A partly submerged glacier cave on perito मोरेनो Glacier.
The बर्फ मुखाग्र is approximately 60 m high
Ice formations in the Titlis glacier cave
A हिमानी cave is a cave formed within the ice of a glacier.
Glacier caves are often called ice caves, but this term is properly used to describe bedrock गुफाएं that contain year-round ice.
In physics, circular motion is a movement of an object along the परिधि of a वृत्त or रोटेशन साथ a गोलाकार path.
It can be वर्दी, साथ निरंतर angular rate of rotation ( and constant speed ), or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation.
The rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional देह involves गोलाकार motion of its parts.
The equations of motion describe the गति of the बीच of द्रव्यमान of a body.
उदाहरण of गोलाकार गति शामिल : an कृत्रिम उपग्रह orbiting the धरती at निरंतर ऊँचाई, a स्टोन जिससे is tied to a रस्सी और is being swung in circles, a car turning through a curve in a race track, an electron moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field, and a gear turning inside a mechanism.
Since the object 's velocity vector is constantly changing direction, the moving object is undergoing acceleration by a अभिकेन्द्रीय फ़ोर्स in the दिशा of the center of rotation.
Without this त्वरण, the ऑब्जेक्ट होता मूव in a सीधा line, according to Newton 's laws of motion.
Apollo पंथ is a fictional अक्षर इससे the Rocky films, initially portrayed as the Undisputed Heavyweight Champion of the World.
He was निभाई by कार्ल Weathers.
Creed had multiple nicknames, including The Master of Disaster, The King of Sting, The Dancing Destroyer, The प्रिंस of पंच, the एक और तभी और the गिनती of Monte Fisto.
Urban legend states that Apollo Creed 's name is a wordplay on the Apostles ' पंथ, a बयान of विश्वास प्रयुक्त in ईसाई चर्च.
All of Apollo 's championship fights were scheduled for the 15 गोलाकार distance.
Championship fights did not बदलें इससे 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987.
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red, white, और ब्लू trunks ; पंथ थी the पहला man to पहनें उन्हें ( latterly worn by रॉकी बाल्बोआ in the 3rd and 4th installments and finally by Tommy `` The Machine '' Gunn ( Tommy Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) although normally he wore red and white, as seen in Rocky II.
Balboa 's signature colors were black and gold—colors he प्रयुक्त in the नवीनतम movie.
In the United States, the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States and confirmed by the United States Senate pursuant to the नियुक्ति clause in आलेख ii of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States, whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter, acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( भी पुकारा `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) साथ appellate क्षेत्राधिकार over अलग regions of the संयुक्त States, and 94 United States district courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court, Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals, और ज़िला न्यायाधीशों of the संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला न्यायालयों.
All of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal सरकारी by आलेख iii of the u.S. संविधान.
In जोड, न्यायाधीशों of the अदालत of International Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal courts, including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges, are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor confirmed by the Senate, and their power derives from Article I instead.
See Article I and आलेख iii अधिकरणों.
the beretta 21a बॉबकैट is a small pocket-sized semi-automatic pistol designed by Beretta in Italy.
Production began in late 1984, solely in the beretta u.s.A. सुविधा in Accokeek, Maryland.
It is a further विकास of the Beretta Model 20, whose production ended in 1985.
Variable Universal Life Insurance ( often shortened to vul ) is a प्रकार of life insurance that builds a cash value.
In a vul, the नकदी मान can be invested in a चौड़ी किस्में of पृथक खाते, समान to mutual funds, and the choice of which of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner.
The 'variable ' घटक in the नाम refers to इस क्षमता to invest in separate accounts whose values vary—they vary because they are invested in stock and/or bond markets.
The 'universal ' component in the नाम refers to the flexibility the owner has in making premium payments.
The premiums can vary from nothing in a given month up to maximums defined by the Internal Revenue कोड लिये जीवन बीमे.
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life insurance that has fixed premium payments that typically can not be missed without lapsing the policy ( although one may exercise an Automatic Premium ऋण विशेषता, or आत्मसमर्पण dividends to अदा a पूरे Life premium ).
Variable universal life is a type of permanent life insurance, because the death benefit will be paid if the insured dies any time as long as there is sufficient नकदी value to pay the costs of insurance in the policy.
With most if not सब vuls, नापसंद पूरे जीवन, वहीँ is no endowment आयु ( the age at which the cash value equals the death benefit amount, which for whole life is typically 100 ).
This is yet another कुंजी लाभ of VUL over Whole Life.
With a typical whole life policy, the death benefit is सीमित to the फेस राशि specified in the policy, and at endowment age, the face amount is all that is paid out.
Thus with either मौत or endowment, the insurance company keeps any cash value built up over the years.
However, some participating whole life policies offer riders which specify that any dividends paid on the policy be used to purchase `` paid up additions '' to the नीति जिससे बढ़ाएँ दोनो the cash value and the death benefit over time.
If investments made in the separate accounts out-perform the सामान्य खाता of the बीमे company, a higher rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life.
The combination over the years of no endowment age, continually increasing death benefit, and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate accounts of a vul नीति, इस could परिणाम in उच्चतर मान to the मालिक or लाभार्थी than कि of a पूरे जीवन policy with the same amounts of money paid in as premiums.
The outdoor wood boiler is a variant of the classic wood stove adapted for set-up outdoors जबकि स्टिल transferring the ऊष्मा to interior buildings.
A mound of लड़की Scout cookies.
This mound contains 74 boxes of cookies
Girl Scout Cookies are cookies sold by Girl Scouts of the USA ( GSUSA ) as one of its major fundraisers for local स्काउट इकाई.
Members of the gsusa have been selling cookies since 1917 to raise funds.
Girls who participate can earn पुरस्कार लिये their efforts.
There are also unit incentives if the ईकाई as a whole does well.
As of 2007, sales were estimated at परिचय 200 लाख boxes per year.
University हॉल
Purdue University, स्तिथ in वेस्ट lafayette, इंडियाना, is the फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों of the six-campus Purdue University system.
Purdue was founded on May 6, 1869, as a land-grant विश्वविद्यालयों जब the इंडियाना सामान्य सभा, लेने लाभ of the Morrill Act, accepted a donation of land and money from Lafayette businessman John Purdue to establish a college of science, technology, and agriculture in his name.
The first classes were held on सितंबर 16, 1874, साथ छह instructors and 39 students.
Today, Purdue is a member of the बिग टेन सम्मेलन, और is a well known world-class research institution.
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of कोई विश्वविद्यालयों in इंडियाना as well as the fourth largest international student population of any university in the United States.
Purdue offers both undergraduate and ग्रैजुएट कार्यक्रम in over 211 प्रमुख क्षेत्रों of पढ़ाई, and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula.
The university has also been highly influential in America 's history of aviation, having स्थापित the पहला कॉलेज क्रेडिट offered in उड़ान प्रशिक्षण, the पहला four-year स्नातक 's degree in aviation, and the first university airport ( Purdue University Airport ).
Purdue 's aviation technology कार्यक्रम remains एक of the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी aviation-specific programs in the world.
In the mid-20th century, Purdue 's aviation program expanded to encompass उन्नत spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving वृद्धि to purdue 's nickname, Cradle of Astronauts.
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts, including Gus Grissom ( one of the original Mercury Seven astronauts ), Neil आर्मस्ट्रांग ( the पहला व्यक्ति to चलना on the चंद्रमा ), और यूजीन Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ).
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a पद कि loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( also known as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
Because an epidermoid cyst originates in the epidermis and a pilar cyst originates from hair follicles, by definition, neither प्रकार of गाँठ is strictly a sebaceous cyst.
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty, white, semi-solid material in both of these cyst entities is नहीं sebum, but keratin.
furthermore, अंतर्गत the microscope neither entity contains sebaceous glands.
In अभ्यास, however, the terms are often used interchangeably.
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and are known as steatocystomas or, if अनेक, as steatocystoma multiplex.
Modern pointe shoes.
The edge of the टो pad, which is inserted between the foot and toe box for cushioning, can be seen on the right foot.
A pointe shoe is a type of shoe worn by बैले नर्तक when performing pointe work.
Pointe shoes developed from the ख्वाहिश लिये नर्तक to appear weightless and sylph -like and have evolved to enable dancers to dance en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of time.
They are normally worn by female dancers, though male dancers may wear them for unorthodox roles such as the भद्दा stepsisters in सिंडरेला, नीचे in a midsummer रात्रि 's सपना, or मेन performing as women in dance companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva.
They are manufactured in a variety of रंगों, सबसे commonly in shades of light pink.
This tablespoon has a capacity of about 15 mL.
measuring Spoons
In the us और भाग of Canada, a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for eating from a bowl.
In the UK, Europe and सबसे राष्ट्रमंडल countries, a tablespoon is a type of large spoon usually used for serving.
In countries where a tablespoon is a serving spoon, the nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the मिठाई चमचा or the soup spoon.
A tablespoonful, nominally the capacity of one tablespoon, is commonly used as a measure of volume in cooking.
It is abbreviated as T, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated by law and is विषय to considerable variation.
In the USA एक tablespoon ( मापन ईकाई ) is लगभग 15 mL ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( dining utensil ) ranges from 7 mL to 14 mL.
In Australia one tablespoon ( मापन ईकाई ) is 20 mL.
हैरी कुम्हार is a श्रेणी of सात काल्पनिक novels written by the British author J. K. Rowling.
The books chronicle the adventures of a जादूगर, हैरी कुम्हार, और उसके मित्रों रोनाल्ड वीज़्ली और हर्माइनी Granger, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort, whose aims are to become immortal, जीतें the wizarding संसार, subjugate non-magical लोगों, and destroy all those who stand in his way, especially Harry Potter.
Since the release of the first novel Harry Potter and the पारस 's स्टोन on 30 जून 1997, the किताबे have gained immense popularity, critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide.
the श्रेणी रै भी था कुछ share of criticism, including concern for the increasingly dark tone.
, the book series has sold about 450 लाख नक़ल, बनाना it the best-selling book series in history, and has been translated into 67 languages.
The last four books consecutively नियत रिकॉर्ड as the fastest-selling books in history.
A series of many genres, including fantasy and coming of age ( with elements of mystery, thriller, adventure, and romance ), it रै अनेक सांस्कृतिक meanings और सन्दर्भ.
According to रोलिंग, the main theme is death.
वहीँ हैं भी अनेक other themes in the series, such as prejudice and corruption.
the आरंभिक प्रमुख प्रकाशक of the books were Bloomsbury in the United Kingdom and Scholastic Press in the United States.
The books have चूंकि महरूम प्रकाशित by अनेक publishers worldwide.
The books, with the seventh book split into दो भाग, have महरूम बना into an eight-part film series by Warner Bros. Pictures, the highest-grossing film series of all time.
The series also originated much tie-in merchandise, बनाना the Harry Potter brand worth in excess of $ 15 billion.
Also due to the success of the books and films, Harry Potter has been used for a theme park, The Wizarding World of Harry कुम्हार in सार्वभौमिक पार्क & रिसॉर्ट 's Islands of Adventure.

viking 5C rocket engine
A rocket engine, or simply `` प्रक्षेपास्त्र '', is a जेट इंजन कि उपयोग only stored propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive jet.
Rocket engines are reaction engines and obtain thrust in accordance साथ Newton 's third law.
Since they need no external material to form their jet, rocket engines can be used for spacecraft नोदन as खूब as स्थलीय उपयोग, ऐसे as missiles.
Most rocket engines are internal combustion engines, although non-combusting फ़ॉर्म भी exist.
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust velocities, are by far the lightest, लकिन हैं the तनिक propellant efficient of all types of jet engines.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a song by अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार Britney Spears.
It served as Spears 's debut single and title track इससे उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम,... Baby One More Time ( 1999 ).
Written by Max Martin and produced by Martin and Rami, ``... Baby एक अधिक समय '' थी released on सितंबर 30, 1998, by Jive Records.
After रिकॉर्डिंग और sending a डेमो tape with an unused song from Toni Braxton, Spears signed a multi-album deal with Jive.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a teen pop and dance-pop song that refers to a girl who regrets breaking up साथ her boyfriend.
the सोंग प्राप्त generally favorable reviews from critics, who praised its composition.
``... Baby One More Time '' attained global success, reaching number one in प्रत्येक देश it charted.
It also received numerous certifications around the world, और is एक of the best-selling singles of all time, with over 10 million copies sold.
An accompanying music video, directed by Nigel Dick, portrays Spears as a student from a Catholic high स्कूल, जो starts to daydream कि वो is गायन और नाचना around the school, while watching her love interest from afar.
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ), where Spears 's fictional daughter is वेश साथ a समान schoolgirl पहनावा while wearing pink ribbons in her hair.
In 2010, the म्यूज़िक वीडियो लिये ``... baby एक अधिक Time '' was voted the third most influential video in the history of pop music, in a poll held by Jam !.
Spears has performed ``... Baby One More Time '' in a number of सजीव दिखावे and in all of her concert tours.
It was the encore of the... Baby One More समय दौरे ( 1999 ) और सपना भीतर a Dream Tour ( 2001 ) ; Spears also performed remixed versions of the song during the Oops !...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ), The Onyx Hotel Tour ( 2004 ), The M+M 's Tour ( 2007 ), The Circus Starring britney स्पीयर्स ( 2009 ), और the femme fatale दौरे ( 2011 ).
``... Baby One More Time '' was nominated लिये a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा Pop Vocal Performance, and has been included in lists by Blender, Rolling Stone and VH1.
It has been noted for redefining the ध्वनि of late 1990s music.
स्पीयर्स रै नामित ``... Baby One More Time '' as one of her favorite songs from her career.
It was also the final song to be played on the बीबीसी 's म्यूज़िक कार्यक्रम Top of the Pops.
Cholera is an संक्रमण in the छोटी आंत caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
The main लक्षण हैं watery diarrhea and vomiting.
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food that has been contaminated by the feces ( waste उत्पाद ) of an संक्रमित व्यक्ति, सहित one with no apparent symptoms.
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can lead to rapid dehydration and electrolyte असंतुलन, और मौत in कुछ cases.
The primary treatment is oral पुनर्जलीकरण चिकित्सा, typically with oral rehydration solution, to replace water and electrolytes.
If this is not tolerated or does not provide सुधार तेज़ पर्याप्त, intravenous fluids can also be used.
Antibacterial drugs are beneficial in those with severe disease to shorten its duration and severity.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 लाख लोगों and causes 100,000–130,000 deaths a year.
Cholera was one of the earliest infections to be studied by epidemiological methods.
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only published novel by Oscar Wilde, appearing as the सीसे स्टोरी in lippincott 's मासिक पत्रिका on 20 June 1890, printed as the July 1890 issue of this magazine.
The magazine 's editors feared the story was indecent as submitted, so वे censored roughly 500 शब्द, without Wilde 's knowledge, before publication.
But even with that, the story was still greeted with outrage by British reviewers, some of whom suggested that Wilde should be prosecuted on moral grounds, leading वाइल्ड to बचाव the अनोखा aggressively in letters to the British press.
Wilde later revised the story for book publication, making substantial alterations, deleting controversial passages, adding नई अध्याय और सहित an aphoristic Preface which has since become famous in its own right.
The amended version was published by वार्ड, ताला और कम्पनी in April 1891.
Some scholars believe that Wilde would today have wanted us to read the संस्करण he originally सुपुर्द to lippincott 's.
The novel tells of a young man नामित डोरियन धूसर, the विषय of a painting by artist Basil Hallward.
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's beauty and becomes infatuated with him, believing उसके सौंदर्य is responsible for a new mode in his art.
Dorian meets Lord Henry Wotton, a friend of बेसिल 's, और becomes enthralled by रब Henry 's world view.
espousing a नई hedonism, रब हेनरी suggests the only things worth pursuing in life are beauty and fulfilment of the senses.
Realizing that one day his beauty will fade, Dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a ख्वाहिश to बेचें उसके आत्मा to ensure the portrait Basil has painted would age rather than he.
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled, and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery, the portrait serves as a reminder of the effect each अधिनियम रै upon उसके आत्मा, साथ प्रत्येक सिन प्रदर्शित as a disfigurement of his form, or through a sign of aging.
The चित्र of डोरियन धूसर is माना a work of classic Gothic fiction with a strong Faustian theme.
Sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ), known as Zsa Zsa Gabor ( ), is a Hungarian -born American अभिनेत्री जो acted in supporting भूमिकाएँ in फिल्मों, on ब्रॉडवे, और occasionally on television.
गैबर was also a socialite.
She began her stage career in Vienna at आयु 15, और थी पहनाया Miss Hungary in 1936.
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and became a sought-after अभिनेत्री साथ `` यूरोपीय flair and style '', with a personality that `` exuded charm and grace ''.
Her first movie role was as supporting अभिनेत्री in Lovely to Look At.
She later acted in we 're नहीं शादीशुदा !
and played one of her few leading roles in Moulin रूज ( 1952 ), निर्देशित by जॉन हस्टन, जो वर्णित उसके as a `` विश्वसनीय '' actress.
Besides her film and television appearances, she is best known for having nine husbands, सहित होटल महारथी कोनराड हिल्टन and actor George Sanders.
She once stated, `` Men have सदा liked me and I have always liked men.
But I like a mannish man, a man who knows कैसा to बात to और दावत a स्त्री – not just a man with muscles. ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20 जुलाई 1973 ) was a Chinese American martial artist, actor, martial arts instructor, philosopher, and filmmaker.
The founder of Jeet kune do, ली थी the बेटे of Cantonese opera star Lee Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely considered by commentators, critics, media and other martial कलाकारों to be one of the most influential martial artists of all time, and a pop culture icon of the 20th century.
He is often credited with helping to बदलें the रास्ता एशियाइ were presented in American films.
Lee was born in चाइनाटाउन, सैन फ्रांसिस्को on 27 November 1940 to parents from Hong Kong and was raised in Kowloon with his family until his late teens.
He was introduced to the फिल्मी उद्योग by his father and appeared in several films as a child actor.
Lee moved to the United States at the age of 18 to receive his higher शिक्षा, and it was during this time that he began teaching martial arts.
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated the traditional Hong Kong martial arts film to a new स्तर of लोकप्रियता और acclaim, sparking a surge of interest in Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s.
The direction and tone of his films changed and influenced martial arts and martial arts films in Hong काँग और the बाकी of the world.
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) and Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; Way of the ड्रैगन ( 1972 ), निर्देशित और लिखा by ली ; warner भाइयो ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of Death ( 1978 ), both directed by Robert Clouse.
Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the world, particularly among the Chinese, as he portrayed चाइनीज राष्ट्रवाद in his films.
He initially trained in Wing Chun, but later rejected well-defined martial art styles, favouring instead the use of techniques from various sources, in the spirit of his personal martial arts philosophy, जिससे he उतावले जीत kune do ( the रास्ता of the intercepting Fist ).
Lee held dual नागरिकता of हांग काँग and the United States.
He died in कोलून Tong on 20 July 1973 at age 32.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ), also known as chronic obstructive lung disease ( COLD ), chronic obstructive airway disease ( COAD ), chronic airflow limitation ( कैलोरी ) and chronic obstructive respiratory disease ( CORD ), is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema, a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time.
This limits airflow to और इससे the lungs, causing shortness of breath ( dyspnea ).
In clinical practice, COPD is defined by इसके characteristically कम airflow on lung function tests.
In contrast to asthma, this limitation is poorly reversible and प्रायः gets progressively worse over time.
COPD is caused by noxious अणु or गैस, सबसे commonly इससे तम्बाकू smoking, which triggers an abnormal inflammatory response in the lung.
The diagnosis of COPD requires lung फलन परीक्षण.
Important management strategies are smoking cessation, vaccinations, पुनर्वास, और drug therapy ( often using inhalers ).
Some मरीजों go on to require long-term oxygen therapy or lung transplantation.
विश्वव्यापी, copd क्रमित as the sixth leading cause of death in 1990.
It is projected to become the fourth leading cause of मौत विश्वव्यापी by 2030, due to an increase in smoking rates and demographic changes in many countries.
COPD is the third leading cause of मौत in the u.S., और the economic burden of COPD in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in health care costs and lost productivity.
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank (, ?, ; 12 जून 1929early कूच 1945 ) is one of the most discussed Jewish victims of the Holocaust.
Her diary has been the आधार लिये several plays and films.
Born in the city of Frankfurt am Main in वाइमर जर्मनी, वो lived most of her life in or near Amsterdam, in the Netherlands.
Born a जर्मनी नेशनल, फ़्रैंक lost her citizenship in 1941.
She gained international fame मरणोपरांत बाद उसके डायरी थी प्रकाशित.
It documents her experiences hiding during the German occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स in संसार युद्ध II.
The Frank family moved from Germany to एम्सटर्डम in 1933, the साल the nazis gained कंट्रोल over Germany.
By the beginning of 1940, they were trapped in Amsterdam by the नाजी occupation of the Netherlands.
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in July 1942, the परिवार गई into छुपाना in the छुपा कक्ष of ऐनी 's father, Otto Frank 's, office building.
After two years, the group was betrayed and transported to concentration camps.
Anne Frank and her सिस्टर, margot, यहूद आखिरकार transferred to the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp, where they died of typhus in March 1945.
Otto Frank, the only survivor of the family, returned to Amsterdam after the war to find that Anne 's diary had been saved, and his efforts led to इसके प्रकाशन in 1947.
It was translated from its असली डच और पहला published in English in 1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl.
It has since been translated into अनेक भाषाएं.
The diary, which was given to Anne on her 13th birthday, chronicles her life इससे 12 जून 1942 जबतक 1 अगस्त 1944.

Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) was an American musician and artist, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर, guitarist और प्राथमिक songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in एबरडीन, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 और स्थापित it as भाग of the सिएटल music scene, having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC रिकॉर्ड, the बैंड मिला भेदन कामयाबी with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of Nevermind, निर्वाण was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X, and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was often असहज और कुंठित, believing his message and artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public, with his personal issues often subject to media attention.
He challenged निर्वाण 's दर्शक साथ its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of his life, Cobain struggled with heroin व्यसन, बीमारी और अवसाद.
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public चित्र, और the पेशेवर and lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his wife, musician Courtney Love.
On April 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his home in Seattle, the शिकार of कया थी officially शासित a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
The circumstances of his death at age 27 have become a टॉपिक of public fascination and debate.
चूंकि उनके डेब्यू, Nirvana, with Cobain as a songwriter, has sold over 25 million albums in the U.S., and over 50 million worldwide.

Radial engine of a बाईप्लेन
Master rod ( upright ), slaves और balances इससे a two-row, fourteen-cylinder Pratt & Whitney Twin Wasp
The radial engine is a reciprocating type internal combustion engine configuration in which the cylinders point outward from a central crankshaft जैसे the तीलियां of a व्हील.
It resembles a stylized star when viewed इससे the सामने, and is called a `` star engine '' ( German Sternmotor ) in some languages.
The radial विन्यास थी बहुत commonly used in aircraft engines before turbine engines became predominant.
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom, created by Susan Harris, that originally aired on NBC from September 13, 1985, to may 9, 1992.
Starring Bea Arthur, Betty White, Rue McClanahan and Estelle Getty, the show centers on four older महिलाओं sharing a घर in मियामी, फ्लोरिडा.
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris Productions, in association with Touchstone टेलीविज़न, और पॉल junger witt, टोनी थामस, and Harris served as the original executive producers.
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout सबसे of its run and won several awards, including the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy Series twice.
It also won three Golden Globe Awards for Best Television श्रेणी – Musical or Comedy.
All four stars each received an Emmy Award throughout the series ' run and had multiple nominations.
The series also ranked among the top ten highest-rated programs for six out of इसके सात seasons.
Deepwater drilling is the process of oil and gas खोजी और उत्पादन in गहराइयों of more than 500 feet.
By this definition, वहीँ हैं लगभग 600 deepwater wells in the Gulf of Mexico.
It has been economically infeasible लिये अनेक सालो, लकिन साथ उठती oil prices, more companies are investing in this area.
प्रमुख कंपनियाँ working in this sector include Diamond Offshore, TransOcean, and Baker Hughes.
There are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater खुदाई rigs : semi-submersible drilling rigs and drillships.
Drilling can also be performed from a fixed-position संस्थापना ऐसे as a फ्लोटिंग spar ( platform ) or tension-leg platform.
Recent industry विश्लेषण रै अनुमानित कि the कुल व्यय in the global deepwater infrastructure market will reach $ 145bn in 2011.
“not all oil is accessible on land or in shallow water.
You can find some oil deposits buried deep under the ocean floor.”... Using sonic equipment, आयल कंपनियाँ determine the खुदाई sites most likely to produce oil.
Then they use a mobile offshore खुदाई ईकाई ( MODU ) to dig the initial well.
Some units हैं परिवर्तित into production rigs, meaning they switch from drilling for oil to capturing oil once it 's found.
Most of the समय, the आयल कम्पनी होगा replace the MODU with a more permanent oil production rig to capture oil.”... The MODU 's job is to drill down into the ocean 's floor to find oil deposits.
The part of the ड्रिल कि extends नीचे the deck and through the water is called the riser.
The riser allows for drilling fluids to मूव between the मंजिल and the rig.
इंजीनियर्स निम्नतर a ड्रिल string -- a series of pipes designed to drill down to the oil deposit -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater drilling is happening despite दुर्घटनाओं in offshore fields... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred killing 11 workers and spilling लाखो of गैलन of आयल into the गल्फ of Mexico while a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters.
“... Despite the risks, the deepwater drilling trend is spreading in the Mediterranean and off the coast of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such खुदाई, विश्लेषक कह, is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to face the high risks that come with deepwater drilling in order for Americans to continue to carry on their everyday lives.
“The Energy Department recently प्रक्षिप्त कि गल्फ आयल उत्पादन would expand from its 2011 level of 1.3 million barrels a day, still nearly a quarter of total domestic production, to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater खुदाई affects the पर्यावरण in both negative and positive ways.
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes oil spills it is स्टिल a hazardous संभावित निष्कर्ष.
Oil spills result in oil sinking to the bottom of the ocean smothering plant life leaving मछली बगैर खाना और आश्रय to जीवित.
On the अन्य हाथ deepwater drilling effects the environment in a positive ways too.
In time once the deepwater oil well is not in उपयोग anymore पौधे होगा grow on और around the well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in.
Deepwater drilling also lets us see the depths of the समंदर मंजिल कि हैं hardly ever seen.
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record footage and take photos of rare fish that are in वहीँ प्राकृतिक आवास, giving वैज्ञानिक a dekh at animals they rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ). ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री साथ जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair and its परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
Francis Albert `` Frank '' Sinatra,, ( December 12, 1915 – May 14, 1998 ) was an अमरीकी सिंगर और फिल्मी actor.
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy Dorsey, Sinatra found unprecedented success as a solo artist from the early to mid-1940s after being signed to Columbia Records in 1943.
Being the idol of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released his first album, The Voice of Frank Sinatra in 1946.
His professional career had stalled by the 1950s, but it was reborn in 1953 बाद he जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity.
He signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and released several critically lauded एल्बम ( ऐसे as in the मूत छोटी घंटों, गीतों लिये swingin ' प्रेमियों !, Come Fly with Me, Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ).
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label, Reprise रिकॉर्ड in 1961 ( ढूंढना कामयाबी साथ एल्बम ऐसे as ring-a-ding-ding !, सिनात्रा at the Sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio Carlos Jobim ), toured internationally, was a founding member of the Rat Pack and fraternized with celebrities and statesmen, including John F. Kennedy.
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective सितंबर of my सालो, स्ट्रक्चर in the एमी -winning टेलीविज़न special Frank Sinatra : A Man and His Music, and scored hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way ``.
With sales of his music dwindling and after appearing in several poorly received films, Sinatra retired for the first time in 1971.
Two years later, however, he came आउट of रिटायरमेंट और in 1973 recorded several albums, scoring a Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme From ) New York, New York `` in 1980.
Using his Las Vegas shows as a home base, he toured both भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य और internationally, until a short time before his death in 1998.
Sinatra भी forged a highly successful career as a film actor.
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953, he also garnered a nomination for Best Actor for The Man with the Golden Arm, and critical acclaim लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the मंचूरियन Candidate.
He also starred in such musicals as High Society, Pal Joey, यारों और डॉल और on the Town.
सिनात्रा थी सम्मानित at the Kennedy Center Honors in 1983 and was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by Ronald Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997.
He was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards, including the ग्रैमी trustees पुरस्कार, ग्रैमी लेजेंड पुरस्कार और the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award.
सिनात्रा is भी एक of world’s best-selling artists of all time, having sold more than 150 million copies worldwide.
Typical cornhole फलक
Cornhole, also known as bean bag toss, corn toss, baggo or bags, is a lawn game in जिससे खिलाड़ी लो turns फेंकना मकई छेद बैग at a raised platform with a hole in the far end.
A bag in the hole scores 3 अंक, जबकि one on the platform scores 1 point.
Play continues जबतक a टोली or player reaches the score of 21.
The अमरीकी सुनहरा त्रिभुज is an official gold bullion coin of the United States.
Authorized under the Gold bullion सिक्का Act of 1985, it was first released by the United States Mint in 1986.
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga that Bikram Choudhury synthesized from परंपरागत hatha योग तकनीकों और popularized शुरूआत in the early 1970s.
All Bikram Yoga वर्ग चलाएं लिये 90 मिनट्स और consist of the same series of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises.
Bikram Yoga is ideally practiced in a room heated to 105°F ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a आर्द्रता of 40 %,.

massey रै प्राप्त many awards and nomination including a Young Artist Award and Emmy Awards nominations.

A conventional teaspoon made of बेदाग स्टील.
A teaspoon is an item of cutlery and/or a measuring यंत्र, as खूब as a ईकाई of मापन of आवाज़ in some countries and customs.
A fern is any one or more of a group of about 12,000 species of plants belonging to the botanical group known as Pteridophyta.
Unlike mosses, they have xylem and phloem ( making उन्हें vascular plants ).
They have stems, leaves, and roots like other vascular plants.
Ferns reproduce via बीजाणुओं and have neither seeds nor flowers.
By दूर the largest समूह of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, but ferns as defined here ( also called monilophytes ) include horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, and ophioglossoid ferns.
The term pteridophyte also refers to ferns and a few अन्य बीजरहित vascular पौधे ( देखिए वर्गीकरण section below ).
Ferns first appear in the fossil record 360 million years ago in the Carboniferous but many of the current families and species did not appear until roughly 145 लाख सालो पहले in the जल्दी cretaceous ( after flowering plants came to dominate many environments ).
Ferns are not of major economic importance, but some are grown or gathered for food, as ornamental plants, for remediating contaminated soils, और have महरूम the विषय of शोध लिये उनके ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air.
कुछ हैं significant weeds.
They also play a role in mythology, आयुर्विज्ञान, and art.
Flat roofs in Israel
Flat roof in लॉस एंजिल्स
A flat roof is a type of covering for a भवन.
in कंट्रास्ट to the more sloped form of roof, a flat roof is horizontal or nearly horizontal.
The slope of a roof is properly known as its pitch : Roofs which हैं nearly चपटा हैं ज्ञात as low-pitch roofs ( as the कोण of slope increases, so the pitch is said to increase ).
Any sheet of सामग्री प्रयुक्त to कवर a चपटा or low-pitched छत is usually known as a membrane and the primary purpose of these membranes is to waterproof the roof area.
Materials that cover flat roofs typically allow the water to run बंद इससे a पतला inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water from some flat roofs such as on garden sheds sometimes flows freely off the edge of a roof, though gutter प्रणालियों हैं of लाभ in keeping दोनो walls and foundations dry.
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead जल सीधे onto the मैदान, or बेहतर, into a specially made soakaway.
Gutters on larger roofs usually सीसे जल into the rainwater नाले system of any built up area.
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to collect water in a pool, usually for aesthetic purposes, or लिये rainwater buffering.
Flat roofs मौजूद सब over the संसार और प्रत्येक क्षेत्रफल रै इसके own tradition or preference for materials used.
In warmer climes where rainfall is less and freezing is unlikely to occur, many flat roofs are simply built of masonry or concrete and this is good at keeping out the heat of the sun and cheap and easy to build जहाँ timber is नहीं readily उपलब्धियाँ.
in क्षेत्रों जहाँ the छत could become संतृप्त by बरसात और leak, or where water soaked into the brickwork could freeze to ice and thus lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs are not suitable.
traditionally सबसे चपटा roofs in the पश्चिमी world make use of tar or more usually tar paper applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight.
The tar or tarpaper is in फेरे covered in gravel to keep the sun 's heat, UV rays and weather off it and helps protect it from cracking or blistering and degradation.
Roof decking is usually of plywood, chipboard or osb फलक ( osb = उन्मुख strand फलक, also known as Sterling board ) of around 18mm thickness.
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a hot liquid, heated in a tar kettle, or as sheets of tar impregnated 'paper ' glued down and sealed together at joints by hot तारकोल - एकबार it रै cooled, the gravel is spread evenly over it.
A main reason for failure of ये परंपरागत roofs is अनभिज्ञता or कमी of मेंटेनेंस जहाँ लोगों or कार्यक्रम कारण the बजरी to be स्थानांतरित or removed from the tar or tarpaper waterproofing, thus exposing it to weather and sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in.
tarpaper is प्रायः a 'paper ' or fibre material soaked or impregnated in tar.
As gravel can not protect tarpaper surfaces where they rise vertically from the roof such as on parapet दीवारें or upstands, tarpaper विसंगतियाँ हैं उत्पादित with fine gravel applied to the hot tar during the process of manufacture such that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection.
Tarpapers vary in quality as does the workmanship and प्रशिक्षण of those applying it to produce more or less successful results.
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in relation to the cost of materials purchase and cost of laying them, however the cost of modern membranes ऐसे as epdm रै आइये bas over recent years to make them more and more affordable.
There are now अधिक firms supplying आधुनिक विकल्प and there is generally a growing awareness of their performance and availability.
If a leak does occur on a flat roof then damage often goes unnoticed for long periods of time during which water penetrates and soaks the decking and any insulation and/or structure beneath it.
This can lead to expensive damage from the rot which often develops and if left can weaken the छत ढांचा.
There are also various health risks to people and animals breathing the mould spores : the severity of इस स्वास्थ्य रिस्क remains a debated point.
One problem with maintaining flat roofs is that if water does penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a modern membrane ) it can सफर a long रास्ता पहले causing दृश्य क्षति or टपकती into a भवन जहाँ it can be seen.
Thus it is नहीं easy to see where it is leaking in order to repair it.
एकबार underlying छत अलंकार is soaked it often sags causing a further collection or puddling of water in that area and the problem worsens.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क जिससे contains data.
The name is an acronym which stands for `` Compact Disc read-only मेमोरी ``.
Computers can read cd-roms, लकिन can नहीं लिखें on them.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software, including वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया applications, though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
कुछ cds, पुकारा उन्नत cds, थाम दोनो कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा और audio with the latter capable of being played on a CD player, while data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the technical standard that defines the स्वरूप of cd-roms.
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the technical specifications for all CD formats, the Yellow Book, created by Sony and Philips, was the पहला एक्सटेंशन of कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क डिजिटल ऑडियो.
It adapted the format to थाम any form of data.
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 July 1965 ), pen name J. K. Rowling, is a अंग्रेजों novelist, best known as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series.
The Potter किताबे have gained विश्वव्यापी attention, won multiple awards, and sold more than 400 million copies.
They have become the best-selling book series in history, and been the आधार लिये a श्रेणी of films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history.
Rowling had overall approval on the scripts as well as maintaining creative control by सेवारत as a निर्माता on the फाइनल किस्त.
born in yate, ग्लॉस्टरशायर, रोलिंग थी working as a शोधकर्ता and bilingual secretary for Amnesty International when she conceived the idea for the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990.
The seven-year period that followed entailed the मौत of उसके माँ, तलाक इससे उसके पहला husband और poverty until Rowling finished the first novel in the series, Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ).
Rowling subsequently प्रकाशित 6 sequels—the last, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as well as 3 supplements to the series.
In 2012, Rowling parted with her एजेंसी और resumed लिखने in the रूप of a tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership, entitled The Casual Vacancy.
Rowling रै कहा वो is फिलहाल working on दो books—one aimed लिये वयस्कों, the other for children younger than the Harry Potter audience, and she expects the latter to be published first.
Rowling has led a `` rags to riches `` life story, in which she progressed from living on राज्य लाभ to multi-millionaire status within five years.
She is the संयुक्त किंगडम 's best-selling author since records began, with sales in excess of £238m.
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich List estimated Rowling 's सौभाग्य at £560 लाख ( $ 798 लाख ), रैंकिंग उसके as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom.
Forbes क्रमित रोलिंग as the forty-eighth सबसे शक्तिशाली हस्ती of 2007, and TIME magazine named her as a runner-up for its 2007 Person of the Year, noting the social, moral, and political inspiration she has given her fans.
In October 2010, Rowling was named the `` Most Influential Woman in Britain '' by अग्रणी पत्रिका editors.
She has become a notable philanthropist, supporting such charities as Comic Relief, One Parent Families, Multiple काठिन्य समाज of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और lumos ( formerly the children 's High Level Group ).
Auburndale is a नगर in polk काउंटी, Florida, United States.
The population was 11,032 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
According to the U.S Census estimates of 2005, the city had a जनसांख्यिकी of 12,381.
It is part of the Lakeland – Winter हेवन महानगर Statistical Area.
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen from orbit during expedition 7 of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस Station.
The eye, eyewall, and surrounding rainbands, विशेषताएँ of तीव्र cyclones, are clearly visible in this view from space.
A tropical cyclone is a storm system characterized by a low-pressure बीच surrounded by a spiral arrangement of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy rain.
Tropical cyclones strengthen when water evaporated from the ocean is released as the संतृप्त एयर उदय, resulting in condensation of water vapor contained in the moist air.
They are fueled by a different heat mechanism than अन्य cyclonic windstorms such as nor'easters, European windstorms, and polar lows.
The characteristic that separates tropical cyclones from other cyclonic systems is that at any ऊँचाई in the माहौल, the बीच of a तीव्र चक्रवात will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems.
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical origin of these systems, which usually form in tropical regions of the ग्लोब, और to उनके formation in maritime tropical air masses.
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms ' cyclonic nature, with counterclockwise wind flow in the Northern गोलार्ध और clockwise हवा प्रवाह in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध.
The opposite दिशा of the wind flow is a result of the Coriolis force.
Depending on its location and strength, a tropical cyclone is referred to by names such as hurricane (, ), तूफ़ान ( ), तीव्र storm, cyclonic storm, tropical depression, and simply cyclone.
While tropical cyclones can produce extremely powerful winds and torrential rain, they are also able to produce high लहरें, damaging तूफ़ान surge, and tornadoes.
They develop over large bodies of warm water, and lose उनके शक्ति if वे मूव over जमीन due to increased surface friction and loss of the warm ocean as an energy source.
This is why coastal regions can प्राप्त significant damage from a tropical cyclone, while inland regions are relatively safe from receiving strong winds.
Heavy rains, however, can produce significant flooding inland, and storm surges can produce extensive तटीय बाढ़ up to इससे the तटरेखा.
Although their effects on human populations can be विनाशकारी, tropical cyclones can relieve drought conditions.
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and transport it toward temperate latitudes, which makes उन्हें an महत्वपूर्ण part of the global atmospheric circulation mechanism.
As a result, tropical cyclones help to maintain equilibrium in the Earth 's troposphere, and to maintain a relatively stable और गरम तापमान worldwide.
Many tropical cyclones develop when the atmospheric conditions around a कमजोर disturbance in the माहौल हैं favorable.
The background environment is modulated by climatological cycles and patterns such as the Madden-Julian oscillation, El Niño-Southern दोलन, और the अटलांटिक multidecadal oscillation.
Others form when अन्य प्रकार of cyclones acquire tropical characteristics.
Tropical systems are then moved by steering winds in the troposphere ; if the conditions remain favorable, the तीव्र disturbance intensifies, and can even develop an eye.
On the other end of the spectrum, if the conditions around the system deteriorate or the tropical cyclone makes landfall, the प्रणाली weakens and eventually dissipates.
It is not possible to artificially induce the dissipation of ये प्रणालियों साथ current technology.
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch, ; December 9, 1916 ) is an American stage and film actor, film producer and author.
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ), Champion ( 1949 ), Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ), The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952 ), 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ), Lust for Life ( 1956 ), Paths of Glory ( 1957 ), Gunfight at the O.K. Corral ( 1957 ), The Vikings ( 1958 ), Spartacus ( 1960 ), Lonely Are the Brave ( 1962 ), सात दिनों in may ( 1964 ), the नायक of telemark ( 1965 ) और मुश्किल यारों ( 1986 ).
He is No.17 on the American Film Institute 's list of the greatest male American स्क्रीन महापुरूष of सब समय, बनाना उसे the highest-ranked living person on the list.
In 1996, he received the Academy Honorary Award `` for 50 years as a creative and moral force in the गति चित्र जातियाँ. ''
He is one of the last surviving actors from Hollywood 's `` सुनहरी आयु ''.
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born May 6, 1945 ) is an अमरीकी चट्टान and roll singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist, he performed and recorded as Bob Seger and the Last सुना और bob seger प्रणाली throughout the 1960s.
By the early 1970s, he had dropped the `` प्रणाली '' इससे उसके रिकार्डिंग और जारी to strive for broader success with other various bands.
In 1973, he put together The Silver Bullet Band, a group of Detroit-area musicians, with whom he became most successful on the नेशनल स्तर साथ the एल्बम सजीव गोली, अंकित सजीव साथ the Silver Bullet Band in 1975 at Cobo Hall in Detroit, Michigan.
In 1976, he achieved a नेशनल ब्रेकआउट साथ the स्टुडियो album Night Moves.
On his studio albums, he also worked extensively with the Alabama-based मांसपेशी shoals लय खण्ड, जिससे appeared on अनेक of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums.
A roots rocker with a classic raspy, shouting आवाज़, seger लिखा और अंकित songs that dealt with love, women, blue-collar themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock.
Seger has अंकित अनेक हिट्स, सहित `` रात्रि Moves, '' `` Turn the Page, '' `` We 've Got Tonight, '' `` Against the Wind, '' and Shakedown that was written for Beverly Hills Cop II and `` Like a Rock, '' and also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
His iconic recording of `` Old Time Rock and Roll `` was named one of the गीतों of the सदी in 2001.
With a career spanning five decades, seger continues to perform and record today.
Seger was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2004 and the Songwriters हॉल of Fame in 2012.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States, serving from 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to resign the दफ्तर.
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from California and as the 36th वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in Yorba Linda, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
He graduated from whittier कॉलेज in 1934 and Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He and his wife, Pat Nixon, moved to Washington to कार्य लिये the संघीय सरकारी in 1942.
He subsequently served in the United राज्य नेवी दौरान संसार War II.
Nixon was elected in कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the House of Representatives in 1946 and to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his प्रतिष्ठा as a अग्रणी anti-communist, and elevated him to national prominence.
He was the running mate of ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर, the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election.
Nixon परोसा लिये आठ years as vice president.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly losing to John F. Kennedy, और खोया a रेस लिये राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again for the प्रेसिडेंसी and was elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations, and he initiated détente and the anti-ballistic मिसाइल सन्धि साथ the सोवियत संघ the वही year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced policies that transferred power from Washington to the states.
Among other things, he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal दवाएँ, imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण, enforced desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी स्कूलों, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the चंद्र अवतरण शुरूआत with Apollo 11, he scaled back manned space exploration.
He was re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo, the resignation of his vice president, Spiro Agnew, and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by सदस्यों of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his राजनैतिक support, और on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office.
After his resignation, he controversially received a pardon जारी by उसके successor, Gerald Ford.
In retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक books and undertaking many foreign trips, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
He suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18, 1994, and died four days later at the age of 81.
{ { infobox Senator
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused bitter contention between अध्यक्ष Grant and Sen. Sumner.
Brady 1869 ] ]
Sen. Sumner, opposed to अमरीकी साम्राज्यवाद in the caribbean और fearful कि annexation would lead to the conquest of the neighboring black republic of Haiti, became convinced that corruption lay behind the treaty, and that men close to the president shared in the corruption.
As chairman of the Senate Foreign संबंध कमेटी, sen. sumner initially withheld his opinion on the treaty on January 18, 1870.
Sen. Sumner had been leaked information from Assistant Secretary of State, bancroft डेविस, कि u.s. नवल ships were being used to protect President Báez.
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against annexation and at Sen. Sumner’s suggestion and quite possibly to सहेजें the पार्टी इससे an भद्दा लड़ो or the अध्यक्ष from embarrassment, the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session.
President Grant persisted and sent messages to Congress in favor of annexation on कूच 14, 1870, and May 31, 1870.
In closed session, sen. sumner spoke आउट विरूद्ध the सन्धि ; warnng कि वहीँ होता be परेशानी with the foreign nationals, noting the chronic rebellion that took place on the island, and the risk that the independence of Haiti, recognized by the United States in 1862, would be lost.
Sumner stated that Grant 's use of the U.S. Navy as a प्रोटेक्टोरेट थी a उल्लंघन of International law and unconstitutional.
Finally, on June 30, 1870 the treaty was voted on by the Senate and failed to gain the जरूरी 2/3 बहुमत लिये treaty passage.
The following day, President Grant, feeling betrayed by Sen. Sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley, Ambassador to Britain.
By autumn, Sumner 's personal hostility to the president was public knowledge, and he blamed the Secretary of राज्य लिये failing to have resigned, rather than let Grant have his way.
the दो मेन, friends until then, cooled into bitter enemies.
In December, 1870, still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo डोमिंगो somehow, sumner gave a fiercely critical speech accusing the president of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct.
Already, President Grant, supported by his Secretary of State Hamilton Fish, had initiated a campaign to depose Sumner from the chairmanship of the Senate विदेशी संबंध Committee.
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '', in addition to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt, Sumner had defeated Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of Office Act, blocked Grant 's nomination of Alexander Stewart to U.S. Secretary of Treasury, and been a constant harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been willing to go.
Grant resented Sumner 's बड़प्पन of manner, as well.
Told once that Sumner did not believe in the Bible, the अध्यक्ष is supposed to have said that he was not surprised : `` he did n't write it. ''
As the rift between Grant and Sumner increased, Sumner’s स्वास्थ्य began to decline.
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4, 1871, Senators affiliated with President Grant, ज्ञात as ‘’new radicals’’ voted to oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship.
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a form of applied ethics or professional ethics that examines ethical सिद्धान्त और moral or नैतिक समस्याएं कि उठता in a कारोबार पर्यावरण.
It applies to all aspects of business conduct and is relevant to the conduct of individuals and entire organizations.
Business आचार रै दोनो normative and descriptive dimensions.
As a corporate practice और a करियर specialization, the field is primarily normative.
Academics attempting to समझे business behavior employ descriptive methods.
The दायरा और मात्रा of कारोबार नैतिक issues reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns.
Interest in कारोबार आचार त्वरित dramatically during the 1980s and 1990s, both within major corporations and within academia.
For example, today most major corporations promote their commitment to non-economic मान अंतर्गत headings ऐसे as ethics codes and social responsibility charters.
Adam Smith said, `` People of the same trade seldom meet together, even for merriment and diversion, but the वार्तालाप ends in a षड्यंत्र विरूद्ध the पब्लिक, or in some contrivance to raise prices. ''
सरकारें उपयोग कानून and regulations to point business behavior in what they perceive to be beneficial directions.
Ethics implicitly regulates areas and details of behavior that lie beyond governmental control.
The emergence of large corporations with limited relationships and sensitivity to the communities in which they operate त्वरित the विकास of formal ethics regimes.
A burn is a प्रकार of चोट to flesh or स्किन caused by heat, electricity, chemicals, friction, or radiation.
Most burns affect only the सतही स्किन ( ज्ञात as सतही or पहला उपाधि ) or extend into the deeper skin but do not involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second degree ).
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper tissues, such as muscle or bone can be injured in which case the burn is either पूरा मोटाई ( तीसरा उपाधि ) or fourth degree.
The treatment जरूरी depends on the severity of the burn.
Superficial burns maybe managed with छोटी अधिक than सरल पीड़ा हत्यारे जबकि प्रमुख burns may require prolonged treatment in specialized burn centers.
Cooling with tap water may aid pain and decrease damage however if exposure is prolonged it may परिणाम in कम देह temperature.
Partial thickness burns may आवश्यकता सफ़ाई साथ साबुन और जल followed by dressings.
फफोले चाहिए typically be left unbroken.
Full thickness burns usually require surgical treatments such as skin कलम और extensive burns प्रायः आवश्यकता large amount of intravenous fluids.
The most common complications of burns are सम्बन्धित to संक्रमण.
While large burns can be fatal, modern treatments developed in the last 50 years have significantly improved the outcomes, especially in children and young adults.
Globally about 11 million people seek medical treatment and 300,000 people die from burns.
In the United States, of those admitted to a बर्न बीच, लगभग 4 % die from their injuries.
The long term outcome is primarily सम्बन्धित to the size of burn and the age of the person effected.
The Atlantic Ocean, not including Arctic और अंटार्कटिक regions
This video was taken by the crew of Expedition 29 on फलक the ISS.
The pass starts इससे बस north-east of the Island of Newfoundland over the North Atlantic Ocean to central Africa, over South Sudan.
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the संसार 's oceanic divisions.
With a total area of about, it covers approximately 20 percent of the Earth 's सतह and about 29 percent of its water surface area.
The first part of its नाम refers to एटलस of यूनानी mythology, making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas ''.
The oldest known mention of `` Atlantic '' is in The Histories of Herodotus around 450 BC ( Hdt. 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis थलैसा ( यूनानी : ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : Sea of Atlas ).
The term ethiopic समंदर, निकला इससे Ethiopia, was applied to the southern Atlantic as late as the mid-19th century.
Before Europeans खोजा अन्य महासागर, the पद `` समंदर '' itself थी synonymous साथ the waters beyond the Strait of Gibraltar that we now know as the Atlantic.
The early Greeks believed this ocean to be a gigantic नदी encircling the संसार.
The Atlantic Ocean occupies an elongated, S-shaped basin extending longitudinally between Eurasia and Africa to the east, and the Americas to the west.
As एक घटक of the interconnected global ocean, it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( which is sometimes considered a sea of the Atlantic ), to the Pacific Ocean in the southwest, the Indian Ocean in the southeast, and the Southern Ocean in the south.
( Other definitions describe the Atlantic as extending southward to Antarctica. )
The equator subdivides it into the North Atlantic Ocean and South Atlantic Ocean.
Due to their long-term हठ, और the need लिये a अद्वितीय पहचानकर्ता in issuing forecasts और चेतावनियाँ, तीव्र cyclones and subtropical cyclones are given names according to policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ).
The following are lists from which these tropical and subtropical cyclone names are निकला.
White लाइट is dispersed by a prism into the colors of the optical spectrum.
The visible spectrum is the portion of the electromagnetic spectrum that is visible to ( can be detected by ) the इंसान eye.
इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण in this range of wavelengths is called visible light or simply light.
A ठेठ इंसान नजर will respond to wavelengths from about 390 to 700 nm.
In terms of आवृत्ति, इस corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 THz.
A light-adapted eye generally रै इसके अधिकतम sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 THz ), in the green region of the optical spectrum ( see : luminosity function ).
the वर्णक्रम करता नहीं, however, contain all the colors that the human eyes and brain can distinguish.
Unsaturated colors such as pink, or purple variations such as magenta, are absent, लिये उदाहरण, क्युकी वे can be बना तभी by a मिक्सर of अनेक wavelengths.
Colors containing only one wavelength are also पुकारा pure colors.
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window ``, the region of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम जिससे allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere.
An example of this घटना is कि साफ एयर scatters blue light more than red wavelengths, and so the midday sky appears blue.
The optical window is also called the visible window क्युकी it overlaps the इंसान दृश्य जवाब spectrum.
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies just out of the human vision, as well as the Medium Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) window and the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them.
Many species can see light with frequencies बाहर the `` दृश्य वर्णक्रम, '' जिससे is पारिभाषित in terms of human vision.
Bees and many other insects can detect ultraviolet light, which helps them find nectar in flowers.
Plant species that depend on insect pollination may owe reproductive कामयाबी to उनके रूप in ultraviolet light, rather than how colorful they appear to humans.
Birds, too, can see into the पराबैंगनी ( 300–400 nm ), और कुछ have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range.
Many animals that can see into the पराबैंगनी दायरा, however, can नहीं देखिए रेड light or any other reddish wavelengths.
Bees ' visible spectrum ends at परिचय 590nm, बस पहले the orange wavelengths start.
Birds, however, can see some red wavelengths, लकिन नहीं as अनेक as humans.
Zebras ( or ) are several species of African equids ( horse family ) संयुक्त by उनके distinctive ब्लैक और श्वेत stripes.
Their धारियाँ आइये in different patterns, unique to each individual.
They are generally सोशल पशु कि सजीव in small harems to large herds.
Unlike their closest relatives, horses and asses, zebras have never महरूम truly domesticated.
There are three species of zebras : the मैदान जेब्रा, the grévy 's जेब्रा and the mountain zebra.
The plains जेब्रा और the पहाड़ जेब्रा belong to the subgenus Hippotigris, but Grévy 's zebra is the sole species of subgenus Dolichohippus.
The latter resembles an ass, to which it is closely सम्बन्धित, जबकि the पूर्व दो हैं more horse-like.
All three belong to the genus equus, साथ साथ अन्य living equids.
the अद्वितीय धारियाँ of zebras make them one of the animals most familiar to people.
They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, woodlands, thorny scrublands, kyu, and coastal hills.
However, various anthropogenic factors have had a severe impact on zebra populations, in particular शिकार लिये खालें and habitat destruction.
Grévy 's zebra and the पहाड़ जेब्रा are endangered.
While plains zebras are much अधिक plentiful, एक subspecies, the quagga, became विलुप्त in the लेट 19th सदी – हालांकि there is currently a plan, called the Quagga Project, that aims to breed zebras that are phenotypically similar to the quagga in a process called breeding back.
Barry White, born Barry Eugene कार्टर ( – ), थी an अमरीकी composer and singer-songwriter.
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive bass आवाज़ और रोमांटिक चित्र, श्वेत 's महानतम कामयाबी आए in the 1970s as a सोलो सिंगर और साथ the Love Unlimited Orchestra, crafting many enduring soul, funk, and disco songs such as his two biggest hits, `` You 're the First, the Last, My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your Love, Babe. ''
Along with Isaac Hayes, White is considered by allmusic.com as a पायोनियर of डिस्को music in the early 1970s.
During the course of his career in the म्यूज़िक कारोबार, श्वेत achieved 106 gold albums worldwide, 41 of which also attained platinum status.
White had 20 gold and 10 platinum singles, with worldwide sales in excess of 100 लाख, according to आलोचकों ed होगन और Wade Kergan.
His influences included Rev. James Cleveland, Ray Charles, Aretha Franklin plus motown कलाकारों the supremes, the चार Tops and Marvin Gaye.
Angelina Jolie (, born Angelina Jolie Voight ; June 4, 1975 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, फिल्मी निदेशक, और screenwriter.
She has received an Academy Award, two Screen अभिनेताओं गिल्ड Awards, and three Golden Globe Awards, and was named Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes in 2009 and 2011.
Jolie promotes humanitarian causes, and is noted for her work with refugees as a Special Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador for the United राष्ट्र ऊँची कमिश्नर for Refugees ( UNHCR ).
She has often been cited as the world 's `` most खूबसूरत '' स्त्री, a title for which she has received substantial media attention.
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside her father Jon Voight in Lookin ' to Get Out ( 1982 ), लकिन उसके फिल्मी करियर began in सच्चाई a दशक बाद साथ the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ).
Her first अग्रणी भूमिका in a major film was in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ).
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television films George Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 ), and won an Academy Award for Best Supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the drama Girl, Interrupted ( 1999 ).
Jolie achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video game heroine Lara Croft in लारा क्रॉफ्ट : मकबरा रेडर ( 2001 ), और स्थापित herself among the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ).
She continued her action स्टार करियर साथ mr. & mrs. स्मिथ ( 2005 ) और चाही ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated वाणिज्यिक सफलताओं to date—and प्राप्त further critical acclaim for her performances in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and Changeling ( 2008 ), which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress.
Jolie made her directorial debut with the wartime drama in the जमीन of रक्त और मधु ( 2011 ).
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller and Billy Bob Thornton, Jolie now lives with actor Brad Pitt, in a संबंध notable लिये fervent media attention.
Jolie and pitt have three biological children and three adopted children.
A natural arch उत्पादित by the अपरदन of differentially weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz, Jordan
Erosion is the process by which soil and rock are removed इससे the धरती 's सतह by exogenetic प्रक्रियाओं such as wind or water flow, and then transported and deposited in other locations.
While erosion is a natural process, human activities have increased by 10-40 टाइम्स the रेट at जिससे अपरदन is occurring globally.
Excessive erosion कल्याणकारी समस्याएं ऐसे as मरुस्थलीकरण, decreases in agricultural productivity due to land degradation, sedimentation of waterways, and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers.
Water and wind erosion are now the two primary causes of land degradation ; combined, they are responsible for 84 % of degraded acreage, making excessive erosion one of the most significant global environmental problems.
Industrial agriculture, deforestation, roads, anthropogenic climate change and urban sprawl are amongst the most significant human activities in लिहाज़ to उनके प्रभाव on stimulating अपरदन.
However, there are many available alternative land use practices that can curtail or सीमा अपरदन, ऐसे as छत -building, no-till agriculture, and revegetation of denuded soils.
Jersey Shore is an American reality television series जिससे भागा on एमटीवी इससे दिसम्बर 3, 2009 to दिसम्बर 20, 2012 in the United States.
The series follows the जीवनदान of आठ housemates बिता उनके गर्मियाँ at the जर्सी Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey.
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold पूर्वोत्तर शीत to मियामी बीच, with Season 3 returning to the Jersey Shore.
The fourth ऋतु, filmed in Italy, premiered on August 4, 2011.
The show returned for a पांचवां ऋतु, at Seaside Heights on January 5, 2012.
The fifth ऋतु finale aired on March 15, 2012.
On March 19, 2012, MTV confirmed that the श्रेणी होता वापसी for their sixth season.
On August 30, 2012, MTV announced कि the श्रेणी होगा समाप्त बाद the sixth season, which premiered on October 4.
The series finale aired on December 20, 2012.
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words `` Guido / Guidette, '' portrayals of italian-american stereotypes, और scrutiny from locals because the cast members were not residents of the area.
The series garnered रिकार्ड दरजा लिये MTV, making it the network 's most viewed series telecast ever.
The series ' cast have also been credited साथ introducing अद्वितीय lexicon and phrases into American popular culture.
The University of Chicago and the University of Oklahoma are among the शैक्षणिक संस्थानों that have had classes or conferences about the show.
In 2010, the cast of जर्सी shore थी नामित on Barbara Walters ' 10 Most Fascinating People list, and the series has since been exported to dozens of countries worldwide.
There are several remakes of the show in other countries, with दो नियत in the संयुक्त किंगडम ; the खूब ज्ञात Geordie Shore, set in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.
The other is The Valleys, the वेल्श समतुल्य, which is filmed and set in Cardiff.

United States territory is any extent of region under the jurisdiction of the federal सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य, सहित सब waters ( around islands or continental tracts ) and all U.S. Naval vessels.
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign अधिकारों लिये exploring, exploiting, conserving, and managing its territory.
This extent of territory is all the area belonging to, और अंतर्गत the डोमिनियन of, the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी ( which includes tracts lying at a distance from the country ) for administrative and other purposes.
The United राज्य कुल territory includes a subset of political divisions.
The U.S. सरकारी is a सरकारी साथ delegated powers under the United States Constitution.
`` The powers not delegated to the United States by the संविधान, nor निषिद्ध by it to the राज्य, हैं reserved to the States respectively, or to the people '' by the Tenth Amendment.

A cord of लकडी
The cord is a unit of measure of dry volume used in Canada and the United राज्य to माप ईधन और pulpwood.
A cord is the amount of wood that, when `` क्रमित और खूब stowed '' ( arranged so टुकड़े हैं लकीर, समानांतर, touching and compact ), occupies a volume of.
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile high, long, और गहन ; or कोई अन्य व्यवस्था of linear measurements that yields the same volume.
The name cord संभवतः आता इससे the use of a cord or string to measure it.

It was released in Japan on, in North अमेरिका in, और in Europe on.

The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system following the खेल & देखें श्रेणी introduced in, और it संयुक्त features from both the Nintendo Entertainment System and Game & Watch.
It was originally bundled साथ the पहेली खेल टेट्रिस.
