The World Trade Center is a जटिल of इमारतें अंतर्गत निर्माण in निम्नतर मैनहटन, नई यॉर्क नगर, United States, replacing an earlier complex of seven buildings with the same name on the same site.
The original World Trade Center featured landmark twin towers, which opened on April 4, 1973 and were destroyed in the September 11 हमले of 2001, साथ साथ 7 संसार व्यापार बीच.
The other buildings in the complex were damaged in the attacks, and their तबाह were eventually demolished.
The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers and a memorial to those killed in the attacks.
, only one skyscraper has been समाप्त ; the अन्य चार हैं अपेक्षित to be completed before 2020.
One World Trade Center will be the lead building for the नई जटिल, reaching more than 100 stories at its completion.
It became the tallest भवन in नई यॉर्क नगर on अप्रैल 30, 2012, and is expected to be finished by 2013.
A sixth tower is awaiting पुष्टि.
At the time of their completion, the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower ) and 2 World Trade Center ( the South Tower ), ज्ञात collectively as the `` जुड़वा मीनारें '', यहूद the tallest इमारतें in the संसार.
The other buildings included 3 WTC ( the Marriott World Trade बीच ), 4 wtc, 5 WTC, 6 WTC, and 7 WTC.
All of these buildings were निर्मित between 1975 और 1985.
the लागत लिये the निर्माण was $ 400 million ( $ in dollars ).
the जटिल थी स्तिथ in the heart of New York City 's downtown financial district and contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space.
The World Trade Center अनुभवी a आग on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 and a robbery on, 1998.
In 1998, the बंदरगाहों प्राधिकार decided to privatize the World Trade Center, leasing the buildings to a private company to manage, and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in.
On the morning of September 11, 2001, Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers flew two Boeing 767 jets into the complex, एक into प्रत्येक tower, in a coordinated terrorist attack.
बाद burning for 56 minutes, the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour later by the North Tower ( 1 ), with the attacks on the World Trade Center resulting in 2,753 deaths.
Falling debris from the towers, combined with fires that the debris initiated in several surrounding buildings, led to the partial or complete collapse of all the other buildings in the complex and caused catastrophic damage to ten अन्य विशाल structures in the surrounding area.
The process of cleanup and recovery at the World Trade Center site took आठ महीने.
Over the following years, plans for a rebuilt संसार व्यापार बीच took form.
The first new building at the साईट थी 7 संसार व्यापार Center, which opened in.
The Lower Manhattan Development Corporation ( LMDC ), established in to oversee the पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम, व्यवस्थित प्रतियोगिताओं to चुनें a साईट plan and memorial design.
Memory Foundations, designed by Daniel Libeskind, was selected as the master plan, but this went through substantial परिवर्तन in design.
The new World Trade Center complex will include One World Trade Center, three other high-rise office मीनारें, और the नेशनल सितंबर 11 Memorial & Museum.
सैन जिबरील Mountains
San Bernardino Mountains, with Mt. San Gorgonio in the अग्रभूमि और बिग Bear Lake in the background.
The Transverse Ranges are a group of mountain सीमाएँ of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, in the Pacific Coast Ranges physiographic region in North America.
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end of the California Coast Ranges and lie between Santa Barbara and San Diego counties.
They derive the नाम अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ due to their East-West orientation, making them transverse to the general North-South orientation of most of California 's coastal mountains.
Periodic table with इलेक्ट्रॉन शेल
An electron shell may be विचार of as an कक्षा followed by electrons around an atom 's nucleus.
The closest shell to the केंद्रक is पुकारा the `` 1 शेल '' ( भी पुकारा `` k shell '' ), followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or `` L shell '' ), then the `` 3 shell '' ( or `` M shell '' ), and so on farther and farther from the nucleus.
the शेल अक्षर K, L, M,..., used in the X-ray notation, are alphabetical.
Each shell can contain only a fixed number of electrons : The 1st shell can थाम up to दो electrons, the 2nd shell can hold up to eight electrons, the 3rd shell can hold up to 18, and 4th shell can hold up to 32 and so on.
Since electrons are electrically आकर्षित to the केंद्रक, an atom 's electrons will generally occupy outer shells only if the more inner shells have already been completely filled by other electrons.
However, this is not a strict आवश्यकता : अणु may have दो or भी तीन अधूरी outer shells.
( देखिए madelung rule for more details. )
For an explanation of why electrons exist in ये शेल देखिए इलेक्ट्रॉन विन्यास.
The electrons in the outermost occupied शेल ( or शेल ) determine the chemical properties of the atom ; it is called the valence shell.
Each shell consists of one or more subshells, and each subshell consists of एक or more atomic orbitals.
Vickie Lynn Marshall ( née Hogan ; नवम्बर 28, 1967 – फ़रवरी 8, 2007 ), ज्ञात by उसके moniker anna Nicole Smith, was an American model, actress, and television personality.
Smith first gained लोकप्रियता in प्लेबॉय, becoming the 1993 Playmate of the Year.
वो modeled for clothing companies, including Guess jeans and Lane Bryant.
Smith dropped out of ऊँची स्कूल और थी married in 1985.
Her highly publicized second marriage to oil business mogul, J. Howard Marshall, 62 years her senior, resulted in speculation that she married the octogenarian for his money, which she denied.
Following Marshall 's death, Smith began a lengthy legal बैटल over a share of उसके estate.
Her case, Marshall v. Marshall, reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a question of federal क्षेत्राधिकार, और again on a सवाल of दिवालियापन court authority ( now called Stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on February 8, 2007 in a हॉलीवुड, फ्लोरिडा hotel room as a result of an overdose of prescription drugs.
Within the final six months of her life, Smith was the focus of a renewed press coverage surrounding the death of her son, Daniel, and the paternity and कस्टडी बैटल over उसके newborn daughter, Dannielynn.
The is one denomination of जापानी येन.
The current design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese characters known as the `` नई स्क्रिप्ट ``, और यहूद भी minted इससे 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters.
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( when, due to the much उच्चतर मान of the yen, they were minted in gold ).
The front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing आउट of the जल, साथ `` पाँच येन '' written in kanji ; the back is stamped with `` Japan '' and the year of issue, also in kanji, separated by sprouts of a tree.
The three graphic elements of the coin represent agriculture and fisheries, the कुंजी तत्व of the जापानी first-sector अर्थव्यवस्था.
Around a hole, there is a गियर कि represents industry.
It is the only Japanese coin in circulation to कमी अरबी numerals on either face.
TLC is an American girl group whose repertoire spanned R & B, hip hop, soul, funk, और new jack swing.
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins, rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes and singer Rozonda `` Chilli '' Thomas, the group found unprecedented success in the 1990s while भी enduring a श्रेणी of spats साथ the विधि, प्रत्येक अन्य, and the group 's record label.
Initially, TLC achieved commercial success following the release of उनके डेब्यू एल्बम ooooooohhh...
on the tlc टिप, which sold 6 million copies worldwide.
However, it थी उनके दूसरी एल्बम, CrazySexyCool, that catapulted the group to superstar status.
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond by the RIAA — a first for a female group, और आखिरकार बेची 23 million copies worldwide.
Five years later, the group released their third album FanMail, which became the group 's first album to debut at क्रमांक एक और बेची अधिक than 11 लाख copies worldwide.
The subsequent दौरे following FanMails release became the highest grossing tour of all time by a female band.
In 2002, लिसा `` बाएँ Eye '' Lopes died in a car accident in Honduras.
Seven months later, T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's fourth album 3D, जिससे बेची 2 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी, it featured unreleased vocals from Left Eye.
Billboard magazine ranked TLC as one of the महानतम musical trios.
Between 1992 and 2003, the बैंड संचित टेन शीर्ष ten singles, four number one singles, four multi-platinum albums, and four Grammy Awards.
At the end of 1999, TLC was ranked as the सातवाँ most successful act of the 1990s by Billboard.
In 2008, the group was inducted into the All Time Hot 100 Artist Hall of Fame by the वही पत्रिका, at 56th place.
That year it was also listed as the # 25 R & b/hip-hop कलाकार of the preceding 25 years.
TLC has sold अधिक than 65 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी and they are ranked as the second best selling female group of all time, and the best selling female R & B group of all time.
In 2012, TLC ranked 12th on vh1 's 100 महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक, होने ranked the number one all girl group on that list.
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure film produced by Walt Disney Feature एनिमेशन और वितरित by वॉल्ट Disney Pictures.
The 37th फिल्मी in the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड क्लासिक, it is based on the story Tarzan of the Apes by Edgar Rice Burroughs, and is the only major motion picture version of the story Tarzan property to be animated.
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima with a screenplay by Tab Murphy, Bob Tzudiker, and नोनी श्वेत, टार्ज़न सुविधाएँ the आवाज़ें of टोनी goldwyn, minnie ड्राइवर, ग्लेन Close, and Rosie O'Donnell with Brian Blessed, Lance Henriksen, Wayne Knight, and Nigel Hawthorne.
It was the last bona fide hit before the Disney slump of the early 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically और $ 448,191,819 विश्वव्यापी, outgrossing इसके पूर्ववर्तियों Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ).
At the time of its release, its production budget of $ 130 लाख बना it the most expensive animated film ever made, until topped by Disney 's own $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002.
It was also the first डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता to खोलें at # 1 since Pocahontas.
This was the last major बक्सा दफ्तर कामयाबी of the डिज़्नी Renaissance.
आयल मंच p-51 off the Brazilian coast is a semi-submersible platform.
Oil platform mittelplate in the North sea
An oil platform, ( offshore platform or colloquially oil rig ) is a large structure with facilities to drill wells, to extract and process oil and natural gas, and to temporarily store product until it can be brought to shore लिये शोधन and marketing.
In many cases, the platform contains facilities to house the workforce as खूब.
Depending on the हालातों, the platform may be fixed to the ocean floor, may consist of an artificial island, or may float.
Remote subsea wells may also be connected to a platform by flow lines and by umbilical कनेक्शन्स.
These subsea समाधान may consist of एक or अधिक subsea wells, or of one or more manifold centres for multiple wells.
Slaughter is the killing of animals, usually that of घरेलू पशुधन for food.
The animals most commonly slaughtered for food are cattle, water buffalo ( for beef and veal ), शीप, बकरियों ( लिये मेमने और मटन ), सूअर ( लिये पोर्क ), horses ( for horse meat ), and fowl, largely chickens, turkeys, and ducks and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ).
The White हाउस, the अध्यक्ष 's आधिकारिक residence and center of the administration
अंतर्गत the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, the President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the संघीय सरकारी as a पूरे, the presidency is the highest political office in the United States by influence and recognition.
The president is also the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य Armed Forces.
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the चुनावी कॉलेज असफल to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951, no person may be elected President more than twice, and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, resignation, or removal from दफ्तर of an लाज़िम President, the Vice President assumes the office.
The President must be at तनिक 35 सालो of age and a `` natural born '' citizen of the United States.
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the ratification of the United States Constitution, which took प्रभाव on कूच 4, 1789.
For American leaders before this ratification, see President of the महाद्वीपीय Congress.
The list does not include कोई एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive शर्तें और is गिने क्रमबद्धता as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as president, four died in office of प्राकृतिक कल्याणकारी ( विलियम हेनरी हैरिसन, zachary टेलर, वारेन G. Harding, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. Garfield, William McKinley, and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first president, was inaugurated in 1789 after a सर्वसम्मत vote of the चुनावी कॉलेज.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841, और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over बारह सालो, but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945.
He is the तभी अध्यक्ष to serve अधिक than दो शर्तें, and a constitutional amendment, affecting presidents after Harry Truman, was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 बाद सबसे कानून barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
Warren Harding was the first elected बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान rights in 1920.
History records four presidents – John Q Adams, Rutherford B. Hayes, बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. बुश – who lost the popular vote but assumed office.
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith, and the current अध्यक्ष, Barack Obama, is the first president of African descent.
Several firearms with detachable suppressors, from top to bottom : An uzi, an ar-15, a heckler & koch खासियत रणनीतिक, A Beretta 92FS, and a SIG Mosquito.
Bolt action rimfire rifle साथ suppressor
AWM-F sniper राइफल साथ attached suppressor.
A suppressor, sound suppressor, or sound मॉडरेटर, is a यंत्र संलग्न to or भाग of the बैरल of a firearm which reduces the amount of noise, and usually the amount of muzzle flash, generated by firing the weapon.
A suppressor can be used both with a firearm और साथ संपीडित air gun.
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, इस पद is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the sound of a projectile, especially one moving faster than the speed of sound, through the air can not be eliminated.
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e. greater than 300 meters ) can lessen, or retard, the report at the moment of प्रभाव, और बनाएँ the छाप of खामोशी निकट the निशाना.
The noise सुना निकट the muzzle as a प्रक्षेप्य leaves the barrel, though subdued, is not silent at all.
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder साथ आतंरिक mechanisms to reduce the ध्वनि of फायरिंग by slowing the escaping propellant gas and sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet.
Early suppressors were created around the शुरूआत of the 20th century by several inventors.
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens Maxim, hiram पर्सी 's पिता, और the आविष्कारक of the Maxim Machine Gun ), is credited with inventing and selling the first commercially successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ).
Maxim gave his device the trademarked नाम कहावत Silencer.
The muffler for internal combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm suppressor by Maxim in the early 20th century, using many of the वही तकनीकों to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries automobile mufflers are still called silencers ).
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in widespread use, although it has since fallen out of favor with some, especially among the firearms उद्योग, होने replaced साथ the more literally accurate term sound suppressor or just suppressor, because a `` sound suppressor '' does not `` silence '' any weapon, rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the sonic pressure of a firearm discharging.
Common usage and U.S. legislative language favor the historically earlier term, silencer.
In U.S. law, the शर्तें `` firearm मफलर '' and `` firearm silencer '' are synonymous.
Suppressors were regularly used by agents of the United राज्य दफ्तर of रणनीतिक सेवाएं, जो favored the newly designed High Standard HDM.22 Long Rifle pistol during World War II.
OSS Director William Joseph `` Wild Bill '' डोनोवन demonstrated the पिस्टल लिये अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt at the White House.
according to oss शोध मुख्य Stanley Lovell, Donovan ( an old and trusted friend of the President ) was waved into the Oval Office, where Roosevelt was dictating a letter.
While Roosevelt finished his message, Donovan turned his back and fired टेन गोलियाँ into a sandbag he था brought साथ उसे, घोषित कया he था किया और handed the smoking gun to the astonished president.
The British SOE ( Special Operations कार्यपालिका ) welrod हत्या pistol with an integral suppressor was also used by the American OSS on clandestine operations in Nazi occupied Europe during the Second World War.
Beatrice `` Bea '' Arthur ( May 13, 1922 – April 25, 2009 ) थी an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, comedienne, and singer whose career spanned seven decades.
Arthur achieved fame as the character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms सब in the परिवार और maude, and as Dorothy Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The Golden Girls, winning Emmy Awards for both roles.
A stage actress both before and after her television success, वो जीती the टोनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शित Actress in a Musical for her performance as Vera Charles in the original cast of Mame ( 1966 ).
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film आधारित on the tekken वीडियो खेल श्रेणी, उत्पादित by डिजिटल Frontier and distributed by Asmik Ace Entertainment in association with Bandai Entertainment.
The film premiered in North America by Bandai Entertainment on July 26, 2011, and in Australia on July 27, 2011 in a special विशेष one-off स्क्रीनिंग.

In the United States, a homeowner association is a corporation formed by a real estate developer for the purpose of marketing, managing, and selling of homes और लोट in a आवासीय subdivision.
It grants the developer privileged मतदान अधिकारों in शासी the संघ, जबकि allowing the developer to exit financial and legal responsibility of the organization, typically by transferring ownership of the association to the homeowners after selling off a predetermined number of lots.
Membership in the homeowners association by a residential buyer is typically a कंडीशन of खरीदें ; a खरीदार is n't given an option to reject it.
Most homeowner associations are incorporated, and हैं विषय to राज्य statutes that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations.
State oversight of homeowner associations is minimal, and mainly takes the form of कानून जिससे हैं असंगत इससे राज्य to state.
Some states, such as Florida and California, have a large body of homeowner संघ विधि, और कुछ राज्य, ऐसे as Massachusetts, have virtually no homeowner association law.
The fastest growing form of housing in the United States today is common-interest developments ( CIDs ), a category that includes planned-unit developments of single-family घरों, condominiums, और सहकारी अपार्टमेंट.
Since 1964, homeowner एसोसिएशन have become increasingly common in the USA.
The Community Associations संस्थान व्यापार संघ अनुमानित कि HOAs governed 24.8 million American homes and 62 million residents in 2010.
A prize-winning lilac-and-white Silkie
There are many breeds of Guinea pig which have been developed since its domestication ca. 5000 BC.
Breeds vary widely in appearance and purpose, ranging इससे दिखाएँ breeds साथ long, flowing hair to those in use as model organisms by science.
From ca. 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532, selective breeding by indigenous South American peoples resulted in many varieties of domestic गिनी सूअर, जिससे रूप the आधार लिये कुछ of the आधुनिक domestic breeds.
Early Andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural stock for food, and efforts at improving the गिनी सुअर as a खाना सोर्स continue to the modern era.
With the export of Guinea pigs to Europe in the 15th century, the goal in breeding shifted to focus on the विकास of appealing pets.
To इस समाप्त, विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी breeding organizations were founded by fanciers.
The American Cavy Breeders Association, an adjunct to the American Rabbit Breeders Association, is the शासी देह in the संयुक्त States and Canada.
the अंग्रेजों cavy परिषद governs cavy clubs in the United Kingdom.
Similar organizations exist in Australia ( Australian National Cavy Council ) and New जीलैंड ( New Zealand Cavy Club ).
Each क्लबों publishes its own Standard of Perfection and determines which breeds are eligible for showing.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st century.
Though there are many breeds of Guinea pig, only a few breeds हैं commonly found on the show table as pets.
Most Guinea pigs found as pets were either found undesirable by breeders or were bred to be सुखद पालतु regardless of कैसा well they meet the breed standard of perfection.
The छोटी बाल, abyssinian, peruvian और sheltie ( उर्फ Silkie ) breeds are those most frequently seen as pets, and the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs.
In addition to their standard form, nearly सब breeds आइये in a Satin variant.
Satins, due to उनके hollow hair shafts, possess coats of a special gloss and shine.
However, there is growing प्रमाण कि the जीनों जिम्मेदार लिये the Satin coat also can cause severe bone problems, including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease.
Showing Satin विसंगतियाँ is निषिद्ध by कुछ cavy प्रजनक ' associations because of animal welfare reasons.
All cavy breeds have some shared general standards : the head profile should be rounded, साथ विशाल eyes and large, smooth ears.
The body should be दमदार और of compact build.
Coat colour should in all variations be clearly पारिभाषित और thorough from root to tip.
These standards are best met by long established, commonly bred breeds, as उनके प्रजनक have था पर्याप्त समय और पशु to effectively breed for these qualities.
The coat colour ideal of good definition and thoroughness is rarely met by other than the चिकना coated breeds, जिससे have था खूब established, separate breeding lines for different colours.
State schools ( also known as public schools or government schools ) generally refer to primary or secondary schools mandated for or offered to all children बगैर चार्ज सशुल्क लिये, in पूरे or in भाग, by taxation.
The term may also refer to संस्थानों of post-secondary education funded, in whole or in part, and overseen by government.
The ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules whose अनुक्रम is नियंत्रित by the अनुक्रम of मेसेंजर rna molecules.
This is जरूरी by सब जीना cells and associated viruses.
The ribosome ( from ribonucleic एसिड और the यूनानी सोम, अर्थ `` देह '' ) is a large and complex molecular machine, found within all living cells, that serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ).
Ribosomes कड़ी अमीनो acids साथ in the अनुक्रम specified by messenger RNA ( mRNA ) molecules.
Ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the small ribosomal subunit reads the mRNA, जबकि the विशाल subunit joins अमीनो acids to form a polypeptide chain.
प्रत्येक subunit is रचित of एक or more ribosomal RNA ( rRNA ) molecules and a variety of proteins.
The sequence of DNA encoding for a protein may be copied many times into मेसेंजर rna ( mrna ) जंजीरों of a similar sequence.
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA कड़ी और उपयोग it as a टेम्पलेट लिये determining the correct sequence of amino acids in a particular protein.
Amino acids are selected, collected and carried to the ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA molecules ), which enter one part of the ribosome और bind to the मेसेंजर RNA chain.
The attached amino acids are then linked together by another भाग of the राइबोसोम.
Once the protein is produced, it can then 'fold ' to उपज a विशिष्ट कार्यात्मक three-dimensional structure.
A ribosome is made from complexes of rnas and proteins and is therefore a ribonucleoprotein.
Each राइबोसोम is विभाजित into दो subunits : the smaller subunit binds to the mRNA pattern, while the larger subunit binds to the tRNA and the amino acids.
When a ribosome finishes reading an mRNA अणु, ये two subunits split apart.
Ribosomes are ribozymes, because the catalytic peptidyl transferase activity that links amino acids साथ is performed by the ribosomal rna.
Ribosomes from bacteria, archaea and eukaryotes ( the three domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size, sequence, ढांचा, और the अनुपात of प्रोटीन to rna.
The differences in structure allow some antibiotics to मार जीवाणु by inhibiting उनके ribosomes, while leaving human ribosomes unaffected.
In bacteria and archaea, more than one ribosome may मूव साथ a सिंगल mrna chain at one time, each `` reading '' its sequence and producing a corresponding protein molecule.
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally resemble many features of those in जीवाणु, reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria.
Albert Claude, Christian de Duve, and George Emil Palade were jointly awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, in 1974, for the डिस्कवरी of the ribosomes.
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009 was awarded to Venkatraman रामकृष्णन, थामस A. steitz और एडीए E. Yonath for determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome.
The सरलीकृत आतंरिक ढांचा of a chloroplast
Overview of the calvin साईकिल और कार्बन fixation
The light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast बाहर of the thylakoid membranes.
ये प्रतिक्रियाएँ take the light-dependent reactions and perform further chemical processes on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation, reduction reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, this process occurs तभी जब लाइट is available.
Plants do not carry out the calvin साईकिल by night.
They, instead, release sucrose into the फ्लोएम इससे उनके मंड reserves.
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( c3 कार्बन fixation, c4 कार्बन fixation, और crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work.
In गणित, a square number or perfect square is an integer that is the square of an integer ; in other words, it is the product of some integer with itself.
For example, 9 is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक, since it can be written as.
The usual notation for the formula for the वर्गाकार of a क्रमांक is नहीं the product, but the equivalent exponentiation, usually pronounced as `` squared ''.
The name square number comes from the name of the आकार ; देखिए नीचे.
वर्गाकार संख्याएँ are non-negative.
Another way of saying that a ( non-negative ) क्रमांक is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक, is कि इसके वर्गाकार roots are again integers.
For example, = ±3, so 9 is a square number.
A positive integer that has no perfect square divisors मगर 1 is पुकारा square-free.
For a non-negative integer, the th वर्गाकार क्रमांक is, साथ होने the zeroth square.
The concept of square can be extended to some other क्रमांक प्रणालियों.
If तर्कसंगत संख्याएँ हैं शामिल, तब a वर्गाकार is the ratio of two square integers, and, conversely, the ratio of two square integers is a square ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
Starting with 1, there are square numbers up to and including, where the अभिव्यक्ति represents the मंजिल of the क्रमांक.
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य कि reflected a sense of national purpose and a desire for unity among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
the era देखी the पतन of the federalist पार्टी और an समाप्त to the bitter partisan disputes between it and the dominant Democratic-Republican party during the First Party System.
President James मुनरो endeavored to downplay दलगत संबद्ध in making his nominations, with the ultimate goal of national unity and eliminating parties altogether from national politics.
The period is so closely associated with Monroe 's presidency ( 1817–1825 ) and his administrative goals that his name and the era are virtually synonymous.
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in American politics with the end of the federalist पार्टी as अमेरिका began to develop after the War of 1812.
While America was experiencing growth और समृद्धि बाद the युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन, इस era भी marks the first instance of economic troubles in the growing United States.
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay, protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second Bank of the United States complicated the tension between the North and South with the coming of the पहला वित्तीय संकट.
While the term “Era of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with irony क्युकी of the political turmoil, economic factors caused animosity between the North and South.
The designation of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with विडंबना or skepticism, as the इतिहास of the era थी one in which the political atmosphere was strained and divisive, especially among factions within the Monroe administration and the Republican Party.
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell, in the Boston Federalist समाचारपत्र, columbian centinel, on जुलाई 12, 1817, following मुनरो 's विज़िट to Boston, Massachusetts as part of his good will tour of America.
Mariel Margaret `` Mia '' hamm ( born कूच 17, 1972 ) is a retired American professional soccer player.
hamm निभाई अनेक सालो as a forward for the United States women 's national soccer team and was a founding member of the Washington Freedom.
Hamm scored 158 international goals, more than कोई अन्य खिलाड़ी, पुरूष or मादा, in the history of soccer and is the third most capped female player in soccer history behind Kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone, appearing in 275 international matches.
Hamm was named the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the first two times that award was given ( in 2001 and 2002 ), and is सूचीबद्ध as एक of फीफा 's 125 बेहतरीन living players ( as chosen by Pelé ).
She was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame as well as the Alabama Sports Hall of Fame and टेक्सास खेल हॉल of Fame.
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to जीतना in सॉकर और जीवन और appeared in the HBO documentary Dare to Dream : The Story of the U.S. Women 's Soccer Team.
Washington Post columnist Michael Wilbon called Hamm, `` शायद the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण खिलाड़ी of the पिछला 15 सालो. ''

the नई यॉर्क रेड bulls is an अमरीकी पेशेवर soccer team based in Harrison, New Jersey, representing the New York metropolitan area.
The team competes in the Eastern सम्मेलन of प्रमुख लीग Soccer ( MLS ).
It is one of the ten चार्टर क्लब of mls, having competed in the league since its inception.
the टोली थी a founding member of MLS ( 1996 ), but has gone through several name changes.
The टोली थी originally ज्ञात as the New York/New Jersey MetroStars through 1997.
From the 1998 ऋतु through the 2005 ऋतु, the team was known as the MetroStars.
On March 9, 2006, the team was sold to Red Bull GmbH, leading to the टोली 's वर्तमान name.
They हैं the तभी असली MLS franchise not to have won any significant trophy ( including regular season, playoffs, and knockout competition ) since inception.
The team 's best result in the MLS was the mls कप फाइनल in 2008.
In the US Open कप, the metrostars पहुँचे तीन semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), before reaching their first final in 2003, losing 1–0 to the Chicago Fire.
On August 26, 2000, the Metros ' Clint Mathis set an MLS record by scoring five goals in a खेल विरूद्ध the डलास बर्न.
Some well-known players that have played for the team include Giovanni Savarese, Tim Howard, Tony Meola, Tab Ramos, Alexi Lalas, Clint Mathis, Jozy Altidore, Michael Bradley, Claudio Reyna, Eddie Pope, Roberto Donadoni, Lothar Matthäus, Adolfo Valencia, Youri Djorkaeff, Amado Guevara, Juan Pablo Ángel, thierry हेनरी, juninho pernambucano, जन गुन्नार Solli, Rafael Márquez, and Tim Cahill.
The team has also had well-known coaches, including कार्लोस queiroz, कार्लोस Alberto Parreira, Bora Milutinović, Bob Bradley, Mo Johnston, Bruce Arena and Hans Backe.
Confucianism, Taoism, and buddhism हैं एक, a पेंटिंग in the litang style portraying three men laughing by a river stream, 12th century, Song Dynasty.
Estimating the number of Buddhists in the world, or in many countries, is difficult due to definitional मुद्दे as खूब as व्यावहारिक समस्याएं of enumeration.
To begin with, the religious beliefs, practices, and identities of East Asians ( who comprise the majority of the world 's Buddhists by any measure ) often blend Buddhism with other traditions including Confucianism, the Chinese folk religion, daoism, shinto, और कोरियाई shamanism.
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations, or observe a definite अनुष्ठान of adherence ऐसे as taking Refuge, making it difficult to accurately estimate the number of practitioners.
An additional challenge is the hostility of several national governments ( often Communist ones such as चीन or उत्तर कोरियाई ) to धर्म generally or to Buddhism specifically.
Government policies in these countries may प्रोत्साहित the under-reporting or non-reporting of धार्मिक adherence, resulting in आधिकारिक योग that may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries.
Estimate of the worldwide Buddhist population range from 350 million to over one अरब, लकिन क्लस्टर nearer to the first figure.
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a फिगर of 397 million.
By major branches, the संख्याएँ हैं as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana buddhism, सहित ईस्ट एशियाई buddhism, साथ no कम than 185 million adherents, and possibly several times that many ( again, depending on definitional issues ).
इस is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in China, South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, and Vietnam.
( 2 ) Theravada buddhism, with no fewer than 125 million adherents.
This is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in Cambodia, थाईलैंड, लाओस, श्री लंका, and Burma.
( 3 ) वज्रयान buddhism, with approximately 20 million adherents.
This रूप predominates in the greater Tibetan and Mongolian regions, as well as in the Himalayas.
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and भूटान, और विभिन्न territories भीतर कया is अभी पश्चिमी चीन, Vajrayana is traditional to certain regions of Russia ( e.g. Kalmykia, Buryatia ), India ( e.g. Ladakh, Sikkim ), and Nepal ( e.g. Khumbu ).
Vajrayana, also known as Tibetan Buddhism, is often conflated with तांत्रिक buddhism, लकिन इस is imprecise, as shingon and other forms of East Asian Buddhism also practice tantra.
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, बर्मा, Bhutan, and Mongolia ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities.
depending on कैसा एक calculates चाइनीज और other East Asian adherents, this figure might expand to include several more countries.
In addition, Buddhism is the state religion of Cambodia and Bhutan, and receives prominent जिक्र in the constitutions of थाईलैंड और श्री Lanka.
In उत्तरी इण्डिया और नेपाल, the land where Buddhism was born, the religion severely declined during the first millennium.
Whether this decline was due to the इस्लामी conquest of northern India, or to other factors, remains controversial.
देखिए the article Decline of Buddhism in India.
James Butler Hickok ( May 27, 1837 – August 2, 1876 ), better known as Wild Bill Hickok, थी a लोक नायिका of the American Old West.
His skills as a gunfighter and स्काउट, साथ साथ उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a lawman, provided the basis for his fame, although some of his reported exploits are fictionalized.
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois, Hickok went west at age 18 as a fugitive from justice, first working as a stagecoach driver, पहले he became a lawman in the frontier territories of कान्सास और नेब्रास्का.
He fought for the Union Army during the American Civil War, and gained publicity बाद the युद्ध as a स्काउट, marksman, actor, and professional gambler.
Between his law-enforcement कर्तव्य और gambling, which easily overlapped, Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts.
He was shot and killed while playing पोकर in the nuttal & मन 's Saloon in Deadwood, Dakota Territory ( now South Dakota ).
कलाकार 's धारणा of the Curiosity rover vaporizing rock on Mars.
The rover landed on मंगल in August 2012.
A Mars rover is an स्वचालित मोटर गाडी which propels itself across the surface of the planet Mars after landing.
रोवर्स have अनेक लाभ over stationary landers : वे जाँचें more territory, they can be directed to interesting features, they can place themselves in sunny positions to weather winter months and they can advance the knowledge of how to perform very remote robotic vehicle control.
There have been four कामयाब robotically operated Mars rovers.
The Jet नोदन प्रयोगशाला प्रबंधित the Mars Pathfinder mission and its now inactive Sojourner rover.
It currently manages the Mars Exploration Rover mission 's active Opportunity rover and inactive Spirit, और, as भाग of the मंगल विज्ञान प्रयोगशाला मिशन, the जिज्ञासा रोवर.
A financial ऑडिट, or अधिक accurately, an ऑडिट of वित्तीय कथन, is the verification of the financial statements of a legal entity, with a view to express an audit opinion.
The audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable assurance, लकिन नहीं निरपेक्ष परख, कि the वित्तीय statements are presented fairly, in all material respects, and/or give a true and fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework.
The purpose of an audit is provide and उद्देश्य स्वतंत्र परिक्षा of the वित्तीय कथन, जिससे increases the मान and credibility of the financial statements produced by management, thus increase user confidence in the financial statement, reduce investor risk and consequently reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the financial statements.
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of practicing accountants who are experts in financial reporting.
The वित्तीय ऑडिट is एक of many assurance functions provided by accounting firms.
Many संगठन separately employ or hire internal auditors, who do not attest to financial reports but focus mainly on the internal controls of the organization.
External auditors may choose to प्लेस सीमित रिलायंस on the work of internal auditors.
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures made by an संगठन, इसलिए होता संभावित to reduce of such corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings.
Internationally, the International Standards on Auditing ( ISA ) issued by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय auditing और परख मानकों फलक ( iaasb ) is considered as the benchmark for audit process.
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors to follow the isa or a लोकल variation of the ISA.
Dollar coins have been minted in the संयुक्त States in gold, silver, and base metal versions.
The term silver dollar is often used for any large white metal coin issued by the संयुक्त राज्य साथ a फेस मान of एक डालर, हालांकि purists जिद that a dollar is not silver unless it contains some of that metal.
Silver dollars, the first dollar coin issue, यहूद minted beginning in 1794.
Gold dollars and gold-colored डॉलर have भी been produced by the United States.
The Sacagawea and Presidential dollars are प्रायः referred to as `` सुनहरी डॉलर ''.
In modern times, dollar coins have not been very लोकप्रिय in the United States.
Despite efforts by the government to promote their use, सबसे अमेरिकी फिलहाल उपयोग the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins.
In straight and level flight लिफ्ट ( l ) equals weight ( W ).
In a banked turn of 60°, lift equals double the weight ( L=2W ).
The pilot experiences 2g and a doubled वज़न.
The steeper the bank, the greater the g-forces.
इस top-fuel dragster can accelerate from zero to in 0.86 seconds.
This is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. Combined with the vertical g-force in the stationary मामला the pythagorean प्रमेय yields a g force of 5.4 g.
g-force ( with g from गुरुत्वाकर्षक ) is a term for accelerations felt as weight and measurable by accelerometers.
It is not a force, per se, लकिन a फ़ोर्स per unit mass.
Since such a force is perceived as a वज़न, कोई g-force can be वर्णित as a `` weight per unit mass '' ( see the synonym specific weight ).
The g-force acceleration acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an ऑब्जेक्ट 's द्रव्यमान, और ( सहेजें लिये निश्चित इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक force influences ) is the cause of an object 's acceleration in relation to free-fall.
This acceleration experienced by an object is due to the vector sum of non-gravitational शक्तियां एक्टिंग on an object free to move.
The accelerations that are not produced by gravity हैं termed उचित accelerations, and it is only these that are measured in g-force units.
They cause तनावों और strains on objects.
Because of these strains, विशाल g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a g-force, even though g-forces are expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a मानक गम्भीरता.
Thus, the standard गुरुत्वाकर्षक acceleration at the Earth 's surface produces g-force only indirectly, as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces.
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the धरती 's सतह is caused by mechanical फ़ोर्स exerted in the upward direction by the ground, keeping the object from going into free-fall.
The upward force from the ground ensures that an object at rest on the Earth 's surface is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition, which is the path कि the ऑब्जेक्ट होता follow जब गिरना freely toward the धरती 's center.
Objects allowed to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only, feel no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a freely falling elevator falling toward the धरती 's बीच ( in वैक्यूम ), or ( to good approximation ) conditions inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit.
These are उदाहरण of coordinate acceleration ( a change in velocity ) without a sensation of weight.
The experience of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is produced, is synonymous साथ weightlessness.
In the absence of gravitational fields, or in directions at right angles to them, proper and coordinate accelerations हैं the वही, और कोई निर्देशांक acceleration must be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration.
An example यहाँ is a प्रक्षेपास्त्र in free space, in which simple changes in velocity are produced by the engines, and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers.
An augur holding a lituus, the curved wand प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a प्रतीक of augury on Roman coins
the augur थी a पुजारी and official in the classical world, especially ancient Rome and Etruria.
His main role was to interpret the will of the gods by studying the flight of birds : whether they are उड़ती in समूह or अलोन, कया noises वे मेक as they fly, direction of flight and what kind of birds they are.
This थी ज्ञात as `` taking the auspices. ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was central to कोई प्रमुख undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters of war, commerce, and religion.
The Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` Who does not know that this city was संस्थापित तभी बाद लेने the auspices, कि सबकुछ in युद्ध और in सलाम, at घर और विदेश, was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington Hills is an affluent जातियाँ in southeastern Michigan.
It is the दूसरी largest city in Oakland County in the U.S. state of Michigan.
Its population was 79,740 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
It is part of the upscale northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan Detroit and is भी पूर्वोत्तर of शहर Ann Arbor.
farmington पहाड़ियाँ consistently बाँधने as one of the safest cities in the United States, as well as in the state of Michigan.
In 2010, the क्षेत्रफल क्रमित as the 30th safest city in America.
Although the two cities have separate services and addresses, Farmington और farmington पहाड़ियाँ हैं often thought of as the same community.
Features of the जातियाँ शामिल a recently संवर शहर, boutiques, a vintage cinema, numerous restaurants, exotic car dealerships, art galleries, and public parks including Heritage Park.
There are several historical sites सहित the longacre हाउस और the Governor Warner Mansion.
Both cities हैं परोसा by Farmington Public Schools.
farmington पहाड़ियाँ serves as a major business center for the greater Detroit area.
Present-day impression of a लेट कांस्य आयु seal
Town seal ( मेट्रिक्स ) of Náchod from 1570
A seal is a device for making an impression in wax, clay, पेपर, or कुछ अन्य मीडियम, including an embossment on paper, and is also the impression thus made.
The original purpose was to authenticate a document, a wrapper for one such as a आधुनिक लिफाफा, or the कवर of a container or package holding valuables or other objects.
The sealing process is essentially that of a mould, with the final image represented on the device for बनाना the छाप by a mirror-image डिज़ाइन, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making device is also referred to as the seal matrix or die ; the imprint it creates as the मुहर छाप ( or, more rarely, the sealing ).
If the impression is made purely as a relief resulting from the greater pressure on the paper where the high parts of the matrix touch, the seal is ज्ञात as a शुष्क मुहर ; in सब अन्य मामले a द्रव or liquified मीडियम ( ऐसे as ink or wax ) is used, usually in another color than the paper.
For legal उद्देश्य, the परिभाषा of a मुहर may be विस्तारित to include rubber stamps, or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S. `` ).
In the United States, the word `` seal '' is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of the मुहर डिज़ाइन ( in मोनोक्रोम or रंग ), जिससे may be used in a variety of contexts including architectural settings, on flags, or on official letterheads.
यूँ, लिये उदाहरण, the ग्रेट मुहर of the United States, among other uses, appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; and several of the seals of the U.S. states appear on their respective state flags.
In Europe, although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as well as on seals, the मुहर डिज़ाइन in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
The study of seals is ज्ञात as sigillography or sphragistics.
groundhog दिन ( पेन्सिलवेनिया German : Grundsaudaag, Murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2.
According to folklore, if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges इससे इसके burrow on इस दिन, तब वसन्त होगा आइये जल्दी ; if it is सनी, the groundhog will supposedly see its shadow and retreat back into its burrow, and the winter weather will continue for six more weeks.
Modern customs of the अवकाश involve जश्न जहाँ early morning festivals are held to watch the groundhog emerging from its burrow.
In southeastern Pennsylvania, Groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the holiday with fersommlinge, सोशल कार्यक्रम in जिससे खाना is परोसा, भाषणों are made, and one or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment.
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the only language spoken at the event, and those जो बोलो अंग्रेज़ी अदा a दंड, प्रायः in the रूप of a निकल, dime, or quarter per word spoken, with the money put into a bowl in the center of the table.
the largest groundhog दिन celebration is held in Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania.
groundhog दिन, already a widely पहचाना और लोकप्रिय परंपरा, प्राप्त widespread attention as a result of the 1993 film Groundhog Day, which was set in Punxsutawney, PA ( though filmed primarily in Woodstock, IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil.
High resolution image of tampa खाड़ी region
The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate ( Koppen Cfa ), with warm and humid summers with बारंबार thunderstorms और drier सर्दियों साथ जमने temperatures occurring every 2–3 years.
The area experiences a significant summer wet ऋतु, as nearly two-thirds of the सालाना वर्षण falls in the months of June through September.
The area is listed by the United राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) as होने in hardiness मण्डल 10, जिससे is about the northern limit of where coconut palms and royal palms can be grown.
Highs usually range between 65 and 95 °F ( 18 और 35 °c ) साल round.
Though known for hot summers, Tampa 's आधिकारिक ऊँची रै never पहुँचे 100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the city 's all-time record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ).
St. Petersburg 's all-time रिकार्ड high is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ).
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico, and much of the city of Tampa lies on a smaller प्रायद्वीप jutting आउट into Tampa Bay.
This proximity to large bodies of जल दोनो नरमपंथियों temperatures and introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere.
In सामान्य, the लोकल समुदायों farthest from the coast have larger temperature ranges, both during a single day and throughout the seasons of the year.
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum, showing विभिन्न गुण आरपार the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all possible बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a अलग अर्थ, और is बजाय the characteristic वितरण of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the कम बारंबारता प्रयुक्त लिये आधुनिक रेडियो संचार to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई, हालांकि in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous.
Most parts of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम हैं प्रयुक्त in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize matter.
In addition, radiation from various भाग of the वर्णक्रम रै मिला अनेक अन्य uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ).
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by उसके आद्याक्षर, fdr, थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war.
A प्रबल नेता of the लोकतांत्रिक Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms, he built a New Deal Coalition that realigned American politics after 1932, as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme, FDR defeated incumbent Republican Herbert हूवर in नवम्बर 1932, at the गहराई of the ग्रेट अवसाद.
Energized by his personal victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing optimism and activism contributed to a नवीकरण of the नेशनल spirit.
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary जोसेफ स्टालिन in अग्रणी the allies विरूद्ध जर्मनी और जापानी in World War II, and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a किस्में of कार्यक्रम designed to उपज राहत ( सरकारी कार्य लिये the बेरोजगार ), रिकवरी ( आर्थिक विकास ), और सुधार ( through विनियमन of वॉल गली, बैंको and transportation ).
The अर्थव्यवस्था improved rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937, but then relapsed into a deep recession.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his पैकिंग the परम् अदालत or गुजर कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम when unemployment diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85, मगर लिये the विनियमन of वॉल Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission, which still exists.
Along with several छोटी कार्यक्रम, प्रमुख surviving कार्यक्रम शामिल the संघीय जमा Insurance Corporation, which was created in 1933, and Social Security, which Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the Japanese invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR gave strong diplomatic और वित्तीय support to चीन और ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, जबकि बाकी officially neutral.
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of लोकतंत्र `` जिससे would supply munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional approval, provided Lend-Lease aid to the देशों लड़ विरूद्ध Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very दमदार नेशनल support, he बना युद्ध on जापानी और जर्मनी बाद the जापानी attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941, calling it a `` date which will live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war effort.
As an active military leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts कि ended in the शिकस्त of the अक्ष Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb.
in 1942 रूज़वेल्ट ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to नई हाइट्स as लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers, और 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not तभी दौरान the बारह सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी, but also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System.
FDR 's New Deal गठबन्धन संयुक्त मजदूर संघ, बिग city machines, white ethnics, African Americans and rural white Southerners.
He भी बहकावे the बाद सृष्टि of the United Nations and Bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the शीर्ष तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, साथ साथ Abraham Lincoln and George Washington.
A liberal Democrat, Roosevelt defined his ideological स्थिति as `` a little left of center. ''
A Joint Committee is a term in politics that is used to refer to a committee made up of members of both कक्षों of a bicameral विधानमंडल.
In other contexts, it refers to a कमेटी साथ members from more than one organization.
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated शक्तियां of the संघीय सरकारी ; अंतर्गत the दसवाँ amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, it is इसलिए exclusively the domain of the states to permit, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act.
In most states, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक अनुक्रम अपराधों, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It was at एक समय माना to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow brothel prostitution, the terms of which are stipulated in the नेवाडा संशोधित statutes.
Only 8 counties currently contain active brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ), washoe काउंटी ( जिससे contains Reno ), Carson City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The other counties theoretically allow वेश्यालय prostitution, but some of these counties currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and जीना बंद of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with other countries, prostitution in the United States can be विभाजित into तीन व्यापक श्रेणी : street prostitution, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The national flag of the United States of America, often simply referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating with white, with a blue rectangle in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in नौ ऑफसेट आड़ा पंक्ति of छह सितारों ( शीर्ष और नीचे ) alternating with rows of five stars.
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the तेरह अंग्रेजों colonies कि घोषित independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the Union.
Nicknames लिये the ध्वज शामिल the `` सितारों and Stripes '', `` Old Glory ``, and `` The Star-Spangled Banner. ''
India is a federal संघ of राज्य comprising twenty-eight states and seven union territories.
The राज्य और territories हैं further subdivided into districts and so on.
Congressional districts for the 113th संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस
2010 जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts, starting in 2013, as a परिणाम of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
2000 जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts, इससे 2003 to 2013, as a result of the 2000 census.
This is a complete list of congressional districts for representation in the United States House of Representatives.
The quantity ( apportionment ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of districts are संकल्पित बाद प्रत्येक census, although in some cases states have changed the boundaries more than once per census.
This list includes the 435 current and over 200 obsolete जिले.
For example, चूंकि the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, Nebraska has had three districts, but it used to have as many as six.
In the पहला दशक of the twenty-first century, Texas had 32 districts, but has since added four due to reapportionment as a result of the 2010 census.
Other states have lost districts since the number of congressional seats has महरूम नियत at 435 by statute.
Also included here are non-voting delegations : छह वर्तमान और four obsolete.
The boundaries of districts often shift with each redistricting.
Over time, the region and demographics represented in a district can change substantially.
furthermore, जिले sometimes retain the same boundaries while changing their district numbers.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, रिकार्ड producer, actress, and philanthropist.
Under the guidance of Columbia Records कार्यपालिका टॉमी mottola, कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records Emotions ( 1991 ), Music Box ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` एक मीठी दिन ``, a duet साथ बॉयज ii मेन, खर्च a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history.
During the recording of the album, Carey began to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings और धीरे traversed into हिप hop.
This musical change became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at which समय कैरी था अलग from Mottola.
Carey left कोलंबिया in 2000, और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records.
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized लिये कठोर थकावट.
Following the film 's poor reception, she was bought out of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध लिये $ 50 लाख, जिससे led to a decline in her career.
She signed a multi-million डालर अनुबंध सौदे साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002, और बाद an unsuccessful काल, returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became her सबसे कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s, और थी बाद named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received अभिनीत भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` भेदन प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival, and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two decades, Carey has sold more than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, बनाना her one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the world 's best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार of the 1990s at the संसार Music Awards.
Carey was भी named the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000.
According to the Recording Industry Association of अमेरिका, वो is the तीसरा best-selling female artist in the United States, with 63.5 million certified albums.
साथ the रिलीज of `` टच my देह `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained her eighteenth number one single in the United States, more than any other solo artist.
In 2012, Carey was क्रमित दूसरी on vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music ''.
aside इससे उसके वाणिज्यिक accomplishments, Carey has won five Grammy Awards, 17 World Music Awards, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness संसार रिकॉर्ड, वो is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन range, power, melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register.
stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology, a cloud is a visible द्रव्यमान of द्रव droplets or frozen crystals made of water or various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body.
These निलंबित अणु are also known as aerosols.
Clouds in Earth 's atmosphere are studied in the cloud भौतिकी शाखा of meteorology.
Two processes, possibly acting together, can lead to air becoming saturated ; cooling the air or adding water vapor to the air.
In general, precipitation will fall to the surface ; an एक्सेप्शन is virga, जिससे evaporates before reaching the surface.
The international cloud classification system is based on the fact बादल in उनके सबसे मौलिक फ़ॉर्म can दिखाएँ free-convective upward growth like cumulus, appear in non-convective layered sheets such as stratus, or take the form of thin fibrous wisps, as in the case of cirrus.
Prefixes are used in connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in these मौलिक फ़ॉर्म or to specify middle or high altitude ranges.
These शामिल strato- लिये कम बादल साथ सीमित संवहन कि रूप ज़्यादातर in uneven परतों, cumulo- लिये जटिल highly-convective storm clouds, nimbo- for thick layered clouds of some complexity that can produce moderate to heavy precipitation, alto- for middle clouds, and cirro- for high clouds ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure.
Whether or not a cloud is low, middle, or high level depends on how far above the मैदान इसके आधार फ़ॉर्म.
Cloud types with significant vertical extent can रूप in the कम or मध्य ऊँचाई सीमाएँ depending on the moisture content of the air.
Clouds in the क्षोभमण्डल have लैटिन names due to the popular adaptation of Luke Howard 's cloud categorization system, which began to spread in popularity during December 1802.
Synoptic surface weather observations use code numbers to record and report the types of tropospheric cloud visible at each scheduled observation समय आधारित on the ऊँचाई और शारीरिक appearance of the clouds.
While a majority of clouds form in Earth 's troposphere, there are occasions when clouds in the stratosphere और mesosphere can be observed.
These three main layers of the atmosphere where बादल may be देखी हैं collectively known as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere, which together make up the heterosphere कि marks the transition to outer space.
Clouds have been observed on other planets and moons within the Solar System, but, due to उनके अलग तापमान characteristics, they are composed of other substances such as methane, ammonia, and sulfuric acid.
Galveston County is a county located in the U.S. state of Texas within the Houston–Sugar land–baytown महानगर area.
As of the 2010 census, the जनसांख्यिकी थी 291,309.
Its काउंटी सीट is Galveston.
League City is the largest city in Galveston County in terms of जनसांख्यिकी ; url_http between 2000 और 2005 it surpassed Galveston as the county 's largest city.
Galveston County थी founded in 1838.

The Big Ten Conference, formerly Western Conference and Big Nine Conference, is the oldest Division I college athletic सम्मेलन in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Its बारह सदस्य संस्थानों ( जिससे हैं primarily फ्लैगशिप शोध विश्वविद्यालयों in उनके संबंधित राज्य, well-regarded academically, and with relatively large student enrollment ) are located primarily in the Midwest, stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the east.
the सम्मेलन competes in the ncaa 's Division I ; its football teams compete in the Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ), formerly known as Division I-A, the highest level of NCAA competition in that sport.
Member schools of the Big Ten ( or, in two cases, उनके जनक विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणालियों ) भी are members of the Committee on Institutional Cooperation, a leading educational and research consortium.
Despite the conference 's name, the Big Ten actually consists of 12 schools, following the जोड of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य University in 1993 and the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the conference will expand to 14 members with the additions of the University of Maryland, College Park and rutgers, the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of New Jersey.
It is not to be confused with the Big 12 Conference, which has only ten स्कूलों और represents a different region of the country.
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in Scotland using a pot स्टिल आसवन प्रक्रम at a single distillery, with malted barley as the only grain ingredient.
As with any Scotch whisky, a single malt Scotch must be आसुत in स्कॉटलैंड और matured in ओक casks in Scotland for at least three years ( most single malts are matured longer ).
`` Malt '' indicates that the whisky is distilled from a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of grains can be malted ( for example, barley, rye and wheat are all grains which can be malted ) ; however, in the मामला of सिंगल malt स्कॉच, जौ is always the only grain used.
`` Single '' indicates that all the malts in the बोतल आइये from a single distillery.
Bottlings containing malt व्हिस्की इससे multiple distilleries are called `` blended malt ``.
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the word `` blended '' only appeared ( in the context of Scotch whisky ) on bottles of व्हिस्की कि contained a mixture of both barley and non-barley grain whisky, but this is no longer the case.
Under the terminology established by the SWR 2009, a `` blended malt Scotch whisky '' is a mixture of single malt Scotch whiskies, not a मिश्रण of malted जौ व्हिस्की और non-barley व्हिस्की ; those are called `` blended Scotch whisky '', without the word `` malt ''.
The term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' used under the prior labelling conventions.
The age statement on a bottle of single malt स्कॉच is the number of years the whisky spent maturing in cask.
As very few whiskies are bottled from a single cask the age statement reflects the आयु of the youngest malt in the mix.
A texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely दृष्टिकोण the single-object औकात of fused-ensemble timbres, लिये उदाहरण, the beautiful 'northern lights ' chord..., in a very interesting distribution of pitches, produces a fused sound supported by a suspended cymbal roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
In contrast to more traditional musical बनावट, ध्वनि द्रव्यमान संयोजन `` minimizes the importance of individual pitches in preference for texture, timbre, and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and impact. ''
Developed from the modernist tone clusters and spread to orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s और 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
Techniques which may create or be used with sound mass शामिल विस्तारित तकनीकों ऐसे as मूक पीतल or strings, flutter tonguing, wide vibrato, extreme ranges, and glissandos.
Composers and works include Barbara Kolb, Pauline Oliveros ' Sound Patterns for chorus ( 1961 ), Norma beecroft 's इससे सपनो of पीतल लिये chorus ( 1963–1964 ), and Nancy Van de Vate.
Beecroft `` blurs individual pitches in favor of a collective timbre through the use of vocal and instrumental क्लस्टर, choral वाक, narrator, and a wash of sounds from an electronic tape. ''
( ibid )
A very early example is the opening of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet Les Elémens ( 1737–38 ), where chaos is represented by a धीरे cumulating orchestral क्लस्टर of सब सात टीप of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
A बाद उदाहरण is the तीसरा गति of रुथ क्रॉफर्ड seeger 's स्ट्रिंग Quartet 1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280 ) while more recently Phill Niblock 's multiple drone based music serves as an example.
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins साथ debussy और edgard varèse प्रायः carefully scored व्यक्तिगत इंस्ट्रूमेंटल भाग so कि वे होता fuse into one ensemble timbre or sound mass ( Erickson 1975, pp. 18 and 21 ).
Other examples include European `` textural '' compositions of the fifties और sixties ऐसे as krzysztof penderecki 's threnody to the पीड़ितों of हिरोशिमा ( 1959 ) and György Ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ).
Other composers साथ works using this technique include Henryk Górecki, Karel Husa, Witold Lutosławski, Kazimierz Serocki, and Steven Stucky.
Sound mass techniques also appear in the music of जार्ज crumb ( Anon. n.d. ).

A student is a learner, or किसी जो attends an educational institution.
In some nations, the English term ( or its cognate in another language ) is reserved for those who attend university, while a schoolchild under the age of eighteen is called a pupil in अंग्रेज़ी ( or an समतुल्य in अन्य भाषाएं ), हालांकि in the संयुक्त राज्य a व्यक्ति enrolled in grades K–12 is often called a student.
In its widest use, student is used for anyone who is learning.
Australia is a continent comprising मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Tasmania, New Guinea, Seram, possibly Timor, and neighbouring islands.
The continent is sometimes ज्ञात in तकनीकी contexts by the names sahul, Australinea or Meganesia, to distinguish it from the Australian mainland.
It is the smallest of the seven traditional continents in the English conception.
New Zealand is not part of the continent of Australia, लकिन of the पृथक, submerged continent of Zealandia.
Zealandia and Australia are both part of the wider regions known as australasia और महासागरीय.
The continent of Australia lies on a continental shelf overlain by shallow seas which divide it into several landmasses — the Arafura Sea and Torres Strait between mainland ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई गिनी, और बास जलसन्धि between mainland Australia and Tasmania.
When sea levels were lower during the Pleistocene ice age, सहित the पिछला glacial maximum about 18,000 BC, they were connected by dry land.
During the past ten thousand years, rising sea levels overflowed the lowlands and separated the continent into आज 's low-lying arid to semi-arid मेनलैंड and the two mountainous islands of New Guinea and Tasmania.
Geologically, a continent extends to the edge of its continental shelf, so the now-separate islands are considered part of the महाद्वीप.
Due to the spread of animals, fungi and plants across the single Pleistocene landmass the separate lands have a related biota.
Central Park is nearly twice as big as the संसार 's second-smallest country, Monaco.
Historically its reservoirs were important components of the नगर 's water supply.
पर्यावरणीय मुद्दे in नई यॉर्क नगर हैं प्रभावित by the city 's size, density, abundant public transportation infrastructure, and location at the mouth of the Hudson River.
New York 's population घनत्व रै पर्यावरणीय pros and cons.
It facilitates the उच्चतम द्रव्यमान पारगमन उपयोग in the United States, but also concentrates pollution.
Gasoline consumption in the city is at the rate the national average was in the 1920s, and greenhouse gas emissions are a fraction of the national average, at 7.1 मीट्रिक टन प्रति व्यक्ति प्रति साल, नीचे सैन फ्रांसिस्को, at 11.2 metric tons, and the national average, at 24.5 metric tons.
New York City accounts for only 1 % of United States greenhouse gas emissions जबकि आवास 2.7 % of its population.
In September 2012, New York was named the # 1 `` America 's Dirtiest City, '' by a Travel+Leisure readership survey that rated the environmental quality of 35 prominent शहरों in the संयुक्त States.
Atlanta (, stressed, locally ) is the capital of and the most populous city in the U.S. state of Georgia, with an estimated 2011 population of 432,427.
Atlanta is the cultural and economic center of the Atlanta metropolitan area, home to 5,457,831 people and the ninth largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त States.
Atlanta is the county seat of fulton काउंटी, और a छोटी portion of the city extends eastward into DeKalb County.
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the intersection of two रेलरोड लाइनों, और the नगर रोज़ इससे the ashes of the Civil War to become a national center of commerce.
In the decades following the Civil अधिकारों Movement, during which the city earned a reputation as `` too busy to hate '' for the progressive views of its citizens and leaders, Atlanta attained international prominence.
Atlanta is the primary transportation hub of the Southeastern संयुक्त राज्य, via राजमार्ग, रेलरोड, और air, with Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport being the world 's busiest airport since 1998.
Atlanta is considered an `` alpha ( - ) संसार नगर, '' and, with a gross domestic product of US $ 270 billion, Atlanta’s economy ranks 15th among world cities and sixth in the nation.
Although Atlanta’s economy is considered diverse, dominant sectors include logistics, professional and business services, media operations, government administration, और उच्चतर शिक्षा.
Topographically, Atlanta is चिह्नित by रोलिंग hills and dense tree coverage.
Revitalization of Atlanta 's पड़ोस, initially spurred by the 1996 ओलंपिक, has intensified in the 21st century, altering the city 's demographics, politics, and culture.

McCarthyism is the practice of making accusations of disloyalty, subversion, or देशद्रोह बगैर proper regard for evidence.
It also means `` the practice of making unfair allegations or using unfair investigative techniques, विशेषकर in order to restrict dissent or political criticism. ''
The पद रै इसके origins in the काल in the संयुक्त राज्य ज्ञात as the दूसरी रेड scare, lasting roughly from 1950 to 1956 and characterized by heightened fears of communist influence on American institutions and espionage by Soviet agents.
Originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of Republican U.S. Senator Joseph McCarthy of विस्कॉन्सिन, `` mccarthyism '' जल्द took on a broader अर्थ, describing the excesses of similar efforts.
The term is also now used more generally to describe reckless, unsubstantiated आरोपों, as खूब as demagogic attacks on the character or patriotism of political adversaries.
During the McCarthy era, thousands of Americans were accused of being Communists or communist sympathizers and became the subject of aggressive investigations और questioning पहले सरकारी or private-industry panels, committees and agencies.
The primary targets of such suspicions were government employees, those in the entertainment उद्योग, शिक्षक और संघ कार्यकर्ताओं.
Suspicions were often given credence despite inconclusive or questionable evidence, and the level of threat posed by a person 's real or supposed वामपंथी एसोसिएशन or मान्यताओं थी प्रायः greatly अतिरंजित.
Many people suffered loss of employment and/or विनाश of उनके करियर ; कुछ even suffered imprisonment.
Most of these punishments came about through trial verdicts later overturned, laws that would be declared unconstitutional, dismissals for reasons later declared illegal or actionable, or extra-legal प्रक्रियाओं कि होता आइये into general disrepute.
The most famous examples of McCarthyism include the speeches, investigations, and hearings of Senator McCarthy himself ; the हॉलीवुड ब्लैकलिस्ट, संबद्ध साथ hearings conducted by the हाउस un-american क्रियाएँ कमेटी ( huac ) ; और the various anti-communist activities of the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) under Director J. Edgar Hoover.
mccarthyism थी a फैली सोशल और सांस्कृतिक घटना that affected all levels of society and was the source of a great deal of debate and conflict in the United States.
नेपोलियन is a fictional अक्षर और the main antagonist in George Orwell 's Animal Farm.
While he is at first a common farm pig, he gets rid of Snowball, another सुअर जिससे साझा the power.
He then takes advantage of the animals ' uprising विरूद्ध उनके मास्टर्स to आखिरकार become the tyrannical `` President of Animal Farm, '' which he turns into a dictatorship.

The NEPTUNE Canada project is the world’s first regional-scale भाटे समंदर वेधशाला that plugs directly into the Internet.
Since December 2009, it has allowed people to `` surf '' the seafloor जबकि समंदर वैज्ञानिकों चलाएं deep-water experiments from labs and universities around the world.
Along with its sister project, VENUS, NEPTUNE offers a अद्वितीय दृष्टिकोण to समंदर विज्ञान.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry out उनके शोध, जबकि the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट उपयोग a remotely operated crawler.

In the 1960s, the name was transferred to चकमा 's mid-size प्रविष्टि.
