एलिज़ाबेथ ii ( एलिज़ाबेथ एलेक्जेंड्रा मरियम ; born 21 अप्रैल 1926 ) is the संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the Commonwealth realms, and their territories and dependencies, and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is परम् राज्यपाल of the गिरिजाघर of England and, in some of her realms, carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent राष्ट्रमंडल देशों : the संयुक्त किंगडम, कनाडा, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, नई जीलैंड, दक्षिण Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first four aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the second longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth was born in लंदन और शिक्षित privately at home.
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII, from जिससे समय वो थी the वारिस presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties during the Second संसार युद्ध, in जिससे वो परोसा in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
in 1947, वो शादीशुदा Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, with whom she has four children : Charles, Anne, Andrew, and Edward.
Her coronation service took place in 1953 and was the पहला to be televised.
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings शामिल a राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms, such as devolution in the संयुक्त किंगडम और the patriation of the कनाडाई constitution.
Times of personal significance have शामिल the births और विवाह of उसके children, the births of her grandchildren, the investiture of the Prince of Wales, and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver, Golden, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, respectively.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern Ireland, the falklands युद्ध, युद्धों with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ), the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments, but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high.
Christianity is the largest religion सूचीबद्ध by australians in the national census.
In the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी, 61.1 % of australians were listed as Christian.
Australia has no official state religion and the Australian संविधान protects स्वतंत्रता of religion.
The presence of Christianity in ऑस्ट्रेलिया began साथ the आगमन of the First Fleet of British convicts in 1788.
the धर्म grew to खाता लिये 96.1 % of the नेशनल population at the time of the Federation of Australia in 1901.
the anglican गिरिजाघर of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( formerly ज्ञात as the Church of England in Australia ) remained the largest denomination until 1986, when it was surpassed by the Roman Catholic Church in Australia.
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance among some sections of the population have diversified the demographics of धर्म in ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as ईसाई in 2011, the largest denominations यहूद either रोमन कैथोलिक ( 25 % ) or Anglican ( 17 % ), with the third largest denomination being the 5 % affiliated with the Uniting Church in Australia.
Post-war immigration has grown the numbers belonging to churches like the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese of Australia and there are large और growing पेंटेकोस्टल groups, such as Sydney 's Hillsong Church.
The festivals of Easter and क्रिसमस are public holidays in Australia.
Around a quarter of students attend church schools and Christian organisations हैं अग्रणी non-government प्रदाताओं of health and welfare services through organisations like Catholic Health Australia, Anglicare, UnitingCare Australia, the Salvation Army and St Vincent de Paul Society.
Historically significant Australian Christians have included Rev Dr John dunmore लैंग, संत मरियम mackillop, कैथरीन हेलेन Spence, Pastor David Unaipon, the Reverend John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls.
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim Costello Baptist minister and current CEO of World Vision Australia, Frank Brennan, Jesuit human rights वकील, कार्डिनल जार्ज pell, कैथोलिक archbishop of सिडनी, फिलिप aspinall the वर्तमान Anglican Primate and Archbishop of Brisbane, Kevin Rudd, former Labor Prime Minister, and Tony Abbott, leader for the Federal Opposition Liberal Party.
Charter बनाना कॉलेजिएट स्कूल, जिससे became Yale College, October 9, 1701
Yale University is a private Ivy League research विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in नई हेवन, कनेक्टिकट.
Founded in 1701 in the Colony of Connecticut, the विश्वविद्यालयों is the third-oldest संस्था of higher education in the United States.
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate School '', the संस्था traces इसके जड़ें to 17th-century clergymen who sought to establish a college to train clergy and political leaders for the colony.
In 1718, the College was renamed `` Yale College '' to honor a gift इससे elihu yale, a राज्यपाल of the British East India Company.
In 1861, the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences became the first U.S. संस्था to पुरस्कार the PhD. Yale became a founding member of the Association of American Universities in 1900.
Yale College was transformed, beginning in the 1930s, through the establishment of आवासीय कॉलेजों : 12 अभी मौजूद और दो अधिक हैं नियोजित.
Yale employs over 1,100 faculty to teach and advise about 5,300 undergraduate और 6,100 ग्रैजुएट and professional students.
लगभग सब tenured professors सिखा undergraduate courses, more than 2,000 of which are offered annually.
The University 's एसेट शामिल an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion, the second-largest of any academic institution in the world.
Yale 's system of अधिक than दो दर्जन libraries holds 12.5 million volumes.
49 Nobel Laureates have been affiliated with the University as students, संकाय, और स्टाफ.
Yale has produced many notable alumni, सहित पाँच u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, 19 u.S. Supreme Court Justices, and several foreign heads of state.
At the graduate level, Yale Law School, Yale School of Art, and Yale School of Drama are consistently ranked the शीर्ष कार्यक्रम in उनके field.
Yale Law School is the most selective law school in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Yale students compete intercollegiately as the Yale Bulldogs in the ncaa प्रभाग i आइवी लीग.
The oldest intercollegiate athletic event in the United राज्य is the Yale-Harvard regatta.
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an aromatic shrub from the family Asteraceae, जिससे grows in arid और semi-arid शर्तें, throughout a range of cold desert, steppe, and mountain habitats in the Intermountain West of North America.
The vernacular name `` sagebrush '' is also used for several related members of the genus Artemisia, ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया sagebrush ( artemisia californica ).
Big Sagebrush and other Artemisia species are the dominant plants across large portions of the ग्रेट जलाशय, covering कुछ 422,000 वर्गाकार मील in 11 western U.S. & Canadian states.
It is the राज्य flower of Nevada.
Sagebrush provides food and habitat for a variety of प्रजाति, ऐसे as ऋषि grouse, pronghorn antelope, gray vireo, pygmy rabbit, and mule deer.
Big sagebrush थी प्रयुक्त as an हर्बल आयुर्विज्ञान by Native Americans throughout the Intermountain West of North America—especially for preventing infection in wounds, stopping internal bleeding, and treating headaches and colds.
Chemically, the active medicinal constituents शामिल camphor, terpenoids, and tannins.
Several major threats exist to sage brush ecosystems, सहित इंसान settlements, conversion to agricultural land, livestock grazing, invasive plant species, wildfires, and climate change.
Yahoo ! Mail is a फ़्री ईमेल सेवा offered by the American search engine company Yahoo !
It was launched in 1997, and, according to comScore, याहू ! मेल is the third-largest web-based email service with 281 million users as of December 2012.
Currently, Yahoo ! offers three versions of याहू ! Mail.
The traditional `` Yahoo ! Mail Classic '' continues the उपलब्धता of the असली interface introduced in 1997.
A version introduced in 2005 included a new Ajax interface, drag-and-drop features, improved search functionality, कुंजीपटल शॉर्टकट, address auto-complete, tabs, and other updated features.
In October 2010, Yahoo ! released a beta version of Yahoo ! मेल, जिससे शामिल सुधार to the design, performance, search functionality, and Facebook integration.
In May 2011, beta testing for the new version रोका, और it became the default interface for Yahoo ! Mail.
In early 2008, Yahoo ! began offering unlimited mail storage to its users in जवाब to heated प्रतियोगिता in the फ़्री web-mail मार्केट segment.
On June 27, 2009, याहू ! मेसेंजर was integrated with Yahoo ! Mail.
Tacoma (, ) is a mid-sized urban port city और the काउंटी सीट of Pierce County, Washington, United States.
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound, southwest of Seattle, northeast of the राज्य पूंजी, ओलंपिया, और उत्तरपश्चिम of Mount Rainier National Park.
The population थी 198,397, according to the 2010 census.
Tacoma is the second-largest city in the Puget Sound area और the तीसरा largest in the राज्य.
Tacoma also serves as the center of business activity for the दक्षिण Sound region, which has a population of around 1 million people.
Tacoma अपनाया its name after the nearby Mount Rainier, originally called Mount Tahoma.
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the area was chosen to be the western terminus of the उत्तरी प्रशांत रेलरोड in the late 19th century.
The decision of the railroad was बहकावे by टकोमा 's neighboring deep-water harbor, Commencement Bay.
By connecting the bay with the railroad Tacoma 's motto became `` जब rails मिलें sails. ''
Today शुरुआत खाड़ी serves the Port of Tacoma, a center of international trade on the Pacific Coast and Washington state 's largest port.
Like most central cities, टकोमा suffered a prolonged मनाही in the mid-20th century as a result of suburbanization and divestment.
Since the 1990s, developments in the downtown core include the University of Washington Tacoma ; Tacoma Link, the first modern electric light rail service in the state ; the state 's highest density of art and history museums ; and a restored शहरी waterfront, the thea Foss Waterway.
With a long history of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad मजदूर of the 19th century, to the longshoremen of the 20th century, to the Labor Ready workers of today — Tacoma has long been known for its rough, gritty image.
A song about Tacoma, `` Thrice All American '', by American singer-songwriter and former resident Neko Case, describes it as `` a dusty बूढ़ा गहना in the South Puget Sound / where the factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down ''.
Tacoma-Pierce County has been नामित एक of the most livable areas in the country.
टकोमा थी भी recently listed as the 19th most walkable city in the country.
in कंट्रास्ट, the नगर is also ranked as the most stressed-out city in the country in a 2004 survey.
In 2006, women 's magazine Self named Tacoma the `` Most Sexually Healthy नगर '' in the संयुक्त States.
In 2012, The Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` Gayest नगर in अमेरिका '', in भाग क्युकी of the विशाल विविधता of पब्लिक कार्यालयों held, and Washington State passing a bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry.
Tacoma is famous for the 1940 पतन of the टकोमा Narrows Bridge.
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the दूसरी largest नगर in the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल, the seventh largest city in Southern California, the fourteenth largest city in the State of California, and the 77th-largest city in the United States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 243,916 as of the 2010 census.
Located just from downtown San Diego and from the Mexican border in the South Bay region of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल, the नगर is at the बीच of one of the richest economic and culturally diverse zones in the United States.
Chula Vista is so named because of its scenic स्थान between the San Diego Bay and coastal mountain foothills.
संस्थापित in the जल्दी 19th century, fast population growth has recently been observed in the city.
As the second largest city in San Diego County, Chula Vista has quickly become a destination लोकप्रिय to अनेक पर्यटकों.
Located in the city is one of America 's few year-round United States Olympic Training centers and popular tourist destinations include Cricket Wireless Amphitheater, the chula विस्टा मरीना, और the chula विस्टा प्रकृति बीच.
Metes और bounds is a system or method of describing land, real property ( in contrast to personal property ) or real estate.
The system has been प्रयुक्त in इंग्लैण्ड लिये अनेक सदियां, और is स्टिल प्रयुक्त वहीँ in the परिभाषा of general boundaries.
By custom, it थी लागू in the असली तेरह colonies that became the United States, and in many other land jurisdictions based on English common law.
Typically the system uses physical features of the local geography, along with directions and distances, to define और describe the सीमाएँ of a parcel of land.
The boundaries are described in a running prose style, working around the पार्सल in अनुक्रम, इससे a पाइंट of शुरूआत, returning वापस to the same point ; compare with the oral ritual of beating the bounds.
It may include references to other adjoining parcels ( और उनके स्वामी ), and it, in turn, could also be referred to in later surveys.
At the time the description is compiled, it may have been marked on the ground with permanent monuments placed where there were no उपयुक्त प्राकृतिक monuments.
The term `` metes '' refers to a boundary defined by the मापन of प्रत्येक सीधा चलाएं, निर्दिष्ट by a अलहदा between the terminal points, and an orientation or direction.
A दिशा may be a सरल कम्पास bearing, or a precise orientation determined by accurate survey methods.
The term `` bounds '' refers to a more सामान्य boundary वर्णन, ऐसे as साथ a certain watercourse, a stone wall, an adjoining public road way, or an existing building.
The system is often used to define larger टुकड़े of प्रॉपर्टी ( e.g. खेतो ), और राजनैतिक subdivisions ( e.g. town boundaries ) where precise definition is not required or would be far too expensive, or previously designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description.
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an English physicist and mathematician who is widely regarded as एक of the सबसे influential वैज्ञानिकों of सब समय and as a key figure in the scientific revolution.
His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` Mathematical Principles of Natural दर्शनशास्त्र '' ), पहला प्रकाशित in 1687, रखी the मूलाधार for most of classical mechanics.
Newton also made seminal contributions to optics and shares credit with Gottfried लैबनिट्ज़ लिये the आविष्कार of the infinitesimal calculus.
न्यूटन 's प्रिन्सिपिया प्रतिपादित the कानून of गति and universal gravitation that dominated scientists ' view of the physical universe for the next three centuries.
It also demonstrated कि the गति of वस्तुएँ on the Earth and that of celestial bodies could be described by the same principles.
By deriving Kepler 's laws of ग्रहीय गति इससे उसके गणितीय वर्णन of गम्भीरता, न्यूटन removed the last doubts about the validity of the heliocentric model of the cosmos.
Newton built the first व्यावहारिक reflecting दूरदर्शी और विकसित a सिद्धान्त of रंग based on the observation that a prism decomposes white light into the many colours of the visible spectrum.
he also formulated an empirical law of cooling and studied the speed of sound.
In addition to his work on the calculus, as a mathematician Newton contributed to the study of power series, generalised the binomial theorem to non-integer exponents, और विकसित Newton 's method for approximating the roots of a function.
Newton was a fellow of ट्रिनिटी College and the second Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge.
He was a devout but unorthodox Christian and, unusually for a member of the Cambridge faculty, he refused to take holy orders in the Church of England, perhaps because he privately अस्वीकृत the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In addition to his work on the गणितीय sciences, न्यूटन also dedicated much of his time to the study of alchemy and biblical chronology, but most of his work in those areas remained unpublished until long after his death.
In his later life, Newton became president of the Royal Society.
He भी परोसा the अंग्रेजों government as Warden and Master of the Royal Mint.
Prof. Walter lewin explains न्यूटन 's law of gravitation in MIT course 8.01
Satellites and projectiles सब obey न्यूटन 's law of gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation states that every point mass in the universe attracts every other पाइंट द्रव्यमान साथ a फ़ोर्स कि is directly proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them.
( Separately it was shown that large spherically symmetrical masses आकर्षित और हैं आकर्षित as if all their mass were concentrated at their centers. )
This is a general physical law derived from empirical observations by कया न्यूटन पुकारा induction.
It is a part of classical mechanics and was formulated in Newton 's work Philosophiæ Naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया mathematica ( `` the प्रिन्सिपिया '' ), पहला published on 5 July 1687.
( When Newton 's book was presented in 1686 to the Royal Society, रॉबर्ट hooke बना a अर्जी कि Newton had obtained the inverse square law from him – see History section below. )
In आधुनिक भाषा, the law states the following:
Assuming SI units, F is measured in newtons ( N ), m1 and m2 in kilograms ( kg ), r in meters ( m ), और the निरंतर g is लगभग बराबर to.
The value of the constant G was first accurately determined from the results of the Cavendish experiment conducted by the British scientist Henry Cavendish in 1798, हालांकि कैवेंडिश किया नहीं खुद गणना a numerical value for G.
This experiment was also the first test of Newton 's theory of gravitation between masses in the laboratory.
It took place 111 years after the publication of Newton 's Principia and 71 years after Newton 's death, so none of Newton 's calculations could use the मान of g ; बजाय he could तभी गणना a force relative to another force.
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles Coulomb 's law of electrical forces, which is used to calculate the magnitude of विद्युत फ़ोर्स between दो चार्ज लाशें.
Both are inverse-square कानून, in जिससे फ़ोर्स is inversely proportional to the square of the distance between the bodies.
कूलम्ब 's विधि रै the उत्पाद of दो आरोप in प्लेस of the product of the masses, and the electrostatic constant in place of the gravitational constant.
Newton 's law रै चूंकि महरूम superseded by आइंस्टीन 's सिद्धान्त of general relativity, but it continues to be used as an excellent approximation of the effects of gravity.
Relativity is required only when there is a need for चरम परिशुद्धता, or जब dealing साथ gravitation for extremely massive and dense objects.
White and red flags, representing Iraqi and American deaths, sit in the grass quadrangle of The Valley Library on the Corvallis, Oregon, कैम्पस of ऑरेगॉन राज्य University.
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( नहीं सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह गिनती प्रोजेक्ट ), the ध्वज aim to `` raise awareness of the human cost of the Iraq War. ''
( may 2008 )
Casualties of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of इराकी, और continuing साथ the ensuing occupation of इराकी, as खूब as the क्रियाएँ of the विभिन्न हथियारबंद समूह operating in the country ) have come in many forms, and the accuracy of the information available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly.
The table below summarizes various estimates of the इराकी casualty figures.
For troops in the U.S.-led बहुराष्ट्रीय गठबन्धन, the मौत टोल is carefully tracked and updated daily, and the names and photographs of those killed in action as well as in accidents have been published widely.
A total of 4,486 U.S. soldiers were मारे in इराकी between 2003 और 2012.
Regarding the Iraqis, however, information on both military और civilian हताहत is both less precise and less consistent.
Estimates of casualty स्तर हैं उपलब्धियाँ इससे पत्रकारों on the scene, from officials of involved organizations, and from groups that summarize information on incidents reported in the news media.
The word `` casualties `` in its most general sense includes the घायल as खूब as the dead.
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely, partly because it is नहीं स्पष्ट कया चाहिए be गिने : चाहिए तभी those चोटों serious enough to put a soldier out of commission be included ?
Do बीमारियों or चोटों caused by दुर्घटनाओं count, or should the focus be restricted to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
Sources using different definitions may arrive at very different numbers, और sometimes the precise definition is not clearly specified.

A highwayman was a thief and brigand who preyed on travellers.
This type of outlaw usually travelled और robbed by horse, as compared to a footpad who travelled and robbed on foot.
Mounted robbers were widely considered to be socially superior to footpads.
Such robbers operated in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड इससे the Elizabethan era until the early 19th century.
The word highwayman is first known to be used in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms शामिल `` शूरवीरों of the सड़क '' और `` gentlemen of the road. ''
Two terms applied to 19th-century North अमरीकी highwaymen यहूद सड़क एजेंटों in कुछ उदाहरण लिये पहाड़ डाकुओं while in other cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians.
In the same समय काल in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, they were known as bushrangers.
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson, Jr. ( born August 14, 1959 ) is a retired American professional basketball player who played point guard for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ).
बाद जीतना championships in ऊँची school and college, Johnson was selected first overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers.
He won a championship and an NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award in his rookie season, and won चार अधिक championships साथ the लेकर्स during the 1980s.
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing कि he था contracted hiv, but returned to play in the 1992 All-Star Game, winning the All-Star MVP Award.
After protests from उसके fellow players, he retired again for four years, but returned in 1996, at age 36, to play 32 games for the Lakers before retiring for the third and final time.
Johnson 's career achievements include three NBA MVP पुरस्कार, नौ एनबीए फाइनल दिखावे, बारह all-star खेल, और टेन all-nba First and Second Team nominations.
He led the league in regular-season assists four टाइम्स, और is the एनबीए 's all-time नेता in average assists per game, at 11.2.
Johnson was a सदस्य of the `` सपना Team ``, the U.S. basketball team that won the Olympic gold medal in 1992.
After leaving the NBA in 1992, जॉनसन formed the जादू जॉनसन all-stars, a barnstorming team that travelled around the world playing exhibition games.
Johnson was honored as one of the 50 महानतम खिलाड़ी in एनबीए History in 1996, and enshrined in the Basketball Hall of Fame in 2002.
He was रेटेड the महानतम NBA point guard of all time by ESPN in 2007.
His friendship and rivalry with Boston Celtics star Larry Bird, whom he faced in the 1979 ncaa फाइनल and three NBA championship series, were well documented.
Since his retirement, Johnson has been an advocate for HIV/ AIDS prevention and safe sex, as well as an उद्योगों, लोकसेवक, प्रसारणकर्ता और प्रेरक speaker.
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers for several years, and was part of a समूह कि खरीदा the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2012.
Allium cells in different phases of the cell cycle
The cells of eukaryotes ( left ) and prokaryotes ( right )
The cell is the मौलिक संरचनात्मक, functional and biological unit of all known living organisms.
It is the smallest unit of life that is classified as a living thing ( except virus, जिससे consists तभी इससे dna/rna covered by प्रोटीन और lipids ), and is often called the building block of life.
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a membrane, जिससे contains अनेक biomolecules ऐसे as प्रोटीन और nucleic acids.
Organisms can be classified as unicellular ( consisting of a single cell ; सहित सबसे जीवाणु ) or बहुकोशिकीय ( सहित पौधे and animals ).
While the number of cells in plants and animals varies from species to species, इंसानो contain परिचय 100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells.
Most plant and animal cells are between 1 and 100 micrometres और इसलिए हैं दृश्य only under the microscope.
The cell was खोजा by रॉबर्ट Hooke in 1665.
The cell theory, first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob Schleiden and Theodor Schwann, states that all organisms are composed of one or more cells, that all cells come from preexisting cells, that vital functions of an organism occur भीतर कोशिकाएं, और कि सब कोशिकाएं contain the खानदानी सूचना जरुरी for regulating cell functions and for transmitting information to the next generation of cells.
Cells emerged on planet Earth at least 4.0–4.3 अरब सालो पहले.
The word cell comes from the Latin गर्भगृह, अर्थ `` छोटी रूम ''.
The descriptive term for the smallest जीना biological ढांचा was coined by Robert Hooke in a book he published in 1665 when he compared the cork cells he saw through his microscope to the small rooms monks lived in.
Grecian Formula is a men 's hair coloring product in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Canada and यूरोपीय previously banned the product because of its use of lead acetate.
A motor scooter 's front with an impractical क्रमांक और किस्में of headlamps, added for decorative purposes
A headlamp is a lamp attached to the front of a vehicle to लाइट the सड़क ahead.
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age, spurred by the great disparity between daytime and nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration states that nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the अंधेरा, despite तभी 25 % of ट्रैफ़िक यात्राएं during darkness.
While it is common for the term headlight to be used interchangeably in informal discussion, headlamp is the term for the यंत्र itself, जबकि हेडलाइट properly refers to the बीम of light produced and distributed by the device.
Other vehicles, ऐसे as रेल और वायुयान, are required to have headlamps.
सायकिल headlamps हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त on bicycles, and are required in some jurisdictions.
They can be powered by a battery or a छोटी विद्युत generator on the wheel.
Additionally automotive night vision systems कार्य to संपूरक headlamps.
Women 's rights are the rights और entitlements claimed for women and girls of many societies worldwide.
In some places these rights are institutionalized or समर्थित by विधि, लोकल custom, and behaviour, whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of इंसान अधिकारों through दावा of an अंतर्निहित historical and traditional bias against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the right : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental and religious rights.
Caryn Elaine जॉनसन, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as whoopi गोल्डबर्ग (, ( born नवम्बर 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
गोल्डबर्ग बना her film debut in The Color Purple ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actress and won her first सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये उसके भूमिका in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda mae भूरा, a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this made Goldberg only the second black woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie mcdaniel जो जीती लिये गए With the Wind in 1939.
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2, The Player, Made in America, How Stella Got Her नाली वापस, लड़की, बाधित और चूहा रेस.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender guinan in स्टार ट्रेक : the अगला पीढी, as टेरी doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash, and as Carmen Tibideaux in Glee, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
Goldberg has been nominated for 13 Emmy पुरस्कार लिये उसके कार्य in television.
She was co-producer of the लोकप्रिय game show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004.
She has been the moderator of the daytime talk दिखाएँ the दृश्य चूंकि 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a टोनी ( लिये production, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award, four लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार, और रै महरूम honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
She is one of the few entertainers who have won an Emmy, ग्रैमी, ऑस्कर, और Tony Award.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब, of जिससे seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग in the संसार, और one of the major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest professional sports trophy in North अमेरिका, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season.
The league was organized on November 26, 1917, in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, after the suspension of operations of इसके पूर्ववर्ती संगठन, the नेशनल Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It प्रारंभ साथ चार टीमों और, through a श्रेणी of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to जिससे the नाम of the लीग originally referred was Canada, although the league has now been binational since 1924 when it expanded into the United States.
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season, the league resumed play under a नई सामूहिक bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
In 2009, the NHL enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in शर्तें of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
The NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the world और फिलहाल रै खिलाड़ी इससे परिचय 20 अलग countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the past four plus decades the percentages of US and European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty क्लब चूंकि 1967, और the increased उपलब्धता of अत्यधिक skilled European players.
maggots feeding on carrion.
A maggot is the larva of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is applied in particular to the larvae of Brachyceran flies, such as houseflies, cheese flies, and blowflies, rather than larvae of the nematocera, ऐसे as मच्छरों और Crane flies.
`` Maggot '' is not a technical term and should not be taken as ऐसे ; in अनेक मानक textbooks of entomology it does not appear in the index at all.
In many non-technical ग्रन्थ the पद is प्रयुक्त for insect larvae in general.
Other स्त्रोत have coined their own definitions ; for example : ``...
The term applies to a grub when all trace of limbs has disappeared... '' and ``... Applied to the footless larvae of Dipters. ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are of wide importance in ecology and medicine ; among other roles, various species are prominent in recycling carrion and garbage, attacking crops और foodstuffs, spreading सूक्ष्मजैविक infections, और causing myiasis.
Herod (, Hordos, Greek :, hērōdēs ), भी ज्ञात as हेरोदेस the ग्रेट ( 73/74 bce – 4 bce in Jericho ), was a Roman client king of Judea.
His epithet of `` the ग्रेट '' is widely विवादित as he is described as `` a madman who murdered his own family and a great many rabbis ``.
He is भी ज्ञात लिये उसके colossal भवन प्रोजेक्ट in जेरूसलम और elsewhere, सहित his expansion of the Second Temple in Jerusalem ( sometimes referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and the construction of the port at Caesarea Maritima.
Important details of his biography are gleaned from the works of the 1st सदी ce roman–jewish इतिहासकार Josephus Flavius.
The Romans made Herod 's son, Herod Archelaus, ethnarch of Judea, Samaria, and Idumea ( biblical Edom ) from 4 BCE to 6 CE, referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea.
archelaus थी judged incompetent by the रोमन emperor Augustus who then combined Samaria, Judea proper and Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41.
Herod 's other बेटे हेरोदेस antipas थी tetrarch of Galilee from 4 BCE–39 CE.
ABO blood group antigens present on red रक्त कोशिकाएं और igm antibodies present in the serum
The ABO blood group system is the most important blood type system ( or रक्त group system ) in human blood transfusion.
The associated anti-A and anti-B antibodies हैं प्रायः igm antibodies, जिससे हैं प्रायः उत्पादित in the पहला सालो of जीवन by sensitization to environmental substances such as food, bacteria, and viruses.
ABO blood types are also present in some other animals, for example apes such as chimpanzees, bonobos, और gorillas.

Northville is an affluent नगर स्तिथ in and divided by Oakland and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan.
The area is a उपनगरीय of Metropolitan Detroit.
The जनसांख्यिकी was 5,970 at the 2010 census.
Most of the city is in Oakland काउंटी, और is घिरी by the city of Novi.
The Wayne काउंटी portion is घिरी by Northville Township.
northville is served by Northville Public Schools.
The city is located northeast of Ann Arbor और उत्तरपश्चिम of डेट्रॉयट.

She has appeared in numerous stage plays और musicals, विशेषता films, and many television programs.

Misfits is a British science fiction comedy-drama television show about a group of young offenders sentenced to कार्य in a जातियाँ सेवा कार्यक्रम, जहाँ वे obtain अलौकिक शक्तियां बाद a अजीब electrical storm.
The series opened in 2009 and is फिलहाल ongoing.
Antonia Thomas, Iwan Rheon, Lauren Socha, Nathan stewart-jarrett, और रॉबर्ट sheehan हैं introduced as Alisha Daniels, Simon Bellamy, Kelly Bailey, Curtis Donovan, and Nathan Young respectively.
Sheehan left after the second series, replaced in the तीसरा by जोसेफ gilgun as Rudy Wade.
After the fourth series was announced Rheon, Thomas and Socha had left their roles and would be replaced by new characters Karla crome, नाथन mcmullen and Matt Stokoe, as Jess, Finn and Alex respectively.

On 19 March 2013, Channel 4 announced at a दबायें इवेंट कि वे have नवीनीकृत misfits for a fifth and final series containing 8 episodes.
Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10, 1969 ) is a former American football quarterback who spent the बहुमत of उसके करियर साथ the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was a 20-year veteran of the एनएफएल, having निभाई quarterback for the Atlanta Falcons ( 1991 ), Green Bay Packers ( 1992 – 2007 ), New York Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL history to throw for over 70,000 yards, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, और over 10,000 pass attempts.
Favre started at the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति लिये the University of Southern Mississippi for four years before being selected in the second round of the 1991 NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ).
He was traded to Green Bay on February 10, 1992, for the 19th चुनें in the 1992 एनएफएल Draft.
Favre became the Packers ' starting quarterback in the fourth game of the 1992 season, stepping in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski, and started every game through the 2007 season.
He was traded to the New York Jets और प्रारंभ at क्वार्टरबैक लिये the 2008 season before signing with the Vikings on August 18, 2009 as their starting quarterback.
He made an एनएफएल रिकार्ड 297 consecutive starts ( 321 including playoffs ).
He is the only player to win the ap सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ).
He has led teams to आठ प्रभाग championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), five NFC Championship Games ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), and two Super Bowl appearances ( Super Bowl XXXI, Super Bowl XXXII ), winning one ( Super Bowl XXXI ).
He holds many NFL records, including most career touchdown passes, most career passing yards, most career pass completions, most career pass attempts, most career interceptions thrown, most consecutive starts by a player, most consecutive starts by a क्वार्टरबैक, सबसे करियर victories as a starting quarterback, most sacked, and most fumbles.
He is also referred to by his उपनाम `` the gunslinger ''.

The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly ज्ञात as the web ), is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
With a web browser, one can view web pages that may contain text, images, videos, and other मल्टीमीडिया, और navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier हाइपरटेक्स्ट प्रणालियों जैसे enquire, अंग्रेजों इंजीनियर, कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक और at कि time employee of the CERN, Sir Tim Berners-Lee, now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ), wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a यूरोपीय शोध organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '', and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year.
Wayne Lyman Morse ( October 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) was a राजनेता और attorney इससे ऑरेगॉन, संयुक्त राज्य, known for his proclivity for opposing his parties ' leadership, and specifically for his opposition to the Vietnam War on constitutional grounds.
Born in Madison, Wisconsin, and educated at the विश्वविद्यालयों of wisconsin-madison और the विश्वविद्यालयों of Minnesota Law School, Morse moved to Oregon in 1930 and began teaching at the University of Oregon School of Law.
During World War II he was elected to the United States Senate as a Republican ; he became an Independent after Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the प्रेसिडेंसी in 1952.
While an independent, he set a record for performing the second longest one-person filibuster in the इतिहास of the Senate.
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955, और थी reelected twice while a member of that party.
Morse made a brief run for the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी 's अध्यक्षीय nomination in 1960.
A few years later, Morse was one of only two Senators who opposed the गल्फ of tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे प्राधिकृत the अध्यक्ष to लो सैन्य action in Vietnam without a declaration of war.
He continued to speak out against the war in the ensuing years, and lost his 1968 bid लिये reelection to bob packwood, जो criticized उसके दमदार opposition to the war.
Morse made two more bids for reelection to the सीनेट पहले उसके मौत in 1974.
In parliamentary कार्यविधि, a गति to table has two different and contradictory meanings:
In the United States, to table प्रायः अर्थात् the to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the तालिका or to मूव लिये postponement of consideration ; a proposal to suspend consideration of a pending motion.
much कम प्रायः, it अर्थात् a गति to `` put on the table '' : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ), a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world.
In the rest of the english-speaking संसार such as the United Kingdom, to table means to move to place [ the topic ] upon the table ( or to move to place on the table ) : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal.
Both the American and the अंग्रेजों dialects have the भाव of `` to table '' as to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to cause [ the topic ] to lie on the table.
The difference is the idea of what the table is for, that of a शेल्फ बंद to the पक्ष, or an active work bench.
The British meaning has the भाव of the तालिका as होने an क्रियाशील कार्य bench, with the topic being the center of attention, considered and discussed by all until it can be resolved, at which point it is taken off the 'table '.
The American sense is that the table is like that of a shelf, archive, or long-term storage यंत्र, जहाँ the topic has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' and leaving it there.
Toy Story 3 is a 2010 American 3D computer animated comedy-drama prison film, और the तीसरा किश्त in the खिलौना स्टोरी श्रेणी.
It was produced by पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
Directed by Lee Unkrich, the film was released worldwide from June through October in Disney Digital 3-d, reald, and IMAX 3D.
Toy Story 3 was also the first film to be released theatrically with dolby घेर 7.1 ध्वनि.
The screenplay was written by Michael Arndt, while Unkrich wrote the story along with John Lasseter and Andrew Stanton, respectively director and co-writer of the दो पहला films.
the प्लाट focuses on the खिलौने वुडी, Buzz Lightyear, and their friends dealing with an uncertain future as their owner, Andy, prepares to leave for college.
Actors Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Don Rickles, Estelle हैरिस, जॉन ratzenberger, वालेस shawn, जेफ़ pidgeon, Jodi Benson, R. Lee Ermey, John Morris, and Laurie Metcalf reprised their voice-over roles from the previous films.
Jim Varney, who played Slinky Dog in the first two films, and Joe Ranft, who portrayed Lenny and wheezy, दोनो died पहले उत्पादन began on Toy Story 3.
The role of Slinky Dog was taken over by Blake Clark ( a friend of Varney ), while Ranft 's वर्ण और विभिन्न others were written out of the story.
New characters include प्रदर्शन by ned beatty, टिमोथी डाल्टन, Kristen Schaal, Bonnie Hunt, Whoopi Goldberg, Jeff Garlin, Richard Kind, and Michael Keaton.
The feature broke Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest खोलने दिन उत्तर अमरीकी सकल for an animated film unadjusted for inflation, and a big opening with an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189.
It is also the highest-grossing opening weekend for a Pixar film, as well as the highest-grossing opening weekend for a film to have opened in the माह of जून.
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010, both in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा, और विश्वव्यापी.
In early August, it became Pixar 's highest-grossing film at the North American box office ( surpassing Finding nemo ), और the highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of सब time worldwide ( surpassing Shrek 2 ) ; later that month, Toy Story 3 became the first ever animated film in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide.
It is currently the 10th-highest-grossing film of all time.
खिलौना स्टोरी 3 थी मनोनीत लिये पाँच अकादमी पुरस्कार, including Best Picture, Best Adapted Screenplay, and Best Sound Editing.
It was the third animated film ( बाद सौंदर्य और the जानवर and Up ) to be nominated for Academy Award for Best Picture.
It won the पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन एनिमेटेड Feature and Best Original Song.
John Levell Starks ( born August 10, 1965 ) is an American retired पेशेवर बास्केट shooting guard.
Starks was सूचीबद्ध at 6'5 '' और 190 pounds during his NBA playing career.
Although he थी नहीं drafted in the 1988 एनबीए ड्राफ्ट बाद उपस्थित चार कॉलेजों in उसके देशी Oklahoma, including Oklahoma State University, he gained fame while playing for the New York Knicks of the National Basketball Association in the 1990s.
सुरक्षित डिजिटल or ( sd ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable devices, such as mobile phones, digital cameras, GPS navigation devices, and tablet computers.
The Secure Digital standard is कायम by the SD Card Association ( SDA ).
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across दर्जनों of उत्पाद श्रेणी and more than 8,000 models.
the सुरक्षित डिजिटल स्वरूप includes four card families available in three different form factors.
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ), the High-Capacity ( sdhc ), the extended-capacity ( sdxc ), and the SDIO, which combines input/output functions with data storage.
The three form factors are the original size, the `` mini '' size, and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are many combinations of रूप कारकों and device families.
Electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a छोटी card in a host device built to hold a larger card.
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards, but this article explains several factors कि can prevent the उपयोग of a नए sd card:
A newer card may offer greater क्षमता than the host device can handle.
A newer card may use a file प्रणाली the मेजबान यंत्र can not navigate.
Use of an SDIO card requires the मेजबान यंत्र be designed for the input/output functions the card provides.
The संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला starting with the SDHC family.
Some vendors produced SDSC ताश ऊपर 1 gb before the SDA had standardized a method of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ and assure users of compatibility.
Hugh John mungo ग्रान्ट ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a British actor and film producer.
He has received a Golden Globe, a bafta, और an Honorary César.
His films have अर्जित अधिक than us $ 2.4 billion from 25 theatrical releases worldwide.
Grant achieved international स्टारडम बाद appearing in रिचर्ड कर्टिस 's कामयाब Four Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ).
He used this breakthrough role as a frequent cinematic persona during the 1990s, delivering कॉमिक प्रदर्शन in मुख्यधारा films like Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ).
By the turn of the 21st century, he had established खुद as a अग्रणी man skilled with a satirical comic talent.
Grant has expanded उसके oeuvre साथ critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), About A Boy ( 2002 ), Love Actually ( 2003 ), and American Dreamz ( 2006 ).
He later played against type साथ अनेक कैमियो भूमिकाएँ in the epic drama film Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ).
Within the film industry, Grant is cited as an anti-film star who approaches his roles like a character actor, and कोशिशें to मेक उसके एक्टिंग appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of his comic skills include a nonchalant touch of irony / sarcasm and studied physical mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed संवाद डिलीवरी और फेशियल expressions.
The entertainment media 's coverage of ग्रान्ट 's जीवन बंद the बिग स्क्रीन has often overshadowed his work as a thespian.
He has been vocal about his disrespect for the profession of एक्टिंग, और in उसके disdain towards the culture of celebrity and hostility towards the media.
In a career spanning 30 years, Grant has repeatedly claimed that acting is not a true कॉलिंग लकिन बस a job he fell into.
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 ad ) थी an इम्पीरियल राजवंश of चीन, preceded by the qin राजवंश ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ).
It was founded by the विद्रोही नेता लियू Bang, known posthumously as Emperor Gaozu of Han.
It was briefly बाधित by the xin राजवंश ( 9–23 ad ) of the former regent Wang Mang.
This interregnum separates the Han into two periods : the Western Han ( 206 BC – 9 AD ) और पूर्वी हान ( 25–220 ad ).
Spanning over four centuries, the काल of the हान राजवंश is माना a सुनहरी age in Chinese history.
To this day, China 's बहुमत जातीय समूह refers to itself as the `` Han people '' and the Chinese script is referred to as `` Han characters ``.
The Han Empire was divided into areas directly controlled by the central government, known as commanderies, और a क्रमांक of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
These kingdoms धीरे खोया सब vestiges of their independence, particularly following the Rebellion of the Seven States.
The Xiongnu, a nomadic confederation which dominated the पूर्वी यूरेशियाई स्तान, पराजित the Han army in battle in 200 BC.
Following the defeat, a political marriage alliance was negotiated in जिससे the Han became the de facto inferior partner.
When, despite the treaty, the Xiongnu continued to raid Han borders, Emperor Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 bc ) शुभारम्भ अनेक सैन्य अभियान against them.
The ultimate Han victory in these युद्धों आखिरकार forced the Xiongnu to accept vassal status as Han tributaries.
These campaigns expanded Han sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped स्थापित the विशाल व्यापार संजाल known as the Silk Road, which reached as far as the Mediterranean world.
Han forces managed to divide the Xiongnu into two competing nations, the Southern and उत्तरी xiongnu, और मजबूर the उत्तरी xiongnu आरपार the Ili River.
Despite these victories, the territories north of Han 's borders were quickly overrun by the nomadic xianbei कनफेडरेशन.
After 92 AD, the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in court politics, engaging in violent power struggles between the विभिन्न consort clans of the empresses and empress dowagers, causing the Han 's ultimate downfall.
Imperial authority was also seriously challenged by large Daoist religious समाजों जिससे instigated the पीला पगड़ी विद्रोह और the Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion.
Following the death of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 ad ), the राजमहल हिजड़े suffered होलसेल नरसंहार by सैन्य officers, allowing members of the aristocracy and military governors to become warlords and divide the empire.
When Cao Pi, किंग of वेई, usurped the throne from Emperor Xian, the Han Dynasty ceased to exist.
The Han Dynasty was an age of economic prosperity and saw a significant growth of the money economy first स्थापित दौरान the Zhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ).
The coinage issued by the central सरकारी मिंट in 119 bc remained the standard coinage of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ).
To pay for its military campaigns और the उपनिवेश of newly conquered frontier territories, the government nationalized the private salt and iron industries in 117 BC.
These government monopolies were repealed दौरान the पूर्वी Han period, and the lost revenue was recouped through heavily taxing private entrepreneurs.
The emperor was at the pinnacle of हान society.
He presided over the Han government but shared power with both the nobility and appointed ministers who came largely इससे the scholarly gentry क्लास.
From the reign of Emperor Wu onward, the Chinese court officially sponsored Confucianism in education and court politics, synthesized with the cosmology of बाद विद्वानों ऐसे as डांग zhongshu.
This policy endured until the fall of the Qing राजवंश in 1911 AD.
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant advances, including papermaking, the nautical steering rudder, the उपयोग of ऋणात्मक संख्याएँ in गणित, the raised-relief मैप, the हाइड्रोलिक -powered armillary sphere for astronomy, and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum.
Tourette syndrome ( also पुकारा tourette 's सिंड्रोम, tourette 's विकार, गाइल्स de la tourette सिंड्रोम, gts or, अधिक commonly, simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with onset in childhood, characterized by multiple physical ( motor ) tics and at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic.
These tics characteristically wax and wane, can be suppressed temporarily, and are preceded by a premonitory urge.
tourette 's is पारिभाषित as भाग of a वर्णक्रम of tic disorders, which includes transient and chronic tics.
Tourette 's was once considered a rare and bizarre syndrome, most often associated with the exclamation of obscene words or socially अनुचित और अपमानजनक remarks ( coprolalia ), लकिन इस लक्षण is उपस्थित in तभी a छोटी minority of people with Tourette 's.
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition, but it is not always correctly identified because most मामले हैं mild और the गंभीरता of tics decreases for most children as they pass through adolescence.
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the prevalence of transient and chronic tics in school-age children is higher, with the more आम tics of नजर blinking, खाँसी, गला clearing, sniffing, and facial movements.
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, and tourette 's करता नहीं adversely affect प्रज्ञा or जीवन expectancy.
Genetic और पर्यावरणीय factors play a role in the etiology of Tourette 's, but the exact causes are unknown.
In most cases, medication is अनावश्यक.
There is no effective treatment लिये प्रत्येक मामला of tics, but certain medications and therapies can help when their use is warranted.
Education is an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of कोई उपचार plan, and explanation and reassurance alone are often sufficient treatment.
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses अन्य than tourette 's ) ऐसे as attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) and obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are present in many patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics.
These other conditions often cause more functional impairment to the individual than the tics that are the hallmark of Tourette 's, hence it is महत्वपूर्ण to correctly identify comorbid conditions and treat them.
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of his resident, जॉर्जेस Albert Édouard Brutus Gilles de la Tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a French physician and neurologist, who published an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885.
Sunbeam बैज.
Sunbeam was a marque registered by John Marston Co. ltd of wolverhampton, इंग्लैण्ड, in 1888.
The company first made bicycles, then motorcycles and cars from the late 19th century until परिचय 1936, और लागू the marque to सब तीन फ़ॉर्म of transportation.
the कम्पनी भी manufactured एयरो इंजन in the First World War and 647 aircraft during the Second World War.
A सनबीम थी the पहला British car to win a Grand Prix race, and set a number of land speed records.
The कम्पनी गई into receivership in 1935 and was purchased by the Rootes Group, which continued to use the Sunbeam marque.
Fox News Channel ( FNC ), also known as Fox News, is a cable news channel owned by the Fox Entertainment Group, a subsidiary of न्यूज निगम.
As of April 2009, the channel was available to 102 लाख households in the संयुक्त राज्य और to viewers internationally, broadcasting primarily from its New York studios.
The channel was निर्मित by australian-american media mogul Rupert Murdoch, who hired former NBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO.
It launched on October 7, 1996 to 17 million cable सदस्य.
It grew during the late 1990s and 2000s to become the प्रबल केबल न्यूज संजाल in the United States.
Critics have stated that Fox News Channel promotes रूढ़िवादी राजनैतिक positions and biased reporting.
Commentators, news anchors, and reporters at Fox News Channel have responded कि न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग और राजनैतिक commentary operate independently of each other, and have denied any bias in news reporting.
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( away from the midline of the फेस ) इससे दोनो the mandibular second premolars of the mouth but mesial ( toward the midline of the face ) from both mandibular second molars.
It is located on the mandibular ( निम्नतर ) मेहराब of the mouth, and generally opposes the maxillary ( upper ) first molars and the maxillary 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion.
The function of this molar is similar to कि of सब molars in लिहाज़ to grinding being the principal action during mastication, commonly known as chewing.
There are usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular first molars : two on the buccal ( side nearest the cheek ), two lingual ( side nearest the जीभ ), and one distal.
There are great differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars and those of the permanent mandibular molars, भी हालांकि उनके फलन हैं similar.
The स्थाई mandibular molars are not considered to have any teeth that precede it.
Despite being named molars, the पतझड़ी molars हैं followed by स्थाई premolars.
In the universal system of notation, the deciduous mandibular first molars are designated by a अक्षर लिखा in अपरकेस.
The right deciduous mandibular first molar is known as `` s '', और the बाएँ एक is known as `` L ''.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय notation has a different system of notation.
Thus, the सही पतझड़ी mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 84 '', और the बाएँ one is known as `` 74 ''.
In the universal system of notation, the स्थाई mandibular पहला molars हैं designated by a number.
The right permanent mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 30 '', और the left one is known as `` 19 ''.
The पामर संकेतन उपयोग a number in conjunction with a symbol designating in which quadrant the tooth is found.
For this tooth, the left and right first molars would have the same number, `` 6 '', but the सही एक होता have the प्रतीक, `` ┐ '', over it, while the left one would have, `` ┌ ''.
The international notation has a different numbering system than the पिछला दो, और the सही स्थाई mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 46 '', and the left one is known as `` 36 ''.
Mandibular primary first molars प्रायः have चार pulp horns.
The first molar is usually the पहला स्थाई दाँत to erupt और रै वयस्क undertones.
Anatomy : The mandibular पहला molar रै पाँच पुलिन : the mesiobuccal ( mb, toward midline और गाल ), mesiolingual ( ml, toward midline और tongue ), distolingual ( DL, away from midline and towards tongue ), distobuccal ( DB, away from midline and toward cheek ), and distal ( D, away from midline ), listed in order of decreasing size.
Listed in order of decreasing height they are : ML, DL, DF, MF, and D. An eighth cusp was found in a प्राथमिक दूसरी निम्नतर molar in an Argentinean child.
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ), the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( पाँच तरफा ) in आकार और tapers toward the lingual, with the sides being the buccal surface, the mesial surface, the lingual surface, distal surface, and the distobuccal surface.
The occlusal surface has four grooves.
The central groove is not सीधा लकिन रनों bas the बीच of the दाँत mesially to distally and contains four pits ( mesial, central, central, and distal ).
The distobuccal groove runs from the distal pit in the सेंट्रल नाली distobuccally separating the distal and distobuccal cusps.
The lingual groove runs from the more distal of the central pits in the central groove toward the lingual सतह between the mesiolingual and distolingual cusps.
The buccal नाली रनों इससे the अधिक mesial of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the central groove toward the buccal surface between the mesiobuccal and distobuccal cusps ending in the buccal pit.
The portion of the central groove between the central pits is termed the Lewis offset and is mandatory to खाता लिये the स्थितियाँ of the buccal और lingual डोले ( buccal नाली होने अधिक mesial than the lingual groove while they are parallel ).
From the buccal ( buccal view ), two roots are उपस्थित.
the distal रूट is generally straighter, although both often have a slight distal curvature.
The heights of contour on the mesial and distal contact the adjacent teeth and are located at the जंक्शन of the occlusal और मध्य तिहाई of the crown.
The Florida विधानमंडल is the two houses that act as the state legislature of the U.S. state of Florida.
The Florida Constitution states that `` The legislative power of the राज्य shall be vested in a विधानमंडल of the राज्य of Florida, '' composed of a Senate and House of Representatives.
The विधानमंडल is seated at the Florida State Capitol in Tallahassee.
Stained glass चित्रण of डेनियल interceding with Arioch, the king 's guard.
Arioch had been charged with killing all the हिकमत मेन बाद वे यहूद नहीं able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
Daniel 2 is the second chapter of the Book of डेनियल in the Hebrew Bible.
The अध्याय 's source text is predominantly written in Aramaic.
According to the टेक्स्ट, nebuchadnezzar is the किंग of बाबुल who is troubled by his dreams.
He मांगे an निर्वचन for his dreams or will have his mystic interpreters executed.
डेनियल seeks दैवी Wisdom to interpret the king 's dreams and praises God with a short psalm.
God gives डेनियल a दृष्टि in the रात्रि to reveal the king 's dream.
Able to satisfy the king, Daniel is promoted over the whole province of Babylon.

The old Comcast logo from 1969 to 1999, when it थी replaced साथ the crescent logo.
The Comcast Corporation is an अमरीकी प्रदाता of entertainment, information and communications products and services.
It is the largest cable operator, one of the biggest mass media, home Internet service provider, and third largest home telephone service provider in the United States, providing cable television, broadband Internet, टेलीफोन सेवा और in कुछ क्षेत्रों घर सुरक्षा ( सहित burglar सचेतक, निगरानी कैमरे, आग सचेतक प्रणालियों और घर स्वचालन ) to दोनो आवासीय और वाणिज्यिक ग्राहक in 40 states and the District of Columbia.
The company is headquartered in फिलाडेल्फिया, Pennsylvania.
In 2011, Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media संगुटिका nbcuniversal from GE in January 2011, and began the process of purchasing the remaining 49 % on February 12, 2013, at a cost of $ 16.7 billion.
It समाप्त the खरीदें on March 19, 2013.
Comcast also has significant holding in अनेक केबल संजाल ( including E !
Entertainment Television, Style Network, G4, the Golf Channel and NBC Sports Network ), distribution ( ThePlatform ), and related businesses.
Comcast has been the subject of criticism for activities including its stance on net neutrality, as well as poor results on customer संतोष सर्वेक्षण.
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of sharp spines, or quills, कि बचाव और camouflage उन्हें इससे predators.
They are स्वदेशी to the americas, दक्षिणी Asia, and Africa.
Porcupines are the third largest of the rodents, behind the capybara और the बीवर.
Most porcupines हैं परिचय long, with an long tail.
Weighing, वे हैं rounded, large and slow.
Porcupines come in various shades of भूरा, धूसर, और the unusual white.
Porcupines ' spiny protection resembles that of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs and monotreme echidnas.
The आम साही is a herbivore.
It eats leaves, herbs, twigs and ग्रीन पौधे जैसे skunk cabbage and clover and in the winter it may eat bark.
The उत्तर अमरीकी साही often climbs trees to find food.
The African porcupine is not a climber and forages on the मैदान.
It is mostly nocturnal, but will sometimes forage लिये food in the day.
Porcupines have become a pest in कीनिया and are eaten as a delicacy.
the नाम साही आता from Middle French porc espin ( spined pig ).
A regional अमरीकी name for the animal is quill pig.

Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2, 1844 – October 10, 1929 ) was a black canadian-american आविष्कारक और engineer, who was notable for his 57 U.S. patents, most to do with lubrication of steam engines.
Born free in Canada, he returned as a five-year-old चाइल्ड साथ उसके परिवार to the संयुक्त राज्य in 1847, जहाँ he जिया लिये the rest of his life and became a US citizen.
Honda FCX Clarity, a hydrogen fuel cell demonstration गाडी introduced in 2008
A hydrogen गाडी is a गाडी कि उपयोग hydrogen as its onboard fuel for motive power.
Hydrogen vehicles include hydrogen fueled स्पेस rockets, as well as automobiles and other transportation vehicles.
The power plants of such vehicles convert the रासायनिक उर्जा of हाइड्रोजन to mechanical उर्जा either by burning hydrogen in an internal combustion engine, or by reacting hydrogen with oxygen in a fuel cell to run electric motors.
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling परिवहन is a key element of a proposed hydrogen economy.
Hydrogen ईंधन करता नहीं occur naturally on Earth and thus is not an energy source ; rather it is an energy carrier.
It is most frequently made from methane or other चट्टान fuels, लकिन it can be उत्पादित using स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as हवा, solar, or nuclear ) that are intermittent, too diffuse or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen पौधे, using electrolysis of water, are exploring technologies to deliver costs low enough, and quantities great enough, to compete with traditional energy sources.
Many companies are working to develop technologies कि might efficiently exploit the potential of hydrogen energy for mobile uses.
The attraction of using hydrogen as an energy करेंसी is कि, if हाइड्रोजन is prepared बगैर using चट्टान ईंधन inputs, vehicle propulsion would not contribute to carbon dioxide emissions.
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost, low energy content per unit volume, high tankage weights, very high storage vessel pressures, the storage, transportation and filling of gaseous or द्रव हाइड्रोजन in वाहनों, the विशाल निवेश in अवसंरचना कि would be required to fuel vehicles, and the inefficiency of production processes.
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of California और the सीट of सरकारी of Sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in the northern portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive सेंट्रल घाटी.
With an estimated 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest city in California and the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core सांस्कृतिक और आर्थिक बीच of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, and the San Diego metropolitan area, as well as the 25th largest in the United States.
Sacramento was cited by समय पत्रिका as अमेरिका 's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John sutter, sr., उसके बेटे जॉन sutter, jr., and James W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of sutter 's फोर्ट, जिससे थी स्थापित by Sutter in 1839.
During the कैलिफ़ोर्निया सुनहरा फटाफट, sacramento थी a प्रमुख वितरण पाइंट, a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural center, and a terminus for wagon trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State विश्वविद्यालयों, sacramento, अधिक commonly known as Sacramento State or Sac State, is the largest local university.
it is एक of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system.
Drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ in Downtown, Sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of Law is located in the Oak Park पड़ोस.
In addition, the University of California, डेविस is स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस, वेस्ट of the capital.
The UC Davis Medical Center, a world-renowned research hospital, is located in the नगर of sacramento.
the ठहराना स्टोर is a कड़ी of retail stores owned and operated by Apple Inc., dealing in computers and consumer electronics.
The stores sell Macintosh personal computers, software, iPods, iPads, आईफ़ोन, third-party accessories, and other consumer electronics such as Apple TV.
Some high profile stores feature a Theatre for presentations and workshops and a Studio लिये प्रशिक्षण साथ ठहराना उत्पाद ; सब स्टोर्स प्रस्ताव a Genius Bar for technical support and repairs, as well as free workshops available to the public.
Under the leadership of Ron Johnson, the former Senior Vice President of Retail Operations, the Apple Stores have, according to an article in the New York Times, been responsible for `` [ turning ] the boring कंप्यूटर बिक्री मंजिल into a sleek playroom भर साथ gadgets ''.
, Apple has 405 स्टोर्स विश्वव्यापी, साथ वैश्विक बिक्री of अरब in merchandise in 2011, and they lead the United States retail market in terms of sales per unit area.
Steven Paul `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24, 1955 – October 5, 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor, best known as the co-founder, अध्यक्ष, और सीईओ of ठहराना Inc.
Through Apple, he was widely पहचाना as a charismatic पायोनियर of the निजी कंप्यूटर क्रान्ति और लिये उसके influential करियर in the कंप्यूटर and consumer electronics fields, transforming `` one industry after another, from computers and smartphones to music and movies... ''
Jobs also co-founded and served as chief executive of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became a member of the board of directors of The Walt डिज़्नी कम्पनी in 2006, जब Disney acquired Pixar.
Jobs was among the first to see the commercial potential of Xerox PARC 's mouse -driven graphical user interface, which led to the सृष्टि of the ठहराना लिसा और, one year later, the Macintosh.
He भी निभाई a भूमिका in introducing the LaserWriter, one of the first widely available laser printers, to the market.
After a power संघर्ष साथ the फलक of निर्देशकों in 1985, कार्य left Apple and founded NeXT, a computer platform development company specializing in the higher-education and business markets.
in 1986, he acquired the computer graphics division of Lucasfilm, which was spun off as Pixar.
He was credited in Toy Story ( 1995 ) as an कार्यपालिका निर्माता.
He served as सीईओ और बहुमत shareholder until Disney 's purchase of Pixar in 2006.
In 1996, after Apple had failed to deliver its operating system, copland, gil amelio turned to अगला कंप्यूटर, और the NeXTSTEP platform became the foundation for the Mac OS X.
Jobs returned to Apple as an advisor, and took control of the कम्पनी as an interim CEO.
Jobs brought Apple from near bankruptcy to profitability by 1998.
As the new CEO of the company, Jobs oversaw the development of the iMac, iTunes, iPod, iPhone, and ipad, और on the सेवाएं पक्ष, the कम्पनी 's ठहराना Retail Stores, iTunes Store and the App Store.
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable financial रिटर्न, और propelled ठहराना to become the संसार 's most valuable publicly traded company in 2011.
The reinvigoration of the कम्पनी is regarded by many commentators as one of the greatest turnarounds in business history.
In 2003, Jobs was diagnosed with a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor.
Though it was initially treated, he reported a hormone imbalance, underwent a जिगर प्रत्यारोपण in 2009, and appeared progressively thinner as his health declined.
On medical leave for most of 2011, Jobs resigned in अगस्त कि साल, and was elected Chairman of the Board.
He died of respiratory arrest सम्बन्धित to उसके metastatic tumor on October 5, 2011.
Jobs प्राप्त a number of honors and public recognition for his influence in the technology and music industries.
He has been referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or simply `` visionary '', and has been described as the `` Father of the Digital क्रान्ति '', a `` निपुण of नवीनता '', और a `` design perfectionist ''.

Roman numerals, the numeric system in ancient रोम, उपयोग combinations of letters from the Latin alphabet to signify values.
The numbers 1 to 10 can be expressed in रोमन numerals as follows:
और.
The रोमन numeral system is a cousin of Etruscan numerals.
उपयोग of रोमन numerals continued after the decline of the Roman Empire.
From the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in most contexts by more convenient Hindu-Arabic numerals ; however this process was क्रमिक, और the उपयोग of रोमन numerals in कुछ नाबालिग applications continues to this day.
प्रभावी नाभिकीय Charge Diagram
The effective nuclear चार्ज ( often symbolize as or Z* ) is the net positive charge experienced by an electron in a multi-electron atom.
The term `` effective '' is प्रयुक्त क्युकी the shielding प्रभाव of negatively चार्ज electrons prevents higher orbital electrons from experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons.
The effective nuclear चार्ज अनुभवी by the बाहरी शेल electron is also called the core charge.
It is possible to determine the शक्ति of the nuclear charge by looking at the oxidation number of the atom.
