The Dwight D. Eisenhower National प्रणाली of अंतरराज्यीय और रक्षा राजमार्गों ( commonly ज्ञात as the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली, Interstate Freeway System, Interstate System, or simply the Interstate ) is a network of freeways that forms a part of the National Highway System of the United States.
The प्रणाली is नामित for President Dwight D. Eisenhower, who championed its formation.
Construction थी प्राधिकृत by the संघीय सहायता Highway Act of 1956, and the original portion was completed 35 years later.
The network has since been extended, and, it had a total length of, making it the संसार 's दूसरी longest बाद चीन 's., about one-quarter of all vehicle miles driven in the country use the Interstate system.
The cost of construction has महरूम अनुमानित at $ 425 अरब ( in 2006 डॉलर ), making it the `` largest public works program since the Pyramids ``.
The system has contributed in shaping the United राज्य into a world economic superpower and a highly industrialized nation.
.eu is the country code top-level domain ( ccTLD ) for the यूरोपीय Union ( EU ).
Launched on 7 December 2005, the domain is उपलब्धियाँ लिये संगठनों in and residents of EU member states.
The TLD is administered by EURid, a consortium originally consisting of the national ccTLD registry operators of Belgium, Sweden, and Italy, joined later by the national registry operator of the Czech Republic.
Trademark owners were able to submit registrations through a सूर्योदय काल, in an प्रयत्न to prevent cybersquatting.
Full registration प्रारंभ on 7 April 2006.
Meister means master in German ( as in master craftsman, or as an honorific title such as Meister Eckhart ).
The शब्द is akin to maestro.
In sports, Meister is used for the current national, यूरोपीय or संसार चैंपियन ( deutscher Meister, *Europameister, Weltmeister ).
Many modern day German police शक्तियां उपयोग the शीर्षक Meister.
दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, Meister was the highest enlisted rank of the Ordnungspolizei.
Meister has been borrowed into अंग्रेज़ी कठबोली, where it is used in compound nouns.
A person referred to as “meister” is एक जो रै extensive theoretical knowledge and practical skills in his profession, business, or some other kind of work or activity.
For उदाहरण, a “puzzle-meister” would be someone highly skilled at solving puzzles.
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for example, “stubble-meister” लिये किसी साथ a छोटी, neat beard or “crier-meister” for someone who often cries ).
Mighty Morphin Power रेंजरों is an अमरीकी live-action children 's टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय teenagers with super-powers, based on the 16th installment of the Japanese Super Sentai franchise, Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger.
Both the show and its सम्बन्धित merchandise देखी unbridled overnight success, becoming a staple of 1990s pop culture in mere months.
Under the original name, `` Mighty Morphin Power Rangers '' the series ran from 1993 to 1995 and spawned the विशेषता फिल्मी mighty morphin Power Rangers : The Movie.
The second and third seasons of the show drew on फुटेज और तत्व इससे the Super Sentai series Gosei Sentai Dairanger and Ninja Sentai Kakuranger respectively, though the Zyuranger costumes were still used for the five main Rangers and several regular villains.
Only the mecha and the Kiba Ranger costume ( worn by the White Ranger ) were retained from dairanger लिये the दूसरी ऋतु, जबकि तभी the mecha इससे kakuranger यहूद प्रदर्शित in the तीसरा season.
However the Kakuranger costumes were later used for the title वर्ण of the mini-series, Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers.
The series was produced by MMPR Productions, वितरित by saban entertainment, and aired on Fox Kids.
The show 's merchandise थी उत्पादित और distributed by Bandai Entertainment.
In 1996, the series थी rebranded as the शक्ति रेंजरों मताधिकार ; renaming the series every year after, and using costumes, props, and footage from subsequent Super Sentai series, as well as changing the cast and storyline.
While an overarching storyline would continue until Power Rangers Lost Galaxy, subsequent श्रेणी बाद MMPR are not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional sense.
In 2010, a re-version of Mighty Morphin Power Rangers, with a new logo, comic book-referenced graphics, and extra alternative खास प्रभाव, थी ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी बच्चे, और बंदाई उत्पादित ब्रांड नई खिलौने to coincide with the series.
Edgar Allan Poe ( born Edgar Poe ; January 19, 1809 – October 7, 1849 ) was an American author, poet, editor and literary critic, considered भाग of the अमरीकी रोमांटिक गति.
Best known for his tales of mystery and the macabre, Poe was one of the earliest अमरीकी practitioners of the short story and is generally considered the inventor of the detective fiction genre.
He is further credited साथ contributing to the emerging genre of science fiction.
He was the first well-known American writer to try to earn a जीना through लिखने alone, resulting in a financially difficult life and career.
He was born as Edgar Poe in Boston, Massachusetts ; he was orphaned young when उसके माँ died shortly बाद उसके father abandoned the family.
Poe was taken in by John and Frances allan, of रिचमंड, वर्जिनिया, लकिन they never formally adopted him.
He attended the University of Virginia for one semester but left due to lack of money.
After enlisting in the Army and later failing as an officer 's cadet at वेस्ट पाइंट, पो parted तरीके साथ the allans.
His publishing career began humbly, with an anonymous collection of poems, Tamerlane and Other Poems ( 1827 ), credited तभी to `` a bostonian ''.
Poe switched उसके फ़ोकस to गद्य और खर्च the अगला अनेक years working for literary journals and periodicals, becoming known for his own style of literary criticism.
His work मजबूर उसे to मूव among several cities, including Baltimore, Philadelphia, and New York City.
In Baltimore in 1835, he married Virginia Clemm, उसके 13-year-old cousin.
In January 1845 पो प्रकाशित उसके कविता, `` the रेवेन ``, to instant success.
His wife died of तपेदिक दो सालो after its publication.
He began planning to produce his own journal, the penn ( बाद renamed The Stylus ), though he died before it could be produced.
On October 7, 1849, at age 40, Poe died in Baltimore ; the cause of his death is अनजान और रै महरूम variously attributed to दारू, दिमाग जमघट, हैजा, drugs, heart disease, rabies, suicide, tuberculosis, and other agents.
Poe and his works influenced literature in the United States और around the संसार, as खूब as in specialized fields, such as cosmology and cryptography.
Poe and his work appear throughout popular संस्कृति in literature, music, films, and television.
A क्रमांक of उसके घरों are dedicated museums today.
The Mystery Writers of America present an annual award known as the एडगर पुरस्कार लिये विशिष्ट work in the mystery genre.
Lions are obligate carnivores ; वे आवश्यकता up to seven kilograms ( 15 lbs ) of meat per day.
A major component of their आहार is the flesh of large mammals, like this African buffalo.
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat eater ' ( Latin, caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' and vorare meaning 'to devour ' ) is an सजीव कि गर्भाशयी इसके उर्जा और nutrient आवश्यकताएँ इससे a आहार consisting मुख्यतः or exclusively of animal tissue, whether through predation or scavenging.
Animals that depend solely on animal flesh for their nutrient requirements are considered carnivores जबकि those कि भी consume non-animal खाना हैं considered carnivores.
Omnivores also consume both animal and non-animal food, and apart from the more general परिभाषा, there is no clearly defined ratio of plant to animal material that would distinguish a facultative carnivore from an omnivore.
A carnivore कि sits at the top of the foodchain is an apex predator.
Plants that capture and digest insects हैं called carnivorous plants.
Similarly, fungi that capture microscopic animals are often called carnivorous fungi.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an international association football competition contested by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 और 1946 जब it थी नहीं आयोजित क्युकी of the Second World War.
The current champions हैं स्पेन, who won the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within the host nation ( s ) over a period of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been won by आठ अलग नेशनल teams.
Brazil have won five times, and they are the तभी टोली to have निभाई in every tournament.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, with four titles ; Germany, with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे, साथ दो शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; और इंग्लैण्ड, France, and Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 million people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
Heroes is an American science fiction टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी निर्मित by टिम Kring that appeared on NBC for four seasons from September 25, 2006 through February 8, 2010.
The श्रेणी tells the stories of ordinary people who discover superhuman abilities, and how these abilities take effect in the characters ' lives.
The series emulates the aesthetic स्टाइल और storytelling of American comic books, using multi-episode story arcs that build upon a larger, more encompassing arc.
The series थी उत्पादित by tailwind Productions in association with Universal Media Studios.
It was filmed primarily in लॉस Angeles, California.
Four पूरा seasons aired, ending on February 8, 2010.
The critically acclaimed first season had a run of 23 episodes and garnered an average of 14.3 million viewers in the संयुक्त राज्य, receiving the उच्चतम दरजा लिये an एनबीसी नाटक premiere in five years.
The second season of Heroes attracted an average of 13.1 million viewers in the U.S., and marked NBC 's sole series among the शीर्ष 20 क्रमित कार्यक्रम in कुल viewership for the 2007–2008 season.
Heroes has earned a number of पुरस्कार और nominations, सहित Primetime Emmy Awards, Golden Globes, People 's Choice Awards and British Academy Television Awards.
An online extension of the series, Heroes 360 Experience, later rebranded as Heroes evolutions, थी निर्मित to explore the Heroes universe and provides insight into the show 's mythology.
अन्य आधिकारिक नायक मीडिया include magazines, action figures, tie-in and interactive websites, a mobile game, a novel, clothing and other merchandise.
In the fall of 2008, NBC Digital entertainment released a श्रेणी of ऑनलाइन सामग्री लिये the गर्मियाँ, सहित अधिक असली वेब सामग्री, बेतार iTV interactivity, graphic novels available for mobile viewing and webisodes.
NBC announced नायक रद्दीकरण on May 14, 2010.
afterward, the संजाल माना making a television special event to conclude the series ; however, on September 9, 2010, NBC announced the decision to stop any further development of the Heroes franchise.
Tim Kring then suggested that the broad premise of नायक storylines allowed for the franchise to return for fans, but he did not specify when or in what media format.
On April 17, 2013, TV Line reported that MSN was in talks to revive the श्रेणी साथ a new cast.
John Pierpont `` J. P. ''
Morgan ( April 17, 1837 – कूच 31, 1913 ) थी an American financier, banker, philanthropist and art collector who dominated corporate finance and industrial consolidation during his time.
In 1892 Morgan arranged the merger of Edison सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक और thomson-houston Electric Company to form General Electric.
After financing the creation of the Federal Steel Company, he merged in 1901 with the Carnegie Steel Company और अनेक अन्य स्टील और आयरन व्यवसायों, सहित संचित स्टील और तार कम्पनी owned by William Edenborn, to form the United States Steel Corporation.
Morgan died in Rome, Italy, in his sleep in 1913 at the age of 75, leaving his fortune and business to his son, John Pierpont `` Jack '' Morgan, Jr., and bequeathing his mansion and large book संग्रहण to the मॉर्गन पुस्तकालयों & Museum in New York.
At the ऊँचाई of मॉर्गन 's करियर दौरान the जल्दी 1900s, he and his partners had financial investments in many large corporations and were accused by critics of controlling the nation 's high finance.
He निर्देशित the बैंकिंग गठबन्धन that stopped the Panic of 1907.
He was the अग्रणी फाइनेंसर of the प्रगतिशील Era, and his dedication to efficiency and modernization helped transform American business.
This is a सूची of एपीसोड of the television series.
The episodes were directed by Shigeru Ueda and उत्पादित by the yggdrasil कार्यपालिका Committee which included Xebec and Genco.
The plot of the episodes is set in Tokyo and revolves around Rin Asōgi, an immortal private investigator, as she explores the secrets of आधुनिक और near-future संसार और the अलौकिक कार्यक्रम that surround the fictional society of immortals like herself.
There are large time gaps in the आतंरिक कालक्रम between the first five episodes, ranging from one to thirty years.
The six episodes were broadcast monthly on AT-X channel in Japan, between फ़रवरी 3 और July 6, 2008.
प्रत्येक एपीसोड is 45 minutes long.
Two pieces of theme music are used for the episodes : the खोलने थीम `` alsatia '' and the ending theme `` Cause Disarray ''.
Both were composed and performed by the Japanese metal बैंड galneryus.
The series was produced to commemorate the tenth वर्षगांठ of the AT-X network it originally aired on.
Aerial फ़ोटो of fletc, जहाँ US digital forensics standards were developed in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes known as digital forensic science ) is a branch of forensic science encompassing the recovery and छानबीन of सामग्री मिला in डिजिटल डिवाइस, प्रायः in relation to computer crime.
The term digital forensics was originally used as a पर्याय लिये कंप्यूटर forensics लकिन रै विस्तारित to cover investigation of all devices capable of storing digital data.
With जड़ें in the निजी computing revolution of the late 1970s and early '80s, the discipline evolved in a haphazard manner during the 1990s, and it was not until the early 21st century that national policies emerged.
Digital forensics investigations have a variety of applications.
The most common is to support or refute a hypothesis before दण्ड or सिविल ( as भाग of the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्कवरी process ) courts.
Forensics may also feature in the निजी सेक्टर ; ऐसे as दौरान आतंरिक कॉरपोरेट investigations or intrusion investigation ( a specialist probe into the nature and extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ).
The technical aspect of an investigation is divided into अनेक sub-branches, relating to the प्रकार of डिजिटल डिवाइस involved ; computer forensics, network forensics, forensic data analysis and mobile device forensics.
The ठेठ forensic प्रक्रम encompasses the seizure, forensic imaging ( acquisition ) and analysis of digital media and the production of a report into collected evidence.
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime, digital forensics can be used to attribute evidence to specific suspects, confirm alibis or statements, determine intent, पहचानो स्त्रोत ( लिये उदाहरण, in कापीराइट मामले ), or authenticate documents.
Investigations are much broader in scope than other areas of forensic analysis ( जहाँ the usual उद्देश्य is to provide जवाब to a श्रेणी of simpler questions ) often involving complex time-lines or hypotheses.
A comparison of the chromaticities enclosed by कुछ रंग स्पेसेस.
A color model is an abstract mathematical model describing the way colors can be represented as tuples of संख्याएँ, typically as three or four values or color components ( e.g. RGB and CMYK are color models ).
However, a color model with no associated mapping function to an absolute color space is a more or less arbitrary color system with no connection to any globally understood system of रंग निर्वचन.
Adding a certain mapping function between the color model and a certain reference color space परिणाम in a definite `` पदचिह्न '' within the reference color space.
This `` footprint '' is known as a gamut, and, in संयोजन साथ the color model, defines a new color space.
For example, Adobe आरजीबी और srgb हैं दो अलग absolute color spaces, both based on the RGB model.
In the most generic sense of the definition above, color spaces can be defined बगैर the उपयोग of a रंग model.
These spaces, such as Pantone, are in effect a given नियत of names or संख्याएँ जिससे हैं पारिभाषित by the अस्तित्व of a corresponding set of physical color swatches.
This article focuses on the गणितीय model concept.
Labor Day is an American federal holiday observed on the first Monday in September, that मनाता the आर्थिक और सोशल contributions of workers.
Life insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy होल्डर ) और an insurer, जहाँ the insurer वादे to pay a designated beneficiary a sum of money ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the death of the insured person.
Depending on the contract, अन्य कार्यक्रम such as terminal illness or critical illness may also trigger payment.
The policy holder typically pays a premium, either regularly or as a lump sum.
अन्य खर्च ( such as funeral expenses ) are also sometimes included in the benefits.
Life policies are legal contracts and the शर्तें of the अनुबंध describe the सीमाएं of the insured events.
Specific exclusions are often written into the contract to limit the देयता of the insurer ; आम examples are claims relating to suicide, fraud, war, riot and civil commotion.
life-based अनुबंध tend to पतन into two major categories:
सुरक्षा नीतियों – designed to provide a benefit in the event of specified event, typically a lump sum payment.
A common form of this design is पद insurance.
Investment policies – where the main objective is to facilitate the growth of पूंजी by नियमित or सिंगल प्रीमियम.
Common forms ( in the US ) are whole life, universal life और परिवर्तनीय जीवन नीतियों.

mitzi gaynor donahue ( born may 2, 1962 in Yorba Linda, Orange County, California ) is an American actress, also credited and more popularly known as Mitzi Kapture.
Kapture began her career in films, most of which were not huge commercial successes.
She went on to make a few television guest appearances ( MacGyver, 1st & Ten, and as a प्रतियोगी on The $ 100,000 Pyramid ) before she gained international exposure with her first major television role as Sergeant Rita Lee Lance in the television series Silk Stalkings.
Kapture 's role as Rita, the other half of the दो `` sams '' लिये लगभग 5 सालो, cemented her popularity.
Paired with Rob Estes who played Sergeant Chris Lorenzo, Kapture gained global recognition along साथ उसके costar चूंकि the दिखाएँ थी broadcast in several countries.
Sergeant Lance eventually became Lieutenant Lance by the time Kapture left the श्रेणी in 1995 to have her first child Madison.
During her time with the series, Kapture briefly sat in the director 's chair, लिये दो episodes.
She was interviewed for the Silk Stalkings Season 1 DVD which was distributed by Anchor Bay Entertainment and released in सितंबर 2004.
After a short hiatus from the screen following her exit from Silk Stalkings, Kapture returned in 1997 to the small स्क्रीन और यूएसए Network.
She played lead भूमिकाएँ in two USA Pictures Originals telemovies, Perfect Crime ( based on a true story, also called Hide and Seek : The Joanne Jensen Story ), which also starred Jasmine Guy and His Bodyguard.
She later starred in a few other independent film projects and थिएटर प्रोडक्शन्स और था अनेक टेलीविज़न अतिथि appearances.
kapture भी था a recurring role on Baywatch as Alexis Ryker.
She played Anita Hodges on The Young and the Restless इससे 2002 through 2004, जहाँ वो थी credited as mitzi Kapture Donahue, and starred in the made-for-TV movie Night of Terror which premiered March 26, 2006 on Lifetime Network.
Her latest is a supporting role in परमेश्वर 's कानों, released in 2007.
Kapture is the official हस्ती प्रवक्ता लिये the Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society.
The Xbox 360 is the second video game console विकसित by और उत्पादित लिये Microsoft and the successor to the Xbox.
The Xbox 360 competes with Sony 's PlayStation 3 and Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles.
As of September 30, 2012, 70 million एक्सबॉक्स 360 consoles have been sold worldwide.
The Xbox 360 was officially unveiled on MTV on May 12, 2005, with detailed launch and game information divulged later that month at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक entertainment एक्सपो ( E3 ).
The console sold out completely upon release in all regions मगर in जापानी.
Several major features of the Xbox 360 are its integrated Xbox Live service that allows players to compete online ; download arcade games, game demos, trailers, TV shows, म्यूज़िक और फिल्मों ; और इसके खिड़कियाँ मीडिया बीच मल्टीमीडिया capabilities.
The Xbox Live also offers access to various ( प्रायः region-specific ) third-party media streaming applications.
At their E3 presentation on जून 14, 2010, Microsoft announced a redesigned Xbox 360 that would ship on the same day.
The redesigned console is slimmer than the पिछला एक्सबॉक्स 360 model and features integrated 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi, TOSLINK S/PDIF optical audio output, five USB 2.0 ports ( compared to the three from older versions ) and a special AUX port.
Older models of the Xbox 360 have चूंकि been discontinued.
The first new console to be released features a 250 gb मुश्किल ड्राइव, जबकि a बाद, कम महंगी SKU features 4 GB internal storage.
Backpack may also refer to a 2001 अनोखा by एमिली Barr
a modern backpack
Swiss फौज backpack ca. 1960
एकीकृत तुमको frame.
A backpack ( also called rucksack, knapsack, packsack, पैक ) is, in its simplest form, a cloth sack carried on one 's back and secured with two straps that go over the shoulders, but there can be exceptions.
Lightweight types of backpacks are sometimes worn on तभी एक कंधे strap.
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying भारी loads or carrying any sort of equipment, because of the limited capacity to carry heavy weights for long periods of time in the hands.
Large backpacks, used to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 lbs ), usually offload the largest भाग ( up to परिचय 90 % ) of उनके वज़न onto padded हिप बेल्ट, leaving the कंधे straps mainly for stabilising the load.
This improves the potential to carry heavy loads, as the hips are stronger than the shoulders, and also increases agility and balance, since the load rides nearer the wearer 's अपना बीच of द्रव्यमान.
In ancient times, the backpack was used as a means to carry the hunter 's larger game and other types of शिकार और as a रास्ता of easier हस्तांतरण for other materials.
In the cases of larger hunts, the hunters होता dismember उनके शिकार और distribute the pieces of the animal around, each one packing the meat into many wrappings and then into bags which they placed on to their backs.
The bag itself थी बना up of अलग एनिमल छुपा और स्किन ( depending on कया sorts of पशु यहूद in the क्षेत्रफल ) and sewn together by the intestines of said animals, which were woven together tightly to make a sturdy thread-like material.
Mexico ( ; ; ), officially the United Mexican States ( ), is a federal constitutional republic in उत्तर America.
It is bordered on the north by the United राज्य ; on the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by the प्रशांत Ocean ; on the southeast by Guatemala, Belize, and the Caribbean Sea ; and on the east by the Gulf of Mexico.
Covering almost two million square kilometres ( over 760,000 sq mi ), Mexico is the fifth largest country in the Americas by total क्षेत्रफल और the 13th largest independent nation in the world.
With an estimated population of over 113 लाख, it is the संसार 's eleventh most populous country and the most populous Spanish-speaking country.
Mexico is a संघ comprising thirty-one states and a Federal District, the capital city.
In pre-Columbian Mexico many cultures matured into advanced सभ्यताओं ऐसे as the olmec, the toltec, the teotihuacan, the zapotec, the Maya and the Aztec before first contact with Europeans.
In 1521, Spain conquered और colonized the territory from its base in México-Tenochtitlan, which was administered as the Viceroyalty of New Spain.
This territory would eventually become Mexico following recognition of the उपनिवेश 's स्वतंत्रता in 1821.
The post-independence काल थी characterized by आर्थिक अस्थिरता, the mexican-american War and territorial cession to the United States, a civil war, two empires and a domestic dictatorship.
The latter led to the Mexican Revolution in 1910, which culminated with the promulgation of the 1917 Constitution and the emergence of the देश 's वर्तमान राजनैतिक प्रणाली.
Elections held in July 2000 चिह्नित the पहला समय कि an opposition party won the presidency from the Institutional Revolutionary Party.
Since 2006 the country has been in the midst of a ड्रग युद्ध जिससे रै caused 60,000 deaths.
Mexico has one of the world 's largest economies, and is माना दोनो a क्षेत्रीय शक्ति और मध्य शक्ति.
In addition, Mexico was the first Latin American सदस्य of the संगठन for Economic Co-operation and Development OECD ( since 1994 ), and considered an upper-middle income country by the World Bank.
Mexico is considered a newly industrialized देश और an emerging power.
It रै the fourteenth largest nominal GDP and the eleventh largest GDP by purchasing power parity.
The economy is strongly linked to those of इसके उत्तर अमरीकी फ़्री व्यापार Agreement ( NAFTA ) partners, especially the United States of America.
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and first in the Americas by number of UNESCO World Heritage Sites with 31, और in 2007 थी the दसवाँ सबसे visited देश in the संसार with 21.4 million international arrivals per year.
Babe Ruth holds the MLB career slugging प्रतिशत रिकार्ड (.690 ).
In baseball statistics, slugging percentage ( abbreviated SLG ) is a लोकप्रिय माप of the power of a hitter.
It is गणना as total bases divided by at bats :
where AB is the number of at-bats for a given player, and 1B, 2B, 3B, and HR हैं the क्रमांक of singles, युगल, तिगुना, and home runs, respectively.
सैर हैं specifically excluded from this calculation.
For example, in 1920, Babe Ruth played his first season for the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़.
In 458 at bats, Ruth had 172 hits, comprising 73 singles, 36 युगल, 9 तिगुना, और 54 घर runs, which brings the total base count to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388.
His total number of bases ( 388 ) divided by his total at-bats ( 458 ) is.847, उसके slugging percentage for the season.
The next year he slugged.846, and these records went unbroken until 2001, जब बैरी bonds हासिल 411 bases in 476 at-bats, bringing his slugging percentage to.863, unmatched since.
is a role-playing video game developed and published by Square ( now वर्गाकार एनिक्स ) लिये the सुपर निन्टेंडो entertainment System in 1995.
Chrono Trigger 's विकास टोली शामिल three designers that Square dubbed the `` Dream Team '' : Hironobu Sakaguchi, the creator of Square 's Final Fantasy series ; Yuji Horii, a freelance designer and creator of Enix 's popular Dragon Quest series ; and Akira Toriyama, a freelance manga artist famed for his work with Dragon Quest and Dragon Ball.
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game, Masato Kato wrote सबसे of the प्लाट, जबकि composer Yasunori Mitsuda scored most of the game before falling ill and deferring remaining tracks to Final Fantasy composer Nobuo Uematsu.
The game 's story follows a समूह of adventurers who travel through time to prevent a global catastrophe.
वर्गाकार re-released a ported संस्करण by tose in जापानी लिये Sony 's PlayStation in 1999, later repackaged with a Final Fantasy IV port as Final Fantasy Chronicles in 2001 for the North American market.
A slightly enhanced Chrono Trigger was released for the Nintendo DS on November 25, 2008, in North America and Japan, and went on sale in Australia on February 3, 2009 और in यूरोपीय on फ़रवरी 6, 2009.
The खेल थी never released in PAL territories before the Nintendo DS version.
Chrono Trigger was a critical and commercial success upon release and is माना आज to be एक of the महानतम video games of all time.
Nintendo शक्ति पत्रिका वर्णित पहलुओं of chrono ट्रिगर as क्रांतिकारी, सहित इसके अनेक endings, plot-related sidequests focusing on character development, unique battle system, and detailed graphics.
Chrono Trigger was the third best-selling खेल of 1995, और the खेल 's snes और प्लेस्टेशन iterations have shipped 2.65 million copies as of March 2003.
The version for the Nintendo DS बेची 790,000 copies as of March 2009.
Chrono Trigger was also ported to mobile phones, Virtual Console, the PlayStation संजाल ( तभी in the यूएसए ), iOS devices, and Android devices.
बकरी चीज
Goat cheese, or chèvre ( इससे the फ्रेंच शब्द लिये बकरी ), is cheese made out of the milk of goats.
अतिताप is elevated देह तापमान due to failed thermoregulation that occurs when a body produces or absorbs more heat than it dissipates.
Extreme temperature उन्नयन तब becomes a medical emergency requiring immediate treatment to prevent disability or death.
The most आम कल्याणकारी include heat stroke and adverse reactions to drugs.
The पूर्व is an अधि तापमान उन्नयन caused by exposure to excessive heat, or combination of heat and humidity, that overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms.
The latter is a relatively rare side effect of many drugs, विशेषकर those कि affect the central nervous system.
Malignant hyperthermia is a rare complication of कुछ प्रकार of सामान्य anesthesia.
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices and may be used in the उपचार of कुछ kinds of cancer and other conditions, most commonly in conjunction with radiotherapy.
अतिताप differs from fever in that the body 's temperature set point remains unchanged.
The opposite is hypothermia, which occurs when the temperature drops below कि जरूरी to maintain normal metabolism.
Belize, is a country located on the northeastern coast of Central America.
It is the only country in the area where English is the official language, although Kriol and स्पेनी हैं अधिक commonly बोला.
Belize is bordered on the north by Mexico, to the south and वेस्ट by ग्वाटेमाला और to the east by the Caribbean Sea.
Its mainland is about long और चौड़ी.
With of जमीन और a जनसांख्यिकी of only 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 census ), Belize possesses the lowest population density in Central America.
The country 's population growth rate of 3.15 % ( 2012 est. ) is the दूसरी उच्चतम in the प्रदेश and one of the highest in the western hemisphere.
Belize 's abundance of terrestrial and marine species, and its diversity of ecosystems give it a key place भीतर the globally significant Mesoamerican Biological Corridor.
Belize has a diverse समाज, comprising अनेक संस्कृतियों and languages.
It is the only nation in the region with a British colonial heritage, but as a part of the Western Caribbean Zone, it also shares a आम विरासत साथ the fellow anglophone Caribbean countries.
In general, Belize is considered to be a Central American and Caribbean nation with strong ties to दोनो the caribbean और लैटिन अमेरिका.
Belize is a member of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ), the Community of Latin American and Caribbean States ( CELAC ), and Central American Integration System ( सिका ).
Belize is known for its September Celebrations, and is the birthplace of चबाने गम और punta चट्टान.
The `` Betsy Ross '' ध्वज
A `` Betsy Ross '' ध्वज उड़ती बाहर San Francisco City Hall
The Betsy Ross flag is an जल्दी डिज़ाइन of the ध्वज of the संयुक्त राज्य, popularly attributed to Betsy Ross, using the common motifs of alternating red-and-white striped field with five-pointed stars in a blue canton.
The flag was designed during the American Revolution and सुविधाएँ 13 सितारों to represent the original 13 colonies.
The distinctive feature of the रॉस ध्वज is the व्यवस्था of the stars in a circle.
Although the बेट्सी रॉस story is accepted by most Americans, some flag historians and revisionists do not accept the Betsy Ross design as the first American flag.
According to the परंपरागत खाता, the original flag was made in June 1776, when a small committee—including George Washington, Robert Morris and relative George Ross —visited Betsy and discussed the need for a new American flag.
Betsy accepted the job to manufacture the flag, altering the कमेटी 's डिज़ाइन by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars.
While the Betsy Ross legend is questionable, the flag design is known to have been in use by 1777 ; अल्फ्रेड b. गली वर्णित it at the आत्मसमर्पण of सामान्य Burgoyne and understood the circle of stars to represent equality among the American states.
It is one of the oldest versions of U.S. flags known to exist ; while it is not the oldest surviving flag artifact in cloth form, its likeness appears on पुरानी शारीरिक अरबिंदो, namely, the समकालीन रणभूमि paintings by John Trumbull and Charles Willson Peale.
They depict the circular star arrangement being flown from ship masts and many other स्थान, और यूँ provide the पहला ज्ञात ऐतिहासिक दस्तावेज़ीकरण of the flag 's appearance.
The seal of the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs uses the Betsy Ross flag to represent service to all दिग्गजों इससे the अमरीकी क्रान्ति to the present day.
The Betsy Ross design of 13-star US flags रै महरूम प्रदर्शित in अनेक लोकप्रिय artworks ( sometimes inaccurately, as in Washington Crossing the Delaware ) and films, such as the 1960 version of Pollyanna.
The flag continues to be one of the most popular symbols of the American Revolution.
A purr is a ध्वनि बना by सब species of felids and is a part of cat communication.
It varies between cats ( for example by loudness और टोन ), और इससे प्रजाति to species, but can be characterized as a tonal buzzing.
The term `` purring '' has महरूम प्रयुक्त liberally in साहित्य, और it रै महरूम claimed कि viverrids ( civet, mongoose, genet ), bears, badgers, hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr.
अन्य पशु कि have महरूम कहा to purr हैं rabbits, squirrels, guinea pigs, tapirs, ring-tailed lemurs, elephants, raccoons and gorillas while eating.
However, using a strict परिभाषा of purring कि निरन्तर ध्वनि उत्पादन जरूर वैकल्पिक between pulmonic egressive और ingressive airstream ( and usually go on for minutes ), Peters ( 2002 ), in an exhaustive review of the scientific literature, reached the conclusion that until then only ‘purring cats’ ( Felidae ) and two species of genets, Genetta tigrina, and most likely also Genetta genetta, had been documented to purr.
The platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern Australia, सहित तस्मानिया.
Together with the four species of echidna, it is one of the five extant प्रजाति of monotremes, the तभी स्तनधारियों कि lay अंडे instead of giving birth.
It is the sole living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( ornithorhynchus ), हालांकि a number of related species have been found in the fossil record.
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying, duck -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed mammal मनोरथ यूरोपीय naturalists when they first encountered it, with some considering it an elaborate fraud.
it is एक of the few विषैला mammals, the male platypus having a spur on the hind foot that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus make it an महत्वपूर्ण विषय in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable और iconic प्रतीक of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; it रै appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the animal emblem of the राज्य of नई दक्षिण Wales.
जबतक the जल्दी 20th सदी, it was hunted for its fur, but it is now protected throughout its range.
Although captive breeding programmes have had only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution, it is नहीं अंतर्गत कोई तात्कालिक threat.
St. Elizabeth is a गाँव in Miller County, Missouri, United States.
The population was 336 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Wilton is a census-designated place ( cdp ) in sacramento काउंटी, California, United States.
It is part of the sacramento – Arden-Arcade – Roseville Metropolitan Statistical Area.
The population was 5,363 at the 2010 census, up इससे 4,551 at the 2000 census.
In human-computer interaction, cut and paste and copy and paste are related commands that offer a user-interface interaction technique for transferring text, data, फाइलें or वस्तुएँ इससे a सोर्स to a गंतव्य.
Most ubiquitously, users require the क्षमता to काटें और paste sections of plain text.
The cut command removes the selected data from its original स्थिति, जबकि the नक़ल कमांड creates a नकल ; in दोनो मामले the चयनित data is placed in a clipboard.
The data in the clipboard is later inserted in the position where the paste command is issued.
The कमांड names हैं an इंटरफ़ेस metaphor based on the physical procedure used in manuscript editing to create a page layout.
This interaction technique has close associations with related techniques in graphical user अंतरफलक कि उपयोग इंगित डिवाइस ऐसे as a कंप्यूटर चूहा ( by खीचें और drop, for example ).
Economic order quantity is the अनुक्रम मात्रा कि minimizes total inventory holding costs and ordering costs.
It is one of the oldest शास्त्रीय उत्पादन scheduling models.
The framework used to determine this order quantity is also known as barabas eoq मॉडल or barabas सूत्र.
The model was developed by Ford W. हैरिस in 1913, लकिन R. H. विल्सन, a सलाहकार जो लागू it extensively, is given credit for his in-depth analysis.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by his initials SRV, vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding member and leader of Double Trouble.
Together with drummer क्रिस layton और bassist Tommy Shannon, they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
With a career spanning seven years, Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently sold out कॉन्सर्ट जबकि उनके एल्बम frequently went gold.
He थी born और raised in Dallas, Texas, and for a short period of time lived in Graham, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan started playing the guitar at age seven and formed several bands that occasionally performed in लोकल nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped आउट of ऊँची school and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical career, joining groups such as Krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a बैंड कि आखिरकार विकसित into दोगुना Trouble and regularly performed around Austin.
In 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the Montreux जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, catching the ध्यान of संगीतकारों David Bowie and Jackson Browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to खेल on उसके आगामी स्टुडियो album Let 's Dance, while Browne offered the band free use of his personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran record producer John हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the समूह released the एल्बम, could n't स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984 ) और Soul to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans.
Although his career had progressed successfully, Vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in Atlanta, Georgia to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, In Step was released and earned them a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन Blues Performance.
On August 27, 1990, Vaughan was killed in a helicopter crash following a प्रदर्शन in East Troy, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense style was derived from a variety of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues संगीतकारों सहित अल्बर्ट किंग, Freddie King, Otis Rush, and Muddy Waters, and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the classic blues and pentatonic scales.
He has received wide critical recognition for his guitar playing, ranking at # 6 on रोलिंग पत्थरों सूची of `` 100 महानतम guitarists '' in 2011.
He was मरणोपरांत inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park.
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the greatest musicians to come from the राज्य of Texas.

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores, restaurants, and vending machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The coca-cola कम्पनी of अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया, और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton, Coca-Cola was bought out by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler, जिनकी विपणन tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
the कम्पनी produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी, उपज समाप्त product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers तब बेचें, वितरित और merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises, जिससे is the largest सिंगल Coca-Cola bottler in North America and western Europe.
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for soda स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां और खाना सेवा distributors.
The Coca-Cola Company has, on occasion, introduced अन्य कोला पेय अंतर्गत the Coke brand name.
The most common of these is Diet Coke, with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and special संस्करण साथ नीबू, लाइम or कॉफी.
Based on interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक brand 2011, Coca-Cola was the world 's most valuable brand.
Barry Louis Larkin ( born April 28, 1964 ) is a retired Major League बेसबॉल खिलाड़ी.
Larkin played shortstop for the Cincinnati Reds from 1986 to 2004 और थी एक of the pivotal players on the 1990 Reds ' World Series championship team.
Larkin was elected to the National Baseball Hall of कीर्ति in जनवरी 2012 और थी inducted on July 22.
Larkin is considered one of the top players of his era, winning nine Silver Slugger पुरस्कार और तीन सुनहरा दस्ताने पुरस्कार.
He was चयनित to the प्रमुख लीग all-star Game twelve times, and was elected the 1995 National League Most Valuable Player.
brasília ( ) is the संघीय पूंजी of Brazil and the seat of government of the Federal District.
Administratively, the नगर is located in the Federal District which is in the Central-West Region.
Physically, it is located in the Brazilian हाइलैंड्स.
It has a population of about 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the महानगर क्षेत्रफल ) as of the 2008 ibge अनुमान, बनाना it the fourth largest city in Brazil.
However, as a metropolitan area, it बाँधने निम्नतर at छठे in जनसांख्यिकी.
Brasília is the largest city in the संसार कि किया नहीं मौजूद at the beginning of the 20th century.
Brasília has the fifth largest जीडीपी among लैटिन अमरीकी cities and the third in Brazil.
At around R $ 62,000 Brazilian reais ( equal to approximately $ 30,900 US डॉलर or €23,000 euros ), the नगर 's प्रति capita income is the highest among Brazil 's largest cities.
As the national capital, Brasília is the seat of all three branches of the संघीय सरकारी of ब्राज़ील.
The city also hosts the headquarters of many ब्राज़ीलियाई कंपनियाँ.
Planning policies such as the location of residential buildings around expansive urban areas, as well as building the city around large avenues और dividing it into सेक्टर, have sparked a debate and reflection on life in big cities in the 20th century.
The city 's design divides it into numbered blocks as well as sectors for specified activities, such as the होटल सेक्टर, the बैंकिंग Sector or the Embassy Sector.
Brasília hosts 124 विदेशी embassies.
The city थी नियोजित and developed in 1956 with Lúcio Costa as the principal urban planner, Oscar Niemeyer as the principal architect and Roberto Burle Marx as the landscape designer.
Brasilia is in the Unesco 's World Hertitage सूची due to इसके वास्तुकला.
On April 22, 1960, it formally became Brazil 's national capital.
viewed इससे ऊपर, the प्रमुख portion of the city resembles an airplane or a butterfly.
The city is commonly referred to as Capital Federal, or simply BSB.
Residents of Brasília are known as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those नहीं born in the नगर लकिन जो migrated there after it was established ).
In local usage, the शब्द `` brasília '' प्रायः refers only to the First Administrative Region ( RA I ) within the Federal District ( Distrito Federal ), where the most important government buildings are located.
Brasília has a unique status in Brazil, as it is an प्रशासनिक division rather than a legal municipality like nearly all cities in Brazil.
Nationally, the term is almost सदा प्रयुक्त synonymously with the Federal District, which constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit, analogous to a state.
Several `` उपग्रह शहरों '' exist which are also part of the Federal District.
Brasília International Airport is the main airport in Brasília, connecting the capital to सब प्रमुख ब्राज़ीलियाई शहरों और अनेक अंतरराष्ट्रीय destinations.
it is the तीसरा सबसे महत्वपूर्ण विमानक्षेत्र in Brazil, in terms of passengers and aircraft movements.
Personifications of Germany, France, Russia, austria-hungary, और the संयुक्त किंगडम attempting to रखना the ढक्कन on the simmering cauldron of imperialist and nationalist tensions in the Balkans to prevent a general European war.
They were successful in 1912 and 1913 but did not सफल in in 1914.
The causes of World War I, which began in central Europe in late July 1914 and finished in 1918, included many factors, such as the विरोध और दुश्मनी of the four decades leading up to the war.
सैन्यवाद, alliances, साम्राज्यवाद, and nationalism played major roles in the conflict as well.
The immediate origins of the war, however, lay in the decisions taken by statesmen and generals during the Crisis of 1914, casus belli लिये जिससे थी the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड ( the Archduke of Austria Hungary ) and his wife Sophie by Gavrilo Princip, an irredentist Serb.
The crisis came after a long and difficult series of diplomatic clashes between the ग्रेट शक्तियां ( इटली, फ़्रांस, जर्मनी, the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य, the austria-hungarian Empire and Russia ) over European and colonial issues in the decade before 1914 that had left tensions high.
In turn these diplomatic clashes can be traced to changes in the संतुलन of power in Europe since 1867.
the अधिक तात्कालिक कारण for the war was tensions over territory in the Balkans.
Austria-Hungary competed साथ सर्बिया और रूस लिये territory and influence in the region and they pulled the rest of the Great Powers into the conflict through their various alliances and treaties.
Although the chain of events unleashed by the assassination triggered the war, the war 's origins go deeper, involving national politics, cultures, economics, and a जटिल वेब of alliances और counterbalances कि था विकसित between the various European powers since 1870.
Some of the most important long term or structural causes are : the growth of nationalism across Europe, unresolved territorial disputes, an intricate system of alliances, the perceived breakdown of the balance of power in Europe, convoluted and fragmented governance, the arms races of the previous decades, previous military planning, imperial and colonial rivalry for wealth, power और प्रतिष्ठा, और आर्थिक और सैन्य फंसने in उद्योग और व्यापार – e.g., the सुअर युद्ध between ऑस्ट्रिया और सर्बिया.
Other causes that came into play during the diplomatic crisis that preceded the war included misperceptions of intent ( e.g., the जर्मनी विश्वास कि the संयुक्त किंगडम होता remain neutral ) and delays and misunderstandings in diplomatic communications.
the विभिन्न categories of explanation for World War I correspond to different historians ' overall methods.
Most historians and popular commentators शामिल कल्याणकारी इससे अधिक than one category of explanation to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war.
The deepest distinction among these accounts is between कहानियां कि देखिए it as the अपरिहार्य और predictable निष्कर्ष of certain factors, and those that describe it as an arbitrary and unfortunate mistake.
In attributing causes for the war, इतिहासकारों और लड था to सौदे साथ an unprecedented flood of memoirs and official documents, released as each country involved tried to avoid blame for starting the war.
Early releases of information by governments, विशेषकर those released लिये उपयोग by the `` आयोग on the Responsibility of the Authors of the War '' were shown to be incomplete and biased.
In addition some documents, especially राजनयिक केबल between रूस और France, were found to have been doctored.
Even in later decades however, when much more information had been released, historians from the same culture have been दिखाया to आइये to differing conclusions on the causes of the war.
जॉनसन 's नई chart of national emblems, published c. 1868.
The large flags shown in the corners are the 37-star flag of the United States ( flown 1867-1877 ), the royal मानक of the संयुक्त किंगडम, the Russian Imperial Standard, and the French tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle.
Various other flags flown by जहाजों हैं दिखाया.
The Flag of क्यूबा is labelled `` Cuban ( so called ) ``.
The Chinese dragon on the Flag of China was drawn mistakenly as a western ड्रैगन.
A national flag is a flag that symbolizes a देश.
the ध्वज is flown by the government, but usually can also be flown by citizens of the country.
Both public and private buildings such as स्कूलों और courthouses may fly the national flag.
In some countries, the national flags are only flown from non-military इमारतें on निश्चित ध्वज दिनों.
There are three distinct types of national flag for use on जमीन, और तीन for use at sea, though many countries use identical designs for several ( and sometimes all ) of these types of flag.
The American Civil War ( acw ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war था इसके उत्पत्ति in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers did नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential चुनाव, republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके प्रशासन would not initiate civil war.
आठ बाकी slave states continued to reject calls for secession.
Confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह, and both sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to eleven.
The Union soon नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the बैटल of antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, which बना समाप्ति गुलामी a युद्ध goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their पश्चिमी सेना, और the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant कमांड of सब संघ armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate अवसंरचना along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland अभियान towards रिचमंड, the confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा industrial wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Norrie disease is a genetic disorder that primarily affects the नजर और लगभग सदा leads to blindness.
In addition to the congenital ocular symptoms, some patients suffer इससे a प्रगतिशील सुनना घाटा starting ज़्यादातर in उनके 2nd दशक of जीवन, जबकि another portion may be mentally challenged.
Patients with Norrie disease may develop cataracts, leukocoria ( a condition where the pupils appear white when light is shone on them ), along with other developmental मुद्दे in the नजर, ऐसे as shrinking of the ग्लोब और the बर्बाद दूर of the आईरिस.
Around 30–50 % of उन्हें होगा भी have developmental delay/ mental retardation, psychotic-like features, incoordination of movements or behavioral abnormalities.
Most patients are born साथ सामान्य सुनना ; however, the onset of hearing loss is very common in early adolescence.
About 15 % of the मरीजों हैं estimated to develop all the features of the disease.
The disease affects almost only male infants at birth or soon after birth, because the बीमारी is inherited x-linked recessive.
Only in बहुत विरल मामले, महिलाओं have been diagnosed with Norrie disease as well.
The exact incidence number is अनजान ; तभी a few hundred cases have been reported so far.
It is a very rare disorder that is not संबद्ध साथ कोई विशिष्ट ethnic or racial groups.
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object entered into voluntarily by two or more पार्टियों, प्रत्येक of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them.
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक क्षमता जो एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of कुछ or सब of ये तत्व may be done in writing, though contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for breach of contract can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the रूप of मुआवजे of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction.
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the `` benefit of the bargain '' or expectation damages, जिससे हैं वृहद than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The पार्टियों may be natural persons or juristic persons.
A contract is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking कि कुछ होगा or will not occur.
The word promise can be used as a legal synonym for अनुबंध, हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a वादा may नहीं have the full standing of a contract, as when it is an agreement without consideration.
Contract law varies greatly from one क्षेत्राधिकार to another, सहित मतभेद in common law compared to civil law, the impact of received law, particularly from England in common law countries, and of law codified in regional legislation.
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example, there are 40 relevant acts which impact on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( Federal / नेशनल ) level, and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW.
In addition there are 6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable for international dealings, such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts लिये the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बिक्री of goods.
ASP.NET is a server-side Web application framework designed for Web विकास to उपज dynamic Web pages.
It was developed by Microsoft to allow programmers to build dynamic web sites, web applications and web services.
It was first released in January 2002 with version 1.0 of the.NET Framework, and is the successor to Microsoft 's Active सर्वर पृष्ठों ( ASP ) technology.
ASP.NET is built on the आम भाषा runtime ( clr ), allowing प्रोग्रामर्स to write ASP.NET code using any supported.NET language.
The ASP.NET SOAP extension फ्रेमवर्क allows asp.net components to process SOAP messages.
Lysergic acid diethylamide, abbreviated LSD or LSD-25, also known as lysergide ( INN ) and colloquially as acid, is a semisynthetic psychedelic drug of the ergoline परिवार, खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभाव जिससे can शामिल altered सोच processes, closed and open eye visuals, synesthesia, an altered sense of time and spiritual experiences, as well as for its key role in 1960s counterculture.
It is used mainly as an entheogen, recreational drug, and as an agent in psychedelic therapy.
LSD is non-addictive, is not known to cause दिमाग क्षति, और रै अत्यधिक low toxicity relative to dose.
However, प्रतिकूल मनोरोग reactions such as anxiety, paranoia, and delusions are possible.
LSD was first synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1938 from ergotamine, a chemical derived by Arthur Stoll from ergot, a grain fungus that typically grows on rye.
The short form `` LSD '' comes from its early code name LSD-25, जिससे is an संक्षिप्त लिये the जर्मनी `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number.
LSD is sensitive to oxygen, ultraviolet light, and क्लोराइड, विशेषकर in समाधान, हालांकि इसके potency may पिछला लिये years if it is stored away from light and moisture at low temperature.
In pure रूप it is a colorless, odorless, tasteless solid.
LSD is typically delivered orally, usually on a substrate such as absorbent blotter पेपर, a शुगर cube, or gelatin.
In its liquid रूप, it can भी be administered by intramuscular or intravenous injection.
LSD is very potent, with 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) होने the दहलीज dose.
नई प्रयोग with LSD started in 2009 for the first time in 40 years.
introduced by sandoz laboratories, साथ trade-name delysid, as a drug with various psychiatric uses in 1947, LSD quickly became a therapeutic agent that appeared to show great promise.
In the 1950s, officials at the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency ( CIA ) thought the drug might be applicable to दिमाग कंट्रोल और रासायनिक warfare ; the एजेंसी 's mkultra शोध कार्यक्रम propagated the drug among young servicemen and students.
The subsequent recreational use of the drug by youth culture in the Western world during the 1960s led to a राजनैतिक firestorm कि resulted in its prohibition.
Currently, a number of organizations—including the Beckley Foundation, MAPS, Heffter Research संस्थान और the अल्बर्ट hofmann foundation—exist to fund, encourage and coordinate research into the medicinal and spiritual uses of LSD and related psychedelics.
The United States Navy 's Sea, Air, Land Teams, commonly known as the Navy SEALs, are the U.S. Navy 's प्रिंसिपल खास परिचालन फ़ोर्स और a भाग of the नवल खास warfare कमांड और United States Special Operations Command.
`` SEAL '' is always capitalized in सन्दर्भ to सदस्यों of the नवल Special Warfare community.
The acronym is derived from their capacity to operate at sea, in the एयर, और on जमीन.
SEALs are male members of the संयुक्त राज्य Navy.
An exchange program with the Coast Guard, which graduated three Coast guardsmen as seals, थी suspended in 2011.
The CIA 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and more specifically its elite Special Operations Group ( SOG ) recruits ऑपरेटर इससे the मुहर Teams.
Joint Navy SEALs and CIA operations go back to the famed macv-sog दौरान the Vietnam War.
This cooperation still exists आज और is देखी in the युद्धों in इराकी और अफगानिस्तान, and in the finding and killing of Osama bin Laden in Pakistan.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, नारंगी, green ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded population आंकड़े हैं in ब्लू.
According to the highest estimate, the world population may rise to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
the संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the total number of living humans on Earth.
As of today, it is अनुमानित to क्रमांक अरब by the United States Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates कि the संसार population exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी निधि, it reached this milestone on October 31, 2011.
the संसार population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly during the 1950s, और लिये a longer काल दौरान the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और था declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and are now expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 लाख, जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth, stagnation, or even overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ, and energy resources.
Memphis is a city in the southwestern corner of the u.S. राज्य of टेनेसी, और the county seat of Shelby County.
The city is located on the 4th Chickasaw Bluff, south of the संगम of the भेड़िया और मिसिसिपी rivers.
Memphis had a population of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest city in the state of Tennessee, the largest city on the Mississippi River, the third largest in the Southeastern United States, and the 20th largest in the United States.
The greater Memphis metropolitan area, including adjacent counties in Mississippi and अरकंसास, था a 2010 population of 1,316,100.
This makes Memphis the second largest metropolitan area in Tennessee, surpassed only by metropolitan Nashville, which रै overtaken मेम्फिस in हाल years.
मेम्फिस is the youngest of Tennessee 's major cities.
A resident of Memphis is referred to as a Memphian, and the Memphis region is known, विशेषकर to मीडिया आउटलेट, as `` Memphis & The Mid-South ``.
The Cattenom नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in France.
France produces around तीन quarters of its electricity by nuclear power.
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power संयंत्र in जर्मनी.
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced on May 30, 2011, that Germany’s 17 nuclear power स्टेशन होगा be shut bas by 2022, in a नीति reversal following जापानी 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster.
Currently, 68 रिएक्टरों हैं under construction in 15 countries.
Nuclear power stations operate in तीस countries.
In 2010, before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational प्रति साल, हालांकि according to the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009, only five actually came on stream.
As of June 2011, जर्मनी and Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power.
As of June 2011, countries such as Australia, Austria, Denmark, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, liechtenstein, ध्वज, Malaysia, Malta, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
Skeletal muscles homo sapiens
This is a table of muscles of the इंसान anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral मांसपेशियां, मिला on दोनो पहलू, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles.
Examples range इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of groups जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन, मांसपेशियां of the धड़ or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी from the standard anatomical position.
In other positions, other क्रियाएँ may be performed.

The Seminole Wars, also known as the Florida Wars, यहूद तीन विरोध in फ्लोरिडा between the seminole — the सामूहिक name given to the amalgamation of various groups of native Americans and Black people who settled in Florida in the early 18th century — and the United States Army.
The First Seminole War was from 1814 to 1819 ( although स्त्रोत differ ), the दूसरी seminole War from 1835 to 1842, and the Third Seminole War from 1855 to 1858.
The first conflict with the Seminoles arose out of tensions relating to सामान्य एंड्रयू जैक्सन 's आक्रमण और विनाश of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816.
Jackson also attacked the स्पेनी at pensacola.
Ultimately, the Spanish Crown ceded the colony to United States rule.
orono is a कस्बा in penobscot County, Maine, United States.
It was first settled in 1774 and named in सम्मान of मुख्य जोसेफ Orono of the Penobscot Nation.
It is home to the विश्वविद्यालयों of Maine.
The population was 10,362 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.

Luxor Las Vegas is a hotel and casino on the लास Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada.
The 30-story होटल, स्वामित्व और संचालित by MGM Resorts International, has a casino with over 2,000 slot machines and 87 table games.
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation, it has a नई, अत्यधिक आधुनिकीकरण, और समकालीन design and contains a total of 4,400 rooms, including 442 suites, lining the interior walls of a pyramid style tower and within twin 22-story ziggurat towers that were built as later additions.
The hotel is named after the city of Luxor ( ancient Thebes ) in Egypt.
Luxor is the second largest hotel in Las Vegas ( the largest being the MGM ग्रैंड ) और the आठवीं largest in the world.
As of 2010, the Luxor has a 4 Key rating from the Green Key eco-rating कार्यक्रम, जिससे evaluates `` sustainable '' hotel operations.
A pilot experiment, also called a pilot study, is a small scale प्रारंभिक पढ़ाई conducted in अनुक्रम to evaluate feasibility, समय, लागत, प्रतिकूल कार्यक्रम, और प्रभाव आकार ( सांख्यिकीय variability ) in an attempt to predict an appropriate sample size and improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale research project.
Pilot studies, इसलिए, may not be appropriate for case studies.
The Los Angeles Fire विभाग ( lafd ) is the एजेंसी कि provides fire protection and emergency medical services for the city of Los Angeles.
It may be unofficially referred to as the लॉस एंजिल्स नगर आग विभाग to फर्क it from the Los Angeles County Fire Department.
The acre is a unit of क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in the इम्पीरियल and U.S. customary systems.
An acre is about 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – slightly smaller than an American football field.
The acre is no longer commonly प्रयुक्त, हालांकि a few notable अपवाद include the United States, Australia, Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom, though is still used in real estate descriptions ).
It is still प्रयुक्त, to कुछ extent, in Canada.
The international प्रतीक of the एकड़ is ac, और is defined as 1/640 of a square mile.
The most commonly used एकड़ आज is the international acre.
In the United States both the international acre and the थोड़ा different US survey acre are in use.
The most common use of the एकड़ is to माप tracts of land.
One international acre is defined as 4046.8564224 वर्गाकार मीटर.
During the Middle Ages, an acre was the amount of land that could be plowed in one day साथ a yoke of oxen.

Language processing refers to the way human beings use words to communicate ideas and जज्बात, और कैसा ऐसे communications are processed and understood.
Thus it is कैसा the दिमाग creates and understands language.
सबसे हाल theories consider that this process is carried out entirely by and inside the brain.
This is considered one of the most characteristic abilities of the इंसान प्रजाति - शायद the most characteristic.
However very little is known about it and there is huge scope for research on it.
Most of the knowledge acquired to date on the subject has come from patients who have suffered some type of significant head injury, whether external ( wounds, बुलेट ) or आतंरिक ( strokes, tumors, degenerative diseases ).
Studies have shown that सबसे of the भाषा प्रसंस्करण कृत्यों हैं carried आउट in the cerebral cortex.
The अनिवार्य फलन of the cortical language areas is symbolic representation.
Even though language exists in different फ़ॉर्म, सब of उन्हें हैं based on symbolic representation.
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined ग्रैंड touring car, designed और विकसित by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim, France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal production car in the संसार, साथ a शीर्ष गति of.
The original version has a top speed of.
It was named Car of the दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear.
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best car चलित सब Year award in 2005.
On 6 April 2013, Bugatti set the record for the fastest roadster in the world with the Veyron Grand Sport vitesse, reaching on औसत a शीर्ष speed of.
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss, and the exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen, with much of the अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य होने conducted अंतर्गत the मार्गदर्शन of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber.
A number of special variants have महरूम उत्पादित.
In December 2010, Bugatti began offering prospective खरीदार the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior and interiors colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website.
DVD is an optical disc storage format, invented और विकसित by फिलिप्स, सोनी, तोशिबा, and Panasonic in 1995.
DVDs offer higher भंडार क्षमता than कॉम्पैक्ट discs while having the same dimensions.
Pre-recorded DVDs are mass-produced using molding machines कि physically stamp data onto the DVD.
Such discs are known as DVD- ROM, क्युकी आंकड़ा can तभी be read and not written nor erased.
Blank recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using a DVD recorder and then function as a DVD-ROM. rewritable dvds ( dvd-rw, dvd+rw, and DVD-RAM ) can be recorded and erased multiple times.
DVDs are used in DVD-Video consumer digital video format and in DVD-Audio consumer डिजिटल ऑडियो स्वरूप, as खूब as लिये authoring AVCHD discs.
DVDs containing other types of information may be referred to as DVD data discs.
What chilli wants is an अमरीकी reality series on VH1 starring Chilli, one-third of the Grammy Award -winning R & B trio TLC.
The show chronicles Chilli 's quest to find love with the help of Tionna T. Smalls, an author and संबंध coach.
The series premiered on April 11, 2010, और रै चूंकि been renewed for a second season.
The second ऋतु premiered on संडे, January 2, 2011.
Peter Gene Hernandez ( born October 8, 1985 ), ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम ब्रूनो Mars, is an American singer-songwriter and record producer.
Raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, by a family of musicians, Mars began बनाना म्यूज़िक at a यंग आयु and performed in various musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood.
He graduated from high स्कूल और तब स्थानांतरित to Los Angeles, California, to pursue a musical career.
मंगल उत्पादित गीतों for other artists, joining production team The Smeezingtons.
मंगल था an unsuccessful stint with Motown Records, but then signed with Atlantic in 2009.
He became recognized as a सोलो कलाकार बाद lending उसके vocals and co-writing the hooks for the songs `` Nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B, and `` Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy.
He also co-wrote the हिट्स `` सही Round `` by Flo Rida featuring Ke $ ha, and `` Wavin ' Flag `` by K'naan.
In October 2010, he released his debut album, Doo-Wops & Hooligans.
Anchored by the worldwide number-one singles `` बस the रास्ता तुम हैं `` और `` ग्रेनेड ``, the एल्बम peaked at number three on the Billboard 200.
Mars was nominated for seven Grammys at the 53rd Grammy Awards, winning Best Male Pop Vocal Performance लिये `` बस the रास्ता तुम Are ''.
His second studio album, Unorthodox Jukebox, थी released on दिसम्बर 11, 2012.
Mars ' music is noted for displaying a wide किस्में of शैलियाँ and influences, and contains elements of many musical genres.
He has worked with an assortment of कलाकारों इससे various genres.
As a child, he was highly influenced by artists such as Little Richard, Elvis Presley and माइकल जैक्सन और होता प्रायः impersonate ये कलाकारों from a young age.
Mars also incorporates रेगी - और motown -inspired sounds into his work.
Worldwide, मंगल became the best-selling digital artist in 2011.
He had three singles in the शीर्ष टेन, सहित first place with `` Just the Way You Are '', which sold 12.5 million copies.
Mars won Best International Male सोलो कलाकार at the 2012 ब्रिट Awards.
Bruno Mars has sold 6 million albums and 40 million singles worldwide as a सिंगर.
Althought as a song-writer, producer and सिंगर उसके कुल सिंगल डाउनलोड बिक्री surpass 100 million worldwide.

Greek mythology is the देह of मिथकों और शिक्षाओं कि belong to the प्राचीन Greeks, concerning their gods and heroes, the nature of the world, and the origins and significance of their own cult and ritual practices.
It was a part of the religion in प्राचीन यूनानियों और is भाग of धर्म in modern Greece and around the world, known as Hellenismos.
Modern scholars refer to and study the myths in an attempt to throw light on the religious and political institutions of Ancient Greece and its सभ्यता, और to लाभ समझना of the प्रकृति of myth-making itself.
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a विशाल संग्रहण of कहानियां, और implicitly in Greek representational arts, such as vase-paintings and votive gifts.
Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of the world, and details the जीवनदान और adventures of a wide variety of gods, goddesses, heroes, heroines, and mythological creatures.
These accounts initially were disseminated in an oral-poetic tradition ; today the Greek myths are known primarily from Greek साहित्य.
The oldest known Greek literary sources, Homer 's epic poems Iliad and Odyssey, focus on कार्यक्रम surrounding the Trojan War.
Two poems by Homer 's near समकालीन hesiod, the Theogony and the Works and Days, contain accounts of the genesis of the world, the succession of divine rulers, the succession of human ages, the origin of human woes, and the origin of sacrificial practices.
Myths are also preserved in the Homeric Hymns, in fragments of epic poems of the Epic Cycle, in lyric poems, in the works of the tragedians of the fifth century BC, in कृतियाँ of विद्वानों और कवियों of the hellenistic आयु, और in ग्रन्थ इससे the समय of the Roman Empire by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias.
Archaeological findings provide a principal source of detail about Greek mythology, with gods and heroes featured prominently in the decoration of many artifacts.
ज्यामितीय डिजाइन on pottery of the eighth century BC depict scenes from the Trojan cycle as well as the adventures of Heracles.
In the succeeding archaic, शास्त्रीय, और hellenistic अवधि, homeric and various other mythological scenes appear, supplementing the existing literary evidence.
Greek mythology has had an extensive influence on the संस्कृति, कला, और साहित्य of पश्चिमी civilization and remains part of Western heritage and language.
Poets and artists from ancient times to the present have derived inspiration from Greek mythology and have खोजा समकालीन significance and relevance in the themes.

Mouth & macneal थी a pop duo from the Netherlands.
