They are currently led by head coach Chris Petersen and play उनके घर खेल at Bronco Stadium.
The franc ( sign : Fr. or SFr. ; German : Franken, French and Romansh : franc, Italian : franco ; code : CHF ) is the currency and legal tender of Switzerland and Liechtenstein ; it is also विधिक टेंडर in the इतालवी exclave Campione d'Italia.
Although not formally legal tender in the German exclave Büsingen ( the एकमात्र विधिक करेंसी is the यूरोपियन ), it is in wide daily use there.
The Swiss नेशनल बैंको मुद्दे banknotes and the federal mint Swissmint issues coins.
The Swiss franc is the only संस्करण of the फ़्रैंक स्टिल जारी in Europe.
The smaller denomination, a hundredth of a franc, is a rappen ( rp. ) in जर्मनी, centime ( c. ) in फ्रेंच, centesimo ( ct. ) in Italian, and rap ( rp. ) in Romansh.
The ISO code of the करेंसी प्रयुक्त by बैंको और वित्तीय संस्थानों is CHF, although `` Fr. '' is used by most businesses and advertisers ; some use SFr. ; the Latinate `` CH '' stands for Confoederatio Helvetica.
Given the different languages used in Switzerland, Latin is used लिये language-neutral inscriptions on the coins.
Sir Charles स्पेंसर `` चार्ली '' चैपलिन, ( 16 April 188925 December 1977 ) was a British comic actor and filmmaker who rose to fame in the silent era.
Chaplin became a worldwide icon through his screen persona `` the Tramp `` और is माना एक of the most important figures of the film industry.
His career spanned more than 75 सालो, इससे a चाइल्ड in the Victorian era to close to his death at the age of 88, and encompassed both adulation and controversy.
उठाया in लंदन, चैपलिन 's childhood was defined by poverty and hardship.
He was sent to a workhouse twice पहले the आयु of नौ ; उसके पिता was absent, and his mother was committed to a mental asylum.
Chaplin began performing इससे a young age, touring music halls and later working as a stage actor and comedian.
At 19 he was signed to the prestigious फ्रेड Karno company, which took him to America.
Chaplin was scouted by the फिल्मी उद्योग, और बना उसके first appearances in 1914 with Keystone Studios.
He soon विकसित the Tramp persona and formed a large fan base.
Chaplin directed his films from an early stage, and continued to hone his craft as he moved to the Essanay, परस्पर, और पहला नेशनल corporations.
By 1918, he थी एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध men in the world.
In 1919, Chaplin co-founded the distribution company United Artists, giving him complete कंट्रोल over उसके films.
His first feature-length चित्र थी the बच्चा ( 1921 ), followed by A Woman of Paris ( 1923 ), The Gold Rush ( 1925 ), and The Circus ( 1928 ).
He refused to move to sound films in the 1930s, बजाय producing नगर लाइट्स ( 1931 ) and Modern Times ( 1936 ) without dialogue.
Chaplin became increasingly political and his next फिल्मी, the ग्रेट तानाशाह ( 1940 ), satirised Adolf Hitler.
The 1940s was a decade marked with विवाद लिये चैपलिन, and his popularity declined rapidly.
He was accused of communist sympathies, while his involvement in a paternity suit and विवाह to much younger महिलाओं यहूद माना scandalous.
An FBI investigation was opened on Chaplin, and he was eventually forced to छोड़ the संयुक्त राज्य और settle in स्विट्ज़रलैंड.
He abandoned the Tramp लिये उसके बाद films, जिससे शामिल Monsieur Verdoux ( 1947 ), Limelight ( 1952 ), A King in New York ( 1957 ), and A Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ).
Chaplin wrote, निर्देशित, उत्पादित, संपादित, scored, and starred in most of his films.
He was a perfectionist, and his financial independence meant he often spent years on the development और उत्पादन of a चित्र.
His films are characterised by slapstick combined with pathos, and often feature the Tramp struggling विरूद्ध adversity.
अनेक contain social and political themes, as well as autobiographical elements.
In 1972, as part of a renewed appreciation for his work, Chaplin received an Honorary Academy Award for `` the incalculable effect he has had in बनाना गति तस्वीरें the आर्ट रूप of इस सदी ''.
He continues to be held in high regard, साथ the सुनहरा फटाफट, नगर लाइट्स, आधुनिक टाइम्स, और the ग्रेट Dictator often ranked among the greatest films of all time.
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA ), commonly shortened to Planned Parenthood, is the U.S. affiliate of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियोजित parenthood संघ ( IPPF ) and one of its larger members.
PPFA is a non-profit organization providing reproductive स्वास्थ्य and maternal and child health services.
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund, Inc. ( PPAF ) is a related organization which lobbies for pro-choice legislation, comprehensive sex शिक्षा, और अभिगम to सस्ती health care in the United States.
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S. provider of reproductive health services, including cancer screening, HIV screening और counseling, निरोधक, and abortion.
Contraception accounts for 35 % of PPFA 's total services and abortions account for 3 % ; PPFA conducts roughly 300,000 abortions प्रत्येक साल, among 3 लाख लोगों परोसा.
The organization has its roots in Brooklyn, New York, where मार्गरेट सैंगर खोली the देश 's first birth-control clinic.
Sanger founded the American Birth Control League in 1921, जिससे in 1942 became part of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America.
Since then, Planned Parenthood has grown to have over 820 क्लिनिक स्थितियाँ in the u.S., with a total budget of US $ 1 billion.
PPFA provides an array of services to over three million people in the United States, and supports सेवाएं लिये over एक लाख क्लाइंट बाहर the संयुक्त States.
पुरुषों rea is लैटिन for `` guilty mind ''.
in दण्ड law, it is viewed as one of the necessary elements of some crimes.
The standard common law test of criminal liability is usually expressed in the लैटिन phrase, actus गैर facit reum nisi पुरुषों बैठना rea, जिससे अर्थात् `` the act is not culpable unless the mind is guilty ''.
Thus, in jurisdictions with due प्रक्रम, वहीँ जरूर be an actus reus, or `` अपराधी अधिनियम, '' accompanied by some level of mens rea to constitute the crime with which the defendant is charged ( see the technical requirement of concurrence ).
As a general rule, criminal liability does नहीं संलग्न to a व्यक्ति जो acted साथ the absence of mental fault.
The exception is strict देयता crimes.
in सिविल विधि, it is प्रायः नहीं necessary to prove a subjective mental element to establish liability for breach of contract or tort, for example.
However, if a tort is intentionally committed or a contract is intentionally breached, such intent may increase the scope of liability as well as the माप of क्षतिपूर्ति देय to the अभियोक्ता.
Therefore, mens rea refers to the mental element of the अपराध कि accompanies the actus reus.
In some jurisdictions, the शर्तें mens rea and actus reus have been replaced by alternative terminology.
In Australia, for example, the elements of the संघीय offences हैं अभी designated as `` fault elements '' or `` mental elements '' ( mens rea ) and `` physical elements '' or `` external elements '' ( actus reus ).
इस शब्दावली was adopted to replace the obscurity of the Latin terms with simple and accurate phrasing.
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ; April 27, 1822 – July 23, 1885 ) was the 18th President of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1869–1877 ) following उसके अत्यधिक कामयाब role as a war general in the second half of the Civil War.
Under Grant, the Union Army defeated the Confederate सैन्य ; having effectively ended the war and secession with the surrender of Robert E. Lee 's army at Appomattox.
As president he led the कट्टरपंथी republicans in their effort to eliminate all vestiges of Confederate nationalism and slavery.
Upset over uncontrolled violence in the South and having desired to protect अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी नागरिकता, President Grant effectively destroyed the Ku Klux Klan in 1871.
Grant was the first President to establish Civil Service reform having created a two-year federally वित्तपोषित सिविल सेवा आयोग in 1871.
In terms of foreign policy, Grant नाज़िल an `` अनपेक्षित क्षमता लिये deliberation and consultation '' that promoted the national interest.
His reputation was marred by his repeated defense of corrupt appointees, and by America 's first industrial age economic अवसाद ( पुकारा the `` दहशत of 1873 `` ) that dominated his second term.
Although his रिपब्लिकन पार्टी विभाजित in 1872 with reformers denouncing him, Grant was easily reelected.
By 1875 the रूढ़िवादी श्वेत दक्षिणी विपक्ष regained control of every state in the South and as he left the White House in March 1877 his policies were being undone.
A career soldier, he graduated from the United States Military Academy at वेस्ट पाइंट and served in the Mexican–American War.
When the सिविल युद्ध began in 1861, ग्रान्ट trained Union volunteer regiments in Illinois.
In 1862, as a general he fought a series of battles and was promoted to major general after forcing the surrender of a large confederate फौज और gaining कंट्रोल of केंटकी and most of Tennessee.
He then led Union forces to victory after initial setbacks in the Battle of Shiloh, कमाई a प्रतिष्ठा as an आक्रामक कमांडर.
In July 1863, after a long, complex campaign, Grant defeated five uncoordinated Confederate armies ( capturing एक of उन्हें ) और जब्त vicksburg.
This famous victory gave the Union full कंट्रोल of the मिसिसिपी नदी, विभाजित बंद the western Confederacy, and opened the way for more Union triumphs.
बाद another जीत at the बैटल of चट्टानूगा in लेट 1863, President Abraham Lincoln made him lieutenant general and commander of all of the Union Armies.
As commanding general of the army, Grant confronted Robert E. Lee in a series of very bloody battles in 1864 known as the Overland Campaign that ended with the bottling up of ली at पीटर्सबर्ग, बाहर the confederate capital of Richmond.
During the siege, Grant coordinated a series of devastating campaigns launched by William Tecumseh Sherman, फिलिप Sheridan, and George Thomas.
Finally breaking through Lee 's trenches, the Union Army captured रिचमंड in April 1865.
Lee surrendered his depleted forces to Grant at appomattox as the confederacy collapsed.
Although pro-Confederate historians attacked ग्रान्ट as a निष्ठुर कसाई who won by brute force, most historians have hailed his military genius.
Grant 's two consecutive terms as President stabilized the nation after the American सिविल युद्ध और दौरान the turbulent Reconstruction period that followed.
As president, he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing सिविल rights laws and fighting Ku Klux Klan violence.
Grant won passage of the पंद्रहवीं amendment ; giving संवैधानिक protection for African-American voting rights.
He used the army to build the Republican Party in the South, based on black voters, Northern newcomers ( `` Carpetbaggers `` ) और देशी श्वेत समर्थक ( `` Scalawags. '' )
As a result, African अमेरिकी यहूद represented in the U.S. Congress for the first time in American history in 1870.
Reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace policy by having broken the deadlock on Indian appropriations in Congress, the creation of the Board of Indian Commissioners to make reform recommendations, and his enlistment of quaker protestants जो नियंत्रित मिड पश्चिमी भारतीय एजेंसियों, कि effectively curbed Congressional patronage.
Grant remained determined in keeping Indians from being exterminated इससे श्वेत settler अतिक्रमण or by the U.S. military.
Grant 's प्रतिष्ठा as अध्यक्ष by 1875 थी at an all-time high for his previous veto of the Inflation Bill, the passage of the Resumption of Specie Act, and Secretary Bristow 's successful raids that shut down the Whiskey Ring.
Grant 's foreign policy, led by Secretary of State Hamilton Fish, implemented अंतरराष्ट्रीय मध्यस्थता, settled the अलबामा दावा साथ Britain and avoided war with Spain over the Virginius Affair.
A jukebox is a partially automated music-playing device, usually a coin-operated machine, that will खेल a संरक्षक 's चयन इससे self-contained media.
The क्लासिक ज्यूकबॉक्स रै बटन साथ अक्षर और numbers on them that, when entered in combination, are used to play a specific selection.
A drug test is a technical analysis of a biological specimen – for example urine, hair, रक्त, स्वेद, or मौखिक द्रव / लार – to determine the presence or absence of specified parent drugs or their metabolites.
Major uses of drug testing are to detect the presence of performance enhancing steroids in sport or for drugs prohibited by कानून, ऐसे as cannabis, cocaine and heroin.

Amphetamines ( सहित Methamphetamine )

शनि v rocket, used for the American manned lunar landing missions
Space exploration is the discovery and exploration of बाहरी स्पेस by अर्थात् of स्पेस technology.
Physical exploration of space is conducted both by human spaceflights और by रोबोटिक spacecraft.
While the observation of objects in space, known as astronomy, predates reliable recorded history, it was the विकास of विशाल और अपेक्षाकृत कुशल rockets during the early 20th century that allowed physical space exploration to become a reality.
Common rationales for exploring space include advancing वैज्ञानिक शोध, uniting different nations, ensuring the future survival of humanity and developing military and strategic advantages against other countries.
Various criticisms of space खोजी are sometimes made.
Space खोजी रै प्रायः महरूम प्रयुक्त as a प्रॉक्सी प्रतियोगिता for geopolitical rivalries such as the Cold War.
The early era of space exploration was driven by a `` Space Race `` between the Soviet Union and the United States, the launch of the first man-made object to orbit the Earth, the USSR 's Sputnik 1, on 4 October 1957, and the first चंद्रमा लैंडिंग by the अमरीकी Apollo 11 craft on 20 July 1969 are often taken as the boundaries for this initial period.
The Soviet स्पेस कार्यक्रम हासिल अनेक of the पहला माइलस्टोन, सहित the पहला जीना होने in कक्षा in 1957, the पहला इंसान spaceflight ( यूरी गगारिन सवार वोस्तोक 1 ) in 1961, the first spacewalk ( by Aleksei Leonov ) on 18 March 1965, the first automatic landing on another celestial body in 1966, and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971.
After the first 20 years of exploration, focus shifted from one-off flights to renewable hardware, such as the Space Shuttle कार्यक्रम, और इससे प्रतियोगिता to सहयोग as with the International Space Station ( ISS ).
With the substantial completion of the ISS following sts-133 in कूच 2011, plans for space exploration by the USA remain in flux.
Constellation, a Bush Administration program for a return to the चंद्रमा by 2020 थी judged inadequately वित्तपोषित और unrealistic by an expert review panel reporting in 2009.
The Obama Administration proposed a revision of Constellation in 2010 to focus on the development of the capability for crewed missions beyond low earth orbit ( LEO ), envisioning extending the आपरेशन of the iss परे 2020, transferring the development of launch vehicles for human crews from NASA to the private sector, and developing technology to enable missions to beyond LEO, such as Earth/Moon L1, the Moon, Earth/Sun L2, near-earth asteroids, and Phobos or Mars orbit.
As of March 2011, the US सीनेट और हाउस of Representatives are still working towards a compromise NASA funding bill, which will probably terminate Constellation and fund development of a heavy lift launch vehicle ( HLLV ).
In the 2000s, the People 's Republic of China initiated a successful manned spaceflight program, while the यूरोपीय संघ, जापानी, और इण्डिया have भी नियोजित भविष्य मानवयुक्त space missions.
China, Russia, Japan, and India have advocated मानवयुक्त मिशन to the चंद्रमा दौरान the 21st century, while the European Union has advocated manned missions to both the Moon and Mars during the 21st century.
From the 1990s onwards, निजी रूचि began promoting space tourism and then private space exploration of the Moon ( see Google Lunar X Prize ).
John Calvin Coolidge, Jr. ( July 4, 1872january 5, 1933 ) थी the 30th अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1923–1929 ).
A Republican lawyer from Vermont, Coolidge worked his way up the सीढ़ियाँ of मैसाचुसेट्स राज्य राजनीती, आखिरकार becoming governor of that state.
His conduct during the Boston पुलिस स्ट्राइक of 1919 thrust उसे into the national spotlight and gave him a reputation as a man of decisive action.
Soon after, he was elected as the 29th Vice President in 1920 और succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी upon the अचानक मौत of Warren G. Harding in 1923.
Elected in his own right in 1924, he gained a reputation as a small-government रूढ़िवादी, और भी as a man जो कहा बहुत छोटी.
Coolidge restored public confidence in the White House बाद the घोटालों of उसके पूर्ववर्ती 's administration, and left office with considerable popularity.
As a Coolidge biographer put it, `` He embodied the spirit and hopes of the middle class, could interpret उनके longings और एक्स्प्रेस उनके opinions.
That he did represent the genius of the average is the most convincing प्रमाण of उसके शक्ति. ''
Some later criticized Coolidge as part of a general criticism of laissez-faire सरकारी.
His reputation underwent a renaissance during the Ronald Reagan Administration, but the ultimate assessment of his presidency is still विभाजित between those जो स्वीकृति of उसके कटौती of the आकार of सरकारी कार्यक्रम and those who believe the federal government should be more involved in regulating and controlling the economy.
Espresso is a concentrated beverage brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly खौलते जल अंतर्गत दबाव through finely ground coffee beans.
Espresso often has a thicker consistency than coffee brewed by other methods, a higher विशेषज्ञता of निलंबित और dissolved solids, and crema ( meaning cream, but being a reference to the foam with a creamy texture that forms as a result of the pressure ).
as a परिणाम of the pressurized brewing प्रक्रम the जायका और रसायन in a ठेठ कप of एस्प्रेसो हैं बहुत concentrated.
Espresso is the base for other drinks, such as a latte, cappuccino, macchiato, मोचा, or americano.
Espresso has more कैफीन प्रति ईकाई आवाज़ than most beverages, but the usual serving size is smaller—a typical 60 mL ( 2 US fluid ounce ) of espresso has 80 to 150 mg of caffeine, little less than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) cup of drip-brewed coffee.
Brian Keith Kelly ( born October 25, 1961 ) is an American फ़ुटबॉल कोच and former player.
He is currently the सिर फ़ुटबॉल coach for the Notre Dame Fighting Irish, a position he has held since December 2009.
Kelly was previously head coach at Grand Valley State University ( 1991–2003 ), Central Michigan University ( 2004–2006 ), and University of सिनसिनाटी ( 2006–2009 ).
A contract is an अनुबंध having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by two or more parties, each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them.
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal capacity who exchange `` consideration '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be done in writing, हालांकि अनुबंध may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The उपाय लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध can be `` damages '' in the form of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction.
Both of these remedies award the पार्टी at घाटा the `` लाभ of the सौदेबाजी '' or expectation damages, which are greater than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be natural persons or juristic persons.
A contract is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking कि something will or will not occur.
The word promise can be used as a legal synonym for contract, although care is required as a वादा may नहीं have the पूरा खड़ा of a अनुबंध, as जब it is an agreement without consideration.
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another, including differences in common law compared to civil law, the impact of received law, particularly from England in common law countries, and of law codified in क्षेत्रीय legislation.
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example, there are 40 relevant acts which impact on the interpretation of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल ) स्तर, और an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW.
In addition there are 6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable for international dealings, such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts लिये the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Sale of Goods.
Sidney Patrick Crosby, ONS ( born August 7, 1987 ) is a Canadian professional ice hockey player who is captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins of the नेशनल हॉकी लीग ( NHL ).
Crosby was drafted first overall by the Penguins out of the Quebec Major जूनियर हॉकी लीग ( qmjhl ).
During his two-year major junior career साथ the rimouski océanic, he अर्जित back-to-back chl Player of the Year awards and led his club to the 2005 Memorial Cup final.
Nicknamed `` The Next One ``, he was one of the most highly regarded draft picks in हॉकी इतिहास, अग्रणी अनेक to refer to the 2005 ड्राफ्ट लॉटरी as the `` Sidney Crosby Sweepstakes ''.
In his first NHL season, Crosby finished sixth in league scoring with 102 points ( 39 goals, 63 assists ) और थी a runner-up लिये the calder मेमोरियल ट्रॉफी ( जीती by सिकंदर Ovechkin ).
By his second season, he led the NHL with 120 points ( 36 goals, 84 assists ) to capture the Art Ross Trophy, becoming the youngest खिलाड़ी और the तभी किशोरावस्था to जीत a स्कोरिंग शीर्षक in कोई प्रमुख उत्तर American sports league.
That same season, Crosby also won the Hart Memorial Trophy as the Professional Hockey लेखक संघ 's चुनाव लिये सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी और the लेस्टर B. पियर्सन पुरस्कार as the एनएचएल Players Association 's choice for most outstanding player, becoming the seventh player in NHL history to earn all three awards in one year.
Crosby started the 2007–08 season with the team 's captaincy and subsequently led them to the 2008 Stanley Cup Finals, where they were defeated by the Detroit Red Wings in six games.
The Penguins returned to the Finals against Detroit the following year and won in seven games ; Crosby became the youngest कप्तान in एनएचएल इतिहास to win the Stanley Cup.
In the 2009–10 season, Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals, tying him with Steven Stamkos for the Rocket रिचर्ड ट्रॉफी as the league-leader ; साथ 58 assists, he totaled 109 points, second in the NHL.
During the off-season, Crosby received the Mark Messier Leadership Award.
In 2010–11, Crosby sustained a concussion as a परिणाम of hits to the head in back-to-back games.
The injury left him sidelined for ten और a हाफ months.
However, after playing eight games in the 2011–12 season, Crosby 's concussion-like symptoms returned in दिसम्बर 2011, और he किया नहीं वापसी until mid-March 2012.
internationally, crosby रै represented कनाडा in numerous tournaments for the country 's junior and men 's teams.
After competing in the 2003 U-18 Junior World Cup, he represented कनाडा in back-to-back iihf संसार U20 Championships, winning silver in 2004 and gold in 2005.
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship, he led the tournament in स्कोरिंग, जबकि भी कमाई Top Forward and All-Star Team honours.
Four years later, Crosby थी नामित to टोली कनाडा for the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver.
Playing the United States in the gold medal game, he scored the game-winning goal in overtime.
A United States cent, also ज्ञात as a पैनी.
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) and its longer version `` put my दो सेंट in '' is an संयुक्त राज्य ( us ) idiomatic expression, taken from the original English idiom expression : to put in `` my two pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth. ''
It is used to preface the tentative stating of one’s opinion.
By deprecating the opinion to follow – suggesting its value is only two cents, a very small amount – the user of the phrase hopes to lessen the impact of a possibly statement, showing politeness and humility.
However, it is also sometimes प्रयुक्त साथ irony when expressing a strongly felt opinion.
The phrase is also used out of आदत to preface uncontentious opinions.

The Chinese Civil War was a civil war in China fought between forces वफ़ादार to the सरकारी of the गणतंत्र of चीन led by the Kuomintang ( KMT ) and forces of the Communist Party of China ( CPC ).
The war began in April 1927, amidst the Northern Expedition, and essentially ended when major active battles ceased in 1950.
The conflict eventually resulted in two de facto states, the Republic of China ( ROC ) in Taiwan and the People 's Republic of China ( PRC ) in मेनलैंड चीन, दोनो claiming to be the legitimate government of China.
The war represented an ideological split ( Left vs. Right ) between the Communist CPC, and the kmt 's ब्रांड of राष्ट्रवाद.
The civil war जारी intermittently जबतक लेट 1937, जब the दो parties formed a Second United Front to counter a Japanese invasion.
China 's full-scale सिविल युद्ध resumed in 1946, a year after the end of hostilities with Japan.
After four more years, 1950 saw the cessation of major military hostilities—with the newly संस्थापित लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन controlling mainland China ( including Hainan ), and the Republic of China 's jurisdiction being restricted to Taiwan, Penghu, Quemoy, Matsu and several outlying islands.
The Kuomintang defeat is attributed to several factors : Corruption - Chiang wrote in his diary on June 1948 that the kmt था विफल, नहीं क्युकी of बाह्य दुश्मनों but because of rot from within.
Strong initial support इससे the U.S. diminished, and then, stopped.
( Partly because of KMT corruption और anti-democratic शासन, और partly क्युकी of the अनिश्चित U.S. foreign policy towards Communism between 1945 and 1950 ) ; Communist land reform policy promised poor peasants farmland from their landlords.
This ensured pla लोकप्रिय support.
After the surrender of Japan at the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध ii, सोवियत forces turned over their captured Japanese weapons to the CPC and allowed the CPC to take control of territory in Manchuria.
To this day, no armistice or सलाम treaty has ever been signed, and it is debated as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended.
Cross-Strait relations have been hindered by सैन्य खतरे और political and economic pressure, particularly over Taiwan 's political status, with both governments officially adhering to a `` One-China policy. ''
The PRC still actively claims Taiwan as part of its territory and continues to threaten the ROC with a सैन्य आक्रमण if the आरओसी officially declares स्वतंत्रता by बदलना इसके नाम to और gaining international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan.
The ROC mutually दावा मेनलैंड चीन, and they both continue the fight over diplomatic recognition.
Today, the war as such occurs on the political and आर्थिक fronts in the रूप of cross-strait relations ; however, the two separate de facto states have close economic ties.
The One Hundred Twelfth United States Congress was the meeting of the legislative branch of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी, from January 3, 2011 until January 3, 2013.
It convened in Washington, D.C. on January 3, 2011, and ended on January 3, 2013, 17 दिनों पहले the समाप्त of the अध्यक्षीय पद to जिससे Barack Obama was elected in 2008.
Senators elected to regular terms in 2006 समाप्त those शर्तें in this Congress.
This Congress included the last House of Representatives elected from congressional districts that were apportioned आधारित on the 2000 census.
In the 2010 midterm elections, the Republican Party जीती the बहुमत in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
While the Democrats रखा उनके Senate majority, it was reduced from the previous Congress.
This was the first Congress in which the House and Senate were controlled by different parties since the 107th Congress ( 2001–2003 ), और the पहला कॉंग्रेस to शुरू कि रास्ता चूंकि the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ).
In this Congress, the House of Representatives had the largest क्रमांक of रिपब्लिकन सदस्यों, 242, since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ).
It was also the first Congress since 1947 in which no member of the Kennedy family served, as well as the most politically polarized कॉंग्रेस चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण, with record low approval ratings.
Wealth in the United States is commonly measured in terms of net worth, which is the sum of all assets, सहित घर इक्विटी, ऋण all liabilities.
The total net worth of US households and nonprofit संगठन 1945–2009, unadjusted for inflation or population change.
For example, a household in कब्ज़ा of an $ 800,000 हाउस, $ 5,000 in परस्पर निधि, $ 30,000 in cars, $ 20,000 worth of stock in their own company, and a $ 45,000 IRA would have assets totaling $ 900,000.
Assuming that this household would have a $ 250,000 बंधक, $ 40,000 in car लोन, और $ 10,000 in credit card debt, its debts would total $ 300,000.
Subtracting the debts from the worth of this household 's एसेट ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ), this household would have a net worth of $ 600,000.
जाल लायक can vary साथ fluctuations in value of the underlying assets.
The wealth —more specifically, the मध्य net worth—of households in the United States is varied with relation to race, education, geographic location and gender.
as एक होता expect, households साथ वृहद आय विशेषता the उच्चतम जाल worths, हालांकि ऊँची आय can नहीं be लिया as an सदा सटीक indicator of जाल worth.
Overall the क्रमांक of wealthier households is on the rise, with baby boomers hitting the highs of their careers.
In addition, wealth is unevenly distributed, with the wealthiest 25 % of US households owning 87 % of the माल in the United States, which was $ 54.2 trillion in 2009.
Including human capital such as skills, the United Nations estimated the कुल माल of the संयुक्त States in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion.
इस article deals with Selective Dorsal Rhizotomy ( SDR ) rather than the rhizotomy procedures for pain relief ; for those procedures, which have begun to take the name `` rhizotomy '' in certain instances, see facet rhizotomy and similar.
A rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure that selectively नष्ट समस्यापूर्ण तंत्रिका जड़ें in the स्पाइनल cord, सबसे प्रायः to relieve the लक्षण of neuromuscular conditions such as spastic diplegia and other forms of spastic cerebral palsy.
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) लिये spastic दिमागी palsy रै महरूम the प्रमुख उपयोग of rhizotomy लिये neurosurgeons specialising in spastic CP since the 1980s ; in this surgery, the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and then targeted and destroyed.
The sensory nerve roots, where spasticity is located, are first separated from the motor ones, and the तंत्रिका मछली to be काटें हैं तब identified via electromyographic stimulation.
The ones producing spasticity are then selectively lesioned साथ छोटा विद्युत pulses.
In spasticity, rhizotomy precisely targets and destroys the damaged nerves कि don’t प्राप्त गामा अमीनो butyric acid, which is the core problem for people with spastic cerebral palsy.
ये over-firing, non-gaba-absorbing nerves generate असामान्य विद्युत activity during the EMG testing phase in SDR and are thus considered to be the source of the patient 's hypertonia ; they are eliminated with the electrical pulses once identified, while the remaining nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact and untouched.
This means that the spasticity is permanently dissolved, and that this is done without affecting nervous system sensitivity or function in other areas, because the only nerves destroyed are the over-firing ones responsible for the muscle tightness.
The terms rhizotomy and neurotomy are also increasingly becoming interchangeable in the उपचार of chronic back pain from degenerative disc disease.
This is a कार्यविधि पुकारा a facet rhizotomy and is not a surgical procedure but is instead done on an outpatient basis using a simple probe to apply radiofrequency waves to the impinged pain-causing nerve root lying between the facet joint and the vertebral body.
Such radio frequency nerve lesioning results in five to eight or more months of pain relief before the nerve regenerates and another round of the कार्यविधि needs to be performed.
A facet rhizotomy is just one of many different forms of radiofrequency ablation, और इसके उपयोग of the `` rhizotomy '' नाम should not be confused with the SDR procedure.

The term migrant कार्यकर्ता रै अलग official meanings and connotations in different parts of the world.
The United Nations ' definition is broad, including any लोगों working बाहर of their home country.
The पद can भी be used to describe someone who migrates within a country, possibly their own, in order to pursue work such as seasonal work.
फोटोग्राफ of Lil Wayne with teardrop tattoos below his eyes.
The teardrop tattoo or tear tattoo is a symbolic टैटू कि is लगाई underneath the eye.
It has no fixed meaning but almost all meanings ( see below ) have some connection to prison.
U.S. Route 75 is a north–south u.S. Highway.
The highway 's northern terminus is in Kittson County, Minnesota, at the Canadian border, जहाँ it एकबार जारी as मनिटोबा राजमार्ग 75 on the other side of the now-closed border crossing.
Its southern terminus is at Interstate 30 and Interstate 45 in Dallas, Texas, where it is ज्ञात as उत्तर Central Expressway.
U.S. 75 was a border-to-border रूट, इससे Canada to the Gulf of Mexico at Galveston, Texas.
However, the entire segment south of Dallas, Texas has been decommissioned in favor of Interstate 45, a cutoff section of town-to-town सतह सड़क having become राज्य राजमार्ग 75.
Lower Ninth Ward is a पड़ोस of the नगर of नई Orleans.
As the नाम implies, it is part of the Ninth Ward of New Orleans.
The Lower Ninth Ward is often thought of as the entire area within New Orleans downriver of the Industrial Canal ; however, the City Planning आयोग divides इस क्षेत्रफल into the निम्नतर Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods.
the पद `` निम्नतर '' refers to its location farther towards the mouth of the Mississippi River, `` down '' or `` below '' the rest of the city in local geographic terminology.
लकिन the 9th वार्ड, जैसे all Wards in New Orleans, is a voting district.
The 9th Ward was added as a voting district in 1852.
The `` lower '' 9th Ward is composed of Ward 9 Districts 1, 2, 4, and 7 which make up the Holy Cross Area and Ward 9 जिले 3, 5, 6, and 8.
Higher मतदान ज़िला संख्याएँ in the 9th वार्ड ( 8-27 ) are on the upriver side of the Industrial Canal.
the क्षेत्रफल आए to national attention for its devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005.
Hubble views of Copernicus crater ( inset ), जिससे is परिचय 58 miles ( 93 km ) wide
Red and orange tinted Moon, as seen इससे धरती दौरान a lunar eclipse, where the Earth comes between the Moon and Sun
The Moon is the only natural satellite of the Earth, and the पांचवां largest उपग्रह in the Solar System.
It is the largest natural उपग्रह of a ग्रह in the सौर प्रणाली relative to the size of its primary, having 27 % the diameter and 60 % the density of Earth, resulting in its mass.
The Moon is the second densest satellite after io, a उपग्रह of बृहस्पति.
The Moon is in synchronous rotation with Earth, always showing the same face with its near side marked by dark volcanic maria that भरण between the उज्जवल प्राचीन crustal हाइलैंड्स और the prominent प्रभाव craters.
It is the brightest object in the sky after the Sun, although its surface is actually very अंधेरा, साथ a reflectance समान to कि of कोयले.
Its prominence in the sky and its regular cycle of phases have, since ancient times, made the Moon an important cultural influence on language, पंचांग, आर्ट और mythology.
The Moon 's gravitational influence produces the ocean tides and the minute lengthening of the दिन.
The Moon 's current orbital distance, about thirty times the diameter of the Earth, causes it to appear almost the same size in the sky as the Sun, allowing it to कवर the सूर्य nearly precisely in कुल solar eclipses.
This matching of apparent विज़ुअल आकार is a संयोग.
The Moon 's linear distance from the Earth is currently increasing at a rate of 3.82±0.07cm प्रति साल, लकिन इस रेट is नहीं constant.
The Moon is thought to have formed nearly 4.5 billion years ago, not long after the Earth.
Although there have been several hypotheses for its origin in the past, the current most widely accepted explanation is that the Moon formed from the मलबा बाएँ over after a giant impact between Earth and a Mars -sized body.
The Moon is the only celestial body other than धरती on जिससे इंसानो have set foot.
The Soviet Union 's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon with unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the United States ' NASA Apollo कार्यक्रम हासिल the तभी मानवयुक्त मिशन to तिथि, शुरूआत साथ the first manned lunar orbiting mission by Apollo 8 in 1968, and six manned lunar landings between 1969 and 1972, with the first being Apollo 11.
These missions returned over 380 kg of lunar rocks, which have been used to develop a geological understanding of the Moon 's origins, the formation of its आतंरिक ढांचा, और इसके subsequent इतिहास.
After the Apollo 17 mission in 1972, the Moon has been visited तभी by unmanned spacecraft, notably by the final Soviet Lunokhod rover.
Since 2004, Japan, China, India, the United States, and the European Space Agency have each sent चंद्र orbiters.
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the डिस्कवरी of चंद्र जल ice in permanently shadowed craters at the poles and bound into the lunar regolith.
Future manned missions to the Moon have been planned, सहित सरकारी as खूब as privately funded efforts.
The Moon remains, under the Outer Space Treaty, free to सब राष्ट्र to explore लिये शांतिपूर्ण उद्देश्य.
Ronald Wilson Reagan ( ; फ़रवरी 6, 1911 – June 5, 2004 ) was the 40th President of the United States ( 1981–1989 ).
Prior to that, he was the 33rd Governor of California ( 1967–1975 ), और a रेडियो, film and television actor.
Born in Tampico, Illinois, and raised in Dixon, Reagan थी शिक्षित at Eureka College, earning a Bachelor of Arts degree in economics and sociology.
After graduating, Reagan moved first to Iowa to work as a radio broadcaster and then, in 1937, to Los Angeles where he began a करियर as an कर्ता, पहला in films और बाद टेलीविज़न.
Some of his most notable films include Knute Rockne, All American ( 1940 ), Kings Row ( 1942 ), और bedtime लिये bonzo ( 1951 ).
Reagan served as President of the Screen Actors Guild and later as a प्रवक्ता लिये सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; उसके प्रारंभ in राजनीती occurred during his work for GE.
Originally a member of the Democratic Party, his positions began shifting rightward in the 1950s, और he switched to the Republican Party in 1962.
After delivering a rousing speech in support of Barry Goldwater 's presidential candidacy in 1964, he was persuaded to seek the कैलिफ़ोर्निया governorship, जीतना दो सालो बाद and again in 1970.
He was defeated in his run for the Republican presidential nomination in 1968 और in 1976, लकिन जीती दोनो the नामांकन and general election in 1980, defeating incumbent Jimmy Carter.
As president, Reagan implemented sweeping new political and आर्थिक पहलों.
His supply-side आर्थिक नीतियों, उतावले `` reaganomics ``, advocated reducing कर दरों to spur आर्थिक growth, controlling the money supply to reduce inflation, deregulation of the economy, and reducing government spending.
In his first term he बच an हत्या attempt, took a hard line against labor unions, announced a new War on Drugs, and ordered an invasion of Grenada.
He was re-elected in a landslide in 1984, proclaiming that it was `` Morning in America ``.
His second term was primarily चिह्नित by विदेशी matters, ऐसे as the समाप्ति of the Cold War, the 1986 bombing of Libya, and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair.
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil empire ``, he supported anti-communist movements worldwide and spent his first term forgoing the रणनीति of détente by ordering a विशाल सैन्य buildup in an arms race with the USSR.
Reagan negotiated with Soviet General Secretary मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव, culminating in the INF Treaty and the decrease of both countries ' nuclear arsenals.
reagan बाएँ office in 1989.
In 1994, the former president disclosed that he had been diagnosed with अल्जाइमर 's बीमारी पहले in the साल ; he died ten years later at the age of 93.
A conservative icon, he ranks highly in public opinion polls of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों और is credited लिये generating an ideological renaissance on the American political right.
Complete set of scrolls, constituting the संपूर्ण tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; भी tenakh, tenak, tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
the tanakh is also known as the Masoretic Text or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : The Torah ( `` शिक्षण '', भी ज्ञात as the पाँच किताबे of मूसा ), nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) और ketuvim ( `` कृतियाँ '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), अर्थ `` कि जिससे is read '', is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh.
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral tradition passed on by प्रत्येक पीढी, पुकारा the मौखिक Torah.
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R is a Kawasaki 600 cc class sport मोटरसाइकिल.
It was introduced in 1995, and रै महरूम constantly अद्यतनीकृत throughout the सालो in जवाब to new products from Honda, Suzuki, and Yamaha.
The ZX series is what was known as the Ninja line of Kawasaki motorcycles in the 1980s और still carries the name today.
Assassination attempts and भूखंड on राष्ट्रपतियों of the संयुक्त राज्य have been numerous : more than 20 attempts to kill sitting and former presidents, as well as the Presidents-elect, are known.
Four sitting presidents have been killed : Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th President ), James A. Garfield ( the 20th अध्यक्ष ), विलियम mckinley ( the 25th President ) and John F. Kennedy ( the 35th President ).
दो राष्ट्रपतियों यहूद घायल in attempted assassinations : पूर्व अध्यक्ष Theodore Roosevelt ( the 26th President ), and President Ronald Reagan ( the 40th President ).
Although the historian J.W. Clarke has suggested that most American assassinations were politically motivated actions, carried out by rational men, नहीं सब such attacks have been undertaken for political reasons.
Some हमलावर था questionable दिमागी स्थिरता, and a few were judged legally insane.
Since the Vice President of the United States has for more than a century been elected from the same political party as the अध्यक्ष, the हत्या of the अध्यक्ष is असंभावित to result in major policy changes.
This may बताइये क्यों राजनैतिक समूह typically do not make such attacks.
Where the Red Fern Grows is a novel written by Wilson Rawls in 1961 about a boy who buys and trains दो redbone coonhound शिकार कुत्तो.
ओक्लाहोमा ( ) ( pawnee : uukuhuúwa, cay : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in West South Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 संयुक्त States.
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and humma, अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '', और it is known informally by its nickname, The Sooner State.
Formed by the combination of ओक्लाहोमा Territory and Indian Territory on November 16, 1907, Oklahoma was the 46th state to enter the union.
Its residents are known as oklahomans or, informally `` Okies '', and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma City.
A major producer of natural gas, oil, and agriculture, Oklahoma relies on an economic base of aviation, energy, दूरसंचार, और जैवप्रौद्योगिकी.
It has one of the तीव्रतम growing economies in the nation, ranking among the top states in per capita income growth and gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, with nearly two thirds of oklahomans जीना भीतर उनके महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रों.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, and eastern forests, most of Oklahoma lies in the Great Plains और the u.s. Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of English, German, Scottish, Irish and Native American ancestry, more than 25 देशी अमरीकी languages are spoken in Oklahoma, second only to California.
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American सांस्कृतिक regions और historically served as a route for cattle drives, a destination for southern settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.
Redwall, by Brian Jacques, is a series of children 's काल्पनिक novels.
It is the title of the first book of the series, published in 1986, as well as the name of the Abbey featured in the किताब और the नाम of an एनिमेटेड tv श्रेणी आधारित on तीन of the novels ( redwall, Mattimeo, and Martin the Warrior ), which first aired in 1999.
The books are primarily aimed at older children, लकिन have प्रशंसक of सब ages.
There have महरूम twenty-two novels and two picture books published.
The twenty-second, and final, अनोखा, the दुष्ट क्रू, was posthumously released on May 3, 2011.
Natural गैस is प्रायः measured by volume in the United States and is stated in cubic feet.
A cubic foot of gas is the amount of gas needed to fill a volume of one cubic foot under set conditions of pressure and temperature.To measure larger amounts of natural gas, a `` therm '' is प्रयुक्त to denote 100 घन फीट, और `` mcf '' is प्रयुक्त to denote 1,000 घन feet.
to provide वृहद सटीकता in comparing fuels, energy content is measured in terms of `` British Thermal Units ( BTU 's ). ''
A BTU is the amount of heat जरूरी to उठाएँ एक पाउंड of जल ( approximately a pint ), one degree Fahrenheit at or close to its point of maximum density.
One British therm ( प्रतीक thm ) is a non- si ईकाई of heat energy equal to 100,000 British thermal units ( BTU ).
It is approximately the energy equivalent of burning 100 घन फीट ( प्रायः referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas.
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume and not energy content, a therm factor is used by ( Natural ) gas companies to बदलें the आवाज़ of गैस प्रयुक्त to इसके ऊष्मा समतुल्य, and thus calculate the actual energy use.
The therm factor is प्रायः in the units therms/CCF.
it होगा vary साथ the mix of hydrocarbons in the natural gas.
Natural gas with a higher than average विशेषज्ञता of इथेन, प्रोपेन or butane will have a higher therm factor.
Impurities, such as carbon dioxide or nitrogen, lower the therm फ़ैक्टर.
The volume of the गैस is गणना as if measured at standard temperature and pressure ( STP ).
The heat content of natural gas is solely dependent on the composition of the gas, and is independent of तापमान और दबाव.
One therm is equal to परिचय 105.5 megajoules, 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours.
One therm can also be provided by about of प्राकृतिक गैस.
The therm sometimes has been confused with the thermie ( see below ).
The names of both units आइये इससे the Greek word for heat.
A thermie ( th ) is a metric unit of heat energy, part of the meter-tonne-second प्रणाली sometimes used by European engineers.
The thermie is equal to the राशि of उर्जा जरूरी to raise the temperature of 1 tonne of water by 1 °C.
The thermie is समतुल्य to 1,000 kilocalories, 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 BTU.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of गुलामी, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave राज्य formed the confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave states जारी to अस्वीकृत calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to ढूँढें a सुलह, और both sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they होता intervene ; none किया और none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort held by संघ सैनिकों in दक्षिण कैरोलिना.
Lincoln called for each state to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप.
lincoln जारी the emancipation Proclamation, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ नष्ट the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of gettysburg.
पश्चिमी successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
the defending confederate फौज विफल, leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true औद्योगिक wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार War I.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
William Bruce Jenner ( born October 28, 1949 ) is a former U.S. track and field athlete, motivational speaker, socialite, टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व और बिजनेसमैन.
He won the सुनहरा पदक लिये decathlon in the Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics.
Following his Olympic win and the सम्बन्धित मान्यता, he married Kris Kardashian, and his professional career evolved into being a television celebrity.
By 1981, he had starred in several made-for-tv फिल्मों और थी erik Estrada 's replacement on the top rated TV series CHiPs.
He has six children : Burt, Casey, Brandon, Brody, केंडल and Kylie.
Since his 1991 विवाह to Kris Jenner, he is the stepfather to Kourtney, Kim, Khloe and Rob Kardashian.
चूंकि 2007, he has appeared with his blended family on Keeping Up with the Kardashians.
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated E. coli ) is a gram-negative, rod-shaped bacterium कि is commonly found in the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms ).
Most E. coli strains are harmless, but some serotypes can कारण गंभीर खाना विषाक्तता in humans, and are occasionally responsible for product recalls due to food contamination.
The harmless strains are part of the normal flora of the gut, and can benefit their hosts by producing विटामिन k2, और by preventing the स्थापना of रोगजनक जीवाणु within the intestine.
E. coli and related bacteria constitute परिचय 0.1 % of आंत फ्लोरा, और fecal–oral हस्तांतरण is the major route through which pathogenic strains of the bacterium cause disease.
Cells are able to survive outside the body for a limited amount of time, which makes them ideal indicator organisms to test पर्यावरणीय नमूने लिये fecal contamination.
There is, however, a growing body of research that has examined environmentally persistent E. coli जिससे can जीवित लिये विस्तारित periods outside of the host.
The bacterium can also be grown easily और inexpensively in a प्रयोगशाला setting, and has been intensively investigated for over 60 years.
E. coli is the सबसे widely पढ़ाई prokaryotic मॉडल सजीव, और an महत्वपूर्ण species in the fields of biotechnology and microbiology, where it has served as the host organism for the majority of work with recombinant DNA.
Area कोड 217 is the उत्तर अमरीकी telephone area code for much of western and central Illinois.
The 217 क्षेत्रफल शामिल इलिनोइस ' पूंजी, Springfield, plus Champaign, Urbana, Decatur, Danville, Quincy, and Rantoul.
217 was one of the original area कोड, जिससे were created in 1947.
The only significant बदलें in 217 's सीमाएँ थी in 1957, जब इसके northern portion was combined with part of area code 815 to form area code 309.
Image of the largest अंटार्कटिक ओज़ोन छेद कभी अंकित ( सितंबर 2006 ), over the Southern pole
परतों of the atmosphere ( not to scale )
Ozone depletion describes two distinct but related phenomena observed चूंकि the लेट 1970s : a स्थिर मनाही of परिचय 4 % प्रति दशक in the कुल आवाज़ of ozone in Earth 's stratosphere ( the ozone layer ), and a much larger springtime decrease in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's polar regions.
The latter phenomenon is referred to as the ozone hole.
In addition to these well-known stratospheric phenomena, there are also springtime ध्रुवीय tropospheric ओज़ोन depletion कार्यक्रम.
The details of ध्रुवीय ओज़ोन छेद गठन differ इससे कि of mid-latitude thinning, but the most important process in both is catalytic destruction of ozone by atomic halogens.
The main source of these हैलोजन अणु in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( CFCs, freons, halons ).
These compounds are transported into the stratosphere after being emitted at the surface.
Both types of ओज़ोन depletion यहूद observed to increase as emissions of halo-carbons increased.
CFCs and other contributory substances are referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ods ).
Since the ozone layer prevents most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of ultraviolet light ( UV light ) from passing through the Earth 's atmosphere, observed and projected decreases in ozone have generated worldwide concern leading to adoption of the Montreal Protocol that bans the उत्पादन of cfcs, halons, और अन्य ozone-depleting रसायन ऐसे as कार्बन tetrachloride and trichloroethane.
It is suspected that a variety of biological consequences such as increases in skin cancer, cataracts, damage to plants, और कटौती of प्लवक populations in the समंदर 's photic मण्डल may परिणाम इससे the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion.
The Preamble to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is a ब्रैड introductory statement of the Constitution 's fundamental purposes and guiding principles.
It states in general terms, and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning and what they hoped the संविधान होता achieve as it pertains to सब of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the people of the United States and it sets into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the individual rights and equality among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy.

The shot put ( pronounced ) is a track and field event involving `` throwing '' / '' putting '' ( throwing in a pushing गति ) a भारी गोलाकार ऑब्जेक्ट —the shot—as दूर as possible.
The shot put competition for men has been a part of the modern Olympics चूंकि उनके पुनरुद्धार in 1896, महिलाओं 's प्रतियोगिता began in 1948.
Map of the United Nations ( UN ) member states, with their territories ( सहित निर्भर territories ) recognized by the UN in blue
There are United Nations ( UN ) member states, and प्रत्येक of उन्हें is a सदस्य of the संयुक्त Nations General Assembly.
The criteria for admission of new members are set out in the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Charter, Chapter II, Article 4:
A recommendation for admission from the Security Council requires affirmative votes from at तनिक नौ of the परिषद 's fifteen members, with none of the five permanent members voting against.
The Security Council 's recommendation must then be subsequently स्वीकृत in the सामान्य सभा by a two-thirds majority vote.
In principle, only sovereign राज्य can become un सदस्यों, और फिलहाल सब un सदस्यों हैं sovereign states ( although a few members were not sovereign when they joined the UN ).
Because a state can only be admitted to the UN by the approval of the Security Council and the General Assembly, a number of states that may be considered sovereign states according to the Montevideo Convention criteria are not members because the UN does not consider them to possess sovereignty, mainly due to the lack of international recognition or opposition from certain members.
In addition to the member states, the UN also invites non-member states ( currently two : the Holy See and Palestine ), intergovernmental organizations, and other international organizations and entities whose statehood or sovereignty are not precisely defined, to become observers at the General Assembly, allowing them to participate and बोलो, लकिन नहीं vote, in सामान्य सभा meetings.
The Eiffel Tower (, ) is an iron जाली मीनार located on the Champ de Mars in Paris, named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, whose company designed and built the tower.
Erected in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 World 's Fair, it has become both a global cultural icon of France and one of the most recognizable structures in the world.
The tower is the tallest structure in Paris and the most-visited paid monument in the world ; 7.1 लाख लोगों ascended it in 2011.
The third level observatory 's upper platform is at the highest accessible to public in the European Union and the highest in Europe as long as the platform of the ostankino मीनार, at, remains बंद as a परिणाम of the fire of August 2000.
The मीनार प्राप्त its 250 millionth visitor in 2010.
The tower stands tall, about the वही ऊँचाई as an 81-storey building.
During its construction, the Eiffel Tower surpassed the Washington Monument to assume the title of the tallest man-made ढांचा in the संसार, a शीर्षक it आयोजित लिये 41 सालो, जबतक the Chrysler Building in New York City was built in 1930.
Because of the जोड, in 1957, of the एंटीना atop the Eiffel Tower, it is now taller than the Chrysler Building.
Not including broadcast antennas, it is the second-tallest ढांचा in France, after the Millau Viaduct.
The tower has three levels लिये विज़िटर.
टिकटें can be खरीदा to ascend, by stairs or lift ( elevator ), to the first and second levels.
The walk from ground स्तर to the पहला स्तर is over 300 steps, as is the walk from the first to the second level.
The third and highest level is accessible तभी by lift—stairs do exist but are usually closed to the public.
The first and second स्तर have restaurants.
The tower has become the most prominent symbol of both Paris and फ़्रांस, प्रायः in the establishing शॉट of films set in the city.

Jennings is noted for holding the record for the longest जीतना streak on the u.S. syndicated game show Jeopardy !
and as being the all-time leading money winner on अमरीकी खेल shows.
In 2004, Jennings जीती 74 jeopardy !
games पहले he थी पराजित by चैलेंजर Nancy Zerg on his 75th appearance.
उसके कुल आय on Jeopardy !
are $ 3,172,700, consisting of $ 2,520,700 over उसके 74 विन्स, a $ 2,000 second-place prize in his 75th appearance, a $ 500,000 second-place prize in the Jeopardy !
परम टूर्नामेंट of Champions, as well as half of a $ 300,000 prize in the IBM Challenge.
दौरान उसके पहला चलाएं of Jeopardy !
appearances, Jennings अर्जित the रिकार्ड for the highest American game show winnings.
His total was surpassed by Brad Rutter, who पराजित जेनिंग्स in the फाइनल of the Jeopardy !
