The Big बंग सिद्धान्त is an अमरीकी कॉमेडी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी created and executive produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady.
Like the name of the series itself, with the एक्सेप्शन of the पहला episode— '' पायलट '' —episode शीर्षक of the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त always start with `` The '' and resemble the name of a scientific principle, theory or experiment, whimsically referencing a plot point or quirk.
, 133 episodes have aired.
The Big Bang सिद्धान्त रै महरूम renewed for a seventh season.
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced, ; October 14, 1890 – कूच 28, 1969 ) थी the 34th अध्यक्ष of the United States from 1953 until 1961.
He had previously been a five-star general in the United States Army during World War II and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Forces in Europe ; he had responsibility for planning and supervising the invasion of North Africa in Operation Torch in 1942–43 and the कामयाब आक्रमण of फ़्रांस और जर्मनी in 1944–45 इससे the पश्चिमी Front.
In 1951, he became the पहला परम् commander of NATO.
Eisenhower was of Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry and was reared in a large family in Kansas by अभिभावक साथ a मजबूत कार्य ethic और धार्मिक पृष्ठभूमि.
As one of six sons, he was conditioned by a प्रतिस्पर्धी माहौल जिससे instilled self-reliance.
He attended और ग्रैजुएट इससे वेस्ट पाइंट and later married and had two sons.
After World War II, Eisenhower served as Army Chief of Staff under अध्यक्ष हैरी S. ट्रूमैन, तब assumed the post of President at Columbia University.
Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential race as a Republican to काउंटर the non-interventionism of Senator Robert A. Taft and to crusade against `` Communism, Korea and corruption ''.
He won by a भूस्खलन, defeating डेमोक्रेट Adlai Stevenson and ending two decades of the New Deal Coalition.
In the first year of his presidency, Eisenhower deposed the leader of Iran in the 1953 Iranian coup d'état and used nuclear खतरे to conclude the कोरियाई युद्ध साथ चीन.
His New Look policy of nuclear deterrence gave priority to inexpensive नाभिकीय हथियार जबकि reducing the funding लिये conventional military forces ; the goal was to keep pressure on the Soviet Union and reduce federal deficits.
In 1954, Eisenhower first articulated the domino सिद्धान्त in उसके वर्णन of the threat प्रस्तुत by the स्प्रेड of communism.
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution, which enabled him to prevent चाइनीज कम्युनिस्ट आक्रामकता विरूद्ध Chinese nationalists and established the U.S. policy of defending Taiwan.
When the soviets शुभारम्भ sputnik in 1957, he था to play catch-up in the space race.
Eisenhower forced Israel, the UK, and France to समाप्त उनके आक्रमण of मिश्र दौरान the Suez Crisis of 1956.
In 1958, he भेजा 15,000 us सैनिकों to लेबनान to prevent the pro-Western government from falling to a Nasser -inspired revolution.
Near the end of his term, his efforts to set up a summit meeting साथ the soviets collapsed क्युकी of the U-2 incident.
On the domestic front, he covertly opposed Joseph McCarthy and contributed to the end of McCarthyism by openly invoking the modern expanded version of executive privilege.
He otherwise left most political कार्यकलाप to उसके Vice President, Richard Nixon.
He was a moderate conservative who continued New Deal agencies और विस्तारित सोशल सुरक्षा.
Among his enduring innovations, he launched the Interstate Highway System ; the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency ( DARPA ), which led to the internet, among many invaluable outputs ; the National Aeronautics and Space प्रशासन ( नासा ), ड्राइविंग शांतिपूर्ण डिस्कवरी in स्पेस ; the establishment of strong science education via the National Defense Education Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear power via amendments to the Atomic Energy Act.
In social policy, he sent federal सैनिकों to छोटी चट्टान, अरकंसास, लिये the पहला समय since Reconstruction to enforce federal court orders to desegregate public schools.
He also signed civil rights विधान in 1957 और 1960 to protect the right to vote.
He implemented desegregation of the armed forces in two years and made five appointments to the Supreme Court.
He was the first term-limited president in accordance साथ the 22nd amendment.
Eisenhower 's दो शर्तें यहूद शांतिपूर्ण ones for the most part and saw considerable economic prosperity except for a sharp recession in 1958–59.
Eisenhower is प्रायः क्रमित highly among the U.S. Presidents.
Air Force एक is the आधिकारिक एयर ट्रैफ़िक कंट्रोल call sign of a United States Air Force aircraft carrying the President of the United States.
In common parlance the term refers to those Air Force aircraft specifically designed, built, and used for the purpose of transporting the president.
The Presidential aircraft is a prominent symbol of the अमरीकी प्रेसिडेंसी और इसके power.
The idea of designating specific सैन्य वायुयान to हस्तांतरण the अध्यक्ष arose in 1943, when officials of the United States Army Air Forces – the predecessor to the U.S. Air Force – became concerned with relying on commercial airlines to transport the President.
A c-87 मुक्तिवादी एक्स्प्रेस थी reconfigured for use as a presidential transport ; however, it was rejected by the Secret Service amid concerns over the aircraft 's safety record.
A C-54 Skymaster was then converted for अध्यक्षीय उपयोग ; इस वायुयान, उतावले the पवित्र Cow, transported President Franklin D. Roosevelt to the Yalta Conference in February 1945, and was subsequently used for another two years by President Harry S. Truman.
The `` Air Force One '' call sign was created after a 1953 घटना दौरान जिससे a उड़ान carrying अध्यक्ष Dwight D. Eisenhower entered the same airspace as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign.
Several aircraft have been used as Air Force One since the creation of the presidential fleet, including two Boeing 707s introduced in the 1960s and 1970s, respectively ; since 1990, the presidential fleet has consisted of दो बोइंग vc-25as – specifically configured, highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft.
The Air Force is looking into replacing the two VC-25 aircraft with three बदलना वायुयान शुरूआत in 2017.
A wedding anniversary is the anniversary of the date a wedding took प्लेस.
Traditional names exist for most of them : for instance, 50 years of marriage is called a `` golden wedding वर्षगांठ '' or बस a `` golden anniversary ''.
A scanner with duplexing स्वचालित Document Feeder.
In multifunction or all-in-one मुद्रक, फैक्स मशीने, photocopiers और scanners, an स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or adf is a विशेषता which takes several pages and feeds the paper one page at a time into a scanner or copier, allowing the user to scan, and thereby copy, print, or fax, multiple-page documents without having to manually replace each page.
Most copiers allow scanning on the flatbed or platen ( the `` glass '' ) or through a दस्तावेज़ फीडर.
The vast majority of fax machines have an ADF, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines, some fax यंत्र स्वामी उपयोग the फैक्स यंत्र as a स्कैनर, faxing multi-page documents to themselves.
Document feeders are described by गति, in पृष्ठों प्रति मिनट or ppm, and capacity, usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200.
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) स्कैनिंग : a reversing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or radf scans एक पक्ष of a page, then flips it and scans the other side.
A duplexing स्वचालित document feeder or DADF scans both sides in one pass.
The लाभ of the dadf is तेज़ speed for two-sided originals.
RADFs and DADFs are rated in images per minute ( ipm ), the क्रमांक of पहलू they can scan each minute.
Fair Park is a recreational and educational complex located in डलास, टेक्सास ( USA ).
The complex is registered as a Dallas लैंडमार्क, नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क और is घर to nine museums, six performance facilities, a lagoon, and the largest Ferris wheel in North America.
Many of the buildings on the complex were constructed for the Texas Centennial exposition in 1936 जिससे खींचा over छह लाख विज़िटर.
Most of the buildings built for the exposition still survive and it is recognized as a significant example of आर्ट डेको architecture.
Fair Park has been designated a ग्रेट Place in America by the American Planning Association.
The American Planning Association ( APA ) “is an independent, not-for-profit शैक्षणिक organization that provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The Great स्थान in अमरीकी कार्यक्रम helps to celebrate areas with “exemplary character, quality, and planning.”
Being designated as a Great प्लेस in अमेरिका, मेला पार्क was one of only ten cities chosen in 2011.
San Jose ( ; Spanish : St. जोसेफ ) is the third-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, the tenth-largest in the U.S., and the county seat of Santa Clara County which is located at the southern end of San Francisco Bay.
San Jose is the largest city within Silicon Valley, which is a major component of the greater San फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, a प्रदेश of 8.4 लाख people and the fifth largest metropolitan area ( CSA ) in the United States.
It is the largest city in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
San Jose was founded on नवम्बर 29, 1777, as el pueblo de सैन जोस de guadalupe, the first civilian town in the Spanish colony of Nueva California, which later became Alta California.
The city served as a खेती जातियाँ to support Spanish military installations at San Francisco and Monterey.
When California gained statehood in 1850, सैन जोस परोसा as its first capital.
After more than 150 सालो as a छोटी खेती city, San Jose and the surrounding Santa Clara Valley became the last ( and largest ) contiguous area of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay.
San Jose experienced increased माँग लिये आवास इससे सैनिको and veterans returning from World War II.
San Jose then continued its aggressive expansion during the 1950s और 1960s by annexing more land area.
The rapid growth of the high-technology और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स उद्योग further accelerated the transition from an agricultural center, to an urbanized metropolitan area.
By the 1990s, San Jose 's location within the booming local technology उद्योग अर्जित the नगर इसके उपनाम, पूंजी of Silicon Valley.
San Jose now maintains global नगर औकात और is the largest नगर in the सैन फ्रांसिस्को Bay Area in terms of population, land area, and industrial development.
The U.S. Census Bureau reported the population of the city to be 945,942 as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
As of April 2013, the estimated population of San जोस थी 984,000.
San Jose, along with the Santa Clara Valley, experienced about half a century of spectacular suburban sprawl, with characteristics of intense urbanization समान to the लॉस एंजिल्स area of Southern California.
The city has taken definite कदम to avoid बनने `` L.A. North ''.
However, the sprawl in San Jose is worse than in Los Angeles by measures such as population density and public transit सुरक्षा, निवेश, और ridership.

The history of Europe covers the people inhabiting the European continent चूंकि it थी पहला आबादी in प्रागैतिहासिक टाइम्स to उपस्थित, with the first Homo sapiens arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 BC.
The earliest settlers to प्रागैतिहासिक Europe came during the paleolithic era.
The आगमन of कृषि around 7000 BC ushered in the neolithic age.
Neolithic Europe lasted for 4000 years, overlapping with metal-using cultures that धीरे स्प्रेड throughout the continent.
technological अग्रिम दौरान the प्रागैतिहासिक age tended to arrive from the Middle East, spreading gradually to the northwest.
Some of the best-known सभ्यताओं of प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय यहूद Minoan and Mycenaean, which flourished during the Bronze Age until they collapsed in a short period of time around 1200 BC.
The period known as शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता began with the rise of the city-states of Ancient Greece.
Greek influence reached its zenith अंतर्गत the expansive साम्राज्य of Alexander the Great, spreading throughout Asia.
Northern and western Europe were वर्चस्व by the La Tène culture, a precursor to the Celts.
Rome, a small city-state traditionally संस्थापित in 753 BC, would grow to become the Roman Republic in 509 BC and would succeed Greek culture as the dominant Mediterranean civilization.
The events of the नियम of जूलियस Caesar led to reorganization of the Republic into the Roman Empire.
The empire was later divided by the emperor Diocletian into the पश्चिमी और पूर्वी empires.
During the बाद सालो of the रोमन साम्राज्य, the germanic peoples of northern Europe grew in strength and repeated attacks led to the Fall of the Western Roman Empire in AD 476, a date which traditionally marks the end of the classical period and the start of the Middle Ages.
During the मध्य आयु, the Eastern Roman Empire survived, though modern historians refer to this state as the Byzantine Empire.
In Western Europe, Germanic peoples स्थानांतरित into स्थितियाँ of शक्ति in the remnants of the former Western Roman Empire and established kingdoms and empires of their own.
Of all of the Germanic peoples, the Franks would rise to a स्थिति of आधिपत्य over पश्चिमी यूरोपीय, the frankish साम्राज्य reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800.
Francia was divided into several parts ; वेस्ट francia होता evolve into the किंगडम of France, while East Francia would evolve into the Holy Roman Empire, a precursor to modern Germany.
The अंग्रेजों isles were the site of several large-scale migrations.
Native Celtic peoples had been marginalized during the period of Roman Britain, and when the Romans abandoned the British isles दौरान the 400s, लहरें of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern Britain and established a series of petty kingdoms in what would eventually develop into the Kingdom of England by AD 927.
During this period, the Kingdom of Poland and Kingdom of Hungary ( 1000–1945 ) यहूद व्यवस्थित as well.
The Viking Age, a period of migrations of Scandinavian peoples, dominated the काल इससे the late 700s to the middle 1000s.
Chief among the Viking states was the Empire of Cnut the Great, a Danish leader who would become किंग of इंग्लैण्ड, डेनमार्क, और Norway.
The Normans, a Viking people who settled in Northern France and founded the Duchy of normandy, होता have a significant प्रभाव on many parts of Europe, from the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily.
Another Scandinavian people, the Rus ' people, would go on to found Kievan Rus ', an early state which थी a precursor लिये the आधुनिक देश of Russia.
As the viking आयु खींचा to a बंद, the काल ज्ञात as the Crusades, a series of religiously-motivated military expeditions originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began.
Several Crusader राज्य यहूद संस्थापित in the eastern Mediterranean.
These were all short-lived.
The Crusaders would have a profound प्रभाव on many parts of Europe.
Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204 brought an abrupt end to the बीज़ान्टिन साम्राज्य.
विलुप्त श्वान breeds is a compilation of dog breeds that have become extinct.
Wii Speak is a microphone accessory लिये Nintendo 's Wii video game console.
Connected to the कंसोल via usb, the यंत्र can be placed near the video display, allowing voice chat to be conducted with the entire room.
The device features an LED to indicate जब the माइक्रोफोन is active.
Wii Speak थी घोषित at Nintendo 's 2008 E3 media briefing.
It was released separately and bundled साथ एनिमल क्रासिंग : नगर लोक on नवम्बर 16, 2008, in North America, and was released on December 5, 2008, in Europe.
The Wii Speak accessory is succeeded by the अंतःस्थापित microphone on the Wii U 's GamePad controller.
निसान बुद्धिमान Key®
A smart कुंजी is an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अभिगम और प्राधिकरण system which is available as an option or standard in several cars.
It was first developed by Siemens in the mid-1990s and introduced by Mercedes-Benz under the name `` Keyless Go '' in 1998 on the W220 s-class following इसके डिज़ाइन पेटेंट दायर by daimler-benz on May 17, 1997.
Univisión ( ) is a spanish-language television network in the United States.
The network is primarily समर्पित लिये लैटिन अमरीकी परिवारों who reside in the United States.
It has the largest दर्शक of spanish-language टेलीविज़न viewers in the world according to Nielsen ratings.
Randy Falco, ( CEO as of जून 29, 2011 ) coo, रै been in charge of the company since the departure of Univision Communications president and CEO Joe Uva in April 2010.
In recent years the network has reached parity with the U.S. 's five major English-language television networks, and is often a strong fifth, outranking The CW, with some fourth-place weekly placings, and as of 2012, even first place rankings for individual कार्यक्रम over सब पाँच अंग्रेज़ी संजाल due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year.
Univisión is headquartered in नई यॉर्क, और रै इसके प्रमुख studios, उत्पादन सुविधाएं, and operations in Doral, Florida, a suburb of Miami.
In 2009, another television studio was announced, univision studios, to be built in Doral.
Univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country, साथ लोकल स्टेशन in over 50 बाज़ार साथ विशाल हिस्पैनिक and Latino populations and a national cable network feed distributed in markets without either the availability or the demand for a locally-based station.
Most of these stations air full local news and other local programming in addition to network shows, and in major markets such as Los Angeles, New York, and Miami the लोकल newscasts carried by the संजाल 's owned-and-operated स्टेशन ( o & o ) stations are equally competitive with their English-language counterparts ratings-wise.
Univisión was acquired on March 29, 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's saban पूंजी समूह ( जो था previously owned the entity Saban Entertainment ), TPG Capital, L.P., Providence Equity Partners, Madison Dearborn Partners, and Thomas H. Lee Partners for $ 13.7 billion or $ 36.25 per share plus $ 1.4 billion in acquired debt.
the buyout बाएँ the कम्पनी साथ a debt level of twelve times its annual cash flow, which was twice the norm in buyouts done over the previous two years.
Artist 's धारणा of a protoplanetary disk
The formation and of the Solar System is estimated to have begun 4.6 billion years ago with the gravitational collapse of a छोटी भाग of a दानव आणविक cloud.
Most of the collapsing mass collected in the centre, forming the Sun, while the rest flattened into a आदिग्रह डिस्क आउट of जिससे the ग्रह, moons, क्षुद्रग्रह, and other small Solar System bodies formed.
This widely accepted model, known as the nebular परिकल्पना, थी first developed in the 18th century by Emanuel Swedenborg, Immanuel Kant, and Pierre-Simon Laplace.
Its subsequent विकास रै interwoven a किस्में of वैज्ञानिक disciplines including astronomy, physics, geology, and planetary science.
चूंकि the भोर of the स्पेस आयु in the 1950s और the डिस्कवरी of extrasolar planets in the 1990s, the model has been both challenged and refined to account for new observations.
The Solar System has विकसित considerably since its initial formation.
Many moons have formed from circling discs of gas and dust around their parent planets, while other moons are thought to have formed independently and later been captured by their planets.
Still others, as the धरती 's Moon, may be the result of giant collisions.
Collisions between bodies have occurred continually up to the उपस्थित दिन और have महरूम सेंट्रल to the एवोल्यूशन of the Solar System.
The स्थितियाँ of the planets often shifted, and planets have switched places.
This planetary migration is now thought to have been responsible for much of the सौर प्रणाली 's जल्दी एवोल्यूशन.
In roughly 5 billion years, the Sun will cool and expand outward many times its current diameter ( becoming a red giant ), before casting off its outer layers as a planetary nebula and leaving पीछे a तारकीय remnant known as a white dwarf.
In the far दूर भविष्य, the गम्भीरता of passing stars will gradually reduce the Sun 's retinue of planets.
Some planets will be destroyed, अन्य ejected into अंतरतारकीय space.
Ultimately, over the course of tens of billions of years, it is likely कि the सूर्य होगा be बाएँ साथ none of the original bodies in orbit around it.
The Trial ( Kafka 's original German title :, बाद as, और ) is a अनोखा लिखा by फ्रांज Kafka in 1914 and 1915 but not published until 1925.
One of Kafka 's best-known works, it tells the story of a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote, inaccessible authority, साथ the प्रकृति of उसके अपराधों नाज़िल to neither उसे nor the reader.
Like Kafka 's other novels, The Trial was never completed, although it does include a chapter जिससे brings the स्टोरी to an end.
Because of this there are certain inconsistencies which exist within the novel, ऐसे as असमानताओं in समय in जोड to अन्य discontinuities in narration.
After Kafka 's death in 1924 his friend and साहित्यिक executor अधिकतम brod edited the text for publication by Verlag Die Schmiede.
The original manuscript is held at the Museum of आधुनिक साहित्य, marbach am neckar, Germany.
In 1999, the book was listed in Le Mondes 100 Books of the Century and as No. 2 of the बेहतरीन जर्मनी novels of the बीसवीं सदी.
Lisa Anne Loeb ( born March 11, 1968 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter और अभिनेत्री.
She launched her career in 1994 with the song, `` Stay ( I Missed You ) ``, जिससे थी शामिल in the film Reality Bites.
She was the first artist to have a क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त States while not signed to a recording contract.
Her five studio CDs include her major label debut, the gold-selling Tails and its follow-up, the grammy-nominated, gold-selling पटाखा.
Loeb has also worked in फिल्मी, टेलीविज़न, voice-over work and children’s recordings.
Loeb has appeared in two टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, dweezil & लिसा, a साप्ताहिक culinary adventure for the Food Network and Number 1 Single, a reality show on the E !
संजाल in 2006 केन्द्रित on उसके quest for love, success, career, and family.
Her children 's music includes the albums Catch the Moon ( 2003 ), and Camp Lisa ( 2008 ).
Her first joint children 's किताब और एल्बम लिसा लोएब 's पगली sing-along : The Disappointing Pancake and Other Zany Songs was published in 2011.
In 2010 she संस्थापित the लिसा लोएब चश्मा संग्रहण, which is based on her own designs.
The Coat of arms of the राज्य of नई जर्सी includes:
A shield with three plows emblazoned, representative of नई जर्सी 's agricultural tradition.
A forward-facing knight 's helmet.
a घोड़ा 's head as the crest of the helmet.
The female figures स्वतंत्रता और ceres, प्रतिनिधि of the state 's motto ( see next item ).
Liberty is holding a staff supporting a `` liberty cap `` ; Ceres is holding an overflowing cornucopia.
The streamer at the पैर of the emblem contains the State Motto of New Jersey, `` Liberty and Prosperity '', and the year of statehood, 1776.
It was originally designed by Pierre यूजीन du simitiere in 1777 and was modified slightly in 1928.
The seal is the central motif in the flag of New Jersey and the ग्रेट मुहर of the State of New Jersey.
The Coat of बाहें contains a horse 's head.
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself accordingly and three plows on a shield referring to the State 's agriculture tradition, giving it the उपनाम `` गार्डन State ''.
the दो देवियाँ represent the State motto, `` Liberty and Prosperity ''.
Liberty is on the बाएँ.
She is holding a staff with a liberty cap on it, and the शब्द स्वतंत्रता underneath her.
The देवी on the right is Ceres, goddess of agriculture.
वो is पकड़कर a cornucopia with prosperity written below her.
According to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly for March 11, 1896, the date in which the Assembly officially approved the flag as the state emblem, the buff color is due indirectly to George Washington, who had ordered on October 2, 1779, that the uniform coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue, with buff facings.
Buff-colored facings had until then been reserved only for his own uniform and those of other Continental सेनापतियों और उनके aides.
Then, on February 28, 1780, the Continental War Officers in Philadelphia directed that the uniform coat facings of all regiments were to be the same as the पृष्ठभूमि रंग of the regiments ' राज्य ध्वज.

`` We Can Work It Out '' is a song by the बीटल्स, लिखा by पॉल mccartney और John Lennon.
It was released as a `` double A-sided `` single with `` Day Tripper ``, the first time both sides of a single were so designated in an initial release.
Both songs were recorded दौरान the रबर आत्मा sessions.
The सोंग is an उदाहरण of lennon–mccartney collaboration at a depth that happened only rarely after they wrote the hit singles of 1963.
This song, `` A Day in the Life ``, `` Baby, You 're a Rich Man `` and `` I 've Got a Feeling ``, are among the notable exceptions.
As a medical diagnosis, pedophilia or paedophilia is a मनोरोग विकार in व्यक्तियों 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी typically characterized by a primary or exclusive sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger, though specific diagnosis criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ).
An adolescent who is 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी जरूर be at तनिक पाँच सालो पुरानी than the prepubescent child before the attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The term has a range of परिभाषाएं, as found in psychiatry, psychology, the vernacular, and law enforcement.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` disorder of adult personality and behaviour '' in which there is a sexual preference for children of prepubertal or early pubertal age.
According to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders ( DSM ), it is a paraphilia in which adults or adolescents 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी have तीव्र और तूल यौन प्रेरणाएं towards और कल्पनाओं about prepubescent children that they have either acted on or which cause them distress or interpersonal difficulty.
In popular usage, pedophilia means any sexual interest in children or the act of child sexual abuse, often termed `` pedophilic बर्ताव ''.
For उदाहरण, the अमरीकी विरासत stedman 's Medical Dictionary states, `` Pedophilia is the act or fantasy on the part of an adult of engaging in sexual activity with a child or children. ''
This common use application also extends to the यौन interest in and sexual contact with pubescent or post-pubescent minors.
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although people who commit child sexual abuse commonly प्रदर्शनी the विकार, some offenders do not meet the clinical diagnosis standards for pedophilia and these standards pertain to prepubescents.
Additionally, not all pedophiles दरअसल commit such abuse.
pedophilia थी पहला formally पहचाना and named in the late 19th century.
A significant amount of शोध in the क्षेत्रफल रै taken place since the 1980s.
Although mostly documented in men, there are also women who exhibit the disorder, and शोधकर्ताओं assume उपलब्धियाँ estimates underrepresent the true number of female pedophiles.
No cure for pedophilia रै महरूम विकसित, लकिन वहीँ हैं therapies that can reduce the incidence of a person committing child sexual abuse.
In the United States, following Kansas v. hendricks, sex अपराधियों जो are diagnosed with certain mental disorders, particularly pedophilia, can be subject to indefinite civil commitment, under various state laws ( generically called SVP laws ) and the federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006.
At present, the exact causes of pedophilia have not been conclusively स्थापित.
Research suggests that pedophilia may be correlated with several different neurological abnormalities, और प्रायः co-exists साथ अन्य व्यक्तित्व विकार and psychological pathologies.
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement, a variety of typologies have been सुझाया to categorize pedophiles according to behavior and motivations.
Julio César Chávez ( born Julio César Chávez gonzález on जुलाई 12, 1962 ) is a retired Mexican professional boxer.
chávez is माना by अनेक people for their sport statistics the greatest fighter ever to come out of Mexico.
He is a six-time world champion in three weight divisions, and for several years he was considered one of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the संसार.
In a career that spanned over 25 years, Chávez won five world titles in three weight divisions : WBC Super Featherweight in 1984, WBA Lightweight in 1987, WBC Lightweight in 1988, WBC Light Welterweight in 1989, ibf लाइट welterweight in 1990, और wbc लाइट welterweight in 1994.
He holds records for most successful लगातार defenses of संसार शीर्षक ( 27 ), सबसे शीर्षक झगड़े ( 37 ), सबसे title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is after Joe Louis with ( 23 ) for most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ).
Chávez also has the longest अपराजित streak in boxing history, 13 years.
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first loss to Frankie Randall and had an 87 लड़ो जीत streak जबतक उसके `` चित्रण '' साथ Whitaker.
Julio César Chávez was known for his outstanding पंचिंग शक्ति, विनाशकारी body attack, remarkably strong chin and the relentless stalking of his opponents.
He ranks # 24 on ईएसपीएन 's 50 महानतम Boxers Of All Time.
On दिसम्बर 7, 2010, he was inducted in the prestigious International Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011.
He is the पिता of prospect ओमर chávez और former WBC Middleweight Champion Julio César Chávez, Jr.

To be sent to the right meant स्लेव मजदूर ; to the बाएँ, the gas chamber.

The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos, `` whole '' and kaustós, `` burnt '' ) also known as the Shoah ( Hebrew :, HaShoah, `` catastrophe '' ; Yiddish :, Churben or Hurban, from the Hebrew for `` destruction '' ), was the द्रव्यमान हत्या or genocide of approximately six million Jews during World War II, a programme of systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany, led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party, throughout German-occupied territory.
Of the nine million Jews who had resided in Europe before the holocaust, लगभग two-thirds were killed.
Over one million Jewish children were killed in the Holocaust, as were लगभग two million Jewish women and three million Jewish men.
A network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany and German-occupied territory were प्रयुक्त to concentrate, hold, and kill Jews and other victims.
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the परिभाषा, और कुछ उपयोग the आम संज्ञा `` holocaust '' to describe other Nazi mass murders, including those of Soviet prisoners of war, Polish and Soviet civilians, and homosexuals.
Recent estimates based on आंकड़े प्राप्त चूंकि the पतन of the सोवियत Union indicates some ten to eleven million civilians and prisoners of war were intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime.
the persecution and genocide were carried out in stages.
Various laws to remove the यहूदियों इससे सिविल समाज, सबसे prominently the Nuremberg Laws, were enacted in Germany years before the outbreak of World War II.
विशेषज्ञता शिविरों यहूद स्थापित in which inmates were subjected to slave labor until they died of exhaustion or disease.
Where Germany conquered new territory in eastern Europe, specialized units called Einsatzgruppen murdered Jews and राजनैतिक प्रतिद्वंद्वियों in द्रव्यमान shootings.
The occupiers required Jews and Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos पहले होने transported by भाड़ा ट्रैन to extermination camps where, if they survived the journey, most were systematically killed in gas chambers.
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy was involved in the logistics that led to the genocides, turning the तीसरा reich into कया एक holocaust scholar has called `` a genocidal state ''.
4-H in the United States is a youth organization administered by the National Institute of Food and Agriculture of the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ), with the mission of `` engaging youth to पहुँचें उनके fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development. ''
The name represents four निजी विकास areas of focus for the organization : head, heart, hands, and health.
The organization has over 6.5 million सदस्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य, इससे आयु five to twenty-one, in approximately 90,000 clubs.
The goal of 4-H is to develop citizenship, leadership, जिम्मेदारी और जीवन कौशल of युवावस्था through experiential सीखना कार्यक्रम और a धनात्मक youth development approach.
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused organization as a result of its history, 4-h आज focuses on नागरिकता, स्वस्थ जीना, विज्ञान, engineering, and technology programs.
Today, 4-h और सम्बन्धित कार्यक्रम मौजूद in over अस्सी countries around the world ; the organization and administration varies from country to country.
Each of these programs operates independently, but cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges, global education programs, and communications.
The 4-H motto is `` To make the best better '', जबकि इसके स्लोगन is `` सीख by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ).
The national flag of Chile, consists of two unequal horizontal bands of white and red and a blue square the same height as the white बैंड in the कैण्टन, जिससे bears a श्वेत five-pointed star in the center.
It थी अपनाया on 18 October 1817.
The Chilean flag is also known in स्पेनी as la estrella Solitaria ( The Lone Star ).
The star represents a guide to progress and honor ; ब्लू symbolizes the आसमान और the प्रशांत समंदर, श्वेत is लिये the snow-covered andes, और रेड stands for the blood spilled to achieve independence.
According to the epic poem La Araucana, the colors were derived from those इससे the ध्वज flown by the Mapuche during the Arauco War.
`` Flag Day '' is held each year on the नवीं of जुलाई to commemorate the 77 सैनिको जो died in the 1882 Battle of La Concepción.
Generation Y, also known as the Millennial Generation, is the जनसांख्यिकी दल following पीढी X.
There are no precise तिथियाँ लिये जब पीढी Y starts and ends.
Commentators use beginning birth dates from the latter 1970s, or इससे the early 1980s to the early 2000s.

Virginia ( ), officially the Commonwealth of Virginia, is a U.S. state located in the South Atlantic region of the United राज्य.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion '' and the `` Mother of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद the eight U.S. presidents born there.
The geography and climate of the Commonwealth are shaped by the Blue Ridge kyu और the chesapeake खाड़ी, जिससे provide आवास for much of its flora and fauna.
The capital of the Commonwealth is Richmond ; and Virginia बीच is the most populous city.
Fairfax काउंटी is the सबसे populous political subdivision.
The wealthiest is Loudoun काउंटी.
The राष्ट्रमंडल 's population is over eight million.
The area 's इतिहास begins with several indigenous groups, including the Powhatan.
In 1607 the London Company स्थापित the Colony of Virginia as the first permanent New World English colony.
Slave मजदूर और the जमीन acquired इससे विस्थापित Native American tribes each played a significant role in the colony 's early politics and plantation economy.
वर्जिनिया थी एक of the 13 colonies in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति और joined the Confederacy in the American Civil War, during which Richmond was made the Confederate capital and Virginia 's northwestern counties seceded to form the state of West Virginia.
Although the Commonwealth was under conservative single-party rule for nearly a century following Reconstruction, both प्रमुख नेशनल parties are competitive in modern Virginia.
The Virginia General Assembly is the oldest विधानमंडल in the Western Hemisphere.
The state government has महरूम repeatedly क्रमित सबसे प्रभावी by the Pew Center on the States.
It is unique in how it treats cities and counties equally, manages local सड़कें, और prohibits इसके राज्यपालों from serving consecutive terms.
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; संघीय एजेंसियों in उत्तरी वर्जिनिया, सहित the मुख्यालय of the विभाग of Defense and CIA ; and military facilities in Hampton Roads, the site of the region 's main seaport.
वर्जिनिया 's पब्लिक स्कूलों and many colleges and universities have contributed to growing media and technology sectors.
As a result, computer chips have become the राज्य 's leading export.
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known as Windows Live Movie Maker, codenamed Sundance ) is a फ्रीवेयर वीडियो editing software by Microsoft.
It is a भाग of खिड़कियाँ अनिवार्य तन्त्र suite and offers the ability to create and edit videos as well as to publish them on SkyDrive, Facebook, YouTube, and Flickr.
`` ब्रेंडा 's मिला a baby '' is the solo debut single by Tupac Shakur, and tenth track from his debut album, 2Pacalypse Now.
The song, which features R & B singer Dave Hollister, is about a twelve year-old girl named ब्रेंडा जो जीवनदान in a ghetto, has a baby, and is incapable of supporting it.
The song explores the समस्या of टीन गर्भावस्था और इसके effect on the young mothers and their families.
जैसे अनेक of shakur 's songs, `` Brenda 's Got a baby '' draws from the plight of the impoverished.
Using Brenda to represent young mothers in general, Shakur criticises the low level of support from the baby 's father, the government, and society in general.
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who got pregnant from her cousin and, क्युकी वो किया नहीं want उसके अभिभावक to जान परिचय the baby, threw it in a trash can.
The official logo of Pokémon for इसके अंतरराष्ट्रीय रिलीज ; `` पोकीमॉन '' is छोटी लिये the original Japanese title of `` Pocket Monsters ''.
is a media मताधिकार प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by जापानी video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996.
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game Boy role-playing video games विकसित by खेल freak, पोकीमॉन रै चूंकि become the second-most successful and lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world, behind only Nintendo 's own Mario franchise.
पोकीमॉन गुण have चूंकि महरूम merchandised into anime, manga, trading cards, toys, books, and other media.
The franchise celebrated in 2006, and, cumulative sales of the video games ( including home console versions, such as the `` pikachu '' निन्टेंडो 64 ) have reached more than 200 million copies.
In November 2005, 4Kids Entertainment, which had managed the non-game related licensing of Pokémon, announced that it था सहमत नहीं to नवीनीकृत the पोकीमॉन प्रतिनिधित्व agreement.
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company International ), a subsidiary of Japan 's Pokémon Co., now oversees सब पोकीमॉन लाइसेंसिंग बाहर of Asia.
The name Pokémon is the romanized contraction of the Japanese brand.
The term Pokémon, in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself, also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made दिखावे in पोकीमॉन मीडिया as of the रिलीज of the पांचवां पीढी शीर्षक Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 ; with the upcoming releases of Pokémon X and Y, 6 new Pokémon have been featured in promotions for the games.
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the एकवचन और बहुवचन, as is प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत प्रजाति नाम ; it is grammatically correct to say `` one Pokémon '' and `` many Pokémon '', as well as `` one Pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu ''.

Dada ( ) or Dadaism was an art movement of the यूरोपीय avant-garde in the जल्दी 20th सदी.
Many claim Dada began in Zurich, स्विट्ज़रलैंड in 1916, spreading to बर्लिन shortly thereafter but the height of New York Dada was the year before in 1915.
To quote डोना budd 's the भाषा of आर्ट ज्ञान, Dada was born out of negative reaction to the horrors of World War I.
This अंतरराष्ट्रीय गति थी begun by a group of artist and poets associated with the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich.
Dada rejected reason और लॉजिक, prizing बकवास, irrationality and intuition.
The origin of the name Dada is unclear ; कुछ मानना कि it is a nonsensical word.
Others maintain that it originates from the Romanian artists Tristan Tzara and Marcel Janco 's frequent use of the words da, da, meaning yes, yes in the रोमानियाई भाषा.
Another theory says that the name `` Dada '' came during a meeting of the समूह जब a पेपर चाकू stuck into a French-German dictionary happened to point to 'dada ', a French word for 'hobbyhorse '.
The movement primarily involved visual arts, literature, poetry, art manifestoes, art theory, theatre, and graphic design, और concentrated इसके anti-war राजनीती through a अस्वीकृति of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works.
In addition to being anti-war, Dada was also anti- bourgeois and had राजनैतिक affinities साथ the कट्टरपंथी left.
Dada activities included public gatherings, demonstrations, and publication of art/literary जर्नल्स ; passionate कवरेज of art, politics, and culture were topics often discussed in a variety of media.
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball, Emmy Hennings, Hans Arp, Raoul Hausmann, Hannah Höch, Johannes Baader, Tristan Tzara, Francis Picabia, Richard Huelsenbeck, Georg Grosz, John Heartfield, Marcel Duchamp, Beatrice Wood, Kurt Schwitters, and Hans Richter, among others.
The movement बहकावे बाद शैलियाँ जैसे the avant-garde and downtown music movements, and groups including surrealism, Nouveau réalisme, pop art and Fluxus.
Dada is the groundwork to abstract art and sound poetry, a starting पाइंट लिये प्रदर्शन आर्ट, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on pop art, a celebration of antiart to be later embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism.
First trophic level.
The plants in this image, और the शैवाल और phytoplankton in the lake, are primary producers.
They take nutrients from the मृदा or the जल, और manufacture their own food by photosynthesis, using energy from the sun.
The trophic level of an सजीव is the स्थिति it occupies in a food chain.
The word trophic derives from the यूनानी τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding.
A food chain represents a उत्तराधिकार of जीवों that eat another organism and are, in turn, eaten themselves.
The क्रमांक of कदम an सजीव is from the start of the chain is a measure of its trophic level.
Food chains start at trophic level 1 with primary producers such as plants, move to herbivores at level 2, predators at level 3 and typically समाप्त साथ carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5.
The path along the chain can form either a one-way प्रवाह, or a खाना `` web. ''
ecological समुदायों साथ higher biodiversity form more complex trophic paths.

Top to नीचे : bombyx mori, Hyalophora cecropia, Antheraea pernyi, Samia cynthia.

A silk-producing raspy cricket.
Silk is a प्राकृतिक protein fibre, some forms of which can be woven into textiles.
The protein fibre of silk is composed mainly of fibroin and produced by निश्चित कीट लार्वे to रूप cocoons.
The best-known प्रकार of रेशा is प्राप्त इससे the cocoons of the larvae of the mulberry silkworm Bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
The shimmering appearance of silk is due to the triangular prism -like structure of the silk fibre, which allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at अलग कोण, यूँ producing अलग रंगों.
Silks are produced by several other कीट, लकिन generally only the silk of moth caterpillars has been used for textile manufacturing.
There has been some research into other silks, which differ at the आणविक level.
Many silks are mainly produced by the larvae of insects undergoing complete metamorphosis, लकिन कुछ वयस्क कीट ऐसे as webspinners उपज silk, and some insects such as raspy crickets produce silk throughout their lives.
Silk production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees, wasps, and ants ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, beetles, lacewings, fleas, flies and midges.
अन्य प्रकार of सन्धिपाद produce silk, most notably various arachnids such as spiders ( see spider silk ).
Late Show with David Letterman is an American late-night talk show hosted by David Letterman on CBS.
The show debuted on August 30, 1993, and is produced by लेटरमैन 's production company, Worldwide Pants Incorporated.
The show 's music director and band-leader of the हाउस बैंड, the सीबीएस Orchestra, is Paul Shaffer.
The सिर लेखक is Matt Roberts and the announcer is Alan Kalter.
Of the major U.S. late-night programs, Late Show बाँधने दूसरी in संचयी औसत दर्शक over समय and third in number of episodes over time.
The show leads other late night shows in ad revenue with $ 271 लाख in 2009.
In most U.S. markets the दिखाएँ airs at 11:35 p.m. eastern/pacific समय, लकिन is अंकित Monday through Wednesday at 4:30 p.m., and Thursdays at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m.
The second Thursday episode usually airs on शुक्रवार of कि week.
In 2002, Late Show with David Letterman was ranked No. 7 on TV Guide 's 50 महानतम tv shows of सब Time.
CBS has a contract with Worldwide Pants to continue the show through 2014 ; by then, Letterman will surpass Johnny कार्सन as the longest tenured late-night बात दिखाएँ मेजबान.
The Real Housewives of Orange County is an American reality documentary television कार्यक्रम on ब्रावो, नियत in नारंगी काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
It was the first The Real housewives कार्यक्रम in the series.
The series is a voyeuristic look into the wealthy lives of these housewives, as they shop, get प्लास्टिक सर्जरी, गपशप, लड़ो and live lavishly.
The financial crisis, the beginning of which coincided almost exactly with the first season 's broadcast, has since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with job losses, evictions, mortgage defaults, foreclosures, और marital stress—all recorded in progressive seasons of the show.
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or other electronic means to stalk or harass an individual, a group of individuals, or an organization.
It may include the making of false accusations or statements of fact ( as in defamation ), monitoring, making threats, identity theft, क्षति to आंकड़ा or उपकरण, the solicitation of नाबालिग लिये sex, or gathering information that may be used to harass.
The definition of `` harassment '' must meet the criterion that a reasonable व्यक्ति, in कब्ज़ा of the वही सूचना, होता regard it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress.
Cyberstalking is different from spatial or offline stalking in that it occurs through the उपयोग of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक communications technology such as the internet.
However, it sometimes लीड to it, or is accompanied by it.
Both are दण्ड offenses.
Cyberstalking shares important विशेषताएँ साथ offline stalking.
Many stalkers – online or off – are motivated by a ख्वाहिश to कंट्रोल उनके victims.
A cyberstalker may be an ऑनलाइन stranger or a person whom the target knows.
A cyberstalker may be बेनाम और may solicit भागीदारी of other people online who do not even know the target.
Cyberstalking is a criminal offense that comes into play under state anti-stalking laws, slander laws, and उत्पीड़न laws.
A cyberstalking conviction can result in a restraining order, probation, or even criminal penalties against the assailant, सहित jail.
A business letter is usually used when writing from one company to another, or लिये पत्राचार between ऐसे संगठन और their customers, clients and other external parties.
The overall स्टाइल of अक्षर होगा निर्भर on the relationship between the parties concerned.
There are many कारण to लिखें a business letter.
It could be to request direct information or action from another पार्टी, to अनुक्रम आपूर्तियाँ इससे a प्रदायक, to identify a mistake that was committed, to reply directly to a request, to apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill.
Even today, the business letter is still very useful because it produces a स्थाई रिकार्ड, is गोपनीय, औपचारिक और delivers persuasive, well-considered messages.
Tilapia ( ) is the common name for nearly a सौ प्रजाति of cichlid fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe.
Tilapia are mainly freshwater fish, inhabiting shallow streams, तालाबों, नदियाँ और झीलों, और कम commonly मिला जीना in brackish water.
Historically, they have been of major importance in artisan fishing in Africa and the Levant, and are of increasing महत्व in aquaculture.
tilapia can become समस्यापूर्ण हृदयरोग species in new warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, but generally not in temperate climates due to their inability to survive in cooler waters below about.
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 comedy drama अपराधों फिल्मी अभिनीत tom हैंक्स और beasley the Dog as the eponymous characters, Turner and Hooch respectively.
The film also stars Mare Winningham, क्रेग T. Nelson, and Reginald VelJohnson.
It was निर्देशित by रोजर spottiswoode ; the फिल्मी थी originally slated to be directed by Henry Winkler, but he was terminated due to `` creative differences ''.
It was co-written by Michael Blodgett from Beyond the Valley of the डॉल कीर्ति.
Although K-9 ( with James Belushi ) was released prior to this film ( exactly three months earlier ), Turner & Hooch became more popular and seemingly निष्प्रभ इसके वृहद कामयाबी, भी हालांकि K-9 had a very similar plot.
A pilot लिये a टर्नर & Hooch TV series was made and ran as a part of The Magical World of Disney.

Adolf Hitler ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an Austrian -born German politician and the leader of the नाजी पार्टी ( ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party ).
He was chancellor of जर्मनी इससे 1933 to 1945 and dictator of Nazi Germany ( as Führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945.
हिटलर थी at the centre of Nazi Germany, World War II in Europe, and the Holocaust.
Hitler was a decorated veteran of संसार War I.
He joined the German Workers ' पार्टी ( precursor of the nsdap ) in 1919, and became leader of the NSDAP in 1921.
in 1923, he attempted a तख्तापलट d'état in Munich, known as the Beer Hall Putsch.
The failed coup resulted in Hitler 's कारावास, दौरान जिससे समय he लिखा his memoir, Mein Kampf ( My Struggle ).
After his release in 1924, Hitler gained popular support by attacking the सन्धि of Versailles and promoting Pan-Germanism, antisemitism, and anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda.
After his appointment as chancellor in 1933, he transformed the Weimar Republic into the तीसरा reich, a single-party तानाशाही आधारित on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of Nazism.
Hitler 's aim थी to स्थापित a नई अनुक्रम of absolute Nazi German hegemony in continental Europe.
To this end, his foreign and domestic policies had the aim of seizing Lebensraum ( `` जीना स्पेस '' ) लिये the germanic लोगों.
He directed the rearmament of Germany and the invasion of Poland by the Wehrmacht in September 1939, resulting in the outbreak of संसार War II in Europe.
Under Hitler 's rule, in 1941 German शक्तियां और उनके यूरोपीय allies occupied most of Europe and North Africa.
In 1943, जर्मनी था महरूम मजबूर onto the defensive and suffered a series of escalating defeats.
In the final days of the war, during the Battle of Berlin in 1945, Hitler married his long-time संगी, एवा braun.
On 30 April 1945, less than two days later, the two committed suicide to avoid capture by the Red Army, and their corpses यहूद burned.
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is माना the प्रमुख कारण of the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
His antisemitic नीतियों और racially प्रेरित ideology resulted in the deaths of at least 5.5 million Jews, and millions of other people deemed racially inferior.

A domain name is an identification string that defines a realm of administrative autonomy, authority, or control on the अंतरजाल.
डोमेन names हैं formed by the rules and procedures of the Domain Name System ( DNS ).
Technically, any name पंजीकृत in the DNS is a domain name.
Domain names are used in various networking contexts and application-specific नामकरण और संबोधित purposes.
In general, a domain name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource, such as a निजी कंप्यूटर प्रयुक्त to अभिगम the अंतरजाल, a server computer hosting a web site, or the web site itself or any other service communicated via the Internet.
Domain names are organized in subordinate स्तर ( subdomains ) of the डीएनएस रूट डोमेन, which is nameless.
The first-level set of domain names are the top-level डोमेन ( tlds ), सहित the generic top-level domains ( gTLDs ), such as the prominent domains com, info, net and org, and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ).
नीचे these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level domain names that are typically open for reservation by end-users who wish to connect local area networks to the Internet, create other publicly accessible Internet resources or run web sites.
The registration of these domain names is usually administered by domain नाम registrars जो बेचें उनके सेवाएं to the public.
A fully qualified domain name ( FQDN ) is a domain name that is completely निर्दिष्ट in the पदानुक्रम of the डीएनएस, having no omitted parts.
Domain names हैं प्रायः लिखा in lowercase, although labels in the Domain Name System are case-insensitive.
Nitrate is a polyatomic ion with the molecular सूत्र no3− और a आणविक द्रव्यमान of 62.0049 g/mol. Nitrates also describe the organic functional group RONO2.
These nitrate esters are a specialized क्लास of explosives.

कृषि is a प्रमुख उद्योग in the United States and the country is a net exporter of food.
As of the last census of agriculture in 2007, वहीँ यहूद 2.2 लाख farms, covering an area of, an average of per farm.
Although agricultural activity occurs in सबसे राज्य, it is विशेषकर concentrated in the vast expanse of flat, arable land known as the Great Plains, which encompasses the central region of the nation.
The Mpemba effect, named after Tanzanian student Erasto Mpemba, is the assertion कि warmer जल can फ्रीज faster than colder water.
Although there is anecdotal support for the effect, there is no अनुबंध on exactly कया the effect is and under what circumstances it occurs.
वहीँ have महरूम रिपोर्ट्स of समान phenomena चूंकि ancient times, although with insufficient detail for the claims to be replicated.
The phenomenon seems contrary to ऊष्मागतिकी, लकिन a क्रमांक of possible explanations for the effect have been proposed.
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise definition of `` freezing '' and control a vast number of starting पैरामीटर्स in अनुक्रम to confirm or बताइये the effect.
The Siamese (, ) is एक of the पहला distinctly recognized breeds of Oriental cat.
The breed originated in Thailand ( formerly known as Siam ), where they are one of अनेक देशी breeds and are called Wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a name meaning `` moon diamond '' ).
In the 20th century the Siamese cat became one of the सबसे लोकप्रिय breeds in Europe and North America.
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a supermarket chain based in Bellevue, वॉशिंगटन, साथ 64 स्टोर्स in the puget ध्वनि प्रदेश of Washington state and in the Portland, Oregon metropolitan area.
In economics, the money supply or money stock, is the कुल राशि of मौद्रिक एसेट उपलब्धियाँ in an अर्थव्यवस्था at a specific time.
There are several ways to define `` money, '' but standard measures usually include currency in circulation and demand deposits ( depositors ' easily accessed एसेट on the किताबे of वित्तीय संस्थानों ).
Money सप्लाई आंकड़ा हैं अंकित और published, usually by the government or the central bank of the country.
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored changes in money supply because of its effects on the price level, महंगाई, the एक्सचेंज रेट और the business cycle.
That संबंध between धन और कीमतें is historically associated with the quantity theory of money.
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between money-supply growth and long-term price inflation, at least for rapid increases in the amount of money in the economy.
That is, a country such as Zimbabwe which saw रैपिड increases in इसके धन सप्लाई भी saw rapid increases in prices ( hyperinflation ).
This is one reason for the reliance on monetary नीति as a अर्थात् of controlling inflation.
The nature of this causal chain is the विषय of contention.
Some heterodox economists argue that the धन सप्लाई is endogenous ( संकल्पित by the workings of the economy, not by the central bank ) and that the sources of inflation must be found in the distributional structure of the economy.
In addition, those अर्थशास्त्रियों देखकर the सेंट्रल बैंको 's कंट्रोल over the धन सप्लाई as feeble say that there are two weak links between the growth of the money supply and the inflation rate.
First, in the aftermath of a recession, when many resources are underutilized, an increase in the money supply can cause a sustained increase in real production instead of inflation.
Second, if the velocity of money, i.e., the ratio between nominal GDP and money supply, changes, an increase in the money supply could have either no प्रभाव, an अतिरंजित प्रभाव, or an मनमौजी प्रभाव on the growth of nominal GDP.

IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image Maximum ) is a motion picture film format and a set of cinema projection मानकों निर्मित by the Canadian company IMAX Corporation.
imax रै the क्षमता to रिकार्ड and display images of far greater size and resolution than conventional film systems.
Since 2002, some feature films have been converted ( or upgraded ) into imax स्वरूप लिये display in IMAX theatres and some have also been partially shot in IMAX.
IMAX is the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त प्रणाली लिये special-venue film presentations.
, there are 697 IMAX theatres in 52 देशों.
Today 's Special is a Canadian children 's टेलीविज़न show produced by Clive VanderBurgh at TVOntario from 1981 to 1987.
It also ran on Nickelodeon and the Faith and Values Channel/Odyssey ( now the Hallmark Channel ) as खूब as अनेक pbs स्टेशन throughout the संयुक्त राज्य.
It was set in a department store, based on the फ्लैगशिप स्थान of the अभी defunct सिम्पसन 's in Toronto.
Many sequences लिये it were shot at the Queen Street West and Yonge Street store after hours.
Constitutionalism, in its most general meaning, is `` a complex of ideas, attitudes, and patterns of behavior elaborating the principle कि the प्राधिकार of सरकारी derives from and is limited by a body of fundamental law ''.
A political organization is constitutional to the extent that it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of power control for the protection of the interests and liberties of the citizenry, सहित those कि may be in the minority ``.
As described by राजनैतिक scientist and constitutional scholar David Fellman :
An ice-cream headache, also known as brain freeze, cold-stimulus headache, or its दिए वैज्ञानिक नाम sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( अर्थ `` तंत्रिका पीड़ा of the sphenopalatine गंडिका `` ), is a form of brief cranial pain or headache commonly associated with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops.
It is caused by having something cold touch the roof of the mouth ( palate ), and is believed to result from a nerve response causing रैपिड constriction और सूजन of blood vessels or a `` referring `` of pain from the roof of the mouth to the head.
The rate of intake for cold foods has been studied as a contributing फ़ैक्टर.
There are people who can not अनुभव `` brain freeze '' or similar symptoms.
The term ice-cream headache has been in use since at least 31 January 1937, contained in a journal entry by Rebecca Timbres published in the 1939 किताब we किया n't पूछो यूटोपिया : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia.
The first published use of the term brain freeze, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, was on 27 May 1991.
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s '' rather than `` z '' ) is a स्कॉट्स कविता लिखा by रॉबर्ट burns in 1788 और नियत to the धुन of a traditional folk song ( Roud # 6294 ).
It is well known in many countries, especially in the English-speaking world ; its traditional use being to celebrate the प्रारंभ of the नई साल at the स्ट्रोक of midnight.
By extension, it is also sung at अंत्येष्टि, graduations and as a farewell or ending to other occasions.
The international Boy Scout youth movement, in many countries, uses it as a बंद to jamborees and other functions.
The song 's Scots title may be अनूदित into अंग्रेज़ी वस्तुतः as `` बूढ़ा long चूंकि '', or more idiomatically, `` long long ago '', `` days gone by '' or `` old times ''.
Consequently `` For auld lang syne '', as it appears in the पहला लकीर of the chorus, might be loosely translated as `` for ( the sake of ) old times ''.
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is also used in similar poems by Robert Ayton ( 1570–1638 ), Allan Ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), और जेम्स Watson ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating Burns.
Matthew Fitt uses the phrase `` In the days of auld lang syne '' as the equivalent of `` Once upon a time...
`` in his retelling of fairy tales in the स्कॉट्स भाषा.

Leeroy Jenkins, sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins and often elongated with numerous अतिरिक्त अक्षर, is an अंतरजाल मीम नामित for a player character created by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's MMORPG, World of Warcraft.
The character became popular due to a video of the खेल कि परिचालित around the Internet.
The phenomenon has since spread beyond the सीमाएँ of the gaming community into other online and mainstream media.
Oscar ग्रान्ट was fatally shot by BART police officer Johannes Mehserle in Oakland, California, United States, in the early morning hours of New Year 's Day 2009.
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded Bay Area Rapid Transit train returning from San Francisco, BART Police officers detained Oscar Grant and several अन्य यात्री on the मंच at the fruitvale बार्ट Station.
Officer Johannes Mehserle and another officer were restraining Grant, who was prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest.
Officer Mehserle stood और, according to witnesses, said : `` Get back, I 'm gon na tase him. ''
Then Mehserle drew उसके गन और शॉट ग्रान्ट एकबार in the back ; Mehserle appeared stunned, put his hands to his head and exclaimed, `` Oh, my God ! ''
During his court testimony, Mehserle said that Grant तब exclaimed, `` तुम शॉट me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he was सुनाया मुर्दे the अगला morning at Highland Hospital in Oakland.
The events were captured on multiple digital वीडियो and cell phone cameras.
The footage was disseminated to media outlets and to various websites, where it was watched millions of times.
The following days saw both peaceful and violent विरोध.
The shooting has been variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution.
On January 13, Alameda County prosecutors चार्ज mehserle साथ हत्या for the shooting.
He resigned उसके स्थिति and pleaded not guilty.
The trial began on June 10, 2010.
Michael Rains, Mehserle 's criminal defense attorney, argued कि mehserle mistakenly shot Grant with his pistol, intending to use his Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband.
Pretrial filings argue that his client did not commit first-degree murder and asked a Los Angeles judge to instruct the jury to limit its deliberations to either second-degree murder or acquittal.
Oakland civil rights attorney John Burris filed a $ 25 million wrongful death अर्जी विरूद्ध बार्ट on निमित्त of Grant 's family.
On July 8, 2010, the jury returned its verdict : Mehserle was found guilty of involuntary manslaughter and not अपराधी of second-degree हत्या और voluntary manslaughter.
Initial protests against the ruling यहूद शांतिपूर्वक व्यवस्थित ; लूटने, आगजनी, विनाश of property, and small riots broke out after dark.
Nearly 80 people were eventually गिरफ्तार.
on शुक्रवार, जुलाई 9, 2010, the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil rights case against Mehserle ; the federal government can prosecute him independently for the same act under the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy.
The Department of Justice will be working with the U.S. attorney 's दफ्तर in सैन फ्रांसिस्को and the FBI.
On November 5, 2010, mehserle थी sentenced to two years, minus time served.
He served his time in the Los Angeles County Jail, occupying a private कोशिका दूर from other prisoners.
He थी released on जून 13, 2011 and is now on parole.
Major representatives of the हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण.
The Harlem Renaissance थी a cultural movement that spanned the 1920s.
At the time, it was known as the `` New Negro गति '', नामित बाद the 1925 anthology by Alain Locke.
Though it was centered in the Harlem neighborhood of New York City, many French-speaking ब्लैक लेखक इससे अफ़्रीकी और caribbean colonies who lived in Paris were also influenced by the Harlem Renaissance.
The हार्लेम Renaissance is unofficially recognized to have spanned from about 1919 until the early or mid-1930s.
अनेक of इसके ideas lived on much longer.
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro literature '', as James Weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance, was placed between 1924 ( the year कि अवसर : a जर्नल of नीग्रो जीवन hosted a पार्टी लिये ब्लैक लेखक जहाँ अनेक श्वेत प्रकाशक यहूद in उपस्थिति ) and 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ).

The history of Africa begins with the prehistory of Africa and the emergence of Homo sapiens in East अफ़्रीकी, continuing into the उपस्थित as a patchwork of diverse and politically developing nation states.
Some early evidence of agriculture in Africa dates इससे 16,000 bce, और metallurgy from about 4000 BCE.
The recorded history of early civilization arose in Egypt, and बाद in नुबिया, the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa.
During the Middle Ages, islam स्प्रेड through the regions.
Crossing the Maghreb and the Sahel, a major बीच of Muslim culture was Timbuktu.
Some notable pre-colonial states and societies in Africa include the Nok culture, Mali साम्राज्य, ashanti साम्राज्य, किंगडम of mapungubwe, किंगडम of ज्या, किंगडम of saloum, किंगडम of baol, किंगडम of Zimbabwe, Kingdom of Kongo, Ancient Carthage, Numidia, Mauretania, the Aksumite Empire, the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate.
From the late 15th सदी, europeans और arabs took स्लेव इससे West, Central and Southeast Africa overseas in the African slave trade.
European colonization of Africa विकसित rapidly in the हाथापाई लिये Africa of the late 19th and early 20th centuries.
following struggles लिये स्वतंत्रता in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप, as खूब as a weakened Europe after the Second World War ; decolonization took place.
Africa 's history has been challenging for researchers in the field of African studies because of the scarcity of written sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa.
Scholarly techniques such as the recording of oral history, ऐतिहासिक भाषाविज्ञान, पुरातत्व और आनुवंशिकी have been crucial.
Curry Foley थी the पहला खिलाड़ी in Major League Baseball history to hit for the cycle.
In baseball, hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one बैटर hitting a सिंगल, a double, a triple, and a home run in the same game.
Collecting the हिट्स in कि अनुक्रम is known as a `` natural cycle ''.
Cycles are uncommon in Major लीग बेसबॉल ( MLB ), and have occurred 294 times since the first by Curry Foley in 1882.
the साईकिल is roughly as आम as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in MLB history ) ; it has been called `` one of the rarest '' and `` most difficult feats '' in baseball.
Based on 2009 offensive levels, the probability of an average MLB player hitting for a cycle against an average team in a game is लगभग 0.00590 % ; इस corresponds to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams.
In other baseball leagues, the cycle is हासिल less frequently.
Through September 4, 2008, 62 players in Nippon Professional Baseball ( NPB ), the top-level बेसबॉल संगठन in Japan, have hit for the cycle, the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara.
Two players have hit for the cycle on the वही दिन एकबार in npb history ; this has occurred twice in MLB history.
One NPB player has also hit for the cycle in an npb all-star game.
No player has ever hit for the cycle in the एमएलबी all-star खेल or the postseason.
The प्रमुख स्लेव रूट in medieval Africa.
This article discusses प्रणालियों, history, and effects of slavery within Africa.
See Arab slave trade, Atlantic slave trade, maafa, और गुलामी in समकालीन अफ़्रीकी for other discussions.
`` Slave हस्तांतरण in Africa ''.
europeans प्रायः did not enter the interior regions.
Slavery in Africa has existed throughout the continent for अनेक सदियां, and continues in the current day.
Systems of servitude and slavery were common in many parts of the continent, as they were in much of the ancient world.
In most African societies where slavery was prevalent, the enslaved लोगों यहूद largely treated as indentured servants and not treated as chattel slaves.
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began, many of the local slave प्रणालियों बदला और began supplying captives लिये स्लेव बाज़ार outside of Africa.
Slavery in historical Africa was practiced in many different forms and some of these do not clearly fit the definitions of गुलामी elsewhere in the संसार.
Debt slavery, enslavement of war captives, सैन्य गुलामी, और दण्ड गुलामी यहूद सब practiced in विभिन्न parts of Africa.
Although there had been some trans-Saharan trade from the interior of sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी to अन्य regions, गुलामी थी a छोटी भाग of the आर्थिक life of many societies in Africa until the introduction of transcontinental slave trades ( Arab and Atlantic ).
Slave practices were again रूपांतरित साथ यूरोपीय colonization of Africa and the formal abolition of slavery in the early 1900s.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications, processes and CPU usage, commit charge and memory information, network activity और आंकडे, logged-in उपयोक्ता, और प्रणाली सेवाएं ( और as प्रायः is the मामला साथ तन्त्र टूल्स provided by microsoft लिये खिड़कियाँ, 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ जिससे भरता the आवश्यकताएँ more thoroughly, e.g, `` Process Explorer '', `` Extended Task Manager '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities, processor affinity, forcibly terminate processes, and shut bas, restart, hibernate or log off from Windows.
Windows Task Manager was introduced with खिड़कियाँ nt 4.0.
Previous versions of Windows NT included the Task List application, जिससे था दूर fewer features.
The task list was capable of listing फिलहाल कार्यशील प्रक्रियाओं and killing them, or creating a new process.
In Windows XP only, a Shutdown menu is also present that allows access to Standby, Hibernate, Turn off, Restart, log बंद और स्विच User.
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft Windows 3.x, Windows 95, Windows 98 ) had a program known as कार्य to प्रदर्शक the कार्यक्रम currently running.
This file was चलाया by कार्यशील the taskman.exe file from the C : \Windows directory.
The Troop is an American-Canadian live-action, single camera comedy -adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय a तिकड़ी of teenagers जो लड़ो और कैप्चर राक्षस और other supernatural phenomena that invade the fictional town of Lakewood.
Created and executive produced by Max Burnett, Greg कूलिज और क्रिस मॉर्गन, the श्रेणी premiered on Nickelodeon on September 18, 2009.

Sparsely populated in relation to its area, the Democratic Republic of the कांगो ( drc ) is घर to a विशाल संभावित of प्राकृतिक संसाधन और खनिज माल, इसके untapped जमा of कच्चा खनिज हैं अनुमानित to be लायक in excess of us $ 24 trillion, yet the economy of the DRC has declined drastically since the mid-1980s.
At the time of its independence in 1960, drc थी the दूसरी सबसे industrialized देश in अफ़्रीकी बाद दक्षिण Africa ; it boasted a thriving mining sector and its agriculture sector was relatively productive.
If the viewer stares at this image for 20–60 seconds and stares at a white object, a negative afterimage होगा appear ( in इस मामला, it will be cyan on magenta ).
This can also be achieved by the viewer closing his/her आँखें और tilting उनके सिर up.
An afterimage or ghost image or image burn-in is an ऑप्टिकल भ्रम कि refers to an चित्र continuing to appear in one 's vision after the exposure to the original image has ceased.
One of the most common afterimages is the bright glow that seems to float before one 's आँखें बाद looking into a लाइट सोर्स लिये a few seconds.
Closing the eye can help achieve a better भाव of the रंग in इसके अपना पहलू.
Afterimages come in two forms, negative ( inverted ) and positive ( retaining original color ).
The process behind positive afterimages is अनजान, though thought to be related to neural adaptation.
On the other hand, ऋणात्मक afterimages हैं a retinal phenomenon and are well understood.
Lost is an American serial drama television series that premiered on September 22, 2004 on the अमरीकी प्रसारण Company ( ABC ).
The series was created by J. J. Abrams and Damon Lindelof, based upon an असली पायलट स्क्रिप्ट titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber.
Six seasons of the show aired, in जोड to numerous clip shows to recap previous episodes.
ABC announced that Lost would end after six सीज़न, having produced a total of 121 episodes.
The series follows the past, present, and future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a plane crash on a यात्री जेट, oceanic उड़ान 815, उड़ती इससे सिडनी to लॉस एंजिल्स after it crashes on a tropical island in the South Pacific.
The series also includes stories of the lives of people already living on the island — they include the `` Others ``, who initially antagonize the survivors, as खूब as a समूह of लोगों who arrive on the freighter Kahana.
Each episode typically सुविधाएँ कार्रवाई on the island as well as a secondary storyline from another point in a character 's life.
Season 6 सुविधाएँ a detailing of the lives of the survivors in a different reality, as if the flight had never crashed.
In the following सूची, the पद `` प्रदर्शित character ( s ) '' refers to the character or characters who are featured in the secondary storyline of each episode.
`` no.
in series '' refers to the episode 's number in the overall श्रेणी, whereas `` No.
in season '' refers to the एपीसोड 's क्रमांक in each particular season.
`` U.S. viewers ( million ) '' refers to the number of Americans in millions who देखी the एपीसोड live.
A total of 121 episodes of Lost were produced, the पिछला of जिससे aired on may 23, 2010.
All seasons are उपलब्धियाँ on dvd in regions 1–4 and on Blu-ray in Regions A and B.
Flat feet ( also called pes planus or fallen arches ) is a formal reference to a medical condition in which the मेहराब of the पैर collapses, साथ the संपूर्ण एकमात्र of the पैर coming into पूरा or near-complete contact with the ground.
In some individuals ( an estimated 20–30 % of the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी ) the arch simply never develops in one foot ( unilaterally ) or both feet ( bilaterally ).
Three अध्ययन ( देखिए citations नीचे in सैन्य खण्ड ) of सैन्य रंगरूटों have shown no evidence of later increased injury, or foot problems, due to flat feet, in a population of people who reach military service age without prior foot problems.
however, these studies can not be used to judge possible future damage from this condition when diagnosed at younger ages.
They also can not be applied to persons whose flat feet are associated with foot symptoms, or certain symptoms in other भाग of the देह ( ऐसे as the लेग or वापस ) possibly referable to the foot.
Generation X, commonly abbreviated to Gen X, is the generation born after the पश्चिमी post-world War II baby boom.
Demographers, historians और टीकाकारों उपयोग शुरूआत birth dates from the early 1960s to the early 1980s.
the पद थी popularized by Douglas Coupland 's 1991 novel Generation X : Tales for an Accelerated Culture.
Before that, it had been used for विभिन्न subcultures or countercultures after the 1950s.
Pressure ulcers, also known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores, हैं स्थानीयकृत चोटों to the स्किन and/or underlying ऊतक प्रायः over a bony prominence, as a result of pressure, or pressure in combination with shear and/or friction.
Most commonly this will be the sacrum, coccyx, heels or the hips, but other sites such as the elbows, knees, ankles or the back of the cranium can be affected.
The cause of दबाव छाले is दबाव लागू to soft tissue so that blood flow to the soft tissue is completely or partially obstructed.
Shear is also a cause ; shear pulls on blood vessels कि फीड the skin.
Pressure ulcers most commonly develop in व्यक्तियों who are not moving about or are confined to wheelchairs.
It is widely believed कि अन्य कारकों can influence the सहिष्णुता of skin for pressure and shear thereby increasing the risk of pressure ulcer development.
These factors are protein-calorie malnutrition, microclimate ( skin wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ), रोगों कि reduce blood flow to the skin, such as arteriosclerosis or diseases that reduce the feeling in the skin, such as paralysis or neuropathy.
The healing of pressure ulcers may be slowed by the age of the person, चिकित्सा शर्तें ( ऐसे as arteriosclerosis, diabetes or infection ), smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs.
Although often prevented और treatable if मिला early, pressure ulcers can be very difficult to prevent in critically ill patients, frail elders, wheelchair users ( especially where spinal injury is involved ) and terminally ill patients.
Primary prevention is to redistribute दबाव by turning the रोगी regularly.
The लाभ of turning to avoid further sores is well documented since at least the 19th century.
In addition to turning and re-positioning the patient in bed or wheelchair, eating a balanced diet with adequate protein and keeping the skin free इससे एक्सपोज़र to urine and stool is very important.
The prevalence of दबाव छाले in हॉस्पिटल settings is high, but improvements are being made.
According to the 2010 IPUP ( International Pressure Ulcer Prevalence सर्वेक्षण ) conducted in कनाडा, there was a significant decrease in the overall facility-acquired prevalence of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010.
Ulcers were most commonly identified at the sacral/coccyx ulcer location ; however, heel छाले यहूद the सबसे common facility-acquired location in the survey.
Overboard is a 1987 American romantic कॉमेडी फिल्मी अभिनीत Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell.
