Green Bay is a city in and the county seat of Brown County in the U.S. state of Wisconsin, located at the सिर of ग्रीन खाड़ी, a sub-basin of झील मिशिगन, at the mouth of the Fox River.
It has an elevation of above sea level and is located north of मिल्वौकी.
the जनसांख्यिकी was 104,057 at the 2010 census.
It is the third-largest नगर in the राज्य of Wisconsin, after Milwaukee and Madison.
It is also the third-largest नगर on the वेस्ट shore of Lake Michigan, after Chicago and Milwaukee.
Green Bay is home to the Green Bay Packers of the National Football लीग, बनाना it by दूर the smallest महानगर area in the USA to host a major professional sports franchise.
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan Statistical Area, which covers Brown, Kewaunee, and Oconto Counties and had a combined population of 282,599 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
Green Bay is an industrial city with several meatpacking and paper plants, and a port on Green Bay, an arm of Lake Michigan that locals call the खाड़ी of ग्रीन खाड़ी, to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city.
It is home to the National Railroad Museum ; the Neville Public Museum, with exhibitions of art, history, और विज्ञान ; और the विश्वविद्यालयों of wisconsin–green Bay.
Luteinizing hormone ( LH, also known as lutropin and sometimes lutrophin ) is a hormone उत्पादित by gonadotroph कोशिकाएं in the anterior pituitary gland.
In females, an acute rise of LH ( `` LH surge '' ) triggers ovulation and development of the कॉर्पस luteum.
In males, where LH had also been called interstitial cell-stimulating hormone ( ICSH ), it stimulates leydig कोशिका उत्पादन of testosterone.
it अधिनियमों synergistically with FSH.
Selena Quintanilla-Pérez ( April 16, 1971 – March 31, 1995 ), ज्ञात बस as Selena, was an American singer-songwriter.
She was named the `` top Latin artist of the '90s '' and `` Best selling Latin कलाकार of the दशक '' by Billboard for her fourteen top-ten singles in the Top Latin Songs chart, including seven number-one hits.
Selena had the most successful singles of 1994 and 1995, `` Amor Prohibido `` and `` no me queda Más ``.
She was called `` The महारानी of tejano म्यूज़िक `` और the Mexican equivalent of Madonna.
Selena released her first album, Selena y लॉस dinos, at the age of twelve.
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano Music Awards and landed a recording contract साथ emi a few सालो बाद.
Her fame grew throughout the early 1990s, विशेषकर in spanish-speaking देशों, और वो था begun recording in English as well.
सेलिना थी murdered at the age of 23 on March 31, 1995 by Yolanda Saldívar, the former president of her fan club.
On April 12, 1995, दो सप्ताह बाद उसके मौत, जार्ज W. Bush, governor of Texas at the time, declared her birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas.
Warner Bros. produced Selena, a film आधारित on उसके जीवन अभिनीत Jennifer Lopez, in 1997.
Selena 's life was also the basis of the musical सेलिना Forever starring Veronica Vazquez as Selena.
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated with a life-sized bronze statue ( mirador de la flor in कॉर्पस christi, टेक्सास ) and a Selena museum opened there.
वो has sold over 60 million albums worldwide, making her one of the best-selling artists of all time.
She is also the only female artist to have five albums in U.S. बिलबोर्ड 200 at the वही समय.
German stahlhelm from World War II
तमगा of the bolivian Army Colorados regiment, showing a Stahlhelm and two crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( plural, Stahlhelme ) is जर्मनी लिये `` steel helmet ''.
The Imperial German फौज began to बदलें the traditional boiled-leather Pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) with the Stahlhelm during World War I in 1916.
The term Stahlhelm refers दोनो to a जेनेरिक स्टील हेल्मेट, और अधिक specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) German design.
The Stahlhelm, with its distinctive `` coal scuttle `` आकार, was an instantly recognizable icon for military imagery and became a common element of military propaganda on both sides, just like the Pickelhaube before it.
Its name was also used by the Stahlhelm, a अर्धसैनिक राष्ट्रवादी संगठन स्थापित at the end of 1918.
glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence, the production and emission of लाइट by a जीना सजीव
chemiluminescence, is the emission of light ( luminescence ) without emission of heat
स्फुरदीप्ति, a specific type of photoluminescence related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence, production of luminescence in a material by the bombardment of ionizing radiation

Frankfurt Airport serves as a हब नगर for Lufthansa and receives flights from Star Alliance carriers.
Airline hubs are airports ranked as large, medium, small, and non-hubs as एक of the faa विमानक्षेत्र श्रेणी जिससे हैं re-evaluated every year based on number of commercial passengers.
The more common but informal use for the phrase airline hub is an विमानक्षेत्र कि an एयरलाइन उपयोग as a ट्रांसफ़र point to get passengers to their intended destination.
It is भाग of a हब और spoke मॉडल, जहाँ travelers moving between airports not served by direct flights change planes en route to their destinations.
This is as opposed to the Point to Point model.
Many hubs of the airlines are also situated at airports in the शहरों of the respective head offices.
Some एयरलाइंस may उपयोग तभी a सिंगल hub, while other airlines use multiple hubs.
hubs हैं प्रयुक्त for both passenger flights as well as cargo flights.
Many एयरलाइंस भी उपयोग फ़ोकस शहरों, which function much the same as hubs.
एयरलाइंस may भी use secondary hubs, a non-technical term for large focus cities.
A hub in the middle of a route is more effective than at either end as connecting ट्रैफ़िक अधिक easily भरता the प्लेन - यात्री prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route.
Hollow lacedaemon.
Site of the Menelaion, the shrine to Helen and Menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze Age city that stood on the हिल of Therapne on the left bank of the Eurotas River overlooking the future site of Dorian Sparta.
Across the घाटी the successive ridges of Mount Taygetus are in evidence.
Sparta ( Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ), or Lacedaemon, was a prominent city-state in ancient Greece, situated on the बैंको of the eurotas नदी in laconia, in south-eastern पेलोपोनीज़.
it उभरा as a राजनैतिक एंटिटी around the 10th century BC, when the invading Dorians subjugated the local, non-Dorian population.
around 650 bc, it रोज़ to become the dominant military land-power in ancient Greece.
Given its military pre-eminence, Sparta was recognized as the overall नेता of the संयुक्त यूनानी शक्तियां during the Greco-Persian Wars.
Between 431 and 404 BC, Sparta was the प्रिंसिपल दुश्मन of एथेंस दौरान the peloponnesian War, from which it emerged victorious, though at great cost.
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in the Battle of leuctra in 371 bc ended स्पार्टा 's prominent role in Greece.
However, it कायम its political independence until the Roman conquest of Greece in 146 BC.
It then underwent a long काल of मनाही, especially in the Middle Ages, when many Spartans moved to live in Mystras.
Modern Sparta is the capital of the Greek regional unit of Laconia and a center for the प्रसंस्करण of goods ऐसे as citrus और olives.
Sparta was unique in ancient Greece for its social system and संविधान, जिससे completely केन्द्रित on सैन्य प्रशिक्षण and excellence.
Its inhabitants were classified as Spartiates ( Spartan citizens, जो enjoyed पूरा अधिकारों ), mothakes ( non-spartan फ़्री मेन उठाया as Spartans ), Perioikoi ( freedmen ), and Helots ( state-owned serfs, enslaved non-Spartan local population ).
Spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge training and education regimen, और spartan phalanges यहूद widely considered to be among the best in battle.
Spartan women enjoyed considerably अधिक अधिकारों और समता to men than elsewhere in the classical world.
Sparta was the subject of fascination in its own day, as well as in the West following the revival of classical learning.
This love or admiration of Sparta is ज्ञात as laconism or Laconophilia.
Fantasy फ़ुटबॉल is an इंटरैक्टिव प्रतियोगिता in which users compete against each other as general managers of virtual teams.
The players that an individual is able to manage are पेशेवर अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल players in the National Football League.
The different actions people हैं समर्थ to मेक हैं drafting, trading, adding or dropping players, and changing rosters.
Due to the growth of the Internet, Fantasy football has vastly increased in popularity, particularly because Fantasy football providers such as ESPN, Yahoo, CBS, and the NFL itself are able to रखना track of आंकडे entirely ऑनलाइन, eliminating the need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track of players.
Most leagues have a single week championship in Week 16 of the एनएफएल season.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, नारंगी, ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded population आंकड़े हैं in ब्लू.
According to the highest estimate, the world population may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान, it may decline to 6 billion.
The संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल number of living humans on Earth.
As of today, it is अनुमानित to number billion by the United States Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates कि the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund, it पहुँचे इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31, 2011.
The world जनसांख्यिकी रै अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल and the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – were seen briefly during the 1950s, and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 million, and are now expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million, while deaths number 56 million per year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ), साथ the वैश्विक population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further विकास, stagnation, or भी overall मनाही in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, वैश्विक खाना supplies, and energy resources.
skeletal muscles homo sapiens
This is a तालिका of muscles of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles, found on both sides, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles differently, e.g. regarding कया is पारिभाषित as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles.
Examples दायरा इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of groups जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the head and neck, muscles of the torso or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the action of each muscle from the standard anatomical स्थिति.
In other positions, अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed.
A gold bar is a quantity of refined metallic gold of any shape that is made by a बार निर्माता meeting standard conditions of manufacture, labeling, and record keeping.
Larger gold bars that are produced by pouring the molten metal into molds हैं पुकारा पिंडों.
Smaller बार may be manufactured by minting or stamping from appropriately rolled gold sheets.
The standard gold bar held as gold reserves by central banks and traded among bullion डीलर is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good Delivery gold bar.
The kilobar, which is to say 1000 grams in mass, is the bar that is अधिक manageable और is used extensively for trading and investment.
The premium on these bars when traded is very कम over the स्पॉट मान of the सुनहरा making it ideal for small transfers between banks and traders.
Most kilobars are flat, although some investors, particularly in यूरोपीय, prefer the brick shape.
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19, 1949 ) is a former American football quarterback in the National फ़ुटबॉल League, playing for the New Orleans Saints from 1971 to 1982, then for the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings.
He is the father of current Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning, current New York दिग्गज starting क्वार्टरबैक एली मैनिंग, और former Ole Miss receiver Cooper Manning.
Advocacy is a political process by an individual or group which aims to influence public-policy and resource allocation decisions within political, आर्थिक, और सोशल प्रणालियों और संस्थानों.
Advocacy can include many activities that a person or organization undertakes सहित मीडिया अभियान, पब्लिक बोलना, commissioning and publishing research or polls or the filing of an amicus brief.
Lobbying ( often by lobby groups ) is a form of advocacy where a direct दृष्टिकोण is बना to विधायक on an समस्या जिससे plays a significant role in modern politics.
Research is beginning to explore how advocacy groups in the U.S. and Canada are using social media to सुकर नागरिक सगाई और सामूहिक कार्रवाई.
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de méxico ) is a लंबवत तिरंगा of ग्रीन, श्वेत, और रेड साथ the national coat of arms charged in the center of the white stripe.
While the meaning of the colors has changed over time, these three colors were adopted by Mexico following independence from Spain during the country 's War of Independence, और subsequent First Mexican Empire.
The current flag was adopted in 1968, but the overall डिज़ाइन रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि 1821, when the First National Flag was created.
the वर्तमान विधि of नेशनल symbols, Law on the National Arms, Flag, and Anthem, that governs the use of the national flag has been in place since 1984.
Red, श्वेत, और ग्रीन हैं the colors of the national liberation army in Mexico.
The central emblem is the Aztec pictogram for tenochtitlan ( अभी मैक्सिको नगर ), the center of their empire.
It recalls the legend that inspired the Aztecs to settle on कया थी originally a lake-island.
The form of the coat of बाहें थी सबसे recently revised in 1968.
A ribbon in the नेशनल रंगों is at the bottom of the coat of arms.
Throughout history, the flag has changed four times, as the design of the coat of arms and the length-width ratios of the ध्वज have महरूम परिवर्धित.
However, the coat of arms has had the same features throughout : an eagle, पकड़कर a serpent in इसके talon, is perched on शीर्ष of a prickly नाशपाती cactus ; the cactus is situated on a rock that rises above a lake.
The coat of बाहें is निकला इससे an एज़टेक लेजेंड कि उनके देवताओं told them to build a city where they spot an eagle on a nopal eating a serpent, which is now Mexico City.
The current national flag, the चौथी नेशनल ध्वज, is भी प्रयुक्त as the मैक्सिकन naval ensign by ships registered in Mexico.
A destination marketing organization or convention and visitor bureau promotes a town, city, region, or country in order to बढ़ाएँ the क्रमांक of visitors.
It promotes the development and marketing of a destination, focusing on convention बिक्री, पर्यटन विपणन, and services.
Such organizations promote economic development of a गंतव्य by increasing विज़िट from tourists and business travelers, which generates overnight lodging for a destination, visits to restaurants, and shopping revenues.
Convention and visitor bureaus हैं the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण पर्यटन विपणन संगठन in उनके respective tourist destinations, as they are directly responsible for marketing the destination brand through travel and tourism `` product awareness '' to visitors.
DMOs produce billions of dollars in सीधा और अप्रत्यक्ष आय और कर for their destinations ' economies with their marketing and sales expertise.
Destination विपणन संगठन हैं प्रायः पुकारा सफर, सम्मेलन, visitors, or tourism bureaux, welcome centers, information centers and more.
Regardless of the नाम, ये organizations offer many services to the traveling public.
the नीलगाय or wapiti ( cervus canadensis ) is एक of the largest प्रजाति of deer in the world, and one of the largest land mammals in North America and eastern Asia.
It was long believed to be a subspecies of the European red deer ( Cervus elaphus ), लकिन प्रमाण इससे a 2004 पढ़ाई of the mitochondrial DNA indicates that the two are distinct species.
This animal should not be confused with the larger moose ( Alces alces ), to जिससे the नाम `` नीलगाय '' applies in Eurasia.
Apart from the moose, the only other member of the deer परिवार to प्रतिद्वंद्वी the नीलगाय in आकार is the दक्षिण एशियाई sambar ( rusa unicolor ).
Elk range in forest and forest-edge habitat, feeding on grasses, पौधे, पत्ते, and bark.
Although native to North America and eastern Asia, they have adapted well to countries where they have महरूम introduced, सहित अर्जेंटीना, Australia, and New Zealand.
Their great adaptability may threaten endemic species and ecosystems into which they have been introduced.
Male elk have विशाल antlers which are shed each year.
Males also engage in ritualized mating behaviors during the rut, सहित posturing, antler कुश्ती ( sparring ), और bugling, a loud series of vocalizations which establishes dominance over other males and attracts females.
Elk हैं susceptible to a क्रमांक of संक्रामक रोगों, some of which can be transmitted to livestock.
Efforts to eliminate संक्रामक रोगों from elk populations, largely through vaccination, have had mixed success.
Some संस्कृतियों आदर the elk as a spiritual force.
In parts of Asia, antlers and their मखमल हैं प्रयुक्त in traditional medicines.
Elk are hunted as a game species ; the meat is leaner and higher in protein than बीफ or मुर्गा.
The George Washington University ( GW, GWU, or George Washington ) is a व्यापक निजी, coeducational शोध university located in Washington, D.C..
It awards certificates, स्नातक डिग्री, मास्टर्स डिग्री, and PhDs across several dozen disciplines.
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on February 9, 1821 as the columbian कॉलेज in the District of Columbia.
The lion ( Panthera leo ) is one of the four big cats in the genus Panthera and a सदस्य of the family Felidae.
With some males exceeding in weight, it is the second-largest जीना बिल्ली after the tiger.
Wild lions currently मौजूद in sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी और in एशिया ( जहाँ an endangered remnant जनसांख्यिकी resides in Gir Forest National Park in India ) while other types of lions have disappeared from North Africa and Southwest Asia in historic times.
Until the late pleistocene, परिचय 10,000 years ago, the lion was the most widespread large land mammal after humans.
They were found in most of Africa, across Eurasia from western Europe to India, and in the americas इससे the Yukon to Peru.
The lion is a vulnerable species, having देखी a major population decline of 30–50 % over the past two decades in its African range.
Lion populations are untenable outside designated reserves और नेशनल parks.
Although the cause of the decline is नहीं fully समझा, आवास घाटा और विरोध साथ humans are currently the greatest causes of concern.
Within Africa, the West अफ़्रीकी शेर जनसांख्यिकी is particularly endangered.
Lions live for 10–14 years in the wild, while in captivity वे can सजीव longer than 20 सालो.
In the wild, males seldom live longer than 10 years, as injuries sustained इससे continual लड़ साथ प्रतिद्वंद्वी males greatly reduce उनके longevity.
They typically inhabit सवाना and grassland, although they may take to bush and forest.
Lions are unusually सोशल compared to other cats.
A pride of lions consists of related females and offspring and a small number of adult males.
Groups of female lions typically हंट साथ, preying mostly on large ungulates.
Lions are apex and keystone predators, हालांकि वे scavenge as opportunity allows.
While lions do नहीं typically hunt humans, some have been known to do so.
Sleeping mainly during the day, lions are primarily nocturnal, हालांकि bordering on crepuscular in nature.
Highly distinctive, the male lion is easily recognised by its mane, and its फेस is एक of the सबसे widely recognised animal symbols in human culture.
Depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic period, with carvings and paintings from the lascaux और chauvet गुफाएं, through वस्तुतः सब प्राचीन and medieval cultures where they once occurred.
It has been extensively चित्रित in sculptures, in paintings, on national flags, and in contemporary films and literature.
Lions have been kept in menageries चूंकि the समय of the रोमन साम्राज्य, and have been a key species sought for exhibition in zoos over the world since the late 18th century.
Zoos are cooperating worldwide in breeding कार्यक्रम लिये the endangered Asiatic subspecies.
In the इतिहास of वीडियो खेल, the सातवाँ पीढी of consoles is the पिछला generation, and includes consoles released since late by Nintendo, Microsoft, and Sony.
For home consoles, the seventh generation began on 22 नवम्बर 2005 साथ the रिलीज of एक्सबॉक्स 360 और जारी with the release of PlayStation 3 on 11 November 2006, and Wii on 19 November 2006.
Each new console introduced a नई प्रकार of breakthrough in technology.
the एक्सबॉक्स 360 offered खेल rendered natively at hd रिज़ॉल्यूशन, the प्लेस्टेशन 3 offered, in addition to FHD gaming, HD movie playback via a built-in 3D Blu-ray Disc player, and the Wii focused on integrating controllers with movement sensors as well as joysticks.
Joining Nintendo in the motion market, सोनी released the प्लेस्टेशन Move in September 2010.
The प्लेस्टेशन मूव सुविधाएँ motion sensing gaming, similar to that of the Wii.
Microsoft भी joined Sony and Nintendo, with its Kinect.
Unlike the other two systems ( PlayStation 3 and Wii ), Kinect does not use any controllers of कोई sort और makes the उपयोक्ता the `` नियंत्रक. ''
Having sold 8 million units in its first 60 दिनों on the मार्केट, Kinect has claimed the Guinness World Record of being the `` fastest selling consumer electronics device ''.
While the Xbox 360 offers wired परिरक्षक as a स्टैंडअलोन उत्पाद, all PlayStation 3 controllers can be used in wired and wireless configurations.
Starting with handheld consoles, the सातवाँ पीढी began on 21 नवम्बर 2004 साथ the उत्तर अमरीकी introduction of the Nintendo DS as a `` third pillar '', alongside Nintendo 's existing Game Boy Advance and GameCube consoles.
The निन्टेंडो ds ( nds ) सुविधाएँ a टच screen and built-in microphone, and supports wireless IEEE 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards.
Additionally, the revised version of the nds, the dsi, सुविधाएँ दो निर्मित in कैमरे, the ability to download games from the DSi store, and a web browser.
The PlayStation पोर्टेबल, or psp, released बाद the same year on 12 December 2004, followed a different pattern.
It became the first handheld video game console to use an ऑप्टिकल डिस्क स्वरूप, सार्वभौमिक Media Disc ( UMD ), as its primary storage media.
Sony also gave the psp मजबूत multi-media capability, connectivity with the PlayStation 3 and other PSPs, and Internet connectivity.
The Nintendo DS likewise has connectivity to the internet through the Nintendo wi-fi कनेक्शन और निन्टेंडो DS Browser, as well as wireless connectivity to other DS systems and Wii consoles.
Despite high sales numbers for both consoles, PlayStation Portable sales have consistently पिछड़ापन पीछे those of the Nintendo DS ; nevertheless, the PlayStation Portable has the distinction of being the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming system.
Sgt. Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club Band ( often shortened to Sgt. Pepper ) is the आठवीं स्टुडियो एल्बम by अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान band the Beatles.
Released in जून 1967, the एल्बम included songs such as `` With a Little Help from My Friends ``, `` Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds ``, and `` A Day in the Life ``.
Continuing the artistic maturation seen on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ), Sgt. Pepper further departed from the conventional pop rock idiom of the time and incorporated balladry, psychedelic, music हॉल, और symphonic प्रभाव.
During the Sgt. Pepper sessions, the group improved upon the विशेषता of उनके म्यूज़िक 's उत्पादन while exploring experimental recording techniques.
Producer George Martin 's innovative approach included the उपयोग of an ऑर्केस्ट्रा.
Widely acclaimed and imitated, the album cover, designed by English pop artists Peter Blake and Jann Haworth, was inspired by a sketch by Paul McCartney that depicted the band posing in front of a कोलाज of कुछ of उनके favourite celebrities.
Sgt. Pepper was a worldwide critical and वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, बिता 27 सप्ताह at the शीर्ष of the UK Album Chart and 15 weeks at number one on the US Billboard 200.
A seminal work in the emerging psychedelic rock style, the album was critically acclaimed upon रिलीज और जीती four Grammy Awards in 1968.
साथ an अनुमानित 32 लाख नक़ल sold, it is one of the world 's best selling albums.
Sgt. Pepper is considered by many to be the most influential और प्रसिद्ध चट्टान एल्बम कभी, और has been named the greatest album of all time by both All Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone.
The temporal lobe is a region of the cerebral cortex that is located beneath the पार्श्ववर्ती फिशर on दोनो दिमागी बांटती of the mammalian brain.
The temporal lobes are शामिल in the स्तंभन of विज़ुअल यादें, processing sensory input, comprehending language, storing new memories, emotion, and deriving meaning.
The human lungs are the अंगों of respiration in humans.
इंसानो have two lungs, a right lung and a left lung.
The right lung consists of three lobes while the left lung is slightly smaller consisting of तभी दो निर्मोक ( the बाएँ फेफड़ों रै a `` हृदय पायदान '' allowing space for the heart within the chest ).
Together, the lungs contain approximately of airways and 300 to 500 million alveoli, having a total सतह क्षेत्रफल of परिचय ( ) in वयस्कों — roughly the वही area as one side of a tennis court.
furthermore, if सब of the capillaries कि घेर the alveoli were unwound and laid end to end, they would extend for about.
Each lung weighs, therefore बनाना the संपूर्ण अंग about.
इंसान फेफड़े
The trachea divides into two bronchi ( एक लिये प्रत्येक पक्ष ) at the level of T4.
This जंक्शन is भी known as the carina.
The conducting zone contains the trachea, the bronchi, the bronchioles, and the terminal bronchioles The respiratory zone contains the respiratory bronchioles, the alveolar ducts, and the alveoli.
The conducting zone and the respiratory stuffers ( but not the alveoli ) हैं made up of airways.
The conducting zone has no गैस एक्सचेंज साथ the रक्त, और is reinforced with cartilage in order to hold open the airways.
The conducting zone warms the air to और humidifies the एयर.
It also cleanses the air by निकालना अणु via cilia located on the walls of all the passageways.
The फेफड़े हैं घिरी by the rib cage.
The respiratory zone is the साईट of गैस exchange with blood.
The sympathetic nervous system via noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the बीटा receptors कल्याणकारी bronchodilation.
The parasympathetic nervous system via acetylcholine, which अधिनियमों on the m-3 muscarinic receptors, maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth muscle.
This action is related, although माना distinct from bronchoconstriction.
Many other non-autonomic nervous and biochemical stimuli, including carbon dioxide and oxygen, हैं भी शामिल in the विनियमन process.
The pleural cavity is the potential space between the parietal pleura, lining the inner wall of the thoracic पिंजरा, और the visceral pleura lining the lungs.
The lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer solely to alveolar tissue साथ respiratory bronchioles, alveolar नलिकाएं और terminal bronchioles.
However, it often includes any form of lung tissue, भी सहित bronchioles, bronchi, blood vessels and lung interstitium.
The margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of टकीला मिश्रित साथ cointreau or समान नारंगी -flavoured liqueur and lime or lemon juice, often served with salt on the glass rim.
It is the most common tequila-based कॉकटेल in the United States.
The drink is served shaken with ice ( on the rocks ), blended with बर्फ ( frozen मार्गरिटा ), or without ice ( straight up ).
Two bottles of red Burgundy wine from gevrey-chambertin, Côtes de Nuits
Burgundy is a dark red color associated with the Burgundy wine of the same name, which in turn is नामित बाद the बरगंडी प्रदेश of France.
the रंग बरगंडी is similar to other shades of dark red such as maroon.
When referring to the color, `` burgundy '' is usually not capitalized.
The first recorded use of `` burgundy '' as a color name in अंग्रेज़ी was in 1881.

लापता in कार्रवाई ( मिया ) is a casualty Category assigned under the Status of Missing to armed services personnel who are reported missing during active service.
They may have been मारे, wounded, become a prisoner of war, or deserted.
If deceased, neither their remains nor grave can be positively पहचाना.
Becoming MIA has been an occupational risk for service personnel for as long as वहीँ has been warfare.

This building is the original jail, निर्मित along with the Historic Courthouse.
Both sit on the कस्बा Square.

First Baptist Church at 117 Cora Street in Center is located next to the शहर खण्ड.
First Christian Church at 124 Cora Street in बीच is एक of the oldest congregations in the community.
Center is a नगर in शेल्बी County, Texas, United States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,193 at the 2010 census.
It is the काउंटी seat of Shelby County.
It is named for its location near the center of Shelby County, not for its location in Texas as it is located निकट the louisiana किनारा.
Intense red-eye प्रभाव in ब्लू आँखें with dilated pupil
The red-eye प्रभाव in छायाचित्र is the common appearance of red pupils in color photographs of eyes.
It occurs when using a photographic flash very close to the camera lens ( as साथ सबसे कॉम्पैक्ट cameras ), in ambient low light.
the प्रभाव appears in the eyes of humans and animals that have tapetum lucidum.
Theatrical followspot operators, positioned nearly coincidentally with a बहुत उज्जवल लाइट और somewhat distant from the actors, occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage.
The effect is not visible to the rest of the audience because it is reliant on the बहुत छोटी कोण between the followspot operator and the light.
The University of California, Santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as uc सांता बारबरा or ucsb ) is a पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों and one of the ten general campuses of the University of California system.
The main campus is located on a site in Goleta, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त राज्य, from Santa Barbara and northwest of Los Angeles.
Tracing its जड़ें वापस to 1891 as an स्वतंत्र शिक्षक ' कॉलेज, UCSB joined the University of California system in 1944 and is the third-oldest general-education campus in the system.
UCSB is one of America 's Public Ivy universities, which recognizes top पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों in the United States.
The विश्वविद्यालयों is a व्यापक doctoral university and is organized into five colleges and schools offering 87 undergraduate degrees and 55 graduate degrees.
The campus is the 6th-largest in the UC system by enrollment with 18,977 undergraduate और 2,950 graduate students.
In 2012, UCSB was ranked 41st among `` National Universities '' and 10th among public universities by U.S. News & संसार रपट.
The university was also ranked 35th worldwide by the Times Higher Education World University rankings और 34th विश्वव्यापी ( 6th विश्वव्यापी लिये अभियान्त्रिकी ) by the Academic Ranking of World Universities in 2012. < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is a `` very high activity '' research university and spent $ 191.2 million on research expenditures in the 2007 फिस्कल साल, 97th-largest in the संयुक्त States.
UCSB houses twelve national research centers, including the प्रसिद्ध kavli संस्थान for Theoretical Physics.
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates, one Fields Medalist, 29 members of the National Academy of Sciences, 27 members of the National Academy of Engineering, and 31 members of the अमरीकी अकादमी of कला and Sciences.
UCSB was the No. 3 मेजबान on the arpanet और थी निर्वाचित to the Association of American Universities in 1995.
The UC सांता बारबरा gauchos compete in the NCAA Division I Big West Conference.
The Gauchos have won NCAA national championships in मेन 's सॉकर and men 's water polo.
Saint Joseph with the Infant यीशु by guido reni
Saint Joseph 's Day, March 19, the Feast of St. Joseph is in Western Christianity the प्रिंसिपल feast दिन of संत जोसेफ, जीवनसाथी of the Blessed Virgin Mary.
He is also the step-father of यीशु of नासरत /Jesus Christ.
It has the rank of a solemnity in the Roman Catholic Church ; Catholics who follow the Missal of 1962 celebrate it as a first class feast.
Previous to 1962 it was मनाये as a feast of the रैंक of double of the first class.
It is a feast or commemoration in the प्रांतों of the anglican नियाज़, और a feast or festival in the Lutheran Church.
Saint Joseph 's Day is the Patronal Feast day for Poland as well as लिये कनाडा, व्यक्तियों नामित Joseph, Josephine, etc., for religious institutes, schools and parishes bearing his name, and for carpenters.
It is भी Father 's Day in some Catholic countries, mainly Spain, Portugal, and Italy.
कूच 19 थी समर्पित to संत जोसेफ in several Western calendars by the tenth century, and this custom was established in Rome by 1479.
Pope St. Pius V extended its use to the संपूर्ण रोमन रीति by उसके Apostolic Constitution Quo Primum ( July 14, 1570 ).
Since 1969, Episcopal Conferences may, if they wish, ट्रांसफ़र it to a तिथि बाहर lent.
Between 1870 and 1955, a feast was celebrated in honor of St. Joseph as Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary and Patron of the Universal Church, the latter शीर्षक having महरूम दिए to him by Pope Pius IX.
Originally celebrated on the तीसरा संडे after Easter with an octave, after Divino Afflatu of St. Pius X ( see Reform of the Roman Breviary by Pope Pius X ), it was moved to the preceding Wednesday.
The feast was also retitled the solemnity of Saint Joseph.
This जश्न और इसके accompanying अष्टक was abolished during the modernisation and simplification of rubrics under Pope Pius XII in 1955.
It is still maintained by Catholics who follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals.
As the traditional holiday of the Apostles Ss. Philip और जेम्स, may 1, था धुंधली इससे the memory of most Catholics by the mid-twentieth century, that of Joseph the Worker was created in order to coincide with the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries.
The feast of Ss. फिलिप and James, which had been celebrated on that date since the sixth century, was moved from its traditional place.
In the new calendar published in 1969, the feast, which at one time occupied the highest possible rank in the Church calendar, was reduced to an optional Memorial, the न्यूनतम रैंक लिये a संत 's day.
The Eastern Orthodox Church celebrates संत जोसेफ on the Sunday after Christmas.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an American सिंगर, songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, actress, and philanthropist.
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola, कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और शाखित four consecutive number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 और कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव ( 1991 ), म्यूज़िक बक्सा ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second सिंगल `` एक मीठी दिन ``, a duet साथ बॉयज ii मेन, खर्च a रिकार्ड सोलह weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history.
During the recording of the album, Carey began to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings और धीरे traversed into hip hop.
This musical change became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at जिससे समय कैरी had separated from Mottola.
Carey left Columbia in 2000, और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records.
Before the release of her first विशेषता फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ), वो suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor reception, she was bought out of her recording अनुबंध लिये $ 50 लाख, which led to a decline in her career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002, and after an unsuccessful काल, लौटे to the शीर्ष of म्यूज़िक चार्ट with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became her most कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s, and was later named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she थी awarded the `` भेदन प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ Springs International Film Festival, and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two decades, Carey has sold more than 200 million records विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling music artists of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the संसार 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards.
कैरी थी भी named the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000.
According to the Recording Industry Association of अमेरिका, वो is the तीसरा best-selling मादा कलाकार in the United States, with 63.5 million certified albums.
With the रिलीज of `` टच my देह `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained her eighteenth number one single in the United States, more than any other solo artist.
In 2012, कैरी थी क्रमित दूसरी on VH1 's list of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music ''.
Aside from her commercial accomplishments, कैरी रै जीती पाँच ग्रैमी Awards, 17 World Music Awards, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness संसार रिकॉर्ड, वो is famed लिये her five-octave vocal range, power, melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register.
A bumblebee is any member of the मधुमक्खी genus bombus, in the family Apidae.
There are over 250 known species, existing primarily in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध हालांकि वे also occur in South America.
They have been introduced to नई जीलैंड and the Australian state of Tasmania.
bumblebees हैं सोशल कीट कि हैं characterised by black and yellow body hairs, often in bands.
However, some species have orange or red on their लाशें, or may be entirely black.
Another obvious ( but not unique ) characteristic is the soft nature of the hair ( long, branched setae ), पुकारा pile, कि कवर उनके संपूर्ण देह, making them appear and feel fuzzy.
They are best distinguished from similarly large, fuzzy bees by the form of the female hind leg, which is modified to form a corbicula : a shiny concave surface that is bare, but surrounded by a fringe of hairs used to हस्तांतरण पराग ( in समान मधुमक्खियों, the हिन्द लेग is completely बालदार, और पराग दाने हैं wedged into the hairs for transport ).
Like their रिश्तेदारों the मधु मधुमक्खियों, bumblebees feed on nectar and gather pollen to feed their young.
A man openly carrying a handgun in a बर्गर King in Eagle, Colorado.
In the United States, खोलें carry is आशुलिपि terminology for `` openly carrying a firearm in public '', as distinguished from concealed carry, where firearms can not be seen by the casual observer.
The practice of open carry, where gun owners openly carry firearms while they go about their daily कारोबार, रै देखी an बढ़ाएँ in the U.S. in recent years.
This has been marked by a number of organized events intended to बढ़ाएँ the दृश्यता of खोलें carry and public awareness about the practice.
Proponents of open carry point to history and आंकडे, noting कि अपराधियों प्रायः conceal their weapons.
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org, GeorgiaCarry.org and some participants of the फ़्री राज्य प्रोजेक्ट, खोलें carry रै देखी a पुनरुद्धार in recent years, but it is not yet clear if this represents just a short-term trend.
The gun rights community has been मिश्रित in its response.
एलन gottlieb of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA have been cautious in expressing support, while special-interest groups such as the aforementioned OpenCarry.org and GeorgiaCarry.org, and certain national groups such as the Gun Owners of America ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice.
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun control groups such as the ब्रैडी अभियान and the Coalition to Stop Gun Violence.
The Cattenom नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in France.
France produces around तीन quarters of its electricity by nuclear power.
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power संयंत्र in जर्मनी.
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced on May 30, 2011, that Germany’s 17 nuclear power stations will be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following जापानी 's फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय disaster.
Currently, 68 reactors are under construction in 15 देशों.
Nuclear power स्टेशन operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year, हालांकि according to the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009, only five actually came on stream.
As of June 2011, Germany और स्विट्ज़रलैंड हैं phasing-out nuclear power.
As of June 2011, countries such as Australia, Austria, डेनमार्क, यूनानियों, आयरलैंड, इटली, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Malta, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
Color motion picture film refers both to unexposed रंग फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक फिल्मी in a स्वरूप उपयुक्त लिये उपयोग in a गति चित्र camera, and to finished motion picture film, ready for use in a projector, which bears images in color.
The first color cinematography was by अर्थात् of योगात्मक रंग प्रणालियों such as the one patented in England by Edward Raymond Turner in 1899 and tested in 1902.
A simplified additive system was विकसित by जार्ज Albert Smith and successfully commercialized in 1909 as Kinemacolor.
These early systems used black-and-white film to photograph and project two or more component images through अलग रंग filters.
Still from footage recorded by Edward टर्नर in 1902
With the present-day technology, there are two distinct processes : Eastman Color Negative 2 chemistry ( camera negative stocks, duplicating interpositive और internegative स्टॉक्स ) and Eastman Color Positive 2 chemistry ( positive prints for direct projection ), usually abbreviated as ECN-2 and ECP-2.
Fuji 's products are compatible साथ ecn-2 और ecp-2.
Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13, 1980 ) is an American singer-songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, और अभिनेत्री.
Ashanti is most famous for her eponymous debut album, which featured the hit song `` Foolish ``, and sold over 503,000 नक़ल in इसके पहला सप्ताह of रिलीज throughout the U.S. in April 2002.
The album set a Soundscan रिकार्ड as the biggest खोलने सप्ताह sales for a new female artist, outselling debuts by Alicia Keys and Lauryn Hill.
In the same week, she became the first female performer to simultaneously hold the top two places on the Billboard Hot 100 singles chart with `` Foolish '', and `` कया 's luv ? ``
( साथ मोटे Joe ).
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten songs, `` Foolish, '' `` What 's Luv ? '' and `` Always on Time ``, on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट in the वही सप्ताह, होने the पहला स्त्री to accomplish this feat and being second only to the Beatles.
In 2003, the self-titled debut album won Ashanti her पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन R & B album.
As of अप्रैल 1st 2013, ashanti has sold over 27.7 million records worldwide.
Ashanti ended the decade ( 2000–09 ) as the third शीर्ष नई r & b कलाकार पीछे Alicia Keys and Beyoncé.
She also ended the decade at number 38 on the शीर्ष कलाकार of the Decade list.
She is currently on the सूची of the बीस बेहतरीन Selling Music Singles Since 1990 for her single Foolish for selling 7.2 million copies to-date.
Ashanti has an estimated net worth of $ 40 million dollars [ usd ].
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't It मजेदार ( हत्या रिमिक्स ) ``, जिससे पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on बिलबोर्ड Hot 100, which was also in the top 10 chart at the same time as `` Foolish '', `` Always on Time '' ( with Ja Rule ), and `` What 's Luv '' ( with Fat Joe ).
Later that year, she was acclaimed as the `` Princess of hip-hop & r & b '' by उसके लेबल और capped बंद उसके कामयाब debut by winning eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards.
Within seven years of Ashanti 's career, she रै scored 16 शीर्ष 40 hits on the Hot 100.
Ashanti has endorsed numerous उत्पाद सहित Gap, Herbal Essences and Mudd Jeans.
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston, Janet Jackson, Prince, Madonna, Tupac Shakur, Mary J. Blige, Ella Fitzgerald, Smokey रॉबिन्सन, डोना गर्मियाँ, और ब्लू जादू as उसके musical प्रभाव.
Praised as a gifted songwriter by her peers and critics alike, ashanti रै written/co-written the bulk of all her music.
She is currently working on her अपना प्रकाशन कम्पनी हकदार Written Entertainment.
She released her fourth studio album entitled The Declaration on June 3, 2008 and is फिलहाल in the स्टुडियो working on her fifth.
She also performed the दान धुन `` Just Stand Up `` alongside 15 other female singers for the `` Stand Up to Cancer '' live television special which helped raise $ 100 million dollars for cancer research.
The United States Army एयर शक्तियां ( usaaf or aaf ) थी the military aviation arm of the United States of America during and immediately after World War II, and the direct predecessor of the United States Air Force.
The AAF was a component of the United States Army, which in 1942 was divided functionally by executive अनुक्रम into three autonomous forces : the Army Ground Forces, the Services of Supply ( which in 1943 became the Army Service Forces ), and the AAF.
Each of these forces had a commanding general who reported directly to the मुख्य of स्टाफ of the United States Army.
The AAF administered all parts of सैन्य विमानन formerly वितरित among the Army Air Corps, General Headquarters Air Force, and ground forces corps area commanders, and thus became the first air organization of the U.S. Army to control its own installations and support personnel.
In practice, the AAF was वस्तुतः autonomous अंदर the Army.
The peak size of the AAF was over 2.4 लाख मेन और महिलाओं in सेवा और nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944, and 783 domestic bases in December 1943.
by ve दिन it था 1.25 million men stationed overseas and operated from more than 1,600 airfields worldwide.
The Air Corps became the Army Air Forces in June 1941 to provide the air arm a greater autonomy in which to expand अधिक efficiently, और to provide a ढांचा लिये the अतिरिक्त command echelons required by a vastly increased force.
Although other nations already had separate air forces स्वतंत्र of the फौज or नेवी ( ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों royal एयर Force and the German Luftwaffe ), the AAF remained a part of the United States Army until the United States Air Force came into being in September 1947.
However, in its expansion and conduct of the war, the aaf became अधिक than बस an भुजा of the greater organization.
By the end of संसार युद्ध ii the AAF had become virtually an independent service.
By regulation and executive order, the AAF was a subordinate agency of the युद्ध विभाग tasked तभी साथ आयोजन, प्रशिक्षण, और equipping कॉम्बैट units, limited in responsibility to the continental United States, as were the Army Ground Forces and the Army Service Forces.
In reality, Headquarters AAF controlled the conduct of all aspects of the air war in every part of the world, determining air policy and issuing orders without transmitting उन्हें through the मुख्य of स्टाफ.
This `` कंट्रास्ट between सिद्धान्त and fact is... fundamental to an understanding of the AAF. ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of information law that allows for the full or partial disclosure of previously unreleased सूचना और दस्तावेज़ नियंत्रित by the United States government.
The Act defines agency records subject to disclosure, outlines mandatory disclosure procedures और अनुदान nine exemptions to the statute.
It was originally signed into विधि by अध्यक्ष lyndon B. जॉनसन, despite his misgivings, on July 4, 1966 as and went into effect the following year.
The Federal Government 's Freedom of Information Act should not be confused with the different and varying Freedom of सूचना अधिनियमों passed by the individual states.
Many of those state acts may be समान but not identical to the federal act.
The European Union ( EU ) is an economic and political संघ of 27 सदस्य राज्य कि are located primarily in Europe.
The EU operates through a प्रणाली of supranational स्वतंत्र संस्थानों और intergovernmental negotiated decisions by the member states.
Institutions of the EU शामिल the यूरोपीय आयोग, the परिषद of the यूरोपीय संघ, the यूरोपीय परिषद, the Court of Justice of the European Union, the European Central Bank, the Court of Auditors, and the European Parliament.
The European Parliament is elected प्रत्येक पाँच सालो by eu नागरिकों.
The EU 's de facto capital is Brussels.
The EU traces इसके origins इससे the यूरोपीय कोयले और Steel Community ( ECSC ) and the European Economic Community ( EEC ), formed by the Inner Six countries in 1951 and 1958 respectively.
In the intervening years the community और इसके successors have grown in size by the accession of new member states and in power by the addition of policy areas to its remit.
The Maastricht Treaty established the European संघ अंतर्गत इसके वर्तमान name in 1993.
The latest प्रमुख amendment to the संवैधानिक basis of the EU, the Treaty of Lisbon, came into force in 2009.
The EU has developed a single market through a standardised system of laws that लागू in सब सदस्य राज्य.
Within the Schengen Area ( which शामिल 22 eu and 4 non-EU states ) passport controls have been abolished.
EU policies aim to ensure the free movement of people, goods, services, and capital, enact legislation in justice and home affairs, and maintain common policies on व्यापार, कृषि, fisheries and regional development.
A monetary union, the eurozone, थी स्थापित in 1999 और is composed of 17 member states.
Through the Common Foreign and Security नीति the eu रै विकसित a भूमिका in external relations and defence.
स्थाई राजनयिक मिशन have been established around the world.
The EU is represented at the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the WTO, the G8 and the G-20.
With a combined population of over 500 million निवासियों, or 7.3 % of the संसार जनसांख्यिकी, the eu, in 2012, उत्पन्न a नाममात्र सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( GDP ) of 16.584 trillion US dollars, representing approximately 20 % of the global GDP when measured in terms of purchasing power parity, and represents the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world.
The EU was the recipient of the 2012 नोबेल Peace Prize.
The Wales नेशनल रग्बी लीग टोली represent Wales in international rugby league football matches.
Currently the team is seventh in the rlif संसार rankings.
The team were run under the auspices of the Rugby Football League, but an स्वतंत्र देह, Wales Rugby League, now runs the team from Cardiff.
A कुल of तीन Welsh players have been entered into the Rugby League Hall Of Fame.
Similar to many other Welsh national sporting teams, Wales strip रै महरूम primarily red for many years, including now.
however in उनके पिछला संसार कप अभियान in 2000 वे did wear a shirt featuring the Welsh flag, adding a touch of green and white.
The team is ज्ञात as `` the ड्रेगन '' और so the teams logo on the shirt is a red dragon.
The team date back to 1907, making them the third oldest नेशनल पक्ष after England and New Zealand.
And it was a touring New Zealand पक्ष कि वेल्स पहला played against in 1908, winning 9-8 at Aberdare.
Since then Wales have regularly निभाई इंग्लैण्ड, चूंकि 1935 फ़्रांस, as खूब as welcomed the touring Australia and New Zealand teams, although they rarely toured themselves, not playing a match in the Southern Hemisphere until 1975.
For twenty-six years Wales competed विरूद्ध their two biggest rivals, England and France, in the European Nations Cup, winning the trophy four times.
Wales have भी competed in the संसार कप on three occasions, the first time being in 1975.
In 1995 and 2000 they had their most successful tournaments to तिथि, surprisingly बनाना the semi-finals on both occasions before being beaten by England and Australia respectively.
Wales failed to qualify for the 2008 World Cup, being the second highest ranked side not to do so, having lost to Scotland on points difference over two matches.
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the नई सिर कोच और नियुक्त Lee Briers as captain, having played for Wales since 1998.
In recent seasons Wales have taken massive strides under पूर्व खिलाड़ी iestyn हैरिस who has coached Wales to back to back European Cup successes, which culminated in a Four Nations appearance in 2011.
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the फलन of the myocardium ( the दिल मांसपेशी ) लिये कोई reason, usually leading to heart failure ; common symptoms are dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and peripheral edema ( swelling of the legs ).
People with cardiomyopathy are often at risk of dangerous forms of irregular दिल beat and sudden cardiac death.
The most common form of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy.
Fuck in its शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the act of sexual intercourse.
It is an अंग्रेज़ी शब्द कि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
The उत्पत्ति of the word is obscure.
It is प्रायः माना to be first attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
In modern usage, fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a संज्ञा, a verb, an adjective or an adverb.
There are many common phrases जिससे मेक उपयोग of the word, as well as a number of compounds incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Note : this article adopts the U.S. Department of Transportation 's परिभाषा of a यात्री गाडी, to mean a car or truck, used for passengers, excluding buses and trains.
The United States is home to the largest यात्री गाडी मार्केट of any country in the world.
Overall, there were an estimated 254.4 million registered passenger vehicles in the संयुक्त राज्य according to a 2007 बिन्दु study.
This number, along with the average age of vehicles, has increased steadily since 1960, indicating a growing number of vehicles per capita.
The Chinese car market, however, is poised to soon exceed the United States ; by the end of 2012, वहीँ यहूद over 240 लाख cars on the road in China.
The United राज्य is भी घर to तीन विशाल vehicle manufacturers : General Motors, Ford Motor Company and Chrysler, which have historically been referred to as the `` Big Three. ''
Chrysler however is no longer among the top three ; but is number five, behind Toyota and Honda.
The motor car has clearly become an integral part of American जीवन, साथ वाहनों outnumbering licensed drivers.

A medical laboratory or clinical laboratory is a laboratory where tests are done on clinical specimens in order to get information परिचय the स्वास्थ्य of a रोगी as pertaining to the निदान, treatment, and prevention of disease.
In poker, players construct hands of five cards according to predetermined rules, which vary according to जिससे रूपांतर of poker is being played.
These hands are compared using a hand ranking system that is standard across all variants of poker, the player with the highest-ranking हाथ जीतना कि particular deal in most variants of poker.
In some variants, the lowest-ranking hand can win or tie.
These hand rankings are also प्रयुक्त in कुछ अन्य card games, and in poker dice.
The ranking of a particular hand is increased by including multiple cards of the same card rank, by all five cards being from the same suit, or by all पाँच ताश होने of consecutive rank.
The relative रैंकिंग of the विभिन्न हाथ श्रेणी is based on the probability of being randomly dealt such a hand from a well- shuffled deck.
Bruce Randall Hornsby ( born November 23, 1954 ) is an American virtuoso ; a singer, pianist, synthesizer, accordion, and dulcimer खिलाड़ी, और songwriter.
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live performances, Hornsby draws frequently from classical, jazz, bluegrass, folk, Motown, gospel, rock, blues, and jam band musical traditions with his songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained within.
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a number of occasions with industry awards, including the Best New Artist Grammy in 1987 with Bruce hornsby और the दायरा, the बेहतरीन ब्लूग्रास रिकॉर्डिंग ग्रैमी in 1990, and the Best Pop Instrumental Grammy in 1993.
Hornsby has also achieved recognition for his solo albums and performances, his touring band Bruce Hornsby and the Noisemakers, his bluegrass प्रोजेक्ट with Ricky Skaggs and his appearances as a session- and guest-musician.
He also collaborated साथ आभारी मुर्दे और थी a सदस्य of the band from September 1990 to March 1992, playing at over one hundred shows during that period.
Sugarcane plantation in ग्रामीण क्यूबा
Agriculture in Cuba has played an important part in the अर्थव्यवस्था for several hundred years.
Agriculture contributes less than 10 percent to the सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( GDP ), but it employs roughly 20 percent of the working population.
About 30 percent of the country 's land is प्रयुक्त लिये crop cultivation.
the अकुशल agricultural उद्योग in Cuba has led to the need to import large amounts of foods.
Cuba now imports about 80 % of the खाना it rations to the public.
The rationing program accounts for about a third of the food उर्जा the औसत Cuban consumes.
Overall, however, Cuba is dependent on imports for only 16 % of इसके food.

Mega Millions ( initially called The Big Game Mega Millions as the successor of The Big Game ) is an अमरीकी multi-jurisdictional $ 1 लॉटरी खेल.
The first ( The Big Game ) Mega Millions drawing was in 2002 ( see below ).
The minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000, paid in 26 बराबर वार्षिक किश्तों ( जबतक the नकदी विकल्प is चुनी ) ; usually, the jackpot increases when there is no top-prize winner.
However, despite no jackpot winner for the $ 12,000,000 December 18, 2012 आरेखण, the जैकपॉट remained at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be held on December 21.
( See below for information on how the game 's जैकपॉट is वित्तपोषित. )
Reflecting common practice among American lotteries, the जैकपॉट is advertised as a nominal value of annual installments.
A cash value option ( the usual choice ), when chosen by a जैकपॉट winner ( see below ), pays the approximate present value of the installments.
Mega लाखो फिलहाल उपयोग a 5/56 ( श्वेत balls ) plus 1/46 ( the Mega Ball ) double matrix to select its winning numbers.
Each game लागत $ 1.
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( कैलिफ़ोर्निया is the एक्सेप्शन ), वहीँ is an विकल्प, पुकारा Megaplier ( such games are $ 2 each ) where non-jackpot prizes are multiplied by 2, 3, or 4.
the megaplier थी बना उपलब्धियाँ to सब Mega Millions jurisdictions in January 2011 ; it began as a Texas -only option.
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. Eastern time Tuesdays और Fridays, including holidays.
Mega Millions is administered by a consortium of its 12 original lotteries and the drawings are held at wsb-tv in अटलांटा, Georgia.
supervised by the जॉर्जिया लॉटरी.
The largest जैकपॉट in आचमन लाखो, as खूब as in अमरीकी लॉटरी इतिहास, was $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( with a cash option of $ 474,000,000 ) for the March 30, 2012 drawing in which there were three jackpot-winning tickets ; one each in Illinois, Kansas, and Maryland.
All three tickets had been claimed as of April 18, with each set of winners चुनना the cash option.
is a Japanese manga श्रेणी निर्मित by लेखक Tsugumi Ohba and manga artist Takeshi Obata.
The प्रमुख अक्षर is लाइट yagami, a ऊँची स्कूल छात्र जो discovers a supernatural notebook, the `` Death Note '', dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of death ) named Ryuk.
The Death Note grants its user the ability to kill anyone whose name and face they जान, by writing the name in the notebook while picturing their face.
The series centers around लाइट 's attempt to बनाएँ और नियम a world `` cleansed of evil '' as `` God '' using the notebook, and the efforts of a detective known as L to stop him.
Death Note was first serialized in 108 अध्याय by Shueisha in the Japanese manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from December 2003 to May 2006.
The series was also published in tankōbon format in जापानी starting in May 2004 and ending in October 2006 with a total of thirteen volumes.
The दुश्मनी श्रेणी aired in Japan from October 3, 2006, to June 26, 2007.
Composed of 37 एपीसोड, the anime was developed by Madhouse and directed by Tetsuro Araki.
A light novel based on the series, written by Nisio Isin, थी released in जापानी.
Additionally, various video games have been published by कोनामी लिये निन्टेंडो DS.
The series was adapted into live-action films released in जापानी on जून 17, 2006, नवम्बर 3, 2006, and February 2, 2008.
Viz Media licensed the Death Note manga in उत्तर अमेरिका और रै published all the twelve volumes from the series, a 13th volume which serves as a `` reader 's guide '', as well as the light novels.
The एपीसोड इससे the दुश्मनी first appeared in North America as downloadable by IGN.
Viz later licensed the दुश्मनी श्रेणी और it aired on Bionix in Canada and on Cartoon Network in the United States.
The live-action films briefly played in certain North American थिएटर चूंकि 2008.
However, none of the video games have यूँ दूर महरूम published in North America or Europe.
Death Note is one of Weekly Shōnen jumps best-selling manga श्रेणी of all time, with sales over 26.5 million copies.
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a संकुचन of `` सब hallows ' संध्या `` ), भी ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या, is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of countries on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to अनेक विद्वानों, All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals, and festivals of the dead with possible pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
अन्य विद्वानों maintain कि it originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots.
Typical festive Halloween क्रियाएँ शामिल trick-or-treating ( भी ज्ञात as `` guising `` ), उपस्थित वेशभूषा parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
New York City taxicabs during Midtown फटाफट घंटा in Manhattan
The taxicabs of New York City, साथ उनके distinctive yellow paint, are a widely recognized icon of the city.
Taxicabs are operated by private companies and licensed by the नई यॉर्क City Taxi and Limousine Commission ( TLC ).
It also oversees over 40,000 other for-hire vehicles, सहित `` black cars '', commuter vans and ambulettes.
`` Medallion taxis, '' the familiar yellow cabs, are the only vehicles in the नगर permitted to चुनें up यात्री in जवाब to a street hail.
schematic क्रॉस खण्ड of भाग of leaf, xylem shown as red circles at figure 8.
Xylem is one of the two types of transport tissue in vascular plants ( फ्लोएम is the अन्य ).
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is wood, हालांकि it is मिला throughout the संयंत्र.
Its basic function is to transport water, but it also transports कुछ nutrients through the संयंत्र.
U.S. women suffragists demonstrating for the right to vote, February 1913.
Women 's suffrage also known as स्त्री suffrage is the सही of महिलाओं to vote and to run for office.
सीमित मतदान अधिकारों were gained by women in Sweden, Finland and some western U.S. states in the late 19th century.
International organizations were formed to coordinate प्रयत्न, especially the International Council of Women ( 1888 ) and the International Woman Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ).
In 1893, New Zealand, then a self-governing British colony, granted adult women the right to vote और the self-governing अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश of दक्षिण ऑस्ट्रेलिया किया the वही in 1895, but also permitted women to run for office.
Australia federated in 1901, and women acquired the right to vote and stand in federal elections from 1902, though uneven restrictions on Aboriginal महिलाओं मतदान in नेशनल चुनावों यहूद not completely removed until 1962.
The first European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the Grand Duchy of Finland, then part of the Russian Empire, which also produced the world 's पहला मादा सदस्यों of पार्लियामेंट in the 1907 parliamentary elections.
Norway followed, granting full women 's suffrage in 1913.
In most Western countries, women 's suffrage came after World I War I I, with some important late adopters होने फ़्रांस in 1944 और Switzerland in 1971.
Women 's suffrage has generally been recognized after political अभियान to obtain it यहूद waged.
In many countries it was granted before universal suffrage.
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right under the सम्मेलन on the विलोपन of सब फ़ॉर्म of पक्षपात Against Women, adopted by the United Nations in 1979.
The Thirteenth Tale ( 2006 ) by Diane Setterfield is a गोथिक सस्पेंस novel, the author 's first published book.
Jehovah 's Witnesses is a millenarian restorationist Christian denomination with nontrinitarian beliefs distinct from mainstream Christianity.Sources for descriptors : • Millenarian : • Restorationist : • Christian : • denomination : the संगठन रिपोर्ट्स विश्वव्यापी सदस्यता of over 7.78 लाख adherents शामिल in इंजीलवाद, सम्मेलन उपस्थिति of over 12 लाख, and annual Memorial attendance of over 19 million.
They are निर्देशित by the Governing Body of Jehovah 's Witnesses, a group of elders in Brooklyn, New York, that establishes all doctrines.
Jehovah 's Witnesses ' beliefs are based on their interpretations of the Bible and they prefer to उपयोग उनके अपना अनुवाद, the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures.
They believe that the destruction of the present world system at Armageddon is imminent, and that the स्थापना of परमेश्वर 's किंगडम on earth is the only solution for all problems faced by mankind.
The समूह उभरा इससे the बाइबल Student movement —founded in the late 1870s by Charles Taze Russell with the formation of Zion 's Watch Tower Tract Society —with significant organizational and doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford.
The name Jehovah 's witnesses, based on Isaiah 43:10–12, was adopted in 1931 to distinguish themselves from other Bible Student groups and symbolize a ब्रेक साथ the legacy of Russell 's traditions.
Jehovah 's Witnesses are best known for their door-to-door उपदेश, distributing साहित्य such as The Watchtower and Awake !
, and refusing military service and रक्त transfusions.
वे consider उपयोग of the name Jehovah vital for proper worship.
They reject Trinitarianism, inherent अमरत्व of the आत्मा, और hellfire, which they consider to be unscriptural doctrines.
They do not observe Christmas, Easter, birthdays, or other holidays and customs वे consider to have pagan origins incompatible with Christianity.
Adherents commonly refer to उनके देह of मान्यताओं as `` the truth '' and consider themselves to be `` in the truth ''.
They consider secular society to be morally corrupt and under the influence of Satan, and most limit their social बातचीत साथ non-witnesses.
Congregational disciplinary actions include disfellowshipping, their term लिये औपचारिक expulsion और shunning.
Baptized individuals जो formally leave are considered disassociated and are also shunned.
Disfellowshipped and disassociated individuals may आखिरकार be reinstated if deemed repentant.
The religion 's position regarding ईमानदार आपत्ति to सैन्य सेवा और refusal to salute national flags has brought it into conflict with some governments.
Consequently, Jehovah 's Witnesses have been persecuted और उनके क्रियाएँ are banned or restricted in some countries.
Persistent विधिक चुनौतियां by Jehovah 's Witnesses have influenced legislation related to civil rights in several countries.
Last Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972 franco-italian रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by बर्नार्डो bertolucci जिससे portrays a recent American widower who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a young, betrothed Parisian woman.
It stars मार्लोन ब्रैंडो, Maria Schneider, and Jean-Pierre Léaud.
The film 's कच्चा portrayal of यौन violence and emotional turmoil led to international controversy and drew various levels of government censorship.
The mpaa दिया the film an X rating upon release in the United States.
After revisions were बना to the MPAA ratings code, it was classified as an NC-17 in 1997.
mgm released a censored R-rated cut in 1981.
The film has its NC-17 rating for `` some सुस्पष्ट यौन सामग्री. ''
Windows XP is an ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली उत्पादित by microsoft लिये उपयोग on निजी कंप्यूटर, including home and business desktops, laptops and media centers.
First released to computer manufacturers on August 24, 2001, it is the दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय version of Windows, based on installed user base.
The name `` XP '' is short लिये `` अनुभव '', highlighting the enhanced user experience.
Windows XP, the successor to खिड़कियाँ 2000 और Windows ME, was the first consumer-oriented operating system produced by Microsoft to be built on the Windows NT kernel.
Windows XP was released worldwide for retail sale on अक्तूबर 25, 2001, और over 400 लाख नक़ल were in use in January 2006.
It was succeeded by Windows विस्टा in जनवरी 2007.
Direct OEM and retail बिक्री of खिड़कियाँ XP ceased on June 30, 2008.
Microsoft continued to sell Windows XP through उनके प्रणाली बिल्डर ( छोटी OEMs who sell assembled computers ) program until January 31, 2009.
On April 10, 2012, Microsoft reaffirmed that विस्तारित support लिये खिड़कियाँ xp और दफ्तर 2003 होता समाप्त on अप्रैल 8, 2014 and suggested that administrators begin preparing to migrate to a newer OS.
The NT -based versions of Windows, which are programmed in C, C++, and assembly, are known for their improved stability and दक्षता over the 9x संस्करण of microsoft खिड़कियाँ.
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical user interface, a change microsoft प्रचारित as अधिक user-friendly than पिछला संस्करण of Windows.
In an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL hell `` that plagued the past versions of Windows, improved side-by-side assembly technology in Windows XP allows side-by-side installation, registration and servicing of multiple versions of globally साझा software components in full isolation.
It is also the first version of Windows to use product activation to combat illegal copying.
During Windows XP 's development, the प्रोजेक्ट थी codenamed `` whistler '', बाद whistler, अंग्रेजों Columbia, as many Microsoft employees skied at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort.
According to वेब analytics आंकड़ा उत्पन्न by जाल Applications, Windows XP was the most widely used operating system until August 2012, when Windows 7 overtook it.
, खिड़कियाँ xp मार्केट share is at 38.99 %, having decreased almost every month since at least November 2007, the first month for which statistics are publicly available from Net Applications.
`` Por una Cabeza '' is an अर्जेंटाइन टैंगो साथ म्यूज़िक and lyrics written in 1935 by Carlos Gardel and Alfredo Le Pera respectively.
The name is a Spanish horse-racing phrase meaning `` by a सिर '', जिससे refers to a घोड़ा जीतना a race by the length of one head.
The lyrics speak of a बाध्यता horse-track gambler who compares his addiction for horses with his attraction to women.
Alfredo Le Pera was a Brazilian from são पाउलो, a much Italian-influenced area in Brazil, and also the birthplace of Zequinha de Abreu, composer of Tico-Tico no Fubá.
Le Pera and Gardel died in an वायुयान क्रैश in Medellín, ( Colombia ), on June 24, 1935.
Por ऊना cabeza
The tango has चूंकि महरूम performed by numerous tango orchestras.

In the movie Frida ( Salma हायेक, 2002 ), Gardel is heard singing it on a radio.
It is भी कोटेड in David Del Tredici 's `` Good News !
