In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ), the tango is performed by the `` The Tango Project '', who actually appear in the dancing scene starring Al Pacino ( the recording used is available on one of their CD albums ).
John Williams arranged a version of the piece that appears on the एल्बम `` सिनेमा Serenade '' with the violin solo performed by Itzhak Perlman.
Perlman and Williams ( conducting ) have भी performed the piece together in live concerts.
In 2012 a dance version was released by the group `` Da करेरा '' featuring the असली गायन रिकॉर्डिंग by Carlos Gardel.
The baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is one of the देह 's homeostatic mechanisms लिये maintaining blood pressure.
It provides a negative feedback loop in which an elevated blood pressure reflexively causes heart rate to decrease therefore causing blood pressure to decrease ; likewise, decreased रक्त दबाव activates the baroreflex, causing दिल रेट to बढ़ाएँ thus causing an increase in blood pressure.
The system relies on specialized न्यूरॉन्स, ज्ञात as baroreceptors, in the aortic arch, carotid sinuses, and elsewhere to monitor changes in blood pressure and relay them to the brainstem.
Subsequent changes in रक्त दबाव are mediated by the autonomic nervous system.
Atrial natriuretic peptide forms a parallel negative feedback loop in an endocrinological कंट्रास्ट to the renin-angiotensin system.
The Loma Prieta earthquake, also ज्ञात as the भूकंप of '89 और the संसार श्रेणी भूकंप, was a major earthquake that struck the San Francisco Bay Area of California on October 17, 1989, at 5:04 pm local time.
Caused by a slip along the San Andreas Fault, the quake lasted 10–15 सेकेंड और measured 6.9 on दोनो the पल परिमाण स्केल ( surface-wave परिमाण 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale.
The quake killed 63 people throughout उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, घायल 3,757 and left some 3,000–12,000 people homeless.
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up practice for the third game of the 1989 World Series, featuring both of the Bay Area 's Major League Baseball teams, the Oakland Athletics and the San Francisco Giants.
Because of game-related sports coverage, इस थी the पहला प्रमुख भूकंप in the United States to have its initial jolt broadcast live on television.
Pawn in the standard staunton पैटर्न
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most circumstances the weakest piece in the game of chess, historically representing infantry or, more विशेषकर, हथियारबंद peasants or pikemen.
In chess, each player begins the game with eight pawns, one on each square of the rank immediately in front of the other pieces.
( In बीजीय संकेतन, the श्वेत प्यादे start on a2, b2, c2,..., h2, while black pawns start on a7, b7, c7,..., h7. )
Individual प्यादे हैं referred to by the file on which they stand.
For example, one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn '' or `` Black 's b-pawn '', or कम commonly ( using वर्णनात्मक संकेतन ), `` श्वेत 's किंग 's बिशप pawn '' or `` Black 's queen 's knight pawn ''.
It is also common to refer to a rook pawn, meaning any pawn on the a- or h-file, a knight pawn ( on the b- or g-file ), a bishop pawn ( on the c- or f-file ), a महारानी साहूकार ( on the d-file ), a king pawn ( on the e-file ), and a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ).
The military forces of the world have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and lesbian ) and bisexual individuals.
the हथियारबंद शक्तियां of सबसे विकसित देशों have now removed policies excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with strict policies on sexual harassment ).
Nations that permit gay लोगों to serve खुलकर in the सैन्य शामिल the 4 of the 5 members of the UN Security Council ( United States, United Kingdom, France, and Russia ), the Republic of China ( Taiwan ), Australia, Israel, South Africa, Argentina, and all NATO members excluding Turkey.
Hydrogen production is the family of औद्योगिक methods for generating hydrogen.
Currently the प्रबल प्रौद्योगिकी लिये direct production is steam reforming from hydrocarbons.
Many other methods are known सहित electrolysis and thermolysis.
In 2006, the United States was estimated to have a production capacity of 11 million tonnes of hydrogen.
5 million tonnes of hydrogen were consumed on-site in oil refining, and in the उत्पादन of अमोनिया ( haber process ) and methanol ( reduction of carbon monoxide ).
0.4 million tonnes were an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali प्रक्रम.
Hydrogen production is an अनुमानित $ 100 अरब industry.
A basis point ( often denoted as bp, colloquially referred to in the plural as `` bips '', also known as a `` beep '' ) is a unit equal to एक hundredth of a प्रतिशत पाइंट, or एक भाग प्रति टेन हजार, 1/10000.
The same unit is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad, वस्तुतः अर्थ 'for ( प्रत्येक ) असंख्य ( टेन हजार ) ', और in कि कॉन्टेक्स्ट is लिखा साथ जिससे looks like a percent sign ( % ) with two extra zeroes at the end ( like a stylized form of the four zeros in the denominator, although it originates as a natural extension of the percent ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ).
A basis point is पारिभाषित as:
1 basis point = 1 permyriad = one one-hundredth प्रतिशत
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp = 100
Basis points are used as a convenient unit of measurement in contexts where percentage differences of कम than 1 % हैं discussed.
The most आम उदाहरण is ब्याज दरों, जहाँ मतभेद in ब्याज rates of less than 1 % per year are usually meaningful to talk about.
For example, a difference of 0.10 प्रतिशत अंक is समतुल्य to a बदलें of 10 basis points ( e.g. a 4.67 % rate increases by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ).
Like percentage points, basis points avoid the ambiguity between relative and absolute discussions about interest rates by dealing only with the absolute change in numeric value of a rate.
For example, if a report says there has been a `` 1 % increase '' from a 10 % interest rate, this could refer to an increase either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative, 1 % of 10 % ), or इससे 10 % to 11 % ( निरपेक्ष, 1 % प्लस 10 % ).
If, however, the report says there has been a `` 10 basis point increase '' from a 10 % interest रेट, तब we जान कि the ब्याज रेट of 10 % has increased by 0.10 % ( the absolute change ) to a 10.1 % rate.
It is common practice in the financial industry to use basis points to denote a rate change in a वित्तीय यंत्र, or the अंतर ( स्प्रेड ) between दो ब्याज rates, including the yields of fixed-income securities.
Since certain loans and bonds may commonly be quoted in relation to some index or underlying security, they will प्रायः be कोटेड as a स्प्रेड over ( or under ) the index.
For example, a loan that bears interest of 0.50 % per annum above the London Interbank Offered Rate ( libor ) is कहा to be 50 आधार अंक over libor, जिससे is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps '' or simply `` L+50 ''.
The term `` basis point '' has its origins in trading the `` आधार '' or the स्प्रेड between two interest rates.
Since the basis is usually small, these are quoted multiplied up by 10000, and hence a `` पूरा पाइंट '' गति in the `` आधार '' is a basis point.
Contrast साथ pips in FX forward markets.
The relationship between percentage changes और आधार अंक can be summarized as follows : 1 percentage point change = 100 basis points, and 0.01 percentage points = 1 basis point.
So, a bond whose yield increases इससे 5 % to 5.5 % is said to increase by 50 basis points ; or interest rates that have risen 1 percentage point are said to have increased by 100 basis points.
The अंग्रेजों royal परिवार is the समूह of close relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom.
The term is also commonly applied to the same group of people who are the relations of the monarch in her or his role as sovereign of any of the other Commonwealth realms, thus sometimes at variance with official national terms for the family.
Members of the Royal Family belong to, either by birth or marriage, the House of विंडसर, चूंकि 1917, जब जार्ज v बदला the name of the royal house from Saxe-Coburg and Gotha.
This decision was primarily taken because ब्रिटेन और उसके साम्राज्य यहूद at युद्ध साथ जर्मनी और given the British Royal Family 's strong German ancestry ; it was felt that its public image could be improved by choosing a more British house name.
The new name chosen, Windsor, had absolutely no connection अन्य than as the नाम of the किला जिससे थी और continues to be a royal residence.
Although in the United Kingdom there is no strict legal or formal definition of who is or is not a member of the Royal Family, and different lists will include different people, those carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( HM ), or Her or His Royal Highness ( HRH ) are always considered members, which usually results in the application of the term to the monarch, the consort of the monarch, the widowed consorts of previous monarchs, the children of the monarch and previous monarchs, the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and previous monarchs, and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons.
On 30 November 1917, King George v जारी अक्षर Patent defining who are members of the Royal Family ; the text of the notice from the London Gazette is as follows:
In 1996, Her Majesty The Queen modified these Letters पेटेंट, as was evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a title and a style borne by members of the Royal Family to अतिरिक्त व्यक्तियों to be born, evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
Members and रिश्तेदारों of the अंग्रेजों royal परिवार historically represented the monarch in विभिन्न places throughout the British Empire, sometimes for extended periods as viceroys, or for specific ceremonies or events.
Today, they often perform ceremonial and social duties throughout the United Kingdom and abroad on निमित्त of the संयुक्त Kingdom.
Aside from the monarch, their only constitutional role in the affairs of government is to serve, if eligible and when appointed by letters patent, as a Counsellor of State, two or more of whom exercise the authority of the क्राउन ( भीतर stipulated हद ) in the indisposal or absence from the British realm of the monarch.
In the other realms of the राष्ट्रमंडल रॉयल्टी do not serve as Counsellors of State.
However in each such realm the monarch 's family members may act on निमित्त of, हैं वित्तपोषित by, और represent the sovereign of that particular state, and not the United Kingdom.
The Queen, her consort, her children and grandchildren, as well as all former अधिपति ' children और grandchildren थाम स्थान in the first sections of the official orders of precedence in England and Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland.
Wives of the said enjoy their husbands ' precedence, and husbands of princesses are unofficially लकिन habitually placed with their wives as well.
However, the Queen changed the private order of precedence in the Royal Family in favour of Princesses Anne and Alexandra, who henceforth लो निजी पूर्वता over the duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, जो is otherwise the realm 's highest ranking woman after the Queen herself.
She did not alter the relative precedence of other born-princesses, ऐसे as the daughters of her younger sons.
Haiti ( ; Haitian Creole Ayiti ), officially the गणतंत्र of हैती ( ; ), is a Caribbean country.
It occupies the western, smaller portion of the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला, in the Greater Antillean archipelago, which it shares with the Dominican Republic.
Ayiti ( land of high mountains ) was the स्वदेशी Taíno or Amerindian name for the island.
The country 's highest पाइंट is pic la Selle, at.
The total area of Haiti is और इसके पूंजी is Port-au-Prince.
Haitian क्रियोल और फ्रेंच हैं the official languages.
Haiti 's regional, historical, and ethno-linguistic स्थिति is अद्वितीय लिये अनेक कारण.
It was the पहला स्वतंत्र स्वदेश of लैटिन अमेरिका और the Caribbean, the first black -led republic in the world, and the second republic in the Americas when it gained independence in 1804 as part of a successful slave revolution lasting nearly a decade.
In 2012, Haiti announced its intention to seek associate सदस्यता औकात in the African Union.
Haiti is the सबसे populous of the predominantly Francophone independent nations in the Americas.
It is one of only two independent nations in the americas ( साथ साथ कनाडा ) to designate फ्रेंच as an आधिकारिक language ; the other French-speaking areas are all overseas départements, or collectivités, of France.
Haiti is the most populous full member-state of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ).
It is the poorest देश in the Americas as measured by the Human Development Index.
Political violence रै occurred regularly throughout its history, leading to government instability.
Most recently, in February 2004, a coup d'état originating in the उत्तर of the देश मजबूर the resignation and exile of President Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
A provisional government took control with security provided by the United Nations Stabilization Mission in हैती ( MINUSTAH ).
Michel martelly, the वर्तमान president, was elected in the Haitian general election, 2011.
The island has था a इतिहास of destructive earthquakes.
a 7.0 परिमाण भूकंप struck Haiti on 12 January 2010 and devastated Port-au-Prince.
The highest reliable मौत गिनती थी अनुमानित at 220,000.
haitian सरकारी estimates were higher.
The Presidential राजमहल, पार्लियामेंट और अनेक अन्य महत्वपूर्ण structures यहूद नष्ट, साथ with countless homes and businesses, leaving hundreds of thousands of people homeless.
The country has yet to recover from the 2010 earthquake ( and subsequent incidents ) due to both the गंभीरता of the क्षति हैती endured in 2010, as खूब as a government that was ineffective well before the earthquake.
United राज्य सहायता संगठन have donated $ 2 billion.
Combined साथ अन्य international donations, these funds are intended to contribute to the rebuilding of the country.
The Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo, the Italian electro house and dance-punk music producer, DJ and photographer.
The Bloody Beetroots is well-known for the black Venom मुखौटा he wears during performances.
In fact, the only identifying पब्लिक विशेषता of rifo is the साल `` 1977 '' tattooed आरपार his chest, which is both the year that the producer and punk-rock was born.
`` The Bloody beetroots dj नियत '' contains Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo and Tommy Tea.
A Motorola Advisor alphanumeric pager used in Brazil in the 1990s, संचालित by Teletrim
A pager is a wireless telecommunications device that receives and displays numeric or text messages, or receives और announces voice messages.
One-way pagers can only receive messages, while response pagers and two-way pagers can also acknowledge, reply to, and originate messages using an internal transmitter.
Pagers operate as part of a paging system which includes one or more fixed transmitters ( or in the case of जवाब pagers और two-way pagers, one or more base stations ), as well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users.
These systems can range from a restaurant system with a single low-power transmitter, to a nationwide system with thousands of high-power base stations.
One of the first practical paging services was शुभारम्भ in 1950 लिये physicians in the New York City area.
Physicians paid US $ 12 per month for the service and carried a ( 6 oz ) पेजर कि होता प्राप्त फोन संदेश within ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower.
The system was manufactured by the reevesound कम्पनी और संचालित by Telanswerphone.
In 1960, John Francis Mitchell combined elements of Motorola 's Walkie Talkie and automobile radio technologies to create the first transistorized pager, and from this point, paging प्रौद्योगिकी जारी to अग्रिम, और पेजर अपनाना जारी to विस्तार, जबतक the जल्दी 1990s.
However, by the mid-1990s, as cellular technologies became cheaper and more widely उपलब्धियाँ, उन्नत सेवाएं began to displace paging as a commercial product.
Today, pagers exist largely as niche products, finding preferential use in applications such as अस्पताल, पब्लिक सुरक्षा, और खुदरा स्थितियाँ जहाँ उनके सादगी, high reliability, and low cost represent significant advantages.
reevesville is a कस्बा in dorchester County, South Carolina, United States.
The population थी 196 at the 2010 census.
As defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget, and used by the U.S. Census Bureau for statistical purposes only, Reevesville is शामिल भीतर the charleston-north charleston-summerville metropolitan area.
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena कार्मेन frieda kahlo y calderón ; जुलाई 6, 1907 – जुलाई 13, 1954 ) was a Mexican painter, born in Coyoacán, who is best known for her self-portraits.
Kahlo 's life began and ended in Mexico City, in her घर ज्ञात as the ब्लू हाउस.
She gave her birth date as जुलाई 7, 1910, लकिन उसके birth certificate shows July 6, 1907.
Kahlo had allegedly wanted the year of her birth to coincide with the year of the beginning of the Mexican revolution so that her life would begin साथ the जनम of आधुनिक मैक्सिको.
Her work has been celebrated in Mexico as emblematic of national and स्वदेशी परंपरा, और by नारीवादी लिये its uncompromising depiction of the female experience and form.
Mexican culture and Amerindian cultural tradition are important in her work, जिससे रै महरूम sometimes characterized as naïve art or folk art.
Her work has also been described as `` surrealist '', and in 1938 André Breton, principal initiator of the surrealist गति, वर्णित Kahlo 's art as a `` ribbon around a bomb ''.
Kahlo had a volatile विवाह with the famous Mexican artist Diego Rivera.
She suffered lifelong स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं.
Many of her health problems were the result of a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना वो बच as a किशोरावस्था.
Recovering from her injuries isolated her from other people and this अलगाव बहकावे उसके works, many of which are self-portraits of one sort or another.
Kahlo सुझाया, `` i पेंट myself because I am so often alone and because I am the subject I know best. ''
वो भी stated, `` I was born a bitch.
I was born a चित्रकार. ''

theresienwiese on the day before Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating बियर आयोजित annually in म्यूनिख, Bavaria, Germany, running from late September to the first weekend in October.
It is one of the most famous events in Germany and is the संसार 's largest मेला, साथ अधिक than 6 million people from around the world attending the event every year.
To the स्थानीय, it is नहीं पुकारा oktoberfest, लकिन `` die Wiesn '', after the colloquial name of the fairgrounds themselves.
The Oktoberfest is an important part of Bavarian संस्कृति, having been held since 1810.
Other cities across the world also hold Oktoberfest celebrations, modeled बाद the असली Munich event.
The Munich Oktoberfest originally took प्लेस दौरान the सोलह दिनों up to, और including, the first Sunday in October.
In 1994, the अनुसूची थी परिवर्धित in जवाब to जर्मनी reunification so that if the first Sunday in October falls on the 1st or 2nd, then the festival would go on until October 3 ( German Unity Day ).
Thus, the festival is now 17 days when the first Sunday is October 2 and 18 days when it is October 1.
In 2010, the पर्व lasted until the first Monday in October, to mark the anniversary of the event.
The festival is held in an area named the Theresienwiese ( field, or meadow, of Therese ), प्रायः पुकारा wiesn लिये छोटी, स्तिथ निकट म्यूनिख 's center.
Large quantities of oktoberfest बियर हैं खपत, with almost 7 million liters served during the 16 day festival in 2007.
Visitors may also enjoy a wide किस्में of परंपरागत खाना ऐसे as hendl ( मुर्गा ), schweinebraten ( रोस्ट पोर्क ), schweinshaxe ( ग्रील्ड ham hock ), Steckerlfisch ( grilled fish on a stick ), Würstl ( sausages ) along with Brezeln ( Pretzel ), Knödel ( potato or bread dumplings ), Käsespätzle ( cheese noodles ), Reiberdatschi ( potato pancakes ), Sauerkraut or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white sausage ).

पहियों of Gouda
Cheese is a जेनेरिक पद लिये a diverse group of milk-based food products.
Cheese is produced in wide-ranging flavors, textures, and forms.
Cheese consists of proteins and fat from milk, usually the मिल्क of गायों, भैंस, goats, or sheep.
It is produced by जामन of the milk protein casein.
Typically, the milk is acidified और जोड of the enzyme rennet causes coagulation.
The solids are अलग and pressed into final form.
Some cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout.
Most cheeses melt at cooking तापमान.
Hundreds of types of cheese इससे विभिन्न countries are produced.
Their styles, textures and flavors depend on the origin of the milk ( including the animal 's diet ), whether they have been pasteurized, the butterfat content, the जीवाणु और मोल्ड, the processing, and aging.
Herbs, spices, or wood smoke may be प्रयुक्त as flavoring agents.
The yellow to red color of many cheeses, such as Red Leicester, is normally formed इससे adding annatto.
For a few cheeses, the milk is curdled by adding acids ऐसे as vinegar or lemon juice.
Most cheeses हैं acidified to a lesser उपाधि by जीवाणु, जिससे turn milk sugars into lactic acid, then the addition of rennet completes the curdling.
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet are उपलब्धियाँ ; सबसे हैं उत्पादित by fermentation of the fungus Mucor miehei, but others have been extracted from various species of the Cynara thistle family.
Cheese is valued for its पोर्टेबिलिटी, long जीवन, और high content of fat, protein, calcium, and phosphorus.
Cheese is more compact and has a longer shelf life than milk, although how long a cheese will keep may depend on the type of cheese ; labels on packets of cheese often claim that a cheese should be consumed within three to पाँच दिनों of खोलने.
Generally बोलना, मुश्किल cheeses पिछला longer than soft cheeses, such as Brie or goat 's milk cheese.
cheesemakers near a dairy region may benefit from fresher, lower-priced milk, and lower shipping costs.
The long storage life of कुछ चीज, विशेषकर if it is encased in a protective rind, allows selling when markets are favorable.
Additional ingredients may be added to some cheeses, ऐसे as ब्लैक मिर्च, लहसुन, chives or cranberries.
A specialist seller of cheese is sometimes ज्ञात as a cheesemonger.
To become an expert in this field, like wine or cooking, requires कुछ औपचारिक शिक्षा और सालो of चख and hands-on experience.
इस स्थिति is typically responsible for all aspects of the cheese inventory ; selecting the cheese menu, purchasing, receiving, storage, and ripening.
Legal citation signals are a set of brief abbreviated phrases or words used to clarify the authority or significance of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition.
Signals सहायता a रीडर जल्दी discern अर्थ or usefulness of a particular reference when the reference itself does not provide adequate information.
सबसे citation सिग्नल हैं placed in front of the citation to which they apply.
For उदाहरण, in the paragraph When writing a legal argument, it is important to refer to primary sources.
To assist readers in locating these sources, it is desirable to use a मानकीकृत citation स्वरूप.
See generally Harvard Law Review Association, the bluebook : a वर्दी System of Citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ).
Note, however, that some courts may require any legal papers that are सुपुर्द to them to conform to a different citation format.
the signal is the phrase `` see generally, '' which indicates that the citation `` The Bluebook : A वर्दी प्रणाली of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ) '' provides सामान्य background information on the topic.
Neil एल्डन आर्मस्ट्रांग ( अगस्त 5, 1930 – August 25, 2012 ) was an American astronaut and the first person to walk on the Moon.
He was also an aerospace engineer, naval aviator, test pilot, and विश्वविद्यालयों professor.
Before becoming an astronaut, Armstrong was an officer in the U.S. Navy and served in the कोरियाई War.
After the war, he earned his bachelor 's degree at Purdue University and served as a test pilot at the National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics high-speed उड़ान स्टेशन, अभी ज्ञात as the ड्राइडेन उड़ान शोध बीच, where he logged over 900 flights.
He later समाप्त ग्रैजुएट अध्ययन at the University of Southern California.
A भागीदार in the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स 's man in स्पेस soonest and X-20 Dyna-Soar human spaceflight programs, Armstrong joined the NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962.
He made his first space flight, as command pilot of Gemini 8, in 1966, बनने नासा 's पहला civilian astronaut to fly in space.
On this mission, he performed the first docking of two spacecraft, साथ पायलट David Scott.
Armstrong 's second and last spaceflight थी as मिशन कमांडर of the Apollo 11 moon landing, in July 1969.
On this मिशन, आर्मस्ट्रांग और बज़ एल्ड्रिन descended to the चंद्र सतह और खर्च two and a half hours exploring, while Michael Collins remained in lunar orbit in the Command Module.
Along with Collins and Aldrin, Armstrong was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by President Richard Nixon ; in 1978, President Jimmy Carter presented आर्मस्ट्रांग the congressional स्पेस पदक of सम्मान in 1978 ; he और उसके former crewmates received the Congressional Gold Medal in 2009.
Armstrong died in Cincinnati, Ohio, on August 25, 2012, at the आयु of 82, बाद complications from coronary artery bypass surgery.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) was an अमरीकी Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the Preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), और the belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today.
He is considered to be एक of the महानतम Thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN क्रमित सचिवालय the 35th बेहतरीन athlete of the 20th century, the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http.
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the शीर्ष 100 u.S. racehorses of the 20th Century.
सचिवालय थी sired by Bold Ruler out of Somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
He was foaled at the मर्ग in कैरोलीन County, Virginia.
Like उसके प्रसिद्ध पूर्ववर्ती man o ' युद्ध, सचिवालय was a large chestnut colt and was given the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, nasrullah, is भी the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew.
स्वामित्व by पैनी chenery, he थी प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte, along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ), and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and white checkered रंगों और उसके दूल्हे थी एडी Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, and weighed, with a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
Madrid (, ) is the पूंजी और largest city of Spain.
The population of the city is roughly 3.3 million and the entire population of the Madrid महानगर क्षेत्रफल is गणना to be around 6.5 million.
It is the third-largest city in the European संघ, बाद लंदन और बर्लिन, और इसके metropolitan area is the third-largest in the European Union after London and Paris.
The city spans a total of.
The city is located on the Manzanares river in the centre of both the country and the Community of Madrid ( which comprises the city of मैड्रिड, इसके conurbation और विस्तारित उपनगरों and villages ) ; this community is bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha.
As the capital city of Spain, seat of सरकारी, और निवास of the स्पेनी monarch, Madrid is also the political, economic and cultural centre of Spain.
The current mayor is Ana botella इससे the People 's Party ( PP ).
The Madrid urban agglomeration has the third-largest GDP in the European Union and its प्रभाव in राजनीती, शिक्षा, entertainment, पर्यावरण, मीडिया, फ़ैशन, विज्ञान, culture, and the arts all contribute to its status as one of the world 's major global cities.
Due to its economic output, high standard of living, and market size, Madrid is considered the major financial centre of Southern Europe and the Iberian Peninsula ; it hosts the head offices of the vast majority of the प्रमुख स्पेनी कंपनियाँ, ऐसे as telefónica, Iberia or Repsol.
Madrid is the most touristic नगर of स्पेन, the fourth-most touristic of the continent, and the seventh most visited city in the world according to Forbes.
Is the 10th most livable city in the world according to Monocle पत्रिका, in इसके 2010 index.
Madrid also ranks among the 12 greenest European cities in 2010. < ref name= '' http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > Madrid is currently a प्रत्याशी नगर लिये the 2020 Summer Olympics.
Madrid घरों the मुख्यालय of the संसार पर्यटन संगठन ( wto ), belonging to the संयुक्त राष्ट्र संगठन ( UN ), the SEGIB, the Organization of Ibero-American States ( OEI ), and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ).
It also hosts major international institutions regulators of Spanish : the Standing Committee of the Association of Spanish Language Academies, headquarters of the royal स्पेनी अकादमी ( rae ), the cervantes संस्थान and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ).
Madrid organizes fairs as FITUR, ARCO, SIMO TCI and the Cibeles Madrid फ़ैशन सप्ताह.
While Madrid possesses a modern infrastructure, it has preserved the look and feel of many of इसके ऐतिहासिक neighbourhoods और गलियों.
Its landmarks include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the Teatro Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen Retiro Park, founded in 1631 ; the 19th-century National Library building ( founded in 1712 ) containing some of Spain 's historical archives ; a large number of National museums, and the Golden Triangle of Art, located along the Paseo del Prado and comprising three art museums : प्राडो संग्रहालय, the museo nacional centro de arte reina sofía, a museum of modern art, and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, which completes the shortcomings of the other two museums.
Cibeles Palace and Fountain have become the monument symbol of the city.
The path of the Via appia और of the Via Appia Traiana.
remains of the Appian Way in Rome, near Quarto Miglio
Near रोम.
The Appian Way ( Latin and Italian : Via Appia ) was one of the earliest और रणनीतिक most important Roman roads of the ancient republic.
It कनेक्ट रोम to brindisi, Apulia, in southeast Italy.
Its महत्व is indicated by its common name, recorded by Statius :
appia teritur regina longarum viarum
`` the Appian way is the queen of the long सड़कें ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus, the Roman censor who began और समाप्त the first section as a military road to the south in 312 BC during the Samnite Wars.
The Draupner wave, a single giant wave measured on New Year 's Day 1995, finally confirmed the अस्तित्व of freak लहरें, जिससे था previously महरूम considered near-mythical
दुष्ट लहरें ( भी ज्ञात as freak लहरें, दानव लहरें, killer waves, extreme waves, and abnormal waves ) are relatively large and spontaneous ocean surface waves that occur far out at sea, and are a threat even to large ships and ocean liners.
In oceanography, वे हैं अधिक precisely defined as waves whose height is more than twice the significant wave height ( SWH ), which is itself defined as the mean of the largest third of waves in a wave record.
Therefore rogue waves are not necessarily the biggest waves found at समुद्र ; वे हैं, बल्कि, surprisingly large waves for a given sea state.
Rogue waves seem not to have a single पृथक कारण, लकिन occur जहाँ शारीरिक कारकों ऐसे as ऊँची हवाएँ और strong currents cause waves to merge to create a single exceptionally large wave.
Electress sophia of हनोवर ( 1630–1714 )
The line of succession to the British throne is the ordered sequence of all those people eligible to succeed to the सिंहासन of the संयुक्त किंगडम और the अन्य 15 राष्ट्रमंडल realms.
The Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed succession on the electress sophia of हनोवर और उसके वंशजों जबकि excluding Roman Catholics.
The British government does नहीं प्रकाशित an आधिकारिक सूची of सब those in लकीर to सफल, but the work of genealogical authors and amateur researchers suggests that there are several thousand people potentially in line.
At a summit in Perth, Western Australia in 2011, the heads of government of all 16 Commonwealth realms agreed to take steps to adopt absolute primogeniture, end the exclusion of लोगों शादीशुदा to रोमन Catholics, and make other changes in the succession rules.
the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार is भी प्रयुक्त to select the Counsellors of State ( and a regent if the need arises ) under the provisions of the Regency Act 1937.
For earlier versions of the line of succession, see History of the अंग्रेजों लकीर of उत्तराधिकार.
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17, 1920July 23, 1966 ) थी an अमरीकी फिल्मी और stage actor The New York Times’ obituary noted his portrayal of `` moody, sensitive young men ''.
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the social climber in George Stevens 's A Place in the Sun, the anguished Catholic priest in Hitchcock 's I कबूल, the doomed नियमित सिपाही रॉबर्ट E. ली prewitt in फ्रेड zinnemann 's From Here to Eternity, and the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's The Young Lions.
Later, after a disfiguring car क्रैश in 1956, and alcohol and prescription drug abuse, he became erratic.
Nevertheless important roles were still his, including `` the reckless, alcoholic, mother-fixated rodeo performer '' in John Huston 's The Misfits, the title role in Huston 's, and the विशेषज्ञता शिविर victim in Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg. ''
Clift प्राप्त चार अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations दौरान उसके career, three for Best Actor and one for Best Supporting Actor.
The War on Terror ( also known as the Global War on Terrorism ) is a term commonly applied to an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान जिससे प्रारंभ as a result of the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States.
This resulted in an international सैन्य अभियान to eliminate al-qaeda and other militant organizations.
The United Kingdom and many other NATO and non-NATO nations participate in the conflict.
The phrase 'War on Terror ' was first used by US President George W. Bush on 20 सितंबर 2001.
The Bush administration and the Western media have since प्रयुक्त the पद to signify a वैश्विक सैन्य, राजनैतिक, lawful, and conceptual struggle—targeting both organizations designated as terrorist and regimes accused of supporting them.
It was typically used साथ a particular फ़ोकस on militant Islamists, al-Qaeda, and other jihadi groups.
Although the term is not officially used by the administration of US President Barack Obama ( which instead uses the term Overseas Contingency Operation ), it is still commonly प्रयुक्त by politicians, in the media and by some aspects of government officially, such as the United States ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal.
German battleship Schleswig-Holstein, westerplatte, सितंबर 1, 1939
Destroyer USS Shaw exploding after her आगे पत्रिका थी detonated during the Attack on Pearl Harbor
The main causes of World War II were nationalistic मुद्दे, अनसुलझे मुद्दे, और resentments resulting इससे संसार War I and the interwar period in Europe, in addition to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s.
The culmination of events that led to the outbreak of युद्ध हैं generally समझा to be the 1939 invasion of Poland by Germany and Soviet Russia and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of China by the Empire of Japan.
These military aggressions were the result of decisions made by the सत्तावादी सत्ताधारी नाजी elite in जर्मनी और by the leadership of the Kwantung Army in Japan.
World युद्ध ii प्रारंभ बाद ये आक्रामक actions were met with an official declaration of war and/or armed resistance.

The Mitsubishi galant is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Mitsubishi Motors between 1969 and 2012.
The name was derived from the French word galant, meaning `` chivalrous ''.
There have been nine distinct generations, and cumulative sales now exceed पाँच million.
It began as a कॉम्पैक्ट सेडान, but over the course of its life has evolved into a larger mid-size car.
आरंभिक उत्पादन थी तभी आधारित in जापानी, लकिन चूंकि 1994 the American market has been served by vehicles assembled at the former Diamond-Star Motors ( DSM ) facility in Normal, Illinois.
Blood pressure ( BP ), sometimes referred to as arterial रक्त दबाव, is the दबाव exerted by circulating blood upon the walls of blood vessels, and is one of the principal vital signs.
When used without further specification, `` रक्त दबाव '' usually refers to the arterial pressure of the systemic circulation.
During each heartbeat, blood pressure varies between a maximum ( systolic ) और a न्यूनतम ( diastolic ) pressure.
The blood दबाव in the परिसंचरण is principally due to the pumping action of the heart.
मतभेद in औसत रक्त pressure are responsible for blood flow from one location to another in the circulation.
The rate of mean blood flow depends on the resistance to flow presented by the blood vessels.
Mean blood pressure decreases as the circulating blood moves away from the दिल through धमनियों and capillaries due to viscous losses of energy.
Mean blood pressure drops over the whole परिसंचरण, हालांकि सबसे of the पतन occurs along the small arteries and arterioles.
Gravity affects blood pressure via hydrostatic forces ( e.g., during standing ) and valves in veins, breathing, and pumping इससे संकुचन of skeletal मांसपेशियां भी influence blood pressure in veins.
Blood pressure without further specification usually refers to the systemic arterial pressure measured at a person 's अपर भुजा और is a माप of the दबाव in the brachial धमनी, the major artery in the upper arm.
A person’s blood pressure is usually expressed in शर्तें of the systolic दबाव over diastolic दबाव and is measured in millimetres of mercury ( mmHg ), for example 120/80.
A veto – लैटिन लिये `` i forbid '' – is the शक्ति ( प्रयुक्त by an अधिकारी of the state, for example ) to unilaterally stop an official action, especially the enactment of legislation.
A veto can be absolute, as for instance in the United Nations Security Council, whose permanent सदस्यों ( चीन, फ़्रांस, रूस, संयुक्त किंगडम, संयुक्त राज्य of America ) can block any resolution.
Or it can be limited, as in the legislative प्रक्रम of the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ a two-thirds vote in both the House and Senate may override a Presidential veto of legislation.
A veto only gives power to stop changes, not to adopt उन्हें ( मगर लिये the विरल `` amendatory veto '' ).
Thus a veto allows its holder to protect the status quo.
The अवधारणा of a वीटो देह originated with the Roman consuls and tribunes.
Either of the two consuls holding office in a given year could ब्लाक a सैन्य or सिविल निर्णय by the other ; any tribune had the power to unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate.
Sulfur dioxide ( भी गंधक dioxide ) is the chemical compound with the formula.
it is a विषाक्त गैस साथ a pungent, irritating smell, that is released by volcanoes and in various industrial processes.
चूंकि कोयले और पेट्रोलियम प्रायः contain sulfur compounds, their combustion generates sulfur dioxide unless the sulfur compounds are removed before burning the fuel.
Further oxidation of SO2, usually in the उपस्थिति of a उत्प्रेरक such as NO2, forms H2SO4, and thus acid rain.
Sulfur dioxide emissions हैं भी a precursor to particulates in the atmosphere.
Both of these impacts are cause for चिंता over the environmental impact of these fuels.
Myasthenia gravis ( from Greek μύς `` muscle '', `` weakness '', and `` serious '' ; abbreviated mg ) is an असंक्राम्य neuromuscular disease leading to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability.
It is an autoimmune disorder, in which weakness is caused by circulating antibodies that block acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular जंक्शन, inhibiting the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions.
myasthenia is treated medically with acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants, and, in selected cases, thymectomy.
The disease incidence is 3–30 cases per million per year and rising as a result of increased जागरूकता.
MG must be विशिष्ट इससे जन्मजात myasthenic syndromes that can present similar symptoms but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments.
परावर्तक मुड़ nematic liquid crystal display.
Polarizing filter film with a लंबवत अक्ष to polarize light as it enters.
Glass substrate with ITO electrodes.
The आकार of ये electrodes होगा determine the shapes that will appear when the LCD is turned ON.
Vertical ridges etched on the सतह are smooth.
मुड़ nematic liquid crystal.
कांच substrate साथ आम एलेक्ट्रोड film ( ITO ) with horizontal ridges to line up with the horizontal filter.
Polarizing filter film with a आड़ा अक्ष to block/pass light.
Reflective surface to भेजें लाइट वापस to viewer.
( In a backlit एलसीडी, इस परत is replaced with a light source. )
A liquid-crystal display ( एलसीडी ) is a चपटा फलक प्रदर्शक, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक विज़ुअल प्रदर्शक, or video display that uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals.
द्रव crystals do not emit light directly.
LCDs are available to display arbitrary images ( as in a general-purpose computer display ) or fixed images which can be displayed or hidden, such as preset शब्द, अंक, और 7-segment प्रदर्शक as in a digital clock.
They use the same basic technology, except that arbitrary images are made up of a विशाल क्रमांक of छोटी पिक्सेल, जबकि अन्य displays have larger elements.
LCDs are प्रयुक्त in a चौड़ी दायरा of अनुप्रयोग सहित कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर, televisions, instrument panels, aircraft cockpit displays, and signage.
They are common in consumer devices such as video players, gaming devices, clocks, watches, calculators, और telephones, and have replaced cathode ray tube ( CRT ) displays in most applications.
They are available in a wider range of स्क्रीन आकार than crt और प्लाज्मा प्रदर्शक, और चूंकि वे do नहीं use phosphors, they do not suffer image burn-in.
LCDs are, however, susceptible to चित्र हठ.
The LCD screen is more energy efficient and can be disposed of more safely than a CRT.
Its low electrical power consumption enables it to be प्रयुक्त in बैटरी -powered electronic equipment.
It is an electronically modulated ऑप्टिकल यंत्र बना up of any number of segments filled with liquid crystals and arrayed in front of a light source ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome.
Liquid crystals यहूद पहला खोजा in 1888.
by 2008, विश्वव्यापी बिक्री of टेलीविज़न with LCD screens exceeded annual sales of CRT units ; the CRT became obsolete for most purposes.
The Borgata Hotel Casino and Spa is a luxury hotel, casino, and spa in Atlantic नगर, New Jersey, United States.
It is owned by Marina District Development, a joint venture between Boyd Gaming और a divesture विश्वास स्थापित by MGM Resorts International.
The $ 1.1 billion casino hotel features 2,002 कक्ष और is the largest होटल in नई Jersey.
The borgata खोली in July 2003 as a Las Vegas-style megaresort and is the top-grossing casino in Atlantic City.
A bottle of high potency b-complex vitamin supplement pills.
A विटामिन ( or ) is an organic compound required by an organism as a vital nutrient in limited amounts.
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of यौगिकों ) is called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from the diet.
Thus, the term is conditional both on the हालातों और on the particular organism.
For example, ascorbic acid ( vitamin C ) is a vitamin for humans, but not for सबसे अन्य पशु, और biotin और विटामिन d हैं required in the human diet only in certain circumstances.
By convention, the term विटामिन शामिल neither अन्य अनिवार्य nutrients, such as dietary minerals, essential fatty acids, or essential amino acids ( which are needed in larger amounts than vitamins ) nor the large number of other nutrients that promote health but are otherwise required less often.
Thirteen vitamins are universally पहचाना at present.
Vitamins are classified by their biological and chemical कार्यकलाप, नहीं उनके structure.
Thus, each `` vitamin '' refers to a क्रमांक of vitamer यौगिकों कि सब show the biological activity associated with a particular vitamin.
Such a set of रसायन is grouped अंतर्गत an alphabetized विटामिन `` जेनेरिक वर्णनकर्ता '' शीर्षक, ऐसे as `` vitamin A ``, which includes the compounds retinal, retinol, and four known carotenoids.
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the क्रियाशील रूप of the विटामिन in the देह, and are sometimes inter-convertible to one another, as well.
Vitamins have विविध biochemical functions.
Some have hormone-like कृत्यों as regulators of खनिज चयापचय ( such as vitamin D ), or regulators of cell and tissue growth and differentiation ( such as some forms of vitamin A ).
Others function as antioxidants ( e.g., vitamin E और sometimes विटामिन C ).
The largest number of vitamins ( such as B complex vitamins ) function as precursors for enzyme cofactors, that help enzymes in their work as catalysts in चयापचय.
In this role, विटामिन may be tightly बंधी to एंजाइमों as भाग of prosthetic समूह : For example, biotin is part of enzymes involved in making fatty acids.
Vitamins may also be less tightly bound to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes, detachable अणुओं कि फलन to carry रासायनिक समूह or electrons between molecules.
For example, folic एसिड may carry मिथाइल, formyl, and methylene groups in the cell.
Although these roles in assisting enzyme-substrate प्रतिक्रियाएँ हैं विटामिन ' best-known function, the other vitamin functions are equally important.
Until the mid-1930s, when the first commercial yeast-extract vitamin B complex and semi-synthetic vitamin C supplement tablets were sold, vitamins were obtained solely through food intake, and changes in diet ( which, for example, could occur दौरान a particular growing ऋतु ) प्रायः greatly altered the प्रकार और amounts of विटामिन ingested.
However, vitamins have been produced as commodity chemicals and made widely उपलब्धियाँ as inexpensive semisynthetic और synthetic-source multivitamin dietary and food supplements and additives, since the middle of the 20th century.
World Muslim population by प्रतिशत ( pew शोध Center, 2009 )
World Muslim जनसांख्यिकी in लाखो
Islam is the world 's दूसरी largest धर्म after Christianity.
According to a 2010 पढ़ाई, islam रै 1.62 अरब adherents, making up over 23 % of the world population.
Islam is the predominant धर्म in the मध्य ईस्ट, in सहेल, in the Horn of Africa and northern Africa, and in some parts of Asia.
Large समुदायों of मुसलमान हैं also found in China, the Balkans, and Russia.
Other parts of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western Europe, for उदाहरण, islam is the second largest religion after Christianity, where it represents 6 % of the total population.
according to the Pew Research Center in 2010 there were 49 Muslim-majority countries.
around 62 % of the world 's Muslims live in South and Southeast Asia, with over 1 billion adherents.
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia, home to 12.7 % of the world 's मुसलमान, followed by पाकिस्तानी ( 11.0 % ), India ( 10.9 % ), and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ).
About 20 % of मुसलमान सजीव in Arab countries.
In the Middle East, the non-Arab countries of तुर्कों और इरान हैं the largest Muslim-majority countries ; in Africa, Egypt and Nigeria have the most populous Muslim communities.
A study conducted by the Pew Research Center in 2010 और released जनवरी 2011 मिला कि वहीँ हैं 1.62 अरब Muslims around the world.
The study found more Muslims in the संयुक्त किंगडम than in Lebanon and more in China than in Syria.
Rhode Island ( or ), officially the State of Rhode Island and Providence बागानों, is a राज्य in the New England region of the United States.
Rhode Island is the smallest in area, the eighth least populous, but the second सबसे densely आबादी of the 50 US states behind New Jersey.
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the वेस्ट और मैसाचुसेट्स to the उत्तर और east, and it shares a water boundary with New York 's Long Island to the southwest.
Rhode Island was the first of the 13 original colonies to declare independence from British rule, declaring itself स्वतंत्र on may 4, 1776, दो महीने पहले कोई अन्य colony.
The State was also the last of the thirteen original colonies to ratify the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
Rhode Island 's official nickname is `` The Ocean State '', a reference to the State 's geography, since rhode द्वीप रै अनेक विशाल bays और inlets कि राशि to about 14 % of its total area.
Its land area is, लकिन इसके कुल क्षेत्रफल is significantly larger.
Dubai ( ; ', ) is a city in the United Arab अमीरात, located within the emirate of the same name.
The emirate of Dubai is located on the southeast coast of the Persian Gulf on the Arabian प्रायद्वीप और is एक of the सात emirates that make up the country.
It has the largest population in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest land territory by क्षेत्रफल ( 4,114 km2 ) बाद Abu Dhabi.
Dubai and Abu Dhabi, the national capital, are the तभी दो अमीरात to have वीटो शक्ति over नाजुक matters of national importance in the country 's legislature.
The city of Dubai is located on the emirate 's उत्तरी तटरेखा और heads up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan area.
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived as a देश or city-state और, in some cases, the UAE as a whole has been described as 'Dubai '.
The earliest जिक्र of दुबई is in 1095 AD, and the earliest recorded settlement in the region dates from 1799.
The Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally established in 1833 by शेख़ maktoum बिन butti al-maktoum जब he persuaded around 800 सदस्यों of his tribe of the Bani Yas, living in what was then the Second Saudi State and now part of Saudi Arabia, to follow him to the Dubai Creek by the Abu Falasa clan of the Bani Yas.
It remained under the tribe 's control when the United Kingdom assumed protection of the Sheikhdom in 1892 and joined the nascent संयुक्त अरब अमीरात upon स्वतंत्रता in 1971 as the देश 's दूसरी अमीर.
Its strategic geographic location made the कस्बा an महत्वपूर्ण trading hub and by the beginning of the 20th century, Dubai was already an important regional port.
Today, Dubai has उभरा as a कॉस्मोपॉलिटन metropolis कि रै grown steadily to become a global city and a business and cultural hub of the Middle East and the Persian Gulf region.
Although Dubai 's economy was historically built on the oil industry, the emirate 's Western-style model of कारोबार ड्राइव इसके अर्थव्यवस्था with the main revenues now coming from tourism, real estate, and financial services.
Dubai has recently आकर्षित संसार attention through many innovative large construction projects and sports events.
The city रै become सांकेतिक लिये इसके skyscrapers और high-rise इमारतें, such as the world 's tallest Burj Khalifa, in addition to ambitious development projects including man-made islands, hotels, and some of the largest shopping malls in the region and the world.
This increased attention has also highlighted मजदूर और human rights issues concerning the city 's largely South Asian paid workforce.
Dubai 's प्रॉपर्टी मार्केट अनुभवी a प्रमुख deterioration in 2008–2009 as a result of the worldwide economic downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008.
However, Dubai has made a steady और क्रमिक रिकवरी साथ help coming from neighboring emirates.
the handful of नई प्रोजेक्ट कि are in the pipeline have been able to help Dubai real estate make a comeback.
As of 2012, Dubai is the 22nd most महंगी नगर in the संसार, और the सबसे expensive city in the Middle East, surpassing Israel 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ).
Dubai has also been rated as one of the best places to live in the Middle East, including by US American global consulting firm Mercer who rated the city as the best place to live in the Middle East in 2011.

This animation uses Earth science data from a variety of sensors on NASA Earth observing satellites to measure physical oceanography parameters such as समंदर currents, समंदर हवाएँ, sea surface height and sea surface temperature.
An ocean ( ; the World Ocean of classical antiquity ) is a body of saline जल कि composes a विशाल भाग of a ग्रह 's hydrosphere.
In the context of Earth, it refers to एक or सब of the प्रमुख विभाजन of the ग्रह 's संसार Ocean – they are, in descending order of area, the Pacific, Atlantic, Indian, Southern ( Antarctic ), and Arctic Oceans.
the शब्द `` समुद्र `` is प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably with `` ocean '', but strictly speaking a sea is a body of saline water ( possibly a division of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land.
Earth is the तभी ग्रह ज्ञात to have an ocean ( or any large amounts of open liquid water ).
Approximately 72 % of the planet 's surface ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline water that is customarily विभाजित into अनेक प्रिंसिपल oceans and smaller seas, with the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface.
In terms of the जलमंडल of the धरती, the समंदर contains 97 % of the Earth 's water.
Oceanographers have stated that out of 97 %, only 5 % of the ocean as a whole on Earth has been explored.
Because it is the principal component of Earth 's hydrosphere, the world ocean is अभिन्न to सब ज्ञात जीवन, फ़ॉर्म part of the carbon cycle, and influences climate and weather patterns.
The total volume is approximately 1.3 billion cubic किलोमीटर ( 310 million cu mi ) with an average depth of.
It is the habitat of 230,000 known species, although much of the ocean 's depths remain unexplored and it is estimated that over two लाख समुद्री प्रजाति मौजूद.
The origin of Earth 's oceans is still unknown, but oceans are believed to have formed in the Hadean period and may have महरूम the impetus लिये the emergence of life.
extraterrestrial महासागर may be composed of a wide range of elements and compounds.
The only confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial सतह liquids are the lakes of Titan, although there is evidence for the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System.
Early in their geologic histories, मंगल और शुक्र हैं theorized to have had large water oceans.
The Mars ocean hypothesis suggests that nearly a third of the surface of मंगल थी एकबार covered by जल, हालांकि the जल on Mars is no longer oceanic, and a runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus.
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its freezing point, so कि जल might मौजूद in विशाल quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting ice.
अपुष्ट महासागर हैं speculated beneath the surface of many dwarf planets and natural satellites ; notably, the ocean of Europa is believed to have over twice the water volume of Earth.
The Solar System 's gas giant planets are also believed to possess द्रव वायुमंडलीय परतों of yet to be confirmed compositions.
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and exomoons, including surface oceans of liquid water within a circumstellar habitable zone.
Ocean planets are a hypothetical type of planet with a सतह completely covered with liquid.
Elvis Aaron Presley ( January 8, 1935 – अगस्त 16, 1977 ) was an American singer and actor.
A सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक, he is commonly known by the single name Elvis.
One of the most popular musicians of the 20th century, he is प्रायः referred to as the `` King of Rock and Roll '' or `` the King ''.
Born in Tupelo, Mississippi, Presley moved to Memphis, टेनेसी, साथ उसके परिवार at the age of 13.
He began his career there in 1954, working with Sun Records owner Sam Phillips, who wanted to bring the ध्वनि of african-american म्यूज़िक to a wider audience.
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and bassist Bill Black, प्रेस्ली थी the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण popularizer of rockabilly, an uptempo, backbeat -driven fusion of country and rhythm and blues.
RCA Victor acquired his contract in a deal arranged by Colonel Tom पार्कर, who went on to manage the singer for over two decades.
Presley 's first RCA single, `` heartbreak होटल ``, released in जनवरी 1956, was a number-one hit.
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of चट्टान और फेंकें साथ a श्रेणी of network television appearances and chart-topping records.
His energized interpretations of songs, many from African-American sources, and his uninhibited प्रदर्शन स्टाइल बना उसे enormously popular—and controversial.
In November 1956, he made his film डेब्यू in प्रेम Me Tender.
Drafted into military service in 1958, Presley relaunched his recording करियर दो सालो बाद with some of his most commercially successful work.
He staged few concerts however, and guided by Parker, proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to making हॉलीवुड फिल्मों and soundtrack albums, most of them critically derided.
In 1968, after seven years away from the stage, he returned to live performance in a मनाये वापसी टेलीविज़न खास कि led to an विस्तारित लास Vegas concert residency and a string of profitable tours.
In 1973 Presley staged the first कॉन्सर्ट ब्रॉडकास्ट globally via उपग्रह, aloha from Hawaii.
Prescription drug abuse severely deteriorated his health, and he died एकाएक in 1977 at the age of 42.
Presley is regarded as एक of the most important figures of 20th-century popular culture.
He had a versatile voice and unusually चौड़ी कामयाबी encompassing अनेक जाति, सहित country, pop ballads, gospel, and blues.
He is the best-selling solo artist in the history of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक.
Nominated for 14 competitive Grammys, he जीती तीन, और प्राप्त the ग्रैमी आजीवन Achievement Award at age 36.
He has महरूम inducted into multiple music halls of fame.

Root beer is a carbonated, sweetened beverage, originally made using the root of a sassafras plant ( or the bark of a sassafras tree ) as the प्राथमिक स्वाद.
Root beer, popularized in North America, comes in two फ़ॉर्म : alcoholic and soft drink.
The historical root beer was analogous to small beer in कि the प्रक्रम provided a पेय साथ a बहुत low alcohol content.
हालांकि जड़ें हैं प्रयुक्त as the सोर्स of many soft drinks throughout the world, often different names are used.
Fluorescent खनिज emit दृश्य light when exposed to ultraviolet light
Fluorescence is the emission of light by a पदार्थ कि रै अवशोषित लाइट or other electromagnetic radiation.
It is a रूप of luminescence.
In most cases, the emitted light has a longer wavelength, और इसलिए lower energy, than the absorbed radiation.
However, when the absorbed electromagnetic radiation is intense, it is possible for one electron to absorb two photons ; this two-photon absorption can lead to emission of विकिरण having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation.
The emitted radiation may also be of the same wavelength as the absorbed विकिरण, termed `` अनुनाद प्रतिदीप्ति ''.
The most striking examples of प्रतिदीप्ति occur जब the absorbed radiation is in the ultraviolet region of the spectrum, and thus invisible to the human eye, and the emitted light is in the visible region.
Fluorescence has अनेक व्यावहारिक applications, including mineralogy, gemology, chemical sensors ( fluorescence spectroscopy ), fluorescent labelling, dyes, biological detectors, and, most commonly, fluorescent lamps.
Informal logic, intuitively, refers to the principles of logic and logical thought outside of a formal setting.
However, perhaps because of the अनौपचारिक in the शीर्षक, the precise definition of informal logic is a matter of some dispute.
Ralph H. Johnson and J. Anthony Blair define informal logic as `` a branch of logic whose task is to develop non-formal standards, criteria, procedures लिये the विश्लेषण, निर्वचन, मूल्यांकन, criticism and construction of argumentation. ''
This definition reflects what had महरूम अव्यक्त in उनके अभ्यास और कया others were doing in their informal logic texts.
Informal logic is associated with ( informal ) fallacies, नाजुक सोच, the सोच Skills Movement and the interdisciplinary inquiry known as argumentation theory.
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that the label `` informal लॉजिक '' कवर a `` संग्रहण of normative approaches to the पढ़ाई of reasoning in ordinary language that remain closer to the practice of argumentation than formal logic. ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60, with the years of the Great अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
Unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960, with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression began in अगस्त of 1929, जब the संयुक्त States economy first went into an economic recession.
Although the country spent two months with declining GDP, it was not until the Wall Street Crash of October, 1929 that the effects of a declining economy were felt, and a major worldwide economic downturn ensued.
The market crash marked the beginning of a decade of high unemployment, गरीबी, कम profits, अपस्फीति, plunging farm incomes, and lost opportunities for economic growth and personal advancement.
Although its causes are still uncertain and controversial, the net effect was a अचानक और सामान्य घाटा of confidence in the economic future.
The usual explanations include numerous कारकों, विशेषकर ऊँची उपभोक्ता कर्ज़, ill-regulated बाज़ार कि permitted overoptimistic loans by banks and investors, and the lack of high-growth new industries, all interacting to create a downward economic spiral of reduced spending, falling confidence, and lowered production.
Industries that suffered the most included construction, agriculture as dust-bowl conditions persisted in the agricultural heartland, shipping, mining, and logging as well as durable goods जैसे ऑटोमोबाइल और उपकरण कि could be postponed.
The economy reached bottom in the winter of 1932–33 ; तब आए चार सालो of बहुत रैपिड विकास जबतक 1937, जब the मंदी of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment.
The Depression caused major political परिवर्तन in America.
Three years into the depression, Herbert Hoover lost the 1932 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव to Franklin Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide.
Roosevelt 's economic recovery plan, the New Deal, instituted unprecedented programs for relief, recovery and reform, and brought about a प्रमुख realignment of अमरीकी राजनीती.
The Depression also resulted in an increase of करणों of लोगों to अन्य countries for the first time in American history.
For example, some आप्रवासियों गई वापस to उनके देशी देशों, and some native US citizens went to Canada, Australia, and South Africa.
It also resulted in the mass migration of people from badly hit areas in the Great Plains and the South to places such as California और the उत्तर, क्रमशः ( देखिए okies और the ग्रेट माइग्रेशन of African Americans ).
Racial tensions also increased दौरान this time.
By the 1940s immigration had लौटे वापस to सामान्य, और emigration declined.
A well-known example of an emigrant थी फ़्रैंक mccourt, who went to Ireland, as recounted in his book Angela 's Ashes.
The memory of the Depression also shaped modern theories of अर्थशास्त्र और resulted in अनेक परिवर्तन in कैसा the सरकारी dealt साथ आर्थिक downturns, such as the use of stimulus packages, Keynesian economics, and Social Security.
It also shaped modern American literature, resulting in famous novels such as John steinbeck 's `` the अंगूर of प्रकोप `` और `` of Mice and Men ``.
The Great Depression of the 1930s प्रारंभ साथ the भण्डार market crash of October 1929.
Turkey ( ), officially the Republic of Turkey, is a transcontinental country, located mostly on Anatolia in Western एशिया और on ईस्ट thrace in southeastern Europe.
Turkey is bordered by eight countries : Bulgaria to the northwest ; Greece to the west ; Georgia to the पूर्वोत्तर ; अर्मेनिया, इरान और the अज़रबैजानी exclave of nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast.
The Mediterranean Sea is to the south ; the Aegean Sea is to the west ; and the Black Sea is to the north.
The Sea of Marmara, the Bosphorus and the Dardanelles ( which साथ रूप the तुर्की straits ) demarcate the boundary between Thrace and Anatolia ; they also separate Europe and Asia.
तुर्कों 's स्थान at the क्रॉसरोड्स of Europe and Asia makes it a country of significant geostrategic importance.
The country 's official language is Turkish, a Turkic language, which is spoken by approximately 85 % of the जनसांख्यिकी as mother tongue.
The most numerous ethnic group is the Turks, who constitute between 70 % और 75 % of the population according to The World Factbook.
Kurds are the largest ethnic minority and, according to the same source, number around 18 % of the जनसांख्यिकी जबकि अन्य जातीय अल्पसंख्यकों are estimated to be at 7–12 %.
The vast majority of the जनसांख्यिकी is मुस्लिम.
The area now called Turkey has been inhabited since the Paleolithic, including various Ancient Anatolian सभ्यताओं और thracian peoples.
After सिकंदर the ग्रेट 's conquest, the क्षेत्रफल थी hellenized, which continued with the Roman rule and the transition into the Byzantine Empire.
the सलजूक़ turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century, starting the process of Turkification, which was greatly accelerated by the Seljuk victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071.
The Seljuk Sultanate of Rûm ruled Anatolia until the Mongol आक्रमण in 1243, upon which it disintegrated into several small Turkish beyliks.
Starting from the late 13th सदी, the Ottoman beylik united Anatolia and created an empire encompassing much of Southeastern Europe, Western Asia and North Africa.
After the Ottoman साम्राज्य collapsed following its defeat in World War I, parts of it were occupied by the victorious Allies.
A cadre of young military officers, led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his colleagues, organized a successful resistance to the allies ; in 1923 वे स्थापित the आधुनिक गणतंत्र of Turkey, with Atatürk as its first president.
Turkey is a democratic, secular, unitary, संवैधानिक गणतंत्र with a diverse cultural heritage.
Turkey has become increasingly integrated with the West through सदस्यता in संगठनों ऐसे as the परिषद of Europe, NATO, OECD, OSCE and the G-20 major economies.
Turkey began पूरा सदस्यता negotiations साथ the European Union in 2005, having been an associate member of the European Economic Community since 1963 and having joined the EU Customs Union in 1995.
Turkey has also fostered close cultural, political and economic relations with the Middle East, Caucasus, the Turkic states of Central Asia and the African countries through membership in organisations such as the turkic परिषद, संयुक्त प्रशासन of turkic कला और संस्कृति, संगठन of Islamic Cooperation and the Economic Cooperation Organisation.
Turkey 's growing economy and राजनयिक पहलों have led to its recognition as a regional power.
तुर्कों is the संसार 's 17th largest economy by nominal GDP and the 16th largest by purchasing power parity.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, best known as Whoopi Goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, अभिनेत्री, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
Goldberg made her film debut in The Color Purple ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated ब्लैक woman in the Deep South.
She received a nomination for the Academy Award लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री और जीती उसके पहला सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार for her role in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda Mae Brown, a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक Swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री ; इस बना गोल्डबर्ग only the second black woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939.
Notable later films include सिस्टर अधिनियम और सिस्टर अधिनियम 2, the खिलाड़ी, बना in अमेरिका, कैसा स्टेला Got Her Groove Back, Girl, Interrupted and Rat Race.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation, as Terry doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर फ्लैश, और as कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली, as खूब as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
गोल्डबर्ग रै been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards for her work in television.
She was co-producer of the popular game show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004.
She has been the moderator of the daytime talk दिखाएँ the दृश्य चूंकि 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a Tony ( for production, नहीं एक्टिंग ), और an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a British Academy फिल्मी पुरस्कार, चार लोगों 's चुनाव Awards, and has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
She is one of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता who have won an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony Award.
Augusta is a consolidated city in the u.S. राज्य of जॉर्जिया, स्तिथ at the fall line of the Savannah River, at the head of its navigable portion.
As of the 2010 census, the augusta– रिचमंड काउंटी जनसांख्यिकी थी 195,844 नहीं गिनती the unconsolidated cities of Hephzibah and Blythe.
Augusta is the principal city of the Augusta – रिचमंड काउंटी महानगर Statistical Area, which as of 2010 had an estimated population of 556,877, making it both the second-largest city and the second-largest metro area in the state after Atlanta.
It is the 116th-largest city in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Internationally, Augusta is best ज्ञात लिये होस्टिंग The Masters Tournament in golf each spring.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क जिससे contains data.
The नाम is an एक्रोनिम जिससे स्टैंड for `` Compact Disc Read-only memory ``.
Computers can read CD-ROMs, but can not लिखें on उन्हें.
CD-ROMs are popularly प्रयुक्त to वितरित computer software, including video games and multimedia applications, though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced CDs, hold both computer data and audio with the latter capable of being played on a CD player, while आंकड़ा ( ऐसे as तन्त्र or डिजिटल वीडियो ) is तभी usable on a कंप्यूटर ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the तकनीकी मानक that defines the format of CD-ROMs.
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the technical specifications for all CD formats, the Yellow Book, created by सोनी और फिलिप्स, थी the पहला एक्सटेंशन of कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क डिजिटल Audio.
It adapted the स्वरूप to hold any form of data.
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as ब्लैक चीलों पहले 1986, और ज्ञात colloquially as the Hawks ) are a professional ice hockey team based in Chicago, Illinois.
They are सदस्यों of the सेंट्रल प्रभाग of the Western Conference of the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
They have जीती चार स्टेनली कप championships since their founding in 1926, most recently in 2009–10.
The Blackhawks are एक of the Original Six NHL teams, along with the Detroit Red Wings, Montreal Canadiens, Toronto Maple Leafs, Boston Bruins and New York Rangers.
Since the Blackhawks have played their home games at the संयुक्त बीच बाद having खर्च 65 सालो playing at Chicago Stadium.

The violet color is often associated with penance and detachment.
Similar Christian penitential अभ्यास is देखी in अन्य Catholic countries, sometimes associated with mortification of the flesh.
granada, Nicaragua.
Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical year of many Christian denominations, स्थायी लिये a काल of approximately six weeks leading up to Easter Sunday.
In the general Latin-rite and most Western denominations Lent is taken to run from Ash Wednesday to maundy गुरुवार ( पावन Thursday ) morning or to Easter Eve.
In the Catholic Church, Lent lasts until Holy Thursday, while other denominations चलाएं जबतक Easter Eve.
The traditional purpose of Lent is the preparation of the believer through prayer, penance, तौबा, almsgiving, and self-denial.
Its institutional purpose is heightened in the सालाना commemoration of पावन सप्ताह, अंकन the मौत, दफ़न और क़यामत of Jesus, which recalls the events of the Bible when Jesus is crucified on Good Friday, which then culminates in the celebration on Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of Jesus Christ.
During Lent, many of the faithful commit to fasting or giving up निश्चित प्रकार of luxuries as a form of penitence.
The Stations of the Cross, a devotional commemoration of मसीह 's carrying the क्रॉस and of his execution, are often observed.
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant churches remove flowers from their altars, while crucifixes, religious statues, and other विस्तृत धार्मिक प्रतीकों हैं प्रायः रहमत in violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event.
In certain pious Catholic countries, some adherents mark the season with the परंपरागत abstention इससे the खपत of meat.
In some countries, grand धार्मिक जुलूसों और सांस्कृतिक कस्टम हैं observed, और the faithful attempt to visit seven churches during Holy Week in honor of Jesus Christ heading to Mount Calvary.
Lent is traditionally वर्णित as स्थायी लिये चालीस दिनों, in commemoration of the चालीस दिनों जिससे, according to the gospels of Matthew, Mark and Luke, Jesus spent fasting in the desert before the beginning of his public ministry, where he endured temptation by the Devil.
However, different ईसाई denominations गणना the forty days of Lent differently.
In most Western traditions the Sundays are not counted as part of Lent ; thus the period from Ash Wednesday until ईस्टर consists of 40 दिनों जब the sundays हैं excluded.
However in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर Lent is now taken to end on Holy Thursday rather than Easter Eve, and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays, or 44 days in total.
This event, along with its pious customs are observed by Catholics, Lutherans, Methodists, presbyterians, और Anglicans.
