The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी SSR ), which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union.
An explosion and fire released large quantities of radioactive particles into the माहौल, which spread over much of the western USSR and Europe.
The Chernobyl disaster is widely माना to have महरूम the worst नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र दुर्घटना in इतिहास, और is एक of तभी दो वर्गीकृत as a level 7 event on the International Nuclear Event Scale ( the other being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately involved over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles.
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has been disputed, and long-term effects ऐसे as cancers और deformities हैं स्टिल being accounted for.
In grammar, a subject complement is a predicative expression that follows a linking verb ( copula ) and that complements ( completes ) the विषय of the वाक्य by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it.
In the former case, a renaming संज्ञा phrase such as a noun or pronoun is called a predicative nominal.
An adjective following the copula and describing the विषय is पुकारा a predicative adjective.
In either case the predicative complement in effect mirrors the subject.
Subject complements are used with a small class of verbs called linking क्रियाएँ or copula, of which be is the most common.
Since copula are stative verbs, विषय complements हैं नहीं प्रभावित by any action of the verb.
Subject complements are typically not clause वितर्क, nor हैं वे clause adjuncts.
Throughout the fifty-five year इतिहास of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, many significant records have been set.
This page only includes the competitive awards won by विभिन्न artists.
This does not include the various special awards that are presented by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences such as Lifetime Achievement पुरस्कार, trustees पुरस्कार, तकनीकी पुरस्कार or Legend Awards.
The page however does include other non-performance related Grammys ( known as the Craft & Production Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ).
Marshall Bruce Mathers III ( born October 17, 1972 ), better known by his stage name Eminem ( stylized as EMINƎM ) and by उसके alter अहंकार पतला छायादार, is an अमरीकी rapper, रिकार्ड निर्माता, songwriter and actor.
Eminem, along with his solo career, is a member of his group D12, and also one half of the hip hop duo Bad Meets Evil, साथ रॉयस da 5'9 ''.
Eminem is एक of the best-selling artists in the world and is the best-selling artist of the 2000s.
He has been listed and ranked as one of the महानतम कलाकारों of सब समय by अनेक magazines, including Rolling Stone magazine which ranked him 82nd on its list of The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time.
The same magazine declared him The King of हिप हॉप.
Including his work with d12 और Bad Meets Evil, Eminem has achieved ten number-one albums on the Billboard 200.
He has sold more than 100 million records विश्वव्यापी, सहित 42 लाख ट्रैक्स and 49.1 million albums in the United States.
As an भूमिगत rapper एमिनेम released his debut solo album, Infinite in 1996.
The एल्बम थी a critical and commercial failure.
He gained mainstream popularity in 1999 after the release of his major-label डेब्यू एल्बम The Slim Shady LP.
The LP also earned Eminem his first Grammy Award for बेहतरीन Rap Album.
His next two records The Marshall Mathers LP, and The Eminem Show, also won Best Rap Album Grammy पुरस्कार, बनाना एमिनेम the पहला कलाकार to win Best Rap Album for three consecutive LPs.
इस थी followed by another studio release in 2004 titled Encore.
Eminem then went on अंतराल बाद touring in 2005.
He released उसके पहला एल्बम in पाँच years titled Relapse, on May 15, 2009.
In 2010, Eminem released उसके सातवाँ studio album Recovery.
Recovery was an international success and was named the best selling album of 2010 worldwide, joining The Eminem Show, जिससे थी the बेहतरीन विक्रेता of 2002.
Eminem won Grammy Awards for both Relapse and Recovery, giving उसे a कुल of 13 Grammys in his career.
Eminem has opened other ventures, including his own record label Shady Records with his manager पॉल rosenberg.
He also has his own radio channel, Shade 45 on Sirius XM रेडियो.
एमिनेम began an acting career in 2002, when he starred in the hip hop drama film 8 Mile.
He won the Academy Award for Best Original Song, becoming the first रैप कलाकार कभी to जीत the award.
He has also made cameo appearances in The Wash ( 2001 ), मजेदार लोगों ( 2009 ) and the television series Entourage.
The acre is a unit of area used in the imperial and U.S. प्रथागत प्रणालियों.
An acre is about 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – slightly smaller than an American football field.
The acre is no longer commonly used, although a few notable अपवाद शामिल the संयुक्त States, Australia, Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom, though is still used in real estate descriptions ).
It is स्टिल used, to some extent, in Canada.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतीक of the acre is ac, and is defined as 1/640 of a square mile.
the सबसे commonly used acre today is the international acre.
In the United States दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the slightly different US survey acre are in use.
The most common use of the एकड़ is to माप tracts of land.
One international acre is defined as 4046.8564224 square metres.
During the Middle Ages, an acre was the amount of जमीन कि could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen.
Antoine लाव्वाज़्ये 's डिस्कवरी of the विधि of संरक्षण of Mass led to many new findings in the 19th century.
Joseph Proust 's law of definite proportions और जॉन डाल्टन 's atomic theory branched from the discoveries of Antoine Lavoisier.
Lavoisier 's quantitative experiments revealed that combustion involved oxygen rather than what was previously विचार to be phlogiston.
The law of conservation of mass, or principle of mass conservation, states that for any system closed to all transfers of matter and energy ( both of which have mass ), the mass of the system must remain constant over समय, as प्रणाली द्रव्यमान can नहीं बदलें मात्रा if it is not added or removed.
Hence, the मात्रा of द्रव्यमान is `` conserved '' over time.
The law implies that mass can neither be created nor नष्ट, हालांकि it may be rearranged in space, or the entities associated with it may be changed in form, as for example when light or physical work is transformed into particles that contribute the same mass to the system as the light or work had contributed.
The law implies ( requires ) that during any chemical reaction, nuclear reaction, or रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय in an isolated system, the mass of the reactants or starting material must equal the mass of the products.
The concept of mass conservation is widely प्रयुक्त in अनेक फ़ील्ड ऐसे as रसायन, mechanics, and fluid dynamics.
Historically, mass conservation was discovered in chemical reactions by Antoine Lavoisier in the late 18th century, and was of crucial importance in the प्रगति इससे alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry.
The closely related concept of matter conservation was found to hold good in chemistry to such high approximation that it failed तभी लिये the ऊँची energies treated by the later refinements of relativity theory, but otherwise remains useful and sufficiently accurate for most chemical calculations, even in modern practice.
In special relativity, needed for accuracy when large energy transfers between systems is involved, the difference between thermodynamically closed and isolated systems becomes important, since conservation of द्रव्यमान is सख्ती और perfectly upheld तभी लिये so-called पृथक प्रणालियों, i.e. those completely पृथक इससे सब exchanges with the environment.
In this परिस्थिति, the mass-energy equivalence theorem states that mass conservation is equivalent to total energy conservation, which is the first law of thermodynamics.
By contrast, for a thermodynamically closed system ( i.e., one which is closed to exchanges of पदार्थ, लकिन खोलें to exchanges of non-material उर्जा, ऐसे as ऊष्मा और कार्य, with the surroundings ) mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved.
The input or output of non-material energy must change the mass of the system in relativity theory, although the बदलें is प्रायः छोटी, चूंकि अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts of such energy ( by comparison with ordinary experience ) carry only a small amount of mass ( again by ordinary standards of measurement ).
In special relativity, mass is not converted to energy, since energy in all of its forms always retains इसके समतुल्य राशि of द्रव्यमान throughout any transformation or translocation into, or out of, a system.
However, certain types of matter ( a अलग अवधारणा ) may be परिवर्तित to energy, so long as the mass of the system is unchanged in the process.
However, if such energy is removed from प्रणालियों, वे जरूर खोना the mass that is associated with it.
In general relativity, mass ( and energy ) conservation in expanding volumes of स्पेस is a जटिल अवधारणा, विषय to अलग परिभाषाएं, और neither द्रव्यमान nor उर्जा is as सख्ती and simply conserved as is the case in special relativity and in Minkowski space.
For a discussion, see द्रव्यमान in सामान्य relativity.
A pig is any of the पशु in the genus Sus, within the Suidae family of even-toed ungulates.
Pigs include the domestic pig, इसके पूर्वज the wild boar, and several other wild relatives.
Young and छोटी सूअर हैं ज्ञात as piglets.
Pigs are omnivores and are highly social and बुद्धिमान पशु.

A floppy disk, or diskette, is a disk storage medium composed of a disk of thin and लचीली चुम्बकीय भंडार मीडियम, sealed in a आयताकार plastic carrier lined with fabric that removes dust particles.
They are पढ़ा और written by a floppy disk drive ( FDD ).
Floppy disks, initially as media and later in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) sizes, were a ubiquitous form of data भंडार और एक्सचेंज इससे the mid-1970s well into the first decade of the 21st century.
By 2010, computer motherboards were rarely manufactured with floppy drive support ; `` floppies could be used as an external usb ड्राइव, लकिन ``, 8 ``, और non-standard ड्राइव could only be handled by old equipment.
While floppy disk drives still have some limited uses, especially with legacy industrial computer equipment, they have been superseded by data storage methods with much greater capacity, such as USB flash ड्राइव, पोर्टेबल बाह्य मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव, ऑप्टिकल discs, memory cards, and computer networks.
An एनिमेटेड आरेख of a cutter
In baseball, a cutter, or cut fastball, is a type of fastball जिससे ब्रेक थोड़ा toward the पिचर 's दस्ताने पक्ष as it reaches home plate.
This pitch is somewhere between a slider and a fastball, as it is usually thrown faster than a स्लाइडर लकिन साथ अधिक गति than a ठेठ fastball.
Some pitchers use a कटर as a रास्ता to prevent hitters from expecting their regular fastballs.
A common technique used to throw a कटर is to उपयोग a four-seam fastball grip with the baseball set slightly off center in the hand.
When a batter is able to hit a cutter pitch, it often results in soft contact and an easy out, due to the pitch 's movement keeping the ball away from the चमगादड़ 's मीठी स्पॉट.
The cutter is typically 2–5 किमी धीमा than a पिचर 's four-seam fastball.
In 2010, the average pitch classified as a cutter by PITCHf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher थी 88.6 किमी ; the औसत four-seamer was 92.1 mph.
`` What It takes '' is a शक्ति ballad by American hard rock band Aerosmith.
It was written by Steven टायलर, जो पेरी, and Desmond Child.
It was released in 1990 as the तीसरा सिंगल इससे Aerosmith 's critically and commercially successful 1989 album Pump.
In the video The Making of पंप, a & r man John Kalodner described the song as `` a masterpiece ''.
During सजीव प्रदर्शन, टायलर गाती the पहला श्लोक a cappella and belts out one of his signature screams right before the chorus.
The album संस्करण of the सोंग is followed by an untitled hidden track.

Odysseus ( or ; Greek :, ), also ज्ञात by the रोमन नाम ulysses ( ; ), was a legendary Greek king of Ithaca and a hero of Homer 's epic poem the Odyssey.
Odysseus भी plays a कुंजी भूमिका in Homer 's Iliad and other works in that same Epic Cycle.
Husband of Penelope, father of Telemachus, and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea, Odysseus is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके brilliance, छल, और versatility ( polytropos ), और is hence known by the epithet Odysseus the Cunning ( mētis, or `` cunning intelligence `` ).
He is most famous for the ten eventful सालो he took to वापसी घर बाद the decade-long Trojan War and his famous Trojan Horse ploy to capture the city of Troy.
erie is a Statutory Town in Boulder and Weld counties in the U.S. state of Colorado.
the जनसांख्यिकी according to the 2010 census is 18,135 and was recorded as 6,291 at the 2000 census.
The Town of Erie is located just west of I-25 for easy access to I-70, Denver International विमानक्षेत्र और कोलोराडो 's entire Front Range.
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48 वर्गाकार मील, extending from the north side of State Highway 52 south to State Highway 7, and between US 287 on the west and Interstate 25 to the east.
Erie is approximately 35 minutes from Denver International Airport, 25 minutes to डेनवर और 20 मिनट्स इससे बोल्डर.
The Board of Trustees serves as the legislative and governing body of the Town of Erie और is जिम्मेदार लिये establishing कस्बा नीतियों और goals.
The Board has the authority to adopt laws, ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the business of the Town, and by ordinance may डालें into अनुबंध or intergovernmental agreements to furnish, receive services or to provide for cooperative service delivery.
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of Trustees, the Town Administrator is the chief operating and प्रशासनिक अधिकारी of the कस्बा और is जिम्मेदार लिये providing पेशेवर leadership in the administration and execution of policies and objectives formulated by the Board.
The mission of the Erie Police विभाग is to communicate और कार्य साथ the जातियाँ to maintain a safe environment, prevent crime and enforce the law, while protecting the rights of all.
Erie नगरपालिका विमानक्षेत्र ( eik ) is स्वामित्व and operated by the Town of Erie and is strategically located in the Denver-Boulder metropolitan area on Colorado Highway 7, a little over three miles west of Interstate 25.
The main रनवे is कंक्रीट paved and 4,700 feet long.
The is a home वीडियो खेल कंसोल उत्पादित by Sony Computer Entertainment.
It is the successor to the प्लेस्टेशन 2, as part of the PlayStation series.
The PlayStation 3 competes with Microsoft 's Xbox 360 and Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh पीढी of वीडियो खेल consoles.
It was first released on नवम्बर 11, 2006, in Japan, with international markets following shortly thereafter.
The कंसोल थी पहला officially announced at E3 2005.
Originally set for a spring 2006 release date, it was delayed several times until finally hitting stores at the समाप्त of the year.
It was the first और फिलहाल तभी कंसोल to उपयोग blu-ray डिस्क as its primary storage medium.
Major features of the console include its unified online gaming service, the PlayStation Network, and its connectivity with the PlayStation पोर्टेबल और प्लेस्टेशन वीटा, in सितंबर 2009 the अद्यतनीकृत PlayStation 3 Slim, was released.
This Slim is lighter and thinner than the original version, although it lacks प्लेस्टेशन 2 backwards compatibility ( removed on later original models ), but notably featured a re-designed logo and marketing design.
As of November 4, 2012, 70 लाख प्लेस्टेशन 3s have been sold worldwide.
Its successor, PlayStation 4, is set लिये a q4 2013 रिलीज.
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto Dalí i Domènech, 1st Marqués de Dalí de Pubol ( May 11, 1904January 23, 1989 ), ज्ञात as साल्वाडोर dalí ( ), थी a prominent Spanish surrealist painter born in Figueres, Spain.
Dalí was a skilled draftsman, best known लिये the striking और विचित्र images in his surrealist work.
His painterly कौशल हैं प्रायः attributed to the influence of Renaissance masters.
His best-known work, the हठ of मेमोरी, थी समाप्त in 1931.
Dalí 's expansive कलाकारी रंगमंडल included film, sculpture, and photography, in collaboration with a range of artists in a variety of media.
Dalí attributed his `` love of everything that is gilded and excessive, my passion for luxury and my love of oriental clothes '' to a self-styled `` Arab lineage '', claiming कि उसके पूर्वजो यहूद descended from the Moors.
Dalí was highly imaginative, and also enjoyed indulging in असामान्य और वैभवशाली behavior.
His eccentric manner and attention-grabbing public actions sometimes drew more attention than his artwork, to the dismay of those who held his कार्य in ऊँची esteem, और to the जलन of उसके critics.

The humanities are academic disciplines that study human culture, using methods that are primarily analytical, critical, or सट्टे, और having a significant historical element, as distinguished from the mainly empirical approaches of the natural sciences.
The humanities include ancient and modern languages, literature, philosophy, religion, और विज़ुअल और performing कला ऐसे as म्यूज़िक और theatre.
The humanities that are also regarded as social sciences include history, anthropology, area studies, communication studies, सांस्कृतिक अध्ययन, विधि, अर्थशास्त्र और भाषाविज्ञान.
Scholars working in the मानवता हैं sometimes वर्णित as `` humanists ''.
However, that term also describes the philosophical position of मानवतावाद, जिससे कुछ `` antihumanist `` विद्वानों in the humanities reject.
Some secondary schools offer humanities classes, usually consisting of English literature, वैश्विक अध्ययन, और आर्ट.
Human disciplines like history, सांस्कृतिक मानवशास्त्र और मनोविश्लेषण पढ़ाई विषय matters to जिससे the प्रायोगिक method does not apply, and they have access instead to the comparative method and comparative research.
The 2005 Blue Room क्रिसमस Tree
The White House Christmas Tree, also known as the Blue Room Christmas Tree, is the official indoor Christmas tree at the residence of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, the White House.
The first indoor Christmas tree was installed in the White House sometime in the 19th century ( वहीँ हैं varying दावा as to the सटीक साल ) और चूंकि 1961 the पेड़ रै था a प्रसंग मोटिफ at the discretion of the First Lady of the United States.
The अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका ( POTUS ) is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
The president leads the executive branch of the संघीय सरकारी और is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the संयुक्त राज्य in the अध्यक्ष और आरोप उसे साथ the निष्पादन of federal law, alongside the responsibility of appointing federal executive, diplomatic, regulatory, and judicial officers, and concluding treaties with foreign powers, with the advice and consent of the Senate.
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves, और to convene और adjourn either or दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस under extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the संयुक्त राज्य, the शक्ति of the अध्यक्ष और the संघीय government have grown substantially and each modern president, despite possessing no formal legislative powers beyond signing or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The president is अक्सर described as the most powerful person in the world.
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term, and is one of only two nationally निर्वाचित संघीय अधिकारियों, the अन्य होने the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States.
The twenty-second amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone from ever being elected to the presidency for a third full term.
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than once if that person previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष, or acting president, for more than two years of another person 's term as president.
In all, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year terms.
On जनवरी 20, 2009, Barack Obama became the 44th and current president.
On November 6, 2012, he was re-elected और is अनुसूचित to serve until January 20, 2017.
Senses are physiological capacities of जीवों that provide data for perception.
The senses and their operation, classification, and theory are overlapping topics studied by a variety of fields, most notably neuroscience, संज्ञानात्मक मनोविज्ञान ( or संज्ञानात्मक विज्ञान ), और दर्शनशास्त्र of perception.
The nervous system has a विशिष्ट संवेदी system or organ, dedicated to each sense.
Humans have a multitude of senses.
Sight ( ophthalmoception ), hearing ( audioception ), taste ( gustaoception ), महकते ( olfacoception or olfacception ), and touch ( tactioception ) are the five traditionally recognized.
While the ability to detect other stimuli beyond those governed by the परंपरागत होश exists, सहित तापमान ( thermoception ), kinesthetic भाव ( proprioception ), पीड़ा ( nociception ), संतुलन ( equilibrioception ), त्वरण ( kinesthesioception ), and various internal stimuli ( e.g. the different chemoreceptors for detecting salt and carbon dioxide concentrations in the blood ), only a small number of these can safely be classified as separate senses in and of themselves.
What constitutes a भाव is a पदार्थ of some debate, leading to difficulties in defining what exactly a sense is.
Animals also have receptors to sense the संसार around उन्हें, साथ डिग्री of capability varying greatly between species.
Humans have a comparatively weak sense of smell, while some animals may lack एक or अधिक of the परंपरागत पाँच senses.
Some animals may also intake and interpret संवेदी stimuli in very different ways.
Some species of animals are able to sense the world in a way that humans can not, with some species able to sense विद्युत और चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड, and detect water pressure and currents.
मकड़ियों ( अनुक्रम araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that have eight legs and chelicerae with fangs that inject venom.
They are the largest order of arachnids and rank seventh in total species diversity among सब other groups of organisms.
Spiders are found worldwide on every continent except for Antarctica, and have become established in nearly प्रत्येक आवास साथ the exception of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at least 43,678 spider species, and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however, there has been भ्रम भीतर the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as to कैसा सब ये परिवारों चाहिए be classified, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body खण्ड हैं fused into दो tagmata, the cephalothorax और उदर, और joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
Unlike कीट, spiders do not have antennae.
In all except the most primitive group, the mesothelae, मकड़ियों have the सबसे centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of all arthropods, as all their ganglia are fused into one mass in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, spiders have no extensor muscles in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages कि have महरूम परिवर्धित into spinnerets that extrude silk from up to six types of silk glands within their abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in size, shape and the amount of स्टिकी thread used.
It now appears कि the सर्पिल orb वेब may be एक of the earliest फ़ॉर्म, और मकड़ियों that produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about, but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets.
True मकड़ियों have महरूम मिला in carboniferous rocks from, and are very similar to the most primitive surviving order, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of modern spiders, mygalomorphae और araneomorphae, पहला appeared in the Triassic period, before.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, but all other known species are predators, mostly preying on insects and on other spiders, although a few large प्रजाति भी लो पक्षियों और lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid detection, or running it down.
Most detect prey mainly by sensing कंपन, लकिन the क्रियाशील hunters have acute vision, and hunters of the genus Portia show signs of intelligence in their choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, and they liquidize their food by बाढ़ it साथ digestive एंजाइमों और पीस it with the bases of their pedipalps, as they do not have true jaws.
Male spiders पहचानो themselves by a variety of complex courtship rituals to avoid being eaten by the females.
Males of most species survive a few matings, limited mainly by उनके छोटी जीवन spans.
महिलाओं बुनते रेशा egg-cases, each of which may contain hundreds of eggs.
Females of many species care for their young, for example by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing खाना साथ उन्हें.
A minority of species are social, building सांप्रदायिक webs कि may हाउस anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social बर्ताव सीमाएँ इससे precarious toleration, as in the विधवा spiders, to co-operative hunting and food-sharing.
Although most spiders live for at most two years, tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can live up to 25 सालो in captivity.
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans, वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी researching the उपयोग of मकड़ी venom in आयुर्विज्ञान और as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength and elasticity that is superior to that of synthetic materials, and spider रेशा जीनों have महरूम inserted into स्तनधारियों और पौधे to देखिए if ये can be used as silk factories.
As a result of उनके चौड़ी दायरा of व्यवहार, spiders have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing various combinations of patience, cruelty and creative powers.
Grey 's Anatomy is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न चिकित्सा नाटक कि premiered on the अमरीकी प्रसारण Company ( ABC ), as a mid-season replacement on March 27, 2005.
The series has aired nine seasons, और focuses on the fictional lives of surgical interns and residents as they gradually evolve into seasoned doctors, while trying to maintain personal lives.
The show 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes, who serves as an कार्यपालिका निर्माता, साथ साथ बेट्सी beers, Mark Gordon, Krista Vernoff, Rob Corn, Mark Wilding, and Allan Heinberg.
The श्रेणी थी निर्मित to be racially diverse, utilizing a color-blind casting technique.
It is primarily फिल्माया in Los Angeles, California.
The series ' protagonist is Dr. Meredith Grey ( Ellen pompeo ), जो originally is स्वीकृत into the residency program at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital.
Meredith is assigned to work under Dr. Miranda Bailey ( Chandra Wilson ), along with Dr. क्रिस्टीना यांग ( सैंड्रा oh ), dr. जार्ज o'malley ( T. R. Knight ), Dr. Izzie Stevens ( Katherine Heigl ), and Dr. Alex Karev ( Justin Chambers ).
Following O'Malley 's death and Stevens ' departure, the hospital 's merger with Mercy West brings in dr. जैक्सन एवेरी ( जेसी विलियम्स ) and Dr. April Kepner ( Sarah Drew ), in the sixth season.
The surgical wing is primarily supervised by Dr. Richard Webber ( James Pickens, Jr. ), who is eventually replaced by Dr. Derek Shepherd ( पैट्रिक डेम्पसे ), और बाद dr. ओवन हंट ( केविन McKidd ).
Dr. Preston Burke ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the conclusion of the third season, and is replaced by Dr. Erica Hahn ( Brooke Smith ), who leaves the show during the पांचवां ऋतु, और बाद dr. टेडी altman ( किम raver ), जो प्रस्थान at the समाप्त of the आठवीं ऋतु.
introduced in the दूसरी ऋतु is dr. एडीसन Montgomery ( Kate Walsh ), who leaves the show at the end of the third season, in order to launch her own spin-off medical drama Private Practice.
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. Mark Sloan ( Eric Dane ) also enter the show in the दूसरी ऋतु, जबकि the latter मरता in the premiere of the ninth season.
Meredith 's half-sister, dr. lexie धूसर ( Chyler Leigh ), appears from season three and dies at the end of season eight.
Dr. Arizona Robbins ( Jessica Capshaw ) is given series regular status at the शुरूआत of the sixth season.
धूसर 's anatomy is the highest-rated drama in the key 18–49 demographic.
Previously among the overall top-ten रेटेड shows in the संयुक्त राज्य, धूसर 's Anatomy has been well received by critics.
Considered an impact on culture, the series has प्राप्त numerous पुरस्कार, और रै भी महरूम शामिल in various critics ' top ten lists.
The show has produced several specials, as well as distributed all seasons to dvd, और released a collection of merchandise.
In 2012, Grey 's Anatomy was named the fifth-highest revenue earning show, in terms of advertising per half-hour.
On May 11, 2012, the श्रेणी थी renewed for a ninth season, which premiered on September 27, 2012.
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a mental विकार characterized by a विश्लेषण of thought processes and by a deficit of typical emotional responses.
Common symptoms include auditory hallucinations, paranoid or विचित्र delusions, or disorganized वाक and thinking, and it is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction.
The onset of symptoms typically occurs in यंग adulthood, with a global lifetime prevalence of about 0.3–0.7 %.
Diagnosis is based on observed behavior and the रोगी 's reported experiences.
Genetics, early environment, neurobiology, and psychological and social प्रक्रियाओं appear to be महत्वपूर्ण contributory कारकों ; some recreational and prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms.
Current research is focused on the role of neurobiology, हालांकि no सिंगल isolated organic cause has been found.
The many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate about whether the diagnosis represents a सिंगल विकार or a number of discrete syndromes.
Despite the etymology of the term from the यूनानी जड़ें skhizein ( σχίζειν, `` to विभाजित '' ) और phrēn, phren- ( φρήν, φρεν- ; `` mind '' ), schizophrenia does not imply a `` split personality '', or `` multiple personality disorder '' ( which is known these days as dissociative identity disorder ) —a condition with which it is often confused in public perception.
Rather, the पद अर्थात् a `` splitting of mental functions '', because of the symptomatic presentation of the illness.
The mainstay of treatment is antipsychotic दवा, जिससे primarily दबा dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity.
Psychotherapy and vocational and social पुनर्वास हैं भी महत्वपूर्ण in treatment.
In more serious cases—where there is risk to self and others— involuntary hospitalization may be जरुरी, हालांकि hospital stays are now shorter and less frequent than they once were.
The disorder is thought mainly to affect संज्ञान, लकिन it भी usually contributes to chronic problems with behavior and emotion.
People with schizophrenia are likely to have additional ( comorbid ) conditions, including major depression and anxiety disorders ; the lifetime occurrence of पदार्थ use disorder is almost 50 %.
Social समस्याएं, ऐसे as long-term unemployment, poverty, and homelessness are common.
The average life expectancy of लोगों साथ the विकार is 12 to 15 सालो कम than those बगैर, the result of increased physical health problems and a higher suicide rate ( about 5 % ).
Paul Leslie Snider ( April 15, 1951–August 14, 1980 ) was the estranged husband और मैनेजर of प्लेबॉय मॉडल डोरोथी stratten, whom he murdered before killing himself the same day.
The Epic of Gilgamesh, an एपिक कविता इससे मेसोपोटामिया, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems परिचय 'bilgamesh ' ( sumerian लिये gilgamesh ), king of Uruk.
Four of ये यहूद प्रयुक्त as सोर्स material for a combined epic in Akkadian.
This first combined epic, ज्ञात as the `` बूढ़ा babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th century BC and is titled after its incipit, Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have survived.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th centuries BC and bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` he who Saw the Deep '' ).
Fragments of approximately two thirds of इस longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
Some of the बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
The story centers on a दोस्ती between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man निर्मित by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk.
Together, they यात्रा to the देवदार पहाड़ to शिकस्त humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later they kill the सांड of स्वर्ग, जिससे the देवी Ishtar sends to punish Gilgamesh for spurning her advances.
As a punishment for these actions, the देवताओं वाक्य enkidu to मौत.
The second half of the epic focuses on gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death, and his quest for immortality.
In order to learn the secret of eternal life, gilgamesh undertakes a long और perilous journey.
He learns कि `` The life that you are seeking you will never find.
When the gods created man they allotted to him मौत, लकिन जीवन वे retained in their own keeping. ''
This उद्धरण थी originally attributed to siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic, and then attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic.
nevertheless, gilgamesh 's कीर्ति जिया on बाद उसके मौत, because of his great building projects, and his account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
The story has been translated into many different languages, और gilgamesh रै चूंकि become adapted in works of popular fiction.
A eukaryote ( or ) is an सजीव जिनकी कोशिकाएं contain complex structures enclosed within membranes.
Eukaryotes may more formally be referred to as the taxon Eukarya or Eukaryota.
The defining membrane-bound structure कि सेट eukaryotic कोशिकाएं apart from prokaryotic cells is the nucleus, or nuclear envelope, within which the genetic material is carried.
The presence of a nucleus gives eukaryotes their नाम, जिससे आता इससे the यूनानी ( eu, `` good '' ) and ( karyon, `` nut '' or `` kernel '' ).
Most eukaryotic कोशिकाएं भी contain अन्य membrane-bound organelles such as mitochondria, chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus.
All विशाल जटिल जीवों are eukaryotes, including animals, plants and fungi.
the समूह भी शामिल many unicellular organisms.
Cell division in eukaryotes is different from that in organisms without a nucleus ( Prokaryote ).
It involves separating the duplicated गुणसूत्रों, through movements directed by microtubules.
वहीँ हैं दो types of division processes.
in समसूत्रण, one cell divides to produce two genetically identical cells.
In meiosis, which is required in sexual reproduction, one diploid cell ( having two instances of each chromosome, one from each parent ) undergoes recombination of each pair of parental chromosomes, and then two stages of कोशिका प्रभाग, resulting in चार अगुणित कोशिकाएं ( gametes ).
Each gamete has just one complement of chromosomes, प्रत्येक a अद्वितीय मिक्सर of the सम्बन्धित pair of parental chromosomes.
Eukaryota appears to be monophyletic, और so makes up one of the three domains of life.
The two other domains, जीवाणु और आर्किया, हैं prokaryotes और have none of the above features.
Eukaryotes represent a tiny minority of all living things ; even in a इंसान देह वहीँ हैं 10 टाइम्स अधिक microbes than इंसान cells.
However, due to their much larger size their सामूहिक विश्वव्यापी बायोमास is अनुमानित at about equal to that of prokaryotes.
They are considered to have first developed लगभग 1.6–2.1 अरब सालो ago.
The use of अंतरजाल सेवाएं or तन्त्र साथ अंतरजाल अभिगम to defraud victims or to otherwise take advantage of them, for example by stealing personal information, which can even lead to identity theft.
A very common रूप of अंतरजाल fraud is the distribution of rogue security software.
अंतरजाल सेवाएं can be प्रयुक्त to उपस्थित बेईमान solicitations to prospective victims, to conduct fraudulent transactions, or to transmit the proceeds of fraud to financial institutions or to others connected with the scheme.
Internet धोखाधड़ी can occur in गपशप कक्ष, email, message boards, or on websites.
The International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) is a NATO -led security mission in Afghanistan that was established by the United Nations Security Council in December 2001 by रेज़ोल्यूशन 1386, as envisaged by the बॉन अनुबंध.
Its main purpose is to train the Afghan National सुरक्षा शक्तियां ( ansf ) और assist अफगानिस्तान in पुनर्निर्माण key government institutions but is also engaged in the 2001-present war with insurgent groups.
ISAF was initially charged with securing Kabul and surrounding areas from the तालिबान, al qaeda और factional warlords, so as to allow for the establishment of the Afghan Transitional Administration headed by Hamid Karzai.
In October 2003, the UN Security Council प्राधिकृत the विस्तार of the isaf मिशन throughout Afghanistan, and ISAF subsequently expanded the mission in four main stages over the whole of the country.
From 2006 to 2011, ISAF had been involved in increasingly more intensive कॉम्बैट operations in southern and eastern Afghanistan.
Troop contributors include from the United States, संयुक्त किंगडम, नाटो member states and a number of other countries.
The intensity of the combat faced by contributing nations varies greatly, with the United States, United Kingdom, and Canada sustaining the majority of हताहत in intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन, साथ अन्य योगदानकर्ता sustaining significantly less.
As of early 2010, there were at least 700 military bases inside Afghanistan but more were अपेक्षित to be निर्मित in the coming सालो.
About 400 of ये were used by American‐led NATO forces and 300 by ANSF.
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( इन ) is a crystalline tropane alkaloid that is obtained from the leaves of the coca plant.
The name comes from `` कोका '' और the alkaloid suffix -ine, forming cocaine.
It is a उत्तेजक, an appetite suppressant, and a topical anesthetic.
Biologically, कोका अधिनियमों as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor, also known as a triple reuptake inhibitor ( TRI ).
It is addictive because of इसके प्रभाव on the mesolimbic reward pathway.
Unlike most अणुओं, कोका has pockets with both high hydrophilic and lipophilic efficiency, violating the rule of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance.
This causes it to क्रॉस the blood–brain barrier far better than other psychoactive chemicals and may even induce blood-brain barrier breakdown.
It is illegal to possess, produce, or distribute cocaine for non-medicinal and non-government-sanctioned purposes in लगभग प्रत्येक देश.

The tri-tip is a cut of beef from the bottom sirloin primal काटें.
It is a small triangular muscle, usually 1.5 to 2.5 lbs. ( 675 to 1,150g ) प्रति पक्ष of beef.
The scientific name of this muscle is tensor fasciae latae, inserted in the fascia lata, the connective tissue covering the quadriceps femoris, भी पुकारा quadriceps extensor, a group of four muscles which in turn insert in the patella, or knee cap of the animal.
willmar is a नगर in, और the काउंटी seat of, Kandiyohi County, Minnesota, United States.
The population was 19,610 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Willmar has been assigned ZIP code 56201 by the United States Postal Service.

The Speaker of the United राज्य हाउस of Representatives ( or Speaker of the House ) is the presiding officer of the chamber.
The office was established in 1789 by Article I, Section 2 of the United States Constitution, जिससे राज्य in भाग, `` the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि shall chuse their Speaker... ''
The वर्तमान स्पीकर is जॉन boehner, a Republican who represents Ohio 's 8th congressional district.
The Constitution does not require that the Speaker be a सदस्य of Congress, but no non-member has ever been elected to the office.
The Speaker is second in the United States presidential line of succession, after the Vice President and ahead of the अध्यक्ष प्रो tempore of the U.S. Senate.
Unlike कुछ वेस्टमिंस्टर प्रणाली parliaments, in which the office of Speaker is considered non-partisan, in the United States the Speaker of the House is a leadership position and the office-holder actively works to set the majority party 's legislative agenda.
The Speaker usually does not personally preside over debates, instead delegating the ड्यूटी to सदस्यों of the हाउस इससे the majority party.
Aside from duties relating to heading the House and the majority political पार्टी, the स्पीकर भी performs administrative and procedural functions, and represents his or her Congressional district.
A bicycle frame is the main component of a bicycle, on to which wheels and अन्य components are fitted.
The modern and most common frame design for an upright सायकिल is आधारित on the safety bicycle, and consists of two triangles, a main triangle and a paired rear triangle.
This is ज्ञात as the diamond frame.
Frames are required to be strong, stiff and light, which they do by combining अलग सामग्री and shapes.
`` Simple gravity pendulum '' model assumes no घर्षण or एयर प्रतिरोध.
an exemplar एनिमेशन of a pendulum showing the velocity and acceleration vectors
A pendulum is a वज़न निलंबित इससे a so that it can swing freely.
When a pendulum is displaced sideways इससे इसके resting संतुलन स्थिति, it is subject to a restoring force due to gravity that will accelerate it back toward the equilibrium position.
When released, the restoring force combined with the pendulum 's mass कल्याणकारी it to oscillate परिचय the संतुलन स्थिति, सुहाने back and forth.
The समय लिये एक पूरा cycle, a left swing and a right swing, is called the period.
A pendulum swings with a specific काल जिससे depends ( mainly ) on its length.
From its discovery around 1602 by Galileo Galilei the regular motion of pendulums was used for timekeeping, and was the world 's सबसे सटीक timekeeping technology until the 1930s.
Pendulums are used to regulate pendulum clocks, and are used in वैज्ञानिक instruments such as accelerometers and seismometers.
Historically they were used as gravimeters to measure the acceleration of gravity in geophysical सर्वेक्षण, और भी as a standard of length.
The word 'pendulum ' is नई लैटिन, इससे the लैटिन pendulus, meaning 'hanging '.
The simple gravity लोलक is an idealized mathematical model of a pendulum.
This is a weight ( or bob ) on the end of a massless cord suspended from a, बगैर घर्षण.
जब दिए an initial push, it will swing back and forth at a constant amplitude.
Real pendulums हैं विषय to friction and air drag, so the amplitude of their swings declines.
The First Battle of सांड चलाएं, भी ज्ञात as पहला manassas ( the नाम used by Confederate forces ), was fought on July 21, 1861, in Prince William County, Virginia, near the city of Manassas.
It was the पहला प्रमुख जमीन battle of the American Civil War.
Just months after the start of the war at Fort Sumter, the उत्तरी पब्लिक clamored लिये a march against the Confederate capital of Richmond, Virginia, which they expected to bring an early end to the rebellion.
Yielding to political pressure, Brig. Gen. Irvin McDowell led his unseasoned संघ फौज आरपार सांड चलाएं विरूद्ध the बराबर अनुभवहीन confederate Army of Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped near Manassas Junction.
McDowell 's ambitious plan for a surprise flank attack on the Confederate left was poorly executed by his officers and men ; nevertheless, the Confederates, who had been planning to attack the Union left पार्श्व, मिला themselves at an आरंभिक disadvantage.
Confederate reinforcements under Brig. Gen. Joseph E. Johnston arrived from the shenandoah घाटी by रेलरोड and the course of the battle quickly changed.
A brigade of Virginians under a relatively unknown colonel from the Virginia Military Institute, Thomas J. Jackson, stood उनके मैदान और जैक्सन प्राप्त उसके प्रसिद्ध उपनाम, `` Stonewall Jackson ''.
The confederates तब शुभारम्भ a दमदार counterattack, और as the Union troops began withdrawing under fire, many panicked and it turned into a rout as McDowell 's men frantically ran without order in the direction of Washington, D.C.
Both armies were sobered by the fierce fighting and अनेक हताहत, और एहसास the युद्ध थी going to be much longer and bloodier than either had anticipated.
अंधड़ निकट garajau, Madeira
Weather is the state of the atmosphere, to the degree that it is hot or cold, wet or dry, calm or stormy, clear or cloudy.
Most weather phenomena occur in the क्षोभमण्डल, बस below the stratosphere.
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and precipitation activity, whereas climate is the term for the औसत वायुमंडलीय शर्तें over longer अवधि of समय.
When used without qualification, `` weather '' is समझा to be the मौसम of Earth.
Weather is driven by air pressure ( temperature and moisture ) differences between एक प्लेस और another.
These pressure and temperature differences can occur due to the sun angle at any particular स्पॉट, जिससे varies by अक्षांश इससे the tropics.
The strong तापमान कंट्रास्ट between ध्रुवीय और tropical air gives rise to the jet stream.
Weather systems in the mid-latitudes, such as extratropical cyclones, हैं caused by instabilities of the जेट stream flow.
Because the Earth 's axis is tilted relative to its orbital plane, sunlight is incident at अलग कोण at different times of the year.
On Earth 's surface, temperatures प्रायः दायरा ±40 °C ( −40 °F to 100 °F ) annually.
Over thousands of years, changes in Earth 's orbit affect the राशि और वितरण of सौर उर्जा प्राप्त by the Earth and influence long-term climate and global climate change.
Surface temperature differences in turn cause pressure मतभेद.
Higher altitudes are cooler than lower altitudes due to मतभेद in compressional हीटिंग.
मौसम forecasting is the अनुप्रयोग of science and technology to predict the state of the atmosphere for a future time and a given location.
The atmosphere is a chaotic system, so small changes to one part of the प्रणाली can grow to have large effects on the system as a whole.
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout human इतिहास, और वहीँ is evidence that human activity such as agriculture and industry has inadvertently modified weather patterns.
Studying how the weather works on अन्य planets has been helpful in understanding how weather works on Earth.
A famous landmark in the Solar System, Jupiter 's Great Red Spot, is an anticyclonic storm known to have existed for at तनिक 300 सालो.
However, weather is not limited to ग्रहीय लाशें.
a स्टार 's किरीट is constantly being lost to space, creating what is essentially a very thin atmosphere throughout the Solar System.
the गति of mass ejected from the Sun is known as the solar wind.
कैटी पेरी is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter from Santa Barbara, California.
She signed with कैपिटल रिकॉर्ड.
Perry has released three studio albums, including her डेब्यू ईसाई प्रयत्न Katy Hudson, One of the Boys, and Teenage Dream.
Perry 's mainstream career was kicked off with the massive चार्ट कामयाबी of उसके डेब्यू single `` I Kissed a Girl ``.
During her career, Perry has महरूम मनोनीत लिये numerous प्रमुख म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, primarily for Teenage Dream and One of the Boys.
The following is a सूची of sovereign राज्य और territories जहाँ अंग्रेज़ी is an official language or language of government.
In 2012, there were 88 states in कुल ( 60 sovereign states and 28 non-sovereign states ).
In many देशों अंग्रेज़ी is the dominant language, but does not have official status.
In Australia, English is spoken by the vast majority of the population and is the only language used in government संस्थानों, लकिन ऑस्ट्रेलिया does not have an official language.
The case is the same in the United Kingdom and the United States, though many states and regions भीतर the u.S. do have अंग्रेज़ी as an official language.
English is the dominant language of New Zealand and an official language of कनाडा ( साथ साथ फ्रेंच ), इण्डिया ( साथ साथ हिंदी और अनेक अन्य भाषाएं ), आयरलैंड ( along with Irish ), and the Philippines ( along with Tagalog ).
English is the sole official language of the Commonwealth of Nations और the राष्ट्रमंडल खेल.
English is one of the official languages of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the European Union and the International Olympic Committee.
Many of ये देशों हैं वर्तमान or पूर्व colonies or dependencies of the United Kingdom ( see also British Empire ), or of the United States, itself a former colony of the UK.
Notable अपवाद शामिल रवांडा, जिससे थी a former Belgian colony and Eritrea, which was an Italian colony where the British Empire spanned its control only in World War II and shortly after ( 1941-1952 ).
India 's भाषाई picture is complex.
According to the Constitution of India, `` हिंदी in the देवनागरी स्क्रिप्ट '' is the आधिकारिक भाषा of the union ; and English the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however, English is mandated for the authoritative texts of all federal laws and Supreme Court decisions and ( along with Hindi ) is one of the two languages of the Indian Parliament.
अंग्रेज़ी is प्रयुक्त almost exclusively for higher education, business and science.
Courses in majority of the schools are सिखाया exclusively in English.
English is extensively used for प्रशासनिक उद्देश्य in India.
India is the second-largest english-speaking देश in the संसार by number of speakers, after the United States.
As ऐसे, अनेक consider अंग्रेज़ी to be the de facto official language of India.
See Official भाषाएं of India.
The linguistic makeup of Pakistan is similarly complex.
While the नेशनल भाषा is Urdu, English is an official language and used in business, government and law.
English is a अनिवार्य भाषा in schools.
All स्कूल पाठ्यक्रम हैं taught in English.
Pakistan is the 9th largest English-speaking country in the world by population.
Southern Cone (, ) is a geographic प्रदेश रचित of the southernmost areas of South America, south of the Tropic of Capricorn.
Although geographically this शामिल दक्षिणी और भाग of southeast ( são Paulo ) of Brazil, in terms of political geography the Southern cone has traditionally comprised Argentina, Chile, Paraguay, and Uruguay.
In the narrowest sense, it only covers Argentina, Chile and Uruguay, bounded on the north by the states of Brazil, पैराग्वे, बोलीविया और पेरू, on the वेस्ट by the प्रशांत समंदर, and south to the junction between the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans, which it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ).
High life expectancy, the highest Human Development Index of Latin America, high Standard of living, significant participation in the global बाज़ार और the उभरते अर्थव्यवस्था of इसके सदस्यों मेक the Southern Cone the most prosperous macro-region in South America.
For multi-event एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं देखिए track and Field Competitions, section `` Meetings ''.
Meetings are sometimes held around conference tables.
In a meeting, two or more people come together to discuss एक or अधिक विषय, often in a formal setting.
An official game in baseball, also sometimes called a regulation game, is a game that has progressed beyond the पाइंट at जिससे it can be माना पूरा if जरुरी.
This is लगभग the halfway पाइंट of the game.
In the case of inclement weather, कोई खेल जिससे रै पहुँचे इस पाइंट may be रोका and shortened as needed, with the result being final, and all records and statistics counted.
A game which has not reached this point before being stopped is either considered a निलंबित खेल ( to be continued at a later date from the point of stoppage ), or is simply canceled and replayed from the start.
( This depends on the नियम of each individual league. )
In either case, no statistics are counted until the game becomes आधिकारिक.
Since most professional बेसबॉल खेल हैं नौ पारी long, the पांचवां inning is used as the threshold for an official game.
If the visiting team is leading, or the game is tied, the end of the fifth inning marks इस पाइंट.
If the home team ( which bats last ) is already ahead in the स्कोर, और theoretically होता नहीं need its half of the fifth inning, then 41⁄2 innings ( i.e., the middle of the fifth ) is considered an official game.
The game is also considered official if the home team scores to take the lead in the नीचे of the पांचवां inning, since the game would end immediately if the same thing happened in the ninth.
In nearly all cases, the `` official game '' status is used to determine whether a बरसात जाँच होगा be सम्मानित लिये fans holding tickets.
If a game is started but does not reach the पाइंट of बनने आधिकारिक, प्रशंसक हैं हकदार to a नई ticket for the make-up game or ( in most cases ) any other available game of their choice.
If a game is halted after it becomes official, the game is बस shortened और no बरसात जाँच is given.
The `` आधिकारिक खेल '' statistic प्राप्त कुछ ध्यान दौरान the 1995 ऋतु, जब Cal Ripken, Jr. was approaching the record for consecutive games played, previously held by Lou Gehrig.
Large numbers were hung on the side of the b & o गोदाम at Oriole Park at Camden Yards to show the number of games in Ripken 's streak.
Each day, a new number was unfurled during the पांचवां inning बाद प्रत्येक खेल था become आधिकारिक ( चूंकि the statistic would not have counted if the game had been stopped before that point ).
A similar practice has been used to count down toward the demolition of several stadiums ( including Veterans Stadium in Philadelphia in 2003, Busch Memorial Stadium in St. Louis in 2005, and the original Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium in New York City in 2008 ) ; as each game became official, the टोली होता unveil a नई ( निम्नतर ) क्रमांक प्रर्दशित the क्रमांक of खेल बाएँ to be निभाई in the stadium.
A telephone क्रमांक or फोन क्रमांक is a अनुक्रम of digits used to call from one telephone line to another in a public switched telephone network.
When telephone numbers were invented, they were short — as few as one, two or three digits — and were given orally to a switchboard ऑपरेटर.
As phone systems have grown and interconnected to encompass the world, telephone संख्याएँ have become longer.
In addition to telephones, they now access other devices, such as computers and फैक्स मशीने.
The number contains the सूचना necessary to identify uniquely the intended endpoint for the telephone call.
Each such endpoint must have a unique क्रमांक भीतर the public switched telephone network.
Most countries उपयोग फिक्स्ड लंबाई संख्याएँ ( लिये सामान्य लाइनों at least ) and therefore the number of endpoints determines the necessary length of the telephone number.
It is also possible लिये प्रत्येक सदस्य to have a set of shorter numbers for the endpoints most often used.
These `` shorthand '' or `` speed calling '' numbers are automatically translated to unique टेलीफोन संख्याएँ पहले the कॉल can be कनेक्ट.
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, और 1-1-2 होने the आपात सेवाएं संख्याएँ लिये चीन, जापानी, दक्षिण Korea, Taiwan and Sri Lanka ; Canada and the United States ; Australia ; the United Kingdom, Ireland, South Africa, Poland, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Morocco, Macao, Bahrain, Qatar, Bangladesh, Botswana, Ghana, Kenya, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Mauritius, Singapore, Zimbabwe, Trinidad, Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union, respectively. )
Many प्रणालियों भी allow काल्स भीतर a लोकल area to be made without dialing the local area code.
For example, a phone number in North America will start with three numbers ( such as 661 ), which is the area code, followed by seven digits split into भाग of तीन और चार ( ऐसे as 550-1212 ), जिससे is the लोकल number.
Some areas अभी have अनिवार्य ten-digit dialing in place, even for local calls.
Most telephone networks today ( exceptions होने निजी intercom और सुरक्षित फोन संजाल ) हैं interconnected in the international telephone network, where the format of telephone numbers is standardized by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164.
This specifies कि the संपूर्ण क्रमांक चाहिए be 15 digits or shorter, and begin with a country prefix.
For most countries, this is followed by an क्षेत्रफल कोड or नगर कोड और the subscriber number, which might consist of the code for a particular telephone exchange.
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an international telephone number in writing or print, starting with a प्लस चिह्न ( `` + '' ) और the country code.
When calling an international number from a fixed line phone, the + must be replaced साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय कॉल prefix chosen by the country the call is being made from.
Some mobile phones allow the + to be entered directly.
The format and allocation of local phone numbers are नियंत्रित by प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's संबंधित सरकारी, either directly or by sponsored organizations ( such as NANPA overseen by NeuStar Inc. ).
Before a telephone call is connected, the टेलीफोन क्रमांक जरूर be dialed by the calling party or Caller.
The called party might have equipment that presents कॉलर id पहले the call is answered.
A collection agency is a business that pursues payments of debts owed by individuals or व्यवसायों.
Most collection agencies operate as agents of लेनदारों और collect debts for a fee or percentage of the total amount owed.
There are many types of collection agencies.
First-party agencies are oftentimes subsidiaries of the original company the debt is owed to.
Third-party agencies are separate companies contracted by a company to collect debts on their निमित्त लिये a fee.
Debt buyers purchase the debt at a percentage of its मान, तब attempt to collect it.
Each country has its own rules and regulations regarding them.

Cannabis, also ज्ञात as मारिजुआना ( इससे the मैक्सिकन स्पेनी marihuana ), and by other names, is a preparation of the Cannabis plant intended for use as a psychoactive drug and as medicine.
pharmacologically, the प्रिंसिपल psychoactive constituent of कैनबिस is tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) ; it is one of 483 known compounds in the plant, including at least 84 other cannabinoids, such as cannabidiol ( CBD ), cannabinol ( CBN ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ).
and cannabigerol ( cbg ).
This is a list of American football quarterbacks who have started for the Washington Redskins, as well as its पूर्ववर्तियों the बोस्टन braves ( 1932 ) और Boston Redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ), in the National Football League ( NFL ).
the वॉशिंगटन redskins मताधिकार was originally founded in Boston, Massachusetts as the Boston Braves, named after the local baseball franchise.
The name was changed the following साल to the redskins.
In 1937, the मताधिकार स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
Of the 49 Redskins starting quarterbacks, two have been inducted into the प्रो फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of कीर्ति : सैमी Baugh and Sonny Jurgensen.
