1st खास शक्तियां operational detachment-delta ( 1st sfod-d ), popularly known as Delta Force, is one of the United States ' four secretive tier-one counter-terrorism and Special Mission Units.
It was formerly सूचीबद्ध as the कॉम्बैट अनुप्रयोग समूह by the Department of Defense but has since been officially re-designated the Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE ).
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively supported by usasoc, it जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the operational control of the Joint Special Operations Command.
Delta Force and its Navy counterpart, the Naval Special Warfare Development Group, are the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य 's प्राथमिक counter-terrorism units.
Delta Force 's primary tasks are counter-terrorism, direct action, and national intervention operations, although it is an extremely versatile group सक्षम of conducting अनेक प्रकार of गुप्त मिशन, सहित, लकिन नहीं सीमित to, hostage rescues and raids.
The Central Intelligence Agency 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) और अधिक specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन समूह ( sog ) प्रायः works with – and recruits – operators from Delta Force.
Alpha decay is one example type of radioactive decay, in which an atomic nucleus emits an alpha particle, and thereby transforms ( or 'decays ' ) into an atom with a mass क्रमांक 4 less and atomic number 2 less.
अनेक अन्य types of decays are possible.
Radioactive decay, also known as nuclear क्षय or radioactivity, is the प्रक्रम by which a nucleus of an unstable atom loses energy by emitting particles of ionizing radiation.
A material that spontaneously emits this kind of radiation — which includes the emission of energetic alpha अणु, बीटा अणु, और गामा किरणें — is माना radioactive.
There are many different types of रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय ( देखिए table below ).
A decay, or loss of energy, results when an atom with one type of केंद्रक, पुकारा the जनक radionuclide, परिणत to an अणु साथ a केंद्रक in a different state, or to a different nucleus containing different numbers of protons and neutrons.
Either of these उत्पाद is नामित the daughter nuclide.
In some decays the parent and daughter are different chemical elements, and यूँ the क्षय प्रक्रम परिणाम in nuclear transmutation ( creation of an atom of a new element ).
The first decay processes to be discovered यहूद अल्फा क्षय, बीटा क्षय, and gamma decay.
Alpha decay occurs जब the केंद्रक ejects an alpha particle ( helium nucleus ).
इस is the सबसे आम प्रक्रम of emitting nucleons, but in rarer types of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or specific nuclei of other elements ( in the process called cluster decay ).
Beta decay occurs जब the केंद्रक emits an electron or positron and a type of neutrino, in a process that changes a proton to a neutron or the other way around.
The nucleus may capture an orbiting electron, converting a प्रोटॉन into a न्यूट्रॉन ( इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर ).
All of these processes result in नाभिकीय transmutation.
By contrast, there exist radioactive क्षय प्रक्रियाओं कि do not result in transmutation.
The energy of an excited nucleus may be emitted as a gamma ray in gamma decay, or used to eject an कक्षीय इलेक्ट्रॉन by बातचीत साथ the उत्साहित केंद्रक in a प्रक्रम पुकारा आतंरिक conversion.
Radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, और इस results in a change in an element from one isotope to another.
One type of रेडियोसक्रिय decay results in products which are not defined, but appear in a range of `` pieces '' of the original nucleus.
This क्षय is पुकारा spontaneous fission.
This decay happens when a large अस्थिर केंद्रक अनायास splits into two ( and occasionally three ) smaller daughter nuclei, and usually emits gamma rays, neutrons, or other particles as a consequence.
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e., random ) process at the level of single atoms, in that, according to क्वांटम सिद्धान्त, it is नामुमकिन to predict when a particular atom will decay.
However, the chance that a दिए अणु होगा क्षय is constant over time.
For a large number of atoms, the decay rate for the collection is computable इससे the measured क्षय स्थिरांक of the न्यूक्लाइड ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ).
Waxing is a form of semi-permanent hair removal जिससे removes the hair from the root.
New hair will not grow back in the previously waxed area for two to eight weeks, although some people will start to see regrowth in only a सप्ताह.
लगभग कोई क्षेत्रफल of the देह can be waxed, including eyebrows, face, bikini area, legs, arms, back, abdomen and feet.
There are many types of waxing उपयुक्त for removing unwanted hair.
Strip waxing is accomplished by spreading a wax thinly over the स्किन.
A cloth or paper strip is then pressed on the शीर्ष और ripped बंद the दिशा of hair growth.
This removes the मोम along with the hair.
Strip wax can also be made at घर using नीबू रस, water, sugar and honey.
Hot waxing utilizes Hot wax ( as opposed to strip wax ).
In this case, the wax is applied somewhat thickly और साथ no cloth or paper strips.
The wax then hardens when it cools, यूँ allowing the आसान हटाना by a therapist without the aid of cloths.
This waxing method is very beneficial to लोगों जो have sensitive skin.
Wall painting ( 1st century AD ) from Pompeii depicting a multigenerational भोज
Ancient Roman culture existed throughout the लगभग 1200-year history of the civilization of Ancient Rome.
The term refers to the culture of the Roman Republic, later the Roman साम्राज्य, जिससे, at इसके शिखर, covered an क्षेत्रफल इससे lowland स्कॉटलैंड and Morocco to the Euphrates.
Life in ancient Rome revolved around the city of Rome, its famed seven hills, and its monumental structures ऐसे as the flavian amphitheatre ( अभी पुकारा the कोलोसियम ), the Forum of Trajan, and the Pantheon.
The city also had several theaters, gymnasiums, and many taverns, baths, और brothels.
Throughout the territory अंतर्गत प्राचीन रोम 's कंट्रोल, residential architecture ranged from very modest houses to country villas, and in the capital city of Rome, there were imperial residences on the elegant Palatine Hill, from which the word palace is derived.
the विशाल बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी जिया in the city center, packed into insulae ( apartment blocks ).
The city of Rome was the largest megalopolis of that time, with a population that may well have exceeded one million people, with a high end estimate of 3.6 million and a low end estimate of 450,000.
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 percent of the population under the city 's jurisdiction lived in innumerable urban centers, with जनसांख्यिकी of at तनिक 10,000 और अनेक सैन्य settlements, a very high rate of urbanization by pre-industrial standards.
The most urbanized part of the Empire was Italy, which had an estimated rate of urbanization of 32 %, the same rate of शहरी of इंग्लैण्ड in 1800.
Most रोमन कस्बों और शहरों था a फ़ोरम, temples and the same type of buildings, on a smaller scale, as found in Rome.
The विशाल शहरी जनसांख्यिकी जरूरी an endless supply of food which was a complex logistical task, including acquiring, transporting, storing and distribution of food for Rome and other urban centers.
Italian farms supplied vegetables and फल, लकिन मछली और मांस were luxuries.
Aqueducts यहूद निर्मित to लाओ जल to urban centers and wine and oil were imported from Hispania, Gaul and Africa.
There was a very large amount of commerce between the प्रांतों of the रोमन Empire, since its transportation technology was very efficient.
The average costs of transport and the प्रौद्योगिकी यहूद comparable with 18th-century Europe.
The बाद नगर of रोम किया नहीं भरण the space within its ancient Aurelian walls until after 1870.
Eighty percent of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the क्षेत्राधिकार of प्राचीन Rome lived in the countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand inhabitants.
Landlords generally resided in cities and their estates were बाएँ in the परवाह of farm managers.
The plight of rural slaves was generally worse than their counterparts working in शहरी aristocratic households.
To stimulate a higher मजदूर उत्पादकता most landlords freed a large number of slaves and many received wages.
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 people lived in one small farm hut in Egypt, while छह परिवारों स्वामित्व a सिंगल ज़ैतून पेड़. ''.
Such a rural environment continued to induce migration of population to urban centers until the जल्दी 2nd सदी, जब the शहरी जनसांख्यिकी stopped growing and started to decline.
Starting in the middle of the 2nd century BC, private Greek culture was increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades विरूद्ध the `` softening '' effects of Hellenized culture from the conservative moralists.
By the समय of augustus, संस्कारी यूनानी household slaves taught the Roman young ( sometimes even the girls ) ; chefs, decorators, secretaries, doctors, and hairdressers—all came from the Greek East.
Greek sculptures adorned hellenistic लैंडस्केप बागवानी on the palatine or in the villas, or were imitated in Roman sculpture yards by Greek slaves.
The Roman cuisine preserved in the cookery books ascribed to apicius is essentially Greek.
रोमन लेखक disdained Latin for a cultured Greek style.
Only in विधि और शासन was the Italic nature of Rome 's accretive culture supreme.
Against इस इंसान background, both the urban and rural setting, one of history 's most influential civilizations took shape, leaving behind a cultural legacy that survives in part today.
James Joseph `` Duffy '' Waldorf, Jr. ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर मनःस्थिति.
Glass bottles ( for खीरा स्लाइस ) on शिपिंग pallets
A सोवियत mayonnaise jar
A modern `` French kilner '' jar
Glass production involves two main methods – the float glass process, which produces sheet glass, and glassblowing जिससे produces बोतलों and other containers.
A season is a subdivision of the year, चिह्नित by changes in weather, ecology, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the धरती around the सूर्य और the झुकाव of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the seasons are marked by changes in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface, variations of which may cause पशु to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June and July, the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is exposed to more direct sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun.
The same is true of the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in November, December and January.
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the सूर्य to be higher in the sky during the summer months which increases the solar flux.
However, due to seasonal lag, June, July and August are the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December, जनवरी और फ़रवरी हैं the hottest महीने in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध.
in शीतोष्ण और subpolar regions, generally four calendar -based seasons ( with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists ज़्यादातर उपयोग a छह ऋतु मॉडल लिये शीतोष्ण जलवायु regions कि includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or monsoon ) season and the शुष्क ऋतु, और in कुछ tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
In some parts of the world, special `` seasons '' are loosely defined based on important events such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
The six ecological सीज़न
The four calendar seasons, depicted in an ancient रोमन मोज़ेक इससे ट्यूनीशिया
The Battle of Fort Sumter ( April 12–14, 1861 ) was the बमबारी और आत्मसमर्पण of फोर्ट sumter, निकट चार्ल्सटन, South Carolina, that started the American Civil War.
Following declarations of secession by seven Southern राज्य, दक्षिण कैरोलिना मांगे that the U.S. Army abandon its facilities in Charleston Harbor.
On December 26, 1860, u.S. प्रमुख रॉबर्ट एंडरसन surreptitiously स्थानांतरित उसके small command from the indefensible Fort Moultrie on Sullivan 's Island to Fort Sumter, a substantial fortress controlling the entrance of Charleston Harbor.
An attempt by U.S. President James बुकानन to reinforce और resupply Anderson, using the unarmed merchant ship Star of the West, failed when it was fired upon by shore batteries on January 9, 1861.
South Carolina authorities then seized all संघीय प्रॉपर्टी in the Charleston area, except for Fort Sumter.
During the early months of 1861, the situation around फोर्ट sumter increasingly began to resemble a siege.
In March, Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard, the first general officer of the newly formed Confederate States of America, was placed in command of Confederate forces in Charleston.
Beauregard energetically directed the strengthening of बैटरी around चार्ल्सटन harbor aimed at Fort Sumter.
Conditions in the fort grew dire as the Union सैनिको rushed to complete the installation of additional guns.
एंडरसन थी छोटी of men, food, and supplies.
The resupply of Fort Sumter became the first crisis of the प्रशासन of अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln.
He notified the Governor of South Carolina, Francis W. pickens, that he was sending supply ships, which resulted in an ultimatum from the Confederate government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately.
Major Anderson refused to आत्मसमर्पण.
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on April 12, the Confederates bombarded the fort from artillery batteries surrounding the harbor.
Although the Union garrison returned fire, they were significantly outgunned और, बाद 34 घंटों, Major Anderson agreed to evacuate.
There was no loss of life on either side as a direct result of this सगाई, हालांकि a गन विस्फोट दौरान the आत्मसमर्पण ceremonies on April 14 caused two Union deaths.
Following the battle, there was widespread support from both North and South for further सैन्य कार्रवाई.
Lincoln 's immediate call for 75,000 volunteers to suppress the विद्रोह resulted in an अतिरिक्त चार दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य भी declaring their secession and joining the Confederacy.
The सिविल युद्ध had begun.
3G, short for third पीढी, is the third generation of mobile telecommunications technology.
3G telecommunication संजाल support सेवाएं that provide an information transfer rate of at least 200 kbit/s.
However, many services advertised as 3g provide उच्चतर गति than the minimum technical requirements for a 3G service.
Recent 3G releases, प्रायः denoted 3.5g और 3.75g, भी provide मोबाईल broadband access of several Mbit/s to smartphones and mobile modems in laptop computers.
3G finds application in wireless voice telephony, mobile Internet access, fixed wireless अंतरजाल अभिगम, वीडियो काल्स और mobile TV.
`` mazel tov ! '' written on a wine glass tag
Traditionally, after the groom breaks the glass, the अतिथि चिल्लाओ `` mazel Tov ! ``.
a जन्मदिवस केक, आइस्ड with the words `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is often done in Israel.
Here the phrase is written in यहूदी cursive.
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( Hebrew / Yiddish : `` מזל טוב '', यहूदी : `` mazal tov '' ; Yiddish : `` mazel tov '' ; lit.
`` good luck '' ) is a phrase used to express बधाई लिये a प्रसन्न और significant occasion or event.
Hepatitis C is an infectious disease affecting primarily the liver, caused by the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ).
The infection is often asymptomatic, but chronic infection can lead to scarring of the liver and ultimately to cirrhosis, जिससे is generally apparent बाद अनेक सालो.
In some cases, those with cirrhosis will go on to develop liver विफलता, जिगर कर्कट or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices.
HCV is spread primarily by blood-to-blood सम्पर्क संबद्ध with intravenous drug use, poorly sterilized medical equipment and transfusions.
An estimated 130–200 million people worldwide are संक्रमित with.
The existence of ( originally `` non- A non- B hepatitis '' ) was postulated in the 1970s और सिद्ध in 1989.
only infects इंसानो और chimpanzees.
The वायरस persists in the liver in about 85 % of those infected.
This persistent infection can be treated with medication : the मानक चिकित्सा is a संयोजन of peginterferon and ribavirin, with either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases.
Overall, 50–80 % of people treated are cured.
those जो develop cirrhosis or liver cancer may require a liver transplant.
is the leading cause of liver transplantation, हालांकि the virus usually recurs after transplantation.
No vaccine विरूद्ध is available.
A flexible spending account ( FSA ), also known as a flexible spending arrangement, is one of a क्रमांक of tax-advantaged वित्तीय खाते कि can be नियत up through a cafeteria plan of an employer in the United States.
An FSA allows an employee to नियत aside a portion of आय to अदा for qualified expenses as established in the cafeteria plan, most commonly for medical expenses but often for dependent care or other expenses.
Money deducted from an employee 's pay into an FSA is not subject to payroll कर, resulting in substantial payroll tax savings.
One significant disadvantage to using an FSA is that funds not used by the समाप्त of the योजना साल हैं खोया to the कर्मचारी, ज्ञात as the `` use it or lose it '' rule.
The सबसे आम प्रकार of लचीली बिता account, the medical expense FSA ( also medical FSA or health FSA ), is similar to a health savings account ( HSA ) or a health reimbursement account ( HRA ).
However, while HSAs and HRAs are almost exclusively used as components of a उपभोक्ता चलित स्वास्थ्य परवाह योजना, चिकित्सा fsas are commonly offered with more traditional health plans as well.
In addition, funds in a health savings account are not lost when the योजना साल is over, unlike funds in an FSA.
Paper forms or an FSA debit card, also known as a flexcard, may be used to access the account funds.
Tennessee ( ) ( ) is a U.S. state स्तिथ in the southeastern United States.
Tennessee is the 36th most extensive and the 17th सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky and Virginia to the north, North Carolina to the ईस्ट, जॉर्जिया, अलबामा, and Mississippi to the south, and Arkansas and Missouri to the west.
The Appalachian Mountains dominate the eastern part of the राज्य, और the मिसिसिपी River forms the state 's western border.
Tennessee 's capital and second largest नगर is नैशविले, जिससे has a population of 609,644.
मेम्फिस is the राज्य 's largest city, with a population of 652,050.
The state of Tennessee is rooted in the Watauga Association, a 1772 frontier अनुबंध generally regarded as the पहला constitutional government west of the Appalachians.
What is now Tennessee was initially part of North कैरोलिना, और later part of the Southwest Territory.
Tennessee was admitted to the संघ as the 16th state on June 1, 1796.
Tennessee was the last state to leave the Union and join the Confederacy at the outbreak of the U.S. सिविल युद्ध in 1861, और the पहला राज्य to be readmitted to the Union at the end of the war.
Tennessee furnished more soldiers for the confederate फौज than कोई अन्य राज्य, और अधिक सैनिको for the Union Army than any other Southern state.
In the 20th century, Tennessee transitioned from an agrarian economy to a more diversified अर्थव्यवस्था, aided at times by federal entities such as the Tennessee Valley Authority.
In the early 1940s, the city of Oak Ridge was established to हाउस the मैनहटन प्रोजेक्ट 's uranium enrichment facilities, helping to build the world 's first atomic bomb.
टेनेसी रै निभाई a नाजुक भूमिका in the development of many forms of American popular music, including rock and roll, blues, country, and rockabilly.
Beale Street in Memphis is considered by many to be the birthplace of the blues, with musicians such as w.c. सुलभ performing in इसके क्लब as जल्दी as 1909.
Memphis थी भी घर to सूर्य रिकॉर्ड, जहाँ संगीतकारों such as Elvis Presley, Isaac Hayes, Johnny Cash, Carl Perkins, Jerry Lee Lewis, Roy Orbison, and Charlie Rich began their recording careers, and where rock and roll took shape in the 1950s.
The 1927 Victor recording sessions in Bristol generally mark the beginning of the country music genre and the rise of the Grand Ole Opry in the 1930s helped make नैशविले the बीच of the देश म्यूज़िक रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग.
Three bricks and mortar museums recognize Tennessee 's role in nurturing various forms of popular music : the Memphis Rock N ' Soul Museum, the देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय in Nashville, and the International Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson.
In addition, the Rockabilly Hall of Fame, an online site recognizing the development of rockabilly in which Tennessee निभाई a निर्णायक भूमिका, is आधारित in नैशविले.
Tennessee 's major industries include agriculture, निर्माण, और पर्यटन.
Poultry, soybeans, and cattle are the state 's primary agricultural products, और प्रमुख निर्माण निर्यात शामिल chemicals, transportation equipment, and electrical equipment.
The Great Smoky Mountains National Park, the nation 's most visited national park, is headquartered in the पूर्वी भाग of the राज्य, और a section of the Appalachian Trail roughly follows the Tennessee-North Carolina border.
Other major tourist attractions include the Tennessee Aquarium in Chattanooga, the Sunsphere in Knoxville, Dollywood in Pigeon Forge, the पार्थेनन, the देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय, और ryman ऑडिटोरियम in नैशविले, और Elvis Presley 's Graceland residence and tomb in Memphis.
One design रूपांतर of a मुर्गा ring.
A cock ring is a ring that can be placed around a man 's penis, usually at the base, primarily to slow the प्रवाह of रक्त इससे the वीर्यपात penile ऊतक, यूँ maintaining an स्तंभन for a much longer period of time.
Cock rings can be worn around just the penis or both the penis and scrotum, or just the scrotum अलोन, हालांकि इस is प्रायः पुकारा a testicle कफ.
Rings can be made of a variety of different materials, most commonly leather, rubber, or silicone, though nylon and metal are also used either as the main component or part of the closure.
The term cock ring is sometimes used as a synonym लिये a प्रिंस अल्बर्ट piercing, a piercing of the penis that is usually, though not always, a metal ring.
When used in cases of erectile dysfunction they are known by various names such as `` स्तंभन रिंग '' और `` टेंशन रिंग ''.
The headquarters of Major League Baseball at 245 Park एवेन्यू, midtown मैनहटन, New York City, USA.
Major League Baseball ( MLB ) is a professional बेसबॉल लीग, consisting of teams that play in the National League and the American League.
Dating to 1876 and 1901 respectively, the two leagues merged in 2000 into a single organization led by the Commissioner of Baseball, after 100 सालो as पृथक विधिक entities.
MLB constitutes एक of the major professional sports leagues of the United States and Canada.
It is composed of 30 teams — 29 in the संयुक्त राज्य and one in Canada.
Teams in MLB खेल 162 खेल प्रत्येक ऋतु over six months ( April through September ).
Five teams in each league advance to a four-round postseason tournament that culminates in the World Series, a best-of-seven-games चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी between the दो लीग champions जिससे dates to 1903.
The organization oversees many minor-league baseball लीग which operate about 240 teams affiliated with the major-league clubs.
With the International Baseball Federation, the league also manages the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संसार बेसबॉल Classic tournament.
MLB has the highest ऋतु उपस्थिति of कोई खेल लीग in the world with nearly 75 million spectators in 2012.
Delaware ( ) is a U.S. राज्य स्तिथ on the Atlantic Coast in the Mid-Atlantic region of the United States.
it is bordered to the south and west by Maryland, to the northeast by New Jersey, and to the north by Pennsylvania.
The state takes इसके नाम इससे थामस वेस्ट, 3rd Baron De La Warr, an English nobleman and Virginia 's first colonial governor, after whom what is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named.
Delaware is located in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva Peninsula and is the second smallest, the छठे तनिक populous, लकिन the छठे सबसे densely आबादी of the fifty United States.
डेलावेयर is विभाजित into three counties.
इससे उत्तर to south, these three counties are New Castle, Kent, and Sussex.
जबकि the दक्षिणी दो काउंटी have historically been predominantly agricultural, New Castle County has been more industrialized.
Before its तटरेखा थी छान by europeans in the 16th century, Delaware was inhabited by several groups of Native Americans, including the Lenape in the north and Nanticoke in the south.
It was initially colonized by Dutch traders at Zwaanendael, located near the उपस्थित कस्बा of lewes, in 1631.
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating in the American क्रान्ति और on दिसम्बर 7, 1787, became the first state to ratify the Constitution of the United States, thereby becoming known as The First State.
Energy परिवर्तन in उर्जा प्रणालियों Language
Energy transformation or energy परिवर्तन is the प्रक्रम of बदलना one form of energy to another.
In physics, the term energy describes the capacity to produce certain changes within a system, without लिहाज़ to सीमाएं in परिवर्तन imposed by Entropy.
Changes in total energy of systems can only be accomplished by adding or subtracting energy from them, as energy is a मात्रा जिससे is conserved, according to the first law of thermodynamics.
According to special आपेक्षिकता, परिवर्तन in the उर्जा of systems will also coincide with changes in the system 's mass, and the total amount of mass of a system is a measure of its energy.
Energy in a system may be transformed so that it resides in a अलग राज्य, or a different type of energy.
Energy in many states may be used to do many किस्में of physical work.
Energy may be used in natural processes or machines, or else to provide some service to society ( such as heat, लाइट, or motion ).
For example, an internal combustion engine converts the potential chemical energy in gasoline and oxygen into heat, जिससे is तब रूपांतरित into the propulsive उर्जा ( गतिज उर्जा that moves a vehicle ).
A solar cell converts solar radiation into विद्युत उर्जा कि can तब be प्रयुक्त to लाइट a बल्ब or power a computer.
The generic name for a device which converts energy from one form to another, is a ट्रान्सड्यूसर.
In general, most types of energy, save for thermal energy, may be converted efficiently to कोई अन्य दयालु of उर्जा.
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 %, such as जब संभावित उर्जा is परिवर्तित to kinetic energy as an object falls in vacuum, or when it orbits nearer or farther from another object, in space.
Conversion of other types of energies to ऊष्मा may also occurs with nearly perfect efficiency ( many types of friction do this ).
Exceptions for perfect conversion efficiency ( even for isolated systems ) occur when energy has already been partly distributed among many available quantum states for a collection of particles, which हैं freely अनुमत to explore कोई राज्य of आवेग और स्थिति ( phase space ).
In such circumstances, a measure called Entropy, or evening-out of energy distribution in such states, dictates that future राज्य of the प्रणाली जरूर be of at तनिक बराबर evenness in उर्जा distribution.
( There is no way, taking the universe as a whole, to collect उर्जा into fewer states, once it has spread to them ).
A consequence of this requirement is that there are limitations to the efficiency with which thermal energy can be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of energy, since thermal energy in equilibrium at a given temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all possible states.
Such energy is sometimes considered `` degraded energy, '' because it is नहीं entirely usable.
The second law of thermodynamics is a way of stating that, for this reason, thermal energy in a system may be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of उर्जा साथ efficiencies approaching 100 %, तभी if the एन्ट्रॉपी ( even-ness or disorder ) of the universe is increased by other means, to compensate for the decrease in entropy associated with the disappearance of the thermal energy and its entropy content.
Otherwise, only a part of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( and thus, useful work ), since the remainder of the heat must be reserved to be transferred to a thermal reservoir at a lower temperature, in such a way that the increase in Entropy for this process more than compensates for the एन्ट्रॉपी घटी संबद्ध साथ परिवर्तन of the बाकी of the heat into other types of energy.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब, of जिससे सात हैं फिलहाल स्तिथ in कनाडा और 23 in the संयुक्त States.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice hockey league in the संसार, और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग in the संयुक्त राज्य and Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest professional sports trophy in North अमेरिका, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season.
The league was organized on November 26, 1917, in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, after the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती organization, the National Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It started with four teams and, through a series of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the लीग is अभी रचित of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred थी कनाडा, हालांकि the league has now been binational since 1924 when it expanded into the United States.
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season, the league resumed play under a new collective bargaining अनुबंध कि शामिल a सैलरी cap.
In 2009, the एनएचएल enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in शर्तें of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
the एनएचएल draws अनेक अत्यधिक skilled खिलाड़ी from all over the world and currently has players from about 20 different countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the खिलाड़ी in the एनएचएल, over the पास्ट चार प्लस दशकों the percentages of US and European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
This is the complete list of the ratified and unratified amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान जिससे प्राप्त the approval of the United States Congress.
twenty-seven amendments have महरूम ratified चूंकि the original signing of the Constitution, the first ten of which are known collectively as the Bill of Rights.
The procedure लिये amending the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution is governed by Article V of the original text.
There have महरूम अनेक अन्य प्रस्ताव लिये amendments to the United States Constitution introduced in Congress, but not submitted to the states.
Before an amendment can take effect, it must be proposed to the states by a two-thirds vote of both houses of Congress or by a convention ( known as an Article v सम्मेलन ) पुकारा by two-thirds of the राज्य, और ratified by three-fourths of the states or by three-fourths of conventions thereof, the method of ratification being determined by Congress at the time of proposal.
To date, no convention for proposing amendments has been called by the राज्य, और तभी once—in 1933 for the ratification of the twenty-first amendment —has the convention method of ratification been employed.
FMR LLC ( Fidelity Management and Research ) or वफ़ादारी निवेश is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय financial services corporation.
It is one of the largest परस्पर निधि and financial services groups in the world.
It was founded in 1946 and serves North अमरीकी investors.
Fidelity Ventures is इसके venture capital arm.
Fidelity International Limited ( FIL ), was an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संबद्ध संस्थापित in 1969, serving most countries in the rest of the world.
In September 2011, FIL was rebranded as 'Fidelity विश्वव्यापी निवेश '.
Fidelity Investments manages a large family of mutual funds, provides fund distribution and investment सलाह services, as well as providing discount brokerage services, retirement services, wealth management, securities execution and clearance, life insurance and a number of other services.

Sociology is the scientific study of human society and इसके origins, विकास, संगठन, and institutions.
It is a social science which uses various methods of empirical छानबीन और नाजुक विश्लेषण to develop a body of knowledge about human social activity, structures, and functions.
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct research which may be applied directly to social policy और welfare, जबकि अन्य फ़ोकस primarily on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes.
Subject matter ranges from the micro level of individual agency and बातचीत to the मैक्रो स्तर of प्रणालियों and the social structure.
The परंपरागत focuses of समाजशास्त्र include social stratification, social class, culture, race and ethnicity, gender and sexuality, social mobility, religion, secularization, law, and deviance.
As all spheres of human activity are affected by the interplay between social structure and individual agency, sociology has gradually expanded its focus to further subjects, such as health, medical, military and penal institutions, the Internet, environmental sociology, राजनैतिक अर्थव्यवस्था और the भूमिका of social activity in the development of scientific knowledge.
The range of social scientific विधि रै भी विस्तारित.
Social शोधकर्ताओं चित्रण upon a किस्में of qualitative and quantitative techniques.
The भाषाई और सांस्कृतिक turns of the mid-twentieth सदी led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, and philosophic approaches to the analysis of society.
Conversely, recent decades have seen the rise of new analytically, mathematically and computationally rigorous techniques, such as agent-based मॉडलिंग और सोशल संजाल analysis.
Sociology should not be confused with various general social studies courses जिससे भालू छोटी संबंध to sociological theory or social science research methodology.
Thunder is the sound caused by बिजली.
Depending on the nature of the lightning and अलहदा of the श्रोता, थंडर can दायरा from a sharp, loud crack to a long, low rumble ( brontide ).
The sudden increase in pressure और तापमान इससे बिजली produces rapid expansion of the air surrounding and within a bolt of lightning.
In turn, this विस्तार of एयर creates a सोनिक शॉक वेव, similar to a sonic boom, which produces the sound of thunder, often referred to as a clap, crack, or peal of thunder.
The distance of the lightning can be calculated by the listener based on the समय अंतराल इससे जब the बिजली is seen to when the sound is heard.
Palma (,, ), in full Palma de Mallorca, is the major city and port on the द्वीप of majorca ( mallorca ) और पूंजी नगर of the autonomous community of the Balearic Islands in Spain.
The names Ciutat de mallorca ( नगर of Majorca ) and Ciutat ( City ) were used before the War of the Spanish Succession and are still used by people in Majorca.
however, the official name was Mallorca, the same as the island.
It is situated on the दक्षिण coast of the island on the Bay of Palma.
As of the 2009 census, the population of the city of Palma उचित थी 401,270, and the population of the entire urban area was 517,285, ranking as the twelfth largest urban area of Spain.
Almost half of the total जनसांख्यिकी of majorca live in Palma.
The Cabrera Archipelago, though widely separated from Palma proper, is administratively माना part of the municipality.
Its airport, Son Sant जोन, serves over 22 million passengers each year.
The marivent राजमहल थी offered by the city to the then Prince Juan Carlos I of Spain.
The royals have चूंकि spent their summer holidays in Palma.

Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor is a fictional अक्षर, a supervillain appearing in comic books published by DC Comics.
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman, and as a high-status supervillain, has also come into conflict साथ बैटमैन and other superheroes in the DC Universe.
Created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster, the character first appeared in कार्रवाई कॉमिक्स # 23 ( April 1940 ).
Luthor is described as `` a power-mad, evil scientist '' of high intelligence and incredible technological prowess.
Luthor 's goals typically center on killing Superman, the foremost बाधा to achieving the विलेन 's megalomaniacal लक्ष्य.
Despite periodically wearing a संचालित बहि, Luthor has traditionally lacked superpowers or a dual identity.
The character was originally depicted as a mad scientist who, in the रग of pulp novels, wreaks havoc on the world with his futuristic weaponry.
In his earliest appearances, luthor is दिखाया with a full head of red hair.
Despite this, the character later became hairless as the परिणाम of an कलाकार 's गलती.
A 1960 स्टोरी by जेरी siegel विस्तारित upon luthor 's origin and motivations, revealing him to be a childhood friend of Superman 's who lost his hair when a fire destroyed his laboratory ; Luthor vowed revenge.
Following the 1985 limited श्रेणी संकट on अनन्त earths, the अक्षर थी re-imagined as a Machiavellian industrialist and white-collar criminal, even briefly serving as President of the United States.
In recent years, various लेखक have revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s.
The अक्षर थी क्रमित as the 8th महानतम विलेन by Wizard on its 100 Greatest Villains of All Time list.
IGN 's सूची of the शीर्ष 100 Comic Book Villains of All Time ranked Luthor as # 4.
Luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by comic book critic Peter Sanderson, one of a few genre-crossing villains whose adventures take place `` in a world in which the ordinary कानून of प्रकृति हैं थोड़ा निलंबित '' ; वर्ण ऐसे as Professor Moriarty, Count Dracula, Hannibal Lecter, Doctor Doom, and Darth Vader, also fit this description.
Martin Luther King, Jr. Day is a United States federal holiday marking the जन्मदिवस of रेव. Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
It is observed on the तीसरा सोमवार of January each year, which is around the time of King 's birthday, January 15.
The floating holiday is similar to holidays set under the Uniform Monday Holiday Act, though the act predated the establishment of मार्टिन लूथर किंग, jr. Day by 15 years.
King was the chief spokesman for nonviolent activism in the civil अधिकारों गति, जिससे सफलतापूर्वक protested racial discrimination in federal and state law.
The campaign for a federal holiday in King 's honor began जल्द बाद उसके assassination in 1968.
Ronald Reagan signed the holiday into law in 1983, and it was पहला observed on जनवरी 20, 1986.
At first, some states resisted observing the holiday as such, giving it alternative names or combining it साथ अन्य छुट्टियाँ.
It was officially observed in all 50 states for the पहला समय in 2000.
The camera phone solution allows instant sharing of तस्वीरें.
As it 's automatic and instant, the user does not have to उपयोग a केबल or removable मीडिया to कनेक्ट to a निजी कंप्यूटर.
A camera phone is a mobile phone जिससे is समर्थ to कैप्चर स्टिल छायाचित्र ( and usually video ).
Since early in the 21st सदी the बहुमत of मोबाईल phones in use are camera phones.
Most camera phones are simpler than पृथक डिजिटल cameras.
Their usual फिक्स्ड फ़ोकस lenses और छोटी सेंसर limit their performance in poor lighting.
Lacking a physical shutter, most have a long शटर lag.
Flash, where उपस्थित, is प्रायः weak.
ऑप्टिकल जूम और tripod screws are rare.
Some also lack a USB connection, removable memory card, or अन्य रास्ता of transferring their pictures more quickly than by the phone 's inherent communication feature.
Some of the more expensive camera phones have only a few of these technical disadvantages, जिससे लागू सबसे acutely in कम लाइट शर्तें और in any case have not inhibited their widespread use.
Most model lines improve in ये regards every year or two.
Some, such as the Droid Incredible only have a मेनू चुनाव to प्रारंभ an अनुप्रयोग program to activate the camera.
Others, such as the BlackBerry Storm 2, Droid X, Motorola V980 and Nokia 5800 also have a पृथक कैमरा बटन लिये quickness और convenience.
Windows Phones can be configured to operate as a कैमरा even if the phone is asleep.
Some camera phones are designed to resemble separate low-end digital compact cameras in appearance and to some extent in सुविधाएँ और चित्र विशेषता, और हैं ब्रांडेड as दोनो मोबाईल फोन and cameras, including certain Sony phones.
The principal advantages of camera फोन हैं लागत और compactness ; indeed for a user who carries a mobile phone anyway, the additional size and cost are negligible.
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile applications to add सामर्थ्य ऐसे as geotagging and image stitching.
A few ऊँची समाप्त फोन can उपयोग उनके टच स्क्रीन to सीधा उनके कैमरा to फ़ोकस on a particular ऑब्जेक्ट in the फ़ील्ड of view, giving even an inexperienced user a degree of focus control exceeded only by seasoned photographers using manual focus.
`` Whatever happened to the man of कल ? '' is a 1986 comic book story featuring the DC Comics character of Superman.
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time, and soon to be retiring, Superman editor, Julius Schwartz, the story was प्रकाशित in दो भाग, शुरूआत in सुपरमैन # 423 और समाप्ति in Action Comics # 583, both published in September 1986.
The story was drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan, in his final major contribution to the Superman titles, and was inked by जार्ज pérez in the समस्या of सुपरमैन और कर्ट schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics.
The story was an imaginary tale जिससे बताई the फाइनल स्टोरी of the चांदी आयु सुपरमैन और his long history, which was being rebooted following the events of Crisis on Infinite Earths, before his modern introduction in the John Byrne series, The Man of Steel.
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long history of the character and to serve as a complete निष्कर्ष to उसके mythology.
The story is a frame story set ten years after Superman was last seen, where Lois Lane recounts the tale of the end of Superman 's career to a रिपोर्टर इससे the रोज़ ग्रह.
Her story includes numerous violent attacks against Superman by उसके दुश्मनों, the पब्लिक रहस्योद्घाटन of उसके रहस्य पहचान of Clark Kent and a number of deaths of those closest to him.
The story has been cited as one of the बेहतरीन कहानियां of the अक्षर of सुपरमैन, और आलोचकों and audiences frequently choose it as one of the most memorable comics ever published.
It is used as an example of how to बंद the long-time निरंतरता of a comic book character.
The story 's legacy has endured with similar stories written as tributes to it.
The title is a reference to one of the nicknames of Superman as the Man of कल, और थी प्रयुक्त in the title of another Superman.
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined ग्रैंड touring car, designed and developed by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim, France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The Super Sport संस्करण of the veyron is the fastest street-legal production car in the world, with a top speed of.
The original version रै a शीर्ष speed of.
It was नामित car of the दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear.
The standard Veyron जीती शीर्ष गियर्स बेहतरीन car Driven All Year award in 2005.
On 6 April 2013, Bugatti set the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the world with the Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse, reaching on average a top speed of.
The Veyron 's chief designer थी hartmut warkuss, और the exterior थी designed by jozef kabaň of volkswagen, with much of the engineering work being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber.
A number of special variants have महरूम उत्पादित.
In December 2010, Bugatti began offering prospective खरीदार the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स रंग by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website.
The institution of the Eucharist has been a key theme in the depictions of the Last Supper in ईसाई आर्ट, as in this 16th-century Juan de Juanes painting.
`` At the Last Supper, on the night he was betrayed, our Savior instituted the eucharistic बलिदान of उसके देह and Blood. ''
( Catechism of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर 1323 )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass, that is, the Eucharist liturgy, and the bread and wine which after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ, Lord and God, a घोषणा प्रतिपादित by the परिषद of ट्रेंट साथ an anathema against anyone who denied this.
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional term used in the Roman Catholic गिरिजाघर to refer to the eucharistic species ( the Body and Blood of Christ ).

A short story is a brief work of literature, प्रायः लिखा in narrative prose.
उभरते इससे पहले मौखिक storytelling traditions in the 17th century, the short story has grown to encompass a body of work so diverse as to defy easy characterization.
At its most prototypical the short story features a small cast of named वर्ण, और focuses on a self-contained घटना with the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood.
In so doing, short stories make use of plot, अनुनाद, और अन्य डायनेमिक components to a far greater degree than is typical of an anecdote, yet to a far lesser degree than a novel.
While the short story is largely पृथक इससे the अनोखा, लेखक of दोनो generally draw from a common pool of literary techniques.
Short stories have no नियत लंबाई.
In terms of word count there is no official demarcation between an anecdote, a short स्टोरी, और a अनोखा.
Rather, the form 's parameters are given by the rhetorical and practical context in which a दिए स्टोरी is उत्पादित और माना, so कि कया constitutes a short story may differ between genres, countries, eras, and commentators.
Like the novel, the short story 's predominant shape reflects the demands of the available markets for publication, and the evolution of the form seems closely tied to the एवोल्यूशन of the प्रकाशन उद्योग और the सबमिशन दिशानिर्देश of its constituent houses.
The short story has been considered both an apprenticeship form preceding more lengthy works, और a crafted रूप in इसके अपना सही, एकत्रित साथ in किताबे of similar length, price, and distribution as novels.
Short story लेखक may define उनके works as part of the artistic and personal expression of the form.
They may also attempt to resist categorization by विधा and fixed form.
