Area code 810 is the telephone area code serving पूर्वी मिशिगन.
The raccoon (, Procyon lotor ), sometimes spelled racoon, also known as the common raccoon, North American raccoon, northern raccoon and colloquially as coon, is a medium-sized mammal देशी to उत्तर America.
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid family, having a body length of and a body weight of.
Its grayish coat mostly consists of dense underfur which insulates विरूद्ध ठंडा मौसम.
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive features are its extremely dexterous front paws and इसके फेशियल मुखौटा, जिससे हैं विषयवस्तु in the mythology of several Native American tribes.
Raccoons are noted for their intelligence, with studies प्रर्दशित कि वे हैं समर्थ to remember the solution to tasks for up to three years.
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon, जिससे is प्रायः nocturnal, consists of about 40 % invertebrates, 33 % plant foods, and 27 % vertebrates.
The original habitats of the raccoon are deciduous and mixed forests, but due to their adaptability they have विस्तारित उनके दायरा to mountainous क्षेत्रों, तटीय marshes, और शहरी क्षेत्रों, जहाँ कुछ homeowners consider them to be pests.
As a result of escapes and deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century, raccoons are now also distributed across the यूरोपीय मेनलैंड, the काकेशस प्रदेश और जापानी.
Though previously thought to be एकान्त, वहीँ is अभी evidence that raccoons engage in gender-specific social behavior.
Related females often share a common area, while unrelated males live together in groups of up to four animals to maintain their positions against foreign males दौरान the समागम ऋतु, और अन्य संभावित invaders.
Home range sizes vary anywhere from 3 hectares ( 7 acres ) for females in cities to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) लिये males in prairies.
After a gestation period of परिचय 65 दिनों, दो to पाँच यंग, known as `` kits '', are born in spring.
The kits are subsequently उठाया by उनके mother until dispersion in late fall.
Although captive raccoons have been known to live over 20 years, their औसत जीवन प्रत्याशा in the जंगली is तभी 1.8 to 3.1 सालो.
In many क्षेत्रों, शिकार and vehicular injury are the two most common causes of death.
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic परिमाण 7.0 mw भूकंप, साथ an उपरिकेंद्र near the town of Léogâne ( Ouest Department ), approximately west of Port-au-Prince, Haiti 's capital.
The भूकंप occurred at 16:53 local time ( 21:53 UTC ) on Tuesday, 12 January 2010.
By 24 January, at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or greater had been recorded.
An estimated three million people यहूद प्रभावित by the quake.
The उच्चतम विश्वसनीय death count was estimated at 220,000.
Haitian government estimates were higher.
The government of Haiti estimated that 250,000 residences and 30,000 वाणिज्यिक इमारतें था collapsed or were severely damaged.
The earthquake caused major damage in Port-au-Prince, Jacmel और अन्य settlements in the region.
Many notable लैंडमार्क इमारतें यहूद significantly damaged or destroyed, including the Presidential Palace, the National Assembly building, the Port-au-Prince Cathedral, and the main jail.
Among those killed were Archbishop of Port-au-Prince Joseph Serge Miot, and विपक्ष नेता micha Gaillard.
The headquarters of the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ), located in the capital, collapsed, हत्या अनेक, सहित the Mission 's Chief, Hédi Annabi.
Many countries responded to appeals for humanitarian aid, pledging निधि और dispatching बचाव और चिकित्सा teams, engineers and support personnel.
Communication systems, air, land, and sea transport facilities, hospitals, and electrical networks had been damaged by the earthquake, which hampered rescue and aid efforts ; confusion over जो थी in चार्ज, एयर ट्रैफ़िक जमघट, और समस्याएं साथ prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief work.
Port-au-Prince 's morgues were अभिभूत साथ tens of thousands of bodies.
These had to be दफ्न in द्रव्यमान क़ब्रों.
As rescues tailed off, supplies, चिकित्सा परवाह और sanitation became priorities.
Delays in aid distribution led to angry appeals from aid workers और survivors, और लूटने और विरल हिंसा were observed.
On 22 January the संयुक्त राष्ट्र विख्यात कि the आपात phase of the relief operation was drawing to a close, and on the following day the Haitian government officially called off the search for survivors.
Mister Ed is a fictional talking horse, originally appearing in छोटी कहानियां by वाल्टर R. ब्रूक्स, और later in an American television situation comedy produced by Filmways that first aired in syndication from January 5 to July 2, 1961, and then on CBS from October 1, 1961 to February 6, 1966.
The stars of the show were Mister Ed, a palomino horse who could `` talk '', played by gelding Bamboo Harvester and voiced by former Western star Allan Lane ( who went uncredited लिये the संपूर्ण लंबाई of the श्रेणी ), और उसके मालिक, an eccentric और enormously klutzy, yet friendly, architect named Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ).
Much of the कार्यक्रम 's ह्यूमर stemmed इससे the फैक्ट मिस्टर Ed would speak only to Wilbur, as well as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker.
Other running jokes centered on Wilbur 's character being a huge klutz और inadvertently causing harm to himself or others.
According to the दिखाएँ 's निर्माता, आर्थर lubin, यंग was chosen as the lead character because he `` just seemed like the sort of guy a horse would talk to ''.
Lubin, a friend of Mae West, scored a तख्तापलट by persuading the स्क्रीन प्रतीक to guest star in one episode.
In the United States, reruns aired on उपनाम at नाइट इससे March 3, 1986, to February 1, 1993.
Sister station TV Land also reran the show from 1996–98 और again इससे 2003-06.
The series is currently broadcast every morning on This TV, साथ साथ राजमार्ग Patrol, and The Patty Duke Show.
It is also currently broadcast on hallmark फिल्म चैनल.
As of January 1, 2011, the पहला two seasons of the show are available on Hulu.
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology which refers to the `` being caught up '' discussed in 1 thessalonians 4:17, जब the `` dead in Christ '' and `` we who are alive and remain '' will be `` caught up in the clouds '' to meet `` the Lord in the air ''.
The term `` Rapture '' is प्रयुक्त in at तनिक two senses.
In the pre-tribulation दृश्य, a group of people will be left behind on earth after another group literally leaves `` to meet the Lord in the air. ''
This is now the most common use of the term, विशेषकर among fundamentalist ईसाइयों और in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The other, older use of the term `` Rapture '' is simply as a synonym for the final resurrection generally, without a belief that a group of people is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the कार्यक्रम of 1 thessalonians 4:17.
This distinction is important as some types of Christianity never refer to `` the Rapture '' in religious education, but might use the older and more सामान्य भाव of the शब्द `` rapture '' in referring to what happens during the final resurrection.
There are many views among Christians regarding the timing of Christ 's return ( including whether it will occur in one event or two ), and various views regarding the गंतव्य of the aerial महफ़िल वर्णित in 1 thessalonians 4.
Denominations such as Roman catholics, परंपरागत ईसाइयों, लूथरन ईसाइयों, and Reformed Christians believe in a rapture only in the sense of a general final resurrection, when Christ returns a single time.
They do नहीं मानना कि a समूह of लोगों is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was developed in the 1830s by John Nelson Darby and the Plymouth brethren, and popularized in the United States in the early 20th century by the wide circulation of the Scofield Reference Bible.
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born February 6, 1985 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर बास्केट खिलाड़ी साथ the Brooklyn Nets.
The Philistine cities of Gaza, Ashdod, ashkelon, ekron, and Gath
The Philistines (,,, or ;, Plištim ), Pleshet or Peleset, were a people who as part of the Sea Peoples appeared in the southern coastal area of Canaan at the beginning of the Iron Age ( circa 1175 bc ), सबसे संभवतः from the Aegean region.
According to the Bible, they ruled the five city-states ( the `` philistine pentapolis '' ) of Gaza, Ashkelon, Ashdod, Ekron and Gath, from Wadi Gaza in the south to the Yarqon River in the north, but with no fixed border to the east.
The Bible paints them as the Kingdom of इसराईल 's सबसे खतरनाक दुश्मन.
Originating somewhere in the Aegean, their population was around 25,000 in the 12th century BC, rising to a peak of 30,000 in the 11th सदी bc, of जिससे the ईजियन तत्व थी नहीं अधिक than हाफ the total, and perhaps much less.
Nothing is known for certain about the original language or languages of the Philistines, however they यहूद नहीं भाग of the सामीती canaanite जनसांख्यिकी.
There is कुछ सीमित प्रमाण in पक्ष of the assumption that the Philistines were Indo-European-speakers either from Greece and/or Luwian speakers from the coast of Asia Minor.
Philistine-related words found in the बाइबल हैं नहीं सामीती, और can in some cases, with reservations, be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots.
By the beginning of the 1st मिलेनियम bce वे था अपनाया the सामान्य Canaanite language of the region.
The Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery ( asvab ) is a अनेक चुनाव परीक्षण, administered by the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य Entrance Processing Command, used to determine qualification for enlistment in the United States armed forces.
It is often offered to American high school students when they are in the 10th, 11th और 12th ग्रेड, हालांकि anyone eligible for enlistment may take it.
Although the test is administered by the military, it is not ( and never has been ) a requirement that a test-taker with a qualifying score enlist in the हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
In financial accounting, a balance sheet or statement of financial position is a summary of the financial balances of a sole proprietorship, a business partnership, a corporation or other कारोबार संगठन, such as an LLC or an LLP.
Assets, liabilities and ownership equity are listed as of a specific date, ऐसे as the समाप्त of इसके वित्तीय year.
A balance चादर is प्रायः described as a `` snapshot of a company 's financial condition ''.
Of the four basic financial statements, the balance sheet is the only statement which applies to a single point in समय of a कारोबार ' calendar year.
A standard कम्पनी संतुलन चादर रै three parts : assets, liabilities and ownership equity.
The main categories of assets are प्रायः सूचीबद्ध पहला, and typically in order of liquidity.
Assets are followed by the देनदारी.
The difference between the assets and the liabilities is known as equity or the net assets or the net worth or capital of the company and according to the accounting equation, net worth must equal assets minus liabilities.
another रास्ता to dekh at the वही समीकरण is कि assets equals liabilities plus owner 's equity.
Looking at the equation in this way shows how assets were financed : either by उधार money ( liability ) or by using the owner 's money ( owner 's equity ).
Balance चादरें हैं प्रायः प्रस्तुत साथ assets in one section and liabilities and net worth in the other section with the two sections `` balancing. ''
A business ऑपरेटिंग entirely in नकदी can measure its profits by withdrawing the entire bank balance at the end of the period, plus any cash in hand.
However, अनेक व्यवसायों are not paid immediately ; they build up inventories of goods and they acquire buildings and equipment.
In other words : businesses have assets and so they can not, even if they want to, तत्काल फेरे ये into नकदी at the end of each period.
Often, these businesses owe money to suppliers and to tax authorities, and the proprietors do not withdraw all their original पूंजी और profits at the end of each period.
In other words व्यवसायों also have liabilities.
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire, commonly known as the.17 hmr, is a rimfire राइफल कार्ट्रिज विकसित by the ammunition company Hornady in 2002.
It descended from the.22 Magnum by necking down the.22 Magnum case to take a.17 caliber ( 4.5 mm ) bullet, and it is more costly to shoot than परंपरागत.22 कैलिबर rimfire cartridges.
Commonly loaded with a 17 grain ( 1.1 g ) bullet, it can deliver muzzle velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ).
the schaumburg flyers were a professional baseball team based in Schaumburg, Illinois, in the United States.
The Flyers were to be a charter member of the North American League, which is not affiliated with Major लीग बेसबॉल, however, the टोली folded in March 2011, before they began play in the NAL.
From the 1999 ऋतु to the 2010 ऋतु, the Flyers played their home games at Alexian Field, near the Elgin O'Hare Expressway.
The team formerly निभाई in थंडर Bay, Ontario, where they were known as the Thunder Bay Whiskey Jacks.
The team was originally a सदस्य of the Northern League from 1993 to 2010.
on जुलाई 27, 2009, the Flyers played host to Battle of the Sexes II, which pitted the Flyers against the National Pro Fastpitch Softball Champions, the Chicago Bandits.
Played by official सॉफ्टबॉल नियम, the game was seen by an overflow record crowd of 8,918, and was won by the Bandits 4-2.
In 1999, the flyers नियुक्त their first manager, Ron Kittle.
Kittle is best known for his playing दिनों साथ the शिकागो श्वेत sox, और पूर्व शिकागो शावक और श्वेत Sox player Greg Hibbard was the pitching coach.
During the early years of the franchise, Kittle did a series of TV commercials to promote the team, using the gimmick `` Ma Kittle. '' where he निभाई दोनो खुद और his `` Ma. ''
The विज्ञापन यहूद कामयाब at sparking some initial interest in the team as the Flyers hoped to steal away fans from the nearby Kane County Cougars.
The ad mimicked the highly successful Converse ads where Larry Johnson starred as दोनो खुद और `` gramama. ''
At the end of the 2001 season, however, Kittle resigned इससे उसके managerial position, and Jim Boynewicz was hired to replace him.
In 2004, the flyers बना it to the Northern League Championship Series against the St. Paul Saints.
Despite leading the five-game series 2-1, Schaumburg आखिरकार lost the series.
In Game 5, Flyers relief pitcher Lyle Prempas अनुमत a खेल जीतना ग्रैंड स्लैम by st. पॉल infielder Marc Mirizzi in the ninth inning.
The Flyers appeared in the Northern League Playoffs four times ( 1999, 2003, 2004, 2006 ) लकिन never जीती the चैंपियनशिप.
Some famous players who played for the Flyers were former Oakland A 's outfielder ozzie canseco और पूर्व शिकागो Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith.
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice / ; born 7 March 1970 ) is an English film and थिएटर अभिनेत्री और पूर्व fashion model.
वाइज़ began her acting career at Trinity Hall, Cambridge in the early 1990s, then started working in television, appearing in Inspector Morse, the British mini-series Scarlet and Black, and the television film Advocates II.
वो बना उसके फिल्मी début in the फिल्मी मौत यंत्र ( 1994 ), but her breakthrough role came in the film Chain Reaction ( 1996 ), leading to a high-profile role as Evelyn Carnahan-O'Connell in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ).
Other notable films featuring Weisz are Enemy at the Gates, About a Boy, constantine, the फव्वारा and The Constant Gardener, for which she received an Academy Award, a Golden Globe and a Screen Actors ' Guild award for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle.
She has been labelled an `` English rose '' चूंकि उसके नाबालिग भूमिका in Stealing Beauty ( 1996 ).
Weisz also works in थिएटर.
Her stage breakthrough was the 1994 revival of Noël Coward 's play Design for Living, which अर्जित उसके the लंदन आलोचकों वृत्त पुरस्कार for the most promising newcomer.
Weisz 's performances also include the 1999 Donmar Warehouse production of Tennessee Williams ' Suddenly, पिछला गर्मियाँ, और उनके 2009 पुनरुद्धार of A Streetcar Named Desire.
Her portrayal of Blanche DuBois in the latter play earned उसके the आलोचकों ' वृत्त थिएटर Award for Best Actress.
She has recently played Evanora in Oz the Great and शक्तिशाली.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign शक्तियां did not intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his प्रशासन होता not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave states जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a सुलह, और दोनो sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none पहचाना the नई confederate राज्य of अमेरिका.
Hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval blockade that अबोध the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the emancipation Proclamation, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, and the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight battles of अपघर्षण through the overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Potato bread is a form of bread in which potato replaces a portion of the regular wheat flour.
it is पकाया in a किस्में of methods, including by baking it on a hot griddle or pan, or in an oven.
It may be leavened or unleavened, and may have a variety of other संघटक baked into it.
The ratio of potato to wheat आटा varies significantly इससे रेसिपी to रेसिपी, साथ some recipes having a majority of potato, and others having a majority of wheat flour.
Some recipes call for mashed आलू, with others calling for dehydrated potato flakes.
It is available as a commercial product in many countries, with similar variations in संघटक, कुकिंग विधि, और अन्य variables.
The Pacific Time Zone observes standard time by subtracting आठ घंटों from Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
The clock time in this zone is based on the mean सौर समय of the 120th मध्याह्न वेस्ट of the Greenwich Observatory.
During daylight saving time, its time offset is.
In the United States and Canada, this time zone is generically पुकारा प्रशांत Time ( PT ).
Specifically, it is Pacific Standard Time ( PST ) when observing standard समय ( शीत ), और प्रशांत daylight समय ( PDT ) when observing daylight saving time ( summer ).
Most of Canada uses daylight saving time.
In Mexico the UTC−8 time zone is known as the Northwest Zone, which is synchronized with the U.S. PDT daylight saving schedule.
The largest city in the Pacific Time Zone is Los Angeles in California from USA ; the city 's महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the largest in the zone.
The zone is एक घंटा ahead of the Alaska Time Zone, one hour behind the Mountain Time Zone and three hours behind the Eastern Time Zone.
Stereo 8, commonly known as the eight-track cartridge, eight-track tape, or simply eight-track, is a चुम्बकीय टेप ध्वनि रिकॉर्डिंग प्रौद्योगिकी.
it थी लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे the mid-1960s through to the early 1980s, but was relatively unknown in many European countries.
It was, however, बहुत लोकप्रिय in the United Kingdom during this period.
Stereo 8 was created in 1964 by a consortium led by Bill Lear of Lear जेट निगम, साथ with Ampex, Ford Motor Company, General Motors, Motorola, and RCA Victor Records ( RCA ).
It was a further development of the similar stereo-pak four-track कार्ट्रिज निर्मित by Earl `` Madman '' Muntz.
A later quadraphonic संस्करण of the स्वरूप थी घोषित by RCA in April 1970 and first known as Quad-8, then later changed to just Q8.
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian :, alternatively transcribed as Rameses and Ramses or ), referred to as रामेसेस the ग्रेट, थी the तीसरा Egyptian pharaoh ( reigned 1279 BC – 1213 BC ) of the Nineteenth dynasty.
He is often regarded as the महानतम, सबसे मनाये, and most powerful pharaoh of the Egyptian Empire.
His successors और बाद उन्होंने called him the `` Great Ancestor. ''
Ramesses II led several military expeditions into the levant, re-asserting Egyptian control over Canaan.
He भी led रिझाने to the दक्षिण, into Nubia, commemorated in inscriptions at Beit el-Wali and Gerf Hussein.
At age fourteen, Ramesses was appointed प्रिंस रीजेंट by his father Seti I.
He is believed to have taken the throne in उसके लेट किशोर और is ज्ञात to have ruled Egypt from 1279 BC to 1213 BC for 66 years and 2 months, according to both Manetho and Egypt 's contemporary historical records.
He was once said to have lived to be 99 years old, but it is more likely that he died in his 90th or 91st year.
If he became Pharaoh in 1279 BC as most Egyptologists today believe, he would have assumed the throne on May 31, 1279 BC, based on his known accession तिथि of III Shemu day 27.
Ramesses II celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed festivals ( the first held after तीस सालो of a pharaoh 's शासनकाल, और तब every three years ) during his reign—more than any other pharaoh.
On his death, he was दफ्न in a मकबरा in the Valley of the Kings ; his body was later moved to a royal cache where it was discovered in 1881, and is now on display in the Cairo Museum.
The early भाग of his reign was focused on building cities, temples and monuments.
He established the city of Pi-Ramesses in the Nile Delta as his new capital and प्रमुख आधार लिये उसके campaigns in Syria.
This city was built on the remains of the city of Avaris, the capital of the हिक्सोस जब वे took over, और थी the location of the main Temple of Set.
He is also known as Ozymandias in the यूनानी स्त्रोत, इससे a लिप्यन्तरण into यूनानी of a भाग of Ramesses 's throne name,, `` Ra 's mighty truth, chosen of Ra ''.
The Texas Rangers are a professional बेसबॉल टोली located in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, based in Arlington, Texas.
The Rangers franchise is currently a member of the पश्चिमी प्रभाग of प्रमुख लीग Baseball 's American League.
Since, the रेंजरों have निभाई in रेंजरों ballpark in आर्लिंगटन in Arlington, Texas.
The team 's name is borrowed from the famous law प्रवर्तन agency of the same name.
The franchise was established in 1961 by the name of the Washington सीनेटरों, an विस्तार टोली awarded to वॉशिंगटन, d.C., बाद the नगर 's पहला ballclub, the असली Washington Senators, moved to Minnesota and became the Twins.
After the season, the new Senators moved to आर्लिंगटन, टेक्सास, और debuted as the Rangers the following spring.
The Texas Rangers Baseball Club has made six appearances in the MLB postseason, सब following प्रभाग championships, in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2010, 2011 and 2012.
In 2010, the Rangers उन्नत पास्ट the प्रभाग Series for the first time, defeating the Tampa Bay Rays.
Texas then brought home their first American League Pennant after beating the New York यांकीज़ in six games.
In the 2010 World Series, the मताधिकार 's पहला, the रेंजरों गिरी to the San Francisco Giants in five games.
Their lone victory made them the पहला टेक्सास टोली to जीत a संसार श्रेणी खेल, the ह्यूस्टन Astros having been swept in their 2005 World Series appearance.
They repeated as American League champions the following year, then lost the 2011 संसार श्रेणी to the st. लुई Cardinals in seven games.
Gaius Julius Caesar (, July 100 BC – 15 March 44 BC ) was a Roman general, statesman, Consul and notable लेखक of लैटिन गद्य.
He played a नाजुक भूमिका in the कार्यक्रम कि led to the निधन of the Roman Republic and the rise of the Roman Empire.
In 60 BC, Caesar, Crassus and Pompey formed a political alliance that was to dominate Roman politics for several years.
Their attempts to amass power through populist tactics यहूद opposed by the रूढ़िवादी elite भीतर the Roman Senate, among them Cato the Younger with the frequent support of Cicero.
Caesar 's conquest of Gaul, completed by 51 BC, extended Rome 's territory to the English Channel and the राइन.
Caesar became the first Roman general to cross both when he built a bridge across the राइन और conducted the पहला आक्रमण of Britain.
These achievements granted him unmatched military power and threatened to eclipse the standing of Pompey, who had realigned himself with the Senate after the मौत of crassus in 53 bc.
With the Gallic Wars concluded, the Senate ordered Caesar to lay down his military कमांड और वापसी to रोम.
Caesar refused, and marked his defiance in 49 BC by crossing the Rubicon with a legion, leaving उसके प्रांत और illegally entering Roman territory under arms.
Civil युद्ध resulted, इससे जिससे he emerged as the unrivaled leader of Rome.
After assuming control of सरकारी, सीज़र began a कार्यक्रम of सोशल and governmental reforms, including the creation of the Julian calendar.
He centralised the bureaucracy of the Republic and was eventually proclaimed `` dictator in perpetuity ''.
But the underlying राजनैतिक विरोध had not been resolved, and on the Ides of March ( 15 March ) 44 BC, Caesar was assassinated by a group of senators led by Marcus Junius Brutus.
A new series of civil wars broke out, and the constitutional government of the गणतंत्र थी never restored.
Caesar 's अपनाया वारिस octavian, later known as Augustus, rose to sole power, and the era of the Roman Empire began.
Much of Caesar 's life is known from his own accounts of his military campaigns, and इससे अन्य समकालीन स्त्रोत, mainly the letters and speeches of Cicero and the historical writings of Sallust.
The later biographies of सीज़र by Suetonius and Plutarch are also major sources.
Caesar is deemed to be one of the greatest military कमांडरों of history.
Linguistic मैप of सीरियल, Cameroon, and Benin.
Sign in अंग्रेज़ी, बाहर the University of Lagos
वहीँ हैं hundreds of languages spoken in Nigeria.
The major languages are Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, ईदो, fulfulde, कनूरी, and Ibibio.
The official language of Nigeria, English, the former colonial language, was chosen to facilitate the सांस्कृतिक और भाषाई एकता of the देश.
English, however, remains an विशेष बचाना of the देश 's शहरी elite, and is not widely spoken in rural areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole, encompassing three major African languages families : afroasiatic, nilo-saharan, और Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages, such as Cen tuum, जिससे may represent a relic of an भी वृहद diversity prior to the spread of the current language families.
Daucus carota ( आम names शामिल जंगली गाजर, ( uk ) बर्ड 's घोंसला, बिशप 's lace, and Queen Anne 's lace ( North America ) ) is a flowering plant in the family Apiaceae, native to temperate regions of Europe, southwest Asia and naturalised to North America and Australia.
domesticated गाजर are cultivars of a subspecies, Daucus carota subsp. sativus.
In the United States, the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States and confirmed by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the नियुक्ति clause in आलेख II of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States, whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter, अधिनियमों of कॉंग्रेस have स्थापित 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States, and 94 United States district courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a संघीय न्यायधीश ; ऐसे स्थितियाँ शामिल the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court, Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals, and district judges of the United States district courts.
All of these न्यायाधीशों वर्णित यूँ दूर हैं referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution.
In addition, न्यायाधीशों of the अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal courts, including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges, are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, they are neither appointed by the President nor पुष्टि by the सीनेट, और उनके शक्ति गर्भाशयी from Article I instead.
See Article I and आलेख iii tribunals.
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born December 2, 1978 ) is a कनाडाई सिंगर, songwriter and actress.
She has sold 20 million albums worldwide and more 20 million singles, bringing उसके total sales to over 40 million records around the world.
Furtado पहला gained कीर्ति साथ उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, Whoa, Nelly !
, which spawned two कामयाब singles, `` I 'm Like a Bird `` and `` Turn Off the Light ``. ``
I 'm Like A Bird '' won a 2001 Juno पुरस्कार लिये सिंगल of the साल और a 2002 Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance.
In 2003, Furtado released Folklore, which produced three international singles— `` powerless ( कह कया तुम want ) ``, `` कोशिश `` और `` Força ``.
Three years later she released Loose, a worldwide वाणिज्यिक success.
The album शाखित चार number-one हिट्स : `` promiscuous ``, `` Maneater ``, `` Say It Right `` and `` All Good Things ( Come to an End ) ``.
After a three-year break, she released her first full-length Spanish album, Mi Plan, and Furtado received a लैटिन ग्रैमी लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप Vocal Album.
In 2012, Furtado 's fourth English-language studio album, The Spirit अविनाशी थी released.
Furtado 's work has earned her numerous awards and accolades, including 2 Grammy Awards, 10 juno पुरस्कार, 3 muchmusic वीडियो पुरस्कार और a स्टार on कनाडा 's Walk of Fame.
Creatures of the Night is the tenth स्टुडियो एल्बम by Kiss.
It is the बैंड 's पिछला एल्बम लिये Casablanca Records, the only label the group had ever recorded for at that point.
The album was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca founder and early Kiss supporter Neil Bogart, जो था died of cancer during the recording sessions.
It is also the band 's last album recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official member ( until 1998 's Psycho Circus ), and its first एल्बम साथ vinnie विंसेंट as the initially uncredited सीसे guitarist ( Vincent would later be credited, but not featured pictorially on the cover, of 1985 's reissue of the album ).
Touch is a निर्णायक अर्थात् of receiving information.
This photo shows tactile markings identifying सीढ़ियाँ लिये visually impaired people.
The somatosensory system is a diverse sensory system comprising the receptors and processing centres to produce the संवेदी modalities ऐसे as टच, तापमान, proprioception ( body position ), and nociception ( pain ).
The sensory receptors cover the skin and epithelia, skeletal muscles, bones and joints, internal organs, और the cardiovascular प्रणाली.
While touch is considered one of the पाँच परंपरागत senses, the impression of touch is formed from several modalities.
In medicine, the colloquial term `` touch '' is usually replaced साथ `` दैहिक होश '' to better reflect the variety of mechanisms involved.
Somatic senses are sometimes referred to as somesthetic senses, with the understanding that somesthesis शामिल टच, proprioception और ( depending on उपयोग ) भी haptic बोध.
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using different receptors : thermoreceptors, nociceptors, mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors.
Transmission of information from the receptors गुजरता via संवेदी nerves through tracts in the spinal cord and into the brain.
Processing primarily occurs in the प्राथमिक somatosensory क्षेत्रफल in the parietal lobe of the cerebral cortex.
The cortical homunculus was devised by Wilder Penfield.
At its simplest, the system works when activity in a sensory neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus ऐसे as ऊष्मा ; इस सिग्नल आखिरकार गुजरता to an क्षेत्रफल in the दिमाग uniquely attributed to that area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location.
The point-to-point mapping of the body surfaces in the brain is called a homunculus and is अनिवार्य in the सृष्टि of a body image.
This brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) मैप is not immutable, however.
Dramatic शिफ्ट can occur in response to stroke or injury.
Magnolia is a large genus of परिचय 210 flowering संयंत्र प्रजाति in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the family Magnoliaceae.
It is named after French वनस्पतिशास्त्री Pierre Magnol.
Magnolia is an प्राचीन genus.
Appearing before bees did, the flowers विकसित to प्रोत्साहित परागण by भृंग.
To avoid damage from pollinating beetles, the carpels of Magnolia flowers are अत्यधिक मुश्किल.
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have been found dating to 20 million years ago, and of plants identifiably belonging to the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 million years ago.
Another aspect of Magnolias that is considered to represent an ancestral state is that the flower bud is enclosed in a bract rather than in sepals ; the perianth parts are undifferentiated and पुकारा tepals बल्कि than पृथक sepals and petals.
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic with several other flowering पौधे निकट the आधार of the flowering संयंत्र lineage ऐसे as amborella और nymphaea ( as well as with many more recently derived plants such as Lilium ).
The natural range of Magnolia species is a disjunct distribution, with a main centre in east and southeast Asia and a secondary centre in eastern North America, Central America, the वेस्ट इंडीज, और कुछ प्रजाति in दक्षिण अमेरिका.

`` White Christmas '' is an Irving Berlin song reminiscing परिचय an old-fashioned Christmas setting.
According to the Guinness Book of World रिकॉर्ड, the संस्करण सुंग by bing crosby is the best-selling single of all time, with estimated sales in excess of 50 million copies worldwide.
Accounts vary as to when and जहाँ बर्लिन wrote the song.
One story is that he wrote it in 1940, in warm La Quinta, California, while staying at the La Quinta Hotel, a frequent Hollywood retreat also favored by writer-producer फ़्रैंक capra, हालांकि the एरिज़ोना Biltmore also claims the song was written there.
He often stayed up all night writing — he बताई उसके सचिव, `` पकड़ें अपना कलम and take down this song.
I just wrote the best song I 've ever written — हेक, i बस लिखा the बेहतरीन सोंग that anybody 's ever written ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or XC skiing ) is a form of ski touring in जिससे भागीदार propel themselves across snow-covered terrain using skis and poles.
The activity is popular in many places with large snowfields, primarily उत्तरी Europe, Canada, and Alaska.
Cross-country skiing is part of the Nordic skiing sport family, which includes ski jumping, Nordic combined ( cross-country skiing and ski jumping ), Biathlon ( स्कीइंग और राइफल marksmanship ) और ski-orienteering ( जिससे includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ).
Cross-country skiing is the modern style of skiing that सबसे resembles प्रागैतिहासिक skiing, particularly when done in the backcountry.
It is also related to telemark स्कीइंग.
A use tax in United States is पूरक to बिक्री tax which means, if you buy a Taxable product/services without paying any Sales tax to vendor, you owe use tax.
You must self assess use tax and pay it directly to the state where the उत्पाद यहूद खपत or सेवाएं यहूद rendered.
Use tax typically is a कर on खपत लकिन if तुम ख़रीदे an मद ( बगैर paying sales tax ) and store it in your warehouse initially, use tax applies to that location where goods were stored.
Later on when the final consumption takes place at some other location, you are required to अदा the differential of tax rate to the jurisdiction of ultimate place of consumption.
This really means that you do n't have to pay दोनो बिक्री कर as खूब as Use Tax on one transaction.
It is only one or the other that you are required to अदा on खरीदें of taxable products/services.
If vendor does n't चार्ज कोई बिक्री कर on इसके चालान तब it is the दायित्व of the buyer to self assess Use tax and pay it to the appropriate Jurisdication.
Use Tax is generally चार्ज at the same tax rate of Sales Tax but in some states the tax rate is different.
Use tax is also termed as `` खपत कर '' or `` Consumer Use Tax ''.
A use tax is a type of excise tax levied in the United States by numerous राज्य सरकारें.
It is assessed upon tangible personal property purchased by a resident of the assessing राज्य लिये उपयोग, भंडार, or खपत in कि राज्य ( नहीं लिये resale ), regardless of where the purchase took place.
If a resident of a state makes a purchase भीतर उसके घर राज्य, पूरा बिक्री कर is paid at the time of the transaction.
The use tax applies when a resident of the assessing state purchases an item that is not subject to his home state 's sales tax.
Usually, this is due to out-of-state purchases, as खूब as ordering वस्तुएं through the mail, by phone, or over the Internet from other states.
The use tax is typically assessed at the same rate as the sales tax that would have been owed ( if कोई ) था the वही goods महरूम खरीदा in the राज्य of निवास.
For example, a resident of Massachusetts, with a 6.25 % `` sales and use tax '' on certain goods and services, purchases non-exempt goods or services in नई हैम्पशायर लिये उपयोग, भंडार or अन्य खपत in मैसाचुसेट्स.
Under New Hampshire law, the New Hampshire vendor collects no sales taxes on the goods, but the Massachusetts purchaser/user must still pay 6.25 % of the बिक्री दाम सीधे to the विभाग of आय in मैसाचुसेट्स as a use tax.
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect sales tax for such goods at time of purchase, whatever taxes were paid by the purchaser to that state can be deducted ( as a कर क्रेडिट ) इससे the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent उपयोग, भंडार or खपत in Massachusetts.
With few exceptions, no state 's vendors will charge the native राज्य 's बिक्री कर on goods shipped आउट of राज्य, अर्थ सब goods ordered from out-of-state are essentially free of sales tax.
The purchaser is therefore required to declare and pay the use tax to उसके घर राज्य on ये ordered goods.
The assessing jurisdiction may make the use tax देय annually, लकिन कुछ राज्य आवश्यकता a monthly payment.
For example, where a Vermont resident has not paid at least 6 % sales tax on property brought in for use in the state, Vermont law requires filing a tax return ( Form SU-452 and payment ) by the 20th दिन of the month following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 late fee, a 5 % penalty per month, to a maximum of 25 %, plus statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties.
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit organizations or governmental agencies, purchases for resale in commerce, and purchases via `` कैज़ुअल बिक्री '' by individuals नहीं in the ordinary course of business.
Also नोट कि वहीँ हैं thousands of tax jurisdictions in the U.S. and many have ever-changing lists of specific types of goods and services that are not taxable.
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 मैसाचुसेट्स विधि requires भुगतान of कर on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software purchased and downloaded over the Internet for installation and use in Massachusetts, regardless of where it originates.
However, the वास्तविक उपयोग of the वही तन्त्र डाउनलोड by a Massachusetts resident to a server in another state remains a non-taxed `` service ''.
In contrast, अरकंसास generally करता नहीं कर anything वितरित over the Internet ( such as downloaded software or music ), except VoIP which is specifically defined as taxable `` telecommunications services ''.
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` delivered thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e., on disk ) in Arkansas is taxable even if ordered online, except `` custom तन्त्र लिये a particular ग्राहक '' जिससे is non-taxable `` प्रोग्रामिंग services '' even if delivered on a disk.
In most मामले, इस जटिलता is भाग of the underlying बिक्री कर कानून ; लकिन जबकि a brick-and-mortar स्टोर रै to सौदे साथ तभी the बिक्री कर कानून of its own location, remote sellers have to deal with the use tax laws of many jurisdictions—up to every US state and locality that assesses them, if the company has a presence or `` nexus '' in every state ( as large `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ).
In medicine, pulmonary hypertension ( ph ) is an बढ़ाएँ of रक्त दबाव in the pulmonary artery, pulmonary vein, or pulmonary capillaries, together known as the lung vasculature, leading to shortness of breath, dizziness, fainting, and other symptoms, all of which are exacerbated by exertion.
pulmonary hypertension can be a severe disease with a markedly decreased exercise tolerance and heart failure.
it थी पहला पहचाना by Dr. Ernst von Romberg in 1891.
According to the most recent classification, it can be one of five different प्रकार : arterial, venous, hypoxic, thromboembolic or miscellaneous.

Sanuk, a division of Deckers Outdoor Corporation, is a जूते ब्रांड आधारित in Southern California.
Sanuk, the Thai word for fun, was founded by Southern California native Jeff Kelley when he started making sandals out of indoor-outdoor carpet.
the पहला उत्पाद निर्मित was green carpeted and entitled the `` Fur Real '' after one shop owner asked if the novelty sandal was `` For Real. ''
The फर रियल पहला became a runaway hit through boutique stores and not the intended surf shops.
The विलक्षणता अधिनियम थी followed up by a चन्दन लपेटा in wire mesh, a leopard print version, and styles made out of a poncho material in a variety of colors.
Sanuk has grown to include style options for men, women and youth और is वितरित आरपार the संयुक्त राज्य और in over 50 देशों throughout Europe, Asia, South America and Australia.
Sanuk centers itself around a positive lifestyle वकालत the स्लोगन, `` मुस्कान, Pass it on ! ``.
In computer विज्ञान, सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषाएं ( भी ज्ञात as vector or multidimensional languages ) generalize operations on scalars to apply transparently to vectors, matrices, and higher dimensional arrays.
Array programming primitives concisely express broad ideas about data manipulation.
The level of conciseness can be dramatic in certain cases : it is नहीं uncommon to ढूँढें सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा one-liners that require more than a couple of pages of Java code.
APL, designed by Ken Iverson, was the first प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा to provide array programming capabilities.
The mnemonic apl refers to the शीर्षक of his seminal book `` A Programming Language '' and not to arrays per se. Iverson 's contribution to rigor and clarity was probably more important than the simple extension of dimensions to functions.
In the United राज्य an annuity अनुबंध is निर्मित जब an insured party, usually an individual, pays a life insurance company a single premium that will later be distributed back to the insured party over time.
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed distribution of income over time, such as via fixed payments, until the death of the person or व्यक्तियों नामित in the अनुबंध or जबतक a फाइनल तिथि, whichever comes first.
However, the majority of modern annuity customers use annuities only to accumulate निधि फ़्री of आय और पूंजी gains कर और to बाद लो lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature.
अध्यक्ष बराक Obama.
Barack Obama साथ उसके पहला परम् अदालत nominee, Sonia Sotomayor.
Following is a सूची of सब संयुक्त राज्य संघीय न्यायाधीशों appointed by President Barack Obama during his presidency.
As of April 30, 2013, 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the United States Senate, namely two Justices to the Supreme Court of the United राज्य, 35 न्यायाधीशों to the संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों of appeals and 150 judges to the United States district courts.
25 further nominations are फिलहाल प्रतीक्षारत Senate action.
There are currently 16 vacancies on the United States Courts of Appeals, 67 vacancies on the United States district courts and 22 additional federal न्यायपालिका vacancies कि हैं anticipated to occur पहले the समाप्त of ओबामा 's दूसरी term.
Obama has not made any recess appointments to the federal न्यायालयों.
Obama has made two nominations to the United राज्य अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय Trade, an Article III tribunal.
Obama also designated sitting judge Emily C. Hewitt of the United States Court of Federal Claims, an Article I court, to be Chief Judge of कि अदालत.
This is a सूची of airports in Mexico, sorted by location.
Mexico has about 1,834 एयरपोर्ट, रैंकिंग 2nd in क्रमांक of एयरपोर्ट in North America, and 3rd in the world.

Agency debt also known as an Agency bond is a security, usually a bond, जारी by a u.S. government-sponsored agency.
The offerings of these agencies are backed but not guaranteed by the US सरकारी चूंकि the agencies are private entities.
Some prominent issuers of these securities are Student Loan Marketing Association ( Sallie Mae ), Federal National Mortgage Association ( fannie mae ) और संघीय घर ऋण Mortgage Corporation ( Freddie Mac ).
Agency securities are usually exempt from राज्य और लोकल कर, but not federal tax.
Agency debt is भी पुकारा an agency security.
The Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, a खौलते water reactor.
The reactors are located inside the rectangular containment buildings towards the सामने of the कूलिंग मीनारें.

Crew members are spelling out Einstein 's mass-energy equivalence सूत्र e = mc2 on the flight deck.
The Russian nuclear-powered icebreaker NS Yamal on a 1994 संयुक्त expedition with the NSF.
Nuclear power is the use of sustained nuclear fission to generate ऊष्मा and electricity.
Nuclear power plants provided about 5.7 % of the संसार 's energy and 13 % of the world 's electricity, in 2012.
In 2013, the IAEA report that there are 437 operational नाभिकीय शक्ति रिएक्टरों ( हालांकि not all are producing electricity ), in 31 countries.
In addition, there are approximately 140 naval vessels using nuclear propulsion in operation, powered by some 180 रिएक्टरों.
There is an जारी बहस about the use of nuclear energy.
Proponents, such as the World Nuclear Association, the IAEA and Environmentalists for Nuclear Energy contend that nuclear शक्ति is a चिरस्थायी उर्जा सोर्स कि reduces carbon emissions.
Opponents, such as Greenpeace International and NIRS, believe that nuclear power मुद्राएँ अनेक खतरे to लोगों और the environment.
Nuclear power plant दुर्घटनाओं शामिल the chernobyl विपत्ति ( 1986 ), फुकुशिमा daiichi nuclear disaster ( 2011 ), and the Three Mile Island accident ( 1979 ).
There have also महरूम कुछ nuclear-powered submarine mishaps.
Research into safety improvements is continuing and nuclear fusion, believed to be safer, may be प्रयुक्त in the भविष्य.
As of 2012, according to the IAEA, worldwide there were 68 civil nuclear power reactors under निर्माण in 15 देशों.
In the US the licenses of almost half its reactors have been extended to 60 सालो, और योजनाएँ to निर्माण another दर्जन are under serious consideration.
However, Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear विपत्ति prompted a rethink of nuclear energy policy in many countries.
Germany decided to close all इसके रिएक्टरों by 2022, और Italy has banned nuclear power.
Following Fukushima, the International Energy Agency halved its estimate of additional nuclear generating capacity to be built by 2035.
फोटोग्राफ of the Berlin Wall taken from the West side.
The Wall was built in 1961 to prevent East Germans from fleeing इससे साम्यवादी.
It was an iconic symbol of the ठंडा युद्ध और इसके पतन in 1989 marked the end of the War.
The Cold War, often dated from 1947 to 1991, was a sustained state of political and military tension between powers in the Western Bloc, dominated by the United राज्य साथ नाटो among इसके allies, and powers in the Eastern Bloc, dominated by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw Pact.
This began after the success of their temporary wartime alliance against Nazi Germany, leaving the USSR and the US as two superpowers साथ profound आर्थिक और राजनैतिक मतभेद.
A neutral faction arose with the non-aligned गति संस्थापित by मिश्र, इण्डिया, and Yugoslavia ; this faction rejected association with either the US-led West or the Soviet-led East.
The Cold War was so named because the two major powers—each possessing nuclear weapons and thereby threatened with mutual assured विनाश —never मिले in सीधा सैन्य combat.
Instead, in their struggle for global influence they engaged in ongoing मनोवैज्ञानिक warfare और in नियमित अप्रत्यक्ष confrontations through proxy wars.
Cycles of relative calm would be followed by ऊँची tension, which could have led to world war.
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ), the Korean War ( 1950–1953 ), the Suez Crisis ( 1956 ), the बर्लिन संकट of 1961, the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट ( 1962 ), the वियतनाम युद्ध ( 1959–1975 ), the Yom Kippur War ( 1973 ), the Soviet war in Afghanistan ( 1979–1989 ), the Soviet downing of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ), and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ).
The conflict was expressed through सैन्य coalitions, रणनीतिक conventional फ़ोर्स deployments, extensive सहायता to क्लाएंट राज्य, espionage, विशाल प्रचार campaigns, conventional and nuclear arms races, appeals to neutral nations, rivalry at sports events ( in particular the Olympics ), and technological competitions such as the Space Race.
The US and USSR became involved in political and military conflicts in the Third World countries of लैटिन अमेरिका, अफ़्रीकी, the मध्य ईस्ट, और southeast Asia.
To alleviate the risk of a potential nuclear war, both sides sought राहत of राजनैतिक तनाव through détente in the 1970s.
In the 1980s, the United States increased राजनयिक, सैन्य, और आर्थिक pressures on the Soviet Union, at a time when the communist state was already suffering from economic stagnation.
In the mid-1980s, the नई सोवियत अध्यक्ष मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` openness '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures for national independence grew stronger in पूर्वी Europe, especially Poland.
They reached a breaking point when Gorbachev refused to use Soviet troops to support the faltering सरकारी of ईस्ट Germany in late 1989.
Within weeks all the satellite states broke free from Moscow in a peaceful wave of revolutions ( वहीँ थी कुछ हिंसा in रोमानिया ).
The pressures escalated अंदर the सोवियत संघ, जहाँ साम्यवादी fell and the USSR was formally dissolved in late 1991.
The United States remained as the world 's तभी महाशक्ति.
The Cold War and its events have left a significant legacy, and it is प्रायः referred to in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति, विशेषकर in मीडिया featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare.
pikes शिखर राज्य पार्क is a state park of Iowa, USA, featuring a bluff overlooking the Upper Mississippi River opposite the confluence of the Wisconsin River.
The park is संचालित by the Iowa Department of Natural Resources.
It is nearly a thousand acres ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
The nearest city is मैकग्रेगर, आयोवा.
Iowa राजमार्ग 76 लगभग defines its northern boundary.
It gets its नाम इससे the आयोवा अवतार of pikes शिखर, a particularly high point overlooking the gorge of the Upper Mississippi, and like Pikes Peak in Colorado, is named for Zebulon Pike.
There हैं चढ़ाई trails, campgrounds and RV facilities.
Mountain bikes are permitted in निश्चित portions of the park.
Aside from recreational development, the land in the park was never साफ और to a विशाल extent remains as it was before the advent of white settlement.
It is part of a larger complex of पार्क, reserves और refuges जिससे शामिल पुतला mounds नेशनल स्मारक, the विभिन्न components of the पीला नदी राज्य वन, the विशाल Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge and much smaller, much less well known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge.
The Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System is undergoing development, and will connect तत्व of ये sites.
Zac Brown Band is an American country/folk बैंड आधारित in Atlanta, Georgia.
The lineup consists of Zac Brown ( lead vocals, guitar ), Jimmy De Martini ( fiddle, vocals ), John Driskell Hopkins ( bass guitar, vocals ), Coy Bowles ( guitar, keyboards ), Chris fryar ( ड्रम ), मिट्टी कुक ( गिटार, keyboards, mandolin, steel guitar, vocals ), and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ).
The band has toured throughout the United States, including a slot on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival.
They have also recorded five studio albums, and charted nine Number One singles on the Billboard country charts : `` Chicken fried ``, `` toes ``, `` राजमार्ग 20 सवारी ``, `` फ़्री ``, `` as She 's Walking Away ``, `` Colder Weather ``, `` Knee Deep ``, `` Keep Me In Mind ``, and `` Goodbye in Her Eyes `` in addition to the singles `` Whatever It Is `` and `` No Hurry ``, which peaked at number 2 on the same chart.
Talk radio is a radio format containing चर्चा परिचय topical मुद्दे.
Most shows are regularly hosted by a सिंगल व्यक्तिगत, और often feature interviews with a number of different guests.
Talk radio typically includes an element of listener participation, usually by broadcasting live conversations between the मेजबान और श्रोता जो `` call in '' ( usually via telephone ) to the show.
Listener contributions are usually screened by a show 's producer ( s ) in order to maximize audience interest and, in the मामला of वाणिज्यिक बात radio, attract advertisers.
Generally, the shows are organized into खण्ड, प्रत्येक separated by a pause for advertisements ; however, in public or non-commercial radio, music is sometimes played in place of commercials to separate the program segments.
Variations of talk radio शामिल रूढ़िवादी बात, hot talk, liberal talk and sports talk.
While talk radio has historically been associated with AM/FM, starting around 2005 the प्रौद्योगिकी लिये internet-based talk-radio shows became cost effective in the form of podcasts.
Now, it is संभावित लिये an व्यक्तिगत to उपयोग a किस्में of services to host an Internet-based talk-radio show without carriage by a traditional radio station.
In addition TV प्रोग्रामिंग इससे बात and news outlets such as BBC, CNN, Bloomberg and Fox are now often available expanding the world of talk radio further.
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed not only on radios, but a चौड़ी किस्में of अन्य डिवाइस और सेवाएं सहित PCs using iTunes, station directories such as Tunein, show directory smartphones with apps such as Stitcher.
Hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the family Hippidae, containing the following species:
Hippa adactyla fabricius, 1787
hippa admirabilis ( Thallwitz, 1892 )
Hippa alcimede ( de man, 1902 )
hippa australis Hale, 1927
hippa carcineutes Holthuis & Manning, 1970
hippa celaeno ( de Man, 1896 )
hippa granulatus ( Borradaile, 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes ( दाना, 1852 )
hippa इंडिका Haig, Murugan & Balakrishnan Nair, 1986
hippa marmorata ( Hombron & Jacquinot, 1846 )
Hippa ovalis ( A. milne-edwards, 1862 )
Hippa picta ( Heller, 1861 )
Hippa strigillata ( Stimpson, 1860 )
Hippa testudinaria ( herbst, 1791 )
Hippa truncatifrons ( Miers, 1878 )
It is closely related to the genus Emerita, and species have often been transferred between the two genera.
Jakarta ( ), officially ज्ञात as the खास पूंजी Region of Jakarta ( ), is the capital and largest city of Indonesia.
Located on the northwest coast of Java, Jakarta is the country 's economic, cultural and political centre, and with a population of 10,187,595 as of November 2011, it is the most populous नगर in इंडोनेशिया और in southeast Asia, and is the thirteenth most populated city in the world.
The official महानगर क्षेत्रफल, ज्ञात as jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining the initial syllables of Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang and Bekasi ), is the second largest in the world, yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it.
Jakarta is listed as a global city in the 2008 Globalization and World Cities Study Group and Network ( GaWC ) शोध.
and रै an क्षेत्रफल of.
This area has population of well over 28 million, बनाना it एक of the संसार 's largest conurbations in terms of number of inhabitants.
In 2011, Jakarta ranked 17th among the world 's 200 largest शहरों, a जम्प इससे its 2007 ranking of 171.
Jakarta has grown अधिक rapidly than Kuala Lumpur, Beijing and Bangkok.
Established in the fourth century, the city became an important trading बंदरगाहों लिये the किंगडम of Sunda.
It was the de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( when it थी ज्ञात as batavia ) और रै जारी as the capital of Indonesia since the country 's independence was declared in 1945.
The city is the seat of the आसियान सचिवालय.
Jakarta is served by the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport, Halim Perdanakusuma International Airport, and Tanjung Priok Harbour ; it is connected by several intercity and commuter railways, and परोसा by अनेक बस लाइनों कार्यशील on reserved busways.
A typical home air कंडीशनिंग window unit.
Air conditioning is the process of altering the properties of एयर ( primarily temperature and humidity ) to more favourable conditions.
More generally, air conditioning can refer to any form of technological cooling, heating, वेंटिलेशन, or कीटाणुशोधन कि modifies the कंडीशन of air.
An air कंडीशनर ( प्रायः referred to as एयर कॉन, ac or a/c, और नहीं to be उलझन साथ the संक्षिप्त लिये प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान ) is a major or home appliance, system, or mechanism designed to change the air temperature and humidity within an area ( used for cooling and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ).
The cooling is typically done using a simple refrigeration cycle, but sometimes evaporation is used, commonly for comfort cooling in इमारतें और मोटर vehicles.
In construction, a पूरा प्रणाली of हीटिंग, वेंटिलेशन and air conditioning is referred to as `` HVAC ``.
`` 6 Foot 7 Foot '' ( also styled as `` 6'7 '' ) is a song by अमरीकी rapper लील वेन featuring label mate, Cory Gunz.
It is लिया इससे उसके नवीं studio album, Tha Carter IV ( 2011 ).

The song samples `` day-o ( the Banana Boat Song ) `` by Harry Belafonte.
DC Talk ( styled as dc Talk ), is a Grammy -winning ईसाई रैप तिकड़ी.
The group was formed in Lynchburg, Virginia in 1987 by Toby McKeehan, Michael Tait, and Kevin Max स्मिथ.
They have released पाँच प्रमुख स्टुडियो एल्बम साथ : DC Talk ( 1989 ), Nu Thang ( 1990 ), Free at Last ( 1992 ), Jesus Freak ( 1995 ), and Supernatural ( 1998 ).
In 2002, the Encyclopedia of समकालीन ईसाई म्यूज़िक पुकारा dc बात `` the सबसे popular overtly Christian act of all time. ''
In 2000, the समूह released an EP titled Solo which contained two solo songs from each member.
Since that time, DC Talk has been on an indefinite अंतराल, and the three band members have each led solo careers.
They have performed and recorded individual songs together several times during the 2000s, although the group never officially reunited or disbanded.
The group 's musical style evolved significantly throughout उनके career.
Their first two releases, DC बात और nu थांग, were of the hip hop genre.
DC Talk 's third album, Free at पिछला, भी मुख्यतः took influence from the hip hop style, although their music began taking on a rock sound.
The trio 's last two albums, Jesus Freak and Supernatural, were predominantly pop rock.
The Bible is a compilation of many shorter books written at different टाइम्स और बाद समवेत into the biblical canon.
All but the shortest of ये books have been divided into chapters, generally a page or so in length, since the early 13th century.
Since the mid-16th century, each chapter has been further विभाजित into `` आयतें '' of a few short lines or sentences.
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one verse, as in the case of, and sometimes there is अधिक than एक वाक्य in a single verse, as in the case of.
As the chapter और श्लोक विभाजन यहूद नहीं भाग of the original texts, they form part of the paratext of the Bible.
The Jewish divisions of the Hebrew text differ at various अंक इससे those used by Christians.
For instance, in यहूदी परंपरा, the ascriptions to अनेक ज़बूर हैं regarded as स्वतंत्र verses, making 116 more verses, whereas the established Christian practice is to count and number each Psalm ascription together with the first verse following it.
Some chapter divisions also occur in different places, e.g. in Hebrew bibles is गिने as in Christian translations.
An index ( plural : indexes ) is a सूची of शब्द or वाक्यांश ( 'headings ' ) और associated pointers ( 'locators ' ) to where useful material relating to that heading can be found in a document.
In a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings will include names of people, places and events, and concepts selected by a व्यक्ति as होने प्रासंगिक और of ब्याज to a संभावित reader of the book.
The pointers are typically page numbers, paragraph numbers or खण्ड numbers.
In a library catalog the words are authors, titles, विषय headings, etc., और the pointers are call numbers.
Internet search engines, such as Google, और पूरा टेक्स्ट searching help provide access to information but are not as selective as an index, as they provide non-relevant links, and may miss relevant information if it is not phrased in exactly the way they expect.
In United States financial regulation, a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a report made by a financial institution to the Financial Crimes Enforcement संजाल ( fincen ), an एजेंसी of the United States Department of the Treasury, regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious activity.

Facebook is an online सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा, जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम लिये the book given to students at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other.
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his college roommates and fellow Harvard विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin, एंड्रयू mccollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the founders to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, लकिन थी विस्तारित to अन्य कॉलेजों in the Boston area, the Ivy League, and Stanford University.
It gradually added support for students at various other universities पहले खोलने to ऊँची स्कूल students, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at least 13 years old to become पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता of the site.
Users must register पहले using the साईट, बाद which they may create a personal profile, add other users as friends, and exchange messages, including automatic notifications when they update their profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by workplace, school or college, or other विशेषताएँ, और categorize उनके मित्रों into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of September 2012, फेसबुक has over one billion active users.
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey, there are 7.5 million children अंतर्गत 13 साथ खाते and 5 million under 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
in may 2005, accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook, and Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot.
A January 2009 compete.com पढ़ाई क्रमित फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल networking service by worldwide monthly active users.
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` कैसा on धरती किया we stalk our exes, remember our co-workers ' birthdays, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics, such as Facebook Detox, state that Facebook has turned into a national obsession in the United States, resulting in vast amounts of समय खोया और encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates फेसबुक रै 138.9 million monthly unique U.S. visitors in May 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a Facebook account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's market growth started to stall in some regions, with the site losing 7 million क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा in May 2011.
Facebook eventually filed for an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering on फ़रवरी 1, 2012, and was headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
फेसबुक inc. began selling stock to the public and trading on the NASDAQ on May 18, 2012.
Sulfonamide functional समूह
Hydrochlorothiazide is a सल्फोनेमाइड और a thiazide.
furosemide is a सल्फोनेमाइड, but not a thiazide.
सल्फोनेमाइड or sulphonamide is the basis of several groups of drugs.
The original antibacterial sulfonamides ( sometimes called sulfa drugs or sulpha drugs ) are synthetic antimicrobial agents that contain the sulfonamide group.
Some sulfonamides हैं भी devoid of antibacterial activity, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
The sulfonylureas and thiazide diuretics are newer drug समूह आधारित on the antibacterial sulfonamides.
Sulfa allergies are common, hence medications containing sulfonamides are prescribed carefully.
It is महत्वपूर्ण to मेक a भेद between sulfa दवाएँ और अन्य sulfur-containing drugs and additives, such as sulfates and sulfites, which are chemically unrelated to the sulfonamide group, and do not cause the same hypersensitivity reactions seen in the sulfonamides.

Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or Anser cygnoides ) are domesticated grey geese ( either ग्रेलैग geese or swan geese ) रखा as मुर्गीपालन लिये उनके मांस, अंडे, और bas feathers चूंकि ancient times.
30 Seconds to Mars is an अमरीकी चट्टान बैंड from Los Angeles, formed in 1998.
Since 2007, the band has consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals, rhythm guitar, songwriter ), Shannon Leto ( drums, percussion ) और tomo miličević ( सीसे गिटार, keyboards ).
Following the departure of Matt Wachter ( now of Angels & Airwaves ) in 2007, Tim Kelleher became the bassist for the group, performing live only with both Jared and miličević रिकॉर्डिंग बास लिये स्टुडियो रिकार्डिंग, जबकि braxton olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009.
Previously, the group also featured guitarists Solon Bixler ( now of Great Northern ) और Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss ).
To date, 30 Seconds to Mars have released three studio albums – 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2002 ), A Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ), This Is War ( 2009 ) and three extended plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ), to the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ), and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ).
30 Seconds to Mars ' music has been associated mostly with neo-prog, progressive metal and post-grunge, but they have also included emo, screamo, स्पेस चट्टान और synthrock into उनके music.
They have been compared to Pink floyd ( जो यहूद an influence on उनके कार्य ) and Tool because of their use of philosophical and spiritual lyrics, concept albums and their use of experimental music.
A Christmas Story is a 1983 American क्रिसमस कॉमेडी फिल्मी आधारित on the छोटी कहानियां और semi-fictional उपाख्यानों of लेखक और raconteur जां गड़रिये, based on his book In God We Trust, All Others Pay Cash, with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories.
It was निर्देशित by bob Clark.
The film has since become a holiday classic and is shown numerous टाइम्स on टेलीविज़न दौरान the Christmas season on the network TBS, often in a 24-hour marathon.
In 2012, the film was selected for preservation in the National Film Registry by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस for being `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.

New York City Cruise Liner टर्मिनल in नरक 's Kitchen at 52nd Street.
The New यॉर्क यात्री जलयान टर्मिनल ( भी known as the Luxury Liner Row or Manhattan Cruise Terminal or New York Cruise Terminal ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side.
The terminal consists of उत्तर नदी पियर 88, 90, 92 and 94 on the Hudson River between West 46th and West 54th Street.
( As a general rule, pier numbers in Manhattan can be संकल्पित by adding 40 to the सम्बन्धित cross-street. )
Ships now डॉक at Piers 88, 90 and 92.
Pier 94 on the north side is now प्रयुक्त लिये प्रदर्शनी space.
Pier 86, once used by United States Lines, is अभी घर to the USS Intrepid.
In 2003, the terminal handled 900,000 passengers.
The city is forecasting कि 1.5 million will use the terminal by 2017.
The पियर हैं long and apart.
They were पहला समाप्त in 1935 to बदलें the चेल्सी Piers as the city 's luxury liner terminal.
The नई टर्मिनल थी निर्मित to handle bigger ships that had outgrown the Chelsea Piers.
The piers were renovated in 1970 and are currently undergoing another $ 150 लाख नवीकरण.
The renovated plans call for it to handle तीन विशाल जहाजों at a time.
In doing renovations, the city is also considering decommissioning Pier 92.
Logo of the New York क्रूज terminal.for
decades the टर्मिनल थी the तभी ocean-going यात्री टर्मिनल in New York harbor.
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's ability to handle comfortably only three large ships at a time, two new terminals have opened in the harbor — the Cape Liberty Cruise Port opened in 2004 in bayonne, नई जर्सी ( प्रयुक्त by Royal Caribbean Cruise Line, Celebrity Cruises and Azamara Cruises ), and the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal ( used by the Queen Mary 2 and other ships of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn, New York.
The West Side Highway takes a small jog east from the piers to नीचे वेस्ट 42nd गली क्युकी जब the टर्मिनल थी निर्मित जमीन had to be taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer piers.
The US Army Corps of Engineers, who control the waterfront dimension, would not extend the pierhead line farther into the river, so the city extended the pier by कटिंग दूर at the land.
The city earlier did this for the Chelsea Piers ; however in चेल्सी तभी लैंडफिल was taken away.
At the Passenger टर्मिनल वास्तविक Manhattan schist was taken away.
इससे डाउनस्ट्रीम in the नदी
Many major passenger ships have docked there, including the RMS Queen Mary 2 and Freedom of the Seas, before the Brooklyn and bayonne terminals opened.
The SS Normandie caught आग and subsequently capsized at its Pier 88 berth during World War II.

Christian right is a पद प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त राज्य to describe right-wing Christian political groups that are characterized by their strong support of socially conservative policies.
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply their understanding of the शिक्षाओं of christianity to राजनीती और पब्लिक नीति by proclaiming the value of those teachings and/or by seeking to use those teachings to influence law and public policy.
In the U.S., the Christian right is an informal coalition formed around a core of evangelical Protestants that draws `` support from politically conservative catholics, यहूदियों, mormons, and occasionally secularists '' who share their goals.
The movement has its roots in American politics going back as far the 1940s and has महरूम विशेषकर influential चूंकि the 1970s.
Their influence draws, in part, from grassroots activism as well as their focus on social issues and ability to motivate the electorate around those issues.
The Christian right is notable today for advancing socially रूढ़िवादी स्थितियाँ on मुद्दे सहित स्कूल दुआ, स्टेम कोशिका शोध, homosexuality, contraception, abortion, and pornography.
Although the ईसाई सही is प्रायः संबद्ध साथ the u.S., the movement has been a key factor in the politics of Canada, The Netherlands, Northern Ireland and Australia, among others.
Far East गति ( stylized as Far★East Movement or abbreviated FM ) is an American hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles.
The group formed in 2003 and consists of Kev Nish ( Kevin Nishimura ), Prohgress ( James Roh ), J-Splif ( jae choung ), और dj virman ( virman Coquia ).
Far East Movement 's first claim to fame was their song `` Round Round '' featured in the Hollywood movie, The Fast and the Furious : Tokyo Drift, और इसके subsequent soundtrack, video game and DVD.
Since `` Round गोलाकार '', the समूह रै महरूम featured on various network shows including,, Entourage, Gossip Girl, and Finishing the Game ( a featured film at Sundance 2007 ).
Their single `` जैसे a g6 `` hit क्रमांक एक on the Billboard Hot 100 Chart and on iTunes as well in late October 2010.
Far East Movement also has the भेद of होने the पहला asian-american समूह to earn a # 1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States.
LR44 is the IEC designation for an alkaline 1.5 volt button cell, commonly used in छोटी led flashlights, डिजिटल thermometers, calculators, calipers, watches, clocks, toys and laser pointers.
LR44 क्षारीय cell
the बैटरी नामकरण is पारिभाषित by the International Electrotechnical Commission ( IEC ) in its 60086-3 standard ( Primary batteries, part 3 Watch batteries ).
The letter L indicates the electrochemical system used ; a zinc negative एलेक्ट्रोड, मैंगनीज dioxide depolarizer and positive electrode, and an alkaline electrolyte.
R44 indicates a गोलाकार कोशिका 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and 5.2±0.2 mm height as defined by the IEC standard 60086.
Manufacturers have their own part numbers for IEC type LR44 बैटरी including:
LR44, LR44G, lr44gd, LR44H
LR1154, L1154, L1154C, L1154F, l1154g, l1154h
6135-99-792-8475 ( NSN )
1166a
AG13, A613, AG14, ag-14, G13A, G13-A
157, 303, 357
A76, GDA76, GP76A, GPA7, GPA75, gpa76, gps76A,
1128MP, 208-904, A-76, CA18, CA19, cr44, d76a, ka, ka76, ms76h, px76a, PX675A, RPX675, RW82, SB-F9, V13GA
4.5-volt, D, c, aa, AAA, AAAA, A23, 9-volt, CR2032 and LR44 batteries
Other types of batteries हैं or यहूद बना in the R44 size.
Formerly, mercury batteries were made as button cells ( प्रकार MR44 and NR44 ).
Zinc-air बैटरी type PR44 require air to work.
silver-oxide बैटरी प्रकार sr44 may provide extra capacity compared to LR44 types but have slightly different voltage characteristics.
Performance of a device meant to use a silver-oxide बैटरी may be degraded with substitution of LR44 types.
