Hurricane कैटरीना थी the deadliest and most destructive Atlantic hurricane of the 2005 Atlantic hurricane season.
It was the costliest natural disaster, as well as one of the five deadliest hurricanes, in the इतिहास of the संयुक्त States.
Among recorded Atlantic hurricanes, it थी the sixth strongest overall.
At least 1,833 people died in the hurricane और subsequent floods, बनाना it the deadliest u.S. hurricane चूंकि the 1928 okeechobee hurricane ; total property damage was estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ), nearly triple the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992.
Hurricane Katrina formed over the Bahamas on August 23, 2005 and crossed southern फ्लोरिडा as a मॉडरेट श्रेणी 1 hurricane, causing कुछ मौतों और बाढ़ there before strengthening rapidly in the Gulf of Mexico.
The hurricane strengthened to a श्रेणी 5 hurricane over the गरम गल्फ जल, लकिन weakened before making its second landfall as a Category 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday, August 29 in southeast Louisiana.
it caused कठोर destruction along the Gulf coast from central Florida to Texas, much of it due to the storm surge.
The most significant number of deaths occurred in New Orleans, Louisiana, which flooded as the levee प्रणाली catastrophically विफल, in many cases hours after the storm had moved inland.
Eventually 80 % of the city and large tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, और the floodwaters lingered for weeks.
However, the worst property damage occurred in coastal क्षेत्रों, ऐसे as सब मिसिसिपी beachfront towns, which were flooded over 90 % in hours, as boats and casino barges rammed buildings, pushing cars and houses inland, with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach.
The hurricane surge protection failures in New ऑरलियन्स हैं माना the worst सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी विपत्ति in u.S. इतिहास and prompted a lawsuit against the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers ( USACE ), the designers and builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965.
Responsibility for the failures and flooding was laid squarely on the Army Corps in January 2008 by Judge Stanwood Duval, U.S. District Court, but the federal agency could not be आयोजित financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928.
There was also an investigation of the responses from federal, state and local governments, resulting in the इस्तीफा of संघीय आपात प्रबन्धन एजेंसी ( fema ) निदेशक माइकल D. भूरा, और of नई ऑरलियन्स पुलिस Department ( NOPD ) Superintendent Eddie Compass.
Several agencies including the United States Coast Guard ( uscg ), नेशनल hurricane बीच ( nhc ), और नेशनल Weather Service ( NWS ) were commended for their actions.
They provided सटीक hurricane मौसम tracking forecasts with sufficient lead time.
Even the most insistent appeals from national, state and local public officials to residents to evacuate before the storm did नहीं warn कि the levees could उल्लंघन और असफल.
u.S. कर्ज़ इससे 1940 to 2011.
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the public '' and black lines indicate the कुल नेशनल कर्ज़ or सकल पब्लिक कर्ज़.
The difference is the `` intragovernmental कर्ज़, '' जिससे includes obligations to government programs such as Social Security.
Stated as a formula, National Debt = Debt आयोजित by the पब्लिक + Intragovernmental Debt.
The second panel shows the दो कर्ज़ आंकड़े as a percentage of U.S. GDP ( dollar value of U.S. economic production for that year ).
The top फलक is deflated so every year is in 2010 dollars.
The United States public debt is the money उधार by the संघीय सरकारी of the United States through the issuing of securities by the Treasury and other federal government agencies.
US public debt consists of two घटकs:
Debt held by the public शामिल राजकोष प्रतिभूति आयोजित by निवेशकों बाहर the संघीय government, including that held by individuals, corporations, the Federal Reserve System and foreign, state and local governments.
Debt held by government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury securities held in accounts administered by the संघीय सरकारी कि हैं owed to कार्यक्रम beneficiaries, such as the Social Security Trust Fund.
Debt held by government accounts represents the cumulative surpluses, सहित ब्याज आय, of these accounts that have been invested in Treasury securities.
Public debt increases or decreases as a परिणाम of the सालाना एकीकृत budget deficit or surplus.
The federal government budget deficit or surplus is the अंतर between government receipts and spending, ignoring intra-governmental transfers.
However, some spending that is excluded from the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) भी adds to the debt.
Historically, the US public debt as a share of जीडीपी increased during wars and recessions, and subsequently declined.
For example, debt held by the पब्लिक as a share of जीडीपी peaked just after World War II ( 113 % of GDP in 1945 ), but then fell over the following 30 years.
In recent decades, however, large budget deficits और the resulting increases in debt have led to concern about the long-term sustainability of the federal government 's fiscal policies.
on 2 अप्रैल 2013, कर्ज़ आयोजित by the public was approximately $ 11.959 trillion or about 75 % of GDP.
intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 trillion, giving a combined total public debt of $ 16.805 trillion.
As of January 2013, $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47 % of the debt held by the public was owned by foreign investors, the largest of which यहूद the लोगों 's Republic of China and Japan at just over $ 1.1 trillion each.
In basketball, an assist is attributed to a खिलाड़ी जो गुजरता the बॉल to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was `` assisting '' in the basket.
There is some निर्णय शामिल in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
An assist can be scored लिये the passer even if the player who receives the pass makes a basket after dribbling the ball.
However, the original definition of an assist did not include such situations, so the तुलना of assist आंकडे आरपार eras is a complex matter.
Only the pass directly before the score may be counted as an assist, so no अधिक than एक assist can be recorded per field goal ( unlike in other sports, such as ice hockey ).
A pass that leads to a shooting foul और स्कोरिंग by फ़्री throws करता not count as an assist in the NBA, but does in FIBA play ( only one assist is awarded per set of free throws in which at least one free throw is made ).
Point guards tend to get the most assists per game ( apg ), as उनके भूमिका is primarily that of a passer and ballhandler.
Centers tend to मिलेंगी कम assists, लकिन centers साथ good floor presence and court vision can dominate a team by assisting.
Being inside the key, the center often has the best angles and the best position for `` बर्तन '' और अन्य छोटी गुजरता in the scoring area.
Center Wilt चेम्बरलेन led the NBA in assists in 1968.
A strong center with inside-scoring prowess, such as former NBA center hakeem olajuwon, can भी be an प्रभावी assistor क्युकी the रक्षा 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the form of shooters.
The NBA single-game assist record is 30, आयोजित by स्कॉट skiles of the ऑरलैंडो Magic against the Denver Nuggets, on December 30, 1990.
The NBA record लिये सबसे करियर assists is held by John Stockton with 15,806.
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK, when discussing property taxes in the United States, or previously in Cyprus and Malta ) is a now-abstract unit of currency used sometimes in accounting.
In the United राज्य, it is a notional ईकाई equivalent to of a United States dollar ( a tenth of a cent ).
In the United Kingdom it was proposed during the दशकों of चर्चा on the decimalization of the pound as a division of the pound sterling.
Several other currencies used the mill, such as the Maltese लीरा.
The term comes from the Latin `` millesimum '', meaning `` thousandth भाग ''.
The Greco-Persian Wars ( also often called the Persian Wars ) were a श्रेणी of विरोध between the Achaemenid Empire of Persia and city-states of the Hellenic world that started in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC.
The collision between the fractious political world of the Greeks और the विशाल साम्राज्य of the फारसियों began when Cyrus the Great conquered Ionia in 547 BC.
Struggling to rule the independent-minded cities of Ionia, the Persians नियुक्त उत्पीड़क to rule each of them.
This would prove to be the source of much trouble for the यूनानियों और Persians alike.
In 499 BC, the then tyrant of Miletus, aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to conquer the island of Naxos, with Persian support ; however, the expedition was a debacle and, pre-empting his dismissal, Aristagoras incited all of Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians.
This was the beginning of the Ionian Revolt, जिससे होता पिछला जबतक 493 BC, progressively drawing more regions of Asia Minor into the conflict.
Aristagoras secured military support from Athens and Eretria, and in 498 BC these forces helped to कैप्चर और बर्न the पारसी क्षेत्रीय capital of Sardis.
The पारसी किंग दारा the ग्रेट vowed to have revenge on Athens and Eretria for this act.
The revolt continued, with the two sides effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC.
In 494 bc, the फारसियों regrouped, and attacked the epicentre of the revolt in Miletus.
At the Battle of Lade, the Ionians suffered a decisive शिकस्त, और the विद्रोह collapsed, साथ the फाइनल members being stamped out the following year.
Seeking to secure his empire from further revolts and from the हस्तक्षेप of the मेनलैंड Greeks, Darius embarked on a scheme to conquer Greece and to punish Athens and Eretria for burning Sardis.
The first Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 bc, साथ the पारसी सामान्य mardonius conquering thrace and Macedon before several mishaps forced an early end to the campaign.
In 490 BC a second force was sent to Greece, this time across the Aegean Sea, under the कमांड of datis and Artaphernes.
This expedition subjugated the cyclades, पहले besieging, capturing and razing Eretria.
However, while en route to attack Athens, the Persian force was decisively defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of मैराथन, समाप्ति पारसी प्रयत्न लिये the समय होने.
Darius then began to plan to complete the conquest of Greece, but died in 486 BC and जिम्मेदारी लिये the conquest passed to his son Xerxes I.
In 480 BC, Xerxes personally led the दूसरी पारसी invasion of Greece with one of the largest ancient armies ever assembled.
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek states ( led by Sparta and Athens ) at the बैटल of thermopylae अनुमत the फारसियों to torch Athens and overrun most of Greece.
However, while seeking to नष्ट the संयुक्त यूनानी बेड़े, the Persians suffered a severe defeat at the Battle of Salamis.
the following साल, the confederated यूनानियों went on the offensive, defeating the Persian army at the Battle of Plataea, and ending the invasion of Greece.
The allied Greeks followed up their success by destroying the बाकी of the पारसी बेड़े at the Battle of Mycale, before expelling Persian garrisons from Sestos ( 479 BC ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ).
The actions of the general Pausanias at the siege of Byzantium alienated many of the Greek states इससे the spartans, और the anti-persian गठबंधन थी इसलिए reconstituted around Athenian leadership, as the so-called Delian League.
The Delian League continued to campaign against Persia for the next three दशकों, शुरूआत साथ the expulsion of the remaining Persian garrisons from Europe.
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in 466 BC, the League won a double victory कि आखिरकार secured स्वतंत्रता लिये the cities of Ionia.
However, the League 's involvement in an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 BC ) resulted in a disastrous शिकस्त, और further campaigning थी निलंबित.
A fleet was sent to साइप्रस in 451 bc, लकिन हासिल little, and when it withdrew the Greco-Persian Wars drew to a quiet end.
Some historical sources suggest the end of hostilities was marked by a सलाम सन्धि between एथेंस and Persia, the so-called Peace of Callias.
Hooverville near पोर्टलैंड, ऑरेगॉन
A `` hooverville '' is the लोकप्रिय नाम लिये shanty towns built by homeless people during the Great Depression.
They were named after Herbert Hoover, who was अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान the onset of the Depression and widely blamed for it.
The term was coined by Charles Michelson, publicity chief of the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल Committee.
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck ( born September 25, 1975 ) is an American football क्वार्टरबैक लिये the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He थी drafted in the छठे round of the 1998 NFL Draft by the Green Bay Packers.
After a season on the practice squad and two seasons backing up Brett Favre, he was traded to the सिएटल सीहॉक्स in 2001.
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003, and led Seattle to six playoff appearances and a Super Bowl appearance ; he was selected to तीन प्रो प्याले और an All-Pro selection.
Following टेन सीज़न साथ the सीहॉक्स, Hasselbeck joined the Tennessee Titans in 2011.
Hasselbeck then signed a contract with the Indianapolis कोल्टस in 2013 कम than 24 घंटों बाद होने released by the Tennessee Titans.
ICT is inevitably सम्बन्धित to the computer network.
Information and Communications Technology or ( ICT ), is often used as an extended synonym for information technology ( IT ), but is a more specific term कि तनावों the भूमिका of एकीकृत संचार और the संयोजन of दूरसंचार ( telephone lines and wireless signals ), computers as well as necessary enterprise software, middleware, storage, and audio-visual systems, which enable users to access, store, transmit, and manipulate information.
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s, but it became popular after it was used in a रपट to the uk सरकारी by डेनिस Stevenson in 1997 and in the revised National Curriculum for England, Wales and Northern Ireland in 2000.
The term ICT is now also used to refer to the convergence of audio-visual and telephone networks साथ कंप्यूटर संजाल through a सिंगल cabling or कड़ी system.
There are large economic incentives ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the telephone network ) to merge the audio-visual, भवन प्रबन्धन और टेलीफोन संजाल साथ the कंप्यूटर संजाल system using a single unified system of cabling, signal distribution and management.
The term Infocommunications is used in some cases as a shorter रूप of सूचना and communication ( s ) technology.
In fact infocommunications is the विस्तार of telecommunications with information processing and content handling functions on a common digital technology base.
For a comparison of ये और अन्य terms, see.
For ICT विकास अनुक्रमणिका around the world, see.

A schematic presentation of the plum pudding model of the atom ; in Thomson 's mathematical model the `` corpuscles '' ( or आधुनिक electrons ) यहूद arranged non-randomly, in rotating rings
The वर्तमान मॉडल of the sub-atomic ढांचा involves a dense nucleus surrounded by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum pudding model of the atom by J. J. Thomson, who discovered the electron in 1897, was proposed in 1904 before the discovery of the परमाणु nucleus in order to add the electron to the atomic model.
In this model, the atom is composed of electrons ( जिससे thomson स्टिल पुकारा `` corpuscles '', हालांकि G. J. Stoney had proposed that atoms of electricity be called electrons in 1894 ) surrounded by a soup of positive charge to balance the electrons ' negative charges, like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding ``.
The electrons ( as we know उन्हें आज ) यहूद विचार to be positioned throughout the atom, but with many structures possible for positioning multiple electrons, particularly rotating rings of electrons ( see below ).
Instead of a soup, the atom was also sometimes said to have had a `` बादल '' of धनात्मक चार्ज.
With this model, Thomson abandoned उसके पहले `` nebular atom '' hypothesis in which the atom was composed of immaterial vortices.
Now, at least part of the atom was to be composed of Thomson 's particulate negative corpuscles, although the rest of the positively चार्ज भाग of the अणु remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined.
The 1904 thomson मॉडल थी disproved by the 1909 gold foil experiment of Hans Geiger and Ernest Marsden.
This was interpreted by Ernest Rutherford in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom containing a बहुत ऊँची धनात्मक चार्ज ( in the case of gold, enough to balance about 100 electrons ), thus leading to the Rutherford model of the atom.
Although सुनहरा रै an परमाणु क्रमांक of 79, तत्काल after Rutherford 's paper appeared in 1911 Antonius Van den Broek made the intuitive suggestion that atomic number is nuclear charge.
The matter required प्रयोग to decide.
Henry Moseley 's work showed experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley 's law ) that the effective nuclear charge was very close to the atomic क्रमांक ( moseley मिला तभी एक ईकाई अंतर ), and Moseley referenced only the papers of Van den Broek and Rutherford.
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( लकिन quantum-limited ) bohr model of the atom in the same year, in which a nucleus containing an atomic number of positive charge is surrounded by an equal number of electrons in orbital shells.
Bohr had also प्रेरित Moseley 's work.
Thomson 's model was compared ( though not by Thomson ) to a British मिठाई पुकारा प्लम खीर, hence the name.
thomson 's पेपर थी प्रकाशित in the March 1904 edition of the Philosophical Magazine, the leading British science journal of the day.
In Thomson 's view :... the atoms of the elements consist of a number of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a गोला of वर्दी positive electrification,...
In this model, the electrons were free to घूर्णन भीतर the blob or cloud of positive substance.
These orbits were stabilized in the model by the fact कि जब an इलेक्ट्रॉन स्थानांतरित दूर इससे the बीच of the positive cloud, it felt a larger net positive inward force, because there was more material of opposite charge, inside its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ).
In Thomson 's model, electrons were free to rotate in rings which were further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, and spectra were to be accounted for by energy differences of different ring orbits.
Thomson attempted to make his model account for some of the प्रमुख spectral लाइनों known for some elements, but was not notably successful at this.
Still, Thomson 's मॉडल ( साथ साथ a समान saturnian रिंग मॉडल लिये परमाणु electrons, also put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka after James Clerk Maxwell 's model of Saturn 's rings ), were earlier harbingers of the later and more successful solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom.
ठेठ strip of bacon.
Bacon is a cured मांस prepared from a pig.
It is first cured using large quantities of salt, either in a brine or in a dry packing ; the परिणाम is भैस बेकन ( भी ज्ञात as green bacon ).
Fresh bacon may then be further सूखी लिये सप्ताह or months in cold air, or it may be boiled or smoked.
Fresh and dried बेकन is typically cooked before eating.
boiled बेकन is तैयार to eat, as is some smoked bacon, but may be cooked further before eating.
बेकन is prepared इससे several different cuts of meat.
It is usually made from side and back cuts of pork, except in the United States, जहाँ it is लगभग सदा prepared इससे पोर्क पेट ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` fatty '', or `` American style '' outside of the US and Canada ).
The side cut has more meat and कम मोटे than the belly.
Bacon may be prepared इससे either of दो पृथक वापस कटौती : fatback, जिससे is almost pure fat, and pork loin, which is very lean.
bacon-cured पोर्क loin is known as back bacon.
uncooked पोर्क belly bacon strips.
बेकन may be eaten smoked, boiled, fried, baked, or grilled, or used as a minor ingredient to flavor dishes.
Bacon is also used for barding and larding roasts, especially game, e.g. venison, pheasant.
The word is derived from the Old High German bacho, meaning `` buttock '', `` ham '' or `` side of bacon '', and cognate with the बूढ़ा फ्रेंच बेकन.
In continental Europe, this part of the pig is usually not smoked like bacon is in the United States ; it is used primarily in cubes ( lardons ) as a cooking ingredient, valued both as a source of fat and for its flavor.
In Italy, this is called pancetta and is usually cooked in small घन or परोसा uncooked और thinly sliced as भाग of an antipasto.
Meat from other animals, such as beef, lamb, chicken, goat, or turkey, may also be cut, cured, or otherwise prepared to resemble बेकन, और may भी be referred to as `` bacon ''.
Such use is common in areas with significant यहूदी and Muslim populations.
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured पेट of a स्वाइन carcass '' ; अन्य कटौती और विशेषताएँ must be separately qualified ( e.g., `` smoked pork loin bacon '' ).
For safety, bacon must be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by Trichinella, a parasitic roundworm जिससे can be नष्ट by हीटिंग, freezing, drying, or smoking.
Bacon is distinguished from salt pork and ham by मतभेद in the brine ( or dry packing ).
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients, most notably sodium nitrite, and occasionally सोडियम नाइट्रेट or पोटैशियम नाइट्रेट ( साल्टपीटर ) ; सोडियम ascorbate or erythorbate हैं added to accelerate curing and stabilize color.
Flavorings such as brown शुगर or मेपल हैं प्रयुक्त लिये some products.
If used, सोडियम polyphosphates are added to improve sliceability and reduce spattering when the bacon is pan fried.
Today, a brine for ham, लकिन नहीं बेकन, शामिल a विशाल amount of sugar.
Historically, `` ham '' and `` bacon '' referred to अलग कटौती of meat that were brined or packed identically, often together in the same barrel.
The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 ( ERISA ) (, codified in part at ) is a federal law जिससे establishes न्यूनतम मानकों लिये पेंशन plans in private industry and provides for extensive rules on the federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans.
ERISA was enacted to protect the interests of employee लाभ योजना भागीदार और उनके beneficiaries by:
requiring the प्रकटीकरण of वित्तीय and other information concerning the plan to beneficiaries ;
Establishing standards of conduct लिये योजना fiduciaries ;
Providing for appropriate remedies और अभिगम to the federal courts.
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full body of laws regulating employee benefit plans, which are मिला मुख्यतः in the आतंरिक आय Code and ERISA itself.
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA is divided among the Department of Labor, the विभाग of the राजकोष ( विशेषकर the आतंरिक Revenue Service ), and the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation.
Illegal immigration to the संयुक्त राज्य is the अधिनियम of विदेशी nationals entering the United States, without government permission and in violation of United States nationality law, or staying beyond the termination date of a visa, also in violation of the law.
A चेतावनी चिह्न at the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary between the United States and Canada in Point Roberts, Washington.
A much अलग approach at the U.S.-Mexico border near El Paso, Texas
The undocumented immigrant population of the United States in 2008 थी अनुमानित by the बीच लिये आव्रजन अध्ययन to be परिचय 11 million people, down from 12.5 million people in 2007.
Other estimates दायरा इससे 7 to 20 million.
According to a 2005 Pew Hispanic Center report, 56 % of undocumented immigrants were from Mexico ; 22 % were from other Latin American countries ; 13 % were from Asia ; 6 % were from Europe and Canada ; and 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world.
Alvin Independent School ज़िला is a स्कूल ज़िला आधारित in Alvin, Texas ( USA ).
Alvin ISD is a large suburban school ज़िला दक्षिण of ह्यूस्टन in the communities of Alvin, Manvel, Pearland, Hillcrest, Rosharon, Iowa Colony, Liverpool, and Amsterdam.
AISD serves Pearland city 's rapidly growing western portion of the city including the new large master-planned communities of छाया क्रीक ranch, दक्षिण कांटा, और दक्षिणी trails.
Alvin ISD कवर of land.
In human anatomy, the ulnar तंत्रिका is a nerve which runs near the ulna bone.
The ulnar collateral ligament of कोहनी संयुक्त is in संबंध with the ulnar nerve.
The nerve is the largest unprotected nerve in the human body ( meaning unprotected by मांसपेशी or अस्थि ), so injury is common.
This nerve is directly कनेक्ट to the छोटी उंगली, और the सटा हाफ of the रिंग finger, supplying the palmar side of these fingers, including both front and back of the tips, perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds.
One method of injuring the तंत्रिका is to स्ट्राइक the medial epicondyle of the humerus from posteriorly, or inferiorly with the elbow flexed.
The ulnar nerve is trapped between the अस्थि और the overlying skin at this point.
This is commonly referred to as bumping एक 's `` funny bone ''.
This name is thought to be a pun, आधारित on the sound resemblance between the name of the bone of the upper arm, the `` humerus `` and the word `` humorous ``.
Alternatively, according to the Oxford English Dictionary it may refer to `` the peculiar सनसनी अनुभवी जब it is struck ''.
Hogwarts स्कूल of Witchcraft and Wizardry, shortened Hogwarts, is a fictional British school of magic for students aged eleven to eighteen, and is the primary setting for the first six books in J.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
Rowling has suggested that she may have inadvertently taken the name इससे the hogwort संयंत्र ( croton capitatus ), जिससे वो था देखी at kew gardens कुछ समय पहले writing the series, although the names `` The Hogwarts '' and `` Hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans.
Hogwarts school was voted as the 36th best Scottish educational establishment in a 2008 ऑनलाइन रैंकिंग, outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto School.
According to a director of the Independent Schools Network Rankings, it was added to the स्कूलों लिस्टिंग `` लिये मजा '' and was then voted on.
The U.S. subprime बंधक संकट थी a नियत of कार्यक्रम और शर्तें that led to a financial crisis and subsequent recession that began in 2008.
It was characterized by a rise in subprime mortgage delinquencies and foreclosures, and the resulting decline of securities backed by कहा mortgages.
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September 2008, with significant disruption in the प्रवाह of क्रेडिट to व्यवसायों and consumers and the onset of a severe global recession.
There were अनेक कल्याणकारी of the संकट, साथ commentators assigning different levels of blame to financial institutions, regulators, credit agencies, government housing policies, and consumers, among others.
A proximate कारण थी the rise in subprime lending.
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated during a given साल रोज़ इससे the ऐतिहासिक 8 % or निम्नतर दायरा to approximately 20 % from 2004 to 2006, with much higher ratios in some parts of the U.S.
A high percentage of these subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 for example, यहूद adjustable-rate mortgages.
These two changes यहूद भाग of a broader trend of lowered lending standards and higher-risk mortgage products.
Further, U.S. households had become increasingly indebted, with the ratio of debt to disposable personal income rising इससे 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the समाप्त of 2007, much of this increase mortgage-related.
When U.S. home prices declined steeply बाद peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' ability to refinance their loans became more difficult.
As adjustable-rate mortgages began to रीसेट at उच्चतर ब्याज दरों ( causing higher monthly payments ), mortgage delinquencies soared.
Securities backed with mortgages, including subprime mortgages, widely आयोजित by वित्तीय firms globally, lost most of their value.
Global investors also drastically घटाया purchases of mortgage-backed कर्ज़ और अन्य प्रतिभूति as part of a decline in the capacity and willingness of the private financial system to support lending.
Concerns about the soundness of U.S. credit and financial markets led to tightening क्रेडिट around the संसार और slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe.
The crisis had severe, long-lasting consequences लिये the u.S. और European economies.
The U.S. entered a deep recession, with nearly 9 million jobs खोया दौरान 2008 and 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
U.S. आवास कीमतें गिरी nearly 30 % on average and the U.S. stock market fell approximately 50 % by early 2009.
As of early 2013, the U.S. stock market had recovered to its pre-crisis peak but आवास कीमतें remained निकट उनके कम पाइंट और बेरोजगारी remained elevated.
Economic growth remained नीचे pre-crisis levels.
Europe also जारी to संघर्ष साथ इसके own economic crisis.
Carl Jung in 1910.
Myers and Briggs extrapolated their MBTI theory from Jung 's कृतियाँ in उसके किताब मनोवैज्ञानिक Types.
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( mbti ) assessment is a psychometric questionnaire designed to measure psychological preferences in how people perceive the world and make decisions.
These preferences were extrapolated from the typological theories proposed by Carl Gustav Jung और पहला प्रकाशित in उसके 1921 किताब Psychological Types ( English edition, 1923 ).
Jung theorized कि वहीँ हैं चार प्रिंसिपल मनोवैज्ञानिक functions by which we experience the world : sensation, intuition, feeling, and thinking.
One of these four कृत्यों is प्रबल most of the time.
The original डेवलपर of the व्यक्तित्व inventory यहूद katharine कुक briggs और उसके बेटी, इसाबेल briggs मायर्स ; these two, having studied extensively the work of Jung, turned their interest of human behavior into a devotion of turning the theory of psychological types to practical use.
They began creating the indicator during World War II, believing that a knowledge of personality preferences would help women who were entering the औद्योगिक workforce लिये the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable and effective ''.
The initial प्रश्नावली grew into the myers-briggs Type Indicator, which was first published in 1962.
The MBTI focuses on normal populations and emphasizes the value of naturally occurring मतभेद.
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is that we all have specific preferences in the way we construe हमारी अनुभवों, और ये वरीयताओं underlie हमारी रूचि, needs, मान, and motivation '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist महिला गागा, इससे उसके दूसरी स्टुडियो album Born This Way ( 2011 ).
It was released by Interscope Records on April 15, 2011, four days ahead of इसके अनुसूचित रिलीज.
Written and produced by Lady गागा और redone, `` Judas '' is a dance and electro house song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted गागा in the पास्ट, और इसके कोर अर्थ refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape.
Gaga has further explained that the song was भी परिचय honoring one 's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the light.
The artwork for the सिंगल थी designed by गागा in Microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups, the song was generally well received by critics, who likened the song to `` ख़राब रोमांस `` साथ कुछ noting it चाहिए have महरूम the album 's lead single.
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's पिछला redone-produced tracks, including `` Poker Face ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` Bad Romance '', and `` Alejandro ``.
It contains तीन पृथक hooks and a house -influenced break down.
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the विश्लेषण बात परिचय उसके as परे redemption, regarding the traditional views of what a woman should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales opening, but was less successful commercially in तुलना to Gaga 's previous singles.
The song reached the top ten of the charts in most major music markets, and also reached the top of the charts in South Korea.
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by गागा और laurieann गिब्सन and co-starring Norman Reedus.
It has a Biblical storyline where reedus निभाई यहूदा Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene.
The video portrays them as आधुनिक day missionaries going to Jerusalem.
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying यीशु, और ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before its release, the Catholic लीग condemned गागा लिये the कथित use of religious imagery and her role in the video.
however, आलोचकों generally praised the video, not finding any offensive content.
The video was मनोनीत लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards.
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows, including The Graham Norton Show, शनिवार रात्रि सजीव, शुभ morning americas `` Summer Concert Series '', the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
Marvin Gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born Marvin Pentz Gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` और `` i सुना it through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell, later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On and Let 's Get It On and became among the first artists in motown to ब्रेक दूर इससे the बागडोर of its production company.
Gaye 's later रिकार्डिंग बहकावे अनेक r & b subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul.
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning hit `` यौन Healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye has been posthumously honored by many institutions, including the Grammy Lifetime Achievement पुरस्कार और the चट्टान और Roll Hall of Fame.
The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and sciences ( ampas ) to निर्माता working in the गति चित्र industry and is the only category in which every member is eligible to nominate for.
Best Picture is considered the most important of the Academy Awards, as it represents all the directing, acting, music composing, writing, editing and other प्रयत्न put forth into a film.
Consequently, बेहतरीन चित्र is the फाइनल पुरस्कार and the conclusion of the annual Academy Awards ceremony.
The Grand Staircase columns at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, where the Academy Awards ceremonies have been held since 2002, showcase every film that has won the Best Picture शीर्षक चूंकि the पुरस्कार 's inception 85 सालो ago.
Heavy Rain is an इंटरैक्टिव नाटक action-adventure video game created by French developer Quantic Dream exclusively for the PlayStation 3.
The game is written and निर्देशित by quantic सपना 's founder and CEO David Cage.
Heavy Rains story is a dramatic thriller modelled after फिल्मी noir, featuring चार protagonists शामिल साथ the mystery of the Origami Killer, a serial killer who uses extended periods of rainfall to drown his victims.
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son from being the next victim, while investigative journalist Madison paige, एफबीआई profiler नॉर्मन jayden, और निजी detective Scott Shelby are each trying to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity.
The player interacts with the game by performing actions highlighted on screen related to motions on the controller, and in some cases, performing a श्रेणी of जल्दी समय कार्यक्रम दौरान fast-paced action sequences.
The खिलाड़ी 's निर्णय and actions during the game will affect the narrative.
The main वर्ण can be killed, and certain actions may lead to different scenes and endings.
A playable डेमो थी released on 11 February 2010.
the डेमो थी released prior to इस तिथि लिये people who took part in a Four Day Challenge on 5 February 2010.
A patch to allow उपयोग of the प्लेस्टेशन मूव नियंत्रक to play the game was released in September 2010.
Heavy Rain was critically acclaimed और has sold over two million copies.
It won 2010 's Game of the Year from CNN और गेमिंग संघ, और बेहतरीन PS3 Game of 2010 by GameSpy and IGN.
A modified version of the game was released titled Heavy Rain Edition Modifiée exclusively in France, aimed towards a younger दर्शक.
In 2010, the game was included in the book 1001 Video खेल तुम जरूर Play Before You Die.
Total superannuation industry liabilities : members funds and reserves ( a $ लाखो ) since 1988.
Annual total superannuation industry asset विकास 1996-2005.
Superannuation in Australia refers to the arrangements which people make in ऑस्ट्रेलिया to have निधि उपलब्धियाँ for them in retirement.
In Australia, superannuation arrangements are government-supported and encouraged, and minimum प्रावधानों हैं अनिवार्य लिये employees.
For example, employers are required to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries and मजदूरी ( फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation fund, but people are encouraged to put aside additional funds into superannuation.
The minimum obligation required by employers is set to increase to 12 % धीरे stepping annually इससे 2013 to 2020.
An individual can withdraw funds out of a superannuation fund when the person meets one of the शर्तें of रिलीज contained in अनुसूची 1 of the Superannuation Industry ( Supervision ) Regulations 1994.

Electoral College map showing the results of the 2012 U.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव.
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the लोकप्रिय vote in 26 राज्य और the District of Columbia ( denoted in blue ) to capture 332 electoral votes.
Former Governor Mitt Romney ( R - MA ) won the popular vote in 24 states ( denoted in red ) to capture 206 चुनावी मत.
Cartogram representation of the Electoral College vote for the 2012 चुनाव, साथ प्रत्येक वर्गाकार representing one electoral vote.
The United States चुनावी कॉलेज is the संस्था that officially elects the President and Vice President of the United States every four years.
The President and Vice President are not elected सीधे by the मतदाता.
Instead, they are निर्वाचित by `` निर्वाचक '' who are chosen by popular vote on a state-by-state basis.
Electors are apportioned to each state and the District of कोलंबिया, लकिन not to territorial possessions of the United States, such as Puerto Rico and Guam.
The number of electors in each state is equal to the number of members of कॉंग्रेस to जिससे the राज्य is हकदार.
The Twenty-third Amendment has always resulted in the District of Columbia having तीन निर्वाचक.
There are 538 electors, based on there being 435 प्रतिनिधि और 100 सीनेटरों, प्लस the तीन निर्वाचक from the District of Columbia.
Electors are pledged to particular अध्यक्षीय और वाइस presidential candidates, though unpledged electors are possible.
In all states, except Maine and Nebraska, electors are निर्वाचित on a `` winner-take-all '' basis.
That is, all electors pledged to the presidential प्रत्याशी जो विन्स the सबसे मत in a state become electors for that state.
Maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district method '', selecting one elector within each congressional district by popular vote and selecting the remaining two electors by a statewide popular vote.
Although no elector is required by federal law to सम्मान a प्रतिज्ञा, वहीँ have तभी महरूम बहुत few occasions when an elector voted contrary to a pledge.
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how a President and Vice President are निर्वाचित और requires प्रत्येक elector to डाल एक vote for President and another vote for Vice President.
Critics argue that the चुनावी College is inherently undemocratic and gives swing states disproportionate influence in electing the President and Vice President.
The Electoral College gives a numeric advantage in the election of the अध्यक्ष to the छोटी राज्य, as the न्यूनतम number of electors for the small states is three compared to one for the election of representatives.
On the other hand, the winner-take-all method of voting favors the larger states.
A number of constitutional amendments have been proposed seeking to alter the चुनावी College or replace it with a direct popular vote.
Barack Hussein Obama II ( ; born August 4, 1961 ) is the 44th और वर्तमान अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, the first African American to hold the office.
Born in Honolulu, Hawaii, Obama is a graduate of Columbia University and Harvard Law स्कूल, जहाँ he थी अध्यक्ष of the Harvard Law Review.
He was a community organizer in शिकागो पहले कमाई his law degree.
He worked as a civil rights attorney in शिकागो और सिखाया संवैधानिक विधि at the University of Chicago Law School from 1992 to 2004.
He served three terms representing the 13th District in the Illinois Senate from 1997 to 2004, कार्यशील unsuccessfully लिये the संयुक्त राज्य House of Representatives in 2000.
In 2004, Obama received national attention during his campaign to represent Illinois in the United States Senate with his victory in the March Democratic Party primary, his keynote address at the Democratic नेशनल सम्मेलन in जुलाई, और उसके चुनाव to the सीनेट in नवम्बर.
He began his presidential campaign in 2007, and in 2008, after a close primary campaign against Hillary Rodham Clinton, he जीती sufficient delegates in the Democratic Party primaries to receive the presidential nomination.
He then defeated Republican nominee John McCain in the general election, and was उदघाटन as अध्यक्ष on जनवरी 20, 2009.
Nine months बाद, Obama was named the 2009 Nobel Peace Prize laureate.
He was re-elected president in November 2012, defeating रिपब्लिकन nominee mitt romney, and was sworn in for a second term on January 20, 2013.
Early in his first term in office, Obama signed into law economic stimulus legislation in response to the Great Recession in the form of the अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment अधिनियम of 2009 और the कर राहत, बेरोजगारी Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010.
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, often referred to as `` Obamacare '' ; the Dodd–Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer सुरक्षा अधिनियम ; the do n't पूछो, do n't बताना repeal अधिनियम of 2010 ; the बजट कंट्रोल अधिनियम of 2011 ; और the अमरीकी करदाताओं Relief Act of 2012.
In May 2012, he became the first sitting U.S. president to publicly support same-sex marriage and in 2013 उसके प्रशासन दायर briefs जिससे urged the Supreme Court to rule in favor of same-sex couples in two high-profile cases.
In foreign policy, Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War, increased troop स्तर in अफगानिस्तान, हस्ताक्षरित the नई प्रारंभ बाहें कंट्रोल सन्धि साथ रूस, ordered U.S. military involvement in Libya, and ordered the military operation that resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden.
The Honda CBR1100XX Super Blackbird was a होंडा मोटरसाइकिल made from 1996 to 2007.

Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य record based on images
Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य information about individual patients or populations.
It is a record in डिजिटल स्वरूप that is theoretically capable of being shared across different health care settings.
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information प्रणालियों और other information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of data, including demographics, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization status, laboratory test परिणाम, radiology बिंब, vital लक्षण, निजी आंकड़े जैसे आयु और weight, and billing information.
The Mariner up on the mast in a storm.
One of the wood-engraved illustrations by Gustave Doré.
The Rime of the Ancient Mariner ( originally The Rime of the Ancyent Marinere ) is the longest प्रमुख कविता by the अंग्रेज़ी कवि सैमुएल टेलर कॉलरिज, लिखा in 1797–98 और प्रकाशित in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads.
Modern संस्करण उपयोग a बाद संशोधित version printed in 1817 that featured a gloss.
Along with अन्य कविताएं in गीतात्मक Ballads, it was a signal shift to modern poetry and the beginning of British Romantic literature.
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines how web browsers and अन्य उपयोक्ता एजेंटों can automatically चुनें the appropriate proxy server ( access method ) for fetching a given URL.
A PAC file contains a JavaScript फलन “findproxyforurl ( url, host ) ”.
This फलन रिटर्न a string with one or more access method specifications.
These विशेषताएँ कारण the user agent to use a particular proxy server or to connect directly.
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back जब a proxy fails to respond.
the ब्राउजर fetches this PAC file before requesting other URLs.
The URL of the PAC file is either विन्यस्त हस्तचालित or संकल्पित automatically by the Web Proxy Autodiscovery Protocol.
Zendaya कोलमैन ( born सितंबर 1, 1996 ), known mononymously as Zendaya, is an American actress, singer and dancer.
she सितारों on the डिज़्नी Channel sitcom Shake It Up as Rocky Blue.
She has starred in two films and played one of the सीसे भूमिकाएँ in the फिल्मी frenemies as Halley Brandon.
She voiced फर्न in the Pixie Hollow Games.
She appeared in Good Luck चार्ली as रॉकी ब्लू और in a शुभ लक चार्ली और शेक it up crossover title Charlie Shake It Up.
She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the एपीसोड `` चलना the शरारत '' और on A.N.T. Farm as Sequoia Jones in the episode `` Creative ConsultANT. ''
Zendaya is भी a musician.
She signed a deal with Hollywood Records on अगस्त 8, 2012 and started recording songs for her debut album on August 12, 2012.
She released a single from an independent label called `` Swag It Out `` and another सिंगल साथ बेला thorne पुकारा `` देखें me, '' which is featured on the Break It Down album.
On March 20, 2012, Zendaya and Bella Thorne released an एल्बम together called Shake It Up : Live 2 Dance, each have their own song on it, along with a mash-up of both songs together as one.
On अगस्त 21, 2012, zendaya और Bella Thorne released an EP called Shake It Up : Made In Japan.

This is a सूची of airports in Pennsylvania ( a U.S. state ), grouped by type and sorted by location.
it contains all public-use and military airports in the state.
Some private-use and former एयरपोर्ट may be शामिल जहाँ notable, ऐसे as airports that were previously public-use, those with commercial enplanements recorded by the FAA or airports assigned an IATA airport code.
iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a mobile operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc. Originally released in 2007 लिये the iphone और ipod टच प्लेटफ़ॉर्म, it रै महरूम विस्तारित to support अन्य Apple devices such as the iPad and Apple TV.
Unlike Microsoft 's Windows Phone and Google 's Android, Apple करता नहीं अनुज्ञा आईओएस लिये installation on non-Apple hardware.
, Apple 's App Store contained अधिक than 700,000 iOS applications, which have collectively been downloaded more than 30 billion times.
It had a 21 % share of the स्मार्टफोन मोबाईल ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली units shipped in the fourth quarter of 2012, behind only Google 's Android.
In June 2012, it accounted for 65 % of mobile web data consumption ( including use on both the ipod टच और the iPad ).
At the half of 2012, there यहूद 410 लाख डिवाइस activated.
According to the special media event held by Apple on September 12, 2012, 400 लाख डिवाइस have महरूम बेची through जून 2012.
the उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस of iOS is based on the concept of direct manipulation, using multi-touch gestures.
Interface control elements consist of sliders, switches, and buttons.
Interaction with the OS includes gestures such as swipe, tap, पिंच, और रिवर्स पिंच, सब of which have specific definitions within the context of the iOS operating system and its multi-touch interface.
Internal accelerometers are used by some applications to respond to shaking the यंत्र ( एक आम परिणाम is the undo कमांड ) or rotating it in three dimensions ( one common result is switching from portrait to landscape mode ).
iOS is निकला इससे OS X, with which it shares the Darwin foundation.
iOS is Apple 's मोबाईल संस्करण of the OS X operating system used on Apple computers.
In iOS, there are four abstraction layers : the Core OS layer, the Core Services layer, the Media layer, and the Cocoa Touch layer.
The current version of the operating system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 gb of the यंत्र 's फ्लैश मेमोरी लिये the प्रणाली partition, using roughly 800 MB of that partition ( varying by model ) for iOS itself.
iOS फिलहाल रनों on iphone, ipad, iPod touch and Apple TV.
The Plymouth Superbird is प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके अत्यधिक high rear wing.

A spoiler is an automotive aerodynamic device whose intended design function is to 'spoil ' unfavorable एयर गति आरपार a देह of a गाडी in गति, usually described as turbulence or drag.
Spoilers on the front of a vehicle are often called air dams, because in addition to directing air flow they also reduce the amount of एयर बहती underneath the vehicle which generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag.
Spoilers are often fitted to race and high-performance खेल गाड़ियाँ, हालांकि they have become common on passenger vehicles as well.
Some spoilers are added to cars primarily for styling purposes and have either छोटी aerodynamic लाभ or भी मेक the aerodynamics worse.
Spoilers for गाड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः incorrectly confused with, or the term used interchangeably with, wings.
ऑटोमोटिव विंग्स हैं डिवाइस जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन is to generate downforce as air passes around them, not simply disrupt existing airflow patterns.
Mario, who serves as Nintendo 's mascot, is a fictional character निर्मित by खेल पंक्तियां शिगेरू miyamoto and voiced by Charles Martinet.
This is a list of वीडियो खेल जहाँ the अक्षर मारियो plays a part, either as the protagonist, antagonist, supporting character, as part of an ensemble cast, as a cameo, or in a game within a game.
It does not include simple references to the character, ऐसे as the portraits of Mario found in The Legend of Zelda : A Link to the Past.
The year indicated is the year the game was first released, most commonly in जापानी ; खेल यहूद sometimes released सालो later in other regions of the world.
The list includes पोर्ट, remakes and compilations.
It does n't include कोई आभासी कंसोल re-releases.
`` Man of Constant विषाद '' ( भी ज्ञात as `` i am a man of निरंतर विषाद '' ) is a traditional American folk song first recorded by Dick Burnett, a partially blind fiddler from Kentucky.
The song was originally recorded by burnett as `` विदाई सोंग '' मुद्रित in a Richard Burnett songbook, circa 1913.
An early version was recorded by emry आर्थर in 1928 ( Vocalion Vo 5208 ).
Public ब्याज in the सोंग थी renewed after the release of the 2000 film O Brother, Where Art Thou ?
, as it plays a central role in the फिल्मी 's plot.
The song was also शामिल in the फिल्मी 's अत्यधिक successful, multiple-platinum selling soundtrack.
जोसेफसन जंक्शन सरणी चिप विकसित by the National Bureau of Standards as a standard volt
The volt ( symbol : v ) is the si निकला ईकाई लिये इलेक्ट्रिक potential ( voltage ), electric potential difference, and electromotive force.
The volt is named in honor of the इतालवी physicist alessandro volta ( 1745–1827 ), who invented the voltaic pile, possibly the first chemical battery.
A plaque commemorating the स्थान of the साराजेवो हत्या and steps of Gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987, before steps were removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo हत्या ( चित्र लिया in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, heir presumptive to the austro-hungarian सिंहासन, और उसके बीवी, सोफी, duchess of hohenberg, यहूद shot dead in Sarajevo, by Gavrilo Princip, one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be संयुक्त into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The हत्यारे ' motives यहूद consistent with the movement that later became known as Young Bosnia.
सर्बियाई सैन्य officers stood behind the attack.
At the top of ये सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों थी मुख्य of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević, his righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić, and Masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the assassins with bombs और pistols और trained them.
the हत्यारे यहूद दिए अभिगम to the वही clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and agents that Rade Malobabić used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the कुंजी सदस्यों of the clandestine tunnel, and the key Serbian military conspirators who were still alive were arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
Those who were arrested in Bosnia were tried in साराजेवो in अक्तूबर 1914.
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the शीर्ष सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों.
Much of what is known about the assassinations comes from these two trials and related records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is अत्यधिक विवादास्पद क्युकी the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one month later.
Mission San Juan Capistrano was a Spanish mission in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, स्तिथ in present-day San Juan Capistrano.
It was संस्थापित on सब संतो ' दिन नवम्बर 1, 1776, by Spanish Catholics of the Franciscan Order.
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano, a 15th century theologian and `` warrior पुजारी '' जो resided in the abruzzo region of Italy, San Juan Capistrano has the distinction of being home to the oldest building in California still in use, a chapel built in 1782.
Known alternately as `` Serra 's Chapel '' and `` Father Serra 's Church, '' it is the only extant structure where it has been प्रलेखित कि the padre junipero Serra celebrated mass.
One of the best known of the alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया मिशन ( और एक of the few मिशन to have दरअसल been founded twice—others being Mission San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission La Purísima Concepción ).
The site was originally consecrated on अक्तूबर 30, 1775, by Father Fermín Lasuén, but was quickly abandoned due to unrest among the indigenous population in San Diego.
The success of the उपनिवेश is evident in its historical records.
prior to the आगमन of the प्रचारकों, कुछ 550 natives were scattered throughout the local area.
By 1790, the number of converted ईसाइयों था grown to 700, और बस छह years later nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( recent converts ) lived in or around the Mission compound.
1,649 baptisms were conducted that year alone, out of the total 4,639 souls परिवर्तित between 1776 और 1847.
More than 2,000 former inhabitants ( mostly Juaneño Indians ) हैं दफ्न in unmarked graves in the Mission 's cemetery ( campo santo ).
The remains of Father ( later Monsignor ) St. John O'Sullivan, who recognized the property 's historic value and working tirelessly to conserve and rebuild its structures, are buried at the entrance to the cemetery on the west side of the property, and a statue raised in उसके सम्मान स्टैंड at the सिर of the crypt.
The surviving chapel also serves as the फाइनल resting प्लेस of तीन padres who passed on while serving at the Mission : Fathers José Barona, Vicente Fustér, and Vicente Pascual Oliva are all entombed beneath the sanctuary floor.
The criolla or `` मिशन अंगूर, '' थी first planted at San Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the first wine produced in Alta California emerged from the Mission 's winery.
The Mission entered a long period of gradual decline after secularization in 1833.
Numerous efforts were made over the सालो to restore the Mission to its former glory, but none met with great success until the arrival of Father O'Sullivan in 1910.
Restoration efforts continue, and `` Serra 's Chapel '' is still प्रयुक्त लिये धार्मिक services.
About half-a-million visitors, including 80,000 school children, come to the मिशन प्रत्येक साल.
And while the ruins of `` The Great Stone Church '' ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 भूकंप ) हैं a प्रसिद्ध architectural अचरज, the Mission is perhaps best known for the annual `` Return of the Swallows '' which is traditionally observed every March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's Day ).
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a favorite subject for many notable artists, and has been immortalized in साहित्य और on फिल्मी numerous टाइम्स, शायद अधिक than any other mission.
In 1984, a modern church complex was constructed बस उत्तर और west of the Mission compound and is now known as Mission Basilica San Juan Capistrano.
Today, the mission compound serves as a museum, with the सेरा चैपल भीतर the compound serving as a chapel for the mission parish.
Better Off Dead is a 1985 American teen romantic comedy film starring John Cusack and लिखा और निर्देशित by जंगली स्टीव Holland.
it tells the स्टोरी of high school student Lane Myer who is suicidal after his girlfriend breaks up with him.
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally Louisiana Superdome and commonly The Superdome ) is a खेल और प्रदर्शनी स्टेडियम, स्तिथ in the सेंट्रल कारोबार District of New Orleans, Louisiana, USA.
Plans were drawn up in 1967, by the New Orleans modernist architectural firm of Curtis and Davis.
Its steel frame कवर a expanse.
Its dome is made of a Lamella multi-ringed फ़्रेम और रै a व्यास of, making it the largest fixed domed structure in the world.
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints, the ncaa 's प्रभाग i-a tulane ग्रीन वेव फ़ुटबॉल टोली ( the largest फ़ुटबॉल स्टेडियम in Conference USA ), the State Farm Bayou Classic, the R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl, the Allstate Sugar Bowl and, every fourth year, the BCS National Championship Game.
क्युकी of the आकार और स्थान in एक of the प्रमुख पर्यटक destinations in the United States, the Superdome routinely makes the `` short list '' of candidates being considered for major sporting events, such as the Super Bowl and the Final Four.
In 2005, the superdome gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय attention of a different type when it housed thousands of people seeking shelter from Hurricane Katrina.
The building suffered extensive damage as a परिणाम of the तूफ़ान, और थी बंद for many months afterward.
on अक्तूबर 3, 2011, it थी announced that German automaker Mercedes-Benz purchased naming rights to the stadium.
The new नाम took effect on October 23, 2011.
It is the third stadium that has नामकरण अधिकारों इससे mercedes-benz ( और पहला in the संयुक्त राज्य ), after the Mercedes-Benz Arena, the stadium of Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart, in Stuttgart, Germany and the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai, China.

Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is an African-themed डीलक्स रिज़ॉर्ट at the वॉल्ट Disney World Resort.
It खोली on अप्रैल 16, 2001.
The resort is स्वामित्व और संचालित by Walt Disney Parks and Resorts.
Disney 's Animal किंगडम आवास is स्तिथ in the Animal Kingdom Resort Area, adjacent to Disney 's Animal Kingdom.
It gives guests the अवसर to दृश्य चरने वन्यजीव बाहर their rooms and public areas in the resort within proximity of the animals, conveying the feeling of being in an African savanna.
The People 's Party, also known as the `` Populists '', was a short-lived राजनैतिक पार्टी in the संयुक्त राज्य स्थापित in 1891 दौरान the populist गति ( संयुक्त States, 19th Century ).
It was most महत्वपूर्ण in 1892-96, and then rapidly faded away.
Based among poor, white cotton farmers in the दक्षिण ( विशेषकर उत्तर कैरोलिना, अलबामा, और टेक्सास ) और hard-pressed wheat farmers in the plains states ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ), it represented a radical crusading form of agrarianism and hostility to banks, railroads, and elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor unions, and in 1896 the Democrats endorsed their presidential nominee, William जेनिंग्स Bryan.
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism `` are commonly used for anti-elitist appeals in विपक्ष to established interests and mainstream parties.
Linguistic map of Nigeria, कैमरून, और बेनिन.
Sign in English, outside the विश्वविद्यालयों of Lagos
There are hundreds of भाषाएं बोला in Nigeria.
The major languages are Yoruba, हौसा, इग्बो, ईदो, fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
The official language of सीरियल, अंग्रेज़ी, the पूर्व colonial language, was chosen to facilitate the cultural and linguistic unity of the country.
अंग्रेज़ी, however, remains an विशेष बचाना of the country 's urban elite, and is not widely spoken in rural areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे, encompassing three major African languages families : Afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified भाषाएं, ऐसे as Cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the current language families.
A series of events led to the आक्रमण on Pearl Harbor.
War between Japan and the United States had been a possibility कि प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's सैन्य शक्तियां नियोजित लिये चूंकि the 1920s, though real tension did not begin until the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by Japan.
Over the next decade, Japan expanded slowly into China, leading to all आउट युद्ध between the two in 1937.
In 1940 Japan invaded French Indochina in an effort to embargo सब imports into चीन, सहित war supplies purchased from the U.S.
This मूव prompted the संयुक्त राज्य to embargo all oil exports, leading the Imperial Japanese Navy to estimate that it had less than two years of bunker oil remaining and to support the existing plans to seize oil resources in the Dutch East Indies.
Planning had been underway for some time on an attack on the `` Southern Resource Area '' to add it to the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific.
The Philippine islands, at कि समय an अमरीकी territory, were also a Japanese target.
The Japanese सैन्य concluded कि an आक्रमण of the फिलीपीन would provoke an American military response.
Rather than seize and fortify the आइलैंड्स, और इंतजार लिये the अपरिहार्य us counterattack, जापानी 's सैन्य leaders instead decided on the pre-emptive Pearl Harbor attack, which they assumed would negate the American forces needed for the liberation and reconquest of the islands.
Planning for the attack had begun in बहुत जल्दी 1941, by Admiral Isoroku Yamamoto.
He finally won assent from the Naval High Command by, among other बाते, threatening to resign.
The attack was स्वीकृत in the गर्मियाँ at an Imperial Conference and again at a second Conference in the fall.
Simultaneously over the साल, पायलटों यहूद प्रशिक्षित, और ships prepared for its execution.
Authority for the attack was granted at the second Imperial सम्मेलन if a राजनयिक परिणाम satisfactory to Japan was not reached.
After final approval by Emperor हिरोहितो the अनुक्रम to आक्रमण थी जारी at the beginning of December.
A common office stapler
A common स्कूल stapler
A stapler is a mechanical यंत्र कि joins चादरें of पेपर or समान material by driving a thin metal staple through the sheets and folding the ends.
Staplers are widely used in government, business, कार्यालयों, घरों और स्कूलों.
The word `` stapler '' can दरअसल refer to a number of different devices of varying uses.
In addition to joining paper sheets together, staplers can भी be प्रयुक्त in a सर्जिकल setting to join tissue together with surgical staples to close a surgical wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ).
Typically, most staplers हैं used to join multiple sheets of paper.
Paper staplers come in two distinct types : हस्तचालित और इलेक्ट्रिक.
Manual staplers are normally hand-held, although models that हैं प्रयुक्त जबकि नियत on a डेस्क or अन्य सतह are not uncommon.
Electric staplers exist in a किस्में of अलग designs and models.
Their primary operating function is to join large संख्याएँ of पेपर चादरें साथ in rapid succession.
Some electric staplers can जुड़ें up to 20 sheets at a time.
Swallowing, known scientifically as deglutition, is the process in the human or animal body that makes something pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, और into the ग्रासनाल, while shutting the epiglottis.
If this fails और the ऑब्जेक्ट goes through the trachea, then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
In the human body it is नियंत्रित by the swallowing reflex.
Thaddeus Stevens ( April 4, 1792 – August 11, 1868 ), of Pennsylvania, was a leader of the Radical रिपब्लिकन गुट of the रिपब्लिकन Party and a fierce opponent of slavery.
He was one of the most influential members in the इतिहास of कॉंग्रेस.
As chairman of the powerful House Ways and Means कमेटी, स्टीवंस, a witty, sarcastic speaker and flamboyant party leader, dominated the House from 1861 until his death.
He wrote much of the financial विधान कि paid for the American Civil War.
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were the prime leaders of the Radical republicans दौरान the war and Reconstruction era.
Scholarly views of Stevens have swung sharply since his death as interpretations of पुनर्निर्माण have changed.
Historians of the Dunning School ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible for demanding harsh treatment of the white South and violating American traditions of republicanism, depicting स्टीवंस as a विलेन लिये उसके वकालत of हर्ष उपायों in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates.
This highly negative characterization held sway into the 1950s.
The rise of the neo-abolitionist स्कूल in the 1950s led to a दमदार धनात्मक सराहना of Stevens ' work on civil rights for Freedmen.
a हाल biographer characterizes him as, `` The Great Commoner, savior of free public education in Pennsylvania, national Republican leader in the struggles against slavery in the United States and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure racial justice for the Freedmen during Reconstruction, the only member of the House of Representatives ever to have been known as the 'dictator ' of Congress. ''
Overview of the translation of eukaryotic messenger RNA
Diagram showing the translation of mRNA and the संश्लेषण of प्रोटीन by a ribosome
In molecular biology and genetics, अनुवाद is the process through which cellular ribosomes manufacture proteins.
It is part of the प्रक्रम of जीन अभिव्यक्ति.
In translation, messenger RNA ( mRNA ) produced by ट्रांसक्रिप्शन is decoded by the राइबोसोम to produce a specific amino acid chain, or polypeptide, that will later fold into an active protein.
In bacteria, translation occurs in the cell 's cytoplasm, where the large and छोटी subunits of the राइबोसोम हैं स्तिथ, and bind to the mRNA.
In eukaryotes, translation occurs आरपार the membrane of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial synthesis.
The ribosome facilitates डिकोडिंग by inducing the binding of tRNAs with complementary anticodon sequences to that of the mRNA.
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids कि हैं chained साथ into a polypeptide as the mRNA passes through and is `` read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock ticker and ticker tape.
In many instances, the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to the outer झिल्ली of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum और रिलीज the nascent प्रोटीन polypeptide अंदर लिये later vesicle transport and secretion outside of the cell.
Many types of transcribed RNA, such as transfer RNA, ribosomal rna, और छोटी नाभिकीय rna, do नहीं undergo translation into proteins.
Translation proceeds in four phases : initiation, elongation, translocation and termination ( all describing the growth of the अमीनो एसिड कड़ी, or polypeptide that is the product of translation ).
अमीनो acids are brought to ribosomes and assembled into proteins.
In activation, the correct amino acid is covalently बंधुआ to the सही transfer RNA ( tRNA ).
The amino acid is joined by इसके carboxyl group to the 3 ' OH of the tRNA by an ester bond.
When the tRNA has an amino acid linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
Initiation involves the small subunit of the ribosome binding to the 5 ' समाप्त of mrna साथ the सहायता of initiation factors ( IF ).
Termination of the polypeptide happens when the A site of the ribosome चेहरों a रोकें codon ( uaa, uag, or UGA ).
no trna can recognize or bind to this codon.
Instead, the stop codon induces the binding of a release factor protein that prompts the disassembly of the संपूर्ण ribosome/mrna complex.
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting अनुवाद ; ये शामिल anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, and puromycin, among others.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure from that of eukaryotic ribosomes, and thus एंटीबायोटिक can specifically निशाना बैक्टीरियल infections बगैर any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells.
A multimedia संदेश on a मोबाईल phone.
Multimedia Messaging Service ( MMS ) is a standard way to send संदेश कि शामिल मल्टीमीडिया सामग्री to और from mobile phones.
It extends the core SMS ( Short Message Service ) capability that अनुमत एक्सचेंज of टेक्स्ट messages only up to 160 characters in length.
The most popular use is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets, although it is also popular as a method of delivering news and entertainment content सहित वीडियो, तस्वीरें, टेक्स्ट पृष्ठों और ringtones.
The standard is developed by the खोलें मोबाईल गठबंधन ( ओमो ), although during development it was part of the 3GPP and WAP groups.
Smallpox was an infectious बीमारी अद्वितीय to इंसानो, caused by either of two virus variants, Variola major and Variola minor.
The disease is also known by the लैटिन names variola or variola vera, derived from varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ).
The disease was originally known in English as the `` pox '' or `` red plague '' ; the term `` smallpox '' was first used in Britain in the 15th century to फर्क variola इससे the `` ग्रेट चेचक '' ( syphilis ).
The last naturally occurring case of smallpox ( Variola minor ) थी diagnosed on 26 अक्तूबर 1977.
Smallpox स्थानीयकृत in छोटी रक्त बरतन of the skin and in the mouth and throat.
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular खाज और, बाद, उठाया fluid-filled blisters.
V. प्रमुख produces a अधिक गंभीर disease and has an overall mortality rate of 30–35 %.
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also known as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, और क्यूबन खुजली ) जिससे मारता about 1 % of its victims.
long-term जटिलताओं of V. प्रमुख infection include characteristic scars, commonly on the face, which occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration and scarring, और limb deformities due to गठिया और osteomyelitis are less common complications, seen in about 2–5 % of cases.
Smallpox is believed to have emerged in इंसान populations about 10,000 BC.
The earliest physical evidence of it is संभवतः the pustular खाज on the mummified body of Pharaoh Ramses V of Egypt.
The disease killed an estimated 400,000 Europeans annually during the closing years of the 18th सदी ( including five reigning monarchs ), and was responsible for a third of all blindness.
Of all those infected, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of infected children—died इससे the बीमारी.
smallpox थी जिम्मेदार लिये an अनुमानित 300–500 million deaths during the 20th century.
As recently as 1967, the World Health Organization ( जो ) अनुमानित कि 15 लाख लोगों contracted the disease and that two million died in that year.
After vaccination campaigns throughout the 19th and 20th centuries, the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
Smallpox is one of दो संक्रामक रोगों to have been eradicated, the other being rinderpest, which was declared eradicated in 2011.
`` i want to थाम अपना हाथ '' is a song by the English rock band the Beatles.
Written by जॉन लेनन और Paul McCartney, and recorded in October 1963, it was the first Beatles record to be made using four-track equipment.
With advance orders exceeding one million copies in the United Kingdom, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' would ordinarily have gone सीधा to the शीर्ष of the अंग्रेजों रिकार्ड चार्ट on इसके दिन of रिलीज ( 29 नवम्बर 1963 ) था it नहीं महरूम अवरोधित by the group 's first million seller `` She Loves You ``, the Beatles ' previous UK single, which was having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media coverage of the group.
Taking two weeks to dislodge its predecessor, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' stayed at क्रमांक एक लिये पाँच सप्ताह और remained in the uk शीर्ष पचास for twenty-one weeks in total.
It was also the group 's first American number one, entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 January 1964 at number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the American music industry.
By 1 February it held the number one spot — for seven weeks — before being replaced by `` She Loves You '', a reverse scenario of what had occurred in ब्रिटेन, और remained in the US charts for a total of fifteen weeks.
`` I Want to थाम अपना हाथ '' became the Beatles ' best-selling single worldwide.
A gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the United States in the late 1950s and जारी जबतक the early 1970s.
Gassers were आधारित on उत्पादन मॉडल इससे the 1930s to mid-1960s, जिससे have been stripped of extraneous weight and jacked up using a truck beam axle to provide better weight distribution on acceleration ( Beam axles are also lighter than an independent front suspension ), though a raised stock front suspension is common as well.
Common weight कटौती तकनीकों include fiberglass body panels, stripped interiors and plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ).
Because they were primarily built for racing, these cars typically had the इंजन swapped to a larger or more powerful one, the existing stock engine modified ( often heavily ) or both.
It was very common to fit a Roots supercharger and mechanical fuel injection, such as one from Algon, hilborn, or crower.
With form being dictated by function, their appearance is often very top heavy and ungainly, largely due to front ends होने उठाया उच्चतर than भण्डार, to assist in the weight transfer during rapid acceleration ( racing ).
Having their exhaust पाइप निकास through the सामने फेंडर खूब is a आम characteristic of gassers, as is having bodies painted in flamboyant metalflakes, pearls, and candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts.
The name arose because they competed in a gasoline -fueled drag racing क्लास, बल्कि than one using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the predecessor of the modern Funny car.
