Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical activity of the दिल over a काल of समय, as detected by electrodes attached to the surface of the skin and recorded by a device external to the body.
The recording produced by इस noninvasive procedure is termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ).
An ECG is used to measure the rate and regularity of heartbeats, as खूब as the आकार और स्थिति of the कक्षों, the presence of any damage to the heart, and the effects of drugs or devices used to regulate the heart, such as a pacemaker.
Most ECGs are performed for diagnostic or research purposes on human hearts, but may also be performed on पशु, प्रायः लिये निदान of दिल abnormalities or शोध.
Donald John Trump, Sr. ( born जून 14, 1946 ) is an अमरीकी business magnate, television personality and author.
He is the chairman and president of The Trump Organization and the founder of ट्रम्प entertainment Resorts.
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle, outspoken manner, and role on the NBC reality show The Apprentice have made him a well-known हस्ती जो थी no. 14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list.
Trump is the बेटे of फ्रेड ट्रम्प, a wealthy New York City real-estate developer.
He worked for his father 's firm, एलिज़ाबेथ ट्रम्प & बेटे, जबकि उपस्थित the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania, and in 1968 officially joined the company.
He was given control of the company in 1971 और renamed it The Trump Organization.
In 2010, Trump expressed an interest in becoming a candidate for president of the United States in the 2012 election, though in May 2011, he घोषित he होता नहीं be a प्रत्याशी.
In December 2011, Trump was suggested as a possible vice अध्यक्षीय चयन by मिशेल bachmann, if she were to win the Republican nomination.
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & B singer-songwriter Sam Cooke, written and first recorded in 1963 और released अंतर्गत the आरसीए विक्टर लेबल shortly बाद his death in late 1964.
Though only a modest hit for Cooke in तुलना साथ उसके पिछला singles, the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement.
The song has gained in popularity and critical acclaim in the decades since its release, and is # 12 on रोलिंग स्टोन 's 500 महानतम गीतों of All Time.
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir geothermal शक्ति Station in Iceland.
Geothermal energy is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न and stored in the Earth.
Thermal energy is the energy that determines the तापमान of पदार्थ.
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates इससे the असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the अंतर in तापमान between the कोर of the ग्रह and its surface, drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ), meaning earth, and θερμος ( thermos ), अर्थ hot.
At the core of the Earth, thermal energy is created by radioactive क्षय और temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the core to surrounding कूलर rock.
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt, creating magma convection upward चूंकि it is lighter than the solid rock.
The मैग्मा heats चट्टान और water in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal energy has been used for bathing since Paleolithic times and for space heating since ancient Roman times, but it is now better known लिये विद्युत पीढी.
Worldwide, परिचय 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed for district heating, space heating, spas, industrial processes, desalination and agricultural अनुप्रयोग.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, चिरस्थायी, और environmentally दोस्ताना, लकिन रै historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries.
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of सुगठित संसाधन, विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as home heating, opening a potential for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth, but these emissions are much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा ईकाई than those of fossil fuels.
As a परिणाम, geothermal शक्ति has the potential to help mitigate global warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than पर्याप्त to सप्लाई मानवता 's उर्जा needs, लकिन only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and exploration for deep संसाधन is बहुत expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी, energy prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green शक्ति कार्यक्रम दिखाएँ कि ग्राहक होता be willing to अदा a छोटी more for a renewable energy source like geothermal.
But as a परिणाम of सरकारी assisted शोध and industry experience, the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades.
In 2001, geothermal energy cost between two and ten cents per kwh.
Ownership of property may be निजी, collective, or common and the property may be objects, land/real estate, or intellectual property.
determining स्वामित्व in विधि involves determining who has certain rights and duties over the property.
These rights and duties, sometimes पुकारा a 'bundle of अधिकारों ', can be separated and held by different parties.
The question of ownership reaches back to the ancient philosophers, प्लेटो और अरस्तू, जो आयोजित अलग राय on the subject.
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought निजी प्रॉपर्टी निर्मित divisive inequalities, जबकि Aristotle ( 384 BC – 322 BC ) thought private property enabled people to receive the full benefit of their labor.
Private property can circumvent what is now referred to as the “ tragedy of the commons ” प्रॉब्लम, जहाँ people tend to degrade common property more than they do private property.
Given a short-sighted owner, however, a private property system can make these tragedies worse—for example, a private owner of a piece of oil-rich property, depending on his worldview, might be more interested in short-term financial gain than वृद्धिशील उपयोग साथ an नजर toward अन्य 's चिंताएं ( e.g., those of future generations, the disenfranchised, etc. ).
While Aristotle justified the अस्तित्व of निजी स्वामित्व, he बाएँ खोलें सवाल of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate property between what is private and common and ( 2 ) how to allocate the private property within society.
Over the millennia, and across संस्कृतियों कया can be property and how it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
Ownership is the basis for many other concepts that form the foundations of प्राचीन और आधुनिक समाजों ऐसे as धन, व्यापार, कर्ज़, दिवालियापन, the criminality of theft, and private vs. public property.
Ownership is the key building block in the development of the पूंजीवादी socio-economic system.
Adam Smith stated कि एक of the पवित्र laws of justice was to guard a person 's property and possessions.
The process and mechanics of ownership are fairly complex : एक can लाभ, ट्रांसफ़र और खोना स्वामित्व of प्रॉपर्टी in a number of ways.
To acquire property one can खरीदें it साथ धन, व्यापार it लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी, प्राप्त it as a gift, steal it, find it, make, it or homestead it.
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for money, exchanging it लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी, giving it as a gift, being robbed of it, it, or having it stripped from one 's ownership through legal means such as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
Ownership is self-propagating in that the owner of any property will also own the आर्थिक लाभ of कि प्रॉपर्टी.
`` What 's My नाम ? '' is a सोंग अंकित by barbadian recording artist Rihanna, for her fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ).
Featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake, the सोंग थी released as the second single from Loud on October 29, 2010 through Def Jam Recordings.
The R & B song was उत्पादित by the नॉर्वेजियाई उत्पादन duo स्टारगेट, और was written by the duo along with Ester Dean, Traci Hale, and Drake.
lyrically, it incorporates themes of sexual intercourse and romance.
Music critics gave the song positive reviews, citing it some of Rihanna 's बेहतरीन गायन कार्य to तिथि ; वहीँ थी a तारीफ़ regarding its romantic nature, as well as its sexual tones.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was a commercial success and topped the US Billboard hot 100 चार्ट, giving रिहाना उसके तीसरा number-one सिंगल in 2010, as खूब as उसके eighth overall on the chart.
The song also topped the charts in Hungary and the संयुक्त किंगडम और पहुँचे the top five in Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, Norway and Slovakia.
The song received a nomination at the 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये Best Rap/Sung Collaboration.
An accompanying music video, निर्देशित by फिलिप andelman, portrays a romantic encounter between Rihanna and Drake in a grocery store along with romantic scenes between the pair and Rihanna walking through Manhattan 's Lower East Side.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was promoted with live performances across both sides of the Atlantic, including Saturday Night Live in America and the series seven finale of The X Factor in the United Kingdom.
The latter performance resulted in an investigation from the country 's media regulator, ofcom, लिये the raunchy प्रकृति of Rihanna 's outfit.
A mathematical constant is a special number, प्रायः a real number, that is `` significantly interesting in some way ''.
Constants arise in many different क्षेत्रों of गणित, with constants such as e ( mathematical constant ) | and pi| occurring in such diverse contexts as geometry, number theory and calculus.
What it means लिये a निरंतर to उठता `` naturally '', और कया makes a निरंतर `` interesting '', is ultimately a matter of taste, and some mathematical constants are notable more for historical reasons than for their intrinsic mathematical interest.
The more popular constants have been studied throughout the आयु और computed to अनेक दशमलव स्थान.
All mathematical स्थिरांक हैं definable संख्याएँ और प्रायः हैं also computable numbers ( Chaitin 's constant being a significant exception ).
Elections to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट यहूद आयोजित on नवम्बर 2, 2010, for 37 of the United States Senate 's 100 seats.
( A special चुनाव on जनवरी 19, 2010 in Massachusetts was held earlier in the year. )
Thirty-four of the seats were लिये six-year शर्तें to the सीनेट 's `` क्लास तीन '', and three were special elections for shorter terms.
Of the 37 elections, 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or यहूद पराजित in the प्राथमिक ) and 18 featured incumbent Republicans ( eight of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ).
After the previous elections ( in 2008 ), the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट was composed of 58 Democrats, 40 Republicans, and 2 independents who caucus with the Democrats.
Republicans won four seats held by retiring डेमोक्रेट और Republicans defeated two incumbent Democrats.
इस थी the largest क्रमांक of republicans gains चूंकि the 1994 elections and also the first time since that election that Republicans successfully defended all of their own seats.
This was the fourth लगातार election of `` class 3 '' senators where Democrats have failed to gain seats and the third consecutive mid-term election held in a president 's first term where Republicans have picked-up seats.
Despite these Republican wins, however, the Democrats retained a majority of the Senate with 51 seats plus 2 independents जो caucus साथ उन्हें, compared to the 47 Republicans.
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice each year as the Sun reaches its highest or lowest excursion relative to the celestial equator on the celestial sphere.
As a result, on the day of the संक्रांति, the सूर्य appears to have reached its highest or lowest annual altitude in the sky above the horizon at local solar noon.
The word solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( sun ) and sistere ( to stand still ), because at the solstices, the Sun stands still in declination ; that is, the मौसमी गति of the सूर्य 's path ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction.
The solstices, together साथ the equinoxes, are connected with the seasons.
In many संस्कृतियों the solstices mark either the beginning or the midpoint of winter and summer.
The term solstice can also be used in a broader sense, as the date ( day ) when this occurs.
The day of the solstice is either the longest day of the year ( in summer ) or the shortest दिन of the साल ( in winter ) for any place outside of the tropics.
जेरी ली लुईस ( born सितंबर 29, 1935 ) is an American rock and roll and country music singer-songwriter and pianist.
He is known by the nickname `` The Killer '' and is often viewed as “rock & roll 's first great wild man”.
An जल्दी पायोनियर of चट्टान and roll music, in 1956 Lewis made his first recordings at Sun Records.
`` Crazy Arms `` sold 300,000 copies in the दक्षिण, लकिन it थी उसके 1957 hit `` Whole Lotta Shakin ' Going On `` that shot Lewis to fame worldwide.
Lewis followed इस in कि वही साल जब he अंकित songs such as `` Great Balls of Fire ``, `` Breathless `` and `` High School Confidential ``.
Lewis sold more records than एल्विस प्रेस्ली at this time.
However, Lewis ' rock 'n ' roll career faltered in the वेक of उसके विवाह to उसके young cousin.
He था छोटी कामयाबी in the चार्ट following the scandal and his popularity quickly faded.
His live प्रदर्शन शुल्क plummeted from $ 10,000 per night to $ 250.
In the meantime he was संकल्पित to gain back some of his popularity.
During the early 60’s he did n't have much chart कामयाबी साथ few अपवाद such as `` What 'd I Say ``.
His live performances at इस समय यहूद increasingly जंगली and energetic.
His album Live at the Star Club, हैम्बर्ग इससे 1964 is प्रायः regarded by अनेक म्यूज़िक पत्रकारों and fans as one of the wildest and greatest rock and roll concert albums ever.
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several years with little success, in 1968 Lewis made a transition into country music and had hits with गीतों ऐसे as `` another Place, Another Time ''.
This reignited his करियर और throughout the लेट '60s और '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts.
His # 1 देश hits included `` To Make Love Sweeter For You ``, `` There Must Be More to Love Than This ``, `` Would You Take Another Chance on Me `` and `` Me And Bobby McGee ``.
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he embraced his rock 'n ' roll past with songs such as a cover of the बिग Bopper 's `` Chantilly Lace `` and `` Rockin ' My Life Away ``.
In the 21st century Lewis continues to tour to audiences around the world and still रिलीज new albums.
एक ऐसे एल्बम, titled Last Man Standing, is his best selling to date at over a million copies sold worldwide.
This थी followed by औसत Old Man which has received some of the best sales of Lewis’s career.
Lewis has had a dozen gold records in both rock and country, won several ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, सहित a आजीवन उपलब्धि Award.
Lewis was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1986, और उसके pioneering योगदान to the genre has been recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame.
In 1989, his life was chronicled in the movie Great Balls of Fire, अभिनीत डेनिस Quaid.
In 2003, Rolling Stone पत्रिका सूचीबद्ध उसके बक्सा नियत सब कातिल, no फिलर : The Anthology number 242 on their list of `` 500 greatest albums of all time ``.
In 2004, they ranked him number 24 on उनके सूची of the 100 Greatest Artists of All Time.
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' Million Dollar Quartet and the Class of '55 album, which also included Johnny नकदी, कार्ल perkins, रॉय orbison और एल्विस Presley.
Henry Louis स्टीफंस, बेनाम watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man पढना a समाचारपत्र with headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery ''.
The emancipation उदघोषणा थी an अनुक्रम जारी to सब खण्ड of the Executive branch ( including the Army and Navy ) of the United States by President Abraham Lincoln on January 1, 1863, during the American Civil War.
It was based on the president 's constitutional authority as commander in मुख्य of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां ; it थी नहीं a law passed by Congress.
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever free, and ordered the Army ( and all segments of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ) to दावत as फ़्री सब those enslaved in ten states that were still in rebellion, thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S.
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas still under rebellion, लकिन as the फौज took कंट्रोल of Confederate regions, the slaves in those regions were emancipated rather than returned to their masters.
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion had already महरूम subdued यहूद तत्काल emancipated, और over 3 लाख more were emancipated as the Union army advanced.
The Proclamation did not apply to the five slave states that were not in rebellion, nor to most regions already नियंत्रित by the Union army ; emancipation there would come after separate state actions and/or the December 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth Amendment, which made slavery illegal everywhere in the U.S.
The Proclamation did not compensate the owners, did not itself outlaw गुलामी, और किया not make the ex-slaves ( called freedmen ) citizens.
It made the eradication of गुलामी an सुस्पष्ट युद्ध लक्ष्य, in जोड to the goal of reuniting the Union.
On September 22, 1862, Lincoln had issued a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of all slaves in any state of the Confederate States of अमेरिका कि किया नहीं वापसी to संघ कंट्रोल by January 1, 1863.
None returned, and the order, signed and issued January 1, 1863, took प्रभाव मगर in स्थितियाँ where the Union had already mostly regained control.
The उदघोषणा outraged white Southerners who envisioned a race war, angered some Northern Democrats, energized anti-slavery forces, and weakened forces in Europe that wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy.
It also lifted the आत्माओं of अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी दोनो in the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी राज्य, और led to many slaves escaping their masters and running behind Union lines in order to have their emancipation enforced.
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American fantasy action film directed by Zack Snyder and co-written by उसे और स्टीव Shibuya.
It is Snyder 's first film आधारित on an असली script.
The film stars Emily ब्राउनिंग, abbie cornish, जेना malone, वैनेसा हजेंस, Jamie Chung, and Carla Gugino.
The storyline follows the fantasies of a young woman who is committed to a mental institution, as वो makes a योजना to एस्केप the hospital before suffering a lobotomy.
the फिल्मी थी released in both conventional and IMAX theatres in the United States at midnight on March 25, 2011.
It प्राप्त generally ऋणात्मक reviews from critics, but was a moderate box office success.

Haselblad 503CW with Ixpress V96C digital back, an example of a पेशेवर डिजिटल camera system
A digital camera ( or digicam ) is a कैमरा कि takes वीडियो or स्टिल photographs by recording images on an electronic image sensor.
Most cameras sold today are digital, and digital cameras are incorporated into अनेक डिवाइस ranging इससे गुस्से और मोबाईल फोन ( पुकारा कैमरा फोन ) to vehicles.
Digital and film cameras share an optical system, typically using a lens with a variable diaphragm to फ़ोकस लाइट onto an image pickup device.
The diaphragm and shutter admit the correct amount of light to the imager, just as with film but the image pickup device is इलेक्ट्रॉनिक बल्कि than रासायनिक.
However, unlike film cameras, digital cameras can display images on a screen immediately after being अंकित, और store and delete images from memory.
Many digital कैमरे can भी record moving video with sound.
Some digital cameras can क्रॉप और सिलाई तस्वीरें और perform other elementary image editing.
The inside and front of a Dell PowerEdge web सर्वर, a कंप्यूटर designed for rack mounting
Multiple web servers may be प्रयुक्त लिये a ऊँची traffic website, here four Sun Fire X4200 servers are installed together
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the software ( the कंप्यूटर अनुप्रयोग ) that helps to deliver web content that can be accessed through the Internet.
The most आम उपयोग of वेब सर्वर is to मेजबान वेबसाइटों, लकिन वहीँ are other uses such as gaming, data storage or running enterprise applications.
The American Red Cross ( ARC ), also known as the American National Red Cross, is a humanitarian संगठन कि provides आपात सहायता, disaster relief and education inside the United States.
It is the designated U.S. affiliate of the International Federation of रेड क्रॉस और रेड Crescent Societies.
Today, in addition to domestic disaster relief, the American Red Cross offers services in five other areas : community services that help the needy ; communications services and comfort for military members and their family members ; the collection, processing and distribution of blood and blood products ; educational programs on preparedness, स्वास्थ्य, और सुरक्षा ; और अंतरराष्ट्रीय राहत और विकास कार्यक्रम.
Issued a corporate charter by the United States Congress under Title 36 of the United States Code, Section 3001, the American National Red Cross is governed by स्वयंसेवक और समर्थित by जातियाँ दान, income from health and safety training and products, and income from blood products.
the अमरीकी रेड क्रॉस is headquartered in Washington, D.C.
The Chairman of the Board of राज्यपालों, सेवारत उसके second three-year term, is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter.
The current President and Chief Executive Officer is गेल J. mcgovern.
A मुर्गा in Kosovo
A मुर्गा, प्रर्दशित wattles, earlobes and comb
A rooster crowing ( साथ ऑडियो )
सही
A मुर्गा ( भी पुकारा a cockerel or cock ) is a male gallinaceous bird.
It usually refers to a male chicken ( gallus gallus ).
Immature male मुर्गियों less than one year old are called cockerels.
The term `` rooster '' originates in the United States, and the term is widely used throughout North अमेरिका, as खूब as ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई Zealand.
In the United Kingdom and आयरलैंड the older term `` cockerel '' is more commonly used.
`` Cock '' is in general use as the name for a पुरूष of अन्य प्रजाति of बर्ड, लिये उदाहरण `` Cock sparrow ''.
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching aloft to नींद at night, and is done by both sexes.
The rooster is polygamous, लकिन can नहीं guard several nests of eggs at once.
He गार्ड the सामान्य क्षेत्रफल जहाँ उसके hens are nesting, and will attack other roosters that enter his territory.
During the daytime, he usually sits on a high perch, usually 3–5 feet off the ground to serve as a lookout for his flock.
He will sound a distinctive alarm कॉल if predators are nearby.
The Pokémon Trading Card Game ( Pokémon TCG ) is a collectible card game based on the पोकीमॉन वीडियो खेल श्रेणी, पहला प्रकाशित in October 1996 by Media Factory in Japan.
In the US, it was initially published by Wizards of the coast, the कम्पनी कि produces, in December 1998.
निन्टेंडो took over publishing in June 2003.
It is one of निन्टेंडो 's पिछला बाकी strong links to its heritage as a playing card company.
Land Rover is a British car manufacturer with its headquarters in gaydon, Warwickshire, United Kingdom which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles.
It is part of the जैगुआर जमीन रोवर समूह, a subsidiary of Tata Motors of India.
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car ब्रांड in the संसार ( बाद जीपी ).
The Land Rover name was originally used by the Rover Company for one specific vehicle model, नामित बस the Land Rover, launched by Rover in 1948.
Over the following years it developed into a marque encompassing a दायरा of four-wheel-drive मॉडल, सहित the Defender, Discovery, Freelander, Range Rover, Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque.
Land Rovers are currently assembled in the company 's Halewood और solihull पौधे, साथ शोध और development taking place at JLR 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres.
Land Rover बेची 194,000 वाहनों worldwide in 2009.
Although the brand originates from the original 1948 मॉडल, जमीन रोवर as a कम्पनी रै only existed since 1978.
Prior to this, it was a product line of the रोवर कम्पनी जिससे थी subsequently absorbed into the Rover-Triumph division of the British Leyland Motor Corporation ( BL ) following Leyland Motor Corporation ’s takeover of Rover in 1967.
The ongoing commercial success of the original Land Rover series models, and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s well documented business troubles prompted the establishment of a separate Land Rover company लकिन स्टिल अंतर्गत the BL umbrella, remaining part of the subsequent Rover Group in 1988, under the ownership of British Aerospace after the remains of British Leyland were broken up and privatised.
In 1994 Rover Group plc थी acquired by BMW.
In 2000, Rover Group was broken-up by BMW and जमीन रोवर थी sold to Ford Motor Company, becoming part of its Premier Automotive Group.
In 2006 Ford purchased the Rover brand इससे bmw लिये around £6 लाख.
This reunited the Rover and Land Rover brands for the पहला समय चूंकि 2000 जब the Rover group was broken up by BMW.
In June 2008, Ford sold दोनो जमीन रोवर और जैगुआर Cars to Tata Motors.
This sale भी शामिल the dormant Rover brand

The ninth season of the Bleach anime श्रेणी is named.
The श्रेणी is based on Tite Kubo 's manga with same name.

The episodes ' plot focuses on the introduction of a new Soul Reaper captain, shūsuke amagai, और the रहस्य surrounding the Kasumiōji clan, one of the families that constitute the nobility of Soul Society.
The ऋतु began airing on April 23, 2008 in Japan on TV Tokyo and ended on October 7, 2008.
The English अनुकूलन of the ब्लीच दुश्मनी is licensed by viz मीडिया, and this arc began airing on August 28, 2010 on Cartoon Network 's Adult Swim, and finished on January 29, 2011.
Five DVD compilations, each containing four episodes of the season, have been released by Aniplex ; the first DVD compilation was released on नवम्बर 26, 2008 और the पांचवां on कूच 25, 2009.

the एपीसोड use three pieces of theme music : one opening theme and two closing themes.
the opening theme is `` Chu-Bura `` by Kelun.

The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to permit, prohibit, or otherwise विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex, मगर insofar as कॉंग्रेस may विनियमित it as भाग of अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स with laws like the Mann Act.
In most states, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of पब्लिक अनुक्रम अपराधों, a अपराधों कि disrupts the order of a community.
It was at one time considered to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow brothel वेश्यावृति, the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes.
Only 8 counties currently contain क्रियाशील brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in क्लार्क काउंटी ( जिससे contains the लास vegas–paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ), Washoe County ( which contains Reno ), Carson City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The other counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution, but some of these counties फिलहाल have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत नेवाडा law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with अन्य देशों, वेश्यावृति in the संयुक्त States can be divided into three broad categories : street prostitution, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The East Coast of the United States, also known as the Eastern Seaboard or the Atlantic Seaboard और commonly shortened to ईस्ट coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic Ocean.
The states which have shoreline on the East Coast are, from उत्तर to दक्षिण, the u.S. राज्य of maine, New Hampshire, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, Connecticut, New York, New Jersey, Delaware, Maryland, Virginia, North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia, and Florida.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States, serving from 1969 to 1974, when he became the only अध्यक्ष to इस्तीफा the office.
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from California and as the 36th Vice President of the संयुक्त States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in Yorba Linda, California.
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया to अभ्यास law.
he और उसके wife, Pat Nixon, moved to Washington to work for the federal government in 1942.
he subsequently served in the United States Navy during World War II.
Nixon was elected in California to the House of Representatives in 1946 और to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his reputation as a अग्रणी anti-communist, और elevated him to national prominence.
He was the कार्यशील mate of ड्वाइट D. Eisenhower, the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election.
निक्सन परोसा लिये eight years as vice president.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly losing to जॉन F. कैनेडी, और खोया a रेस लिये राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया in 1962.
in 1968, he ran again for the presidency and was elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended u.S. भागीदारी in 1973.
Nixon 's विज़िट to the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 खोली राजनयिक relations between the two nations, and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced policies that transferred power from वॉशिंगटन to the राज्य.
Among other things, he launched पहलों to लड़ो cancer and illegal drugs, imposed wage and price controls, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with Apollo 11, he scaled वापस मानवयुक्त स्पेस खोजी.
He थी re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo, the इस्तीफा of उसके वाइस अध्यक्ष, spiro agnew, and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by members of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of उसके राजनैतिक support, और on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office.
After his resignation, he controversially प्राप्त a pardon जारी by उसके successor, जेराल्ड Ford.
In retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking अनेक विदेशी trips, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, और died चार दिनों बाद at the age of 81.
sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft, Lustral ) is an antidepressant of the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class.
it थी introduced to the market by Pfizer in 1991.
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in adult outpatients as खूब as obsessive–compulsive, दहशत, और सोशल चिंता विकार in both adults and children.
In 2011, it was the second-most prescribed antidepressant on the U.S. retail market, with 37,208,000 prescriptions.
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is similar to that of older tricyclic antidepressants, but its पक्ष प्रभाव हैं much कम pronounced.
Differences साथ नए antidepressants are subtler and also mostly confined to side effects.
Evidence suggests that sertraline may कार्य better than fluoxetine ( Prozac ) for some subtypes of depression.
Treatment of panic disorder with sertraline results in a significant decrease of the क्रमांक of दहशत हमले और in improved विशेषता of life.
For obsessive-compulsive disorder, sertraline is not as प्रभावी as संज्ञानात्मक behavioral therapy ; the best results have been achieved by combining these two treatments.
Although approved for social phobia और posttraumatic stress disorder, sertraline leads to only modest improvement in these conditions.
Sertraline also alleviates the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric विकार और can be प्रयुक्त in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment.
Sertraline shares the आम side effects and contraindications of other SSRIs, with high rates of nausea, diarrhea, insomnia, and sexual side effects ; however, it does not cause weight gain, and its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild.
In pregnant women taking sertraline, the ड्रग थी उपस्थित in significant एकाग्रता in fetal blood, and was also associated with a higher rate of various birth defects.
Similarly to other antidepressants, the use of sertraline लिये अवसाद may be associated with a higher rate of suicidality.
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama film निर्देशित by रॉबर्ट टाउनसेंड, who co-wrote the script with Keenan Ivory Wayans.
Distributed by 20th Century Fox, the film 's main cast शामिल टाउनसेंड, माइकल राइट, Leon Robinson, Harry J. Lennix, Tico Wells, Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers, and Diahann Carroll.
The plot of the film ( which is loosely based on the lives of several artists : The Dells, The Temptations, Four Tops, Wilson Pickett, James Brown, Frankie Lymon, sam cooke और अन्य ) फ़ॉलो the three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats.
The film depicts the rise and fall of a Motown inspired soul act through the eyes of the film 's main protagonist, Donald `` Duck '' Matthews ( portrayed by Townsend ), who serves as a narrator throughout the film.
However, a बहुमत of the सिनेमा is प्रस्तुत in a लगातार time line as opposed to traditional flash backs.
The film includes a significant amount of original music conceived by various artists for the film 's soundtrack, including singles ऐसे as `` a दिल is a हाउस लिये प्रेम ``, `` we have n't समाप्त Yet '', and `` Nothing But Love ''.
The film was released to most North American audiences March 29, 1991 however it was not made available to audiences in other continents until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another dvd रिलीज in 2006 लिये the फिल्मी 's 15th anniversary.
The movie received मिश्रित समीक्षाएँ from critics.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) was an अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today.
he is माना to be one of the greatest Thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th century, the highest ranking racehorse on the सूची url_http.
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th सदी.
Secretariat was sired by बिंदास शासक आउट of Somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
He was foaled at the मर्ग in Caroline County, Virginia.
Like his प्रसिद्ध पूर्ववर्ती man o ' युद्ध, सचिवालय was a large chestnut colt and was given the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 ट्रिपल क्राउन विजेता सिएटल Slew.
Owned by Penny chenery, he थी प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte, along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ), and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow stable 's ब्लू और श्वेत checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, and weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
A typical 12 V, 40 Ah lead-acid car battery
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable बैटरी that supplies electric energy to an automobile.
Usually this refers to an SLI battery ( starting, lighting, प्रज्वलन ) to शक्ति the प्रारंभ मोटर, the लाइट्स, और the ignition system of a vehicle’s engine.
Automotive SLI batteries हैं प्रायः lead-acid type, and are made of six galvanic cells in series to provide a 12 volt system.
Each cell provides 2.1 volts for a कुल of 12.6 वोल्ट at full charge.
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors, often equipped with diesel engines, may have two batteries in series लिये a 24 वोल्ट प्रणाली, or may have समानांतर स्ट्रिंग्स of batteries.
Lead-acid batteries are made up of plates of lead and separate plates of lead डाइऑक्साइड, जिससे हैं submerged into an electrolyte समाधान of about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % water.
This causes a chemical reaction that releases electrons, allowing उन्हें to प्रवाह through conductors to produce electricity.
As the battery discharges, the acid of the electrolyte प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ the सामग्री of the plates, changing their surface to lead sulfate.
When the battery is recharged, the chemical प्रतिक्रिया is reversed : the सीसे सल्फेट reforms into lead dioxide and lead.
With the plates restored to their original condition, the प्रक्रम may now be repeated.
Battery recycling of automotive batteries reduces the need लिये संसाधन required for manufacture of new batteries, diverts toxic lead from landfills, and prevents risk of improper disposal.
Full-time employment is employment in which a व्यक्ति works a न्यूनतम क्रमांक of hours defined as such by his/her employer.
Full-time employment often comes with benefits that are not typically offered to part-time, temporary, or flexible workers, such as annual leave, sickleave, and health insurance.
full-time कार्य are often considered careers.
They generally अदा अधिक than part-time jobs, and usually carry more hours per week.
The Fair Labor Standards Act ( flsa ) करता not define full-time employment or part-time employment.
This is a matter generally to be determined by the employer ( us विभाग of Labor ).
The definition by employer can vary and is generally प्रकाशित in a कम्पनी 's कर्मचारी हैंडबुक.
Companies commonly require from 30–35 or 40 घंटों प्रति सप्ताह to be पारिभाषित as full-time and therefore eligible for benefits.
Full-Time status varies between company and is often based on the shift the कर्मचारी जरूर work during each work week.
The `` standard '' work week consists of five eight-hour दिनों, commonly परोसा between 9:00AM to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours.
While a four-day week generally consists of four ten-hour days ; it may also consist of as little as nine hours for a कुल of a 36 घंटा work week.
twelve-hour शिफ्ट हैं प्रायः तीन दिनों प्रति week, unless the company has the intention of paying out the employee overtime.
ओवरटाइम is legally सशुल्क आउट anytime an employee works more than 40 hours per week.
The legal minimum for ओवरटाइम starts at Base Pay + One-Half.
The increased payout is considered to compensate slightly for the increased fatigue which a person experiences on such long शिफ्ट.
Shifts can also be very irregular, as in retail, but are still full-time if the required क्रमांक of घंटों is पहुँचे.
There are some situations where a व्यक्ति जो needs full-time कार्य is dropped to part-time, which is sometimes a form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker.
Seahorse is the title given to 54 species of marine मछली in the genus हिप्पोकैम्पस.
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the Ancient Greek hippos meaning `` horse '' and kampos meaning `` sea monster ''.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United States as Title ii of the व्यापक ड्रग गाली रोकथाम और Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture, importation, possession, use and वितरण of निश्चित substances is regulated.
the अधिनियम भी परोसा as the national implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण निर्णय are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
माया numerals
Maya numerals are a vigesimal ( base - twenty ) numeral system used by the pre-columbian माया civilization.
The numerals are made up of three symbols ; zero ( शेल आकार ), one ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ).
For example, thirteen is written as तीन dots in a आड़ा पंक्ति above two horizontal lines stacked above each other.
lyndon baines जॉनसन ( अगस्त 27, 1908 – जनवरी 22, 1973 ), प्रायः referred to as LBJ, was the 36th President of the United States ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four लोगों जो परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त States : Representative, Senator, Vice President, and President.
Johnson, a Democrat from Texas, served as a United States प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961, सहित six years as United States Senate Majority Leader, two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960, Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the हत्या of जॉन F. कैनेडी on नवम्बर 22, 1963, समाप्त Kennedy 's term and was elected President in his own right, winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President, he थी जिम्मेदार लिये डिजाइनिंग the `` ग्रेट समाज `` विधान कि शामिल कानून कि upheld सिविल अधिकारों, पब्लिक प्रसारण, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to education, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार, '' उसके coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War, from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in जल्दी 1968, as अमरीकी हताहत soared and the peace process bogged down.
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965, और अपराधों rates soared, as his opponents raised demands for `` law and order '' policies.
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक, he ended his bid for reelection.
Republican रिचर्ड निक्सन थी निर्वाचित to succeed him.
Historians argue कि जॉनसन 's प्रेसिडेंसी marked the peak of modern liberalism in the United States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by some historians because of his domestic policies.
Progesterone also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a c-21 स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन शामिल in the मादा menstrual cycle, pregnancy ( supports gestation ) and embryogenesis of humans and other species.
Progesterone belongs to a क्लास of हार्मोन पुकारा progestogens, and is the major naturally occurring human progestogen.
Big Bird is a protagonist of the children 's television show Sesame Street.
Officially performed by Caroll spinney चूंकि 1969, he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) tall bright primrose-yellow bird.
He can रोलर स्केट, बर्फ skate, dance, sing, write poetry, draw and even ride a unicycle.
But despite this wide array of talents, he is prone to frequent misunderstandings, on one occasion even singing the alphabet as एक बिग long शब्द ( इससे the सोंग पुकारा `` abc-def-ghi, '' सुनाया `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering what it could ever mean.
He lives in a large nest behind the 123 Sesame Street brownstone and has a teddy bear named Radar.
Webtrends is a private company headquartered in पोर्टलैंड, ऑरेगॉन, United States.
It provides web, social, and mobile analytics और अन्य तन्त्र समाधान सम्बन्धित to विपणन intelligence.
The company was संस्थापित in 1993 and now serves more than 10,000 large and small firms. < ref name='Intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21 ' >
The Second Crusade ( 1145–1149 ) थी the दूसरी major crusade launched from Europe.
The Second Crusade was started in response to the fall of the County of Edessa the पिछला साल to the शक्तियां of Zengi.
The county had been founded during the First Crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by baldwin of boulogne in 1098.
While it थी the पहला Crusader state to be founded, it was also the first to fall.
The Second Crusade was announced by Pope Eugene III, and was the first of the crusades to be led by European kings, namely Louis VII of France and Conrad III of Germany, with help from a number of other European nobles.
The armies of the दो किंग्स marched separately across Europe.
After crossing बीज़ान्टिन territory into आनातोलिया, both armies were separately defeated by the Seljuq Turks.
The main Western Christian source, Odo of Deuil, and Syriac Christian sources claim that the Byzantine emperor Manuel I Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' प्रगति, विशेषकर in Anatolia where he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them.
Louis and Conrad and the remnants of their armies reached Jerusalem and, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised attack on Damascus.
The crusade in the east was a failure लिये the crusaders और a ग्रेट victory for the Muslims.
It would ultimately have a key influence on the पतन of जेरूसलम और दे वृद्धि to the Third Crusade at the end of the 12th century.
The only success of the Second Crusade came to a combined force of 13,000 फ्लेमिश, frisian, नॉर्मन, English, Scottish, and German crusaders in 1147.
Travelling from England, by ship, to the Holy Land, the फौज रोका और helped the छोटी ( 7,000 ) पुर्तगाली army in the capture of Lisbon, expelling its Moorish occupants.
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. ( ), branded as walmart, is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय retail corporation that runs chains of large discount department stores and warehouse stores.
The company is the world 's third largest पब्लिक निगम, according to the सौभाग्य Global 500 list in 2012, the biggest private employer in the world with over two million employees, and is the largest retailer in the world.
walmart remains a family-owned कारोबार, as the कम्पनी is नियंत्रित by the वाल्टन परिवार, जो अपना a 48 प्रतिशत हिस्सेदारी in walmart.
It is भी एक of the संसार 's most valuable companies.
The company was founded by Sam Walton in 1962, incorporated on अक्तूबर 31, 1969, और publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange in 1972.
It is headquartered in Bentonville, Arkansas.
Walmart is also the largest grocery retailer in the संयुक्त राज्य.
In 2009, it generated 51 percent of its US $ 258 billion sales in the U.S. from grocery कारोबार.
It भी owns और operates the sam 's Club retail warehouses in North America.
By 1988, Wal-Mart was the most profitable retailer in the US, and by November 1990, it outsold k-mart.
By 1991 it outsold Sears in retail, making it America 's largest रिटेलर, a भेद it स्टिल holds.
Walmart has 8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 देशों, अंतर्गत 55 different names.
The company operates under the Walmart name in the संयुक्त राज्य, including the 50 states and Puerto Rico.
It operates in मैक्सिको as Walmex, in the United Kingdom as Asda, in Japan as Seiyu, and in India as Best Price.
It has wholly owned operations in अर्जेंटीना, ब्राज़ील, और Canada.
walmart 's निवेश बाहर उत्तर अमेरिका have था मिश्रित परिणाम : its operations in the United Kingdom, South America, and China are highly successful, whereas ventures in Germany and South Korea were unsuccessful.
Robert William Gary Moore ( 4 April 1952 – 6 February 2011 ), was a उत्तरी आयरिश संगीतकार, सबसे widely recognised as a singer and guitarist.
In a career डेटिंग वापस to the 1960s, मूर निभाई with artists including Phil Lynott and Brian Downey during his teens, leading him to memberships with the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions.
Moore shared the stage with such blues and rock luminaries as b.b. किंग, अल्बर्ट किंग, कोलोसियम ii, George Harrison and Greg Lake, as well as having a successful solo career.
He guested on a number of albums recorded by high profile musicians, including a cameo appearance playing the सीसे गिटार सोलो on `` वो 's my baby `` इससे traveling Wilburys Vol. 3.
An उदाहरण of rack mounted servers
A web होस्टिंग सेवा is a प्रकार of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग service that allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by clients, as well as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a आंकड़ा बीच.
Web hosts can also provide data center space और कनेक्टिविटी to the Internet for other servers located in their data center, called colocation, also known as Housing in Latin America or France.
The पैमाना of वेब होस्टिंग services varies greatly.
The most basic is web page and small-scale संचिका होस्टिंग, जहाँ फाइलें can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
The files are usually delivered to the वेब `` as is '' or साथ minimal processing.
Many Internet service providers ( ISPs ) offer this सेवा फ़्री to subscribers.
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web page hosting from वैकल्पिक service providers.
निजी वेब साईट होस्टिंग is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting प्रायः रै a उच्चतर व्यय depending upon the size and type of the website.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient for personal web pages.
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides डेटाबेस support और अनुप्रयोग विकास प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow customers to write or install स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग जैसे forums और content management.
Also, सुरक्षित sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or control panel for managing the Web सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट, as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल and service applications like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in certain software or सेवाएं ( e.g. e-commerce ), which are commonly used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
Obstetrics ( from the Latin obstare, `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the care of all women 's reproductive tracts and their children दौरान गर्भावस्था ( prenatal काल ), प्रसव and the postnatal period.
Many obstetricians हैं भी स्त्रीरोग, meaning they perform in both specialties.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, ये physicians are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs.
The Wright brothers, Orville ( August 19, 1871 – January 30, 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – May 30, 1912 ), were two American brothers, inventors, and aviation pioneers who were credited with inventing and भवन the संसार 's पहला successful airplane and making the first controlled, powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight, on December 17, 1903.
From 1905 to 1907, the brothers developed their flying machine into the पहला व्यावहारिक fixed-wing aircraft.
Although not the पहला to निर्माण और मक्खी प्रायोगिक aircraft, the Wright brothers were the first to invent aircraft controls that made fixed-wing powered flight possible.
The brothers ' आधारभूत भेदन थी उनके आविष्कार of three-axis control, which enabled the pilot to steer the aircraft effectively and to maintain its equilibrium.
This method became मानक और remains standard on fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds.
From the beginning of their aeronautical work, the राइट भाइयो focused on developing a reliable method of pilot control as the key to solving `` the flying problem ''.
This approach differed significantly from other experimenters of the समय who put more emphasis on developing powerful engines.
Using a small homebuilt wind tunnel, the Wrights also collected more accurate data than any before, enabling उन्हें to डिज़ाइन और निर्माण विंग्स और propellers कि यहूद अधिक कुशल than any before.
Their first U.S. patent, 821,393, did not claim invention of a flying machine, but rather, the invention of a system of aerodynamic कंट्रोल कि manipulated a उड़ती यंत्र 's सतहों.
They gained the mechanical skills essential for their success by working for years in their shop with printing presses, bicycles, मोटर्स, और अन्य मशीनरी.
Their work with साइकिल in particular influenced their belief that an unstable vehicle like a flying machine could be controlled and balanced with practice.
From 1900 until उनके पहला संचालित फ़्लाइट in late 1903, they conducted extensive glider tests that also developed their skills as pilots.
Their bicycle shop employee चार्ली टेलर became an important part of the team, building their first aircraft engine in close collaboration with the brothers.
The राइट भाइयो ' औकात as inventors of the airplane has been subject to counter-claims by various parties.
Much विवाद persists over the many competing claims of early aviators.
अमेरिका 's अगला शीर्ष मॉडल, साईकिल 12 is the बारहवीं cycle of America 's Next Top Model and the sixth season to air on The CW network.
It premiered on कूच 4, 2009.
The cycle 's catch phrase is `` मिलेंगी in the मोड़ें. ''
