The prizes लिये इस साईकिल are:
A modeling अनुबंध with Elite Model Management.
A fashion spread and cover in सत्रह.
A 100,000 अनुबंध with CoverGirl cosmetics.
The first half of the cycle took place in New York City, moving the show वापस इससे लॉस एंजिल्स last season.
The international destination for this साईकिल is são पाउलो, ब्राज़ील, the श्रेणी पहला visit to South America.
The number of girls was reduced to 13, the first time चूंकि साईकिल 9, बाद being maintained at 14 in the last two cycles.
This was the last time Paulina Porizkova participated as न्यायधीश.
The winner थी 20-year-old teyona Anderson from Woodstown, New Jersey.
This season averaged 4.35 लाख viewers per episode.
Exxon Mobil Corporation, or ExxonMobil, is an American multinational oil and गैस निगम headquartered in Irving, Texas, United States.
It is a direct descendant of John D. rockefeller 's Standard Oil company, and was formed on November 30, 1999, by the merger of Exxon and Mobil.
it is संबद्ध with Imperial Oil which operates in Canada.
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest company by आय और in 2013, became the largest publicly traded company by market capitalization in the world.
The कम्पनी is क्रमित # 5 globally in Forbes Global 2000 list in 2013.
Exxon Mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the समाप्त of 2007 और, at then ( 2007 ) rates of production, are expected to last over 14 years.
With 37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a combined daily refining capacity of, Exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the world, a title that was also associated with Standard आयल चूंकि इसके incorporation in 1870.
ExxonMobil is the largest of the world 's supermajors with रोज़ उत्पादन of 3.921 लाख boe ( barrels of oil equivalent ).
In 2008, this was लगभग 3 % of संसार उत्पादन, which is less than several of the largest state-owned petroleum companies.
When ranked by oil और गैस reserves it is 14th in the world with less than 1 % of the total.
A 2012 article in The Daily Telegraph says that ExxonMobil has `` grown into एक of the planet’s सबसे hated corporations, able to determine American foreign policy and the fate of entire nations ''.
In terms of its environmental record, ExxonMobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to them by dictatorships, ऐसे as those in chad and Equatorial Guinea.
Lee Raymond, the corporation’s chief कार्यपालिका जबतक 2005, थी `` notoriously sceptical about climate change and disliked government interference at any level ''.
The company was widely criticized लिये इसके slow जवाब to cleaning its 1989 Valdez oil spill in Alaska.
This article is about the Globe Theatre of शेक्सपियर.
For the modern पुनर्निर्माण in लंदन, see Shakespeare 's Globe.
For other uses, देखिए ग्लोब थिएटर ( disambiguation ).
The Globe थिएटर थी a थिएटर in लंदन associated with William Shakespeare.
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company, the Lord Chamberlain 's Men, on land owned by Thomas Brend and inherited by his son, निकोलस brend और पोता सर मैथ्यू Brend, and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613.
A second Globe Theatre was built on the same site by June 1614 और बंद in 1642.
A modern पुनर्निर्माण of the ग्लोब, नामित `` Shakespeare 's Globe ``, opened in 1997 approximately from the site of the original theatre.
It 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 अमरीकी क्रिसमस नाटक फिल्मी उत्पादित और निर्देशित by Frank Capra, based on the short story `` The Greatest Gift ``, which Philip Van Doren Stern wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945.
The film is considered one of the most loved films in American cinema and has become traditional viewing during the Christmas season, alongside popular classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas Carol.
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey, a man who has given up his dreams in order to help others and whose imminent suicide on Christmas Eve brings परिचय the हस्तक्षेप of उसके संरक्षक देवदूत, क्लेरेंस odbody ( हेनरी Travers ).
Clarence shows जार्ज all the lives he has touched and how different life in his community of Bedford Falls would be had he never been born.
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production costs and stiff competition at the time of its release, the film has आइये to be regarded as a क्लासिक और is a staple of Christmas television around the world.
Theatrically, the film 's break-even point was actually $ 6.3 million, लगभग twice the उत्पादन लागत, a फिगर it never came close to achieving in its initial release.
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` हालांकि it थी नहीं the पूरा बक्सा दफ्तर विफलता that today everyone believes... it was initially a major disappointment and confirmed, at least to the studios, that Capra was no longer capable of turning out the populist features that made his films the must-see, money-making events they once were. ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and has been recognized by the American Film Institute as one of the 100 best American films ever made, placing number 11 on its initial 1998 greatest movie list, and would also place number one on its list of the most प्रेरणादायक अमरीकी films of सब time.
Data Warehouse अवलोकन
In computing, a आंकड़ा गोदाम or एंटरप्राइज़ आंकड़ा warehouse ( DW, DWH, or EDW ) is a database used for reporting and data analysis.
It is a central repository of data which is created by integrating आंकड़ा इससे एक or अधिक disparate sources.
Data warehouses store current as well as ऐतिहासिक आंकड़ा और हैं प्रयुक्त लिये बनाना चर्चित रिपोर्ट्स लिये वरिष्ठ प्रबन्धन reporting such as annual and quarterly comparisons.
The data stored in the warehouse are uploaded from the operational systems ( ऐसे as विपणन, बिक्री etc., shown in the figure to the right ).
The data may pass through an operational आंकड़ा store for additional operations before they are used in the DW for reporting.
The typical ETL -आधारd आंकड़ा गोदाम उपयोग staging, data integration, and access layers to house its key functions.
The स्टेजिंग परत or स्टेजिंग डेटाबेस stores raw data extracted from each of the disparate source data systems.
The integration layer integrates the disparate data sets by transforming the आंकड़ा इससे the staging layer often storing this transformed data in an operational data store ( ODS ) database.
The integrated data are then moved to yet another database, often called the आंकड़ा गोदाम डेटाबेस, जहाँ the आंकड़ा is arranged into hierarchical groups often called dimensions and into facts and aggregate facts.
The combination of facts and dimensions is sometimes पुकारा a स्टार स्कीमा.
The अभिगम परत helps users retrieve data.
A data warehouse constructed from an integrated data सोर्स प्रणालियों करता not require ETL, staging databases, or operational data store databases.
The integrated data source systems may be माना to be a भाग of a distributed operational data store layer.
Data federation methods or data virtualization methods may be used to access the distributed integrated source आंकड़ा प्रणालियों to consolidate और aggregate data directly into the data warehouse database tables.
Unlike the ETL-based data warehouse, the integrated source data systems and the data warehouse are all integrated since there is no परिवर्तन of dimensional or reference data.
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the ड्रिल bas इससे the कुल आंकड़ा of the आंकड़ा गोदाम to the transactional data of the integrated source data systems.
Data warehouses can be subdivided into data marts.
Data marts store subsets of आंकड़ा इससे a गोदाम.
This definition of the data गोदाम focuses on data storage.
The main source of the data is cleaned, transformed, cataloged and made उपलब्धियाँ लिये उपयोग by प्रबंधक और अन्य कारोबार professionals for data mining, online analytical processing, market research and decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ).
However, the means to retrieve and analyze data, to extract, transform and load data, and to manage the data dictionary हैं भी माना अनिवार्य components of a आंकड़ा warehousing system.
Many सन्दर्भ to आंकड़ा warehousing use this broader context.
Thus, an expanded definition for data warehousing includes business intelligence tools, tools to निकालें, रूपांतरण और लोड आंकड़ा into the repository, and tools to manage and retrieve metadata.
Portland stone quarry on the आइल of Portland, England
An abandoned construction aggregate quarry निकट एडिलेड, South Australia
A quarry is a type of open-pit mine from which rock or खनिज हैं निकाली.
Quarries are generally used for extracting building materials, ऐसे as आयाम स्टोन, निर्माण कुल, riprap, sand, and gravel.
They are often collocated with concrete and asphalt plants due to the आवश्यकता लिये विशाल amounts of aggregate in those materials.
Open mines that produce minerals are typically referred to as खोलें गड्ढे खानों.
The word quarry can include underground quarrying लिये स्टोन, ऐसे as नहाना स्टोन.
Mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural group related to Mormonism, the principal branch of the latter दिन संत गति of restorationist christianity, जिससे began साथ the visions of जोसेफ Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s.
After Smith 's death in 1844 the Mormons followed Brigham Young to कया होता become the यूटा Territory.
Today Mormons are understood to be members of The Church of यीशु मसीह of latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ).
Some Mormons हैं भी either स्वतंत्र or non-practicing.
The बीच of mormon सांस्कृतिक influence is in यूटा, and North America has more Mormons than any other continent, though the majority of Mormons live outside the United States.
mormons have विकसित a दमदार sense of communality that stems from their doctrine and history.
During the 19th सदी mormon converts tended to gather to a central geographic location, and between 1852 and 1890 a minority of Mormons openly practiced plural marriage, a form of religious polygamy.
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time and संसाधन to सेवारत in उनके गिरिजाघर, और अनेक young Mormons choose to serve a full-time proselytizing mission.
Mormons have a health code that eschews alcoholic beverages, tobacco, coffee, tea, and अन्य addictive substances.
They tend to be very family-oriented, और have दमदार कनेक्शन्स आरपार पीढियां और साथ विस्तारित परिवार, परावर्तक of उनके belief that families can be sealed together beyond death and throughout eternity.
Mormons also have a strict law of chastity, requiring abstention इससे यौन संबंध outside of marriage and strict fidelity within marriage.
Mormons self-identify as Christian, though some of their beliefs differ from मुख्यधारा christianity.
Mormons believe in the Bible, as well as other books of scripture, ऐसे as the Book of Mormon.
They have a unique view of cosmology, and believe that all लोगों हैं spirit-children of परमेश्वर.
Mormons believe that returning to God requires following the example of Jesus मसीह, और accepting उसके प्रायश्चित through ordinances such as baptism.
They believe that Christ 's church was restored through जोसेफ स्मिथ, और is हिदायत by living prophets and apostles.
Central to Mormon आस्था is the विश्वास कि परमेश्वर बोलती to his children and answers their prayers.
In वित्तीय हिसाब, assets are economic resources.
Anything tangible or intangible that is सक्षम of होने स्वामित्व or नियंत्रित to produce value and that is held to have positive economic value is considered an asset.
Simply stated, एसेट represent मान of ownership that can be converted into cash ( although cash itself is also considered an asset ).
The balance sheet of a firm records the monetaryj.
G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest Pocket CPA '', Wiley, 2005.There are different methods of assessing the monetary value of the एसेट अंकित on the संतुलन चादर.
In some cases, the Historical Cost is used ; such that the value of the एसेट जब it थी खरीदा in the past is used as the monetary value.
In other उदाहरण, the उपस्थित मेला मार्केट value of the asset is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet.
मान of the assets owned by the firm.
It is धन and other valuables belonging to an individual or business.
Two major asset classes are ठोस एसेट और intangible assets.
ठोस एसेट contain various subclasses, including current assets and fixed assets.J.
downes, j.e. गुडमैन, `` शब्दकोष of वित्त & निवेश शर्तें '', सामन्त 's वित्तीय Guides, 2003 Current assets include inventory, while fixed assets include such items as buildings and equipment.J. Downes, J.E. Goodman, `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest Pocket CPA '', Wiley, 2005.
Intangible assets are nonphysical resources and rights that have a मान to the कड़ क्युकी वे दे the कड़ कुछ kind of advantage in the market place.
Examples of intangible एसेट हैं साख, copyrights, trademarks, patents और कंप्यूटर programs, and financial assets, including such items as accounts receivable, bonds and stocks.
A neuron ( or ; also known as a neurone or तंत्रिका कोशिका ) is an electrically excitable कोशिका कि processes and transmits information through electrical and chemical signals.
A रासायनिक सिग्नल occurs via a synapse, a specialized connection with other cells.
Neurons connect to each other to रूप neural networks.
Neurons हैं the कोर components of the nervous system, which includes the brain, spinal cord, and peripheral ganglia.
A number of specialized types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond to touch, sound, light and numerous other stimuli affecting cells of the संवेदी अंगों कि तब भेजें सिग्नल to the स्पाइनल cord and brain.
Motor neurons receive signals from the brain and spinal cord, cause muscle contractions, और affect glands.
Interneurons connect neurons to अन्य न्यूरॉन्स within the same region of the brain or spinal cord.
A typical neuron possesses a cell देह ( प्रायः पुकारा the सोम ), dendrites, and an axon.
dendrites हैं पतला structures कि उठता इससे the कोशिका देह, प्रायः extending for hundreds of micrometres and branching multiple times, giving rise to a complex `` dendritic tree ''.
An axon is a special cellular extension that arises from the cell body at a site called the axon hillock and travels for a distance, as far as 1 meter in इंसानो or भी अधिक in अन्य species.
The cell body of a neuron frequently gives rise to multiple dendrites, लकिन never to अधिक than one axon, although the axon may branch hundreds of times before it terminates.
At the majority of synapses, signals are sent from the axon of एक न्यूरॉन to a dendrite of another.
There are, however, many exceptions to ये नियम : न्यूरॉन्स कि lack dendrites, neurons that have no axon, synapses that connect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, etc.
All neurons are electrically excitable, maintaining voltage gradients across their membranes by means of metabolically चलित आयन पंपों, जिससे combine साथ आयन चैनल्स embedded in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration differences of ions such as sodium, potassium, chloride, and calcium.
Changes in the cross-membrane voltage can alter the function of voltage-dependent ion channels.
If the voltage changes by a large enough amount, an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called an कार्रवाई संभावित is उत्पन्न, जिससे ट्रेवल्स rapidly along the cell 's axon, and activates synaptic connections with other cells when it arrives.
न्यूरॉन्स do not undergo cell division.
In most cases, neurons are उत्पन्न by खास types of stem cells.
Astrocytes, a type of glial cell, have also been observed to फेरे into न्यूरॉन्स by पुण्य of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency.
In humans, neurogenesis largely ceases दौरान adulthood—but in two brain areas, the hippocampus and olfactory bulb, there is strong evidence for generation of substantial numbers of new neurons.
Super Bowl XLIII was an American football game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Pittsburgh स्टीलर्स और the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season.
The Steelers defeated the Cardinals by the स्कोर of 27–23.
The game was played on फ़रवरी 1, 2009, at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Florida.
With इस जीत, the स्टीलर्स became the first team to win six Super Bowls.
Pittsburgh, who finished the regular season with a 12–4 record, also won their second Super Bowl in four years after winning सुपर कटोरी xl at the समाप्त of the 2005 ऋतु.
The Cardinals entered the game seeking their first NFL title since 1947, the longest चैंपियनशिप सूखा in the league.
The club became an unexpected winner during the regular season, compiling a 9–7 रिकार्ड, और the playoffs साथ the सहायता of head coach Ken Whisenhunt, who was the Steelers ' offensive coordinator in Super Bowl XL, and the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt Warner, who was the Super Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team, St. Louis Rams.
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 halftime lead, aided by linebacker जेम्स हैरिसन 's सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.
Trailing 20–7 at the start of the fourth quarter, Arizona scored 16 अनुत्तरित अंक, सहित चौड़ी receiver Larry Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown reception, to take the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game.
But the Steelers marched 78 yards to score on चौड़ी receiver santonio holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left.
Holmes, who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown, सहित चार receptions for 73 yards on that final game-winning drive, was named Super Bowl MVP.
He became the छठे चौड़ी receiver to जीत the award, and also was the third Pittsburgh receiver to win the award, following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward.
despite the वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट और सीमित राशि of आनुषंगिक festivities that are normally held before the game, the NBC television network broadcast attracted an average U.S. audience of 98.7 million viewers, making it the most watched Super Bowl in history to that point.
A diagram of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम, प्रर्दशित विभिन्न properties across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all possible frequencies of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning, and is instead the characteristic वितरण of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त, thereby covering wavelengths इससे thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is thought that the छोटी wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous.
Most parts of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize matter.
In addition, radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण लिये अधिक applications ).
लेजेंड
marchantia, a liverwort
Bryophyte is a परंपरागत नाम प्रयुक्त to refer to all embryophytes ( land plants ) that do not have true vascular tissue and are therefore called ' non-vascular plants '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the transport of water ; however since ये do नहीं contain lignin, वे हैं नहीं considered to be true vascular tissue.
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a natural or monophyletic group ; however the नाम is सुविधाजनक and remains in use as a collective term for mosses, hornworts, and liverworts.
bryophytes उपज enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia and sporangia ), but they produce neither flowers nor seeds, reproducing via spores.
The term bryophyte comes from Greek βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant ''.
A bank is a financial institution and a financial intermediary that accepts जमा और चैनल्स those जमा into lending activities, either directly by loaning or indirectly through capital markets.
A bank is the connection between customers कि have पूंजी deficits and customers with capital surpluses.
Due to their influence within a वित्तीय प्रणाली और an अर्थव्यवस्था, बैंको are generally highly regulated in most countries.
Most banks operate under a system known as fractional reserve banking जहाँ वे थाम तभी a छोटी आरक्षित of the निधि deposited and lend out the rest for profit.
They are generally subject to न्यूनतम पूंजी आवश्यकताएँ जिससे हैं आधारित on an अंतरराष्ट्रीय set of capital standards, known as the Basel Accords.
The oldest bank still in existence is Monte dei Paschi di Siena, headquartered in सियेना, इटली, जिससे रै महरूम ऑपरेटिंग continuously since 1472.
It is followed by Berenberg Bank of Hamburg ( 1590 ) and Sveriges Riksbank of स्वीडन ( 1668 ).
Banking in its modern sense evolved in rich शहरों of पुनर्जागरण इटली, ऐसे as Florence, Venice and Genoa.
In the history of banking, a number of banking dynasties —among them notably Medici, Fugger, Welser, Berenberg, Baring and Rothschild —have निभाई a सेंट्रल भूमिका over many centuries.
The Xbox is a वीडियो खेल कंसोल manufactured by Microsoft.
It was released on November 15, 2001 in उत्तर अमेरिका, फ़रवरी 22, 2002 in Japan, and March 14, 2002 in Australia and Europe.
It was Microsoft 's first foray into the गेमिंग कंसोल मार्केट.
As part of the sixth-generation of गेमिंग, the एक्सबॉक्स competed साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 2, Sega 's Dreamcast ( which stopped American sales before the Xbox went on sale ), and Nintendo 's GameCube.
The Xbox was the first console offered by an American company बाद the atari जैगुआर रोका बिक्री in 1996.
The integrated Xbox Live service launched in नवम्बर 2002 allowed players to play games online with a broadband connection.
It first competed with Dreamcast 's online सेवा लकिन बाद primarily competed with PlayStation 2 's online service.
Although these two are free while Xbox Live required a सब्सक्रिप्शन, as खूब as broadband-only कनेक्शन जिससे थी नहीं completely adopted yet, Xbox Live was a success due to better servers, features such as a buddy list, and milestone titles like Halo 2 released in November 2004, which is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by far the most popular online game for years.
Xbox 's successor, the Xbox 360, was launched in नवम्बर 2005.
The Xbox was discontinued in late 2005 in Japan where sales were poor.
It was discontinued in late 2006 in Europe and early 2007 in North America.
The last Xbox game in Europe was Tony Hawk 's प्रोजेक्ट 8 released in नवम्बर 2006, and the last game in North America was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008.
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was discontinued on कूच 2, 2009, stating कि कोई in-warranty मरम्मत अभी needed will not be undertaken.
Xbox अभिगम to एक्सबॉक्स सजीव was stopped on April 15, 2010.
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the इन्जील of जॉन or बस जॉन और प्रायः referred to in New Testament scholarship as the Fourth Gospel, is an account of the public ministry of Jesus.
It begins with the witness and affirmation by John the Baptist and concludes with the death, burial, क़यामत, और post-resurrection दिखावे of Jesus.
This account is fourth of the canonical gospels, after the synoptics Matthew, Mark and Luke.
states that the book derives from the testimony of the ' शिष्य whom Jesus loved. '
Along with पीटर, the unnamed disciple is especially close to Jesus, and early-church tradition identified him as John the Apostle, one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles.
The gospel is closely related in style and content to the three surviving Epistles of John such that टीकाकारों दावत the चार किताबे साथ, yet, according to सबसे आधुनिक विद्वानों, John was not the author of any of these books.
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more and more has लगाई जॉन भीतर a first-century यहूदी कॉन्टेक्स्ट.
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering work to trace the विकास of the परंपरा from which the gospel arose.
The discourses seem to be concerned with the actual issues of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time जब the इन्जील थी लिखा.
It is notable कि, in the इन्जील, the community still appears to define itself primarily against Judaism, rather than as part of a wider Christian church.
Though christianity प्रारंभ as a गति भीतर judaism, gradually Christians and Jews became bitterly opposed.
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics, अर्थ कि it describes यीशु as the अवतार of the divine Logos through whom all things were made, as the object of veneration, and more explicitly as God incarnate.
Only in John does Jesus talk at length about himself and his divine role, प्रायः साझा with the disciples only.
Against the synoptics, John focuses largely on different miracles ( including resurrecting Lazarus ), दिए as लक्षण meant to engender faith.
Synoptic elements such as parables और exorcisms हैं नहीं found in John.
It presents a realized eschatology in which salvation is already उपस्थित for the believer.
The Plagues of Egypt ( ), also called the Ten Plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues, were ten calamities that, according to the biblical Book of Exodus, Israel 's God, Yahweh, inflicted upon Egypt to राजी pharaoh to रिलीज the ill-treated israelites from slavery.
Pharaoh capitulated बाद the दसवाँ plague, triggering the Exodus of the Jewish people.
The plagues were designed to कंट्रास्ट the शक्ति of yahweh with the impotence of Egypt 's various gods.
Some commentators have associated several of the plagues with judgment on specific देवताओं संबद्ध साथ the nile, प्रजनन and natural phenomena.
The plagues of Egypt are also mentioned in the कुरान ( 7,133–136 ).
According to the Book of exodus, परमेश्वर proclaims that all the gods of Egypt will be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John Martin 's पेंटिंग of the plague of hail and fire ( 1823 ).
A role-playing game ( RPG and sometimes roleplaying खेल ) is a खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी assume the भूमिकाएँ of characters in a fictional setting.
Players take responsibility for acting out these भूमिकाएँ भीतर a कथा, either through literal acting or through a process of structured decision-making or character development.
Actions taken within many games succeed or fail according to a औपचारिक system of rules and guidelines.
There are several forms of आरपीजी.
The original form, sometimes called the tabletop RPG, is conducted through discussion, whereas in live action role-playing games ( LARP ) players physically perform their characters ' actions.
In both of these forms, an arranger पुकारा a खेल निपुण ( GM ) usually decides on the rules and setting to be used and acts as referee, while each of the other players plays the role of a single character.
Several किस्में of आरपीजी भी मौजूद in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मीडिया, such as multi-player text-based MUDs and their graphics-based successors, massively multiplayer online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ).
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing वीडियो खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी कंट्रोल a character or team who undertake quests, and may include capabilities that advance using statistical mechanics.
These games often share settings and rules with tabletop RPGs, लकिन emphasize अक्षर उन्नति अधिक than collaborative storytelling.
Despite this variety of forms, some game forms such as trading card games and wargames that are related to role-playing games may not be included.
Role-playing activity may sometimes be उपस्थित in such games, but it is not the primary focus.
The term is also sometimes used to describe roleplay simulation games and exercises used in शिक्षण, प्रशिक्षण, और अकादमिक research.
The American Civil War ( acw ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers किया not intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would not initiate सिविल युद्ध.
Eight remaining slave राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह, and both sides prepared for war.
The confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border states and स्थापित a नवल blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The पूर्वी थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी नदी.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना in 1864.
In the पश्चिमी थिएटर, विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate फौज विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War थी एक of the earliest सच्चा industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी history, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40.
The definition of the world 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र रै महरूम निर्दिष्ट by the Airports Council International in Geneva, Switzerland.
The ACI defines and measures the following three types of airport traffic:
Passenger traffic : total passengers emplaned and deplaned, passengers in पारगमन गिने once
कार्गो ट्रैफ़िक : loaded and unloaded freight and mail in metric tonnes
ट्रैफ़िक आंदोलनों : अवतरण and take-offs of aircraft
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 और lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर 1918.
It was predominantly called the संसार War or the Great War from its occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली, जापानी और the संयुक्त States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in अनेक of the राष्ट्र शामिल.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at war and, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was successful विरूद्ध the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
इटली और बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of कामयाब offensives और American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor राज्य of the पूर्व two lost a great amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe was redrawn into अनेक छोटी राज्य.
The League of Nations was formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill, the BP oil disaster, the Gulf of Mexico oil spill, and the Macondo blowout ) was an oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico on the BP -operated Macondo Prospect, considered the largest आकस्मिक समुद्री आयल spill in the इतिहास of the पेट्रोलियम उद्योग, अनुमानित to be between 8 % और 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill.
Following the explosion और डूब of the deepwater क्षितिज oil rig, which claimed 11 lives, a sea-floor oil gusher flowed unabated for 87 days, until it was capped on 15 July 2010.
The total discharge is estimated at.
A massive जवाब ensued to protect समुद्रतट, वेटलैंड्स और मुहानों from the spreading oil utilizing skimmer ships, floating booms, controlled burns and of Corexit oil dispersant.
After several विफल प्रयत्न to contain the प्रवाह, the well was declared sealed on 19 September 2010.
Some reports indicate the well site continues to लीक.
Due to the months-long spill, along with adverse effects from the response and cleanup activities, extensive damage to marine and wildlife habitats, fishing and tourism industries, and human health problems have continued through 2013.three सालो बाद the spill, तारकोल balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast.
Numerous investigations explored the causes of the विस्फोट और record-setting spill.
Notably, the U.S. सरकारी 's सितंबर 2011 report pointed to defective cement on the well, faulting mostly BP, but also well operator Transocean and contractor Halliburton.
Earlier in 2011, a White House commission likewise blamed BP and its partners for a series of cost-cutting decisions and an अपर्याप्त सुरक्षा प्रणाली, लकिन भी concluded कि the spill resulted इससे `` प्रणालीगत '' रूट कल्याणकारी और `` अनुपस्थित significant reform in both industry practices and government policies, might well recur ''.
In November 2012, bp और the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of इंसाफ settled संघीय दण्ड आरोप साथ BP pleading guilty to 11 counts of manslaughter, two misdemeanors, and a felony count of lying to Congress.
BP also agreed to four years of government monitoring of its safety practices and आचार, और the पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा एजेंसी घोषित that BP would be temporarily banned from new contracts with the US government.
BP and the Department of Justice agreed to a record-setting $ 4.525 अरब in जुर्माना और अन्य भुगतान लकिन further विधिक कार्यवाही not expected to conclude until 2014 are ongoing to determine payouts and fines under the Clean Water Act and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment.
As of February 2013, दण्ड और civil settlements and payments to a trust fund had cost the company $ 42.2 billion.
`` Where the Streets Have No नाम '' is a song by rock band U2.
It is the opening track from their 1987 album The जोशुआ पेड़ और थी released as the album 's third single in August 1987.
The song 's hook is a repeating गिटार arpeggio using a delay effect, played during the song 's introduction and again at the end.
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that it is possible to identify a person 's religion and income based on the गली on जिससे वे जिया, particularly in Belfast.
During the band 's difficulties recording the song, निर्माता ब्रायन eno माना erasing the सोंग 's टेपों to have them start from scratch.
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' was praised by critics and became a commercial success, peaking at number thirteen in the US, number fourteen in Canada, number ten in the नीदरलैंड्स, और क्रमांक चार in the संयुक्त किंगडम.
The song has become one of the band 's most popular songs and has remained a staple of their live act since the song debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour.
The song was notably performed on a लॉस एंजिल्स छत लिये the फिल्मांकन of इसके म्यूज़िक वीडियो, जिससे won a Grammy Award for Best Performance Music Video.Recently the song has been used by the NFL 's Baltimore Ravens as their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
थामस जेफरी `` tom '' हैंक्स ( born जुलाई 9, 1956 ) is an American actor, producer, writer, and director.
Hanks is known for his roles in Apollo 13, बिग, कि बात तुम Do !
, The Green Mile, You 've Got Mail, Sleepless in Seattle, Charlie Wilson 's War, Catch Me If You can, फॉरेस्ट गंप, डाल दूर, a लीग of उनके अपना, the da विंची कोड, फ़रिश्ते & राक्षसों, as well as animated films like the Toy Story film series, The Polar Express, and The Simpsons Movie.
He has earned and been nominated for numerous पुरस्कार दौरान उसके करियर, सहित जीतना a सुनहरी ग्लोब लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता और an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका in फिलाडेल्फिया and a Golden Globe, an Academy Award, a Screen Actors Guild Award, and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for his role in Forrest Gump, and earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004.
Hanks is also known for his collaboration with film director Steven स्पिलबर्ग on छायांकन निजी रयान और the mini-series बैंड of भाइयो, जिससे शुभारम्भ हैंक्स भी as a successful director, producer and writer.
As of 2012, Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 अरब at the संयुक्त राज्य बक्सा दफ्तर अलोन, और over $ 8.5 billion worldwide making him the highest all-time box office star.
The Cape is an अमरीकी सुपरहीरो drama series.
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season replacement beginning with a two-hour पायलट एपीसोड on संडे, जनवरी 9, 2011 at 9 pm Eastern and Pacific Time.
An encore played on सोमवार, जनवरी 10, with follow-up episodes continuing on Monday evenings in the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January 17.
NBC subsequently cut the total क्रमांक of एपीसोड to be aired from 13 to 10 as a result of low ratings.
On March 2, 2011, NBC announced कि the श्रेणी finale would only be aired on the network 's website.
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye from Earth, and thus the only naked-eye धूमकेतु कि might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter and more spectacular, लकिन होगा appear तभी एकबार in thousands of years.
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have महरूम observed and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese, Babylonian, and medieval European chroniclers, but were not पहचाना as reappearances of the वही ऑब्जेक्ट at the time.
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by English astronomer edmond हैली, बाद whom it is now named.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the भीतरी सौर System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft, providing the पहला observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation.
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses परिचय धूमकेतु निर्माण, विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple 's `` गंदा snowball '' model, which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust.
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, और कि तभी a छोटी portion of it is icy.
The following is a सूची of the सबसे populous incorporated places of the United States of America.
As defined by the United States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated place `` शामिल a किस्में of designations, सहित city, town, village, borough, and municipality.
A few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also included in the जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's लिस्टिंग of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a distinct type of government that includes the entire population of a county, or county equivalent.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, include multiple incorporated स्थान.
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties कि हैं नहीं a भाग of another incorporated place.
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities within their defined limits, which does not include अन्य municipalities or unincorporated suburban क्षेत्रों within urban agglomerations.
A अलग रैंकिंग is evident when considering U.S. metropolitan area populations.
The mayflower थी the जलयान that in 1620 transported 102 English Pilgrims, including a core group of Separatists, to New England.
Their story is एक of travail और survival in a harsh New World environment.

Forwards, also known as strikers, are the players on a team in association फ़ुटबॉल जो खेल निकटतम to the opposing टोली 's लक्ष्य, and are therefore principally responsible for scoring goals.
This very advanced position and its limited defensive जिम्मेदारियों औसत आगे normally score more goals than other players.
This position requires intelligence, गति, और शक्ति, दोनो of निष्पादन और of thought, to perform the role well.
Modern team formations usually include एक to तीन आगे ; दो is the most common.
Coaches typically field one striker who plays in an advanced position ( the centre आगे ), और another attacking आगे जो plays somewhat deeper and assists in making goals as well as scoring ( the second striker ).
it चाहिए be विख्यात that inside forwards develop from attacking midfield positions and hence are naturally midfielders.
Barcelona FC star Lionel मेस्सी is a ठेठ attacking मिडफील्डर seen as a forward due to his shot accuracy.
a कैलिफ़ोर्निया घरेलू साझेदारी is a विधिक relationship available to same-sex couples, and to certain opposite-sex couples in which at least one party is at least 18 years of age.
It affords the couple `` the same rights, protections, and benefits, और... the वही जिम्मेदारियों, दायित्वों, and duties under law... '' as married spouses.
Enacted in 1999, the domestic साझेदारी रजिस्ट्री was the first of its kind in the United States created by a legislature without court intervention.
Initially, domestic partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally बस hospital-visitation rights and the right to be claimed as a next of kin of the estate of a deceased partner.
the विधानमंडल रै चूंकि विस्तारित the पैमाना of California domestic partnerships to include all of the rights and responsibilities common to marriage.
As such, California domestic partnerships are functionally समतुल्य to सिविल संघ offered in अनेक अन्य states.
Although the program enjoys broad support in California, it has been the सोर्स of some controversy.
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have challenged the विस्तार of घरेलू partnerships in court.
Conversely, advocates of same-sex marriage contend that anything less than full marriage rights extended to same-sex partners is analogous to the `` separate लकिन बराबर '' जातिगत कानून of the जिम Crow era.
Mark A. Jackson ( born April 1, 1965 ) is an American basketball coach, और पूर्व खिलाड़ी जो is the current head coach of the Golden State Warriors of the NBA.
A point guard from St. John 's विश्वविद्यालयों, he निभाई लिये the नई यॉर्क knicks, Indiana Pacers, Los Angeles Clippers, Denver Nuggets, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning from 1987 to 2004.
Jackson has also worked as a commentator for ईएसपीएन और ABC alongside his former coach Jeff Van Gundy and play-by-play man Mike Breen.
He was previously an NBA analyst for The YES संजाल 's नई जर्सी नेट खेल.
South Africa has ग्यारह आधिकारिक भाषाएं : Afrikaans, English, Ndebele, Northern Sotho, Sotho, Swazi, Tswana, Tsonga, Venda, Xhosa and Zulu.
Fewer than two प्रतिशत of दक्षिण africans बोलो a first language other than an official one.
सबसे दक्षिण Africans can speak more than one language.
Dutch and English यहूद the पहला आधिकारिक languages of South Africa from 1910 to 1925.
अफ्रीकी was added as a part of Dutch in 1925.
Dutch थी replaced by अफ्रीकी जब दक्षिण Africa became a republic in 1961, and Dutch was dropped in 1983, so between 1983 and 1994, South Africa had two official languages : English and Afrikaans.
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by the names in those languages : isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sepedi ( referring to Northern Sotho ), Setswana, English, Sesotho ( referring to Southern Sotho ), Xitsonga, Siswati, Tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ).
In South Africa, Southern Ndebele is ज्ञात बस as ndebele, as most speakers of Northern Ndebele live in Zimbabwe.
The 1993 version of the Constitution referred to Northern Sotho as Sesotho sa Leboa, but the 1996 संस्करण referred to the language as Sepedi.
Different सरकारी departments and official bodies use different terms to denote Northern Sotho.
The main language of सरकारी is अंग्रेज़ी भी if South Africans often take pride in using indigenous languages for any purpose.
Afrikaans also features prominently in कॉमर्स साथ साथ अंग्रेज़ी as the languages with the highest number of fluent speakers are Afrikaans and English.
In terms of linguistic classification, the आधिकारिक भाषाएं शामिल दो West-Germanic languages ( English and Afrikaans ) and nine Bantu languages.
Four of these are Nguni languages ( Zulu, Xhosa, Swati and Ndebele ) and three are sotho–tswana भाषाएं ( उत्तरी Sotho, Southern Sotho and Tswana ).
Tsonga is a tswa–ronga language.
South अफ़्रीकी चिह्न भाषा is a पृथक though incompletely emerged national standard language which also subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects.
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium and nitric acid, existing normally as a crystalline hydrate, most commonly as एल्युमिनियम नाइट्रेट nonahydrate, al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O.
The New York Jets are a पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल टोली headquartered in Florham Park, New Jersey, representing the New York metropolitan area.
The टोली is a सदस्य of the पूर्वी प्रभाग of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
In a unique arrangement for the league, the jets share metlife स्टेडियम in East Rutherford, New Jersey with the New York Giants.
The मताधिकार is legally and corporately registered as New York Jets, LLC.
The team was founded in 1959 as the Titans of New York, an original member of the American Football League ; बाद, the मताधिकार joined the NFL in the AFL–NFL merger.
The team began to खेल in 1960 at the Polo Grounds.
Under new ownership, the current name was adopted in 1963 and the franchise was relocated to Shea Stadium in 1964 and तब to the meadowlands खेल Complex in 1984.
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first समय in 1968 और गई on to compete in सुपर Bowl III where they defeated the Baltimore Colts, becoming the first AFL team to defeat an NFL club in an AFL-NFL World Championship Game.
Since 1968, the jets have appeared in the playoffs तेरह टाइम्स, और in the AFC Championship Game four times, most recently losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010.
However, the Jets have never returned to the Super Bowl, making them one of three NFL teams to win their lone Super Bowl appearance, along with the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो और tampa खाड़ी buccaneers.
The टोली 's प्रशिक्षण सुविधा, अटलांटिक स्वास्थ्य Jets Training Center, which opened in 2008, is located in Florham Park.
The team currently holds उनके सालाना प्रशिक्षण शिविर सत्र on the campus of the State University of New York at Cortland in Cortland, New York while holding occasional sessions at the Florham Park complex.
Psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms, also known as psychedelic mushrooms, are fungi कि contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
There are multiple colloquial terms for psilocybin मशरूम, the सबसे आम being shrooms and magic mushrooms.
Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe, Conocybe, Copelandia, Galerina, gerronema, gymnopilus, hypholoma, inocybe, mycena, panaeolus, pluteus, and Psilocybe.
There are लगभग 190 प्रजाति of psilocybin mushrooms and most of them fall in the genus Psilocybe.
Psilocybin mushrooms have likely been used since prehistoric टाइम्स और may have महरूम चित्रित in चट्टान आर्ट.
Many cultures have प्रयुक्त ये मशरूम in religious rites.
In modern Western society they are प्रयुक्त recreationally लिये उनके साइकेडेलिक effects.
Recent studies done at Imperial College London and Johns Hopkins स्कूल of Medicine conclude that when used properly, psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans.
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the northwest extremity of the North American continent, with the international boundary with कनाडा to the ईस्ट, the आर्कटिक समंदर to the उत्तर, और the प्रशांत समंदर to the वेस्ट and south, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest state in the United राज्य by क्षेत्रफल, the 4th तनिक populous and the least densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents live भीतर the anchorage महानगर area.
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil, natural gas, and fishing industries ; it रै ये संसाधन in प्रचुरता.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, for $ 7.2 million ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at लगभग दो सेंट प्रति एकड़ ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several प्रशासनिक परिवर्तन पहले बनने an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period, when it was used only for the peninsula and is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq, अर्थ `` the mainland '' or, more literally, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is also known as Alyeska, the `` great land '', an Aleut word derived from the वही रूट.
the 101 फ्रेंच विभाग are divided into 342 arrondissements, which may be translated into English as districts.
The capital of an arrondissement/district is पुकारा a subprefecture.
When an arrondissement contains the प्रीफ़ेक्चर ( पूंजी ) of the विभाग, that prefecture is the capital of the arrondissement, acting both as a prefecture and as a subprefecture.
Arrondissements are further विभाजित into cantons and communes.
The vagina ( from Latin vāgīna, literally `` sheath '' or `` scabbard `` ) is a tubular tract जिससे is a sex अंग और रै दो प्रमुख कृत्यों ; यौन मैथुन and childbirth.
In humans, this passage leads from the opening of the vulva to the uterus ( womb ), लकिन the vaginal tract ends at the cervix.
Unlike men, who have only one genital orifice, महिलाओं have दो, the urethra और the vagina.
The vaginal opening is much larger than the urethral खोलने, और दोनो उद्घाटन हैं सुरक्षित by the labia.
The inner mould of the योनि रै a foldy texture which can create friction for the penis during intercourse.
दौरान arousal, the योनि gets moist to facilitate the entrance of the penis.
The Latinate plural `` vaginae '' is rarely used in English.
colloquially, the शब्द योनि is often used to refer to the vulva or to the female genitals in general.
However, by its dictionary and anatomical परिभाषाएं, योनि refers exclusively to the specific internal structure.
The सिनसिनाटी लाल हैं a Major League Baseball team based in Cincinnati, Ohio.
They are members of the National लीग सेंट्रल प्रभाग.
Established in 1881 as an independent क्लबों, the टोली became a चार्टर सदस्य of the American Association in 1882, and joined the National League in 1890.
The club traditionally traces its उत्पत्ति to बेसबॉल 's first openly professional team in 1869.
The Reds have won five World Series titles, one American Association pennant, nine नेशनल लीग pennants और टेन प्रभाग titles.
The Reds played in the National League West between 1969 and 1993 और have महरूम in the National League Central since 1994.
Since 2003, the Reds have played at Great American Ball Park, built next to उनके घर इससे 1970 to 2002, riverfront स्टेडियम.
Bob Castellini has owned the Cincinnati Reds चूंकि 2006.
A शरारत बदबू bomb.
A stink bomb is a यंत्र designed to बनाएँ an unpleasant smell.
They range in effectiveness from simple pranks to सैन्य grade malodorants or riot control chemical agents.
The Guinness Book of रिकॉर्ड सूचियाँ दो smelliest substances.
One is `` US Government Standard बाथरूम malodor '' ; a मिश्रण of आठ रसायन साथ a stench resembling इंसान मल, तभी much stronger, designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners.
Another one, `` Who me ? ``, is a mixture of five sulfur-containing chemicals and खुश्बू जैसे rotting खाना और carcasses.
The adage `` A picture is worth a thousand words '' refers to the ख़्याल कि a जटिल idea can be conveyed with just a single still image.
It also aptly characterizes एक of the प्रमुख लक्ष्य of visualization, namely making it possible to absorb large amounts of data quickly.
The expression `` Use a चित्र.
It 's worth a thousand words. '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper editor Arthur Brisbane discussing पत्रकारिता और publicity.
1913 समाचारपत्र advertisement
A similar phrase, `` One Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '', appears in a 1913 newspaper विज्ञापन लिये the piqua स्वचालित सप्लाई House of Piqua, Ohio.
An early use of the exact phrase appears in an 1918 newspaper advertisement for the San Antonio Light which says : One of the Nation 's Greatest Editors Says : One Picture is लायक a हजार शब्द the सैन अंतोनियो लाइट 's सचित्र पत्रिका of the युद्ध exemplifies the सच्चाई of the ऊपर बयान -- judging इससे the गरम रिसेप्शन it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers.
It is believed by कुछ कि the आधुनिक उपयोग of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in the advertising trade journal Printers ' Ink, promoting the use of images in advertisements that appeared on the sides of streetcars.
The December 8, 1921 issue carries an ad entitled, `` One Look is Worth A Thousand Words. ''
Another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10, 1927 समस्या साथ the phrase `` One Picture Worth Ten Thousand Words, '' where it is labeled a Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
The Home Book of Proverbs, Maxims, and Familiar Phrases उद्धरण बर्नार्ड as saying he पुकारा it `` a चाइनीज कहावत, so that people would take it seriously. ''
Soon after, the proverb would become popularly attributed to Confucius.
The discussion of `` One Picture Worth Thousand Words '' versus `` One Picture Worth Ten Thousand Words '' wan येन i hua और 10.000 मील लायक 10.000 किताबे is cited in Information graphics where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures.
A picture is लायक a हजार words
Despite this modern origin of the लोकप्रिय phrase, the sentiment has been expressed by earlier writers.
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in Fathers and Sons in 1862 ), `` a चित्र shows me at a glance what it takes dozens of pages of a book to expound. ''
Computer programmer and author Fred Brooks makes an opposite statement regarding programming in The Mythical Man-Month : `` Show me अपना flowcharts और छिपाते अपना टेबल, और i shall continue to be mystified.
Show me your tables, and I won’t प्रायः need अपना flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious. ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by John McCarthy, the famous कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक, to मेक the विपरीत पाइंट : `` as the Chinese say, 1001 words is worth more than a picture. ''
A season is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by changes in weather, ecology, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the वार्षिक क्रान्ति of the धरती around the Sun and the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the सीज़न हैं चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in the तीव्रता of धूप कि reaches the Earth 's surface, variations of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June and July, the northern hemisphere is उजागर to अधिक सीधा धूप because the hemisphere faces the sun.
The same is true of the southern hemisphere in November, December और जनवरी.
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the सूर्य to be higher in the sky during the summer months which increases the solar flux.
However, due to seasonal lag, जून, जुलाई और अगस्त हैं the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December, January and February are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate and subpolar regions, generally four पंचांग -आधारd सीज़न ( साथ उनके adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists ज़्यादातर उपयोग a छह ऋतु model for temperate climate regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or monsoon ) ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु, और in कुछ tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
In some parts of the world, special `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित आधारित on महत्वपूर्ण events such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
The six ecological सीज़न
The four calendar seasons, चित्रित in an ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia
Dutch निर्यात in 2006
At the time of writing the नीदरलैंड्स is the 17th largest economy of the world.
( see : List of देशों by जीडीपी ( नाममात्र ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in the top 10 of richest nations in the world ( see : List of countries by GDP ( ppp ) प्रति capita ).
Between 1996 and 2000 annual आर्थिक विकास ( GDP ) averaged over 4 %, well above the European average.
Growth slowed considerably in 2001-05 as part of the global economic slowdown.
2006 and 2007 however showed आर्थिक विकास of 3.4 % and 3.9 %.
The Dutch economy was hit considerably by the ongoing global financial crisis and the ensuing European debt crisis.
Several banks went दिवालिया, and a number of others had to receive governmental aid.
In 2009 the economy अस्वीकृत साथ 3.5 %, followed by two years of mild growth.
The Dutch economy is currently in a recession again, साथ an आर्थिक मनाही of 0.5 % in 2012.
Inflation is at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी 2013.
Unemployment has been relatively low compared to अन्य eu राष्ट्र for decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 %.
The Netherlands managed to maintain its AAA rating at तनिक जबतक कूच 2013 according to the तीन major credit rating agencies.
Historically, the डच introduced और invented the भण्डार मार्केट by the merchandise trading through Dutch West India Company.
The नीदरलैंड्स is a founding सदस्य of the European Union, the OECD and the World Trade Organization.
Loyal to the Game is the tenth studio album and sixth स्टुडियो एल्बम by Tupac Shakur.
It contains remixes of previously unreleased music recorded by Shakur before his death in 1996.
Released in the United States on December 14, 2004 ( दिसम्बर 12 in the संयुक्त Kingdom ), Loyal to the Game was produced by Eminem.

The View is an American talk दिखाएँ ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी कि debuted in 1997 as part of the network 's daytime programming block.
Created by Barbara Walters and विधेयक geddie, जो दोनो भी serve as the show 's executive producers, the program features a panel of women as co-hosts.
Along with Walters, the current panel includes Whoopi Goldberg, who serves as the मॉडरेटर, आनन्द behar, एलिज़ाबेथ hasselbeck, और sherri Shepherd.
International versions of the कार्यक्रम are aired in several countries.
As of the 2012–13 season, its 16th, The View is the fourth-longest running नेशनल दिन बात दिखाएँ in इतिहास, behind The Phil Donahue Show ( 29 ), the variously-named Live !
programs ( 25 ), और the ओपरा Winfrey Show ( 25 ).
Prunus virginiana, commonly पुकारा bitter-berry, chokecherry, वर्जिनिया बर्ड चेरी और पश्चिमी chokecherry ( also black chokecherry for P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a species of bird cherry ( Prunus subgenus Padus ) native to North America ; the natural historic range of P. virginiana includes most of the continent, except for the far north and far south.
Los एंजिल्स अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is the प्राथमिक विमानक्षेत्र serving the Greater Los Angeles Area, the second-most populated metropolitan area in the United States.
It is most often referred to by its IATA विमानक्षेत्र कोड lax, साथ the letters pronounced individually.
LAX is located in southwestern Los एंजिल्स साथ the प्रशांत coast in the पड़ोस of westchester, इससे the downtown core and is the primary airport of Los Angeles World Airports ( LAWA ), an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports.
In 2011, lax थी the छठे व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र in the संसार बाद hartsfield-jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, Beijing Capital International Airport, London Heathrow Airport, Chicago O'Hare International Airport, and Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers.
The airport holds the claim for `` the world 's busiest origin and गंतव्य ( o & d ) विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011 that involves non-connecting passenger traffic.
It is also the तभी विमानक्षेत्र to रैंक among the top five U.S. airports for both passenger and cargo traffic.
LAX is the busiest airport in the Greater Los Angeles Area, but other airports including Bob Hope Airport, John Wayne Airport, Long Beach Airport, la/ontario अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, and Palm Springs International Airport also serve the region.
LAX is also the busiest airport in California and the West Coast of the United States in terms of flight operations, passenger traffic and air cargo activity, अग्रणी it to be referred to as the `` गेटवे to the प्रशांत Rim ``.
Peyton विलियम्स मैनिंग ( born कूच 24, 1976 ) is an American football quarterback for the Denver Broncos of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He played for the Indianapolis Colts for 14 सीज़न from 1998 to 2011.
He is the son of former NFL quarterback Archie Manning and an elder bhai of नई यॉर्क दिग्गज quarterback Eli Manning.
Manning played college football for the University of Tennessee, अग्रणी the स्वयंसेवक to the 1997 SEC Championship in his senior season.
However, No. 3 Tennessee lost to the no. 2 नेब्रास्का cornhuskers 42-17 in the नारंगी Bowl giving Nebraska and Tom Osborne their 3rd national championship in 4 years.
He was chosen by the Indianapolis Colts with the first overall pick in the 1998 एनएफएल Draft.
From 1998 to 2010, he led the कोल्टस to आठ ( सात afc दक्षिण and one AFC East ) division championships, two AFC championships, and to a Super Bowl championship ( Super Bowl XLI ).
He has won a record four league most valuable player awards, was the most valuable player of सुपर कटोरी xli, रै महरूम नामित to बारह प्रो प्याले, रै बारह 4,000-yard गुजर seasons, and is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ).
In 2009, he was named the best player in the एनएफएल और फॉक्स खेल साथ साथ खेल illustrated named him the NFL player of the decade of the 2000s.
In May 2011, he underwent गर्दन सर्जरी to alleviate गर्दन पीड़ा और भुजा कमज़ोरी he dealt with during the previous few seasons before signing a five-year, $ 90 million contract extension with the Colts in July 2011.
मैनिंग था hoped to खेल in the 2011 season, but in September 2011, he underwent a much more serious second surgery : a level one cervical fusion procedure.
मैनिंग था never छूटी an एनएफएल खेल in his career, but was forced to miss the entire 2011 season.
He was released by the कोल्टस on कूच 7, 2012, और after an almost two-week period where he visited with and worked out for several NFL teams, he signed with the Denver Broncos on March 20, 2012.
Manning 's pre-snap routine has earned him the उपनाम, `` the शेरिफ '' और is एक of the most recognizable and parodied in the NFL.
The Indianapolis Colts ' almost exclusive use of the hurry-up offense led to Manning using an array of gestures and verbal commands to call the play at the line of scrimmage rather than in the huddle.

Baker ह्यूजेस is एक of the संसार 's largest oilfield services companies.
It operates in over 90 देशों, providing the oil and gas industry with products and services for drilling, formation evaluation, completion, production and reservoir consulting.
बेकर ह्यूजेस रै इसके मुख्यालय in the अमेरिका Tower in the American General Center in Neartown, Houston.
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed when Baker International and ह्यूजेस औजार कम्पनी merged in 1987.
Baker Hughes operates विश्वव्यापी साथ प्रमुख कार्यालयों in लिवरपूल, संयुक्त किंगडम ; सिंगापुर ; दुबई ; a शोध और maintenance facility in Celle, Germany ; Lafayette, Louisiana ; Houston, Texas ; Pescara, Italy ; and Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
The company is administered broadly in दो बांटती : the पूर्वी गोलार्ध साथ five regions ( Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Asia Pacific and Russia/Caspian ) and the western hemisphere with four regions ( Canada, US Land, US Gulf, and Latin America ).
Each of these regions is subdivided into markets.
The United States one- cent coin, commonly known as a penny, is a unit of currency equaling एक one-hundredth of a United States dollar.
The cent 's प्रतीक is ¢.
Its obverse has featured the profile of President Abraham Lincoln since 1909, the centennial of his birth.
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of Lincoln 's birth ) to 2008, the रिवर्स प्रदर्शित the lincoln Memorial.
Four different reverse designs in 2009 honored Lincoln 's 200th जन्मदिवस और a नई, permanent reverse – the Union Shield – was introduced in 2010.
The coin is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm ) in diameter and 0.061 इंच ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness.
the u.S. मिंट 's official name for a penny is `` '' and the U.S. Treasury 's official name is `` one cent piece ''.
The colloquial term penny derives from the British coin of the वही नाम, the pre-decimal संस्करण of which had a similar value.
In American English, pennies is the plural form, other plural फ़ॉर्म पेंस और पेशाब ( मानक उपयोग in अंग्रेजों English ) are not used.
As of 2012, it costs the U.S. Mint 2.00 cents to make a cent because of the cost of materials and production.
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed components for वितरण और fabrication, estimated at $ 13 million in FY 2011.
It also includes Mint overhead allocated to the penny, जिससे थी $ 17.7 million for 2011.
Fixed costs and overhead would have to be absorbed by other circulating सिक्के बगैर the penny.
The loss in profitability due to producing the one cent coin in the United राज्य लिये the साल of 2012 थी $ 58,000,000.
This was a slight decrease from 2011, the year before, which था a उत्पादन घाटा of $ 60,200,000.
or more specifically, हैं शोभायमान किस्में of domesticated common carp ( Cyprinus carpio ) that are kept for decorative purposes in outdoor koi ponds or water gardens.
Koi varieties are distinguished by coloration, patterning, and scalation.
Some of the major रंगों हैं श्वेत, ब्लैक, रेड, yellow, blue, and cream.
The most popular category of koi is the Gosanke, which is made up of the kohaku, Taisho Sanshoku, and Showa Sanshoku varieties.
The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the संघीय सरकारी, परिचय 5,000 कर्मचारी of the District of Columbia, and a few hundred private sector employees, mostly in and around federal facilities.
AFGE is the largest union for civilian, non- postal federal employees and the largest संघ लिये ज़िला of कोलंबिया कर्मचारी जो रपट directly to the mayor ( i.e., outside of D.C. public schools ).
It is संबद्ध with the AFL-CIO.

Blue : a spore bearing a trilete mark – the -shaped scar.
