The एवोल्यूशन of पौधे रै resulted in increasing स्तर of complexity, from the earliest algal mats, through bryophytes, lycopods, ferns to the complex gymnosperms and angiosperms of today.
While many of the groups which appeared earlier continue to thrive, especially in the environments in which they evolved, for a समय प्रत्येक नई ग्रेड of संगठन became अधिक `` कामयाब '' than its predecessors.
In the ordovician काल, around, the first land plants appeared.
These began to diversify in the late Silurian काल, around, और the परिणाम of their diversification are displayed in remarkable detail in an early Devonian fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert.
This chert preserved early पौधे in सेल्यूलर विवरण, petrified in volcanic springs.
By the मध्य of the devonian काल, सबसे of the features recognised in plants today are present, including roots, leaves and secondary wood ; and, by late Devonian times, seeds had evolved.
Late Devonian plants had thereby reached a उपाधि of परिष्कार कि अनुमत उन्हें to form forests of tall trees.
Evolutionary innovation continued into the carboniferous period and is still ongoing today.
Most plant groups were relatively unscathed by the Permo-Triassic extinction इवेंट, हालांकि the structures of समुदायों बदला.
This may have set the scene for the रूप of the flowering पौधे in the triassic ( ~ ), और their later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene.
The latest major समूह of plants to evolve were the grasses, which became important in the mid-Paleogene, from around.
The grasses, as खूब as अनेक other groups, evolved new mechanisms of metabolism to survive the low and warm, dry conditions of the tropics over the last.
The winning सुपर Bowl team receives the Vince Lombardi Trophy.
The Super Bowl is an annual American football game that determines the चैंपियन of the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
The contest is held in an अमरीकी नगर कि is चुनी तीन to चार सालो beforehand, usually in warm-weather or domed sites.
Since 1971, the winner of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) Championship Game has faced the winner of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) चैंपियनशिप खेल in the culmination of the NFL playoffs.
Before the 1970 merger between the American Football League ( AFL ) and the National Football League ( NFL ), the two leagues met in four such contests.
The first two यहूद ज्ञात as the `` AFL-NFL World Championship Game. ''
Super Bowl III in 1969 was the first such game that carried the `` Super Bowl '' moniker, the names `` सुपर कटोरी i `` और `` सुपर कटोरी ii `` यहूद retroactively applied to the first two games.
The nfc /nfL लीड in सुपर Bowl wins with 25, while the AFC /AFL has won 22.
अठारह अलग franchises, including teams that relocated to another city, have won the Super Bowl.
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the most Super प्याले साथ छह championships ( रिकार्ड 6–2 ), जबकि दोनो the डलास cowboys and San Francisco 49ers have five wins each ( Cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ).
Dallas and Pittsburgh have the most Super Bowl appearances with eight, जबकि the भैंस बिल्स have the सबसे लगातार दिखावे साथ चार losses in a row from 1990 to 1993.
the नई इंग्लैण्ड Patriots, Denver Broncos and Minnesota Vikings have also lost a record four Super Bowls.
Buffalo and Minnesota are both 0–4, Denver is 2–4 and New इंग्लैण्ड is 3–4.
The record for consecutive wins is two and is shared by seven franchises : the 1966-67 Green Bay Packers, the 1972-73 मियामी डॉल्फिन, the 1974-75 और 1978-79 पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स ( the तभी टोली to accomplish this feat twice ), the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers, the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys, the 1997-98 Denver Broncos, and the 2003-04 New England Patriots.
The only team with अनेक सुपर कटोरी दिखावे और no नुकसान is the Baltimore Ravens, who in winning Super Bowl XLVII unseated and replaced the 49ers in that position.
Four current NFL teams have never appeared in a सुपर कटोरी, सहित मताधिकार relocations और renaming : the Cleveland Browns, Detroit Lions, Jacksonville Jaguars, and Houston Texans, though both the Browns and Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl.
Martin County is a county located in the u.S. राज्य of Texas.
As of the 2010 census, its जनसांख्यिकी थी 4,799.
Its seat is stanton.
The county is नामित लिये wylie Martin, an early settler.
मार्टिन काउंटी is one of 30 prohibition, or entirely dry, counties in the state of Texas.
Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP, ALKP ) ( ) is a hydrolase enzyme जिम्मेदार लिये निकालना फास्फेट समूह इससे अनेक प्रकार of अणुओं, including nucleotides, proteins, and alkaloids.
The process of removing the फास्फेट समूह is called dephosphorylation.
As the name suggests, alkaline phosphatases are most effective in an क्षारीय पर्यावरण.
It is sometimes used synonymously as मौलिक phosphatase.
Triticale ( × Triticosecale ), ( ) is a hybrid of wheat ( Triticum ) and rye ( Secale ) first bred in laboratories during the late 19th century.
The grain was originally करवाया in स्कॉटलैंड and Sweden.
Commercially available triticale is almost सदा a दूसरी पीढी संकर, i.e., a cross between two kinds of primary ( first cross ) triticales.
As a rule, triticale combines the yield potential and grain quality of गेहूं साथ the बीमारी और पर्यावरणीय सहिष्णुता ( including soil conditions ) of rye.
Only recently has it been विकसित into a commercially viable crop.
Depending on the cultivar, triticale can अधिक or कम resemble either of its parents.
It is grown mostly for forage or fodder, although some triticale-based foods can be खरीदा at health food stores or are to be found in some breakfast cereals.
When crossing wheat and rye, wheat is used as the मादा जनक और rye as the male parent ( pollen donor ).
the resulting संकर is बंध्य, और must be treated with colchicine to induce polyploidy and thus the ability to reproduce itself.
The primary producers of triticale हैं Poland, Germany, France, Belarus and Australia.
In 2009, according to the Food and Agriculture Organization ( FAO ), 15.0 लाख टन यहूद harvested in 29 देशों आरपार the संसार.
the triticale संकरण हैं सब amphidiploid, which means the plant is diploid for two genomes derived from different species.
In other words, triticale is an allotetraploid.
In earlier years, सबसे कार्य थी किया on octoploid triticale.
Different ploidy levels have महरूम निर्मित और evaluated over time.
The tetraploids showed little promise, but hexaploid triticale थी कामयाब पर्याप्त to ढूँढें वाणिज्यिक application.
The CIMMYT triticale सुधार कार्यक्रम चाही to improve food production and nutrition in developing countries.
Triticale has potential in the production of bread and other food products, such as कुकीज़, पास्ता, पिज़्ज़ा dough and breakfast cereals.
The protein content is higher than that of wheat, although the glutenin भिन्न is less.
The grain has also been stated to have higher स्तर of lysine than गेहूं.
Assuming increased acceptance, the milling industry will have to adapt to triticale, as the milling techniques employed लिये गेहूं हैं मुलम्मा to triticale.
Sell et al. found triticale could be प्रयुक्त as a फीड अनाज, और बाद research found its starch was particularly readily digested.
As a feed grain, triticale is already खूब स्थापित and of high economic importance.
It has received attention as a potential उर्जा क्रॉप, और research is currently being conducted on the use of the crop 's biomass in bioethanol production.
`` Puff, the जादू ड्रैगन '' is a सोंग लिखा by लियोनार्ड lipton and Peter Yarrow, and made popular by Yarrow 's group Peter, Paul and Mary in a 1963 recording.
The सोंग achieved great popularity.
A college football national championship in the highest level of collegiate play in the United States, currently the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ) Division I Football कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ), is a designation awarded annually by various third-party organizations to their selection ( s ) of the best college football team ( s ).
Division I FBS ( formerly Division i-a ) फ़ुटबॉल is the तभी ncaa खेल in which a yearly champion is not determined by an NCAA sanctioned championship event.
क्युकी the चैंपियनशिप team is not determined by a NCAA championship or tournament event, it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical national championship ``.
चूंकि the ncaa, the खेल 's शासी देह, does not determine or declare a national champion in this field, determination of such has often engendered controversy.
A championship team is independently declared by various individuals and संगठन, प्रायः referred to as `` चयनकर्ताओं ''.
These choices हैं sometimes at odds with each other.
While the NCAA has never officially endorsed an annual championship team, it has documented the चुनाव of अनेक चयनकर्ताओं in the official NCAA Football Bowl Subdivision Records.
In addition, various third party analysts have independently प्रकाशित उनके अपना सूचियाँ of कया वे have संकल्पित to be the most legitimate selections for each season.
These are also often at odds with each other as well as व्यक्तिगत स्कूल 's दावा on नेशनल championships, which, for any particular season, may or may not correlate to the selections published elsewhere.
Currently, two widely recognized national champions selectors are the Associated Press, which conducts a poll of football sportswriters, and the USA Today Coaches ' Poll, a पोल of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच संघ active coaches that is contractually obligated to name the winner of the Bowl Championship Series championship game as its national champion.
The Milwaukee Brewers हैं a पेशेवर baseball team based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
The team is a member of the सेंट्रल प्रभाग of प्रमुख League Baseball 's National League and plays its home games at Miller Park.
The team is so नामित क्युकी of the city 's association with the brewing industry.
The Washington नागरिकों हैं a पेशेवर baseball team based in Washington, D.C.
The Nationals are a member of the East Division of the National लीग of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( MLB ).
The team 's home ballpark is Nationals Park, located on South कैपिटल गली in southeast d.C., near the Anacostia River.
The park opened in 2008, replacing RFK Stadium, the team 's home from 2005 to 2007.
The Nationals ' name derives from the former Washington baseball team that had the वही नाम ( प्रयुक्त interchangeably with Senators ).
Their nickname is `` the Nats '' —a shortened version that was also प्रयुक्त by the बूढ़ा D.C. teams.
An expansion franchise, the club was संस्थापित in as the मॉन्ट्रियल Expos, the first major league team in Canada.
They were आधारित in Montreal, Quebec, and played their home games at Jarry Park Stadium and later in Olympic Stadium.
In, the Expos won a division championship, won their first-ever playoff series by defeating the Philadelphia Phillies, 3–2, and advanced to the नेशनल लीग चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी, जहाँ वे होता go on to खोना to the लॉस एंजिल्स डॉजर्स, 3–2, in उनके only postseason appearance during the strike-shortened season.
The Expos had their highest winning percentage in the strike-shortened ऋतु of, जब the team had the best record in baseball.
The team 's subsequent shedding of खिलाड़ी caused fan interest to drop off.
After the 2001 season, MLB considered revoking the team 's मताधिकार, along with either the Minnesota Twins or the Tampa Bay Devil Rays.
After being purchased by MLB in 2002, the team was moved before the ऋतु to वॉशिंगटन और renamed the Nationals, the first relocation since the second Washington Senators moved to Arlington, Texas, and became the Texas Rangers in.
The Nationals are one of two MLB franchises, and the तभी एक in the नेशनल लीग, कि has never played in a World Series ( the Seattle Mariners are the other ).
A contingent fee ( in the United States ) or conditional fee ( in England and Wales ) is कोई शुल्क लिये सेवाएं provided जहाँ the शुल्क is payable only if there is a favourable result.
In the law, it is defined as a `` fee charged for a lawyer 's services only if the मुकदमा is कामयाब or is favorably settled out of court....
निर्भर शुल्क हैं प्रायः गणना as a percentage of the client 's net recovery. ''
In the English legal system, it is generally referred to as no win no fee.
A conditional शुल्क अनुबंध between a law firm and a client.
The usual form of this agreement is that the solicitor होगा लो a विधि मामला on the understanding that if lost, no payment is made.
However, if the मामला is जीती, the वकील will be entitled to the normal fee based on hourly billing, plus a success fee.
The success fee in England must be as a percentage no वृहद than 100 % of the normal fee.
This contrasts with the contingency fee in the US, which देता the कामयाब attorney a प्रतिशत of the damages awarded in favor of his client.
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue their civil rights since otherwise, to sue someone for a tort, one must first be wealthy enough to pursue ऐसे litigation in the first place.
however, क्युकी of the high risk, few attorneys will take cases on a contingency basis unless they feel the case has good merit.
According to a 2004 book by law professor Herbert Kritzer, contingent fees were allowed as of that year in the following countries : Australia, Brazil, Canada, the Dominican Republic, France, Greece, आयरलैंड, जापानी, नई जीलैंड, the संयुक्त Kingdom and the United States.
They are also allowed in personal चोट क्रियाएँ in Lithuania.
Recently, वे have महरूम allowed in Belgium as well.
A Convocation ( Latin 'calling together ', translating the Greek ecclesia ) is a group of people formally समवेत लिये a खास purpose.

The Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn = `` waters '', singular : ) and the volcano of the वही नाम हैं in south-east Iceland.
They हैं in the हाइलैंड्स of Iceland at the northwestern side of the Vatnajökull ice-cap.
The झीलों हैं at, at an elevation of.
Beneath the lakes is the मैग्मा कक्ष of the grímsvötn volcano.
Grímsvötn is a basaltic volcano which has the highest eruption frequency of सब the ज्वालामुखी in आइसलैंड और रै a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system.
The massive climate-impacting Laki fissure eruption of 1783–1784 was a part of the वही फिशर system.
Grímsvötn was erupting at the same time as laki दौरान 1783, लकिन जारी to erupt until 1785.
Because most of the volcano lies underneath Vatnajökull, most of its eruptions have been subglacial और the बातचीत of मैग्मा और meltwater इससे the बर्फ कल्याणकारी phreatomagmatic explosive activity.
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 UTC, an eruption began, with high plumes accompanied by multiple earthquakes, resulting in cancellation of 900 flights in आइसलैंड, और in the संयुक्त किंगडम, ग्रीनलैंड, जर्मनी, आयरलैंड और नार्वे on 22–25 May.
Until 25 May the eruption scale had been larger than कि of the 2010 eruption of Eyjafjallajökull.
The eruption रोका at 02:40 utc on 25 May 2011, although there was some explosive activity from the tephra vents affecting only the area around the crater.

Caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly Harrah 's Entertainment from 1995 to 2010 ) is an American public gaming corporation that owns and operates over 50 कसीनो, होटल, और सात गोल्फ़ पाठ्यक्रम अंतर्गत several brands.
The company, आधारित in स्वर्ग, Nevada, is the largest gaming company in the world, with annual revenues of $ 8.9 billion ( 2010 ).
Caesars is a public company, with a संयुक्त venture of अपोलो वैश्विक प्रबन्धन and Texas Pacific Group ownig a large portion of the stack and Blackstone Group also holding a significant stake.

harrah 's remains a key brand in the company.

A Permanent Resident in Canada is a person जो is नहीं a कनाडाई नागरिक लकिन जो रै महरूम granted permission to live and work in Canada without any time limit on his or her stay.
A permanent resident must live in Canada for two years आउट of प्रत्येक पाँच or रिस्क खोने that status.
A Permanent Resident holds many of the same अधिकारों और जिम्मेदारियों as a कनाडाई नागरिक, among अन्य the सही to कार्य लिये कोई एंटरप्राइज़ as खूब as for the federal or provincial government ( under restriction of access rights to certain regulated professions ).
The main differences are that निवासियों can नहीं :
vote in चुनावों in Canada ;
चलाएं लिये elected office ;
थाम कनाडाई passports ;
In addition, they may be allowed to join Canada 's armed forces if the नेशनल ब्याज would not be prejudiced.
Permanent residents also risk प्रत्यर्पण लिये गंभीर अपराधों committed while resident in Canada.
Permanent residents may लागू लिये कनाडाई नागरिकता after three years in Canada ; however this is not mandatory.

A graph of the US CPI from 1913 to 2006 ( in ब्लू ), और its percent annual change ( in red )
A consumer price index ( CPI ) measures changes in the price स्तर of a मार्केट बास्केट of consumer goods and services purchased by households.
The CPI in the United States is defined by the Bureau of Labor Statistics as `` a measure of the average change over time in the prices paid by urban consumers for a मार्केट बास्केट of consumer goods and services. ''
The CPI is a statistical estimate constructed using the कीमतें of a sample of representative items whose prices are collected periodically.
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for different categories and sub-categories of goods and services, being combined to produce the overall index with weights reflecting their shares in the कुल of the उपभोक्ता expenditures covered by the index.
It is one of several price indices calculated by most national सांख्यिकीय एजेंसियों.
The annual percentage change in a cpi is प्रयुक्त as a measure of inflation.
A CPI can be used to index ( i.e., adjust for the effect of inflation ) the real value of wages, salaries, pensions, for regulating prices and for deflating monetary magnitudes to show changes in real values.
In most countries, the CPI is, along with the population census and the USA National Income and Product खाते, एक of the सबसे closely देखी नेशनल economic statistics.
Knocking on wood, or to टच लकडी, refers to the apotropaic परंपरा in पश्चिमी लोकगीत of वस्तुतः touching/knocking on लकडी, or merely stating कि तुम हैं doing or intend वही, in order to avoid `` tempting fate `` after making a favourable observation, a boast, or declaration concerning one 's own death.
Rocker भुजा
Generally referred to within the context of the internal combustion engine of automotive, marine, motorcycle and reciprocating विमानन इंजन, the rocker arm is an oscillating lever that conveys radial movement from the cam lobe into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it.
One end is raised and lowered by a rotating lobe of the camshaft ( either directly or via a tappet ( lifter ) and pushrod ) while the अन्य समाप्त अधिनियमों on the valve stem.
When the camshaft lobe raises the outside of the arm, the inside presses down on the वाल्व stem, opening the valve.
When the बाहर of the भुजा is permitted to वापसी due to the camshafts rotation, the inside rises, allowing the valve spring to close the valve.
the ड्राइव cam is driven by the camshaft.
This pushes the rocker भुजा up और bas about the trunnion pin or rocker shaft.
घर्षण may be reduced at the point of contact with the valve stem by a roller cam follower.
A similar व्यवस्था हस्तांतरण the गति via another roller cam follower to a second rocker arm.
This rotates about the rocker shaft, and transfers the motion via a tappet to the poppet वाल्व.
In this case this opens the सेवन वाल्व to the cylinder head.
The effective leverage of the arm ( and thus the force it can exert on the valve stem ) is determined by the rocker arm ratio, the ratio of the distance from the rocker arm 's बीच of रोटेशन to the टिप विभाजित by the distance from the center of rotation to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod.
Current automotive design favors रॉकर भुजा ratios of about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1.
However, in the past smaller positive ratios ( the valve lift is greater than the कैम लिफ्ट ) और भी ऋणात्मक ratios ( valve lift smaller than the cam lift ) have been used.
Many pre-WW2 engines use 1:1 ( neutral ) ratios.
For car engines the rocker arms are generally steel stampings, providing a उचित संतुलन of शक्ति, weight and economical cost.
क्युकी the रॉकर बाहें हैं, in भाग, reciprocating weight, excessive mass especially at the lever ends limits the engine 's ability to reach high operating speeds.
`` The Night the लाइट्स गई आउट in जॉर्जिया '' is a Southern Gothic song written by songwriter Bobby Russell and performed in 1972 by his then-wife Vicki Lawrence.
Reba mcentire बाद covered it in 1991.
Recorded in late October 1972 in United/Western Studios on Sunset in Hollywood and released less than two weeks later in November 1972, the song centers around the पुरानी bhai of the narrator, falsely convicted of और चलाया लिये a हत्या, which the narrator herself has committed.
In postal mail, a वापसी पता is an सुस्पष्ट समावेश of the address of the person sending the message.
it provides the प्राप्तकर्ता ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine how to respond to the sender of the message if needed.
The return address need not include a sender 's name, but should include address or P.O. box विवरण in the वही रास्ता as the delivery address should.
In some countries, the return address is conventionally स्तिथ in the अपर बाएँ हाथ कोने of the envelope, card, or label.
In the United Kingdom, the return address is प्रायः लगाई on the रिवर्स of the लिफाफा, near the top.
व्यवसायों often use envelopes preprinted with a return address.
Many individuals have sheets of चिपकने लेबल्स preprinted with their home address to affix to their correspondence.
Charities sometimes include such चादरें in mailshots.
Rolls of Return Address Labels can be purchased from companies that sell personalized लेबल्स to provide individuals an आसान way to peel and stick return address labels to their envelopes.
The return पता is नहीं जरूरी on postal mail.
However, lack of a return address prevents the postal service from being able to return the item if it proves undeliverable ; ऐसे as from damage, postage due, or invalid destination.
Such mail may thus become मुर्दे letter mail.
Should the return address be of a different राज्य or देश, the mail may be routed through that location for ease of return.
A nerve guidance conduit ( also referred to as an artificial nerve conduit or artificial nerve graft, as opposed to an autograft ) is an artificial means of guiding axonal regrowth to सुकर तंत्रिका regeneration and is one of several clinical treatments for nerve injuries.
When direct suturing of the two stumps of a severed nerve can not be accomplished without tension, the standard clinical treatment for peripheral nerve injuries is autologous तंत्रिका grafting.
Due to the limited availability of donor tissue and functional recovery in autologous nerve grafting, neural ऊतक अभियान्त्रिकी शोध रै केन्द्रित on the development of bioartificial nerve guidance conduits as an alternative treatment, especially for large defects.
Similar techniques are also being explored for nerve repair in the spinal cord लकिन तंत्रिका regeneration in the सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली मुद्राएँ a वृहद challenge because its axons do not regenerate appreciably in their native environment.
The creation of artificial conduits is also known as entubulation because the nerve ends and intervening gap are enclosed भीतर a ट्यूब रचित of biological or synthetic materials.
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic tube, सिंथेटिक ट्यूब or tissue-engineered conduit, it चाहिए सुकर neurotropic और neurotrophic संचार between the proximal and distal ends of the nerve gap, block external inhibitory factors, and provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth.
The most basic objective of a nerve guidance conduit is to combine physical, रासायनिक, और biological cues अंतर्गत शर्तें कि होगा फोस्टर tissue formation.
Materials that have been used to make biologic tubes include blood vessels and skeletal muscles, while nonabsorbable and bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have been made इससे silicone और polyglycolide क्रमशः.
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a combination of many elements : scaffold structure, scaffold सामग्री, सेल्यूलर therapies, neurotrophic कारकों and biomimetic materials.
The choice of which physical, chemical and biological cues to use is based on the properties of the nerve environment, which is critical in बनाना the सबसे वांछनीय पर्यावरण लिये axon regeneration.
The factors that control सामग्री चयन शामिल biocompatibility, biodegradability, mechanical integrity, controllability during nerve growth, implantation and sterilization.
Hardcore Pawn is an American reality television series produced by RDF USA ( later Zodiak USA ) and Richard Dominick Productions for truTV about the day-to-day operations of American Jewelry and Loan, a family-owned साहूकार दूकान located at 20450 Greenfield Road, between 8 Mile Road and the John C. The series premiered on August 16, 2010, delivering दो million viewers, setting a record as truTV 's most-watched series premiere ever.
amoxicillin BP
Amoxicillin ( INN ), formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ), and abbreviated amox, is a moderate-spectrum, bacteriolytic, β-lactam antibiotic प्रयुक्त to दावत बैक्टीरियल infections caused by susceptible microorganisms.
It is usually the drug of choice within the class because it is better absorbed, following oral administration, than other β-lactam antibiotics.
Amoxicillin is one of the most common antibiotics विहित लिये children.
The ड्रग became available in 1972.
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing bacteria, which are resistant to a broad spectrum of β-lactam antibiotics, such as penicillin.
For this reason, it is often combined with clavulanic एसिड, a β-lactamase inhibitor.
This increases effectiveness by reducing its susceptibility to β-lactamase resistance.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), प्रायः referred to as lbj, थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ), a स्थिति he assumed बाद उसके service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four people who served in all four elected federal offices of the United States : प्रतिनिधि, सीनेटर, वाइस अध्यक्ष, and President.
Johnson, a Democrat from Texas, served as a United States प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961, including six years as United States Senate Majority Leader, two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960, Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the हत्या of जॉन F. कैनेडी on November 22, 1963, completed Kennedy 's term and was elected President in his own right, winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President, he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that शामिल कानून कि upheld सिविल अधिकारों, पब्लिक broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to education, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering personality and the `` जॉनसन उपचार, '' उसके coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American involvement in the वियतनाम युद्ध, इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968, as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down.
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965, and crime दरों soared, as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया मांगे for `` law and order '' policies.
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary, he ended उसके bid for reelection.
Republican Richard Nixon was निर्वाचित to सफल him.
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency marked the peak of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the संयुक्त States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is क्रमित favorably by some historians because of his domestic policies.
The Big Bang Theory cast at Comic Con 2009, from left : Kunal Nayyar, Simon Helberg, Kaley Cuoco, Jim पार्सन्स, और जॉनी Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory, created and executive produced by चक lorre और विधेयक prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter, two Caltech physicists ; Penny, a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across the hall ; and लियोनार्ड और शेल्डन 's मित्रों और co-workers aerospace इंजीनियर Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ), a physicist सहयोगी, और, at अलग टाइम्स, a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife, and former part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also features numerous supporting characters, each of whom plays a prominent भूमिका in a छोटी समूह of एपीसोड.
The American Civil युद्ध ( acw ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The युद्ध था its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers did नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James बुकानन और the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके administration would not initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव states continued to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise, and दोनो पहलू prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the फोर्ट ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The पूर्वी थिएटर was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप.
Lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of their western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the पश्चिमी थिएटर, विलियम T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight battles of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड, the confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
इतिहासकार जॉन huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Human एवोल्यूशन refers to the evolutionary process leading up to the appearance of modern humans.
While it began with the last common ancestor of all life, the topic प्रायः कवर तभी the विकासवादी इतिहास of primates, in particular the genus Homo, and the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct species of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ).
The study of human evolution involves many scientific disciplines, सहित शारीरिक मानवशास्त्र, primatology, पुरातत्व, linguistics, evolutionary psychology, embryology and genetics.
According to genetic studies, primates diverged from other mammals about in the Late Cretaceous period, और the earliest fossils appear in the Paleocene, around.
The family Hominidae diverged from the Hylobatidae ( Gibbon ) family 15-20 million years ago, and around, the ponginae ( orangutans ), diverged from the Hominidae family.
Bipedalism is the basic adaption of the Hominin line, and the earliest bipedal hominin is माना to be either sahelanthropus or orrorin, with Ardipithecus, a full bipedal, coming somewhat later.
the गोरिल्ला और चिंपैंजी diverged around the same time, about 4-6 million years ago, and either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin may be our last shared ancestor with them.
The early bipedals eventually evolved into the australopithecines और later the genus Homo.
The earliest documented सदस्यों of the genus Homo are Homo habilis which evolved around ; the earliest species for which there is positive evidence of use of stone tools.
The brains of these early hominins were परिचय the वही आकार as कि of a chimpanzee.
During the next million years a process of encephalization began, and with the arrival of Homo erectus in the fossil record, cranial क्षमता था doubled to 850 cm3.
Homo erectus and Homo ergaster were the first of the hominina to छोड़ अफ़्रीकी, and these species spread through Africa, Asia, and Europe between.
It is believed that these species were the first to use आग और complex tools.
according to the हाल अफ़्रीकी ancestry सिद्धान्त, आधुनिक इंसानो evolved in Africa possibly from Homo heidelbergensis, Homo rhodesiensis or Homo antecessor and migrated out of the continent some 50,000 to 100,000 years ago, replacing local populations of Homo erectus, Homo denisova, Homo floresiensis and Homo neanderthalensis.
Archaic Homo sapiens, the forerunner of anatomically modern humans, विकसित between 400,000 और 250,000 years ago.
Recent DNA evidence suggests that several haplotypes of Neanderthal origin are present among all non-African populations, and Neanderthals and other hominids, such as Denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of उनके genome to present-day इंसानs. < संदर्भ name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > anatomically modern humans evolved from archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic, about 200,000 years ago.
The transition to behavioral modernity with the development of symbolic culture, language, and specialized lithic प्रौद्योगिकी happened around 50,000 सालो पहले according to अनेक विज्ञानियों हालांकि some suggest a gradual change in behavior over a longer time span.
Lisa Cuddy, M.D., is a fictional अक्षर on the Fox network medical drama House.
She is portrayed by Lisa edelstein.
cuddy थी the डीन of आयुर्विज्ञान और हॉस्पिटल व्यवस्थापक of the fictional Princeton-Plainsboro Teaching Hospital in New Jersey.
She also becomes House 's प्रेम interest through the years to start a relationship with him in season seven.
Cuddy quit her job after the events of season seven 's finale `` चलती on ``.
Track and field is a sport comprising various competitive athletic contests based on कार्यशील, कूद, और फेंकना.
The name of the sport गर्भाशयी इससे the प्रतियोगिता स्थान : a स्टेडियम साथ an oval running track around a grass field.
The throwing and कूद कार्यक्रम generally लो प्लेस in the central enclosed area.
Track and field falls under the छतरियाँ खेल of एथलेटिक्स, जिससे भी शामिल road running, cross country running, and race walking.
The two most prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय track और फ़ील्ड प्रतियोगिताओं हैं आयोजित अंतर्गत the ध्वज of athletics : the athletics competition at the Olympic Games and the IAAF World Championships in Athletics.
The International Association of एथलेटिक्स federations is the international governing body for track and field.
Track and field events are generally individual sports with athletes चुनौतीपूर्ण प्रत्येक अन्य to decide a सिंगल victor.
The racing events are won by the athlete with the fastest time, जबकि the कूद और फेंकना कार्यक्रम हैं जीती by the athlete who has achieved the greatest distance or height in the contest.
The running कार्यक्रम हैं categorised as sprints, middle and long-distance events, relays, and hurdling.
Regular jumping events include long jump, triple jump, high jump and pole vault, while the most common throwing events are शॉट put, javelin, discus और हथौड़ा.
There are also `` संयुक्त कार्यक्रम '', ऐसे as heptathlon and decathlon, in which athletes compete in a number of the above events.
Records are kept of the best प्रदर्शन in विशिष्ट कार्यक्रम, at संसार and national levels, right down to a personal level.
However, if athletes are deemed to have violated the event 's नियम or regulations, वे हैं disqualified इससे the competition and their marks are erased.
In North America, the term track and field may be used to refer to athletics in general, बल्कि than specifically track और फ़ील्ड events.
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ), codenamed Operation Desert Storm ( 17 January 1991 – 28 February 1991 ) was a war waged by a u.n.-authorized गठबन्धन फ़ोर्स इससे 34 राष्ट्र led by the United States, against Iraq in response to Iraq 's invasion and annexation of Kuwait.
The war is also known under other names, such as the Persian Gulf War, First Gulf War, Gulf War I, or the First Iraq War, before the term `` Iraq War '' became पहचाना बजाय साथ the 2003 इराकी युद्ध ( भी referred to in the u.S. as `` आपरेशन इराकी Freedom '' ).
Kuwait 's आक्रमण by इराकी सैनिकों कि began 2 August 1990 was met with international condemnation, and brought immediate economic sanctions against Iraq by members of the U.N. Security Council.
U.S. President George H. W. Bush deployed U.S. forces into Saudi Arabia, and urged other देशों to भेजें उनके अपना शक्तियां to the scene.
An सरणी of nations joined the Coalition.
The great majority of the गठबन्धन 's सैन्य शक्तियां यहूद इससे the u.S., with Saudi Arabia, the United Kingdom and Egypt as leading contributors, in that order.
Saudi Arabia paid around us $ 36 billion of the US $ 60 billion cost.
The war was marked by the beginning of live news on the front lines of the लड़ो, साथ the primacy of the U.S. network CNN.
The war has also earned the nickname Video खेल युद्ध बाद the रोज़ ब्रॉडकास्ट बिंब on board the U.S. bombers during Operation Desert Storm.
The आरंभिक विरोध to निकाल Iraqi troops from Kuwait began with an aerial bombardment on 17 January 1991.
This was followed by a मैदान उत्पीड़न on 24 February.
This was a decisive विजय लिये the Coalition forces, who liberated Kuwait and advanced into Iraqi territory.
The Coalition ceased their advance, and declared a cease-fire 100 hours after the ground campaign started.
Aerial and ground combat was confined to Iraq, Kuwait, and क्षेत्रों on सऊदी अरब 's border.
Iraq launched scud मिसाइलें विरूद्ध गठबन्धन military targets in Saudi Arabia and against Israel.
The nickel, in American usage, is a five- cent सिक्का जारी by the United States Mint.
Composed of 75 % copper और 25 % निकल, the टुकड़ा has been struck since 1866.
The silver half dime, equal to five cents, had been issued since the 1790s.
The American Civil War caused economic hardship, driving gold and silver from circulation ; in response, in place of low-value सिक्के, the सरकारी at पहला जारी पेपर currency.
In 1865, Congress abolished the five-cent fractional करेंसी नोट बाद स्पेंसर M. क्लार्क, head of the Currency Bureau ( today the Bureau of Engraving and Printing ), placed his own portrait on the denomination.
After successful introduction of two-cent and three-cent pieces, without precious metal, Congress also authorized a five-cent piece consisting of base metal ; the Mint began striking this version in 1866.
The initial design of the Shield nickel was struck until 1883, तब replaced by the Liberty Head nickel.
The Buffalo nickel was introduced in 1913 as part of a drive to increase the beauty of अमरीकी coinage ; in 1938, the Jefferson nickel followed.
In 2004 and 2005, special designs in honor of the bicentennial of the Lewis and Clark expedition यहूद जारी.
In 2006, the Mint reverted to using जेफरसन निकल designer Felix Schlag 's original reverse ( or `` tails '' side ), although a new obverse, by Jamie Franki, was substituted.
As of 2013, it costs more than eleven cents to उपज a निकल ; the मिंट is exploring the possibility of reducing cost by using less expensive metals.
A poster with flowers or clusters of flowers produced by twelve species of flowering पौधे इससे अलग families
A flower, sometimes known as a bloom or blossom, is the reproductive structure found in flowering plants ( plants of the division Magnoliophyta, also पुकारा angiosperms ).
The biological फलन of a पुष्प is to effect reproduction, usually by providing a mechanism for the union of sperm with eggs.
Flowers may facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of sperm and eggs from different individuals in a population ) or allow selfing ( fusion of sperm and egg इससे the वही पुष्प ).
Some flowers produce diaspores without fertilization ( parthenocarpy ).
Flowers contain sporangia and are the site where gametophytes develop.
पुष्प दे rise to fruit and seeds.
Many flowers have विकसित to be आकर्षक to पशु, so as to cause them to be vectors for the transfer of pollen.
In addition to facilitating the reproduction of flowering plants, flowers have long been admired and used by इंसानो to beautify उनके पर्यावरण, और भी as objects of romance, ritual, religion, medicine and as a source of food.
The McDonnell Douglas ( now Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a twin-engine, all-weather tactical fighter designed by McDonnell Douglas to gain and maintain air superiority in aerial combat.
It is considered among the most successful आधुनिक सेनानी, साथ over 100 aerial कॉम्बैट victories साथ no losses in dogfights.
Following reviews of proposals, the United States Air Force selected McDonnell Douglas ' design in 1967 to meet the service 's need for a समर्पित एयर बड़प्पन fighter.
The Eagle पहला उड़ाया in जुलाई 1972, and entered service in 1976.
Since the 1970s, the Eagle has been exported to इसराईल, जापानी, सऊदी अरब, और अन्य राष्ट्र.
The F-15 was originally envisioned as a pure एयर superiority aircraft.
Its डिज़ाइन शामिल a द्वितीयक ground-attack capability that was largely unused.
The design proved flexible enough that an all-weather strike derivative, the F-15E Strike Eagle, थी बाद विकसित, और डाला service in 1989.
The F-15 Eagle is expected to be in सेवा साथ the u.S. Air Force past 2025.
mimio is a ब्रांड नाम of a line of technology products aimed at the education market.
The primary products are focused around computer whiteboard इंटरैक्टिव शिक्षण डिवाइस.
mimiocapture डिवाइस भी allow उपयोक्ता to कैप्चर सब of the ink strokes that are written on the whiteboard.
When used in conjunction with a video projector it turns the ordinary whiteboard सतह into a fully इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard.
The product line थी originally designed by Virtual Ink.
On October 4, 2006 Newell Rubbermaid acquired the Mimio इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard ( iwb ) product line.
rahab of Jericho
Rahab, ( ; ; ) was, according to the Book of Joshua, a स्त्री who lived in Jericho in the Promised Land and assisted the Israelites in capturing the city.
Nearly all English translations of जोशुआ describe her as a harlot or prostitute.
The Organization of American States ( Spanish : Organización de लॉस estados americanos, पुर्तगाली : Organização dos Estados Americanos, French : Organisation des États américains ), or the OAS, is a regional international organization.
The OAS was संस्थापित on 30 अप्रैल 1948, और has its headquarters in Washington, D.C., United States.
Its members are the 35 स्वतंत्र राज्य of the Americas.
Since 26 May 2005, the Secretary General of oas रै महरूम José Miguel Insulza.
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo Colombo ; Spanish : Cristóbal Colón ; Portuguese : Cristóvão Colombo ; before 31 October 145120 May 1506 ) was an Italian explorer, navigator, and colonizer, born in the Republic of जेनोआ, in कया is आज northwestern Italy.
Under the auspices of the Catholic Monarchs of Spain, he completed four voyages across the Atlantic Ocean that led to general यूरोपीय जागरूकता of the अमरीकी महाद्वीपों.
Those voyages, and his efforts to establish permanent settlements on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला, initiated the Spanish colonization of the New World.
In the context of emerging western imperialism and economic competition between European kingdoms seeking माल through the स्थापना of व्यापार रूट और colonies, कोलंबस 's speculative proposal, to reach the East Indies by sailing westward, eventually received the support of the Spanish crown, which saw in it a promise, however remote, of gaining the upper hand over rival powers in the contest for the lucrative spice trade with Asia.
During his first voyage in 1492, instead of reaching Japan as he had intended, कोलंबस उतरा in the Bahamas archipelago, at a locale he named San Salvador.
over the कोर्स of तीन अधिक voyages, कोलंबस visited the वृहद and Lesser Antilles, as well as the Caribbean coast of Venezuela and Central America, claiming them for the Spanish Empire.
हालांकि कोलंबस थी नहीं the पहला यूरोपीय एक्सप्लोरर to पहुँचें the americas ( having महरूम preceded by the नॉर्स expedition led by leif ericson in the 11th सदी ), कोलंबस 's voyages led to the पहला स्थायी यूरोपीय सम्पर्क साथ the americas, inaugurating a काल of यूरोपीय खोजी, conquest, और colonization कि lasted लिये अनेक सदियां.
They had, therefore, an enormous impact in the ऐतिहासिक विकास of the आधुनिक पश्चिमी संसार.
Columbus himself saw his accomplishments primarily in the light of the spreading of the ईसाई धर्म.
Never admitting that he had reached a continent previously unknown to Europeans, rather than the East Indies he had set out for, कोलंबस पुकारा the निवासियों of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ).
Columbus 's strained relationship with the Spanish crown and its appointed colonial administrators in America led to his arrest and dismissal as governor of the settlements on the island of हिस्पानिओला in 1500, और बाद to protracted वाद over the लाभ जिससे कोलंबस और उसके वारिस claimed were owed to them by the crown.
Bred in Germany, the Boxer is a breed of stocky, medium-sized, short-haired dogs.
The coat is चिकना और tight-fitting ; रंगों are fawn or brindled, with or without white markings, which may cover the entire body.
Boxers are brachycephalic ( वे have व्यापक, short skulls ), and have a square muzzle, mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ), very strong jaws, and a powerful bite ideal for hanging on to large prey.
The Boxer was bred from the Old English बुल और the अभी विलुप्त Bullenbeisser, and is part of the Molosser group.
Boxers were पहला exhibited in a श्वान दिखाएँ लिये St. Bernards in Munich in 1895, the first Boxer club being founded the next year.
Based on 2012 American Kennel Club statistics, Boxers held steady as the seventh most popular breed of dog in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये the तीसरा लगातार साल.
सीरियल ata ( sata ) is a कंप्यूटर बस इंटरफ़ेस that connects host bus adapters to mass storage devices such as hard disk drives and optical drives.
Serial ATA replaces the older AT Attachment standard ( ata ; बाद referred to as समानांतर ata or pata ), offering अनेक लाभ over the older interface : reduced cable size and cost ( seven conductors instead of 40 ), native hot swapping, faster data transfer through higher signalling rates, and more efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol.
SATA host adapters and devices communicate via a high-speed serial cable over दो pairs of conductors.
In contrast, parallel ATA ( the redesignation लिये the विरासत ata विशेषताएँ ) प्रयुक्त a 16-bit चौड़ी data bus with many additional support and control signals, all operating at much lower frequency.
To ensure पिछड़ा संगतता with legacy ATA software and applications, SATA uses the same basic ATA and ATAPI command-set as legacy ATA devices.
SATA has replaced parallel ATA in consumer desktop and laptop computers, and रै largely replaced pata in new embedded applications.
SATA 's market share in the डेस्कटॉप pc मार्केट was 99 % in 2008.
PATA remains widely used in industrial and embedded applications that use CompactFlash भंडार, भी हालांकि the नई cfast मानक is based on SATA.
Serial ATA industry compatibility specifications originate from The Serial ATA अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन ( aka.
sata-io, serialata.org ).
The SATA-IO group collaboratively creates, समीक्षाएँ, ratifies, और publishes the interoperability specifications, the test cases, and plug-fests.
As with many other industry compatibility standards, the SATA content स्वामित्व is transferred to अन्य उद्योग लाशें : primarily the incits t13 उपसमिति ata, the INCITS T10 subcommittee ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of T10 responsible for Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ).
The पूरा specification इससे SATA-IO.
The remainder of this article will try to use the शब्दावली and specifications of SATA-IO.
The history of the Internet began with the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक computers in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the अवधारणाओं कि होता सीसे to the अंतरजाल जब a संदेश थी भेजा over the arpanet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at University of California, Los Angeles ( UCLA ), after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ).
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark I at NPL in the UK, CYCLADES, मेरिट संजाल, tymnet, और telenet, यहूद विकसित in the late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols.
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking, in which अनेक पृथक networks could be joined together into a network of networks.
In 1982, the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) थी मानकीकृत, और नतीजतन, the अवधारणा of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks, called the Internet, was introduced.
Access to the ARPANET was विस्तारित in 1981 जब the नेशनल विज्ञान न्यास ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations.
Commercial अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The अंतरजाल थी commercialized in 1995 जब nsfnet थी decommissioned, निकालना the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the अंतरजाल to carry वाणिज्यिक ट्रैफ़िक.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce, including the rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail, instant messaging, आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव video calls, and the World Wide Web with its discussion forums, blogs, social networking, and online shopping sites.
The research and education community continues to develop and use उन्नत संजाल such as NSF 's very high speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and higher speeds over fiber optic networks operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or अधिक.
the अंतरजाल 's कब्ज़ा over the वैश्विक संचार लैंडस्केप थी लगभग तत्काल in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in the year 1993, already 51 % by 2000, and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the Internet continues to grow, चलित by कभी greater amounts of online information, commerce, entertainment, and social networking.

बॉयल hinted कि the album has a 1960s feel `` because that was [ her ] era ''.
on 30 November 2011, the album received a नामांकन in 54th ग्रैमी Awards for Best Traditional Pop Vocal Album.

Professor Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore is a major अक्षर और समर्थक of J. K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
For most of the श्रेणी, he is the headmaster of the wizarding school Hogwarts.
As part of his backstory, it is revealed कि he is the संस्थापक और नेता of the Order of the Phoenix, an organisation dedicated to fighting the main antagonist of the series, Lord Voldemort.
Dumbledore is portrayed by Richard Harris in the film adaptions of Harry कुम्हार और the पारस 's स्टोन and Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.
After Harris ' death, Michael Gambon portrayed Dumbledore for all of the बाकी films.
Rowling stated she chose the name Dumbledore, which is an जल्दी आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी शब्द लिये `` bumblebee ``, because of Dumbledore 's love of music : she imagined him walking around `` humming to himself a lot ''.
Calcitonin ( also known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino acid linear polypeptide हार्मोन कि is उत्पादित in humans primarily by the parafollicular cells ( also known as C-cells ) of the thyroid, and in many other animals in the ultimobranchial body.
It acts to reduce blood calcium ( Ca2+ ), opposing the effects of parathyroid hormone ( PTH ).
Calcitonin has been मिला in मछली, सरीसृपों, पक्षियों, and mammals.
Its importance in humans has not been as well established as its importance in other animals, as its फलन is प्रायः नहीं significant in the regulation of normal calcium homeostasis.
It belongs to calcitonin-like protein परिवार.
A mousepad साथ a padded wrist rest.
A mousepad ( US ) or चूहा mat ( uk ) is a सतह लिये रखकर and moving a computer mouse.
A mousepad enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using a चूहा सीधे on a तालिका by providing a surface to allow the tracking LED or ball ( in former models ) to measure movement accurately and without jitter.
Some mousepads increase ergonomics by providing a padded wrist rest.

The Riverfront स्टेडियम साईट in जून, 2006.
This photo was taken from the western concourse of Great American Ball Park.
A small portion of the riverfront स्टेडियम साईट is अभी occupied by the Reds ' Hall of Fame and Museum and Main Street, which was extended when the new park was built.

Riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ), later known as Cinergy Field ( 1996–2002 ), was the home of the Cincinnati Reds National League baseball team and the Cincinnati Bengals National फ़ुटबॉल League team.
Located on the Ohio River in downtown सिनसिनाटी, the स्टेडियम थी बेहतरीन known as the home of `` The Big Red Machine ``, as the Reds were often called in the 1970s.
Construction began on February 1, 1968, और थी समाप्त at a cost of less than $ 50 million.
On June 30, 1970, the Reds hosted the Atlanta Braves in their grand opening, with Hank Aaron hitting the पहला कभी घर चलाएं at Riverfront.
Two weeks later on July 14, 1970, Riverfront hosted the 1970 प्रमुख लीग Baseball All-Star Game.
This game is best remembered for the often-replayed collision at home plate between Reds star Pete Rose and catcher रे fosse of the क्लीवलैंड Indians.
In September 1996, Riverfront Stadium was renamed `` Cinergy Field '' in a प्रायोजन सौदे साथ वृहद सिनसिनाटी 's energy company, Cinergy Corporation.
In 2001, to make room for Great American Ball Park, the seating capacity at cinergy फ़ील्ड थी घटाया to 39,000.
There was a huge wall in Center Field visible बाद the renovations, to serve as the batter 's eye.
The stadium was demolished by implosion on December 29, 2002.
Nexen Tire is a tire निर्माता, headquartered in Yangsan, South Gyeongsang Province, and Seoul, both in South Korea.
Its major घरेलू प्रतिस्पर्धी are Hankook Tire and Kumho Tires.
The company 's नाम is reflected in the company slogan, `` Next Century Tire. ''
The silent majority is an unspecified large majority of people in a country or group जो do नहीं एक्स्प्रेस their opinions publicly.
The term was popularized ( though not first used ) by U.S. President Richard Nixon in a November 3, 1969, speech in which he said, `` And so tonight—to you, the ग्रेट मूक बहुमत of my fellow americans—i ask for your support. ''
In this usage it referred to those Americans who did not join in the large demonstrations against the Vietnam War at the समय, जो किया नहीं जुड़ें in the counterculture, and who did not participate in public discourse.
Nixon along with many others saw this group of Middle Americans as होने निष्प्रभ in the media by the more vocal minority.
The phrase was used in the 19th सदी as a प्रेयोक्ति referring to all the people who have died, and others have used it before and after Nixon to refer to groups of voters in various nations of the world.

Before humans went into space, several animals were launched into space, including numerous monkeys, so that वैज्ञानिकों could investigate the biological प्रभाव of space travel.
The United States launched flights containing primate कार्गो primarily between 1948-1961 साथ एक उड़ान in 1969 and one in 1985.
France launched दो monkey-carrying flights in 1967.
The Soviet Union and Russia launched बंदरों between 1983 and 1996.
Most monkeys were anesthetized before lift-off.
Overall thirty-two बंदरों उड़ाया in the space program ; none flew more than once.
Numerous back-up monkeys also went through the कार्यक्रम लकिन never flew.
Monkeys from several species were used, including rhesus monkeys, cynomolgus monkeys, squirrel बंदरों, और pig-tailed macaques.
Some chimpanzees ( which are apes बल्कि than बंदरों ) यहूद also used.
RAID ( redundant array of independent disks, originally अनावश्यक सरणी of inexpensive disks ) is a storage technology that combines multiple disk drive components into a logical unit.
Data is distributed across the drives in one of several ways called `` RAID levels '', depending on the level of अतिरेक and performance required.
The term `` RAID '' was first defined by David Patterson, Garth A. Gibson, and रैंडी katz at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, बर्कली in 1987.
Marketers representing industry रेड निर्माताओं later attempted to reinvent the term to describe a redundant array of independent disks as a means of disassociating a low-cost expectation from RAID technology.
RAID is now used as an umbrella term for computer data storage schemes that can divide and replicate data among multiple physical drives : RAID is an example of storage virtualization and the array can be पहुँचा by the operating system as one single drive.
The अलग योजनाएं or architectures are named by the word RAID followed by a number ( e.g. RAID 0, RAID 1 ).
Each scheme provides a अलग संतुलन between the कुंजी goals : reliability and availability, performance and capacity.
RAID levels greater than RAID 0 provide protection against unrecoverable ( सेक्टर ) read errors, as well as whole disk failure.
A lymphocyte is a type of white रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate immune system.
Under the microscope, lymphocytes can be divided into large lymphocytes और छोटी lymphocytes.
विशाल granular lymphocytes include natural killer cells ( NK cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of t cells and B cells.
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark comedy फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by Joel and Ethan Coen.
Jeff Bridges stars as Jeff lebowski, an बेरोजगार लॉस एंजिल्स slacker and avid bowler, nicknamed `` The Dude. ''
After a case of mistaken पहचान, the Dude is introduced to a millionaire also named Jeffrey Lebowski.
When the millionaire Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped, he आयोग the यार to deliver the ransom to secure her release.
the योजना goes awry जब The Dude 's friend Walter Sobchak ( John Goodman ) schemes to keep the full ransom.
Steve Buscemi, Philip Seymour Hoffman, David Huddleston, Julianne Moore, Tara Reid, and John Turturro also star in the फिल्मी, जिससे is narrated by a काउंटी known only as `` The Stranger '', played by Sam Elliott.
The film is loosely प्रेरित by the कार्य of Raymond Chandler.
Joel Coen stated : `` We wanted to do a Chandler दयालु of स्टोरी – कैसा it चालें episodically, और सौदे with the characters trying to unravel a mystery, as well as having a hopelessly complex plot that 's ultimately unimportant. ''
The original score was रचित by कार्टर Burwell, a longtime collaborator of the Coen Brothers.
The Big Lebowski was a disappointment at the U.S. box office and received mixed समीक्षाएँ at the समय of its release.
Reviews have trended towards the positive over time, and the film has become a cult favorite, noted for its idiosyncratic characters, dream sequences, unconventional संवाद, और eclectic साउंडट्रैक.
Severus Snape is a fictional अक्षर in the हैरी कुम्हार किताब श्रेणी written by J.K. Rowling.
In the first novel of the series, he is शत्रु toward हैरी और is निर्मित up to be the primary antagonist until the final chapters.
As the series progresses, Snape 's अक्षर becomes more layered and complex.
Rowling does not fully reveal the details of his true loyalties जबतक the end of the final book, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows.
Over the course of the series, Snape 's portrayal evolves from that of a malicious and partisan teacher to that of a pivotal अक्षर of considerable जटिलता and moral ambiguity.
Snape primarily teaches Potions at Hogwarts, though in the sixth novel he सिखाती रक्षा विरूद्ध the अंधेरा कला, a स्थिति जिससे he थी ज्ञात to have desired throughout the series.
He ultimately becomes हेडमास्टर of हॉग्वार्ट्स in the final novel.
Rowling has described him as `` a gift of a अक्षर ''.
Grits refers to a ground-corn food of Native अमरीकी उत्पत्ति, कि is common in the Southern United States and mainly eaten at breakfast.
Modern grits हैं commonly made of alkali-treated corn known as hominy.
Grits are similar to other thick maize-based porridges from around the संसार such as polenta or the thinner farina.
`` Instant grits '' have महरूम processed to speed cooking.
The शब्द `` grits '' गर्भाशयी इससे the बूढ़ा English word `` grytt, '' meaning coarse meal.
This word originally referred to गेहूं और other porridges now known as groats in parts of the U.K..
Maize, unknown in Europe in the Middle Ages, is a खाना निकला इससे मकई ( a New World plant ) and `` corn '' had been used to describe wheat products in many European regions.
`` Grits '' may be either singular or plural ; historically, in the American South the word was invariably singular notwithstanding its बहुवचन रूप ( cf. ऐसे खाना names as `` स्पघेटी '' or `` linguine '', likewise बहुवचन in form, but singular in use ).
Sometimes, grits are called sofkee or sofkey ( from a native American Muskogee word ).
In molecular biology, human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by the निषेचित अंडा बाद धारणा.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta, और बाद by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors produce this hormone ; therefore, elevated स्तर measured when the patient is not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
however, it is नहीं ज्ञात whether this production is a contributing cause or an effect of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hCG, ज्ञात as luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh ), is उत्पादित in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages.
, the FDA has prohibited the sale of `` homeopathic '' and over the counter hCG आहार उत्पाद और घोषित them fraudulent and illegal.

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores, restaurants, and vending मशीने in प्रत्येक देश मगर क्यूबा and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, जॉर्जिया, और is प्रायः referred to बस as Coke ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a पेटेंट आयुर्विज्ञान जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th सदी by जॉन pemberton, coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by businessman Asa Griggs Candler, whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The कम्पनी produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive अनुबंध with the company, produce finished product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers तब बेचें, distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines.
ऐसे bottlers शामिल coca-cola उद्यमों, which is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North America and western Europe.
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for soda fountains to major restaurants and खाना सेवा वितरकों.
The Coca-Cola कम्पनी रै, on अवसर, introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand name.
The most common of these is Diet Coke, with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, coca-cola शून्य, coca-cola वैनिला, और special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, coca-cola थी the world 's most valuable brand.
An ombudsman is an official, usually appointed by the सरकारी or by पार्लियामेंट लकिन साथ a significant उपाधि of स्वतंत्रता, जो is चार्ज साथ representing the interests of the public by investigating and addressing complaints of maladministration or violation of rights.
In some countries an इंस्पेक्टर सामान्य, नागरिक एडवोकेट or other official may have duties similar to those of a national ombudsman, and may also be appointed by the legislature.
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state, local or municipal government, और unofficial ombudsmen may be नियुक्त by, or भी कार्य लिये, a निगम ऐसे as a यूटिलिटी प्रदायक or a newspaper, for an NGO, or for a professional regulatory body.
Whether appointed by the legislature, the executive, or an organization ( or, कम अक्सर, निर्वाचित by the constituency कि he or वो serves ), the typical duties of an ombudsman are to investigate complaints and attempt to resolve them, usually through recommendations ( binding or not ) or mediation.
Ombudsmen sometimes also aim to identify systemic issues leading to ग़रीब सेवा or breaches of people 's rights.
At the नेशनल स्तर, सबसे ombudsmen have a चौड़ी जनादेश to सौदे साथ the entire public sector, and sometimes also elements of the private sector ( for example, contracted service providers ).
In some cases, there is a अधिक प्रतिबंधित mandate, for example with particular sectors of society.
More recent developments have included the creation of specialised Children 's ombudsman और सूचना Commissioner agencies.
In some jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with the handling of concerns about national government is more formally referred to as the `` Parliamentary Commissioner '' ( e.g. the संयुक्त किंगडम संसदीय Commissioner for Administration, and the Western Australian state Ombudsman ).
In many countries where the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing with कथित maladministration to promoting और protecting human rights, the ombudsman is recognised as the national human rights institution.
The post of ombudsman had by the end of the 20th century महरूम instituted by सबसे सरकारें and by some intergovernmental organizations such as the European Union.
Making a complaint to an ombudsman is usually फ़्री of charge.

New England is a region in the northeastern corner of the United States consisting of the six states of maine, नई Hampshire, Vermont, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, and Connecticut.
New England is bordered by New York state to the southwest, Quebec to the उत्तरपश्चिम, और नई ब्रंसविक and the Atlantic Ocean to the east.
In one of the earliest अंग्रेज़ी settlements in North America, Pilgrims from England first settled in New England in 1620, to form Plymouth Colony.
Ten years later, the Puritans settled north of Plymouth उपनिवेश in बोस्टन, यूँ forming मैसाचुसेट्स खाड़ी Colony.
Over the next 130 years, नई इंग्लैण्ड लड़ा in चार फ्रेंच और Indian Wars, until the British defeated the French and their native allies in North America.
In the late 18th century, the New England Colonies initiated the प्रतिरोध to the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट 's efforts to impose new taxes without the consent of the colonists.
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which Great Britain responded with a series of punitive laws stripping Massachusetts of self-government, जिससे यहूद termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the British authorities from नई इंग्लैण्ड in वसन्त 1776, और the Declaration of Independence in July 1776.
Some of the पहला आंदोलनों of American literature, philosophy, and education originated in New England.
The region played a prominent भूमिका in the गति to abolish गुलामी, और थी the first region of the United States to be transformed by the Industrial Revolution.
Today, New England is a major world center of शिक्षा, ऊँची प्रौद्योगिकी, insurance, and medicine.
Boston is its cultural, वित्तीय, शैक्षणिक, चिकित्सा and transportation center.
प्रत्येक राज्य is प्रधानतया subdivided into small incorporated municipalities known as New England towns, which are often governed by town meeting.
The only unincorporated territory in New इंग्लैण्ड exists in the sparse, उत्तरी regions of Vermont, New Hampshire, and Maine.
Since 1970, मतदाता have अधिक प्रायः समर्थित उदार उम्मीदवार at the state and federal level than those of any other region in the United States.
New England is the only one of the United States Census Bureau 's nine regional divisions whose name करता नहीं derive इससे इसके भूगोल, and it is the only multi-state region with clear, consistent boundaries.
It maintains a strong sense of सांस्कृतिक पहचान नियत अलावा इससे the बाकी of the country, although the terms of this identity are often contested, combining Puritanism with liberalism, agrarian life with industry, and isolation with immigration.

is an American television series that combines the चिकित्सा नाटक और action-adventure genres.
It was उत्पादित by चिह्नित VII Limited and distributed by Universal Studios.
It debuted as a midseason replacement on January 15, 1972, on NBC, replacing the two short-lived श्रेणी the साझेदार और the शुभ जीवन, और भागा until September 3, 1977, with six additional two-hour television films during the following two years.
