was created and produced by Jack Webb and Robert A. cinader, दोनो of जिसको यहूद भी responsible for the police dramas Adam-12 and Dragnet.
The Eastern Time Zone ( ET ) encompasses 17 U.S. states in the eastern part of the contiguous United राज्य, भाग of कनाडा और तीन देशों in दक्षिण अमेरिका.
Places that use Eastern Standard Time ( EST ) when observing standard time ( autumn/winter ) are 5 घंटों पीछे समन्वित सार्वभौमिक समय ( ).
पूर्वी daylight समय ( edt ), जब observing daylight saving time ( spring/summer ) is 4 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
In the उत्तरी भाग of the समय मण्डल, दौरान the दूसरी संडे in March, at 2:00 a.m. EST, clocks are advanced to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one hour `` gap. ''
During the first Sunday in नवम्बर, at 2:00 a.m. edt, clocks are moved back to 1:00 a.m. EST, thus `` duplicating '' one hour.
Southern parts of the zone ( पनामा और the caribbean ) do नहीं observe daylight saving.
Standard form of the आवधिक तालिका.
The colors represent different categories of तत्व समझाया below.
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements, organized on the basis of उनके परमाणु संख्याएँ, इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations, and recurring chemical properties.
Elements are presented in order of increasing परमाणु क्रमांक ( क्रमांक of protons ).
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main body of elements, positioned above a छोटी दोगुना पंक्ति of तत्व.
The table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the सही, the d-block in the मध्य, और the f-block below that.
The rows of the table are पुकारा अवधि ; the कालम of the s-, d-, and p-blocks are called groups, with some of these having names such as the halogens or the noble gases.
Since, by परिभाषा, a आवधिक तालिका incorporates पुनरावर्ती trends, any such table can be used to derive relationships between the properties of the elements and predict the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
As a result, a periodic table—whether in the मानक रूप or कुछ other variant—provides a useful framework for analyzing chemical behavior, and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences.
हालांकि precursors मौजूद, dmitri mendeleev is generally credited with the publication, in 1869, of the first widely recognized periodic table.
He developed his table to illustrate आवधिक रुझान in the properties of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown तत्व कि होता be अपेक्षित to fill gaps in this table.
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the तत्व in सवाल यहूद subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded and refined with the डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further नई तत्व और the विकास of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior.
All elements from atomic numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have महरूम discovered or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम मिला to मौजूद naturally, although some are found only in trace amounts and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
The elements after 98 have तभी महरूम synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued, with the question of how the periodic तालिका may need to be परिवर्धित to accommodate कोई ऐसे परिवर्धन being a matter of ongoing debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित in laboratories.
Minecraft is a sandbox indie game originally created by Swedish programmer Markus `` Notch '' Persson and बाद विकसित और published by Mojang.
It was publicly released for the PC on May 17, 2009, as a developmental अल्फा संस्करण और, बाद क्रमिक अद्यतन, थी प्रकाशित as a पूरा release version on November 18, 2011.
A version for Android was released a माह पहले on अक्तूबर 7, and an iOS version was released on November 17, 2011.
On May 9, 2012, the game was released on Xbox 360 as an Xbox Live Arcade game, co-developed by 4J Studios.
All versions of Minecraft receive periodic अद्यतन.
The creative and building aspects of Minecraft allow खिलाड़ी to निर्माण constructions आउट of textured cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world.
Other activities in the खेल शामिल खोजी, gathering resources, crafting and combat.
Gameplay in its commercial release has two principal modes : survival, which requires players to acquire resources and maintain उनके स्वास्थ्य और भूख ; और रचनात्मक, जहाँ खिलाड़ी have an असीमित सप्लाई of resources, the ability to fly, and no health or hunger.
A third gameplay विधि नामित हार्डकोर is the वही as अस्तित्व, differing only in difficulty ; it is set to hardest setting and respawning is disabled, forcing players to delete their worlds upon death.
Minecraft प्राप्त पाँच पुरस्कार इससे the 2011 Game Developers Conference : it was awarded the Innovation Award, Best Downloadable Game Award, and the Best Debut Game Award from the Game Developers Choice Awards ; and the Audience Award, as well as the Seumas McNally Grand Prize, from the Independent Games Festival in 2011.
In 2012, minecraft थी awarded a सुनहरी जॉयस्टिक Award in the category Best Downloadable Game.
As of April 8, 2013, the game has sold over 10 million copies on PC and as of January 22, 2013, over 20 लाख नक़ल across all platforms.
The Dark नाईट is a 2008 British-American superhero film directed, produced, and co-written by Christopher Nolan.
Based on the DC Comics character Batman, the film is the दूसरी भाग of नोलन 's बैटमैन फिल्मी श्रेणी और a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins.
Christian Bale reprises the सीसे भूमिका of ब्रूस wayne/batman, with a returning cast of Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth, Gary Oldman as James Gordon and Morgan Freeman as Lucius Fox.
The film introduces the character of Harvey Dent ( Aaron Eckhart ), Gotham 's newly elected District Attorney and the consort of Bruce Wayne 's childhood friend Rachel Dawes ( Maggie जिलएनहॉल ), जो joins बैटमैन और the पुलिस in combating the नई उठती threat of a दण्ड मास्टरमाइंड calling himself `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ).
Nolan 's inspiration for the film was the Joker 's comic book debut in 1940, the 1988 ग्राफिक अनोखा, और the 1996 श्रेणी, जिससे retold Two-Face 's origin.
The nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was first लागू to बैटमैन in बैटमैन no. 1 ( 1940 ), in a story written by Bill Finger.
The Dark Knight was फिल्माया primarily in शिकागो, as खूब as in several other locations in the United States, the United Kingdom, and Hong Kong.
Nolan used an IMAX camera to film some sequences, सहित the जोकर 's first appearance in the film.
On January 22, 2008, some months after he था समाप्त फिल्मांकन on the अंधेरा नाईट और छह महीने पहले the फिल्मी 's release, Heath Ledger died from a toxic combination of prescription drugs, leading to intense attention from the press and movie-going public.
Warner भाईs. था initially निर्मित a वाइरल विपणन campaign for The Dark Knight, developing promotional websites and trailers highlighting screen shots of Ledger as the Joker, but after Ledger 's death, the studio refocused its promotional campaign.
The Dark Knight was released on July 16, 2008 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, on जुलाई 18, 2008 in North America, and on July 24, 2008 in the United Kingdom.
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s and one of the best superhero films ever बना, the फिल्मी प्राप्त अत्यधिक धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ और नियत numerous records during its theatrical run.
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide, it is the 14th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब time, unadjusted for inflation.
The film received eight Academy Award nominations ; it won the award for Best Sound Editing and Ledger was मरणोपरांत awarded बेहतरीन supporting Actor.
The Dark Knight Rises, the final भाग of the त्रयी, थी released on July 20, 2012.
The timeline of रेडियो सूचियाँ भीतर the इतिहास of रेडियो, the प्रौद्योगिकी और कार्यक्रम कि produced instruments that use radio waves and activities that people undertook.
Later, the history is dominated by programming and contents, जिससे is करीब to सामान्य इतिहास.
The Sydney ओपेरा हाउस is a multi-venue performing arts centre in New South Wales, Australia.
It was conceived and largely built by Danish architect Jørn Utzon, खोलने in 1973 बाद a long gestation that began with his competition-winning design in 1957.
Joseph Cahill 's New South Wales Government gave the go-ahead for work to शुरू in 1958.
The सरकारी 's bold decision to select Utzon 's design is often overshadowed by the scandal that followed.
It is on bennelong पाइंट in सिडनी Harbour, close to the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
It sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central business district ( the CBD ), surrounded on three sides by the harbour ( सिडनी कोव और फार्म कोव ) और अंतर्देशीय by the Royal Botanic Gardens.
Contrary to its name, it घरों अनेक performance venues.
It is among the busiest performing arts centres in the world, hosting over 1,500 प्रदर्शन प्रत्येक साल attended by कुछ 1.2 million people.
It provides a venue for many performing-arts companies, including the four key resident कंपनियाँ ओपेरा ऑस्ट्रेलिया, The Australian Ballet, the Sydney Theatre Company and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra, and presents a wide range of productions on its own account.
It is also one of the most popular visitor attractions in Australia, with more than seven लाख लोगों visiting प्रत्येक साल, 300,000 of whom take a guided tour.
It is administered by the Sydney Opera House Trust, under the New South Wales Ministry of the Arts.
On 28 June 2007, it was made a युनेस्को World Heritage Site.
It is one of the 20th century 's most distinctive buildings और एक of the सबसे famous performing arts centres in the world.
A graph of देह द्रव्यमान index as a function of body mass and body height is shown above.
The dashed lines represent subdivisions within a प्रमुख क्लास.
For instance the `` Underweight '' वर्गीकरण is further divided into `` severe '', `` moderate '', and `` mild '' subclasses.
The body mass index ( BMI ), or Quetelet index, is a measure for human body shape आधारित on an individual 's weight and height.
It was devised between 1830 and 1850 by the Belgian polymath Adolphe Quetelet during the कोर्स of विकासशील `` social physics ''.
Body mass index is defined as the individual 's body mass divided by the वर्गाकार of their height.
The formulae universally used in medicine produce a ईकाई of माप of kg/m2.
BMI can also be determined using a BMI chart, which displays बीएमआई as a फलन of weight ( horizontal axis ) and height ( vertical axis ) using contour lines for different values of BMI or colors for different BMI categories.
† The factor for UK/US units is more precisely 703.06957964, but that level of precision is not meaningful for इस गणना.
To work from stone and pounds first multiply the stone by 14 then add the pounds to give the whole mass in pounds ; to work from feet and inches first multiply the फीट by 12 तब add the इंच to दे the पूरे ऊँचाई in inches.
Thomas Paine ( January 29, 1737 ( NS February 9, 1737 ) – June 8, 1809 ) थी an english-american राजनैतिक activist, author, political theorist and revolutionary.
As the author of two highly influential pamphlets at the प्रारंभ of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति, he inspired the Patriots in 1776 to declare independence from Britain.
His ideas reflected आत्मज्ञान era बयानबाजी of transnational human rights.
He has been called `` a corsetmaker by trade, a पत्रकार by व्यवसायिक, and a propagandist by inclination. ''
Born in Thetford, England, in the काउंटी of Norfolk, Paine emigrated to the British American colonies in 1774 with the help of Benjamin Franklin and he arrived in time to participate in the American Revolution.
His principal contributions were the powerful, widely read pamphlet Common Sense ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling American book that advocated colonial America 's independence from the Kingdom of Great ब्रिटेन, और the अमरीकी संकट ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series.
Common Sense was so influential that John Adams said, `` Without the pen of the लेखक of आम भाव, the तलवार of Washington would have been raised in vain.”
Paine lived in France for most of the 1790s, बनने deeply शामिल in the French Revolution.
He wrote the Rights of Man ( 1791 ), in भाग a रक्षा of the French Revolution against its critics.
His attacks on British writer Edmund बुर्के led to a विचारण और conviction in absentia in 1792 for the crime of seditious libel.
In 1792, despite not being able to speak French, he was elected to the French National Convention.
the girondists regarded him as an ally.
Consequently, the Montagnards, especially Robespierre, regarded उसे as an दुश्मन.
In December 1793, he was arrested and imprisoned in पेरिस, then released in 1794.
He became notorious because of The Age of Reason ( 1793–94 ), his book that advocates deism, promotes reason और freethinking, और argues विरूद्ध institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular.
He also wrote the pamphlet Agrarian Justice ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of property, and introduced the concept of a guaranteed minimum income.
In 1802, he returned to America where he died on जून 8, 1809.
Only six people attended his funeral as he had been ostracized for उसके उपहास of christianity.
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development that generate safety and efficacy data ( or more specifically, information about adverse drug reactions and adverse effects of other उपचार ) लिये स्वास्थ्य interventions ( e.g., दवाएँ, नैदानिक, डिवाइस, चिकित्सा प्रोटोकॉल ).
They are conducted only after satisfactory information has been gathered on the विशेषता of the गैर नैदानिक सुरक्षा, और स्वास्थ्य authority/ethics committee approval is granted in the country where approval of the drug or device is sought.
Previously, अनेक उभरते देशों किया not require local trials for product approvals.
Now, though emerging countries still accept आंकड़ा इससे u.s./europe, they also require some local trials.
Depending on the type of product and the stage of its development, investigators initially enroll volunteers and/or मरीजों into छोटी pilot studies, and subsequently conduct larger scale studies in patients that often compare the new product with others already approved for the affliction of interest.
As positive safety and efficacy data are gathered, the number of patients is typically increased.
Clinical trials can vary in size, and can involve a single research entity in एक देश or अनेक such entities in multiple countries.
A full series of trials may incur sizable costs, and the burden of paying for all the necessary people and services is usually borne by the प्रायोजक, जिससे may be a सरकारी organization or a pharmaceutical, biotechnology or medical device company.
When the diversity of जरूरी support भूमिकाएँ exceeds the संसाधन of the sponsor, a clinical trial is managed by an outsourced partner, such as a contract research organization or a clinical trials unit in the academic sector.
The ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स हैं an American football team based in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
They are members of the उत्तर प्रभाग of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the NFL, having been organized and playing in 1919.
The Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned major league professional sports टोली in the संयुक्त States.
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small कस्बा टीमों '' कि यहूद once common in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun, the Green खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन and the Midwest.
They joined the American पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल Association ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ).
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team, its लोकल प्रशंसक आधार और मीडिया extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ), including nine NFL championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ), 1968 ( Super Bowl II ), 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC सेंट्रल ) opponents, the Chicago Bears, Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions.
The Bears-Packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास, डेटिंग वापस to 1921.
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl alcohol ), the same type of दारू मिला in alcoholic beverages.
It is most often used as a मोटर ईंधन, मुख्यतः as a biofuel additive for gasoline.
World ethanol production for transport ईंधन tripled between 2000 और 2007 from 17 billion to more than 52 billion liters.
From 2007 to 2008, the share of ethanol in वैश्विक गैसोलीन प्रकार ईंधन उपयोग increased from 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
In 2011 worldwide ethanol fuel production reached 22.36 billion U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ), with the United States as the top producer with 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ), हिसाब लिये 62.2 % of वैश्विक उत्पादन, followed by ब्राज़ील साथ 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ).
Ethanol fuel has a `` gasoline गैलन equivalency `` ( gge ) मान of, जिससे अर्थात् 1.5 gallons of ethanol produce the energy of one gallon of gasoline.
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil and in the United States, और साथ दोनो देशों यहूद जिम्मेदार लिये 87.1 % of the world 's ethanol fuel production in 2011.
Most cars on the road today in the U.S. can run on blends of up to 10 % ethanol, और इथेनॉल represented 10 % of the u.S. गैसोलीन ईंधन सप्लाई निकला from domestic sources in 2011.
Since 1976 the Brazilian government has made it mandatory to blend ethanol with gasoline, and since 2007 the legal blend is around 25 % ethanol और 75 % गैसोलीन ( e25 ).
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 million flex-fuel automobiles and light trucks and 1.5 million flex-fuel मोटरसाइकिल that regularly use neat ethanol fuel ( known as E100 ).
Bioethanol is a form of renewable उर्जा कि can be उत्पादित from agricultural feedstocks.
It can be made from very common crops such as शुगर cane, आलू, manioc and corn.
There has been considerable debate about how useful bioethanol will be in replacing gasoline.
Concerns about इसके उत्पादन और उपयोग relate to increased food prices due to the large amount of arable land required for crops, as well as the energy and pollution balance of the whole cycle of ethanol production, especially from corn.
Recent developments साथ cellulosic इथेनॉल production and commercialization may allay some of these concerns.
Cellulosic ethanol offers वादा क्युकी cellulose मछली, a प्रमुख और universal component in plant cells walls, can be used to produce ethanol.
According to the International Energy Agency, cellulosic ethanol could allow ethanol fuels to play a much bigger role in the future than previously thought.

A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987, before steps were removed in 1992 and प्लैक बदला इससे cyrillic to लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट )
A plaque commemorating the स्थान of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and his wife, Sophie, Duchess of Hohenberg, were shot dead in Sarajevo, by Gavrilo Princip, one of a group of छह बोस्नियाई Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the हत्या थी to ब्रेक बंद austria-hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so they could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives were consistent with the गति कि बाद became ज्ञात as यंग Bosnia.
Serbian military अधिकारियों stood पीछे the attack.
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin dimitrijević, उसके righthand man प्रमुख vojislav tankosić, और masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the assassins with बम और pistols और trained them.
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and agents that Rade Malobabić used for the घुसपैठ of हथियार और operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the key members of the clandestine tunnel, and the key Serbian military conspirators who यहूद स्टिल जिंदा were arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
Those who were arrested in Bosnia were आजमाया in साराजेवो in October 1914.
The other षड्यंत्रकारियों यहूद गिरफ्तार और आजमाया पहले a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the top military conspirators.
Much of what is known about the assassinations comes from these two ट्रायल और सम्बन्धित records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly controversial क्युकी the आक्रमण led to the outbreak of संसार War I one month later.
Renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born अप्रैल 25, 1969 ) is an American actress and producer.
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the film Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ), और subsequently प्राप्त दो nominations for the Academy Award for Best Actress for her roles as Bridget Jones in the comedy Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), and as Roxie Hart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ).
She जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Cold Mountain ( 2003 ).
She has won an Academy Award, three Golden Globe Awards, तीन स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं Guild Awards, and a BAFTA Award ; was named Hasty Pudding 's Woman of the Year in 2009 ; and established herself as one of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of 2007.
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) are the three smallest bones in the human body, the malleus, the incus और the stapes.
They are contained भीतर the मध्य कान स्पेस and serve to transmit sounds from the air to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ).
The absence of the auditory ossicles would constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing loss.
The term `` ossicles '' वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` छोटा हड्डियों '' और commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, though the term may refer to any small bone throughout the body.
the नई वचन ( Hebrew • • — Greek • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical interpretation originally derived from a phrase in the Book of Jeremiah, in the Hebrew Scriptures.
It is often विचार of as an eschatological Messianic Age or world to come and is related to the biblical concept of the Kingdom of God.
Generally, Christians believe that the नई वचन थी instituted at the पिछला भोजन as भाग of the Eucharist, which in the Gospel of John includes the New Commandment.
There are several Christian eschatologies that further define the New Covenant, as an example an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the New Covenant as an ongoing संबंध between ईसाई ईमानवालों और परमेश्वर कि होगा be in पूरा फलीभूत बाद the दूसरी coming of मसीह ; कि is, it will not only be in full fruition in believing hearts, but in the future external world as well.
The connection between the Blood of Christ and the New Covenant is देखी in सबसे आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of the नई वसीयत साथ the saying : `` this cup that is poured out for you is the new covenant in my blood ''.
Christians believe that यीशु is the मध्यस्थ of the New Covenant, and that the Blood of Christ shed at his crucifixion is the required blood of the covenant.
As with all covenants between God and man described in the Bible, the नई वचन is माना `` a बंध in रक्त sovereignly administered by God. ''
It has महरूम theorized कि the New Covenant is the Law of Christ as spoken during his Sermon on the Mount.
The following List of people pardoned or granted clemency by the President of the United States दस्तावेज़ the सबसे prominent मामले of प्रत्येक presidency.
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II, Section 2, Clause 1 ), राष्ट्रपतियों have the power to grant clemency in one or more of the following ways : the ability to grant a full pardon, to commute a sentence, or to rescind a fine.
U.S. Presidents have no power to ग्रान्ट दया लिये crimes prosecuted under state law.
As to the difference between a pardon and a commutation:
A pardon is an कार्यपालिका order vacating a conviction.
A commutation is the mitigation of the वाक्य of किसी फिलहाल सेवारत a वाक्य for a crime pursuant to a conviction, without vacating the conviction itself.
Approximately 20,000 pardons and clemencies यहूद जारी by u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों in the 20th century alone.
The records of acts of दया यहूद पब्लिक until 1934.
In 1981 the Office of the Pardon Attorney was created and रिकॉर्ड from President H. W. Bush forward are now listed.
This list शामिल pardons and commutations.
Tampa ( ) is a नगर in the u.S. state of Florida.
It serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County and is स्तिथ on the वेस्ट coast of फ्लोरिडा, on tampa खाड़ी निकट the Gulf of Mexico.
the जनसांख्यिकी of Tampa in 2011 was 346,037.
The वर्तमान स्थान of tampa थी एकबार inhabited by स्वदेशी peoples of the Safety Harbor culture, most notably the Tocobaga and the Pohoy, who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay.
It was briefly explored by Spanish explorers in the early 16th century, but there were no permanent अमरीकी or यूरोपीय settlements भीतर आज 's नगर हद जबतक बाद the संयुक्त राज्य था acquired Florida from Spain in 1819.
In 1824, the United States Army established a frontier outpost called Fort Brooke at the mouth of the Hillsborough River, near the site of आज 's tampa सम्मेलन Center.
The पहला civilian निवासियों यहूद pioneers who settled near the fort for protection from the nearby Seminole population.
The town grew slowly until the 1880s, when railroad links, the discovery of फास्फेट, और the आगमन of the सिगार उद्योग jump-started tampa 's development and helped it to grow into an important city by the early 1900s.
आज, tampa is a भाग of the metropolitan area most commonly referred to as the Tampa Bay Area.
For U.S. Census purposes, Tampa is part of the Tampa-St. Petersburg-Clearwater, Florida महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल.
The four-county क्षेत्रफल is रचित of roughly 2.7 million residents, making it the second largest metropolitan statistical area ( MSA ) in the state, and the fourth largest in the Southeastern United States, behind Miami, Washington, D.C., and Atlanta.
The Greater Tampa Bay area has बस over 4 लाख निवासियों और generally शामिल the Tampa and Sarasota metro areas.
The Tampa Bay Partnership and U.S. जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़ा दिखाया an average annual growth of 2.47 percent, or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per year.
Between 2000 and 2006, the Greater Tampa Bay Market experienced a संयुक्त विकास रेट of 14.8 प्रतिशत, growing इससे 3.4 million to 3.9 million and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1, 2007.
A 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay area population to have 4,310,524 people and a 2017 प्रक्षेप of 4,536,854 लोगों.
Tampa has a क्रमांक of sports teams, such as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the National Football League, the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League, and the Tampa Bay Storm of the Arena Football League.
The Tampa Bay Rays in Major League Baseball and the tampa खाड़ी rowdies of the उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग खेल their home games in neighboring St. Petersburg, Florida.
In 2008, tampa थी क्रमित as the 5th best outdoor city by Forbes.
A 2004 survey by the NYU newspaper Washington Square News ranked Tampa as a शीर्ष नगर लिये `` twenty-somethings. ''
Tampa is now क्रमित as a `` गामा '' world city by Loughborough University.
According to Loughborough, Tampa ranks alongside other world cities such as Phoenix, सेंटो डोमिंगो, and Osaka.
In recent years Tampa has seen a notable upsurge in high-market माँग इससे consumers, signaling more wealth concentrated in the area.
tampa hosted the 2012 Republican National Convention.
The शेवरलेट cavalier थी a कॉम्पैक्ट automobile produced from 1982 to 2005 by General Motors.
Built on the company 's J platform, the cavalier उत्पादित the highest sales in 1984.
AT & T Mobility LLC branded and referred to as AT & T ( formerly Cingular Wireless LLC ), is a wholly owned subsidiary of AT & T Inc. that provides बेतार सेवाएं to 107 million subscribers in the United States, including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
AT & T Mobility is the second largest बेतार दूरसंचार provider in the United States and Puerto Rico, behind Verizon Wireless, which serves 115.78 million customers as of the fourth quarter of 2012.
AT & t गतिशीलता is headquartered in the Lenox Park area of DeKalb Co. Georgia, just outside Atlanta.
Originally Cingular Wireless LLC from 2000 to 2007, a joint venture between SBC Communications and bellsouth, the कम्पनी acquired the बूढ़ा at & t बेतार in 2004 ; SBC later acquired the original AT & T and re-branded as `` AT & T ''.
Cingular became wholly owned by at & t in दिसम्बर 2006 as a result of AT & T 's acquisition of BellSouth.
In January 2007, Cingular confirmed it would re-brand itself अंतर्गत the at & T name.
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately, for both regulatory and brand-awareness reasons both ब्रांड्स यहूद प्रयुक्त in the कम्पनी 's साइनेज और विज्ञापन दौरान a transition period.
The परिवर्तन concluded in लेट June, just prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone.
On March 20, 2011, AT & T Mobility घोषित इसके इरादे to acquire t-mobile USA from Deutsche Telekom for $ 39 billion.
If it had received government and regulatory स्वीकृति, at & T would have had more than 130 million subscribers.
however, the u.S. विभाग of इंसाफ, the Federal Communications Commission, and AT & T Mobility 's competitors ( such as Sprint Nextel ) opposed the move on the grounds that it would reduce competition in the cellular communications market.
In December 2011, in the face of दोनो सरकारी और फैली उपभोक्ता opposition, AT & T withdrew their offer to complete the merger.
Martin Luther King, Jr. ( January 15, 1929 – April 4, 1968 ) was an American clergyman, activist, and leader in the african-american सिविल अधिकारों Movement.
He is best known for his role in the advancement of civil rights using nonviolent सिविल disobedience.
King has become a national icon in the history of American progressivism.
A Baptist minister, King became a सिविल अधिकारों activist early in his career.
He led the 1955 Montgomery Bus Boycott and helped found the Southern Christian Leadership सम्मेलन ( sclc ) in 1957, serving as its first president.
With the SCLC, King led an unsuccessful struggle against segregation in Albany, Georgia, in 1962, and organized nonviolent विरोध in बर्मिंघम, अलबामा, कि आकर्षित नेशनल attention following television news coverage of the brutal police response.
King also helped to व्यवस्थित the 1963 कूच on Washington, where he delivered his `` I Have a Dream `` speech.
There, he स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा as one of the greatest orators in American history.
He also established his reputation as a radical, and became an object of the Federal Bureau of Investigation 's cointelpro लिये the बाकी of his life.
FBI agents investigated him for संभावित communist ties, recorded his extramarital liaisons and reported on them to government officials, and on one occasion, mailed King a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit suicide.
On October 14, 1964, King received the नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार लिये combating racial inequality through nonviolence.
In 1965, he and the SCLC helped to organize the Selma to Montgomery marches and the following साल, he took the movement north to Chicago.
In the final सालो of उसके जीवन, किंग विस्तारित उसके फ़ोकस to include poverty and the Vietnam War, alienating many of his liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam ''.
King was planning a national occupation of वॉशिंगटन, d.C., पुकारा the ग़रीब लोगों 's Campaign.
King was assassinated on अप्रैल 4, 1968, in Memphis, Tennessee.
His death was followed by दंगे in अनेक U.S. cities.
Allegations that James Earl Ray, the man convicted of हत्या किंग, था महरूम framed or acted in concert with government agents persisted for decades after the shooting, and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King.
King was awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता and the Congressional Gold Medal posthumously.
Martin Luther King, Jr. Day was established as a U.S. संघीय अवकाश in 1986.
Hundreds of streets in the U.S. have महरूम renamed in his honor.
A memorial statue on the नेशनल मॉल थी खोली to the public in 2011.
the बाघ ( Panthera tigris ) is the largest cat species, reaching a total body length of up to and weighing up to.
It is the third largest land carnivore ( behind only the ध्रुवीय bear and the brown bear ).
Its most recognizable feature is a pattern of dark लंबवत धारियाँ on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside.
It रै exceptional stout दांत, और the canines are the longest among living felids with a crown height of as much as or even.
In zoos, tigers have lived for 20 to 26 years, जिससे भी seems to be उनके आयु in the wild.
They are territorial and generally solitary but social पशु, प्रायः requiring विशाल संलग्न areas of habitat that support their prey requirements.
This, coupled साथ the फैक्ट कि वे हैं स्वदेशी to some of the more densely populated places on Earth, has caused significant conflicts with humans.
Tigers once ranged widely across Asia, from Turkey in the west to the पूर्वी coast of रूस.
Over the past 100 years, they have lost 93 % of their historic range, and have महरूम extirpated इससे दक्षिणपश्चिम और सेंट्रल एशिया, from the islands of Java and Bali, and from large areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia.
Today, they range from the Siberian taiga to open grasslands and तीव्र mangrove swamps.
The remaining six tiger subspecies have been वर्गीकृत as endangered by IUCN.
The global population in the wild is estimated to number between 3,062 और 3,948 individuals, bas इससे around 100,000 at the प्रारंभ of the 20th century, with most remaining populations occurring in small pockets isolated from each other.
प्रमुख कारण लिये जनसांख्यिकी decline include habitat destruction, habitat fragmentation and poaching.
The extent of area occupied by टाइगर्स is अनुमानित at less than, a 41 % decline from the area estimated in the mid-1990s.
टाइगर्स हैं among the सबसे recognisable and popular of the world 's charismatic megafauna.
They have featured prominently in ancient mythology and लोकगीत, और continue to be depicted in modern films and literature.
टाइगर्स appear on many flags, coats of arms, and as mascots for sporting teams.
The Bengal बाघ is the नेशनल एनिमल of both India and Bangladesh.

Overview of the calvin cycle and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that convert carbon डाइऑक्साइड और अन्य यौगिकों into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a हरितलवक outside of the thylakoid membranes.
These reactions take the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ और perform further रासायनिक processes on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin cycle : कार्बन fixation, कटौती reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, this process occurs तभी जब लाइट is available.
Plants do not carry out the calvin cycle by night.
They, instead, रिलीज sucrose into the phloem from their starch reserves.
इस प्रक्रम happens जब लाइट is उपलब्धियाँ स्वतंत्र of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation, C4 carbon fixation, and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work.
A लिनेन रूमाल with pulled thread embroidery around the edges
Linen cloth recovered from qumran गुफा 1 निकट the Dead Sea.
Linen ( ) is a textile made from the fibers of the flax संयंत्र, Linum usitatissimum.
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture, but जब it is बना into garments, it is valued for its exceptional coolness and freshness in hot weather.
The word `` linen '' is of West Germanic origin and cognates साथ the लैटिन नाम for the flax plant linum, and the earlier Greek λινόν ( linon ).
This word history has given rise to a number of other शर्तें in अंग्रेज़ी, the सबसे notable of जिससे is the English word line, derived from the use of a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a straight line.
Textiles in a linen weave texture, even when made of कपास, गांजा और अन्य non-flax fibers are also loosely referred to as `` linen ''.
Such fabrics generally have उनके अपना विशिष्ट names other than linen ; for example, fine cotton yarn in a linen-style weave is called Madapolam.
The सामूहिक पद `` linens `` is स्टिल प्रायः प्रयुक्त generically to describe a class of woven and even knitted bed, bath, table and kitchen textiles.
The name linens is retained because traditionally, लिनेन थी प्रयुक्त लिये अनेक of these items.
In the past, the word `` linens '' was also used to mean lightweight undergarments ऐसे as शर्ट, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a word also cognate with linen ), and detachable shirt collars and cuffs, which were historically made almost exclusively out of linen.
The inside cloth परत of ठीक कम्पोजिट clothing garments ( as for example jackets ) was traditionally made of linen, and this is the origin of the word lining.
Linen textiles appear to be some of the oldest in the संसार : उनके इतिहास goes back many thousands of years.
Fragments of straw, seeds, fibers, yarns, and various प्रकार of fabrics जिससे तिथि वापस to परिचय 8000 bc have been found in Swiss lake dwellings.
Dyed flax fibers found in a prehistoric cave in Georgia suggest the use of woven लिनेन fabrics इससे wild flax may date back even earlier to 36,000 BP.
Linen was sometimes used as currency in प्राचीन मिश्र.
Egyptian mummies were wrapped in linen because it थी देखी as a symbol of light and purity, and as a display of wealth.
Some of these fabrics, woven from hand spun yarns, were very fine for their day, but are coarse compared to modern linen.
आज, लिनेन is usually an expensive textile, and is produced in relatively small quantities.
It रै a long `` स्टेपल '' ( individual fiber length ) relative to cotton and other natural fibers.
Many products are made of linen : aprons, bags, towels ( swimmers, bath, beach, body and wash towels ), napkins, bed linens, लिनेन चौके, runners, chair covers, and men 's & women 's wear.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the संसार कप, is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ football competition contested by the senior men 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The चैंपियनशिप रै महरूम awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War.
The current champions are स्पेन, जो जीती the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; इस phase is प्रायः पुकारा the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three years, is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together साथ the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ).
The 19 World Cup tournaments have महरूम won by eight different national teams.
Brazil have won five times, and वे हैं the तभी टोली to have निभाई in every tournament.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, with four titles ; Germany, with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay, with two titles each ; and England, France, and Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million लोगों देखी the फाइनल match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The next three World Cups होगा be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
The is an expansion device for the वी रिमोट वीडियो खेल नियंत्रक for the Wii that allows it to more accurately capture complex motion.
According to निन्टेंडो, the सेंसर in the यंत्र पूरक the accelerometer और सेंसर बार सामर्थ्य of the वी रिमोट to enable actions to be rendered identically on the screen in real time.
The Wii 's successor console, the Wii U, supports the Wii motionplus और इसके peripherals in games where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary.
Majulah Singapura ( onward सिंगापुर ) is the national anthem of Singapore.
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a theme song for official functions of the City Council of Singapore, the song was चयनित in 1959 as the द्वीप 's गान जब it attained self-government.
Upon full independence in 1965, Majulah Singapura थी formally अपनाया as Singapore 's national anthem.
By विधि the गान may तभी be सुंग साथ its original Malay lyrics, although there exist authorized translations of the lyrics of the anthem in Singapore 's three other official languages : English, Mandarin and Tamil.
Originally composed in the key of G major, in 2001 the national anthem was officially relaunched in the lower key of F प्रमुख as इस थी कहा to allow लिये a `` grander and more inspiring arrangement ''.
The national anthem is regularly performed or sung in schools and armed forces camps at ceremonies held at the beginning and/or the end of each day, during which the national flag is also raised and lowered and the national pledge is taken.
Singaporeans are especially encouraged to sing the national anthem on occasions of national celebration or नेशनल significance ऐसे as at the नेशनल Day Parade, at National Day observance ceremonies conducted by educational institutions and government departments, and at sporting events at which Singapore teams are participating.
An expedition 's shipwrights building a brigantine, 1541.
Shipbuilding is the construction of जहाजों और फ्लोटिंग vessels.
It normally takes place in a specialized सुविधा known as a shipyard.
Shipbuilders, also called shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation कि traces its roots to before recorded history.
Shipbuilding and जलयान मरम्मत, दोनो वाणिज्यिक and military, are referred to as `` naval engineering ''.
The construction of boats is a समान कार्यकलाप पुकारा boat building.
The dismantling of जहाजों is पुकारा ship breaking.
wakonda is a कस्बा in मिट्टी काउंटी, South Dakota, United States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 321 at the 2010 census.
The following is a list of the most populous incorporated places of the संयुक्त राज्य of America.
As defined by the United States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated प्लेस `` शामिल a किस्में of designations, सहित city, town, village, borough, and municipality.
A few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's लिस्टिंग of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी कि includes the entire population of a county, or county equivalent.
कुछ संचित city-counties, however, include multiple incorporated places.
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that हैं नहीं a भाग of another incorporated place.
Note that this list refers तभी to the जनसांख्यिकी of individual municipalities within their defined limits, which does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident when considering U.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations.

Nintendo DS storage devices are devices used to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress images, homebrew video खेल और डाउनलोड वाणिज्यिक खेल ( चूंकि the निन्टेंडो ds is नहीं बेची साथ a rewritable storage medium ).
Licensed developers, however, can उपयोग a ब्लू Intelligent Systems Nitro Emulator box to flash cards.
These devices are also known as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
There are दो प्रमुख वर्ग of flashcarts : पुरानी डिवाइस which fit in Slot-2 ( the Game Boy Advance Game Pak slot ) and newer devices that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card slot ).
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically cheaper due to economies of scale ( inherited from their use साथ खेल लड़के अग्रिम ), लकिन आवश्यकता a booting औजार in Slot-1 in order to use the touch screen and other DS features.
Second-generation devices ( those which only use Slot-1 ) do नहीं कार्य साथ gba homebrew, लकिन became कम महंगी और easier to use, rivaling many Slot-2 devices in price.
First-generation devices include GBA फ्लैश कारतूस, gbamp CF, SuperCard, and M3.
Second-generation devices include r4 क्रान्ति, CycloDS, G6 Real and DS-X.
The storage device either contains flash मेमोरी or a स्लॉट लिये a मेमोरी card to store homebrew.
Storage devices साथ a memory-card स्लॉट usually have more storage capacity than flash-memory devices.
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured in megabits ( mb ), memory-card क्षमता is प्रायः measured in megabytes ( MB ) ( where 8 Mb is 1 MB ).
Storage-device brands differ in उनके support लिये homebrew ; ds और खेल Boy Advance ROMs ; special features ( such as ability to play media files ) ; physical size and cost.
सख्ती बोलना, a भंडार device is not necessary for DS with FlashMe installed because homebrew can be sent to the DS using WMB.
However, इस is नहीं an easily-portable विधि because the DS needs to be within range of a suitable Wi-Fi card.
are American people of जापानी heritage.
Japanese Americans have historically been among the three largest Asian American समुदायों, लकिन in हाल दशकों, it रै become the sixth largest group at roughly 1,304,286, including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
In the 2010 census, the largest Japanese American communities were found in California with 272,528, Hawaii with 185,502, New York with 37,780, वॉशिंगटन साथ 35,008, और इलिनोइस with 17,542.
Southern California रै the largest japanese-american population in North America.

This is a comprehensive listing जिससे हाइलाइट significant उपलब्धियाँ और माइलस्टोन based upon Billboard magazine 's singles charts, most notably the Billboard Hot 100.
This list spans from the issue dated जनवरी 1, 1955 to present.
The Billboard Hot 100 began with the issue dated August 4, 1958, and is फिलहाल the मानक लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक चार्ट in the United States.
Prior to the सृष्टि of the hot 100, Billboard published four singles charts : `` Best Sellers in Stores '', `` Most Played by Jockeys '', `` Most Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 ''.
These charts, which ranged इससे 20 to 100 slots, were phased out at different times between 1957 and 1958.
Though technically not part of the Hot 100 chart history, their data is included for computational purposes, and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations.
All वस्तुएं सूचीबद्ध below are from the Hot 100 era, unless otherwise noted ( pre-Hot 100 charts ).
V is an American science fiction television series कि भागा लिये दो सीज़न on ABC, from November 3, 2009 to March 15, 2011.
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created by Kenneth Johnson, the new series chronicles the आगमन on धरती of a technologically उन्नत एलियन species which ostensibly comes in peace, but actually has sinister motives.
V stars Morena Baccarin, Lourdes Benedicto, Morris Chestnut, Joel Gretsch, Logan Huffman, Charles Mesure, Elizabeth Mitchell, Laura Vandervoort और स्कॉट भेड़िया, और थी कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by Scott Rosenbaum, Yves Simoneau, Scott Peters, and Jace Hall.
The series was produced by The स्कॉट पीटर्स कम्पनी, HDFilms and Warner Bros. Television.
Geocaching is an outdoor recreational activity, in जिससे the भागीदार उपयोग a वैश्विक positioning प्रणाली ( gps ) receiver or मोबाईल यंत्र और अन्य navigational techniques to hide and seek containers, called `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the world.
A typical cache is a छोटी waterproof container containing a logbook where the geocacher enters the date they found it and signs it with their established code name.
After signing into the log, the cache must be placed back exactly जहाँ the person found it.
Larger containers such as प्लास्टिक भंडार containers ( tupperware or समान ) or ammunition बाक्स can also contain items for trading, usually toys or trinkets of little value.
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, and waymarking.
Boogie Down Productions was a hip hop group कि थी originally रचित of krs-one, D-Nice, and DJ Scott La Rock.
DJ Scott La Rock was murdered on August 27, 1987, महीने बाद the रिलीज of bdp 's debut album, Criminal Minded.
The name of the group, Boogie Down, गर्भाशयी इससे a उपनाम लिये the दक्षिण Bronx section of The Bronx, one of the five boroughs of New York City.
The group pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae and hip hop music and their debut LP Criminal Minded contained frank descriptions of life in the South Bronx of the late 1980s thus setting the स्टेज लिये कया होता आखिरकार become gangsta rap.
A municipal bond is a bond issued by a local government, or उनके एजेंसियों.
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states, cities, counties, redevelopment agencies, special-purpose districts, school districts, public utility districts, publicly owned airports and seaports, और कोई अन्य सरकारी entity ( or group of governments ) at or below the state level.
नगरपालिका bonds may be सामान्य obligations of the issuer or secured by specified revenues.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, ब्याज आय प्राप्त by धारकों of नगरपालिका bonds is often exempt from the federal income tax and from the income tax of the state in which they are issued, although municipal bonds issued for certain purposes may not be tax exempt.
Unlike new issue stocks that are brought to market with price restrictions until the deal is sold, municipal bonds are free to trade at any time once वे हैं खरीदा by the investor.
Professional traders regularly trade और retrade the वही bonds अनेक टाइम्स a week.
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a song written by Steve winwood, स्पेंसर डेविस और muff winwood, और originally performed by The Spencer Davis Group.
The basic riff of the song was उधार इससे the होमर बैंको सोंग `` ( Ai n't That ) A Lot of Love '', written by Banks and Willie Dean `` Deanie '' Parker.
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' was a uk # 2 in the Autumn of 1966 and a US # 7.
The song is क्रमित # 247 on the रोलिंग Stone magazine 's list of The 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.
The version issued in the UK ( and probably most of Europe ) is different from that issued in the US on the United Artists label, being slower, and lacking the बैकिंग vocals और `` सजीव sounding '' performance found on the US single.
( The US version रै अधिक प्रायः महरूम used on reissue CDs, even those coming from Europe. )

The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an ऑनलाइन डेटाबेस of सूचना related to films, television programs, and video games.
This includes अभिनेताओं, उत्पादन क्रू कर्मियों, और fictional characters featured in these three visual entertainment media.
It is one of the most popular online entertainment गंतव्यों, साथ over 100 लाख अद्वितीय उपयोक्ता प्रत्येक माह and a solid and rapidly growing mobile presence.
IMDb थी शुभारम्भ on अक्तूबर 17, 1990, and in 1998 was acquired by Amazon.com.
As of April 27, 2013, IMDb had 2,503,783 titles ( includes episodes ) and 5,192,493 personalities in इसके डेटाबेस, as खूब as 43 लाख registered users.
The जालस्थल has an Alexa rank of 48.

In computer hardware, a host controller, मेजबान एडाप्टर, or मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( hba ) connects a host system ( the computer ) to other network and storage devices.
The terms are primarily used to refer to devices for connecting scsi, fibre चैनल और esata डिवाइस.
However, devices for connecting to आईडीई, ईथरनेट, firewire, USB and other systems may also be called host adapters.
Recently, the advent of iSCSI and Fibre Channel over ईथरनेट रै brought परिचय ईथरनेट hbas, जिससे are different from Ethernet NICs in that they include TCP Offload Engines.
There are also converged HBAs that support both Ethernet and Fibre Channel called Converged Network adapters ( CNAs ).
cashmere Scarves
आधुनिक men 's cashmere sweaters for sale.
Cashmere wool, usually simply known as cashmere, is a रेशा प्राप्त इससे cashmere बकरियों और अन्य प्रकार of goat.
The शब्द cashmere गर्भाशयी from an old spelling of Kashmir.
Cashmere is ठीक in बनावट, दमदार, light, and soft.
garments बना इससे it provide excellent insulation.
In the United States, under the U.S. Wool Products labeling अधिनियम of 1939, as amended, ( 15 Uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), states that a wool or textile product may not be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such wool product is the fine ( dehaired ) undercoat fibers उत्पादित by a cashmere बकरी ( capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the fiber of ऐसे wool product does not exceed 19 microns ; and
such wool उत्पाद करता नहीं contain more than 3 percent ( by weight ) of cashmere fibers with average diameters that exceed 30 microns.
The average fiber diameter may be subject to a गुणांक of विभिन्नता around the mean that shall not exceed 24 percent.
Jennifer Convertibles Inc. is the owner and licensor of sofabed and leather specialty खुदरा स्टोर्स in the संयुक्त राज्य, साथ स्टोर्स स्तिथ throughout the Eastern seaboard, in the Midwest, on the West Coast and in the Southwest.
The company was founded in 1975 और is आधारित in Woodbury, New York.

Egg roll is a पद प्रयुक्त लिये अनेक अलग foods around the world.
2__Egg_roll __ Varieties of egg rolls are मिला in मेनलैंड चीन, अनेक chinese-speaking regions of Asia, and Chinese immigrant communities around the world.
Egg rolls as referred to in चीन.
In Guangdong and Hong काँग, अंडा फेंकें usually refers to biscuit roll.
This is a type of बिस्किट.
the संघटक included egg, flour and sugar.
Egg roll also is a dish in Canton and Hong Kong, this is usually बना साथ सब्ज़ी.
Within China egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast and are not as commonly खपत in the north and western parts of China.
In American Chinese cuisine, an अंडा फेंकें is a savory dish typically served as an appetizer.
It is usually stuffed with chicken, pork or shrimp, cabbage, carrots, tomatoes, सेम sprouts और अन्य vegetables, and then deep fried.
This variety of the egg roll is very common and popular, across even regional किस्में of अमरीकी चाइनीज खाना, और is प्रायः शामिल as part of a `` combination platter ''.
In Montreal, Canada, open-ended eggrolls हैं a jewish-chinese fusion dish.
They can be either कोषेर certified or merely kosher style.
Pain and suffering is the legal term for the physical and emotional stress caused from an injury ( see also पीड़ा और कष्ट ).
Some damages that might be under this category would be : aches, अस्थाई and permanent limitations on activity, potential shortening of life, depression or scarring.
When filing a lawsuit as a result of an injury, it is common for someone to seek money both in compensation for actual money कि is खोया और लिये the पीड़ा and stress associated with virtually any injury.
In a suit, pain and suffering is part of the `` general damages '' section of the claimant 's claim, or, alternatively, it is an element of `` compensatory '' non-economic क्षतिपूर्ति कि allows रिकवरी लिये the दिमागी anguish and/or शारीरिक पीड़ा endured by the claimant as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks redress.
Apart from money damages awarded in trial, money damages are also given informally outside the judicial system in mediations, मध्यस्थता ( दोनो of जिससे may be अदालत annexed or गैर litigated दावा ) as खूब as in दिनचर्या बीमे settlements.
Individual claimants or those represented by वकील प्रायः उपस्थित मांगे to insurers to settle for money.
These demand for bodily चोट मुआवजे monies प्रायः set out damages that are similarly used in the court litigated pleadings.
Demands are usually written summaries of a claimant 's चिकित्सा परवाह और the facts which resulted in the injury.
Sample of a medallion हस्ताक्षर guarantee stampIn
the United States and Canada, a medallion signature guarantee is a खास हस्ताक्षर गारंटी लिये the transfer of securities.
It is a guarantee by the transferring financial institution that the हस्ताक्षर is वास्तविक और the वित्तीय institution accepts liability for any forgery.
Signature guarantees protect शेयरधारकों by preventing unauthorized transfers and possible investor losses.
They also limit the liability of the ट्रांसफ़र agent who accepts the certificates.
अलग संस्थानों have different policies as to what type of identification they require to provide the guarantee and whether they charge a fee for such service ( usually nominal if any ).
Most institutions will not guarantee a signature of किसी जो रै नहीं already महरूम their customer.
A medallion signature guarantee is not the same as an acknowledgment by a notary public, in the sense that a `` signature guarantee '' is a certification by the institution that the signature is authentic, और an acknowledgment is a प्रमाणन by a नोटरी पब्लिक attesting कि the signer हस्ताक्षरित a document voluntarily.
Some banks may no longer provide this service, however, many still do as well as अन्य वित्तीय संस्थानों such as a Savings and Loans and Credit Unions.
At their sole discretion, ये संस्थानों may still decline to provide the Medallion Signature Guarantees.
When US citizens are विदेश, कुछ वित्तीय संस्थानों may accept संयुक्त राज्य दूतावास Seals, in place of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp.
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars stacked at a junkyard on टर्मिनल द्वीप, लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, March 1956
The General Motors स्ट्रीटकार षड्यंत्र ( भी known as the Great American streetcar scandal ) refers to allegations and convictions in relation to a program by General Motors ( GM ) and other companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train systems in many American cities.
Between 1936 and 1950, National City Lines and Pacific City Lines —with investment from GM, Firestone Tire, Standard Oil of California, Phillips Petroleum, Mack Trucks, and the Federal Engineering Corporation—bought over 100 इलेक्ट्रिक surface-traction प्रणालियों in 45 शहरों सहित बाल्टीमोर, Newark, Los Angeles, New York City, Oakland and San Diego and converted them into bus operation.
Several of the companies involved were convicted in 1949 of षड्यंत्र to monopolize अंतरराज्यीय commerce but were acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these companies.
Some suggest that this program played a key role in the decline of public transit in cities across the United States ; notably Edwin J. Quinby, who first drew attention to the कार्यक्रम in 1946, और तब ब्रैडफोर्ड C. snell, an anti-trust attorney लिये the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट जिनकी विवादास्पद 1974 testimony to a Senate inquiry brought the issue to national awareness.
Both Quinby and Snell argued that the deliberate destruction of streetcars was part of a larger strategy to push the United States into automobile dependency.
Others say that independent economic factors brought about changes in the transit system, including the Great Depression, the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935, labor unrest, market forces, rapidly increasing ट्रैफ़िक जमघट, शहरी sprawl, कराधान नीतियों कि favored निजी गाडी स्वामित्व, and general enthusiasm for the automobile.
One writer on the subject has suggested that snell और अन्य गिरी into simplistic षड्यंत्र theory thinking, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly, GM waged a war on electric traction.
It थी बेशक an सब आउट उत्पीड़न, but by no means the single reason for the failure of rapid transit.
Also, it is just as clear that actions and inactions by government contributed significantly to the elimination of electric traction. ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving effective rail-based urban transport प्रणालियों आधारित on streetcars or trams, सहित न्यूर्क, फिलाडेल्फिया, सैन फ्रांसिस्को, Pittsburgh, and Boston ; others are re-introducing them.
The story has been explored several times in छपाई, फिल्मी और अन्य मीडिया, notably in Who Framed Roger Rabbit, Taken for a Ride and The End of Suburbia.
Corwin House, Salem, मैसाचुसेट्स, निर्मित ca. 1660, First Period English
American colonial architecture includes several building design styles associated with the colonial period of the संयुक्त राज्य, including First Period English ( late-medieval ), French Colonial, Spanish Colonial, Dutch Colonial and Georgian.
These styles are associated with the houses, churches and सरकारी इमारतें of the period from about 1600 through the 19th century.
`` in the मनोदशा '' is a big band era # 1 hit recorded by American bandleader Glenn Miller.
It topped the चार्ट in 1940 in the U.S. and one year later was featured in the movie Sun Valley Serenade.
In 1999, National Public Radio ( NPR ) included the 1939 Glenn Miller रिकॉर्डिंग on आरसीए bluebird on the npr 100, the सूची of `` the 100 most important American musical works of the 20th century ''.

The NEPTUNE Canada प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s first regional-scale underwater ocean observatory that plugs directly into the Internet.
Since December 2009, it has allowed people to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists run deep-water experiments from labs and विश्वविद्यालयों around the world.
Along with its sister project, VENUS, NEPTUNE offers a unique दृष्टिकोण to ocean science.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry out their research, जबकि the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट उपयोग a remotely operated crawler.
A gramophone record, commonly known as a phonograph record ( in American English ), vinyl record ( in reference to विनाइल, the सामग्री सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त बाद परिचय 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a रिकार्ड '', is an analog sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed, modulated spiral groove.
The groove usually starts near the periphery and ends near the center of the disc.
Phonograph records are generally वर्णित by उनके व्यास in इंच ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, इत्यादि. ), the rotational speed at which they are played ( `` 33 rpm ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', etc. ), their time capacity ( `` long playing '' ), their reproductive accuracy, or `` fidelity `` ( `` high fidelity '', `` Orthophonic '', `` full-range '', etc. ), and the number of channels of audio provided ( `` mono ``, `` stereo ``, `` quadraphonic ``, etc. ).
Phonograph records were the primary medium used लिये म्यूज़िक जनन for most of the 20th century, replacing the phonograph cylinder, with which it had co-existed, by the 1920s.
By the late 1980s, डिजिटल मीडिया था gained a larger market share, and the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991.
They continue to be manufactured और बेची in the 21st century.
In 2008, nearly 2.9 million units shipped, the most in any year since 1998 और the format has continued to slowly regain popularity.
They are especially used by DJs और audiophiles लिये अनेक प्रकार of music.
As of 2013, विनाइल रिकॉर्ड continue to be used for distribution.

The Konza tallgrass prairie in the Flint Hills of northeastern कान्सास.
