An Inner Mongolian grassland in the People 's गणतंत्र of चीन
Grasslands are areas where the vegetation is वर्चस्व by grasses ( पोएसी ), however sedge ( Cyperaceae ) and rush ( Juncaceae ) families can also be found.
Grasslands occur naturally on all continents except अंटार्कटिक.
In temperate latitudes, such as northwestern Europe and the Great Plains and California in North America, native grasslands are dominated by perennial bunch grass species, whereas in warmer climates annual प्रजाति form a greater component of the vegetation.
Grasslands are found in most ecoregions of the धरती.
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the temperate grasslands, savannas, and shrublands बायोम ( ' ecosystem ' ), जिससे is one of eight terrestrial ecozones of the Earth 's surface.
Henna ( Lawsonia inermis, also called हिना पेड़ ) or हिना is a flowering plant, the sole species in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae.
The English name `` henna '' comes from the Arabic ( ALA-LC : ḥinnāʾ / सुनाया ) or colloquially, loosely pronounced.
The name is also used for डाई preparations निकला इससे the संयंत्र, and for the art of temporary tattooing based on those dyes.
Henna has been used since antiquity to dye skin, hair, and fingernails, as खूब as fabrics सहित रेशा, wool and leather.
additionally, the name is misused for other skin and hair dyes, such as black henna or neutral henna, which are not derived from the plant.
A thin film is a layer of material ranging from fractions of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in thickness.
Electronic semiconductor डिवाइस और optical coatings are the main applications benefiting from thin-film construction.
A familiar अनुप्रयोग of पतला films is the household mirror, which typically has a thin metal coating on the back of a sheet of glass to form a reflective interface.
The process of silvering was once commonly प्रयुक्त to produce mirrors.
A very-thin-film coating ( less than a nanometer मोटा ) is प्रयुक्त to produce two-way mirrors.
The performance of optical coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or AR, coatings ) are typically enhanced when the thin-film coating consists of अनेक परतों having varying thicknesses and refractive indices.
Similarly, a periodic structure of alternating thin films of different materials may collectively form a so-called superlattice which exploits the phenomenon of क्वांटम कारावास by restricting इलेक्ट्रॉनिक phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is being done साथ ferromagnetic and ferroelectric thin films for use as computer memory.
It is also being लागू to pharmaceuticals, via thin-film drug delivery.
Thin-films are used to produce thin-film बैटरी.
Thin films are भी प्रयुक्त in dye-sensitized solar cells.
सिरेमिक पतला films are in wide use.
The relatively high hardness and inertness of ceramic materials make this type of पतला कोटिंग of interest for protection of substrate materials against corrosion, oxidation and wear.
In particular, the उपयोग of ऐसे coatings on cutting tools can extend the life of these items by several orders of magnitude.
Research is being done on a new class of thin-film inorganic ऑक्साइड सामग्री, पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent oxides, which could be used to make transparent transistors that are inexpensive, stable, and environmentally benign.
Gears of War is a military science fiction third-person shooter video game developed by एपिक खेल और प्रकाशित by microsoft Game Studios.
It was initially released as an exclusive title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in North America, Australia, and most of यूरोपीय और शामिल a `` सीमित कलेक्टर 's संस्करण '' with added content and an art book titled Destroyed Beauty that detailed much of the game 's back-story.
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity, a Microsoft Windows version of the game was developed in conjunction with People Can Fly and released a year later, featuring new content including additional campaign स्तर, a नई एकाधिक खेल विधि, और खेल लिये Windows Live functionality.
The game focuses on the troops of Delta Squad as they wield a desperate, last-ditch attempt to सहेजें the बाकी इंसान निवासियों of the fictional planet Sera from a relentless and seemingly unstoppable subterranean enemy known as the Locust Horde.
The player assumes the role of Marcus Fenix ( but can also खेल as डोमिनिक सैंटियागो ), a पूर्व कैदी and war-hardened soldier.
The game is based on the use of cover and strategic fire for the player to advance through the scenarios ; a second player can play cooperatively through the main campaign to assist.
The खेल भी features several online multiplayer game modes for up to eight players.
Gears of War sold over तीन लाख नक़ल in बस टेन सप्ताह और थी the fastest-selling video game of 2005 as well as the second-most played game over Xbox Live during.
It currently stands as the 5th best selling Xbox 360 game of सब समय.
The game has since sold over पाँच million copies by September 2008.
The game was well received by critics, who praised its gameplay and detailed visuals, and it won अनेक `` खेल of the साल '' पुरस्कार in 2006.
The success of the game has led to the development of the Gears of War franchise, including the 2008 sequel गियर्स of युद्ध 2 और इसके follow-up, गियर्स of युद्ध 3, जिससे थी released on सितंबर 20, 2011, बाद having initially been set to have been released on April 5, 2011, the date upon which Epic Games ' Cliff Bleszinski was a guest on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon.
Adaptations to books, कॉमिक्स, as well as a feature film are to be expected.
A Tree Grows in Brooklyn is a 1943 novel लिखा by बेट्टी स्मिथ.
The story focuses on an Irish-American family in williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York City.
The अनोखा is नियत in the पहला और दूसरी decades of the 20th century.
the किताब was an immense success.
The main metaphor of the book is the hardy Tree of Heaven, native to China and Taiwan, now माना हृदयरोग, और आम in the vacant lots of New York City.
World map with the intertropical मण्डल highlighted in red.
Tropical climate zones of the Earth where all twelve months have mean temperatures ऊपर 18 °c ( 64 °f ).
The tropics is a प्रदेश of the Earth surrounding the Equator.
It is limited in latitude by the Tropic of Cancer in the northern hemisphere at approximately N and the Tropic of Capricorn in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध at s ; ये latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth.
the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध हैं भी referred to as the tropical zone and the torrid zone ( see geographical zone ).
The tropics include all the areas on the धरती जहाँ the सूर्य reaches a point directly overhead at least once during the solar year.
The tropics are विशिष्ट इससे the अन्य climatic और biomatic regions of Earth, the middle latitudes and the polar regions on either side of the equatorial zone.
For the INXS song, see What You need ( सोंग ).
`` What You Need '' is an episode of the American television anthology श्रेणी the गोधूलि Zone.
It is based on the short story of the same नाम by लुईस padgett ( Henry Kuttner and C. L. Moore ).
PlayhouseSquare, in the Cleveland Theater District in downtown Cleveland, Ohio, is the second-largest थिएटर जटिल in the संयुक्त राज्य, second only to New York City 's Lincoln Center ).
Constructed in a span of 19 months in the जल्दी 1920s, the थिएटर यहूद subsequently closed down, but were revived through a grassroots effort.
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a new era of downtown पुनरोद्धार in क्लीवलैंड, और थी पुकारा `` एक of the top ten successes in Cleveland history. ''
The driver and passenger front airbags, बाद having महरूम तैनात, in a British Peugeot 306 car.
An airbag is a vehicle सुरक्षा यंत्र.
It is an occupant restraint system consisting of a flexible fabric लिफाफा or cushion designed to inflate rapidly during an automobile collision.
Its purpose is to cushion occupants during a crash and provide protection to their bodies when वे स्ट्राइक आंतरिक वस्तुएँ ऐसे as the परिचालन व्हील or a खिड़की.
Modern vehicles may contain multiple airbag modules in various side and frontal locations of the passenger seating positions, and sensors may तैनात एक or अधिक airbags in an प्रभाव मण्डल at परिवर्तनीय दरों आधारित on the प्रकार, angle and severity of impact ; the airbag is designed to only inflate in moderate to severe frontal crashes.
Airbags are normally designed with the intention of supplementing the सुरक्षा of an occupant जो is correctly restrained with a seatbelt.
सबसे डिजाइन हैं inflated through pyrotechnic means and can only be operated once.
Newer side-impact airbag modules consist of संपीडित एयर सिलेंडर that are triggered in the event of a side impact vehicle impact.
The first commercial designs were introduced in यात्री ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान the 1970s with limited success.
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in अनेक बाज़ार दौरान the लेट 1980s और early 1990s with a driver airbag, and a front passenger airbag as well on some cars ; and many modern vehicles now include four or more units.
IRS tax forms are used for taxpayers and tax-exempt organizations to report financial information to the आतंरिक आय सेवा ( IRS ) of the United States.
They are used to report income, गणना कर to be सशुल्क to the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त States, and disclose other information as required by the Internal Revenue Code ( IRC ).
वहीँ हैं over 800 various forms and schedules.
The best-known of these is Form 1040 प्रयुक्त by individuals.
In the United States, driver 's licenses are issued by each व्यक्तिगत राज्य ( सहित वॉशिंगटन, D.C. and territories ), rather than the federal government because of the political concept of federalism.
Drivers are normally required to obtain a license from their state of residence and all states recognize each other 's licenses for अस्थाई विज़िटर विषय to सामान्य age requirements.
A state may भी बर्खास्तगी an individual 's driving privilege within its borders for traffic violations.
Many states share a common system of license वर्ग, साथ कुछ अपवाद, और वाणिज्यिक license classes are standardized by federal regulation at 49 CFR part 383.
चीन रै महरूम the सोर्स of अनेक आविष्कारों, सहित the Four Great Inventions : papermaking, the compass, gunpowder, and printing ( both woodblock and movable type ).
The list below contains ये और other inventions.
The Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics, hydraulics, और गणित लागू to horology, metallurgy, खगोलशास्त्र, कृषि, अभियान्त्रिकी, music theory, craftsmanship, nautics, and warfare.
By the Warring States Period ( 403–221 BC ), they had advanced metallurgic technology, including the blast furnace और cupola भट्टी, जबकि the finery forge और puddling प्रक्रम यहूद ज्ञात by the हान Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ).
A sophisticated economic system in China gave birth to inventions ऐसे as पेपर धन दौरान the सोंग राजवंश ( 960–1279 ).
The invention of gunpowder by the 10th century led to an array of आविष्कारों ऐसे as the आग तलवार, जमीन मेरा, नवल mine, hand cannon, exploding cannonballs, multistage rocket, and rocket bombs with aerodynamic wings and explosive payloads.
With the navigational aid of the 11th-century compass and ability to steer at high sea with the 1st-century sternpost rudder, premodern चाइनीज sailors sailed as दूर as ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी and Egypt.
In water-powered clockworks, the premodern चाइनीज था प्रयुक्त the escapement यांत्रिकी since the 8th century and the endless power-transmitting chain drive in the 11th century.
They also made large mechanical puppet theaters driven by waterwheels and carriage wheels and wine-serving automatons चलित by चप्पू व्हील boats.
The contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan cultures represent the oldest Neolithic cultures of चीन और यहूद formed around 7000 BC.
Some of the first inventions of Neolithic, prehistoric China include semilunar and rectangular stone knives, stone hoes and spades, the cultivation of millet, rice and the soybean, the refinement of sericulture, the भवन of rammed धरती structures साथ लाइम -plastered हाउस floors, the सृष्टि of the कुम्हार 's व्हील, the सृष्टि of pottery साथ cord-mat-basket designs, the creation of pottery tripods and pottery steamers, and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination.
Francesca Bray argues that the domestication of the ox and buffalo during the Longshan culture ( c. 3000–c. 2000 BC ) period, the absence of Longshan-era irrigation or high-yield crops, full evidence of Longshan cultivation of dry-land cereal crops which gave high yields `` only when the soil was carefully cultivated, '' suggest that the plow was known at least by the Longshan culture period and explains the high agricultural production yields which allowed the rise of Chinese civilization during the Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c. 1050 BC ).
With later inventions such as the multiple-tube बीज ड्रिल और भारी moldboard iron plow, China 's agricultural output could sustain a much larger population.
For the purposes of इस सूची, आविष्कारों हैं regarded as technological firsts विकसित in China, and as such does not include foreign technologies which the Chinese acquired through contact, such as the windmill from the Middle East or the telescope from Early modern Europe.
It also does not include technologies developed elsewhere and later invented separately by the Chinese, such as the odometer and chain pump.
Scientific, mathematic or natural discoveries, changes in minor concepts of design or style and कलाकारी नवप्रवर्तनों can नहीं be regarded as आविष्कारों and do not appear on the list.
सकल घरेलू product in 2011 US dollars per capita, adjusted for inflation and purchasing power parity ( log scale ) from 1860 to 2011, with population ( disk area ) for the US ( yellow ), UK ( orange ), Japan ( red ), China ( red ), and India ( blue ).
वैश्वीकरण ( or globalisation—see स्पेलिंग differences ) is the process of international integration arising from the interchange of world views, products, ideas, and other aspects of culture.
Put in simple terms, globalization refers to processes कि प्रचार world-wide exchanges of national and cultural resources.
Advances in transportation and telecommunications infrastructure, including the rise of the Internet, are प्रमुख कारकों in वैश्वीकरण, generating further interdependence of economic and cultural activities.
Though several scholars place the origins of globalization in modern times, others trace its history long पहले the यूरोपीय आयु of डिस्कवरी और voyages to the नई संसार.
Some even trace the origins to the third मिलेनियम BCE.
Since the beginning of the 20th century, the pace of globalization has intensified at a रैपिड रेट, विशेषकर दौरान the पोस्ट ठंडा युद्ध era.
The term globalization has been in increasing use since the mid-1980s and especially since the mid-1990s.
In 2000, the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) identified four basic aspects of globalization : trade और ट्रांजेक्शन, पूंजी और निवेश आंदोलनों, माइग्रेशन और गति of people and the dissemination of knowledge.
Further, environmental challenges such as climate change, cross-boundary water and air प्रदूषण, और over-fishing of the ocean are linked with globalization.
Globalizing processes affect and are affected by business and work संगठन, अर्थशास्त्र, socio-cultural resources, and the natural environment.
The Replacements is a 2000 American sports comedy film निर्देशित by हावर्ड deutch.
It सितारों कियानू रीव्स, जीन Hackman, and Brooke Langton.
An American Airlines वायुयान takes off from Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport.
This airport is the एयरलाइन 's largest hub.
American Airlines flies to 79 domestic destinations and 78 international गंतव्यों in 48 देशों.
( as of दिसम्बर 2012 )
The list includes the city, country, the codes of the International Air Transport संघ ( iata विमानक्षेत्र कोड ) and the International Civil Aviation Organization ( ICAO airport code ), and the airport 's name, with the airline 's hubs, focus cities and seasonal destinations marked.
The list also contains destinations no longer परोसा by the एयरलाइन, जिससे हैं चिह्नित as terminated destinations.
It करता नहीं शामिल गंतव्यों परोसा लिये अमरीकी Airlines by its regional affiliates American Eagle Airlines, Executive Airlines, and AmericanConnection.
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a traditional Jamaican mento folk song, the best-known version of which was sung by Harry Belafonte and an alternate version interspersed with another jamaican folksong, हिल और गुल्ली सवार, by Dame Shirley Bassey.
Despite the song 's mento प्रभाव, `` day-o ( the Banana Boat Song ) '' is widely known as an example of calypso music.
it is a work song, from the point of view of dock workers working the night shift loading bananas onto ships.
Daylight has come, the shift is over and they want उनके कार्य to be counted up so that they can go home.
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, और the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, इटली did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : इटली, जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants यहूद मारे, largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the ग्रेट शक्तियां of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers यहूद at युद्ध और, via उनके colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 जुलाई, the austro-hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the russians mobilised, the germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम and Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on पेरिस थी brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 और Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's सरकारी collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western सामने, the allies drove वापस the germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
जर्मनी, जिससे था its own trouble with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and उस्मानी empires—ceased to मौजूद.
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory, while the latter दो यहूद dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe थी redrawn into अनेक smaller states.
The League of Nations was formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
Nurse Jackie is an American series that premiered on June 8, 2009, on showtime, Movie Central and The Movie Network.
The series stars Edie Falco as the शीर्षक अक्षर जैकी Peyton, an emergency department nurse at All Saints ' Hospital in New York City.
For Jackie, `` Every day is a high wire act of juggling patients, डॉक्टर, fellow नर्स और उसके अपना indiscretions. ''
Keeping Up with the Kardashians ( often referred to simply as The Kardashians ) is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on October 14, 2007, on E !.
It follows the lives of the Kardashian/Jenner family, including sisters कोर्टनी, किम, और khloé Kardashian.
The series ' success has led to the spin-offs Kourtney and Kim Take New York, Khloé & Lamar, कोर्टनी और Khloé Take Miami, and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami.
Afghanistan ( ; ; ), officially the Islamic Republic of अफगानिस्तान, is a landlocked sovereign राज्य forming भाग of South Asia, Central Asia, and to some extent Western Asia.
It रै a जनसांख्यिकी of around 30 million inhabiting an area of approximately, making it the 42nd most populous and 41st largest nation in the world.
It is bordered by Pakistan in the दक्षिण और the ईस्ट, इरान in the वेस्ट, तुर्कमेनिस्तान, Uzbekistan and Tajikistan in the north, and China in the far northeast.
Afghanistan has been an ancient फोकल पाइंट of the Silk Road and human migration.
Archaeologists have found evidence of human habitation from as far back as the Middle Paleolithic.
Urban civilization may have begun in the क्षेत्रफल as early as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE.
Sitting at an important geostrategic location that connects the Middle East culture with Central Asia and the Indian subcontinent, the land has been home to various peoples through the ages and witnessed many military campaigns, notably by सिकंदर the ग्रेट, चंगेज़ खान, and in modern era Western forces.
The land also served as a सोर्स इससे जिससे the greco-bactrians, Kushans, Hephthalites, Saffarids, Ghaznavids, Ghorids, Khiljis, Timurids, Mughals, Durranis, and others have risen to form major empires.
The राजनैतिक इतिहास of the आधुनिक state of Afghanistan begins in 1709, when the Hotaki dynasty was established in Kandahar followed by Ahmad Shah Durrani 's rise to power in 1747.
In the late 19th सदी, अफगानिस्तान became a बफ़र state in the `` Great Game `` between the British and Russian empires.
following the 1919 anglo-afghan युद्ध, किंग अमानुल्ला began a European style modernization of the country but was stopped by the ultra-conservatives.
During the Cold War, after the withdrawal of the British from neighboring India in 1947, the United States and the Soviet Union began spreading influences in Afghanistan, which led to a खूनी युद्ध between the us-backed मुजाहिदीन शक्तियां और the soviet-backed अफगान government in which over a million Afghans lost their lives.
This was followed by the 1990s civil war, the वृद्धि और पतन of the extremist Taliban government and the 2001–present war.
In December 2001, the United Nations Security Council authorized the creation of the International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) to help maintain सुरक्षा in अफगानिस्तान और assist the करज़ई प्रशासन.
Three decades of war बना अफगानिस्तान one of the world 's most dangerous countries, including the largest producer of refugees and asylum seekers.
While the international community is rebuilding war-torn Afghanistan, terrorist groups such as the Haqqani Network and Hezbi Islami are actively involved in a देशभर Taliban -led insurgency, which includes hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks.
According to the United Nations, the insurgents were responsible for 80 % of civilian casualties in 2011 and 2012.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers did not intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, republicans, led by अब्राहम Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President जेम्स बुकानन and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन would not initiate civil war.
आठ बाकी स्लेव states continued to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a सुलह, and both sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, when Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
lincoln जारी the emancipation Proclamation, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the मिसिसिपी River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was एक of the earliest सच्चा industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation and food आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian हताहत.
Historian John huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Cost of goods sold ( COGS ) refer to the inventory costs of those goods a कारोबार रै बेची दौरान a particular period.
Costs are associated with particular goods using one of several formulas, including specific identification, first-in first-out ( fifo ), or औसत cost.
Costs include all costs of purchase, costs of परिवर्तन और अन्य costs incurred in bringing the inventories to their present location and condition.
Costs of goods made by the business शामिल सामग्री, labor, and allocated overhead.
The costs of those goods नहीं yet बेची हैं deferred as costs of inventory until the inventory is sold or written down in value.

A confectionery store ( more commonly referred to as a sweet shop in the United Kingdom, a candy store in the North America, or a lolly shop in Australia ) sells confectionery और is प्रायः targeted to children.
Most confectionery stores are भर साथ an assortment of मिठाई दूर larger than a grocer or convenience store could accommodate.
They often offer a selection of old fashioned ट्रीट, और मिठाई इससे different countries.
Very often unchanged in layout since their inception, confectioneries are ज्ञात लिये उनके वार्मिंग and nostalgic feel.
The village of pateley सेतु claims to have the oldest confectionery store in England.
the oldest मीठी दूकान in England, in the village of Pateley Bridge
Oklahoma ( ) ( pawnee : uukuhuúwa, cay : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state located in West South Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive और the 28th सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
The state 's name is derived from the choctaw शब्द okla और humma, meaning `` red people '', and it is known informally by its nickname, The Sooner State.
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory on November 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th राज्य to डालें the संघ.
इसके निवासियों हैं ज्ञात as Oklahomans or, informally `` Okies '', and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma City.
A major producer of natural गैस, आयल, और कृषि, Oklahoma relies on an economic base of aviation, energy, telecommunications, and biotechnology.
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the nation, रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita income growth and gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living within their महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रों.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, और पूर्वी वनों, सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट Plains and the U.S. Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a व्यापकता of अंग्रेज़ी, जर्मनी, Scottish, Irish and Native American ancestry, more than 25 Native American languages are spoken in Oklahoma, second only to California.
Oklahoma is स्तिथ on a संगम of three major American cultural regions and historically served as a route for cattle drives, a destination for southern settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.

A tire ( or tyre ) is a ring-shaped covering कि fits around a व्हील 's rim to protect it and enable better vehicle performance.
Most tires, such as those for automobiles and bicycles, provide traction between the गाडी और the सड़क जबकि providing a लचीली cushion that absorbs shock.
The materials of modern pneumatic tires are synthetic rubber, natural rubber, fabric and wire, साथ साथ कार्बन ब्लैक और अन्य chemical compounds.
वे consist of a tread and a body.
The tread provides traction while the देह provides containment लिये a quantity of compressed air.
Before rubber was developed, the first versions of tires were simply bands of metal that fitted around लकड़ी पहियों to prevent wear and tear.
Early rubber tires were ठोस ( नहीं न्यूमेटिक ).
Today, the majority of tires are pneumatic inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped body of cords and wires encased in rubber and generally भर साथ compressed air to form an inflatable cushion.
न्यूमेटिक टायर हैं प्रयुक्त on अनेक types of vehicles, including cars, bicycles, motorcycles, trucks, earthmovers, and aircraft.
Metal tires are still used on locomotives and railcars, and solid rubber ( or other polymer ) tires are still प्रयुक्त in विभिन्न non-automotive अनुप्रयोग, ऐसे as कुछ casters, carts, lawnmowers, and wheelbarrows.
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11, 1741 – June 17, 1775 ) was an American doctor who played a leading role in American Patriot organizations in Boston in early days of the American क्रान्ति, आखिरकार सेवारत as अध्यक्ष of the क्रांतिकारी मैसाचुसेट्स Provincial Congress.
Warren enlisted Paul Revere and विलियम dawes on अप्रैल 18, 1775, to leave Boston and spread the alarm that the British garrison in Boston was setting out to raid the town of Concord and arrest rebel leaders John Hancock and Samuel Adams.
Warren participated in the next day 's Battles of lexington और concord, जिससे हैं commonly माना to be the opening engagements of the American Revolutionary War.
Warren had been commissioned a Major सामान्य in the उपनिवेश 's militia shortly before the June 17, 1775 Battle of Bunker Hill.
Rather than exercising his rank, Warren served in the battle as a private soldier, and was मारे in कॉम्बैट जब अंग्रेजों सैनिकों stormed the redoubt atop Breed 's Hill.
His death, immortalized in John Trumbull 's painting, The Death of General Warren at the Battle of Bunker 's Hill, June 17, 1775, galvanized the rebel forces, और he has been memorialized in many place names in the United States.

an सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर is an सशुल्क सामग्री साथ semiconductor properties, that is, with an electrical conductivity between that of insulators and that of metals.
सिंगल अणुओं, छोटी कड़ी ( oligomers ) and organic polymers can be semiconductive.
Semiconducting small molecules ( खुशबूदार hydrocarbons ) शामिल the polycyclic aromatic compounds pentacene, anthracene, and rubrene.
polymeric सशुल्क semiconductors include poly ( 3-hexylthiophene ), poly ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as well as polyacetylene and its derivatives.
There are two major overlapping classes of organic semiconductors.
These are organic charge-transfer complexes and various linear-backbone conductive polymers derived from polyacetylene.
Linear backbone organic semiconductors include polyacetylene itself और इसके डेरिवेटिव polypyrrole, and polyaniline.
At least locally, charge-transfer complexes often exhibit similar conduction mechanisms to inorganic semiconductors.
Such mechanisms arise from the presence of hole and electron conduction layers अलग by a बैंड gap.
While such classic mechanisms are important locally, as with inorganic amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, स्थानीयकृत राज्य, गतिशीलता gaps, and phonon -assisted hopping also significantly contribute to conduction, particularly in polyacetylenes.
Like inorganic semiconductors, organic semiconductors can be doped.
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping such as polyaniline ( Ormecon ) and are also known as organic metals.
Typical वर्तमान वाहक in सशुल्क semiconductors are holes and electrons in π-bonds.
Almost all organic solids हैं insulators.
But when their constituent molecules have π-conjugate प्रणालियों, electrons can move via π-electron cloud overlaps, especially by hopping, tunnelling and related mechanisms.
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons और phthalocyanine salt crystals are examples of this type of organic semiconductor.
Mainly due to low mobility, even unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer देवालय.
Such unpaired electrons can फलन as current carriers.
This type of semiconductor is also obtained by pairing an इलेक्ट्रॉन दाता अणु with an electron acceptor molecule.
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the मादा urethra दौरान or पहले an orgasm.
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these are considered to be अलग phenomena in कुछ शोध publications.
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among medical professionals, which is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the अस्तित्व of the G-Spot.
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is an international association football competition contested by the senior women 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ), the खेल 's global governing body.
The championship has महरूम awarded प्रत्येक चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural tournament in 1991.
जापानी won the 2011 tournament in a penalty shootout.
The current format of the tournament involves 16 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a period of about three weeks ; – this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the preceding three years, is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the most important International competition in women 's football and is played amongst women 's national फ़ुटबॉल टीमों of the member states of FIFA, the sport 's global governing body.
The पहला महिलाओं 's संसार कप टूर्नामेंट, नामित the महिलाओं 's संसार चैंपियनशिप, was held in 1991, sixty-one years after the men 's first FIFA World Cup tournament in 1930.
The six World कप tournaments have महरूम जीती by चार different national teams.
The next World Cup will be hosted by कनाडा in 2015.
Scorpions is a young adult novel written by Walter Dean Myers, first published in the United States by हार्पर & पंक्ति on June 20, 1988.

'Son of man ' is the अनुवाद of विभिन्न यहूदी and Greek phrases used in both the Hebrew Bible and the New Testament.
It has diverse meanings, ranging from a normal human होने to a prophesied अनन्त, दैवी शासक.
The Hebrew expression `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears एक सौ और seven times in the Hebrew Bible.
This is the most common Hebrew construction for the singular but is प्रयुक्त ज़्यादातर in ezekiel ( 93 टाइम्स ) और 14 टाइम्स elsewhere.
In thirty two cases the phrase appears in intermediate plural form `` बेटे of मेन '', i.e. human beings.
As generally interpreted by Jews, it denotes humankind generally.
In the koine यूनानी of the New Testament, `` the son of man '' is invariably used as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article.
The use of the definite article in `` the son of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is अनोखा, और पहले its use there, no records of its use in any of the surviving Greek documents of antiquity exist.
geza vermes has stated that `` the Son of man '' in the Christian gospels is unrelated to Hebrew Bible usages.
In Christian usage, unlike the Son of God title, which रै महरूम an अनिवार्य तत्व of ईसाई creeds since the Apostolic age, the proclamation of `` Jesus as the Son of man '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity.
The interpretation of the use of `` the Son of man '' in the New वसीयत रै remained चुनौतीपूर्ण और बाद 150 सालो of debate no consensus on the issue has emerged among scholars.
Master of foxhounds लीड the फ़ील्ड इससे powderham Castle in Devon, England, with the hounds in front.
Fox hunting is an activity involving the tracking, chase, and sometimes killing of a fox, traditionally a red fox, by trained foxhounds or other scent hounds, और a समूह of निहत्थे अनुसरणकर्ता led by a निपुण of foxhounds, जो follow the hounds on foot or on horseback.
Fox hunting originated in the form practised until recently in the United Kingdom in the 16th सदी, लकिन is practised सब over the संसार, सहित in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा, फ़्रांस, आयरलैंड, Italy and the United States.
In Australia, the पद भी refers to the hunting of foxes with firearms similar to spotlighting or deer hunting.
In much of the संसार शिकार in सामान्य is समझा to सुनाना to कोई खेल पशु or हथियार ( e.g., हिरण शिकार साथ धनुष और arrow ) ; in Britain and Ireland, `` hunting '' without qualification implies fox hunting ( or other forms of hunting with hounds- beagling, stag hunting, mink hunting, drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here.
The sport is controversial, particularly in the UK, where it was banned in Scotland in 2002, and in England and Wales in नवम्बर 2004 ( विधि enforced इससे फ़रवरी 2005 ), हालांकि शूटिंग foxes as vermin remained legal.
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an important part of rural culture and useful for कारण of संरक्षण and pest control, while opponents argue that it is cruel and unnecessary.

It is now एक of the सबसे अत्यधिक regulated forms of marketing.
Some or all फ़ॉर्म of tobacco advertising are banned in many countries.

Inferno ( Italian for `` Hell `` ) is the पहला भाग of दांते एलीगियरी 's 14th-century epic poem Divine Comedy.
It is followed by purgatorio and Paradiso.
It is an allegory telling of the journey of Dante through नरक, हिदायत by the Roman poet Virgil.
In the poem, Hell is depicted as nine circles of suffering located within the धरती.
Allegorically, the दैवी कॉमेडी represents the यात्रा of the आत्मा towards God, with the Inferno describing the recognition and rejection of sin.
Smirnoff is a brand of वोदका स्वामित्व और produced by the British company Diageo.

in कूच 2006, diageo North America claimed that Smirnoff vodka was the best-selling distilled spirit brand in the world.

It has been adopted by Alcoholics बेनाम और अन्य twelve-step programs.

The courage to बदलें the बाते I can,
और अक्ल to know the difference.
The Declaration and Resolves of the First Continental Congress ( also known as the Declaration of Colonial Rights, or the Declaration of अधिकारों ), थी a बयान अपनाया by the पहला महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on अक्तूबर 14, 1774, in response to the Intolerable Acts passed by the British Parliament.
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the असहनीय अधिनियमों, सूचीबद्ध a औपनिवेशिक विधेयक of अधिकारों, और provided a detailed list of grievances.
It was similar to the Declaration of Rights and Grievances, passed by the स्टैम्प अधिनियम कॉंग्रेस a decade earlier.
The Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress 's plans : to enter into a boycott of British trade ( the Continental Association ) until their grievances were redressed, to publish addresses to the people of Great ब्रिटेन और अंग्रेजों अमेरिका, और to भेजें a याचिका to the King.
Pulse pressure is the दबाव कि is लगा जब feeling the pulse.
Measured in millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), the दबाव अंतर between the systolic और diastolic pressures is the pressure change to create the pulse, which is the pulse pressure.
If resting रक्त दबाव is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), pulse pressure is 40.
The Hills is a reality television series जिससे originally aired on एमटीवी from May 31, 2006 until July 13, 2010.
The show uses a reality television format, following the personal lives of several young adults living in Los Angeles, California, but tends towards a narrative स्वरूप अधिक commonly मिला in scripted जाति ऐसे as soap operas.

In poker, bad beat is a subjective पद लिये a हाथ in जिससे a खिलाड़ी with what appear to be strong cards nevertheless loses.
It most often occurs where one player bets the clearly stronger हाथ and their opponent makes a poor call that eventually `` hits '' and wins.
There is no consensus among poker खिलाड़ी as to कया exactly constitutes a bad beat and often players will disagree about whether a particular hand was a bad beat.
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater मछली in the परिवार Cyprinidae of order Cypriniformes.
it थी एक of the earliest fish to be domesticated, and is one of the most commonly kept aquarium fish.
A relatively small member of the कार्प परिवार ( जिससे भी शामिल the कोई कार्प and the crucian carp ), the goldfish is a domesticated version of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east Asia.
It was first domesticated in China more than a thousand years ago, and अनेक पृथक breeds have चूंकि महरूम विकसित.
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in size, देह shape, fin configuration and coloration ( various combinations of white, yellow, orange, red, brown, and black are known ).
uncooked rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade, singular : roulade ) is a German meat roulade usually consisting of bacon, प्याज, सरसों और अचार लपेटा in thinly sliced beef which is then cooked.
In some countries, the roulade is भी known as `` beef olive ''.
Beef or veal is used as meat though some food scholars tend to believe that the original version was probably venison or पोर्क, और pork is still popular in some areas.
The beef rouladen as we know them today have become लोकप्रिय over the last century.
The cut is usually topside beef or silverside चूंकि इस is the सस्ता cut.
The more महंगी संस्करण होता be the round steak, also known as rump steak.
The meat is काटें into large, thin slices.
the भरना is a मिश्रण of स्मोक्ड और पकाया पोर्क belly, chopped onions and chopped pickles ( gurken ) which is at times varied by adding minced meat, sausage meat, pine nuts and mustard.
The mixture varies इससे region to region.
Rouladen are traditionally परोसा लिये dinner.
Red wine is प्रायः served with this dish.
Typical eukaryotic cell.
Cellular श्वसन is the नियत of the metabolic प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रक्रियाओं कि लो प्लेस in the cells of organisms to convert biochemical energy from nutrients into adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ), and then release waste products.
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic reactions, which break large molecules into smaller ones, releasing उर्जा in the प्रक्रम as कमजोर so-called `` high-energy '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products.
श्वसन is एक of the कुंजी ways a cell gains useful energy to fuel cellular activity.
Cellular श्वसन is माना an exothermic redox reaction.
The overall reaction is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs in the देह, most of which are redox reactions themselves.
Although technically, cellular respiration is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया, it clearly करता नहीं resemble one when it occurs in a living cell.
This difference is because it occurs in many separate steps.
While the overall reaction is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया, no सिंगल reaction that comprises it is a combustion reaction.
Nutrients that are commonly used by animal and plant cells in respiration include sugar, amino acids and fatty acids, and a common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is आणविक ऑक्सीजन ( o2 ).
The energy stored in ATP ( its third phosphate group is weakly bonded to the rest of the molecule and is cheaply broken allowing stronger bonds to form, thereby transferring energy for use by the cell ) can then be used to drive प्रक्रियाओं requiring उर्जा, सहित जैवसंश्लेषण, locomotion or परिवहन of molecules across cell membranes.
Countries by 2011 GDP ( nominal ) according to the सीआईए संसार factbook.
This article includes a list of देशों in the संसार sorted by उनके सकल domestic product ( GDP ), the market value of all final goods and services from a nation in a given year.
The GDP dollar estimates प्रस्तुत here are calculated at market or government official exchange rates.
Several economies which are not considered to be countries ( world, the eu, और कुछ निर्भर territories ) हैं शामिल in the lists because they appear in the sources.
These economies are not ranked in the चार्ट यहाँ, लकिन हैं listed where applicable.
The figures presented here do not take into account differences in the cost of living in different countries, and the परिणाम can vary greatly इससे एक साल to another based on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency.
Such fluctuations may change a country 's ranking from one year to the next, even though they often make छोटी or no अंतर to the standard of living of its population.
Therefore these figures should be प्रयुक्त साथ सावधानी.
Some countries/regions may have नागरिकों जिससे हैं on average wealthy.
These countries/regions could appear in this list as having a small GDP.
इस होता be क्युकी the country/region सूचीबद्ध has a small population, and therefore small total economy ; the GDP is calculated as the population times the wealth per capita.
Comparisons of national wealth are also frequently made on the basis of purchasing power parity ( PPP ), to adjust लिये मतभेद in the लागत of जीना in अलग countries.
( See List of देशों by GDP ( PPP ) )
PPP largely removes the exchange rate problem, but has its own drawbacks ; it does not reflect the मान of आर्थिक आउटपुट in अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार, और it भी requires more estimation than nominal GDP.
On the whole, ppp प्रति capita आंकड़े हैं more narrowly spread than nominal GDP per capita figures.
The first list includes data compiled by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र आंकडे प्रभाग for 2011.
The दूसरी सूची largely includes data ( estimate ) compiled by the International Monetary Fund for 2012.
The third list shows the World Bank 's ज़्यादातर 2011 estimates, और the fourth list includes mostly 2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook.
Lapping is a machining प्रक्रम, in जिससे दो सतहों हैं मला साथ साथ an abrasive between them, by hand movement or by way of a machine.
This can take दो फ़ॉर्म.
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ), typically involves rubbing a brittle material such as glass against a surface such as iron or glass itself ( also known as the `` lap '' or grinding tool ) with an अक्खड़ ऐसे as एल्यूमिनियम ऑक्साइड, जौहरियों 's रूज, optician 's रूज, एमरी, सिलिकॉन कार्बाइड, डायमंड, etc., in between them.
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the अक्खड़ रोल्स परिचय between the two surfaces and removes material from both.
The other form of lapping involves a softer material such as pitch or a ceramic for the गोद, जिससे is `` charged '' with the abrasive.
The lap is then used to cut a harder material—the workpiece.
The abrasive embeds within the softer material which holds it और permits it to स्कोर आरपार and cut the harder material.
Taken to a finer limit, this will produce a polished surface such as with a polishing cloth on an automobile, or a polishing cloth or polishing पिच upon कांच or steel.
Taken to the ultimate limit, with the aid of accurate interferometry और specialized पॉलिशिंग मशीने or skilled hand polishing, lensmakers can produce surfaces that are flat to better than 30 nanometers.
This is one twentieth of the wavelength of light from the commonly used 632.8 nm helium neon laser light source.
Surfaces this flat can be molecularly bonded ( optically contacted ) by bringing उन्हें साथ अंतर्गत the right conditions.
( This is not the same as the wringing प्रभाव of Johansson blocks, although it is similar ).
The term `` अमेरिका 's टोली '' is a लोकप्रिय उपनाम in the United States that refers to the Dallas Cowboys in the National Football League.
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film, where the narrator opens with the following introduction : The term is recognized and often used by media आउटलेट, सहित ईएसपीएन, याहू !, एचबीओ खेल, और खेल illustrated.
My Babysitter 's a Vampire ( फ्रेंच : ma gardienne est un पिशाच ) is a 2011 Canadian television series, based on the television film of the same name.

In the film, he learns he is able to have visions and उसके बेहतरीन dost बेनी वीयर ( Atticus Mitchell ) is a spellmaster.

A pickup truck or pick-up, often simply referred to as a पिकअप, is a लाइट मोटर गाडी साथ an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and फैक्टरी निर्मित, एकीकृत bed, as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों, प्रायः आधारित on a निजी car chassis, but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
Some countries have their own terms similar to पिकअप, ऐसे as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया and New Zealand, or bakkie in South Africa.
Large पिकअप ट्रक हैं somewhat विरल in Europe, where vans and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
The President of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the head of state and सिर of सरकारी of the United States.
The president leads the executive branch of the federal government and is the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य Armed Forces.
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the execution of federal विधि, alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका, राजनयिक, नियामक, and judicial officers, and concluding treaties with foreign powers, with the advice and consent of the Senate.
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves, और to convene और adjourn either or दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस under extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the United States, the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially and each modern president, despite possessing no formal legislative powers beyond signing or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स, is largely जिम्मेदार लिये dictating the विधान कार्यसूची of उसके पार्टी और the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The अध्यक्ष is अक्सर वर्णित as the most powerful person in the world.
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term, and is one of only two nationally elected संघीय अधिकारियों, the अन्य होने the Vice President of the United States.
The Twenty-second Amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone from ever being elected to the प्रेसिडेंसी लिये a third full term.
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than once if that person previously had served as president, or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, लिये more than two years of another person 's term as president.
In all, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year terms.
On January 20, 2009, Barack Obama became the 44th और current president.
On नवम्बर 6, 2012, he थी re-elected and is scheduled to serve until January 20, 2017.
Bottled खनिज जल
Bottled water is drinking water ( e.g., well water, distilled water, Mineral water, or spring water ) packaged in प्लास्टिक or कांच जल बोतलों.
Bottled water may be कार्बोनेटेड or not.
आकार दायरा इससे small single serving bottles to large carboys for water coolers.
मैप of the major rivers, lakes, and reservoirs in India
Map showing rivers और बाढ़ prone areas in India
Rivers of India play an important role in the lives of the भारतीय लोगों.
The river systems provide irrigation, potable जल, सस्ती transportation, electricity, and the livelihoods for a large number of people all over the country and to rural areas.
This easily explains why nearly सब the प्रमुख शहरों of India are located by the banks of rivers.
The rivers भी have an important role in Hindu mythology and are considered holy by all Hindus in the country.
Seven major rivers along with their numerous tributaries मेक up the नदी प्रणाली of इण्डिया.
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the Bay of Bengal ; however, some of the rivers whose courses take them through the western part of the country and towards the east of the राज्य of himachal pradesh empty into the Arabian Sea.
Parts of Ladakh, northern parts of the Aravlli range and the arid parts of the थार मरुस्थल have अंतर्देशीय नाले.
dr.francis बुकानन surveyed the पाठ्यक्रम of the नदियाँ of इण्डिया along with their tributaries and branches in 1810-11 AD and presented a minute account of it.
The shifting of the पाठ्यक्रम और bed over the centuries is very remarkable.
Many of the चैनल्स उल्लेखित in कि सर्वेक्षण have now become dead, dried or even extinct.
All major rivers of India originate from one of the तीन प्रमुख watersheds :
The Himalaya and the काराकोरम ranges
Vindhya और satpura सीमाएँ और Chotanagpur plateau in central India
Sahyadri or Western ghats in पश्चिमी इण्डिया
The Bretton Woods system of monetary management established the rules for commercial and financial relations among the संसार 's major industrial states in the mid-20th century.
The Bretton Woods system was the first example of a fully negotiated monetary order intended to govern monetary relations among स्वतंत्र nation-states.
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World War II was still raging, 730 delegates from all 44 अलाइड राष्ट्र gathered at the माउंट वॉशिंगटन होटल in bretton वुड्स, नई Hampshire, United States, for the United Nations Monetary and Financial Conference.
The delegates deliberated during 1–22 July 1944, और signed the Agreement on its final day.
Setting up a system of rules, institutions, and procedures to regulate the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक प्रणाली, the planners at Bretton Woods established the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development ( IBRD ), which today is part of the World Bank Group.
ये संगठन became operational in 1945 after a sufficient number of countries had ratified the agreement.
The chief features of the Bretton Woods system were an obligation for each country to adopt a monetary policy that maintained the exchange rate by tying its currency to the u.S. डालर और the क्षमता of the imf to सेतु अस्थाई imbalances of payments.
On 15 August 1971, the United States unilaterally terminated convertibility of the US $ to gold.
This brought the bretton वुड्स system to an end and saw the dollar become fiat currency.
This action, referred to as the Nixon shock, created the हालात in which the United States dollar became a reserve currency used by many states.
At the वही समय, अनेक fixed currencies ( such as GBP, for example ), also became free floating.
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian कम्पनी कि डिजाइन और manufactures motorcycles.
headquartered in बोलोग्ना, इटली, डुकाटी is owned by Audi through its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini.
A credit score is a numerical expression based on a statistical analysis of a person 's क्रेडिट फाइलें, to represent the creditworthiness of that person.
A credit score is primarily based on क्रेडिट रपट सूचना typically sourced from credit bureaus.
Lenders, such as banks and credit card companies, use credit scores to evaluate the संभावित रिस्क posed by lending धन to उपभोक्ता and to mitigate losses due to bad debt.
Lenders use credit स्कोर to determine who qualifies for a loan, at what interest rate, and what credit limits.
Lenders also use credit स्कोर to determine जिससे customers are likely to bring in the most revenue.
The use of credit or पहचान स्कोरिंग prior to authorizing अभिगम or granting credit is an implementation of a trusted system.
Credit scoring is not सीमित to banks.
Other organizations, such as mobile phone companies, बीमे कंपनियाँ, जमींदार, and government departments employ the same techniques.
Credit scoring also has a लॉट of ओवरलैप साथ आंकड़ा खनन, which uses many similar techniques.
These techniques combine thousands of factors but they are more or less similar or the वही.
The seven SI base units and the interdependency of their definitions : for example, to extract the परिभाषा of the मीटर इससे the गति of light, the definition of the second must be known while the ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length, mass and time.
The International System of इकाई ( si ) defines सात units of measure as a basic set from which all other SI units are derived.
ये si आधार इकाई and their physical quantities are:
metre for length ( us अंग्रेज़ी : मीटर )
kilogram for mass ( नोट : नहीं the gram )
दूसरी for time
ampere for electric वर्तमान
केल्विन लिये temperature
candela लिये चमकदार intensity
mole for the राशि of substance.
The SI base quantities रूप a set of mutually independent dimensions as required by dimensional analysis commonly employed in science and technology.
however, in a दिए realization of ये इकाई वे may well be interdependent, i.e. defined in terms of each other.
the names of si इकाई हैं लिखा in लोअरकेस वर्ण ( the 'degree Celsius ' meets this rule, as 'degree ' is the unit, and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ).
The symbols of units are written in lowercase ( e.g. मीटर रै the प्रतीक m ), मगर कि प्रतीकों लिये इकाई नामित after persons are written with an initial capital letter ( e.g., the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz ).
Many other units, such as the litre ( US English : liter ), are formally not part of the SI, but are स्वीकृत लिये उपयोग with SI.
स्मारक canyon
Colorado National Monument ( locally referred to as the स्मारक ) is a part of the National Park Service near the city of Grand Junction, Colorado.
spectacular canyons काटें गहन into sandstone and even granite–gneiss–schist rock formations, in some areas.
This is an area of desert land high on the Colorado Plateau, साथ पिनियन और juniper forests on the plateau.
The park hosts a wide range of wildlife, including red-tailed hawks and सुनहरी ईगल्स, ravens, jays, desert bighorn sheep, and coyotes.
Activities include hiking, horseback riding, road bicycling, and दर्शनीय ड्राइव ; a visitor center on the west side contains a natural history museum and gift shop.
There are magnificent views from trails और the Rim Rock Drive, which winds along the plateau.
Nearby are the Book Cliffs, and the largest flat-topped mountain in the संसार, the Grand Mesa.
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon, which runs the width of the park, और शामिल चट्टान formations ऐसे as स्वतंत्रता Monument, the Kissing Couple, and Coke Ovens.
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 वर्गाकार मील ), much of जिससे रै महरूम अनुशंसित to Congress for designation as wilderness.
left to right : Utility Uniform, Blue Dress Uniform, Service Uniform, and Evening पोशाक uniforms
The Uniforms of the United States Marine corps serve to फर्क Marines from members of other services.
Among current uniforms in the United States हथियारबंद शक्तियां, the marines ' uniforms have been in service the longest.
The Marine Dress Blue uniform has, with few changes, महरूम worn in essentially its current form since the 19th century.
North American telephone area codes 419 और 567 serve the northwest quadrant of the U.S. state of Ohio.
The largest city served by these area codes is Toledo ( and its उपनगरों of हॉलैंड, maumee, northwood, ऑरेगॉन, ओटावा पहाड़ियाँ, perrysburg, Rossford, Sylvania, Swanton, Waterville, and Whitehouse ).
Other cities served by these area codes include Ada, Ashland, Bellevue, Bluffton, Bowling Green, Bryan, Bucyrus, Celina, क्लाइड, crestline, defiance, Delphos, Edison, Erastus, Findlay, Fostoria, Fremont, Galion, Kenton, Lima, Mansfield, Mount Gilead, Napoleon, Norwalk, Oak Harbor, Port Clinton, Sandusky, Shelby, St. Marys, Tiffin, Upper Sandusky, Van Wert, Wapakoneta, Wauseon, Willard.
Other areas served include the Lake erie Islands north of Port Clinton and west of Sandusky.
The main area code, 419, was created as one of the original area codes in October 1947 ; the ओवरले क्षेत्रफल कोड 567 थी निर्मित on जनवरी 1, 2002.
Despite the presence of Toledo, the state 's fourth-largest नगर, 419 थी the पिछला of ओहियो 's असली चार क्षेत्रफल codes to have been split or overlaid.
मिकी लेरॉय gilley ( born March 9, 1936 ) is an American country music singer and musician.
Although he प्रारंभ आउट गायन straight-up country and western material in the 1970s, he moved towards a more pop -friendly sound in the 1980s, bringing him further success on not just the country charts, but the pop charts as well.
Among his biggest hits are `` Room Full of Roses, '' `` Do n't the Girls All Get Prettier at closing समय, '' और the रीमेक of the आत्मा hit `` स्टैंड by me ``.
he is भी the cousin of Jerry Lee Lewis, Carl McVoy, Jim Gilley and Jimmy Swaggart.
According to the Federal Aviation Administration, Gilley is a licensed pilot, who holds an यंत्र दरजा साथ वाणिज्यिक पायलट privileges लिये multi-engine airplanes, as खूब as private pilot privileges for single engine aircraft.
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11, September 11th, or 9/11 ) यहूद a श्रेणी of चार समन्वित terrorist attacks launched by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in New York City and the Washington, D.C. area on September 11, 2001.
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19 al-Qaeda terrorists so वे could be flown into buildings in suicide attacks.
Two of those planes, American Airlines Flight 11 and United Airlines Flight 175, were crashed into the उत्तर और दक्षिण मीनारें, क्रमशः, of the संसार व्यापार Center complex in New York City.
Within two hours, both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting फ़ायर causing आंशिक or पूरा पतन of all other buildings in the WTC complex, as well as major damage to ten other large surrounding structures.
A third plane, American Airlines Flight 77, was crashed into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the मुख्यालय of the United States Department of Defense ), leading to a partial collapse in its western side.
The fourth plane, United एयरलाइंस उड़ान 93, थी targeted at the संयुक्त States Capitol in Washington, D.C., but crashed into a field near Shanksville, Pennsylvania, after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers.
In total, लगभग 3,000 लोगों died in the attacks, including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes.
suspicion जल्दी fell on al-Qaeda.
Although the group 's leader, Osama bin Laden, initially denied any भागीदारी, in 2004 he claimed जिम्मेदारी for the attacks.
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited U.S. support of इसराईल, the उपस्थिति of u.S. सैनिकों in Saudi Arabia, and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the attacks.
The United States responded to the attacks by शुभारंभ the युद्ध on आतंक और आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान to depose the Taliban, which had harbored al-Qaeda.
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism विधान और विस्तारित विधि प्रवर्तन powers.
Having evaded कैप्चर लिये सालो, bin Laden was located and killed by U.S. forces in May 2011.
the विनाश of the Twin Towers and other properties caused serious damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and had a significant effect on global markets.
Cleanup of the World Trade Center site was completed in may 2002, और the प्रस्तुतीकरण थी repaired भीतर a year.
numerous memorials have महरूम constructed, सहित the नेशनल September 11 Memorial & Museum in New York, the Pentagon Memorial, and the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania.
After a lengthy delay, the One World Trade बीच is अपेक्षित to be समाप्त at Ground Zero in New York City in 2013.
Finding Nemo is a 2003 अमरीकी computer-animated comedy-drama adventure film written and directed by Andrew Stanton, released by Walt Disney Pictures, and the fifth film produced by Pixar Animation Studios.
It tells the story of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who, साथ साथ a राजसी तंग नामित dory ( एलेन degeneres ), searches for his abducted son Nemo ( Alexander Gould ) all the way to Sydney Harbour.
Along the way, Marlin learns to लो risks और let Nemo take care of himself.
It is Pixar 's पहला फिल्मी to be released in cinemas in the northern hemisphere summer.
The film was re-released for the first time in 3D on September 14, 2012, और it थी released on Blu-ray on December 4, 2012.
A sequel, Finding Dory, is currently in development, नियत to be released on November 25, 2015.
The film received universal critical acclaim and won the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन एनिमेटेड विशेषता, और थी मनोनीत in three more categories including Best Original Screenplay.
It was the second highest-grossing film of 2003, कमाई a total of $ 921 million worldwide.
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling DVD of all time, with over 40 million copies sold as of 2006, and was the highest-grossing g-rated फिल्मी of सब समय पहले पिक्चर्स 's अपना Toy Story 3 overtook it.
It is also the 23rd highest-grossing film of all time, as well as the 3rd highest-grossing animated film.
In 2008, the American Film संस्थान नामित it the tenth greatest animated film ever made during their Top 10.
The sixth season of America 's Best Dance Crew, also known as America 's Best Dance Crew : Season of the Superstars, premiered on April 7, 2011 and concluded on June 5, 2011.

in the संयुक्त राज्य, सोशल सुरक्षा refers to the Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance ( OASDI ) federal program.
The असली सोशल सुरक्षा Act ( 1935 ) and the current version of the Act, as amended, encompass several social welfare and social insurance programs.
Social सुरक्षा is primarily वित्तपोषित through dedicated payroll taxes called Federal Insurance Contributions Act tax ( FICA ).
Tax deposits are formally entrusted to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund, the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund, the Federal हॉस्पिटल बीमे विश्वास निधि, or the संघीय अनुपूरक चिकित्सा बीमे विश्वास निधि जिससे comprise the Social Security Trust Fund.
Upward redistribution of income is responsible for about 43 % of the प्रक्षिप्त सोशल सुरक्षा shortfall over the next 75 years.
According to economist Martin feldstein, the संयुक्त बिता लिये सब सोशल बीमे कार्यक्रम in 2003 constituted 37 % of government expenditure and 7 % of the gross domestic product.
Social Security is currently estimated to keep roughly 40 percent of all Americans age 65 or older आउट of poverty.
The Social Security प्रशासन is headquartered in Woodlawn, Maryland, just west of Baltimore.
the दारू by volume shown on a bottle of absinthe.
Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated as ABV, abv, or alc/vol ) is a मानक माप of कैसा much दारू ( ethanol ) is contained in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ).
The ABV standard is used विश्वव्यापी.
In some countries, alcohol by volume is referred to as degrees Gay-Lussac ( after the फ्रेंच केमिस्ट जोसेफ लुई gay-lussac ).

The population was 1,952 at the 2010 census.
Charles John Huffam Dickens ( ; 7 February 1812 – 9 जून 1870 ) थी an अंग्रेज़ी लेखक और सोशल critic.
He created some of the world 's most memorable fictional characters and is generally regarded as the महानतम उपन्यासकार of the विक्टोरियन काल.
During his life, his works enjoyed unprecedented कीर्ति, और by the बीसवीं सदी his literary genius was broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars.
His novels and short stories continue to be widely popular.
Born in Portsmouth, England, डिकेंस बाएँ स्कूल to work in a factory after his father was thrown into debtors ' prison.
Although he had little formal education, his early impoverishment drove उसे to सफल.
Over his career he edited a weekly journal for 20 years, wrote 15 novels, 5 novellas and hundreds of छोटी कहानियां और non-fiction आलेख, lectured और performed extensively, was an indefatigable letter writer, and campaigned vigorously for children 's rights, education, and other social reforms.
Dickens sprang to fame with the 1836 सीरियल प्रकाशन of the Pickwick Papers.
Within a few years he had become an international literary celebrity, famous for his ह्यूमर, व्यंग्य, और keen अवलोकन of character and society.
His novels, most published in monthly or weekly instalments, pioneered the serial publication of narrative fiction, जिससे became the प्रबल विक्टोरियन विधि लिये अनोखा publication.
The instalment स्वरूप अनुमत डिकेंस to evaluate his audience 's reaction, and he often modified his plot and character development based on such feedback.
For example, when his wife 's chiropodist expressed distress at the way Miss Mowcher in David कॉपरफील्ड लगा to प्रतिबिंबित उसके disabilities, Dickens went on to improve the character with positive lineaments.
Fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous बाड़ ikey सुलेमान ; His caricature of Leigh Hunt in the figure of Mr Skimpole in Bleak House was likewise toned down on advice from some of his friends, as they read episodes.
In the same novel, both Lawrence Boythorne and मूनी the beadle हैं drawn इससे रियल जीवन – boythorne from Walter Savage Landor and Mooney from 'Looney ', a beadle at Salisbury Square.
His भूखंड were carefully constructed, and Dickens often wove in elements from topical events into his narratives.
Masses of the अनपढ़ ग़रीब chipped in ha'pennies to have each new monthly episode read to them, opening up and inspiring a new class of readers.
Dickens was regarded as the साहित्यिक colossus of his age.
His 1843 novella, A Christmas Carol, is one of the most influential works ever written, और it remains लोकप्रिय और continues to inspire adaptations in every artistic genre.
His creative genius has been praised by fellow writers—from Leo टालस्टाय to G. K. चेस्टरटन और जार्ज ऑरवेल —for its realism, comedy, prose style, unique characterisations, and social criticism.
On the other हाथ ऑस्कर वाइल्ड, हेनरी जेम्स और वर्जिनिया woolf complained of a lack of psychological depth, loose writing, and a vein of saccharine sentimentalism.
Martin Luther King and other civil rights leaders in front of the प्रतिमा of अब्राहम lincoln, August 28, 1963
The civil rights movement was a series of worldwide political movements लिये समता पहले the विधि कि peaked in the 1960s.
In many situations it took the form of campaigns of civil resistance aimed at achieving change by nonviolent forms of resistance.
In some situations it was accompanied, or followed, by civil अशांति और हथियारबंद विद्रोह.
The process was long and tenuous in many countries, and many of these movements did not fully achieve their goals although, the efforts of these movements did lead to सुधार in the विधिक अधिकारों of previously दलित समूह of people.
The main aim of the civil rights movement included, and include, ensuring that the rights of all people are बराबर सुरक्षित by the विधि, सहित the rights of minorities.
Civil rights movements ranging from the वैश्विक lgbt अधिकारों गति to the global Women 's rights movement to various racial minority rights movements around the world continue.
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup, the world चैंपियनशिप लिये मेन 's नेशनल संघ फ़ुटबॉल टीमों.
It took प्लेस in दक्षिण Africa from 11 June to 11 July 2010.
The bidding process for होस्टिंग the टूर्नामेंट फाइनल थी खोलें तभी to अफ़्रीकी राष्ट्र ; in 2004, the international football federation, FIFA, selected South Africa over Egypt and Morocco to become the first African nation to host the finals.
The matches were played in ten stadiums in nine host cities around the देश, साथ the फाइनल निभाई at the सॉकर City stadium in South Africa 's largest city, Johannesburg.
Thirty-two teams were selected for participation via a विश्वव्यापी योग्यता tournament that began in August 2007.
In the first round of the tournament finals, the टीमों competed in round-robin groups of four teams for points, with the top two teams in each group proceeding.
These sixteen teams advanced to the knockout stage, where three rounds of play decided जिससे टीमों होता participate in the फाइनल.
In the final, Spain, the European champions, defeated third-time finalists the Netherlands 1–0 बाद अतिरिक्त समय, साथ आन्द्रेस iniesta 's लक्ष्य in the 116th मिनट giving स्पेन उनके पहला संसार title, becoming the eighth nation to win the tournament, and the first European nation to win the tournament outside its home continent.
Host nation South Africa, 2006 world champions Italy and 2006 runners-up फ़्रांस यहूद सब eliminated in the first round of the tournament.
It was the first समय कि the होस्ट यहूद eliminated in the first round.
New Zealand with their तीन draws यहूद the तभी अपराजित टोली in the tournament, but were also eliminated in the first round.

John Lennon was an English musician जो gained विश्वव्यापी कीर्ति as एक of the संस्थापकों of the बीटल्स, लिये his subsequent solo career, and for his political activism and pacifism.
He was shot by Mark David Chapman at the entrance of the building जहाँ he जिया, the डकोटा, in New York City on 8 December 1980.
लेनन था बस लौटे from Record Plant Studio with his wife, Yoko Ono.
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center, where it was stated that nobody could have lived for more than a few मिनट्स बाद sustaining ऐसे चोटों.
Shortly after local news stations reported Lennon 's मौत, crowds gathered at रूज़वेल्ट हॉस्पिटल and in front of the Dakota.
Lennon was cremated on 10 December 1980 at the ferncliff कब्रिस्तान in Hartsdale, New York ; the ashes were given to Ono, who chose not to hold a funeral for him.
The first report of Lennon 's death to a U.S. नेशनल दर्शक थी घोषित by Howard Cosell, on ABC 's Monday Night Football.
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a major United States बंदरगाहों और the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana.
The population of the city was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States.
the नई orleans–metairie–bogalusa Combined Statistical Area, a larger trading area, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
The city is named बाद orléans, a नगर स्तिथ on the loire नदी in Centre, France, and is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine, music ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), and its annual celebrations and festivals, most notably Mardi Gras.
the नगर is प्रायः referred to as the `` most unique '' in America.
New Orleans is located in southeastern Louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The city and Orleans मोहल्ला ( ) हैं.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of st. Tammany to the north, St. Bernard to the east, Plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of जिससे is शामिल in the city limits, lies to the north and Lake Borgne lies to the east.
The United States अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1968 थी the 46th quadrennial presidential election, held on Tuesday, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, पूर्व vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन, जीती the election over the Democratic nominee, incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
Nixon ran on a campaign that promised to restore विधि और अनुक्रम to the स्वदेश 's शहरों, फटा by riots and crime.
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the New Deal Coalition that had वर्चस्व अध्यक्षीय politics for 36 years.
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a ऐतिहासिक भूस्खलन, the चुनाव देखी the incumbent president forced out of the race and a Republican elected for the first time in twelve years.
It was a wrenching national experience, conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King, Jr., and subsequent race riots across the nation, the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. Kennedy, widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses, and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election featured the strongest third party effort since 1912 by former Alabama राज्यपाल जार्ज वालेस, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's अभियान opposed संघीय हस्तक्षेप in the South to end school segregation, he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North.
This was the last election in which नई यॉर्क था the सबसे votes in the electoral college ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 जनसांख्यिकी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the most electoral votes and has remained the most populous state since then.
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without carrying the vice presidential प्रत्याशी 's home state.
