Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – अप्रैल 5, 1994 ) was an American musician and artist, best known as the lead singer, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist novoselic in एबरडीन, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 और स्थापित it as part of the Seattle music scene, having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the band found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like Teen स्पिरिट `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of Nevermind, Nirvana was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X, and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, थी प्रायः असहज और कुंठित, believing उसके संदेश and artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public, with his personal issues often subject to media attention.
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio album In utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of उसके जीवन, कोबेन struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन, बीमारी and depression.
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and पब्लिक चित्र, और the पेशेवर और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding himself and his wife, musician Courtney Love.
On April 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his home in Seattle, the शिकार of कया थी officially शासित a आत्महत्या by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
The circumstances of his death at age 27 have become a टॉपिक of पब्लिक fascination and debate.
Since their debut, Nirvana, with Cobain as a songwriter, has बेची over 25 लाख एल्बम in the u.S., और over 50 million worldwide.
A millwright is a craftsman or tradesman सगाई साथ the निर्माण and maintenance of machinery.
More generally in the English speaking world, early millwrights यहूद विशेषज्ञ बढ़ई who erected machines used in agriculture, food processing and processing lumber and paper.
In the early part of the Industrial Revolution, their skills were pressed into service भवन the earliest powered textile mills.
आधुनिक millwrights कार्य साथ स्टील और अन्य सामग्री in addition to wood and must often combine the skills of several skilled trades in order to successfully fabricate industrial machinery or to assemble machines from pre-fabricated parts.
The modern millwright must also be able to read blueprints और अन्य schematics to सहायता उसे in the construction of complex systems.
Millwrights are frequently unionized, with around 45 % unionized in the US, हालांकि अनुभवी millwrights often set themselves up as independent contractors.

Sodium azide is the अकार्बनिक यौगिक साथ the formula NaN3.
This colorless salt is the gas-forming घटक in अनेक car airbag systems.
It is प्रयुक्त लिये the तैयारी of other azide compounds.
It is an ionic पदार्थ, is अत्यधिक घुलनशील in water, and is very acutely toxic.
Double rainbow and supernumerary rainbows on the अंदर of the primary arc.
The shadow of the photographer 's head on the bottom marks the centre of the rainbow वृत्त ( antisolar पाइंट ).
A rainbow is an optical and meteorological phenomenon that is caused by reflection of light in water droplets in the Earth 's atmosphere, resulting in a वर्णक्रम of लाइट appearing in the sky.
It takes the रूप of a multicoloured arc.
Rainbows caused by धूप सदा appear in the section of sky directly opposite the sun.
In a `` primary rainbow '', the arc shows red on the बाहरी भाग और बैंगनी on the inner side.
This rainbow is caused by light being refracted while entering a droplet of जल, then reflected inside on the back of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it.
In a double rainbow, a second arc is seen outside the primary arc, and has the order of its colours reversed, रेड facing toward the अन्य एक, in both rainbows.
This दूसरी रेनबो is caused by light reflecting twice inside water droplets.
The Conservative Party, officially the Conservative and Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the Tories, is a centre-right राजनैतिक पार्टी in the संयुक्त किंगडम कि espouses the तत्त्वज्ञान of conservatism and British unionism.
it is the largest political party in the United Kingdom, being the largest सिंगल पार्टी in the हाउस of कॉमन्स साथ 303 mps, the largest party in local government with 9,391 councillors, and the largest British party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs.
It governs in गठबन्धन साथ the उदार डेमोक्रेट, with party leader David Cameron as Prime Minister.
The Conservative Party was founded in 1834, and was one of two dominant parties in the 19th सदी, साथ साथ the Liberal Party.
It changed its name to the Conservative and Unionist Party in 1912 after merging with the उदार यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी, हालांकि कि नाम is rarely प्रयुक्त और it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative Party.
In the 1920s, the उदार vote greatly diminished and the Labour Party became the Conservatives ' main rivals.
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57 years of the 20th century, including विंस्टन Churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) and Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic liberalisation and saw the Conservatives become the सबसे eurosceptic of the तीन प्रमुख parties.
The party was लौटे to सरकारी in गठबन्धन, having विफल to win a majority, in 2010 under the more `` liberal '' leadership of David Cameron.
In the European Parliament, the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs, who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives and Reformists ( ECR ) संसदीय समूह, जबकि the पार्टी itself is a सदस्य of the Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty.
They are the third-largest party in the Scottish Parliament and second-largest in the वेल्श सभा.
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist Party ( UUP ) as part of the ulster conservatives और unionists arrangement, with the UUP currently participating in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive.
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose final, and perhaps most recognizable, line-up comprised बेयोंस नॉलेस, केली rowland and Michelle Williams.
Formed in 1990 in Houston, Texas, Destiny 's Child सदस्यों began उनके musical endeavors as लड़की 's टीमे comprising, among others, Knowles, Rowland, LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett.
After सालो of सीमित कामयाबी, वे were signed to Columbia Records as Destiny 's Child.
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream recognition following the release of their best-selling दूसरी album, The Writing 's on the Wall, which contained the number-one singles `` Bills, Bills, Bills `` and `` Say My Name ``.
Despite critical and commercial success, the group was plagued by आतंरिक विरोध और विधिक turmoil, as roberson और luckett attempted to split from the group 's manager Mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland, his daughter and niece, respectively.
Both roberson और luckett यहूद soon replaced with Williams and Farrah Franklin ; however, in 2000, Franklin was dismissed, leaving them as a trio.
Their third album, Survivor, which contains themes the public interpreted as a channel to the group 's experience, contains the worldwide हिट्स `` स्वतंत्र महिलाओं ``, `` उत्तरजीवी `` और `` Bootylicious ``.
In 2002, they announced a hiatus and re-united two years later for the release of their fourth स्टुडियो एल्बम, नियति fulfilled ( 2004 ).
Destiny 's Child has sold more than 50 लाख records worldwide to date.
Billboard magazine ranks the समूह as एक of the महानतम musical trios of all time, the ninth most successful artist/band of the 2000s, and placed the group 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists list in 2008.
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United States federal agency under the Department of Health and Human Services headquartered in Druid Hills, unincorporated dekalb काउंटी, Georgia, in Greater Atlanta.
it works to protect पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य और सुरक्षा by providing सूचना to बढ़ाएँ health decisions, and it promotes health through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations.
The सीडीसी फ़ोकस नेशनल ध्यान on विकासशील और applying बीमारी रोकथाम और कंट्रोल ( विशेषकर infectious diseases and foodborne pathogens and other microbial infections ), environmental health, occupational safety and health, health promotion, injury prevention and education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the United States.
The CDC is the United States ' national public health संस्थान और is a founding सदस्य of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of नेशनल Public Health Institutes.
Earthquake prediction `` is usually defined as the specification of the time, location, and magnitude of a future earthquake within stated हद '', और विशेषकर of `` the अगला दमदार earthquake to occur in a region. ''
This can be distinguished from भूकंप forecasting, जिससे is the probabilistic assessment of general earthquake hazard, including the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes, in a given area over periods of years or decades.
This can be further विशिष्ट इससे real-time भूकंप चेतावनी प्रणालियों, which, upon detection of a severe earthquake, can provide neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking.
To be useful, an भूकंप भविष्यवाणी जरूर be precise पर्याप्त to वारंट the लागत of increased एहतियात, including disruption of ordinary activities and commerce, and timely enough that preparation can be made.
Predictions must also be reliable, as false alarms and cancelled alarms are not only economically costly, but seriously undermine विश्वास in, और thereby the प्रभावकारिता of, any kind of warning.
With over 7,000 earthquakes around the world each year with a परिमाण of 4.0 or वृहद, नगण्य कामयाबी in भूकंप भविष्यवाणी is easily obtained using sufficiently broad parameters of time, location, or magnitude.
However, such trivial `` कामयाब पूर्वानुमान '' are not useful.
Major earthquakes are often followed by reports that they were predicted, or at least anticipated, but no claim of a successful भविष्यवाणी of a प्रमुख भूकंप रै बच बंद पूछताछ.
In the 1970s there was intense optimism amongst scientists that some method of predicting earthquakes might be found, but by the 1990s continuing विफलता led अनेक वैज्ञानिकों to सवाल whether it थी even possible.
While many scientists still hold that, given enough resources, भविष्यवाणी might be संभावित, many others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible.
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born May 13, 1993 ) is an American actress, सिंगर, संगीतकार, songwriter और रिकार्ड producer.
Ryan is best known for starring as Bailey Pickett in the Disney Channel Original Series the Suite Life on Deck.
In 2008, The Suite Life on Deck ranked as TV 's शीर्ष श्रेणी among बच्चे 6-11 और the No. 2 scripted series among tweens 9-14.
Ryan started acting in professional theatres at the age of seven ; in 2007 she appeared in the Barney & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : let 's go to the फायरहाउस और तब थी खोजा in a देशभर search by Disney.
She is also known for appearing in the 2008 विशेषता फिल्मी the longshots as Edith.
In 2009, she guest स्ट्रक्चर in an एपीसोड of wizards of waverly प्लेस in wizards on Deck with Hannah Montana as Bailey Pickett along with her other cast mates from The Suite Life on Deck.
Then, in 2010, she starred in the film 16 Wishes, which थी the सबसे देखी केबल कार्यक्रम on the day of its premiere on the Disney Channel.
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ; the movie received high viewership in the वयस्कों जनसांख्यिकी ( 18-34 ).
Soon after that, Ryan starred in the independent theatrical film, कया if..., जिससे premiered on August 20, 2010.
Ryan also starred in the new Disney Channel Original movie, Radio Rebel, where वो portrays the भूमिका of tara एडम्स, a शर्मीले 17-year-old लड़की जो adopts the radio personality, Radio Rebel.
Released फ़रवरी 17, 2012.
Ryan stars in the titular भूमिका in the डिज़्नी Channel Original Series, Jessie.
Stührling Tourbillon गति ( ).
In horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an addition to the mechanics of a watch escapement.
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss घड़ीसाज़ abraham-louis breguet इससे an पहले विचार by the अंग्रेज़ी chronometer मेकर जॉन अर्नाल्ड, a tourbillon aims to काउंटर the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता by mounting the escapement and balance wheel in a rotating cage, to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position.
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy, tourbillons हैं स्टिल शामिल in कुछ महंगी आधुनिक घड़ियाँ as a novelty and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
The mechanism is usually exposed on the देखें 's face to show it off.
The Windows Installer ( previously ज्ञात as microsoft installer ) is a तन्त्र घटक प्रयुक्त लिये the installation, maintenance, and removal of software on modern Microsoft Windows systems.
The installation information, and often the files themselves, are packaged in installation packages, loosely रिलेशनल databases संरचित as com संरचित storages and commonly known as `` MSI files '', from their default file extension.
Windows Installer contains significant परिवर्तन इससे इसके पूर्ववर्ती, Setup API.
New features include a GUI framework and automatic generation of the uninstallation sequence.
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone executable installer frameworks such as older versions of InstallShield and NSIS.
Microsoft encourages third parties to use Windows Installer as the basis for installation frameworks, so that they synchronize correctly साथ अन्य installers और रखना the आतंरिक डेटाबेस of संस्थापित products consistent.
Important features such as rollback and versioning निर्भर on a सतत internal database for reliable operation.
Furthermore, Windows Installer facilitates the principle of least privilege by performing तन्त्र संस्थापना by proxy for unprivileged users.
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic beverages, originally marketed as energy drinks, sold by phusion प्रोजेक्ट of Chicago, Illinois.
Phusion operates as Drink चार brewing Company.
Four Loko, the company 's most popular beverage, debuted in the संयुक्त राज्य market in 2005.
It is now sold in 48 states, और in कनाडा, The Bahamas, Bolivia, Honduras, and Europe.
The name `` Four '' is derived from the असली उर्जा पेय 's चार प्रमुख संघटक : alcohol, caffeine, taurine, and guarana.
Four branded products have been the object of legal, नैतिक, और स्वास्थ्य चिंताएं सम्बन्धित to the कम्पनी allegedly marketing them to the underaged and the purported danger of combining alcohol and caffeine.
After the beverage was banned in several states, a product reintroduction in December 2010 removed कैफीन, taurine, और guarana as संघटक, and the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an energy drink.
The neck of a guitar showing the nut ( in the पृष्ठभूमि, coloured श्वेत ) और first four metal frets.
A fret is a raised element on the neck of a stringed यंत्र.
Frets usually extend across the पूरा चौडाई of the neck.
On most modern पश्चिमी fretted यंत्र, frets are metal strips inserted into the fingerboard.
On some historical instruments and non-European instruments, frets are made of टुकड़े of स्ट्रिंग tied around the neck.
Frets divide the neck into फिक्स्ड खण्ड at intervals related to a musical framework.
On instruments such as guitars, each fret represents one semitone in the मानक पश्चिमी प्रणाली where one octave is divided into twelve semitones.
fret is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a क्रिया, meaning simply `` to press down the string behind a fret. ''
Fretting प्रायः refers to the frets and/or their system of placement.
There was consumption of alcohol both during and बाद निषेध.
The 18th Amendment prohibited the production, distribution and sale of alcoholic beverages in the United राज्य और थी widely समर्थित by the अमरीकी पब्लिक जब it गई into effect in 1920.
The temperance movement had popularized the belief that alcohol was the major cause of most personal and social problems and prohibition was seen as the समाधान to the स्वदेश 's गरीबी, crime, violence, and other ills.
Upon ratification of the amendment, the famous इंजीलवादी बिली संडे कहा कि `` The slums will soon be only a memory.
We will फेरे हमारी जेलों into factories and our jails into storehouses and corncribs. ''
( Compare christianity and alcohol. )
Since alcohol was to be बैन and since it was seen as the cause of most, if not all, crime, some communities sold their jails.
The nation was highly optimistic और the अग्रणी prohibitionist in the United States Congress confidently asserted that `` There is as much chance of repealing the Eighteenth Amendment as there is for a hummingbird to fly to the planet Mars with the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English ), ( SI unit symbol : m ; SI dimension symbol : L ), is the आधारभूत ईकाई of लंबाई in the International System of Units ( SI ).
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the अलहदा from the Earth 's equator to the North Pole ( at sea level ), its definition has been periodically refined to reflect growing knowledge of metrology.
Since 1983, it has been defined as `` the length of the पाथ travelled by लाइट in वैक्यूम during a time interval of 1/299,792,458 of a second. ''

geologists explaining the महत्व of volcanic ash layers to students on field in Iceland
a भूवैज्ञानिक is a scientist who studies the solid and liquid matter that constitutes the Earth as well as the processes and history that has shaped it.
Geologists प्रायः engage in studying geology.
Geologists, studying more of an लागू विज्ञान than a सैद्धांतिक one, must approach Geology using physics, chemistry and biology as well as other sciences.
Geologists, compared to scientists engaged in other fields, are generally more exposed to the outdoors than staying in laboratories ; although कुछ geologists prefer to perform सबसे of their studies in the lab.
Geologists are सगाई in खोजी लिये खनन कंपनियाँ in search of metals, oils, and other Earth resources.
They are also in the forefront of natural hazards and disasters warning and mitigation, studying भूकंप, volcanic कार्यकलाप, tsunamis, मौसम storms, and the like ; their studies are used to warn the general public of the occurrence of these events.
Currently, geologists are also engaged in the discussion of climate change, as वे पढ़ाई the इतिहास और प्रमाण लिये this Earth process.
नीचे is a व्यापक ड्रिल and tap size chart for all drills, imperial and metric, and taps up to 36.5 mm.
Modern वैक्यूम tubes, mostly miniature style
In electronics, a vacuum tube, इलेक्ट्रॉन ट्यूब ( in उत्तर अमेरिका ), तापायनिक वाल्व, tube, or valve is a device controlling electric current through a vacuum in a sealed container.
The संग्राहक is प्रायः पतला पारदर्शी glass in a roughly cylindrical shape.
The simplest vacuum ट्यूब, the डायोड, is essentially an incandescent light bulb with an added electrode inside.
When the बल्ब 's फिलामेंट is heated white-hot, electrons are `` boiled '' off its surface and into the vacuum inside the bulb.
If the electrode -- called a `` plate '' or `` anode '' -- is made more positive than the hot filament, a सीधा वर्तमान बहती through the वैक्यूम to the एलेक्ट्रोड ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ).
As the current only flows in one direction, it makes it संभावित to बदलें an प्रत्यावर्ती current applied to the filament to direct current.
The introduction of a third electrode, a ग्रिड between the फिलामेंट और the थाली, yields another function.
A voltage applied to the grid controls the वर्तमान बहती इससे the फिलामेंट to the plate.
Thus, it allows the device to be used as an electronic amplifier.
Vacuum tubes हैं यूँ प्रयुक्त लिये rectification, amplification, switching, or similar processing or creation of electrical signals.
The vast majority of modern day tubes consist of a sealed संग्राहक साथ a वैक्यूम अंदर, and essentially rely on thermionic emission of electrons from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament.
Some exceptions to this are dealt with in the खण्ड परिचय gas-filled tubes below.
Vacuum tubes were critical to the development of electronic technology, which drove the expansion and commercialization of radio प्रसारण, टेलीविज़न, रडार, ध्वनि reinforcement, ध्वनि रिकॉर्डिंग और जनन, विशाल टेलीफोन संजाल, analog and digital computers, and industrial process control.
Although some applications had counterparts using earlier technologies ऐसे as the चिंगारी गैप ट्रांसमीटर or mechanical computers, it was the invention of the vacuum tube with three electrodes ( called a triode ) and its capability of electronic amplification that made these technologies widespread and practical.
In सबसे अनुप्रयोग, solid-state devices such as transistors and other semiconductor devices have replaced tubes.
Solid-state devices last longer and are smaller, more efficient, अधिक विश्वसनीय, and cheaper than tubes.
Tubes can be fragile, sometimes generate significant अनावश्यक ऊष्मा, और can take many seconds—many minutes in critical applications—after powering on to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational tolerance.
However, tubes still find uses where solid-state devices have not been developed, are impractical, or where a tube has superior performance, as साथ कुछ डिवाइस in professional audio and high-power radio transmitters.
Tubes are स्टिल उत्पादित for such applications.
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be destroyed by the electromagnetic pulse produced by nuclear explosions और geomagnetic तूफ़ान उत्पादित by दानव solar flares.
Skittles is a brand of fruit-flavoured मिठाई, currently produced and marketed by the Wm. Wrigley Jr. Company, a division of Mars, Inc.
They have hard sugar शेल जिससे carry the letter S.
The inside is mainly शुगर, मकई सिरप, और hydrogenated ताड़ कर्नेल oil along with fruit juice, citric acid, and natural and artificial flavours.
The confectionery has been sold in a variety of flavour संग्रहण, such as Tropical and Wild Berry.
Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill, ( 30 नवम्बर 1874 – 24 जनवरी 1965 ) थी a अंग्रेजों राजनेता who was the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955.
Widely regarded as one of the महानतम wartime नेताओ of the 20th सदी, चर्चिल was also an officer in the British Army, a historian, a writer, and an artist.
He is the तभी अंग्रेजों प्रधान मंत्री in इतिहास to have received the Nobel Prize in Literature, and was also the first person to be made an Honorary Citizen of the United States.
Churchill was born into an वैभवशाली family as the grandson of the 7th Duke of Marlborough.
His father, Lord Randolph Churchill, was a charismatic politician जो परोसा as चांसलर of the exchequer ; उसके माँ, Jennie Jerome, was an American socialite.
As a young फौज अधिकारी, he देखी action in British India, The Sudan, and the Second Boer War.
He gained fame as a युद्ध correspondent और wrote books about his campaigns.
At the forefront of politics for पचास सालो, he आयोजित अनेक political and cabinet positions.
Before the First World War, he served as President of the Board of Trade, Home Secretary, and First रब of the admiralty as भाग of the asquith Liberal government.
During the war, he continued as First Lord of the Admiralty जबतक the विनाशकारी gallipoli Campaign caused his departure from government.
He then briefly resumed active army service on the पश्चिमी सामने as कमांडर of the 6th Battalion of the Royal Scots Fusiliers.
He returned to सरकारी as मंत्री of Munitions, Secretary of State for War, and Secretary of State for Air.
After the War, Churchill served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative ( Baldwin ) government of 1924–29, controversially returning the pound sterling in 1925 to the gold standard at its pre-war parity, a move widely seen as creating deflationary दबाव on the UK economy.
भी विवादास्पद was his opposition to increased home rule for India and his resistance to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII.
Out of दफ्तर और नीतियां `` in the wilderness '' during the 1930s, Churchill took the lead in warning about Nazi Germany and in campaigning for rearmament.
On the outbreak of the Second World War, he थी again नियुक्त पहला रब of the Admiralty.
following the इस्तीफा of Neville Chamberlain on 10 May 1940, Churchill became Prime Minister.
His steadfast refusal to consider defeat, surrender, or a compromise peace helped inspire British resistance, especially during the difficult जल्दी दिनों of the युद्ध जब ब्रिटेन stood अलोन among यूरोपीय देशों in इसके active opposition to Adolf Hitler.
Churchill was particularly noted लिये उसके भाषणों और radio broadcasts, which helped inspire the British people.
He led Britain as Prime मंत्री जबतक विजय over Nazi Germany had been secured.
After the Conservative Party lost the 1945 election, he became Leader of the Opposition to the Labour ( Attlee ) government.
After winning the 1951 election, he again became प्रधान Minister, before retiring in 1955.
Upon his death, Elizabeth II granted him the honour of a राज्य अंत्येष्टि, which saw one of the largest assemblies of world statesmen in history.
Named the Greatest Briton of all time in a 2002 poll, Churchill is widely regarded as होने among the सबसे influential लोगों in अंग्रेजों इतिहास.

An agar थाली -- an example of a bacterial growth medium.
Specifically, it is a streak plate ; the orange lines and dots हैं formed by बैक्टीरियल colonies.
A growth medium or culture medium is a liquid or gel designed to support the विकास of microorganisms or cells, or small plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens.
There are different types of media for growing अलग प्रकार of कोशिकाएं.
There are two major types of growth media : those used for cell culture, which use विशिष्ट कोशिका प्रकार निकला इससे पौधे or animals, and microbiological culture, which are used for growing microorganisms, such as bacteria or yeast.
The most common growth media for microorganisms are nutrient broths and agar plates ; specialized मीडिया हैं sometimes required for microorganism and cell culture growth.
Some organisms, termed fastidious organisms, require specialized environments due to जटिल nutritional आवश्यकताएँ.
Viruses, for example, are obligate intracellular परजीवी और आवश्यकता a विकास medium containing living cells.
A talent agent, or booking agent, is a person who finds jobs for actors, authors, फिल्मी निर्देशकों, संगीतकारों, मॉडल, निर्माता, पेशेवर एथलीट, लेखक and other people in various entertainment businesses.
An agent also defends, supports और promotes the interest of his/her clients.
Agents can नहीं उपज their own shows due to conflict of interest.
A talent agent must be परिचित साथ उनके clients.
An agent रै to जान कया दयालु of कार्य the client can and can not do in order to match them with various jobs.
Having an agent is not required, लकिन करता सहायता the कलाकार in getting jobs.
In many cases casting directors, or other businesses, go to talent agencies to ढूँढें कलाकारों वे हैं looking for.
The agent is paid a percentage of the star 's आय ( typically 10 % ).
Agents sometimes will be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There are different regulations that govern different types of agents that are स्थापित by कलाकार 's संघ and the legal jurisdiction in which the agent operates.
There are also पेशेवर organizations that license talent agencies.
Since the decline in viewership in theaters, from the 1950s to 1960s, this caused a monumental shift in how studios would produce films and thus reducing the लागत of विशेष और expensive actors.
Actors and actresses were working for the studios but were not owned by एक major studio entity and so were able to work on within their time and with other studios.
क्युकी of इस, एजेंटों were now seen as a necessity instead of an option.
Agents now became third parties कि negotiated between studios and clients, this making their services imperative between each party.
Since talent एजेंसियों हैं working साथ lucrative अनुबंध, सब हुनर एजेंसियों जरूर be licensed अंतर्गत खास भाग of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया Labor Code, which calls an agent a `` person or corporation who engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, promising, or attempting to procure employment for artist or artists. Mars has two known moons, Phobos and Deimos, which are thought to be captured क्षुद्रग्रह.
Both satellites were discovered in 1877 by Asaph Hall and are named after the characters Phobos ( panic/fear ) and Deimos ( terror/dread ) जो, in यूनानी mythology, accompanied their father Ares, god of war, into battle.
Ares was known as Mars to the romans.
It is possible that Mars may have moons smaller than 50 - 100 मीटर और a धूल रिंग between Phobos and Deimos may be present but none have been discovered.
In law enforcement parlance, the term हत्या किताब refers to the मामला संचिका of a murder investigation.
Typically, murder books include crime scene photographs and sketches, autopsy and forensic रिपोर्ट्स, transcripts of जांचकर्ताओं ' टीप and witness interviews.
The murder book encapsulates the complete paper trail of a murder छानबीन, from the time the murder is first reported through the arrest of a suspect.
Law enforcement agencies typically guard murder books carefully, and it is unusual for civilians to be given unfettered access to ये kinds of records, especially for unsolved cases.

Melon balls are balls of melon made using a melon baller that varies from around 1 centimeter to 3 सेंटीमीटर ( परिचय 3/8 इंच to 1 इंच ).
वे हैं generally used in fruit salad.
A KSA, or Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities, is a series of narrative कथन कि हैं जरूरी जब applying to संयुक्त राज्य Federal government job openings.
KSAs are used to determine, along with resumes, who the best आवेदकों हैं जब अनेक उम्मीदवार qualify for a job.
The knowledge, skills and abilities ( KSAs ) necessary for the successful प्रदर्शन of a स्थिति are contained on each job vacancy announcement.
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked federal agencies to stop requiring job applicants to भरण आउट the questionnaires, to be phased out within a year.
KSAs are brief and focused essays about one 's career and educational background that presumably qualify एक to perform the duties of the position being applied for.
A knowledge, skills, and abilities ( ksa ) is a संक्षिप्त निबन्ध परिचय एक 's talent and expertise and related experiences ( work, education, volunteer ) and accomplishments.
A series of KSA statements are usually required when applying for most संघीय सरकारी और कुछ राज्य और नगर government jobs.
KSAs are used as a yardstick to assess the capabilities of a prospective applicant in terms of likely क्षमता to perform the कर्तव्य of the जॉब.
Most सरकारी भर्ती officials dekh लिये a छोटी, crisp and clear KSA that emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in previous work.
KSA कथन are also known as Evaluation Factors.
Other agencies sometimes call them `` Rating Factors '', `` Quality Ranking Factors '', `` Knowledge, Abilities, कौशल और अन्य विशेषताएँ '', or `` Job Elements ''.
The name can be just a name but often it प्रभाव सामग्री and length of the essay.
Every agency has its own regulations but most of the समय the प्रत्येक ksa फ़ैक्टर should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long.
The below definitions हैं पारिभाषित by the U.S. Office of Personnel Management :
Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The attributes required to perform a जॉब और हैं generally demonstrated through qualifying service, education, or training.
Knowledge - Is a body of information applied सीधे to the performance of a function.
Skill - Is an observable competence to perform a सीखे psychomotor act.
Ability - Is competence to perform an observable बर्ताव or a बर्ताव कि परिणाम in an observable product.
The scoring of KSA essays is based on a स्केल of इससे एक to 100.
Job applicants must स्कोर ऊपर 70 to be माना for the position.
High scores are derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as possible, providing examples from previous नियुक्ति or प्रशिक्षण कि clearly demonstrate you meet the qualifications.
When applying to federal government positions, a Federal Resume is usually जरूरी in जोड to KSA statements.

Love सदा is the डेब्यू एल्बम of अमरीकी r & B duo K-Ci & JoJo, released on June 17, 1997, by MCA Records.
It was recorded at various studios in नई यॉर्क और the Los Angeles area in 1996 and 1997.
It was produced by JoJo and several others, including DeVante Swing, जेम्स mtume, और जेफ़ Redd.
The duo were originally a भाग of jodeci before this album.
The album peaked at sixth on the US Billboard 200 और भी appeared on international charts.
The single `` All My Life `` charted number one in multiple देशों, और सब चार of the एल्बम 's singles peaked ऊपर the शीर्ष 25 in the US Hot R & B/Hip-Hop Songs and the New Zealand Top 40 Singles.
Love Always was received favorably by आलोचकों, जो praised the brothers ' singing ability and the production.
The album has been certified three times platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America ( riaa ) और सुनहरा by म्यूज़िक कनाडा और ifpi स्वीडन.
As of June 1999 it had sold 2.9 लाख नक़ल in the संयुक्त States.
A variable-rate mortgage, adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ), or tracker mortgage is a mortgage loan with the interest rate on the note periodically adjusted based on an index which reflects the लागत to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets.
The loan may be offered at the lender 's मानक परिवर्तनीय rate/ base rate.
There may be a direct and legally-defined link to the underlying index, but where the lender offers no specific link to the underlying मार्केट or अनुक्रमणिका the रेट can be बदला at the lender 's discretion.
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most common outside the United States, whilst in the United States, `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is most common, and implies a बंधक regulated by the संघीय सरकारी, with caps on charges.
In many countries, समायोज्य रेट mortgages हैं the norm, और in ऐसे स्थान, may simply be referred to as mortgages.
Among the most common indices are the rates on 1-year constant-maturity Treasury ( CMT ) securities, the Cost of Funds Index ( COFI ), and the लंदन interbank offered रेट ( LIBOR ).
A few lenders use their own लागत of निधि as an अनुक्रमणिका, rather than using other indices.
This is done to ensure a steady margin for the lender, जिनकी अपना लागत of funding होगा प्रायः be related to the index.
Consequently, payments made by the borrower may change over time with the changing ब्याज रेट ( alternatively, the पद of the ऋण may change ).
This is distinct from the graduated payment mortgage, जिससे offers बदलना भुगतान amounts but a fixed interest rate.
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest only mortgage, the फिक्स्ड रेट बंधक, the negative amortization mortgage, and the balloon payment mortgage.
Adjustable rates transfer भाग of the ब्याज रेट रिस्क from the lender to the borrower.
They can be used जहाँ मनमौजी ब्याज दरों make fixed rate loans difficult to obtain.
the borrower लाभ if the interest rate falls but loses if the interest rate increases.
The borrower लाभ इससे घटाया मार्जिन to the underlying cost of borrowing compared to fixed or capped rate mortgages.
the हत्या of रॉबर्ट फ्रांसिस `` bobby '' कैनेडी, a संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटर और brother of assassinated President John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy, took place shortly after midnight on June 5, 1968, in Los Angeles, California, during the campaign season for the United States Presidential election, 1968.
After winning the California and South Dakota primary elections for the Democratic nomination for President of the United States, कैनेडी थी शॉट as he walked through the रसोईघर of the दूत Hotel and died in the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours later.
Sirhan Sirhan, a 24-year-old फिलीस्तीनी / जार्डन अप्रवासी, थी convicted of कैनेडी 's murder and is serving a life sentence for the crime.
Sirhan 's वकील have released statements claiming evidence that he was framed.
The shooting was अंकित on ऑडियो टेप by a freelance समाचारपत्र रिपोर्टर, and the aftermath was captured on film.
Kennedy 's body lay in repose at St. Patrick 's गिरजाघर in नई यॉर्क for two days before a funeral mass was held on June 8.
His body was interred near his bhai जॉन at आर्लिंगटन National Cemetery.
His death prompted the सुरक्षा of अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार by the United States Secret Service.
Hubert Humphrey went on to जीत the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन for the presidency, but ultimately narrowly lost the election to Richard Nixon.
As with his brother Jack 's death, Bobby 's assassination and the circumstances surrounding it have शाखित a किस्में of conspiracy theories.
As of 2013 Kennedy remains one of तभी दो बैठे United States Senators to be assassinated ( the other being Huey Long ).
The Modern Age of Comic Books is an informal name for the काल in the इतिहास of मुख्यधारा American comic books generally considered to last from the mid-1980s until present day.
In this period, comic book characters generally became darker and more psychologically complex, creators became better-known and क्रियाशील in बदलना the उद्योग, स्वतंत्र comics flourished, and larger publishing houses became more commercialized.
An alternate name for this period is the Dark Age of Comic Books, due to the लोकप्रियता और कलाकारी influence of grim शीर्षक, such as and Watchmen.
When Harry Met Sally... is a 1989 American रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा by नोरा ephron और निर्देशित by Rob Reiner.
It stars Billy Crystal as Harry और मेग रयान as Sally.
The story follows the title characters from the time they meet just before sharing a cross-country drive, through twelve years or so of मौका मुठभेड़ों in New York City.
The फिल्मी उठाता the सवाल `` can मेन and women ever just be friends ? '' and advances many ideas about relationships that became household concepts, such as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person ''.
The origins of the film came from Reiner 's वापसी to सिंगल जीवन बाद a divorce.
An interview ephron conducted with Reiner provided the basis for Harry.
Sally थी आधारित on Ephron and some of her friends.
Crystal आए on board and made his own contributions to the screenplay, making Harry funnier.
Ephron supplied the structure of the फिल्मी साथ much of the संवाद आधारित on the real-life friendship between Reiner and Crystal.
The soundtrack consists of standards performed by Harry connick, jr., साथ a बिग band and orchestra arranged by Marc Shaiman.
Connick won his पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Jazz Male Vocal Performance.
Columbia Pictures released the film using the `` platform '' technique, जिससे शामिल खोलने it in a few select cities, letting positive word of mouth generate interest, and then gradually expanding distribution over subsequent weeks.
When Harry Met Sally... grossed a total of US $ 92.8 million in North अमेरिका.
Ephron प्राप्त a British Academy Film Award, an Oscar nomination, and a Writers Guild of America Award nomination for her screenplay.
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years... 100 Laughs list of the top comedy films in American cinema and number 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 funniest फिल्मों ''.
In early 2004, the film was adapted लिये the स्टेज in a production starring Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan.

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged food products primarily consisting of boxed पास्ता bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings.
The contents of each box are combined with browned ground beef, water and milk to बनाएँ a पूरा dish.
The product लकीर भी सुविधाएँ products with other starches such as rice or potatoes instead of pasta.
It is made by सामान्य Mills.
Although the classic boxed Hamburger Helper products only supply the starch item and the सॉस पैकेट्स, कुछ किस्में of the उत्पाद शामिल मैदान बीफ.
These include a frozen food line, which सुविधाएँ कुछ of the ब्रांड 's क्लासिक varieties in a complete meal kit form, with frozen ground beef and frozen sauce packaged separately from the noodles in the same bag.
There is also an `` instant '' version of Hamburger Helper containing dehydrated मांस, नूडल्स और seasonings in a छोटी pouch, requiring only water to be added.
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping Hand '', an anthropomorphic animated, four fingered left-hand glove, जिससे appears in the product 's television commercials and on the packages.

A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass object that is neither a planet nor a satellite.
More explicitly, the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a बौना ग्रह as a celestial देह in सीधा कक्षा of the सूर्य कि is massive enough for its shape to be controlled by gravitation, but that unlike a planet has not cleared its orbital region of other objects.
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of लाशें orbiting the सूर्य, brought परिचय by an बढ़ाएँ in discoveries of trans-neptunian objects that rivaled Pluto in size, and finally precipitated by the discovery of an even more massive object, Eris.
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the neighbourhood of their orbit are पारिभाषित as ग्रह, जबकि those कि हैं नहीं massive enough to be rounded by their own gravity are defined as small Solar System bodies.
बौना ग्रह come in between.
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the roster of planets by the IAU has been both praised and criticized ; it was said to be the `` right decision '' by माइक भूरा, जो खोजा और अन्य नई बौना ग्रह, लकिन रै महरूम rejected by Alan Stern, who had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990.
The IAU currently recognizes five dwarf planets in the सौर प्रणाली :, प्लूटो,,, and.
However, only two of ये लाशें, ceres and Pluto, have been observed in enough detail to demonstrate that they fit the definition.
Eris has been accepted as a dwarf planet because it is अधिक विशाल than Pluto.
The IAU subsequently decided कि बेनाम trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ with an absolute magnitude brighter than +1 ( and hence a diameter of ≥838 km assuming a geometric albedo of ≤1 ) are to be named under the assumption that they are dwarf planets.
The only two such objects known at the समय, माकेमाके और हउमेया, गई through this naming procedure and were declared to be dwarf planets.
It is suspected that another सौ or so ज्ञात वस्तुएँ in the Solar System are dwarf planets.
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be found when the entire region known as the Kuiper belt is explored, and that the number may exceed 10,000 जब वस्तुएँ बिखरे बाहर the kuiper बेल्ट are considered.
Individual astronomers recognize several of these, and in August 2011 Mike Brown published a list of 390 candidate objects, ranging इससे `` nearly निश्चित '' to `` संभावित '' बौना planets. '
Brown identifies nine known objects – the five accepted by the IAU plus,,, and – as `` वस्तुतः निश्चित '', साथ another दो दर्जन highly likely, and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total.
The classification of bodies in other planetary systems with the विशेषताएँ of बौना ग्रह has not been addressed.
A debit card ( भी ज्ञात as a बैंको कार्ड or जाँच कार्ड ) is a plastic payment card that provides the cardholder electronic access to his or her bank account ( s ) at a financial institution.
Some cards have a stored value with which a payment is made, while most relay a message to the cardholder 's बैंको to withdraw निधि इससे a payee 's designated bank account.
The card, where accepted, can be प्रयुक्त बजाय of cash when making purchases.
In some cases, the primary account क्रमांक is आबंटित exclusively लिये उपयोग on the अंतरजाल and there is no physical card.
In many countries, the use of debit cards has become so widespread that their volume has overtaken or entirely replaced cheques और, in कुछ उदाहरण, cash transactions.
The development of debit cards, नापसंद क्रेडिट ताश and charge cards, has generally been country specific resulting in a number of different systems around the world, which were often incompatible.
Since the mid-2000s, a number of initiatives have allowed debit ताश जारी in एक देश to be प्रयुक्त in अन्य countries and allowed their use for internet and phone purchases.
Unlike credit and charge cards, payments using a debit card are immediately transferred from the cardholder 's designated bank account, instead of उन्हें paying the money back at a later date.
Debit cards usually भी allow लिये तत्काल वापसी of नकदी, acting as the ATM card for withdrawing cash.
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities to customers, where a customer can withdraw cash along with उनके खरीदें.
Francois Henri `` जोकर '' lalanne ( सितंबर 26, 1914 - जनवरी 23, 2011 ) थी an अमरीकी फ़िटनेस, exercise, and nutritional expert and motivational speaker who is sometimes called `` the godfather of fitness '' and the `` first fitness superhero. ''
He described himself as being a `` sugarholic '' and a `` junk food junkie '' जबतक he थी 15.
He also had behavioral समस्याएं, लकिन `` turned उसके जीवन around '' after listening to a public lecture by Paul Bragg, a well-known nutrition speaker.
During his career, he came to believe that the country 's overall health depended on the health of its population, writing that `` शारीरिक संस्कृति और पोषण — is the मोक्ष of America. ''
Decades before health and fitness began being प्रचारित by हस्तियाँ जैसे जेन फोंडा and Richard Simmons, LaLanne was already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a good diet.
He प्रकाशित numerous किताबे on fitness and hosted a fitness television show between 1953 and 1985.
As early as 1936, at age 21, he opened one of the nation 's first fitness gyms in Oakland, California, which became a prototype for dozens of similar gyms using his name.
One of his 1950s टेलीविज़न कसरत programs was aimed toward women, whom he also encouraged to join his health clubs.
He invented a number of कसरत मशीने, सहित leg-extension and pulley devices.
Besides producing his own श्रेणी of वीडियो, he coached the बुजुर्ग और निष्क्रिय not to forgo exercise, believing it would enable them to enhance their strength.
LaLanne also gained recognition for his success as a bodybuilder, as खूब as लिये उसके prodigious feats of strength.
Arnold Schwarzenegger एकबार stated, `` कि जोकर lalanne 's an animal !, '' after LaLanne, at 54, beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest.

पेनेलोपे क्रूज़ sánchez ( ; born April 28, 1974 ) is a Spanish actress.

File Explorer, previously known as Windows Explorer, is a file manager application and also a navigation tool that is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows operating system इससे खिड़कियाँ 95 onwards.
It provides a graphical user interface for accessing the file systems.
It is भी the घटक of the ऑपरेटिंग system that presents many user interface items on the monitor such as the taskbar and desktop.
Controlling the computer is possible without Windows Explorer कार्यशील ( लिये उदाहरण, the संचिका | चलाएं कमांड in कार्य मैनेजर on nt-derived versions of Windows will function without it, as will commands typed in a command prompt window ).
Located in the C : \Windows निर्देशिका, it is sometimes referred to as the Windows shell, explorer.exe, or simply “Explorer”.

Interstate 70 ( I-70 ) is an Interstate Highway in the संयुक्त राज्य कि रनों इससे अंतरराज्यीय 15 near Cove Fort, Utah, to a Park and Ride near Baltimore, Maryland.
It was the first अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रोजेक्ट in the United States.
I-70 approximately traces the पाथ of u.S. रूट 40 ( और also the old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains.
West of the Rockies, the route of i-70 थी निकला from multiple sources.
I-70 is the fifth longest Interstate Highway, after i-90, i-80, i-40, and I-10.
The construction of I-70 in Colorado and Utah is considered an engineering marvel as the रूट गुजरता through the आइज़नहावर टनल, glenwood canyon, and the San Rafael Swell.
The Eisenhower Tunnel is the highest पाइंट साथ the Interstate Highway system with an elevation of.
The sections of the interstate in Missouri and Kansas have रखी अर्जी to be the पहला अंतरराज्यीय in the United States.
Though disputed, the Federal Highway Administration has claimed the section of I-70 through glenwood canyon, समाप्त in 1992, थी the पिछला टुकड़ा of the अंतरराज्यीय Highway system, as originally planned, to open to traffic.

As seen from the Earth, a solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between the सूर्य और धरती, और the चंद्रमा fully or partially blocks ( `` occults `` ) the Sun.
This can happen only at new moon, when the Sun and the Moon are in संयोजन as देखी इससे धरती in an संरेखण referred to as syzygy.
In a total eclipse, the disk of the सूर्य is fully obscured by the Moon.
In आंशिक और annular eclipses only part of the Sun is obscured.
If the Moon were in a perfectly गोलाकार कक्षा, a छोटी करीब to the Earth, and in the same orbital plane, there would be total solar eclipses every single month.
However, the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at more than 5 degrees to Earth 's orbit around the Sun ( see ecliptic ) so इसके छाया at नई चंद्रमा प्रायः चूकें धरती.
धरती 's कक्षा is पुकारा the ecliptic प्लेन as the चंद्रमा 's orbit must cross this plane in order for an eclipse ( both solar as well as lunar ) to occur.
In addition, the Moon 's वास्तविक कक्षा is अंडाकार, प्रायः लेने it far enough away from Earth that its apparent size is not large enough to block the Sun totally.
The orbital planes cross each year at a line of nodes resulting in at तनिक दो, और up to पाँच, solar eclipses occurring each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses.
However, total solar eclipses are rare at any particular location because totality exists तभी साथ a सीमित पाथ on धरती 's सतह traced by the Moon 's shadow or umbra.
An ग्रहण is a प्राकृतिक phenomenon.
nevertheless, in कुछ प्राचीन और आधुनिक संस्कृतियों, सौर eclipses have been attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as bad omens.
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to people who are unaware of its खगोलीय स्पष्टीकरण, as the Sun seems to disappear during the day and the sky darkens in a matter of minutes.
Because it is dangerous to look directly at the Sun, observers should use खास नजर सुरक्षा or अप्रत्यक्ष देखने तकनीकों when viewing a partial eclipse, or the partial phases of a total eclipse.
It is safe to view the total phase of a total सौर ग्रहण साथ the unaided eye and without protection, however.
People referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles will travel to रिमोट स्थितियाँ to observe or witness predicted central solar eclipses.
A political party ( from, Genitive partis, `` part '', `` portion '' ) is a political organization that typically seeks to influence, or entirely control, government policy, प्रायः by nominating उम्मीदवार साथ लकीर राजनैतिक दृश्य and trying to seat them in political office.
Parties participate in electoral अभियान और शैक्षणिक outreach or protest actions.
Parties often espouse an विचारधारा or दृष्टि, expressed in a party program, bolstered by a written platform with specific goals, forming a coalition among disparate interests.
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to the genus Mangifera, consisting of numerous तीव्र fruiting पेड़ in the flowering संयंत्र family Anacardiaceae.
the आम is देशी to दक्षिण Asia, from where it has been distributed worldwide to become one of the most cultivated fruits in the tropics.
While other Mangifera species ( e.g. horse mango, M. foetida ) are also grown on a more localized basis, Mangifera indica – the 'common mango ' or 'Indian mango ' – is the तभी आम पेड़ commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions.
It is the national fruit of India, पाकिस्तानी और फिलीपीन.
In several cultures, its fruit and leaves are ritually used as floral decorations at weddings, public celebrations and धार्मिक ceremonies.
Gill Arnette Byrd, < ref name > http : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/b/byrdgi00.htm ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1961 in San Francisco, California ) is a former professional American football player.

World map showing the tropic of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer, भी referred to as the उत्तरी tropic, is the circle of latitude on the Earth that marks the most northerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead at its zenith.
This इवेंट occurs एकबार प्रति साल, at the समय of the June solstice, when the Northern Hemisphere is tilted toward the Sun to its maximum extent.
It currently ( Year 2013 ) झूठ at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ north of the Equator.
Its Southern Hemisphere counterpart, marking the most southerly स्थिति at जिससे the सूर्य may appear सीधे overhead, is the Tropic of Capricorn.
These tropics are two of the five major degree measures or major circles of latitude that mark maps of the धरती, besides the Arctic and Antarctic Circles and the Equator.
The positions of these circles of latitude ( other than the equator ) हैं लिखवाई by the tilt of the Earth 's axis of rotation relative to the plane of its orbit.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store डिजिटल वीडियो on dvd discs, और is फिलहाल the dominant consumer video format in Asia, North America, Europe, and Australia.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g., a DVD player, or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ).
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः multi-channel formats as described below ).
Typically, the आंकड़ा rate for DVD movies ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, and the bit rate is usually adaptive.
It was first available लिये खुदरा around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD Forum and can be प्राप्त इससे dvd format/logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly उपलब्धियाँ, क्युकी प्रत्येक सदस्य must sign a non-disclosure agreement.
निश्चित सूचना in the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential.
In computing and specifically Internet, a leech is एक जो लाभ, प्रायः deliberately, इससे अन्य ' information or effort but does not offer anything in return, or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid being called a leech.
In economics, this type of behavior is called `` free सवारी '' and is associated with the free rider problem.
Depending on context, leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of computer resources, but often instead to लालची उपयोग according to तहज़ीब : to wit, using too much of कया is freely given without contributing a reasonable amount back to the community that provides it.
The name derives from the जोंक, an एनिमल कि sucks blood and then tries to leave unnoticed.
Other शर्तें हैं प्रयुक्त, ऐसे as `` freeloader '', but leech is the most common.

The United राज्य Postal Service ( USPS ), also known as the Post Office and U.S. Mail, is an independent agency of the United States federal government responsible for providing postal service in the United States.
It is one of the few सरकारी एजेंसियों explicitly authorized by the United States Constitution.
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 दौरान the दूसरी महाद्वीपीय Congress, where Benjamin Franklin was appointed the first postmaster general.
The cabinet-level Post Office Department was created in 1792 from Franklin 's operation and रूपांतरित into इसके वर्तमान form in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization Act.
The USPS employs over 574,000 मजदूर and operates over 260,000 vehicles.
The USPS is the operator of the largest गाडी fleet in the world.
The USPS is legally obligated to serve all Americans, regardless of geography, at uniform price and quality.
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' and personal letterboxes in the United States, but still competes against private package delivery services, such as UPS and FedEx.
The USPS has not directly received taxpayer-dollars since the early 1980s with the minor exception of subsidies for costs संबद्ध साथ the निष्क्रिय और विदेशी मतदाता.
Since the 2006 all-time peak mail volume, after which Congress passed the Postal Accountability and Enhancement Act ``, ( which mandated $ 5.5 billion per year to be paid into an account to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 years into the future, a requirement unique among organizations and businesses in the U.S. ), revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced घटती मेल आवाज़, prompting the डाक सेवा to dekh to other sources of revenue while cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit.
Washington, D.C. has महरूम the पूंजी of the United States since 1800.
Eight other cities have served as the meeting place for Congress and are therefore considered to have एकबार महरूम the पूंजी of the संयुक्त States.
In addition, each of the 50 U.S. states और the पाँच प्रिंसिपल territories of the संयुक्त States maintains its own capital.
राजकुमारी cut diamond set in a ring
The Princess cut is the second most popular cut shape for ईंट, अगला to a round brilliant.
The face-up shape of the princess cut is square or rectangular and the profile or side-on shape is समान to कि of an उलट पिरामिड with four beveled sides.
The princess cut is a अपेक्षाकृत नई डायमंड cut, having been created in the 1960s.
It has gained in popularity in recent years as a more distinctive alternative to the more popular round brilliant cut, in जिससे the शीर्ष of diamond, called the crown, is cut with a round face-up shape and the bottom, called the pavilion, is shaped similar to a cone.
A princess cut with the same width as the diameter of a round brilliant will weigh more as it has four corners which would otherwise have been cut बंद और rounded to रूप a गोलाकार brilliant.
The princess cut is sometimes referred to as a वर्गाकार परिवर्धित brilliant.
However, जबकि displaying the वही high degree of brilliance, its faceting style is unique and completely different from that of a round brilliant.
The Princess cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut, having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or `` Cross '' cut crown and a series of unique, chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion जिससे combine to दे a पृथक cross-shaped प्रतिबिंब जब the स्टोन is viewed सीधे through the table.
Effectively, the Princess cut combines the high degree of light return of a round brilliant cut with a distinctive वर्गाकार or आयताकार आकार.
The square princess cut diamond is प्रायः थोड़ा सस्ता than गोलाकार शानदार काटें ईंट of the same carat weight because it retains about 80 % of the rough diamond, as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough.
The ability to retain more crystal weight makes this shape popular amongst डायमंड cutters.
Accredited Gem Appraisers ( AGA ) and American Gem Society Laboratory ( AGSL ) and European Gem Laboratories-USA ( egl-usa ) हैं फिलहाल the तभी labs that grade the Princess cut for cut.
There is no universal definition of what माप मेक an आदर्श राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड और अनेक diamond manufacturers market ideal diamonds with differing facet patterns and angles as `` ideal cut ''.
In contrast to the AGSL, AGA, and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has stated कि वहीँ is नहीं पर्याप्त उद्योग सर्वसम्मति or empirical data to specify cut grading standards for Princess cut diamonds and to do so is at the risk of consumers who may be deceived by diamonds accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut grades.
The name `` Princess Cut '' was originally प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ another डायमंड काटें, वरना ज्ञात as the `` Profile '' cut, designed by Arpad Nagy, a London cutter, in 1961.
The same name was later used and made popular by Ygal Perlman, betzalel ambar, and Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979.
A similar cut with only 49 facets, as opposed to the original 58 facets of the princess cut, was later branded the `` quadrillion '' और initially वितरित by ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles.
Three years of optical शोध yielded a वर्गाकार stone with faceting similar to that of a round brilliant cut diamond.
A तुलना
The number of chevrons can affect the overall आउटलुक of a राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड.
इस can प्रायः be संकल्पित by the wire diagram that is plotted in diamond grading reports.
By adding more chevrons on the pavilion side of the diamond, the individual facets of the डायमंड होगा अभी be broken down into smaller facets.
As a परिणाम, it can give a princess cut diamond a `` crushed ice '' look.
Vice versa, when a princess cut diamond has lesser chevrons, it tends to give the डायमंड a चंकी आउटलुक due to broader facets.
The domestic dog ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the gray भेड़िया ( canis lupus ), a सदस्य of the कैनिडाए परिवार of the mammalian order Carnivora.
The term `` domestic श्वान '' is generally प्रयुक्त for both domesticated and feral varieties.
The dog has been the first animal to be domesticated and has been the सबसे widely रखा working, शिकार, and pet animal in human history.
The word `` dog '' may also mean the male of a canine species, as opposed to the word `` कुतिया '' लिये the मादा of the species.
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000 years ago but,, the oldest fossil specimens genetically linked to the modern dog 's lineage date to approximately 33,000-36,000 years ago.
Dogs ' value to early human hunter-gatherers led to उन्हें quickly becoming ubiquitous across world cultures.
Dogs perform many roles for लोगों, ऐसे as शिकार, herding, pulling loads, protection, assisting police and military, companionship, and, more recently, aiding handicapped individuals.
इस प्रभाव on human society has given them the nickname `` Man 's Best Friend '' in the Western world.
In some संस्कृतियों, कुत्तो are also a source of meat.
In 2001, there were estimated to be 400 लाख कुत्तो in the world.
Most breeds of dogs are at most a few hundred years old, having been artificially चयनित लिये particular morphologies and behaviors by people for specific functional roles.
Through this selective breeding, the श्वान रै विकसित into सैंकड़ों of varied breeds, and shows more behavioral and morphological variation than any other land mammal.
For example, height measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in the Irish Wolfhound ; color varies from white through grays ( usually called `` blue '' ) to black, and browns from लाइट ( तन ) to अंधेरा ( `` रेड '' or `` चॉकलेट '' ) in a चौड़ी variation of patterns ; coats can be short or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, straight, curly, or smooth.
It is common for सबसे breeds to shed this coat.
आरेख of a हस्तांतरण electron microscope
A 1973 Siemens इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी, musée देस कला et Métiers, Paris
An electron microscope ( EM ) is a type of microscope that uses an electron beam to illuminate a specimen and produce a magnified image.
An EM has greater resolving power than a light microscope and can reveal the structure of smaller objects क्युकी electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons.
They can achieve better than 50 pm रेज़ोल्यूशन और magnifications of up to परिचय 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal light microscopes are limited by diffraction to about 200 nm resolution and useful magnifications below 2000x.
The electron microscope uses electrostatic and electromagnetic lenses to control the इलेक्ट्रॉन बीम and focus it to form an image.
These electron ऑप्टिकल lenses हैं analogous to the glass lenses of a light optical microscope.
Electron microscopes are used to investigate the ultrastructure of a wide range of biological and inorganic specimens including microorganisms, कोशिकाएं, विशाल अणुओं, biopsy samples, metals, and crystals.
Industrially, the electron microscope is often used for quality control and failure analysis.
Modern electron microscopes produce इलेक्ट्रॉन micrographs, using specialized digital cameras or frame grabbers to capture the image.
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried मुर्गा तेज़ खाना रेस्तरां founded in 1972 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Often referred to as popeyes और sometimes as popeyes मुर्गा & Biscuits or Popeyes Chicken & Seafood, It was acquired by Sandy Springs, Georgia -based AFC Enterprises, originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company, in 1993.
According to a company press release dated June 29, 2007, Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service मुर्गा रेस्तरां समूह, measured by क्रमांक of इकाई '', साथ अधिक than 1,800 रेस्तरां in अधिक than 40 states and the District of Columbia, and over 22 countries worldwide including Turkey, Northern Cyprus, Bahrain, China, Hong Kong, Iraq, Indonesia, Jordan, Kuwait, United Arab Emirates, Japan, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, South Korea, Singapore, Canada, Jamaica, Guyana, Suriname, Mexico, Trinidad, Puerto Rico, Honduras, Vietnam, Panama, Peru, and Costa Rica.
परिचय तीस locations are company-owned, the rest franchised.
The leg press is a weight training exercise in जिससे the व्यक्तिगत pushes a वज़न or resistance away from them using their legs.
The term लेग दबायें also refers to the apparatus used to perform this exercise.
The leg press can be used to evaluate an athlete 's overall lower body strength ( from knee joint to हिप ).
Using the तिर्यक sled-type leg press machine.
There are दो प्रमुख प्रकार of leg press:
The diagonal or लंबवत 'sled ' type leg press.
Weight disks ( plates ) are attached directly to the sled, which is आरोहित on rails.
The user sits below the sled और pushes it upward with their feet.
These machines normally शामिल समायोज्य सुरक्षा brackets that prevent the user from being trapped under the weight.
The 'cable ' प्रकार लेग press, or 'seated leg press ', commonly found on multigyms.
The user sits upright and pushes forward with their feet onto a plate that is attached to the वज़न स्टेक by अर्थात् of a long स्टील केबल.
Wendy विलियम्स शिकारी ( born वेन्डी जोन Williams ; July 18, 1964 ) is an American media personality, actress and author.
She होस्ट a syndicated टेलीविज़न बात show, The Wendy Williams Show.
prior to टेलीविज़न, Williams was a `` shock jockette `` on several radio shows.
Williams has gained notoriety for her on-air spats साथ celebrities.
She was the subject of the 2006 VH1 reality TV series called The Wendy Williams अनुभव जिससे ब्रॉडकास्ट events surrounding her radio show.
She has written an आत्मकथा and several other books, and has created a product line called Adorn by Wendy Williams.
Patrick Henry `` देशद्रोह '' speech before the House of Burgesses in an 1851 painting by Peter F. Rothermel
`` Give me स्वतंत्रता, or दे me मौत ! '' is a quotation attributed to Patrick Henry from a speech he made to the Virginia Convention.
on कि दिन, at st. जॉन 's गिरिजाघर in Richmond, Virginia, and is credited with having swung the balance in convincing the Virginia House of Burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War.
Among the delegates to the सम्मेलन यहूद भविष्य us Presidents Thomas Jefferson and George Washington.
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada.
situated in the देश 's Atlantic region, it incorporates the island of Newfoundland and mainland Labrador to the northwest, with a combined area of.
In 2011, the प्रांत 's population was 514,536.
Approximately 92 percent of the province 's population lives on the Island of Newfoundland ( including its associated smaller आइलैंड्स ), of जिससे अधिक than हाफ live on the Avalon Peninsula.
The province is Canada 's most linguistically homogenous, साथ 97.6 % of निवासियों रिपोर्टिंग अंग्रेज़ी ( Newfoundland English ) as their mother tongue in the 2006 census ;.
historically, न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड थी भी घर to unique varieties of French, and Irish, as well as the now-extinct Beothuk language.
In Labrador, local dialects of innu-aimun और inuktitut are also spoken.
Newfoundland and Labrador 's capital and largest city, St. John 's, is Canada 's 20th-largest Census महानगर क्षेत्रफल, और is घर to लगभग 40 प्रतिशत of the प्रांत 's population.
St. John 's is the seat of सरकारी, घर to the हाउस of सभा of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and Labrador and the highest court in the jurisdiction, the Newfoundland and Labrador Court of Appeal.
A former colony and dominion of the United Kingdom, Newfoundland and Labrador became the tenth province to enter the Canadian Confederation on कूच 31, 1949, as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड.
On December 6, 2001, an amendment was made to the Constitution of कनाडा to बदलें the प्रांत 's official name to Newfoundland and Labrador.
In day-to-day conversation, however, Canadians generally स्टिल refer to the प्रांत itself as Newfoundland and to the region on the Canadian mainland as Labrador.
Theodore `` t.r. ''
Roosevelt, Jr. ( ; October 27, 1858—January 6, 1919 ) थी the 26th अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1901–1909 ).
He is noted for his exuberant personality, range of रूचि और उपलब्धियाँ, और उसके नेतृत्व of the Progressive Movement, as well as his `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity.
He was a leader of the Republican Party and founder of the first अवतार of the short-lived प्रगतिशील ( `` Bull Moose '' ) Party of 1912.
Before बनने अध्यक्ष, he held offices at the city, state, and federal levels.
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist, explorer, hunter, author, and soldier are as much a part of his fame as कोई दफ्तर he आयोजित as a राजनेता.
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of the United States in 1901, making him the youngest अध्यक्ष कभी ; he ताल आउट the youngest elected president, John F. Kennedy, by only one year.
रूज़वेल्ट थी भी the पहला of only three sitting presidents to have won the Nobel Peace Prize.
The Teddy bear is named after him, despite उसके अवमानना लिये होने पुकारा `` Teddy ''.
Born into a wealthy family in New York City, Roosevelt was a sickly child who suffered from asthma and stayed at home studying प्राकृतिक इतिहास.
To overcome his शारीरिक कमज़ोरी, he embraced a strenuous life.
Home-schooled, he became an eager छात्र of nature.
He attended Harvard University, where he studied जीवविज्ञान, boxed और विकसित an interest in naval affairs.
In 1881, one year out of Harvard, he was elected to the New York State सभा, जहाँ he became a नेता of the सुधार गुट of उसके रिपब्लिकन Party ( the `` GOP '' ).
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established his professional reputation as a serious इतिहासकार ; he लिखा numerous किताबे on शिकार, the बाहरी, और वर्तमान राजनैतिक issues, as well as frontier history.
In 1884, his first wife और उसके माँ died on the same day.
He temporarily बाएँ राजनीती और गई to the frontier, becoming a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas.
Returning to New York City, he ran for mayor in 1886, finishing तीसरा साथ 60,000 votes.
He later gained fame by taking vigorous चार्ज of the नगर पुलिस.
At the national level, he was a नेता in सिविल सेवा reform.
The Spanish–American War broke out in 1898 while रूज़वेल्ट थी, effectively, कार्यशील the Department of the Navy.
He promptly resigned and formed the Rough Riders – a volunteer cavalry रेजीमेंट कि लड़ा in क्यूबा.
The war hero थी निर्वाचित राज्यपाल in 1898 and in 1900 was nominated for vice president.
He successfully energized the GOP base as a highly visible campaigner to reelect President William McKinley on a platform of ऊँची tariffs, the सुनहरा मानक, imperialism, prosperity at home and victory abroad.
In 1901, President William McKinley was assassinated और रूज़वेल्ट became President.
He attempted to move the Republican पार्टी ( gop ) toward प्रगतिवाद, including trust busting and increased regulation of businesses.
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended to the Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon the death of his predecessor, winning the largest प्रतिशत of the लोकप्रिय vote since the uncontested election of 1820.
Roosevelt coined the phrase `` Square Deal `` to describe his domestic agenda, emphasizing कि the औसत नागरिक होता मिलेंगी a मेला share under his policies.
As an outdoorsman और naturalist, he प्रचारित the conservation movement.
On the world stage, रूज़वेल्ट 's नीतियों यहूद characterized by his slogan, `` Speak softly and carry a big stick ``.
A cousin is a सापेक्ष with whom a person shares one or more common ancestor ( s ) ( other than a parent, child/descendant, sibling, child/descendant of a sibling, or sibling of a parent/ancestor ).
However in common parlance, `` cousin '' normally specifically means `` first cousin ''.
Systems of `` degrees '' and `` removals '' are used in the English-speaking world to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the व्यापक भाव ) और the पूर्वज वे have in common.
Various governmental entities have established systems for legal use that can more precisely specify kinships साथ आम ancestors existing any number of generations in the past, though common usage often eliminates the degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives ''.
Webster is an American situation comedy that aired on ABC from सितंबर 16, 1983 जबतक may 8, 1987, और in first-run syndication from September 21, 1987 until March 10, 1989.
The series was created by stu चांदी.
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy who, after losing his parents, is adopted by his एनएफएल -pro गॉडफादर, portrayed by एलेक्स karras, और his new socialite wife, played by Susan Clark.
The focus was largely on how this impulsively married couple had to adjust to their new lives and sudden parenthood, लकिन it थी the अनुकूल वेबस्टर खुद जो drove much of the plot.
The series was उत्पादित by Georgian Bay Ltd., Emmanuel Lewis Entertainment Enterprises, Inc. ( 1986-1989 ) and Paramount Television.
Like NBC 's earlier hit diff'rent स्ट्रोक्स, वेबस्टर प्रदर्शित a यंग African-American boy adopted by a white family.
Three types of कोशिका division
Cell division is the process by which a parent cell divides into two or अधिक बेटी cells.
Cell division usually occurs as part of a larger कोशिका cycle.
In eukaryotes, there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative division, whereby each बेटी कोशिका is genetically एकसमान to the जनक कोशिका ( समसूत्रण ), and a reductive cell division, whereby the number of chromosomes in the daughter cells is reduced by half, to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ).
Both of these cell division cycles are required in sexually reproducing organisms at some point in their life cycle, and दोनो हैं believed to be उपस्थित in the पिछला eukaryotic आम पूर्वज Prokaryotes also undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary fission, where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells.
All cell divisions, regardless of सजीव, हैं preceded by a सिंगल round of DNA replication.
For simple unicellular organisms such as the amoeba, one कोशिका प्रभाग is समतुल्य to reproduction – an entire new organism is created.
On a larger scale, mitotic cell division can create progeny इससे बहुकोशिकीय organisms, such as plants that grow from cuttings.
कोशिका प्रभाग भी enables sexually reproducing organisms to develop from the one-celled zygote, which itself was produced by cell division from gametes.
And after growth, cell division allows for continual निर्माण और repair of the organism.
A human being 's body experiences about 10,000 खरब कोशिका विभाजन in a lifetime.
Cell division has been modeled by परिमित subdivision rules.
The primary concern of cell division is the मेंटेनेंस of the असली cell 's genome.
Before प्रभाग can occur, the genomic सूचना कि is stored in chromosomes must be replicated, and the duplicated genome must be separated cleanly between cells.
a ग्रेट सौदे of cellular infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic information consistent between `` generations ''.

Howard Jones ( born John Howard Jones, 23 February 1955, Southampton, हैम्पशायर, इंग्लैण्ड ) is a British musician, singer and songwriter.
according to the गिनीज किताब of British Hit Singles & Albums, `` Jones is an accomplished singer-songwriter who was a regular chart visitor in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop.
Jones, who was equally popular in the u.S., appeared at Live Aid ``.
Allmusic journalist, Stephen Thomas Erlewine adds, `` Jones was one of the धमक आंकड़े of mid-1980s synthpop.
His music merged the प्रौद्योगिकी intensive ध्वनि of नई वेव with the cheery optimism of hippies and late 1960s pop.
Jones racked up a string of hits in the mid and late 1980s, before he retreated into being a cult figure in the 1990s ''.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय आइल of Man TT ( Tourist Trophy ) Race is a motorcycle racing event held on the Isle of Man and was for many years the most prestigious motorcycle race in the world.
The event was भाग of the fim मोटरसाइकिल Grand Prix World Championship during the period 1949–1976 before being transferred to the United Kingdom after safety concerns and run by the FIM as the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season.
The Isle of Man TT Races became part of the TT Formula 1 Championship from 1977 to 1990 to preserve the इवेंट 's रेसिंग status.
From 1989 the racing has been developed by the Isle of Man Department of पर्यटन as the आइल of man tt पर्व.
The race is run in a time-trial format on public roads closed for racing by the provisions of an अधिनियम of tynwald ( the पार्लियामेंट of the Isle of Man ).
The first रेस थी आयोजित on मंगलवार 28 may 1907 and was called the International Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy.
The event was organised by the Auto-Cycle Club over 10 laps of the St John 's छोटी कोर्स of 15 मील 1,470 गज लिये road-legal touring motorcycles with exhaust silencers, saddles, pedals and mud-guards.
The winner of the single-cylinder क्लास, और overall विजेता of the पहला इवेंट in 1907, was Charlie Collier riding a Matchless motorcycle in a time of 4 hours, 8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average race speed of 38.21 mph.
The विजेता of the twin-cylinder क्लास was Rem Fowler riding a Peugeot engined Norton in a time of 4 hours 21 minutes and 52 seconds at an average race speed of 36.21 mph.
The trophy presented to Charlie Collier as the winner of the 1907 आइल of man tt रेस, थी दान by the बिल्ले de Mouzilly St. Mars.
It featured a stylised version of Olympic God Hermes by giovanni da बोलोग्ना as a चांदी figurine astride a winged wheel.
The trophy was similar in design to the 18 carat gold Montague Trophy presented to John Napier ( arrol-johnston ) as the inaugural विजेता of the आइल of Man Tourist Trophy car race in 1905 now known as the RAC Tourist Trophy.
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. मंगल ट्रॉफी is अभी presented annually to the winner of the Isle of Man Senior TT Motor-Cycle Race.
The 2007 Isle of Man TT was the Centenary event which ran between 26 May and 8 June 2007 and featured a special re-enactment of the 1907 आइल of Man TT Race held on the village green next to Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007.
the विंटेज परेड of 100 क्लासिक motorcycles for the Centenary Re-enactment on the original St John 's Short Course was flagged away by former World Motor-Cycle Champion Geoff Duke.
The first of the participants to be flagged away was the recently लौटी twin-cylinder peugeot-norton ridden by rem fowler दौरान the first Isle of Man TT Race in 1907.
Also participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT race competitor Guy Martin riding a 1938 Triumph Tiger 100 500 cc and other former TT प्रतिस्पर्धी सहित एलन cathcart, सैमी मिलर, Nick Jefferies and Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment lap.
