Unemployment ( or joblessness ) occurs when people are without work और actively seeking work.
The unemployment रेट is a माप of the व्यापकता of unemployment and it is calculated as a percentage by dividing the number of unemployed individuals by all individuals currently in the labor force.
During periods of recession, an economy usually experiences a relatively ऊँची बेरोजगारी rate.
According to International Labour Organization report, more than 197 million people globally are out of work or 6 % of the संसार 's workforce यहूद बगैर a जॉब in 2012.
There remains considerable theoretical debate regarding the कल्याणकारी, consequences और समाधान for unemployment.
Classical economics, New classical economics, and the आस्ट्रिया School of economics argue that market mechanisms are reliable means of resolving unemployment.
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the मजदूर मार्केट इससे the बाहर, ऐसे as unionization, minimum wage laws, taxes, and other regulations that they claim discourage the hiring of workers.
Keynesian economics emphasizes the cyclical nature of unemployment and recommends government interventions in the अर्थव्यवस्था कि it दावा होगा reduce unemployment during recessions.
This theory focuses on recurrent shocks that suddenly reduce aggregate demand for goods and services and यूँ reduce माँग लिये मजदूर.
Keynesian models recommend government interventions designed to increase demand for workers ; ये can शामिल वित्तीय stimuli, सरेआम funded job creation, and expansionist monetary policies.
In addition to these comprehensive theories of unemployment, there are a few categorizations of unemployment that are used to more precisely model the effects of बेरोजगारी भीतर the economic system.
The main types of unemployment include structural unemployment which focuses on structural problems in the economy and inefficiencies inherent in labour markets, including a mismatch between the सप्लाई और माँग of laborers साथ necessary skill sets.
Structural arguments emphasize causes and solutions related to विघटनकारी technologies and globalization.
Discussions of frictional unemployment focus on voluntary decisions to work based on each individuals ' valuation of their own work and how that compares to वर्तमान मजदूरी दरों plus the time and effort required to find a job.
Causes and solutions for frictional unemployment often पता जॉब प्रविष्टि threshold and wage rates.
Behavioral economists हाइलाइट व्यक्तिगत biases in निर्णय making, and often involve problems and solutions concerning sticky wages and efficiency wages.
Collectivism is any philosophic, political, religious, economic, or social outlook that emphasizes the interdependence of every human being in a society or civilization.
Collectivism is a मौलिक सांस्कृतिक तत्व कि exists as the reverse of individualism in human nature ( in the same way high context culture exists as the reverse of low context culture ).
Collectivist orientations stress the importance of मिलाप भीतर सोशल समूह ( such as an `` in-group '', in what specific context it is defined ) and in some cases, the priority of group goals over individual goals.
collectivists often focus on community, society, nation or country.
It has been used as an element in अनेक अलग और विविध प्रकार of सरकारी और राजनैतिक, आर्थिक and educational philosophies throughout history and most human societies in practice contain elements of both individualism and collectivism.
Some examples of collectivist cultures include India and Japan.
Collectivism can be divided into horizontal collectivism और लंबवत collectivism.
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among equal individuals, and is यूँ प्रायः आधारित on decentralization और समतावाद.
Vertical collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of power and on moral and सांस्कृतिक conformity, और is इसलिए based on centralization and hierarchy.
A cooperative enterprise would be an example of आड़ा collectivism, whereas a सैन्य पदानुक्रम होता be an example of vertical collectivism.
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( adem ) is an प्रतिरक्षा mediated disease of the brain.
It usually occurs following a viral infection but may appear following vaccination, bacterial or parasitic संक्रमण, or भी appear अनायास.
As it involves autoimmune demyelination, it is similar to multiple sclerosis, and is considered part of the Multiple काठिन्य borderline diseases.
The incidence rate is about 8 per 1,000,000 लोगों per year.
Although it occurs in all ages, most reported cases are in children and adolescents, साथ the औसत आयु around 5 to 8 years old.
The mortality rate may be as high as 5 %, full recovery is seen in 50 to 75 % of cases, while up to 70 to 90 % रिकवर साथ कुछ नाबालिग अवशेष disability.
the औसत समय to recover is one to six months.
ADEM produces multiple inflammatory lesions in the brain and spinal cord, particularly in the white matter.
Usually these are मिला in the subcortical और सेंट्रल श्वेत पदार्थ और cortical gray-white जंक्शन of both cerebral hemispheres, cerebellum, brainstem, and spinal cord, but periventricular white matter and gray matter of the cortex, thalami and basal ganglia may also be involved.
When the patient suffers अधिक than एक demyelinating एपीसोड, it is पुकारा तूल disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ).
The stomach is a muscular, hollow, dilated part of the digestion system which कृत्यों as an महत्वपूर्ण अंग of the digestive ट्रैक्ट in some animals, including vertebrates, echinoderms, insects ( mid-gut ), and molluscs.
It is involved in the second phase of पाचन, following mastication ( chewing ).
the stomach is located between the esophagus and the small intestine.
It secretes protein-digesting enzymes पुकारा protease और दमदार acids to सहायता in खाना पाचन, ( भेजा to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through smooth muscular contortions ( called segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines.
The word stomach is derived from the Latin stomachus which is derived from the Greek word stomachos ( στόμαχος ), ultimately इससे stoma ( ), `` mouth ''.
The words gastro- and gastric ( meaning related to the stomach ) हैं दोनो निकला इससे the यूनानी word gaster ( ).
1940 Pontiac Special श्रेणी 25 woodie
A woodie is a car body style, especially a station wagon, जहाँ the पश्च bodywork is constructed of wood framework with infill panels of wood or painted metal.
After the demise of actual wood construction, manufacturers used simulated woodgrain sheet vinyl—sometimes augmented साथ three-dimensional, simulated framework—to recall wood construction.
In 2008, wood construction was evoked abstractly on the Ford Flex with a series of side and rear आड़ा डोले.
A pearl is a hard ऑब्जेक्ट उत्पादित भीतर the नरम ऊतक ( specifically the mantle ) of a living shelled mollusc.
Just like the shell of a clam, a pearl is made up of calcium carbonate in minute crystalline रूप, जिससे रै महरूम deposited in केंद्रिय layers.
The ideal pearl is perfectly गोलाकार और चिकना, लकिन अनेक other shapes of pearls ( baroque pearls ) occur.
The finest quality natural pearls have महरूम अत्यधिक valued as रत्नों और वस्तुएँ of सौंदर्य लिये अनेक सदियां, and because of this, the word pearl has become a metaphor for something very rare, fine, admirable, and valuable.
the सबसे मूल्यवान मोती occur spontaneously in the wild, but they are extremely rare.
ये जंगली मोती are referred to as natural pearls.
Cultured or farmed pearls from pearl oysters and freshwater mussels मेक up the बहुमत of those that are currently sold.
Imitation pearls are also widely sold in inexpensive jewelry, but the विशेषता of उनके iridescence is प्रायः बहुत ग़रीब, और प्रायः, कृत्रिम pearls are easily distinguished from genuine pearls.
Pearls have been harvested and cultivated primarily लिये use in jewelry, but in the past they were also stitched onto lavish clothing.
Pearls have also been crushed and used in cosmetics, दवाइयाँ, और in पेंट formulations.
Whether wild or संस्कारी, gem विशेषता मोती are almost always nacreous and, as is the interior of the shell that produces them.
However, almost all species of shelled molluscs are capable of producing pearls ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by some sources ) of lesser shine or less spherical shape.
Although ये may भी be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological labs and also under U.S. Federal Trade Commission rules, and are formed in the same way, most of them have no value, except as curiosities.
Bing ( known previously as सजीव ढूंढें, खिड़कियाँ सजीव ढूंढें, and MSN Search ) is a web search engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine `` ) from Microsoft.
Bing was unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer on May 28, 2009 at the All Things Digital सम्मेलन in सैन डिएगो लिये release on June 1.
notable परिवर्तन शामिल the लिस्टिंग of ढूंढें सुझाव जबकि प्रश्नों are entered and a list of related searches ( called `` Explore pane '' ) based on semantic technology from Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008.
On July 29, 2009, Microsoft and Yahoo ! घोषित a सौदे in जिससे bing होता शक्ति Yahoo ! Search.
All Yahoo ! Search global customers और साझेदार हैं अपेक्षित to have made the transition by early 2012.
In October 2011, Bing announced it थी working on नई back-end ढूंढें infrastructure, with the goal of delivering faster and slightly more relevant search results for users.
Known as `` Tiger '', the new index-serving प्रौद्योगिकी रै महरूम incorporated into Bing globally, since August 2011.
In May 2012, Bing announced another redesign of इसके ढूंढें इंजन कि शामिल `` साइडबार '', a social feature that searches users ' social networks for information relevant to the search query.
A diagram showing an I गठन on ठोकर and a 4-3 Formation on defense
In American football, प्रत्येक टोली रै ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the field at one time.
The specific role that a player takes on the field is called their स्थिति.
Under the modern rules of American फ़ुटबॉल, टीमों हैं अनुमत असीमित subsititutions, that is teams may change any number of players after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of खिलाड़ी, the ठोकर ( the टोली साथ the ball, who is trying to score ), the defense ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring, and to take the ball from them ), and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, various specific positions मौजूद depending on what the player 's main job is.
The Irish people ( or na hÉireannaigh ; Ulster-Scots : Airish fowk ) are an ethnic group who originate in आयरलैंड, an द्वीप in northwestern Europe.
Ireland has been आबादी लिये around 9,000 years ( according to archaeological studies, see Prehistoric Ireland ).
The Irish people 's earliest ancestors are recorded in legends – they are claimed to be descended from groups such as the Nemedians, Fomorians, Fir Bolg, tuatha dé danann और the Milesians.
lebor gabála érenn, a किताब of आयरिश mythology tells that Milesians were Scythian descendants.
The main समूह कि interacted साथ the आयरिश in the Middle Ages include the Picts, Scots, and the Vikings.
Due to this सम्पर्क, icelanders हैं noted for having some Irish descent.
The Anglo-Norman invasion of the High Middle Ages, the English plantations और the subsequent अंग्रेज़ी नियम of the देश introduced the normans and Flemish into Ireland.
वेल्श, picts, bretons, and small parties of Gauls and even Anglo-Saxons are known in Ireland from much earlier times.
There have been many notable आयरिश लोगों throughout history.
The 6th century Irish monk and missionary Columbanus is regarded as one of the `` fathers of यूरोपीय '', followed by kilian of Würzburg and Vergilius of Salzburg.
The scientist Robert Boyle is considered the `` पिता of रसायन ``.
Famous Irish explorers include Brendan the Navigator, Robert McClure, अर्नेस्ट shackleton और tom crean.
By some accounts, the first European child born in North America had Irish descent on both sides ; and an irishman थी the पहला यूरोपीय to set foot on American soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492.
There हैं वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों जीना in अनेक western countries, particularly in English-speaking countries.
Historically, emigration has been caused by politics, famine and आर्थिक मुद्दे.
An estimated 50 to 80 million people are descendants of Irish people, primarily in the संयुक्त किंगडम, the संयुक्त राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा और Iceland ; there are also smaller numbers in Argentina, Chile, Mexico, Jamaica, Barbados, South Africa, New Zealand, France, Germany and Brazil.
The largest number of वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों सजीव in the United States.
The number of people living in Australia who are of Irish descent is उच्चतर, as a प्रतिशत of कुल जनसांख्यिकी, than that of any other country.
Approximately forty percent of the settlement population of Iceland came from Ireland or स्कॉटलैंड.
The very first निवासियों of आइसलैंड were Irish.
The Hubble Space Telescope ( HST ) is a space telescope that was carried into कक्षा by a Space Shuttle in 1990 and remains in operation.
A aperture telescope in low Earth orbit, Hubble 's four main instruments observe in the निकट पराबैंगनी, visible, and near infrared.
The दूरदर्शी is नामित बाद the astronomer Edwin Hubble.
Hubble 's orbit outside the distortion of Earth 's माहौल allows it to take extremely sharp images with almost no background light.
हबल 's गहन फ़ील्ड have महरूम कुछ of the most detailed visible-light images ever, allowing a deep view into space and time.
Many Hubble observations have led to सफलताएँ in astrophysics, ऐसे as accurately determining the rate of expansion of the universe.
Although not the first space telescope, Hubble is one of the largest and most versatile, and is well known as दोनो a vital शोध औजार और a पब्लिक संबंध बून लिये astronomy.
The HST was built by the United States space agency NASA, with contributions from the European Space Agency, and is operated by the स्पेस दूरदर्शी Science Institute.
The HST is one of NASA 's Great Observatories, along with the Compton Gamma रे वेधशाला, the चन्द्रा x-ray वेधशाला, and the Spitzer Space Telescope.
Space telescopes यहूद प्रस्तावित as early as 1923.
Hubble was funded in the 1970s, with a proposed launch in 1983, but the project was beset by तकनीकी देरी, बजट problems, and the Challenger disaster.
When finally launched in 1990, scientists found that the main mirror had been ground incorrectly, compromising the दूरदर्शी 's capabilities.
The telescope was restored to its intended विशेषता by a सर्विसिंग mission in 1993.
Hubble is the only दूरदर्शी designed to be सर्विस in space by astronauts.
Between 1993 and 2002, four missions repaired, upgraded, and replaced systems on the telescope ; a fifth mission was canceled on safety grounds following the Columbia disaster.
However, after spirited public discussion, NASA administrator Mike griffin स्वीकृत एक फाइनल सर्विसिंग मिशन, समाप्त in 2009 by Space Shuttle Atlantis.
The telescope is now expected to function until at तनिक 2013.
Its scientific successor, the James Webb Space Telescope ( JWST ), is to be शुभारम्भ in 2018 or possibly later.
Anti-inflammatory refers to the प्रॉपर्टी of a पदार्थ or treatment that reduces inflammation.
Anti-inflammatory drugs make up about half of analgesics, remedying pain by reducing inflammation as opposed to opioids, जिससे affect the सेंट्रल बेचैन system.
The Tonight Show is a US late-night talk show कि रै aired on NBC since 1954.
It is the longest currently running regularly अनुसूचित entertainment कार्यक्रम in the us और the तीसरा longest-running show on NBC after Meet the Press and Today.
The Tonight Show was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ), Jack Paar ( 1957–1962 ), Johnny Carson ( 1962–1992 ), Jay Leno ( 1992–2009, 2010–present ), और कोनन o'brien ( 2009–2010 ).
Several guest hosts also appeared, विशेषकर during the Paar and Carson eras.
The longest-serving host to date was Johnny Carson, who hosted The Tonight Show अभिनीत जॉनी कार्सन लिये 30 सीज़न from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1992.
The current host of the show is jay लीनो, जो था previously hosted the दिखाएँ from 1992 to 2009 and began his second tenure on March 1, 2010.
On April 3, 2013, एनबीसी घोषित jimmy fallon would become the new host of The Tonight Show.
The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon will premiere February 24, 2014, the day after the closing ceremonies of the 2014 शीत ओलंपिक.
SS Andrea डोरिया.
Pronounced was an ocean liner for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione Italia ) home ported in Genoa, Italy, most famous for इसके डूब in 1956, जब 52 लोगों died ( 51 इससे immediate impact ).
नामित बाद the 16th-century genoese admiral एंड्रिया डोरिया, the ship had a gross register tonnage of 29,100 and a capacity of about 1,200 passengers and 500 crew.
लिये a देश attempting to rebuild इसके economy and reputation after World War II, Andrea Doria was an icon of Italian national pride.
Of all Italy 's ships at the time, Andrea Doria was the largest, तीव्रतम और supposedly safest.
Launched on 16 जून 1951, the जलयान undertook its maiden voyage on 14 January 1953.
On 25 July 1956, while the एंड्रिया डोरिया थी approaching the coast of nantucket, मैसाचुसेट्स, बंधी लिये नई यॉर्क नगर, the eastbound of the Swedish American Line collided with it in what became one of history 's most infamous maritime disasters.
Struck in the पक्ष, the top-heavy Andrea Doria immediately started to list severely to starboard, which left half of its lifeboats unusable.
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant घाटा of जीवन, लकिन the दक्षता of the ship 's technical design allowed it to stay afloat for over 11 hours after the ramming.
The good behavior of the crew, improvements in communications and the rapid response of other ships averted a disaster similar in स्केल to कि of the in 1912.
1,660 passengers and crew were rescued and survived, while 46 people died as a consequence of the collision.
The evacuated luxury liner capsized and sank the following morning.
This accident remains the worst maritime disaster to occur in United States waters चूंकि the डूब of the in 1915.
The incident and its aftermath यहूद heavily covered by the news media.
While the rescue efforts were both successful and commendable, the cause of the collision with the Stockholm and the loss of Andrea डोरिया उत्पन्न much ब्याज in the मीडिया और अनेक lawsuits.
Largely because of an out-of-court settlement agreement between the two shipping companies during hearings immediately after the disaster, no determination of the cause ( s ) थी कभी formally published.
Although greater blame appeared initially to पतन on the इतालवी लाइनर, अधिक हाल discoveries have indicated that a misreading of radar on the Swedish ship may have initiated the collision course, leading to errors on both ships.
Andrea Doria थी the पिछला प्रमुख transatlantic passenger vessel to sink before aircraft became the preferred method of travel.
डायलिसिस tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable झिल्ली tubing made from regenerated cellulose or cellophane.
It can be used for diffusion with solutes or osmosis if प्रयुक्त साथ जल only.
Osmosis is when water passes through a semi-permeable परत to reach equilibrium.
diffusion, on the अन्य hand, allows the movement of molecules from high concentration to low concentration.
It will only allow molecules to pass through a semi-permeable membrane or layer if the molecule is small enough to fit through the झिल्ली or a membrane 's pore.
This usually results with the effects of diffusion through a membrane only really affects छोटी अणुओं, और लगभग never larger molecules.
Dialysis tubing is used in clinical circumstances to ensure a filtered प्रवाह of अणुओं, preventing the flow of larger solute molecules.
Small molecules can be `` washed '' आउट of a समाधान जिससे is pumped through the tubing into a solvent, usually water, which surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away.
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes, a solution containing several types of molecules, प्रायः ग्लूकोज और मंड, is लगाई into a semi-permeable dialysis bag, such as a cellulose membrane with pores, and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band.
The sealed dialysis bag is placed in a संग्राहक of a different solution, or water.
Molecules small enough to pass through the tubing ( water, salts, monosaccharides, and other small molecules ) tend to मूव into or आउट of the डायलिसिस थैला in the दिशा of अवरोहण concentration, therefore displaying diffusion.
Larger molecules ( such as proteins, or polysaccharides ) कि have आयाम significantly वृहद than the pore diameter are retained inside the dialysis bag.
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic समाधान ( a समाधान कि रै a lesser solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) होगा cross a semi-permeable membrane, like dialysis tubing, into a hypertonic solution ( a solution that has a higher solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to ) in an attempt to reach equilibrium, where the solute concentration of each solution is in equilibrium.
पारा प्रयोगशाला thermometer
A thermometer ( from the Greek, thermos, अर्थ `` hot '' और μἐτρον, metron, `` माप '' ) is a device that measures temperature or temperature gradient using a variety of different principles.
A thermometer has two important elements : the temperature sensor ( e.g. the bulb on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) in which some physical change occurs with temperature, plus some means of converting this physical बदलें into a numerical मान ( e.g. the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ).
There हैं अनेक प्रकार और अनेक uses for thermometers, as detailed below in sections of this article.
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs is a 1937 American animated musical fantasy फिल्मी उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी और released by RKO Radio Pictures.
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm, it is the first full-length cel animated feature film and the earliest in the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड क्लासिक series.
The story was adapted by storyboard कलाकारों डोरोथी ऐन रिक्त, रिचर्ड creedon, Merrill De Maris, Otto Englander, Earl Hurd, Dick Rickard, Ted Sears and Webb Smith.
David Hand was the supervising director, जबकि विलियम cottrell, विल्फ्रेड जैक्सन, लैरी morey, Perce Pearce, and Ben Sharpsteen directed the film 's individual sequences.
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre on December 21, 1937, followed by a nationwide release on फ़रवरी 4, 1938, और साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय आय of $ 8 लाख during its initial release briefly assumed the record of highest grossing sound film at the time.
The popularity of the film has led to it होने re-released theatrically many times, until its home video release in the 1990s.
Adjusted for inflation, it is one of the top टेन performers at the North American box office.
At the 11th Academy पुरस्कार, वॉल्ट डिज़्नी थी awarded an honorary Oscar, and the film was nominated for Best Musical Score.
It was added to the संयुक्त राज्य नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री in 1989 and is ranked in the American Film Institute 's list of the 100 greatest American films, who also named the film as the greatest American animated film of all time in 2008.
Disney 's take on the fairy tale has had a big cultural impact, resulting in a लोकप्रिय थीम पार्क आकर्षण, a वीडियो game, and a Broadway musical.
Childbirth, labour, delivery, birth, partus, or parturition is the culmination of a गर्भावस्था काल साथ the expulsion of एक or more newborn infants from a woman 's uterus.
The process of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour : the shortening and dilation of the cervix, descent and जनम of the शिशु, और जनम of the placenta.
in अनेक मामले और साथ increasing frequency, childbirth is achieved through induction of labor or caesarean section, which is the removal of the neonate through a surgical incision in the abdomen, rather than through vaginal birth.
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the u.S. इससे 1996 to 2006, and comprise nearly 32 % of births in the U.S. and Canada.
With respect to induced labor, more than 22 % of women undergo induction of labour in the United States.
Medical professional policy makers find that induced births and elective cesarean can be harmful to the fetus and neonate as well as harmful or without benefit to the mother, and have established strict guidelines for non-medically indicated induced births and elective cesarean पहले 39 weeks.
Viva La Bam was an MTV & Viva show which followed Bam Margera and his crew as they undertook चुनौतियां, performed stunts and traveled the world.
The show ran for 5 seasons between 2003 और 2005.
Flushed Away is a 2006 British/American कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड कार्रवाई / एडवेंचर comedy film directed by David Bowers and Sam Fell.
It was made in the partnership between Aardman एनिमेशन और ड्रीमवर्क्स Animation, and is Aardman 's first completely computer-animated feature as opposed to the usual stop-motion.
The film stars the voice talents of ह्यूज जैकमैन, केट विंसलेट, एंडी serkis, Bill Nighy, Ian McKellen, Shane Richie and Jean Reno.
The story was by Sam Fell, Peter Lord, Dick Clement, and Ian La Frenais, and the screenplay was written by लंड सहनशील, इयान la frenais, क्रिस्टोफर Lloyd, Joe Keenan, and William Davies.
The film was released in US on 3 November 2006, and in UK on December 1 2006, और थी वितरित by सर्वोपरि Pictures, except for Switzerland, Spain, and the Netherlands, which were handled by Universal Pictures.
The Atlanta Braves are a professional baseball team based in अटलांटा.
The Braves are a member of the पूर्वी प्रभाग of Major League Baseball 's National League.
The Braves have निभाई in Turner Field since 1997.
The `` Braves '' name, which was first प्रयुक्त in 1912, originates from a term for a Native American warrior.
They are nicknamed `` the Bravos '', and often referred to as `` America 's Team `` in reference to the team 's खेल होने ब्रॉडकास्ट on the nationally उपलब्धियाँ tbs इससे the 1970s जबतक 2007, gaining a wide fanbase.
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the most successful franchises in baseball, winning division titles an unprecedented 14 लगातार टाइम्स in कि काल ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 season in which there were no official division champions ).
The braves जीती the nl वेस्ट 1991–93 और the NL East 1995–2005, and returned to the playoffs as the National League Wild Card in 2010.
The Braves advanced to the World Series five times in the 1990s, जीतना the शीर्षक in 1995.
Since their debut in the National League in 1876, the मताधिकार रै जीती 16 डिवीजनल शीर्षक, 17 नेशनल League pennants, as well as three World Series championships—in 1914 as the Boston Braves, in 1957 as the Milwaukee Braves, and in 1995 in Atlanta.
the braves हैं the only MLB franchise to have won the World Series in three different home cities.
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining charter franchises ( the other being the Chicago Cubs ) and was founded in Boston, Massachusetts, in 1871 as the Boston Red Stockings ( not to be confused साथ the अमरीकी लीग 's बोस्टन रेड sox ).
They are considered `` the oldest continuously playing टोली in प्रमुख उत्तर अमरीकी खेल. ''
There is an argument as to who is actually older because although the Cubs are a full season `` older '' ( formed as the Chicago White Stockings in 1870 ) Chicago lost two seasons to the ग्रेट शिकागो आग, यूँ the braves have played more consecutive seasons.
After various name changes ( such as the Boston beaneaters ), the टोली संचालित as the Boston Braves for most of the first half of the 20th century.
In 1953, the team moved to Milwaukee, Wisconsin and became the Milwaukee Braves, followed by the मूव to अटलांटा in 1966.
The team 's tenure in Atlanta is famous लिये हांक आरोन तोड़कर Babe Ruth 's career home run record in 1974, though the majority of Aaron 's home runs were hit while the team was in Milwaukee.
His record stood until 2007, when San फ्रांसिस्को बाएँ क्षेत्ररक्षक Barry Bonds broke the record.

3d रेंडरिंग of a μct scan of a leaf piece, resolution circa 40 μm/ voxel.
A leaf is an organ of a vascular plant, as defined in वनस्पति शर्तें, और in particular in plant morphology.
foliage is a द्रव्यमान संज्ञा कि refers to leaves as a feature of plants.
Typically a leaf is a thin, flattened organ borne above ground and specialized for photosynthesis, but many types of leaves are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those terms : some are not flat ( for example many succulent leaves and conifers ), some are not ऊपर मैदान ( ऐसे as बल्ब तराजू ), और कुछ हैं बगैर प्रमुख photosynthetic function ( consider for example cataphylls, spines, and cotyledons ).
Conversely, many structures of non-vascular plants, or even of some lichens, which हैं नहीं पौधे at सब ( in the भाव of होने सदस्यों of the किंगडम Plantae ), do look and function much like leaves.
Furthermore, several structures found in vascular plants look like leaves but हैं नहीं दरअसल पत्ते ; वे differ from leaves in their structures and origins.
Examples include phyllodes, cladodes, and phylloclades.
Title कार्ड लिये the 1937 Our Gang comedy Rushin ' Ballet.
हमारी गिरोह ( भी ज्ञात as the छोटी दुष्टों or एचएएल Roach 's Rascals ) are a series of American comedy short films about a group of poor neighborhood children and their adventures.
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach, the series is noted for showing children behaving in a relatively natural way, as Roach and original निदेशक रॉबर्ट F. mcgowan worked to फिल्मी the unaffected, कच्चा nuances apparent in नियमित children बल्कि than have them imitate adult acting styles.
In addition, Our Gang notably put boys, girls, whites and blacks together in a समूह as बराबरी, कुछ कि `` broke नई मैदान, '' according to film historian Leonard Maltin.
Such a thing had never been done before in cinema लकिन रै चूंकि महरूम repeated after the success of Our Gang.
The first उत्पादन at the रोच स्टुडियो in 1922 was a series of silent short subjects.
When Roach changed distributors from Pathé to metro-goldwyn-mayer ( mgm ) in 1927, and converted the series to sound in 1929, the series took off even further.
Production continued at the Roach studio until 1938, when the series was बेची to mgm, who then continued producing the comedies until 1944.
The Our Gang series includes a total of 220 शॉर्ट्स और एक विशेषता फिल्मी, सामान्य Spanky, featuring over forty-one child actors.
As MGM retained the rights to the Our Gang trademark following their purchase of the production rights, the 80 Roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' यहूद syndicated लिये टेलीविज़न अंतर्गत the शीर्षक the छोटी दुष्टों beginning in 1955.
Both Roach 's The Little Rascals package ( now owned by CBS Television Distribution ) and MGM 's Our Gang package ( now owned by Warner Bros. entertainment ) have चूंकि remained in अनुप्रयोग, साथ आवधिक नई प्रोडक्शन्स आधारित on the शॉर्ट्स surfacing over the years, including a 1994 Little Rascals feature film released by Universal Pictures.
Zacharias Janssen ( also zacharias जानसन or sacharias जानसन ) ( b.1580-88, d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) was a Dutch spectacle-maker from Middelburg associated with the invention of the first optical telescope.
Janssen is sometimes also credited for inventing the पहला truly यौगिक सूक्ष्मदर्शी.
However, the origin of the microscope, just like the origin of the दूरदर्शी, is a पदार्थ of debate.
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is a large freshwater झील in the सिएरा नेवाडा of the संयुक्त राज्य.
At a surface elevation of, it is located along the border between California and नेवाडा, west of Carson City.
Lake tahoe is the largest alpine lake in North America.
Its depth is, making it the United State 's second-deepest ( the deepest is crater झील in Oregon, being deeper, at ).
Additionally, Lake Tahoe is listed as the 26th largest lake by volume in the संसार at.
the झील थी formed परिचय 2 लाख सालो पहले और is a part of the Lake Tahoe Basin with the modern lake being shaped during the ice ages.
It is known for the स्पष्टता of इसके जल and the panorama of surrounding mountains on all sides.
The area surrounding the झील is भी referred to as Lake Tahoe, or simply Tahoe.
Lake Tahoe is a major tourist attraction in दोनो नेवाडा और California.
it is घर to a क्रमांक of ski resorts, summer outdoor recreation, and tourist attractions.
Snow and skiing are a significant part of the area 's economy and reputation.
Mountain and lake नजारा हैं attractions throughout the year.
the नेवाडा पक्ष भी शामिल large casinos.
Highways provide year-round अभिगम from Reno, Carson City, and Sacramento.

Page 2 of the amendment 's certification
पेज 3 of the amendment 's certification
The Twenty-seventh Amendment ( Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any law that increases or decreases the सैलरी of सदस्यों of the कॉंग्रेस इससे लेने effect until the start of the next set of terms of office for Representatives.
It is the most recent amendment to the United States संविधान.
It was submitted to the states for ratification in 1789 and थी अपनाया in 1992.
“First they came... ” is a famous statement and provocative poem attributed to pastor Martin Niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) about the sloth of German intellectuals following the nazis ' वृद्धि to शक्ति और the subsequent purging of their chosen targets, group after group.
There is some disagreement over the exact wording of the quotation and when it was created ; the content of the quotation may have been प्रस्तुत differently by niemöller on अलग occasions.

Four तिहाई logo
The Four Thirds system is a standard created by ओलम्पस और कोडक लिये डिजिटल single-lens reflex camera ( DSLR ) design and development. < ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a मानक that, with digital cameras and lenses available from multiple manufacturers, allows for the interchange of lenses and bodies from different manufacturers.
seems to कवर the standard.
Proponents describe it as an open मानक, लकिन कंपनियाँ may तभी उपयोग it under a non-disclosure agreement.
Unlike older SLR systems, Four Thirds has been designed from the मैदान up to be entirely digital.
Many lenses हैं extensively computerized, to the point that Olympus offers firmware updates for many of them.
Lens design has been tailored to the requirements of digital सेंसर, सबसे notably through telecentric designs.
The size of the sensor is significantly smaller than for most DSLRs and this implies that lenses, विशेषकर telephoto lenses, can be smaller.
For example, a Four Thirds lens with a 300 mm focal length would cover about the same angle of view as a 600 mm focal length lens for the 35 mm film standard, and is correspondingly more compact.
Thus, the Four Thirds System has crop factor ( focal length multiplier ) of about 2, and while this enables longer फोकल लंबाई लिये वृहद आवर्धन, it करता n't सहायता the manufacture of wide angle lenses.
The चित्र सेंसर स्वरूप, generally इंटरमीडिएट between those of larger SLRs and smaller compact cameras, generally gives levels of cost, performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes.
HVAC systems use ventilation air ducts installed throughout a building to supply conditioned air to a रूम through आउटलेट vents, पुकारा diffusers ; and ducts to remove air through return-air grilles.
HVAC ( heating, ventilation, और एयर कंडीशनिंग ) is the प्रौद्योगिकी of indoor and automotive environmental comfort.
hvac प्रणाली डिज़ाइन is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering, based on the principles of thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, and heat transfer.
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the फ़ील्ड 's संक्षिप्त as hvac & r or hvacr, or ventilating is dropped as in HACR ( such as the designation of HACR-rated circuit breakers ).
HVAC is important in the design of medium to large industrial and office buildings such as skyscrapers and in marine environments ऐसे as एक्वैरियम, जहाँ सुरक्षित और स्वस्थ भवन शर्तें हैं regulated with respect to temperature and humidity, using fresh air from outdoors.
वेंटिलेशन on the downdraught प्रणाली, by impulsion, or the 'plenum ' principle, applied to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating, ventilating, and air conditioning is based on आविष्कारों और discoveries बना by निकोलय lvov, माइकल फैराडे, Willis Carrier, Reuben Trane, James Joule, William Rankine, Sadi Carnot, and many others.
The invention of the components of HVAC systems went hand-in-hand with the industrial revolution, and new methods of modernization, उच्चतर दक्षता, and system control are constantly introduced by companies and inventors worldwide.
The three central functions of heating, ventilating, and air-conditioning are interrelated, especially with the need to provide थर्मल सुकून और स्वीकार्य अंदर एयर विशेषता भीतर reasonable installation, operation, and maintenance costs.
HVAC systems can provide ventilation, reduce air घुसपैठ, और maintain दबाव relationships between spaces.
The means of air delivery और हटाना इससे स्पेसेस is ज्ञात as room air distribution.
The starting point in carrying out an estimate both for cooling and हीटिंग depends on the exterior जलवायु और आंतरिक निर्दिष्ट conditions.
However before taking up the heat load calculation, it is necessary to find fresh air requirements for प्रत्येक क्षेत्रफल in विवरण, as pressurization is an महत्वपूर्ण consideration.
In modern buildings the design, installation, and कंट्रोल प्रणालियों of ये कृत्यों are integrated into one or more HVAC systems.
For very small buildings, contractors सामान्यतः क्षमता इंजीनियर और चुनें HVAC systems and equipment.
For larger buildings, building services designers and engineers, such as mechanical, architectural, or भवन सेवाएं इंजीनियर्स analyze, डिज़ाइन, और बताएँ the hvac प्रणालियों, और specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them.
Building permits and code-compliance inspections of the संस्थापना हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी for all sizes of buildings.
The HVAC industry is a worldwide enterprise, साथ भूमिकाएँ सहित आपरेशन and maintenance, system design and construction, equipment manufacturing and sales, and in education and research.
The HVAC industry was historically regulated by the निर्माताओं of hvac उपकरण, लकिन regulating और मानकों संगठन ऐसे as hardi, ashrae, smacna, एसीसीए, Uniform Mechanical Code, International Mechanical Code, and AMCA have been established to support the industry and encourage high standards and achievement.
Royal Navy Commander James Bond, cmg, rnvr, is a fictional अक्षर निर्मित by अंग्रेजों पत्रकार और novelist Ian Fleming in 1953.
He is the protagonist of the James बंध श्रेणी of novels, films, comics and video games.
Fleming wrote बारह बंध novels और two short story collections before his death, although the last two books— The Man with the Golden Gun and Octopussy and The Living Daylights —were published posthumously.
The Bond character is a Secret Service agent, code number 007, residing in लंदन लकिन क्रियाशील internationally.
Bond was a composite character who was based on a number of कमांडो जिसको फ्लेमिंग knew दौरान उसके सेवा in the नवल प्रज्ञा Division during World War II, to whom Fleming added his own style and a number of his own tastes ; Bond 's name was appropriated from American ornithologist James Bond.
Bond has a number of character traits which run throughout the किताबे, सहित an enjoyment of cars, a love of food and drink, and an average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day.
Since Fleming 's death in 1964, there have been other authorised writers of Bond material, including John Gardner, who wrote चौदह novels और दो novelizations और रेमंड बेंसन, who wrote six novels, three novelizations and three short stories.
There have also been three authors who wrote one book each, किंग्सले एमिस ( लिखने as रॉबर्ट Markham ), Sebastian Faulks and Jeffery Deaver.
Additionally a series of novels based on Bond 's youth— यंग बंध —was लिखा by Charlie Higson.
As spin-offs from the literary works, there was a टेलीविज़न अनुकूलन of the पहला अनोखा, कसीनो Royale, in which Bond was played as an American agent.
A comic strip series also ran in the रोज़ एक्स्प्रेस समाचारपत्र.
There have also been twenty-five Bond films ; seven actors have played Bond in ये films.
`` Nature Boy '' is a song by Eden ahbez, प्रकाशित in 1947.
The song tells a fantasy of a `` अजीब एनचांटेड लड़के... जो wandered very far '' only to learn that `` the greatest thing... was just to love and be loved in return ''.
Nat King Cole 's 1948 recording of the song was a प्रमुख hit और `` प्रकृति लड़के '' रै चूंकि become a पॉप और जैज़ standard, with dozens of major artists interpreting the song.
Louisiana ( or ;, ; Louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in the दक्षिणी प्रदेश of the United States of America.
Louisiana is the 31st most extensive and the 25th सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
इसके पूंजी is baton Rouge and largest city is New Orleans.
Louisiana is the only state in the U.S. with राजनैतिक subdivisions termed parishes, which are local government 's equivalent to counties.
The largest parish by population is East Baton रूज मोहल्ला, और the largest by land area is Cameron Parish.
Much of the राज्य 's lands यहूद formed इससे sediment धोया down the Mississippi River, leaving enormous deltas and vast areas of coastal marsh and swamp.
These contain a rich southern biota ; typical उदाहरण शामिल पक्षियों ऐसे as ibis and egrets.
There are also many species of tree frogs, and मछली ऐसे as sturgeon and paddlefish.
In more elevated areas, fire is a प्राकृतिक प्रक्रम in the लैंडस्केप, और रै produced extensive areas of longleaf pine forest and wet savannas.
These support an exceptionally large number of संयंत्र प्रजाति, सहित many species of orchids and carnivorous plants.
Some Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural, बहुभाषी विरासत, being so strongly influenced by an admixture of 18th-century French, Spanish, Native American ( Indian ) and African cultures that they are considered to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S.
Before the American purchase of the territory, the current Louisiana State had been both a Spanish और फ्रेंच उपनिवेश.
In जोड, the पैटर्न of विकास शामिल importing numerous African slaves in the 18th century, with many from the same region of West Africa, thus concentrating their culture.
In the post-Civil War environment, Anglo-Americans increased the pressure for Anglicization, and in 1915, English थी बना the तभी official language of the state.
Women 's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed लिये महिलाओं और लड़कियों of many societies worldwide.
In some places these rights are institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, and आचरण, whereas in अन्य वे may be उपेक्षित or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of human rights through claims of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the कसरत of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the सही : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला wages or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental and religious rights.
The laws of science or scientific laws are statements that describe, predict, and शायद बताइये क्यों, a range of phenomena behave as they appear to in nature.
The term `` law '' has diverse usage in many cases : approximate, accurate, broad or narrow theories, in all natural वैज्ञानिक disciplines ( भौतिकी, रसायन, जीवविज्ञान, geology, astronomy etc. ).
An analogous term for a वैज्ञानिक विधि is a principle.
वैज्ञानिक laws:
summarize a large collection of तथ्य संकल्पित by experiment into a single statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as one or several statements or equation, or at least stated in a single sentence, so that it can be used to भविष्यवाणी the निष्कर्ष of an प्रयोग, दिए the initial, boundary, and other physical conditions of the processes which take place,
are strongly supported by empirical evidence - वे हैं वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान that experiments have repeatedly verified ( and never falsified ).
Their accuracy does not change when new theories are worked out, but rather the scope of अनुप्रयोग, चूंकि the समीकरण ( if कोई ) representing the law does not change.
As with other scientific knowledge, they do not have absolute certainty जैसे गणितीय theorems or पहचान, और it is always possible for a law to be overturned by future observations.
are often कोटेड as a आधारभूत controlling influence rather than a description of observed facts.
I.e. `` the कानून of motion require that ''
Laws differ इससे hypotheses और postulates, जिससे हैं प्रस्तावित during the scientific process before and during validation by experiment and observation.
These are not laws since they have not been verified to the same degree and may not be sufficiently general, हालांकि वे may सीसे to the formulation of laws.
A law is a more solidified और औपचारिक statement, distilled from repeated experiment.
Although the concepts of a law or principle in nature is borderline to philosophy, and presents the depth to which mathematics can describe nature, scientific laws are considered from a वैज्ञानिक परिप्रेक्ष्य और follow the scientific method ; they `` serve their purpose '' rather than `` questioning reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ).
For example, whether a विधि `` refers to वास्तविकता '' is a philosophical issue, rather than scientific.
Fundamentally, all वैज्ञानिक कानून follow इससे भौतिकी, कानून जिससे occur in other sciences ultimately follow from physical laws.
Often, from mathematically आधारभूत viewpoints, universal constants emerge from scientific laws.

Lauren Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly Williams and Grainger ) is a fictional character from the CBS soap operas the यंग और the बेचैन और the बिंदास और the खूबसूरत, portrayed by Tracey E. Bregman.
She made her debut during the एपीसोड airing on January 21, 1983.
In 1992, Bregman began making sporadic appearances on The Bold and the Beautiful, later resulting in the character migrating there fully in 1995.
Following a guest appearance in 2000, Bregman returned to The Young and the बेचैन on अगस्त 24, 2001, remaining on recurring status.
In 2013, it थी घोषित that Bregman had been placed on contract.
Much of Lauren 's history has revolved around her romances with Paul विलियम्स, स्कॉट grainger, sr., और माइकल baldwin among अनेक others causing a fierce rivalry with Traci Abbott Connolly.
Lauren is भी प्रसिद्ध लिये her long, violent rivalry with Sheila Carter.
The 2010 NBA Finals was the National बास्केट Association ( NBA ) championship series for the 2009–10 season.
The best-of-seven playoff was contested between the Los Angeles Lakers, champions of the Western Conference और defending NBA champions, and the Boston Celtics, champions of the Eastern Conference.
The Lakers पराजित the सेल्टिक्स, चार games to three, to win the franchise 's 16th NBA championship.
The 64th edition of the चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी थी played between June 3 and June 17, was broadcast on ABC, and was watched by an average of 18.1 million people.
The Celtics earned their berth into the playoffs by जीतना the Atlantic Division.
the लेकर्स जीती the Pacific Division to earn their berth.
The Celtics reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Miami Heat in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference First Round, the Cleveland Cavaliers in the best-of-seven पूर्वी सम्मेलन semifinals, और defending पूर्वी सम्मेलन चैंपियन ऑरलैंडो जादू in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Finals.
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Oklahoma City Thunder in the best-of-seven Western Conference First Round, the Utah Jazz in the best-of-seven Western Conference Semifinals, and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन फाइनल.
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the Major League Baseball World Series 2–3–2 seven game format, with the लेकर्स possessing home-court लाभ as a बदला लिये finishing साथ better regular season record than the Celtics.
Repeated baskets from starters Kobe ब्रायंट, pau gasol, और रॉन artest brought the Lakers close to victory in Game 1.
A record breaking performance from Ray Allen 's आठ three-point baskets ensured the Celtics a Game 2 triumph.
Derek Fisher ’s 11 points in the चौथी क्वार्टर helped the Lakers win Game 3.
The Celtics won Game 4 ; it did n't hurt that they netted an excellent performance in baskets by the team’s reserves, while Paul Pierce led the टोली to a खेल 5 जीत साथ 27 अंक on 57 % शूटिंग इससे the मंजिल.
The Lakers avoided elimination by winning a निर्णायक खेल 6 साथ 24 अंक contributed by their bench.
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 points early in the third quarter, the Lakers rallied and won their second consecutive championship by लेने over an रोमांचक खेल 7 aided by लेट योगदान on offense by Pau Gasol and Artest and rebounding.
Bryant was named Most Valuable Player of the Finals लिये उसके दूसरी consecutive trophy.
This was the first NBA Finals to go the full seven games since and only the fourth चूंकि the एनबीए फाइनल लौटे to a 2–3–2 स्वरूप in.
The Laker franchise has 16 एनबीए championships ( पाँच in मिनियापोलिस, 11 in Los Angeles ) trailing the Celtics ' seventeen championships.
The NBA Finals used the `` World Series '' Format in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers defeated the Washington Capitols 4 games to 2 ; in 1953 Minneapolis defeated the New York Knicks 4 games to 1 ; in 1954 मिनियापोलिस पराजित the syracuse नागरिकों 4 खेल to 3 ; और in 1955 syracuse नागरिकों defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3.
The NBA would return to the 2–2–1–1–1 नेशनल हॉकी League seven game series format until 1985.
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering बेल in the परिवार piperaceae, cultivated for its fruit, which is usually dried and used as a spice and seasoning.
The fruit, ज्ञात as a peppercorn जब dried, is approximately in diameter, dark red when fully mature, and, like all drupes, contains a single seed.
Peppercorns, and the ground pepper derived from them, may be described simply as pepper, or more precisely as black pepper ( cooked and dried unripe fruit ), green pepper ( dried unripe फल ) और श्वेत pepper ( सूखी ripe seeds ).
Black pepper is native to south India, and is extensively cultivated वहीँ and elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's पाइपर nigrum क्रॉप as of 2008.
Dried ground pepper has been used since antiquity लिये दोनो इसके फ्लेवर and as a medicine.
Black pepper is the world 's सबसे traded spice.
It is one of the सबसे common spices added to European cuisine and its descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the रासायनिक piperine, नहीं to be उलझन with the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs.
It is in the modern world, often युग्म साथ नमक.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection भिन्न ( ef ) represents the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of the ventricle ( heart ) with each heart beat or cardiac cycle.
it can be लागू to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary circulation or the left ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art that allows meaningful mathematical expression defining EF.
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a worldwide utility enabling पढ़ाई of हृदय प्रदर्शन reproducibly and inexpensively.
सरलीकृत, ejection भिन्न is a mathematical product allowed by cardiac imaging.
As a mathematical term, Ejection Fraction is an extension of the work of Adolph फिक in हृदय आउटपुट.
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography, Computed Tomography, Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA स्कैनिंग have definitively अनुमत clinically प्रासंगिक गणित regarding ischemia, Congenital Heart Disease and Heart Failure.
The prosecutor is the मुख्य विधिक प्रतिनिधि of the अभियोजन in देशों साथ either the common law adversarial system, or the civil law inquisitorial system.
The prosecution is the legal party responsible for पेश the मामला in a दण्ड विचारण विरूद्ध an individual accused of breaking the law.

Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ), भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), थी a धार्मिक, राजनैतिक, and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam.
He is believed by Muslims and Bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर और prophet of God.
Muhammad is almost universally considered by Muslims as the last prophet sent by परमेश्वर लिये mankind.
Non-Muslims regard मुहम्मद as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic faith of Adam, नूह, अब्राहम, मूसा, यीशु, and other prophets.
Born in परिचय 570 ce in the arabian नगर of मक्का, he was orphaned at an early age and brought up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib.
He later worked ज़्यादातर as a व्यापारी, as खूब as a shepherd, and was first married by age 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding kyu for several nights of seclusion and prayer, he later reported that it was there, at age 40, that he received his first revelation from God.
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these खुलासे सरेआम, proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is एक ``, कि complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the तभी रास्ता ( dīn ) स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर, and that he himself was a prophet and messenger of God, in the same vein as other Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few अनुसरणकर्ता जल्दी on, and was met with hostility from some Meccan tribes ; he and his followers were treated harshly.
To एस्केप persecution, मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of उसके followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the शुरूआत of the Islamic calendar, which is also known as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, Muhammad संयुक्त the tribes under the Constitution of Medina.
After eight years of लड़ साथ the meccan जनजातियों, उसके अनुसरणकर्ता, जो by then had grown to 10,000, took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट all of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia.
In 632, a few months after returning to मदीना इससे the विदाई यात्राएं, Muhammad fell ill and died.
By the time of his death, most of the arabian प्रायद्वीप had converted to Islam, and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity.
The खुलासे ( or Ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving जबतक उसके मौत – रूप the verses of the Quran, regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based.
Besides the Quran, Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and परंपराओं ( सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of Islam with reverence, adding the phrase सलाम be upon उसे whenever उनके names हैं mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval christendom और premodern टाइम्स यहूद largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in modern history have been far less so.
The Great किताबे ( दूसरी edition )
Great Books of the Western World is a series of books originally published in the United States in 1952 by Encyclopædia Britannica Inc. to present the ग्रेट किताबे in a सिंगल पैकेज of 54 volumes.
The श्रेणी is अभी in its second edition and contains 60 volumes.
The original editors of the series chose three criteria for inclusion : a book must be relevant to contemporary issues, and not only important in its historical context ; it must reward rereading ; and it must be a part of `` the great conversation about the great ideas, '' relevant to at least 25 of the 102 ग्रेट विचार पहचाना by the सम्पादक.
Books were not chosen on the basis of जातीय or सांस्कृतिक inclusiveness, historical influence, or the editors ' agreement with the views expressed.
`` Cocaine '' is a सोंग लिखा और अंकित by JJ Cale in 1976, but also known as a cover version recorded by Eric Clapton.
Allmusic calls the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] most enduringly popular hits '' and notes that `` भी लिये an कलाकार जैसे क्लैप्टन साथ a विशाल देह of high-quality work, 'Cocaine ' ranks among his best. ''
Glyn Johns, who had previously worked साथ the जो, led zeppelin और the रोलिंग Stones, produced the Clapton recording, which was released on Clapton 's 1977 album Slowhand and as a single in 1980.
The live version of `` Cocaine '', from the Just One Night album recorded in Tokyo, charted on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 as the b-side of `` Tulsa Time ``, which was a No. 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine '' was one of several of cale 's गीतों अंकित by क्लैप्टन, including `` After Midnight `` and `` Travelin ' Light ''.
The attack on Pearl हार्बर ( पुकारा हवाई आपरेशन or आपरेशन ai by the जापानी इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) and the Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. हवाई Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from दखल साथ सैन्य क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध overseas territories of the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States.
The आधार थी attacked by 353 जापानी सेनानी, bombers and torpedo planes in two waves, launched from six aircraft carriers.
All आठ u.S. नेवी battleships were damaged, with four being sunk.
Two of these were later raised, and with the remaining four repaired, six battleships लौटे to सेवा बाद in the war.
The Japanese also sank or क्षतिग्रस्त तीन cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship, and one minelayer.
188 U.S. वायुयान यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded.
Important base installations such as the power station, shipyard, maintenance, and fuel and torpedo storage facilities, as well as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय भवन ( भी घर of the प्रज्ञा खण्ड ) were not attacked.
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines lost, और 65 servicemen मारे or wounded.
One जापानी नाविक थी captured.
The attack came as a profound shock to the American people and led directly to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters.
The following day ( December 8 ), the संयुक्त States declared war on Japan.
Domestic support लिये non-interventionism, which had been strong, disappeared.
Clandestine support of Britain ( for example the Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by क्रियाशील alliance.
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and Italy to declare war on the U.S. on December 11, जिससे थी reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
There यहूद numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents for unannounced military action by Japan.
However, the lack of any formal warning, particularly while negotiations were still apparently ongoing, led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim December 7, 1941, `` a date which will live in infamy ``.
Project Runway Season 2 was the second season of ब्रावो 's कामयाब प्रोजेक्ट रनवे, a reality competition for fashion designers.
Season 2 began airing on दिसम्बर 7, 2005.
Following a nationwide search earlier in the year, sixteen designers were chosen as semi-finalists और brought to नई यॉर्क नगर in जून, 2005.
After the पहला चुनौती, called `` Road To The Runway '', fourteen went on to compete as finalists.
The winning designer, क्लो dao, प्राप्त $ 100,000 in seed money to help launch her own line, a 2007 Saturn Sky roadster, a spread in ELLE magazine, and a mentorship with the Banana Republic Design Team.
Winning alongside Dao was her model, Grace Kelsey, who प्राप्त the elle पत्रिका spread.
Michael Kors and नीना गार्सिया लौटे as judges for the second season.

Tim Gunn, fashion कुर्सी at पार्सन्स the New School for Design, returned as a mentor for the designers.

andrae gonzalo, in the same year, competed in the second season of the All Stars edition placing 10th out of 13.
An example of a heraclius mule
In numismatics, a mule is a coin or medal minted with obverse and रिवर्स डिजाइन नहीं सामान्यतः seen on the same piece.
These can be जानबूझकर or produced by error.
This type of गलती is अत्यधिक sought after, and examples can fetch steep prices from collectors.
The earliest mules are मिला among प्राचीन Greek and Roman coins.
Opinion is divided between those who think that they are accidental, the result of an incorrect combination of a new die with one that had officially been withdrawn from use, or the work of coiners working with dies चुराया इससे an आधिकारिक मिंट, शायद at a समय जब एक of उन्हें चाहिए have been destroyed.
The name derives from the mule, the hybrid offspring of a horse and a donkey, due to such a coin having दो पहलू intended लिये अलग सिक्के, much as a mule has parents of two different species.
This page documents the tornadoes और tornado outbreaks of 2010.
The बहुमत of tornadoes रूप in the u.S., but they can occur almost anywhere under the right conditions.
A lesser number occur outside the u.S., सबसे notably in भाग of neighboring दक्षिणी कनाडा दौरान the उत्तरी Hemisphere 's summer season, but are also known in South America, Europe, Asia, and Australia.
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2010 ( of which at least 1,266 were confirmed ), with 45 confirmed fatalities.
Elsewhere in the world, 11 people were killed in tornadoes, छह in अर्जेंटीना, तीन in the Bahamas, one in Bangladesh, and one in Germany.
The year was near average for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early spring period, however such changed बाद a विशाल upswing starting in लेट अप्रैल और a व्यस्त late spring and summer period.
The पतझड़ महीने यहूद थोड़ा above average.
A lymphocyte is a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त cell in the vertebrate immune system.
Under the microscope, lymphocytes can be विभाजित into large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes include natural killer cells ( NK cells ).
छोटी lymphocytes consist of T cells and B cells.
Windows PowerShell is Microsoft 's task automation framework, consisting of a command-line शेल and associated scripting language built on.NET Framework.
PowerShell provides full access to COM and WMI, enabling प्रशासकों to perform प्रशासनिक कार्य on दोनो लोकल और रिमोट खिड़कियाँ systems.
In PowerShell, administrative tasks are generally performed by cmdlets ( सुनाया command-lets ), which are specialized.NET classes implementing a particular operation.
Sets of cmdlets may be combined together in scripts, executables ( which are standalone applications ), or by instantiating regular.NET classes ( or WMI/COM Objects ).
These work by accessing data in different data स्टोर्स, जैसे the filesystem or रजिस्ट्री, which are made available to the PowerShell runtime via Windows PowerShell providers.
Windows powershell भी provides a होस्टिंग API with which the Windows PowerShell runtime can be embedded inside other applications.
ये अनुप्रयोग can तब उपयोग खिड़कियाँ PowerShell functionality to implement certain operations, including those exposed via the graphical interface.
This capability has been used by Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 to expose इसके प्रबन्धन कार्यक्षमता as PowerShell cmdlets and providers and implement the graphical management tools as PowerShell hosts which invoke the necessary cmdlets.
Other Microsoft applications including Microsoft SQL Server 2008 also expose उनके प्रबन्धन इंटरफ़ेस via PowerShell cmdlets.
साथ powershell, आलेखीय interface-based management applications on Windows are layered on top of Windows PowerShell.
A PowerShell scripting interface for Windows products is mandated by the आम अभियान्त्रिकी मापदण्ड.
Windows PowerShell includes its own extensive, console-based help, similar to man pages in Unix शेल, via the Get-Help cmdlet.
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical film starring Julie Andrews, Dick वैन dyke, दाउद tomlinson, और glynis जॉन्स, उत्पादित by Walt Disney, and based on the Mary Poppins books series by P. L. Travers.
The film was directed by Robert stevenson और लिखा by विधेयक Walsh and Don DaGradi, with songs by the Sherman Brothers.
It was shot at Walt डिज़्नी studios in Burbank, California.
Julie Andrews won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Mary Poppins and the film also won Oscars for Best Film Editing, Original Music Score, Best Song for `` Chim Chim cher-ee '' और बेहतरीन विज़ुअल प्रभाव, और प्राप्त a कुल of 13 nominations.
A story arc is an extended or continuing storyline in episodic storytelling media such as television, comic books, comic strips, boardgames, वीडियो खेल, और in कुछ cases, films.
On a television कार्यक्रम, लिये उदाहरण, the story would unfold over many episodes.
In television, the use of the story arc is much more common in dramas than in comedies, especially in soap operas.
webcomics हैं अधिक संभावित to उपयोग स्टोरी arcs than समाचारपत्र comics, as most web comics have readable archives online that a newcomer to the strip can read in order to understand what is going on.
Although story arcs have existed for decades, the term `` story arc '' was coined in 1988 in संबंध to the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी wiseguy, and was quickly adapted for other uses.
Many American comic book series are now written in चार or six-issue arcs, within a continuing series.
Short story arcs are easier to package as trade paperbacks for resale, and more accessible to the casual reader than the never-ending निरंतरता कि एकबार characterised कॉमिक्स.
Black Friday is the day following Thanksgiving Day in the United States, often regarded as the शुरूआत of the क्रिसमस shopping season.
In recent years, most major retailers have opened extremely early and offered promotional sales to kick off the holiday shopping season, similar to Boxing Day sales in many Commonwealth Nations.
Black Friday is not an official public holiday as such, लकिन अनेक non-retail कर्मचारी और स्कूलों have दोनो थैंक्सगिविंग और the दिन बाद बंद, followed by a weekend, thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers.
It has routinely been the busiest shopping day of the year since 2005, although news reports, which at कि समय यहूद inaccurate, have वर्णित it as the व्यस्ततम खरीदारी दिन of the year for a much longer period of time.
The day 's name originated in Philadelphia, where it originally was used to describe the heavy and विघटनकारी पैदल और गाडी ट्रैफ़िक जिससे would occur on the day after Thanksgiving.
Use of the term started पहले 1961 और began to see broader use outside Philadelphia around 1975.
Later an वैकल्पिक स्पष्टीकरण began to be offered : that `` Black Friday '' indicates the point at which retailers begin to turn a profit, or are `` ''.
For many years, it was आम लिये रिटेलर to open at 6:00 a.m., but in the late 2000s many had crept to 5:00 or even 4:00.
This was taken to a new extreme in 2011, when several retailers ( including Target, Kohl 's, Macy 's, Best Buy, and bealls ) खोली at मध्यरात्रि लिये the first time.
In 2012, Walmart and several other retailers announced that they would open most of their stores at 8:00 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day ( except in states where opening on Thanksgiving is prohibited due to blue laws, such as मैसाचुसेट्स जहाँ वे स्टिल खोली around midnight ), prompting calls for a walkout among some workers.
Black Friday shopping is known for attracting aggressive crowds, with annual reports of assaults, shootings, and throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to get the बेहतरीन सौदे on a उत्पाद पहले आपूर्तियाँ run out.
The Family That Preys is a 2008 American movie drama लिखा, उत्पादित, और निर्देशित by Tyler Perry.
The screenplay focuses on two families, one धनवान और the अन्य working क्लास, जिनकी lives are intertwined in both love and business.
The movie is the second of four in which Perry 's signature character, madea, करता नहीं मेक an रूप.
It is also the second Perry-directed film ( alongside Daddy 's Little Girls ) that is not based on any of the filmmaker 's स्टेज plays.
Net 10, Net 15, Net 30 and Net 60 ( also Net 10 days, et al ) are forms of trade credit which specify that the net amount ( the total outstanding on the invoice ) is expected to be paid in full and received by the विक्रेता भीतर 10, 15, 30 or 60 दिनों बाद the goods are dispatched or service is completed.
Net 30 or Net 60 शर्तें हैं प्रायः coupled with a credit for early payment.
The word net in this sense means `` total बाद सब छूट. ''
It originally derives from the Latin nitere ( to shine ) and nitidus ( सुरुचिपूर्ण, trim ), और more recently from the French net ( sharp, neat, clean ).

The British West Indies were the islands in and around the caribbean कि यहूद भाग of the अंग्रेजों Empire.
in 1912, the अंग्रेजों वेस्ट इंडीज यहूद विभाजित into आठ colonies : The Bahamas, Barbados, British Guiana, British Honduras, Jamaica ( with its dependencies the Turks and Caicos Islands and the Cayman Islands ), Trinidad and Tobago, the Windward Islands and the Leeward Islands.
Between 1958 and 1962, all of the द्वीप territories मगर the अंग्रेजों वर्जिन आइलैंड्स, the Bahamas, British Honduras and British Guiana were organised into the West Indies Federation.
It was hoped कि the संघ होता become स्वतंत्र as a single nation, but it had limited powers, many practical problems, and a lack of popular support.
Consequently, the वेस्ट इंडीज Federation was dissolved.
Most of the territories, including all the larger ones, are now स्वतंत्र as पृथक देशों, with membership to many international forums such as the Organization of American States, the Association of Caribbean States, the World Trade Organization, the United Nations, the Caribbean Community, the Commonwealth of Nations and the Caribbean Development Bank among others.
The शेष are British overseas territories.
All the पूर्व राष्ट्र of the अंग्रेजों वेस्ट Indies, except the Commonwealth of Dominica, Guyana and Trinidad and Tobago, are Commonwealth Realms.
The term is still used for British Overseas Territories in the caribbean, ऐसे as the केमन आइलैंड्स.
The remaining British West इंडीज
`` What a Wonderful World '' is a song written by Bob Thiele ( as `` जार्ज Douglas '' ) and George David Weiss.
It was first recorded by Louis Armstrong और released as a single in 1967.
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent in the music world ( Thiele as a producer and Weiss as a composer/performer ).
Armstrong 's recording was inducted in the ग्रैमी हॉल of कीर्ति in 1999.
The publishing for this song is controlled by मेमोरी लेन म्यूज़िक समूह, Carlin Music Corp., and Bug Music, Inc.
उद्घाटन Day 2009 on the west steps of the U.S. Capitol.
President George W. बुश and First Lady Laura Bush lead the inaugural parade down Pennsylvania Avenue to the White House, 2005
The inauguration of the president of the संयुक्त राज्य is a ceremonial इवेंट अंकन the commencement of a new four-year term of a president of the United States.
The day a presidential inauguration occurs is known as `` Inauguration Day '' and occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a संडे ).
( Prior to the बीसवीं amendment, the तिथि थी कूच 4, the day of the year on which the Constitution of the United States first took effect in 1789 ; the last inauguration to take place on the older date was Franklin D. Roosevelt 's first one on March 4, 1933. )
The most recent public presidential inauguration ceremony, the swearing in of President Barack Obama to begin his second four-year पद in दफ्तर, took प्लेस on सोमवार, January 21, 2013.
The only inauguration element mandated by the United States Constitution is that the president make an oath or प्रतिज्ञान पहले कि व्यक्ति can `` डालें on the निष्पादन '' of the office of the presidency.
However, over the years, various traditions have arisen that have विस्तारित the उद्घाटन from a simple oath-taking ceremony to a day-long event, including parades, speeches, and balls.
From the presidency of Andrew Jackson through that of Jimmy Carter, the प्राथमिक उद्घाटन दिन रस्म took place on the Capitol 's East Portico.
Since the 1981 inauguration of Ronald Reagan, the रस्म रै महरूम आयोजित at the Capitol 's West Front.
The inaugurations of विलियम हावर्ड taft in 1909 और reagan in 1985 were moved indoors at the Capitol due to cold weather.
The War of 1812 and World युद्ध ii caused दो inaugurations to be held at other locations in Washington, D.C.
When George Washington was inaugurated, the oath was administered by Robert livingston, चांसलर of नई यॉर्क राज्य, in 1789, and by William Cushing, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court, in 1793.
Since Chief Justice Oliver Ellsworth swore in अध्यक्ष जॉन Adams, no chief justice has missed an Inauguration Day.
When Inauguration Day has fallen on a Sunday, the chief justice has administered the oath to the अध्यक्ष on the संडे privately और तब again the अगला दिन publicly.
When a new president takes over mid-term due to the death or resignation of a अध्यक्ष, the oath of office is administered but formal, public inauguration events have not been held.
Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta ( ; born March 28, 1986 ), known by her stage name Lady Gaga, is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, नर्तकी, activist, businesswoman, fashion designer, actress and philanthropist.
Born and raised in New York City, she primarily studied at the Convent of the पवित्र दिल और briefly attended New York University 's Tisch School of the Arts before withdrawing to focus on her musical career.
She soon began performing in the rock music scene of मैनहटन 's Lower East Side.
By the end of 2007, record executive और निर्माता विंसेंट हर्बर्ट हस्ताक्षरित her to his label Streamline Records, an imprint of Interscope Records.
Initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records, her vocal abilities captured the ध्यान of रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार एकॉन, जो भी हस्ताक्षरित उसके to kon सजीव वितरण, his own label under Interscope.
Lady Gaga came to prominence as a recording artist following the release of her debut album, The Fame ( 2008 ), which was a critical and commercial success that topped charts around the world and शामिल the अंतरराष्ट्रीय number-one singles `` बस नृत्य `` और `` पोकर फेस ``.
After embarking on the The Fame Ball Tour, she followed the एल्बम साथ the कीर्ति दानव ( 2009 ), जिससे spawned the worldwide hit singles `` Bad Romance ``, `` Telephone ``, and `` Alejandro ``.
the कीर्ति राक्षस कामयाबी अनुमत उसके to embark on the eighteen-month long Monster Ball Tour, which later became one of the highest-grossing concert tours of all time.
Her most हाल एल्बम, born इस रास्ता ( 2011 ), अव्वल the चार्ट of सबसे प्रमुख बाज़ार and generated more international chart-topping singles, including `` Born This Way ``, `` Judas ``, and `` The Edge of Glory ``.
Influenced by Britney Spears, David Bowie, Michael Jackson, Madonna, and Queen, Lady Gaga is recognized for her flamboyant, diverse and outré contributions to the music industry through उसके फ़ैशन, प्रदर्शन और म्यूज़िक videos.
As of October 2011, she has sold an estimated 23 million albums and 64 million singles विश्वव्यापी और उसके singles हैं कुछ of the best-selling worldwide.
Her achievements include five Grammy पुरस्कार और 13 एमटीवी Video Music Awards.
Lady गागा has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the Year ( scoring the definitive title in 2010 ), ranked fourth in VH1 's list of 100 Greatest Women in Music, is the sixth best selling digital singles artist in US according to RIAA, is regularly placed on lists composed by Forbes magazine and was named one of the most influential people in the world by Time magazine.
Besides her musical करियर, वो involves herself with humanitarian causes and LGBT activism.
McKethan स्टेडियम home of Gator baseball
A चित्र of the 1924 Baseball team
The Florida Gators baseball टोली represents the University of Florida in the sport of baseball.
The Florida Gators compete in Division I of the National Collegiate Athletics Association ( NCAA ), and the पूर्वी प्रभाग of the southeastern Conference ( SEC ).
They play their home games in Alfred A. McKethan Stadium on the university 's Gainesville, Florida campus, and are currently led by head coach Kevin O'Sullivan.
In the ninety-eight season history of the Gators baseball program, the team has won twelve SEC championships और रै appeared in eight College World Series tournaments.

A political campaign is an organized प्रयत्न जिससे seeks to influence the decision making process within a specific group.
In democracies, राजनैतिक अभियान प्रायः refer to चुनावी अभियान, wherein representatives are chosen or referendums are decided.
In modern politics, the most high profile political campaigns are focused on candidates for head of state or head of सरकारी, प्रायः a अध्यक्ष or प्रधान Minister.
एलिज़ाबेथ cady Stanton and her daughter, Harriot
Elizabeth Cady Stanton ( November 12, 1815 – October 26, 1902 ) was an American social activist, abolitionist, और अग्रणी फिगर of the जल्दी महिलाओं 's अधिकारों movement.
Her Declaration of Sentiments, presented at the first women 's rights convention held in 1848 in Seneca Falls, नई यॉर्क, is प्रायः credited साथ initiating the पहला व्यवस्थित महिलाओं 's अधिकारों and women 's suffrage movements in the United States.
पहले stanton narrowed her political focus almost exclusively to women 's rights, she was an active abolitionist together with her husband, Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin, Gerrit Smith.
Unlike many of those involved in the women 's rights movement, Stanton addressed विभिन्न मुद्दे pertaining to महिलाओं beyond voting rights.
Her concerns included women 's parental and custody rights, property rights, employment and income अधिकारों, divorce, the economic health of the family, and birth control.
She was भी an outspoken supporter of the 19th-century temperance movement.
After the American Civil War, stanton 's प्रतिबद्धता to मादा suffrage caused a schism in the महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति when she, together with Susan B. Anthony, declined to support passage of the Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments to the United States Constitution.
वो opposed giving added legal protection and voting rights to African American men while women, black and white, were denied those same rights.
Her position on this issue, together with her thoughts on organized Christianity and women 's issues beyond voting rights, led to the formation of दो पृथक महिलाओं 's अधिकारों संगठन कि यहूद आखिरकार rejoined, with Stanton as president of the joint organization, approximately twenty years after her break from the original women 's suffrage movement.
Stanton died in 1902 having authored both The Woman 's Bible and her autobiography, along with many articles and pamphlets concerning female suffrage और महिलाओं 's अधिकारों.
My Fair Lady is a musical based upon George बर्नार्ड शॉ 's pygmalion और साथ किताब and lyrics by Alan Jay Lerner and music by Frederick Loewe.
The story concerns Eliza Doolittle, a Cockney flower girl who takes speech lessons from professor Henry Higgins, a phoneticist, so कि वो may pass as a well-born lady.
The musical 's 1956 Broadway उत्पादन थी a hit, सेटिंग कया थी तब the रिकार्ड लिये the longest run of any major musical theatre production in history.
It was followed by a hit लंदन उत्पादन, a popular film version, and numerous revivals.
It has been called `` the पूर्ण musical ''.
Deregulation is the act or process of removing or reducing state regulations.
It is therefore opposite of regulation, which refers to the प्रक्रम of the सरकारी regulating certain activities.

Later that same year the story was शामिल in bradbury 's the martian क्रॉनिकल्स ( 1950 ).
