They number around 50 लाख.
The Korowai people of Papua numbered बस around 3,000 लोगों, and were uncontacted until the 1970s.
Ethnicity or ethnic group is a socially defined category आधारित on आम संस्कृति or राष्ट्रीयता.
Ethnicity can, but does not have to, include common ancestry, appearance, cuisine, dressing style, heritage, history, भाषा or dialect, धर्म, प्रतीकों, परंपराओं, or अन्य cultural factor.
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced through आम विशेषताएँ which set the group apart from other groups.
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day.
Solar energy, radiant light and heat from the sun, has been harnessed by humans since प्राचीन टाइम्स using a दायरा of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies include solar heating, solar photovoltaics, solar thermal electricity, solar architecture and कृत्रिम photosynthesis, जिससे can मेक considerable योगदान to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or active solar depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर, बदलें और distribute solar energy.
Active सौर तकनीकों शामिल the use of photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing गुण, और डिजाइनिंग स्पेसेस that naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of affordable, inexhaustible and clean सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an स्वदेशी, inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce pollution, lower the costs of mitigating climate change, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
ये लाभ are global.
Hence the additional costs of the प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment should be considered learning investments ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
The classical Latin alphabet or Roman alphabet evolved from a western variety of the Greek alphabet called the Cumaean वर्णमाला, जिससे थी अपनाया और परिवर्धित by the Etruscans who ruled early Rome.
The Etruscan alphabet was in turn adopted and further modified by the प्राचीन Romans to write the Latin language.
During the Middle Ages, the Latin alphabet was adapted to Romance languages, direct वंशजों of लैटिन, as खूब as to सेल्टिक, germanic, बाल्टिक, and some Slavic languages.
With the age of colonialism and Christian evangelism, the Latin script was स्प्रेड विदेशी, और लागू to स्वदेशी अमरीकी, Australian, Austronesian, Austroasiatic, and African languages.
More recently, linguists have also tended to prefer the Latin script or the International Phonetic Alphabet ( itself largely based on Latin script ) जब transcribing or बनाना written standards for non-European languages, such as the African reference alphabet.
The term Latin alphabet may refer to either the alphabet used to write Latin ( as described in this article ), or other alphabets based on the Latin script, which is the basic set of letters common to the विभिन्न alphabets descended from the classical Latin one, such as the English alphabet.
These latin-derived alphabets may छोड़ें letters, like the Rotokas alphabet, or add new letters, like the Danish and Norwegian alphabet.
Letter shapes have changed over the centuries, including the creation for Medieval Latin of lower मामला फ़ॉर्म जिससे किया नहीं मौजूद in the Classical period.
The assassination of संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष अब्राहम Lincoln took place on Good Friday, April 14, 1865, as the American Civil War was drawing to a close.
The assassination occurred five days after the commander of the Confederate फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया, सामान्य रॉबर्ट E. ली, surrendered to लेफ्टिनेंट General Ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac.
Lincoln was the first American अध्यक्ष to be assassinated, हालांकि an unsuccessful attempt था been made on Andrew Jackson 30 years before in 1835.
The assassination was planned and carried out by the well-known stage actor John Wilkes Booth, as part of a larger षड्यंत्र in a बोली to revive the Confederate cause.
Booth 's co-conspirators यहूद लुईस Powell and David Herold, who were assigned to kill Secretary of State William H. Seward, and George Atzerodt who was to kill Vice President Andrew Johnson.
By simultaneously eliminating the शीर्ष तीन लोगों in the administration, Booth and his co-conspirators hoped to sever the continuity of the United States government.
Lincoln was shot while watching the play Our American Cousin with उसके बीवी मरियम टॉड lincoln at घाट 's थिएटर in वॉशिंगटन, d.C. on the night of April 14, 1865.
He died early the अगला morning.
The rest of the conspirators ' plot विफल ; पावेल तभी प्रबंधित to घाव seward, जबकि Atzerodt, Johnson 's would-be assassin, lost his nerve and fled Washington.

Club स्तर seating is a खास खण्ड of seating in modern sports stadiums.
The Club Level is usually located towards the मध्य of the स्टेज of seating sections, above the lower deck but below the upper deck.
They are usually right next to the Luxury Boxes, either सही ऊपर, सही नीचे, or sandwiched between two levels of Luxury Boxes.
Club स्तर seating is माना as उच्चतर class than sitting anywhere else in the arena, but lower class compared to the Luxury Boxes.
Unlike the Luxury Boxes, most क्लबों स्तर do नहीं रैप entirely around the arena.
Some club levels stop at a certain point, giving way to an विस्तार of the मेज़ानाइन, जबकि अन्य दे रास्ता to निम्नतर class Luxury Boxes ( such as `` Party Suites '' ).
A notable एक्सेप्शन to this is Emirates Stadium in London, which has a complete tier of club seating.
Club Levels allow fans multiple स्तर of entertainment.
Club Level seating is open to the elements, as opposed to the entirely enclosed लक्ज़री बाक्स, जिससे देता अधिक of an बाहरी impression at roofless and open-roof stadiums and arenas.
Club Level seating is normally bought on a contract basis to allow लिये अधिकतम लाभ on the part of the stadium.
The Club Level provides प्रशंसक साथ खास access to an indoor part of the arena exclusive to fans with special tickets.
ये क्षेत्रों हैं एयर conditioned और allow access to special restaurants, merchandise stands, and lounge areas of the stadium that are not otherwise available.
Concession stands and विक्रेता on the क्लबों स्तर भी often offer different menus than in other stands to give more of a special feel to the Club.
These areas are बंद बंद to the बाकी of the स्टेडियम, और they usually can only be accessed through the exclusive, private club entrances.
Sophia Loren ( ; born Sofia Villani Scicolone ; 20 September 1934 ) is an Italian actress.
Loren is widely recognized as Italy 's सबसे प्रसिद्ध और सम्मानित अभिनेत्री.
She was the first actress of the talkie era to जीत an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये a non-english-speaking प्रदर्शन, for her portrayal of Cesira in Vittorio De Sica 's Two Women.
Her other awards include a Grammy Award, पाँच खास सुनहरी ग्लोब्स, a BAFTA Award and a Laurel Award.
In 1995 she received the सेसिल B. demille Award for lifetime achievements, one of many such awards.
Her films include : houseboat ( 1958 ), el सीआईडी ( 1961 ), कल, आज और कल ( 1963 ), Marriage Italian-Style ( 1964 ), and A Special Day ( 1977 ).
In later years वो रै appeared in American blockbusters such as Grumpier Old Men ( 1995 ), and Nine ( 2009 ).
In 1994 she starred in रॉबर्ट altman 's prêt-à-porter, which earned her a Golden Globe nomination the same year.
She has also achieved critical और वाणिज्यिक success in TV movies such as Courage ( 1986 ).

Incidence of suicide is underreported due to both religious and social pressures, and possibly completely unreported in some areas.
nevertheless, इससे reported मामले, certain trends are apparent.
Since the आंकड़ा is skewed, comparing suicide rates between nations is statistically unsound.
The trends themselves are not the कारण, लकिन may be indicative of a root cause.

The company is owned by Irishman Denis O'Brien, is incorporated in बरमूडा, and based in Jamaica.
It has about 13 million बेतार उपयोक्ता.

Hospital Emergency Codes are प्रयुक्त in अस्पताल विश्वव्यापी to alert staff to various emergencies.
The use of codes is intended to convey essential information quickly and with minimal misunderstanding to स्टाफ, जबकि preventing तनाव और दहशत among विज़िटर to the hospital.
These codes may be posted on placards throughout the hospital, or printed on employee identification बैज लिये तैयार सन्दर्भ.
Back of a हॉस्पिटल id badge showing disaster codes.
Hospital emergency codes may denote अलग events at different hospitals, including nearby ones.
Because many physicians work at अधिक than एक सुविधा, इस may lead to confusion in emergencies, so uniform systems have been proposed.
The route of the Eifel aqueduct, साथ इसके औसत slope.
The Eifel Aqueduct was एक of the longest aqueducts of the Roman Empire.
The aqueduct, constructed in AD 80, carried water कुछ इससे the hilly eifel प्रदेश of कया is अभी जर्मनी to the ancient city of Colonia Claudia Ara Agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ).
If the auxiliary spurs to अतिरिक्त springs are included, the length was.
The construction was लगभग entirely नीचे मैदान, और the flow of the water was produced entirely by gravity.
A few bridges, सहित एक up to in लंबाई, यहूद needed to pass over valleys.
Unlike some of the other famous Roman aqueducts, the Eifel जलसेतु थी specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from damage and freezing.
In chemistry, a disulfide bond ( Br.E. disulphide bond ) is a covalent बंध, usually derived by the coupling of two thiol groups.
The linkage is also called an SS-bond or disulfide सेतु.
The overall कनेक्टिविटी is therefore R-S-S-R.
the शब्दावली is widely used in biochemistry.
In formal terms, the कनेक्शन is a persulfide, in सादृश्य to इसके congener, परऑक्साइड ( r-o-o-r ), but this terminology is obscure and is no longer used ( except in reference to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds ).
Formal depiction of disulfide बंध गठन as an oxidation.

Religion in the United Kingdom and in the countries that preceded it, has been dominated, for over 1,400 सालो, by various forms of Christianity.
According to some surveys, a majority of citizens still identify with Christianity, although regular church attendance has fallen dramatically चूंकि the मध्य of the 20th सदी, और आव्रजन और जनसांख्यिकी change have contributed to the growth of other faiths.
Religious affiliations of UK citizens are recorded by regular surveys, the four major ones being the UK Census, the Labour Force सर्वेक्षण, the अंग्रेजों सोशल attitudes सर्वेक्षण और the यूरोपीय सोशल Survey.
According to the 2001 UK census, Christianity is the major religion, followed by islam, हिंदुत्व, sikhism, judaism और Buddhism in terms of number of adherents.
This, and the relatively large number of individuals साथ नाममात्र or no धार्मिक संबद्धों रै led टीकाकारों to variously describe the United Kingdom as a multi-faith, secularised, or post-Christian society.
The United Kingdom was formed by the union of previously independent countries from 1707, and consequently most of the largest religious groups do not have uk-wide organisational structures.
While some groups have separate structures लिये the व्यक्तिगत देशों of the संयुक्त Kingdom, others may have a single structure covering England and Wales or Great Britain.
Similarly, due to the relatively recent creation of Northern Ireland in 1921, most major religious groups in Northern Ireland are संगठित on an all-ireland basis.
The 1967 Newark दंगे यहूद a प्रमुख सिविल disturbance that occurred in the city of Newark, New Jersey between July 12 and July 17, 1967.
The छह दिनों of rioting, लूटने, and destruction left 26 dead and hundreds injured.
In United States college athletics, redshirt is a delay or बर्खास्तगी of an खिलाड़ी 's भागीदारी in order to lengthen his or her period of eligibility.
Typically, a student 's athletic eligibility in a given sport is four सीज़न, a क्रमांक निकला इससे the चार सालो of अकादमिक classes that are normally required to obtain a bachelor 's degree at an American college or university.
however, a छात्र खिलाड़ी may be offered the अवसर to redshirt लिये up to दो सालो, जिससे allows the खिलाड़ी to स्प्रेड those चार सालो of पात्रता over पाँच, or sometimes छह सालो.
In a redshirt year, a छात्र खिलाड़ी may attend वर्ग at the college or university, practice with an athletic team, and dress for play but he or she may not compete during the game.
Using this mechanism, a student athlete has up to five अकादमिक सालो to उपयोग the चार years of eligibility, thus becoming a fifth-year senior.
The term is used as a क्रिया, संज्ञा, और adjective.
For example, a coach may choose to redshirt a player who is then referred to as a redshirt freshman or simply a redshirt.
The opposite of this is a `` सच्चा freshman. ''
World War I ( WWI ) was a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939, और the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल Entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were दोनो reorganised और विस्तारित as अधिक nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा or गतिशीलता.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the राष्ट्र involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous दशकों यहूद invoked.
भीतर सप्ताह, the प्रमुख शक्तियां were at war and, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया और the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to युद्ध in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove वापस the germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918.
the युद्ध ended in victory for the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory, जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled entirely.
The map of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into several smaller states.
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another ऐसे विरोध.
the यूरोपीय राष्ट्रवाद शाखित by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
Map of countries that declared themselves to be socialist states अंतर्गत the marxist–leninist or Maoist definition - that is to say, `` Communist states '' - between 1979 and 1983.
This period marked the greatest territorial extent of कम्युनिस्ट states.
A कम्युनिस्ट राज्य is a राज्य where the means of production are collectively owned by the society.
It has a form of government characterized by single-party rule or dominant-party rule of a communist party ( referred as तानाशाही of the proletariat by इसके proponents ) and a professed allegiance to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state.
Technically, `` communist state '' is a contradictio in terminis as a communist society as पारिभाषित by दोनो माक्र्सवादी और anarcho-communists is in principle stateless.
From this परिप्रेक्ष्य, the term Marxist-Leninist state is more appropriate.
Historically, a `` communist state '' referred to a system where public ownership of all or most means of production by the Communist party -run state is deemed जरुरी to further the रूचि of the working क्लास ; आज, a कम्युनिस्ट राज्य can भी, for instance, refer to contemporary China and Vietnam, where a Communist Party-run state exists alongside a mixed economy.
According to Marxist–Leninists, the state is a tool in the हैंड्स of the सत्ताधारी क्लास, which in a socialist society is the working class, so a socialist state is, according to Leninists, a state of the working class.
In अभ्यास, कम्युनिस्ट राज्य do नहीं actually refer to themselves as such.
They do इस नहीं to भेस the फैक्ट कि the ruling party is communist, but rather because they do not consider themselves to be a communist society at present.
Instead, they constitutionally identify themselves as socialist राज्य or workers ' states.
The primary goal of these states, which also explains their official name, is to guide their respective countries in the प्रक्रम of भवन समाजवादी, ultimately अग्रणी to communism.
Communist states may have several legal political parties, but the communist party is usually granted a special or dominant भूमिका in सरकारी, प्रायः by statute or under the constitution.
नतीजतन, the संस्थानों of the state and of the communist party become intimately entwined, such as in the development of parallel institutions.
In the 20th century, most communist राज्य अपनाया नियोजित economies.
However, there यहूद अपवाद : the सोवियत संघ दौरान the 1920s और लेट 1980s और Yugoslavia after World War II allowed limited markets and a degree of worker self-management, while China, Vietnam and Laos introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s.
In the 21st century, China and वियतनाम have अनुमत a mixed economy to develop.
The fundamental concepts of कम्युनिस्ट राज्य प्रायः diverge इससे the original socio-economic ideologies from which they develop.
As a result, many adherents of these ideologies often oppose the political systems commonly संबद्ध साथ ये राज्य.
For example, dissenting communists such as Trotskyists were often opposed to the communist states of the 20th सदी, claiming either that they had nothing to do with `` real '' communism or that the ideology of such states had reached a point of irrevocable corruption.
Michael Fred Phelps II ( born June 30, 1985 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी swimmer and the most decorated Olympian of all time, with a total of 22 medals.
फेल्प्स भी holds the all-time रिकॉर्ड लिये ओलम्पिक सुनहरा medals ( 18, double the second highest record holders ), Olympic gold medals in individual events ( 11 ), and Olympic medals in individual events for a male ( 13 ).
In winning eight gold medals at the 2008 Beijing Games, Phelps took the record for the most first-place finishes at any single Olympic Games.
Five of those victories were in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम, tying the single Games record.
In the 2012 Summer Olympics in London, Phelps won four golds and two silver medals, making him the most कामयाब खिलाड़ी of the खेल लिये the तीसरा ओलंपिक in a row.
Phelps is the long course world recordholder in the 100-meter butterfly, 200-meter तितली और 400-meter व्यक्तिगत medley as well as the former long course world recordholder in the 200-meter freestyle and 200-meter individual medley.
He has won a total of 71 medals in major international long-course competition, 57 gold, 11 silver, and three कांस्य spanning the ओलंपिक, the संसार, और the पण प्रशांत championships.
Phelps 's international titles and record-breaking performances have earned him the World Swimmer of the Year Award सात टाइम्स और अमरीकी तैराक of the Year Award nine times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in 2012.
His unprecedented ओलम्पिक कामयाबी in 2008 earned Phelps Sports Illustrated magazine 's Sportsman of the Year award.
After the 2008 Summer Olympics, Phelps started the Michael Phelps न्यास, which focuses on growing the sport of swimming and promoting healthier lifestyles.
He expects to do further work with उसके न्यास बाद the 2012 Olympics, which he has said will be his last.
Lenovo Group Limited ( ) is a Chinese multinational computer hardware and electronics company with its headquarters in Beijing, China and Morrisville, North Carolina और इसके पंजीकृत दफ्तर in हांग Kong, China.
Its products include personal computers, tablet computers, मोबाईल फोन, workstations, सर्वर, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक भंडार devices, IT management software and smart televisions.
लेनोवो is the संसार 's second-largest PC vendor by 2012 unit sales.
It markets the ThinkPad line of कोपी कंप्यूटर and the ThinkCentre line of desktops.
Lenovo has operations in अधिक than 60 देशों and sells its products in around 160 countries.
Lenovo was संस्थापित in बीजिंग in 1984 और incorporated in Hong Kong in 1988 under its previous name, Legend.
Lenovo is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the Hang Seng China-Affiliated Corporations Index.
Slug is a common name for an जाहिर shell-less स्थलीय gastropod mollusk.
The word `` slug '' is also often used as part of the आम नाम of कोई gastropod mollusc कि रै no shell, has a very reduced shell, or has only a small internal shell.
( This is in contrast to the common name `` घोंघा ``, जिससे is लागू to gastropods कि have a coiled shell that is large enough that the soft parts of the animal can retract fully into it. )
Slugs मौजूद on जमीन और in the समुद्र, और वहीँ is even one genus of freshwater slugs, Acochlidium.
The unadorned word `` slug '' is however applied primarily to land slugs, whereas slugs इससे the समुद्र or इससे freshwater are usually referred to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs ''.
Land gastropods with a shell that is not quite vestigial, लकिन is too छोटी to retract into ( like many in the family Urocyclidae ), are known as semislugs.
The various taxonomic families of slugs form part of several quite different evolutionary lineages which also include snails.
Thus, for example, the various families of land slugs are नहीं बहुत closely सम्बन्धित to one another, despite a superficial similarity in the overall body form.
The shell-less condition has arisen many times independently during the विकासवादी पास्ट, और यूँ the श्रेणी `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one.
Slugs, like all other gastropods, undergo torsion ( a 180° twisting of the आतंरिक अंगों ) दौरान विकास.
Internally, slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of this रोटेशन, लकिन externally the लाशें of जमीन slugs appear to be more or less symmetrical, except for the positioning of the pneumostome, which is on one side of the animal, normally the right hand side.
The soft, slimy bodies of slugs are prone to desiccation, so land-living slugs हैं confined to नम environments और जरूर रिट्रीट to नम hiding places when the weather is dry.
The subsequent सूचना in इस article applies to land slugs.

SiC, Silicon carbide, a semiconducting material, also used to make metalworking tools

Segmented Integer Counter mode, a विधि of आपरेशन in cryptography
Sepang International Circuit, a high-end racetrack that hosts the मलेशियाई गोलाकार of सूत्र 1
Shanghai अंतरराष्ट्रीय सर्किट, a मोटर racing venue in Shanghai, China
Simplified instructional कंप्यूटर, a काल्पनिक कंप्यूटर used in systems programming
SIC ( Sons idées couleurs ), an early twentieth-century art magazine produced by French author Pierre Albert-Birot
Southeastern Illinois College, a दो साल जूनियर कॉलेज in harrisburg, Illinois, United States
Specific inductive capacity, abbreviated to SIC, which is अधिक commonly ज्ञात as the relative permittivity or the dielectric constant
St Ignatius ' College, riverview, a जेसुइट स्कूल in सिडनी, Australia

Napoleon Bonaparte (, ; 15 August 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) was a French military and political leader who rose to prominence during the latter चरण of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति और इसके संबद्ध युद्धों in Europe.
As Napoleon I, he was सम्राट of the French from 1804 to 1815.
His legal reform, the Napoleonic Code, has been a major influence on many civil law jurisdictions worldwide, but he is best remembered for his role in the wars led विरूद्ध फ़्रांस by a श्रेणी of coalitions, the so-called Napoleonic Wars.
He established hegemony over most of continental यूरोपीय और sought to स्प्रेड the आदर्शों of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति, while consolidating an imperial monarchy which restored aspects of the deposed Ancien Régime.
Due to his success in these wars, often against numerically superior enemies, he is generally regarded as one of the greatest military commanders of all time, and his campaigns are studied at सैन्य academies worldwide.
Napoleon was born at Ajaccio in corsica in a परिवार of प्रतिष्ठित इतालवी ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century.
He trained as an artillery अधिकारी in मेनलैंड फ़्रांस.
He rose to prominence under the French पहला गणतंत्र और led कामयाब अभियान विरूद्ध the First and Second Coalitions arrayed against France.
He led a successful आक्रमण of the Italian peninsula.
In 1799, he staged a तख्तापलट d'état और संस्थापित खुद as पहला कौंसुल ; पाँच सालो later the French Senate proclaimed him emperor, following a plebiscite in his favour.
In the first दशक of the 19th सदी, the फ्रेंच साम्राज्य under Napoleon engaged in a series of conflicts—the Napoleonic Wars —that involved every major European power.
After a streak of victories, France secured a dominant position in continental Europe, and Napoleon maintained the French sphere of influence through the गठन of extensive alliances and the appointment of friends and family members to rule other European countries as French client states.
The Peninsular War and 1812 French invasion of Russia marked turning अंक in नेपोलियन 's fortunes.
His Grande Armée was badly damaged in the campaign and never fully recovered.
In 1813, the Sixth Coalition defeated his forces at Leipzig ; the following year the Coalition invaded France, मजबूर नेपोलियन to abdicate and exiled him to the island of Elba.
Less than a year later, he फरार एल्बा और लौटे to शक्ति, लकिन was defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in June 1815.
Napoleon खर्च the last six years of his life in confinement by the British on the island of Saint Helena.
An autopsy concluded he died of पेट कर्कट, लकिन वहीँ रै महरूम कुछ बहस परिचय the cause of his death, as some scholars have speculated that he was a victim of arsenic poisoning.
This is a chronological listing of the United राज्य सीनेटरों from Pennsylvania.
United राज्य सीनेटरों हैं popularly elected, for a six-year term, beginning January 3.
Elections are held the first मंगलवार बाद नवम्बर 1.
Before 1914, they were chosen by the Pennsylvania General Assembly, and before 1935, उनके शर्तें began कूच 4.
The South Africa national rugby union team ( known as the springboks ) represents South Africa in rugby union.
They compete in the annual Rugby Championship, साथ साथ southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina, Australia and New Zealand.
They have won this championship on three occasions in sixteen years.
They are currently ranked second in the world by the International Rugby Board, and were named 2008 World Team of the Year at the Laureus World खेल पुरस्कार.
Although South Africa was instrumental in the creation of the Rugby World Cup प्रतियोगिता, the springboks किया नहीं compete in the first two World Cups in 1987 and 1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South Africa.
The team made its World Cup debut in 1995, जब the newly लोकतांत्रिक South Africa hosted the tournament.
The Springboks then defeated the All Blacks 15–12 in the final, which is now remembered as one of the greatest moments in South Africa 's sporting history, and a watershed moment in the post-apartheid nation-building process.
South Africa regained their title as champions 12 years later, when they defeated इंग्लैण्ड 15–6 in the 2007 final.
As a result of the 2007 World Cup tournament the Springboks were promoted to first प्लेस in the आईआरबी संसार rankings, a स्थिति they held until July the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot.
The Springboks play in ग्रीन and gold jerseys, and their emblems are the Springbok and the Protea.
The side has been playing international rugby चूंकि 1891, जब a अंग्रेजों Isles side toured the nation, playing South Africa in their first Test on 30 July.
South Africa was coached by Jake White, जो led the boks to the 2007 संसार कप शीर्षक, announcing his resignation effectively from the end of 2007.
His replacement 's ( Peter de Villiers ) contract expired in 2011, following a 11–9 शिकस्त to Australia in the Rugby World Cup quarter-final, who then stated he would not be signing a new deal.
The previous कप्तान थी जॉन smit, जो पहले he रिटायर्ड in 2011 played hooker for most of his career, although he has also been a prop, mainly in 2008 and 2009.
Due to Smit being unavailable for the November 2010 परीक्षण बाद सर्जरी, ताला विक्टर Matfield took Smit 's place as captain for that tour.
The current captain is Jean de villiers.
The Battle of Gettysburg (, with an sound ), was लड़ा जुलाई 1–3, 1863, in and around the town of Gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
It was the battle with the largest क्रमांक of हताहत in the अमरीकी Civil War and is often described as the war 's turning point.
Union Maj. Gen. George Gordon Meade 's Army of the Potomac defeated attacks by Confederate Gen. Robert E. ली 's फौज of Northern Virginia, ending Lee 's invasion of the North.
After his success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in May 1863, Lee led his army through the Shenandoah Valley to शुरू उसके दूसरी आक्रमण of the North—the Gettysburg Campaign.
With his army in high आत्माओं, ली intended to शिफ़्ट the फ़ोकस of the गर्मियाँ campaign from war-ravaged northern Virginia and hoped to influence Northern politicians to give up their prosecution of the war by penetrating as far as Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, or even Philadelphia.
Prodded by President Abraham Lincoln, Maj. Gen. Joseph Hooker moved his army in pursuit, लकिन थी सुकून बस तीन दिनों पहले the battle and replaced by Meade.
Elements of the two armies initially collided at gettysburg on जुलाई 1, 1863, as ली urgently concentrated his forces there, his objective being to engage the Union army and destroy it.
Low ridges to the northwest of town were defended initially by a Union प्यादे प्रभाग अंतर्गत ब्रिगेडियर. gen. जॉन buford, and soon reinforced with two corps of Union infantry.
However, two large Confederate corps assaulted them from the northwest and north, collapsing the hastily विकसित संघ लाइनों, sending the defenders retreating through the streets of town to the hills just to the south.
On the second day of बैटल, सबसे of दोनो armies had assembled.
The Union line was laid out in a रक्षात्मक गठन resembling a fishhook.
In the late afternoon of July 2, Lee launched a heavy assault on the Union left flank, and fierce fighting raged at छोटी गोलाकार शीर्ष, the wheatfield, Devil 's Den, and the Peach Orchard.
On the Union right, demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on Culp 's Hill and Cemetery Hill.
All across the battlefield, despite significant losses, the संघ defenders आयोजित उनके lines.
On the third day of battle, July 3, fighting resumed on Culp 's Hill, and cavalry battles raged to the east and दक्षिण, लकिन the प्रमुख इवेंट थी a नाटकीय infantry assault by 12,500 Confederates against the center of the Union line on Cemetery Ridge, known as Pickett 's Charge.
The चार्ज थी repulsed by Union rifle and artillery fire, at great losses to the Confederate army.
Lee led his army on a torturous retreat back to Virginia.
Between 46,000 and 51,000 soldiers from both armies were casualties in the three-day बैटल.
That November, President Lincoln used the dedication ceremony for the Gettysburg National Cemetery to honor the fallen Union soldiers and redefine the purpose of the युद्ध in उसके ऐतिहासिक Gettysburg Address.
An academic discipline, or field of study, is a शाखा of ज्ञान कि is taught and researched at the college or university level.
Disciplines are defined ( in part ), and recognized by the academic journals in which research is published, and the सीखे समाजों और अकादमिक विभाग or faculties to which their practitioners belong.
However, there exists no formal criteria for when शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम और scholarly journals form an academic discipline.
A huge difference exists between, on the one hand, well established disciplines that exist in almost all universities all over the world, have a long history, and have a well स्थापित नियत of जर्नल्स और सम्मेलनों, और, on the अन्य हाथ, सुझाव for new fields supported only by few universities and publications.
Fields of study usually have several sub-disciplines or शाखाओं, और the distinguishing lines between these are often both arbitrary and ambiguous.
PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but also used as a general-purpose प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा.
PHP is now संस्थापित on अधिक than 244 million websites and 2.1 million web servers.
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995, the reference क्रियान्वयन of पीएचपी is now produced by The PHP Group.
While PHP originally stood for निजी घर पेज, it अभी stands for PHP : Hypertext Preprocessor, a recursive acronym.
PHP code is interpreted by a web server with a PHP processor module which generates the resulting web page : PHP कमांड can be अंतःस्थापित सीधे into an एचटीएमएल सोर्स दस्तावेज़ बल्कि than कॉलिंग an external file to process data.
it रै भी विकसित to शामिल a command-line इंटरफ़ेस काबिलियत and can be used in standalone graphical applications.
PHP is free software released under the PHP License, which is असंगत साथ the ग्नू सामान्य पब्लिक अनुज्ञा ( जीपीएल ) due to प्रतिबंध on the usage of the term PHP.
PHP can be deployed on most web सर्वर और भी as a स्टैंडअलोन shell on almost every operating system and platform, free of charge.
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by his initials JFK, थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the United States, serving from 1961 until his death in 1963.
After military service as commander of the Motor Torpedo Boats PT-109 and PT-59 during World War II in the दक्षिण प्रशांत, कैनेडी represented मैसाचुसेट्स ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he served in the U.S. Senate इससे 1953 जबतक 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President and रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have been elected to the दफ्तर, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ), and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A Catholic, कैनेडी is the only non- Protestant president, and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
Events दौरान उसके प्रेसिडेंसी शामिल the Bay of Pigs Invasion, the Cuban Missile Crisis, the building of the Berlin Wall, the Space Race, the African-American Civil Rights Movement, and early stages of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the number of सैन्य advisers, खास operation forces, and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the Strategic Hamlet Program which थी implemented by the दक्षिण वियतनामी सरकारी.
It involved certain मजबूर relocation, गाँव internment, और पृथक्करण of rural South Vietnamese from the northern and southern communist insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22, 1963 in Dallas, Texas.
Lee Harvey ओसवाल्ड थी चार्ज साथ the अपराधों, लकिन he थी shot and killed by Jack Ruby two days later, before a trial could take place.
The FBI and the वारेन Commission officially concluded that Oswald was the lone assassin.
however, the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, ABC News in उनके छानबीन, the कैनेडी हत्या : Beyond Conspiracy, confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber program led to a congressional छानबीन कि lasted इससे 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s सूचना concerning Kennedy 's private life has come to light.
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in जिससे he struggled have become better known, especially since the 1990s.
Although initially kept secret from the general public, reports of कैनेडी 's philandering have garnered much दबायें.
Kennedy ranks highly in public opinion ratings of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों.
`` Stand by Me '' is a song originally performed by Ben E. King and written by King, Jerry leiber, और माइक stoller, प्रेरित by the आध्यात्मिक `` रब स्टैंड by Me, '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3.
वहीँ have महरूम over 400 recorded versions of the song.
A political cartoon from an 1894 Puck magazine by illustrator S.D. Ehrhart, shows a farm woman labeled `` Democratic Party '' sheltering इससे a बवंडर of political change.
A metaphor is a figure of speech that describes a subject by asserting that it is, on कुछ पाइंट of तुलना, the वही as another otherwise unrelated object.
Metaphor is a type of analogy and is closely सम्बन्धित to अन्य rhetorical आंकड़े of speech that achieve their effects via association, comparison or resemblance including allegory, hyperbole, and simile.
In simpler terms, a metaphor compares two objects or things without using the शब्द `` जैसे '' or `` as ''.
One of the सबसे prominent उदाहरण of a रूपक in अंग्रेज़ी साहित्य is the All the world 's a stage monologue from As You Like It :
सब the world 's a stage,
And all the men and women merely खिलाड़ी ;
They have their exits और their entrances ; — William Shakespeare, As You Like It, 2/7
This quote is a metaphor because the world is not literally a stage.
By figuratively asserting that the world is a stage, शेक्सपियर उपयोग the अंक of तुलना between the संसार and a stage to convey an understanding about the mechanics of the world and the lives of the people within it.

rembrandt वैन rijn, Self-portrait, etching, c.1630

Printmaking is the प्रक्रम of making artworks by printing, normally on paper.
printmaking normally covers only the process of creating prints with an element of originality, rather than just being a photographic reproduction of a painting.
Except in the case of monotyping, the प्रक्रम is सक्षम of producing multiples of the same piece, which is called a print.
Each print produced is not considered a `` copy '' लकिन rather is considered an `` original ''.
This is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking process, and also because the imagery of a print is typically not simply a reproduction of another work but rather is often a unique image designed इससे the प्रारंभ to be expressed in a particular printmaking technique.
A छपाई may be ज्ञात as an impression.
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is नहीं चुनी only for its ability to produce multiple impressions, but rather for the unique qualities that each of the printmaking processes lends itself to.
Prints are created by transferring स्याही इससे a मेट्रिक्स or through a prepared screen to a sheet of paper or other material.
Common types of matrices include : metal plates, usually तांबे or जस्ता, or पॉलिमर प्लेटों लिये नक्काशी or etching ; स्टोन, aluminum, or polymer for lithography ; blocks of wood for woodcuts and wood engravings ; and linoleum for linocuts.
Screens made of silk or synthetic fabrics हैं प्रयुक्त for the screenprinting process.
Other types of matrix substrates और related processes are discussed below.
Multiple impressions printed from the same matrix form an edition.
Since the late 19th century, artists have generally signed individual impressions from an संस्करण and often number the impressions to form a limited edition.
Prints may also be printed in book रूप, ऐसे as illustrated books or artist 's books.
il divo is an अंग्रेज़ी multinational operatic pop vocal group created by music manager, executive, and reality TV star Simon Cowell.
Formed in the United Kingdom, they are also signed to Cowell 's रिकार्ड लेबल, syco म्यूज़िक.

To date, they have sold more than 26 लाख एल्बम विश्वव्यापी.
Su-15, one of the principal Soviet एयर रक्षा interceptors in the 1970s and 1980s
An interceptor aircraft ( or simply interceptor ) is a type of fighter aircraft designed specifically to prevent मिशन of दुश्मन aircraft, particularly bombers and reconnaissance aircraft, and destroy them, relying usually on great speed and powerful armament.
Being used since the First World War, after the लेट 1960s, interceptors became less important due to shifting from bombers to intercontinental ballistic missiles ( ICBMs ) for nuclear warfare.
A वियतनामी अमरीकी ( ) is an American of Vietnamese descent.
They make up about half of all overseas Vietnamese ( Người Việt Hải Ngoại ) और हैं the fourth-largest एशियाई American group.
Mass Vietnamese immigration to the United राज्य प्रारंभ बाद 1975, after the end of the Vietnam War.
Early immigrants were refugee boat people fleeing persecution or poverty.
Forced to flee from their मातृभूमि और प्रायः thrust into ग़रीब शहरी पड़ोस, ये newcomers have nevertheless managed to establish strong communities in a short amount of time.
अधिक than साठ प्रतिशत of Vietnamese Americans reside in the states of California, Texas, Washington, Florida, and Virginia.
Front page of the U.S. Armed शक्तियां समाचारपत्र, सितारों और धारियाँ, 2 May 1945
Adolf Hitler committed suicide by gunshot on 30 April 1945 in उसके führerbunker in Berlin.
His wife Eva ( née Braun ) वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या साथ उसे by ingesting cyanide.
That दोपहर, in accordance साथ हिटलर 's prior निर्देश, उनके remains were carried up the stairs through the bunker 's emergency exit, doused in petrol and set alight in the Reich Chancellery garden outside the bunker.
The Soviet archives record that their burnt remains were recovered and interred in successive स्थितियाँ जबतक 1970 जब वे were again exhumed, cremated and the ashes scattered.
Accounts differ as to the cause of death ; one that he died by poison only and another that he died by a self-inflicted gunshot, जबकि biting bas on a cyanide capsule.
Contemporary historians have rejected these accounts as being either Soviet propaganda or an attempted सुलह in अनुक्रम to reconcile the different conclusions.
One eye-witness recorded that the देह दिखाया लक्षण of having महरूम शॉट through the मुँह, but this has been proven unlikely.
There is also controversy regarding the authenticity of कपाल and jaw fragments which were recovered.
In 2009, DNA tests were performed on a skull Soviet officials था long believed to be Hitler 's.
The tests revealed that the skull was actually कि of a स्त्री less than 40 years old.
स्थान of Missouri
The alcohol laws of Missouri are among the least restrictive and सबसे lax और permissive in the United States.
Missouri is known throughout the Midwest for its largely laissez-faire approach to alcohol विनियमन, in शार्प कंट्रास्ट to the बहुत सख्त दारू laws of some of its neighbors, like Kansas and Oklahoma.
necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or nf, commonly ज्ञात as flesh-eating बीमारी or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome, is a rare infection of the deeper layers of skin and subcutaneous tissues, easily spreading across the fascial plane within the subcutaneous tissue.
Necrotizing fasciitis is quickly progressing, having वृहद रिस्क of विकासशील in the immunocompromised due to conditions like diabetes, cancer, etc.
It is a severe disease of sudden onset and is usually treated immediately with high doses of intravenous एंटीबायोटिक.
Type I describes a polymicrobial संक्रमण, whereas प्रकार ii describes a monomicrobial infection.
Many types of bacteria can cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g., समूह a streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ), Staphylococcus aureus, Clostridium perfringens, Bacteroides fragilis, Aeromonas hydrophila ).
ऐसे infections हैं अधिक संभावित to occur in people with compromised immune systems.
Historically, Group A streptococcus made up most मामले of प्रकार ii infections.
However, चूंकि as जल्दी as 2001, another गंभीर रूप of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis has been observed with increasing frequency, caused by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ).
Some published case reports have implied a possible link between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory दवाएँ और nf, हालांकि the प्रमाण of the link was said to be weak because of a small number of case patients and it was unclear whether the drugs just masked the symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se.
World War II ( WWII or ww2 ), भी ज्ञात as the Second World War, was a global war that lasted from 1939 to 1945.
It involved the vast majority of the world 's राष्ट्र —including सब of the great powers —eventually forming two opposing military alliances : the Allies and the Axis.
It was the सबसे फैली युद्ध in इतिहास, with more than 100 million people serving in military units from over 30 different countries.
In a state of `` total war ``, the major participants placed their entire economic, industrial, and scientific सामर्थ्य at the सेवा of the युद्ध प्रयत्न, erasing the भेद between civilian and military resources.
चिह्नित by द्रव्यमान मौतों of नागरिकों, सहित the Holocaust and the only use of nuclear weapons in warfare, it resulted in 50 million to over 75 million fatalities.
These deaths make World युद्ध ii by दूर the deadliest conflict in human history.
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was already at war with the Republic of China in 1937, but the world war is generally said to have begun on 1 September 1939 with the invasion of Poland by Germany and subsequent declarations of war on Germany by France and Britain.
From late 1939 to early 1941, in a श्रेणी of अभियान और treaties, जर्मनी formed the Axis alliance with Italy, conquering or subduing much of continental Europe.
Following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact, Germany and the सोवियत संघ partitioned और annexed territories between themselves of their European neighbours, including Poland.
The United Kingdom and the other members of the British Commonwealth were the तभी प्रमुख Allied forces continuing the fight against the Axis, with battles taking place in North Africa as well as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic.
In June 1941, the European Axis launched an invasion of the Soviet Union, giving a start to the largest land थिएटर of युद्ध in इतिहास, जिससे tied bas the major part of the Axis ' military forces for the rest of the war.
In December 1941, Japan joined the Axis, attacked the United States and European territories in the प्रशांत समंदर, और जल्दी conquered much of the Western Pacific.
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942, after Japan lost a series of naval battles and European Axis troops were defeated in North Africa and, decisively, at stalingrad.
In 1943, with a series of German defeats in Eastern Europe, the Allied invasion of Italy, and American victories in the Pacific, the Axis lost the initiative और undertook रणनीतिक रिट्रीट on सब fronts.
In 1944, the पश्चिमी allies invaded फ़्रांस, जबकि the सोवियत Union regained all of its territorial losses and invaded Germany and its allies.
During 1944 and 1945 the United States defeated the Japanese Navy and captured key Western Pacific islands.
The war in Europe ended with the capture of Berlin by सोवियत और पॉलिश सैनिकों और the subsequent German unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945.
Following the Potsdam Declaration by the Allies on 26 July 1945, the United राज्य dropped परमाणु बम on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima on 6 August, and Nagasaki on 9 August.
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago imminent, and the Soviet Union having declared war on Japan by invading Manchuria, जापानी surrendered on 15 अगस्त 1945, समाप्ति the युद्ध in एशिया and cementing the total victory of the Allies over the Axis.
World War II altered the political alignment and social structure of the world.
The United Nations ( UN ) was established to foster international सहयोग और prevent भविष्य conflicts.
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the United States, the Soviet Union, चीन, the संयुक्त किंगडम, और france—became the स्थाई सदस्यों of the United Nations Security Council.
The Soviet Union and the United States emerged as rival superpowers, setting the stage for the Cold War, जिससे lasted लिये the अगला 46 years.
Meanwhile, the influence of European great powers प्रारंभ to मनाही, जबकि the decolonisation of एशिया and Africa began.
Most देशों जिनकी उद्योग had been damaged moved towards economic recovery.
Political integration, especially in यूरोपीय, उभरा as an effort to stabilise postwar relations and fight more effectively in the Cold War.
A limited liability company ( LLC ) is a flexible form of enterprise that मिश्रणों तत्व of साझेदारी और corporate structures.
Note than an llc is नहीं a निगम, और calling an LLC a corporation is technically incorrect.
An LLC is a विधिक रूप of कम्पनी कि provides limited liability to its owners in the vast majority of United States jurisdictions.
LLCs do not need to be व्यवस्थित लिये profit.
पाँच k-cups
The inside of a used K-Cup, with the top foil and the प्रयुक्त coffee grounds removed.
This shows the filter अंदर the k-cup.
K-Cup portion packs are used with Keurig or other single cup brewing systems to काढ़ा a कप of coffee, tea, or hot chocolate.
Each K-Cup is a प्लास्टिक संग्राहक साथ a coffee filter inside.
Ground coffee beans are packed in the K-Cup and sealed air-tight साथ a संयोजन प्लास्टिक and foil lid.
When the K-Cup is लगाई in a keurig brewer, the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom of the K-Cup and forces hot water under pressure through the K-Cup and into a mug.
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to coffee roasters and tea makers such as Green Mountain कॉफी Roasters, Diedrich/ Gloria Jeans, Timothy 's World Coffee, Van Houtte, Caribou Coffee, Celestial Seasonings, Bigelow Tea Company, Twinings, Tully 's, Coffee People and Newman 's Own.
Keurig 's patents on the original K-Cup डिज़ाइन समाप्त in सितंबर 2012.
Keurig holds at least one additional, still-active us पेटेंट और another patent application, detailing improvements that have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup design.

A modern Seiko quartz wristwatch using the chronograph function ( movement 7T92 ).
Citizen Atessa Eco-Drive ATV53-3023 analog-digital chronograph साथ 4 क्षेत्रफल रेडियो नियंत्रित reception ( North America, Europe, China, Japan ).
A chronograph is a विशिष्ट प्रकार of देखें कि is प्रयुक्त as a stopwatch combined with a display watch.
A basic chronograph has an स्वतंत्र स्वीप दूसरी हाथ ; it can be started, stopped, and returned to zero by successive pressure on the stem.
Louis Moinet invented the chronograph in 1816
Conventional पीसीआई ( पीसीआई is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect, part of the PCI Local Bus standard and often shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer.
The PCI bus supports the functions found on a processor bus, but in a मानकीकृत स्वरूप कि is स्वतंत्र of कोई particular processor.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly to the processor bus, और हैं आबंटित addresses in the processor 's address space.
Attached devices can take either the रूप of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself, called a planar device in the PCI specification, or an expansion card that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus थी पहला implemented in ibm pc compatibles, where it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration.
It has subsequently been adopted for other computer types.
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express, but, most motherboards हैं स्टिल made with one or more PCI slots, which are sufficient for many uses.
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the सर्किट फलक किनारे विद्युत सम्पर्क ), विद्युत विशेषताएँ, bus timing, and protocols.
The specification can be purchased from the पीसीआई खास ब्याज Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : network cards, sound cards, modems, अतिरिक्त पोर्ट ऐसे as usb or सीरियल, TV tuner cards and disk controllers.
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards, until growing bandwidth आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the सामर्थ्य of पीसीआई ; the पसन्दीदा interface for video cards became AGP, and then PCI Express.
PCI video cards remain available for use with बूढ़ा pcs बगैर अगप or PCI Express slots.
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly integrated onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in सार्वभौमिक serial bus and PCI Express versions.
Michael Whitaker Smith ( born October 7, 1957 ) is an American contemporary Christian musician, who has charted primarily in the समकालीन ईसाई और occasionally in the mainstream charts.
His biggest कामयाबी in मुख्यधारा म्यूज़िक थी in 1991 when `` Place in this World '' hit No. 6 on the Billboard Hot 100.
Smith is a three-time Grammy Award विजेता, और रै अर्जित 40 dove Awards.
Over the course of his career, he sold more than 13 million albums and recorded 29 No. 1 Hit songs, चौदह सुनहरा एल्बम, और पाँच प्लेटिनम albums.
Smith is an American Music Award recipient ; he was also named one of People पत्रिका 's `` सबसे खूबसूरत लोगों ''.
An American poster from the World War II -era कि थी प्रयुक्त to inform people about what they should do if they suspect sabotage.
Sabotage is a deliberate action aimed at weakening another entity through subversion, रुकावट, disruption, or विनाश.
In a workplace setting, sabotage is the conscious withdrawal of efficiency generally निर्देशित at causing some change in workplace conditions.
One who engages in तोड़फोड़ is a saboteur.
As a rule, saboteurs try to छिपाते उनके पहचान क्युकी of the consequences of their actions.
For example, whereas an पर्यावरणीय pressure group might be happy to be identified with an act of sabotage, it would not want the individual identities of the perpetrators known.
Patrick Henry College ( PHC ) is a private, independent college with an Evangelical Christian basis that focuses on teaching शास्त्रीय उदार कला और सरकारी, स्तिथ in purcellville, Virginia, United States.
Patrick Henry is known for its conservative evangelical ईसाई focus.
As of April 17, 2007, the college was accredited by the transnational संघ of ईसाई कॉलेजों and Schools, a national faith-related accrediting organization recognized by the Department of Education and the Council for Higher Education Accreditation.
The school was founded with the help of the Home School Legal Defense Association, and now serves as the headquarters for the संगठन, साथ जिससे it is स्टिल closely connected.
The history of television comprises the work of numerous engineers and आविष्कारक in अनेक देशों over many decades.
The earliest प्रस्ताव थी in 1908, in a paper by A. A. Campbell-Swinton and postulated the use of cathode rays.
The first practical demonstrations of television, however, were developed using electromechanical विधि to scan, transmit, and reproduce an image.
As electronic camera and display tubes were perfected, electromechanical टेलीविज़न दिया रास्ता to all-electronic systems in nearly all applications.
l'idéal cinéma - ज़ाक tati at aniche खोली November 23rd 1905 ; the oldest still-active movie theater in the world
A सिनेमा in Australia
A typical multiplex ( AMC सैर 16 in वुडलैंड पहाड़ियाँ, Los Angeles, U.S. )
A movie theater ( also called a सिनेमा, फिल्म हाउस, फिल्मी house, film theater or picture house ) is a venue, usually a building, for viewing films.
Most but not all movie थिएटर हैं commercial operations catering to the general public, who attend by purchasing a ticket.
The movie is प्रक्षिप्त साथ a movie projector onto a large projection screen at the front of the auditorium.
सबसे फिल्म थिएटर हैं अभी equipped for digital cinema projection, removing the need to create and transport a physical film print.

Lyme disease, Lyme borreliosis is an infectious disease caused by at least three प्रजाति of जीवाणु belonging to the genus borrelia.
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the प्रमुख कारण of lyme disease in North America, whereas Borrelia afzelii and Borrelia garinii cause most European cases.
The disease is नामित बाद the कस्बों of Lyme and Old Lyme, Connecticut, USA, where a number of cases were identified in 1975.
Although Allen Steere realized that Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978, the cause of the disease remained a mystery until 1981, जब B. burgdorferi थी पहचाना by Willy Burgdorfer.
Lyme disease is the most common tick-borne बीमारी in the उत्तरी Hemisphere.
Borrelia is transmitted to humans by the bite of infected ticks belonging to a few प्रजाति of the genus ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ).
Early symptoms may include fever, headache, fatigue, depression, and a characteristic गोलाकार skin rash called erythema migrans ( EM ).
Left अनुपचारित, बाद symptoms may involve the joints, heart, and central nervous system.
in सबसे मामले, the संक्रमण और इसके लक्षण are eliminated by antibiotics, especially if the illness is treated early.
Delayed or inadequate treatment can lead to more serious symptoms, which can be disabling और मुश्किल to दावत.
Penises of minke whales on display at the आइसलैंडिक Phallological Museum
Penis ( plural penises or penes ) is a सामान्य पद लिये the organs with which male and hermaphrodite animals introduce sperm into receptive females during copulation.
Such organs occur in many animals, both vertebrate and invertebrate, लकिन males do नहीं भालू a शिश्न in प्रत्येक एनिमल प्रजाति, और in those species in which the male does bear a so-called penis, the penes in the various species are not necessarily homologous.
For example, the penis of a mammal is at most analogous to the शिश्न of a male insect or barnacle.
The term penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs, but not to all ; for उदाहरण the intromittent अंग of सबसे cephalopoda is the hectocotylus, a specialised arm, and male spiders use their pedipalps.
In most species of animals in which there is an अंग कि might reasonably be वर्णित as a शिश्न, it रै no प्रमुख फलन अन्य than intromission, or at तनिक conveying the sperm to the female, but in the placental mammals the penis bears the distal part of the urethra, which discharges both urine during urination and semen during copulation as the occasion requires.
Artists and repertoire ( A & R ) is the division of a record label or music publishing company that is जिम्मेदार लिये हुनर बालचर और overseeing the artistic development of recording artists and/or songwriters.
It also acts as a liaison between artists and the record label or publishing कम्पनी ; प्रत्येक कार्यकलाप involving कलाकारों to the पाइंट of एल्बम रिलीज is generally considered under the purview of, and responsibility of, A & R.
A furlong is a measure of अलहदा in इम्पीरियल इकाई और u.S. प्रथागत इकाई equal to one-eighth of a mile, equivalent to 220 yards, 660 feet, 40 rods, or 10 chains.
The exact मान of the furlong varies slightly among English-speaking countries.
पाँच furlongs हैं approximately 1 kilometre ( 1.0058 km is a closer approximation ).
Since the original definition of the metre was one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the परिधि of the धरती ( साथ the ग्रेट वृत्त coincident with the meridian of longitude passing through Paris ), the circumference of the Earth is about 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs.
CR2032 lithium बटन कोशिका battery
Lithium 9 volt, AA, & aaa आकार
Lithium batteries are disposable ( primary ) batteries that have lithium मेटल or लिथियम यौगिकों as an धनाग्र.
वे स्टैंड अलावा इससे अन्य बैटरी in their high charge density ( long life ) and high cost per unit.
Depending on the design and chemical compounds used, lithium cells can produce voltages from 1.5 V ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or क्षारीय battery ) to about 3.7 V. Lithium batteries are widely used in products such as portable consumer electronic devices.

He जीवनदान in मैसाचुसेट्स with his wife and two children.
