Facebook on the Ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social networking सेवा, जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम लिये the किताब दिए to students at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other.
It was संस्थापित in फ़रवरी 2004 by चिह्नित zuckerberg with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, लकिन was expanded to other colleges in the Boston area, the Ivy League, and Stanford University.
It gradually added support for students at various other universities पहले खोलने to ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook अभी allows कोई उपयोक्ता जो घोषित themselves to be at least 13 years old to become registered users of the site.
Users जरूर पंजीकरण पहले using the साईट, बाद जिससे वे may बनाएँ a personal profile, add other users as friends, and exchange messages, including automatic notifications when they update their profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by कार्यस्थल, स्कूल or कॉलेज, or अन्य characteristics, and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of September 2012, फेसबुक रै over एक billion active users.
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey, there are 7.5 million children under 13 with खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10, violating the साईट 's शर्तें of service.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 लाख in फेसबुक, and Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot.
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most used social networking सेवा by विश्वव्यापी मासिक active users.
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` कैसा on धरती किया we stalk हमारी exes, याद our co-workers ' birthdays, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics, such as Facebook Detox, state that Facebook has turned into a national obsession in the United राज्य, resulting in विशाल amounts of समय खोया and encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million मासिक अद्वितीय u.S. visitors in May 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the U.S. population had a Facebook account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's market growth started to stall in some regions, with the site losing 7 लाख क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता in the संयुक्त राज्य and Canada in May 2011.
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on फ़रवरी 1, 2012, और थी headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the public and trading on the नैस्डैक on may 18, 2012.
Erwin योहानेस eugen ख़बरों ( 15 November 1891 – 14 October 1944 ), popularly known as The Desert Fox ( Wüstenfuchs, ), was a German Field Marshal of World War II.
He earned the respect of both उसके अपना सैनिकों और the enemies he fought.
Rommel थी a अत्यधिक decorated officer in World War I and was awarded the Pour le Mérite for his exploits on the Italian front.
In World War II, he further distinguished himself as the कमांडर of the 7th panzer प्रभाग दौरान the 1940 invasion of France.
His leadership of German and Italian forces in the North African campaign स्थापित उसे as एक of the सबसे समर्थ कमांडरों of the युद्ध, और अर्जित him the appellation of the Desert Fox.
He is regarded as one of the most skilled commanders of मरुस्थल warfare in the conflict.
He later commanded the German forces opposing the अलाइड cross-channel invasion in Normandy.
His assignments never took उसे to the Eastern Front.
Rommel is regarded as having been a humane और पेशेवर officer.
His Afrika Korps was never accused of युद्ध अपराधों, और सैनिको captured दौरान his Africa campaign were reported to have been treated humanely.
Orders to kill Jewish soldiers, civilians and captured कमांडो यहूद ignored.
Late in the war, Rommel was linked to the conspiracy to assassinate एडोल्फ Hitler.
Since Rommel was a national hero, Hitler desired to eliminate उसे चुपचाप.
He forced Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill, in return for assurances that Rommel 's परिवार होता नहीं be persecuted following his death.
Stained कांच प्रतिनिधित्व of the Holy Spirit as a dove, c. 1660.
The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven spiritual gifts originating with patristic authors, later elaborated by पाँच बौद्धिक virtues और चार अन्य समूह of नैतिक characteristics.
They are : wisdom, समझना, अचरज and awe ( fear of the Lord ), counsel, knowledge, fortitude, and piety ( reverence ).
The Earth Day Flag, the नवीनतम प्रस्ताव of John McConnell for a flag of Earth Day
Earth दिन is an सालाना इवेंट, मनाये on April 22, on which events are held worldwide to demonstrate support for environmental protection.
It was first celebrated in 1970, and is now coordinated globally by the Earth दिन संजाल, और मनाये in more than 192 countries each year.
In 1969 at a UNESCO Conference in San Francisco, the date proposed was March 21, 1970, the first day of spring in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध.
This day of nature 's equipoise was later sanctioned in a उदघोषणा हस्ताक्षरित by Secretary General U Thant at the United Nations.
A month later a separate Earth Day was founded by United States Senator Gaylord Nelson as an environmental teach-in पहला आयोजित on अप्रैल 22, 1970.
Nelson was later awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom पुरस्कार in recognition of his work.
While this April 22 Earth Day was focused on the United States, an organization launched by Denis Hayes, who was the original national coordinator in 1970, took it अंतरराष्ट्रीय in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations.
numerous समुदायों celebrate Earth Week, an entire week of activities focused on environmental issues.
Iodine is a chemical element with प्रतीक i और atomic number 53.
The name is from Greek ioeidēs, अर्थ बैंगनी or जामुनी, due to the color of elemental iodine vapor.
Iodine and its compounds are primarily used in nutrition, और industrially in the उत्पादन of acetic acid and certain polymers.
Iodine 's अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची परमाणु क्रमांक, कम toxicity, and ease of attachment to organic compounds have made it a part of many X-ray contrast materials in modern medicine.
आयोडीन रै तभी one stable isotope.
A number of आयोडीन radioisotopes हैं also used in medical applications.
Iodine is found on Earth मुख्यतः as the अत्यधिक water-soluble आयोडाइड आयन, i−, which concentrates it in oceans and brine pools.
Like the other halogens, free iodine occurs mainly as a diatomic molecule I2, and then only momentarily after being oxidized इससे आयोडाइड by an oxidant like free oxygen.
In the universe and on Earth, iodine 's ऊँची परमाणु क्रमांक makes it a relatively rare element.
However, इसके उपस्थिति in समंदर water has given it a role in biology.
It is the अधिकतम अनिवार्य तत्व utilized widely by जीवन in biological कृत्यों ( only tungsten, employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria, is heavier ).
Iodine 's rarity in many soils, due to initial कम प्रचुरता as a crust-element, and also leaching of soluble iodide by rainwater, has led to many deficiency problems in land animals and inland human populations.
Iodine deficiency affects about two billion people and is the leading preventable कारण of बौद्धिक disabilities.
Iodine is required by उच्चतर पशु, जिससे उपयोग it to synthesize thyroid hormones, which contain the element.
Because of this function, radioisotopes of iodine are concentrated in the thyroid gland साथ साथ nonradioactive आयोडीन.
If inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, which has a high परिवर्द्धन उत्पाद उपज, concentrates in the thyroid, but is easily remedied with potassium iodide treatment.
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the अधिनियम of attempting to influence decisions made by officials in the government, most often legislators or members of regulatory agencies.
Lobbying is done by many different types of लोगों और व्यवस्थित समूह, सहित individuals in the निजी सेक्टर, corporations, fellow legislators or government officials, or advocacy groups ( interest groups ).
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies, meaning a voter or bloc of voters within his or her electoral district, or नहीं ; वे may engage in lobbying as a कारोबार, or नहीं.
Professional lobbyists are people whose कारोबार is trying to influence विधान on behalf of a group or individual who hires them.
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an act of volunteering or as a small part of their normal job ( for instance, a CEO meeting with a प्रतिनिधि परिचय a प्रोजेक्ट महत्वपूर्ण to his/her कम्पनी, or an activist बैठक साथ his/her विधायक in an unpaid क्षमता ).
Governments often define और विनियमित व्यवस्थित group lobbying that has become influential.
the आचार and morality of lobbying are.
lobbying is प्रायः बोला of साथ अवमानना, जब the implication is that people with inordinate socioeconomic power are corrupting the law ( twisting it away from fairness ) in order to serve their own conflict of interest.
But another side of lobbying is making sure that others ' interests are duly defended against others ' corruption, or even simply making sure that minority interests are fairly defended विरूद्ध mere जुल्म of the majority.
For example, a medical association, or a trade संघ of स्वास्थ्य बीमे कंपनियाँ, may लॉबी a विधानमंडल in order to counteract the influence of tobacco companies, in which case the lobbying would be viewed by most people as justified ( duly defending against others ' corruption ).
The difficulty in drawing objective lines between which lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' और जिससे ones हैं `` bad ones '' is compounded by the cleverness with which lobbyists or their clients can argue that their own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind.
At heart, the effort to influence legislation is a शक्ति संघर्ष.
As in other forms of power struggle, such as war or law enforcement, motives range इससे to self-defense to लड़ लिये इंसाफ, और the dividing line between predation and justice is subject to rationalization.
Sunshine of अपना प्रेम guitar riff
Cream were a 1960s British rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce, guitarist/vocalist Eric Clapton, and drummer Ginger Baker.
Their sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues rock, hard rock and psychedelic rock, combining the psychedelia-themed lyrics, Eric Clapton 's blues guitar playing and vocals, Jack Bruce 's voice and prominent बास playing और Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming.
The group 's third एल्बम, पहियों of आग, was the world 's first platinum-selling double album.
Cream are widely regarded as होने the संसार 's पहला successful supergroup.
In their career, they sold over 15 लाख एल्बम worldwide.
Cream 's music included songs based on traditional blues such as `` Crossroads `` and `` Spoonful ``, and modern ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` born अंतर्गत a ख़राब चिह्न ``, as खूब as more eccentric songs such as `` Strange Brew ``, `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad ``.
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK, number 11 ), `` Sunshine of Your Love `` ( US, number 5 ), `` White Room `` ( US, number 6 ), `` Crossroads '' ( US, number 28 ), and `` बैज `` ( uk, क्रमांक 18 ).
Cream made a significant impact on the लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक of the time, and, along with Jimi Hendrix, and Terry Kath of Chicago, popularised the use of the wah-wah pedal.
They provided a heavy yet technically निपुण musical थीम कि foreshadowed and influenced the emergence of British bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s.
The band 's सजीव प्रदर्शन बहकावे progressive rock acts such as Rush.
Cream were inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of Fame in 1993.
They were included in both Rolling Stone and VH1 's lists of the `` 100 महानतम कलाकारों of सब समय ''.
They were also ranked number 16 on vh1 's `` 100 महानतम Artists of Hard Rock ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written and directed by John Waters, and starring Ricki Lake, Sonny Bono, Debbie Harry, Michael St. Gerard, Shawn थॉम्पसन, colleen fitzpatrick, जेरी stiller, और in उसके पिछला फिल्मी भूमिका, दैवी.
Hairspray was a dramatic departure from Waters ' पहले works, साथ a much broader intended audience.
In fact, Hairsprays pg is the mildest दरजा a Waters film has received ; most of his previous films were rated X by the MPAA.
Set in 1962 Baltimore, Maryland, the फिल्मी घूमती around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था ट्रेसी turnblad as she pursues stardom as a dancer on a local TV show and rallies against racial segregation.
Hairspray was only a moderate कामयाबी upon its initial theatrical release, earning a modest gross of $ 8 million.
However, it प्रबंधित to आकर्षित a larger दर्शक on home video in the early 1990s and became a cult classic.
Most आलोचकों praised the फिल्मी, although some were displeased with the overall campiness.
in 2002, the फिल्मी थी adapted into a ब्रॉडवे musical of the same name, which won eight Tony Awards, including Best Musical in 2003.
A second film version of Hairspray, an adaptation of the stage musical, was also released by New Line Cinema in 2007, जिससे शामिल अनेक परिवर्तन of scripted वस्तुएं इससे the असली.
The film also ranks # 444 on साम्राज्य पत्रिका 's 2008 list of the 500 greatest movies of all time.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक देह अंतर्गत a आम name, structure, and doctrine within Christianity.
Some groups included do not consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the Catholic गिरिजाघर considers itself the एक सच्चा गिरिजाघर and the Apostolic See, and as pre-denominational ).
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being called a denomination and do not have any formal denominational ढांचा, प्राधिकार, or record-keeping beyond the local congregation ; several groups within Restoration Movement fall into this category.
Some groups हैं विशाल ( e.g. catholics, lutherans, anglicans or Baptists ), while others are just a few small churches, and in most cases the relative size is not evident in this list.
Modern movements such as fundamentalist christianity, pietism, evangelicalism, pentecostalism और the पवित्रता movement sometimes cross denominational lines, or in some cases create new denominations out of two or more continuing groups, ( as is the case for many United and uniting churches, for example ).
Such subtleties and complexities हैं नहीं clearly depicted here.
Major विभाजन भीतर Christianity.
Note : This is not a पूरा सूची, लकिन aims to provide a comprehensible overview of the diversity among denominations of Christianity.
As वहीँ हैं reported to be लगभग 41,000 ईसाई denominations, many of which can not be verified to be significant, only those denominations with Wikipedia articles will be listed in order to ensure that all entries on this list are notable and verifiable.
Between denominations, theologians, and comparative religionists there are considerable disagreements परिचय जिससे समूह can be properly पुकारा ईसाई, disagreements arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups.
For the purpose of simplicity, this list is intended to reflect the self-understanding of प्रत्येक denomination.
Explanations of different opinions concerning उनके status as Christian denominations can be found at their respective articles.
There is no आधिकारिक मान्यता in सबसे भाग of the संसार लिये धार्मिक bodies, and there is no official clearinghouse which could determine the status or respectability of religious bodies.
Often there is considerable disagreement between विभिन्न चर्च परिचय whether other churches should be labeled with pejorative terms such as `` cult '', or about whether this or that group enjoys some measure of respectability.
Such considerations often vary from place to place, where one religious group may enjoy majority status in one region, but be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another भाग of the संसार.
Inclusion on this list does not indicate any judgment about the size, महत्व, or character of a group or its members.
1804 map of `` Louisiana ``, edged on the west by the रॉकी kyu.
The Louisiana Purchase ( `` Sale of Louisiana '' ) was the acquisition by the United States of America in 1803 of of फ़्रांस 's अर्जी to the territory of louisiana.
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) plus cancellation of debts worth 18 million francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), for a कुल योग of 15 लाख डॉलर ( कम than 3 सेंट per acre ) for the Louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars, less than 42 cents per acre ).
The Louisiana territory encompassed सब or भाग of 15 उपस्थित U.S. states and two Canadian provinces.
The land purchased contained all of present-day Arkansas, Missouri, Iowa, Oklahoma, Kansas, and Nebraska ; parts of Minnesota that were west of the Mississippi River ; most of North Dakota ; most of South Dakota ; northeastern नई मैक्सिको ; उत्तरी टेक्सास ; the portions of Montana, Wyoming, and Colorado east of the Continental Divide ; Louisiana west of the Mississippi River, including the city of New Orleans ; and small portions of land that would eventually become part of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan.
फ़्रांस नियंत्रित इस विशाल क्षेत्रफल from 1699 until 1762, the year it gave the territory to its ally Spain.
Under Napoleon Bonaparte, France took back the territory in 1800 in the hope of भवन an साम्राज्य in उत्तर अमेरिका.
A slave revolt in Haiti and an impending war with Britain, however, led फ़्रांस to लापरवाही ये योजनाएँ और बेचें the entire territory to the United States, who had originally intended only to seek the purchase of New Orleans and its adjacent lands.
the खरीदें of the territory of Louisiana took place during the presidency of Thomas Jefferson.
At the time, the खरीदें faced घरेलू opposition because it was thought to be unconstitutional.
Although he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did नहीं contain प्रावधानों लिये acquiring territory, जेफरसन decided to go ahead साथ the purchase anyway in order to remove France 's presence in the region and to protect both U.S. trade access to the port of New Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River.
Ceremony at Place d'Armes, New Orleans marking ट्रांसफ़र of louisiana to the संयुक्त राज्य, 10 March 1804, as depicted by Thure de Thulstrup.
`` Cool Jerk '' is a लोकप्रिय सोंग लिखा by डोनाल्ड storball and originally performed by The Capitols.
Released in 1966, it reached No. 2 on the अमरीकी r & B chart and No. 7 on the pop chart.
The backing track for इस सोंग थी दरअसल अंकित ( secretly ) by the Motown house band The Funk Brothers.
Per one of the Funk Brothers, the song was originally to be called `` Pimp Jerk. ''
This was लिया इससे watching पड़ोस pimps, who would dance in the clubs, but were too `` cool '' to do the jerk like regular folks.
Their version was subsequently नामित `` the Pimp Jerk. ''
The producer was afraid that a song with the word pimp in the शीर्षक होता be बैन or not receive much positive attention, and had the title changed to its current form.
The Go-Go 's, Todd Rundgren, Big ट्रबल, इंसान यौन Response, The La De Da 's, The Creation, and The Coasters have covered the song.
Todd Rundgren did his version in an odd time signature ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky feel to the song.
The Go-Go 's covered the song for their 1982 album Vacation and later re-recorded it for their 1990 एल्बम महानतम.
In the feature film Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York, Uncle Frank ( Gerry Bamman ) गाती `` कूल झटका '' in the बरसात.
A version of the song with different lyrics ( `` Do the Cool चाबुक '' ) is प्रयुक्त in कूल चाबुक commercials.
A recording of `` Cool Jerk '' by रिकार्डो रे is प्रदर्शित in the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ).
The song features in the film Standing in the Shadows of Motown, performed by the दुर्गंध भाइयो साथ सीसे vocals by Bootsy Collins.
The song is heard briefly in the animated विशेषता, Madagascar 3 : Europe 's Most Wanted.
Despite this reason, it is listed in some विसंगतियाँ of the फिल्मी 's soundtrack.
A लीग is a ईकाई of length ( or, rarely, area ).
It was long आम in यूरोपीय and Latin America, but it is no longer an official unit in any nation.
The league originally referred to the अलहदा a व्यक्ति could walk in an hour.
Since the Middle Ages, many values have been निर्दिष्ट in अनेक countries.
In the context of nautical distances, the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an observer of average height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can देखिए जब standing at sea level.
Thus, a ship traveling one `` league '' has reached what थी previously the farthest दृश्य अलहदा on the horizon.
The lack of a historical और वैश्विक मानक लिये the सटीक माप of a `` लीग '' can be accounted for by the variable elevation of the observer ( i.e., sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ).
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish फ़्री राज्य, a डोमिनियन of the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल, having seceded from the United Kingdom under the Anglo-Irish Treaty.
It comprises 26 of Ireland 's 32 counties.
चूंकि 1949 it has existed as the Republic of Ireland.
From its foundation, the Irish Free State was embroiled in a civil war between राष्ट्रवादियों supporting the सन्धि और प्रतिद्वंद्वियों जो समर्थित a republic.
The pro-treaty पक्ष, संगठित as cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious from the conflict and won subsequent elections.
They formed the government of the state until 1932, when they peacefully handed over power to the anti-Treaty गुट in fianna fáil, जो पराजित उन्हें in an चुनाव.
The Irish state, despite its violent beginnings, has remained a उदार democracy throughout its existence.
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the links with Britain established under the सन्धि और आयरलैंड 's neutrality in the Second World War demonstrated its independence in foreign policy matters from Britain.
In 1948 Ireland formally बाएँ the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल and adopted the title of `` Republic ''.
In the economic sphere, the Irish राज्य रै था a मिश्रित प्रदर्शन.
on स्वतंत्रता, it was one of the wealthier countries in Europe per head of population.
However it also inherited from British rule the problems of unemployment, emigration, uneven geographical विकास और कमी of a देशी industrial base.
For much of its history, the राज्य struggled to rectify these problems.
Particular peaks of emigration were recorded during the late 1930s, 1950s और 1980s, जब the Irish economy recorded little growth.
In the 1930s, Fianna Fáil governments attempted to create आयरिश घरेलू उद्योग using subsidies and protective tarifs.
In the late 1950s, these policies were dropped in favour of फ़्री व्यापार साथ चयनित देशों और encouraging of foreign investment with low taxes.
This थी विस्तारित जब आयरलैंड डाला the European Economic Community in 1972.
In the 1990s and 2000s, Ireland अनुभवी an आर्थिक बूम ज्ञात as the सेल्टिक Tiger, in which the country 's GDP surpassed many of its European neighbours.
Immigration also surpassed emigration, bringing the राज्य 's population up to over 4 million.
However, चूंकि 2008, Ireland has experienced a severe crisis in the banking sector and with sovereign debt.
The resultant economic slump has deepened the प्रभाव of the संसार recession on Ireland.
From 1937 to 1998, the आयरिश संविधान शामिल a claim on Northern Ireland as a part of the national territory.
However, the state also opposed and used its security forces against those armed groups - principally the Provisional Irish रिपब्लिकन फौज, जो आजमाया to एकजुट आयरलैंड by force.
This occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s और 1980s और has continued on a reduced scale.
Irish सरकारें meanwhile आजमाया to दलाली an अनुबंध to the conflict known as The Troubles within Northern Ireland from 1968 to the late 1990s.
The British government officially recognised the right of the Irish government to be a पार्टी to the उत्तरी negotiations in the anglo-irish Agreement of 1985.
In 1998, as part of the Good Friday Agreement, the Irish constitution was altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim to Northern Ireland and बजाय extend the सही of Irish citizenship to all the people of the island should they wish to have it.
John Quincy Adams ( July 11, 1767february 23, 1848 ) was the sixth President of the United States ( 1825–1829 ).
He served as American diplomat, Senator, and congressional प्रतिनिधि.
He was a member of the Federalist, Democratic-Republican, नेशनल रिपब्लिकन, and later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties.
Adams was the बेटे of पूर्व President John Adams and Abigail Adams.
As a diplomat, Adams played an important role in negotiating many international treaties, most notably the Treaty of Ghent, which ended the War of 1812.
As Secretary of State, he negotiated with the United Kingdom over America 's northern border with Canada, negotiated साथ स्पेन the annexation of फ्लोरिडा, और authored the मुनरो doctrine.
Historians agree he थी एक of the महानतम राजनयिकों और secretaries of state in American history.
As president, he sought to modernize the American economy and promoted शिक्षा.
एडम्स enacted a भाग of his agenda and paid off much of the national debt.
He was stymied by a Congress controlled by his enemies, and his lack of patronage networks helped राजनेता eager to undercut him.
He lost his 1828 bid for re-election to एंड्रयू जैक्सन.
In doing so, he became the first president since his पिता to serve a सिंगल term.
Adams is best known as a राजनयिक जो तराशा अमेरिका 's विदेशी policy in line with his ardently nationalist commitment to America 's republican values.
More recently Howe ( 2007 ) portrayed एडम्स as the exemplar और moral leader in an era of modernization.
During Adams ' lifetime, technological नवप्रवर्तनों और नई अर्थात् of संचार spread messages of religious revival, social reform, and party politics.
Goods, money, and लोगों traveled अधिक rapidly and efficiently than ever before.
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative from Massachusetts after leaving office, serving for the last 17 years of उसके जीवन साथ दूर वृहद acclamation than he had achieved as president.
He is, so दूर, the तभी president later elected to the United States House of Representatives ( though John Tyler was elected to the House of Representatives of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ).
एनिमेटेड by उसके growing revulsion against slavery, Adams became a leading opponent of the Slave Power.
He predicted that if a civil युद्ध यहूद to ब्रेक आउट, the president could abolish slavery by using his war powers.
Adams also predicted the Union 's dissolution over the slavery issue, but said that if the South became स्वतंत्र वहीँ होता be a श्रेणी of bloody slave revolts.
Windows Internet Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) is a version of the Internet Explorer वेब ब्राउजर इससे microsoft.
It was released to the public on कूच 14, 2011.
Microsoft has released Internet Explorer 9 as a major out-of-band version that is not tied to the release अनुसूची of कोई particular संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, नापसंद previous versions.
It is the first version since Internet Explorer 2 to not be bundled with a Windows operating system, although some OEMs have संस्थापित it साथ खिड़कियाँ 7 on उनके pcs, as well as new Windows 7 laptops.
The system requirements for Internet Explorer 9 are Windows 7, खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008 r2, खिड़कियाँ विस्टा सेवा पैक 2 or Windows Server 2008 SP2 with the Platform Update.
खिड़कियाँ XP and earlier are not supported.
Internet Explorer 9 is the last version of Internet एक्सप्लोरर to be समर्थित on खिड़कियाँ Vista.
Both IA-32 and x64 builds are available.
अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 supports अनेक सीएसएस 3 गुण, embedded ICC v2 or v4 color profiles support via Windows Color System, and has improved JavaScript performance.
It is the last of the five major web browsers to implement support लिये स्केलेबल Vector Graphics ( SVG ).
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D, hardware-accelerated text rendering using DirectWrite, hardware-accelerated video rendering using Media Foundation, imaging support provided by खिड़कियाँ इमेजिंग घटक, और ऊँची वफ़ादारी मुद्रण संचालित by the xml पेपर Specification ( XPS ) print pipeline.
अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 also supports the HTML5 video and audio tags and the Web Open Font Format.
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid and pain reliever first marketed by the dr. मील Medicine Company.
It was developed by Maurice Treener, head chemist at Miles, in Elkhart, Indiana.
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches, pains, inflammation, fever, headache, heartburn, खट्टा पेट, अपच, और hangovers, जबकि neutralizing excess stomach acid.
It was launched in 1931.
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer made to relieve colds and फ्लू, alka-seltzer Plus, was later introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant, Alka-Mints, was introduced in 1994 और discontinued in 1997.
Alka-Seltzer is फिलहाल स्वामित्व by बायर Schering Pharma AG, Germany.
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been विस्तारित to चरितार्थ an संपूर्ण लकीर of medications sold over the counter and taken by means of rapidly dissolving tablets that form a carbonated solution in water.

A stalactite (, ; from the Greek stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to drip '', and meaning `` that which drips '' ) is a type of speleothem ( द्वितीयक खनिज ) कि hangs इससे the ceiling of limestone caves.
It is a प्रकार of dripstone.
The corresponding formation on the floor of the cave is known as a stalagmite.
Degree abbreviations are used as an alternative way to specify an academic degree बजाय of स्पेलिंग आउट the title in full, such as in reference books like Who 's Who and on business cards.
Many डिग्री have अधिक than one abbreviation.
In the uk, it is not generally the custom to punctuate abbreviations for degrees with full stops ( e.g. `` BSc '' rather than `` B.Sc. ``.
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans into large and distinct populations or groups by anatomical, cultural, ethnic, genetic, भौगोलिक, ऐतिहासिक, भाषाई, religious, or social affiliation.
First used to denote national affiliations, the पद began to be प्रयुक्त to relate to physical traits in the 17th century.
In the early 20th century the term was often used, in a taxonomic sense, to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype.
While biologists sometimes use the concept of race to make distinctions among fuzzy sets of traits, others in the scientific community suggest that the idea of race often is प्रयुक्त in a भोली or simplistic रास्ता, i.e. कि among humans, race has no taxonomic significance : all living humans belong to the same species, Homo sapiens and subspecies, Homo sapiens sapiens.
Social conceptions and groupings of races vary over time, involving लोक taxonomies
that define of individuals आधारित on आभास traits.
वैज्ञानिकों consider biological essentialism obsolete, and generally discourage racial explanations for collective differentiation in both physical and behavioral traits.
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with the ideologies and theories that grew आउट of the कार्य of 19th-century विज्ञानियों and physiologists has led to the use of the word race itself becoming problematic.
Although still used in general contexts, it is now often replaced by अन्य शब्द जिससे are less ambiguous and emotionally charged, such as populations, people ( s ), ethnic groups or communities depending on context.
Lucy Stone ( August 13, 1818 – October 19, 1893 ) was a prominent American abolitionist and suffragist, and a vocal advocate and organizer promoting rights for women.
In 1847, स्टोन became the first woman from Massachusetts to earn a college degree.
She spoke out for women 's rights and against slavery at a time जब महिलाओं यहूद हतोत्साहित and prevented from public speaking.
Stone was the first recorded American woman to retain her अपना पिछला नाम बाद विवाह.
Stone 's organizational activities लिये the कारण of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों yielded ठोस gains in the difficult political environment of the 19th century.
Stone helped initiate the पहला नेशनल महिलाओं 's अधिकारों सम्मेलन और वो समर्थित और sustained it annually along with a number of other local, state and regional activist conventions.
Stone spoke in सामने of a क्रमांक of विधान bodies to promote laws giving more rights to women.
She assisted in establishing the Woman 's National Loyal League to help pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery, after which she helped form the largest समूह of like-minded महिलाओं 's अधिकारों reformers, the नीतियां मॉडरेट अमरीकी स्त्री suffrage संघ, which worked for decades at the state level in favor of women 's right to vote.
Stone wrote extensively about a wide range of women 's अधिकारों, प्रकाशन और distributing speeches by herself and others, and convention proceedings.
In the long-running and influential Woman 's Journal, a weekly periodical that she established and promoted, Stone aired both her own and differing views about women 's rights.
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the woman 's rights movement '', स्टोन वितरित a वाक which sparked Susan B. Anthony to take up the cause of women 's suffrage.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote that `` Lucy Stone was the first person by whom the heart of the American public was deeply stirred on the woman question. ''
Together, Anthony, Stanton, and Stone have महरूम पुकारा the 19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage and feminism.
In finance, a bond is an यंत्र of indebtedness of the बंध जारीकर्ता to the holders.
It is a debt security, अंतर्गत जिससे the जारीकर्ता owes the धारकों a कर्ज़ और, depending on the terms of the bond, is obliged to pay them interest ( the coupon ) or to repay the principal at a later date, termed the maturity.
ब्याज is प्रायः देय at fixed intervals ( semiannual, annual, sometimes monthly ).
Very often the bond is परक्राम्य, i.e. the ownership of the instrument can be transferred in the secondary market.
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU : the holder of the bond is the lender ( creditor ), the जारीकर्ता of the बंध is the borrower ( debtor ), और the कूपन is the ब्याज.
Bonds provide the borrower साथ बाह्य निधि to वित्त long-term निवेश, or, in the case of government bonds, to finance current expenditure.
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term commercial paper are considered to be money market यंत्र और नहीं bonds : the प्रमुख अंतर is in the length of the term of the instrument.
Bonds and stocks are both securities, but the major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी ( i.e. वे हैं owners ), whereas bondholders have a creditor stake in the company ( i.e. they are lenders ).
Another difference is that bonds usually have a defined term, or maturity, after which the बंध is redeemed, whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely.
An exception is an irredeemable bond, such as Consols, which is a perpetuity, i.e. a बंध साथ no maturity.

A scale model is a physical model, a representation or copy of an object that is larger or smaller than the actual आकार of the ऑब्जेक्ट, जिससे seeks to maintain the सापेक्ष proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical size of the original object.
Very often the scale model is used as a guide to making the object in पूरा आकार.
Scale models are built or एकत्रित लिये अनेक कारण.
The Zune HD was a portable media player in the Zune product family released on September 15, 2009 by microsoft.
It was a direct competitor with the Apple iPod and iPhone श्रेणी of मोबाईल डिवाइस.
It was initially released in 16 और 32 gb capacities.
A 64 GB version was released on अप्रैल 9, 2010.
It utilized a touchscreen interface लिये नेविगेशन और शामिल wi-fi लिये तुल्यकालन, अभिगम to the Zune Marketplace and Web browsing.
The Zune HD utilized the Nvidia Tegra APX 2600 चिप, allowing it to खेल 720p वीडियो through the वैकल्पिक HDMI Zune dock on a high-definition television.
Otherwise, सामग्री होता be scaled down to 480x272 pixels on the player 's OLED touchscreen.
Old Sparky, the electric chair used at Sing Sing prison
Execution by electrocution, usually performed using an electric chair, is an execution method originating in the United States in which the condemned व्यक्ति is strapped to a विशेषकर निर्मित लकड़ी कुर्सी and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body.
This execution विधि थी निर्मित by employees of Thomas Edison during the War of Currents, and has been used only in the United States and, for a period of several decades, in the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation, last in 1976 ).
Historically, once the condemned व्यक्ति थी संलग्न to the कुर्सी, विभिन्न cycles ( differing in voltage and duration ) of alternating current would be passed through the individual 's body, in order to cause fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ).
The first jolt of electric current was designed to cause तात्कालिक unconsciousness and brain death ; the second one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital organs.
Death was frequently caused by electrical overstimulation of the heart.
Although in the United राज्य the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी रै become a प्रतीक of the death penalty, its use is in decline due to the rise of lethal injection, which is widely believed to be a more humane method of execution.
Although कुछ राज्य स्टिल maintain electrocution as a विधि of निष्पादन, today it is only maintained as a secondary method that may be chosen over lethal injection at the request of the prisoner.
As of 2010, electrocution is an वैकल्पिक form of execution in Alabama, Florida, South Carolina and Virginia.
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal injection as an alternative method.
In the states of Kentucky and टेनेसी, the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी रै महरूम रिटायर्ड मगर लिये those जिनकी पूंजी अपराधों यहूद वचनबद्ध prior to legislated तिथियाँ in 1998 ( केंटकी : कूच 31, 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31, 1998 ) and who chose electrocution.
In both states, inmates who do not choose electrocution or inmates who committed their crimes after the designated date are killed by lethal इंजेक्शन.
The electric chair is an alternate form of execution approved for potential use in Arkansas and Oklahoma if other forms of execution are found असंवैधानिक in the राज्य at the समय of निष्पादन.
It is the sole method of निष्पादन in वर्मांट, जहाँ treason is the only capital crime.
On February 8, 2008, the Nebraska Supreme Court determined that execution by electric chair was a `` cruel and unusual punishment '' अंतर्गत the राज्य 's संविधान.
इस brought executions of this type to an end in Nebraska, the only remaining state to retain electrocution as its sole method of execution for murder.
The Maryland House of delegates is the निम्नतर हाउस of the सामान्य Assembly, the state legislature of the American State of Maryland, and is composed of 141 Delegates elected from 47 districts.
The House of Delegates Chamber is located in the Maryland State House ( state capitol ) on राज्य वृत्त in annapolis, जिससे is the state capital.
The State House also houses the Maryland State Senate Chamber and the कार्यालयों of the राज्यपाल और लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल of the State of Maryland.
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis, in the आसपास कैस्पर R. टेलर, Jr. House Office Building.
The Liberation of Paris ( भी ज्ञात as the बैटल लिये पेरिस ) took प्लेस during World War II from 19 August 1944 until the surrender of the occupying German garrison on 25 August.
The Liberation of Paris started with an uprising by the फ्रेंच प्रतिरोध विरूद्ध the जर्मनी garrison.
On 24 August, the French शक्तियां of the आंतरिक ( शक्तियां françaises de l'intérieur, ffi ) प्राप्त reinforcements from the Free French Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton.
The capital region of France had been governed by Nazi Germany since the signing of the Second compiègne armistice in June 1940, when the German Army occupied northern and westernmost France, and when the puppet regime of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France.
This battle marked the मुक्ति of पेरिस और the निर्वासन of the Vichy government to Sigmaringen in Germany.
However, there was still much heavy fighting to be done before France was liberated, including the अभियान in दक्षिणी फ़्रांस दौरान august-september ( in provence और extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the vosges kyu ), साथ the german-held seaports of western France ( such as at Brest and Dunkirk ), in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France, and in northeastern France, such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers.
The German Army and SS fought doggedly in ये क्षेत्रों लिये the शेष of 1944 and into 1945.
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as `` Feeling Alright '' is a song written by Dave Mason of the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album, Traffic.
The song was also a hit single for several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, US # 33 ), Mongo Santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) and ग्रैंड दुर्गंध रेलरोड ( 1971, us # 54 ).
It has also been recorded by Three Dog Night ( 1969 ), The 5th Dimension ( 1970 ), Lou Rawls, Freddie King, Paul Weller, Lulu, Chairmen of the फलक ( 1970 ), विरल धरती, the इलेक्ट्रिक Concept Orchestra, Mother 's Finest ( 1973 ), The Ohio Players ( 1971 ), Diana Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ), Maceo Parker, Gladys Knight & the Pips, Widespread Panic and The Black Crowes.
A Steel ढोल संस्करण by त्रिनिदाद आयल Company was reissued on the dancefloor jazz compilation Blue Juice 2.
It was also प्रदर्शित in the 2000 film Duets, sung by Huey Lewis.
Both the original and the Joe Cocker cover were featured in the movie उड़ान, अभिनीत डेंज़ल वॉशिंगटन.
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an American actor, आवाज़ कर्ता, सिंगर, songwriter and musician, best known for his starring role as Ned Bigby on the Nickelodeon sitcom Ned 's Declassified School Survival Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules, as the lead character Nolan Byrd.
Werkheiser also played Peter Parkes in the fourth and final ऋतु of the एबीसी परिवार show Greek.

Sample दृश्य of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic collection of electronic स्वास्थ्य सूचना परिचय individual patients or populations.
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically capable of being shared आरपार अलग स्वास्थ्य परवाह जमावट.
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and other सूचना संजाल or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of data, including demographics, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization status, laboratory test results, radiology images, vital signs, personal stats like age and वज़न, और बिलिंग information.
Loan origination is the process by which a borrower applies for a नई ऋण, और a lender प्रक्रियाओं that application.
Origination generally includes all the steps from taking a loan अनुप्रयोग up to disbursal of निधि ( or घटती the application ).
Loan servicing covers everything बाद disbursing the funds until the loan is fully paid off.
Loan origination is a specialized संस्करण of नई खाता opening for financial services organizations.
Certain people and संगठन specialize in loan origination.
बंधक brokers and other mortgage originator companies serve as a prominent example.
There हैं अनेक अलग types of loans.
For more information on loan types, see the loan and consumer lending articles.
Steps शामिल in originating a ऋण vary by loan type, various kinds of loan risk, regulator, lender policy, and other factors.
Top left : The टेनेसी घाटी प्राधिकार, भाग of the New Deal, being signed into law in 1933.
Top right : Franklin Delano Roosevelt, who was जिम्मेदार लिये पहलों और कार्यक्रम collectively ज्ञात as the New Deal.
Bottom : A पब्लिक mural from one of the artists employed by the New Deal.
the नई सौदे थी a श्रेणी of आर्थिक programs enacted in the United States between 1933 and 1936.
They involved presidential executive orders or laws passed by कॉंग्रेस दौरान the पहला term of President Franklin D. Roosevelt.
The programs were in जवाब to the ग्रेट अवसाद, और केन्द्रित on कया historians call the `` 3 Rs '' : Relief, Recovery, and Reform.
That is Relief for the unemployed and poor ; Recovery of the economy to normal levels ; and सुधार of the वित्तीय प्रणाली to prevent a repeat अवसाद.
The New Deal produced a political realignment, making the Democratic Party the majority ( as well as the party that held the White House for seven out of nine Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ), with its base in liberal ideas, the white South, traditional Democrats, बिग नगर मशीने, और the newly सशक्त मजदूर संघ and ethnic minorities.
The Republicans were split, with conservatives opposing the entire New Deal as an enemy of business and growth, and liberals accepting कुछ of it और होनहार to मेक it more efficient.
The realignment crystallized into the New Deal Coalition that dominated most presidential elections into the 1960s, while the opposition Conservative गठबन्धन largely नियंत्रित कॉंग्रेस इससे 1937 to 1963.
By 1936 the term `` liberal '' typically थी प्रयुक्त लिये समर्थक of the नई Deal, and `` conservative `` for its opponents.
From 1934 to 1938, Roosevelt थी assisted in उसके endeavours by a “pro-spender” बहुमत in कॉंग्रेस ( drawn from two-party, competitive, non-machine, Progressive, and Left party districts ).
As noted by Alexander Hicks, “Roosevelt, backed by rare, non-southern डेमोक्रेट majorities — 270 non-southern डेमोक्रेट representatives and 71 non-Southern Democrat senators — spelled Second New Deal reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) और a `` दूसरी नई सौदे '' ( 1935–38 ), with the second one more liberal and more controversial.
The `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt साथ विविध groups, from banking and railroads to industry and farming, all of which demanded help for economic survival.
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration, for instance, provided $ 500 million for relief operations by states और शहरों, जबकि the short-lived cwa ( सिविल Works Administration ) gave localities money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34.
The `` Second New Deal `` in 1935–38 included the Wagner Act to promote labor unions, the Works Progress Administration ( WPA ) relief program ( which made the federal government by far the largest सिंगल नियोक्ता in the nation ), the Social Security Act, and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers.
The final major items of New Deal legislation were the creation of the United States Housing Authority and Farm Security Administration, both in 1937, और the मेला मजदूर मानकों Act of 1938, which set maximum hours and minimum wages for most categories of workers.
The economic downturn of 1937–38, and the bitter split between the AFL and CIO labor unions led to major रिपब्लिकन gains in कॉंग्रेस in 1938.
Conservative republicans और डेमोक्रेट in Congress joined in the informal Conservative Coalition.
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs such as the WPA और ccc और अवरोधित major liberal proposals.
Roosevelt himself turned his attention to the war effort, and won reelection in 1940 और 1944.
The Supreme Court declared the National Recovery Administration ( NRA ) and the पहला संस्करण of the agricultural समायोजन अधिनियम ( aaa ) असंवैधानिक, however the aaa was rewritten and then upheld.
As the first Republican president elected after FDR, Dwight D. आइज़नहावर ( 1953–61 ) बाएँ the New Deal largely intact, even expanding it in some areas.
In the 1960s, Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the New Deal as inspiration for a नाटकीय विस्तार of उदार programs, which Republican Richard M. Nixon generally retained.
बाद 1974, however, the call for deregulation of the economy gained bipartisan support.
The New Deal regulation of banking ( glass–steagall अधिनियम ) थी निलंबित in the 1990s.
Many New Deal programs remain active, with some still operating under the original names, including the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation ( FDIC ), the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ), the Federal Housing प्रशासन ( fha ), और the टेनेसी Valley Authority ( TVA ).
The largest programs still in existence today are the Social सुरक्षा प्रणाली और the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज Commission ( SEC ).
A woman ( ), pl : women ( ) is a female human.
The term woman is usually सुरक्षित लिये an adult, with the term girl being the usual term for a female child or adolescent.
However, the term woman is भी sometimes used to identify a female human, regardless of age, as in phrases such as `` Women 's rights ``.
Women are typically सक्षम of giving जनम, though older women who have gone through menopause and some intersex women can not.
`` I Do n't Want to Miss a Thing '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी rock band Aerosmith for the 1998 film Armageddon.
Written by Diane Warren, the song debuted at number one on the Billboard Hot 100 ( the first # 1 लिये the बैंड बाद 28 सालो साथ ).
The song stayed at number one for four weeks from September 5 to सितंबर 26, 1998.
The song also stayed at number 1 for several सप्ताह in अनेक अन्य countries.
In the UK, the song peaked at number four, becoming Aerosmith 's highest charting सोंग in the uk, जहाँ it was the 17th best-selling single of 1998, and has sold over a million copies.
Although not used by the majority of the world 's देशों, daylight saving time is common in the Western world.
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer time in British English — is the practice of advancing घड़ियाँ दौरान the हल्का महीने so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have less.
Typically clocks हैं समायोजित आगे एक घंटा near the start of spring and are adjusted backward in autumn.
The आधुनिक विचार of daylight saving was first proposed in 1895 by George Vernon Hudson and it was first implemented during the First World War.
Many countries have used it at various times चूंकि तब.
Much of the United States used DST in the 1950s and 1960s, और dst उपयोग विस्तारित following the 1970s energy crisis and has been widely used in North America and Europe since then.
The अभ्यास रै महरूम दोनो praised और criticized.
Adding daylight to evenings लाभ retailing, खेल, और अन्य क्रियाएँ कि exploit धूप after working hours, but can cause problems for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun.
Although an early goal of DST was to reduce evening usage of incandescent lighting ( formerly a प्राथमिक उपयोग of विद्युत ), आधुनिक हीटिंग और कूलिंग usage patterns differ greatly, and research about how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory.
DST clock shifts present other चुनौतियां.
They complicate timekeeping, and can disrupt बैठक, सफर, बिलिंग, रिकार्ड keeping, medical devices, heavy equipment, and sleep patterns.
Software can often adjust computer clocks automatically, but this can be सीमित और error-prone, विशेषकर जब DST dates are changed.

Montargis is a commune in the Loiret department in north-central France on the loing नदी.
The town is located about south of Paris and east of orléans in the gâtinais.
Montargis is the दूसरी largest city in the Loiret, after Orléans.
It is near a large forest, and contains light उद्योग और खेती, सहित saffron.
Due to its numerous नहरों और पुलों, montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais. ''
Though quite modern, it retains a मध्यकालीन आकर्षण in इसके शहर area.
In computer storage, a logical unit number, or LUN, is a number used to identify a logical unit, which is a device addressed by the SCSI protocol or protocols जिससे encapsulate scsi, ऐसे as fibre Channel or iSCSI.
A LUN may be used with any device which supports read/write operations, such as a tape drive, but is most प्रायः used to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN.
Though not technically correct, the term `` LUN '' is often also used to refer to the लॉजिकल disk itself.
The Gospel According to Mark (,, to euangelion kata Markon ), commonly shortened to the Gospel of Mark or simply Mark, is the दूसरी किताब of the नई वसीयत.
This canonical account of the life of Jesus of Nazareth is एक of the तीन synoptic gospels.
It was thought to be an निचोड़, जिससे खाते लिये इसके place as the second gospel in the Bible.
However, most contemporary विद्वानों अभी लिहाज़ it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That Mark was used as a source for the अन्य synoptic gospels इन्जील of मैथ्यू और इन्जील of Luke is widely held by many, although not all, New Testament scholars.
The Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of Jesus इससे उसके बपतिस्मा by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट to his death and resurrection.
It focuses विशेषकर on the last week of his life ( chapters 11–16 ) in Jerusalem.
Its swift narrative portrays Jesus as a वीर man of कार्रवाई, an exorcist, healer and miracle worker.
An important theme of Mark is the मुक्तिदाता Secret.
यीशु silences the demoniacs he heals, tries unsuccessfully to keep his messianic identity secret, and conceals his message with parables.
Meanwhile, the disciples fail to understand both the implication of the miracles of Jesus and the meaning of the things he predicts about his arrest, death and resurrection.
Most scholars believe that the original text of the इन्जील ends at चिह्नित 16:8 साथ the discovery of Jesus ' empty tomb and that the following account of his resurrection appearances is a later addition.
According to tradition and some early church writers, the author is Mark the Evangelist, the companion of the apostle Peter.
The gospel, however, appears to rely on several underlying sources, varying in form and in धर्मशास्त्र, जिससे tells विरूद्ध the परंपरा that the gospel was based on Peter 's preaching.
The text is a संकलन जिससे may शामिल eye-witness खाते as खूब as known apostolic preachings, and pre-existing written records that do not exist today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators.
Some of the stories in the gospel may have been transmitted orally पहले होने written down.
Various elements within the gospel suggest that the author wrote in Syria or Palestine for a non-jewish ईसाई community.
The Lord of the Rings is an epic high fantasy novel written by अंग्रेज़ी भाषाशास्त्री और विश्वविद्यालयों of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien.
The story began as a sequel to tolkien 's 1937 children 's fantasy novel The Hobbit, but eventually developed into a much larger work.
It was लिखा in चरण between 1937 और 1949, much of it during World War II.
It is the दूसरी best-selling novel ever written, with over 150 million copies sold.
The title of the novel refers to the story 's main antagonist, the Dark Lord Sauron, who had in an पहले आयु निर्मित the एक रिंग to नियम the अन्य बजती of शक्ति as the ultimate weapon in his campaign to conquer and rule all of Middle-earth.
From quiet beginnings in the Shire, a होब्बिट जमीन नहीं नापसंद the अंग्रेज़ी countryside, the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth, following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters, notably the hobbits Frodo Baggins, Samwise `` Sam '' Gamgee, Meriadoc `` Merry '' Brandybuck and Peregrin `` Pippin '' Took, but also the hobbits ' chief allies and travelling companions : Aragorn, a Human Ranger ; Boromir, a man from Gondor ; Gimli, a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas, an Elven prince ; and Gandalf, a Wizard.
The work was initially intended by Tolkien to be एक आवाज़ of a two-volume नियत, साथ the other being The Silmarillion, but this idea was dismissed by his publisher.
It was decided for economic reasons to publish The Lord of the Rings as three volumes over the course of a year from 29 July 1954 to 20 अक्तूबर 1955, यूँ बनाना the अभी परिचित रब of the Rings trilogy.
The three आयतन यहूद हकदार the फेलोशिप of the Ring, The Two Towers, and The Return of the King.
Structurally, the novel is divided internally into six books, two per volume, साथ अनेक appendices of पृष्ठभूमि material included at the end of the third volume.
The Lord of the Rings has since been reprinted numerous टाइम्स और अनूदित into अनेक भाषाएं.
Tolkien 's work has been the subject of extensive विश्लेषण of इसके themes and origins.
Although a major work in itself, the story was only the last movement of a larger epic Tolkien had worked on चूंकि 1917, in a प्रक्रम he वर्णित as mythopoeia.
प्रभाव on इस पहले कार्य, और on the स्टोरी of the रब of the Rings, include philology, mythology, religion and the author 's distaste for the effects of industrialization, as well as earlier fantasy works and Tolkien 's experiences in World War I.
The Lord of the Rings in its turn is considered to have had a great effect on आधुनिक काल्पनिक ; the प्रभाव of tolkien 's works is such that the use of the words `` Tolkienian '' and `` Tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary.
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the Rings has led to numerous references in popular संस्कृति, the founding of अनेक समाजों by प्रशंसक of tolkien 's works, and the publication of many books about Tolkien and his works.
The Lord of the Rings has inspired, and continues to inspire, artwork, music, films और टेलीविज़न, वीडियो खेल, और subsequent literature.
Award-winning adaptations of The Lord of the Rings have been made for radio, theatre, and film.
The following is an एपीसोड सूची लिये the निकलोडियन sitcom Drake & Josh.
The series debuted on जनवरी 11, 2004.
A TV film Merry Christmas, Drake & Josh was made अलावा इससे the नियमित श्रेणी on दिसम्बर 5, 2008.
There are a total of 60 एपीसोड यहूद उत्पादित spanning four seasons.
Drake Bell, Josh Peck, and Miranda Cosgrove were the only actors to appear in सब 60 एपीसोड.
The San Francisco 49ers conduct training camp at the team 's headquarters and अभ्यास सुविधा in सांता क्लारा, California in August 2010.
The offense is wearing red jerseys with the exception of quarterback Alex Smith, who is in a ब्लैक जर्सी ; the रक्षा in श्वेत.
In the National Football League, training camp refers to the time पहले the ऋतु commences.
During this time, teams will sometimes congregate at an outside location, प्रायः a विश्वविद्यालयों, to conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर for at least the first few weeks.
This is similar to baseball 's वसन्त प्रशिक्षण.
प्रशिक्षण शिविर is used in several different ways.
New players and कोच उपयोग it to acclimate themselves to new teammates and systems.
For younger players, it serves as a काल of evaluation ; for veterans, it is time to round back into form.
Training camp is divided into several different components.
the पहला is scrimmages.
These are pseudo-games where teams run nearly full games ' लायक of plays.
Sometimes, two practice सत्र are held on the same day.
This concept is referred to as two-a-days.
Other parts of training camp include drills, meetings साथ कोच और अन्य खिलाड़ी at एक 's position, weight training, and pre-season games.
The latter half of प्रशिक्षण शिविर leads directly into the exhibition season.
With NFL training camps starting in late-july, the biggest concern has been dehydration.
in 2001, मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स खिलाड़ी korey Stringer died of a medical condition based from dehydration and heatstroke.
The death of stringer prompted the एनएफएल to change their training policies.
At each practice, every team must have the team doctor and trainers on the field ; additionally, an एम्बुलेंस must be present during practices.
With NFL training camps beginning in late July, severe weather can affect अभ्यास और प्रदर्शनी games.
In 2002, a Cleveland Browns प्रदर्शनी खेल ended due to lightning near Cleveland Browns Stadium, and severe storms have been known to disrupt training camps.
Fans are often able to विज़िट उनके पसंदीदा टोली 's प्रशिक्षण शिविर to कैच an जल्दी dekh at the खिलाड़ी ; प्रवेश to practices is often free or substantially less expensive than a game ticket, making training camp trips a popular option for fans who can not attend many games due to financial or other reasons.
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions at camp sites along with offering activities and events to make प्रशिक्षण शिविर a अधिक fan-friendly अनुभव.
In computing, a file system ( or filesystem ) is a प्रकार of आंकड़ा स्टोर जिससे can be used to store, retrieve and update a set of files.
The term could refer to the abstract data structures used to define files, or to the वास्तविक तन्त्र or फर्मवेयर components that implement the abstract ideas.
Some file systems are प्रयुक्त on लोकल आंकड़ा भंडार डिवाइस ; अन्य provide file access via a network protocol ( e.g. NFS, SMB, or 9P clients ).
Some file systems are `` virtual '', in that the `` files '' supplied are computed on request ( e.g. procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a अलग संचिका system used as a backing store.
The file system manages अभिगम to दोनो the सामग्री of फाइलें and the metadata about those files.
It is responsible लिये arranging भंडार स्पेस ; विश्वसनीयता, दक्षता, और ट्यूनिंग with regard to the physical storage medium are important design considerations.
William Howard Taft ( September 15, 1857 – कूच 8, 1930 ) थी the 27th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth Chief Justice of the United States ( 1921–1930 ).
He is the only person to have परोसा in दोनो of these offices.
Before becoming President, taft, a रिपब्लिकन, थी चयनित to serve on the Superior Court of Cincinnati in 1887.
In 1890, Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the संयुक्त राज्य और in 1891 a न्यायधीश on the संयुक्त States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
In 1900, President William McKinley appointed Taft governor-general of the फिलीपीन.
In 1904, President Theodore Roosevelt appointed Taft Secretary of War in an प्रयत्न to दूल्हे taft, तब उसके बंद राजनैतिक ally, into his handpicked presidential successor.
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving, assuming on some occasions the role of acting Secretary of State, जबकि घटती दोहराया offers इससे रूज़वेल्ट to serve on the Supreme Court.
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow रिपब्लिकन रूज़वेल्ट, taft जीती an easy victory in his 1908 bid for the presidency.
In his only term, Taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting, सिविल सेवा सुधार, strengthening the अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स आयोग, improving the प्रदर्शन of the postal service, and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment.
Abroad, Taft sought to further the आर्थिक विकास of राष्ट्र in Latin America and Asia through `` Dollar Diplomacy ``, and showed decisiveness and restraint in response to revolution in Mexico.
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the political ramifications of his decisions, often alienated his own key constituencies, and was overwhelmingly पराजित in उसके बोली लिये a दूसरी पद in the presidential election of 1912.
in सर्वेक्षण of अध्यक्षीय scholars, Taft is usually ranked near the middle of lists of all American Presidents.
After leaving office, Taft spent his time in academia, arbitration, और the ढूंढें लिये संसार सलाम through उसके self-founded League to Enforce Peace.
In 1921, बाद the First World War, President Warren G. Harding appointed Taft Chief Justice of the United States.
Taft served in this capacity जबतक shortly पहले उसके मौत in 1930.
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced and directed by Cecil B. demille कि dramatized the biblical स्टोरी of the exodus, in जिससे the hebrew-born मूसा, an अपनाया Egyptian prince, becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves.
It starred Charlton Heston in the lead role, Yul Brynner as his adoptive brother, Pharaoh Rameses II, Anne Baxter as nefretiri, एडवर्ड G. रॉबिन्सन as dathan, yvonne de कार्लो as sephora, Debra Paget as Lilia, and John Derek as Joshua.
The supporting cast includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke as pharaoh सेती i, नीना foch as Bithiah, Martha Scott as Yoshebel, Judith Anderson as Memnet, Vincent Price as Baka, and John Carradine as Aaron.
The फिल्मी थी released by Paramount Pictures in VistaVision on October 5, 1956.
The Ten Commandments, which DeMille narrated, थी the last film that he directed.
He was नियत to सीधा the 1958 रीमेक of उसके 1938 film The Buccaneer, but his final illness forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law, actor Anthony Quinn.
DeMille had also planned to film the life of रब baden पावेल, the संस्थापक of the स्काउट movement, with David Niven ; this project was never realized.
The Ten आयतें is a partial remake of DeMille 's 1923 silent film.
कुछ of the डाल और क्रू of the 1956 version worked on the original.
it रै चूंकि been remade as a television miniseries broadcast in April 2006.
The Ten Commandments is one of the most financially कामयाब films ever made, grossing over $ 65 million at the U.S. box office.
Adjusting for inflation, this makes it the sixth highest-grossing film domestically, साथ an समायोजित कुल of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
The box office website `` The संख्याएँ '' सूचियाँ the domestic gross at $ 80 million.
In 1999, The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the संयुक्त राज्य नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the Library of Congress as being `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
In June 2008, the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान नाज़िल its `` Ten Top Ten `` —the best ten films in ten American film genres—after polling over 1,500 people from the creative community.
The Ten Commandments was listed as the tenth best फिल्मी in the एपिक विधा.
The film received seven Academy Award nominations including बेहतरीन चित्र, और जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन विज़ुअल Effects.
Charlton Heston was nominated लिये a सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति Picture Actor in the drama category.
Yul brynner जीती the नेशनल फलक of पुनर्विलोकन पुरस्कार for Best Actor for his role as Rameses, along with his other roles in The King and I and Anastasia.
Louisville (, or ) is a major city and the largest नगर in the u.S. राज्य of Kentucky and the county seat of Jefferson County.
Since 2003, the city 's borders have been with those of the काउंटी क्युकी of a city-county merger.
The city 's total consolidated population at the 2010 census was 741,096 ( Louisville 's संतुलन कुल, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous कस्बों और is the जनसांख्यिकी listed in most sources and national rankings ).
As of 2010, the Louisville metropolitan area ( MSA ) had a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,307,647 रैंकिंग 42nd nationally.
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding counties, eight in केंटकी और चार in दक्षिणी Indiana ( see Geography below ).
The Louisville Combined Statistical Area, having a population of 1,451,564, includes the MSA, hardin काउंटी और larue काउंटी in केंटकी, और Scott County, Indiana.
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century, Louisville today is best known as the location of the Kentucky डर्बी, the पहला of तीन सालाना thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown.
a ठेठ प्रायोगिक setup for an aldol reaction.
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °c ) the तापमान of जिससे is होने monitored by a thermocouple ( the wire on the left ).
A कूलिंग नहाना, in प्रयोगशाला रसायन ( प्रायः लकिन not always organic chemistry ) practice, is a liquid mixture which is used to maintain low temperatures, typically between 13 °C and −196 °C.
These low temperatures are used to collect liquids after distillation, to हटाएँ सॉल्वैंट्स using a रोटरी evaporator, or to perform a chemical reaction below room temperature ( see : kinetic control ).
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( विशेषकर द्रव नाइट्रोजन, जल, or भी एयर ) — लकिन सबसे commonly the पद refers to ( b ) a मिश्रण of 3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling agent ( such as dry ice or water ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid 'carrier ' ( such as liquid water, ethylene glycol, acetone, etc. ), which transfers heat between the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid system.
( A परिचित उदाहरण of इस is the उपयोग of an ice/rock-salt mixture to freeze ice cream.
The phase-change of ice into liquid water requires उर्जा, 'pulling ' ऊष्मा इससे the system.
Adding salt lowers the temp at which this happens, meaning more energy has to be अवशोषित from the environment in order to melt the ice.
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it must 'pull ' more heat from its environment to become द्रव. )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits that may involve either insufficient or excessive खाना सेवन to the detriment of an व्यक्तिगत 's शारीरिक और mental health.
Bulimia nervosa and एनोरेक्सिया नर्वोज़ा हैं the सबसे common specific forms in the United Kingdom.
Other types of खाने विकार शामिल binge eating disorder and eating disorder not otherwise specified.
Bulimia nervosa is a विकार characterized by binge eating and purging.
Purging can include self-induce vomiting, over-exercising, और the उपयोग of diuretics, enemas, and laxatives.
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by चरम खाना प्रतिबंध to the पाइंट of self-starvation and excessive weight loss.
Though primarily thought of as affecting females ( an estimated 5–10 million being प्रभावित in the u.K. ), खाने विकार affect males as well.
An estimated 10 – 15 % of people with eating disorders are males ( गोर्गान, 1999 ).
( an estimated 1 लाख u.K. males being affected ).
Although eating disorders are increasing all over the world among both men and women, there is evidence to suggest कि it is महिलाओं in the पश्चिमी संसार जो हैं at the highest risk of developing them and the degree of westernization increases the risk.
nearly हाफ of सब Americans personally know someone with an eating disorder.
The skill to comprehend the सेंट्रल प्रक्रियाओं of भूख रै increased tremendously since leptin was discovered, and the skill to observe the functions of the brain as well.
Interactions between motivational, homeostatic and self-regulatory control processes are involved in eating आचरण, जिससे is a कुंजी घटक in खाने disorders.
The precise cause of eating disorders is not entirely understood, but there is evidence कि it may be linked to अन्य चिकित्सा शर्तें and situations.
Cultural idealization of thinness और youthfulness have contributed to eating disorders affecting diverse populations.
One study showed कि लड़कियों साथ adhd have a greater chance of getting an eating disorder than those not affected by ADHD.
Another पढ़ाई सुझाया कि महिलाओं with PTSD, especially due to sexually related trauma, are more likely to develop anorexia nervosa.
One study showed that foster girls are more likely to develop bulimia nervosa.
Some think that peer pressure and idealized body-types seen in the media हैं भी a significant factor.
Some research show that for निश्चित लोगों वहीँ are genetic reasons why they may be prone to developing an eating disorder.
Recent studies have found evidence a सहसंबंध between मरीजों with bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders.
In addition, anxiety विकार और व्यक्तित्व विकार are common occurrences with clients of eating disorders.
While proper treatment can be highly effective for many suffering from विशिष्ट प्रकार of खाने विकार, the consequences of eating disorders can be severe, including death ( whether from direct medical effects of disturbed eating habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal thinking ).
Slavery in the United States existed from the early years of the colonial period ; it थी firmly स्थापित by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776.
However, by 1804, all states north of the Mason and Dixon Line had either abolished slavery outright or passed कानून लिये the gradual abolition of slavery.
In 1787 Congress prohibited slavery in the उत्तरपश्चिम territory.
But slavery gained new life in the South with the cotton industry after 1800, and expanded into the दक्षिणपश्चिम.
The nation was polarized into slave and free राज्य साथ the mason-dixon Line, which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland.
The United States and ग्रेट ब्रिटेन दोनो निषिद्ध the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्लेव व्यापार in 1808, but the domestic trade, with sales to the Deep South, expanded dramatically, and many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade.
Before the 1840s, the South was vigorously defending गुलामी और इसके expansion into the territories.
In the North some abolitionists denounced it as गुनाहगार, और numerous anti-slavery शक्तियां rejected it as detrimental to the rights of free men.
After failed compromises and Abraham Lincoln 's election, in 1861 eleven slave states broke away to form the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका, अग्रणी to the अमरीकी सिविल War.
The संघीय सरकारी in 1862 made abolition of slavery a war goal.
In January 1863 अध्यक्ष lincoln freed slaves in the Confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation.
After the war, the Thirteenth amendment, प्रभावी दिसम्बर 1865, abolished गुलामी throughout the entire United States, including the Border states and the Indian territories.
From the 16th to the 19th सदियां, an estimated 12 million Africans were shipped as slaves to the Americas.
See Slavery in the Americas.
The ग्रेट बहुमत गई to the sugar plantations of the West Indies or Brazil, where mortality was high.
About 645,000 were brought to कया is now the United States.
By the 1860 United States Census, the स्लेव जनसांख्यिकी in the American South had grown to four million.
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 स्लेव states, nearly 400,000 held slaves ( roughly one in four ), amounting to 8 % of all American families.
While some slaves worked as house servants and urban artisans, the great majority worked on बागानों or विशाल खेतो, cultivating lucrative नकदी फसलों, ऐसे as राइस, tobacco, sugar and, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
By 1860 most slaves were held in the Deep South, where they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in कपास.
In small operations, वे worked with their owners.
In large बागानों वे यहूद निर्देशित by white paid overseers.
Under the system that became chattel slavery ( ownership of a human being, and of his/her descendants ), a racial element थी आधारभूत : स्लेव यहूद अश्वेतों of अफ़्रीकी descent और स्वामित्व, almost universally, by whites of European descent.
In the 17th century, Virginia, followed by other southern colonies, enacted law that children of slave माताओं यहूद born into slavery.
Slaves could gain freedom only by running away ( which थी मुश्किल और illegal to do ), or by manumission by owners, which was regulated by states, and became increasingly difficult or prohibited.
In the earliest era of chattel slavery, the colonies also organized work by a system of बंधुआ मजदूर ज्ञात as indentured servitude.
This typically lasted for several years for both poor Europeans और africans alike, to अदा बंद the costs of transport to the colonies.
They contracted for such arrangements क्युकी of ग़रीब economies in their home countries.
Between 1680 and 1700, as fewer Europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to import more Africans as slaves.
Recognizing the importance of slavery, the House of Burgesses in Virginia enacted a new slave code in 1705 ; it संयुक्त a किस्में of विधान and added new provisions enforcing white supremacy in the law.
