Xylem is one of the two types of transport tissue in vascular plants ( फ्लोएम is the अन्य ).
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known जाइलम ऊतक is लकडी, हालांकि it is मिला throughout the plant.
Its basic function is to transport water, but it also transports some nutrients through the plant.
This clock representation shows some of the major units of geological समय और निर्णायक events of Earth history.
The Hadean eon represents the time before fossil record of life on Earth ; इसके अपर boundary is अभी regarded as 4.0 ga ( billion years ago ).
Other subdivisions reflect the एवोल्यूशन of जीवन ; the archean और proterozoic are both eons, the Palaeozoic, Mesozoic and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic eon.
The two लाख साल quaternary period, the time of recognizable humans, is too small to be visible at this scale.
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to time, and is used by geologists, paleontologists, और अन्य धरती वैज्ञानिकों to describe the समय और संबंध between events that have occurred throughout Earth 's history.
The table of geologic time spans presented here agrees साथ the तिथियाँ और नामकरण नियत forth by the International Commission on Stratigraphy standard color codes of the International Commission on Stratigraphy.
Evidence from radiometric dating indicates कि the धरती is परिचय 4.54 अरब years old.
The geology or deep time of Earth 's past has been organized into विभिन्न इकाई according to events which took place in each period.
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by changes in the composition of strata which correspond to them, indicating major geological or paleontological कार्यक्रम, ऐसे as mass extinctions.
For example, the boundary between the Cretaceous period and the paleogene काल is पारिभाषित by the cretaceous–paleogene extinction इवेंट, जिससे चिह्नित the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life.
Older time spans which predate the विश्वसनीय चट्टान record ( before the Proterozoic Eon ) are defined by absolute age.
The TI-82 is a graphing परिपथ made by Texas Instruments.
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a stripped bas, more user friendly version of the TI-85, and as a replacement for the TI-81.
It was the सीधा predecessor of the TI-83.
it साझा with the TI-85 a 6 MHz Zilog Z80 microprocessor.
Like the ti-81, the ti-82 सुविधाएँ a 96x64 पिक्सेल display, and the core feature set of the TI-81 with many new features.
The cast of वर्ण of the किंग of Fighters XI.
The King of Fighters fighting game series, produced by SNK Playmore, शामिल a चौड़ी डाल of characters, some of which are taken from other SNK games.
The story takes place in a fictional ब्रह्मांड in जिससे an सालाना श्रेणी of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held.
The पहला खेल in the श्रेणी introduces the initial main character of the series, Kyo Kusanagi, a young Japanese fighter who is the heir to a powerful group of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities.
Kyo fights against the Kusanagi clan 's enemies, his rival Iori Yagami, and the god Orochi and इसके इंसान अनुसरणकर्ता, among अन्य.
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights, while The King of Fighters '99 introduces a new story arc, revolving around K ', a young man who seeks to destroy the mysterious NESTS organization because they kidnapped him at an early age and stripped him of his past memories, so that they could force him to be a fighter under their control.
In The King of Fighters 2003, a new character named Ash Crimson enters the tournament, to steal the powers of the clans जो sealed the orochi in the past for an unknown reason.
A new group of antagonists, known as Those From the Past, also appears in the series ; they want to obtain orochi 's शक्ति लिये the purpose of giving it to their unknown master.
The plot and the characters आए इससे the yamata no Orochi legend.
There are also several characters in the games that हैं parodies or homages to अनेक लोकप्रिय anime, manga, and films.
Merchandise based on the characters रै भी महरूम released, सहित action figures and keychains.
The characters have garnered praise इससे अनेक वीडियो खेल publications लिये the quality of their designs and movesets.
Comments focused on the lack of improvements in some of the characters, लकिन added कि the रोस्टर is greatly विविध.
Whale Wars is a weekly American documentary-style reality television series that premiered on November 7, 2008 on the एनिमल ग्रह cable channel.
The program follows Paul Watson, founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society, as he and the क्रू सवार उनके विभिन्न बरतन harass जापानी whalers बंद the coast of Antarctica.
On January 5, 2013, Animal Planet renewed the श्रेणी लिये a छठे ऋतु.
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia harpyja ) is a Neotropical प्रजाति of त्रिभुज.
It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the Papuan Eagle which is sometimes known as the New Guinea Harpy त्रिभुज or पापुआई Harpy Eagle.
It is the largest and most powerful raptor found in the Americas, and among the largest extant प्रजाति of ईगल्स in the world.
It usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the अपर ( emergent ) canopy layer.
Destruction of its natural habitat has seen it vanish इससे अनेक भाग of its former range, and it is nearly extirpated in Central America.
Biological classification, or scientific classification in biology, is a method of scientific taxonomy used to group and categorize जीवों into groups such as genus or species.
These समूह हैं ज्ञात as taxa ( singular : taxon ).
Modern biological classification has its root in the work of Carolus Linnaeus, who grouped प्रजाति according to shared physical characteristics.
These groupings have since been संशोधित to improve संगति with the Darwinian principle of common descent.
With the introduction of the cladistic method in the late 20th century, phylogenetic taxonomy in which organisms are grouped आधारित purely on inferred विकासवादी relatedness, ignoring morphological similarity, has become common in some areas of biology.
Molecular phylogenetics, which uses DNA sequences as data, has also driven many recent revisions और is संभावित to continue doing so.
Biological classification belongs to the science of biological systematics.

John Winston Ono Lennon, ( born John विंस्टन लेनन ; 9 अक्तूबर 1940 – 8 दिसम्बर 1980 ) थी an English musician, singer and songwriter who rose to worldwide fame as a founder member of the Beatles, one of the most commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the history of popular music.
With Paul mccartney, he formed एक of the most celebrated songwriting partnerships of the 20th century.
Born and raised in Liverpool, as a teenager लेनन became शामिल in the skiffle craze ; his first band, the Quarrymen, evolved into the Beatles in 1960.
As the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade, Lennon embarked on a solo career that उत्पादित the critically acclaimed एल्बम जॉन lennon/plastic ओनो बैंड और imagine, and iconic songs such as `` Give Peace a Chance `` and `` Imagine ``.
After his marriage to Yoko Ono in 1969, he बदला उसके नाम to जॉन Ono Lennon.
Lennon disengaged himself from the music business in 1975 to devote time to raising his infant son Sean, but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 साथ the नई एल्बम दोगुना काल्पनिक.
He was murdered तीन weeks after its release.
लेनन नाज़िल a rebellious प्रकृति और acerbic wit in his music, writing, drawings, on film and in interviews.
विवादास्पद through उसके राजनैतिक और सलाम सक्रियता, he स्थानांतरित to नई यॉर्क नगर in 1971, जहाँ his criticism of the Vietnam War resulted in a lengthy attempt by Richard Nixon 's administration to deport him, while some of his songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement.
As of 2012, Lennon 's solo album sales in the United States exceed 14 लाख इकाई, और as लेखक, co-writer or performer, he is responsible for 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 chart.
In 2002, a बीबीसी पोल on the 100 महानतम britons voted him eighth, and in 2008, Rolling Stone ranked him the fifth-greatest singer of all time.
He was posthumously inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 और into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of Fame in 1994.

`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a short story by American author Washington Irving published in 1819, as खूब as the नाम of the story 's fictional protagonist.
लिखा जबकि इरविंग थी जीना in बर्मिंघम, England, it was part of a collection entitled The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon.
Although the story is set in New York 's Catskill Mountains, Irving later admitted, `` जब i लिखा the स्टोरी, I had never been on the Catskills. ''

The page however does include other non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( ज्ञात as the शिल्प & Production Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ).
Pee-wee Herman is a comic fictional character created and portrayed by American comedian Paul reubens.
He is best known for his two टेलीविज़न series and film series during the 1980s.
The childlike Pee-wee Herman character developed as a stage act that जल्दी led to an HBO special in 1981.
As the stage performance gained further popularity, reubens took the अक्षर to गति चित्र with Pee-wee 's Big Adventure in 1985, toning down the adult innuendo for the appeal of children.
This paved the way for Pee-wee 's Playhouse, an Emmy Award winning children 's series that ran on सीबीएस इससे 1986-1991.
Another film, Big Top pee-wee, थी released in 1988.
due to ऋणात्मक मीडिया ध्यान following a कांड in 1991, Reubens decided to shelve his alter ego during the 1990s, and then gradually resurrected it during the following decade.
It was at that time that Reubens addressed plans to write a new Pee-wee फिल्मी, Pee-wee 's Playhouse : The Movie.
In June 2007, Reubens appeared as Pee-wee Herman for the first समय चूंकि 1991 at स्पाइक tv 's Guys ' Choice Awards.
That '70s Show is an American television period sitcom that centers on the lives of a group of teenage friends living in the fictional suburban town of पाइंट प्लेस, विस्कॉन्सिन, from May 17, 1976, to December 31, 1979.
It debuted on the फॉक्स टेलीविज़न संजाल, first airing on August 23, 1998, running for eight consecutive seasons, and concluding with the 200th episode on May 18, 2006.
The main teenage cast members were Topher Grace, Mila Kunis, Ashton Kutcher, डैनी masterson, लौरा prepon, and Wilmer Valderrama.
The main adult डाल सदस्यों यहूद डेबरा jo rupp, kurtwood Smith, Don Stark and, during the first three seasons, Tanya Roberts.
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. state स्तिथ in the Midwestern United States.
It is named after the Kansas River which flows through it, जिससे in फेरे थी नामित after the Kansa Native American tribe, which inhabited the area.
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often said to mean `` लोगों of the हवा '' or `` people of the south wind, '' although this was probably not the term 's original meaning.
Residents of Kansas are पुकारा `` Kansans. ''
लिये हज़ारों of सालो what is now Kansas was home to numerous and diverse Native American tribes.
Tribes in the पूर्वी भाग of the state generally lived in villages along the river valleys.
Tribes in the पश्चिमी भाग of the राज्य यहूद semi- nomadic and hunted large herds of bison.
Kansas was first settled by European Americans in the 1830s, but the pace of settlement त्वरित in the 1850s, in the midst of राजनैतिक wars over the slavery issue.
When officially opened to settlement by the U.S. government in 1854, abolitionist free-staters इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड and pro-slavery settlers from neighboring Missouri rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a slave state.
Thus, the area was a hotbed of violence and chaos in इसके जल्दी दिनों as ये शक्तियां collided, and was known as Bleeding Kansas.
The abolitionists आखिरकार prevailed और on जनवरी 29, 1861, Kansas entered the Union as a free state.
After the Civil युद्ध, the जनसांख्यिकी of कान्सास grew rapidly, when waves of immigrants turned the prairie into farmland.
Today, Kansas is one of the most productive agricultural राज्य, producing ऊँची yields of गेहूं, sorghum and sunflowers.
कान्सास is the 15th most extensive and the 33rd most populous of the 50 United States.
मनोविज्ञान is an अकादमिक और लागू अनुशासन that involves the scientific study of mental functions and behaviors.
Psychology has the immediate goal of समझना individuals और समूह by दोनो establishing general principles and researching specific cases, and by many accounts it ultimately aims to benefit society.
In this field, a professional or researcher is called a psychologist और can be वर्गीकृत as a सोशल, behavioral, or cognitive scientist.
Psychologists attempt to understand the role of mental functions in individual and social behavior, while also exploring the physiological और neurobiological प्रक्रियाओं कि underlie निश्चित संज्ञानात्मक कृत्यों and behaviors.
Psychologists explore concepts such as perception, cognition, attention, emotion, phenomenology, motivation, brain functioning, व्यक्तित्व, बर्ताव, और interpersonal relationships.
Psychologists of diverse stripes also consider the बेहोश दिमाग.
Psychologists employ empirical methods to infer causal and correlational relationships between psychosocial variables.
In addition, or in opposition, to employing अनुभवजन्य और निगमनात्मक विधि, some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at times rely upon symbolic interpretation and other inductive techniques.
Psychology has been described as a `` हब विज्ञान '', with psychological findings linking to research and perspectives from the social sciences, natural sciences, medicine, and the humanities, such as philosophy.
While psychological knowledge is often applied to the assessment and treatment of mental health समस्याएं, it is भी निर्देशित towards समझना और solving problems in many different spheres of human activity.
The majority of psychologists are शामिल in कुछ दयालु of therapeutic role, practicing in clinical, counseling, or school settings.
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes और बर्ताव, और typically कार्य in university psychology departments or teach in other academic settings ( e.g., medical schools, hospitals ).
Some are employed in industrial and organizational जमावट, or in अन्य क्षेत्रों ऐसे as इंसान विकास और वृद्धावस्था, sports, health, and the media, as well as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law.
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13, 1743 ( April 2, 1743 O.S. ) – July 4, 1826 ) was an American founding पिता, the प्रिंसिपल लेखक of the घोषणा of Independence ( 1776 ) and the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ).
At the beginning of the American Revolution, he served in the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, representing वर्जिनिया and then served as a wartime Governor of Virginia ( 1779–1781 ).
Just after the war ended, इससे mid-1784 जेफरसन served as a diplomat, stationed in Paris.
In May 1785, he became the संयुक्त राज्य मंत्री to France.
Jefferson was the first United States Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) serving under President जार्ज वॉशिंगटन.
With his close friend James Madison he organized the Democratic-Republican Party, and subsequently resigned इससे वॉशिंगटन 's cabinet.
Elected Vice President in 1796, जब he आए in दूसरी to जॉन एडम्स of the Federalists, Jefferson opposed Adams and with Madison secretly wrote the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions, which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts.
Elected president in what Jefferson called the Revolution of 1800, he oversaw the purchase of the vast louisiana territory इससे फ़्रांस ( 1803 ), और भेजा the लुईस and Clark Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new west.
His second term was beset with troubles at home, such as the विफल देशद्रोह विचारण of उसके पूर्व Vice President Aaron Burr.
With escalating trouble with Britain who was चुनौतीपूर्ण अमरीकी neutrality and threatening shipping at sea, he tried economic warfare with his embargo laws which only damaged American trade.
In 1803, President Jefferson initiated a process of Indian tribal removal and relocation to the louisiana territory वेस्ट of the Mississippi River, in order to open lands for eventual American settlers.
A नेता in the आत्मज्ञान, जेफरसन थी a बहुश्रुत who spoke five languages fluently and was deeply interested in science, invention, architecture, religion and philosophy, interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency.
He designed his own large mansion on a 5,000 acre plantation निकट charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, which he named Monticello.
While not a notable orator, जेफरसन थी a skilled writer and corresponded with many influential people in America and Europe throughout his adult life.
Though जेफरसन स्वामित्व अनेक स्लेव, he opposed the संस्था सब उसके जीवन and consequently treated and took care of them very well and expected them to work no more than free farmers.
चूंकि 1802 इतिहासकारों और others have been divided over the controversy of whether Jefferson was the father of one or more children belonging to Sally Hemings, a slave at Monticello. ''
इतिहासकारों हैं भी in disagreement with how much Jefferson was committed to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, President Jefferson signed into law a bill that banned the importation of स्लेव into the United States.
After Martha Jefferson, उसके बीवी of ग्यारह सालो, died in 1782, जेफरसन remained a widower for the rest of his life ; their marriage produced six children, of whom two survived to adulthood.
Though Jefferson has been criticized by many modern day विद्वानों over the समस्या of गुलामी, he remains rated as one of the greatest U.S. presidents.
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song written by Steven Van Zandt, produced by Van Zandt and Arthur बेकर और अंकित by कलाकारों संयुक्त विरूद्ध रंगभेद to convey विपक्ष to the South African policy of apartheid.
The primary means of that opposition is to declare that all the artists involved would refuse any and all offers to perform at Sun City, a resort which was स्तिथ in bantustan of bophuthatswana, एक of a क्रमांक of internationally unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states created by the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population.

The National Basketball संघ ( एनबीए ) is a प्रमुख पेशेवर basketball league in North America.
It was founded in 1946 as the बास्केट Association of America ( BAA ).
The league adopted its current name at the प्रारंभ of the जब it मिलाया साथ the नेशनल बास्केट League ( NBL ).
The NBA Finals is the championship series for the NBA and the निष्कर्ष of the खेल 's postseason.
The winning team of the श्रेणी receives the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy.
Players from the winning team usually receive championship बजती इससे the टोली honoring उनके योगदान.
However, in some rare अवसर, the टीमों opted to दिया अन्य commemorative items, such as wrist watches, instead of rings.
The number of championships जीती by एनबीए सुपरस्टार is often used as a measurement of their greatness.
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the record for the most एनबीए championships जीती साथ 11 शीर्षक दौरान उसके 13-year playing career.
He won his first championship with the Boston Celtics in उसके रुकी साल.
afterwards, he went on to win 10 championships in the next 12 years, including eight consecutive championships from 1959 to 1966.
He won the last two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach.
Russell 's teammate, Sam Jones, won 10 championships इससे 1959 to 1969, the second most in NBA history.
चार सेल्टिक्स खिलाड़ी, tom heinsohn, K. C. Jones, Satch Sanders and John Havlicek, won eight championships each.
Two other सेल्टिक्स, जिम loscutoff and Frank Ramsey, won seven championships each.
Four players, Bob Cousy, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Michael Jordan and scottie pippen, जीती छह championships each.
Jordan and Pippen are members of the शिकागो bulls team who won three consecutive championships twice in the 1990s.
Robert Horry and John Salley are the only players to have won the championships साथ तीन different teams.
Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets, the Los Angeles Lakers and the सैन अंतोनियो स्पर्स, जबकि salley जीती चार championships साथ the Detroit Pistons, the Bulls and the Lakers.
Frank Saul and Steve Kerr are the only खिलाड़ी to जीत दो championships with two different teams in consecutive seasons.
Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester Royals and the Minneapolis Lakers in the 1950s, जबकि केर जीती लगातार championships with the Bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
सटीकता indicates निकटता of मापन results to the true value, precision to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the measurement
In the fields of science, engineering, industry, and statistics, the accuracy of a मापन प्रणाली is the उपाधि of closeness of measurements of a quantity to that quantity 's actual ( true ) value.
The precision of a measurement system, also called reproducibility or repeatability, is the degree to which दोहराया माप अंतर्गत अपरिवर्तित शर्तें दिखाएँ the वही परिणाम.
Although the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial use, they are deliberately contrasted in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the scientific method.
A measurement system can be accurate but not precise, precise लकिन नहीं सटीक, neither, or both.
For example, if an experiment contains a systematic error, तब increasing the नमूना आकार generally increases precision but does not improve accuracy.
The result would be a consistent yet inaccurate string of results from the flawed प्रयोग.
Eliminating the systematic error improves सटीकता लकिन करता नहीं बदलें परिशुद्धता.
A मापन प्रणाली is designated valid if it is both accurate and precise.
Related terms include bias ( non- random or निर्देशित प्रभाव caused by a फ़ैक्टर or factors unrelated to the independent variable ) and error ( random variability ).
The terminology is also लागू to अप्रत्यक्ष measurements—that is, values obtained by a computational procedure from observed data.
In addition to accuracy and precision, measurements may also have a measurement resolution, which is the smallest change in the underlying शारीरिक quantity that produces a response in the measurement.
In the case of full reproducibility, ऐसे as जब rounding a क्रमांक to a representable floating point number, the word precision has a meaning not related to reproducibility.
For example, in the IEEE 754-2008 standard it means the number of bits in the significand, so it is used as a माप लिये the सापेक्ष सटीकता साथ which an arbitrary number can be represented.
Fuck in इसके शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the act of sexual intercourse.
It is an English word that is often used as a profanity, either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier.
The origin of the word is अस्पष्ट.
It is usually considered to be पहला attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
In modern usage, fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be used in the स्थिति of a संज्ञा, a क्रिया, an adjective or an adverb.
There are many common phrases which make use of the word, as well as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
एनिमेटेड, color-coded map showing the various continents and regions.
Depending on the convention and model, some continents may be consolidated or subdivided : for example, Eurasia is most often subdivided into यूरोपीय और एशिया ( रेड शेड्स ), जबकि उत्तर और दक्षिण अमेरिका हैं sometimes recognized as one American continent ( green shades ).
A continent is one of several बहुत विशाल landmasses on Earth.
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria, with up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they are ( from largest in size to smallest ) : Asia, अफ़्रीकी, उत्तर अमेरिका, दक्षिण अमेरिका, अंटार्कटिक, Europe, and Australia.
In geology, महाद्वीपों are described by means of tectonic plates.
थाली विवर्तनिकी is the प्रक्रम and study of the movement, collision and division of continents, earlier known as continental drift.

Community property is a marital property regime that originated in civil विधि jurisdictions और is now also found in some common law jurisdictions.
The states of the United States कि recognize जातियाँ property are primarily in the West ; it was inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system, which itself was inherited from Spanish law ( a Roman -derived civil law system ) and ultimately from the Visigoths.
While under Spanish rule Louisiana adopted the ganancial जातियाँ प्रणाली of acquests और gains, जिससे replaced the traditional French community of movables and acquests in its civil law system.
Map of the United States with community प्रॉपर्टी राज्य highlighted in रेड.
In addition to the highlighted states, Alaska is a separate प्रॉपर्टी राज्य कि permits युगल to ऑप्ट into a जातियाँ property arrangement.
In a community property jurisdiction, most property acquired during the marriage ( except for gifts or inheritances ) —the जातियाँ, or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce, annulment or death.
Joint स्वामित्व is automatically presumed by विधि in the अनुपस्थिति of specific evidence that would point to a contrary conclusion for a particular piece of property.
Division of community property may take place by मद, by splitting सब items or by value.
In some jurisdictions, ऐसे as California, a 50/50 division of community property is strictly mandated by statute, meaning that the focus then shifts to whether particular items are to be classified as community or separate property.
In other jurisdictions, such as Texas, a divorce court may decree an `` निष्पक्ष वितरण `` of जातियाँ property, which may result in an unequal division of such.
In non-community property states property may be divided by निष्पक्ष distribution.
Generally speaking, the property that each partner brings into the विवाह or receives by तोहफा, bequest or मक्कारी दौरान विवाह is called separate property ( i.e., not community property ).
See प्रभाग of property.
प्रभाग of जातियाँ debts may not be the same as division of community property.
For example, in California, community property is required to be divided `` equally '' जबकि जातियाँ कर्ज़ is जरूरी to be divided `` equitably ''.
Property that is owned by one spouse before the marriage is the separate property of that spouse, unless the प्रॉपर्टी is `` transmuted '' into जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी.
The rules for इस vary from jurisdiction to jurisdiction.

The wedding of Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, and कैथरीन मिडलटन took प्लेस on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London.
The groom, Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, is the eldest son of Charles, Prince of Wales, and is second in the line of succession to the British Throne and the thrones of fifteen other राष्ट्रमंडल realms.
the बहू, कैथरीन `` केट '' मिडलटन is the ज्येष्ठ of three children of Michael and Carole Middleton of Bucklebury, Berkshire.
The Dean of Westminster, John Hall, presided at the सेवा ; the archbishop of canterbury, rowan विलियम्स, conducted the marriage ; Richard Chartres, the Bishop of London, preached the sermon ; and a reading was given by the bride 's brother, James.
William 's बेहतरीन man थी उसके bhai, प्रिंस Harry, while the bride 's sister, Pippa, was maid of honour.
The ceremony was attended by the bride 's और दूल्हे 's परिवारों, as खूब as अनेक foreign royals, diplomats, and the couple 's chosen personal guests.
After the रस्म, the युगल बना the परंपरागत appearance on the balcony of Buckingham Palace.
As Prince William was not the heir apparent to the throne, the wedding was not a full state occasion and many details were बाएँ to the युगल to decide, ऐसे as much of the guest list of about 1,900.
प्रिंस विलियम and Kate Middleton met in 2001.
Their engagement on 20 October 2010 थी घोषित on 16 नवम्बर 2010.
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted much media attention, being compared in many ways with the 1981 विवाह of विलियम 's parents.
The occasion was a public holiday in the संयुक्त किंगडम और प्रदर्शित अनेक ceremonial aspects, including use of the state carriages and roles for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry.
Events were held around the Commonwealth to mark the wedding ; संगठनों और होटल आयोजित कार्यक्रम आरपार कनाडा, over 5,000 street parties were held throughout the United Kingdom, and one million people lined the route between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace.
The ceremony was viewed live by tens of लाखो अधिक around the world, including 72 million on the YouTube Royal Channel.
In the United Kingdom, television audiences peaked at 26.3 million viewers, with a कुल of 36.7 लाख watching भाग of the coverage.
Vanessa Joy Lachey ( née Minnillo ; born November 9, 1980 ) is an American टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व, टेलीविज़न मेजबान, fashion model, and actress.

A hand ( med. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates and humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.
A few other vertebrates such as the koala ( which has two opposable thumbs on each `` hand '' and fingerprints remarkably समान to इंसान फिंगरप्रिंट ) हैं प्रायः वर्णित as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs.
Hands are the main structures for physically manipulating the पर्यावरण, प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो सकल मोटर कौशल ( ऐसे as grasping a large object ) and fine motor skills ( such as picking up a small pebble ).
The fingertips contain some of the densest areas of nerve endings on the देह, हैं the richest सोर्स of tactile feedback, and have the greatest positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands.
Like other paired organs ( eyes, feet, legs ), each हाथ is dominantly नियंत्रित by the opposing दिमाग गोलार्ध, so that handedness, or the preferred hand choice for single-handed activities such as writing with a pencil, reflects individual brain functioning.
Some evolutionary anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of digits on the forelimb more generally — लिये उदाहरण, in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of whether the three digits of the bird hand involved the same homologous loss of two digits as in the dinosaur hand.
the इंसान हाथ रै 27 हड्डियों, not including the sesamoid bones which number varies between people.
14 of which are the phalanges ( proximal, इंटरमीडिएट और distal ) of the fingers.
The metacarpals are the bones that connects the उंगलियाँ और the wrist.
Each human hand has 5 metacarpals और 8 carpal bones.

Basic digital alarm clock बगैर a रेडियो.
The mark in the top-left of the प्रदर्शक indicates that the time is 4:00pm, not 4:00am.
A 1969 radio alarm क्लॉक ( सोनी digimatic 8fc-59w ) with an early mechanical-digital display.
A digital clock is a type of clock that displays the time digitally, i.e. in numerals or other symbols, as opposed to an एनालॉग क्लॉक, जहाँ the time is indicated by the positions of rotating hands.
Digital clocks are often associated with electronic drives, but the `` digital '' description refers तभी to the प्रदर्शक, नहीं to the drive mechanism.
( Both analog and digital clocks can be driven either mechanically or electronically, but `` clockwork '' mechanisms with डिजिटल प्रदर्शक हैं rare. )
The biggest digital clock is the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` Light समय स्तर '' ) on the टेलीविज़न मीनार Rheinturm Düsseldorf, Germany.
Family guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides the voices of Peter Griffin, Stewie Griffin, Brian Griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
परिवार guy is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड sitcom कि सुविधाएँ पाँच प्रमुख voice actors, and numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars.
The principal voice cast consists of दिखाएँ निर्माता सेठ macfarlane, एलेक्स borstein, सेठ ग्रीन, mila kunis ( जो replaced लेसी Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
पुनरावर्ती आवाज़ अभिनेताओं शामिल पैट्रिक warburton, Adam West, John G. Brennan, Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly, and repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.

The voice actors, in portraying the various अक्षर personalities on the show, draw inspiration from celebrities and pop culture.

Kunis was nominated for an एनी पुरस्कार लिये voicing मेग griffin in the ऋतु 5 एपीसोड `` मुश्किल विधिक `` और macfarlane रै भी won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production, though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series.
The five sets of the board game Monopoly depicted here show the एवोल्यूशन of the खेल 's कलाकृति and designs in the United States from 1935–2005.
the इतिहास of the फलक खेल एकाधिकार can be traced back to the early 20th century.
the earliest ज्ञात design was by the American, Elizabeth Magie, patented in 1904 but existing as early as 1902.
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to illustrate an economic principle, namely the georgist अवधारणा of a सिंगल land value tax.
a श्रेणी of फलक खेल यहूद विकसित from 1906 through the 1930s that involved the buying and selling of land and the development of that land.
By 1934, a board game had been created much like the संस्करण of एकाधिकार बेची by पार्कर Brothers and its related companies through the rest of the 20th century, and into the 21st.
Several people, mostly in the Midwestern संयुक्त राज्य और निकट the ईस्ट coast, contributed to the game 's design and evolution.
By the 1970s, the idea that the game had been created solely by Charles Darrow had become popular folklore ; it was printed in the खेल 's निर्देश लिये अनेक सालो, in a 1974 किताब devoted to एकाधिकार, and was cited in a general book about toys even as recently as 2007.
Even a guide to family games published for Reader 's Digest in 2003 only gave credit to darrow और एलिज़ाबेथ magie, erroneously stating कि magie 's असली game was created in the 1800s, and not acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the game, and the eventual publication by Parker Brothers.
Also in the 1970s, Professor Ralph anspach, जो था खुद प्रकाशित a board game intended to illustrate the principles of both monopolies and trust busting, fought Parker Brothers and its then parent company, General Mills, over the trademarks of the Monopoly board game.
Through the research of Anspach and others, much of the early history of the खेल थी `` rediscovered ''.
Anspach confronted Maxine Brady, author of the 1974 book The Monopoly Book : Strategy and Tactics of the संसार 's सबसे लोकप्रिय खेल over the actual history of the game on Barry Farber 's New York City talk show in 1975.
Because of the lengthy court process, सहित appeals, the विधिक औकात of पार्कर Brothers ' trademarks on the game was not settled until 1985.
The game 's name remains a registered trademark of Parker Brothers, as do its विशिष्ट डिज़ाइन तत्व.
At the conclusion of the court case, the game 's logo and graphic design elements became भाग of a larger एकाधिकार brand, licensed by Parker Brothers ' parent companies onto a variety of items through the present day.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the फलक खेल 's जल्दी इतिहास in the 1970s और 1980s, and several books and journal articles on the subject, Hasbro ( Parker Brothers ' current parent company ) did not acknowledge any of the game 's history before Charles Darrow on its official Monopoly website as recently as June 2012.
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge anyone अन्य than darrow in materials published or sponsored by them, at least as recently as 2006.
International tournaments, first held in the early 1970s, continue to the present, with the next संसार चैंपियनशिप संभावित अनुसूचित for 2013.
Starting in 1985, a new generation of spin-off board games and card games appeared on दोनो पहलू of the अटलांटिक समंदर.
In 1989, the पहला of अनेक video game and computer game editions was published.
Since 1994, many official variants of the game, based on locations other than Atlantic City, New Jersey ( the official u.S. सेटिंग ) or लंदन ( the आधिकारिक राष्ट्रमंडल सेटिंग, excepting Canada ), have been published by Hasbro or its licensees.
In 2008, Hasbro permanently changed the रंग योजना और कुछ of the gameplay of the standard U.S. Edition of the game to match the UK Edition, although the U.S. standard edition maintains the Atlantic City property names.
Hasbro also modified the official logo to give the `` Mr. Monopoly '' character a 3-D computer-generated dekh, जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम अपनाया by licensees USAopoly, Winning Moves and Winning Solutions.
And Hasbro has also been including the Speed Die, introduced in 2006 's एकाधिकार : the आचमन संस्करण by जीतना चालें खेल, in संस्करण उत्पादित directly by Hasbro ( such as the 2009 Championship Edition ).
In baseball, a sacrifice fly is a batted ball कि satisfies चार criteria:
There are कम than दो outs when the ball is hit.
The ball is hit to the आउटफील्ड ( fair or foul ), or to infield foul territory.
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield, or foul territory ) catches the ball on the fly ( alternatively if the बैटर होता have महरूम आउट if नहीं लिये an गलती or if the outfielder drops the ball and another runner is put out ).
a धावक who is already on base scores on the play.
It is called a `` sacrifice '' fly because the batter presumably intends to cause a teammate to स्कोर a चलाएं, जबकि sacrificing उसके अपना क्षमता to do so.
Minnesota ( ) is a u.S. state located in the Midwestern United States.
मिनेसोटा थी carved आउट of the पूर्वी half of the Minnesota Territory and admitted to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11, 1858.
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 झीलों '', the राज्य 's name comes from a Dakota word for `` sky-tinted water ''.
Those waters, together with वनों, पार्क, और wilderness क्षेत्रों, प्रस्ताव निवासियों and tourists a variety of outdoor recreational opportunities.
Minnesota is the 12th most extensive and the 21st most populous of the u.S. राज्य.
Nearly 60 % of its residents live in the minneapolis–saint पॉल महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( ज्ञात as the `` जुड़वा शहरों '' ), the center of transportation, business, industry, education, government and home to an internationally known arts community.
The remainder of the state consists of western prairies अभी दिए over to intensive agriculture ; deciduous forests in the southeast, now cleared, farmed and settled ; and the less populated North Woods, used for mining, forestry, and recreation.
Minnesota is ज्ञात लिये इसके अपेक्षाकृत मिश्रित social and political orientations, and has a high rate of civic participation and voter turnout.
Minnesota ranks among the healthiest राज्य, and has a highly literate population.
the विशाल बहुमत of residents are of Scandinavian and German descent.
The state is known as a center of scandinavian American culture.
Ethnic विविधता रै increased in recent decades.
Substantial influxes of Asian, African, and Latin American immigrants have joined the वंशजों of यूरोपीय settlers and the original Native American inhabitants.
Grants are non-repayable funds by one party ( grant makers ), often a government department, निगम, न्यास or विश्वास, to a, प्रायः ( लकिन नहीं सदा ) a nonprofit एंटिटी, शैक्षणिक institution, business or an individual.
In order to प्राप्त a ग्रान्ट, कुछ form of `` Grant Writing '' often referred to as either a proposal or an application is usually required.
Most grants are made to निधि a विशिष्ट प्रोजेक्ट और आवश्यकता some level of compliance and reporting.
The grant writing process involves an applicant submitting a proposal ( or submission ) to a संभावित funder, either on the आवेदक 's अपना पहल or in response to a Request for Proposal from the funder.
Other अनुदान can be दिए to individuals, ऐसे as पीड़ितों of natural disasters or individuals who seek to open a small business.
Sometimes grant makers require grant seekers to have some रूप of tax-exempt status, be a registered nonprofit organization or a local government.
For example, tiered funding for a freeway are बहुत विशाल अनुदान negotiated at government policy level.
However smaller अनुदान may be provided by a government agency ( e.g. municipal government ).
Project-related funding involving governments, कारोबार, समुदायों, और individuals is often arranged by application either in writing or online.
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope, 59Co. 28 radioisotopes have been characterized with the most stable होने 60co साथ a half-life of 5.2714 सालो, 57co साथ a half-life of 271.79 दिनों, 56Co with a half-life of 77.27 days, and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days.
All of the remaining radioactive isotopes have half-lives that are less than 18 hours and the majority of these have half-lives कि हैं कम than 1 दूसरी.
This element also has 11 meta states, all of which have half-lives less than 15 मिनट्स.
The isotopes of cobalt range in परमाणु वज़न from 47Co to 75Co.
The primary decay mode for isotopes साथ परमाणु द्रव्यमान ईकाई मान कम than कि of the सबसे abundant stable समस्थानिक, 59co, is electron capture and the primary mode of decay for those of greater than 59 atomic mass units is beta decay.
The primary decay उत्पाद पहले 59co हैं आयरन isotopes and the primary products after are nickel isotopes.

Who Moved My चीज ?
An Amazing Way to Deal with Change in Your Work and in Your Life, प्रकाशित in 1998, is a प्रेरक किताब by स्पेंसर जॉनसन लिखा in the style of a parable or business fable.
It describes change in one 's work and life, and four typical reactions to said change by two mice and two `` littlepeople '', दौरान उनके हंट for cheese.
A New York Times business bestseller since रिलीज, जो स्थानांतरित My Cheese ?
remained on the list for almost five years and खर्च over 200 सप्ताह on प्रकाशक Weekly 's hardcover nonfiction list.
It has sold more than 26 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी in 37 languages and remains to be one of the best-selling business books.
Nikita sergeyevich khrushchev ( – सितंबर 11, 1971 ) led the Soviet Union during part of the Cold War.
He served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet संघ इससे 1953 to 1964, और as अध्यक्ष of the Council of Ministers, or Premier, from 1958 to 1964.
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-Stalinization of the Soviet Union, for backing the progress of the early Soviet space program, and for several relatively liberal reforms in areas of domestic policy.
Khrushchev 's party colleagues removed him from power in 1964, replacing him with Leonid brezhnev as पहला सचिव and Alexei Kosygin as Premier.
Khrushchev was born in the Russian village of Kalinovka in 1894, बंद to the present-day किनारा between Russia and Ukraine.
He was employed as a metalworker in his youth, and during the रूसी सिविल War was a political commissar.
With the help of Lazar Kaganovich, he worked उसके रास्ता up the Soviet hierarchy.
He supported Joseph स्टालिन 's purges, and approved thousands of arrests.
In 1939, Stalin sent him to govern युक्त, और he जारी the purges there.
During what was known in the Soviet Union as the Great Patriotic War ( पूर्वी सामने of संसार युद्ध ii ), khrushchev थी again a commissar, serving as an intermediary between Stalin and his generals.
Khrushchev was present at the bloody defense of Stalingrad, a फैक्ट he took ग्रेट अभिमान in throughout his life.
After the war, he returned to Ukraine before होने recalled to Moscow as one of Stalin 's close advisers.
In the power struggle triggered by स्टालिन 's मौत in 1953, Khrushchev, after several years, emerged victorious.
On February 25, 1956, at the 20th Party Congress, he वितरित the `` रहस्य वाक, '' denouncing स्टालिन 's purges और ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet Union.
His domestic policies, aimed at bettering the जीवनदान of ordinary citizens, were often ineffective, especially in the area of agriculture.
Hoping eventually to rely on मिसाइलें लिये नेशनल रक्षा, khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional forces.
Despite the cuts, Khrushchev 's rule saw the tensest years of the Cold War, culminating in the Cuban Missile Crisis.
Some of Khrushchev 's policies were seen as erratic, विशेषकर by उसके उभरते विरोधियों, जो चुपचाप रोज़ in शक्ति and deposed him in October 1964.
He did not suffer the deadly fate of some previous losers of सोवियत शक्ति struggles, लकिन थी pensioned बंद with an apartment in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside.
His lengthy memoirs were smuggled to the West and प्रकाशित in भाग in 1970.
khrushchev died in 1971 of heart disease.
Upper gastrointestinal ( GI ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the upper जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट.
The anatomic cut-off for upper GI bleeding is the ligament of Treitz, which connects the fourth portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm निकट the splenic flexure of the कोलन.
Upper GI bleeds are considered medical emergencies, and require admission to हॉस्पिटल लिये urgent diagnosis and management.
Due to advances in medications and endoscopy, अपर gi hemorrhage is now usually treated without surgery.
World population estimates इससे 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, orange, green ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ).
वास्तविक अंकित population figures are in blue.
According to the highest estimate, the world population may वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The world जनसांख्यिकी is the total number of living humans on Earth.
As of today, it is estimated to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त States Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी Fund, it reached this milestone on October 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great अकाल और the ब्लैक मौत in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were देखी briefly during the 1950s, and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth रेट peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख, जबकि मौतों number 56 million per year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to पहुँचें between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास, stagnation, or even overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world जनसांख्यिकी विकास, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, वैश्विक खाना supplies, and energy resources.

It is a now a fully स्वामित्व प्रभाग of Philips Lighting.
Knuckle mnemonic for the number of दिनों in प्रत्येक month of the Gregorian Calendar.
प्रत्येक projecting knuckle represents a 31-day month.
A mnemonic (, with a silent `` m '' ), or mnemonic device, is any learning technique that aids information retention.
mnemonics उद्देश्य to अनुवाद सूचना into a form that the human brain can retain better than its original form.
Even the process of applying this conversion might already aid the transfer of सूचना to long-term मेमोरी.
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in auditory form, such as short poems, acronyms, or यादगार वाक्यांश, लकिन mnemonics can also be for other types of information and in visual or kinesthetic forms.
Their use is based on the अवलोकन कि the इंसान दिमाग अधिक easily remembers spatial, personal, surprising, physical, sexual, humorous, or otherwise 'relatable ' information, rather than more abstract or impersonal forms of information.
The word mnemonic is derived from the Ancient Greek word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), meaning `` of memory '' और is सम्बन्धित to Mnemosyne ( `` remembrance '' ), the name of the goddess of memory in Greek mythology.
Both of these words are निकला इससे μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` remembrance, memory ''.
Mnemonics in antiquity यहूद सबसे प्रायः माना in the context of what is today known as the Art of memory.
Ancient Greeks and Romans विशिष्ट between दो प्रकार of मेमोरी : the 'natural ' memory and the 'artificial ' memory.
The former is inborn, and is the one that everyone uses automatically and without thinking.
The कृत्रिम मेमोरी in contrast has to be trained and developed through the learning and practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques.
Mnemonic systems are special techniques or strategies consciously used to improve memory, it helps employ information already भंडारित in long-term मेमोरी to make memorization an easier task.

The No Child Left Behind Act of 2001 ( NCLB ) is a United States Act of Congress कि is a reauthorization of the elementary और द्वितीयक Education Act, which included Title I, the government 's flagship aid program for disadvantaged students.
NCLB supports standards-based शिक्षा सुधार आधारित on the आधार कि setting high standards and establishing measurable goals can improve individual outcomes in education.
The Act requires राज्य to develop आकलन in basic skills.
States must give these assessments to all students at select grade levels in order to प्राप्त संघीय स्कूल funding.
the अधिनियम करता नहीं assert a नेशनल achievement standard ; standards are set by each individual state.
NCLB expanded the federal role in public education through annual testing, annual academic progress, रपट ताश, टीचर योग्यता, और funding changes.
The विधेयक passed in the u.S. Congress with bipartisan support.
