A pickup truck or pick-up, often बस referred to as a पिकअप, is a light motor vehicle with an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and फैक्टरी निर्मित, एकीकृत bed, as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों, प्रायः आधारित on a personal car chassis, but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup, such as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड, or bakkie in South Africa.
विशाल पिकअप ट्रक हैं somewhat rare in Europe, where vans and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
This 15th-century depiction of Charlemagne and Pope Adrian I shows a well-bred मध्यकालीन घोड़ा साथ मेहराबदार गर्दन, परिष्कृत सिर और elegant gait.
Horses in the Middle Ages differed in size, निर्माण और नस्ल इससे the modern horse, and were, on average, smaller.
They were also more central to society than their आधुनिक counterparts, होने अनिवार्य for war, agriculture, and transport.
Consequently, विशिष्ट प्रकार of horse developed, many of which have no modern equivalent.
While an understanding of modern horse breeds and equestrianism is vital for any analysis of the medieval horse, शोधकर्ताओं भी need to consider वृत्तचित्र ( दोनो written and pictorial ) and archaeological evidence.
Horses in the Middle Ages were rarely differentiated by breed, but rather by use.
This led them to be described, for example, as `` chargers `` ( war horses ), `` palfreys `` ( riding horses ), कार्ट घोड़े or packhorses.
Reference is also given to their place of origin, such as `` स्पेनी घोड़े, '' लकिन whether इस referred to एक नस्ल or अनेक is अनजान.
Another difficulty arising during any study of medieval documents or literature is the flexibility of the medieval भाषाएं, जहाँ अनेक words can be used for one thing ( or, conversely, several objects are referred to by one word ).
Words such as ' courser ' and 'charger ' हैं प्रयुक्त interchangeably ( भी भीतर एक दस्तावेज़ ), and where one epic may speak disparagingly of a rouncey, another praises its skill and swiftness.
Significant technological advances in equestrian equipment, often introduced from other संस्कृतियों, अनुमत लिये significant changes in both warfare and agriculture.
In particular, improved designs for the solid-treed saddle as well as the arrival of the stirrup, horseshoe and horse collar were significant advances in मध्यकालीन society.
Consequently, the assumptions and theories developed by इतिहासकारों हैं नहीं निर्णायक, और बहस स्टिल rages on many issues, such as the breeding or size of the horse, and a number of sources must be consulted in order to understand the breadth of the subject.
The Music Man is a musical with book, music, and गीत by मेरेडिथ willson, आधारित on a story by Willson and Franklin Lacey.
The plot concerns con man Harold Hill, जो मुद्राएँ as a लड़कों ' बैंड आयोजक और नेता and sells band instruments and uniforms to naive townsfolk before skipping town with the cash.
In River City, Iowa, prim librarian and piano teacher Marian Paroo sees through him, but when Hill helps उसके younger bhai overcome उसके भय of सोशल interactions due to his lisp, Marian begins to fall in love with Harold.
Harold, in turn falling for Marian, risks being caught to win उसके.
In 1957, the show became a hit on Broadway, winning five टोनी पुरस्कार, सहित Best Musical, and running for 1,375 performances.
The cast album won the पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये `` बेहतरीन असली Cast Album '' and was number one on the Billboard charts for 245 weeks.
The show 's success led to revivals and a popular 1962 film adaptation and a 2003 टेलीविज़न रीमेक.
It अक्सर is उत्पादित by both professional and amateur theater companies.
Surveyor 's व्हील
A surveyor 's wheel, also called a clickwheel, hodometer, waywiser, trundle wheel, measuring wheel, or perambulator is a यंत्र लिये measuring distance.
Largest non-polar deserts
Sand dunes in the rub ' al खली ( `` खाली quarter '' ) of Saudi Arabia.
makhtesh रेमन, Negev desert, Israel
A desert is a landscape or region of land that is very dry क्युकी of कम वर्षा amounts ( वर्षण ), often has little coverage by plants, and in which streams dry up unless they are supplied by water from outside areas.
रेगिस्तान can भी be described as areas where more water is lost by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation.
Desert plants must have special adaptations to जीवित with this little water.
Deserts generally receive less than 25 cm of बरसात ( precipitation ) each year.
Semideserts or steppes हैं regions जिससे receive between and.
In the Köppen climate वर्गीकरण प्रणाली, रेगिस्तान हैं classed as bwh ( hot desert ) or BWk ( temperate desert ).
In the Thornthwaite climate वर्गीकरण प्रणाली, रेगिस्तान would be classified as arid megathermal climates.
World War I ( WWI ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
it थी predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the Great War from its occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र डाला the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were मारे, largely क्युकी of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in संसार इतिहास, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the जर्मनी कूच on पेरिस थी brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In नवम्बर the Ottoman Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove वापस the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with revolutionaries, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, austro-hungarian और Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of सेंट्रल Europe was redrawn into several smaller states.
The League of Nations थी formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be कारकों contributing to संसार युद्ध II.
`` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979 सोंग originally लिखा by रॉबर्ट Hazard and made famous by singer Cyndi Lauper.
It was the first major single released by lauper as a सोलो कलाकार और the lead-off single from her debut album She 's So Unusual.
Lauper’s version gained मान्यता as a feminist गान and promoted by an award-winning video.
It has been covered on either an album or in live concert by over 30 अन्य कलाकारों.
The सिंगल थी lauper 's भेदन hit, reaching # 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 and becoming a worldwide hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984.
It remains one of Lauper 's signature songs and was a widely लोकप्रिय सोंग दौरान the era of its release, the 1980s.
The `` Rolling Stone & MTV : '100 Greatest Pop Songs ' : 1-50 '', `` Rolling Stone : `` The 100 Top Music Videos '' '' and the `` VH1 : 100 महानतम वीडियो '' सूचियाँ क्रमित the सोंग at # 22, # 39 and # 45, respectively.
The song received a Grammy Award नामांकन लिये रिकार्ड of the साल और बेहतरीन Female Pop Vocal Performance.
View of defibrillator electrode position और अवस्थिति.
Defibrillation is a common treatment for life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical energy to the प्रभावित heart with a device called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the देह 's प्राकृतिक pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of device used or needed.
Some external units, known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms, meaning that lay responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ to उपयोग उन्हें सफलतापूर्वक with little, or in some cases no training at all.
The Cato संस्थान is an अमरीकी libertarian think tank headquartered in Washington, D.C.
It was founded as the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by Murray Rothbard, ed क्रेन और चार्ल्स koch, अध्यक्ष of the board and chief executive officer of the conglomerate Koch Industries, Inc..
In July 1976, the नाम was changed to the Cato Institute.
According to the 2011 Global Go To Think Tank Index, Cato is the 6th most influential US based think tank, रैंकिंग 3rd in आर्थिक Policy and 2nd in Social Policy.
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to increase the understanding of public policies based on the principles of limited government, free बाज़ार, व्यक्तिगत liberty, and peace.
The Institute will use the most effective means to originate, advocate, promote, and disseminate applicable policy proposals that create free, open, and civil societies in the संयुक्त राज्य and throughout the world. ''
Cato scholars were critical of George W. Bush 's Republican प्रशासन ( 2001–2009 ) on several issues, including the Iraq War, civil liberties, education, agriculture, energy policy, and excessive government spending.
On other issues, they supported Bush administration पहलों, सबसे notably स्वास्थ्य परवाह, सोशल Security, global warming, tax policy, and immigration.
During the 2008 U.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, Cato scholars criticized both major-party candidates, John McCain and Barack Obama.
Cato has criticized President Obama 's stances on policy issues since his inauguration, such as fiscal stimulus, healthcare सुधार, विदेशी नीति, और the युद्ध on दवाएँ, जबकि supporting his stance on the repeal of Do n't Ask, Do n't Tell and liberal immigration policy.
Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by आयरिश लेखक ब्राम स्टोकर.
Famous for introducing the character of the vampire Count Dracula, the novel tells the story of Dracula 's attempt to relocate from Transylvania to इंग्लैण्ड, और the बैटल between ड्रैकुला और a छोटी समूह of men and women led by Professor Abraham Van Helsing.
Dracula has been assigned to अनेक साहित्यिक जाति सहित पिशाच literature, horror fiction, the gothic novel and invasion literature.
the अनोखा छू on विषयवस्तु ऐसे as the भूमिका of महिलाओं in Victorian culture, sexual conventions, immigration, colonialism, and post-colonialism.
Although Stoker did not इफ़तेरा the पिशाच, he पारिभाषित इसके आधुनिक रूप, and the novel has spawned numerous theatrical, film and television interpretations.
Quidditch is a competitive sport in the wizarding world of the Harry Potter universe, and is from the श्रेणी of children 's novels and movies.
It is an extremely rough but very popular semi-contact sport, निभाई by wizards और witches.
Matches are played between two teams of seven players riding flying broomsticks, using four गेंदें और छह elevated ring-shaped लक्ष्य, तीन on each side of the Quidditch pitch ( field ).
In the Harry Potter universe, Quidditch holds a fervent following similar to the position that संघ फ़ुटबॉल holds as a globally popular sport.
The sport is monumental throughout the wizarding world.
Harry plays an important position for his house team at Hogwarts : he is the seeker और becomes the captain in his sixth year there.
Regional and international competitions are उल्लेखित throughout the श्रेणी.
In प्याला of आग, quidditch at Hogwarts is cancelled for the Tri-Wizard Tournament, but Harry and the Weasleys attend the Quidditch World Cup.
In addition, Harry uses his Quidditch skills to capture a golden egg from a dragon called the Hungarian Horntail ( in the first task of the Tri-Wizard Tournament ), to capture a उड़ती कुंजी in पारस 's स्टोन, और on दो कुंजी अवसरों in deathly hallows — getting hold of Ravenclaw 's Diadem, and during the final fight with Voldemort — the `` unerring skill of the Seeker '' is useful to him in snatching the Elder Wand out of the air.
Harry Potter has owned two broomsticks, the nimbus 2000 and the Firebolt, both of which are destroyed by the series ' end.
The game has been adopted in the real संसार in the रूप of मगलू Quidditch.
The United States Congress is the bicameral legislature of the federal government of the United राज्य consisting of two houses : the lower house known as the House of Representatives and the upper house known as the Senate.
कॉंग्रेस meets in the कैपिटल in Washington, D.C.
Both representatives and सीनेटरों हैं chosen through direct election.
Congress has a total of 535 voting सदस्यों : 435 सदस्यों in the House of Representatives and 100 members in the Senate.
Members of the House of प्रतिनिधि serve two-year शर्तें representing the people of a district.
Congressional districts are apportioned to states by population using the United States Census results, each state in the union having at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि in the House of Representatives.
Regardless of population, प्रत्येक of the 50 राज्य रै दो सीनेटरों ; the 100 senators each serve a six-year term.
The terms are staggered so every two सालो लगभग one-third of the Senate is up for election.
Each staggered group of one-third of the सीनेटरों हैं पुकारा 'classes '.
No state of the United राज्य रै दो senators from the same class.
Most incumbents seek re-election, और उनके ऐतिहासिक likelihood of winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 percent.
In August 2012, a Gallup poll reported that Congress’s approval rating amongst अमेरिकी थी at 10 %, मिलान a 38-year low reached in November 2011.
`` A Little More Country Than That '' is the title of a song लिखा by जॉय + रोरी 's रोरी Lee Feek, Wynn Varble, and Don Poythress, and recorded by American country artist Easton Corbin.
It was released in August 2009 as कोर्बिन 's डेब्यू सिंगल और is शामिल on his self-titled debut album.
in अप्रैल 2010, the सोंग पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on the country music charts, making Corbin the first male solo artist in seven years to send a debut single to Number One.
It has महरूम certified Gold by the RIAA.
The ब्लैकबेरी is a लकीर of बेतार handheld devices and services designed and marketed by Research In Motion Limited ( RIM ) operating as BlackBerry.
The first BlackBerry device, an email पेजर, थी released in 1999 ; the most recent BlackBerry devices, the Z10 and Q10, were announced on January 30, 2013.
The user interface varies by model ; most feature a शारीरिक QWERTY keyboard, while newer generations have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard.
A BlackBerry can shoot video, take photos, play म्यूज़िक, और perform ऑनलाइन functions such as web-browsing and emailing.
They can also send and receive push email and तत्काल संदेश जबकि maintaining a ऊँची स्तर of security through on-device message encryption, and are designed to function as personal digital assistants.
BlackBerry devices support a large variety of instant messaging features, with the most popular being the proprietary BlackBerry मेसेंजर सेवा.
The ब्लैकबेरी playbook is a tablet computer offered by the company.
The 100 millionth BlackBerry smartphone was shipped in June quarter of 2010 और the 200 millionth स्मार्टफोन was shipped in September quarter of 2012.
BlackBerry accounts for 3 % of mobile device sales worldwide in 2011, बनाना इसके निर्माता the छठे सबसे लोकप्रिय device maker ( 25 % of mobile device sales are smartphones ).
The consumer BlackBerry Internet Service is available in 91 countries worldwide on over 500 मोबाईल सेवा ऑपरेटर using विभिन्न mobile technologies.
as of सितंबर 2012, there were eighty million subscribers worldwide to BlackBerry.
In 2011 the caribbean और लैटिन अमेरिका had the highest penetrations of BlackBerry smartphones worldwide, with up to about 45 per cent in the region having a RIM device.
BlackBerry, iPhone, Android, and Windows Phone हैं माना the चार प्रमुख स्मार्टफोन brands.
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry '' in the United States, which alludes to its excessive use by its owners and is a reference to the addictiveness of क्रैक कोका.
Use of the term CrackBerry became so widespread that in नवम्बर 2006 वेबस्टर 's New World College Dictionary named `` crackberry '' the `` New Word of the Year. ''
An example of a demand वक्र shifting.
The shift from D1 To D2 means an increase in demand with consequences लिये the other variables
In economics, the demand curve is the आलेख depicting the संबंध between the दाम of a निश्चित कमोडिटी and the amount of it that consumers are willing and able to purchase at that given price.
It is a graphic representation of a माँग अनुसूची.
The demand curve for all consumers together follows from the demand curve of every individual consumer : the व्यक्तिगत मांगे at प्रत्येक दाम हैं added together.
Demand curves are used to estimate behaviors in competitive markets, and are प्रायः संयुक्त साथ सप्लाई वक्र to अनुमान the संतुलन दाम ( the दाम at जिससे विक्रेता साथ हैं willing to बेचें the वही राशि as खरीदार together are willing to buy, also known as market clearing price ) and the equilibrium quantity ( the amount of that good or service that will be produced and bought without surplus/excess supply or shortage/excess demand ) of that market.
In a monopolistic market, the demand curve facing the monopolist is बस the मार्केट माँग वक्र.
historia
by nikolaos gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from Greek - historia, meaning `` inquiry, knowledge acquired by investigation '' ) is an umbrella term that relates to पास्ट कार्यक्रम as खूब as the डिस्कवरी, संग्रहण, संगठन, and presentation of information about these events.
The term includes cosmic, भूगर्भिक, और सशुल्क इतिहास, but is often generically implied to mean human history.
Scholars who write about इतिहास हैं पुकारा historians.
History can also refer to the अकादमिक अनुशासन जिससे उपयोग a कथा to जाँचें and analyse a sequence of past events, and objectively determine the patterns of cause and effect that determine them.
Historians sometimes debate the nature of history and इसके उपयोगिता by discussing the पढ़ाई of the discipline as an end in itself and as a way of providing `` perspective '' on the problems of the present.
Stories common to a particular culture, but not supported by external sources ( such as the tales surrounding King Arthur ) are usually classified as cultural heritage or legends, because they do not support the `` disinterested छानबीन '' जरूरी of the अनुशासन of history.
Events occurring prior to written रिकार्ड हैं considered prehistory.
Herodotus, a 5th century B.C. Greek इतिहासकार is माना भीतर the पश्चिमी परंपरा to be the `` पिता of history '', and, along with his contemporary Thucydides, helped form the foundations for the modern study of human history.
Their work continues to be पढ़ा आज और the divide between the culture-focused Herodotus and the military-focused Thucydides remains a point of contention or approach in modern historical writing.
In the Eastern tradition, a state chronicle the वसन्त और पतझड़ annals थी ज्ञात to be compiled from as early as 722 BCE although only 2nd century BCE texts survived.
Ancient influences have helped spawn variant interpretations of the nature of history which have evolved over the सदियां और continue to बदलें आज.
The modern पढ़ाई of इतिहास is wide-ranging, and includes the study of specific regions and the study of certain topical or thematical elements of historical investigation.
Often history is taught as part of primary and द्वितीयक शिक्षा, और the अकादमिक study of history is a major discipline in University studies.
मैल्कम x ( ; may 19, 1925february 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ), was an African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist.
To his admirers, he was a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks, a man who indicted white America in the harshest terms लिये इसके अपराधों विरूद्ध ब्लैक अमेरिकी.
detractors अभियुक्त उसे of उपदेश racism, black supremacy, and violence.
He रै महरूम पुकारा एक of the महानतम and most influential African Americans in history.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he थी यंग, और at तनिक एक of his uncles was lynched.
When he was 13, his mother was placed in a mental hospital, और he थी लगाई in a श्रेणी of foster homes.
In 1946, at age 20, he went to prison for breaking और प्रवेश.
In prison, Malcolm X became a member of the स्वदेश of islam ; after his parole in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of its leaders.
For a dozen years, Malcolm X थी the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह, but disillusionment with Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of सफर in अफ़्रीकी और the मध्य East, he returned to the United States, where he founded Muslim Mosque, Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity.
In February 1965, less than a year after leaving the Nation of islam, he थी assassinated by तीन सदस्यों of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over time.
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and white Americans —in कंट्रास्ट to the सिविल rights movement 's emphasis on integration.
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of उसके संघ with it, `` I did many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम, he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to work with civil rights leaders, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
Henry Merritt `` Hank '' Paulson, Jr. ( born March 28, 1946 ) is an American banker who served as the 74th संयुक्त राज्य सचिव of the राजकोष.
He had served as the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Goldman Sachs, and is now chairman of the Paulson Institute, which he founded in 2011 to promote sustainable economic growth and a क्लीनर पर्यावरण around the संसार, with an initial focus on the United States and China.
A virtual machine ( VM ) is a software implemented abstraction of the underlying hardware, which is presented to the अनुप्रयोग परत of the प्रणाली.
Virtual machines may be based on specifications of a hypothetical कंप्यूटर or emulate the कंप्यूटर वास्तुकला and functions of a real world computer.
मकड़ियों ( अनुक्रम araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that have eight legs and chelicerae with fangs that inject venom.
They are the largest order of arachnids and rank seventh in total species diversity among all other groups of organisms.
Spiders are मिला विश्वव्यापी on प्रत्येक महाद्वीप मगर for Antarctica, and have become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at least 43,678 spider species, and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however, there has been confusion within the scientific community as to how सब ये परिवारों चाहिए be वर्गीकृत, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body segments are fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax and abdomen, and joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
Unlike insects, मकड़ियों do नहीं have antennae.
In all except the most primitive group, the Mesothelae, spiders have the most centralized nervous systems of all arthropods, as all their ganglia हैं fused into एक mass in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, मकड़ियों have no extensor muscles in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been modified into spinnerets कि extrude रेशा इससे up to six types of silk glands within their abdomen.
मकड़ी webs vary widely in size, shape and the amount of sticky thread used.
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest forms, and spiders that produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids साथ silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about, but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have been found in Carboniferous rocks from, and are very similar to the सबसे आदिम surviving अनुक्रम, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of modern spiders, Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae, first appeared in the triassic काल, before.
A herbivorous प्रजाति, bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, but all other known species are predators, mostly preying on insects and on other spiders, although a few large species also take birds and lizards.
Spiders use a चौड़ी दायरा of रणनीति to कैप्चर शिकार : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it with sticky bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid detection, or running it down.
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations, but the active hunters have acute vision, and hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in their choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, और वे liquidize उनके खाना by बाढ़ it साथ digestive enzymes and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps, as they do not have true jaws.
Male spiders identify themselves by a किस्में of जटिल प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid being eaten by the females.
Males of most species survive a few matings, सीमित मुख्यतः by their short life spans.
महिलाओं बुनते रेशा egg-cases, each of which may contain hundreds of eggs.
Females of many species care for their young, for example by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing खाना with them.
A minority of species are social, building communal webs that may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior ranges इससे precarious toleration, as in the widow spiders, to co-operative hunting and food-sharing.
Although सबसे मकड़ियों सजीव लिये at most two years, tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can live up to 25 years in captivity.
जबकि the venom of a few प्रजाति is खतरनाक to humans, scientists are now researching the use of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength and elasticity that is superior to that of synthetic materials, and spider silk genes have been inserted into स्तनधारियों और पौधे to देखिए if ये can be used as silk factories.
As a result of their wide range of behaviors, spiders have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing various combinations of patience, क्रूरता और creative powers.
Donna Marie Pinciotti ( Born February 13, 1960 ) is a fictional character and one of the two मादा लीड in the फॉक्स sitcom कि '70s दिखाएँ, appearing in all eight seasons.
Portrayed by Laura prepon, Donna is the love interest to Eric Forman.
US काउंटी household median income 2009.
मध्य US household income, 2001-2011
Household income is a measure commonly प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी and private institutions.
Each household is measured by the आय of प्रत्येक निवासी over the age of 15.
Income includes wages and salaries, unemployment insurance, disability payments, child support payments received, regular rental receipts, as well as any personal कारोबार, निवेश, or अन्य kinds of आय received routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had been increasing almost every year from 1945 to 1999, it has चूंकि महरूम चपटा और भी decreased recently.
u.S. मध्य household income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme गरीबी in the संयुक्त राज्य, अर्थ households living on less than $ 2 per day before government benefits, doubled from 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011, including 2.8 million children.
The residents of the household do not have to be सम्बन्धित to the head of the household for their earnings to be considered part of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a similar economic context, the use of household income remains among the सबसे widely स्वीकृत उपायों of आय.
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any analysis of fluctuations भीतर or among the household आय श्रेणी, और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible.
A registered agent, also known as a resident agent or statutory agent, in United States business विधि, is a कारोबार or व्यक्तिगत designated to receive service of process ( SOP ) when a business entity is a party in a legal action such as a lawsuit or summons.
The registered agent 's address may also be where the state होगा भेजें the कागजी लिये the वार्षिक नवीकरण of the business entity 's charter.
The registered agent for a business entity may be an individual member of the company, or ( more often ) a third पार्टी, ऐसे as the संगठन 's वकील or a service company.
Failure to properly maintain a registered agent can affect a कम्पनी negatively.

`` Life, Liberty, and the pursuit of Happiness '' is a well-known phrase in the United States Declaration of Independence.
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' with which all human beings are endowed by their creator for their protection of which they institute governments.
Fencing, is typically divided into Olympic fencing, Classical fencing and ऐतिहासिक तलवारबाजी,.
The sport of fencing ( commonly called olympic fencing or competitive fencing ) is divided into three weapon categories : foil, सब्रे और épée.
Classical fencing uses the same three हथियार, but approaches fencing as a martial art.
Competitive Fencing is one of five sports जिससे रै महरूम प्रदर्शित at प्रत्येक एक of the modern Olympic Games, the other four being Athletics, Cycling, Swimming, and Gymnastics.
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed muscle of the femur `` ), also called simply the quadriceps, quadriceps extensor, quads, is a large muscle group that includes the four prevailing muscles on the front of the thigh.
It is the great extensor muscle of the घुटना, forming a विशाल मांसल mass which covers the front and sides of the femur.
The proper Latin plural form of the क्रियाशील quadriceps would be quadricipites.
In modern English usage, quadriceps is प्रयुक्त in दोनो एकवचन and plural.
The singular form quadricep, उत्पादित by hypercorrection, is frequently used.
RMS Titanic was a अंग्रेजों यात्री लाइनर कि sank in the उत्तर अटलांटिक Ocean on 15 April 1912 after colliding with an iceberg during her maiden voyage from Southampton, UK to New York City, US.
The sinking of Titanic caused the deaths of 1,502 people in one of the deadliest peacetime मेरीटाइम आपदाओं in आधुनिक history.
The RMS Titanic was the largest ship afloat at the समय of उसके maiden voyage.
She was the second of three Olympic class ocean liners operated by the White Star Line, and she was built by the Harland and Wolff shipyard in Belfast with Thomas Andrews, who perished साथ the जलयान, as उसके नवल वास्तु.
On her maiden voyage, she carried 2,224 passengers and crew.
Under the command of Edward स्मिथ, उसके यात्री शामिल some of the wealthiest people in the world, as well as hundreds of emigrants from Great Britain and Ireland, Scandinavia and elsewhere throughout Europe seeking a new life in North America.
The ship was designed to be the last word in comfort and luxury, with an on-board gymnasium, swimming pool, libraries, high-class रेस्तरां और opulent cabins.
She also had a powerful wireless telegraph provided for the convenience of यात्री as खूब as लिये operational use.
Though she had advanced safety features such as watertight compartments and remotely activated watertight doors, वो lacked पर्याप्त lifeboats to accommodate all of those aboard.
Because of outdated maritime safety regulations, she carried only enough lifeboats for 1,178 people—slightly more than half of the number travelling on the maiden voyage, and one-third her total passenger and crew capacity.
After leaving Southampton on 10 April 1912, टाइटैनिक पुकारा at cherbourg in फ़्रांस and Queenstown ( now Cobh ) in Ireland before heading westwards towards New York.
On 14 April 1912, four days into the क्रासिंग और परिचय 375 मील ( 600 km ) south of Newfoundland, she hit an iceberg at 11:40 pm ship 's time.
The glancing collision caused Titanics hull plates to buckle inwards along her starboard side and खोली पाँच of उसके सोलह watertight compartments to the sea ; the ship gradually filled with water.
Meanwhile, passengers and some crew members were evacuated in lifeboats, many of which were शुभारम्भ तभी partly loaded.
A disproportionate number of men were left सवार क्युकी of a `` महिलाओं और children first `` protocol followed by some of the officers loading the lifeboats.
By 2:20 AM, she broke अलावा और foundered, साथ खूब over one thousand people still aboard.
Just under two hours after the Titanic foundered, the Cunard liner RMS carpathia arrived on the scene of the sinking, where she brought aboard an estimated 705 survivors.
The disaster was greeted with worldwide shock and outrage at the huge loss of life and the regulatory and operational असफलताओं कि था led to it.
Public inquiries in Britain and the United राज्य led to प्रमुख सुधार in maritime safety.
One of their most important legacies was the establishment in 1914 of the International Convention for the Safety of Life at समुद्र ( solas ), जिससे स्टिल governs मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा today.
Additionally, several new wireless regulations were passed around the world in an effort to सीख इससे the अनेक missteps in बेतार संचार -- -which could have saved many more passengers.
Many of the survivors lost all of their money and possessions and were left destitute ; many families, particularly those of crew members from Southampton, खोया उनके प्राथमिक bread-winners.
They were helped by an outpouring of public सहानुभूति और charitable दान.
Some of the पुरूष survivors यहूद अभियुक्त of कायरता लिये leaving the ship while people were still on board ; the White Star Line 's chairman, J. Bruce Ismay, faced social ostracism for the rest of his life.
The wreck of the टाइटैनिक remains on the समुद्रतल, विभाजित in two and gradually disintegrating at a depth of.
Since its discovery in 1985, हज़ारों of artefacts have been recovered and put on display at museums around the world.
Titanic रै become one of the most famous ships in history, her memory kept alive by numerous books, folk songs, films, exhibits, and memorials.
The human leg is the entire lower extremity or limb of the इंसान देह, सहित the पैर, जांघ और even the hip or gluteal region ; however, the precise definition in human anatomy refers only to the section of the lower limb extending from the knee to the ankle.
Legs are used for standing, walking, jumping, running, kicking, and समान क्रियाएँ, और constitute a significant portion of a person 's mass.
This आलेख is परिचय the जनसांख्यिकी सुविधाएँ of the जनसांख्यिकी of तुर्कों, including population density, ethnicity, education level, health of the populace, economic status, religious affiliations and other aspects of the population.
As of 2010, the population of Turkey is estimated to be 73.7 million with a विकास रेट of 1.21 % प्रति annum ( 2009 figure ).
The population is relatively यंग साथ 26.6 % गिरना in the 0-14 age bracket.
according to the oecd/world बैंको जनसांख्यिकी statistics in Turkey the population growth from 1990 to 2008 was 16 million or 29 %.

A full-size car is a marketing term प्रयुक्त in उत्तर अमेरिका लिये an ऑटोमोबाइल larger than a mid-size car.
In the United राज्य, the epa uses the term `` large car '' to denote full-size cars.
Joel Grey ( born अप्रैल 11, 1932 ) is an American stage and screen actor, singer, and dancer, known for his role as the Master of Ceremonies in both the stage and film adaptation of the Kander & Ebb musical Cabaret.
He has won the अकादमी पुरस्कार, टोनी पुरस्कार and Golden Globe Award.
He also originated the role of George M. cohan in the musical George M !
in 1973, the जादूगर in the musical Wicked.

James Madison, Jr. ( March 16, 1751 ( o.s. कूच 5 ) – जून 28, 1836 ) थी an अमरीकी statesman और राजनैतिक theorist, the fourth President of the United States ( 1809–1817 ).
He is hailed as the “Father of the constitution” लिये होने इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the drafting of the United States Constitution and as the key champion and author of the United States Bill of Rights.
He served as a politician much of उसके adult life.
After the constitution था महरूम drafted, Madison became one of the leaders in the movement to ratify it.
His collaboration with Alexander Hamilton and John Jay उत्पादित the federalist Papers ( 1788 ).
Circulated only in New York at the time, they would later be considered among the most important polemics in support of the Constitution.
He was also a delegate to the वर्जिनिया संवैधानिक ratifying सम्मेलन, और थी instrumental to the successful ratification effort in Virginia.
Like most of his contemporaries, Madison changed his political दृश्य दौरान उसके life.
During the drafting and ratification of the constitution, he favored a strong national government, though later he grew to favor stronger state governments, before settling between the दो extremes लेट in his life.
In 1789, Madison became a leader in the नई हाउस of Representatives, drafting many basic laws.
He is notable for drafting the first ten amendments to the संविधान, और यूँ is known as the `` Father of the Bill of Rights ``.
मैडिसन worked closely with President George Washington to organize the new federal government.
Breaking with Hamilton and what became the Federalist Party in 1791, मैडिसन और थामस जेफरसन व्यवस्थित कया they called the Republican Party ( later called by historians the Democratic-Republican Party )
As Jefferson’s Secretary of State ( 1801–1809 ), Madison पर्यवेक्षित the louisiana Purchase, which doubled the nation’s size.
After his election to the presidency, he presided over renewed prosperity for several years.
As president ( 1809–17 ), बाद the विफलता of राजनयिक protests and a trade embargo against Great Britain, he led the nation into the War of 1812.
He was responding to British encroachments on American honor and rights ; in addition, he wanted to end the influence of the अंग्रेजों among उनके भारतीय allies, whose resistance blocked United States settlement in the Midwest around the Great Lakes.
Madison found the war to be an administrative दुःस्वप्न, as the संयुक्त राज्य था neither a दमदार फौज nor financial system ; as a result, he afterward supported a stronger national government and a strong military, as well as the national bank, which he had long opposed.
Like other Virginia statesmen in the slave समाज, he थी a slaveholder जो inherited उसके वृक्षारोपण known as Montpelier, and owned hundreds of slaves during his lifetime to cultivate tobacco and other crops.
Madison supported the three-fifths compromise that allowed three-fifths of the enumerated जनसांख्यिकी of स्लेव to be गिने for representation.
`` Roman 's बदला '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी rapper Nicki Minaj from her debut studio album Pink Friday.
It was written by Minaj and rapper Eminem, who is also featured in the song, और थी उत्पादित by swizz Beatz.
It was released exclusively on October 30, 2010 through the US iTunes Store, as a promotional रिलीज preceding the एल्बम 's release.
The song initiated a feud between Lil ' Kim and Minaj, where many people felt the सोंग थी निर्देशित at लील ' किम और regarded around उसके जज्बात towards minaj 's वृद्धि to fame.
The song references minaj 's alter-ego, रोमन Zolanski, and Eminem 's alter-ego, Slim Shady.
The song garnered very positive reviews from critics, most of which praised the song as a stand-out track on the album.
An official remix featuring minaj 's mentor, लील वेन, was released to the US iTunes Store on January 19, 2011.

Hydraulic fluid होने poured.
हाइड्रोलिक fluids, भी पुकारा hydraulic liquids, are the medium by which power is transferred in hydraulic machinery.
Common hydraulic fluids हैं आधारित on mineral oil or water.
Examples of equipment that might उपयोग हाइड्रोलिक fluids शामिल excavators और backhoes, hydraulic brakes, power steering systems, transmissions, garbage trucks, aircraft flight control systems, lifts, and industrial machinery.
Hydraulic systems like the ones mentioned above will work most efficiently if the हाइड्रोलिक द्रव used has no compressibility
Mahindra ट्रैक्टर
Mahindra Tractors, the farm equipment division of महिंद्रा & महिंद्रा, builds and sources tractors that are sold worldwide across six continents.
Mahindra is also among the शीर्ष तीन ट्रैक्टर manufacturers in the world.
Mahindra has a huge consumer base in India, चीन और अमेरिका and a growing base in Australia.
The company builds more tractors in इण्डिया than any other manufacturer, and has the capacity to build 150,000 tractors a year.
In 1963, m & m formed a संयुक्त venture साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the Mahindra nameplate for the Indian market.
Armed with अभियान्त्रिकी, tooling और निर्माण know-how gained इससे इस relationship, M & M developed its first tractor, the B-275.
Mahindra Tractors with sales of nearly 85,000 units annually is one of the largest tractor companies in the world, and is number एक in बिक्री in इण्डिया - the largest tractor market in the world.
To expand into the growing tractor market in चीन, महिंद्रा acquired बहुमत stake in Jiangling.
To raise awareness about Mahindra in the US, Mahindra USA announced its नई प्रायोजन in the nascar देशभर श्रेणी साथ r3 मोटरस्पोर्ट, जिससे is participating with a # 23 Mahindra Tractors Chevrolet.
The car will be driven by Robert Richardson, Jr. महिंद्रा यूएसए, inc. घोषित a 17-race प्राथमिक और 18-race associate sponsorship for the 2009 NASCAR Nationwide Series.
With this sponsorship, Mahindra was the first Indian company to sponsor a car in NASCAR.
in 2008, महिंद्रा was a sponsor of the McDonald Motorsports team which ran the # 81 car in the NASCAR Nationwide Series.
The POWER6 is a माइक्रोप्रोसेसर विकसित by IBM that implemented the Power ISA v.2.03.
When it became available in systems in 2007, it succeeded the POWER5+ as IBM 's flagship Power microprocessor.
It is part of the eCLipz project, said to have a goal of converging IBM 's सर्वर हार्डवेयर where practical ( hence `` ipz '' in the acronym : iSeries, pSeries, and zSeries ).
The अमरीकी मध्य class is a social class in the United States.
While the concept is typically ambiguous in popular opinion and common language use, contemporary social scientists have put आगे several, more or less congruent, theories on the American middle class.
Depending on class model used, the middle class may constitute anywhere from 25 % to 66 % of households.
One of the first major studies of the मध्य क्लास in अमेरिका थी श्वेत कॉलर : the अमरीकी मध्य Classes, published in 1951 by sociologist C. Wright Wright_Mills Mills Wright_Mills.
Later sociologists such as Dennis Gilbert of Hamilton College commonly divide the मध्य क्लास into two sub-groups.
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the upper or पेशेवर मध्य class consisting of highly educated, salaried professionals and managers.
Constituting roughly one तीसरा of households is the lower middle class consisting mostly of semi-professionals, skilled craftsmen and lower-level management.
Middle-class persons commonly have a comfortable standard of living, significant economic सुरक्षा, considerable कार्य स्वायत्तता और rely on उनके विशेषज्ञता to sustain themselves.
Members of the middle class belong to विविध groups which overlap with each other.
Overall, middle-class persons, especially upper-middle-class individuals, are characterized by conceptualizing, बनाना और परामर्श.
Thus, college education is one of the main indicators of middle-class status.
Largely attributed to the प्रकृति of middle-class occupations, middle class values tend to emphasize independence, adherence to intrinsic standards, valuing innovation and respecting non-conformity.
Politically more active than अन्य जनसांख्यिकी, college educated middle class professionals are split between the two major parties.
Income varies considerably इससे निकट the national median to well in excess of $ 100,000.
Household income figures, however, do not always reflect class status and standard of living, as they are largely influenced by the number of income earners and fail to recognize household size.
It is therefore possible for a large, dual-earner, lower middle class household to out-earn a small, one-earner, upper मध्य क्लास household.
The middle classes are very influential, as they encompass the majority of मतदाता, लेखक, teachers, journalists, and editors.
Most societal रुझान in the US originate within the middle classes.
The following is a list of Saturday रात्रि सजीव डाल सदस्यों, पास्ट and present.

Ruins from the 1906 San फ्रांसिस्को भूकंप, remembered as एक of the worst natural disasters in United States history
A disaster is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) जोखिम resulting in an इवेंट of substantial extent causing significant physical damage or destruction, loss of life, or drastic change to the environment.
A disaster can be ostensively पारिभाषित as कोई tragic event stemming from events such as earthquakes, floods, catastrophic accidents, fires, or explosions.
It is a phenomenon that can cause damage to जीवन और प्रॉपर्टी और destroy the economic, social and cultural life of people.
in समकालीन academia, disasters are seen as the consequence of inappropriately managed risk.
These risks are the product of a combination of दोनो hazard/s और vulnerability.
Hazards that strike in areas with low vulnerability होगा never become disasters, as is the case in uninhabited regions.
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – more than 95 percent of all deaths caused by disasters occur in developing countries, and losses due to natural disasters are 20 times greater ( as a percentage of GDP ) in developing देशों than in industrialized countries.
In computing, booting ( also known as booting up ) is the initial set of operations कि a कंप्यूटर प्रणाली performs when electrical power to the CPU is switched on.
The process begins when a computer is turned on for the first time or is re-energized बाद होने turned बंद, और ends जब the computer is ready to perform its normal operations.
On modern general purpose computers, this can take tens of seconds and typically involves performing a power-on self-test, locating and initializing peripheral devices, and then ढूंढना, लदान और starting an operating system.
Many computer systems also allow these operations to be initiated by a software command without cycling power, in what is known as a soft reboot, though some of the initial operations might be skipped on a soft reboot.
A boot loader is a computer program that loads the main operating system or runtime पर्यावरण लिये the कंप्यूटर after completion of the self-tests.
The computer पद बूट is short for bootstrap or bootstrap load and derives from the phrase to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps.
The usage calls attention to the requirement कि, if सबसे तन्त्र is loaded onto a computer by other software already running on the computer, some mechanism must exist to load initial software onto the computer.
Early computers used a किस्में of ad-hoc विधि to मिलेंगी a छोटी program into memory to solve this problem.
The invention of integrated circuit read-only मेमोरी ( rom ) of विभिन्न प्रकार हल इस विरोधाभास by allowing computers to be shipped with a start up program that could not be erased.
Growth in the क्षमता of rom रै अनुमत कभी more elaborate start up procedures to be implemented.
On general purpose computers, the boot process begins with the execution of an initial program stored in boot ROMs or read in another fashion.
in कुछ पुरानी कंप्यूटर, the initial program might have been the application to run, if no operating system was used, or the operating system.
In other computers, the initial program is a boot loader that may then load into random-access memory ( RAM ), from nonvolatile secondary storage ( such as a hard disk drive ) or, in some older computers, from a मीडियम ऐसे as punched ताश, punched टेप, or चुम्बकीय टेप in पुरानी कंप्यूटर, the शब्दकोष कोड of an operating system or runtime environment and then execute it.
If the boot loader is limited in its size और capabilities, it may, instead, load a larger and more capable secondary boot loader, which would then load the operating system or runtime environment.
Some embedded systems do not require a noticeable boot अनुक्रम to शुरू कामकाज और जब turned on may simply run operational programs that are stored in ROM.
Firebird is an open source SQL relational database management system that runs on लिनक्स, खिड़कियाँ, और a किस्में of Unix.
The database forked from borland 's खोलें सोर्स संस्करण of interbase in 2000, but since Firebird 1.5 the code has been largely rewritten.
Outsourcing is the contracting out of an internal business process to a third-party organization.
The practice of contracting a business process out to a तीसरा पार्टी बल्कि than staffing it internally is common in the modern economy.
The term `` outsourcing '' became popular in the United States near the फेरे of the 21st सदी.
Outsourcing sometimes involves transferring employees और एसेट इससे एक कड़ to another, but not always.
The definition of outsourcing includes both foreign and domestic contracting, and sometimes includes offshoring, जिससे means relocating a business function to another country.
Financial savings from lower international मजदूर दरों is a बिग प्रेरणा for outsourcing/offshoring.
The विपरीत of आउटसोर्सिंग is पुकारा insourcing, which entails bringing processes handled by third-party firms in-house, and is sometimes accomplished via vertical integration.
However, a business can provide a contract service to another business without necessarily insourcing कि कारोबार process.
Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that causes acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ( AIDS ), a condition in humans in which progressive failure of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive.
Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood, semen, vaginal द्रव, pre-ejaculate, or breast milk.
Within these bodily fluids, HIV is उपस्थित as दोनो free virus particles and virus within infected immune cells.
HIV infects vital cells in the human प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली ऐसे as हेल्पर t कोशिकाएं ( specifically cd4 + T cells ), macrophages, and dendritic cells.
HIV infection leads to low levels of CD4+ T cells through a number of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander cells, direct viral हत्या of संक्रमित कोशिकाएं, और हत्या of infected CD4+ T cells by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes that recognize infected cells.
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline below a critical level, cell-mediated immunity is lost, and the देह becomes progressively more susceptible to opportunistic infections.
The firepole in a fire स्टेशन in टोरंटो
A fireman 's pole ( भी पुकारा a स्लाइडिंग ध्रुव or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal tube or pipe installed between floors in fire stations, allowing firefighters responding to an alarm to quickly descend to the ground floor faster than by using a standard staircase.
The device was invented in the 1870s by David Kenyon, in Chicago, Illinois, although it is often incorrectly credited to the बोस्टन आग विभाग.
Mary Poppins is the title अक्षर of a श्रेणी of children 's books written by P. L. Travers.
Throughout the Mary Poppins series, which lasted from 1934 to 1988, Mary Shepard was the इलस्ट्रेटर और acted as a दूसरी author.
The books centre on a जादुई अंग्रेज़ी nanny, Mary Poppins.
She is blown by the East wind to Number Seventeen Cherry Tree Lane, London, and into the Banks ' household to परवाह लिये their children.
Encounters with chimney sweeps, shopkeepers and various adventures follow until मरियम poppins abruptly पत्ते, i.e., `` pops-out ''.
The adventures take place over a कुल of eight books.
However, only the first three books विशेषता मरियम poppins arriving and leaving.
The बाद पाँच किताबे recount previously unrecorded adventures from her original three visits.
As P. L. Travers explains in her introduction to Mary Poppins in the पार्क, `` वो can not forever arrive and depart. ''
The books were adapted in 1964 into a musical Disney film starring Julie Andrews and Dick Van Dyke.
In 2004, Disney Theatrical produced a stage musical adaptation in the वेस्ट समाप्त थिएटर.
The stage musical थी transferred to ब्रॉडवे in 2006 where it ran until its closing on March 3, 2013.
It has been highly कामयाब, as थी the 1964 film.
The Last Song is a 2010 American coming of age teen romantic drama film विकसित alongside Nicholas Sparks ' novel by the same name.
The film was directed by Julie Anne Robinson in her feature फिल्मी directorial डेब्यू and co-written by Sparks and Jeff Van Wie.
The Last Song stars Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth, and ग्रेग kinnear और फ़ॉलो a troubled किशोरावस्था as वो reconnects with her estranged father and falls in love during a summer in a quiet Southern United States beach town.
The film is distributed by touchstone Pictures.
Sparks was approached to write both the film 's पटकथा and the novel.
Sparks completed the screenplay in January 2009, prior to the पूर्णता of the novel, making The Last Song his first script to be optioned for film.
The setting, originally in North Carolina like the novel, moved to जॉर्जिया बाद the राज्य था campaigned लिये months to host production.
Upon beginning उत्पादन in Tybee Island, Georgia and nearby Savannah, The Last Song became the first movie to be both shot and set in Tybee Island.
Filming lasted from June 15 to August 18, 2009 with much of it occurring on the द्वीप 's beach and pier.
The Last Song was originally scheduled for wide release on जनवरी 8, 2010, लकिन was postponed to March 31, 2010.
Written simlish
Simlish is a fictional भाषा प्रदर्शित in EA Games ' Sim series of games.
It debuted in SimCopter, and has been especially prominent in The Sims, the Sims 2 and The Sims 3.
The सीम विकास टोली निर्मित the unique Simlish language by experimenting with fractured Ukrainian, French, Latin, Finnish, English, Fijian, Cebuano, and Tagalog.
Simlish can also be heard in simcity 4, simcity समाजों और simcity 2013, but far less frequently.
Civilized Creatures in spore can also be taught to speak Simlish.
It is भी प्रदर्शित to an extent in Firaxis Games ' Sid Meier 's SimGolf.
Designer Will Wright was conscious of the need for dialogue in the game, but thought that using a real language would make it sound too repetitive and होता भी be too costly to hire translators for world languages.
Initially, inspired by the Native American code talkers of World War II, Sims creator Will Wright and language expert Marc gimbel सुझाया experimenting साथ the Navajo language to create Simlish.
However, they ultimately decided that Simlish worked best as a `` language '' made up of gibberish शब्द कि could n't be translated, so that its meaning would be left open to the imagination of the player.
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense भाषा '' turned आउट to be the सही विकास चुनाव, as people were capable of imagining it more realistically than a computer could simulate a real one.
The actual sound of Simlish was created improvisationally by voice actors Stephen kearin और gerri lawlor.
An example of अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण ( UT ) on blade roots of a V2500 IAE aircraft engine.
Step 1 : The UT जांच is लगाई on the रूट of the ब्लेड to be inspected with the help of a special borescope tool ( video probe ).
कदम 2 : Instrument settings are input.
Step 3 : The जांच is scanned over the blade root.
In this case, an indication ( peak in the data ) through the red line ( or फाटक ) indicates a शुभ ब्लेड ; an indication to the left of that range indicates a crack.
principle of ultrasonic testing.
LEFT : A probe sends a sound वेव into a परीक्षण material.
There are two indications, one from the आरंभिक पल्स of the जांच, और the second due to the back wall echo.
RIGHT : A defect creates a तीसरा indication और simultaneously reduces the amplitude of the back wall indication.
The depth of the defect is संकल्पित by the ratio D/E
In ultrasonic परीक्षण ( ut ), बहुत छोटी अल्ट्रासोनिक pulse-waves with center frequencies ranging from 0.1-15 MHz and occasionally up to 50 MHz are launched into materials to detect internal flaws or to characterize materials.
A common example is ultrasonic thickness measurement, which tests the thickness of the test ऑब्जेक्ट, लिये उदाहरण, to मॉनिटर pipework corrosion.
Ultrasonic testing is often performed on स्टील और अन्य धातुओं और alloys, हालांकि it can also be used on concrete, wood and composites, albeit with less resolution.
It is a form of non-destructive परीक्षण प्रयुक्त in many industries including aerospace, automotive and other transportation sectors.
The vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ), also called ductus deferens ( लैटिन : `` carrying-away vessel '' ; plural : ductus deferentes ), is part of the male anatomy of many vertebrates ; they transport sperm from the epididymis in anticipation of ejaculation.
