In medicine, ischemia, also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia, ( ; from Greek language ισχαιμία, ischaimía ; isch- root denoting a restriction or thinning or to make or grow thin/lean, haema blood ) is a restriction in blood supply to tissues, causing a shortage of ऑक्सीजन और ग्लूकोज needed for cellular metabolism ( to keep tissue alive ).
Ischemia is generally caused by समस्याएं साथ रक्त बरतन, with resultant damage to or dysfunction of tissue.
It भी अर्थात् लोकल रक्ताल्पता in a दिए भाग of a देह sometimes resulting from congestion ( such as vasoconstriction, thrombosis or embolism ).
Down syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome, also known as trisomy 21, is a genetic disorder caused by the उपस्थिति of सब or भाग of a third copy of chromosome 21.
Down syndrome is the सबसे आम chromosome तबदीली in humans.
It is typically associated with a delay in संज्ञानात्मक क्षमता ( दिमागी retardation, or mr ) और शारीरिक विकास, और a particular set of facial characteristics.
the average IQ of young adults with Down syndrome is around 50, whereas young adults without the condition typically have an IQ of 100.
( MR has historically been defined as an IQ नीचे 70. )
A large proportion of individuals with bas सिंड्रोम have a severe degree of intellectual disability.
Down syndrome is named after John Langdon Down, the British physician who described the सिंड्रोम in 1866.
The condition was clinically described earlier by Jean Etienne dominique esquirol in 1838 and Edouard Seguin in 1844.
Down syndrome was identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy by dr. jérôme lejeune in 1959.
Down syndrome can be identified in a baby at जनम or पहले जनम by prenatal स्क्रीनिंग.
pregnancies साथ इस diagnosis are often terminated.
The CDC estimates that about one of every 691 babies born in the संयुक्त राज्य प्रत्येक साल is born साथ Down syndrome.
Many children with Down syndrome are शिक्षित in नियमित स्कूल वर्ग while others require specialised educational facilities.
Some children graduate from high school, and, in the US, there are increasing अवसर लिये participating in post-secondary education.
Education and proper care has been shown to improve विशेषता of जीवन significantly.
Many adults with Down Syndrome are able to कार्य at सशुल्क नियुक्ति in the जातियाँ, while others require a more sheltered work environment.
Hot flashes ( also known as hot flushes, or रात्रि sweats if वे happen at night ) are a symptom which may have several other causes, but which is often caused by the changing hormone levels that are characteristic of menopause.
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L. 78-346, 58 Stat. 284m ), known informally as the g.i. विधेयक, थी a विधि कि provided a दायरा of लाभ लिये returning World War II veterans ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ).
Benefits included low-cost mortgages, low-interest लोन to प्रारंभ a कारोबार or फार्म, नकदी भुगतान of tuition and living expenses to attend college, high school or vocational education, as well as one year of unemployment compensation.
It was available to every veteran who had been on क्रियाशील ड्यूटी दौरान the युद्ध सालो लिये at तनिक नब्बे दिनों और था not been dishonorably discharged ; combat was not required.
By the end of the program in 1956, roughly 2.2 million veterans had used the G.I. Bill education benefits in order to attend colleges or universities, and an additional 6.6 million प्रयुक्त ये लाभ लिये कुछ दयालु of प्रशिक्षण program.
Since the original 1944 law, the term has come to include other veteran लाभ कार्यक्रम निर्मित to assist दिग्गजों of subsequent युद्धों as well as peacetime service.
Historians and economists consider the G.I. Bill a major political success—especially in contrast to the उपचार of संसार युद्ध i veterans—and a प्रमुख योगदान to America 's stock of human capital that sped long-term economic growth.
The Watergate scandal was a political scandal कि occurred in the संयुक्त राज्य in the 1970s as a परिणाम of the जून 17, 1972 break-in at the Democratic National Committee headquarters at the Watergate office complex in Washington, D.C., and the Nixon administration 's attempted cover-up of its involvement.
The scandal eventually led to the resignation of Richard Nixon, the President of the United States, on अगस्त 9, 1974 — the तभी इस्तीफा of a U.S. President.
The scandal also resulted in the indictment, trial, conviction, and incarceration of forty-three व्यक्तियों, dozens of whom were Nixon 's top administration officials.
The affair began with the arrest of five men for breaking and entering into the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल कमेटी ( DNC ) headquarters at the Watergate complex on June 17, 1972.
The Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) connected cash found on the burglars to a slush fund used by the कमेटी लिये the re-election of the President, the official organization of Nixon 's campaign.
In July 1973, as evidence mounted against the president 's staff, including testimony provided by former staff members in an investigation conducted by the Senate Watergate Committee, it थी नाज़िल कि अध्यक्ष निक्सन था a tape-recording प्रणाली in his offices and he had recorded many conversations.
Recordings from these tapes implicated the president, revealing he had attempted to cover up the questionable ( and illegal ) goings-on that had taken प्लेस दौरान उसके administration, both before and after the break-in.
After a protracted series of bitter court battles, the U.S. Supreme Court unanimously शासित कि the अध्यक्ष था to हाथ over the टेपों to government investigators ; he ultimately complied.
Facing near-certain महाभियोग in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि and a strong possibility of a conviction in the Senate, Nixon resigned the presidency on August 9, 1974.
His successor, जेराल्ड घाट, तब issued a pardon to him.
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly lansing और स्पेंसर ) is a fictional character on the ABC Daytime soap opera General Hospital.
Elizabeth is the granddaughter of Dr. Steve Hardy ( जॉन beradino ), one of the originating core characters of the series.
Rebecca herbst originated the अक्षर on अगस्त 1, 1997 and has been the only contract actress to play the role.
Elizabeth is part of two supercouple pairings, Lucky Spencer and Elizabeth Webber and Jason Morgan and Elizabeth Webber.
The United States presidency of रोनाल्ड reagan, भी ज्ञात as the reagan प्रशासन, was a Republican administration headed by Ronald Reagan from January 20, 1981, to January 20, 1989.
Domestically, the administration favored reducing government कार्यक्रम और introduced the largest across-the-board tax cuts in American history.
The economic policies enacted in 1981, ज्ञात as `` Reaganomics ``, were an example of supply-side economics.
Reagan aimed to encourage entrepreneurship and limit the growth of social spending, as well as the reduction of विनियमन और महंगाई.
Economic विकास देखी a दमदार recovery in the 1980s, helping Reagan to win a landslide re-election.
The national कर्ज़ increased significantly, however.
Regarding foreign policy, the administration was steadfastly anti-communist, calling the Soviet संघ an `` दुष्ट empire `` and ending 1970s détente.
Reagan accelerated the massive buildup of the military started by his predecessor, including an invasion of Grenada, the पहला प्रमुख विदेशी कार्रवाई by U.S. troops since the end of the Vietnam War.
The `` Reagan Doctrine `` controversially granted aid to paramilitary forces seeking to overthrow communist governments, particularly in war-torn Central अमेरिका और अफगानिस्तान.
Reagan भी प्रचारित नई technologies ऐसे as मिसाइल defense systems in order to confront the Soviets and their allies.
In diplomacy, Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher, and he met with Soviet General Secretary मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव चार टाइम्स, aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals.
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` reagan क्रान्ति '', or the आयु of reagan in recognition of the political realignment both within and beyond the U.S. in favor of his brand of conservatism and his faith in free markets.
The Reagan administration worked toward the पतन of सोवियत Communism, and it did collapse just as he left office.
Victory in the Cold War led to a unipolar world with the U.S. as the world 's sole superpower.
While the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed several Reagan aides during his second term, Reagan himself left office with a 63 percent स्वीकृति दरजा, एक of the उच्चतर स्वीकृति दरजा of दूँ presidents.
After years of unstinting praise from the right, and unrelenting criticism from the left, historian David Henry finds that by 2009 a consensus था उभरा among विद्वानों कि reagan revived कोसा and turned the nation to the right by demonstrating a `` pragmatic conservatism '' that promoted ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political system.
Furthermore, says Henry, the consensus viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the presidency and American self-confidence, और contributed critically to ending the Cold War.
Crude death rate by country ( 2006 ).
Mortality rate is a measure of the number of deaths ( in general, or due to a विशिष्ट कारण ) in a जनसांख्यिकी.
Scaled to the size of कि जनसांख्यिकी, per unit of time.
Mortality rate is typically expressed in units of deaths per 1000 individuals per year ; thus, a मृत्यु rate of 9.5 ( out of 1000 ) in a population of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population, or 0.95 % out of the total.
It is distinct from morbidity रेट, जिससे refers to the number of individuals in poor health during a given time period ( the prevalence rate ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the disease per unit of time ( incidence rate ).
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately used to refer to the number of deaths among a set of diagnosed hospital मामले लिये a बीमारी or चोट, बल्कि than लिये the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी of a country or ethnic group.
This disease mortality statistic is अधिक precisely referred to as `` case fatality rate `` ( CFR ).
One distinguishes:
The crude death rate, the total number of मौतों प्रति साल per 1000 people.
the crude death rate for the whole world is about 8.37 per 1000 per year according to the वर्तमान सीआईए संसार factbook.
The perinatal मृत्यु रेट, the योग of neonatal deaths and fetal deaths ( stillbirths ) per 1000 births.
The maternal मृत्यु अनुपात, the क्रमांक of मातृ deaths per 100,000 live births in same time period.
The maternal mortality rate, the number of maternal deaths per 1,000 महिलाओं of reproductive आयु in the जनसांख्यिकी ( generally पारिभाषित as 15–44 years of age ).
The infant mortality rate, the number of deaths of children less than 1 year old प्रति 1000 live births.
The child mortality rate, the number of deaths of children less than 5 सालो बूढ़ा प्रति 1000 सजीव births.
The standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) - This represents a proportional comparison to the numbers of deaths that would have महरूम अपेक्षित if the जनसांख्यिकी had been of a standard composition in terms of age, gender, etc.
The age-specific mortality rate ( ASMR ) - This refers to the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों per year per 1000 people of a given age ( e.g. age 62 last birthday ).
In regard to the or विफलता of चिकित्सा उपचार or procedures, one would also distinguish:
The early mortality rate, the total number of deaths in the early stages of an ongoing treatment, or in the काल immediately following an treatment.
The late mortality rate, the total number of मौतों in the लेट stages of an ongoing treatment, or a significant length of time after an acute treatment.
Note that the crude मौत रेट as पारिभाषित ऊपर and applied to a whole population can give a misleading impression.
The crude death rate depends on the age ( and gender ) specific मृत्यु दरों और the आयु ( and gender ) distribution of the population.
The number of deaths per 1000 people can be उच्चतर लिये विकसित राष्ट्र than in less-developed देशों, despite जीवन expectancy being higher in developed countries due to standards of health being better.
This happens because developed countries typically have a completely different population age वितरण, साथ a much उच्चतर proportion of पुरानी people, due to both lower recent birth rates and lower mortality rates.
A more complete picture of mortality is given by a life table which shows the mortality rate separately लिये each age.
A life table is जरुरी to दे a शुभ अनुमान of life expectancy.
An otoacoustic emission ( OAE ) is a sound जिससे is उत्पन्न इससे भीतर the inner ear.
Having been predicted by Thomas Gold in 1948, its existence was first demonstrated experimentally by David Kemp in 1978 and otoacoustic emissions have चूंकि महरूम दिखाया to उठता by a क्रमांक of अलग cellular mechanisms within the inner ear.
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear after the inner ear has been damaged, so oaes हैं often used in the laboratory and the clinic as a measure of inner ear health.
Broadly speaking, there are two प्रकार of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( soaes ), which can occur without external stimulation, and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ), which require an evoking stimulus.
Hurricane Tomas was the nineteenth named storm and twelfth hurricane of the 2010 अटलांटिक hurricane season.
Tomas developed from a tropical wave east of the Windward आइलैंड्स on अक्तूबर 29.
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane, it moved through the Windward Islands and passed very near Saint Lucia.
After reaching Category 2 औकात on the Saffir-Simpson scale, Tomas quickly weakened to a tropical storm in the central Caribbean Sea, due to strong wind shear and dry air.
Tomas later regained hurricane status as it reorganized near the windward ड्योढ़ी.
Throughout the hurricane 's path, 71 people are known to have महरूम मारे, 14 of जिसको were in Saint Lucia.
Monetary losses throughout the windward आइलैंड्स यहूद अनुमानित at US $ 588 million, mainly in Saint Lucia.
In the वेक of the तूफ़ान in हैती, flooding intensified an ongoing cholera outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities.
According to a report released in December 2010, 55 people were killed in Cuba and Hispanola, though the distribution of ये fatalities हैं अनजान.
Overall damage from the storm was at तनिक $ 741 लाख.
Victoria जैक्सन ( born अगस्त 2, 1959 ) is an अमरीकी हास्य, अभिनेत्री, satirist, singer and internet blogger best known as a cast member of the NBC television sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992.
She has received attention as a vocal critic of President Barack ओबामा, और is an active participant in the Tea Party movement.
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by heavy reliance on techniques like fragmentation, paradox, and questionable narrators, and is often ( though not exclusively ) defined as a स्टाइल or ट्रेंड जिससे उभरा in the post–world युद्ध II era.
Postmodern works are seen as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध आत्मज्ञान thinking and Modernist approaches to literature.
Postmodern literature, like postmodernism as a whole, tends to resist परिभाषा or वर्गीकरण as a `` movement ''.
बेशक, the अभिसरण of postmodern साहित्य with various modes of critical theory, particularly reader-response and deconstructionist approaches, and the subversions of the implicit contract between author, text and reader by which its works are often characterised, have led to pre-modern fictions such as Cervantes ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy being retrospectively inducted into the fold.
While there is little consensus on the precise characteristics, scope, और महत्व of postmodern साहित्य, as is often the case with artistic movements, postmodern literature is commonly defined in relation to a precursor.
For example, a postmodern literary work tends not to conclude with the neatly tied-up समाप्ति as is प्रायः मिला in modernist literature, but often parodies it.
Postmodern authors tend to celebrate मौका over शिल्प, और further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's authority.
Another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of distinctions between high और कम संस्कृति through the उपयोग of pastiche, the संयोजन of subjects and genres not previously deemed fit for literature.
Enigma is an electronic musical project founded in Germany by माइकल cretu, दाउद fairstein और फ़्रैंक Peterson in 1990.
The Romanian-born Cretu conceived the Enigma project while working in Germany, but based उसके रिकॉर्डिंग स्टुडियो a.r.t. studios in ibiza, स्पेन, इससे the early 1990s until May 2009, where he has recorded all of Enigma 's studio releases to date.
Cretu is both the composer and the निर्माता of the प्रोजेक्ट.
His former wife, pop singer सैंड्रा, प्रायः provided vocals on Enigma tracks.
Jens Gad co-arranged and played गिटार on तीन of the Enigma albums.
Peter Cornelius also contributed to पहेली during the 1990s.
Seven स्टुडियो एल्बम have महरूम produced under the name of the project.
scooby-doo is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड cartoon franchise, comprising several animated television series produced from 1969 to the present day.
the असली series, Scooby-Doo, Where Are You !
, was created for Hanna-Barbera Productions by writers Joe माणिक्य और केन स्पीयर्स in 1969.
इस शनिवार morning कार्टून series featured four teenagers— Fred Jones, Daphne Blake, Velma Dinkley, and Norville `` Shaggy '' Rogers — and their talking brown Great Dane dog named Scooby-Doo, who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural creatures through a series of antics and missteps.
Following the success of the original series, Hanna-Barbera and its successor warner ब्रदर्स. एनिमेशन have उत्पादित numerous follow-up और spin-off एनिमेटेड श्रेणी and several related works, including television specials and telefilms, a line of direct-to-video films, and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films.
Some versions of scooby-doo विशेषता अलग विसंगतियाँ on the दिखाएँ 's अलौकिक theme, and include characters such as Scooby 's cousin Scooby-Dum and nephew Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters.
Scooby-Doo was originally broadcast on सीबीएस इससे 1969 to 1976, when it moved to ABC.
ABC aired the show until canceling it in 1986, and presented a spin-off featuring the वर्ण as children, a pup नामित scooby-doo, from 1988 until 1991.
Two new Scooby-Doo series, What 's नई, Scooby-Doo ?
and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo Get a a Clue ! ] ], aired as भाग of Kids WB on The WB network and its successor, The CW network, from 2002 until 2008.
The सबसे recent Scooby-Doo series, Scooby-Doo !
Mystery incorporated, aired on Cartoon Network from 2010 to 2013.
Repeats of the various Scooby-Doo series are broadcast frequently on कार्टून संजाल और boomerang in the United States and other countries.
Call of Duty is a first-person and third-person shooter computer/ वीडियो game franchise.
The series began on the pc, और बाद विस्तारित to consoles and handhelds.
Several spin-off games have भी महरूम released.
The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II, this शामिल : कॉल of ड्यूटी, कॉल of ड्यूटी 2, and Call of Duty 3.
Beginning with Modern Warfare, which is set in modern times, the series has shifted focus away from World War II.
Call of Duty 4 : Modern Warfare ( released November 2007 ) was followed by कॉल of ड्यूटी : World at War and Call of Duty : Modern Warfare 2.
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the Cold War, while Modern Warfare 3 ( released November 2011 ) takes place in the near-future setting.
Black Ops 2 ( released नवम्बर 13, 2012 ) takes place in the year 2025.
The Call of Duty games are प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by Activision with Aspyr Media publishing it for Apple OS X.
While the studio Infinity Ward primarily still develops them, Treyarch has भी विकसित several of the titles with the release of the studios ' games interlaced with each other.
Some games have been developed by Gray Matter Interactive, Spark Unlimited, Amaze Entertainment, n-Space, Rebellion Developments, ideaworks खेल स्टुडियो, Sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games.
The games use a variety of engines, including the id तकनीक 3, the treyarch NGL, and the IW 5.0.
Other products in the मताधिकार शामिल a लकीर of action figures designed by Plan-B Toys, a card game created by Upper Deck, and a comic book mini-series published by WildStorm.
As of November 11, 2011, the Call Of Duty series have sold over 100 million नक़ल.
As of March 31, 2012 there are 40 million monthly active players across all of the Call of Duty titles, with 10 million Call of Duty : Elite users and 2 million paying annual members.
Over 1.6 billion hours of online gameplay have been logged Modern warfare 3 चूंकि इसके 2011 रिलीज.
The estate tax in the United States is a tax imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person, whether such property is transferred via a will, according to the state laws of intestacy or otherwise made as an incident of the death of the owner, such as a transfer of प्रॉपर्टी इससे an intestate एस्टेट or विश्वास, or the भुगतान of निश्चित जीवन बीमे लाभ or वित्तीय account sums to beneficiaries.
The estate tax is एक भाग of the एकीकृत Gift and Estate Tax system in the United States.
The other part of the प्रणाली, the तोहफा कर, imposes a कर on transfers of property during a person 's life ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate tax should a person want to give away his/her estate.
In addition to the federal सरकारी, अनेक राज्य also impose an estate tax, with the state version called either an estate tax or an inheritance tax.
Opponents of the estate tax call it the `` मौत कर ''.
If an एसेट is left to a spouse or a Federally recognized charity, the tax usually does not apply.
In addition, up to $ 5,250,000 can be दिए by an व्यक्तिगत, before and/or upon their death, without incurring federal gift or estate taxes.
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is an English actor and musician, known as the सीसे सिंगर and rhythm guitarist of the rock band Bush.
Following Bush 's separation in 2002, which lasted for eight years, he was the lead singer and guitarist for संस्थान, और बाद began a solo career.
When performing solo, गेविन plays गीतों इससे उसके extensive musical libraries.
rossdale रै been ranked in the Top 100 Heavy Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader ( # 75 ).
Raffaello Sanzio da Urbino ( April 6 or March 28, 1483 – April 6, 1520 ), better known simply as राफेल, थी an इतालवी चित्रकार और वास्तु of the High Renaissance.
His work is admired for its clarity of form and ease of composition and for its visual उपलब्धि of the neoplatonic ideal of human grandeur.
Together with Michelangelo and Leonardo da Vinci, he forms the traditional trinity of great masters of कि काल.
Raphael was enormously productive, running an unusually large workshop, और despite उसके मौत at 37, a विशाल देह of उसके work remains.
अनेक of उसके works हैं मिला in the वेटिकन राजमहल, जहाँ the frescoed Raphael Rooms were the central, and the largest, work of his career.
The best known work is The School of Athens in the वेटिकन stanza देला segnatura.
After his early years in Rome much of his work was self-designed, but लिये the सबसे भाग चलाया by the workshop from his drawings, with considerable loss of quality.
He was extremely influential in his lifetime, though outside Rome his work थी ज़्यादातर ज्ञात इससे उसके collaborative printmaking.
After his death, the influence of his great rival Michelangelo was more widespread until the 18th and 19th centuries, when Raphael 's अधिक निर्मल और समन्वयात्मक qualities were again regarded as the highest models.
His career falls naturally into three phases and three styles, first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria, then a काल of परिचय चार सालो ( इससे 1504–1508 ) absorbing the कलाकारी परंपराओं of फ्लोरेंस, followed by his last hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome, working for two Popes and their close associates.
Julia Fiona Roberts ( born अक्तूबर 28, 1967 ) is an American actress.
She became a Hollywood star after headlining the romantic कॉमेडी pretty स्त्री ( 1990 ), जिससे grossed $ 464 लाख विश्वव्यापी.
After receiving Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार और अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) and Pretty Woman, she won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ).
Her films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ), My Best Friend 's Wedding ( 1997 ), Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ), Notting Hill ( 1999 ), Runaway Bride ( 1999 ), Ocean 's ग्यारह ( 2001 ), समंदर 's बारह ( 2004 ), चार्ली विल्सन 's युद्ध ( 2007 ), वेलेंटाइन 's दिन ( 2010 ), खा दुवा Love ( 2010 ), and Mirror Mirror ( 2012 ) have collectively brought box office receipts of over $ 2.6 billion, making her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts.
Roberts had become one of the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in the संसार, टॉपिंग The Hollywood Reporters annual `` power list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006.
Her fee for 1990 's Pretty Woman was $ 300,000 ; in 2003, she was सशुल्क an unprecedented $ 25 million for her role in Mona Lisa Smile ( 2003 ).
As of 2010, Roberts 's net worth was अनुमानित to be $ 140 million.
Roberts has been named one of People magazine 's `` 50 Most Beautiful People in the World '' ग्यारह टाइम्स, tied with Halle Berry.
In 2011, she was नामित एक of the `` 100 hottest Women of All-Time '' by Men 's Health.
In 2001, Ladies Home Journal ranked her as the 11th सबसे शक्तिशाली स्त्री in the United States.
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg ( born May 14, 1984 ) is an अमरीकी कंप्यूटर प्रोग्रामर और अंतरजाल उद्योगों.
He is best known as one of five co-founders of the सोशल networking website Facebook.
As of April 2013, Zuckerberg is the chairman and chief executive of Facebook, Inc. and in 2013 उसके निजी माल थी अनुमानित to be US $ 13.3 billion.
Together with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin moskovitz और क्रिस Hughes, Zuckerberg launched Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory rooms.
The group then introduced Facebook onto other campuses nationwide and moved to Palo आल्टो, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards.
In 2007, at the age of twenty-three years, Zuckerberg became a billionaire as a result of Facebook and the number of फेसबुक उपयोक्ता विश्वव्यापी पहुँचे a कुल of one billion in 2012.
Zuckerberg was involved in विभिन्न विधिक विवादों कि यहूद initiated by अन्य in the समूह, who claimed a share of the company based upon their involvement during the development phase of Facebook.
Since 2010, Zuckerberg has been named among the 100 wealthiest and most influential people in the संसार by समय पत्रिका as a भाग of its Person of the Year accolade.
Zuckerberg was played by actor Jesse Eisenberg in the 2010 Hollywood film The सोशल संजाल in जिससे the rise of Facebook is portrayed.
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों, सहित a core group of Separatists, to New England.
Their story is one of travail and अस्तित्व in a हर्ष New World environment.

Committee of Ways and Means is the chief tax -writing committee of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
Members of the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on कोई अन्य House Committees unless they apply for a waiver from their party 's congressional leadership.
The Committee has jurisdiction over all taxation, tariffs and other revenue-raising उपायों, as well as a number of other programs including:
Social सुरक्षा
Unemployment लाभ
medicare
प्रवर्तन of चाइल्ड support laws
Temporary Assistance for Needy परिवारों, a संघीय welfare program
फोस्टर परवाह and adoption programs
The u.S. संविधान requires that all bills regarding taxation must originate in the House of Representatives.
Since House procedure is that all bills regarding taxation must go through this committee, the committee is very influential, as is its सीनेट बंटवारा, the u.S. सीनेट कमेटी on Finance.
The Ways and Means Committee in the 111th Congress was chaired by Charlie Rangel, who had taken a leave of absence as chairman until House ethics violations were resolved.
However, his leave of absence as chairman was शासित to be a इस्तीफा.
Pete Stark resigned as एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, so Sander Levin held that position until the start of the 112th Congress.
डेव शिविर became the कमेटी chair for the 112th Congress, after the Republicans won control of the House in the 2010 election.
The blue whale ( Balaenoptera musculus ) is a marine mammal belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( called Mysticeti ).
At in length and or more in weight, it is the largest ज्ञात एनिमल to have ever existed.
Long and slender, the blue whale 's body can be various shades of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat lighter underneath.
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the उत्तर अटलांटिक और उत्तर प्रशांत, B. m. intermedia of the दक्षिणी समंदर और B. m. brevicauda ( also known as the pygmy blue whale ) found in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean.
B. m. इंडिका, मिला in the Indian Ocean, may be another subspecies.
As with other baleen whales, its diet consists almost exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill.
Blue whales were abundant in nearly सब the महासागर on धरती until the beginning of the twentieth century.
For over a century, they were hunted almost to extinction by whalers जबतक सुरक्षित by the international community in 1966.
A 2002 report अनुमानित वहीँ यहूद 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales worldwide, located in at least five groups.
More recent research into the Pygmy subspecies suggests this may be an underestimate.
Before whaling, the largest population was in the अंटार्कटिक, क्रमांकन approximately 239,000 ( range 202,000 to 311,000 ).
There remain only much smaller ( around 2,000 ) concentrations in each of the eastern North Pacific, अंटार्कटिक, और भारतीय समंदर समूह.
There are two more groups in the North Atlantic, and at least two in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध.
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a किस्में of a species of thistle cultivated as a food.
the खाद्य पदार्थ is buds that form within the flower heads before the flowers come into bloom.
The buds go away or बदलें to a coarse, मुश्किल खाद्य रूप when the flower blooms.
The uncultivated or wild किस्में of the species is called a cardoon.
It is a बारहमासी संयंत्र देशी to the Mediterranean region.
The United States one hundred-dollar bill ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त राज्य करेंसी.
U.S. statesman, inventor, and diplomat Benjamin Franklin is currently प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the bill.
On the reverse of the banknote is an चित्र of स्वतंत्रता Hall.
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has महरूम मुद्रित चूंकि जुलाई 13, 1969, जब the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 were retired.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the औसत जीवन of a $ 100 bill in circulation is 90 months ( 7.5 years ) before it is replaced due to wear and tear.
The bills are also commonly referred to as `` Benjamins '', in reference to the use of Benjamin Franklin 's portrait on the denomination, or `` c-notes '', आधारित on the रोमन numeral for 100.
the विधेयक is एक of दो denominations मुद्रित आज कि does not feature a President of the United States ; the other is the $ 10 bill, featuring Alexander Hamilton.
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the reverse, according to the u.S. ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और Printing, shows approximately 4:10.
One hundred hundred-dollar बिल्स हैं वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित Banks in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled on April 21, 2010, and was to be issued to the public on February 11, 2011, लकिन उत्पादन थी shut bas in दिसम्बर 2010 क्युकी as many as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw.
A vertical crease in the paper reveals a blank space on the विधेयक जब खींचा out.
In their बदलना, और continuing the ऊँची माँग of इस denomination, the Series 2006A was launched retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ).
On April 24, 2013, the Federal Reserve घोषित the नई $ 100 विधेयक होता enter circulation on October 8, 2013.
King David in robes of a बीज़ान्टिन emperor.
miniature from the Paris Psalter.
David ( ; ISO 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : Daveed ) according to the Hebrew बाइबल, थी the दूसरी किंग of the United Kingdom of Israel, and according to the New Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke, an ancestor of Jesus.
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE, his reign over Judah c. 1010–1002 bce, और उसके शासनकाल over the संयुक्त किंगडम of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE.
the किताबे of सैमुएल, 1 किंग्स, और 1 क्रॉनिकल्स हैं the तभी स्त्रोत of सूचना on दाउद, although the Tel Dan stele ( dated c. 850–835 BCE ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), read as `` House of David '', which most scholars take as confirmation of the existence in the mid-9th century BCE of a Judean royal dynasty called the House of David.
He is depicted as a righteous king, although not without faults, as well as an acclaimed warrior, musician, and poet, traditionally credited for composing many of the psalms contained in the किताब of ज़बूर.
David is central to Jewish, ईसाई, और इस्लामी doctrine and culture.
Biblical tradition maintains that a direct descendant of David will be the मसीहा.
In Islam he is माना to be a prophet and the king of a nation.
Kathmandu ( ; ) is the capital and largest urban agglomerate of नेपाल.
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu महानगर City at its core, and its sister cities Patan, Kirtipur, Thimi, and Bhaktapur.
It also includes the recently recognized urban areas of Shankhapur, karyabinayak, and Champapur.
Banepa, Dhulikhel, and Panauti are satellite urban areas of Kathmandu स्तिथ बस बाहर the काठमांडू valley.
Kathmandu is also known informally as `` KTM '' or the `` tri-city ''.
According to a census conducted in 2011, Kathmandu metropolis alone has 975,453 निवासियों ; और the agglomerate रै a जनसांख्यिकी of अधिक than 2.5 लाख inhabitants.
The महानगर city area is and has a population density of 19,250 per km2.
The city stands at an elevation of लगभग in the bowl-shaped Kathmandu Valley of central Nepal.
It is surrounded by चार प्रमुख kyu : shivapuri, phulchoki, Nagarjun, and Chandragiri.
काठमांडू घाटी is भाग of तीन districts ( Kathmandu, Lalitpur, and Bhaktapur ), has the highest population density in the country, and is home to about a twelfth of Nepal 's population.
During Rana and Shah eras, the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the काठमांडू घाटी ; it थी कया लोगों जो जिया बाहर the valley called it.
During this period, अंग्रेजों इतिहासकारों called the valley itself `` Nepal Proper ''.
Today, काठमांडू is नहीं तभी the पूंजी of the संघीय Democratic Republic of Nepal, but also the headquarters of the Central Development Region of Nepal.
The Central प्रदेश comprises तीन zones : Bagmati, Narayani, and Janakpur.
Kathmandu is स्तिथ in the Bagmati Zone.
Kathmandu is the gateway to पर्यटन in नेपाल.
It is भी the तंत्रिका center of the country 's economy.
It has the most advanced infrastructure of any urban area in Nepal, and its economy is focused on tourism, which accounted लिये 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96.
( Tourism in Kathmandu declined thereafter दौरान a काल of राजनैतिक unrest, but since then has improved. )
The नगर रै a समृद्ध इतिहास, spanning nearly 2000 years, as inferred from inscriptions found in the valley.
Religious and cultural festivities रूप a प्रमुख भाग of the जीवनदान of लोगों residing in Kathmandu.
Most of Kathmandu 's people follow Hinduism and अनेक अन्य follow Buddhism.
There are people of other religious beliefs as well, giving काठमांडू a cosmopolitan culture.
Nepali is the सबसे commonly spoken language in the city.
Nepal Bhasa is the स्वदेशी भाषा spoken by the Newar people.
Hindi is widely समझा और अंग्रेज़ी is understood by Kathmandu 's educated residents.
The city 's literacy रेट is 98 %.
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural heritage, tourism industry, and economy ; therefore UNESCO 's World Heritage Site lists all three cities ' monuments and attractions together under one heading, `` Kathmandu Valley- UNESCO World Heritage Site ``.
Field hockey, usually referred to simply as hockey, is a team sport of the hockey family which is played between two टीमों of ग्यारह खिलाड़ी साथ हॉकी sticks और a hard, solid plastic ball.
At the turn of the 21st century, the game is played globally, with particular popularity throughout Europe, Asia, Oceania, and South America – in addition to होने the नेशनल खेल of Pakistan and India.
The term `` field hockey '' is used primarily in Canada, the United राज्य, और अन्य regions of the संसार जहाँ the खेल of ice hockey is more popular.
During play, goal keepers are the only players who are allowed to touch the ball साथ कोई भाग of their body ( with the exception of a player 's hand considered 'part of the stick ' ), with this only applying within the shooting circle ( also known as the D, or shooting arc, or just the circle ), while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick.
The team that scores the सबसे लक्ष्य by the end of the match wins.
If the score is tied at the end of the game, either a चित्रण is घोषित or the खेल goes into extra time and/or a penalty shootout, depending on the competition 's format.
The governing body of hockey is the International Hockey Federation ( FIH ), with men and women being represented internationally in competitions including the Olympic games, Commonwealth games, Hockey World Cup, Champions Trophy and Junior Hockey World Cup, with many countries running extensive जूनियर, वरिष्ठ, और मास्टर्स ' क्लबों प्रतियोगिताओं.
The FIH is also responsible for organising the Hockey Rules फलक और विकासशील the नियम लिये the sport.
A लोकप्रिय रूपांतर of field hockey is indoor hockey, which differs in a number of respects while embodying the primary principles of hockey.
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side रूपांतर, with a field which is reduced to approximately 40m × 20m.
With many of the rules remaining the same, including obstruction and feet, there are several key variations - Players may not raise the ball unless shooting on goal, players may not hit the ball ( instead utilising pushes to transfer the ball ), and the sidelines हैं replaced साथ ठोस बाधाओं जिससे the बॉल होगा rebound बंद.
Ethan `` Cane '' Ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional character from the American CBS soap ओपेरा the यंग और the बेचैन.
He is portrayed by Australian actor Daniel Goddard, who originally auditioned लिये ब्रैड स्नाइडर on as the World Turns but was recommended for a role on The Young and the Restless instead.
The role was to be portrayed as an American, but Goddard 's Australian descent influenced the अक्षर 's पृष्ठभूमि.
Former head writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced उसे दौरान the episode airing on January 12, 2007 as an Australian bartender in search of his family, a debut that received a mixed response.
Latham created Cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly rhodes ) और jill फोस्टर एबॉट ( जेस वाल्टन ) लकिन the अक्षर 's पृष्ठभूमि was rewritten by Maria Arena Bell in 2009, reestablishing him as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie Francis ).
हालांकि characterized as `` रहस्यमय '', Cane is `` loyal and dedicated '', while Goddard described the character as a `` typical Australian, working-class kind of guy ''.
He was the first member of the एटकिन्सन परिवार to appear on the श्रेणी, followed by his parents and identical twin brother.
Soon after his debut, he became a अग्रणी character, a decision praised by viewers and critics.
The character has been involved with Amber Moore ( Adrienne Frantz ), Chloe Mitchell ( Elizabeth Hendrickson ) and most notably Lily Winters ( Christel Khalil ), a रोमांस कि garnered significant fan attention.
In 2009, Cane and Lily were married ; Global BC would later call Lily the love of Cane 's life.
The pair था दो children, Charlie and Mattie Ashby.
In 2011, the कर्ता थी fired, and Cane was shot to death onscreen.
However, Goddard was rehired soon after viewers campaigned for his return, revealing that cane 's एकसमान जुड़वा bhai थी in फैक्ट the man who died.
This sacrificed his marriage to Lily, but the युगल यहूद remarried on Valentine 's Day in 2012.
Goddard has been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; Canyon News said that he portrays the अक्षर honestly, और is `` सदा dependable, on fire and exciting ''.
John क्रिस्टोफर `` जॉनी '' Depp II ( born June 9, 1963 ) is an American actor, film producer, and musician.
He has won the Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार और स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं Guild award for Best Actor.
Depp rose to prominence on the 1980s टेलीविज़न series 21 Jump Street, becoming a teen idol.
Dissatisfied with that status, Depp turned to film for more challenging roles ; he played the title character of the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and later found box office success in films such as Sleepy Hollow ( 1999 ), Charlie and the चॉकलेट फैक्टरी ( 2005 ), ऐलिस in वंडरलैंड ( 2010 ), Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ).
He has collaborated with director and dost टिम बर्टन in आठ films ; the most recent being Dark Shadows ( 2012 ).
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood, Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco, Hunter S. Thompson in Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, George Jung in Blow, and the bank डाकू जॉन dillinger in माइकल मन 's पब्लिक Enemies.
Films featuring Depp have grossed over $ 3.1 billion at the संयुक्त राज्य बक्सा दफ्तर और over $ 7.6 billion worldwide.
He has been nominated for top awards many times, winning the Best Actor Awards from the Golden –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy Globes –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy for Sweeney Todd : The Demon Barber of Fleet Street and from the Screen Actors Guild for Pirates of the Caribbean : The Curse of the Black Pearl.
He also has garnered a sex symbol status in American cinema, being twice named as the `` Sexiest Man Alive `` by लोगों पत्रिका in 2003 और 2009.
He has been listed in the 2012 Guinness Book of World Records as the उच्चतम सशुल्क कर्ता, साथ $ 75 लाख.
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3, commonly known as the web ), is a प्रणाली of interlinked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़ पहुँचा via the अंतरजाल.
With a web browser, one can दृश्य वेब पृष्ठों कि may contain text, images, videos, and other multimedia, and navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his पहले हाइपरटेक्स्ट प्रणालियों जैसे enquire, अंग्रेजों इंजीनियर, कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक और at कि time employee of the CERN, Sir Tim Berners-Lee, now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ), wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, Berners-Lee and belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '', and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year.
Mark Travis John Sanchez ( born नवम्बर 11, 1986 ) is an अमरीकी football quarterback for the New York Jets of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was drafted in the first round of the 2009 NFL Draft as the fifth overall चयन by the jets और the दूसरी क्वार्टरबैक taken overall.
he निभाई कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल at the University of Southern California ( USC ).
Sanchez grew up in a well-disciplined and athletic family.
In the eighth grade, he began to play फ़ुटबॉल और सीख the intricacies of the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति, training with his father, Nick.
A well-regarded prospect, Sanchez committed to Southern California following his successful high स्कूल करियर in जिससे he led उसके टोली to a championship title during his final season.
At USC, Sanchez was relegated as the backup quarterback during his first three years though he rose to prominence due to his brief appearances on the फ़ील्ड in 2007 due to चोटों suffered by starting quarterback John David Booty.
Sanchez also became popular भीतर the जातियाँ due to his Mexican-American heritage.
Named the starter in 2008, Sanchez led USC to a 12–1 record and won the Rose Bowl against Penn State for which Sanchez was awarded the Most Valuable खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार लिये उसके प्रदर्शन on ठोकर.
Although many माना उसे too अनुभवहीन, सांचेज़ announced his intention to enter the 2009 NFL Draft.
He was selected by the Jets after they traded up with the Cleveland Browns, and was named the starting क्वार्टरबैक prior to the प्रारंभ of the season.
Despite a subpar performance, Sanchez led the Jets to the AFC Championship Game, a losing effort to the Indianapolis Colts, बनने the चौथी रुकी quarterback in NFL history to win his first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games.
In his second season, Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second consecutive AFC Championship Game where they narrowly खोया to the पिट्सबर्ग Steelers, 24–19.
With the win over the New England Patriots the week prior, Sanchez tied four other quarterbacks for the दूसरी सबसे post-season सड़क victories by a क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास.
In leading the Jets to two consecutive conference championships, Sanchez joined quarterback Ben roethlisberger as the तभी दो quarterbacks in एनएफएल इतिहास to पहुँचें the सम्मेलन championship in their first two seasons in the league.
The next two seasons would be a regression for both the team and Sanchez as वे विफल to पहुँचें the playoffs.
Fans and media critics called for a struggling Sanchez to be benched.
He eventually was replaced towards the end of the 2012 season with Greg McElroy.
Paul Avery ( April 2, 1934December 10, 2000 ) was an American police reporter, best known for his कहानियां on the infamous सीरियल कातिल known as the Zodiac, and later for his work on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping.
A small submersible AC sump pump with a गार्डन नली connector
A sump pump is a pump used to remove water that रै संचित in a water collecting sump basin, commonly found in the basement of homes.
The water may enter via the perimeter drains of a तहखाने waterproofing system, funneling into the basin or because of rain or natural ground water, if the basement is below the water table level.
Sump pumps are used where basement बाढ़ happens regularly और to उपाय dampness where the water table is above the foundation of a home.
Sump pumps send water away from a हाउस to any place where it is no longer problematic, such as a municipal storm drain or a dry well.
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary sewer in older installations.
Once considered acceptable, this अभ्यास may अभी violate the plumbing code or municipal bylaws, because it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system.
Municipalities urge homeowners to disconnect और reroute sump पंप निर्वहन दूर from sanitary sewers.
Fines may be imposed for noncompliance.
Many homeowners have inherited their sump pump configurations and do not एहसास कि the पंप discharges to the sewer.
If the discharge is fed to a laundry sink in the तहखाने, it 's संभावित going to the sewer.
Usually hardwired into a home 's electrical system, sump पंपों may have a battery backup.
The home 's pressurized जल सप्लाई शक्तियां कुछ पंपों, eliminating the need लिये विद्युत at the व्यय of using potable water, potentially making them more expensive to operate than electrical pumps and creating an additional water disposal problem.
Since a sump basin may overflow if not constantly pumped, a backup system is important for cases when the main power is आउट लिये prolonged अवधि of time, as during a severe storm.
वहीँ हैं generally two types of sump pumps — pedestal and submersible.
The pedestal pump 's motor is mounted above the sump, where it is अधिक easily सर्विस, but is also more conspicuous.
The pump impeller is driven by a long, लंबवत एक्सटेंशन शाफ्ट और the impeller is in a scroll housing in the base of the pump.
The submersible pump is entirely आरोहित अंदर the sump, और is विशेषकर sealed to prevent electrical short circuits.
Sump pump systems are also utilized in industrial and commercial अनुप्रयोग to कंट्रोल जल तालिका -related problems in surface soil.
An artesian aquifer or periodic high water table situation can cause the ground to become अस्थिर due to water saturation.
As long as the पंप functions, the surface soil will remain stable.
These sumps are typically ten feet in depth or more ; lined with corrugated metal pipe that contains perforations or नाली छेद throughout.
They may शामिल इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंट्रोल systems with visual and audible alarms and are usually covered to prevent debris and animals from falling in.
Bleeding कान्सास, खूनी कान्सास or the किनारा युद्ध, थी a श्रेणी of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters and pro-slavery `` Border Ruffian `` elements, that took place in the Kansas Territory and the neighboring towns of Missouri between 1854 and 1861.
At the heart of the विरोध was the question of whether Kansas would enter the Union as a free state or slave state.
As such, Bleeding Kansas was a proxy war between Northerners and southerners over the समस्या of slavery in the United States.
The term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by Horace Greeley of the New York ट्रिब्यून ; the कार्यक्रम it encompasses directly presaged the American Civil War.
Congress had long struggled to संतुलन the interests of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery forces.
The events later known as Bleeding Kansas were set into motion by the kansas–nebraska अधिनियम of 1854, जिससे nullified the Missouri Compromise and instead implemented the concept of popular sovereignty.
An ostensibly democratic idea, popular sovereignty stated that the निवासियों of प्रत्येक territory or राज्य चाहिए decide whether it would be a free or slave state ; however, this resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas by activists from both sides.
At one point, Kansas had two separate governments, each with its own constitution, although only one थी federally पहचाना.
On January 29, 1861, कान्सास थी admitted to the संघ as a free state, less than three months before the Battle of Fort Sumter which began the Civil War.
बेंजीन is an सशुल्क रासायनिक compound with the molecular formula C6 H|Hydrogen|H6.
Its molecule is composed of 6 carbon atoms joined in a रिंग, साथ 1 hydrogen atom attached to each carbon atom.
Because its अणुओं contain तभी कार्बन और हाइड्रोजन अणु, benzene is classed as a hydrocarbon.
Benzene is a natural constituent of crude oil, and is one of the सबसे मौलिक petrochemicals.
Benzene is an aromatic hydrocarbon and the दूसरी [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a cyclic hydrocarbon with a continuous pi bond.
It is sometimes abbreviated ph –h. बेंजीन is a colorless and highly flammable liquid with a sweet smell.
It is mainly used as a precursor to heavy chemicals, such as ethylbenzene and cumene, which are produced on a billion kilogram स्केल.
Because it has a high octane number, it is an important component of gasoline, composing a few प्रतिशत of इसके द्रव्यमान.
Most non-industrial applications have been limited by benzene 's carcinogenicity.
Giovanni Virginio Schiaparelli ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an इतालवी astronomer और विज्ञान historian.
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo 's वी खेल कंसोल to चलाएं तन्त्र कि रै नहीं been authorized by Nintendo.
It achieves this by defeating the वी 's नक़ल protection and code signing measures.
In more general terms, Wii Homebrew refers to the उपयोग of the वी 's हार्डवेयर, accessories and software for purposes outside those intended by the manufacturer.
Original efforts focused on using the वी रिमोट as a इंगित device on other operating systems, or running web-based games in the built-in web browser.
Subsequent developments in games exploits, such as the `` Twilight hack ``, `` Bannerbomb '' and its later incarnation `` LetterBomb '', `` Smash Stack '', `` Indiana Pwns '', `` Yu-Gi-OWNED '', `` bathaxx '', and `` Return of the Jodi '', made installing the `` homebrew चैनल `` possible.
Hadley ( right ) discussing the 2006 israel-lebanon crisis with Bush and Rice.
Stephen John Hadley ( born February 13, 1947 ) was the 21st U.S. Assistant to the President for नेशनल सुरक्षा अफेयर्स ( commonly referred as नेशनल सुरक्षा Advisor ), serving under President George W. Bush.
Take identical growing पौधे and give fertilizer to half of them.
If there are differences between the fertilized plant group and the unfertilized `` control '' समूह, ये मतभेद may be due to the fertilizer.
A scientific control is an experiment or observation designed to minimize the प्रभाव of variables other than the single independent variable.
This increases the विश्वसनीयता of the results, often through a comparison between control measurements and the other measurements.
Scientific controls are a part of the वैज्ञानिक विधि.
For example, during drug testing, वैज्ञानिकों होगा कोशिश to कंट्रोल दो समूह to keep them as identical as possible, then allow one group to try the drug.
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by giving it to only half the plants in a गार्डन : the पौधे कि प्राप्त no उर्वरक हैं the कंट्रोल समूह, क्युकी वे स्थापित the बेसलाइन level of growth that the fertilizer-treated plants will be compared against.
Without a control group, the experiment can not determine whether the fertilizer-treated पौधे grow more than they would have if untreated.
Ideally, all variables in an experiment will be controlled ( accounted for by the control माप ) और none will be uncontrolled.
In such an experiment, if all the controls work as expected, it is possible to conclude that the experiment is working as intended और कि the परिणाम of the प्रयोग हैं due to the effect of the variable being tested.
That is, scientific controls allow an investigator to make a claim like `` Two परिस्थितियों यहूद एकसमान जबतक फ़ैक्टर x occurred.
Since factor X is the only difference between the two परिस्थितियों, the नई outcome was caused by factor X. ''

John Adams ( अक्तूबर 30, 1735 ( o.s. अक्तूबर 19, 1735 ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier served as the first vice president of the United States.
An American Founding Father, he was a statesman, diplomat, and a अग्रणी एडवोकेट of American independence from Great Britain.
Well educated, he was an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism and wrote prolifically about his often seminal ideas, both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the early चरण of the अमरीकी Revolution.
A lawyer and public figure in Boston, as a delegate from मैसाचुसेट्स to the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence.
He assisted थामस जेफरसन in drafting the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in 1776, और थी इसके प्राथमिक एडवोकेट in the कॉंग्रेस.
Later, as a राजनयिक in यूरोपीय, he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with Great Britain, and was responsible for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist और इतिहासकार, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, which together with his earlier Thoughts on Government, influenced American political thought.
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775, he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief, and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States.
एडम्स ' क्रांतिकारी श्रेय secured him two terms as George Washington 's vice president and his own election in 1796 as the second president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious हमले by the jeffersonian republicans, as well as the dominant faction in his own Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton.
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts, and built up the army and navy विशेषकर in the फेस of an undeclared नवल war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of his presidency was his शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition.
In 1800, Adams was defeated for re-election by थामस जेफरसन and retired to Massachusetts.
He बाद resumed his friendship with Jefferson.
He and his बीवी, अबीगैल एडम्स, संस्थापित an संपन्नता family line of politicians, diplomats, and historians now referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams was the father of जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स, the sixth President of the United States.
His achievements have प्राप्त वृहद मान्यता in modern times, though his contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders.
एडम्स थी the पहला u.S. अध्यक्ष to reside in the building that eventually became known as the White House.
A वाट steam engine.
The steam इंजन, fuelled primarily by coal, propelled the Industrial Revolution in Great Britain and the world.
The Industrial Revolution was the transition to नई निर्माण प्रक्रियाओं कि occurred in the period from about 1760 to some time between 1820 and 1840.
This transition included going from hand production methods to machines, new chemical manufacturing and iron उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं, improved efficiency of water power, the increasing use of steam power and development of machine tools.
The transition also included the change इससे लकडी और अन्य bio-fuels to coal.
The Industrial revolution began in Britain and within a few decades स्प्रेड to पश्चिमी यूरोपीय and the United States.
The Industrial Revolution marks a major turning point in history ; almost every पहलू of रोज़ जीवन was influenced in some way.
Most notably, average income and population began to प्रदर्शनी unprecedented sustained growth.
In the शब्द of नोबेल पुरस्कार winner Robert E. Lucas, Jr., `` For the first time in history, the living standards of the masses of ordinary people have begun to undergo sustained growth... Nothing remotely like this economic behavior is mentioned by the classical economists, even as a theoretical possibility. ''
William Bell स्कॉट Iron and Coal, 1855-60
The period of time covered by the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति varies साथ अलग historians.
Eric Hobsbawm held that it 'broke out ' in Britain in the 1780s and was not fully felt जबतक the 1830s or 1840s, जबकि T. S. एश्टन held that it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830.
Some 20th-century historians such as John Clapham and Nicholas Crafts have argued that the प्रक्रम of आर्थिक and social change took place gradually and the term revolution is a misnomer.
This is स्टिल a subject of debate among historians.
GDP per capita was broadly stable before the Industrial क्रान्ति और the emergence of the modern capitalist economy.
The औद्योगिक Revolution began an era of per-capita economic growth in capitalist economies.
आर्थिक इतिहासकारों हैं in अनुबंध that the onset of the Industrial Revolution is the most important event in the history of humanity since the domestication of animals and plants.
The First Industrial Revolution evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the transition years between 1840 and 1870, जब technological और आर्थिक प्रगति gained आवेग साथ the increasing अपनाना of steam-powered नौकाएँ, जहाजों और रेल, the विशाल स्केल manufacture of machine tools and the increasing use of steam powered factories.
जूलियट annmarie huddy ( born सितंबर 27, 1969 ), is an American television news reporter, currently appearing on Fox News Channel.
This list ranks U.S. cities by जमीन क्षेत्रफल ( नहीं including bodies of water ).
Total areas ( including water ) are also given, but note that, जब क्रमित by कुल क्षेत्रफल, a number of coastal cities appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
San Francisco is an extreme उदाहरण ; जल makes up nearly 80 % of इसके total area of 232 square miles ( 601 km2 ).
Note also that in many cases a city may be geographically विशाल primarily क्युकी इसके municipal government has merged with the government of the surrounding county.
In some cases the काउंटी no longer exists, जबकि in अन्य the arrangement has formed a Consolidated city–county ( or city- borough in Alaska, or city- parish in Louisiana ).
These are दिखाया in बिंदास in the सूची below ( but not all examples may be indicated ).
** ये हैं स्वतंत्र cities, meaning they are not a part of any county.
The large intestine ( or bowel, colon ) is the पिछला भाग of the digestive system in vertebrate animals.
Its function is to absorb water from the remaining indigestible खाना पदार्थ, और तब to pass व्यर्थ waste material from the body.
This article is primarily about the human gut, though the information about इसके प्रक्रियाओं हैं सीधे लागू to most mammals.
The large आंत consists of the cecum, rectum and anal canal.
It starts in the right iliac region of the pelvis, just at or below the right waist, जहाँ it is joined to the bottom end of the small intestine.
From here it continues up the abdomen, then across the width of the abdominal cavity, and तब it turns bas, continuing to its endpoint at the anus.
The large intestine is परिचय long, जिससे is परिचय one-fifth of the whole length of the intestinal canal.
In Terminologia Anatomica the large intestine includes the cecum, कोलन, rectum, and anal canal.
However, some sources exclude the गुदा कनाल.
The Green Bay Packers are an American फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
They are members of the North Division of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football लीग ( NFL ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the NFL, having been व्यवस्थित और playing in 1919.
The Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned प्रमुख लीग पेशेवर sports team in the United States.
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small कस्बा टीमों '' कि यहूद एकबार आम in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun, the Green Bay Packers can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध क्लब इससे around Wisconsin and the Midwest.
They joined the American पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ).
Although ग्रीन खाड़ी is the पिछला एनएफएल `` छोटी कस्बा '' team, its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ), including नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ), 1968 ( Super Bowl II ), 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents, the Chicago Bears, मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स and the Detroit Lions.
The bears-packers फंसने is एक of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास, डेटिंग वापस to 1921.
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The Valley '' ) is an urbanized valley located in the Los Angeles महानगर क्षेत्रफल of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त राज्य, defined by the mountains of the Transverse Ranges circling it.
Home to 1.76 लाख लोगों, it lies north of the larger and more populous Los Angeles Basin.
Nearly two thirds of the घाटी 's जमीन क्षेत्रफल is part of the City of Los Angeles.
the अन्य incorporated cities in the valley are Glendale, Burbank, San Fernando, Hidden Hills and Calabasas.

the complex located across Baker Street from Centennial Olympic Park that is घर to the जॉर्जिया Aquarium and future Center for Civil & Human Rights.
It opened to the public on May 24, 2007, relocating इससे और replacing the original exhibit.
Pretties is a 2005 science fiction novel और the दूसरी किताब of the uglies त्रयी लिखा by Scott Westerfeld.
It is set in a भविष्य dystopian संसार in which everyone is turned `` Pretty '' by extreme cosmetic surgery upon reaching age 16.
It tells the story of teenager Tally youngblood जो विद्रोहियों विरूद्ध समाज 's enforced conformity.
Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born सितंबर 26, 1971 ) is an American woman sentenced to life in prison for murdering her children.
Born in Union, South Carolina, and a former student of the University of South Carolina Union, she was convicted on July 22, 1995 for murdering her two sons, 3-year-old माइकल डेनियल स्मिथ, born अक्तूबर 10, 1991, और 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith, born August 5, 1993.
The case gained worldwide ध्यान shortly बाद it विकसित, due to उसके claiming that a black man stole her car and kidnapped her sons.
She later claimed that she suffered from mental health मुद्दे कि impaired her judgment.
According to the दक्षिण कैरोलिना विभाग of Corrections, Smith will be eligible for parole on November 4, 2024, after serving a minimum of thirty years.
She is incarcerated at दक्षिण कैरोलिना 's leath correctional Institution, near Greenwood.
Mount McKinley ( also known as Denali taken from the Inuit Koyukon Athabaskan language meaning `` The Great One '' ) is the highest mountain peak in the United States and in North America साथ a समिट उन्नयन of ऊपर sea level.
At some, the base to peak rise is माना the largest of कोई पहाड़ situated entirely above sea level.
Measured by topographic prominence, it is the third most prominent peak after Mount एवरेस्ट और Aconcagua.
Located in the Alaska Range in the interior of US state of Alaska, it is the centerpiece of denali नेशनल पार्क और बचाना.
The first यूरोपीय to दस्तावेज़ sighting the mountain was George Vancouver in 1794.
In 1903, James Wickersham recorded the first attempt at climbing McKinley जिससे थी unsuccessful.
In 1906, Frederick Cook claimed the first ascent which was later proven to be false.
The first verifiable ascent to McKinley 's summit was achieved on June 7, 1913 by चढना हडसन Stuck, Harry Karstens, Walter Harper, and Robert Tatum.
In 1951, Bradford Washburn pioneered the West Buttress route considered to be the safest और easiest route and therefore the most popular currently in use.
The Honda S600 is an automobile manufactured by Honda.
It was launched in March 1964.
Available as a roadster – bearing strong प्रतिरूप to the होंडा s500 – और as a fastback coupé – introduced in March 1965 – the S600 was the first Honda available in two trim levels.
दौरान इसके उत्पादन चलाएं up to 1966, the मॉडल स्टाइलिंग would remain pretty much the same, with the most notable changes coming to the front grille, bumper, and headlights.
Powered by a DOHC, water-cooled, four-cylinder inline engine with four carburetors, the इंजन क्षमता थी increased to 606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc.
The engine produced at 8,500 आरपीएम और था a शीर्ष गति of.
With the convertible weighing in at mere, the extra sheet मेटल of the कूप तभी added to the overall weight.
Suspension was independent साथ sealed roller chain drive to each rear wheel.
The S600 was the पहला द्रव्यमान marketed Honda car.
First offered only in right-hand drive, it soon became उपलब्धियाँ in left-hand drive to appeal to export markets.
There were a few pre-production s500s manufactured in left hand drive, two or three even being shown in some early sales brochures.
दोनो the s600 roadster और coupé यहूद उपलब्धियाँ in मानक trim और a खास, upgraded पैकेज called the SM600 which included, among other items, special paint colors, exclusive badging, a standard radio and speaker, a special antenna in the passenger side sun visor, standard reversing lights, a standard cigarette lighter, a standard heater, better cushioned seats, and a detachable seat track for quick removal of the passenger seat.
होंडा निर्मित 3,912 roadsters in 1964, with production climbing to 7,261 convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965.
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to the S800 ) with only 111 roadsters and 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles और 1,800 coupes लिये the 3 साल स्पैन.
Everybody Hates Chris is an American टेलीविज़न काल sitcom कि depicts the teenage experiences of comedian Chris Rock ( who is also the narrator ) while growing up in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York.
The show is set between 1983 और 1987 ; however, चट्टान himself was a teenager between 1978 and 1983.
Rock grew up साथ a लड़के नामित Kenny Montero, whom he has often referred to as the inspiration for a lot of the episodes.
in अनेक साक्षात्कार, चट्टान रै described Kenny as the reason he got into comedy in the first place.
The show 's शीर्षक parodies the CBS sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond.
Rock stated : `` Everybody Loves Raymond but Everybody hates क्रिस ! ``.
The show 's lead actors are Tyler James Williams, Terry Crews, tichina अर्नाल्ड, tequan रिचमंड, imani हकीम, and Vincent Martella.
In Fall 2008, the The CW moved everybody hates क्रिस and The Game to the Friday night death slot.
The fourth season of the श्रेणी premiered शुक्रवार, अक्तूबर 3, 2008, at 8:00PM Eastern/7:00PM Central.
On May 21, 2009, The CW announced that it था रद्द Everybody Hates Chris.
Prior to this, executive producer Chris Rock announced that the समाप्त of ऋतु 4 matched up with his own past—dropping out of high school to become a comedian—and that it was time to end the show.
Pleural effusion is excess fluid that accumulates between the दो pleural परतों, the fluid-filled space that surrounds the lungs.
Excessive amounts of such fluid can impair breathing by limiting the expansion of the फेफड़े दौरान वेंटिलेशन.
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional title of an Old अंग्रेज़ी वीर एपिक कविता consisting of 3182 alliterative long lines, set in Scandinavia, commonly cited as one of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature.
It survives in a single manuscript known as the Nowell Codex.
Its composition by an anonymous anglo-saxon कवि is दिनाँक between the 8th and the early 11th century.
In 1731, the manuscript was badly क्षतिग्रस्त by a आग कि swept through a building housing a collection of Medieval manuscripts assembled by Sir Robert Bruce Cotton.
The poem fell into obscurity for दशकों, और इसके अस्तित्व किया नहीं become widely ज्ञात again until it was printed in 1815 in an edition prepared by the Icelandic-Danish scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin.
In the poem, Beowulf, a hero of the Geats in Scandinavia, comes to the help of Hroðgar, the किंग of the danes, जिनकी मीड हॉल ( in Heorot ) has been under attack by a monster known as Grendel.
बाद बियोवुल्फ़ जानबूझ उसे, Grendel 's mother attacks the hall and is then also defeated.
विजयी, बियोवुल्फ़ goes home to Geatland in Sweden and later becomes king of the Geats.
After a period of fifty years has passed, Beowulf defeats a ड्रैगन, but is fatally wounded in the battle.
After his death, his attendants bury him in a tumulus, a दफ़न mound, in Geatland.

Shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም, Sēm ; `` renown ; prosperity ; नाम '' ) थी एक of the sons of Noah in the Hebrew Bible as well as in Islamic literature.
He is most popularly regarded as the ज्येष्ठ son, though some traditions regard him as the second son.
Genesis 10:21 refers to relative ages of Shem and his brother Japheth, but with sufficient ambiguity to have yielded अलग translations.
The verse is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also, the पिता of सब the children of eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born. ``.
However, the नई अमरीकी मानक बाइबल देता, `` Also to Shem, the father of all the children of Eber, and the older brother of Japheth, children were born. ''
Genesis 11:10 रिकॉर्ड कि shem थी स्टिल 100 सालो बूढ़ा at the जनम of arphaxad, ( but nearly 101 - see Chronology note, ) two years after the flood, making him barely 99 at the time the flood began ; and that he lived for another 500 years after this, making his age at death 600 years.
The children of Shem were Elam, Asshur, arphaxad, lud, और aram, in जोड to daughters.
Abraham, the patriarch of the Hebrews and Arabs, was one of the descendants of arphaxad.
Islamic literature describes Shem as one of the believing बेटे of नूह.
Some sources even identify Shem as a नबी in उसके own right and that he was the next prophet after his father.
In one Muslim legend, Shem was one of the people that God made यीशु उठाएगा as a चिह्न to the children of इसराईल.
The 1st century historian Flavius Josephus, among many others, recounted the tradition that these five sons were the progenitors of the nations of Elam, Assyria, chaldea, लीडिया, और सीरियाई, क्रमशः.
सामीती is स्टिल a commonly प्रयुक्त पद लिये the सामीती भाषाएं, as a subset of the Afro-Asiatic languages, denoting the common linguistic heritage of Arabic, Aramaic, Akkadian, Ethiopic, Hebrew and Phoenician languages.
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g., B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; Numbers Rabbah 4:8. ), Shem is believed to have महरूम melchizedek, किंग of सलेम जिसको अब्राहम is recorded to have met after the battle of the four kings.
In a few of the many extra-biblical sources that describe him, Shem is also credited साथ हत्या nimrod, son of Cush.
Shem is mentioned in Genesis 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; also in 1 Chronicles 1:4.
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus, c. 100 AD ; japheth 's sons shown in red, Ham 's sons in blue, Shem 's sons in green.
Go Daddy or Go Daddy Group Inc. is a privately held company that is primarily an अंतरजाल डोमेन रजिस्ट्रार और वेब hosting company.
Go Daddy समूह inc. दायर लिये an IPO in 2006, but later canceled it, due to `` market uncertainties ''.
In addition to domain registration and hosting Go Daddy also sells e-business related तन्त्र और सेवाएं.
On June 24, 2011, The Wall Street Journal reported that private-equity firms KKR and चांदी झील साझेदार, साथ साथ a तीसरा निवेशकों, यहूद nearing a सौदे to ख़रीदे the कम्पनी for between $ 2–2.5 billion.
On July 1, 2011 go पापा पुष्टि कि केकेआर, Silver Lake Partners and Technology Crossover Ventures had closed the deal.
Although the खरीदें price was not officially announced it was reported to be $ 2.25 billion, for 65 % of the company.
, Bob Parsons had ceded the CEO role of Go Daddy to Warren adelman, who had been with the company for about 10 years.

Andorra ( ;, ), officially the Principality of Andorra ( ), also called the Principality of the घाटियों of अंडोरा, ( ), is a landlocked microstate in southwestern यूरोपीय, स्तिथ in the eastern Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain and France.
It is the sixth smallest स्वदेश in यूरोपीय, having an area of and an estimated population of 85,000 in 2012.
Its capital, Andorra la Vella, is the highest capital city in Europe, at an elevation of ऊपर sea level.
The official language is Catalan, although स्पेनी, पुर्तगाली, and French are also commonly spoken.
Created under a charter in 988, the present principality थी formed in 1278.
It is known as a principality as it is a साम्राज्य headed by दो co-princes – the Bishop of Urgell and the President of France.
Andorra is a prosperous country mainly क्युकी of इसके पर्यटन उद्योग, जिससे सेवाएं an estimated 10.2 million visitors annually, and also because of its status as a tax haven.
It is not a member of the यूरोपीय संघ, लकिन the यूरोपियन is the de facto currency.
The people of अंडोरा have the 4th highest human life expectancy in the world — 82 years at birth.
The जार्ज वॉशिंगटन University ( GW, GWU, or George Washington ) is a comprehensive private, coeducational research university located in Washington, D.C..
It awards प्रमाणपत्र, स्नातक डिग्री, मास्टर्स degrees, and PhDs across several dozen disciplines.

Kimberly Noel `` Kim '' Kardashian ( born October 21, 1980 ) is an American socialite, टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व and occasional actress.
In 2007, she gained notoriety as the subject of a sex tape that subsequently resulted in a court awarding her $ 5 million ; later in that same साल, वो और उसके परिवार rose to prominence with their E !
reality television series Keeping Up with the kardashians, और इसके subsequent spin-offs, सहित कोर्टनी और किम Take New York and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami.
In 2010, Kardashian was the highest-earning reality star, with अनुमानित आय of $ 6 लाख.
With sisters Kourtney and khloé, कार्दशियन co-owns the fashion boutique chain D-A-S-H.
She has महरूम शामिल in the production of several lines of clothing and fragrances.
In अगस्त 2011, कार्दशियन शादीशुदा बास्केट player Kris Humphries in a widely publicized ceremony.
That October, Kardashian filed for divorce following 72 days of marriage.
The move garnered significant backlash इससे the मीडिया, जो labeled it a `` publicity stunt ''.
After 536 days, कार्दशियन और humphries reached an undisclosed settlement at the Los Angeles Superior Court, finalizing the divorce in April 2013.

Oahu ( ) or oahu, ज्ञात as `` the महफ़िल प्लेस '', is the third largest of the Hawaiian Islands and the most populous of the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii.
The state capital, होनोलूलू, is on oahu 's southeast coast.
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the islands in kaneohe खाड़ी और बंद the पूर्वी ( windward ) coast, it रै a कुल जमीन क्षेत्रफल of, making it the 20th largest island in the United States.
In the greatest dimension, this volcanic island is long and across.
the लंबाई of the shoreline is.
The island is the result of two पृथक शील्ड ज्वालामुखी : waianae और koolau, with a broad `` valley '' or saddle ( the central Oahu Plain ) between them.
The highest point is Mt. Ka'ala in the Waianae Range, उठती to ऊपर समुद्र स्तर.
the आधार करेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य is the U.S. dollar, and is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1, $ 2, $ 5, $ 10, $ 20, $ 50, and $ 100.
At one समय, however, u.S. करेंसी included five larger denominations.
