अंग्रेजों होंडुरास थी a British colony in Central America.
In 1981, the colony gained full independence, और is अभी the स्वतंत्र nation of Belize.
First colonised by Spaniards in the 17th सदी, the territory on the east coast of Central America, south of Mexico, became a British crown colony in 1862.
In 1964, it became a self-governing colony.
बेलीज़ became fully स्वतंत्र from the United Kingdom in 1981.
Belize was the पिछला महाद्वीपीय कब्ज़ा of the United Kingdom in the Americas.
Spelt, also known as dinkel wheat, or hulled wheat, is an ancient species of wheat from the पांचवां मिलेनियम BC.
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe इससे the कांस्य आयु to मध्यकालीन टाइम्स ; it अभी survives as a relict crop in Central Europe and northern Spain and has found a new market as a health food.
Spelt is sometimes considered a subspecies of the closely related species common wheat ( T. aestivum ), in which case इसके वनस्पति नाम is माना to be Triticum aestivum subsp. spelta.
It is a hexaploid गेहूं, which means it has six sets of chromosomes.
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional जासूस निर्मित by लेखक और चिकित्सक Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.
A London-based `` consulting detective '' whose abilities border on the fantastic, Holmes is famous for his astute logical reasoning, his ability to adopt लगभग कोई भेस, और उसके उपयोग of forensic विज्ञान कौशल to solve मुश्किल मामले.
Holmes, who first appeared in publication in 1887, थी प्रदर्शित in चार novels and 56 short stories.
the पहला अनोखा, a पढ़ाई in स्कारलेट, appeared in beeton 's क्रिसमस Annual in 1887 and the second, The Sign of the Four, in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890.
The character grew tremendously in popularity with the first series of short stories in The Strand Magazine, beginning with A Scandal in Bohemia in 1891 ; further series of short stories and two novels प्रकाशित in सीरियल form appeared between then and 1927.
the कहानियां cover a period from around 1880 up to 1914.
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's friend and biographer, dr. जॉन H. वाटसन ; दो हैं narrated by Holmes himself ( `` The Blanched Soldier `` and `` The Lion 's Mane `` ) and two others are written in the third person ( `` The Mazarin Stone `` and `` His Last Bow `` ).
In two stories ( `` The musgrave अनुष्ठान `` और `` the ग्लोरिया स्कॉट `` ), holmes tells Watson the main story from his memories, while Watson becomes the narrator of the frame story.
The first and fourth novels, A Study in Scarlet and The Valley of Fear, each include a long interval of omniscient narration recounting events unknown to either Holmes or Watson.
The United States House of Representatives is one of the two houses of the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is frequently referred to as the House.
The other हाउस is the Senate.
The composition and powers of the House are established in Article One of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House और सीनेट re-pass the विधान with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ).
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills, to impeach officials, और to elect the U.S. President in case there is no majority in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its population but is entitled to at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि.
The most populous राज्य, California, currently has 53 representatives.
The total number of मतदान प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by law at 435.
प्रत्येक प्रतिनिधि serves for a two-year term.
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, who presides over the chamber, is निर्वाचित by the सदस्यों of the हाउस, and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference, whichever party has more voting members.
the हाउस meets in the south wing of the United States Capitol.
Jell-O is a brand name belonging to U.S.-based Kraft Foods for a number of gelatin desserts, सहित फल gels, puddings and no-bake cream pies.
The brand 's popularity has led to it being used as a generic term for जिलेटिन मिठाई आरपार the u.S. and Canada.
Kennywood is an मनोरंजन पार्क स्तिथ in वेस्ट mifflin, Pennsylvania, a suburb of Pittsburgh.
The park first opened in 1898 as a `` ट्राली पार्क '' आकर्षण at the end of the Mellon family 's Monongahela Street Railway.
The पार्क थी खरीदा in 1906 by F. W. henninger and Andrew McSwigan and thus began the Kennywood Entertainment company that has remained a closely held family business for over 100 years.
This traditional amusement park still has structures और rides dating back to its opening and the early 1900s.
Along with Rye Playland Park, it is one of only two amusement पार्क सूचीबद्ध in the National Register of Historic Places.
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood Entertainment कम्पनी, जिससे जबतक दिसम्बर 2007 थी a closely held family business owned by the Henninger and McSwigan families.
Kennywood entertainment is अभी संचालित by California-based Palace Entertainment, a subsidiary of Parques Reunidos, an international amusement park company based in Madrid, Spain.
Parque Reunidos is in फेरे a subsidiary of candover निवेश, an investment fund based in the UK.
A Social Security card issued by the रेलरोड रिटायरमेंट फलक in 1943 to a now deceased person.
In the United States, a Social Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit number issued to U.S. citizens, स्थाई निवासियों, और अस्थाई ( working ) निवासियों under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security Act, codified as.
The number is जारी to an व्यक्तिगत by the सोशल Security Administration, an independent agency of the United States government.
Its प्राथमिक purpose is to track individuals for Social Security purposes.
A Social Security number may be obtained by applying on Form ss-5, `` अनुप्रयोग लिये a सोशल Security Number Card ''.
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of art and design, especially visual art and music, where the work is set out to expose the essence or पहचान of a विषय through eliminating all non-essential forms, features or concepts.
Minimalism is any design or style in which the सरलतम और fewest elements are used to create the maximum effect.
As a specific movement in the arts it is identified with developments in post–World युद्ध ii पश्चिमी आर्ट, सबसे strongly with American visual arts in the 1960s and early 1970s.
Prominent artists associated with this movement include Donald Judd, John McCracken, Agnes Martin, Dan Flavin, Robert Morris, Anne truitt, और फ़्रैंक Stella.
It is rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism, and is often interpreted as a reaction against अमूर्त अभिव्यंजनावाद और a सेतु to postminimal आर्ट practices.
The terms have expanded to encompass a movement in music which features repetition और iteration, as in the compositions of La Monte Young, Terry Riley, Steve Reich, Philip Glass, and John Adams.
अल्पतम रचनाएं are sometimes known as systems music.
The term `` minimalist '' is often applied colloquially to designate anything कि is अतिरिक्त or stripped to its essentials.
It has also been used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett, the films of Robert Bresson, the कहानियां of रेमंड Carver, and even the automobile designs of Colin Chapman.
the शब्द थी पहला used in English in the early 20th century to describe the Mensheviks.
In chemistry and physics, Dalton 's law ( also called Dalton 's law of आंशिक pressures ) राज्य कि the कुल दबाव exerted by the mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases.
This empirical law was observed by John Dalton in 1801 and is सम्बन्धित to the आदर्श गैस कानून.
Mathematically, the दबाव of a मिश्रण of gases can be defined as the summation
or
where represent the आंशिक pressure of each component.
It is assumed कि the gases do not react with each other
where is the mole भिन्न of the i-th घटक in the total mixture of n components.
The relationship below provides a way to determine the आवाज़ आधारित विशेषज्ञता of कोई individual gaseous component
where is the विशेषज्ञता of the i-th component expressed in ppm.
Dalton 's law is not exactly followed by रियल गैसों.
Those deviations are considerably large at high pressures.
In such conditions, the आवाज़ occupied by the अणुओं can become significant compared to the free space between them.
In particular, the short average distances between molecules raises the intensity of intermolecular forces between gas molecules enough to substantially बदलें the दबाव exerted by उन्हें.
Neither of those effects are माना by the ideal gas model.
This is a list of the largest United States colleges and universities by नामांकन लिये कॉलेजों और universities in the United States.
What इस सूची includes:
Colleges and universities within the संयुक्त States

Enrollment is the योग of the headcount of undergraduate and graduate students
नामांकन is गिने by the एकीकृत post-secondary Education System within the U.S. Department of Education.
Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the number of unique students जो attended the विश्वविद्यालयों दौरान the year.
What this सूची करता नहीं include:
Any indication of how many of the enrolled students are full or part time ( e.g., some विश्वविद्यालयों may have a ऊँची नामांकन, लकिन have most students enrolled in only a single class )

`` Right Round '' is a song performed by American rapper Flo Rida, released as the lead single from his second studio एल्बम, r.o.o.t.s. ( 2009 ).
The song features अतिथि vocals इससे Kesha.
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 and was डिजिटली released on 10 फ़रवरी by पो लड़के entertainment and Atlantic Records.
The song lyrically speaks of Flo Rida 's जाल बॉल रेफरी enthusiasm, जबकि adapting the कोरस of the 1984 Dead or Alive song `` You Spin Me Round ( Like a Record ) `` in its hook.
According to one of the सोंग 's लेखक, the chorus refers to oral sex.
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song, but in the संयुक्त राज्य, दौरान the चलाएं atop the chart, Kesha was uncredited.
The song received mostly negative reviews from critics, जो claimed it थी kitsch and misogynistic.
However, it was a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, reaching the top ten of the charts in nineteen countries worldwide.
In the United States, it became Flo Rida 's second number-one सिंगल और broke the रिकार्ड for first-week sales when it was released to digital retailers.
the सिंगल 's accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो थी निर्देशित by Malcolm Jones and nominated for an MTV Video Music Award.
The song has been used in several फिल्मों, ऐसे as the hangover, The Ugly Truth and the Telugu movie Pilla Zamindar.
In the movie पिच पूर्ण, the सोंग is performed by the a cappella group the Treblemakers.
The Chief Justice of the United States is the head of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय अदालत प्रणाली ( the न्यायिक शाखा of the federal government of the United States ) and the chief judge of the Supreme Court of the United States.
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court justices ; the other eight are the Associate Justices of the परम् अदालत of the United States.
From 1789 until 1866, the दफ्तर was known as the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court.
The Chief Justice is the highest judicial officer in the country, and acts as a chief administrative अधिकारी लिये the संघीय न्यायालयों और as सिर of the Judicial Conference of the United States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts.
The Chief Justice also serves as a प्रवक्ता लिये the judicial branch.
The Chief इंसाफ लीड the कारोबार of the Supreme Court.
He presides over oral arguments before the court.
When the court renders an opinion, the Chief Justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the अदालत 's राय.
The Chief Justice also has significant agenda-setting power over the court 's meetings.
In the case of an impeachment of a President of the United States, जिससे रै occurred twice, the मुख्य इंसाफ presides over the trial in the Senate.
In modern परंपरा, the मुख्य इंसाफ रै the ceremonial duty of administering the oath of office of the President of the United States.
The first Chief इंसाफ थी जॉन Jay.
The 17th और वर्तमान मुख्य Justice is John G. Roberts, Jr.

Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is a विशाल आयल फ़ील्ड on Alaska 's North Slope.
It is the largest आयल फ़ील्ड in दोनो the संयुक्त States and in North America, covering and originally containing approximately of oil.
The amount of recoverable आयल in the फ़ील्ड is अधिक than double that of the next largest field in the United States, the East Texas oil field.
The field is operated by BP ; partners are ExxonMobil और conocophillips Alaska.
Labor unions हैं legally recognized as representatives of workers in many industries in the United States.
Their activity today centers on collective bargaining over wages, benefits, and working conditions for their membership, and on representing उनके सदस्यों in विवादों साथ management over violations of contract provisions.
Larger संघ भी typically engage in lobbying activities and electioneering at the state and federal level.
Most unions in America are aligned with one of two larger छतरियाँ संगठन : the afl-cio created in 1955, and the Change to Win Federation which split from the AFL-CIO in 2005.
Both advocate policies and legislation on behalf of workers in the United States और कनाडा, और लो an क्रियाशील भूमिका in राजनीती.
The afl-cio is विशेषकर concerned with global trade issues.
In 2010, the प्रतिशत of मजदूर belonging to a union in the United States ( or total labor union `` density '' ) was 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in Germany, 27.5 % in Canada, and 70 % in Finland.
Union सदस्यता in the निजी सेक्टर has fallen under 7 % — levels not seen since 1932.
Unions allege कि employer-incited विपक्ष has contributed to this decline in membership.
The most prominent unions are among public sector कर्मचारी ऐसे as शिक्षक and police.
Members of unions are disproportionately older, पुरूष और निवासियों of the Northeast, the Midwest, and California.
Union workers average 10-30 % higher pay than non-union in अमेरिका बाद controlling for individual, job, and labor market characteristics.
Although much smaller compared to their peak membership in the 1950s, American unions remain a prominent political factor, both through mobilization of their own memberships and through coalitions साथ like-minded activist संगठन around मुद्दे ऐसे as अप्रवासी अधिकारों, व्यापार policy, health care, and living wage campaigns.
To fight alleged employer anti-union programs, unions are currently advocating नई `` कार्ड जाँच `` संघीय विधान कि होता require employers to bargain with a union if more than 50 % of workers signed forms, or `` cards, '' stating they wish to be represented by that union.
The current procedure involves waiting 45 to 90 दिनों लिये a federally पर्यवेक्षित secret-ballot कर्मचारी referendum on the subject.
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted that, `` दमदार संघ have helped to reduce असमानता, whereas weaker unions have made it easier for CEOs, sometimes working with market forces that they have helped shape, to increase it. ''
The decline in unionization since WWII in the United States has been associated with a सुनाया rise in income and wealth inequality.
A ईसाई Lacroix fashion boutique
A बुटीक is a small shopping outlet, especially one that specializes in elite and fashionable items such as clothing and jewelry.
The word is French for `` shop '', via लैटिन इससे यूनानी ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
The term entered into रोज अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग in the लेट 1960s when, for a brief period, London was the centre of the fashion trade.
carnaby गली और the किंग्स Road were the focus of much media attention as home to the most fashionable boutiques of the era.
Now the East of London has been regenerated and more boutiques pop up in fashionable areas, such as Tower Bridge Road.
It can also refer to a specialised कड़ ऐसे as a boutique investment bank or boutique law firm.
The word is often used to describe a property in the independent section of the hotel market ( such as The Rockwell in लंदन ) in अनुक्रम to फर्क themselves from larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ).
In such cases the establishments aim to convey the idea कि the आपरेशन is elite and highly specialised.
In the strictest sense of the word, boutiques would be one-of-a-kind but more generally speaking, some chains can be referred to as boutiques if वे specialize in particular styles.
Recently, the term `` boutique '' has started being applied to normally-mass-market items that are either niche or produced in intentionally छोटी संख्याएँ at very high prices.
This may be referred to as boutique manufacturing.
For example, before the release of the Wii, a Time Magazine article suggested that Nintendo could become a `` बुटीक video-game कम्पनी '', producing खेल लिये niche audiences, rather than trying to compete directly with Microsoft and Sony.
In the traditional luxury- watch industry scalfaro अंतरराष्ट्रीय is considered as the precursor in manufacturing and sale of bespoke watches.
The Swiss कम्पनी उपयोग a अत्यधिक flexible boutique manufacturing site, which allows producing small series or even unique timepieces.
हालांकि कुछ boutiques specialise in hand-made items and other truly one-of-a-kind items, others simply produce t-shirts, stickers, and other fashion accessories in artificially small runs and sell them at unusually high prices.
In the early 1990s Selena started manufacturing her own line of women 's clothing.
Opening two boutiques labeled as `` Selena Etc. Boutique & Salon '' One located in कॉर्पस christi और एक स्तिथ in San Antonio, Texas.
One was due to खोलें in monterrey, मैक्सिको, in 1995 but due to her death it was not opened.
Around 1999 the San Antonio location closed and the कॉर्पस christi स्थान was closed in 2009.
In लेट 1990s कुछ यूरोपीय खुदरा व्यापारियों विकसित the idea of tailoring a shop towards a lifestyle theme, in the form of `` concept stores '', which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments.
One of the first concept stores was 10 Corso Como in Milan, इटली followed by colette in पेरिस and Quartier 206 in Berlin.
Several well-known American chains such as Urban Outfitters, D-A-S-H, और the गैप, Australian chain Billabong and, though less common, Lord & Taylor adapted to the concept store trend after 2000.
Navy Federal Credit Union ( or Navy Federal ) is a credit union headquartered in Vienna, Virginia, chartered और regulated अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the नेशनल Credit Union Administration ( NCUA ) of the U.S. federal government.
Navy Federal is the largest natural member ( or खुदरा ) क्रेडिट संघ in the world, both in asset size and in membership.
As of सितंबर 2012, Navy Federal had over $ 50 billion USD in assets, and over 4 million members.
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13, 1950 as Stevland hardaway judkins ), ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम स्टीवी अचरज, is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist, a child prodigy who developed into one of the most creative musical figures of the late 20th century.
Blind since shortly after birth, Wonder signed with Motown 's Tamla label at the आयु of ग्यारह, और continues to perform and record for Motown to this day.
Among Wonder 's बेहतरीन ज्ञात works हैं singles such as `` Superstition ``, `` Sir Duke ``, `` You Are the Sunshine of My Life `` and `` I Just Called to Say I Love You ``.
Well known albums also include Talking Book, innervisions और गीतों in the Key of Life.
He has recorded more than तीस u.S. शीर्ष टेन hits and received twenty-two Grammy Awards, the most ever awarded to a male solo artist.
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist for political causes, सहित उसके 1980 अभियान to make Martin Luther King, Jr. 's birthday a holiday in the United States.
In 2009, Wonder was नामित a संयुक्त Nations Messenger of Peace.
In 2008, Billboard magazine released a list of the Hot 100 All-Time Top Artists to celebrate the US singles चार्ट 's पचासवें वर्षगांठ, साथ अचरज at number five.
By popular vote, स्टीवी थी inducted into The SoulMusic Hall of Fame at SoulMusic.com in December 2012.
मनस्ताप ( इससे the यूनानी ψυχή `` psyche '', लिये mind/soul, और -ωσις `` -ओएसआईs '', लिये असामान्य कंडीशन or derangement ) refers to an abnormal condition of the mind, and is a generic psychiatric term for a mental state often described as involving a `` loss of contact with reality ``.
People suffering from psychosis are described as psychotic.
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder, during जिससे मति और delusions, सकल excitement or stupor and impaired insight may occur.
The term `` psychosis '' is very broad and can mean anything from relatively normal aberrant experiences through to the complex and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia और द्विध्रुवी प्रकार 1 विकार.
Moreover a wide variety of central nervous system diseases, from both external substances and आतंरिक physiologic बीमारी, can उपज लक्षण of मनस्ताप.
This led many पेशेवर to say that psychosis is not specific enough as a diagnostic term.
Despite this, `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in normal behavior ( negative signs ) and more commonly to diverse प्रकार of मति or delusional मान्यताओं ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs may be described as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas one exhibiting बहुत हल्का लक्षण could be वर्गीकृत in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome ''.
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the positive symptoms of psychosis, विशेषकर those of schizophrenia.
This is thought to occur through a यांत्रिकी of aberrant salience of environmental stimuli.
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine प्रणाली ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled ट्रायल of ये दवाएँ, however, show either no significant difference between drug and placebo, or a very small effect size, suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more complex than an overactive dopamine system.
People experiencing मनस्ताप may exhibit some personality changes and thought disorder.
Depending on its severity, this may be accompanied by unusual or bizarre behavior, as well as difficulty with social interaction and impairment in carrying आउट रोज़ जीवन क्रियाएँ.
General Grievous is a fictional character in the स्टार युद्धों universe.
A recurring antagonist, he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, a political faction of ग्रहीय प्रणालियों waging war on the Galactic Republic.
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber combat by Count Dooku, he is a निष्ठुर और शक्तिशाली योद्धा devoted to जेडी 's विनाश during the Clone Wars.
उसके अधिनियमों of wanton आक्रामकता और ऊँची जेडी body count would prompt the galaxy to give him the nickname the Knightslayer.
हालांकि the बदनाम जेडी slayer थी the होने in the galaxy during the Clone Wars who had killed the most Jedi in single combat, he did not hesitate to flee from battles he knew he would lose.
Statistics play an important role in summarizing baseball performance और evaluating खिलाड़ी in the sport.
Since the flow of a baseball game has natural breaks to it, and normally players act individually बल्कि than performing in क्लस्टर, the sport lends itself to easy record-keeping and statistics.
Statistics have been kept for professional baseball since the सृष्टि of the नेशनल लीग और अमरीकी League, now part of Major League Baseball.
Many statistics are also उपलब्धियाँ इससे बाहर of Major League Baseball, from leagues such as the National Association of Professional Base Ball Players and the Negro Leagues.

USA annual real GDP from 1910–60, with the सालो of the ग्रेट Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960, with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression was a severe विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक अवसाद in the decade preceding World War II.
The timing of the Great Depression varied across nations, but in most देशों it प्रारंभ in 1930 and lasted until the late 1930s or middle 1940s.
It was the longest, सबसे फैली, and deepest depression of the 20th century.
In the 21st century, the Great Depression is commonly used as an उदाहरण of कैसा far the world 's economy can decline.
The depression originated in the U.S., after the fall in stock prices कि began around सितंबर 4, 1929, और became विश्वव्यापी news with the stock market crash of October 29, 1929 ( known as Black Tuesday ).
The Great Depression had devastating effects in देशों समृद्ध और ग़रीब.
Personal आय, tax revenue, profits and prices dropped, while international trade plunged by more than 50 %.
Unemployment in the U.S. rose to 25 %, और in कुछ देशों rose as high as 33 %.
Cities all around the world यहूद hit मुश्किल, विशेषकर those dependent on heavy industry.
Construction was वस्तुतः halted in many countries.
खेती और ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों suffered as crop prices fell by approximately 60 %.
Facing plummeting demand with few alternate स्त्रोत of कार्य, क्षेत्रों निर्भर on प्राथमिक sector industries such as cash cropping, mining and logging suffered the most.
कुछ economies started to recover by the mid-1930s.
In many countries, the negative प्रभाव of the ग्रेट अवसाद lasted until the end of World War II.
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ), also known as a premature ventricular complex, ventricular premature contraction ( or complex or complexes ) ( VPC ), ventricular premature beat ( VPB ), or ventricular extrasystole ( VES ), is a अपेक्षाकृत आम इवेंट जहाँ the धड़कन is initiated by purkinje मछली in the ventricles बल्कि than by the sinoatrial नोड, the normal heartbeat initiator.
The electrical events of the दिल detected by the electrocardiogram allow a PVC to be easily distinguished from a normal heart beat.
A PVC may be perceived as a `` छोड़ा ताल `` or felt as palpitations in the chest.
In a normal heartbeat, the ventricles contract after the atria have helped to fill them by contracting ; in इस रास्ता the ventricles can पंप a maximized राशि of रक्त दोनो to the lungs and to the rest of the body.
In a PVC, the ventricles contract first and before the atria have optimally filled the ventricles with रक्त, जिससे अर्थात् कि परिसंचरण is अकुशल.
However, single beat PVC arrhythmias do नहीं प्रायः पोज़ a खतरे और can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.
William Gary Busey ( born June 29, 1944 ), better known as गेरी busey, is an अमरीकी फिल्मी and stage actor, and artist.
He has appeared in a variety of films, including Lethal Weapon, Point Break, and Under Siege, as well as guest appearances on Gunsmoke, Walker, Texas रेंजर, विधि & अनुक्रम, and Entourage.
he थी मनोनीत for an Academy Award for Best Actor in 1978 for his role in The Buddy Holly Story.
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( ACTA ), is a multinational treaty for the purpose of establishing अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों लिये बौद्धिक प्रॉपर्टी अधिकारों प्रवर्तन.
The agreement aims to establish an international legal framework for targeting counterfeit goods, जेनेरिक दवाइयाँ और कापीराइट infringement on the Internet, and would create a new governing body outside existing forums, such as the World Trade Organization, the World Intellectual Property Organization, or the United Nations.
The agreement was signed in अक्तूबर 2011 by ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा, जापानी, मोरक्को, New Zealand, Singapore, South Korea, and the United States.
In 2012, Mexico, the European Union and 22 countries which are member राज्य of the यूरोपीय Union signed as well.
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally approved ) the agreement, which होता आइये into फ़ोर्स in देशों कि ratified it after ratification by six countries.
Supporters have described the agreement as a response to `` the increase in global trade of counterfeit goods and pirated कापीराइट सुरक्षित works ''.
Trades Unions representing workers in the music, film and TV industries and large intellectual property-based organizations such as the Motion Picture Association of अमेरिका और फार्मास्युटिकल शोध और निर्माताओं of अमेरिका यहूद क्रियाशील in the treaty 's development.
Opponents say the सम्मेलन adversely affects आधारभूत अधिकारों including freedom of expression and privacy.
ACTA has भी महरूम criticised by डॉक्टर Without Borders for endangering access to medicines in developing countries.
the रहस्य प्रकृति of negotiations रै excluded सिविल समाज समूह, विकासशील देशों और the general public from the agreement 's negotiation process and it has been described as policy laundering by critics including the Electronic Frontier Foundation and the Entertainment Consumers Association.
The signature of the EU and many of its member states resulted in the इस्तीफा in विरोध of the European Parliament 's appointed chief investigator, rapporteur Kader Arif, as well as widespread protests across Europe.
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, British MEP David Martin, recommended against the treaty, stating : `` the intended लाभ of इस अंतरराष्ट्रीय अनुबंध are far outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties ''.
On 4 July 2012, the European Parliament rejected the agreement in plenary session, with 478 voting against the सन्धि, 39 in पक्ष और 165 meps abstaining.

Tractor with side डम्प ट्रेलर semi-trailer
A tractor साथ an auto-transport semi-trailer.
Semi-trailer truck with स्लीपर पीछे the cab.
A semi-trailer truck is an articulated vehicle that consists of a towing engine, known as a tractor in the United States and ट्रक in अनेक अन्य स्थान, संलग्न to एक or more semi-trailers to carry freight.
It is also known as a transport in Canada, prime mover in Australia, semi, tractor-trailer, truck and trailer, transfer truck, 18-wheeler, mack truck, big rig in the United States, or artic, छोटी for articulated lorry, in Britain and Ireland.
A semi-trailer करता नहीं ट्रेल completely पीछे the towing vehicle, but is attached at a point that is just forward of the rear-most axle of the towing unit.
This is done so that a भिन्न of the वज़न of the trailer is carried by the prime mover.
This arrangement means that both tractor and semi-trailer होगा have a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer.
The Pittsburgh स्टीलर्स हैं a पेशेवर football team based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
The team currently belongs to the North Division of the American Football Conference ( afc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
संस्थापित in, the स्टीलर्स are the oldest franchise in the AFC.
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl titles ( six ), won more AFC Championship खेल ( आठ ) और निभाई in ( पंद्रह ) और hosted अधिक ( ग्यारह ) सम्मेलन championship games than any other AFC or NFC team.
The Steelers share the रिकार्ड लिये सबसे सुपर कटोरी दिखावे साथ the Dallas Cowboys ( eight ).
the स्टीलर्स won their most recent championship, Super Bowl XLIII, on February 1, 2009.
The Steelers were founded as the पिट्सबर्ग pirates on जुलाई 8, 1933, by आर्ट रूनी, लेने इसके असली नाम इससे the baseball team of the same name, as was common practice for NFL teams to do at the time.
The स्वामित्व of the स्टीलर्स रै remained within the Rooney family since its founding.
The current मालिक is आर्ट 's बेटे, डान Rooney, who has given much control of the franchise to his son Art Rooney II.
Long one of the NFL 's flagship teams, the Steelers enjoy a विशाल, फैली fanbase nicknamed Steeler Nation.
The Steelers currently play their home games at Heinz Field on Pittsburgh 's North Side in the उत्तर shore पड़ोस, जिससे also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers.
Built in 2001, the stadium replaced Three Rivers Stadium which hosted the स्टीलर्स लिये 31 सीज़न.
Prior to Three नदियाँ, the स्टीलर्स had played their games in Pitt Stadium and Forbes Field.
Three अलग kinds of wheat and rye flour
Flour is a powder which is made by पीस खाद्यान्न दाने, or other seeds or roots ( like Cassava ).
It is the main ingredient of bread, which is a staple food for many cultures, making the availability of पर्याप्त आपूर्तियाँ of आटा a प्रमुख आर्थिक और political issue at various times throughout history.
Wheat flour is one of the most महत्वपूर्ण भोजन in यूरोपीय, North American, Middle Eastern, Indian and North African cultures, and is the defining ingredient in most of their styles of breads and pastries.
While wheat is the most common base for flour, corn flour has been important in mesoamerican भोजन चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स, और remains a staple throughout the Americas.
Rye flour is an important constituent of bread in much of central Europe, and rice can also be used in flour, though इस is अपेक्षाकृत uncommon.
Heart rate is the number of heartbeats प्रति ईकाई of समय, typically expressed as beats per minute ( bpm ).
Heart rate can vary as the body 's need to absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide changes, such as during physical कसरत, नींद, बीमारी, or as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous system stimulants such as amphetamines increase heart rate.
Central nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases the heart rate ( apart from some particularly strange ones with equally strange effects, such as ketamine which can cause - amongst अनेक अन्य बाते - stimulant-like प्रभाव ऐसे as tachycardia ).
There are अनेक तरीके in जिससे the heart rate speeds up or slows down.
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins और हार्मोन होने released in the brain, many of which are those that are 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion and processing of drugs.
Due to individuals having a constant रक्त आवाज़, एक of the physiological तरीके to उद्धार अधिक oxygen to an organ is to increase heart rate to permit blood to pass by the organ more often.
Normal resting heart rates दायरा इससे 60-100 bpm.
Bradycardia is defined as a resting दिल रेट नीचे 60 bpm.
However, heart rates from 50 to 60 bpm are common among healthy लोगों और do नहीं necessarily आवश्यकता खास ध्यान.
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart rate above 100 bpm, though persistent बाकी दरों between 80-100 bpm, मुख्यतः if they are present during sleep, may be signs of hyperthyroidism or anemia ( see below ).
Catherine II 's carved, painted and gilded राजतिलक कोच ( hermitage Museum )
A carriage is a wheeled vehicle लिये लोगों, प्रायः horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) and sedan chairs are excluded, since they are wheelless vehicles.
The carriage is especially designed for private passenger use and for comfort or elegance, though some हैं भी प्रयुक्त to हस्तांतरण goods.
It may be लाइट, smart और तेज़ or भारी, large and comfortable.
Carriages normally have suspension using leaf springs, अंडाकार स्रोतों ( in the 19th century ) or leather strapping.
A public passenger vehicle would not usually be called a carriage – शर्तें लिये ऐसे शामिल stagecoach, charabanc and omnibus.
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled ) कार्ट share महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the history of the carriage, as is the fast ( two-wheeled ) chariot.
The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust भूकंप कि occurred at 00:58:53 UTC on Sunday, 26 December 2004, with an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra, Indonesia.
The quake itself is ज्ञात by the वैज्ञानिक community as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake.
The resulting सुनामी थी दिए विभिन्न names, सहित the 2004 भारतीय Ocean tsunami, South Asian tsunami, Indonesian tsunami, and the Boxing Day tsunami.
The earthquake was caused by subduction and triggered a series of devastating tsunamis along the coasts of most landmasses bordering the भारतीय समंदर, हत्या over 230,000 लोगों in चौदह देशों, और inundating तटीय समुदायों साथ लहरें up to high.
It was one of the deadliest प्राकृतिक आपदाओं in recorded history.
Indonesia was the hardest-hit country, followed by Sri Lanka, इण्डिया, और Thailand.
With a परिमाण of mw 9.1–9.3, it is the third largest earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph.
The earthquake had the longest duration of faulting कभी observed, between 8.3 and 10 minutes.
It caused the entire planet to vibrate as much as और triggered अन्य भूकंप as far away as Alaska.
Its epicentre was between simeulue और मेनलैंड Indonesia.
The plight of the प्रभावित लोगों और countries prompted a worldwide humanitarian response.
In all, the worldwide community दान अधिक than $ 14 अरब ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid.
Steam rising इससे the nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
Geothermal energy is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न और भंडारित in the Earth.
Thermal energy is the उर्जा कि determines the temperature of matter.
The Geothermal energy of the धरती 's क्रस्ट originates इससे the असली गठन of the planet ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and its surface, drives a continuous conduction of थर्मल उर्जा in the रूप of ऊष्मा from the core to the surface.
The क्रियाशील geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ), meaning earth, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the धरती, थर्मल उर्जा is निर्मित by radioactive decay and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts इससे the core to surrounding cooler rock.
The high temperature and दबाव कारण कुछ चट्टान to melt, बनाना मैग्मा convection upward since it is lighter than the solid rock.
The magma heats rock and जल in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal energy has been used for bathing since Paleolithic times and for स्पेस हीटिंग since ancient Roman times, but it is now better known for electricity generation.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is online in 24 देशों.
An अतिरिक्त 28 gigawatts of सीधा geothermal हीटिंग क्षमता is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला हीटिंग, space heating, spas, industrial processes, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, sustainable, and environmentally friendly, but has historically been सीमित to क्षेत्रों निकट tectonic थाली सीमाएँ.
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources, especially for applications such as home हीटिंग, खोलने a संभावित लिये फैली exploitation.
geothermal कुएं रिलीज ग्रीनहाउस gases trapped deep within the earth, but these emissions are much lower per energy unit than those of fossil fuels.
As a result, geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate global वार्मिंग if widely तैनात in प्लेस of चट्टान fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate to supply humanity 's उर्जा needs, लकिन तभी a बहुत छोटी भिन्न may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and exploration for deep resources is बहुत महंगी.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions about technology, energy prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
Pilot कार्यक्रम जैसे eweb 's ग्राहक ऑप्ट in ग्रीन शक्ति कार्यक्रम दिखाएँ कि ग्राहक होता be willing to pay a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal.
लकिन as a परिणाम of सरकारी assisted research and industry experience, the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades.
In 2001, geothermal उर्जा cost between two and ten cents per kwh.
The पद घन पैर is an इम्पीरियल और us customary ( non- metric ) unit of volume, used in the United States and the United Kingdom.
It is defined as the volume of a cube with sides of one foot ( 0.3048 m ) in लंबाई.
to गणना घन फीट गुणा लंबाई x चौडाई x ऊँचाई.
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation :, Southern Vietnamese pronunciation : ) ; 19 May 1890 – 2 सितंबर 1969 ), born nguyễn sinh cung और भी ज्ञात as Nguyễn Tất Thành and Nguyễn Ái Quốc, was a Vietnamese communist revolutionary leader who was prime minister ( 1945–1955 ) and president ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ).
he थी a कुंजी फिगर in the न्यास of the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of Vietnam in 1945, as well as the People’s Army of Vietnam ( PAVN ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War.
He led the Việt Minh independence movement from 1941 onward, establishing the कम्युनिस्ट -नियमd लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945 और defeating the French Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện Biên Phủ.
He officially stepped down from power in 1955 due to स्वास्थ्य problems, but remained a highly visible figurehead and inspiration for those Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united, communist Vietnam—until his death.
After the war, Saigon, पूंजी of the Republic of Vietnam, was renamed Hồ Chí Minh City.
All Roads Lead Home is a feature film released on सितंबर 26, 2008.
Directed by Dennis Fallon, it stars Peter Boyle, Patton Oswalt, Jason London, Vivien Cardone, Vanessa Branch, Peter कायोटी, स्टीफन मिल्टन, और Allan Kayser.
The movie was filmed in और around Kansas City, Missouri.
The movie made its World Premiere January 27 at the Santa Barbara अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी Festival.
The film रै भी recently महरूम in अनेक film festivals, and has received bad reviews.
Peter Boyle died पहले the movie 's release.
It was the last फिल्म he appeared in.
Sales taxes in the United States हैं कर लगाई on the बिक्री or lease of goods and services in the United States.
While no नेशनल सामान्य बिक्री कर exists, the federal government levies several national selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods and services.
Furthermore, forty-five states, the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, और गुआम थोपने सामान्य बिक्री कर that apply to the sale or lease of most goods and some services, and states also may levy selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services.
राज्य may भी delegate to local governments the authority to impose additional general or selective sales taxes.
Sales tax is गणना by multiplying the purchase price by the applicable tax rate.
Tax rates vary widely by क्षेत्राधिकार और दायरा from less than 1 % to over 10 %.
बिक्री कर is एकत्रित by the seller at the time of sale.
Use tax is स्वः assessed by a खरीदार जो रै not paid sales tax on a taxable purchase.
Unlike the value added कर, a बिक्री कर is imposed only once, at the retail level.
However, in cases where items हैं बेची at खुदरा अधिक than एकबार, such as used cars, the sales tax can be charged on the same item indefinitely.
The परिभाषा of खुदरा sales and what goods and services are taxable vary among the states.
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous श्रेणी of goods और सेवाएं कि हैं exempt इससे बिक्री कर, or taxed at reduced rates.
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or for resale is uniformly exempt from sales tax.
Most jurisdictions exempt खाना बेची in किराना स्टोर्स, नुस्खा medications, and many agricultural supplies.
बिक्री कर, including those imposed by local governments, are generally administered at the state level.
States imposing sales tax आवश्यकता खुदरा विक्रेता to collect tax from customers, file returns, and remit the tax to the state.
Procedural नियम vary widely.
Sellers generally must collect कर इससे in-state purchasers जबतक the purchaser provides an exemption certificate.
Most states allow or आवश्यकता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक remittance.
A central processing unit ( CPU ), also referred to as a central processor unit, is the hardware within a computer that carries out the निर्देश of a कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम by performing the मौलिक अंकगणितीय, लॉजिकल, and input/output operations of the system.
The term has been in use in the कंप्यूटर उद्योग at least since the early 1960s.
the रूप, डिज़ाइन, और क्रियान्वयन of CPUs have changed over the course of their history, but their fundamental operation remains much the same.
A computer can have अधिक than एक CPU ; this is called multiprocessing.
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain अनेक cpu on a सिंगल chip ; those ICs are called multi-core processors.
Two typical components of a CPU are the arithmetic logic unit ( ALU ), which performs arithmetic and logical operations, and the control unit ( CU ), which extracts निर्देश इससे मेमोरी और decodes और चलाता them, calling on the ALU when necessary.
Not all computational systems rely on a central प्रसंस्करण unit.
An array processor or vector processor रै अनेक समानांतर कम्प्यूटिंग elements, with no one unit considered the `` center ''.
In the distributed computing model, problems are solved by a वितरित interconnected नियत of processors.
RFID chip next to a अनाज of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to ट्रांसफ़र a coded पहचान number when queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in consumer products, and implanted in pets, for पहचान उद्देश्य.
Radio-frequency identification ( rfid ) is the बेतार non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक fields to transfer data, for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects.
The tags contain electronically भंडारित सूचना.
Some tags are powered and read at short ranges ( a few मीटर ) via चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड ( इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक induction ).
Others use a local power source such as a battery, or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM field, and then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf रेडियो लहरें ( i.e., इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation at high frequencies ).
Battery powered tags may operate at सैंकड़ों of meters.
Unlike a bar code, the tag does not necessarily need to be भीतर लकीर of sight of the reader, and may be embedded in the tracked object.
RFID tags are used in many उद्योग.
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during उत्पादन can be प्रयुक्त to track its progress through the assembly line.
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and पालतु may have tags injected, allowing positive identification of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or even implanted within people, the possibility of reading personally-linked information बगैर सहमति रै उठाया गोपनीयता चिंताएं.
Overtime is the राशि of समय किसी works beyond normal working hours.
Normal hours may be determined in अनेक रास्ताs:
by custom ( what is considered स्वस्थ or उचित by society ),
by practices of a given trade or profession,
by legislation,
by agreement between नियोक्ता and workers or their representatives.
Most nations have overtime labor laws designed to dissuade or prevent employers इससे forcing उनके कर्मचारी to कार्य excessively long hours.
These laws may लो into खाता अन्य considerations than the humanitarian, such as preserving the health of workers so that they may continue to be productive, or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy.
One common approach to regulating overtime is to आवश्यकता नियोक्ता to अदा workers at a higher hourly rate for overtime work.
Companies may choose to pay workers higher overtime pay भी if नहीं obliged to do so by विधि, विशेषकर if they believe that they face a backward bending supply curve of labour.
ओवरटाइम अदा दरों can कारण workers to work longer hours than they would at a flat hourly rate.
Overtime laws, attitudes toward overtime and hours of work vary greatly from country to country और between अलग आर्थिक sectors.
Visualization of links between पृष्ठों on a विक using a force-directed layout.
Force-directed graph आरेखण algorithms हैं a क्लास of algorithms for drawing graphs in an aesthetically pleasing way.
Their purpose is to स्थिति the नोड of a आलेख in two-dimensional or three-dimensional स्पेस so कि सब the edges are of more or less equal length and there are as few crossing edges as possible, by assigning forces among the set of edges and the set of nodes, based on their relative positions, and then using these forces either to simulate the motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize their energy.
While graph drawing can be a difficult problem, force-directed algorithms, होने शारीरिक simulations, प्रायः आवश्यकता no खास knowledge about graph theory such as planarity.
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively called adjusted for inflation ) is the amount of goods or सेवाएं कि can be खरीदा साथ a unit of currency.
For example, if you had taken one dollar to a store in the 1950s, you would have been able to buy a greater number of items than you would today, indicating that you would have था a वृहद खरीदना शक्ति in the 1950s.
Currency can be either a commodity धन, जैसे सुनहरा or चांदी, or fiat currency, or free-floating market-valued currency like US dollars.
As Adam Smith noted, having money gives one the ability to `` command '' others ' labor, so खरीदना शक्ति to कुछ extent is शक्ति over other people, to the extent that they are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency.
If one 's monetary income stays the वही, लकिन the price level increases, the purchasing power of that income falls.
Inflation does not always imply falling purchasing power of one 's money income चूंकि it may वृद्धि तेज़ than the दाम स्तर.
A higher real income means a higher purchasing शक्ति चूंकि रियल आय refers to the income adjusted for inflation.
For a price index, its value in the आधार साल is प्रायः normalized to a value of 100.
The purchasing power of a ईकाई of करेंसी, कह a डालर, in a given year, expressed in dollars of the base year, is 100/P, where P is the price index in that year.
so, by परिभाषा the purchasing power of a dollar decreases as the price level rises.
The purchasing power in today 's money of an amount C of money, t सालो into the भविष्य, can be computed with the formula for the present value :
जहाँ in इस case i is an assumed future annual inflation rate.
Education in South Korea is viewed as being निर्णायक लिये कामयाबी and competition is consequently very heated and fierce.
A central administration oversees the process for the शिक्षा of children इससे किंडरगार्टन to the third and final year of high school.
गणित, विज्ञान, कोरियाई, अंग्रेज़ी, and social studies are generally considered to be the most important subjects.
Normally physical education is not considered important as it is not recognised, by the generally अकादमिक elitist South Korean populace, as education and therefore many schools lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics.
South Korea was the first country in the world to provide high-speed अंतरजाल अभिगम to all primary, junior, and high schools.
Although South Korean students often rank highly on international comparative assessments when compared to students of most पश्चिमी शिक्षा प्रणालियों, the दक्षिण कोरियाई शिक्षा प्रणाली is criticised लिये emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation.
The South Korean education system is rather notably strict and overly संरचित as compared to इसके counterparts in most Western societies.
Also, the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such as अकादमियों or cram-schools ( hagwon [ 학원 ] ), जिससे too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual understanding, in students are criticised as a major social problem.
The My Lai Massacre (, ;,, or ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of between 347 और 504 निहत्थे नागरिकों in दक्षिण वियतनाम on कूच 16, 1968, by संयुक्त राज्य Army soldiers of `` Charlie '' Company of 1st Battalion, 20th Infantry Regiment, 11th Brigade of the Americal Division.
Victims included women, मेन, children, and infants.
Some of the women were gang-raped और उनके लाशें यहूद later found to be mutilated and many women were allegedly raped prior to the killings.
While 26 U.S. soldiers were initially charged with criminal offenses for उनके क्रियाएँ at mỹ lai, तभी दूसरी लेफ्टिनेंट विलियम Calley, a platoon leader in Charlie Company, was convicted.
Found guilty of killing 22 villagers, he was originally given a life वाक्य, लकिन तभी परोसा तीन और a हाफ सालो under house arrest.
The massacre took प्लेस in the hamlets of My Lai and My Khe of Son My village.
The event is also known as the Son My Massacre, especially in the वियतनामी राज्य मीडिया.
The U.S. सैन्य codeword लिये the `` viet Cong stronghold '' was `` Pinkville ''.
The घटना prompted वैश्विक outrage when it became public knowledge in 1969.
The massacre also increased घरेलू विपक्ष to the U.S. involvement in the Vietnam War.
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre and protect the wounded यहूद initially denounced by several U.S. Congressmen as traitors.
They received hate mail and death threats and मिला mutilated पशु on their doorsteps.
The three were later widely praised and सजा by the फौज for their heroic actions.
The hijackers in the September 11 attacks were 19 men affiliated with al-Qaeda, and 15 of the 19 were citizens of सऊदी Arabia.
Others were from मिश्र, लेबनान, and the UAE.
The hijackers were organized into four teams, each led by a pilot-trained hijacker with four `` muscle hijackers '' जो यहूद प्रशिक्षित to सहायता subdue the पायलटों, यात्री, and crew.
The first hijackers to arrive in the United States were Khalid al-mihdhar और nawaf al-hazmi, जो settled in the San Diego area in January 2000.
They were followed by three hijacker-pilots, मोहम्मद atta, Marwan al-Shehhi, and Ziad Jarrah early in the summer of 2000 to undertake flight training in south Florida.
The fourth hijacker-pilot, hani hanjour, arrived in San Diego in December 2000.
The rest of the `` muscle hijackers '' arrived in the spring and early summer of 2001, बस महीने पहले the सितंबर 11 हमले.
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-muṭṭalib इब्न hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ), also transliterated as Muhammad ( ), was a religious, political, and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam.
He is believed by Muslims and Bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God.
Muhammad is almost universally माना by मुसलमान as the पिछला नबी भेजा by God for mankind.
Non-Muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider उसे to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic faith of Adam, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and other prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca, he was orphaned at an early age and brought up under the care of his ताऊ abu तालिब.
he बाद worked ज़्यादातर as a merchant, as well as a shepherd, and was first married by age 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains for several nights of seclusion and prayer, he बाद reported कि it थी वहीँ, at आयु 40, कि he प्राप्त उसके पहला रहस्योद्घाटन इससे God.
Three years बाद इस इवेंट मुहम्मद प्रारंभ preaching these revelations publicly, proclaiming that `` God is One ``, that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God, and that he himself was a नबी और मेसेंजर of God, in the same vein as other Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few followers early on, and was met with दुश्मनी इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और उसके followers were treated harshly.
To escape persecution, मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the शुरूआत of the इस्लामी पंचांग, which is also known as the Hijri Calendar.
In मदीना, मुहम्मद संयुक्त the tribes under the Constitution of Medina.
After eight years of fighting with the Meccan tribes, his followers, who by then had grown to 10,000, took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the नगर और तब भेजा उसके अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to destroy all of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia.
In 632, a few months after returning to Medina from The Farewell यात्राएं, मुहम्मद fell ill and died.
By the time of his death, most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam, and he था संयुक्त अरब into a single Muslim religious polity.
The revelations ( or ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — जिससे मुहम्मद reported receiving until his death – form the verses of the Quran, regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based.
besides the Quran, Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are also upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss मुहम्मद और अन्य नबियों of Islam with reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern टाइम्स यहूद largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in आधुनिक history have been far less so.
इस is a सूची of टेबल of the verified oldest people in the world in ordinal rank, such as oldest person or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has महरूम validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह कि specifically deals in longevity research, such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously प्रलेखित इंसान जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 years, 164 days.
वो मिले Vincent van Gogh when she was 12 or 13.
This led to news media attention in 1985, बाद calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation found documentation लिये calment 's आयु, परे कोई उचित question, in the records of her native city, Arles, France.
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura, जो फिलहाल जीवनदान in जापानी और is age as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States, on 17 December 2012, किमुरा, born 19 अप्रैल 1897, is the oldest जीना व्यक्ति in the world whose age can be documented.
He has also been the oldest living man since the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013, the oldest जीना स्त्री रै महरूम -year-old misao okawa, also from Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
This is a समयरेखा of the African-American Civil Rights Movement.
The Civil Rights movement was a freedom struggle by African अमेरिकी in the 1950s और 1960s to gain equality.
The goals of the movement were freedom from discrimination, equal अवसर in नियुक्ति, शिक्षा और आवास, the right to vote and equal access to public facilities.
Heavy metal ( often referred to as metal ) is a विधा of चट्टान म्यूज़िक कि विकसित in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s, largely in the United Kingdom and in the United States.
With roots in blues rock and psychedelic rock, the bands that created heavy metal developed a thick, massive sound, characterized by highly amplified distortion, विस्तारित गिटार solos, emphatic beats, and overall loudness.
Heavy metal lyrics and performance styles are generally संबद्ध साथ मर्दानगी और machismo.
The first heavy metal bands such as Led Zeppelin, Deep Purple and Black Sabbath attracted large audiences, though they यहूद प्रायः derided by आलोचकों, a औकात आम throughout the history of the genre.
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's एवोल्यूशन by discarding much of इसके ब्लूज़ influence ; Motörhead introduced a punk rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on speed.
Bands in the New Wave of अंग्रेजों भारी मेटल ऐसे as आयरन Maiden followed in a similar vein.
Before the end of the decade, heavy मेटल प्रशंसक became known as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
During the 1980s, glam metal became a commercial force with groups like Mötley Crüe and Poison.
Underground scenes produced an array of more चरम, आक्रामक शैलियाँ : thrash मेटल broke into the मुख्यधारा साथ bands ऐसे as मेटालिका, मेगाडेथ, Slayer, and Anthrax, while other styles of the most extreme subgenres of metal like death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena.
Since the mid-1990s, popular styles such as nu मेटल, जिससे प्रायः incorporates तत्व of grunge और हिप hop ; and metalcore, which blends extreme metal with hardcore punk, have further expanded the definition of the genre.
The far-right ( also known as the extreme right ) refers to the उच्चतम उपाधि of rightism in right-wing politics.
Far right politics involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in समाज, और supports सर्वोच्चता of निश्चित individuals or समूह deemed to be innately superior or preferable who are to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable.
The far right 's advocacy of supremacism is based on what its adherents perceive as innate विशेषताएँ of लोगों कि can नहीं be बदला.
This stands as a point of difference with the centre-right 's attribution of behaviours, such as laziness or decadence, as the प्राथमिक स्त्रोत of सोशल inequalities.
The centre right—unlike the दूर right—claims that people can end their behavioural inferiority through changing their habits and choices.
The original far right, which emerged in France after the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति, refused to accept the French Republic and supported a counter-revolution to restore the French monarchy and aristocracy.
The far right is commonly associated with persons or groups who hold extreme राष्ट्रवादी, xenophobic, जातिवाद, religious fundamentalist or reactionary views.
The most extreme-right movements have pursued दमन and genocide against groups of people on the basis of their alleged inferiority.
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 December 1679 ), in some older texts थामस हाब्स of malmsbury, थी an अंग्रेज़ी पारस, best known today for his work on political philosophy.
His 1651 book Leviathan स्थापित the न्यास लिये सबसे of पश्चिमी राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र from the perspective of social contract theory.
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign, but he also developed some of the fundamentals of यूरोपीय उदार विचार : the सही of the व्यक्तिगत ; the प्राकृतिक समता of सब मेन ; the कृत्रिम अक्षर of the राजनैतिक अनुक्रम ( जिससे led to the later distinction between civil society and the state ) ; the view that all legitimate political power must be `` representative '' and based on the consent of the people ; and a liberal interpretation of law which leaves people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid.
He was एक of the संस्थापकों of modern political philosophy.
His understanding of humans as being matter and motion, obeying the वही शारीरिक कानून as अन्य पदार्थ और गति, remains influential ; और उसके खाता of human nature as self-interested cooperation, and of political communities as being based upon a `` social contract `` remains one of the major topics of political philosophy.
In addition to political philosophy, Hobbes also contributed to a diverse सरणी of अन्य फ़ील्ड, सहित इतिहास, geometry, the physics of gases, theology, ethics, and general philosophy.
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to identify, assess, and control the भाव of oneself, of अन्य, and of groups.
it can be divided into ability EI and trait EI.
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and has stronger relationships with traditional intelligence, whereas trait EI is usually measured using self-report questionnaires और रै stronger संबंध साथ personality.
Criticisms have centered on whether EI is a real intelligence and whether it रै वृद्धिशील validity over IQ and the Big Five personality traits.
Heredity is the passing of traits to offspring इससे इसके अभिभावक or ancestor.
This is the process by which an offspring cell or organism acquires or becomes predisposed to the characteristics of its parent cell or organism.
Through heredity, variations exhibited by individuals can accumulate and cause some प्रजाति to evolve.
The study of heredity in जीवविज्ञान is पुकारा आनुवंशिकी, which includes the field of epigenetics.
For United States individual income tax, adjusted सकल आय ( agi ) is कुल gross income minus specific reductions.
Taxable income is adjusted gross income minus भत्तों लिये निजी exemptions and itemized deductions.
For most individual tax purposes, AGI is अधिक प्रासंगिक than gross income.
Gross income is sales price of goods or प्रॉपर्टी, ऋण cost of the property sold, plus other income.
It includes wages, ब्याज, dividends, business income, rental income, and all other types of income.
Adjusted gross income is gross income less deductions from a business or rental कार्यकलाप और 21 other specific items.
Several deductions ( e.g. medical खर्च and miscellaneous itemized deductions ) are limited based on a percentage of AGI.
Certain phase outs, सहित those of lower tax rates and itemized deductions, are based on levels of AGI.
Many states base राज्य आय कर on AGI with certain deductions.
`` Lazy Eye '' is the third सिंगल इससे Silversun Pickups ' debut album Carnavas.
The band performed the song on the Late Show with David Letterman, The Tonight Show with Jay Leno, Later साथ jools हॉलैंड, and Last Call with Carson Daly.
The song is a playable track on चट्टान बैंड 2 और गिटार नायिका : संसार दौरे.
An alternate version of the song, with a length of 7:27, थी निभाई on xmu पहले the shorter संस्करण was played on FM and other XM channels.
This version was featured on उनके डेमो cd ( which featured early versions of four tracks ).
A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone क्रमांक ; in the उत्तर अमरीकी क्रमांकन योजना देशों ( देश कोड 1 ), it is the first three digits of a seven-digit phone number.
In other countries both the उपसर्ग और the number may have different lengths.
It shows which exchange the बाकी संख्याएँ refer to.
A full telephone क्रमांक is प्रायः बना up of देश कोड ( required for international calls only ), area code ( required for calls between telephone areas ), prefix, and subscriber number.
Some places restrict certain prefixes to fax numbers or कोशिका फोन तभी ; in अन्य स्थान ऐसे dedicated prefixes are not used.
As telephone technology advanced, the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many स्थान ; 485 in लंदन, UK, was once the GULliver exchange, but now 44207485xxxx is just considered one of many number blocks served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another.
Metformin ( BP, pronounced, ; originally sold as glucophage ) is an मौखिक antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class.
It is the first-line ड्रग of चुनाव लिये the उपचार of type 2 diabetes, in particular, in overweight and obese people and those with normal kidney function.
Its use in gestational diabetes has been limited by सुरक्षा concerns.
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome, and रै महरूम investigated लिये अन्य रोगों जहाँ इंसुलिन प्रतिरोध may be an महत्वपूर्ण factor.
Metformin works by suppressing ग्लूकोज उत्पादन by the liver.
Metformin is the only antidiabetic drug that has been conclusively shown to prevent the cardiovascular जटिलताओं of diabetes.
It helps reduce ldl cholesterol and triglyceride levels, and is not associated with weight gain.
, metformin is one of only two oral antidiabetics in the World Health Organization Model List of Essential Medicines ( the अन्य होने glibenclamide ).
When prescribed appropriately, metformin causes few adverse effects ( the most आम is जठरांत्र परेशान ) और is associated with a low risk of hypoglycemia.
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a गंभीर चिंता in overdose and when it is prescribed to people with contraindications, but otherwise, there is no significant risk.
First synthesized and found to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s, metformin थी forgotten for the next two decades as research shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs.
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports that it could reduce blood sugar levels in people, and in 1957, French physician Jean Sterne published the first clinical विचारण of metformin as a उपचार लिये मधुमेह.
It थी introduced to the United Kingdom in 1958, Canada in 1972, and the United States in 1995.
Metformin is now believed to be the most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the संसार ; in the संयुक्त राज्य अलोन, अधिक than 48 लाख prescriptions were filled in 2010 for its generic formulations.
The Mount Rushmore नेशनल मेमोरियल is a मूर्तिकला carved into the granite face of Mount Rushmore near Keystone, South Dakota, in the United States.
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son, Lincoln Borglum, Mount Rushmore features sculptures of the heads of चार संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रपतियों : जार्ज वॉशिंगटन, थामस जेफरसन, थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट और अब्राहम lincoln.
The entire memorial कवर और is ऊपर समुद्र level.
The tallest mountain in the region is harney शिखर ( ).
South Dakota historian Doane Robinson is credited with conceiving the idea of carving the likenesses of प्रसिद्ध लोगों into the ब्लैक Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the region.
Robinson 's आरंभिक विचार थी to sculpt the needles ; however, gutzon borglum अस्वीकृत the Needles site because of the poor quality of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups.
They settled on the Mount Rushmore location, which also has the advantage of facing southeast लिये अधिकतम सूर्य एक्सपोज़र.
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and Clark, Red Cloud and Buffalo Bill Cody but Borglum decided the sculpture should have a more national focus, and chose the four presidents whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain.
After securing federal funding, construction on the मेमोरियल began in 1927, और the राष्ट्रपतियों ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939.
Upon Gutzon Borglum 's death in March 1941, his son Lincoln borglum took over निर्माण.
Although the आरंभिक अवधारणा पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक अध्यक्ष to be depicted from head to waist, lack of funding forced construction to end in late October 1941.
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the memorial in 1933, while it was still under निर्माण, और रै प्रबंधित the मेमोरियल to the उपस्थित day.
it attracts nearly three million people annually.

A shirt, dress shirt, button-front, button-front कमीज़, or button-up कमीज़ is a परिधान साथ a कॉलर, a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the hem, and sleeves with cuffs.
Shirts are predominantly used by men, since महिलाओं प्रायः पहनें blouses.
The सामने खोलने is fastened using buttons or studs, and the cuffs close with buttons or cuff links.
Shirts are normally made from woven cloth, and are often accompanied by a jacket and tie, for उदाहरण with a suit or formalwear, but shirts are also worn more casually.
In British अंग्रेज़ी, पोशाक कमीज़ अर्थात् specifically the more formal evening garment worn with black- or white- tie, also discussed below.
Some of these formal shirts have stiff fronts and detachable collars attached with कॉलर studs.
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of shirt which has a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in error to apply to all shirts ( with or without buttoned down collars ), being used as a पर्याय लिये `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the कार्य of secretaries, प्रशासनिक assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In North America, it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of अप्रैल ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the तीसरा गुरुवार in अप्रैल ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is celebrated on the पहला शुक्रवार in may

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) was the leading painter of the शास्त्रीय फ्रेंच बरॉक style, although he spent most of his working life in Rome.
His work is characterized by clarity, logic, and अनुक्रम, और favors लकीर over रंग.
Until the 20th century he remained a major inspiration for such classically oriented artists as jacques-louis दाउद, jean-auguste-dominique ingres and Paul Cézanne.
He worked in Rome for a circle of leading collectors there and elsewhere, except लिये a छोटी काल जब कार्डिनल रिचलू ordered him back to France to serve as First Painter to the King.
Most of his works are history paintings of religious or mythological subjects that very प्रायः have a विशाल लैंडस्केप element.
Jackie Keith Whitley ( July 1, 1954Stambler, Irwin, and Grelun Landon ( 2000 ). - Country Music : The Encyclopedia. - New York : St. Martin 's Press. - p.533. - ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin, Richard ( 2003 ). - Country Music : A Biographical Dictionary. - New York : Routledge - p.427. - ISBN 978-0-415-93802-0.—Larkin, Colin ( 1995 ). - The Guinness Encyclopedia of Popular Music. - New York : Stockton Press - P.4462. - ISBN 978-0-85112-662-3.—Stanton, Scott ( 2003 ). - The Tombstone Tourist : Musicians. - New York : Pocket Books. - p.395. - ISBN 978-0-7434-6330-0.—Hicks, Jack. - `` Singer Keith Whitley 's Memory Alive Through Songs, Love in Home Town ''. - The Kentucky Post. - September 25, 1991.— '' Country Music Star Keith Whitley Dead at 33 ''. - Lexington Herald-Leader. - May 10, 1989.——Hurst, Jack. - `` Whitley 's Last Days ''. - Chicago Tribune. - May 14, 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley ''. - United Press International. - ( c/o The San Francisco Chronicle ). - May 10, 1989. — May 9, 1989 ), known professionally as Keith Whitley, was an American country music singer.
Whitley 's brief career in mainstream country music lasted from 1984 until his death in 1989, but he continues to influence an entire generation of singers and songwriters.
He charted 19 singles on the Billboard country charts, including five consecutive Number Ones : `` Do n't Close Your Eyes ``, `` When You Say Nothing at All ``, `` I 'm No Stranger to the Rain ``, `` I Wonder Do You Think of Me `` and `` it ai n't nothin ' `` ( the last two posthumously ).
