A statute is a formal written enactment of a विधान प्राधिकार that governs a state, city, or county.
Typically, statutes कमांड or prohibit कुछ, or declare policy.
The word is often used to फर्क विधि बना by विधान bodies from case law, decided by courts, and regulations issued by government agencies.
Statutes are sometimes referred to as legislation or `` black letter law. ''
As a source of law, statutes are माना प्राथमिक प्राधिकार ( as opposed to secondary authority ).
Ideally all statutes जरूर be in सामंजस्य साथ the fundamental law of the land ( constitutional ).
This word is used in contradistinction to the आम विधि.
Statutes acquire their force from the time of their passage, however जबतक वरना provided.
Statutes are of several kinds ; namely, पब्लिक or निजी.
Declaratory or remedial.
अस्थाई or perpetual.
A temporary statute is one which is सीमित in इसके अवधि at the time of its enactment.
It continues in फ़ोर्स जबतक the समय of इसके limitation has expired, unless sooner repealed.
A perpetual statute is one for the continuance of which there is no सीमित समय, although it may not be expressly declared to be so.
If, however, a statute which did not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another which is temporary only, the former will also be temporary and dependent upon the existence of the latter.
Before a statute becomes law in some countries, it जरूर be सहमत upon by the उच्चतम executive in the government, and finally published as part of a code.
In many countries, statutes are व्यवस्थित in topical इंतजाम ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) भीतर publications called codes, such as the United States Code.
In many nations statutory law is विशिष्ट इससे और अधीनस्थ to constitutional law.
The external iliac arteries are two major arteries which bifurcate बंद the आम iliac arteries anterior to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis.
They proceed anterior and inferior along the medial border of the psoas प्रमुख मांसपेशियां.
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to the inguinal ligament about one third laterally from the insertion point of the वंक्षण स्नायु on the जननांग tubercle at which point they are referred to as the femoral arteries.
The external iliac artery is प्रायः the धमनी प्रयुक्त to attach the renal artery to the recipient of a kidney transplant.
Steam is a digital distribution, digital rights management, multiplayer and communications platform developed by Valve Corporation.
It is used to distribute games and related media online, from small independent developers to larger software houses ; in अक्तूबर 2012, वाल्व विस्तारित the service to include non-gaming software.
Steam provides the user with installation and automatic management of software across multiple कंप्यूटर, जातियाँ सुविधाएँ ऐसे as मित्रों सूचियाँ और समूह, बादल saving, and in-game voice and chat functionality.
The software provides a freely available application programming interface, Steamworks, that developers can take advantage of to integrate many of Steam 's functions within their software products, including copy protection, networking and matchmaking, in-game उपलब्धियाँ और micro-transactions, और support लिये user-created सामग्री through भाप Workshop.
Though initially developed for use on Microsoft Windows, the client has expanded to include OS X and Linux versions, and क्लाइंट साथ limited functionality on the PlayStation 3 console and for both iOS and Android mobile devices.
In जोड to होने a सेंट्रल हब लिये गेमिंग तन्त्र, वाल्व रै निर्मित a version of Steam with altered functionality to be used in schools for educational software, including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons.
, there are nearly 2000 games उपलब्धियाँ through भाप, and 54 million active user accounts.
As of January 2013, Steam has seen over 6.6 लाख संयुक्त खिलाड़ी.
Steam has an estimated 50–70 % share of the digital वितरण मार्केट लिये वीडियो games.
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank और rod from the Walschaerts valve gear of a steam locomotive.
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16, 1926 ) is an अमरीकी हास्य, कर्ता, सिंगर, film producer, screenwriter and film director.
He is known for his slapstick ह्यूमर in फिल्मी, television, stage and radio.
He was originally paired up with Dean Martin in 1946, forming the famed कॉमेडी टोली of मार्टिन and Lewis.
In addition to the duo 's popular nightclub कार्य, वे स्ट्रक्चर in a successful series of comedy films for Paramount Pictures.
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons and position as national chairman for the Muscular Dystrophy Association ( MDA ).
Lewis has won several awards for lifetime achievements from The American Comedy Awards, Los Angeles Film Critics संघ, और वेनिस फिल्मी पर्व, और he रै दो सितारों on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
in 2005, he प्राप्त the राज्यपालों पुरस्कार of the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences Board of Governors, which is the highest Emmy Award presented.
On February 22, 2009, the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences awarded लुईस the जां hersholt Humanitarian Award.
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern Swiss Alps through Germany and eventually flows into the North Sea coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the बारहवीं longest नदी in Europe, at about, with an average discharge of more than.
The राइन और the डेन्यूब formed सबसे of the उत्तरी अंतर्देशीय frontier of the Roman Empire and, since those days, the Rhine has been a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland.
It has also served as a defensive feature और रै महरूम the आधार लिये क्षेत्रीय और अंतरराष्ट्रीय borders.
The many castles and प्रागैतिहासिक fortifications along the Rhine testify to its importance as a waterway.
River traffic could be stopped at these locations, usually for the purpose of collecting tolls, by the राज्य कि नियंत्रित that portion of the river.
Sri ( सिंहली )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री, IAST ; Śrī ), also transliterated as Sree or Shri or Shree is a word of Sanskrit origin, used in the Indian subcontinent as polite form of address समतुल्य to the अंग्रेज़ी `` mr. '' in लिखा और बोला भाषा, or as a शीर्षक of veneration लिये deities ( प्रायः translated as `` Holy '' ).
Design of complex structures like the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस स्टेशन needs in-depth समझना of Structural Analysis.
Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals साथ the डिज़ाइन, निर्माण, और मेंटेनेंस of the शारीरिक and naturally built environment, including works like roads, bridges, canals, dams, and buildings.
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline after सैन्य अभियान्त्रिकी, और it was defined to distinguish non-military engineering from military engineering.
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering, geotechnical engineering, geophysics, geodesy, control engineering, structural engineering, biomechanics, nanotechnology, transportation engineering, earth science, atmospheric sciences, forensic engineering, municipal or शहरी अभियान्त्रिकी, जल संसाधन engineering, materials engineering, coastal engineering, surveying, and construction engineering.
Civil engineering takes प्लेस on सब स्तर : in the पब्लिक sector from municipal through to national governments, and in the private sector from individual homeowners through to international companies.

Katherine Dunham ( June 22, 1909 – may 21, 2006 ) थी an American dancer, choreographer, author, educator, and social activist.
Dunham had one of the most कामयाब नृत्य करियर in अमरीकी और यूरोपीय थिएटर of the 20th century, and directed her own dance company for many years.
She has been called the `` matriarch and queen माँ of ब्लैक नृत्य ''.
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s, Dunham was renowned throughout Europe and लैटिन अमेरिका और थी widely लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ the Washington Post called her `` dancer Katherine the Great ''.
For almost thirty years she maintained the Katherine Dunham Dance Company, the तभी self-supported अमरीकी ब्लैक नृत्य troupe at that time, and over her long career she choreographed more than ninety individual dances.
Dunham was an innovator in African-American आधुनिक नृत्य as खूब as a leader in the field of dance anthropology, or ethnochoreology.
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses, commonly called peat moss due to इसके व्यापकता in गीला habitats जहाँ it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
Sphagnum accumulations can store water, चूंकि दोनो जीना और dead plants can hold large quantities of water inside their cells ; plants may hold from 16-26 times as much water as their dry weight depending on the species.
The empty cells सहायता retain water in drier conditions.
Hence, as sphagnum मॉस grows, it can धीरे स्प्रेड into drier conditions, forming larger peatlands, both raised bogs and blanket bogs.
These peat accumulations then provide habitat for a wide array of peatland plants, including sedges and ericaceous shrubs, as खूब as orchids और मांसाहारी plants.
Sphagnum and the peat formed from it do not decay readily क्युकी of the phenolic compounds embedded in the moss 's cell walls.
in जोड, bogs, जैसे सब वेटलैंड्स, develop anaerobic soil conditions, which produces slower anaerobic decay rather than aerobic microbial action.
Peat moss can also acidify its surroundings by लेने up cations, such as calcium and magnesium, and releasing hydrogen ions.
Under the right conditions, peat can accumulate to a गहराई of अनेक meters.
Different species of Sphagnum have अलग सहिष्णुता limits for flooding and pH, so any one peatland may have a number of different Sphagnum species.
Individual peat moss plants consist of a main stem, with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles usually consisting of two or three spreading branches and two to four hanging branches.
The top of the plant, or capitulum, has कॉम्पैक्ट क्लस्टर of यंग शाखाओं.
Along the stem are scattered leaves of various आकार, नामित स्टेम पत्ते ; the shape varies according to species.
The leaves consist of two kinds of cells ; small, green, living cells ( chlorophyllose cells ), and विशाल, साफ, संरचनात्मक, मुर्दे कोशिकाएं ( hyaline cells ).
the latter have the large water-holding capacity.
The earliest version of the संजाल कार्ड, जारी manually rather than through an APTIS machine.
the पहला APTIS version of the Network Card.
This was used from the प्रारंभ of the aptis era in 1986/1987 जबतक खूब into the 1990s, as stocks had to be used up despite the introduction of the new-look orange-banded version in 1991.
The introduction of the weekday minimum fare कंडीशन in 2002 resulted in a minor change : the red `` R '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard.
This version is स्टिल in use as of 2007.
The Network Railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by British Rail, upon the creation of their Network southeast क्षेत्रफल around लंदन, इंग्लैण्ड.
The card is intended to encourage leisure travel by rail by offering discounts for adults and accompanying children on a चौड़ी दायरा of off-peak fares.
The range of छूट उपलब्धियाँ, और the दाम of the card, have varied since that time, but the card has always been valid for a year 's unlimited use.
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over इससे कोई staffed National Rail station or Rail Appointed Travel Agent, by completing an application form - no photographic identification or other documentation is needed to buy or use the card.
It is one of a क्रमांक of concessionary fare schemes available on the British railway system.
The United Nations ( UN ; फ्रेंच : संगठन देस राष्ट्र unies, onu ) is the world 's largest, foremost, and most prominent international organization.
The stated aims of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र शामिल promoting और facilitating cooperation in international law, international security, economic development, social progress, human rights, civil rights, civil liberties, political freedoms, democracy, and the achievement of lasting world peace.
The UN was founded in 1945 बाद संसार युद्ध ii to बदलें the लीग of राष्ट्र, to stop wars between countries, and to provide a platform for dialogue.
It contains multiple subsidiary organizations to carry out इसके मिशन.
At its founding, the UN had 51 member states ; as of 2011, वहीँ are 193.
From its offices around the world, the UN and इसके specialized एजेंसियों decide on सत्य और प्रशासनिक issues in regular meetings held throughout the year.
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security ) ; the Economic and Social Council ( for assisting in promoting international economic and social cooperation and development ) ; the Secretariat ( for providing studies, information, and facilities needed by the UN ) ; the International Court of Justice ( the primary न्यायिक अंग ) ; और the संयुक्त राष्ट्र ट्रस्टीशिप परिषद ( which is currently inactive ).
Other prominent UN System agencies शामिल the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( जो ), the World Food Programme ( WFP ) and United Nations Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ).
The UN 's most prominent स्थिति is कि of the दफ्तर of secretary-general which has been held by Ban Ki-moon of South Korea since 2007.
The United Nations Headquarters resides in अंतरराष्ट्रीय territory in नई यॉर्क नगर, साथ further main offices at Geneva, Nairobi, and Vienna.
The संगठन is financed इससे assessed और voluntary योगदान इससे its member states, and has six official languages : Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian, and Spanish.
South Beach, also nicknamed SoBe, is a neighborhood in the city of Miami Beach, फ्लोरिडा, संयुक्त राज्य, स्तिथ due ईस्ट of Miami city proper between Biscayne Bay and the Atlantic Ocean.
The area encompasses all of the barrier islands of मियामी बीच दक्षिण of भारतीय Creek.
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed, starting in the 1910s, धन्यवाद to the विकास प्रयत्न of कार्ल G. फिशर, the lummus भाइयो, and John S. Collins, the latter whose construction of the Collins Bridge provided the first vital land link between mainland Miami and the beaches.
The area has gone through numerous कृत्रिम और प्राकृतिक परिवर्तन over the सालो, सहित a booming क्षेत्रीय अर्थव्यवस्था, increased tourism, and the 1926 hurricane, which destroyed much of the area.
As of 2010, about 39,186 निवासियों live in South Beach.
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial presidential election, आयोजित on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 8, 1960.
The Republican Party मनोनीत लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन, जबकि the Democratic Party nominated John F. Kennedy, Senator from Massachusetts.
The incumbent President, Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower, was not eligible for re-election after सेवारत the अधिकतम दो शर्तें अनुमत by the twenty-second Amendment.
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 मत, or 0.17 % of the लोकप्रिय vote, giving him a victory of 303 to 219 in the Electoral College, the closest since 1916.
This was the first election in which all पचास of the वर्तमान United States participated.
A number of factors बताइये why the election was so close.
Kennedy gained since वहीँ थी an आर्थिक मंदी जिससे ठेस the लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन, and he had the advantage of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans.
Furthermore, the new votes that Kennedy gained among catholics लगभग neutralized the नई मत निक्सन gained among Protestants.
कैनेडी 's campaigning कौशल decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
In the end, Nixon 's emphasis on his experience carried little weight, and he wasted उर्जा by campaigning in सब 50 राज्य बजाय of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy used his large, well-funded campaign organization to win the nomination, secure endorsements, and, साथ the सहायता of the पिछला of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. जॉनसन to थाम the दक्षिण and used television effectively.
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting U.S. Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as president and vice-president, a phenomenon कि रै महरूम दोहराया एकबार, by बराक ओबामा और जो बिडेन in 2008 ( in दोनो मामले, the president was the younger, more junior senator ).
A poster लिये a c. 1884 American production of Macbeth, starring Thomas W. Keene.
Depicted, counter clockwise from top-left, are : Macbeth और banquo मिलें the witches ; बस after the murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth.
Macbeth is a play written by विलियम शेक्सपियर.
It is considered one of उसके darkest and most powerful tragedies.
Set in Scotland, the play dramatizes the corroding मनोवैज्ञानिक और राजनैतिक प्रभाव उत्पादित when its protagonist, the Scottish lord Macbeth, chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition for power.
He commits regicide to become king and then furthers his moral descent with a शासनकाल of murderous आतंक to रहो in शक्ति, eventually plunging the country into civil war.
In the end, he loses everything that gives अर्थ और purpose to उसके जीवन पहले losing his life itself.
The play is believed to have महरूम लिखा between 1603 and 1607, and is most commonly dated 1606.
The earliest account of a performance of what was probably Shakespeare 's play is April 1611, when Simon forman अंकित देखकर ऐसे a खेल at the Globe Theatre.
It was first प्रकाशित in the folio of 1623, possibly from a prompt book.
It was most likely written during the reign of James I, who था महरूम जेम्स vi of स्कॉटलैंड पहले he succeeded to the English throne in 1603.
James was a patron of Shakespeare’s acting company, and of all the plays शेक्सपियर लिखा दौरान James’s reign, Macbeth most clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship with the sovereign.
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest त्रासदी, और tells the स्टोरी of a brave Scottish general named Macbeth who receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland.
Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife, मैकबेथ हत्याएं King Duncan and takes the throne for himself.
His reign is racked with guilt and paranoia, and he soon becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is मजबूर to कमिट अधिक और अधिक हत्याएं to protect खुद इससे enmity and suspicion.
The bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth and महिला मैकबेथ into realms of arrogance, madness, and death.
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of Scotland, Macduff, and Duncan in Holinshed 's Chronicles ( 1587 ), a history of England, Scotland and Ireland familiar to Shakespeare and his contemporaries, although the कार्यक्रम in the खेल differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth.
In the backstage world of थिएटर, कुछ मानना that the play is cursed, and will not mention its title aloud, referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play ``.
Over the course of many centuries, the play has आकर्षित कुछ of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध अभिनेताओं to the roles of Macbeth and Lady Macbeth.
It has महरूम adapted to फिल्मी, टेलीविज़न, opera, novels, comic books, and other media.
The मिल्टन hershey स्कूल is a private philanthropic ( pre-K through 12 ) boarding school in Hershey, Pennsylvania.
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School, the institution was founded और वित्तपोषित by चॉकलेट उद्योगपति Milton Snavely Hershey and his wife, Catherine Sweeney Hershey.
The school was originally स्थापित लिये impoverished, स्वस्थ, Caucasian, male orphans, while today it serves students of various backgrounds.
The Milton hershey स्कूल विश्वास, जिससे निधि the स्कूल, owns controlling ब्याज in the Hershey Company and owns the Hershey Entertainment and Resorts Company ( HERCO ) which oversees many of the area hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark.
With over six billion dollars in assets, the Milton Hershey School is one of the wealthiest schools in the world.
The school is overseen by a फलक of Managers.
The school फिलहाल serves 1,818 विद्यार्थी, और योजनाएँ to grow to 2,100 students by 2013.
A member of कोर : गठबन्धन लिये आवासीय Education, it is the largest residential education program in the US.

The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The सीएसए is the संघीय u.S. ड्रग नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
the अधिनियम भी परोसा as the नेशनल implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created पाँच schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and ड्रग प्रशासन, determine जिससे substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000, which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
second-language अधिग्रहण or second-language learning is the process by which people learn a second language.
second-language अधिग्रहण ( प्रायः abbreviated to sla ) also refers to the scientific discipline devoted to studying that process.
Second language refers to any language learned in addition to a person 's first language ; although the concept is named second-language acquisition, it can also incorporate the सीखना of तीसरा, चौथी, or subsequent languages.
Second-language acquisition refers to कया learners do ; it does not refer to practices in language teaching.
The academic अनुशासन of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline of applied linguistics.
It is broad-based and अपेक्षाकृत नई.
As well as the various branches of linguistics, second-language acquisition is also closely related to psychology, संज्ञानात्मक मनोविज्ञान, और शिक्षा.
To separate the academic discipline from the learning process itself, the terms second-language acquisition research, second-language studies, and second-language acquisition studies हैं also used.
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary फ़ील्ड, और क्युकी of this it is difficult to identify a precise starting date.
However, it does appear to have developed a great deal चूंकि the mid-1960s.
The term acquisition was originally used to emphasize the subconscious nature of the learning process, but in recent सालो सीखना और अधिग्रहण have become largely synonymous.
Second-language acquisition can incorporate heritage language learning, but it does not usually चरितार्थ bilingualism.
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as being the end result of सीखना a भाषा, not the process itself, and see the term as referring to native-like fluency.
Writers in fields such as education and psychology, however, often use bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of multilingualism.
Second-language acquisition is also not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign language ; rather, the learning of second languages and the learning of foreign languages involve the same fundamental processes in different situations..
There has been much debate about exactly कैसा भाषा is सीखे, and many issues are still unresolved.
There are many theories of second-language अधिग्रहण, but none are accepted as a complete explanation by all SLA researchers.
Due to the interdisciplinary प्रकृति of the फ़ील्ड of second-language acquisition, this is not expected to happen in the foreseeable future.
Forbes list of billionaires is an annual ranking of the world 's wealthiest people, compiled and published by Forbes, an अमरीकी नेशनल कारोबार पत्रिका.
The total net worth of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत on the list is estimated, in United States dollars, based on their assets and accounting for debt.
The list only represents each person 's valuation on a single day, due to daily fluctuations among एक्सचेंज rates and stock valuations.
The United States Secret Service is a U.S. federal law enforcement agency कि is भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य Department of Homeland Security.
The sworn सदस्यों हैं divided among the Special Agents and the Uniformed Division.
जबतक कूच 1, 2003, the Service was part of the United States Department of the Treasury.
The U.S. Secret Service has two distinct क्षेत्रों of responsibility:
Financial Crimes, covering missions such as रोकथाम और छानबीन of counterfeiting of u.S. currency and U.S. treasury securities, and investigation of major fraud.
Protection, which entails ensuring the safety of current and former national leaders and their families, such as the President, past presidents, vice राष्ट्रपतियों, अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार, visiting heads of राज्य, और विदेशी embassies ( प्रति an अनुबंध साथ the u.S. राज्य विभाग 's ब्यूरो of राजनयिक Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ), etc. )
The Secret Service 's initial responsibility was to investigate counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी, which was rampant following the U.S. Civil War.
The agency then evolved into the United States ' first domestic प्रज्ञा और counterintelligence agency.
Many of the agency 's missions were later taken over by subsequent agencies such as the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ), Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives ( ATF ), आव्रजन और कस्टम प्रवर्तन ( बर्फ ), और आतंरिक Revenue Service ( IRS ).
`` me और bobby mcgee '' is a song written by Kris Kristofferson and Fred Foster, originally performed by Roger Miller.
Others performed the song later, including Kristofferson himself, and Janis Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart with the song in 1971 after her death, making the song the second posthumous number-one single in U.S. chart history after `` ( sittin ' on ) the डॉक of the खाड़ी `` by Otis Redding.
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by his initials, FDR, was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a समय of विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक अवसाद और कुल युद्ध.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms, he built a New Deal Coalition that realigned American politics after 1932, as his घरेलू नीतियों पारिभाषित अमरीकी उदारतावाद लिये the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme, FDR defeated incumbent रिपब्लिकन हर्बर्ट हूवर in नवम्बर 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his personal victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण of the national spirit.
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and सोवियत सामान्य सचिव जोसेफ स्टालिन in leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II, and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, रूज़वेल्ट पथप्रदर्शन प्रमुख विधान और जारी a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the नई सौदे —a किस्में of कार्यक्रम designed to उपज relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ), recovery ( economic growth ), and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, लकिन तब relapsed into a deep recession.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing any considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम when unemployment diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85, except for the regulation of Wall गली by the प्रतिभूति and Exchange Commission, which still exists.
Along with several smaller programs, major surviving कार्यक्रम शामिल the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम, which was created in 1933, and Social Security, which Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, साथ the जापानी आक्रमण of चीन and the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR gave strong diplomatic and financial support to China and Great Britain, while remaining officially neutral.
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` जिससे होता सप्लाई munitions to the allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional approval, provided Lend-Lease aid to the देशों लड़ against Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very strong national support, he made war on Japan and Germany बाद the जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` date which will live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war effort.
As an active military leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts that ended in the defeat of the अक्ष शक्तियां और the विकास of the संसार 's first atom bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 जापानी American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, और the औद्योगिक अर्थव्यवस्था grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people moved to new jobs in war centers, and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt dominated the American political झाँकी नहीं तभी दौरान the बारह सालो of his presidency, but also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System.
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions, big नगर मशीने, श्वेत ethnics, African Americans and rural white Southerners.
He also influenced the बाद सृष्टि of the United Nations and Bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as एक of the शीर्ष तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, साथ with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington.
A liberal Democrat, Roosevelt defined his ideological position as `` a छोटी बाएँ of बीच. ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS, Mara, and MS-13 ) is a transnational criminal gang that originated in Los Angeles and has स्प्रेड to अन्य भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य, कनाडा, मैक्सिको, and Central America.
the बहुमत of the gang is ethnically composed of Central Americans and active in urban and suburban areas.
In the U.S., the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in Los Angeles County and the San Francisco Bay Area in Northern California ; the Washington, D.C. metropolitan areas of Fairfax County, Virginia, Montgomery County, Maryland, and Prince George 's County, मेरीलैंड ; long द्वीप, नई यॉर्क ; the बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स क्षेत्रफल ; शेर्लोट, उत्तर कैरोलिना ; and Houston, Texas.
There is also a उपस्थिति of MS-13 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
Members of MS फर्क themselves by tattoos covering the body and also often the face, as well as the use of their own sign language.
They are notorious for their use of violence and a subcultural moral कोड that predominantly consists of merciless revenge and cruel retributions.
This cruelty of the distinguished members of the `` maras '' or `` mareros '' अर्जित उन्हें a पाथ to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling against Los Zetas in an ongoing drug war south of the United States border.
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention of the FBI and Immigration and Customs Enforcement, who have initiated wide-scale raids against known and suspected गिरोह सदस्यों – netting सैंकड़ों of रखवाले आरपार the country.
Bones is an American crime comedy-drama television series that premiered on the फॉक्स संजाल in the United States on September 13, 2005.
The show is based on forensic anthropology and forensic archaeology, with each episode focusing on an एफबीआई मामला संचिका concerning the रहस्य पीछे इंसान remains brought by एफबीआई खास एजेंट seeley बूथ ( David Boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel ).
The बाकी of the प्रमुख डाल शामिल michaela conlin, T. J. Thyne, Eric Millegan, Tamara Taylor, Jonathan Adams, and John Francis Daley.
Created by हार्ट hanson, the श्रेणी is very loosely based on the life and writings of novelist and forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs, who also produces the show.
Its title अक्षर, temperance ब्रेनन, is named after the protagonist of Reichs ' crime novel series.
Conversely, dr. ब्रेनन writes कामयाब mystery novels based around a fictional ( in the Bones universe ) forensic anthropologist named Kathy Reichs.
Bones is a joint production by Josephson Entertainment, Far Field Productions and 20th Century Fox Television.
The series has completed airing its eighth season and has been नवीनीकृत लिये a ninth season.
Super Bowl XXV was an American football game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Buffalo Bills and the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) चैंपियन नई यॉर्क दिग्गज to decide the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( NFL ) champion for the 1990 season.
The दिग्गज पराजित the बिल्स by the score of 20–19, winning their second ever Super Bowl.
It is the तभी सुपर Bowl decided by one point.
The game was held at Tampa Stadium in Tampa, Florida, on January 27, 1991, during the ऊँचाई of the Gulf War.
It was thus played अंतर्गत much patriotic fervor.
The कार्यवाही शामिल a rousing rendition of `` The Star-Spangled Banner `` by Whitney Houston during the pregame ceremonies.
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle offense were making their first Super Bowl रूप बाद finishing the नियमित ऋतु साथ a 13-3 record, and leading the league in total points scored with 428.
In advancing to their second Super Bowl, the Giants also posted a 13-3 regular season record, but with a ball-control ठोकर और a रक्षा कि अनुमत a लीग कम 211 अंक.
The game is best remembered for Bills placekicker Scott Norwood 's last-second field goal attempt which went wide right of the uprights, अग्रणी to a दिग्गज विजय, और starting a four-game खोने streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills.
The Giants set a Super Bowl record holding possession of the ball for 40 मिनट्स और 33 seconds.
New York also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, और बना a 75-yard touchdown ड्राइव कि खपत a सुपर कटोरी record 9:29 off the clock.
Giants running back Ottis Anderson, who carried the ball 21 times for 102 गज और एक touchdown, थी नामित सुपर कटोरी MVP.
He was the first awardee to receive the newly named `` Pete Rozelle Trophy '' ( named for the former commissioner ).
Anderson also recorded one reception for सात गज.
Malcolm X ( ; May 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ), थी an african-american Muslim minister and human rights activist.
To his admirers, he was a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks, a man who indicted white America in the harshest terms for its अपराधों विरूद्ध ब्लैक अमेरिकी.
Detractors accused him of preaching racism, black सर्वोच्चता, और हिंसा.
he रै महरूम पुकारा one of the greatest and most influential African Americans in history.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by श्वेत supremacists, it थी rumored—when he was young, and at least one of his uncles was lynched.
When he was 13, his mother was placed in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल, और he was placed in a series of foster homes.
In 1946, at age 20, he went to prison for breaking and entering.
In prison, Malcolm X became a member of the Nation of islam ; बाद उसके पैरोल in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of its leaders.
For a dozen years, Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group, but मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश of islam सिर इलियास मुहम्मद led उसे to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East, he returned to the United States, where he founded Muslim मस्जिदे, inc. और the संगठन of Afro-American Unity.
In February 1965, less than a year after leaving the Nation of Islam, he थी assassinated by तीन सदस्यों of the group.
मैल्कम x 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over time.
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and white Americans —in contrast to the सिविल अधिकारों गति 's emphasis on integration.
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of उसके संघ साथ it, `` i किया अनेक things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim, he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work with civil अधिकारों नेताओ, he जारी to emphasize pan-africanism, ब्लैक self-determination, और self-defense.
The third season of 90210, an American television series, premiered on सोमवार सितंबर 13, 2010.
the cw officially renewed the show for a third season on February 16, 2010.
With the reveal of the networks fall 2010 schedule, they announced their decision to move 90210 to Monday नाइट्स at 8:00 pm, as a lead-in to Gossip Girl.
It premiered on September 13, 2010 and was met with generally positive reviews from critics.
The season picks up at the end of summer and focuses on the विद्यार्थी senior year of high school.
It follows Adrianna 's rise to fame, a new relationship between Silver और navid और a confused Teddy who decides to reveal to his family and friends he is gay.
It also deals with the aftermath of नाओमी क्लार्क 's उत्पीड़न.
Regular cast members for the season included Shenae Grimes, Tristan Wilds, AnnaLynne mccord, Ryan Eggold, Jessica Stroup, Michael Steger, Jessica Lowndes, Matt Lanter, Gillian Zinser, Trevor Donovan and Lori Loughlin.
Rebecca Sinclair continued her भूमिका as कार्यपालिका producer for the season.
The season premiered to 1.96 million दर्शक और a 0.9 दरजा in the adults 18–49 demographic.
Christmas-themed episode `` Holiday Madness '', hit season highs in all key demos साथ 2.1 in the cw 's निशाना डेमो of महिलाओं 18–34, a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49.
It was also the most watched एपीसोड in over a साल साथ 2.2 लाख दर्शक tuning in.
the ऋतु finale aired on May 16, 2011.
The season averaged 1.75 लाख live viewers and a 0.9 adults 18–49 rating.
It was released on DVD in the United States on August 30, 2011.
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms, और उनके territories और dependencies, and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
वो is परम् राज्यपाल of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड और, in कुछ of उसके realms, carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first चार aforementioned देशों, एलिज़ाबेथ is महारानी of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth was born in London and educated privately at घर.
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII, इससे जिससे समय वो थी the वारिस presumptive.
She began to undertake public कर्तव्य दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, in जिससे वो served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
In 1947, she married प्रिंस फिलिप, ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग, with whom she has four children : Charles, Anne, Andrew, and Edward.
Her coronation service took प्लेस in 1953 and was the first to be televised.
The Queen 's अनेक ऐतिहासिक विज़िट और बैठक include a state visit to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen major constitutional परिवर्तन in उसके realms, ऐसे as devolution in the United Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children, the births of her grandchildren, the investiture of the Prince of Wales, and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver, सुनहरी, और डायमंड jubilees in 1977, 2002, और 2012, क्रमशः.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern आयरलैंड, the falklands War, wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press आलोचना of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments, but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high.
The 2010 United States Senate election in Florida took प्लेस on नवम्बर 2, 2010 साथ with other elections to the United States Senate in other states as well as all elections to the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections.
Republican मार्को rubio, पूर्व स्पीकर of the Florida House of Representatives, defeated independent Charlie Crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek in a three-way race.

Martinez announced on दिसम्बर 2, 2008 that he would not seek re-election to the Senate, and would resign prior to the end of his term.

Governor Crist publicly announced he was running लिये the सीट in mid-2009.
At the time he received many रिपब्लिकन समर्थन, ऐसे as the नेशनल रिपब्लिकन senatorial Committee, Martinez, and the 2008 Republican presidential nominee John McCain.
His support of the American Recovery और reinvestment अधिनियम of 2009 ठेस his popularity among conservatives, and candidate Marco Rubio surged.

Doha (, ' or ', literally : `` the big tree '' ) is the पूंजी नगर of the राज्य of Qatar.
Located on the coast of the Persian Gulf,
it had a population of 998,651 in 2008, and is also one of the municipalities of Qatar.
Doha is Qatar 's largest city, with over 60 % of the nation 's जनसांख्यिकी residing in दोहा or इसके surrounding उपनगरों, and is also the economic centre of the country.
Doha also serves as the seat of government of Qatar, which is शासित by शेख़ हमद बिन खलीफा al थानी.
Doha is home to the शिक्षा नगर, an क्षेत्रफल devoted to research and education.
Doha was the साईट of the पहला ministerial-level meeting of the Doha Development Round of World Trade Organization negotiations.
The city of Doha held the 2006 Asian Games, which was the largest एशियाई Games ever held.
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab Games and most of the खेल at the 2011 AFC Asian Cup.
Doha hosted the unfccc जलवायु negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012 and will host a large number of the venues for the 2022 FIFA World Cup.
The World पेट्रोलियम परिषद आयोजित the 20th World Petroleum Conference in Doha in December 2011.
Paranasal sinuses हैं a समूह of चार युग्म air-filled स्पेसेस कि घेर the nasal गुहा ( ऊर्ध्वहनु sinuses ), above the eyes ( frontal sinuses ), between the eyes ( ethmoid sinuses ), and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ).
The sinuses are named लिये the फेशियल हड्डियों in which they are located.
Lean manufacturing, lean enterprise, or lean production, often simply, `` Lean, '' is a production practice that considers the expenditure of resources for any goal other than the creation of value for the end ग्राहक to be अपव्यय, and thus a target for elimination.
Working from the perspective of the customer who consumes a product or service, `` value '' is पारिभाषित as कोई कार्रवाई or प्रक्रम कि a ग्राहक would be willing to pay for.
essentially, झुकना is centered on preserving value with less work.
Lean manufacturing is a management philosophy derived mostly from the टोयोटा उत्पादन प्रणाली ( tps ) ( hence the term Toyotism is also prevalent ) and identified as `` Lean '' only in the 1990s.
tps is प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके फ़ोकस on कटौती of the असली Toyota seven wastes to improve overall customer value, but there are varying perspectives on how this is best achieved.
The steady growth of Toyota, from a small company to the world 's largest automaker, has focused ध्यान on कैसा it रै हासिल this success.
