iCarly is an American sitcom that airs on Nickelodeon, which premiered on September 8, 2007.
Nickelodeon promoted many episodes so far such as `` iDo '', `` iHire an Idiot '', `` iPity the Nevel '', `` idate Sam & Freddie '', etc. as specials, despite their being regular episodes.
Every episode title begins with a lower case i जिससे represents the अंतरजाल, as in `` iCarly ''.
The show was nominated for an Emmy पुरस्कार लिये बकाया Children 's Program in 2009.
The series starring Miranda Cosgrove as Carly Shay, a 13-year-old जो becomes an अंतरजाल स्टार.
The series ended on November 23, 2012 with the one-hour खास एपीसोड `` iGoodbye ''.
A कुल of 7 सीज़न and 109 episodes were broadcast.
The largest audience of the series was 11.2 million viewers, with the special episode `` iSaved अपना जीवन '' premiered in January 2010.
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and her sassy best friend Sam ( Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at a school talent show audition, tech-savvy Freddie ( Nathan Kress ) टेपों it और पोस्ट it ऑनलाइन बगैर telling उन्हें.
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and banter, the ऑनलाइन दर्शक clamors लिये अधिक और the icarly webcast is born.
While grappling with typical issues of adolescence, Carly, Sam, and Freddie find out that they have also become online celebrities as their show – which सुविधाएँ हुनर प्रतियोगिताओं, व्यंजनों, problem-solving, and random dancing – garners international accolades.
Carly lives in सिएटल, वॉशिंगटन साथ उसके 26-year-old brother and guardian Spencer ( Jerry Trainor ) and produces the show in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in their apartment.
Their mother has never been seen or उल्लेखित, लकिन उनके पिता, स्टीवन शे ( दाउद chisum ), is a U.S. Air Force officer temporarily stationed on a submarine, and is often mentioned but is only seen in person during the series finale episode, `` iGoodbye ''.
westlife यहूद an आयरिश लड़के band which formed in 1998 and disbanded in 2012.
Originally signed by Simon Cowell and managed by Louis Walsh, the group 's final line-up consisted of nicky Byrne, Kian Egan, Mark Feehily and Shane Filan.
Brian mcfadden थी a सदस्य from 1998 until his departure in 2004.
Westlife sold over 50 million records worldwide, a total कि शामिल स्टुडियो एल्बम, singles, वीडियो रिलीज, and compilation albums.
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the third-highest in UK इतिहास ), tying साथ चट्टान रिचर्ड and ranking just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley.
They achieved a कुल of 26 शीर्ष ten singles over their 14-year career.
By 2010, Westlife was listed in the Guinness World रिकॉर्ड, as the UK 's top-selling album group of the 21st century.
They also won The Record of the Year ( the तभी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार आधारित on पब्लिक मत in the uk ) a record-breaking चार टाइम्स and in 2012, the Official Charts Company listed Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music history.
despite उनके यूरोपीय और एशियाई कामयाबी, Westlife never managed to break into the U.S. market, achieving only one hit single in 2000 : `` Swear It Again ``.
In October 2011, Westlife announced their intention to split in 2012, following उनके महानतम हिट्स दौरे और the रिलीज of their Greatest Hits album.
The boyband 's final कॉन्सर्ट यहूद आयोजित on 22 और 23 जून 2012 at croke Park Stadium in Dublin.
The first farewell concert, offering 85,000 tickets, sold out in a record-breaking 5 मिनट्स और the latter screened सजीव in cinemas worldwide.
Vitamin A is a group of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons, which include retinol, retinal, retinoic acid and several provitamin a carotenoids among जिससे beta-carotene is the most important.
Vitamin A has multiple functions, it is important for growth और विकास, लिये the मेंटेनेंस of the प्रतिरक्षा system and good vision.
Vitamin A is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of retinal, which combines with protein opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing अणु, कि is जरुरी लिये दोनो low-light ( scotopic vision ) and color vision.
विटामिन a भी कृत्यों in a very different role as an irreversibly oxidized form of retinol known as retinoic acid, which is an important hormone-like growth factor for epithelial and other cells.
In foods of animal origin, the major form of vitamin A is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, जिससे is परिवर्तित to रेटिनॉल ( chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine.
The retinol form functions as a storage form of the विटामिन, और can be परिवर्तित to and from its visually active aldehyde form, retinal.
The associated acid ( retinoic acid ), a metabolite that can be irreversibly synthesized इससे विटामिन a, रै तभी आंशिक विटामिन a कार्यकलाप, और करता नहीं फलन in the retina for the visual cycle.
Retinoic acid is used for growth और सेल्यूलर differentiation.
सब फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन a have a beta-ionone ring to which an isoprenoid chain is attached, called a retinyl group.
Both structural features are अनिवार्य लिये vitamin activity.
The orange pigment of carrots – beta-carotene – can be represented as two connected retinyl groups, which are used in the देह to योगदान to विटामिन a स्तर.
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene also have a सिंगल retinyl group, which give them some vitamin activity.
None of the अन्य carotenes have vitamin activity.
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group and रै विटामिन कार्यकलाप in humans.
Vitamin A can be found in two principal फ़ॉर्म in foods :
Retinol, the form of vitamin A अवशोषित when eating animal food sources, is a yellow, fat-soluble substance.
Since the pure alcohol form is unstable, the vitamin is मिला in ऊतकों in a रूप of retinyl ester.
It is also commercially produced and administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl एसीटेट or palmitate.
The carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone बजती ), लकिन no अन्य carotenoids, फलन as provitamin a in herbivores और सर्वाहारी animals, which possess the enzyme ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) which cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol.
In general, carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, and pure carnivores such as cats and ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase and can not convert कोई carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids होने फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन A for these species ).
सेलिना मारी गोमेज़ ( born जुलाई 22, 1992 ) is an American singer and actress.
She बना उसके डेब्यू as a child actress in Barney & Friends.
In 2007, गोमेज़ आए to prominence as a अभिनीत cast member in the television series Wizards of Waverly Place.
She signed to Hollywood रिकॉर्ड the following साल, and became the founder and lead singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene.
Their studio albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ), A Year Without बरसात ( 2010 ), और जब the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) and have spawned Platinum-certified singles `` Naturally ``, `` Who Says ``, and `` Love You like a Love Song ``.
After the release of television films and their accompanying soundtracks, गोमेज़ बना उसके नाट्य फिल्मी डेब्यू in ramona और Beezus in 2010 and starred in Monte Carlo in 2011.
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly प्लेस और the अंतराल of सेलिना गोमेज़ & the झाँकी in 2012, she focused on her film career, serving as a voice actress in Hotel Transylvania and starring in Spring Breakers the following year.
Her debut solo album is tentatively अनुसूचित to be released in summer 2013, and is preceded by its lead single `` Come & Get It ``.
Outside of her work in the entertainment industry, Gomez is शामिल in परोपकारी activities through charity work and various social and environmental causes.
Tracie Monique Spencer ( born July 12, 1976 ) is an अमरीकी r & b और पॉप singer-songwriter, actress, and model.
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of California and the सीट of सरकारी of Sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in the northern portion of California 's expansive सेंट्रल घाटी.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area, San Francisco Bay Area, and the San Diego metropolitan area, as well as the 25th largest in the संयुक्त States.
Sacramento was cited by Time पत्रिका as अमेरिका 's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John Sutter, Sr., his son John Sutter, Jr., और जेम्स W. मार्शल.
sacramento grew जल्दी धन्यवाद to the protection of Sutter 's Fort, which was established by Sutter in 1839.
दौरान the कैलिफ़ोर्निया सुनहरा फटाफट, sacramento थी a प्रमुख वितरण पाइंट, a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच, and a terminus for wagon trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, Sacramento, more commonly known as sacramento राज्य or सैक राज्य, is the largest local university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली.
Drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is located in Downtown, Sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's mcgeorge स्कूल of विधि is located in the Oak Park neighborhood.
In addition, the University of California, डेविस is स्तिथ in nearby Davis, west of the capital.
The UC Davis Medical Center, a world-renowned research हॉस्पिटल, is स्तिथ in the नगर of Sacramento.
मेमोरियल दिन is a United States federal holiday which occurs every year on the final Monday of May.
Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and women who died while serving in the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
Formerly known as Decoration Day, it originated बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध to commemorate the Union and Confederate soldiers who died in the Civil War.
By the 20th सदी मेमोरियल Day had been extended to honor all Americans who have died in all wars.
it typically marks the प्रारंभ of the summer vacation season, while Labor Day marks its end.
Many people visit cemeteries and memorials, विशेषकर to honor those who have died in military service.
Many volunteers place an American flag on each grave in नेशनल कब्रिस्तान.
By the early 20th century, Memorial दिन थी an अवसर लिये अधिक सामान्य expressions of memory, as people visited the graves of their deceased relatives in church cemeteries, whether they had served in the military or not.
It also became a long weekend increasingly devoted to खरीदारी, family gatherings, fireworks, trips to the beach, and national media events.
Annual Decoration Days for particular कब्रिस्तान हैं आयोजित on a संडे in लेट वसन्त or early summer in some rural areas of the American South, notably in the mountains.
In cases involving a family graveyard where remote पूर्वजो as खूब as those जो यहूद मृतक अधिक recently हैं दफ्न, इस may take on the character of an extended family reunion to which some people travel hundreds of miles.
People gather on the designated day and put flowers on क़ब्रों और नवीनीकृत सम्पर्क with kinfolk and others.
There often is a religious service and a `` dinner on the ground, '' the traditional term for a potluck meal in which लोगों प्रयुक्त to स्प्रेड the बर्तन out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass.
It is believed that this practice began before the American Civil War and thus may reflect the real origin of the `` memorial day '' idea.
Memorial Day is not to be confused with Veterans Day ; Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and women who died जबकि सेवारत, जबकि दिग्गजों दिन मनाता the सेवा of all U.S. military veterans, living or dead.
Mt. zion गिरिजाघर राज्य history marker near Philadelphia, Mississippi.
Freedom Summer ( also known as the Mississippi Summer प्रोजेक्ट ) थी a अभियान in the संयुक्त राज्य शुभारम्भ in जून 1964 to attempt to register as many African American voters as possible in Mississippi, which had historically excluded most blacks from voting.
The project also set up दर्जनों of स्वतंत्रता स्कूलों, स्वतंत्रता घरों, and community centers in small towns throughout Mississippi to aid the local black population.
The project was organized by the Council of Federated Organizations ( COFO ), a coalition of the Mississippi branches of the four major civil अधिकारों संगठन ( SNCC, CORE, NAACP and SCLC ).
Most of the impetus, leadership, and financing लिये the Summer Project came from the SNCC.
Robert Parris मूसा, SNCC field secretary and co-director of COFO, directed the summer project.
Blues is the नाम दिए to दोनो a musical रूप और a music genre that originated in communities of primarily the `` Deep South `` of the United States around the end of the 19th century from spirituals, work songs, field hollers, shouts and chants, and rhymed simple narrative ballads.
The blues form, ubiquitous in jazz, rhythm and blues, and rock and roll is characterized by विशिष्ट chord progressions, of which the twelve-bar blues chord progression is the most common.
The blue notes that, for expressive purposes are sung or played flattened or gradually bent ( minor 3rd to major 3rd ) in relation to the pitch of the major scale, are also an important part of the ध्वनि.
The blues genre is based on the blues रूप लकिन possesses अन्य विशेषताएँ ऐसे as specific lyrics, bass lines, and instruments.
Blues can be subdivided into several subgenres ranging from country to शहरी ब्लूज़ कि यहूद अधिक or less popular during different periods of the 20th century.
Best ज्ञात हैं the Delta, Piedmont, Jump, and Chicago blues styles.
World War II marked the transition from acoustic to इलेक्ट्रिक ब्लूज़ and the progressive opening of blues music to a wider audience, especially white listeners.
In the 1960s और 1970s, a hybrid form called blues-rock evolved.
The term `` the blues '' refers to the `` blue devils '', meaning melancholy and sadness ; an early use of the term in this sense is मिला in जार्ज colman 's one-act तमाशा ब्लू शैतानों ( 1798 ).
Though the use of the phrase in african-american म्यूज़िक may be पुरानी, it रै been attested to since 1912, when Hart Wand 's `` Dallas Blues `` became the first copyrighted blues composition.
In lyrics the phrase is often used to describe a उदास mood.
A quarter dollar, commonly shortened to quarter, is a coin worth 1⁄4 of a संयुक्त राज्य डालर or 25 सेंट.
The quarter has been उत्पादित चूंकि 1796.
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination, as opposed to 20¢ जिससे is अधिक आम in अन्य भाग of the संसार, originated साथ the अभ्यास of dividing Spanish Milled Dollars into eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ).
At one time `` two bits ``, i.e. दो wedges, प्रत्येक कील an आठवीं, thus a quarter of the Spanish real, was a common nickname for a quarter.
Day of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican holiday मनाये throughout मैक्सिको और around the world in other cultures.
The holiday focuses on महफिलों of परिवार और मित्रों to दुवा for and remember friends and family members who have died.
It is particularly celebrated in Mexico, where it is a national holiday, and सब बैंको हैं बंद.
The celebration takes place on November 1 and 2, in connection with the Catholic छुट्टियाँ of सब संतो ' Day and All Souls ' Day.
Traditions connected with the holiday include building private altars honoring the deceased using sugar skulls, marigolds, और the पसंदीदा भोजन और पेय of the departed and visiting graves with these as gifts.
They also leave possessions of the मृतक.
Scholars trace the origins of the modern Mexican holiday to indigenous observances dating back hundreds of years and to an Aztec festival dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl.
The holiday has spread throughout the world : In ब्राज़ील, dia de finados is a पब्लिक अवकाश that many Brazilians celebrate by visiting cemeteries and churches.
In Spain, there are festivals और parades, और, at the समाप्त of the दिन, people gather at cemeteries and pray for their dead loved ones.
Similar observances occur elsewhere in यूरोपीय, और similarly themed celebrations appear in many Asian and African cultures.
अनीता mk VIII.
The ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators were launched simultaneously in late 1961 as the संसार 's पहला all- इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डेस्कटॉप calculators.
Designed and built by the घंटी पंच co.
in Britain, and marketed through its Sumlock Comptometer division, they used vacuum tubes and cold-cathode switching tubes in their लॉजिक circuits और nixie tubes लिये उनके numerical displays.
They were the first of a series of desktop and hand-held electronic calculators that the company was to develop and sell under the अनीता नाम into the mid-1970s.
George Washington ( –, 1799 ) was the first President of the United States ( 1789–1797 ), the commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज दौरान the अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी War, and one of the Founding Fathers of the United States.
He presided over the convention that drafted the Constitution, which replaced the आलेख of कनफेडरेशन और established the position of President.
Washington was elected President as the सर्वसम्मत चुनाव of the 69 निर्वाचक in 1788, and he served two terms in office.
He oversaw the creation of a strong, well-financed नेशनल सरकारी कि कायम neutrality in the wars raging in Europe, suppressed rebellion, and won acceptance among Americans of all types.
His leadership style established many forms and rituals of government that have been प्रयुक्त चूंकि, ऐसे as using a कैबिनेट system and delivering an inaugural address.
Further, the peaceful transition from his presidency to the presidency of John Adams established a tradition that continues into the 21st सदी.
वॉशिंगटन was hailed as `` father of his country `` even during his lifetime.
Washington was born into the provincial gentry of Colonial Virginia ; his wealthy planter family owned तम्बाकू बागानों and slaves.
After both his father and older brother died when he was young, Washington became personally and professionally attached to the शक्तिशाली विलियम फेयरफैक्स, जो promoted his career as a surveyor and soldier.
Washington quickly became a senior officer in the colonial शक्तियां दौरान the पहला चरण of the French and Indian War.
Chosen by the Second Continental Congress in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the Continental Army in the American Revolution, Washington प्रबंधित to फ़ोर्स the अंग्रेजों आउट of बोस्टन in 1776, लकिन was defeated and almost captured later that year when he lost New York City.
After crossing the Delaware River in the dead of शीत, he पराजित the अंग्रेजों in दो लड़ाइयों, retook New Jersey and restored momentum to the Patriot cause.
Because of his strategy, Revolutionary शक्तियां captured दो major British armies at Saratoga in 1777 and Yorktown in 1781.
Historians laud Washington for his selection and supervision of उसके सेनापतियों, प्रोत्साहन of मनोबल और ability to hold together the army, coordination with the state governors and state militia units, relations with Congress and attention to supplies, logistics, and training.
In बैटल, however, वॉशिंगटन was repeatedly outmaneuvered by British generals with larger armies.
After victory had been finalized in 1783, वॉशिंगटन resigned as commander-in-chief बल्कि than seize power, proving his opposition to dictatorship and his commitment to American republicanism.
असंतुष्ट साथ the कमजोरियों of the Articles of Confederation, in 1787 Washington presided over the Constitutional Convention that drafted the United States Constitution.
Elected unanimously as the first President of the United States in 1789, he attempted to लाओ प्रतिद्वंद्वी गिरोहों साथ to unify the nation.
He supported Alexander Hamilton 's programs to pay off all state and national debt, to implement an effective tax system and to create a नेशनल बैंको ( despite विपक्ष इससे थामस Jefferson ).
वॉशिंगटन proclaimed the संयुक्त States neutral in the wars raging in Europe after 1793.
He avoided युद्ध साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable trade by securing the Jay Treaty in 1795, despite intense opposition from the Jeffersonians.
Although never officially joining the Federalist Party, he supported its कार्यक्रम.
Washington 's विदाई पता थी an influential primer on republican virtue and a warning against partisanship, sectionalism, and involvement in foreign wars.
He retired from the presidency in 1797 and returned to his home, Mount vernon, और उसके घरेलू जीवन जहाँ he managed a variety of enterprises.
He freed all his slaves by उसके final will.
Washington had a vision of a great और शक्तिशाली स्वदेश कि होता be built on republican lines using federal power.
He sought to use the national सरकारी to बचाना स्वतंत्रता, improve अवसंरचना, खोलें the पश्चिमी lands, promote commerce, found a permanent capital, reduce regional tensions and promote a spirit of American nationalism.
At his death, Washington was eulogized as `` first in war, first in peace, and first in the hearts of his देशवासियों '' by Henry Lee.
The federalists बना उसे the प्रतीक of their party but for many years, the Jeffersonians continued to distrust his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument.
As the leader of the पहला कामयाब क्रान्ति विरूद्ध a औपनिवेशिक empire in world history, Washington became an international icon for liberation and nationalism, especially in France and Latin America.
Fiscal Year 2012 u.S. संघीय Spending – Cash or Budget Basis.
Fiscal Year 2012 u.S. संघीय Receipts.
The Budget of the United States Government often begins as the अध्यक्ष 's प्रस्ताव to the u.S. कॉंग्रेस which recommends funding levels for the next fiscal year, beginning October 1.
However, Congress is the body required by विधि to pass a बजट annually और to submit the बजट passed by both houses to the President for signature.
Congressional decisions are governed by rules and legislation regarding the संघीय बजट प्रक्रम.
Budget committees set spending limits for the House and Senate समितियों और लिये appropriations subcommittees, जिससे तब स्वीकृति व्यक्तिगत appropriations bills to allocate funding to various federal programs.
If Congress fails to pass an सालाना बजट ( as has been the case since 2009 ), a series of Appropriations bills must be passed as `` stop gap '' measures.
After Congress approves an appropriations विधेयक, it is sent to the President, who may sign it into law, or may veto it ( as he would a budget when passed by the Congress ).
A vetoed bill is sent back to Congress, which can pass it into law with a two-thirds majority in प्रत्येक कक्ष.
Congress may also combine all or some appropriations बिल्स into an omnibus reconciliation bill.
In addition, the president may request and the Congress may pass supplemental appropriations bills or आपात supplemental appropriations bills.
Several government agencies provide बजट आंकड़ा and analysis.
These include the Government Accountability Office ( GAO ), Congressional Budget Office, the दफ्तर of प्रबन्धन और बजट ( omb ) और the u.S. Treasury Department.
These agencies have reported that the संघीय सरकारी is facing a series of important financing challenges.
In the short-run, tax revenues have declined significantly due to a severe recession and tax policy choices, while expenditures have विस्तारित लिये युद्धों, बेरोजगारी बीमे and other safety net spending.
In the long-run, expenditures related to healthcare programs such as Medicare and medicaid हैं प्रक्षिप्त to grow faster than the economy overall as the population matures.
New Guinea ( also, Tok Pisin : Niugini, Dutch : Nieuw Guinea, and ; historically : Papua ) is the world 's second largest island, बाद ग्रीनलैंड, covering a जमीन क्षेत्रफल of 786,000 km2.
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean, it lies geographically to the ईस्ट of the मलय द्वीपसमूह, साथ जिससे it is sometimes included as part of a greater Indo-Australian Archipelago.
Geologically it is a part of the वही tectonic plate as Australia.
When world sea levels were low, the two shared shorelines ( which now lie 100 to 140 metres below sea level ), combining with lands अभी inundated into the tectonic महाद्वीप of sahul, भी ज्ञात as Greater Australia.
The two landmasses became separated जब the क्षेत्रफल अभी ज्ञात as the Torres Strait flooded after the end of the last glacial period.
anthropologically, नई गिनी is considered part of Melanesia.
Politically, the पश्चिमी हाफ of the द्वीप comprises two Indonesian provinces : Papua and West Papua.
The पूर्वी हाफ फ़ॉर्म the मेनलैंड of the country of Papua New Guinea.
The island has a population of about 7.5 million, with a very low population density of तभी 8 inh/km2.
New Guinea is differentiated from its drier, flatter, and less fertile southern counterpart, Australia, by its much higher rainfall and its active volcanic geology, with its उच्चतम पाइंट, puncak jaya, reaching an उन्नयन of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ).
Yet the two land masses share a similar animal fauna, with marsupials, सहित wallabies and possums, and the egg-laying monotreme, the spiny anteater, or echidna.
Other than bats and some two dozen indigenous rodent genera, वहीँ हैं no pre-human स्वदेशी placental mammals.
सूअर, अनेक अतिरिक्त species of rats, and the ancestor of the New Guinea Singing Dog were introduced with human colonization.
The इंसान उपस्थिति on the island dates back at least 40,000 years to the oldest human migrations out of Africa.
Research indicates that the highlands were an early and independent center of कृषि, साथ प्रमाण of सिंचाई going back at least 10,000 years.
Because of the समय गहराई of इसके inhabitation और इसके अत्यधिक fractured लैंडस्केप, an unusually ऊँची क्रमांक of भाषाएं हैं बोला on the island, with some 1,000 languages ( a figure higher than that of most continents ) having been catalogued out of an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 human dialects.
Most are classified as पापुआई भाषाएं, a generally accepted geographical term which a minority of authors hold to be a genetic one.
A number of Austronesian languages are बोला on the coast और on offshore islands.
In the 16th century Spanish explorers खोजा the island and called it Nueva Guinea.
In recent history western नई गिनी थी शामिल in the डच East Indies colony.
The germans annexed the उत्तरी coast of the पूर्वी हाफ of the island as German New Guinea in their pre–World War I effort to establish themselves as a colonial power, whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain.
Following the Treaty of Versailles, the German portion was awarded to ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( जिससे थी already शासी the अंग्रेजों अर्जी, नामित the Territory of Papua ) as a League of Nations mandate.
the पूर्वी हाफ of the island was granted independence from Australia as Papua New Guinea in 1975.
The western half gained independence from the Dutch in 1961, but became part of इंडोनेशिया जल्द afterwards in विवादास्पद circumstances.
`` The Van Buren Boys '' is the 148th एपीसोड of the sitcom Seinfeld, and name of a fictional New York street gang.
Their sign is क्रासिंग the हैंड्स, साथ one hand with all the fingers 'up ' and spread out.
The other hand has all but the thumb and pointer finger up, लिये a कुल of आठ ( 8 ).
The gang is named for the 8th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, Martin Van Buren ( who was the first president from New York ).
इस थी the 14th episode for the 8th season.
It aired on February 6, 1997.
Bevo चिह्न
Bevo was a non-alcoholic malt पेय, or near beer, brewed in the United States by the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century.
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success during the time of निषेध, जब बियर, वाइन और आसुत liquors, were made illegal for thirteen years.
The Anheuser-Busch company started brewing Bevo when alcoholic beverages were निषिद्ध in 1916 by the United States armed forces.
Production rose greatly with national prohibition in 1919, and Bevo was by far the most popular of the many `` खाद्यान्न पेय '' or `` निकट beers '' of the time.
At the peak of इसके लोकप्रियता in the जल्दी 1920s, more than five million cases of Bevo were sold annually.
Renard with a मग of bevo, चित्रित in टेरा cotta on the interior walls of the Bevo building, St. Louis
Labels on the bottles billed it as `` Bevo the Beverage ''.
The name `` Bevo '' was coined इससे the शब्द `` पेय '' और the Slavic language word for beer `` pivo '', and was pronounced `` Bee-vo ''.
Some Bevo advertising featured the अक्षर `` renard the फॉक्स `` ( आधारित on the समर्थक of a medieval French folk-tale ), and promotional mugs with this character were manufactured.
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a श्रेणी of boat-bodied गाड़ियाँ in इसके st. लुई दुकानें पुकारा the `` Bevo Boats '' which were used for promotion.
Seven are believed to have महरूम निर्मित on pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis while one surviving example was based upon 1930 Cadillac 353 V8.
बिलबोर्ड विज्ञापन Bevo in Trenton, New Jersey, 1917
A contemporary विज्ञापन पढ़ा `` कूलिंग and invigorating, Bevo the Beverage.
Order by the case इससे अपना पंसारी, druggist, or dealer. ''
The paper label on the वापस of the बोतल read `` The All-Year-Round Soft Drink.
Appetizing - Healthful - Nutritious - ताज़ा.
मिल्क or जल may contain bacteria.
BEVO never does. ''
Bevo became भाग of the लोकप्रिय संस्कृति of the time, and is mentioned in various popular songs and Vaudeville skits of the era.
This led to द्वितीयक कठबोली उपयोग of the शब्द ; लिये उदाहरण, in American military slang a young and inexperienced officer was called a `` Bevo ''.
the विश्वविद्यालयों of Texas named its mascot `` Bevo '', a name which has stuck to this day.
Irving Berlin included a paean to the पेय, `` तुम ca n't रहो up on Bevo '', in his 1917 army revue, Yip Yip Yaphank.
In the late 1920s smuggled बूटलेग बियर और liquor as well as `` homebrew ``, cut into Bevo 's marketshare.
With sales flattening to 100,000 cases by 1929, anheuser-busch stopped production.
The Bevo Mill, st. लुई, in 2008
The Bevo building, with the Renard character prominently displayed at the corners, still operates as a bottling facility at their main ब्रेवरी in st. Louis, Missouri.
The landmark Bevo Mill, constructed by अगस्त anheuser Busch, Sr. in 1917.
It थी बंद in 2009, but it reopened in October 2009 under new owners.
Bevo is also mentioned in the short story `` The Killers `` by Ernest Hemingway ; as well as in Babbitt by sinclair Lewis.
Mylanta is an over the काउंटर दवा प्रयुक्त for the treatment of acid reflux, heartburn, and gastroesophageal reflux disease ( also known as GERD ).
Foremilk and Hindmilk नमूने of इंसान स्तन milk
A glass of pasteurized गाय मिल्क
Milk is a white liquid produced by the mammary glands of mammals.
It is the प्राथमिक सोर्स of पोषण for young mammals before they are able to digest other types of food.
अर्लy- lactation मिल्क contains colostrum, which carries the mother 's antibodies to the baby and can reduce the risk of many diseases in the baby.
It also contains many other nutrients.
As an agricultural उत्पाद, मिल्क is extracted from mammals and used as food for humans.
विश्वव्यापी, दुग्ध खेतो उत्पादित about 730 million tonnes of milk in 2011.
India is the world 's largest निर्माता और उपभोक्ता of मिल्क, yet neither exports nor imports milk.
New Zealand, the European Union 's 27 member राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, और the संयुक्त राज्य हैं the world 's largest exporters of milk and milk products.
China and Russia are the संसार 's largest importers of milk and milk products.
Throughout the संसार, वहीँ are more than 6 billion consumers of milk and milk products.
over 750 लाख people live within dairy farming households.
Milk is a key contributor to improving nutrition and food security particularly in developing countries.
Improvements in livestock और दुग्ध technology offer significant promise in reducing poverty and malnutrition in the world.
Motorcycle speedway, usually referred to as speedway, is a मोटरसाइकिल खेल involving चार और sometimes up to छह राइडर्स competing over four anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit.
Speedway motorcycles use only one gear and have no brakes and racing takes प्लेस on a चपटा ओवल track प्रायः consisting of dirt or loosely packed shale.
Competitors use this surface to slide their machines sideways, powersliding or broadsiding into the bends.
On the straight sections of the track the मोटरसाइकिल reach speeds of up.
The exact origins of the sport are unknown but there is evidence of a type of speedway racing होने practised in the यूएसए पहले the पहला संसार युद्ध और in Australia in the late 1910s and early 1920s.
There are now both domestic and international competitions in a number of countries including the Speedway World Cup whilst the उच्चतम overall स्कोरिंग व्यक्तिगत in the स्पीडवे ग्रैंड Prix events is pronounced the world champion.
Speedway is लोकप्रिय in सेंट्रल और उत्तरी Europe and to a lesser extent in Australia and North America.
a रूपांतर of track racing, speedway is administered internationally by the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme ( FIM ).
Domestic speedway events are regulated by FIM affiliated नेशनल मोटर खेल federations.
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार लिये intestinal absorption of calcium and phosphate.
In humans, the most important सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of विटामिन D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3.
cholecalciferol ( विटामिन d3 ) और ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 ) are unique as they constitute what we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can भी synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब sun exposure is adequate ( hence its nickname, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
Although विटामिन d is commonly पुकारा a विटामिन, it is not actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense, as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight.
( Cats and कुत्तो can नहीं synthesize vitamin D efficiently and must receive it in their diet. )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically called a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from their diet.
however, as साथ अन्य यौगिकों commonly पुकारा विटामिन, vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find the dietary substance that was lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the childhood form of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like other compounds called vitamins, in the developed world vitamin D is added to staple foods, such as milk, to avoid बीमारी due to deficiency.
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous synthesis from exposure to sunlight as well as intake from the diet, and it is believed that संश्लेषण may योगदान generally to the मेंटेनेंस of पर्याप्त serum concentrations.
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but, क्युकी of अनिश्चितता परिचय the कर्कट रिस्क इससे धूप, no सुझाव हैं जारी by the संस्थान of Medicine, USA, for the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements.
Accordingly, the Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that no synthesis occurs और कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन d is from their diet, although that will rarely occur in practice.
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( oh ) d ; और जिससे is the विशिष्ट विटामिन D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status.
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त, regulating the विशेषज्ञता of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone.
calcidiol is भी परिवर्तित to calcitriol बाहर of the गुर्दे लिये अन्य उद्देश्य, ऐसे as the proliferation, differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation.
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the evidence for other health effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
The best evidence of benefit is for bone health and a decrease in मृत्यु in बुजुर्ग महिलाओं.
The Duramax is a सामान्य मोटर्स डीज़ल engine family for light- and medium duty trucks, designed by Isuzu.
The 6.6-liter Duramax is produced by dmax, a joint venture between GM and Isuzu in Moraine, Ohio.
इस इंजन थी initially संस्थापित in 2001 model year Chevy and GMC trucks and has been an option since then in pickups, vans, and medium-duty trucks.
In 2006, production at Moraine was reportedly सीमित to लगभग 200,000 engines per year.
On May 9, 2007, DMAX announced the production of the 1,000,000th Duramax V-8 डीज़ल at इसके moraine facility.

is also a traditional लिखा संक्षिप्त for Baltimore, Maryland.

Balto ( 1919 – March 14, 1933 ) was a Siberian Husky sled dog who led his team on the final leg of the 1925 serum run to Nome, in which diphtheria antitoxin was transported from Anchorage, Alaska, to nenana, अलास्का, by ट्रैन और तब to nome by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease.
The run is commemorated by the annual iditarod ट्रेल sled Dog Race.
Balto थी नामित after the Sami explorer Samuel Balto.
Balto died at the आयु of 14.
Professor Stephen Hawking, known for being a सैद्धांतिक physicist, has appeared in many works of popular culture.
The Nissan Maxima is a mid-size / entry-level luxury car manufactured by Nissan, marketed as the `` four-door खेल car ''.
The origins of the Maxima began in July 1976 as the Datsun 810, an upscale six-cylinder version of the Bluebird, and was spun into its own line in 1981, having been made लगातार since then.
The `` Maxima '' name was applied धीरे, शुरूआत in 1981.
Most pre-2004 maximas यहूद निर्मित in Oppama, Japan, until the current North American Maximas started being assembled in Smyrna, Tennessee.
The `` Maxima '' has भी महरूम लागू to cefiros and Laurels in various markets.
propolis as hive sealing
Propolis is a resinous मिश्रण कि मधु मधुमक्खियों collect from tree buds, sap flows, or other botanical sources.
It is प्रयुक्त as a sealant for unwanted open spaces in the hive.
propolis is प्रयुक्त लिये छोटी गैप ( लगभग or less ), while larger spaces are usually filled with beeswax.
Its color varies depending on its botanical सोर्स, the most common being dark brown.
Propolis is स्टिकी at और above room temperature,.
At lower temperatures, it becomes hard and very brittle.
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; March 26, 1948 ) is an American singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the frontman और सीसे सिंगर of the Boston -based rock band Aerosmith, in which he also plays the harmonica, and occasional piano and percussion.
He is known as the `` राक्षस of screamin ' '' due to his high screams and his wide vocal range.
He is also known for उसके on-stage acrobatics.
During his high-energy performances, he usually dresses in उज्जवल, रंगीन outfits साथ उसके ट्रेडमार्क scarves hanging from his microphone stand.
In the 1970s, Tyler rose to prominence as the frontman of एरोस्मिथ, which released such milestone hard rock albums as Toys in the Attic and Rocks.
In the late 1970s and early 1980s, Tyler had a heavy drug and alcohol व्यसन, और the band 's popularity waned.
He completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently maintained sobriety for over 20 years, but had a relapse with prescription painkillers in the लेट 2000s, लिये जिससे he सफलतापूर्वक प्राप्त उपचार in 2009.
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late 1980s and early 1990s with the albums Permanent Vacation, Pump, and Get a Grip, टायलर became a household नाम और रै remained a प्रासंगिक rock icon.
As a result, he has since embarked on several solo endeavors including guest appearances on other artists ' music, film and TV roles ( including as a judge on American Idol ), authoring a bestselling किताब, और सोलो कार्य ( सहित a शीर्ष 40 hit single in 2011 ).
However, he has continued to record music and perform with Aerosmith, after more than 43 सालो in the बैंड.
The बैंड 's नवीनतम album, Music from Another Dimension !
, was released on नवम्बर 6, 2012.
Tyler is included among Rolling Stones 100 महानतम Singers.
He was also ranked 3rd on hit parader 's शीर्ष 100 मेटल Vocalists of All Time.
In 2001 he was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame with Aerosmith, and he was the प्रस्तुतकर्ता जब ac/dc थी inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003.
In 2013, Tyler and his songwriting partner Joe Perry will be recipients of the ASCAP संस्थापकों पुरस्कार और होगा भी be inducted into the songwriters Hall of Fame.
The liver produces यूरिया in the यूरिया cycle as a waste product of the digestion of protein.
Normal human adult blood should contain between 7 to 21 mg of urea nitrogen per 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood.
Individual laboratories may have different reference ranges, and this is because the procedure may vary.
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2, 1940 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल coach and college and professional football player who was the head coach of the NFL 's Detroit Lions from 1988 to 1996.
His 67 wins and 71 losses are each the most लिये a सिर कोच in team history.
The Jews ( ISO 259-3 Israeli pronunciation ), also known as the Jewish people, are a nation and an ethnoreligious समूह, originating in the Israelites or Hebrews of the Ancient Near East.
The Jewish ethnicity, nationality, and religion are strongly interrelated, as judaism is the traditional faith of the Jewish nation.
Converts to Judaism, whose status as Jews within the Jewish ethnos is equal to those born into it, have महरूम अवशोषित into the यहूदी लोगों throughout the millennia.
In Jewish tradition, Jewish ancestry is traced to the Biblical patriarchs अब्राहम, इसहाक़ और याक़ूब in the दूसरी मिलेनियम BCE.
The modern राज्य of इसराईल थी स्थापित as a Jewish nation-state, and defines itself as such in its Basic Laws.
इसके विधि of वापसी grants the right of citizenship to any Jew who requests it.
Israel is the only country where Jews हैं a बहुमत of the population.
Jews also enjoyed राजनैतिक स्वायत्तता twice before in ancient history.
The first of these periods lasted from 1350 to 586 BCE, and encompassed the periods of the Judges, the United Monarchy, and the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of इसराईल और यहूदा, समाप्ति साथ the विनाश of the पहला टेम्पल.
The second was the period of the Hasmonean Kingdom spanning इससे 140 to 37 BCE.
Since the destruction of the First टेम्पल, सबसे यहूदियों have lived in diaspora.
A minority in every country in which they live ( except Israel ), they have frequently experienced persecution throughout इतिहास, resulting in a जनसांख्यिकी कि रै fluctuated दोनो in numbers and distribution over the centuries.
The world Jewish population reached a peak of 15 million prior to the Second World War, but six लाख यहूदियों यहूद मारे in the holocaust.
Since then the population has risen again and, was estimated at 13.4 लाख by the North American Jewish Data Bank, or less than 0.2 % of the total world population ( roughly one in every 514 people ).
According to this report, about 42.5 % of all Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ), and 39.3 % in the United States ( 5.3 लाख ), साथ सबसे of the शेष living in Europe ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ).
These numbers include all those who consider themselves यहूदियों, whether or नहीं वे हैं संबद्ध साथ a यहूदी organization.
The total world Jewish population, however, is मुश्किल to माप.
In addition to issues with census methodology, there are halakhic disputes regarding who is a Jew and secular, राजनैतिक, और ancestral पहचान कारकों that may affect the figure considerably.

The Feast of Corpus christi ( लैटिन लिये देह of मसीह ), भी ज्ञात as कॉर्पस domini, is a Latin Rite liturgical solemnity celebrating the tradition and belief in the body and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist.
It emphasizes the joy of the institution of the Eucharist, which थी observed on पावन गुरुवार in the somber atmosphere of the nearness of Good Friday.
In the present Roman Missal, the feast is designated the solemnity of the Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ.
It is also celebrated in some Anglican, Lutheran, and Old कैथोलिक चर्च कि थाम समान मान्यताओं regarding the Real Presence.
The feast is liturgically celebrated on the Thursday after Trinity Sunday or, `` where the Solemnity of the Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ is not a Holy Day of Obligation, it is assigned to the Sunday बाद the सबसे पावन ट्रिनिटी as इसके उचित दिन ''.
At the end of Holy Mass, there is often a procession of the Blessed sacrament, generally प्रदर्शित in a monstrance.
The procession is followed by सुनाकर of the Blessed Sacrament.
A notable Eucharistic procession is that presided over by the Pope each year in Rome, where it begins at the archbasilica of st. जॉन lateran और makes इसके रास्ता to the Basilica of Saint Mary Major, where it concludes with Benediction.
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood, the levels of which rise in response to सूजन ( i.e. c-reactive प्रोटीन is an acute-phase protein ).
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the surface of मुर्दे or मरना कोशिकाएं ( और कुछ प्रकार of जीवाणु ) in order to activate the complement system via the C1Q complex.
CRP is synthesized by the liver in response to factors released by macrophages and fat cells ( adipocytes ).
It is a सदस्य of the pentraxin family of proteins.
It is not सम्बन्धित to C-peptide or protein C.
C-reactive protein was the first pattern मान्यता receptor ( prr ) to be identified.
The start of the systematic European colonization of the Americas is typically dated to 1492, when a Spanish expedition headed by क्रिस्टोफर कोलंबस sailed for India to open trade but inadvertently discovered the Americas.
European conquest, large-scale खोजी और colonization soon followed.
Seeing that Europe was preoccupied with many internal wars and was slowly recovering from the many deaths कि the bubonic प्लेग caused, the रैपिड विस्तार at जिससे it grew in wealth and power was unforeseeable in the early 1400s.
The first expeditions occurred along the Caribbean coasts on the islands of Hispaniola, प्यूर्टो रीको और क्यूबा, और बाद 1500 विस्तारित into the इंटीरियर्स of both North and South America.
In 1497, sailing from the north on behalf of England, John Cabot landed on the North American coast, and a साल बाद, कोलंबस 's तीसरा voyage पहुँचे the दक्षिण American coast.
France founded colonies in much of eastern North America, on a क्रमांक of caribbean आइलैंड्स, and in South America.
पुर्तगाल colonized Brazil.
Eventually, the entire Western Hemisphere came under the control of European governments, leading to profound changes to its landscape, जनसांख्यिकी, और संयंत्र और एनिमल life.
In the 19th century alone over 50 million people left यूरोपीय लिये the Americas.
the post-1492 era is known as the period of the Columbian Exchange.
कैथ रिचर्ड्स ( born 18 दिसम्बर 1943 ) is an English musician, singer-songwriter and founder member of the English rock band the Rolling Stones.
Rolling Stone magazine कहा रिचर्ड्स था निर्मित `` rock 's greatest single body of riffs '', ranking him 4th on its list of 100 best guitarists.
Fourteen songs Richards wrote with the Rolling Stones ' lead vocalist Mick Jagger are सूचीबद्ध among रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time ``.
Richards ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in part from several drug busts during the late 1960s and 1970s and his candour regarding his addiction to and eventual abstinence इससे हेरोइन.
टेस्टोस्टेरोन is a स्टेरॉयड hormone from the androgen group and is found in mammals, reptiles, birds, and other vertebrates.
In mammals, testosterone is primarily secreted in the testicles of males and the अंडाशय of महिलाओं, हालांकि छोटी amounts are also secreted by the adrenal glands.
It is the प्रिंसिपल पुरूष sex hormone and an anabolic steroid.
In men, testosterone plays a key role in the development of male reproductive tissues such as the testis and प्रोस्टेट as खूब as promoting द्वितीयक यौन विशेषताएँ ऐसे as increased मांसपेशी, bone mass, and the growth of body hair.
In जोड, टेस्टोस्टेरोन is अनिवार्य for health and well-being as well as the prevention of osteoporosis.
On average, in adult human males, the plasma concentration of testosterone is about 7–8 times as great as the विशेषज्ञता in वयस्क इंसान महिलाओं ' प्लाज्मा, लकिन as the metabolic खपत of टेस्टोस्टेरोन in males is वृहद, the daily production is about 20 times greater in men.
Females also हैं अधिक संवेदनशील to the hormone.
Testosterone is observed in सबसे vertebrates.
मछली मेक a slightly different form called 11-ketotestosterone.
Its counterpart in insects is ecdysone.
These सर्वव्यापी steroids सुझाएँ कि sex hormones have an ancient evolutionary history.
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique प्रयुक्त जब `` प्राकृतिक '' but relatively homogeneous groupings are evident in a statistical population.
It is often used in विपणन शोध.
In this technique, the total population is divided into these समूह ( or क्लस्टर ) and a simple random sample of the groups is selected.
Then the required information is collected from a simple random sample of the elements भीतर प्रत्येक selected group.
This may be done for every element in these groups or a subsample of तत्व may be चयनित भीतर each of these groups.
A common motivation for cluster sampling is to reduce the total number of साक्षात्कार और लागत दिए the desired सटीकता.
Assuming a fixed sample size, the technique देता अधिक सटीक परिणाम जब most of the variation in the population is within the groups, not between them.
Jamestown is a town in Guilford County, North Carolina, United States, और is a उपनगरीय of the आसपास शहरों of greensboro and High Point.
The population थी 3,382 at the 2010 census.
Natalie Portman ( born Natalie Hershlag ; ; June 9, 1981 ) is an actress और मॉडल साथ डुअल अमरीकी and Israeli citizenship.
Her first role was as an orphan taken in by a hitman in the 1994 action film, but mainstream success came when she was cast as Padmé Amidala in the स्टार युद्धों प्रीक्वेल त्रयी ( released in 1999, 2002 और 2005 ).
in 1999, she enrolled at Harvard University to study psychology while still working as an actress.
She completed उसके स्नातक 's degree in 2003.
In 2001, Portman खोली in नई यॉर्क नगर 's पब्लिक Theater production of Anton Chekhov 's The Seagull.
In 2005, Portman received a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting Actress and won the Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress - Motion Picture for the drama Closer.
She won a Constellation Award for Best Female Performance and a Saturn Award for Best अभिनेत्री for her starring role in V for Vendetta ( 2006 ).
She played leading roles in the ऐतिहासिक dramas गोया 's Ghosts ( 2006 ) and The Other Boleyn Girl ( 2008 ).
In May 2008, वो परोसा as the youngest member of the 61st Annual Cannes Film Festival jury.
Portman 's directorial debut, Eve, opened the 65th Venice अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व 's शॉर्ट्स प्रतियोगिता in 2008.
पोर्टमैन निर्देशित a segment of the collective film New York, I Love You.
In 2011, Portman won the Academy Award, the Golden Globe पुरस्कार, the bafta पुरस्कार, the स्क्रीन Actors Guild Award, and the Independent Spirit Award for her lead performance as Nina Sayers in Black Swan.
Copper is a chemical element with the प्रतीक cu ( इससे ) and atomic number 29.
It is a ductile मेटल साथ very high thermal and electrical conductivity.
Pure copper is soft and malleable ; a freshly उजागर सतह has a reddish-orange color.
it is used as a conductor of heat and electricity, a building material, and a constituent of various metal alloys.
The metal and its alloys have been used for thousands of सालो.
In the Roman era, copper was principally mined on Cyprus, hence the origin of the name of the मेटल as сyprium ( मेटल of साइप्रस ), later shortened to сuprum.
Its compounds हैं commonly encountered as तांबे ( ii ) लवण, जिससे प्रायः impart blue or green colors to minerals such as azurite and turquoise and have been widely used historically as pigments.
Architectural structures built साथ तांबे corrode to give green verdigris ( or patina ).
Decorative art prominently सुविधाएँ तांबे, both by itself and as part of pigments.
Copper is essential to all living जीवों as a ट्रेस dietary खनिज because it is a key constituent of the respiratory enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase.
In molluscs and crustacea तांबे is a constituent of the रक्त रंजक hemocyanin, which is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin in fish and other vertebrates.
The main areas where तांबे is found in vertebrates are liver, muscle and bone.
In sufficient concentration, copper compounds are poisonous to higher organisms and are used as bacteriostatic substances, fungicides, और wood preservatives.
The major professional खेल लीग, or simply major leagues, in the United States and Canada are the highest professional competitions of team sports in the two countries.
Although individual sports such as golf, tennis, and auto racing are also बहुत लोकप्रिय, the पद is usually limited to team sports.
The term `` major league '' was first used in 1921 in reference to Major League बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ), the शीर्ष स्तर of पेशेवर अमरीकी बेसबॉल.
Today, the major northern North America professional team sports लीग हैं प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ), the National Basketball Association ( NBA ), the National Football League ( NFL ), and the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
Other notable leagues शामिल प्रमुख लीग सॉकर ( mls ), the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( cfl ), the एरिना फ़ुटबॉल लीग, Major League Lacrosse, the National Lacrosse League and the Women 's National Basketball Association.
The NFL, MLB, NBA, and NHL हैं commonly referred to as the Big Four.
Each of these is the richest पेशेवर क्लबों competition in its sport worldwide.
The best players can become cultural icons in both countries and elsewhere in the world, because the लीग आनंद a significant place in popular culture in the US and Canada.
The NFL has 32 teams, and the अन्य have 30 प्रत्येक.
the विशाल बहुमत of प्रमुख लीग teams are concentrated in the most populous metropolitan areas of the United States.
Baseball, football, हॉकी, और सॉकर have था पेशेवर लीग लिये over 100 सालो ; जल्दी leagues such as the National Association, Ohio League, and National Hockey Association formed the basis of the modern MLB, NFL and NHL respectively.
Soccer was पहला professionalized in 1894, but leagues suffered greatly from lack of sustainability and seldom lasted more than a decade.
Soccer 's greatest successes were in the रूप of the अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ), the original North American Soccer League ( 1968-1984 ), the National Professional Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and, currently, Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ).
Basketball is a अपेक्षाकृत नई विकास ; the एनबीए विकसित इससे the नेशनल बास्केट League and its splinter group the Basketball Association of America, taking on its current form in 1949.
Every major league averages 15,000 प्रशंसक in उपस्थिति per game or higher as of 2011.
मध्याह्न ऊँचाई is an astronomical navigation method of calculating an observer 's latitude.
अर्जित मान प्रबन्धन ( evm ), or अर्जित मान project/performance management ( EVPM ) is a project management technique for measuring project performance and progress in an objective manner.
Because EVM has the क्षमता to combine माप of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
and cost,
in a single integrated प्रणाली, अर्जित Value Management is able to provide accurate forecasts of project performance problems, which is an important contribution for project management.
Early EVM research showed that the areas of planning and control are significantly impacted by its use ; and similarly, using the methodology improves both scope definition as well as the विश्लेषण of overall project performance.
More recent शोध अध्ययन have दिखाया that the principles of EVM are positive predictors of project success.
Popularity of EVM has grown significantly in recent years beyond सरकारी contracting, in जिससे सेक्टर इसके महत्व continues to rise ( e.g., recent new DFAR rules ), in part because EVM can also surface in and help substantiate contract disputes.

Spring is one of the four conventional temperate seasons, following winter and preceding summer.
There are various technical परिभाषाएं of वसन्त, लकिन लोकल उपयोग of the पद varies according to local climate, cultures and customs.
When it is spring in the northern hemisphere, it होगा be पतझड़ in the southern hemisphere.
At the spring equinox, days are close to 12 hours long साथ दिन लंबाई increasing as the season progresses.
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season, and also to ideas of rebirth, कायाकल्प, नवीकरण, क़यामत, and regrowth, with festivals such as Carnival, Easter and Holi being celebrated at this time.
Jamestown was a उपनिवेश in the उपनिवेश of Virginia, the first permanent English settlement in the Americas.
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` जेम्स फोर्ट '' on may 14, 1607 ( o.s., May 24, 1607 N.S. ), it followed several earlier failed attempts, including the Lost Colony of Roanoke.
Jamestown served as the capital of the colony for 83 years, इससे 1616 until 1699.
The settlement was located within the territory of a राजनैतिक एंटिटी ज्ञात as tsenacommacah, the state of the Powhatan Confederacy, with around 14,000 native inhabitants, and specifically was in part of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe.
The natives initially सत्कार the colonists साथ नाचना, feasting and tobacco ceremonies, and they provided crucial provisions and support for the survival of the colonists, who were not agriculturally inclined, although relations with the newcomers also soured fairly early on, leading to the total annihilation of the Paspahegh in warfare within 3 years.
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding, the Virginia Company brought Polish and डच colonists to help improve the settlement.
In 1619, the पहला प्रलेखित africans यहूद brought to jamestown, हालांकि the modern conception of slavery in the future United States did not begin in Virginia until 1660.
When the colony was subdivided into the असली eight shires of Virginia in 1634, the town became located in the eponymous James City Shire.
The London Company 's second settlement, Bermuda, claims to be the site of the oldest town in the English New World, as St. George 's, Bermuda was officially established ( as नई लंदन ) in 1612, whereas जेम्स फोर्ट, in वर्जिनिया, थी नहीं to be परिवर्तित into James towne until 1619, and further did not survive into the present day.
In 1699, the capital was relocated from jamestown to कया is आज williamsburg, बाद जिससे jamestown ceased to मौजूद as a उपनिवेश, मौजूदा today only as an archaeological site.
Today, jamestown is एक of तीन स्थितियाँ comprising the Historic Triangle of Colonial Virginia, along with Williamsburg and Yorktown, with two primary heritage sites.
Historic Jamestowne, the archaeological site on Jamestown Island, is a cooperative effort by Jamestown National Historic Site ( part of Colonial National ऐतिहासिक पार्क ), and Preservation Virginia.
The Jamestown Settlement, a जीना इतिहास interpretive site, is operated by the Jamestown Yorktown Foundation in conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia.
जेम्स क्रिस्टोफर Frey ( born September 12, 1969 ) is an American writer.
His books A लाख छोटी टुकड़े ( 2003 ) and My Friend Leonard ( 2005 ), as well as Bright Shiny Morning ( 2008 ), were bestsellers.
He was the subject of a scandal when investigators discovered that prison time and the extent of certain injuries were exaggerated in A Million Little Pieces, a अधिकारीगण autobiographical खाता of the लेखक 's struggle with addiction.
Deere & Company, सबसे commonly ज्ञात by इसके नाम जॉन deere, is an अमरीकी corporation based in Moline, Illinois, and one of the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in the world.
In 2012, it थी listed as 97th in the Fortune 500 America 's ranking and 190th in the Fortune 500 Global ranking.
Deere और कम्पनी agricultural उत्पाद, बेची अंतर्गत the जॉन deere नाम, include tractors, combine harvesters, cotton harvesters, balers, planters / seeders, sprayers, and UTVs.
The कम्पनी is भी a निर्माता of निर्माण equipment and forestry equipment, as well as a supplier of diesel engines and drivetrains ( axles, transmissions, gearboxes ) used in heavy equipment.
Additionally, John Deere manufactures equipment used in lawn, grounds, and turf care, such as walk-behind लॉन mowers, zero-turn लॉन mowers, lawn tractors, and snowthrowers.
To support the कोर व्यवसायों, जॉन Deere also provides financial services and other related activities.
The company 's slogan is `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' and has a picture of a leaping deer as a logo, a शब्द खेल pun on `` nothing runs like a deer ''.
Carl Westby coined the phrase `` nothing रनों Like a Deere '' for a marketing campaign to sell snowmobiles.
The company 's products are also identifiable by इसके distinctive shade of green paint, usually augmented by yellow trim.
The United States ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States currency.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander Hamilton, is currently featured on the obverse of the विधेयक, जबकि the u.S. राजकोष भवन is प्रदर्शित on the reverse.
( Hamilton is one of two non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल issued U.S. bills.
The other is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is one of only four people featured on U.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to the उपस्थित ) who was not born in the continental United States, as he was from the West Indies.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; and Robert मॉरिस, इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10 1878/80 चांदी प्रमाणपत्र ).
In addition, Kamehameha I, appears on the 2008 हवाई राज्य क्वार्टर. )
All $ 10 बिल्स जारी today are Federal Reserve Notes.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced due to wear.
Approximately 6 % of all US banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills are delivered by Federal Reserve बैंको in पीला straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton that belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट संग्रहण of New York City Hall.
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the पोर्ट्रेट चेहरों to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left, but was used only for intra-government transactions ).
Andy सैमुएल ग्रिफ़िथ ( June 1, 1926 – July 3, 2012 ) was an American actor, television producer, Grammy Award -winning Southern-gospel singer, and writer.
He थी a टोनी पुरस्कार nominee लिये दो भूमिकाएँ, और gained prominence in the starring role in director Elia Kazan 's film A Face in the Crowd ( 1957 ) before he became better known for his television roles, playing the lead characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock.
Theresa Penelope `` terri '' इरविन, ( née raines ; born जुलाई 20, 1964 ) is an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई -based, American -born naturalist, author, the widow of Australian naturalist Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah, Queensland, Australia.
She co-starred with her husband on The मगरमच्छ शिकारी, उनके unconventional टेलीविज़न प्रकृति वृत्तचित्र श्रेणी साथ with its spin-off series, Croc Files and The Crocodile Hunter Diaries.
She has lived in Australia चूंकि 1992, जब she married Steve Irwin.
Andreas Cellarius 's illustration of the Copernican system, इससे the harmonia macrocosmica ( 1660 ).
Heliocentrism, or heliocentricism, is the astronomical model in which the धरती और ग्रह revolve around a relatively stationary Sun at the center of the Solar System.
The word आता इससे the यूनानी ( helios `` sun '' and kentron `` center '' ).
Historically, heliocentrism was opposed to geocentrism, which placed the धरती at the center.
The notion that the Earth revolves around the सूर्य था महरूम प्रस्तावित as early as the 3rd century BC by Aristarchus of Samos, but Aristarchus 's heliocentrism attracted little attention until Copernicus revived and elaborated it.
Lucio Russo, however, argues that इस is a भ्रामक छाप resulting from the loss of scientific works of the Hellenistic Era.
Using indirect evidence he argues that a heliocentric view was expounded in हिप्पारकस 's कार्य on gravity.
It was not until the 16th century that a fully predictive mathematical model of a heliocentric system was presented, by the पुनर्जागरण गणितज्ञ, astronomer, और कैथोलिक मौलवी nicolaus कोपरनिकस of कैंडल, अग्रणी to the copernican Revolution.
In the following century, योहानेस कॅप्लर elaborated upon और विस्तारित this model to include elliptical orbits, and supporting observations made using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei.
With the observations of William Herschel, Friedrich Bessel, and others, astronomers realized that the sun was not the बीच of the ब्रह्मांड और by the 1920s Edwin Hubble had shown that it was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way ) that was only one of many billions.
नोराह जोन्स ( born geetali नोराह Jones Shankar ; March 30, 1979 ) is an American singer-songwriter, pianist, and actress.
वो is the बेटी of Indian sitar player Ravi Shankar and Sue Jones.
वो is भी anoushka Shankar 's half-sister.
In 2002, वो शुभारम्भ उसके सोलो म्यूज़िक करियर साथ the रिलीज of the commercially successful and critically acclaimed album Come Away with Me, a fusion of country music and pop with elements of jazz which was certified diamond album, selling over 26 million copies.
The record earned Jones five ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, सहित the Album of the Year, Record of the Year, and Best New Artist.
Her subsequent studio albums, Feels Like Home, released in 2004, Not Too Late, released in 2007, the same year she made her film debut in My Blueberry Nights, and her 2009 release The Fall all gained प्लेटिनम औकात, selling over a लाख नक़ल और यहूद generally well received by critics.
Jones ' fifth studio album, छोटी टूटा Hearts, was released on April 27, 2012.
Jones has won nine Grammy Awards and was 60th on Billboard magazine 's artists of the 2000–2009 दशक चार्ट.
Throughout her career, जोन्स रै जीती numerous awards and has sold more than 50 million albums worldwide.
Billboard named her the top jazz artist of the 2000–2009 decade.
Not to be उलझन with Dimension of a physical quantity.
For अन्य उपयोग, see Dimension ( disambiguation ).
From left to right, the वर्गाकार, the घन, and the tesseract.
The square is bounded by 1-dimensional lines, the cube by 2-dimensional areas, and the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes.
A projection of the घन is दिए चूंकि it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen.
The same applies to the tesseract, which additionally can तभी be दिखाया as a projection even in three-dimensional space.
A diagram showing the पहला चार स्थानिक आयाम.
In भौतिकी और गणित, the dimension of a space or object is informally defined as the minimum number of coordinates needed to specify any point within it.
Thus a line has a dimension of one because only one coordinate is needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on it ( लिये example, the point at 5 on a number line ).
A surface such as a plane or the surface of a cylinder or sphere has a dimension of two because two coordinates are needed to specify a point on it ( लिये example, to locate a point on the surface of a sphere you need both its latitude and its longitude ).
The inside of a घन, a बेलन or a गोला is three-dimensional because three coordinates are needed to locate a point within these spaces.
In physical terms, dimension refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume ) and इसके स्थिति in समय ( आभास as a अदिश आयाम साथ the t-axis ), as well as the spatial constitution of objects within—structures that correlate with both particle and field conceptions, interact according to relative properties of mass —and are fundamentally mathematical in description.
These, or other axes, may be referenced to uniquely पहचानो a पाइंट or structure in its attitude and relationship to other objects and occurrences.
Physical theories that incorporate time, such as general आपेक्षिकता, हैं कहा to कार्य in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``, ( defined as a Minkowski space ).
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' including quantum field and string theories.
The state-space of क्वांटम यांत्रिकी is an infinite-dimensional function space.
The concept of dimension is not restricted to शारीरिक वस्तुएँ.
High-dimensional spaces occur in mathematics and the sciences for many reasons, अक्सर as विन्यास स्पेसेस ऐसे as in लाग्रांजीय or Hamiltonian mechanics ; these are abstract spaces, independent of the physical space we live in.
Fontana ( ) is a city of 200,762 residents in San Bernardino काउंटी, California.
Founded in 1913, it remained essentially rural until World War II, when उद्योगों हेनरी J. कैसर निर्मित a विशाल स्टील मिल in the area.
It is now a regional hub of the trucking industry, with Interstate 10 and State Route 210 transecting the नगर इससे ईस्ट to वेस्ट, और अंतरराज्यीय 15 गुजर diagonally through its northwestern quadrant.
It is home to the largest of the San Bernardino County system libraries, a renovated ऐतिहासिक थिएटर, a नगरपालिका पार्क, और the स्वचालित क्लबों स्पीडवे on the साईट of the Kaiser Steel Mill.
Fontana also hosts the fontana दिनों हाफ Marathon and 5K run.
इस रेस is the तीव्रतम half-marathon कोर्स in the संसार.
The U.S. 2012 Census reported that Fontana 's population was 200,762 in 2012, making it the second सबसे populous नगर in San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state.
Cowboys स्टेडियम is a स्टेडियम साथ a retractable roof in Arlington, Texas.
It serves as the home of the National Football League 's डलास Cowboys.
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium, which opened in 1971, and served as the cowboys ' घर through the 2008 season.
It थी समाप्त on May 27, 2009.
The stadium seats 85,000, making it the तीसरा largest स्टेडियम in the NFL by seating capacity.
the अधिकतम क्षमता of the stadium, including standing room, is 105,000.
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections are behind seats in each end zone and on a series of छह elevated प्लेटफ़ॉर्म कनेक्ट by stairways.
It has the world 's largest column-free interior and the fourth largest high definition video screen, जिससे hangs इससे 20 yard line to 20 yard line.
The facility can also be used for a किस्में of अन्य क्रियाएँ बाहर of इसके main purpose ( professional football ) such as concerts, basketball games, boxing matches, college football and high school football contests, soccer matches, and motocross races.
Canadian historians until the 1980s tended to फ़ोकस on आर्थिक इतिहास, सहित labour history.
In part this is क्युकी कनाडा रै था दूर कम political or military conflicts than other societies.
This was especially true in the first half of the twentieth century when economic इतिहास थी overwhelmingly dominant.
Many of the most prominent English Canadian historians from this period were economic historians, such as हेरोल्ड innis, डोनाल्ड creighton और आर्थर R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian history were heirs to the traditions that developed in Europe and the संयुक्त राज्य, लकिन frameworks that worked well elsewhere often failed in Canada.
The heavily मार्क्सवादी बहकावे आर्थिक history that dominates Europe has little relevance to most of Canadian history.
A focus on class, urban areas, and industry fails to address कनाडा 's ग्रामीण और संसाधन आधारित अर्थव्यवस्था.
similarly, the monetarist school that is dominant in the United States also has been difficult to transfer north of the border.
The study of economic history in Canada became highly focused on economic भूगोल, और लिये अनेक सालो the dominant school of thought has been the staples thesis.
This school of thought bases the पढ़ाई of the कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था on the study of natural resources.
This दृष्टिकोण रै चूंकि भी become used outside of Canada in Australia and in many developing nations.
Before the arrival of europeans, the First Nations of what would become Canada had a large and vibrant trade network.
Furs, tools, decorative items, और अन्य goods यहूद प्रायः transported thousands of kilometres, mostly by canoe throughout the many rivers and lakes of the region.
The early European history of the Canadian economy is प्रायः पढ़ाई through the स्टेपल्स thesis which argues the Canadian economy developed through the exploitation of a series of staples that would be exported to Europe.
Carbon-14, 14C, or radiocarbon, is a radioactive isotope of कार्बन साथ a केंद्रक containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons.
Its presence in organic सामग्री is the आधार of the radiocarbon डेटिंग विधि pioneered by Willard Libby and colleagues ( 1949 ) to date archaeological, geological and hydrogeological samples.
Carbon-14 was discovered on 27 February 1940, by मार्टिन कामेन और sam Ruben at the University of California Radiation Laboratory in Berkeley, although its existence had been suggested by Franz Kurie in 1934.
There are three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12, 1 % is carbon-13, and carbon-14 occurs in trace amounts, i.e., बनाना up परिचय 1 भाग प्रति खरब ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the atmosphere.
The half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 years.
Carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through बीटा क्षय.
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on धरती is cosmic ray action upon nitrogen in the atmosphere, and it is therefore a cosmogenic nuclide.
however, open-air नाभिकीय testing between 1955–1980 contributed to this pool.
the अलग isotopes of carbon do not differ appreciably in their chemical properties.
This is used in chemical and biological research, in a technique called carbon labeling : carbon-14 atoms can be used to replace nonradioactive carbon, in order to trace chemical and biochemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ involving कार्बन अणु इससे कोई दिए सशुल्क यौगिक.
Lightning is a highly दृश्य रूप of energy transfer
Lightning strikes are electrical discharges on a विशाल scale between the atmosphere and an earth-bound object.
They mostly originate in thunderclouds and terminate on the मैदान, called Cloud to Ground ( CG ) lightning.
However, they may also be initiated from a very tall grounded object and reach into the clouds.
Although `` a lightning strike '' is commonly used to describe all lightning, it is rather erroneous and a misnomer, as only about 25 % of सब बिजली कार्यक्रम विश्वव्यापी हैं cg, the विशाल बल्क of lightning events are Intracloud ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( CC ), where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere.
The scientific name for the complete process of a single lightning event is a and it is a very complex, अनेक stepped बातचीत, which is not completely understood.
Most CG flashes only `` strike '' one physical location, referred to as a termination.
The primary conducting channel, the bright coursing लाइट तुम may देखिए और कॉल a `` स्ट्राइक '', is only about 1 inch in diameter, although to our eyes it looks much larger.
They are miles long, upwards of tens of मील.
And the entire flash, lasts only a few fractions of a second, most of जिससे is नहीं दृश्य to इंसान आँखें.
Thunder is सदा उत्पादित by lightning.
Just like lightning, that deceives our eyes, usually looking larger or closer than it really is, the earth 's atmosphere and our brain 's perception of the बाहर संसार, ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not.
Lightning can not happen in a वैक्यूम विहीन of ions, nor can thunder occur without molecules to vibrate.
Thunder is a शारीरिक निरपेक्ष लिये every single flash of lightning.
contrary to लोकप्रिय विश्वास, a बिजली स्ट्राइक itself is usually not responsible for multiple deaths or injuries from a single event.
It would be impossible given the natural tendencies of a flash, unless people or animals were stacked on top of each other, or they were somehow arranged खड़ा और भाग of the फ्लैश चैनल.
When lightning ignites an available fuel source and an explosion occurs, it is the शॉक वेव or आग causing the चोटों, not the strike itself.
Ground Currents, also called step potential, of an धरती termination is what truly causes most injuries or death to humans and animals.
The निकट instantaneous rush of surface charges, induced by the overhead thundercloud itself, race to the strike point from hundreds to thousands of feet away during discharge.
This current, caused during each stroke, takes the path of least प्रतिरोध, जिससे may be आयन समृद्ध इंसान or animal legs, over poorly conducting earth.
This is why it is बेहतरीन to crouch, साथ फीट close together, if ever caught in the open during a thunderstorm.
दुर्भाग्यवश, सबसे रिपोर्ट्स do नहीं चित्रण a distinction between the real cause of injury or death, be it the strike itself, a resulting explosion or fire, or usually responsible step potential.
Peter F. Kilmartin ( born 1962 ) is the current attorney सामान्य of Rhode Island.
Kilmartin is भी a रिटायर्ड पुलिस कप्तान and a former member of the Rhode Island House of Representatives.
