Sealing is an ordinance ( ritual ) performed in Latter Day Saints temples by a व्यक्ति पकड़कर the sealing प्राधिकार.
The purpose of this ordinance is to seal familiar संबंध, बनाना संभावित the existence of family relationships throughout eternity.
lds शिक्षाओं प्लेस ग्रेट importance on the specific authority required to perform these sealings.
Church doctrine teaches that इस प्राधिकार, पुकारा the Priesthood, corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in.
sealings हैं typically performed as marriages or as sealing of children to parents.
वे यहूद performed prior to the मौत of जोसेफ Smith, Jr. ( the main founder of the Latter Day Saint movement ), and are currently performed in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
Although some other denominations, ऐसे as the Community of Christ, view sealing as an artifact of Smith 's practice of plural marriage, some do still perform them.
The 2000s, pronounced `` two thousands '', was a decade that began on जनवरी 1, 2000, and ended on December 31, 2009.
Globalization, which had accelerated after the early 1990s fall of communism, जारी to be a force in the 2000s.
The growth of the Internet was one of the prime contributors to globalization दौरान the दशक, बनाना it संभावित लिये लोगों to interact with other people, express ideas, introduce others to different cultures and backgrounds, use goods and services, sell and buy online, research and learn about things, along with experiencing the world without having to leave home.
The institutions, linkages and technologies that emerged or were redefined earlier would subsequently in this दशक लाभ अनेक देशों, in particular China and India.
However, in other parts of the world such progress failed to address ongoing struggles with modernity, most notably characterized by the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist groups.
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to the United States, United किंगडम, स्पेन, कनाडा और अन्य राष्ट्र आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान, as खूब as implementing various anti-terrorist measures at home and abroad in what was known as the War on Terror.
The यूरोपीय Union saw further integration and expansion throughout much of Europe.
The economic growth of the 2000s had considerable पर्यावरणीय consequences, उठाया माँग लिये घटाते उर्जा संसाधन, और थी still shown to be vulnerable as demonstrated during the Global Financial Crisis of the late 2000s.
The Gunfight at the O.K. Corral was a gunfight that took place at about 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday, अक्तूबर 26, 1881, in tombstone, Arizona Territory, and is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old West.
The gunfight, believed to have lasted तभी परिचय तीस सेकेंड, थी लड़ा between the outlaw Cowboys Billy Claiborne, Ike and Billy Clanton, and Tom and Frank McLaury, and the opposing town Marshal Virgil Earp and his brothers Assistant Town Marshal Morgan and temporary lawman Wyatt, aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil.
Ike Clanton and Billy Claiborne ran from the fight unharmed, but Ike 's brother बिली clanton थी मारे, साथ साथ both McLaurys.
Lawmen वर्जिल और मॉर्गन earp and Doc Holliday were wounded.
Only Wyatt Earp came through the लड़ो unharmed.
The fight has come to represent a time in American history when the frontier was open range for outlaws opposed by विधि प्रवर्तन कि was spread thin over vast territories, leaving some areas unprotected.
The gunfight was not well known to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published what has since महरूम संकल्पित to be a largely fictionalized जीवनी, व्याट earp : frontier मार्शल, दो सालो after Earp 's death.
Lake retold his story in a 1946 किताब कि निदेशक John Ford developed into the movie My Darling Clementine.
After the movie Gunfight at the O.K. Corral was released in 1957, the गोलीबारी आए to be ज्ञात by that name.
Since then, the conflict has been portrayed साथ varying डिग्री of सटीकता in numerous Western films and books.
despite इसके नाम, the gunfight दरअसल occurred in a narrow lot six doors west of the rear entrance to the O.K. Corral on Fremont Street, and also in the street.
The two opposing parties were initially तभी about apart.
About thirty shots were fired in तीस seconds.
Ike Clanton filed murder charges against the Earps and Doc Holliday but they were eventually exonerated by a local judge after a 30-day preliminary सुनना और तब again by a लोकल ग्रैंड jury.
On December 28, 1881, Virgil Earp was maimed in an assassination attempt by the outlaw Cowboys, and on March 18, 1882, वे assassinated मॉर्गन earp.
The suspects furnished solid alibis, and newly appointed डिप्टी u.s. मार्शल व्याट earp took matters into उसके अपना हैंड्स दौरान the earp वेंडेट्टा सवारी, ironically pursued by county Sheriff Johnny Behan with warrants for the Earp 's arrest.
HDMI ( High-Definition Multimedia Interface ) is a compact audio/video interface for transferring uncompressed video आंकड़ा और compressed/uncompressed डिजिटल ऑडियो आंकड़ा इससे a hdmi-compliant यंत्र ( `` the सोर्स device '' ) to a compatible computer monitor, video projector, digital television, or digital audio device.
HDMI is a digital replacement for मौजूदा एनालॉग वीडियो standards.
There are a number of HDMI-standard cable connectors available, each of which can be used for any uncompressed TV or PC video format, including standard, enhanced, high definition, and 3D video signals ; up to 8 channels of compressed or uncompressed digital ऑडियो ; a cec ( उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स कंट्रोल ) कनेक्शन ; और an ईथरनेट आंकड़ा कनेक्शन.
HDMI implements the eia/cea-861 मानकों, जिससे define वीडियो स्वरुप and waveforms, transport of compressed, uncompressed, and LPCM audio, auxiliary data, and implementations of the VESA EDID.
The CEC allows HDMI devices to control each other when necessary and allows the उपयोक्ता to operate multiple devices with one remote control handset.
Because HDMI is electrically compatible with the CEA-861 signals used by digital visual interface ( DVI ), no signal conversion is necessary, nor is वहीँ a घाटा of वीडियो विशेषता जब a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used.
As an uncompressed CEA-861 connection, HDMI is independent of the various digital television standards used by individual devices, such as ATSC and dvb, as ये हैं encapsulations of संपीडित एमपीईजी वीडियो स्ट्रीम ( जिससे can be decoded and output as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ).
उत्पादन of consumer HDMI products started in late 2003.
In Europe either DVI-HDCP or HDMI is included in the hd तैयार in-store labeling specification लिये TV sets for HDTV, formulated by EICTA with SES Astra in 2005.
HDMI began to appear on consumer HDTV camcorders और डिजिटल still cameras in 2006.
As of January 8, 2013, which is ten years after the release of the first HDMI specification, over 3 billion HDMI devices have shipped चूंकि the लॉन्च of the hdmi मानक.
Bree Van de Kamp ( née Mason ; also known in the series as Bree Hodge and Bree Weston ) is a fictional अक्षर और एक of the चार protagonists on the ABC television series Desperate Housewives.
She is played by actress Marcia Cross, who has received अनेक पुरस्कार और nominations लिये उसके portrayal, सहित an एमी पुरस्कार nomination, three Golden Globe Award nominations, and two Screen Actors Guild Awards.
Cross 's portrayal of ब्री has been widely praised by critics and fans.
Cross originally auditioned for the role of Mary Alice Young, लकिन श्रेणी निर्माता मार्क चेरी विचार वो थी better suited for the role of Bree.
Dana Delany, जो आखिरकार थी डाल as कैथरीन Mayfair, was originally chosen for the role but turned it down, saying it was too similar to her role in Pasadena.
Bree 's main struggle throughout the series has been her attempts to maintain a perfect life despite various बाधाएं ऐसे as widowhood, तलाक, और alcoholism hindering her.
She has been married three times ; to Rex Van de Kamp ( Steven Culp ), Orson Hodge ( काइल maclachlan ) and Trip Weston ( Scott Bakula ).

The Hangover Part ii is a 2011 अमरीकी कॉमेडी film produced by Legendary Pictures and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures.
It is the sequel to 2009 's The Hangover और the दूसरी फिल्मी in the hangover franchise.
Todd Phillips directed the film in addition to co-authoring the स्क्रिप्ट with Craig Mazin, and Scot Armstrong.
The film stars ब्राडली कूपर, ed helms, zach galifianakis, Ken Jeong, Jeffrey Tambor, Justin Bartha and Paul Giamatti.
The Hangover Part II tells the story of Phil, Stu, Alan, और डग as they travel to Thailand for Stu 's wedding.
After the bachelor party in लास वेगास, stu takes no chances and opts for a safe, subdued pre-wedding brunch.

Development of The hangover भाग ii began in April 2009, two months before The Hangover was released.
The प्रिंसिपल अभिनेताओं यहूद cast in March 2010 to reprise their roles from the first film.
Production began in अक्तूबर 2010, in ओंटारियो, California, before moving on location in Thailand.
The film was released on May 26, 2011 and, despite receiving ज़्यादातर ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, it became the highest-grossing R-rated comedy during its theatrical run.
A third फिल्मी is नियत for on May 24, 2013.

The English Renaissance was a cultural and artistic गति in इंग्लैण्ड डेटिंग इससे the लेट 15th and early 16th centuries to the early 17th century.
It is associated with the pan-European Renaissance that is usually regarded as beginning in Italy in the लेट 14th सदी.
Like most of northern Europe, इंग्लैण्ड देखी छोटी of ये developments until more than a century later.
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken, as a convenience, to be 1485, जब the बैटल of bosworth फ़ील्ड ended the Wars of the Roses and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty.
Renaissance style and ideas, however, were slow in penetrating England, and the Elizabethan era in the दूसरी हाफ of the 16th सदी is प्रायः regarded as the height of the English Renaissance.
Elizabeth Ann Bloomer Warren `` Betty '' Ford ( April 8, 1918 – जुलाई 8, 2011 ), थी पहला महिला of the United States from 1974 to 1977 during the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford.
As First Lady, she was active in सोशल नीति और created precedents as a politically active presidential wife.
Throughout her husband 's term in office, she maintained ऊँची स्वीकृति दरजा despite विपक्ष from some conservative Republicans who objected to her more moderate and liberal positions on social issues.
Ford was विख्यात लिये उठाने स्तन कर्कट जागरूकता following उसके 1974 mastectomy and was a passionate supporter of, and activist for, the Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA ).
Pro-choice on abortion and a leader in the Women 's Movement, she gained fame as एक of the सबसे निष्कपट पहला महिलाओं in इतिहास, commenting on प्रत्येक hot-button समस्या of the time, including feminism, equal pay, the ERA, sex, drugs, abortion, and gun control.
वो भी उठाया जागरूकता of addiction when she announced her long-running battle with alcoholism in the 1970s.
Following her White House years, she continued to lobby for the ERA and remained क्रियाशील in the feminist movement.
She was the founder, and served as the first chair of the फलक of निर्देशकों, of the बेट्टी घाट बीच लिये पदार्थ गाली और addiction and is a recipient of the Congressional Gold Medal ( co-presentation with her husband, Gerald R. Ford, October 21, 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( alone, presented 1991, by George H. W. Bush ).

The Miss Florida USA competition is the pageant that selects the representative for the state Florida in the Miss USA pageant.
While Florida has been कामयाब in शर्तें of runners-up, finalists and semi-finalists, the state has never won the Miss USA pageant, although Cheryl Patton became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe.
Florida 's best results were during the mid-1960s to mid-1970s.
Their most recent finalist was lissette गार्सिया जो लगाई in the top 16 in 2011.
Two former Miss Florida टीन यूएसए titleholders have जीती this competition, and three titleholders have also competed at Miss America.
The current titleholder is मिशेल aguirre of Hialeah.
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the काल of the इतिहास of the भाग of ब्रिटेन that became known as England, lasting from the end of Roman occupation and establishment of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms in the 5th century until the Norman conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror.
Anglo-Saxon is a general term referring to the Germanic peoples who came to Britain during the 5th and 6th सदियां, सहित Angles, Saxons, Frisii, and Jutes.
The term also refers to the भाषा बोला at the समय in इंग्लैण्ड, जिससे is अभी पुकारा बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी, और to the संस्कृति of the era, which has long attracted popular and scholarly attention.
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the Heptarchy, the kingdoms of नॉर्थम्ब्रिया, mercia, ईस्ट anglia, एसेक्स, Kent, Sussex, and Wessex.
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed anglo-saxon paganism दौरान the जल्दी period, but converted to Christianity during the 7th century.
paganism था a फाइनल stronghold in a काल of Mercian hegemony during the 640s, ending with the death of Penda of Mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of viking invasions, the House of Wessex became dominant during the 9th century, under the rule of Alfred the Great.
During the 10th century, the individual kingdoms unified under the rule of Wessex into the किंगडम of इंग्लैण्ड, जिससे stood opposed to the danelaw, the Viking kingdoms established from the 9th century in the north and east of England.
The Kingdom of England fell in the viking आक्रमण इससे डेनमार्क in 1013 और थी ruled by the House of Denmark until 1042, when the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored.
the last Anglo-Saxon king, Harold Godwinson, was killed in 1066 at the Battle of Hastings.

Smoked सामन is a तैयारी of salmon, typically a fillet that has been cured and hot or cold smoked.
Due to इसके मध्यम ऊँची दाम, smoked salmon is considered a delicacy.

View of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति and placement.
Defibrillation is a common treatment for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, और pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of विद्युत energy to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of device used or needed.
Some external units, known as automated external defibrillators ( aeds ), automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms, meaning that lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little, or in some cases no training at all.
gabrielle `` कोको '' bonheur चैनल ( अगस्त 19, 1883 – January 10, 1971 ) was a French fashion designer and founder of the Chanel brand.
She was the तभी फ़ैशन designer to appear on Time magazine 's list of the 100 most influential people of the 20th century.
Along with Paul Poiret, Chanel was credited with liberating women from the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' and popularizing the acceptance of a sportive, कैज़ुअल चिक as the feminine standard in the post- World War I era.
A prolific फ़ैशन निर्माता, चैनल 's influence extended beyond couture clothing.
Her design aesthetic थी एहसास in jewelry, handbags, and fragrance.
उसके हस्ताक्षर scent, Chanel No. 5, has become an iconic product.
Chanel was known for her lifelong determination, महत्वाकांक्षा और energy which she applied to her professional and social life.
She achieved दोनो कामयाबी as a businesswoman and social prominence thanks to the connections she made through her work.
These included many artists and craftspeople to जिसको she became a patron.
However, Chanel 's अत्यधिक प्रतिस्पर्धी, opportunistic व्यक्तित्व led उसके to मेक questionable life choices which have generated controversy around her reputation, particularly her behaviour during the German occupation of France in World War II.

A gristmill ( भी : grist mill, corn mill or flour mill ) grinds grain into flour.
The term can refer to both the पीस mechanism and the building that holds it.
Romania ( ; dated spellings Roumania and Rumania ; ) is a country located at the intersection of सेंट्रल और southeastern यूरोपीय, bordering on the Black Sea.
Romania shares a border with Hungary and Serbia to the वेस्ट, युक्त और moldova to the northeast and east, and Bulgaria to the south.
At, Romania is the eighth largest country of the European Union by area, and रै the सातवाँ largest population of the European Union with more than 19 million people.
Its capital and biggest city is बुखारेस्ट, the 11th largest city in the EU.
The United principalities उभरा जब the territories of Moldavia and Wallachia were united under Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859.
In 1866 Prince Karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was called to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the Romanian Principate and in 1881 he was finally crowned as King Carol I the पहला monarch of the किंगडम of Romania.
Independence इससे the Ottoman Empire was declared on 9 May 1877, and was internationally recognized the following year.
At the end of World War I, Transylvania, Bukovina and Bessarabia संयुक्त साथ the किंगडम of Romania.
World War II gave cause to the वृद्धि of a सैन्य तानाशाही in रोमानिया अंतर्गत फासिस्ट General Ion Antonescu, who chose to fight on the side of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944.
After his removal, Romania switched sides in 1944 और joined the allies.
By the end of the war, some formerly Romanian northeastern territories यहूद occupied by the सोवियत संघ, with Red Army units stationed on Romanian soil.
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a लोगों 's गणतंत्र ( 1947-1965 ) and a member of the Warsaw Pact.
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became General सचिव of the रोमानियाई कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी, और the हर्ष austerity उपायों, राजनैतिक दमन, और cult of व्यक्तित्व he implemented led to the समाजवादी Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc.
Eventually his authoritarian government was toppled in दिसम्बर 1989 दौरान the Romanian Revolution of 1989.
With the fall of the आयरन पर्दा, रोमानिया began its transition towards democracy and a capitalist market economy.
After a decade of post-revolution economic problems and living-standards मनाही, extensive reforms fostered आर्थिक रिकवरी.
As of 2010, Romania is an upper-middle-income country with a high human development अनुक्रमणिका.
रोमानिया joined नाटो on 29 March 2004, and the European Union on 1 January 2007.
It is also a member of the : लैटिन संघ, francophonie, OSCE, WTO, BSEC, United Nations, etc.
Today, Romania is a unitary semi-presidential गणतंत्र, in जिससे the executive branch consists of the President and the Government.
`` Ancient '' redirects यहाँ.
लिये अन्य uses, see Antiquity ( disambiguation ).
The times before लिखने belong either to protohistory or to prehistory.
Khafre 's पिरामिड ( 4th dynasty ) and Great Sphinx of Giza ( c. 2500 BC or perhaps earlier )
Ancient history is the study of the written past from the beginning of अंकित इंसान इतिहास to the जल्दी मध्य Ages.
The span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 years, with Cuneiform script, the oldest discovered form of coherent writing, from the protoliterate period around the 30th सदी BC.
This is the beginning of इतिहास, as opposed to प्रागितिहास, according to the definition used by most historians.
The term classical antiquity is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to history in the Old World from the beginning of recorded Greek history in 776 BC ( First Olympiad ).
This roughly coincides साथ the परंपरागत date of the founding of Rome in 753 BC, the beginning of the history of ancient Rome, and the beginning of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece.
Although the ending date of ancient history is disputed, some Western scholars use the fall of the Western Roman Empire in 476 AD, the closure of the Platonic Academy in 529 AD, the death of the emperor Justinian I, the coming of Islam or the rise of शारलेमेन as the समाप्त of प्राचीन और शास्त्रीय यूरोपीय इतिहास.
In India, the period includes the जल्दी काल of the मध्य kingdoms, और, in चीन, the time up to the Qin Dynasty is included.
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a form of विटामिन B12.
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12, occurring as अंधेरा रेड crystals कि freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin B12, vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12, also called cobalamin, is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the दिमाग and nervous system, and for the formation of blood.
It is one of the eight B विटामिन.
It is सामान्यतः शामिल in the metabolism of every cell of the human body, especially affecting DNA synthesis and regulation, but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production.
Neither fungi, पौधे, nor पशु हैं capable of producing vitamin B12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the एंजाइमों जरूरी लिये इसके संश्लेषण, although many foods are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest और सबसे structurally complicated vitamin and can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a क्लास of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), all of which have vitamin activity.
It contains the biochemically rare element cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( which प्रायः उपज hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन परिवर्तन between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body.
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, करता नहीं occur in प्रकृति, लकिन is उत्पादित इससे बैक्टीरियल hydroxocobalamin और तब used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements, and as a food additive, because of its stability and lower production cost.
In the body it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the साइनाइड, albeit in minimal विशेषज्ञता.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, और adenosylcobalamin can be मिला in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements.
The extra utility of ये is फिलहाल debated.
Vitamin B12 was खोजा इससे इसके संबंध to the disease pernicious anemia, which is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic फ़ैक्टर is निर्णायक लिये the सामान्य absorption of B12, so a lack of intrinsic factor, as seen in pernicious anemia, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency and their biochemical प्रभाव have चूंकि महरूम elucidated.
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization, characterised by an autocratic form of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman Republic, which preceded it, था महरूम destabilized through a series of civil wars.
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire, including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 bc ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented स्थिरता और समृद्धि ज्ञात as the pax romana ( `` रोमन सलाम '' ).
It reached its महानतम expanse during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its existence, but थी reunified और stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th century, during which समय a प्रणाली of डुअल नियम थी विकसित in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th सदी, the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as what would later be known as the Byzantine Empire.
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance, the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the development of language, religion, architecture, philosophy, law, और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed, विशेषकर यूरोपीय, और by अर्थात् of यूरोपीय expansionism throughout the modern world.
Total देह सतह क्षेत्रफल ( tbsa ) is an assessment measure of burns of the skin.
In adults, the `` rule of nines '' is used to determine the total प्रतिशत of क्षेत्रफल burned लिये प्रत्येक प्रमुख section of the body.
In some cases, the burns may cover more than one body part, or may not fully cover such a part ; in these cases, burns हैं measured by using the casualty 's palm as a reference point for 1 % of the body.
For children and infants, the lund-browder चार्ट is प्रयुक्त to assess the burned body surface area.
Different percentages are used because the ratio of the combined सतह क्षेत्रफल of the सिर और गर्दन to the सतह क्षेत्रफल of the limbs is typically larger in children than that of an adult.
Typical मान लिये आम groups of humans follow.
( due to rounding, values may not add to 100 %. )

The `` KJ '' part of his name refers to his old rap alias, `` King J. Mac, '' a name which he later वर्णित in एक of उसके podcasts as `` horribly cheesy. ''
`` 52 '', which is pronounced `` five two '', not `` fifty-two '', is a reference to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the multitude with five loaves and two fish, which is भी सुंग परिचय in उसके सोंग `` धक्का up '' इससे the yearbook और in the `` kj पाँच दो '' on It 's Pronounced 'Five Two.
He was awarded the Rap/Hip Hop Recorded Song of the Year for `` Never Look Away '' और rap/hip हॉप एल्बम of the Year at the GMA Dove Awards of 2007.

The degree symbol ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is used, among other things, to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g. in भौगोलिक निर्देशांक प्रणालियों ), hours ( in the medical field ), or degrees of temperature.
The प्रतीक consists of a छोटी उठाया circle, historically a zero glyph.
In युनिकोड it is encoded at.
This is a list of roots, suffixes, और prefixes प्रयुक्त in चिकित्सा शब्दावली, their meanings, and their etymology.
There are a few rules when using चिकित्सा जड़ें.
firstly, prefixes और प्रत्यय, primarily in Greek, but also in Latin, have a droppable -o-.
As a general rule, this -o- लगभग सदा अधिनियमों as a joint-stem to connect two consonantal roots, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
But generally, the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = arthritis, instead of arthr-o-itis.
Secondly, medical roots generally go together according to language : Greek prefixes go with यूनानी प्रत्यय और लैटिन prefixes साथ Latin suffixes.
Although international scientific vocabulary is नहीं कठोर about segregating combining forms of different languages, it is advisable when coining new words not to mix different lingual roots.
Stomach cancer, or gastric cancer, refers to cancer arising from any part of the पेट.
Stomach cancer causes परिचय 800,000 मौतों worldwide per year.
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) because most मरीजों उपस्थित साथ उन्नत बीमारी.
Sara Lynn Evans ( born February 5, 1971 ) is an American देश सिंगर and songwriter.
For her संपूर्ण करियर, she has been signed to RCA Records Nashville.
इवांस ' डेब्यू, तीन मदारी और the Truth, did not produce a Top 40 hit on the Hot Country Songs charts.
She followed इस up साथ no प्लेस कि दूर ( 1998 ), Born to Fly ( 2000 ), Restless ( 2003 ) and Real Fine Place ( 2005 ).
No Place That Far received a gold certification from the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( RIAA ), while the other three albums all were certified platinum.
These discs include the number 1 singles `` No Place That Far ``, `` Born to Fly ``, `` Suds in the Bucket `` and `` A Real Fine Place to प्रारंभ ``, प्लस the शीर्ष 10 हिट्स `` i could नहीं पूछो लिये अधिक `` ( a कवर of the एडविन मैक्केन song ), `` I Keep Looking ``, `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' ``.
Her 2007 महानतम Hits included the top 15 hits `` You 'll Always Be My Baby `` and `` As If ``.

Evans has भी जीती एक पुरस्कार प्रत्येक इससे बिलबोर्ड, the Academy of Country Music, Country Music Association, Broadcast Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove Award.
The world 's principal religions and spiritual traditions may be classified into a small number of major groups, although this is by no अर्थात् a वर्दी अभ्यास.
This theory began in the 18th century with the goal of recognizing the सापेक्ष स्तर of civility in societies.
Berliners watching a C-54 जमीन at tempelhof Airport ( 1948 )
The Berlin blockade ( 24 June 1948 – 12 May 1949 ) was one of the first major अंतरराष्ट्रीय crises of the Cold War.
During the multinational occupation of post–World War II जर्मनी, the सोवियत संघ अवरोधित the Western Allies ' railway, road, and canal access to the sectors of Berlin under Allied control.
Their aim was to force the western powers to allow the Soviet zone to start supplying बर्लिन साथ खाना और ईंधन, thereby giving the Soviets practical control over the entire city.
In response, the Western Allies organized the Berlin एयरलिफ्ट to carry आपूर्तियाँ to the लोगों in West Berlin.
Aircrews from the United States Air Force, the British Royal Air Force, the Royal Australian Air Force, the Royal Canadian Air Force, the Royal New Zealand Air Force, and the South African Air Force flew over 200,000 flights in one year, providing up to 4700 टन of रोज़ necessities ऐसे as fuel and food to the Berliners.
By the spring of 1949, the effort थी clearly succeeding और, by April, the airlift was delivering more cargo than had previously been transported into the city by rail.
The success of the Berlin Airlift brought शर्मिंदगी to the soviets जो था refused to believe it could make a difference.
The blockade थी lifted in May 1949 and resulted in the creation of two separate German states.
The संघीय गणतंत्र of जर्मनी ( वेस्ट जर्मनी ) and the German Democratic Republic ( East Germany ) split up Berlin.
In remembrance of the airlift, three airports in the former western zones of the नगर परोसा as the primary gateways to Germany for another fifty years.
The euro sign ; logotype और हस्तलिखित.
The euro चिह्न is the करेंसी चिह्न प्रयुक्त लिये the euro, the official currency of the Eurozone in the European Union ( EU ).
The डिज़ाइन थी प्रस्तुत to the public by the European Commission on 12 December 1996.
The international three-letter code ( according to आईएसओ मानक ISO 4217 ) for the euro is EUR.
In युनिकोड it is encoded at.
In English, the चिह्न precedes the value.
In some styleguides, but not others, the euro sign is unspaced.
Mate (, ; sometimes also spelled maté ), also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a traditional South American infused drink, विशेषकर in अर्जेंटीना, उरुग्वे, पैराग्वे और the दक्षिणी राज्य of ब्राज़ील और to a lesser degree in south of Chile, the Bolivian Chaco, Syria and Lebanon.
It is prepared इससे steeping सूखी leaves of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, known in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot water.
Mate is परोसा साथ a मेटल स्ट्रॉ from a shared hollow calabash gourd.
The straw is पुकारा a bombilla in कुछ लैटिन अमरीकी countries, a bomba in Portuguese, and a bombija or, more generally, a masassa ( type of straw ) in Arabic.
The स्ट्रॉ is traditionally made of silver.
Modern, commercially available straws are typically made of nickel silver, called Alpaca ; stainless स्टील, or hollow-stemmed cane.
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; जबकि in ब्राज़ील, it रै the विशिष्ट नाम of cuia, or भी cabaça ( the name for Indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in other regions of Brazil, still used for general food and drink in remote regions ).
Even if the water is supplied from a modern thermos, the infusion is traditionally नशे इससे mates or cuias.
as साथ अन्य brewed herbs, yerba mate leaves are dried, chopped, and ground into a powdery mixture called yerba.
The bombilla अधिनियमों as both a straw and a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, साथ छोटी छेद or slots that allow the brewed liquid in, but block the chunky matter that makes up much of the mixture.
A modern bombilla design uses a straight tube with holes, or वसन्त sleeve to act as a sieve.
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have been on the market in अर्जेंटीना, पैराग्वे और उरुग्वे for many years under such trade names as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina, `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay, and in Brazil under the name `` Mate Leão ''.
इस is माना a completely different drink.
It is never drunk from cuias or called chimarrão, nor is it संबद्ध with the gaucho/gaúcho culture.
The automotive industry is a term that covers a wide range of companies and organisations involved in the डिज़ाइन, विकास, manufacture, marketing, and selling of motor vehicles, towed vehicles, motorcycles and mopeds.
It is one of the world 's सबसे important economic sectors by revenue.
The term automotive उद्योग प्रायः करता नहीं शामिल उद्योग dedicated to the maintenance of automobiles following delivery to the end-user, such as repair shops and motor fuel filling stations.
The term automotive was created इससे यूनानी autos ( स्वः ), और लैटिन motivus ( of motion ) to represent any form of self-powered vehicle.
This term was proposed by SAE सदस्य एल्मर स्पेरी.
David Michael `` Dave '' Bautista, Jr. ( born January 18, 1969 ), is an American mixed martial artist, bodybuilder, actor, and former professional wrestler best known लिये उसके समय in संसार कुश्ती entertainment competing under the ring name Batista.
In WWE, he became a six-time संसार चैंपियन, जीतना the World Heavyweight Championship four times, and the WWE Championship two times.
He is the longest-reigning World Heavyweight चैंपियन in डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई इतिहास.
In addition to these championships, Batista has won the World Tag Team Championship three times ( twice with Ric Flair and once with John Cena ) and the WWE Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey Mysterio ).
Batista was also the winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble match and went on to headline WrestleMania 21, एक of the शीर्ष पाँच highest-grossing pay-per-view events in pro wrestling history.
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power Plant, Batista signed a अनुबंध साथ the wwf in 2000 और थी भेजा to इसके developmental territory, Ohio Valley Wrestling ( OVW ), where he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship.
In August 2012, bautista हस्ताक्षरित a अनुबंध with Classic Entertainment & Sports to fight in mixed martial arts.
He won his MMA debut on October 6, 2012, defeating Vince lucero via tko in the पहला गोलाकार.
हेनरी T. थामस sampson, jr. ( born in Jackson, Mississippi in 1934 ) is an African-American inventor.
he ग्रैजुएट from high school in 1951 from Lanier High School in Jackson, Mississippi.
He then attended Morehouse College for a couple of years before transferring to Purdue University where he became a member of the Omega Psi Phi बिरादरी.
He received a Bachelor 's degree in विज्ञान इससे purdue विश्वविद्यालयों in 1956.
He graduated with an MS degree in engineering from the University of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लॉस एंजिल्स in 1961.
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear Engineering from the University of Illinois urbana-champaign in 1965, और उसके phd in 1967.
He is the पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to earn a Ph.D.in Nuclear Engineering in the United States.
Some of his accomplishments include being a member of the United राज्य नेवी between the सालो 1962 और 1964 and earning an Atomic Energy Commission honor between 1964 and 1967.
Later he was awarded the Black Image Award इससे aerospace निगम in 1982.
He was awarded the Blacks in Engineering, Applied Science Award, and prize for शिक्षा, by the लॉस एंजिल्स परिषद of ब्लैक पेशेवर Engineers in 1983.
In June 2007, Sampson was married to Laura Howzell Young in St. Thomas, u.S. वर्जिन आइलैंड्स.
Young-Sampson is a प्राध्यापक in the कॉलेज of शिक्षा at California State University San Bernardino.
Robert Lane Gibbs ( born March 29, 1971 ) is a वरिष्ठ campaign adviser for US President Barack Obama.
previously, he was the 28th White House Press Secretary.
गिब्स थी the संचार निदेशक for then- U.S. Senator Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign.
Gibbs, who has worked with Obama since 2004, was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in सीनेट अभियान, having परोसा as संचार निदेशक लिये the लोकतांत्रिक senatorial Campaign Committee and for four individual Senate campaigns, including those of Obama in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998.

he बाएँ on February 11, 2011.

Armando Pérez ( born जनवरी 15, 1981 ), better known by his stage name Pitbull, is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producer.
His first recorded performance थी इससे the लील Jon album Kings of Crunk in 2002.
In 2004, he released his debut album titled m.i.a.m.i. ( छोटी लिये धन is a प्रमुख Issue ) under TVT Records.
Since then, he रै released तीन अन्य एल्बम अंतर्गत the label : El Mariel in 2006, The Boatlift in 2007, and Planet Pit in 2011.
He released Rebelution in 2009, जिससे शामिल singles `` i जान You Want Me ( Calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy ``.
The latter peaked at No. 30 on the Hot 100 and No. 11 on the Hot Rap Tracks charts जबकि `` i जान तुम want me '' peaked at no. 2 on the hot 100 and peaked within the top ten spots of charts in the UK, Canada, Italy, and the Netherlands.
The song reached No. 1 in France and the European Hot 100 on the week समाप्ति अगस्त 29, 2009 according to Billboard magazine.
He later signed with Polo Grounds Music through सोनी म्यूज़िक और निर्मित his own label Mr. 305 Inc.
Another single इससे rebelution थी `` होटल रूम Service ``, which peaked at No. 8 on the Hot 100.
Rebelution गई on to बेचें over 7.5 million worldwide digital singles and albums combined.
Nevertheless, he dropped a smash called `` दे me सबकुछ '' जिससे reached # 1 worldwide, and featured artists Ne-yo, Nayer, and Afrojack.
He has also performed as a featured artist in the remixes of many other hit songs, like Tik Tok, Scream & Shout, Lo Hecho Esta Hecho, ख़राब, papi, ईंट, कैसा कम, tonight ( i 'm lovin ' तुम ), वीडियो फोन, over to तुम अभी और Bumpy Ride.
Pérez is also the host of his own Spanish-language program on the cable channel Mun2 titled La Esquina ( स्पेनी लिये the कोने ).
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy ' Combs co-founded Bad लड़के लातीनी, a subsidiary of Combs ' Bad Boy Records label.
It primarily focuses on Latin hip हॉप, लैटिन आत्मा, लैटिन पॉप और अन्य तीव्र music, and has offices in New York and Miami, Florida.
Along with co-founding it, Pérez currently heads the A & r प्रभाग of the label.

Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ), also known as All Hallows ' Eve, is a yearly celebration observed in a number of countries on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to many scholars, All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals, and त्यौहार of the मुर्दे साथ संभावित pagan जड़ें, विशेषकर the सेल्टिक Samhain.
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of samhain और has solely Christian roots.
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), attending costume parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling डरावने कहानियां, और watching हॉरर films.
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's राय और विचार using एक 's body and property to anyone who is willing to receive them.
The term स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously, but includes any act of seeking, receiving and imparting information or ideas, regardless of the medium used.
In practice, the right to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country and the right is commonly subject to limitations, as with libel, slander, obscenity, sedition ( including, for example inciting ethnic hatred ), कापीराइट उल्लंघन, revelation of information that is classified or otherwise.
The right to freedom of expression is पहचाना as a इंसान सही अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in international human rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to थाम राय बगैर हस्तक्षेप '' और `` everyone shall have the सही to स्वतंत्रता of expression ; this right shall include freedom to seek, receive and impart information and ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these अधिकारों carries `` खास कर्तव्य और जिम्मेदारियों `` और may `` therefore be subject to certain restrictions '' when necessary `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense, such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
Sydney Harbour from the air, showing the Opera House, the CBD, गोलाकार Quay, the Bridge, the Parramatta River, North Sydney and Kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through arch bridge across Sydney Harbour that carries रेल, vehicular, सायकिल और पैदल ट्रैफ़िक between the सिडनी central business district ( CBD ) and the North Shore.
The dramatic view of the bridge, the harbour, and the nearby Sydney Opera House is an iconic चित्र of सिडनी, नई दक्षिण वेल्स, और ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
the सेतु is nicknamed `` The Coathanger '' because of its arch-based design.
Under the directions of Dr J.J.C. Bradfield of the NSW Department of Public Works, the सेतु थी designed और निर्मित by British firm Dorman Long and Co Ltd of Middlesbrough and opened in 1932.
The bridge 's design was बहकावे by the Hell Gate Bridge in New York.
It was the world 's widest long-span सेतु, at 48.8 मीटर ( 160 feet ) wide, until construction of the new Port Mann Bridge in Vancouver.
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch bridge in the world, and it is the tallest steel arch bridge, measuring इससे शीर्ष to water level.
Until 1967 the harbour सेतु थी Sydney 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic hotspot located near the namesake हवाई Islands, in the northern Pacific Ocean.
One of the most well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the world, the Hawaii plume is responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian – Emperor seamount chain, an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of volcanoes, four of which are active, two of which are dormant, and more than 123 of which are extinct, many having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts और atolls.
The chain extends from south of the island of Hawaii to the edge of the aleutian गर्त, निकट the eastern edge of Russia.
While most volcanoes are created by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries, the Hawaii hotspot is located far from nearby plate boundaries ; the classic hotspot theory, first proposed in 1963 by John Tuzo Wilson, proposes that a single, fixed mantle plume builds volcanoes that then, cut बंद इससे उनके सोर्स by the गति of the प्रशांत थाली, become increasingly निष्क्रिय and eventually erode below sea level over millions of years.
According to this theory, the nearly 60° bend separating the Emperor and Hawaiian segments of the कड़ी थी caused by a अचानक शिफ़्ट in the movement of the Pacific Plate.
In 2003, fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a mobile hotspot सिद्धान्त, suggesting कि हॉटस्पॉट हैं मोबाईल, नहीं फिक्स्ड, और कि the 47 million year old bend was caused by a shift in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's.
Ancient Hawaiians were the first to recognize the increasing आयु और weathered राज्य of the ज्वालामुखी to the north as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands.
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes और उनके constant battle with the sea was a major element in Hawaiian mythology, embodied in Pele, the deity of volcanoes.
After the arrival of Europeans on the island, in 1880-1881 James Dwight Dana directed the first formal geological study of the hotspot 's volcanics, confirming the संबंध long observed by the natives.
1912 marked the founding of the हवाई ज्वालामुखी Observatory by volcanologist Thomas Jaggar, initiating continuous scientific observation of the islands.
In the 1970s, a mapping project was initiated to लाभ अधिक information about the complex geology of Hawaii 's seafloor.
The hotspot has since been tomographically imaged, showing it to be wide and up to deep, and olivine और गार्नेट -आधारd अध्ययन have दिखाया its magma chamber is approximately.
In इसके at तनिक 85 लाख सालो of activity the hotspot has produced an estimated of rock.
The chain 's rate of drift has slowly increased over time, causing the amount of time each individual volcano is active to decrease, from 18 million years for the 76 million year old Detroit Seamount, to बस अंतर्गत 900,000 लिये the एक लाख year-old kohala ; on the other hand, eruptive volume has increased from per year to about.
Overall, this has caused a trend towards more active but quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas volcanoes on the near side of the हॉटस्पॉट ओवरलैप प्रत्येक अन्य ( forming ऐसे superstructures as Hawaii island and the ancient Maui Nui ), the oldest of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as far as apart.

Petitions are होने हस्ताक्षरित to bring the show for a fifth season.
The show airs on Treehouse TV Canada और उपनाम jr. ( formerly Noggin ).

osteonecrosis of the जबड़ों ( ONJ ) is a severe bone disease that affects the maxilla and the mandible.
Various forms of ONJ have महरूम वर्णित over the last 160 years, and a number of causes have been suggested in the literature.
Osteonecrosis of the jaws associated with bisphosphonate therapy, required by some cancer treatment regimens, रै महरूम पहचाना और पारिभाषित as a pathological entity since 2003.
The possible risk from lower oral doses of bisphosphonates, taken by मरीजों to prevent or treat osteoporosis, remains uncertain.
Various treatment options have been छान, however कठोर मामले of ONJ still require surgical removal of the affected bone.
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and possible sites of dental infection are जरूरी to सहायता prevent the कंडीशन, विशेषकर if bisphosphonate therapy is considered.
The Boston Red Sox are a professional baseball team based in Boston, मैसाचुसेट्स, और a सदस्य of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल 's American League Eastern Division.
Founded in as एक of the अमरीकी League 's eight charter franchises, the Red Sox 's home ballpark has been Fenway Park since.
The `` Red Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner, John I. Taylor, around, following previous Boston टीमों कि था महरूम ज्ञात as the `` रेड stockings ``.
They have played in 11 संसार श्रेणी, winning 7.
Boston was a dominant team in the new league, defeating the Pittsburgh Pirates in the पहला World Series in and winning four more championships by.
However, they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in baseball history, called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged beginning with the Red Sox 's sale of Babe Ruth to the rival Yankees two years after their world championship in 1918, an 86-year wait before the टोली 's छठे संसार चैंपियनशिप in.
However, the team 's history during that period was hardly one of futility, but was rather punctuated with some of the most memorable moments in World Series history, including Enos वध 's `` mad डैश `` in, the `` नामुमकिन सपना `` of, कार्लटन फिस्क 's घर चलाएं in, and Bill Buckner 's error in.
Red Sox history has also been marked by the टोली 's तीव्र फंसने साथ the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़, arguably the fiercest and most historic in North American professional sports.
The Boston Red Sox are owned by fenway खेल समूह, जो भी own Liverpool Football Club of the Premier League in England.
The Red Sox are consistently one of the शीर्ष एमएलबी टीमों in औसत सड़क उपस्थिति, जबकि the small capacity of Fenway Park prevents them from leading in overall attendance.
From May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the Red Sox sold out every home game-a total of 820 खेल ( 794 नियमित ऋतु ) लिये a प्रमुख पेशेवर sports record that lasted almost a decade.
Mince pie filled साथ mincemeat
Mincemeat is a mixture of chopped dried fruit, distilled spirits and spices, and sometimes बीफ suet, बीफ, or venison.
Originally, mincemeat सदा contained meat.
अनेक आधुनिक व्यंजनों contain बीफ suet, though vegetable shortening is sometimes used in its place.
Variants of mincemeat are found in Australia, Brittany, Canada, northern यूरोपीय, आयरलैंड, दक्षिण Africa, the United Kingdom and the United States.
In कुछ देशों the term mincemeat refers to minced or ground meat.
Diana, Princess of Wales ( Diana Frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961 – 31 अगस्त 1997 ) थी the पहला बीवी of चार्ल्स, Prince of Wales, the eldest son and heir apparent of Queen Elizabeth II.
She was well known लिये उसके fund-raising work for international charities and as an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century.
Her wedding to the प्रिंस of वेल्स on 29 जुलाई 1981 was held at St Paul 's Cathedral and seen by a global television audience of over 750 million.
While married she bore the titles Princess of Wales, duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, duchess of rothesay, countess of चेस्टर और Baroness of Renfrew.
The marriage produced two sons, the princes William and हैरी, जो became दूसरी और तीसरा in line to the British throne.
Diana was born into an वैभवशाली अंग्रेज़ी family with royal ancestry.
She was the fourth child of John Spencer, 8th Earl Spencer and his wife Frances, daughter of मौरिस रोश, 4th सामन्त fermoy.
She became a public figure with the घोषणा of her engagement.
She also received recognition for her charity work and for her support of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय अभियान to बैन landmines.
From 1989, she was the president of the Great Ormond Street हॉस्पिटल लिये children, in जोड to dozens of other charities.
Diana remained the object of worldwide media scrutiny during और बाद उसके विवाह, जिससे ended in तलाक on 28 August 1996.
Media attention and public mourning were considerable following her death in a car क्रैश in पेरिस on 31 अगस्त 1997.
Argentina, officially the Argentine Republic ( ), is the second largest देश in दोनो दक्षिण अमेरिका और the लैटिन अमेरिका region.
The country is a federation of 23 प्रांतों and the autonomous city of Buenos Aires, its capital and largest city.
It is the eighth -largest country in the world by land area and the largest among spanish-speaking राष्ट्र by भौगोलिक area of 2,780,400 km2 and is the fourth by population, with over 41 million people.
Argentina is a founding member of the United Nations, Mercosur, the संघ of दक्षिण अमरीकी राष्ट्र, the संगठन of ibero-american राज्य, the World Bank Group and the World Trade Organization, and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in South अमेरिका, bordered by चिली to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण, बोलीविया and Paraguay to the north and Brazil and Uruguay to the northeast.
Argentina claims sovereignty over part of Antarctica, the Falkland आइलैंड्स ( ) और दक्षिण जॉर्जिया and the South Sandwich Islands.
Argentina is the successor राज्य of the viceroyalty of the río de la Plata, an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire.
Argentina declared स्वतंत्रता दौरान the अर्जेंटाइन War of Independence, which was followed by the Argentine Civil Wars during most of the 19th century.
The country faced अनेक सैन्य coups और राजनैतिक अस्थिरता दौरान the 20th century, along with periodic economic crisis that continue to this day.
A recognized Southern Cone power, and middle power, Argentina is Latin America 's third-largest अर्थव्यवस्था, साथ a `` very high '' rating on the Human development index.
Within Latin America, Argentina has the पांचवां उच्चतम नाममात्र जीडीपी प्रति capita and the highest in purchasing power terms.
The Legatum Institute have argued that the देश रै a `` न्यास लिये भविष्य growth due to its market size, levels of foreign direct investment, and percentage of high-tech exports as share of total manufactured goods '', and it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy.
Argentina is the Latin American country with the most Nobel Prizes, for a total of five, all प्राप्त दौरान the दूसरी हाफ of the बीसवीं century.
The country has three Nobel prizes in science और दो of peace.
The most important aspects of science and technology in Argentina are concerned with medicine, nuclear physics, biotechnology, nanotechnology, स्पेस और प्रक्षेपास्त्र प्रौद्योगिकी और अनेक फ़ील्ड सम्बन्धित to the country 's Main Economic Activities.
The country also has the mega exhibition center of science, प्रौद्योगिकी, उद्योग और आर्ट कि हैं लैटिन अमेरिका 's largest.
Hickory is a city in Catawba County, साथ भाग भी in Burke County and Caldwell County.
The city 's 2010 अनुमानित population is 40,010.
Hickory is the principal city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA, in which the जनसांख्यिकी at the 2010 Census was 365,497.
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated PET, पीट, or the obsolete petp or pet-p, is a thermoplastic पॉलिमर राल of the पॉलिएस्टर परिवार और is प्रयुक्त in synthetic fibers ; beverage, food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in combination with glass fiber.
The term polyethylene terephthalate is a source of confusion because इस पदार्थ, पालतु, करता नहीं contain polyethylene.
यूँ, the वैकल्पिक रूप, poly ( ethylene terephthalate ), is often used in scholarly journals for the sake of accuracy and clarity.
depending on इसके प्रसंस्करण और थर्मल इतिहास, polyethylene terephthalate may exist both as an amorphous ( transparent ) and as a semi-crystalline polymer.
The semicrystalline material might appear transparent ( कण आकार < 500 nm ) or अपारदर्शी और श्वेत ( कण size up to a few microns ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size.
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic acid and ethylene glycol साथ जल as a byproduct, or by transesterification प्रतिक्रिया between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct.
Polymerization is through a polycondensation प्रतिक्रिया of the monomers ( किया तत्काल after esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct.
The majority of the world 's PET production is for synthetic fibers ( in excess of 60 % ), साथ बोतल उत्पादन accounting for around 30 % of global demand.
In the context of textile applications, PET is referred to by its आम नाम, `` पॉलिएस्टर, '' whereas the एक्रोनिम `` पालतु '' is generally used in relation to packaging.
Polyester makes up परिचय 18 % of संसार पॉलिमर उत्पादन और is the third-most-produced polymer ; polyethylene ( PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are first and second, respectively.
पालतु consists of polymerized इकाई of the मोनोमर ethylene terephthalate, with repeating C10H8O4 units.
पालतु is commonly recycled, and has the number `` 1 '' as its recycling symbol.
