Its current सीनेटरों हैं डेमोक्रेट मरियम Landrieu and Republican David Vitter.
Black pudding, blood pudding or blood sausage is a type of sausage made by cooking blood or सूखी रक्त साथ a filler until it is thick enough to congeal when cooled.
The dish exists in various संस्कृतियों इससे एशिया to Europe and the Americas.
सुअर, चौपायों, sheep, duck, and goat blood can be used depending on different countries.
In Europe and the Americas, typical fillers include meat, fat, suet, ब्रैड, cornmeal, मीठी आलू, प्याज, chestnuts, barley, and oatmeal.
In Spain, Portugal and Asia, आलू is प्रायः replaced by rice.
शेयरधारक may refer to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ), a person, group, संगठन, सदस्य or प्रणाली जो affects or can be affected by an organization 's actions
शेयरधारक, an एंटिटी कि can be affected by the results of that in which they are said to be stakeholders, i.e., that in which they have a stake.
Project stakeholder, a person, group or संगठन साथ an ब्याज in a project
Stakeholder सिद्धान्त, a theory that identifies and models the groups which are stakeholders of a corporation or project
Stakeholder analysis, the process of identifying those प्रभावित by a प्रोजेक्ट or इवेंट
Stakeholder ( law ), a third party जो temporarily holds धन or प्रॉपर्टी जबकि its owner is still being determined
Jack Smight ( March 9, 1925 - September 1, 2003 ) थी an अमरीकी theatre and film director.
Smight was born in मिनियापोलिस, मिनेसोटा and went to school with future actor Peter Graves.
His film credits include The Traveling जल्लाद, खरगोश, चलाएं, मीत युगल, मिडवे, हार्पर, विमानक्षेत्र 1975, फटकार alley and the Emmy Award -winning Eddie, as well as many episodes of television series such as The Twilight Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock Hour.
He also निर्देशित the 1960 ब्रॉडवे खेल The 49th Cousin and composed the music for the film adaption of Roll of Thunder Hear My Cry.
Smight died from cancer in Los Angeles, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 फ़रवरी 1834 – 2 फ़रवरी 1907 o.s. 27 जनवरी 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) was a Russian chemist and inventor.
He formulated the Periodic Law, created his own version of the आवधिक तालिका of तत्व, और used it to correct the properties of some already discovered elements and also to predict the properties of elements yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ), officially the City of Modesto, is the county seat and largest city of Stanislaus काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States.
With a population of approximately 201,165 at the 2010 census, Modesto बाँधने as the 18th largest नगर in the state of California.
The Modesto Census County Division, which includes the cities of ceres और riverbank, has a population of 312,842 as of 2010.
Modesto is located in the central valley area of उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, 90 मील उत्तर of fresno, 92 मील ईस्ट of सैन फ्रांसिस्को, 68 मील दक्षिण of the state capital of Sacramento, 66 miles west of Yosemite National Park, and 24 miles south of Stockton.
modesto, a 29-time पेड़ नगर यूएसए honoree, is surrounded by rich farmland, lending to a ranking for the county as 6th among all California counties in farm production.
Led by milk, almonds, chickens, walnuts, and corn silage, the county grossed nearly $ 3.1 billion in agricultural production in 2011.
modesto थी immortalized in the 1973 George Lucas film American Graffiti.
The award winning film captured the spirit of `` cruising '' and friendship on 10th and 11th गलियों in 1962 और led to the पुनरुद्धार of 1950 's nostalgia कि शामिल the TV show Happy Days and the other spin-offs.
रॉन हावर्ड, हैरिसन Ford and Richard Dreyfuss starred in the film.
The साउंडट्रैक थी a विशाल success.
Director George Lucas is a देशी of Modesto, graduating from Downey High School in 1962.
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index for 2011, which interviews 1,000 participants daily and asks individuals to assess their कार्य, finances, शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य, emotional राज्य of mind and communities, ranked Modesto 126 out of the 190 cities surveyed.
In December 2009, Forbes ranked Modesto 48th आउट of 100 among `` बेहतरीन bang-for-the-buck Cities ''.
In this ranking, Modesto ranked 8th in housing affordability and travel time but also ranked 86th in जॉब भविष्यवाणी विकास और 99th in foreclosures.
Independence Day, commonly known as the Fourth of July, is a federal holiday in the United States commemorating the adoption of the Declaration of Independence on जुलाई 4, 1776, declaring independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain.
Independence Day is commonly associated with fireworks, parades, barbecues, carnivals, fairs, picnics, कॉन्सर्ट, बेसबॉल खेल, परिवार reunions, और राजनैतिक speeches and ceremonies, in addition to various other public and private events celebrating the history, government, and traditions of the United States.
Independence Day is the national दिन of the संयुक्त States.
A gender symbol denotes the sex of an सजीव or characterizes an agent by gender.
The two standard gender symbols denoting male ♂ और मादा ♀ हैं निकला इससे astrological symbols, denoting the classical planets Mars and Venus, respectively.
ये प्रतीकों have महरूम in उपयोग चूंकि the पुनर्जागरण भी denoting elements in alchemy, specifically the metals iron and copper.
They were first used to denote the प्रभावी लिंग of plants ( i.e. sex of individual in a given crossbreed, since most plants are hermaphroditic ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751.
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a temporary सही to थाम जमीन or प्रॉपर्टी in जिससे a lessee or a किरायेदार holds rights of real property by some form of title from a lessor or landlord.
Although a tenant does hold rights to real property, a leasehold estate is typically माना निजी प्रॉपर्टी.
Leasehold is a form of land tenure or property tenure where one party buys the सही to occupy जमीन or a भवन for a given length of time.
As lease is a legal estate, leasehold estate can be खरीदा and sold on the open market.
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is purchased outright and thereafter held for an indeterminate लंबाई of समय, और भी differs इससे a tenancy जहाँ a प्रॉपर्टी is let ( rented ) on a periodic basis such as weekly or monthly.
Until the end of the lease period ( often measured in decades or centuries ; a 99 year lease is काफी आम ) the leaseholder रै the सही to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed rent to the owner.
Terms of the agreement are contained in a lease, जिससे रै तत्व of अनुबंध and property law intertwined.
The term एस्टेट for years may occasionally be used.
This refers to a leasehold estate for any specific period of time ( the शब्द `` सालो '' is भ्रामक ).
An estate for years is नहीं automatically renewed.
Colloquially, `` lease '' and `` leasing `` are often a formalization of a longer, विशिष्ट काल as compared with a `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will, terminable or renewable at the end of a short period.
Olivia ( also known as Welcome to the World of the Pig Olivia ) is a british-american children 's एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित by media company Chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books.
It is seen on उपनाम jr. in the US, Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the UK and Ireland, and Disney Junior in Latin America and Brazil, treehouse tv in कनाडा.
the दिखाएँ रै जीती a silver Parents ' Choice Award for its positive story lines and characters.
Location of Panama between Pacific ( bottom ) और caribbean ( शीर्ष ), with canal at top center
The Panama Canal ( ) is a ship कनाल in पनामा कि connects the Atlantic Ocean ( via the Caribbean Sea ) to the Pacific Ocean.
the कनाल cuts across the Isthmus of Panama and is a key conduit for international maritime trade.
वहीँ हैं ताले at प्रत्येक समाप्त to lift ships up to Gatun Lake ( above sea-level ).
Gatun झील थी निर्मित to reduce the amount of work required for the canal.
The वर्तमान ताले हैं wide.
A third, wider लेन of locks is being built.
France began work on the canal in 1881, but had to stop because of engineering problems and high mortality due to disease.
The United States ( US ) later took over the project and took a decade to complete the canal in 1914, enabling ships to avoid the lengthy केप सींग रूट around the southernmost टिप of दक्षिण America ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan.
One of the largest and most difficult अभियान्त्रिकी प्रोजेक्ट ever undertaken, the Panama Canal shortcut made it possible for ships to travel between the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans in half the time previously required.
The shorter, faster, safer route to the US वेस्ट coast और to राष्ट्र in और साथ the Pacific Ocean allowed those places to become more integrated with the world economy.
During this time, ownership of the territory that is now the Panama Canal was first Colombian, तब फ्रेंच, और तब अमरीकी ; the United States completed the construction.
the कनाल was taken over in 1999 by the Panamanian government, as long planned.
Annual traffic has risen from about 1,000 जहाजों जब the कनाल खोली in 1914, to 14,702 vessels in 2008, the latter measuring a total of 309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons.
By 2008, more than 815,000 vessels had passed through the कनाल, अनेक of them much larger than the original planners could have envisioned ; the largest ships that can transit the canal today are called Panamax.
The American Society of सिविल इंजीनियर्स has named the Panama Canal one of the seven wonders of the modern world.
Benjamin Franklin ( April 17, 1790 ) was one of the founding fathers of the संयुक्त राज्य.
A noted polymath, Franklin was a leading author, मुद्रक, राजनैतिक theorist, राजनेता, postmaster, वैज्ञानिक, musician, inventor, satirist, civic activist, statesman, and diplomat.
As a scientist, he was a major figure in the अमरीकी आत्मज्ञान और the इतिहास of physics for his discoveries and theories regarding electricity.
He invented the बिजली rod, bifocals, the Franklin stove, a carriage odometer, and the glass 'armonica '.
He facilitated many civic organizations, including a fire विभाग और a विश्वविद्यालयों.
Franklin earned the title of `` The First American '' for his early and indefatigable campaigning for colonial unity ; as an author and प्रवक्ता in लंदन लिये अनेक colonies, then as the first United States Ambassador to France, he exemplified the emerging American nation.
Franklin थी foundational in धमक the अमरीकी ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift, hard work, education, community spirit, self-governing institutions, and opposition to authoritarianism both political and religious, with the scientific and tolerant values of the Enlightenment.
In the words of historian Henry Steele Commager, `` In a Franklin could be merged the virtues of Puritanism without its defects, the illumination of the आत्मज्ञान बगैर its heat. ''
To Walter Isaacson, this makes Franklin `` the सबसे संपन्नता अमरीकी of his age and the most influential in inventing the type of society America would become. ''
Franklin, always proud of his working class roots, became a successful समाचारपत्र एडिटर और मुद्रक in फिलाडेल्फिया, the leading city in the colonies.
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three of whom published the Pennsylvania Chronicle, a newspaper that was known for its क्रांतिकारी sentiments और आलोचनाओं of the British monarchy in the American colonies.
He became wealthy प्रकाशन ग़रीब रिचर्ड 's almanack and The Pennsylvania Gazette.
Franklin gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय renown as a वैज्ञानिक for his famous experiments in electricity and for his many inventions, especially the lightning rod.
He played a major role in establishing the University of Pennsylvania and was निर्वाचित the पहला अध्यक्ष of the American Philosophical Society.
Franklin became a national hero in America when he पथप्रदर्शन the प्रयत्न to have पार्लियामेंट repeal the unpopular Stamp Act.
An accomplished diplomat, he was widely admired among the French as American minister to Paris and was a major figure in the विकास of positive Franco-American relations.
For many years he was the British postmaster for the colonies, जिससे सक्रिय उसे to नियत up the पहला नेशनल communications network.
He was active in community affairs, colonial and state politics, as खूब as national and international affairs.
From 1785 to 1788, he served as राज्यपाल of Pennsylvania.
toward the समाप्त of उसके जीवन, he freed his slaves and became one of the most prominent abolitionists.
His colorful life and legacy of scientific और राजनैतिक उपलब्धि, और औकात as एक of अमेरिका 's सबसे influential founding Fathers, have seen Franklin honored on coinage and money ; warships ; the names of many towns, counties, educational institutions, namesakes, and companies ; and more than two centuries after his death, countless cultural references.
Criminal Minds is an American police procedural टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम कि premiered सितंबर 22, 2005, on CBS.
The series follows a team of profilers from the एफबीआई 's behavioral Analysis Unit ( BAU ) based in Quantico, Virginia.
The BAU is part of the FBI National Center for the Analysis of हिंसक अपराधों.
The show differs from many procedural dramas by focusing on profiling the criminal, बल्कि than the अपराधों itself.
The show is produced by The Mark Gordon Company in association with CBS Television Studios ( originally Paramount Network टेलीविज़न तब सीबीएस सर्वोपरि संजाल टेलीविज़न ) and ABC Studios ( originally Touchstone Television ).
CBS announced in अक्तूबर 2009 कि विरासत इंटरैक्टिव would develop a video game based on the show.
The game would require players to जाँचें अपराधों scenes for clues to help solve murder mysteries.
The interactive puzzle game was released in 2012, but did not विशेषता कोई of the आवाज़ें of the दिखाएँ 's cast, nor was the cast involved with the project.
On March 14, 2012, CBS renewed Criminal Minds for an आठवीं ऋतु, जिससे premiered on September 26, 2012.
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a सोंग by the अमरीकी grunge band Nirvana, written by vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain.
The song was released as the first single from the group 's third and final studio एल्बम, in utero, in 1993.
It was one of two songs from the album mixed by Scott Litt in order to augment the असली उत्पादन by निर्माता Steve Albini.
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a physical single for sale in the United States, `` Heart-Shaped Box '' received much American रेडियो airplay, reaching क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड Modern Rock Tracks chart.
The international release of the single reached क्रमांक five on the UK Singles Chart.
The song 's music video, directed by एंटोन corbijn, garnered critical plaudits.
The orbital speed of a देह, generally a ग्रह, a प्राकृतिक उपग्रह, an artificial satellite, or a multiple star, is the speed at which it orbits around the barycenter of a system, usually around a more massive body.
It can be used to refer to either the mean orbital speed, the average गति as it completes an कक्षा, or instantaneous कक्षीय speed, the speed at a particular point in its orbit.
The orbital speed at any position in the orbit can be computed from the distance to the central body at that position, and the specific orbital energy, which is independent of position : the kinetic उर्जा is the कुल उर्जा minus the potential energy.
Brown राजमहल आंतरिक and Atrium
Brown Palace Hotel is the second-oldest operating होटल in डेनवर, कोलोराडो और is एक of the first atrium-style hotel ever built.
It is now संचालित by कोरम होटल and Resorts.
it थी निर्मित in 1892, one year later than the Oxford Hotel.
It was named for its original owner, Henry C. Brown, and was designed with its odd triangular आकार by वास्तु फ़्रैंक edbrooke.
The hotel is located at 321 17th St, Denver, CO between 17th Street, ब्रॉडवे और tremont street/pl in downtown Denver behind the Republic Plaza.
The प्रमुख प्रवेश door is on Tremont Street.
dvd-video is a उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप प्रयुक्त to store digital video on DVD discs, and is currently the dominant consumer video format in Asia, North America, Europe, and Australia.
Discs using the dvd-video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g., a DVD player, or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ).
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः multi-channel formats as described below ).
Typically, the data rate for DVD movies सीमाएँ इससे 3 mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, and the bit rate is usually adaptive.
It was पहला available for retail around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD Forum and can be obtained इससे dvd format/logo लाइसेंसिंग निगम for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly available, because every subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the DVD Book is मालिकाना और confidential.
The nautical मील ( प्रतीक m, nm or nmi ) is a ईकाई of लंबाई कि is परिचय one minute of arc of latitude measured along any meridian, or about one minute of arc of longitude at the equator.
By international अनुबंध it रै महरूम set at 1,852 metres exactly ( about 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted for use in the International System of Units by the BIPM ) प्रयुक्त especially by navigators in the shipping and aviation industries, and also in polar exploration.
It is commonly used in international law and treaties, especially regarding the हद of territorial waters.
It developed from the sea mile और the related geographical mile.
The nautical mile remains in उपयोग by समुद्र और एयर navigators विश्वव्यापी क्युकी of इसके convenience when working with charts.
Most nautical charts use the Mercator projection whose scale varies by about a factor of six इससे the equator to 80° अक्षांश, so charts covering large areas can not use a single linear scale.
The nautical mile is nearly equal to a minute of latitude on a chart, so a distance measured with a chart divider can be roughly converted to nautical miles using the चार्ट 's latitude scale.
Shippensburg is a borough in कम्बरलैंड और फ्रैंकलिन काउंटी in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania.
Settled in 1730, Shippensburg lies in the कम्बरलैंड घाटी, 41 मील ( 66 km ) west-southwest of Harrisburg, and is part of the Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area.
In 1900, 3,228 people lived there ; in 1910, 3,457 ; और in 1940, 5,244 people lived there.
The population थी 5,492 at the 2010 census.
shippensburg थी incorporated as a borough on January 21, 1819.
In the past, there were furniture factories, engine and pump works, and other industrial works located within the town.
Shippensburg is also the home of The Beistle Company, the oldest और largest निर्माता of सजावट and party goods, which sells its distinctive honeycomb paper decorations worldwide.
It is also the location of Pague and Fegan, the oldest continuously संचालित हार्डवेयर स्टोर in Pennsylvania.
In May 2012, Volvo Construction Equipment began a $ 100 लाख विस्तार project to bring its American headquarters to Shippensburg.
Shippensburg is भी घर to shippensburg विश्वविद्यालयों of Pennsylvania, one of 14 universities of the Pennsylvania State System of Higher Education.
Yearly the last full week of July, the Shippensburg Community Fair is आयोजित.
Begun in 1958, the fair bills itself as पेन्सिलवेनिया 's largest bi-county fair.
The मेला शामिल agricultural exhibits, a craft show, food vendors, and carnival rides amongst other things.
Every summer on the last Saturday of August, Shippensburg holds the Corn Festival, an event that brings क्षेत्रीय शिल्पकार और विक्रेता to operate stands downtown.
The शहर is बंद to traffic for at least 5 blocks for most of the day.
Average उपस्थिति at the पर्व is estimated at 60,000 - 70,000 each year.
Black hairy tongue ( BHT, also termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a condition of the tongue where the filiform papillae elongate with black or brown discoloration, giving a ब्लैक और बालदार रूप.
The appearance may be alarming, but it is a हानिरहित कंडीशन.
Predisposing factors include धूम्रपान, xerostomia ( शुष्क मुँह ), नरम आहार, poor oral hygiene and certain medications.
Management is by improving मौखिक hygiene, विशेषकर scraping or brushing the tongue.
The IEEE 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is a सीरियल bus interface standard for high-speed communications and isochronous real-time data transfer.
It थी विकसित in the late 1980s and early 1990s by Apple, who called it FireWire.
The 1394 interface is comparable to USB, and often those two technologies are माना साथ, though USB has more market share.
Apple first included FireWire in some of its 1999 models, and most Apple computers since the year 2000 have included FireWire पोर्ट, हालांकि, as of 2013, nothing परे the 800 संस्करण ( IEEE-1394b ).
The interface is also known by the brand i.LINK ( Sony ), and Lynx ( Texas यंत्र ).
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many applications, because of lower implementation लागत और a सरलीकृत, अधिक अनुकूलनीय cabling system.
The 1394 standard also defines a backplane interface, हालांकि इस is नहीं as widely used.
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video Network Alliance ( HANA ) standard connection interface for A/V ( audio/visual ) component communication and control.
FireWire is also available in wireless, fiber optic, and coaxial versions using the isochronous प्रोटोकॉल.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – अगस्त 27, 1990 ) was an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by his initials SRV, Vaughan is best known as a founding member and नेता of दोगुना Trouble.
Together with drummer Chris Layton and bassist Tommy Shannon, they ignited the blues पुनरुद्धार of the 1980s.
With a career spanning seven years, Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently बेची आउट कॉन्सर्ट while their albums frequently went gold.
He was born और उठाया in डलास, टेक्सास, and for a short period of time lived in Graham, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan प्रारंभ playing the गिटार at आयु सात और formed अनेक bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical career, joining समूह ऐसे as krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed ट्रिपल threat revue, a बैंड कि आखिरकार evolved into Double Trouble and regularly performed around Austin.
In 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the Montreux Jazz पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, catching the ध्यान of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's Dance, while Browne offered the band free उपयोग of उसके निजी स्टुडियो in लॉस एंजिल्स to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and दोगुना ट्रबल यहूद हस्ताक्षरित to Epic Records by veteran record producer John Hammond Sr. and released their debut album, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the group released the albums, Could n't Stand the Weather ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ), the latter of जिससे प्रदर्शित नई keyboardist Reese Wynans.
Although his career had progressed successfully, Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation हॉस्पिटल in अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया to दे up a कोका और दारू habit and returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, In Step was released and earned them a Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Blues प्रदर्शन.
On August 27, 1990, Vaughan was killed in a helicopter crash following a प्रदर्शन in ईस्ट ट्रॉय, विस्कॉन्सिन.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र स्टाइल थी निकला इससे a variety of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues musicians including Albert King, Freddie King, Otis Rush, and muddy waters, और चट्टान guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ और pentatonic scales.
He has प्राप्त चौड़ी नाजुक recognition for his guitar playing, ranking at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011.
He was posthumously inducted into the ब्लूज़ हॉल of कीर्ति in 2000 और a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park.
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the महानतम संगीतकारों to आइये from the state of Texas.
GigE redirects यहाँ.
लिये the कैमरा प्रोटोकॉल, see GigE vision.
In computer networking, gigabit Ethernet ( GbE or 1 GigE ) is a term describing various technologies लिये transmitting Ethernet frames at a rate of a gigabit per second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per second ), as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard.
It came into use beginning in 1999, धीरे supplanting तेज़ ईथरनेट in wired local networks, where it performed considerably faster.
The cables and equipment are very similar to previous मानकों और यहूद बहुत आम and economical by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit links connected through hubs are अनुमत by the specification, लकिन full-duplex usage with switches is much more common.

The main components of a stamp:
1. चित्र
2. perforations
3. Denomination
4. देश name
A postage stamp is a small piece of पेपर कि is खरीदा और प्रदर्शित on an item of mail as evidence of payment of postage.
Typically, stamps are made from special paper, with a national नामांकन और denomination ( दाम ) on the face, and a gum adhesive on the reverse side.
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other authorized vendor and are used to अदा लिये the लागत शामिल in चलती मेल as खूब as अन्य कारोबार necessities such as insurance and registration.
The stamp’s shape is usually that of a small rectangle of varying proportions, though त्रिकोण or अन्य आकार हैं occasionally used.
The stamp is affixed to an envelope or other postal cover ( i.e., packet, बक्सा, mailing बेलन ) कि the customer wishes to send.
the मद is तब processed by the डाक प्रणाली, जहाँ a postmark, sometimes ज्ञात as a cancellation mark, is usually applied over the stamp and cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as used, which prevents its reuse.
The postmark indicates the तिथि and point of origin of the mailing.
the mailed मद is तब वितरित to the address that the customer has applied to the envelope or cover.
Postage stamps have facilitated the delivery of मेल चूंकि the 1840s.
Before this time, ink and hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ), प्रायः बना इससे लकडी or cork, were often used to frank the mail and confirm the payment of postage.
The first चिपकने postage stamp, commonly referred to as the Penny Black, was issued in the United Kingdom in 1840.
The invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve the postal system in the United Kingdom of Great ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड, which in the early 19th century was in disarray and rife with corruption.
There are varying accounts of the आविष्कारक or inventors of the stamp.
Before the introduction of postage stamps, mail in the UK was paid for by the recipient, a प्रणाली कि थी संबद्ध साथ an irresolvable प्रॉब्लम : the लागत of delivering मेल यहूद नहीं recoverable by the postal service when recipients were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items, and senders had no incentive to restrict the number, size, or weight of items sent, whether or not they would ultimately be paid for.
The postage stamp resolved this issue in a सरल और elegant manner, with the additional benefit of room for an element of beauty to be introduced.
Later related inventions include postal stationery such as prepaid-postage लिफाफे, पोस्ट ताश, lettercards, aerogrammes and wrappers, postage meters, and, more recently, specialty boxes and envelopes provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing.
The postage stamp afforded convenience for both the मेलर और डाक officials, more efficiently recovered costs for the postal service, and ultimately resulted in a better, faster postal system.
With the conveniences stamps offered, उनके उपयोग resulted in greatly increased mailings during the 19th and 20th centuries.
Postage stamps during this era were the most लोकप्रिय रास्ता of paying लिये मेल, लकिन by the समाप्त of the 20th सदी यहूद rapidly being eclipsed by the use of metered postage and bulk mailing by businesses. )
The same result with respect to communications by private parties occurred over the last decade of the 20th century and the first decade of the 21st due to declining cost of long अलहदा टेलीफोन संचार और the विकास and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems had.
As postage stamps with उनके engraved imagery began to appear on a widespread basis, historians and collectors began to take notice.
The study of postage stamps and their use is referred to as philately.
Stamp collecting can be both a hobby and a form of historical study and reference, as government-issued postage stamps and their mailing systems have सदा महरूम शामिल साथ the इतिहास of nations.
The University of अलबामा at Birmingham ( UAB ) is a public university in Birmingham in the U.S. state of Alabama.
Developing इससे an एक्सटेंशन बीच established in 1936, the institution became an autonomous institution in 1969 and is today one of three institutions in the University of Alabama System.
UAB offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic divisions leading to bachelor 's, master 's, doctoral, and professional degrees in the social and behavioral sciences, the liberal arts, business, education, engineering, and health-related fields ऐसे as आयुर्विज्ञान, dentistry, optometry, नर्सिंग, और पब्लिक health.
The school is highly renowned for its medical research और प्राकृतिक sciences programs.
The UAB Health System, one of the largest अकादमिक चिकित्सा centers in the United States, is affiliated with the university.
UAB Hospital sponsors रेसिडेंसी कार्यक्रम in विभिन्न चिकित्सा specialties, including internal medicine, neurology, surgery, radiology, and anesthesiology.
UAB Hospital is the only ACS verified Level I trauma center in Alabama, as rated by the American कॉलेज of Surgeons Trauma Program.
UAB is the state 's largest employer, with more than 18,000 faculty and staff and over 53,000 कार्य at the university and in the health system.
An estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan Area and 1 in 33 कार्य in the राज्य of अलबामा हैं directly or indirectly related to UAB.
The university 's overall सालाना आर्थिक impact was estimated to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
In the fall of 2012, the University of Alabama at Birmingham enrolled 17,999 विद्यार्थी इससे अधिक than 110 देशों, including 1,605 freshmen.
There are plans to commence with an `` aggressive '' growth in नामांकन at UAB.
The current UAB President is Dr. रे L. watts.
Tofu, also called bean curd, is a food made by coagulating सोया रस और then pressing the resulting curds into soft white blocks.
It is a component in many East Asian और southeast एशियाई cuisines.
There are many different varieties of tofu, including fresh tofu और टोफू कि रै महरूम processed in some way.
Tofu has a subtle flavor and can be used in savory और मीठी बर्तन.
it is प्रायः seasoned or marinated to suit the dish.
Tofu originated in ancient चीन कुछ 2,000 years ago.
Chinese legend ascribes its invention to prince Liu An ( चाइनीज : 劉安 liú ān, 179–122 BC ).
Tofu and its production तकनीक यहूद introduced into कोरियाई and then Japan during the Nara period.
It spread into अन्य भाग of East Asia as well.
This स्प्रेड संभावित coincided with the spread of Buddhism because it is an important source of protein in the vegetarian diet of East Asian Buddhism.
Li Shizhen in the Ming Dynasty described a method of बनाना टोफू in Bencao Gangmu.
Tofu has a low calorie count, relatively विशाल amounts of protein, and little fat.
It is high in iron and depending on the coagulant used in manufacturing, may also be high in calcium and/or magnesium.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a आम चिंपैंजी, ज्ञात लिये होने the one-time पालतु of अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार Michael Jackson, who bought the primate from a Texas research facility in the early 1980s.
The animal was a frequent travel साथी to the singer, whose attachment to the animal led to media mockery and, among other factors, to a public perception of Jackson as an eccentric.
During the Bad World Tour, for example, Jackson brought Bubbles with him to Japan, जहाँ वे दोनो पिया tea with the mayor of Osaka.
Bubbles was initially kept at the जैक्सन परिवार 's home in Encino, Los Angeles, but was moved to Neverland Ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in Jackson 's bedroom, used the singer 's प्रसाधन, और ate कैंडी in the Neverland movie theater.
In 2003 the public सीखे कि, जैसे सब खिलाते chimpanzees, Bubbles had matured into a large and aggressive adult chimp unsuitable as a companion animal.
He was sent to a California animal trainer, where he was reported to have attempted suicide.
When the trainer shut down his operation in 2004, Bubbles was moved to the Center for Great Apes, a sanctuary in wauchula, फ्लोरिडा, जहाँ he रै जिया चूंकि 2005.
Muse are an English rock band from Teignmouth, Devon, which formed in 1994.
The band consists of school friends Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals, lead guitar, पियानो, keyboards, keytar ), क्रिस्टोफर Wolstenholme ( bass, vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar, harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( drums, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the release of their 2006 album Black Holes and Revelations, keyboardist और percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band.
Muse are known for their energetic and extravagant live performances and their fusion of many music genres, सहित स्पेस चट्टान, प्रगतिशील चट्टान, वैकल्पिक चट्टान, heavy metal, classical music and electronica.
Muse have released six studio albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ), Origin of Symmetry ( 2001 ), Absolution ( 2003 ), Black छेद और खुलासे ( 2006 ), the प्रतिरोध ( 2009 ) और the 2nd Law ( 2012 ).
They have also issued three live albums, Hullabaloo Soundtrack ( 2002 ), जिससे is भी a संकलन of b-sides, Absolution Tour ( 2005 ), and HAARP ( 2008 ), which documents the band 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007.
Black छेद और खुलासे earned the band a Mercury Prize nomination and a third place finish in the NME Albums of the Year list for 2006.
Muse have also won a collection of music awards throughout their history, सहित पाँच एमटीवी यूरोपीय म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, छह q पुरस्कार, आठ nme पुरस्कार, two Brit Awards —winning `` Best British Live Act '' twice, an MTV Video Music Award, four Kerrang !
पुरस्कार and an American Music Award.
They were also मनोनीत लिये पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, of जिससे वे won Best Rock Album, for their fifth studio album The Resistance ( 2009 ).
Muse have sold over 15 लाख एल्बम worldwide.
Bloemfontein (, ; Dutch लिये `` फव्वारा of पुष्प '' ) is the पूंजी नगर of the Free State Province of South Africa ; and, as the judicial capital of the nation, one of South Africa 's three national capitals – the other two being Cape Town, the legislative capital, and Pretoria, the administrative capital.
Bloemfontein is popularly and poetically known as `` the city of roses ``, owing to the प्रचुरता of ये पुष्प और the सालाना rose festival held there.
the नगर 's sesotho नाम is Mangaung, meaning `` place of cheetahs `` and it has been included in the Mangaung Local Municipality since 2000.
Bloemfontein is situated on शुष्क घासभूमि at, at an altitude of above sea level.
The city is घर to 369,568 निवासियों, जबकि the Mangaung Local Municipality has a population of 645,455.

The meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the significance of life or existence in general.
It can also be expressed in different forms, such as `` क्यों हैं we यहाँ ? ``, `` कया is जीवन सब परिचय ? ``, and `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
It has been the विषय of much philosophical, वैज्ञानिक, and theological speculation throughout history.
There have been a large number of proposed answers to these questions from अनेक अलग सांस्कृतिक और वैचारिक पृष्ठभूमि.
The meaning of life is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence, social ties, consciousness, and happiness, and borders on many other issues, such as symbolic meaning, ontology, value, purpose, ethics, शुभ और दुष्ट, फ़्री होगा, the अस्तित्व of एक or अनेक देवताओं, conceptions of God, the soul, and the afterlife.
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing related empirical facts about the universe, exploring the context और पैरामीटर्स concerning the 'how ' of life.
Science also studies and can provide recommendations for the pursuit of well-being और a सम्बन्धित धारणा of morality.
An alternative, humanistic approach poses the सवाल `` कया is the अर्थ of my life ? ''
The value of the question pertaining to the purpose of life may coincide with the achievement of परम वास्तविकता, or a अहसास of oneness, or भी a अहसास of sacredness.
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides the voices of Peter Griffin, stewie griffin, ब्रायन griffin, और ग्लेन कीचड़.
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that features five main voice actors, और numerous नियमित डाल और पुनरावर्ती अतिथि stars.
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, सेठ ग्रीन, mila kunis ( जो replaced लेसी chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
पुनरावर्ती आवाज़ अभिनेताओं शामिल पैट्रिक warburton, आदम वेस्ट, John G. Brennan, Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly, and repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many cast members provide आवाज़ें for multiple characters.
The voice actors, in portraying the various character personalities on the show, draw inspiration from हस्तियाँ और पॉप संस्कृति.
Family Guy characters have been played by more than one actor, बाद members of the show left the series or had conflicting obligations.
Kunis was nominated for an Annie पुरस्कार लिये voicing मेग griffin in the ऋतु 5 एपीसोड `` मुश्किल विधिक `` और macfarlane रै भी won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production, though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series.

`` The राजकुमारी और the मटर '' ( ; शाब्दिक अनुवाद : `` the राजकुमारी on the मटर '' ) is a साहित्यिक fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen about a young woman whose royal identity is established by a test of her physical sensitivity.
The tale was first published with three others by Andersen in an inexpensive पुस्तिका on 8 may 1835 in Copenhagen by C.A. Reitzel.
Andersen had heard the story as a child, and it likely has its सोर्स in लोक सामग्री, possibly originating from Sweden as it is unknown in the Danish oral tradition.
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen 's other tales of 1835 were well received by Danish critics, who disliked उनके कैज़ुअल, chatty स्टाइल, और उनके कमी of morals.
In 1959 `` the राजकुमारी और the मटर '' थी adapted to the musical stage in a production called Once Upon a Mattress starring Carol Burnett.
German Americans ( ) are citizens of the संयुक्त राज्य जो यहूद either born in Germany or are of German ancestry.
They comprise about 50 million people, making them the largest ancestry group ahead of Irish अमेरिकी, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी और अंग्रेज़ी अमेरिकी.
They comprise about 1/3 of the जर्मनी diaspora सब over the world.
None of the German states had New World colonies.
Not until the 1670s did the first significant समूह of जर्मनी आप्रवासियों arrive in the British colonies, settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania.
आव्रजन जारी in बहुत विशाल संख्याएँ दौरान the 19th century, with some eight million arrivals from Germany.
They were pulled by the attractions of land and religious freedom, and धकेल out of Europe by shortages of land and religious or political oppression.
Many arrived seeking religious or political freedom, others for आर्थिक अवसर वृहद than those in यूरोपीय, और अन्य बस लिये the chance to start fresh in the New World.
The arrivals before 1850 were mostly farmers who sought out the most productive जमीन, जहाँ उनके intensive खेती तकनीकों would pay off.
After 1840, many came to cities, where `` Germania '' —german-speaking districts—soon emerged.
German Americans established the first kindergartens in the United States, introduced the Christmas tree tradition, and originated लोकप्रिय अमरीकी भोजन ऐसे as hot कुत्तो and hamburgers.
German American celebrations are held throughout the country, one of the most well-known being the german-american steuben परेड in नई यॉर्क नगर, आयोजित every third Saturday in September.
There are also major सालाना कार्यक्रम in शिकागो, Cincinnati, Milwaukee, Pittsburgh, St. Louis and other cities.
Like many other आप्रवासियों कि आए to the संयुक्त राज्य, an overwhelming number of people of German or partial German descent have essentially become Americanized.
The Preamble to the United States संविधान is a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक statement of the Constitution 's fundamental purposes and guiding principles.
It states in general terms, and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning and what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the people of the United States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the व्यक्तिगत अधिकारों और समता among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy.
The history of the Internet began with the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the अंतरजाल जब a संदेश थी भेजा over the arpanet इससे कंप्यूटर science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at University of California, Los Angeles ( UCLA ), after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ).
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark I at NPL in the UK, CYCLADES, Merit Network, tymnet, और telenet, यहूद विकसित in the लेट 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols.
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking, in which multiple separate संजाल could be joined साथ into a संजाल of networks.
In 1982, the Internet protocol सुइट ( tcp/ip ) थी मानकीकृत, और नतीजतन, the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks, called the Internet, was introduced.
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science Network ( csnet ) और again in 1986 जब nsfnet provided अभिगम to महासंगणक साइट in the United States from research and education organizations.
Commercial अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s.
The ARPANET थी decommissioned in 1990.
the Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned, removing the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce, including the rise of near-instant communication by electronic मेल, तत्काल messaging, आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो काल्स, और the World Wide Web with its discussion forums, blogs, social networking, and online shopping sites.
The research and education community continues to develop and use advanced networks such as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची गति रीढ़ संजाल सेवा ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and उच्चतर speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way दूरसंचार संजाल in the साल 1993, already 51 % by 2000, और more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the Internet continues to grow, driven by ever greater amounts of online information, commerce, entertainment, और सोशल नेटवर्किंग.
दक्षिणपश्चिम एयरलाइंस co. ( ) is a major U.S. airline and the world 's largest low-cost carrier, headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
It was स्थापित in 1967 और अपनाया इसके current name in 1971.
The airline has more than 46,000 employees और operates अधिक than 3,400 फ़्लाइट per day.
As of June 5, 2011, it carries the सबसे घरेलू यात्री of any U.S. airline.
As of April 2013, Southwest Airlines has scheduled सेवा to 84 गंतव्यों in 41 states and Puerto Rico.
Southwest Airlines has solely operated Boeing 737s, except for a few years in the 1970s और 1980s, जब it operated Boeing 727s.
As of अगस्त 2012, दक्षिणपश्चिम is the largest operator of the 737 worldwide with over 550 in service, each operating an average of six flights per day.
In May 2011, the airline acquired AirTran Airways, with संयोजन of the वाहक अपेक्षित to be complete by 2014.
On March 1, 2012, the कम्पनी थी जारी a सिंगल ऑपरेटिंग प्रमाणपत्र, technically becoming one airline.
Rolling Rock is a 4.6 % abv pale lager launched in 1939 by the Latrobe brewing कम्पनी.
Although founded as a local beer in Western Pennsylvania, it थी marketed aggressively और आखिरकार became a national product.
The brand was sold to anheuser-busch of st. Louis, Missouri, in mid 2006, which transferred brewing operations to New Jersey.
Benedict XVI (,, ; born Joseph Aloisius Ratzinger on 16 April 1927 ) is पोप emeritus of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर.
He परोसा as Pope from 2005 to 2013.
In that position, he was both the leader of the Catholic Church and sovereign of the वेटिकन City State.
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave, celebrated his Papal Inauguration Mass on 24 April 2005, and took कब्ज़ा of उसके गिरजाघर, the archbasilica of st. जॉन lateran, on 7 May 2005.
Ordained as a priest in 1951 in his native Bavaria, Ratzinger established himself as a अत्यधिक regarded विश्वविद्यालयों theologian by the लेट 1950s and was appointed a full professor in 1958.
After a long career as an academic, serving as a प्राध्यापक of धर्मशास्त्र at अनेक जर्मनी universities—the पिछला होने the विश्वविद्यालयों of regensburg, जहाँ he परोसा as वाइस अध्यक्ष of the university in 1976 and 1977—he was appointed Archbishop of Munich and Freising and cardinal by Pope Paul VI in 1977, an unusual promotion for someone with little pastoral experience.
In 1981, he settled in Rome when he became Prefect of the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith, one of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण dicasteries of the Roman Curia.
From 2002 until his election as pope, he was also Dean of the College of Cardinals, and as such, the primus inter pares among the कार्डिनल्स.
Prior to becoming pope, he was `` a major figure on the Vatican stage for a quarter of a century '' as `` one of the most respected, influential and controversial members of the College of Cardinals '' ; he had an influence `` second to none जब it आए to सेटिंग गिरिजाघर प्राथमिकताएं and directions '' as one of Pope John Paul II 's closest confidants.
He थी originally a उदार theologian, but adopted conservative views after 1968.
His prolific writings defend traditional Catholic doctrine और मान.
During his papacy, Benedict XVI advocated a return to आधारभूत ईसाई मान to काउंटर the increased secularisation of many Western countries.
He views relativism 's denial of objective truth, and the denial of moral truths in particular, as the सेंट्रल प्रॉब्लम of the 21st century.
He taught the importance of both the Catholic Church and an समझना of परमेश्वर 's redemptive love.
Pope बेनेडिक्ट भी revived a क्रमांक of परंपराओं including elevating the Tridentine Mass to a more prominent position.
He renewed the relationship between the Catholic Church and art, viewing the use of beauty as a path to the sacred, promoted the use of Latin, and reintroduced परंपरागत papal garments, लिये जिससे कारण he was called `` the pope of aesthetics ''.
He has been described as `` the main intellectual force in the गिरिजाघर '' since the mid-1980s.
Several of Pope Benedict 's students from उसके अकादमिक करियर हैं भी prominent churchmen today and confidantes of him, notably Christoph Schönborn.
On 11 फ़रवरी 2013, Pope Benedict announced his resignation in a speech in Latin before the cardinals, citing a `` lack of strength of mind and body '' due to his advanced age.
His resignation became प्रभावी on 28 February 2013.
He is the first pope to resign since Pope Gregory XII in 1415, और the पहला to do so on his own initiative since Pope Celestine V in 1294.
As pope emeritus, Benedict retains the style of His Holiness, and the title of Pope, and will continue to पोशाक in the papal रंग of white.
He was succeeded by Pope Francis on 13 March 2013, and he moved into the newly renovated Mater ecclesiae मठ लिये उसके रिटायरमेंट on 2 May 2013..
Pocket stereoscope साथ original test image.
Used by military to examine stereoscopic pairs of aerial छायाचित्र.

Kaiser-Panorama consisted of a multi-station viewing apparatus और सेट of stereo slides.
patented by A. Fuhrmann around 1890.
Company of ladies watching stereoscopic photographs, पेंटिंग by याक़ूब spoel, before 1868.
A very early depiction of लोगों using a stereoscope.
Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique for creating or enhancing the भ्रम of गहराई in an चित्र by अर्थात् of stereopsis for binocular vision.
The word stereoscopy derives from the Greek `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` firm, solid '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to look '', `` to see ''.
Most stereoscopic methods present two ऑफसेट बिंब separately to the left and right eye of the viewer.
These two-dimensional images are then संयुक्त in the brain to give the perception of 3D depth.
This technique is distinguished from 3D displays that display an image in तीन पूरा आयाम, allowing the निरीक्षक to बढ़ाएँ सूचना about the 3-dimensional objects being displayed by head and eye movements.
John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. October 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having पहले परोसा as the first vice president of the United States.
An American Founding Father, he थी a statesman, राजनयिक, and a leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain.
Well educated, he was an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism and wrote prolifically about his often seminal ideas, both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the early चरण of the American Revolution.
A lawyer and public figure in Boston, as a delegate from Massachusetts to the Continental Congress, he निभाई a अग्रणी भूमिका in persuading Congress to declare independence.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the घोषणा of Independence in 1776, and was its primary advocate in the Congress.
Later, as a राजनयिक in यूरोपीय, he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with Great Britain, and was responsible for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist and historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, which together साथ उसके पहले विचार on सरकारी, बहकावे American political thought.
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775, he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief, और 25 सालो बाद मनोनीत जॉन मार्शल to be मुख्य इंसाफ of the United States.
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George Washington 's वाइस अध्यक्ष और उसके अपना चुनाव in 1796 as the दूसरी president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious attacks by the jeffersonian republicans, as खूब as the प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton.
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts, and built up the army and navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval युद्ध ( पुकारा the `` quasi-war `` ) साथ फ़्रांस, 1798–1800.
the प्रमुख accomplishment of उसके presidency was his peaceful resolution of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition.
In 1800, Adams थी पराजित लिये re-election by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts.
He later resumed उसके दोस्ती साथ जेफरसन.
He and his wife, अबीगैल Adams, founded an accomplished family line of politicians, diplomats, and historians now referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams was the father of John Quincy Adams, the sixth अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य.
His achievements have received greater मान्यता in आधुनिक टाइम्स, हालांकि his contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders.
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the भवन कि आखिरकार became ज्ञात as the White House.
the संयुक्त राज्य ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States currency.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander Hamilton, is currently featured on the obverse of the bill, while the U.S. राजकोष भवन is प्रदर्शित on the reverse.
( हैमिल्टन is एक of two non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills.
The other is Benjamin Franklin, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is one of only four people featured on U.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to the उपस्थित ) जो थी नहीं born in the महाद्वीपीय United States, as he was from the West Indies.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; and Robert Morris, England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ).
In addition, Kamehameha I, appears on the 2008 Hawaii राज्य quarter. )
All $ 10 bills issued आज हैं संघीय Reserve Notes.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced due to wear.
लगभग 6 % of सब us banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar बिल्स हैं वितरित by संघीय Reserve Banks in yellow straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John Trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall.
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a पोर्ट्रेट of वुडरो विल्सन facing to the बाएँ, लकिन थी प्रयुक्त तभी for intra-government transactions ).
A rider on a यामाहा waverunner XL performing a high-speed turn.
A jetboat is a नाव propelled by a जेट of water ejected from the back of the craft.
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that uses a propeller in the water नीचे or पीछे the boat, a jetboat draws the water from under the boat into a pump inside the boat, then expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
Jetboats were originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who developed a waterjet in 1954 ) for operation in the fast-flowing and shallow rivers of New जीलैंड, specifically to overcome the प्रॉब्लम of propellers striking रॉक्स in ऐसे waters.
Previous attempts at waterjet propulsion had very short lifetimes, generally due to the inefficient design of the units and the फैक्ट कि वे offered few लाभ over conventional propellers.
Unlike these previous waterjet developments, such as Campini 's and the Hanley Hydrojet, हैमिल्टन था a विशिष्ट need लिये a propulsion system to operate in very-shallow water, and the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution.
From this, the popularity of the jet unit और jetboat increased rapidly.
Through further developments, it was found the waterjet offered several other advantages over propellers for a wide range of vessel types, and as such, waterjets are used widely today for many high-speed vessels, including passenger ferries, rescue craft, patrol boats and offshore supply vessels.
Jetboats are highly maneuverable, and many can, from full speed, be reversed and brought to a रोकें भीतर छोटी अधिक than उनके अपना लंबाई, in a maneuver known as a `` crash stop ''.
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre where the नाव 's इंजन throttle is काटें, the परिचालन is turned sharply and the throttle opened again, causing the boat to spin quickly around with a large spray of water.
There is no अभियान्त्रिकी सीमा to the आकार of jetboats, हालांकि the वैध of their use depends a lot on the type of application.
Classic prop-drives हैं generally अधिक कुशल और किफायती at कम speeds, up to about, but as boat speed increases beyond this, the extra hull resistance generated by struts, rudders, shafts ( etc. ) means waterjets are more efficient in the 20-50 knot range ( up to ).
Also, in situations with very large propellers turning at slow speeds ( such as tug नौकाएँ ), the समतुल्य आकार waterjet would be too big to be practical.
For these reasons, the vast majority of waterjet units are installed in high-speed vessels and in particular परिस्थितियों जहाँ उथले draught, maneuverability, and load flexibility are main concerns.
The biggest jet-driven vessels are मिला in सैन्य उपयोग or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry.
South Africa 's s ( approximately long ) are the biggest jet-propelled vessels so far.
Even these German-built vessels are capable of performing `` क्रैश stops ''.
Uveitis is broadly पारिभाषित as inflammation of the uvea.
The uvea consists of the मध्य, pigmented, vascular structures of the eye and includes the iris, ciliary body, and choroid.
Uveitis requires an urgent referral और thorough परिक्षा by an ophthalmologist or optometrist along with urgent treatment to control the inflammation.

The Shining is a 1980 psychological horror film produced and directed by Stanley Kubrick, co-written with novelist Diane Johnson, and starring Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, scatman Crothers, and Danny Lloyd.
the फिल्मी is आधारित on the Stephen King novel The Shining.
A writer, Jack Torrance, takes a job as an off-season कार्यवाहक at an पृथक होटल.
His young son possesses psychic abilities और is समर्थ to देखिए बाते इससे the पास्ट और future, such as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel.
Soon after settling in, the family is trapped in the hotel by a snowstorm, and Jack gradually becomes बहकावे by a अलौकिक उपस्थिति ; he उतरता into madness and attempts to murder his wife and son.
Unlike previous Kubrick films, which developed an audience धीरे by भवन on word-of-mouth, The Shining was released as a mass-market film, opening at first in just two cities on Memorial Day, then nationwide a month later.
Although initial response to the film was mixed, later critical assessment was more favorable and it is now viewed as a क्लासिक of the हॉरर genre.
Film director Martin Scorsese, writing in The Daily जानवर, क्रमित it as एक of the 11 scariest horror movies of all time.
Film critics, film students, और kubrick 's producer, Jan Harlan, have remarked on the enormous influence the film has had on popular culture.
The initial European रिलीज of the जगमगाता थी 25 मिनट्स shorter than the American version, achieved by removing most of the scenes taking place outside the environs of the hotel.
Patio कोला बोतल
Patio Diet Cola was a brand of diet soda introduced by पेप्सी in 1963.
It थी निर्मित in जवाब to Diet Rite Cola, which was the first diet cola on the market.
Fitness प्रवर्तक डिब्बी ड्रेक was Patio Diet Cola 's spokesperson.
In 1964, Patio released orange, अंगूर, और रूट बियर जायका.
This flavor line थी नहीं meant to compete with brands like Orange Crush, but rather fill out the line.
आँगन sodas यहूद उपलब्धियाँ in the cold-bottle market : grocery and mom-and-pop stores.
Advertising for Patio was comparatively scarce ; at the समय, bottlers were regionally franchised, and related advertising was necessarily local.
In 1964, आँगन आहार cola became Diet Pepsi.
The newly branded आहार सोडा थी advertised alongside पेप्सी साथ the tagline `` Pepsi either way '', which replaced the slogan `` Dances with flavor ''.
The short life span of Patio Diet कोला makes it a ग्रेट जोड लिये बोतल collectors.
Most of the remaining Patio line of flavors were phased out by the जल्दी 1970s, जबकि a few बच जबतक the मिड 70s
Infrastructure is basic physical and organizational structures needed for the operation of a समाज or enterprise, or the services and facilities necessary for an economy to function.
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural elements that provide framework supporting an संपूर्ण ढांचा of विकास.
It is an important term for judging a country or प्रदेश 's development.
The term typically refers to the technical structures that support a society, such as roads, पुलों, जल सप्लाई, sewers, विद्युत ग्रिड, दूरसंचार, and so forth, and can be defined as `` the physical components of interrelated systems providing commodities and services essential to enable, sustain, or enhance societal living conditions. ''
Viewed functionally, infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and सेवाएं, और भी the वितरण of finished products to markets, as well as basic social services such as schools and hospitals ; for example, roads enable the transport of raw materials to a factory.
In military parlance, the पद refers to the इमारतें और permanent installations necessary for the support, redeployment, and operation of military forces.
to मेक it सरल, अवसंरचना is anything that is needed everyday, an everyday item.
A आलेखीय प्रतिनिधित्व of the ideal human karyotype
mitochondrial डीएनए.
Human genetic variation is the जेनेटिक मतभेद both within and among populations.
There may be multiple variants of any दिए जीन in the इंसान population ( genes ), leading to polymorphism.
Many genes are not polymorphic, meaning that only a single allele is present in the जनसांख्यिकी : the जीन is तब said to be fixed.
No two इंसानो हैं genetically identical.
भी monozygotic twins, who develop from one zygote, have infrequent genetic differences due to mutations occurring during development and gene copy number variation.
Differences between individuals, भी closely सम्बन्धित individuals, are the key to techniques such as genetic fingerprinting.
Alleles occur at different frequencies in different human populations, with populations that are more geographically और ancestrally रिमोट tending to differ more.
Causes of मतभेद between individuals शामिल the exchange of genes during meiosis and various mutational events.
There are at least two कारण क्यों जेनेटिक विभिन्नता exists between populations.
प्राकृतिक चयन may confer an adaptive advantage to individuals in a specific environment if an allele provides a competitive advantage.
Alleles under selection are likely to occur only in those भौगोलिक regions जहाँ they confer an advantage.
The दूसरी प्रमुख कारण of genetic variation is due to the high degree of neutrality of most mutations.
सबसे mutations do नहीं appear to have any selective effect one way or the other on the organism.
The main cause is genetic drift, this is the effect of यादृच्छिक परिवर्तन in the gene pool.
In humans, founder effect and past small population size ( increasing the likelihood of genetic बहाव ) may have था an महत्वपूर्ण influence in neutral differences between populations.
The theory that इंसानो recently migrated out of Africa supports this.
the पढ़ाई of इंसान जेनेटिक विभिन्नता has both evolutionary significance and medical applications.
It can help scientists understand ancient human population migrations as well as how different human groups are biologically सम्बन्धित to एक another.
For medicine, study of human genetic variation may be important because some disease-causing alleles occur more often in people from specific geographic regions.
New findings show that each human has on average 60 new mutations compared to उनके अभिभावक.
Apart from mutations, many जीनों कि may have aided इंसानो in ancient times plague humans today.
For example, it is suspected that genes that allow humans to more efficiently process खाना हैं those कि मेक लोगों susceptible to obesity and diabetes today.
Tea Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol and the नेशनल मॉल at the करदाताओं कूच on वॉशिंगटन on सितंबर 12, 2009.
The Tea पार्टी गति is an अमरीकी राजनैतिक गति कि अधिवक्ताओं सख्त adherence to the संयुक्त States Constitution, reducing U.S. government spending and taxes, and reduction of the U.S. national debt and federal budget deficit.
The movement has महरूम पुकारा partly रूढ़िवादी, partly libertarian, and partly populist.
The गति रै प्रायोजित विरोध and supported political candidates since 2009.
The name of the movement is निकला इससे the Boston Tea Party of 1773, an iconic event in American history.
Anti-tax प्रदर्शनकारियों in the United States have often referred to the original Boston Tea Party for inspiration.
References to the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी यहूद भाग of कर Day protests held throughout the 1990s and earlier.
By 2001, a custom had developed among some रूढ़िवादी कार्यकर्ताओं of mailing चाय bags to legislators and other officials as a symbolic act.
The currencies of प्यूर्टो रीको closely follow the historic development of Puerto Rico.
As a colony of Spain and the United States, Puerto Rico was granted the use of दोनो विदेशी and provincial currencies.
Following the स्पेनी colonization in 1502, Puerto Rico became an important port, with its own supply of gold.
However, as the mineral reserves ran empty भीतर the सदी, the archipelago 's economy suffered.
The Spanish Crown issued the Situado Mexicano, which meant that a semi-regular शिपमेंट of सुनहरा इससे the viceroyalty of नई स्पेन होता be भेजा to the island, as a way to provide economic support.
Between 1636 and 1637, फिलिप iv of स्पेन imposed a tax which had to be paid using a revenue stamp.
Inspired by this, Puerto रीको began producing banknotes in 1766, बनने the पहला उपनिवेश to छपाई 8- रियल banknotes in the Spanish Empire and which in the Spanish government 's approval of subsequent issues.
The situado was discontinued during the 19th century, creating an economic crisis, as a result of Mexico gaining इसके स्वतंत्रता from Spain.
साल्वाडोर meléndez bruna, the colonial governor in office, ordered the issue of provincial banknotes, creating the Puerto Rican peso.
However, printing of these banknotes ceased बाद 1815.
During the following दशकों, विदेशी सिक्के became the widespread currency.
In the 1860s और 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
On February 1, 1890, the banco español de प्यूर्टो रीको was inaugurated and began issuing banknotes.
The bank designed four श्रेणी और लगाई तीन in circulation under Spanish rule.
In 1895, a Royal Decree ordered the उत्पादन of provincial peso coins.
On August 13, 1898, the spanish-american युद्ध ended with Spain ceding Puerto Rico to the United States.
The Banco Español de Puerto Rico was renamed Bank of Porto रीको and issued bills equivalent to the United States dollar, creating the Puerto Rican dollar.
In 1902, the First National Bank of Porto Rico issued banknotes in a parallel manner.
Two more श्रेणी यहूद issued until 1913.
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system was fully integrated into the United States ' economic and monetary system, the Puerto Rican dollars यहूद redeemed लिये those जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य Treasury.
The peso and dollar have been followed by other contemporary issues, सहित commemorative banknotes, private currency, and a quarter coin designed with Fort San Felipe del Morro in the face.
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi, formerly stylized in अपरकेस as पेप्सी ) is a कार्बोनेटेड soft drink that is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo.
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's Drink, it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on अगस्त 28, 1898, तब to पेप्सी in 1961.
The Book of Ezekiel is the third of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible, following the किताबे of यशायाह और यिर्मयाह and preceding the Book of the Twelve.
( The order is somewhat different in the ईसाई बूढ़ा वसीयत ).
It derives its name from, and records the visions of, the 6th सदी bc पुजारी और नबी ezekiel.
According to the book, the नबी, exiled in बाबुल, अनुभवी a श्रेणी of seven visions during the 22 years from 593 to 571 BC, a period which spans the final destruction of Jerusalem in 586.
The visions, and the book, are structured around three themes : ( 1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) निर्णय on the राष्ट्र ( chapters 25-32 ) ; and future blessings for Israel ( chapters 33-48 ).
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a प्रमुख संयुक्त States port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana.
The जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर थी 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States.
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined Statistical Area, a larger व्यापार क्षेत्रफल, था a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
The city is named after Orléans, a city located on the Loire River in Centre, France, and is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New ऑरलियन्स is भी प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके भोजन, म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the birthplace of jazz ), and its annual celebrations and festivals, most notably Mardi Gras.
The नगर is प्रायः referred to as the `` most unique '' in America.
New Orleans is located in southeastern louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The city and Orleans मोहल्ला ( ) हैं.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. tammany to the उत्तर, st. बर्नार्ड to the east, Plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of which is included in the नगर हद, झूठ to the उत्तर and Lake Borgne lies to the east.
The National Birth Control League was a birth कंट्रोल organization in the United States.
It was संस्थापित in कूच 1915 by Mary Dennett, Clara Gruening Stillman and Jessie Ashley.
Its main purpose was to overturn the laws which बैन contraceptives इससे the U.S. mails.
Campaigns were mounted in New York, but in 1919 the League was disbanded and reformed into the voluntary parenthood लीग.
Cancer, known medically as a malignant फुलाव, is a व्यापक group of various diseases, all involving unregulated cell growth.
In cancer, कोशिकाएं divide और grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, and invade nearby parts of the body.
The cancer may also spread to more दूर भाग of the body through the lymphatic system or bloodstream.
Not all tumors हैं cancerous.
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably, do not invade neighboring ऊतकों, and do not spread throughout the body.
There are over 200 different known cancers कि पहुँचकर humans.
Determining what causes कर्कट is complex.
Many things are known to increase the risk of cancer, including tobacco use, certain infections, radiation, कमी of शारीरिक कार्यकलाप, मोटापा, and environmental pollutants.
These can directly damage genes or combine with existing genetic त्रुटियां भीतर cells to cause the disease.
Approximately five to ten percent of cancers हैं entirely hereditary.
Cancer can be detected in a number of तरीके, सहित the presence of certain signs and symptoms, screening tests, or medical imaging.
Once a possible कर्कट is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic examination of a tissue sample.
Cancer is usually treated with कीमोथेरेपी, विकिरण चिकित्सा and surgery.
The chances of surviving the बीमारी vary greatly by the type and location of the cancer and the extent of disease at the start of treatment.
While cancer can affect people of all ages, and a few types of कर्कट हैं अधिक आम in children, the रिस्क of विकासशील कर्कट generally increases with age.
In 2007, cancer caused about 13 % of all human deaths worldwide ( 7.9 लाख ).
Rates are rising as more people live to an old age and as mass lifestyle changes occur in the विकासशील संसार.
