The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory, created and executive produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady, premiered on सीबीएस on सितंबर 24, 2007.
The show centers on पाँच वर्ण : roommates शेल्डन कूपर and Leonard Hofstadter, two Caltech physicists ; Penny, a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ), a physicist colleague, and, at different times, a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife, and former part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), जो joins the समूह बाद होने matched to शेल्डन on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also features numerous supporting characters, प्रत्येक of जिसको plays a prominent role in a small group of episodes.
The A-Team is an American action-adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, कार्यशील इससे 1983 to 1987, परिचय a fictional group of ex– United States Army Special Forces personnel who work as soldiers of fortune, while on the run from the Army after being branded as war criminals for a `` crime they did n't commit ``.
A feature film based on the series थी released by 20th सदी Fox on June 11, 2010.
A comic book series, A-Team : Shotgun Wedding, began कूच 9, 2010.
Diana Prince is a fictional अक्षर appearing regularly in कहानियां published by DC Comics.
She debuted in Sensation Comics # 1 ( January 1942 ) and serves as the civilian and secret identity of the superhero Wonder स्त्री.
The अक्षर थी निर्मित by चार्ल्स Moulton and Harry G. Peter.
Wat Phra Kaew, बैंकॉक, थाईलैंड
There is no official state religion in the Thai constitution, which guarantees religious freedom for all Thai citizens, हालांकि the किंग is जरूरी by law to be Buddhist.
According to the last census ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of thais हैं बौद्धों of the थेरवाद tradition.
Muslims are the second largest religious group in थाईलैंड at 4.6 %.
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani, Yala, narathiwat और भाग of songkhla chumphon have dominant Muslim populations, consisting of both ethnic Thai and Malay.
The southern tip of थाईलैंड is ज़्यादातर जातीय Malays.
Christians, mainly catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
A small but influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and some Hindus also live in the देश 's शहरों, और हैं heavily engaged in retail commerce.
वहीँ is भी a छोटी यहूदी जातियाँ in Thailand, dating back to the 17th century.
Since 2001, Muslim activists, generally described by the Thai government as आतंकवादी or separatists, have rallied against the central government because of alleged corruption and ethnic bias on the part of officials.
Thailand 's Department of Religion, currently under the Ministry of Culture, is formally responsible for the registration of religious groups in थाईलैंड url_http जिससे थाम गुण through legally established foundations.
It has oversight, along with the Immigration Police, over the work permits of प्रचारकों who are `` expatriate religious workers '' of all religions.
A value added tax ( VAT ) is a रूप of खपत tax.
From the perspective of the खरीदार, it is a tax on the purchase price.
From that of the seller, it is a tax only on the value added to a उत्पाद, सामग्री, or सेवा, from an accounting point of view, by this stage of its manufacture or distribution.
The निर्माता remits to the सरकारी the difference between these two amounts, and retains the rest for themselves to offset the taxes they had previously paid on the inputs.
The value added to a उत्पाद by or साथ a business is the sale price charged to its customer, minus the cost of materials and other taxable inputs.
A VAT is like a sales tax in that ultimately तभी the समाप्त उपभोक्ता is taxed.
It differs from the sales tax in that, with the latter, the tax is collected and remitted to the सरकारी तभी एकबार, at the point of purchase by the end consumer.
With the VAT, collections, remittances to the government, and credits for taxes already paid occur each समय a कारोबार in the सप्लाई कड़ी purchases products.
A referee calling a high-sticking penaltyhigh
-sticking is the नाम of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that may occur when a player intentionally or inadvertently plays with his or her stick above the height of the shoulders or above the cross bar of a hockey goal.
This can result in a stoppage of play or in a दंड.
In the rules of the National Hockey League, high-sticking is defined as a दंड in नियम 60 और as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80.
A stoppage in play results if a high stick आता in सम्पर्क साथ the पक और the team who touched it regains control of the puck.
However, play usually continues if a player touches the puck with a high stick and the opposing टोली gains कंट्रोल of the puck.
If the puck goes into the opposing जाल बाद coming into सम्पर्क with a high stick, the goal is disallowed.
The level at which a stick is considered too ऊँची लिये a लक्ष्य is the crossbar of the net.
However, if a player knocks the puck into his own net साथ a ऊँची स्टिक, the goal is allowed.
A penalty is assessed if a खिलाड़ी हमलों another player with a high stick.
The खिलाड़ी is दिए a नाबालिग दंड जबतक उसके ऊँची stick caused an injury, in which case the referee has the option to assess a double-minor, major or match penalty.
It is the referee 's discretion जिससे दंड to assess : the rule calls for a double minor for an accidental injury, or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition player was actually injured ).
Injury is usually decided by the high stick causing bleeding, but the presence of blood करता नहीं automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded.
Some referees have been known to award an extra penalty without the उपस्थिति of रक्त if the रेफरी determines कि the injury sustained was sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty.
Typical modern memory कार्ड रीडर, संगत with many common formats
A memory card reader is a device, typically having a usb इंटरफ़ेस, लिये accessing the आंकड़ा on a memory card such as a CompactFlash ( CF ), Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ).
Most card पाठक भी प्रस्ताव write capability, and together with the card, this can function as a pen drive.
Some printers and personal कंप्यूटर have a built-in card reader.
A multi कार्ड रीडर is प्रयुक्त लिये communication with more than one type of flash memory card.
Multi card readers do not have built-in मेमोरी क्षमता, लकिन हैं समर्थ to accept multiple types and styles of memory cards.
The number of compatible memory cards varies from reader to रीडर और can include more than 20 different types.
The number of different memory cards that a multi card reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1, with x being a figure of merit indicating the number of memory cards accepted, such as 35-in-1.
वहीँ हैं तीन categories of card readers sorted by the type and quantity of the card slots : single card reader ( e.g. 1x SD-only ), multi card reader ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g. 4x SD only ).
Some kinds of memory cards with their own USB functions do not need the card reader, such as the बुद्धिमान स्टिक memory card, which can plug directly into a USB slot.
the usb device class used is 0x08.
Bullying is detrimental to students ' well-being और विकास.
Bullying is the उपयोग of force or coercion to abuse or intimidate others.
The behavior can be habitual and involve an असंतुलन of social or physical power.
It can include verbal harassment or threat, physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular victims, शायद on grounds of रेस, धर्म, लिंग, कामुकता, or ability.
If धमकाना is किया by a group, it is called mobbing.
The victim of धमकाना is sometimes referred to as a `` target ''.
Bullying can be पारिभाषित in many different ways.
The UK currently has no legal definition of bullying, while some u.S. राज्य have कानून against it.
Bullying consists of तीन मौलिक प्रकार of abuse – emotional, verbal, and physical.
It typically involves subtle methods of coercion such as intimidation.
धमकाना सीमाएँ from simple one-on-one bullying to more complex bullying in which the bully may have one or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in his or her bullying activities.
Bullying in school and the workplace is भी referred to as peer abuse.
Robert W. Fuller has analyzed bullying in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of rankism.
A bullying culture can develop in any कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे human beings interact with each other.
This includes school, church, family, the workplace, home, and पड़ोस.
Happy slapping in the instituto क्षेत्रीय Federico Errázuriz, Santa Cruz, Chile
Laura Bush and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4, 2007, in Austin, Texas, after the 8-year-old introduced Mrs. Bush during announcement of the future opening of the टेक्सास क्षेत्रीय दफ्तर of the नेशनल बीच for Missing and Exploited Children.
Rae Leigh was the first child in the U.S. to be recovered as a result of an एम्बर चेतावनी जब वो थी 8 सप्ताह बूढ़ा in नवम्बर 1998.
An AMBER Alert or a Child Abduction Emergency ( SAME code : CAE ) is a child abduction alert system originating in 1996, अभी employed in 9 देशों.
AMBER is officially a backronym for America 's Missing : प्रसारण आपात जवाब, नामित for Amber Hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington, Texas in 1996.
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in Georgia, `` Levi 's Call '' ( नामित बाद लेवी frady ) ; in Hawaii, `` Maile Amber Alert '' ( after Maile Gilbert ) ; and Arkansas, `` Morgan Nick Amber Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ).
AMBER Alerts are वितरित via वाणिज्यिक रेडियो स्टेशन, अंतरजाल रेडियो, उपग्रह रेडियो, टेलीविज़न stations, and cable TV by the Emergency Alert System and NOAA Weather Radio ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ).
The alerts are also issued via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition signs, the LED billboards which are located बाहर of नए walgreens स्थितियाँ, साथ साथ the LED/LCD signs of billboard companies such as Clear Channel Outdoor, CBS Outdoor and Lamar, or through wireless device SMS text messages.
AMBER Alert has also teamed up with Google and Facebook to relay information regarding an एम्बर चेतावनी to an कभी growing demographic.
Those interested in subscribing to प्राप्त एम्बर चेतावनियाँ in उनके क्षेत्रफल via SMS messages can visit Wireless Amber Alerts, which are offered by law as free messages.
in कुछ states, the display scrollboards in front of lottery terminals are also used.
The निर्णय to घोषित an एम्बर चेतावनी is बना by प्रत्येक पुलिस organization ( in many cases, the state police or highway patrol ) which investigates each of the abductions.
Public information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the name and description of the abductee, a description of the suspected abductor, और a वर्णन and license plate number of the abductor 's vehicle, if available.
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री साथ जिसको संयुक्त राज्य President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair and its repercussions ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
House of Night is a series of vampire -themed fantasy novels by अमरीकी लेखक P. C. डाल और उसके daughter Kristin Cast.
It follows the adventures of zoey redbird, a sixteen-year-old लड़की जो रै बस become a `` fledgling vampyre '' and is required to attend the House of Night boarding school in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
The series has been on the New York Times Best विक्रेता सूची लिये 63 सप्ताह और there are over seven million copies in print in North America alone.
The sixth novel, Tempted, which went on sale on October 27, 2009 with a first मुद्रण of a लाख नक़ल, डाला the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1.
In January, 2010, Gezeichnet, a German translation of Marked, reached the # 1 spot on the Der Spiegel bestseller list.
The series has so far sold more than ten million किताबे in 39 देशों.
Burned was released on April 27, 2010, and like Tempted, it entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1.
Awakened, released in January, 2011, also entered the list at # 1.
The series, which is published by St Martin 's Press is planned to शामिल twelve books.
In 2008, plans for a film अनुकूलन यहूद भी घोषित.
the दसवाँ किताब in the श्रेणी, Hidden, was released on October 16, 2012.
The second book in the novellas ( जिससे दे पृष्ठभूमि on supporting वर्ण ), Lenobia 's Vow, was released January 31, 2012.
Book eleven is currently called Revealed, and the Casts have announced that two more novellas, Neferet’s Curse, planned to be released February 19, 2013, and a prequel novel about Kalona, are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books.
In Greek mythology, the Trojan War was waged against the city of Troy by the achaeans ( यूनानियों ) बाद पेरिस of Troy took Helen from her husband Menelaus king of Sparta.
The war is one of the most important events in Greek mythology and has been narrated through many works of Greek साहित्य, सबसे notably through होमर 's इलियड और the Odyssey.
The Iliad relates a part of the last साल of the siege of Troy ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus 's journey home.
Other parts of the war are contained in a साईकिल of एपिक कविताएं, which have survived through fragments.
Episodes from the war provided material for Greek tragedy and अन्य works of यूनानी literature, and for Roman poets including Virgil and Ovid.
The war originated from a quarrel between the देवियाँ एथेना, hera, और aphrodite, बाद eris, the देवी of strife and discord, gave them a golden apple, sometimes known as the Apple of Discord, marked `` for the fairest ''.
Zeus sent the goddesses to पेरिस, जो judged that Aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', should receive the apple.
in एक्सचेंज, aphrodite made Helen, the most beautiful of all women and wife of Menelaus, fall in love with Paris, who took her to Troy.
Agamemnon, king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's husband Menelaus, led an expedition of achaean सैनिकों to ट्रॉय and besieged the city for ten years because of Paris ' insult.
After the deaths of many heroes, including the Achaeans Achilles and Ajax, and the ट्रोजन्स हेक्टर और पेरिस, the नगर गिरी to the ruse of the Trojan Horse.
The Achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except for some of the women and children whom they kept or sold as स्लेव ) और desecrated the temples, thus earning the gods ' wrath.
Few of the Achaeans returned safely to उनके homes and many founded colonies in distant shores.
The Romans later traced their origin to Aeneas, one of the ट्रोजन्स, who was said to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy.
The ancient Greeks thought that the Trojan War was a historical event that had लिया प्लेस in the 13th or 12th सदी bc, और believed कि Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles.
By modern times, दोनो the युद्ध और the city were widely believed to be non-historical.
In 1868, however, the जर्मनी archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert, who convinced Schliemann that Troy was at Hissarlik and Schliemann took over Calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ; this claim is now accepted by most scholars.
Whether there is any historical reality पीछे the trojan युद्ध is an खोलें सवाल.
Many scholars believe that there is a historical core to the tale, though this may simply mean that the Homeric stories are a संलयन of विभिन्न किस्से of sieges and expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks during the Bronze Age.
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a specific historical conflict usually date it to the 12th or 11th centuries BC, often preferring the dates given by Eratosthenes, 1194–1184 BC, जिससे roughly corresponds साथ archaeological evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy VIIa.
Anarchists have employed certain symbols for their cause, including most prominently the circle-A and the black flag, although anarchists have historically largely अस्वीकृत the महत्व of प्रतीकों to political movement.
Since the revival of anarchism around the start of the 21st-century concurrent with the rise of the anti-globalization movement, anarchist cultural symbols are widely present.
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the skull that transmits the greater palatine artery, vein, and nerve between the pterygopalatine fossa और the oral cavity.
Surface temperature of Antarctica in winter and summer from the European Centre for medium-range मौसम forecasts
The जलवायु of अंटार्कटिक is the coldest on the whole of Earth.
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring temperature ever अंकित on the मैदान on Earth : −89.2 °C ( −128.6 °F ) at Vostok Station.
It is also extremely dry ( technically a मरुस्थल ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of precipitation per year.
Even so, on most parts of the continent the snow rarely melts and is eventually compressed to become the glacial बर्फ कि makes up the ice sheet.
Weather fronts rarely घुस दूर into the महाद्वीप.
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap climate ( Köppen EF ) with very cold, generally अत्यधिक शुष्क मौसम throughout the साल and no month averaging above 0 °C ( 32 °F ).
Some fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( Köppen ET ) with a short summer averaging ऊपर जमने, और much उच्चतर वर्षण.
Current head coach Mike Tomlin, दौरान the 2007 season
The Pittsburgh Steelers franchise has had 16 head coaches throughout इसके history.
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in, the name was changed to the Steelers prior to the season to celebrate the नगर 's विरासत of producing steel.
Joe Bach served two separate terms as head coach and Walt kiesling परोसा तीन separate terms.
During the and seasons, due to the amount of players who fought in World War II, the Steelers संयुक्त उनके टोली साथ फिलाडेल्फिया and Chicago, respectively.
दौरान ये सीज़न, स्टीलर्स ' कोच वॉल्ट kiesling shared coaching duties with Greasy Neale and Phil Handler, who have not been included within this list.
Struggling लिये much of the मताधिकार 's जल्दी सालो, the टोली 's पहला ऋतु with more wins than losses was coached by Jock Sutherland in.
In, under Sutherland, the स्टीलर्स निभाई उनके first playoff game against the Philadelphia Eagles.
Ten of the 16 head coaches spent their entire पेशेवर कोचिंग करियर साथ the मताधिकार, including John McNally, Walt Kiesling and Chuck Noll, who have also been voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
One of only four men to coach the same team for 23 years, चक noll रिटायर्ड in.
Noll is also the तभी coach in National Football League history to win four Super Bowls.
Bill Cowher, Noll 's बदलना, coached the स्टीलर्स to their fifth Super Bowl victory, in 2005.
The Steelers sixth सुपर कटोरी जीत आए in सुपर कटोरी XLIII, while head coached by Mike Tomlin, the team 's current head coach.
In criminal law, fraud is intentional deception made for personal gain or to क्षति another individual ; the related adjective is fraudulent, and verb is defraud.
धोखाधड़ी is a अपराधों और a civil law violation, though the specific criminal law definition varies by legal jurisdiction.
defrauding लोगों or entities of धन or valuables is a common purpose of fraud.
A hoax also involves deception, but without the इरादे of लाभ or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a defense in a civil action लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध or विशिष्ट performance of a contract.
Fraud is a आधार for equitable jurisdiction.
Passover, or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew, Yiddish ), Tiberian :, Modern Hebrew : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah, Pesakh, Yiddish : Peysekh, Paysakh, Paysokh ) is an महत्वपूर्ण biblically -derived यहूदी festival.
historically, साथ साथ shavuot ( `` पेंटेकोस्ट '' ) और sukkot ( `` झोपड़ियों '' ), Passover is one of the three pilgrimage festivals ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire population of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem.
Samaritans still make this pilgrimage to Mount Gerizim, but तभी मेन participate in पब्लिक worship.
Passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew month of Nisan and lasts for either सात दिनों ( in इसराईल ) or आठ दिनों ( in the diaspora ).
In Judaism, a day commences at dusk and lasts until the following dusk, thus the first day of Passover only begins बाद संध्या of the 14th of nisan और ends at dusk of the 15th day of the month of Nisan.
The rituals unique to the Passover celebrations commence साथ the passover seder जब the 15th of Nisan has begun.
In the उत्तरी गोलार्ध passover takes प्लेस in spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ).
It is एक of the सबसे widely observed Jewish holidays.
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 सालो पहले by परमेश्वर इससे गुलामी in प्राचीन मिश्र that was ruled by the Pharaohs, and their birth as a nation under the leadership of Moses.
It commemorates the story of the Exodus as described in the Hebrew Bible especially in the किताब of exodus, in जिससे the israelites यहूद freed from slavery in Egypt.
In the narrative of the Exodus, the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery in Egypt by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient उन्होंने पहले the pharaoh होता रिलीज उसके israelite स्लेव ; the दसवाँ और worst of the plagues थी the मौत of the Egyptian first-born.
The Israelites were instructed to चिह्नित the doorposts of उनके घरों with the blood of a slaughtered spring lamb and, upon seeing this, the spirit of the Lord knew to pass over the first-born in these homes, hence the name of the holiday.
There is some debate over जहाँ the पद is actually derived from.
When the pharaoh freed the israelites, it is said that they left in such a hurry that they could not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ).
In commemoration, for the अवधि of passover no leavened bread is eaten, for which reason it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread ''.
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened ब्रैड ) is खाया during Passover and it is a symbol of the holiday.
हैली 's धूमकेतु or धूमकेतु हैली ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye from Earth, and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter और अधिक spectacular, लकिन होगा appear तभी once in thousands of years.
Halley 's returns to the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have been observed and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were बना by चाइनीज, babylonian, और medieval European chroniclers, but were not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The comet 's periodicity थी पहला संकल्पित in 1705 by English astronomer Edmond Halley, after whom it is now named.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the भीतरी Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft, providing the पहला observational आंकड़ा on the ढांचा of a धूमकेतु nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation.
These observations supported a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses परिचय धूमकेतु निर्माण, विशेषकर Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model, which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust.
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, और कि तभी a छोटी portion of it is icy.
Anti-communism is विपक्ष to communism.
Organized anti-communism developed in reaction to the rise of communism, especially after the 1917 अक्तूबर क्रान्ति in रूस और reaching global dimensions during the Cold War.
Most anti-communists reject the concept of historical materialism, which is a central idea in Marxism.
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief that capitalism will be followed by socialism and साम्यवादी, बस as सामंतवाद was followed by capitalism.
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist अर्जी कि the समाजवादी राज्य will `` wither away '' when it becomes unnecessary in a true communist society.
Anti-communists argue that the repression in the early years of Bolshevik rule, while not as extreme as that during Joseph Stalin 's rule, was still severe by reasonable standards, citing examples such as Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret police, which eliminated numerous राजनैतिक प्रतिद्वंद्वियों by extrajudicial executions, और the क्रूर crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion.
Some anti-communists refer to both Communism and fascism as totalitarianism, seeing समानता between the क्रियाएँ of कम्युनिस्ट and fascist governments.
Historian Robert Conquest has argued that Communism was responsible लिये tens of लाखो of मौतों दौरान the 20th सदी.
Opponents argue that Communist parties that have आइये to शक्ति have tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition.
These opponents claim that most Communist countries have shown no signs of advancing from Marx 's socialist stage of अर्थव्यवस्था to an आदर्श कम्युनिस्ट stage.
Rather, Communist सरकारें have महरूम अभियुक्त of creating a new ruling class ( a Nomenklatura ), with powers and privileges greater than those previously enjoyed by the upper classes in the non- communist regimes.
Gil Heron ( 9 April 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) was a Jamaican professional footballer.
He was the first black player to play for Scottish club Celtic, and was the father of कवि और संगीतकार Gil Scott-Heron.
He died in Detroit of a दिल आक्रमण on 27 November 2008.
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( glycine अधिकतम ) is a प्रजाति of legume native to East Asia, widely grown for its edible bean which has numerous uses.
The plant is classed as an oilseed बल्कि than a pulse by the UN Food and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant and cheap source of protein for animal feeds and many prepackaged meals ; सोया सब्ज़ी आयल is another उत्पाद of processing the soybean crop.
For example, soybean products such as textured सब्ज़ी प्रोटीन ( tvp ) are ingredients in many meat and dairy analogues.
Soybeans produce significantly more protein per acre than most other उपयोग of जमीन.
परंपरागत nonfermented खाना उपयोग of soybeans include soy milk, and from the latter tofu and tofu skin.
Fermented भोजन include soy sauce, fermented bean paste, natto, and tempeh, among others.
The oil is प्रयुक्त in अनेक industrial applications.
The main producers of soy are the United States ( 35 % ), ब्राज़ील ( 27 % ), Argentina ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ).
The beans contain significant amounts of phytic acid, alpha-linolenic acid, and isoflavones.
Harrison Ford ( born July 13, 1942 ) is an अमरीकी फिल्मी actor and producer.
He is famous for his performances as Han Solo in the असली स्टार युद्धों त्रयी और the title character of the Indiana Jones film series.
Ford is भी ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as रिक deckard in ब्लेड धावक, John Book in Witness and Jack Ryan in Patriot Games and Clear and Present Danger.
His career has spanned six decades and शामिल भूमिकाएँ in अनेक हॉलीवुड blockbusters, सहित Presumed Innocent, The Fugitive, Air Force One, and What Lies Beneath.
At one point, four of the top six box-office hits of all समय शामिल एक of his roles.
Five of his films have been inducted into the National फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री.
In 1997, Ford was ranked No. 1 in Empire `` The Top 100 फिल्म सितारों of सब समय '' list.
, the United States domestic box office grosses of Ford 's films total over us $ 3.5 अरब, साथ विश्वव्यापी grosses surpassing $ 6 billion, making Ford the third highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office star.
घाट is the husband of actress Calista Flockhart.
a ट्यूब of ChapStick
ChapStick is a brand name for lip balm manufactured by Pfizer उपभोक्ता healthcare and used in many countries worldwide.
It is intended to help treat and prevent chapped lips ; hence the नाम.
Many varieties also include sunscreen in अनुक्रम to prevent sunburn.
Due to its popularity, the term has become a genericized ट्रेडमार्क.
It popularly refers to any lip balm contained in a lipstick-style ट्यूब और लागू in the वही manner as lipstick.
However, the term is still a registered ट्रेडमार्क, साथ rights exclusively owned by Pfizer.
In Sweden and in the United Kingdom, the product 's main competitor is Lypsyl, बना by novartis उपभोक्ता स्वास्थ्य, जिससे is वितरित in similar packaging to ChapStick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), also known as Bishop Berkeley ( बिशप of cloyne ), थी an anglo-irish पारस जिनकी primary achievement was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ).
This theory denies the existence of material substance and instead contends that familiar objects like tables and chairs are only ideas in the minds of perceivers, और as a परिणाम can नहीं मौजूद बगैर being perceived.
Thus, as Berkeley famously put it, for physical वस्तुएँ `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ).
बर्कली is also known for his critique of abstraction, an important premise in his argument for immaterialism.
In 1709, Berkeley published his first major work,, in which he discussed the सीमाएं of इंसान दृष्टि और उन्नत the सिद्धान्त कि the proper objects of sight are not material objects, but light and colour.
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge in 1710 which, after its poor reception, he rewrote in dialogue रूप और प्रकाशित अंतर्गत the शीर्षक तीन संवाद between hylas और Philonous in 1713.
In this book, Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover of mind ' ), while Hylas ( Greek : 'matter ' ) embodies the Irish thinker’s opponents, in particular John Locke.
Berkeley argued against Sir Isaac Newton 's doctrine of absolute space, time और गति in de मोटू ( on Motion ), published 1721.
His arguments were a precursor to the views of Mach and Einstein.
In 1732, he published alciphron, a ईसाई क्षमाप्रार्थी विरूद्ध the free-thinkers, और in 1734, he प्रकाशित the Analyst, an empiricist critique of the foundations of infinitesimal calculus, which was influential in the development of mathematics.
His last major philosophical कार्य, siris ( 1744 ), begins by वकालत the medicinal use of tar water, and then continues to discuss a wide range of topics including science, philosophy, and theology.
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World War II, because he tackled many of the issues of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th सदी ऐसे as the समस्याएं of बोध, the अंतर between primary and secondary qualities, and the importance of language.
Qingdao ( ), historically known as Tsingtao, is a major city in eastern Shandong province, Eastern China, with a जनसांख्यिकी of over 8.715 लाख ( 2010 census ).
Its built up क्षेत्रफल, बना of 6 शहरी जिले and 4 county-level cities, is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010.
It borders Yantai to the northeast, Weifang to the वेस्ट और rizhao to the दक्षिणपश्चिम.
Qīng ( ) in Chinese means `` green '' or `` lush '', जबकि dǎo ( ) अर्थात् `` island ''.
चिंगदाओ is administered at the sub-provincial level.
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the Yellow Sea, चिंगदाओ is a प्रमुख seaport, नवल base, and industrial centre.
It is also the साईट of the tsingtao Brewery.
The world 's longest sea bridge, the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge, links the main urban area of Qingdao with Huangdao ज़िला, straddling the jiaozhou खाड़ी समुद्र areas.
Qingdao is named China 's सबसे livable city.
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified species named acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( apmv ), or is a समूह of phylogenetically related large viruses ( designated usually MimiN ).
In colloquial speech, APMV is more commonly referred to as just `` mimivirus ''.
Until October 2011, when a larger virus Megavirus chilensis was described, it had the largest capsid व्यास of सब known viruses.
Mimivirus has a large and complex genome compared with most other viruses.
Mimivirus, छोटी लिये `` mimicking microbe '', is so called to reflect its large size and apparent Gram-staining properties.
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed conflict between the लोगों of मैक्सिको and the Spanish colonial authorities which started on September 16, 1810.
The गति, जिससे became ज्ञात as the मैक्सिकन युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, was led by Mexican-born Spaniards, Mestizos and Amerindians who sought independence from Spain.
It started as an idealistic peasants ' rebellion against their colonial masters, but ended as an असंभावित गठबंधन between Mexican ex-royalists and Mexican guerrilla insurgents.
Crohn 's disease, also known as Crohn सिंड्रोम और क्षेत्रीय enteritis, is a प्रकार of जलन bowel disease that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms.
It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea ( which may be bloody if inflammation is at its worst ), vomiting ( can be continuous ), or weight loss, but may also cause complications outside the gastrointestinal tract ऐसे as स्किन rashes, arthritis, inflammation of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration.
Crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between environmental, immunological and बैक्टीरियल कारकों in genetically susceptible individuals.
This परिणाम in a दीर्घकालिक जलन विकार, in जिससे the body 's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract possibly directed at microbial antigens.
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been described as an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in the पास्ट ; हाल जांचकर्ताओं have वर्णित it as an immune deficiency state.
There is a genetic association with Crohn 's disease, primarily with variations of the NOD2 जीन और इसके प्रोटीन, जिससे होश बैक्टीरियल cell walls.
Siblings of affected individuals हैं at higher risk.
Males and females are equally प्रभावित.
Smokers are दो टाइम्स अधिक संभावित to develop Crohn 's disease than nonsmokers.
Crohn 's disease affects between 400,000 और 600,000 people in North America.
Prevalence estimates लिये उत्तरी Europe have ranged from 27–48 per 100,000.
Crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the teens and twenties, with another शिखर incidence in the fifties to seventies, although the disease can occur at any age.
There is no ज्ञात फार्मास्युटिकल or surgical cure for Crohn 's disease.
उपचार विकल्प हैं प्रतिबंधित to controlling symptoms, maintaining remission, and preventing relapse.
The disease was named after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn, who, in 1932, together with two other colleagues at माउंट sinai हॉस्पिटल in नई यॉर्क, वर्णित a श्रेणी of मरीजों साथ सूजन of the terminal ileum, the area most commonly affected by the illness.

The list directly includes the tallest buildings and structures लिये प्रत्येक देश, and where appropriate, it also points to more detailed country-specific lists.

It is located west of Grass Valley, California, लगभग 62 मील ( 100 km ) from Sacramento.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 963 at the 2010 census.
YouTube is a video-sharing website, created by three former PayPal employees in February 2005, on which users can upload, view and share videos.
The company is based in San Bruno, California, and uses Adobe Flash वीडियो और html5 प्रौद्योगिकी to प्रदर्शक a चौड़ी किस्में of user-generated वीडियो सामग्री, सहित फिल्म क्लिप्स, tv क्लिप्स, और म्यूज़िक वीडियो, as well as amateur content such as video blogging, short original videos, and educational videos.
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals, although media corporations including CBS, the BBC, Vevo, Hulu, और अन्य संगठन प्रस्ताव कुछ of उनके सामग्री via the site, as part of the YouTube partnership program.
Unregistered users can watch videos, while registered users can अपलोड an असीमित क्रमांक of वीडियो.
Videos considered to contain potentially offensive content are available only to registered users at तनिक 18 सालो बूढ़ा.
In November 2006, YouTube, LLC was bought by Google for US $ 1.65 अरब, और operates as a subsidiary of Google.
Sister Act is a musical written by cheri steinkellner और विधेयक steinkellner साथ अतिरिक्त book material by Douglas Carter Beane, with lyrics by Glenn Slater and music by Alan Menken.
It is based on the hit 1992 film comedy of the same name.
The 2009 West End production was produced by Stage Entertainment, Whoopi Goldberg, और माइकल रेनो लिये सिस Acts LLC.
Goldberg is भी a producer of the 2011 Broadway adaptation.
Microsoft DirectX is a collection of application programming interfaces ( APIs ) for handling tasks सम्बन्धित to मल्टीमीडिया, विशेषकर खेल प्रोग्रामिंग और video, on Microsoft platforms.
Originally, the names of ये api सब began साथ सीधा, ऐसे as direct3d, DirectDraw, DirectMusic, DirectPlay, DirectSound, and so forth.
The name DirectX was coined as shorthand term for all of these APIs ( the X standing in लिये the particular api names ) और जल्द became the नाम of the collection.
When Microsoft later set out to develop a gaming console, the X was used as the basis of the name Xbox to indicate that the console was आधारित on डाइरेक्टएक्स प्रौद्योगिकी.
The X initial has been carried forward in the naming of api designed लिये the एक्सबॉक्स ऐसे as XInput and the Cross-platform Audio Creation Tool ( XACT ), while the DirectX pattern has been continued for Windows APIs such as Direct2D and DirectWrite.
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the development of video games for Microsoft Windows, Microsoft Xbox, microsoft एक्सबॉक्स 360 and some Sega Dreamcast games.
Direct3D is also used by other तन्त्र अनुप्रयोग लिये कल्पना and graphics tasks such as CAD/CAM engineering.
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized component of DirectX, it is common to see the names `` डाइरेक्टएक्स '' और `` direct3d '' प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
The DirectX software development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable शब्दकोष रूप, साथ with accompanying documentation and headers for use in coding.
Originally, the runtimes यहूद तभी installed by games or explicitly by the user.
Windows 95 did not लॉन्च साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स, लकिन डाइरेक्टएक्स was included with Windows 95 OEM Service Release 2.
Windows 98 and Windows NT 4.0 both shipped साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स, as रै every version of Windows released since.
The SDK is उपलब्धियाँ as a free download.
While the runtimes are proprietary, closed-source software, source code is provided for most of the SDK samples.
starting साथ the रिलीज of Windows 8 Developer Preview, DirectX SDK has been integrated into Windows SDK.
Direct3D 9Ex, Direct3D 10, and Direct3D 11 हैं तभी उपलब्धियाँ लिये खिड़कियाँ विस्टा और नए क्युकी प्रत्येक of these new versions was built to depend upon the new Windows Display Driver Model that was introduced for Windows Vista.
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a new video memory manager supporting virtualization of graphics hardware for various अनुप्रयोग और services like the Desktop Window Manager.
Quetzaltenango, also commonly known by इसके स्वदेशी नाम, xelajú, or more commonly, Xela, is the second largest city of Guatemala.
It is दोनो the पूंजी of Quetzaltenango Department and the municipal seat of Quetzaltenango municipality.
It रै an अनुमानित population of 224,703.
The population is about 61 % स्वदेशी or amerindian, 34 % Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European.
quetzaltenango is स्तिथ in a mountain valley at an elevation of 2,330 meters ( 7,655 ft ) above sea level at its lowest part.
It may पहुँचें ऊपर 2,400 meters within the city.
The Municipality of Quetzaltenango consists of an area of.
Municipalities abutting the municipality of Quetzaltenango include : Salcajá, Cantel, Almolonga, Zunil, El palmar, concepción chiquirichapa, सैन mateo, la Esperanza, Olintepeque, and San Andrés Xecul.
All these municipalities are part of the Department of quetzaltenango, मगर सैन आन्द्रेस xecul which is a part of the Department of Totonicapán.
The Epic of Gilgamesh, an epic poem from Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of साहित्य.
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins साथ पाँच स्वतंत्र sumerian कविताएं about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), king of Uruk.
Four of these यहूद प्रयुक्त as सोर्स सामग्री लिये a combined epic in Akkadian.
This first combined epic, known as the `` बूढ़ा babylonian '' संस्करण, dates to the 18th century BC and is titled after its incipit, Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have बच.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' संस्करण तिथियाँ इससे the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ).
Fragments of लगभग दो तिहाई of इस longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
Some of the best copies were discovered in the पुस्तकालयों तबाह of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
the स्टोरी centers on a friendship between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a जंगली man निर्मित by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk.
Together, they journey to the देवदार पहाड़ to शिकस्त humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven, which the goddess Ishtar sends to punish gilgamesh लिये spurning उसके advances.
As a punishment for these क्रियाएँ, the gods sentence Enkidu to death.
The second हाफ of the एपिक focuses on gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at Enkidu 's death, and his quest for immortality.
In order to learn the secret of eternal life, Gilgamesh undertakes a long और perilous journey.
He learns that `` the जीवन कि तुम हैं seeking you will never find.
When the gods created man they allotted to him death, but life they retained in उनके own keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic, and then attributed to the immortal बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic.
Nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's fame जिया on बाद उसके मौत, क्युकी of his great building projects, and his account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
The स्टोरी रै महरूम अनूदित into many different languages, and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction.
There are numerous debates over who निर्मित the पहला वीडियो खेल, साथ the जवाब depending largely on how video games are defined.
The evolution of वीडियो खेल represents a उलझे वेब of several different industries, including scientific, computer, arcade, and consumer electronics.
The `` video '' in `` video game `` traditionally refers to a raster display device.
With the popular catch phrase use of the term `` video game '', the term now implies all प्रदर्शक प्रकार, स्वरुप, और प्लेटफ़ॉर्म.
Historians have also sought to bypass the issue by बजाय using the अधिक विशिष्ट `` digital games '' descriptive.
This term leaves out the पहले analog-based computer games.

Unless otherwise stated, numbers indicate worldwide इकाई बेची, ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the same amount.
The exception are the ones specifying शिपमेंट, which have lower precedence than others listing sales.
Franchise sales include expansion packs even हालांकि वे हैं नहीं माना full video games.

This does not necessarily apply for series that हैं नहीं वीडियो game-based.
डोरोथी ऐन विलिस रिचर्ड्स ( September 1, 1933 – September 13, 2006 ) was an American politician and the 45th Governor of Texas.
She first came to national ध्यान as the राज्य कोषाध्यक्ष of टेक्सास, जब वो वितरित the keynote पता at the 1988 Democratic National Convention.
Richards served as the 45th राज्यपाल of Texas from 1991 to 1995 and was defeated for re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush.
Ann Richards was the दूसरी मादा राज्यपाल of Texas.
Data Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a सुरक्षा विशेषता शामिल in modern operating systems.
It is known to be available in Linux, Mac OS X, iOS, Microsoft Windows and Android ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों और is intended to prevent an application or service from executing code from a non-executable memory region.
This helps prevent certain exploits that store code via a buffer अतिप्रवाह, लिये उदाहरण.
DEP runs in two modes : hardware-enforced DEP for CPUs that can mark memory pages as nonexecutable, and software-enforced DEP with limited protection for CPUs that do not have hardware support.
Software-enforced DEP does not protect विरूद्ध निष्पादन of कोड in आंकड़ा पृष्ठों, लकिन बजाय counters SEH overwrite, another type of attack.
DEP was introduced on Linux in 2004 ( kernel 2.6.8 ), on Windows in 2004 with Windows XP Service Pack 2, while Apple introduced DEP when they moved to x86 in 2006.

, is the Japanese word for hermaphroditism, जिससे is भी प्रयुक्त in a broader sense for androgyny.
Beyond Japan the term is used to describe a commonly pornographic विधा of कंप्यूटर खेल, comics and animations, which includes characters that show both primary sexual characteristics.
But in today 's language it refers लगभग exclusively लिये वर्ण who have an overall feminine appearance.
In कि मामला the पद is भी प्रायः abbreviated as futa ( s ), which is occasionally also used as term for the works itself.
Early captchas such as these, generated by the EZ-Gimpy program, were used on Yahoo !
A modern CAPTCHA, rather than attempting to बनाएँ a distorted पृष्ठभूमि and high levels of warping on the text, might focus on making segmentation difficult by adding an angled line.
Another रास्ता to make segmentation difficult is to crowd symbols together, as in Yahoo ! 's current CAPTCHA format.
Some captchas कोशिश to utilize the ability of people to see three-dimensional objects.
on इस चित्र, प्रतीकों are drawn with lines of different thickness to make an effect of extrusion.
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response test used in कम्प्यूटिंग as an attempt to ensure that the response is generated by a human being.
The process usually involves a computer asking a user to पूरा a सरल परीक्षण which the computer is able to grade.
These tests are designed to be easy for a computer to generate but मुश्किल लिये a कंप्यूटर to solve, लकिन again easy for a human.
if a correct solution is received, it can be presumed to have been entered by a human.
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the user to type letters and/or अंक इससे a distorted चित्र कि appears on the screen.
Such tests are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites, since a normal human can easily read a CAPTCHA, while the bot can not process the image letters and therefore, can not जवाब properly, or at all.
Although most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated, many of them have become difficult even for a human to read, so picture CAPTCHAs were created in which a human is shown a simple test to show a picture of a certain animal ( given few animal pictures ), which is simple for a human being to process, and इसलिए आसान to चुनें, जबकि a bot can नहीं प्रक्रम और solve the सवाल क्युकी हालांकि it can analyze the चित्र, it can not easily guess the animal.
The term `` CAPTCHA '' was coined in 2000 by Luis वोन ahn, मैनुएल ब्लम, निकोलस J. Hopper, and John Langford ( all of Carnegie Mellon University ).
It is an acronym based on the word `` capture '' और खड़ा लिये `` completely स्वचालित पब्लिक Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart ''.
Carnegie Mellon University attempted to trademark the term on 15 October 2004, but the ट्रेडमार्क अनुप्रयोग was abandoned on 21 April 2008.
A CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a reverse Turing परीक्षण, क्युकी it is administered by a यंत्र और targeted at a human, in contrast to the standard Turing test that is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine.
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in English as Jacques Cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval officer, एक्सप्लोरर, conservationist, फिल्मकार, innovator, वैज्ञानिक, फ़ोटोग्राफ़र, author and researcher who studied the sea and all forms of life in water.
He co-developed the Aqua-Lung, pioneered marine conservation and was a सदस्य of the académie française.
KFC ( Kentucky Fried Chicken ) is a fast खाना रेस्तरां कड़ी headquartered in louisville, Kentucky, United States, which specializes in fried chicken.
An `` American icon '', it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as measured by बिक्री ) बाद मैकडोनाल्ड 's, साथ over 18,000 आउटलेट in 120 countries and territories.
The company is a subsidiary of Yum !
Brands, a restaurant company which also owns पिज़्ज़ा हट और टैको घंटी.
KFC was founded by Harland Sanders, who began selling fried chicken इससे उसके roadside रेस्तरां in कोर्बिन, केंटकी दौरान the Great Depression.
Sanders was one of the first people to see the potential of the restaurant फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग अवधारणा, साथ the पहला `` केंटकी fried मुर्गा '' franchise opening in Utah in 1952.
The मताधिकार popularized मुर्गा in the तेज़ food industry, thereby diversifying the market and challenging the dominance of the hamburger.
Marketing खुद as `` कर्नल सैंडर्स '', he became a legendary figure of American cultural history, and his image is still prominently used in KFC branding.
The कम्पनी 's रैपिड विस्तार saw it grow too large for Sanders to manage, and in 1964 he sold the company to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown, Jr. and Jack Massey.
KFC was one of the first fast food chains to विस्तार internationally, opening outlets in England, Mexico and Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s.
throughout the 1970s और 1980s, केएफसी अनुभवी mixed fortunes domestically, as it went through a series of corporate owners who had little or no experience in the restaurant business.
In the early 1970s, केएफसी थी बेची to the आत्माओं कड़ heublein, जो were taken over by the R.J. Reynolds food and tobacco conglomerate, who sold the chain to PepsiCo.
The chain continued to expand overseas however, and in 1987 केएफसी became the पहला पश्चिमी restaurant chain to open in China.
The chain has since expanded rapidly in China, and the country is now the company 's most profitable market.
PepsiCo spun off its restaurants division as Tricon Global रेस्तरां, जिससे बाद बदला इसके name to Yum !
ब्रांड्स.
KFC primarily बिकता fried chicken pieces and variations such as chicken sandwiches and wraps, salads and side dishes such as French fries and coleslaw, desserts and soft drinks, often supplied by PepsiCo.
Its most famous product is pressure fried chicken pieces, seasoned साथ सैंडर्स ' `` असली Recipe '' of 11 herbs and spices.
The exact nature of these ingredients is unknown, and represents a notable trade secret.
Larger portions of fried मुर्गा हैं परोसा in a distinctive cardboard `` bucket '', which has become a signature of the chain since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman.
KFC is famous for the slogan `` finger lickin ' good '', which has since been replaced by `` nobody करता मुर्गा जैसे केएफसी '' और `` So good ''.
Cnidaria ( with a silent c ) or coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 प्रजाति of animals found exclusively in aquatic and mostly marine environments.
Their distinguishing विशेषता is cnidocytes, specialized cells that they use mainly for capturing prey.
Their bodies consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like पदार्थ, sandwiched between दो परतों of epithelium that are mostly one cell thick.
They have two basic body forms : swimming medusae and sessile polyps, both of which are radially symmetrical with mouths घिरी by tentacles कि bear cnidocytes.
Both forms have a single orifice and देह गुहा कि are used for digestion and respiration.
Many cnidarian प्रजाति produce colonies that are single organisms composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or both.
Cnidarians ' activities हैं समन्वित by a विकेन्द्रित nerve net and simple receptors.
Several free-swimming Cubozoa and Scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, और कुछ have simple eyes.
Not all cnidarians reproduce sexually.
Many have complex lifecycles with asexual polyp stages and sexual medusae, but कुछ omit either the polyp or the medusa stage.
cnidarians यहूद लिये a long समय grouped साथ ctenophores in the phylum Coelenterata, but increasing awareness of their differences caused them to be placed in separate phyla.
Cnidarians are classified into four main groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea anemones, corals, sea pens ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa, a diverse group that includes all the freshwater cnidarians as well as अनेक समुद्री फ़ॉर्म, और रै दोनो स्थानबद्ध सदस्यों ऐसे as hydra और औपनिवेशिक swimmers such as the Portuguese Man o ' War.
Staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in their own right rather than a sub-group of scyphozoa, और वहीँ is बहस परिचय whether myxozoa और polypodiozoa हैं cnidarians or करीब to bilaterians ( more complex animals ).
Most cnidarians prey on organisms ranging in size from plankton to पशु अनेक टाइम्स larger than themselves, लकिन अनेक obtain much of their nutrition from endosymbiotic algae, and a few are parasites.
Many are preyed upon by अन्य animals including starfish, sea slugs, fish and turtles.
Coral reefs, whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic algae, support some of the संसार 's सबसे उत्पादक ecosystems, और protect वनस्पति in tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides.
While corals are almost entirely प्रतिबंधित to गरम, उथले समुद्री waters, other cnidarians live in the depths, in polar seas and in freshwater.
Fossil cnidarians have been found in rocks formed about, and other fossils show that corals may have been present shortly before and diversified a few लाख सालो बाद.
Fossils of cnidarians कि do नहीं निर्माण mineralized structures are very rare.
Scientists currently think that cnidarians, ctenophores and bilaterians are अधिक closely सम्बन्धित to calcareous sponges than these are to other sponges, and that anthozoans are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians, and the most closely related to bilaterians.
Recent analyses have concluded that cnidarians, हालांकि माना अधिक `` आदिम '' than bilaterians, have a wider range of genes.

The Aztec people were certain ethnic groups of central Mexico, particularly those समूह जो spoke the नावातल भाषा and who dominated large parts of Mesoamerica from the 14th to 16th centuries.
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( बहुवचन ) औसत `` people from Aztlan ``, a mythological place for the Nahuatl-speaking culture of the time, and later adopted as the word to define the Mexica people.
Often the term `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the Mexica people of Tenochtitlan ( now the location of Mexico City ), situated on an द्वीप in झील texcoco, जो referred to themselves as mexica tenochca or cōlhuah mexica.
Sometimes the term also includes the inhabitants of Tenochtitlan 's two principal allied city-states, the Acolhuas of Texcoco and the Tepanecs of Tlacopan, who together with the Mexica formed the Aztec ट्रिपल गठबंधन जिससे नियंत्रित कया is प्रायः ज्ञात as `` the एज़टेक साम्राज्य ''.
In other contexts, Aztec may refer to all the various city states and their peoples, who shared large भाग of उनके जातीय इतिहास और सांस्कृतिक traits साथ the mexica, acolhua और Tepanecs, and who often also used the Nahuatl language as a lingua franca.
In this meaning it is possible to talk about an Aztec civilization including all the particular cultural patterns common for most of the peoples inhabiting Central Mexico in the late postclassic period.
From the 13th century, the Valley of Mexico was the heart of Aztec civilization : here the capital of the Aztec Triple गठबंधन, the नगर of tenochtitlan, थी निर्मित upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco.
The ट्रिपल गठबंधन formed a उपनदी साम्राज्य expanding its political hegemony far beyond the Valley of Mexico, conquering other city states throughout Mesoamerica.
At its pinnacle, एज़टेक संस्कृति था समृद्ध और complex mythological and religious traditions, as well as reaching remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments.
In 1521 Hernán Cortés, along with a large क्रमांक of नावातल बोलना स्वदेशी allies, conquered tenochtitlan and defeated the Aztec Triple Alliance under the leadership of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II.
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement of मैक्सिको नगर on the site of the ruined Aztec capital, from where they proceeded with the process of colonizing Central America.
Aztec culture and history is primarily known through archaeological evidence found in excavations such as that of the renowned Templo Mayor in Mexico City ; from indigenous bark paper codices ; from eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors such as Hernán Cortés and बर्नल díaz डेल कैस्टिलो ; और विशेषकर इससे 16th और 17th सदी descriptions of एज़टेक संस्कृति और इतिहास लिखा by स्पेनी clergymen and literate Aztecs in the Spanish or Nahuatl language, such as the famous Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous Aztec informants.
Anderson Hays Cooper ( born June 3, 1967 ) is an American journalist, author, and टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व.
He is the primary anchor of the सीएनएन न्यूज दिखाएँ Anderson Cooper 360°.
The program is normally broadcast live from a New York City studio ; however, कूपर प्रायः प्रसारण सजीव on स्थान लिये तोड़कर news stories.
As of September 2011, he also serves as host of his own eponymous syndicated daytime talk show, एंडरसन सजीव, जिससे होगा be रद्द at the end of the second season.
A plot of a normal distribution ( or bell-shaped वक्र ) जहाँ प्रत्येक बैंड रै a चौडाई of 1 मानक deviation – See also : 68-95-99.7 rule
Cumulative probability of a normal distribution with expected मान 0 और मानक विचलन 1.
In statistics and probability सिद्धान्त, मानक विचलन ( represented by the प्रतीक सिग्मा, σ ) shows कैसा much variation or dispersion exists from the average ( mean ), or expected value.
A low standard deviation indicates that the data points tend to be बहुत बंद to the औसत ; ऊँची standard deviation indicates that the data points are spread out over a large range of values.
The standard deviation of a random variable, statistical population, data set, or probability distribution is the वर्गाकार रूट of इसके variance.
It is algebraically simpler though practically कम मजबूत than the average absolute deviation.
A useful property of standard deviation is that, नापसंद variance, it is expressed in the same units as the data.
Note, however, कि लिये माप with percentage as unit, the standard deviation will have percentage points as unit.
In addition to expressing the variability of a population, standard deviation is commonly used to माप विश्वास in सांख्यिकीय conclusions.
For example, the margin of error in polling data is determined by calculating the अपेक्षित मानक विचलन in the परिणाम if the same poll were to be conducted multiple times.
The reported margin of error is typically परिचय twice the मानक विचलन ­– the दायरा of a 95 percent confidence interval.
In science, researchers commonly report the standard deviation of experimental data, and only effects that fall far outside the range of standard deviation are considered statistically significant – सामान्य यादृच्छिक गलती or विभिन्नता in the माप is in this way distinguished from causal variation.
Standard deviation is also important in वित्त, जहाँ the मानक विचलन on the rate of return on an investment is a measure of the volatility of the investment.
When only a sample of data from a population is available, the standard deviation of the population can be estimated by a modified quantity called the `` sample standard deviation ''.
When the sample is the entire population, इसके unmodified मानक विचलन is called the `` population standard deviation ''.
Ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( Ullucus tuberosus ) is a plant grown primarily as a root vegetable, secondarily as a leaf vegetable.
The ulluco is one of the most widely grown और economically महत्वपूर्ण root crops in the Andean region of South America, second only to the potato.
It is known there with the common name of papa lisa, but also by the regional names melloco ( इक्वाडोर ), olluco ( पेरू ), chugua ( कोलंबिया ) or ruba ( Venezuela ), among others.
The leaf and the tuber are edible, similar to spinach and the आलू, क्रमशः.
They are known to contain high levels of प्रोटीन, कैल्सियम, and carotene.
Papalisa were used by the incas prior to arrival of Europeans in South America.
Ulluco tubers are marketed as `` Earth Gems '' in नई जीलैंड, by Halfords Exotic Produce.
Ulluco tubers in New Zealand
An April 24, 1851 poster warning the `` रंगीन लोगों of बोस्टन '' about policemen acting as slave catchers.
The Fugitive Slave Law or Fugitive Slave Act was passed by the United States Congress on September 18, 1850, as part of the Compromise of 1850 between Southern slave-holding interests and उत्तरी free-soilers.
This was one of the most controversial अधिनियमों of the 1850 सुलह और heightened उत्तरी fears of a `` slave power conspiracy ''.
It घोषित कि all runaway slaves were, upon capture, to be returned to their masters.
abolitionists nicknamed it the `` Bloodhound Law '' for the dogs that were used to track down runaway slaves.

He previously represented the 3rd district from 1988 to 1993.
Trin-i-tee 5:7 is a इन्जील duo from New Orleans, Louisiana in the United States.
The group was marketed as a इन्जील वैकल्पिक to r & B girl groups such as Destiny 's Child and TLC.
trin-i-tee 5:7 has sold over 2.5 million albums.
In 1998, the समूह released उनके first album entitled Trin-i-tee 5:7 which debut at # 1 on the Top Gospel charts.
the एल्बम प्रदर्शित the गीतों `` God 's Grace '' and the cover song `` Oh !
Mary Do n't तुम रोते ''.
The एल्बम बाद became certified gold.
In 1999, Terri Brown left the group and was later replaced by सिंगर Adrian Anderson.
During that year, the group अंकित और released उनके second album, Spiritual Love.
The album became the समूह 's second # 1 album on the Top Gospel charts.
The एल्बम contained the singles `` Put Your Hands '' and `` My Body ''.
In 2002, the समूह released उनके third album The Kiss which debuted at # 2 on the Top Gospel charts.
In 2007, the group left gospocentric रिकॉर्ड और signed a record deal with Spirit Rising Music.
In late 2007, trin-i-tee 5:7 released their fifth album T57, which featured the top ten gospel single `` Listen ''.
T57 charted # 2 on the Top Gospel Albums, # 5 on the Top Christian charts, और # 12 on the शीर्ष r & b चार्ट.
The United States federal earned income tax credit or अर्जित आय क्रेडिट ( eitc or eic ) is a refundable कर क्रेडिट for low- and medium-income individuals and couples, primarily for those who have qualifying children.
When the क्रेडिट exceeds the राशि of कर owed, it results in a tax refund to those who claim the credit.
This credit is provided to offset the burden of social security कर और भी to प्रचार an प्रोत्साहन to work.
In order for a person or couple to claim one or more व्यक्तियों as उनके qualifying चाइल्ड ( ren ), the आयु, relationship, and shared residency requirements must be met, as well as some other requirements.
U.S. tax forms 1040EZ, 1040a, or 1040 can be प्रयुक्त to अर्जी eic without qualifying children.
To claim the credit with qualifying children, 1040a or 1040 जरूर be used, as well as attaching Schedule EIC.
EIC phases in slowly, has a medium-length plateau, and तब phases आउट अधिक धीरे than it phased in.
Since the credit phases out at 21 % ( for two children and for three or more qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( for one qualifying child ), it is always preferable to have one more dollar of actual salary or wages ( although technically, since the EIC table moves by fifty dollar increments, it 's always अस्तबलों to have an अतिरिक्त fifty-dollar वृद्धि of सैलरी or मजदूरी ).
For tax year 2011, the maximum eic लिये a सिंगल व्यक्ति or युगल filing without qualifying children was $ 464.
The maximum EIC with one qualifying child was $ 3,094, साथ दो children थी $ 5,112, and with three or more qualifying children was $ 5,751.
ये amounts हैं indexed annually for inflation.
The अर्जित आय कर क्रेडिट रै महरूम भाग of राजनैतिक debates in the United States regarding whether raising the minimum wage or increasing EIC will better address a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs.
The following is a list of halftime shows held at the National Football League 's चैंपियनशिप खेल, the सुपर कटोरी.
While मध्यांतर shows हैं a परंपरा दौरान फ़ुटबॉल खेल at सब स्तर of प्रतियोगिता, the सुपर कटोरी मध्यांतर दिखाएँ represents a fundamental link to pop culture, which helps broaden the television audience and nationwide interest.
In most years since the mid-1980s, the halftime show of the सुपर कटोरी रै प्रदर्शित popular recording artists and other well-known celebrities.
It has measurably increased टेलीविज़न दर्शक दौरान and after the halftime show.
The performance is regarded one of the most-watched events in American television annually with over 100 million दर्शक in the संयुक्त राज्य अलोन.
musical जाति over the सालो have represented a broad range of music types, including pop, rock, classic rock, country, hip hop, rap, blues, and soul.
In some years, short skits or drama scenes are acted आउट on a स्टेज.
The performance समूह up साथ लोगों has performed at the most Super Bowl halftime shows, starring in four during the 1970s and 1980s.
According to nielsen दरजा, सुपर कटोरी xlvi halftime show headlined by Madonna in 2012 remains the most-watched halftime show in history, with 114 million viewers or about 3 million more than the actual game.
Beyonce 's 2013 मध्यांतर show performance was the second most viewed show in history.
It is सूचीबद्ध on the गिनीज संसार Records as the largest TV audience for a Super Bowl half-time performance.
International Men 's Day ( IMD ) is an annual international event मनाये on 19th नवम्बर.
Inaugurated in 1999 in Trinidad and Tobago, the day and its events find support इससे a किस्में of individuals and groups in Australia, the Caribbean, North America, Asia, Europe and Africa.
Speaking on behalf of UNESCO, Director of Women and Culture of Peace Ingeborg Breines said of IMD, `` इस is an बेहतरीन विचार और होता दे कुछ लिंग balance. ''
She added that UNESCO was looking forward to cooperating with the organizers.
The objectives of celebrating an International Men 's Day include focusing on मेन 's और लड़कों ' स्वास्थ्य, improving gender relations, promoting gender equality, and highlighting positive male role models.
It is an अवसर to हाइलाइट पक्षपात विरूद्ध मेन और लड़कों और to celebrate उनके उपलब्धियाँ and contributions, in particular for their contributions to community, family, marriage, and child care.
The broader and ultimate aim of the इवेंट is to प्रचार मौलिक humanitarian values.
International Men 's Day is celebrated in over 60 countries, including Trinidad and Tobago, Jamaica, Australia, India, China, United States, Romania, Singapore, Malta, United Kingdom, South Africa, तंजानिया, ज़िम्बाब्वे, बोत्सवाना, australia, बुरुंडी, हंगेरियाई, आयरलैंड, आइल of man, घाना, कनाडा, डेनमार्क, नार्वे, Austria, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Ukraine, France, Italy, Pakistan, Cuba, Antigua and Barbuda, St. Kitts and Nevis, St. Lucia, Grenada and Cayman Islands, on 19 November, and global support for the celebration is broad.
