Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the northwest extremity of the उत्तर अमरीकी महाद्वीप, साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the east, the Arctic Ocean to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by area, the 4th least populous and the तनिक densely आबादी of the 50 United States.
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents live within the Anchorage महानगर area.
Alaska 's अर्थव्यवस्था is वर्चस्व by the oil, natural gas, and fishing industries ; it has these resources in abundance.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, for $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) at लगभग दो सेंट per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several administrative changes before becoming an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, और the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period, when it was used only for the peninsula and is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq, अर्थ `` the mainland '' or, more literally, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is also known as alyeska, the `` great land '', an Aleut word derived from the same root.
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University ( NMMU ) is a South African tertiary education संस्था साथ इसके प्रमुख प्रशासन in the coastal city of Port Elizabeth.
A merging of three institutions संस्थापित nmmu in जनवरी 2005 लकिन इसके इतिहास dates back to 1882 with the foundation of Port Elizabeth Art School.
The University draws international students from सब over the world.
There हैं over 3000 अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्यार्थी और शामिल विद्यार्थी इससे the संयुक्त States, France, China, Germany, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom and many other countries.
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering पेशेवर और वोकेशनल training.
The University has six campuses - five in Port एलिज़ाबेथ और एक in George.
The main campus is the दक्षिण कैम्पस.
विद्यार्थी at nmmu can पढ़ाई towards diplomas and degrees up to and including doctoral level qualifications.
A number of courses include कार्यस्थल अनुभव as part of the curriculum.
CoverGirl is an American कॉस्मेटिक्स ब्रांड founded in Maryland, by the Noxzema Chemical Company ( later called Noxell ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989.
The Noxell Company advertised इस कॉस्मेटिक्स लकीर by allowing `` कवर girls '', fashion models who appear on the front cover of women 's magazines, to wear its products.
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct individual customer service by providing a wide किस्में of कॉस्मेटिक्स उपलब्धियाँ at उचित कीमतें.
On the Origin of Species, published on 24 November 1859, is a work of वैज्ञानिक साहित्य by चार्ल्स Darwin which is considered to be the foundation of evolutionary biology.
Its full title was On the Origin of Species by अर्थात् of Natural Selection, or the Preservation of Favoured Races in the Struggle for Life.
For the sixth संस्करण of 1872, the short title was changed to The Origin of Species.
डार्विन 's किताब introduced the scientific theory that populations evolve over the course of generations through a process of natural selection.
it प्रस्तुत a देह of प्रमाण कि the diversity of life arose by common descent through a branching pattern of evolution.
Darwin included evidence that he had gathered on the Beagle expedition in the 1830s और उसके subsequent findings from research, correspondence, and experimentation.
Various विकासवादी विचार था already been proposed to explain new findings in biology.
There was growing support for such ideas among dissident anatomists and the general public, but during the first half of the 19th सदी the अंग्रेज़ी वैज्ञानिक स्थापना was closely tied to the Church of England, while science was part of natural theology.
Ideas about the transmutation of species were controversial as they conflicted with the beliefs that प्रजाति यहूद अपरिवर्तनशील भाग of a designed पदानुक्रम और कि humans were unique, unrelated to other animals.
The political and theological implications were intensely debated, but transmutation थी नहीं स्वीकृत by the scientific mainstream.
The book was लिखा लिये non-specialist पाठक और आकर्षित widespread interest upon its publication.
As Darwin was an eminent scientist, his findings were taken seriously and the evidence he प्रस्तुत उत्पन्न वैज्ञानिक, philosophical, and religious discussion.
The debate over the book contributed to the campaign by T.H. Huxley and उसके fellow सदस्यों of the x क्लबों to secularise विज्ञान by promoting scientific naturalism.
Within two decades there was widespread scientific agreement that evolution, with a branching pattern of आम descent, था occurred, लकिन वैज्ञानिकों यहूद slow to दे प्राकृतिक चयन the significance that Darwin thought appropriate.
During the `` eclipse of Darwinism `` from the 1880s to the 1930s, विभिन्न अन्य mechanisms of evolution were given more credit.
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s, Darwin 's अवधारणा of विकासवादी अनुकूलन through प्राकृतिक selection became central to modern evolutionary theory, now the unifying concept of the life sciences.
Charles Dillon `` Casey '' Stengel ( ; July 30, 1890 – September 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` The Old perfessor '', थी an अमरीकी प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल outfielder और मैनेजर.
He was elected to the बेसबॉल Hall of Fame in.
Stengel was born in Kansas City, Missouri, and originally nicknamed `` डच '', a common nickname at that time for Americans of German ancestry.
After his major league career began, he acquired the nickname `` Casey '', जिससे originally आए इससे the आद्याक्षर of उसके hometown ( `` K. C. '' ), which evolved into `` Casey '', influenced by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the Bat.
In the 1950s, sportswriters उतावले उसे साथ yet another उपनाम, `` The Old Professor '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ), for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on anything baseball -related.
Although his baseball करियर spanned a क्रमांक of teams and cities, he is primarily associated with clubs in New York City.
Between playing and managing, he is the only man to have worn four of नई यॉर्क 's प्रमुख लीग क्लब ' वर्दी.
He was the first of four men ( through the season ) to manage दोनो the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ और नई यॉर्क Mets ; Yogi Berra, Dallas Green, and Joe Torre are the others.
जैसे टोरेस, he also managed the Braves and the Dodgers.
he ended उसके बेसबॉल करियर as the beloved मैनेजर लिये the तब expansion New York Mets, which won over the hearts of New York partly due to the unique character of their veteran leader.
June ( ) is the sixth month of the year in the Julian and gregorian पंचांग और एक of the four months with a length of 30 days.
Ovid provides two etymologies for June 's name in his poem concerning the महीने हकदार the fasti.
The first is that the month is named after the Roman goddess Juno, wife of Jupiter and equivalent to the Greek देवी hera ; the दूसरी is कि the नाम आता इससे the लैटिन शब्द iuniores, अर्थ `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for which the preceding month May may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ).
See : Months in various calendars also called the season of the June is the month साथ the longest daylight घंटों of the साल in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध and the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere.
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the मौसमी समतुल्य to December in the Southern Hemisphere and vice versa.
In the उत्तरी गोलार्ध, the beginning of the meteorological summer is 1 June.
In the Southern hemisphere, the शुरूआत of the meteorological winter is 1 June.
At the start of June, the सूर्य उदय in the नक्षत्र of Taurus ; at the end of June, the sun rises in the constellation of Gemini.
However, due to the precession of the equinoxes, June begins with the sun in the astrological चिह्न of मिथुन, और ends साथ the सूर्य in the astrological sign of Cancer.
June is ज्ञात लिये the large number of marriages that occur over the course of the month.
According to one etymology, जून is नामित बाद juno ( Hera ).
Juno was the goddess of marriage and a शादीशुदा युगल 's household, so some consider it good luck to be married in this month.
According to another etymology provided by the रोमन कवि ओविड, जून is नामित लिये the iuniores, latin for `` young people '' ( Fasti VI.88 ) and that the month of May is named for the maiores, Latin for `` elders ''.
In Iceland, folklore says that if you bathe naked in the morning dew on the morning of June 24, तुम हैं supposed to keep aging at bay for longer.
A constitution is a नियत of आधारभूत principles or established precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed.
These rules साथ मेक up, i.e. constitute, what the entity is.
When these principles are written down into a single document or set of legal दस्तावेज़, those दस्तावेज़ may be कहा to embody a लिखा संविधान ; if वे हैं लिखा down in a single comprehensive document, it is said to embody a codified constitution.
Constitutions concern different levels of organizations, from sovereign states to companies and unincorporated एसोसिएशन.
A treaty which establishes an international organization is also its constitution, in that it would define how that संगठन is गठित.
Within states, whether sovereign or federated, a constitution defines the principles upon which the state is based, the procedure in जिससे कानून हैं बना और by जिसको.
Some constitutions, especially codified constitutions, also अधिनियम as limiters of राज्य शक्ति, by establishing लाइनों which a state 's rulers can not cross, such as fundamental rights.
George वॉशिंगटन at Constitutional Convention of 1787, signing of U.S. Constitution.
The Constitution of India is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world, containing 448 articles, 12 schedules and 100 amendments, with 117,369 words in its English language version, while the United राज्य संविधान is the shortest लिखा संविधान, at 7 आलेख और 27 amendments.
Ron Diftler ( left ), NASA Robonaut मैनेजर assisting in a robonaut familiarization training session in the Space Environment Simulation Laboratory at NASA 's Johnson Space Center.
अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबन्धन is a specialized form of management that is concerned with the application of engineering principles to business practice.
Engineering management is a career that brings together the technological problem-solving savvy of अभियान्त्रिकी और the organizational, प्रशासनिक, और नियोजन abilities of management in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to completion.
Example areas of engineering are उत्पाद विकास, निर्माण, निर्माण, डिज़ाइन अभियान्त्रिकी, औद्योगिक अभियान्त्रिकी, technology, production, or any other field that employs personnel who perform an engineering function.
Successful engineering managers typically require training and अनुभव in कारोबार and engineering.
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support by their तकनीकी टोली, और non-commercial प्रबंधक tend to कमी वाणिज्यिक सूझबूझ to deliver in a market economy.
Largely, engineering managers manage engineers who are driven by non-entrepreneurial thinking, thus require the necessary people skills to coach, mentor and motivate तकनीकी पेशेवर.
Engineering professionals joining manufacturing companies sometimes become engineering managers by डिफॉल्ट बाद a period of time.
They are required to सीख कैसा to मैनेज एकबार वे हैं on the job, though this is usually an ineffective way to develop managerial abilities.
In an insurance policy, the deductible is the राशि of खर्च कि जरूर be सशुल्क आउट of pocket before an insurer will pay any expenses.
In general usage, the term deductible may be used to describe one of several types of clauses ( see below ) that are used by insurance companies as a दहलीज लिये नीति भुगतान.
Deductibles हैं typically प्रयुक्त to deter the large number of trivial claims that a consumer can be reasonably expected to bear the cost of.
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant enough to incur large costs, the insurance कड़ expects to अदा out slightly smaller amounts much less frequently, incurring much higher savings.
As a result, insurance premiums are typically cheaper when वे involve उच्चतर deductibles.
Deductibles हैं सामान्यतः provided as clauses in an insurance policy that dictate how much of an insurance-covered expense is borne by the policyholder.
They हैं सामान्यतः कोटेड as a फिक्स्ड मात्रा और is a part of most policies covering losses to the policy holder.
The insurer then becomes liable for claimable expenses that exceed this amount ( subject to the अधिकतम योग claimable indicated in the contract ).
Depending on the policy, the deductible may लागू प्रति covered incident, or per year.
For policies where incidences are not easy to delimit ( for उदाहरण स्वास्थ्य बीमे ), the deductible is typically applied per year.
Several deductibles can be नियत by the insurer based on the cause of the claim.
For उदाहरण, a सिंगल आवास बीमे policy may contain multiple deductible amounts for loss or damage arising from theft, fire, natural calamities, evacuation etc.
There are also deductible reimbursement programs that reimburse a deductible in the इवेंट of an auto, home, boat/yacht or health insurance claim.
An invoice or bill is a commercial दस्तावेज़ जारी by a विक्रेता to a खरीदार, indicating the उत्पाद, quantities, और सहमत prices for products or services the seller has provided the buyer.
an चालान indicates the sale transaction only.
Payment terms are independent of the चालान and are negotiated by the buyer and the seller.
Payment terms are usually included on the चालान.
The buyer could have already paid for the products or services listed on the invoice.
Buyer can also have a maximum number of days in which to pay for these goods और is sometimes offered a छूट if paid before the due date.
In the rental industry, an चालान जरूर शामिल a विशिष्ट सन्दर्भ to the अवधि of the time being billed, so in addition to quantity, price and discount the invoicing amount is also based on duration.
Generally each line of a rental चालान होगा refer to the वास्तविक घंटों, days, weeks, months, etc., being billed.
From the point of view of a विक्रेता, an चालान is a sales invoice.
From the point of view of a buyer, an invoice is a खरीदें चालान.
The document indicates the खरीदार और विक्रेता, लकिन the पद चालान indicates money is owed or owing.
In English, the context of the term invoice is usually used to clarify its meaning, such as `` We sent them an invoice '' ( they owe us धन ) or `` we प्राप्त an invoice from them '' ( we owe them money ).
The right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus, or सही प्रिंसिपल bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system.
It is wider, shorter, और अधिक vertical in direction than the left.
It is about 2.5 cm long, and enters the right lung nearly opposite the fifth thoracic vertebra.
The azygos vein arches over it from पीछे ; और the सही pulmonary धमनी झूठ at first below and then in front of it.
About 2 cm from its commencement it gives off a शाखा to the अपर पालि of the right lung.
This is termed the eparterial branch of the bronchus, because it arises above the सही pulmonary artery.
The bronchus now passes below the artery, and is known as the hyparterial शाखा ; it divides into two branches for the middle and lower lobes.
If a foreign body in the airway passes through the श्वासनली, it होगा सबसे संभावित डालें the सही प्रमुख bronchus instead of the left, due to the straighter alignment of the right bronchus to the trachea.
Squash is a racquet खेल निभाई by दो ( singles ) or four players ( doubles ) in a four-walled court with a small, hollow rubber ball.
The players must alternate in striking the ball with their racquet and hit the ball onto the playable सतहों of the four walls of the court.
The game was formerly called squash racquets, a reference to the `` squashable '' नरम बॉल प्रयुक्त in the खेल ( compared साथ the fatter ball used in its parent game racquets or rackets ).
Squash is recognized by the IOC and supporters are lobbying लिये इसके incorporation in a future Olympic program.
In 2003, Forbes rated squash as the क्रमांक एक healthiest sport to play.
Residual oil is oil found in low concentrations naturally or in बेहाल आयल फ़ील्ड.
Often mixed with जल, it can not be recovered by conventional techniques.
However, it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil recovery ( CO2 EOR ) which involves injecting carbon dioxide into the well reducing श्यानता और बढ़ाना प्रवाह of the oil.
The technique is not new but has not been used extensively on residual oil zones, low-grade deposits of petroleum ऐसे as the 38 वर्गाकार मील in the permian Basin of Texas leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr.
The technique is limited by उपलब्धता of carbon dioxide.
It does not result in sequestration of the carbon डाइऑक्साइड लकिन the गैस is recycled as much as possible.
संयुक्त राज्य reserves of अवशेष oil are estimated to be 100 billion barrels.
Artist 's rendering of the fire, by John R. Chapin, originally printed in हार्पर 's साप्ताहिक ; the दृश्य चेहरों पूर्वोत्तर across the Randolph Street Bridge.
The Great Chicago Fire was a conflagration that burned from Sunday, October 8, to early Tuesday, October 10, 1871, हत्या सैंकड़ों और destroying about in Chicago, Illinois.
Though the fire was one of the largest U.S. disasters of the 19th century, the पुनर्निर्माण कि began helped develop Chicago as one of the most populous and economically important American cities.
Henry VIII ( 28 जून 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) was king of England from 21 April 1509 until his death.
He was lord, and later king, of आयरलैंड, as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry was the second monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश, succeeding उसके पिता, Henry VII.
Besides his छह विवाह, हेनरी viii is ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका in the separation of the Church of England from the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the Church of England from papal authority, the Dissolution of the monasteries, and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a आस्तिक in core Catholic theological teachings, even after his excommunication from the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry oversaw the legal union of England and Wales with the कानून in वेल्स अधिनियमों 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new king allied साथ the पावन रोमन सम्राट, maximillian i, और invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 साथ a विशाल, well-equipped फौज, but achieved little at a considerable financial cost.
Maximillian, लिये उसके भाग, प्रयुक्त the English invasion to his own ends, and this prejudiced England 's ability to defeat the French.
This foray would prove the start of an obsession for Henry, who invaded again in 1544.
This time, Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne, but again the Holy Roman सम्राट, चार्ल्स v, समर्थित हेनरी तभी as long as he needed to and England, strained by the enormous cost of the war, ransomed the city back for peace.
His contemporaries considered Henry in his prime to be an attractive, educated and accomplished king, and he has been described as `` one of the सबसे charismatic शासकों to बैठना on the अंग्रेज़ी throne ''.
Besides ruling with absolute power, he भी सगाई खुद as an author and composer.
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly इससे निजी वैनिटी और partly क्युकी he believed a बेटी would be unable to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that existed following the Wars of the Roses – led to the two things for which Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation.
Henry became रुग्ण मोटे and his health suffered, contributing to his death in 1547.
He is frequently characterised in his later life as a lustful, egotistical, हर्ष, और असुरक्षित किंग.
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by the United States television network Telemundo, in संयोजन साथ the एंटेना 3 संजाल और rti producciones.
Based on a novel of the same name by Spanish author Arturo Pérez-Reverte, the नाटक depicts the वृद्धि of टेरेसा मेंडोज़ा ( केट डेल कैस्टिलो ), a young woman from Mexico who becomes the most powerful drug trafficker in southern Spain.
Patricio Wills, the अध्यक्ष of telemundo टेलीविज़न studios, थी the executive producer.
हालांकि la reina डेल Sur was nominated for Novela of the Year, Favorite Lead Actress, and Best Bad Luck Video, it won no awards.
With a $ 10 million budget, la reina डेल सूर थी the सबसे expensive telenovela ever produced by Telemundo.
The program 's premiere on February 28, 2011, was the network 's उच्चतम रेटेड प्रीमियर लिये a telenovela to date.
The program frequently dominated its time slot, भी over अंग्रेज़ी language programming on other major U.S. networks.
La Reina डेल सूर समाप्त इसके 63 एपीसोड run on Telemundo and its 13 episode run on Antena 3 simultaneously on May 30, 2011.
The final episode was the highest rated broadcast in Telemundo 's 19-year history ( 4.2 million viewers ), और ताल सब of the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा U.S. television networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic.
The program 's success spurred Telemundo to launch its पहला अभियान to gain the series an Emmy Award nomination.
A one-night special featuring several cast members aired on May 31, 2011, and चिह्नित the telemundo डेब्यू of विख्यात latina टेलीविज़न personality Cristina Saralegui.
La Reina del Sur is broadcast in several other markets, including Serbia, Colombia, चिली, साइप्रस, निकारागुआ, कोस्टा रिका, Mexico, Albania, Hungary, Slovenia, Croatia, Romania, ( among others ).
An example of रैक आरोहित servers
A web hosting सेवा is a प्रकार of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग सेवा that allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by clients, as well as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data center स्पेस और कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल लिये अन्य सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके data center, called colocation, also known as Housing in Latin America or France.
The scope of web hosting services varies greatly.
The most basic is web page and small-scale file hosting, where files can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( एफटीपी ) or a वेब interface.
The files हैं प्रायः वितरित to the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing.
Many Internet service providers ( ISPs ) offer इस सेवा free to subscribers.
individuals और संगठन may also obtain Web page hosting from alternative service providers.
Personal web site hosting is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site होस्टिंग प्रायः रै a उच्चतर expense depending upon the size and type of the website.
Single page होस्टिंग is generally sufficient for personal web pages.
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package कि provides डेटाबेस support and application development platforms ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow customers to write or स्थापना स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग like forums and content management.
Also, Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or control panel for managing the Web server and installing scripts, as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल और सेवा अनुप्रयोग जैसे e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in certain तन्त्र or सेवाएं ( e.g. e-commerce ), which are commonly used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
Madden NFL ( known as John Madden Football before 1993 ) is an American football video game series developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon for ea खेल.
The game series is named after Pro Football Hall of Famer जॉन मैडेन, a well-known पूर्व सुपर Bowl –winning coach of the Oakland Raiders and color commentator.
The series is the best selling EA खेल श्रेणी.
The games have consistently been a best seller, and has even spawned tv shows जहाँ खिलाड़ी compete.
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks and player आंकडे, और आवाज़ commentary कि allows खिलाड़ी to hear the game as if it were a real TV broadcast.
The मैडेन एनएफएल श्रेणी has been nicknamed the NFL 's 33rd Franchise.
The series was originally conceived by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कला संस्थापक Trip Hawkins, who then approached Madden in 1984 for his endorsement and expertise.
Due to Madden 's insistence that the game be as realistic as possible, the first version of John मैडेन फ़ुटबॉल थी not released until 1988.
The दूसरी संस्करण of the game was released in 1990, with annual versions since then.
The series ' नाम थी बदला to Madden NFL in 1993 after EA acquired the rights to use NFL teams and players.
Despite Madden 's retirement as a broadcaster in 2009, he continues to lend उसके नाम और provide expertise for the game.
Cindy Lee Miller Sheehan ( born July 10, 1957 ) is an American antiwar activist whose son, U.S. Army विशेषज्ञ केसी sheehan, थी मारे by दुश्मन कार्रवाई दौरान the इराकी War.
She attracted national and international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar protest at a makeshift शिविर बाहर अध्यक्ष George W. Bush 's Texas ranch —a stand that drew both passionate support and angry criticism.
Sheehan ran unsuccessfully for Congress in 2008.
She is a गायन आलोचक of अध्यक्ष Barack Obama 's foreign policy.
Her memoir, Peace Mom : A Mother 's Journey through heartache to Activism, was published in 2006.
Sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the सलाम and Freedom Party.
Wyclef Jeanelle जां ( ; ; born October 17, 1969 ) Wyclef Dumped From Haiti 's Presidential Ballot – TIME, Aug 21, 2010.
`` पहले he घोषित on अगस्त 5 कि he थी running for President of Haiti, Wyclef Jean was still listing his age as only 37 years old.
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate, the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided to come clean and confirm that he was really 40. '' is a three-time Grammy Award -winning haitian-american rapper, singer-songwriter, संगीतकार, रिकार्ड producer, and politician.
At age nine, Jean moved to the United States with his family और रै खर्च much of his life in the country.
He first received fame as a member of the acclaimed नई जर्सी हिप hop group the Fugees.
On August 5, 2010, Jean filed for candidacy in the 2010 Haitian presidential election, although the Electoral Commission subsequently ruled him अयोग्य to स्टैंड as he था नहीं मिले the आवश्यकता to have महरूम resident in Haiti for five years.
Wyclef Jean to appeal against Haiti चुनाव सत्ताधारी – बीबीसी न्यूज, Aug 22, 2010.
Haiti 's electoral commission said that Mr Jean was ineligible to stand as the Haitian constitution requires उम्मीदवार to have जिया in the देश for five years prior to an election.
The 40-year-old सिंगर जीवनदान in the US.
Jean 's efforts at भूकंप राहत, अत्यधिक publicized in 2010 throughout Haiti and the United States, were channeled through his charitable organization, Yéle Haiti.
The charity, which performed a किस्में of charitable works in Haiti between 2005 and 2010, effectively closed in 2012.
In law, a set-off is a statutory defense to the पूरे or to a portion of a plaintiff 's claim.
It had no existence under the English common विधि, होने निर्मित by 2 जियो. ii c. 22 लिये the राहत of insolvent कर्जदार, हालांकि set-off was recognized in equity.
Such a defense could be pleaded only in आदर of परस्पर debts of a definite अक्षर, और किया नहीं apply to cases in which damages were claimed, nor to equitable claims or demands.
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX. r. 3 ) a प्रतिवादी in an कार्रवाई may नियत बंद or नियत up कोई सही or अर्जी by रास्ता of counterclaim विरूद्ध the दावा of a plaintiff, and such set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action.
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair situation whereby a person ( `` Party A '' ) जो owed धन to another ( `` पार्टी b '' ) could be भेजा to debtors prison, despite the fact that Party B also owed money to Party A.
The law thus allows both parties to defer payment जबतक उनके संबंधित दावा have been heard in court.
Upon निर्णय, दोनो दावा हैं बुझे और replaced by a single net sum owing ( e.g. If Party A owes Party B 100 and Party B owes Party A 105, the two sums are set off and replaced with a single obligation of 5 from Party B to Party A ).
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual agreement so that, where a पार्टी मूलभूत, the परस्पर amounts owing हैं automatically set off and extinguished.
In certain jurisdictions ( सहित the uk ), set-off takes place automatically upon the insolvency of a company.
This means that, for each party which is both a creditor and debtor of the insolvent company, mutual debts are set-off against each other, और तब either the दिवालिया 's creditor can अर्जी the balance in the bankruptcy or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be paid, depending on which side owed the most.
This has been criticized as an undeclared सुरक्षा interest that violates the principle of pari passu.
The alternative, where a creditor has to pay all its debts, but receive only a limited portion of the leftover moneys कि अन्य unsecured लेनदारों मिलेंगी, मुद्राएँ the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies.
The right to set off is particularly महत्वपूर्ण जब रिपोर्टिंग a बैंको 's विकिरणों to regulatory authorities.
The situation where a bank has to report that it has lent a large sum to a borrower ( and is इसलिए उजागर, क्युकी वहीँ is a रिस्क कि the borrower might default thereby leading to the loss of the bank 's or its depositors ' money ) is thus replaced ( where the bank has taken security over shares or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the money lent minus the value of the security taken.
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born February 11, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, फिल्मी निदेशक, and producer.
Aniston gained worldwide recognition in the 1990s लिये portraying Rachel Green on the television sitcom Friends, a role which earned her an Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a Screen Actors Guild Award.
एनिस्टन रै भी enjoyed a successful Hollywood film career.
She gained critical acclaim for her performances in the स्वतंत्र films वो 's the एक ( 1996 ), दफ्तर स्पेस ( 1999 ), the Good Girl ( 2002 ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ).
She has had her greatest commercial सफलताओं साथ the films ब्रूस Almighty ( 2003 ), The Break-Up ( 2006 ), Marley & Me ( 2008 ), Just Go with It ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ).

A White tiger at tobu चिड़ियाघर, in saitama, Japan.
The white tiger is a recessive mutant of the Bengal tiger, which was reported in the जंगली इससे time to time in Assam, Bengal, Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa.
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect, part of the PCI Local Bus standard and often shortened to बस पीसीआई ) is a लोकल कंप्यूटर बस लिये attaching हार्डवेयर डिवाइस in a कंप्यूटर.
The PCI bus supports the कृत्यों मिला on a प्रोसेसर बस, लकिन in a standardized format that is independent of any particular processor.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the प्रोसेसर to be कनेक्ट सीधे to the प्रोसेसर bus, and are assigned addresses in the processor 's address space.
Attached devices can take either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself, called a planar यंत्र in the पीसीआई specification, or an विस्तार card that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in ibm pc compatibles, जहाँ it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration.
It has subsequently महरूम अपनाया for other computer types.
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express, but, most motherboards are still made with one or more PCI स्लॉट, जिससे हैं sufficient लिये many uses.
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board edge electrical contacts ), विद्युत विशेषताएँ, bus timing, and protocols.
The specification can be खरीदा इससे the पीसीआई Special Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : संजाल ताश, ध्वनि ताश, modems, extra ports such as USB or serial, TV tuner cards and disk controllers.
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards, until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew the सामर्थ्य of पीसीआई ; the preferred interface for video cards became AGP, and then PCI Express.
PCI video cards remain available लिये उपयोग साथ बूढ़ा pcs बगैर AGP or PCI Express slots.
Many devices previously provided on पीसीआई विस्तार ताश are now commonly integrated onto motherboards or available in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions.
Caffeine is a bitter, white crystalline xanthine alkaloid कि अधिनियमों as a उत्तेजक drug.
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds, leaves, and fruit of some plants, where it acts as a natural कीटनाशक कि paralyzes and kills certain insects feeding on the plants, as well as enhancing the reward memory of pollinators.
It is most commonly consumed by humans in infusions निकाली इससे the बीज of the कॉफी संयंत्र और the पत्ते of the tea bush, as well as from various foods and drinks containing products derived from the kola nut.
अन्य स्त्रोत शामिल yerba maté, guarana berries, guayusa, and the yaupon holly.
In humans, caffeine acts as a central nervous system उत्तेजक, temporarily warding बंद drowsiness and restoring alertness.
It is the संसार 's सबसे widely खपत psychoactive drug, but unlike many other psychoactive substances, it is legal and unregulated in nearly all parts of the world.
Beverages containing caffeine, such as कॉफी, चाय, नरम पेय, और उर्जा पेय, enjoy great popularity.
In North अमेरिका, 90 % of adults consume caffeine daily.
Part of the कारण कैफीन is वर्गीकृत by the खाना और ड्रग प्रशासन as GRAS ( generally recognized as safe ) is that toxic doses ( over 10 grams ) are much higher than typically used doses ( less than 500 milligrams ).
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks, even when carried on for सालो – वहीँ may be a modest सुरक्षात्मक प्रभाव विरूद्ध कुछ diseases, including Parkinsons Disease, and certain types of cancer.
Caffeine can have both positive and negative effects on चिंता विकार.
Some people experience sleep disruption if they consume caffeine, विशेषकर दौरान the संध्या घंटों, लकिन अन्य show little disturbance and the effect of caffeine on sleep is highly variable.
Evidence of a risk to pregnancy is equivocal, but some authorities have concluded that prudent advice is for pregnant women to सीमा खपत to the equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less.
The American Congress of obstetricians और स्त्रीरोग ( ACOG ) concluded in 2010 that caffeine consumption is safe up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women.
Caffeine has pressor and mild diuretic effects when administered to people जो हैं नहीं प्रयुक्त to it, लकिन नियमित उपयोक्ता develop a tolerance to this effect, and studies have generally failed to support the common notion that ordinary consumption contributes significantly to dehydration.
साथ भारी use, tolerance develops rapidly to autonomic effects such as elevated heart rate and muscle twitching, but not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine.
The degree to which caffeine can produce clinically significant physical and mental dependence remains a विषय of विवाद in the चिकित्सा literature.

A longboard is a longer रूपांतर of a स्केटबोर्ड.
It is commonly used for cruising, downhill रेसिंग, slalom रेसिंग, स्लाइडिंग, and/or हस्तांतरण.

The coast सीमाएँ of कैलिफ़ोर्निया span from Humboldt County, California south to Santa Barbara County.
The other three coastal California mountain ranges are the अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ, Peninsular Ranges and the Klamath Mountains.
Physiographically, they are a section of the larger Pacific किनारा प्रांत, जिससे in turn are part of the larger Pacific Mountain System physiographic division.
UNESCO has शामिल the `` कैलिफ़ोर्निया coast सीमाएँ जीवमंडल आरक्षित `` in its Man and the Biosphere Programme of World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983.

An automobile, autocar, motor car or car is a wheeled मोटर गाडी प्रयुक्त लिये transporting passengers, which also carries its own engine or motor.
Most definitions of the term specify that ऑटोमोबाइल हैं designed to चलाएं primarily on सड़कें, to have seating लिये one to eight people, to typically have four wheels, and to be constructed principally for the transport of people rather than goods.
The term motorcar has also been used in the context of electrified rail systems to denote a car which functions as a small locomotive but also provides space for passengers and baggage.
These locomotive cars were often used on suburban routes by both interurban और intercity रेलरोड systems.
It was estimated in 2010 that the number of automobiles had risen to over 1 billion वाहनों, up इससे the 500 million of 1986.
The numbers are increasing rapidly, विशेषकर in China and India.
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर jfk, थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the United States, serving from 1961 until his death in 1963.
After military service as commander of the Motor Torpedo Boats PT-109 and PT-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण Pacific, Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he परोसा in the U.S. Senate from 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican candidate Richard Nixon in the 1960 u.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have been elected to the office, the second-youngest President ( after Theodore रूज़वेल्ट ), और the पहला व्यक्ति born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A Catholic, Kennedy is the only non- Protestant अध्यक्ष, और is the तभी अध्यक्ष to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
Events during his presidency included the Bay of सूअर आक्रमण, the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट, the भवन of the बर्लिन Wall, the Space Race, the African-American Civil Rights Movement, and early stages of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers, special operation forces, and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the Strategic Hamlet Program which was implemented by the दक्षिण वियतनामी government.
It involved certain forced relocation, village internment, and segregation of rural दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे the उत्तरी and southern communist insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on नवम्बर 22, 1963 in Dallas, Texas.
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime, but he was shot and killed by Jack माणिक्य दो दिनों बाद, पहले a trial could take place.
The FBI and the Warren Commission officially concluded कि ओसवाल्ड was the lone assassin.
However, the United States House Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was संभवतः assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, ABC News in their investigation, The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond षड्यंत्र, पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber program led to a congressional investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s information concerning Kennedy 's निजी जीवन रै come to light.
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled have become बेहतर ज्ञात, especially since the 1990s.
Although initially kept secret इससे the सामान्य public, reports of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy ranks अत्यधिक in पब्लिक राय ratings of U.S. presidents.
A Siemens MXL fire alarm control panel ( शीर्ष ) और ग्राफिक annunciator ( bottom ) for Potomac Hall, at James Madison University.
A सतर्क vm-1 आग सचेतक कंट्रोल ईकाई ( facu ) / autonomous control unit ( ACU ) with integrated voice evacuation and fire fighter telephone system.
manufactured by Edwards, A UTC F & S Company
A Fire Alarm Control Panel ( FACP ), or Fire Alarm Control Unit ( FACU ), is the controlling घटक of a आग सचेतक प्रणाली.
The panel receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated with fire, monitors their operational integrity and provides for automatic कंट्रोल of उपकरण, और हस्तांतरण of सूचना जरुरी to तैयारी the facility for fire based on a predetermined sequence.
The panel may also supply electrical energy to operate any associated सेंसर, कंट्रोल, ट्रांसमीटर, or relay.
There are four basic types of panels : coded panels, conventional panels, addressable panels, and multiplex systems.

Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as Katunayake International Airport and Colombo International विमानक्षेत्र ) is एक of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयरपोर्ट सेवारत the नगर of कोलोन, the अन्य is Ratmalana International Airport.
Mattala Rajapaksa International Airport located in southern city of Hambantota is the अन्य international airport in Sri Lanka.
Bandaranaike अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is स्तिथ in katunayake, 22 miles ( 35 km ) north of Colombo.
It is administered by Airport and Aviation सेवाएं ( श्री लंका ) Ltd.
It is the hub of SriLankan Airlines, the नेशनल वाहक of श्री लंका, और mihin लंका, the budget airline of Sri Lanka.
Black Swan is a 2010 American psychological thriller and horror film directed by Darren Aronofsky और अभिनीत Natalie Portman, Vincent Cassel, and Mila Kunis.
The plot revolves around a production of tchaikovsky 's swan Lake ballet by a prestigious New York City company.
The production requires a ballerina to play the innocent and fragile White Swan, for which the committed dancer Nina ( Portman ) is a perfect fit, as well as the dark and sensual Black Swan, जिससे हैं qualities समाविष्ट by the नई आगमन लिली ( kunis ).
Nina is overwhelmed by a feeling of immense pressure when she finds herself स्पर्धा लिये the भाग, causing उसके to खोना उसके tenuous पकड़ on reality and descend into a living nightmare.
Aronofsky conceived the premise by connecting his viewings of a production of swan झील साथ an unrealized पटकथा परिचय understudies और the ख़्याल of होने haunted by a double, similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers.
Aronofsky cites fyodor दोस्तोयेव्स्की 's `` The Double `` as another inspiration for the film.
The director also considered Black Swan a companion piece to his 2008 film The Wrestler, with both films involving demanding प्रदर्शन लिये अलग kinds of art.
He and Portman first discussed the project in 2000, and after a brief attachment to सार्वभौमिक studios, Black Swan was produced in New York City in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures.
Portman and Kunis trained in ballet for अनेक महीने prior to फिल्मांकन, और notable figures from the ballet world helped with film production to shape the ballet presentation.
The film premiered as the opening film for the 67th Venice International Film Festival on September 1, 2010.
It had a limited रिलीज in the संयुक्त राज्य starting December 3, 2010 and opened nationwide on December 17.
Black Swan received critical praise upon its release, particularly for Portman 's performance and Aronofsky 's direction, and was a significant बक्सा दफ्तर कामयाबी, grossing $ 329 लाख worldwide.
The film received five Academy Award nominations and Portman won the Best Actress award for the फिल्मी, as खूब as अनेक अन्य बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार in अनेक guilds और त्यौहार, जबकि Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director.
In addition, the फिल्मी itself received a nomination for Best Picture.
The world’s first ice-calorimeter, used in the winter of 1782-83, by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये और pierre-simon लाप्लास, to determine the ऊष्मा involved in various chemical changes ; calculations which were based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat.
These प्रयोग mark the foundation of thermochemistry.
A calorimeter ( from Latin calor, meaning heat ) is an object used for calorimetry, or the process of measuring the ऊष्मा of रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ or शारीरिक changes as well as heat capacity.
Differential scanning calorimeters, isothermal microcalorimeters, titration calorimeters और त्वरित रेट calorimeters हैं among the सबसे common types.
A सरल ऊष्मामापी बस consists of a थर्मामीटर संलग्न to a metal container full of water suspended above a combustion chamber.
to ढूँढें the enthalpy बदलें प्रति mole of a पदार्थ a in a प्रतिक्रिया between दो substances A and B, the substances are added to a calorimeter and the initial and final temperatures ( before the reaction started and after it has finished ) are noted.
multiplying the तापमान बदलें by the mass and specific heat capacities of the substances gives a value for the energy given off or absorbed during the reaction.
Dividing the energy change by how many moles of A were उपस्थित देता इसके enthalpy बदलें of प्रतिक्रिया.
This method is used primarily in academic teaching as it describes the सिद्धान्त of calorimetry.
It does not खाता लिये the ऊष्मा घाटा through the container or the heat capacity of the thermometer and container itself.
In जोड, the ऑब्जेक्ट लगाई अंदर the ऊष्मामापी shows कि the वस्तुएँ transferred their heat to the calorimeter and into the liquid, and the heat absorbed by the calorimeter and the liquid is equal to the heat given off by the metals.
A जोड़ी of green flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri, thongs, jandals, or a variety of other names throughout the संसार ) हैं a प्रकार of open-toed चन्दन typically worn in कैज़ुअल परिस्थितियों, ऐसे as outside or at the beach.
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot by a y-shaped डोरी that passes between the first and second toes and around either side of the foot.
They may also be आयोजित to the पैर साथ a single strap over the front of the foot rather than a thong.
The नाम `` flip-flop '' originated क्युकी of the sound that is made by slapping between the sole of the foot and the floor when walking.
This style of footwear has been worn by the people of many cultures throughout the world, originating as जल्दी as the प्राचीन उन्होंने in 4,000 B.C.
The modern flip-flop descends from the Japanese zōri, जिससे became लोकप्रिय बाद संसार युद्ध ii जब सैनिको returning to the United States brought them back.
They became popular in casual settings during the 1960s, 1990s, और 2000s, और कुछ किस्में have भी found their way into more formal attire, despite criticism.
The use of flip-flops can result in many pains and injuries, including ankle sprains and टूटा हड्डियों.
Some individuals who walk for long periods report pain in the feet, ankles, और निम्नतर legs.
The lack of support provided by flip-flops प्रायः परिणाम in over-pronation चोटों, caused by the foot slipping inwards further than normal.
This can lead to चपटा फीट और tendonitis.
Other injuries that may result are due to the footwear 's open-toed nature, such as stubbed toes, कटौती, and bruises.
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned soles, as well as those कि have a डोरी कि is नहीं कैनवास और कि comes back almost to the ankle.
The owners of Hanjin Osaka, seen here transiting the Panama Canal in 2008, declared general average following an विस्फोट in the जलयान 's इंजन रूम on.
The law of general average is a legal principle of maritime law according to जिससे सब पार्टियों in a समुद्र venture proportionally share any losses resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the whole in an emergency.
In the exigencies of जोखिमों faced at समुद्र, क्रू सदस्यों often have precious little time in which to determine precisely whose cargo they are jettisoning.
Thus, to avoid quarrelling that could waste valuable time, there arose the equitable practice whereby all the merchants whose cargo landed safely would be called on to contribute a portion, आधारित upon a share or प्रतिशत, to the व्यापारी or merchants whose goods had been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril.
While general average traces its origins in प्राचीन मेरीटाइम law, still it remains part of the admiralty law of most countries.
The first संहिताकरण of सामान्य average was the York Antwerp Rules of 1890.
American कंपनियाँ accepted it in 1949.
General औसत requires तीन तत्व जिससे हैं clearly stated by Mr. Justice Grier in Barnard v. Adams:
`` 1st.
A common danger : a danger in which vessel, cargo and crew all participate ; a खतरे निकट और जाहिर 'inevitable, ' except by voluntarily incurring the loss of a portion of the whole to save the remainder. ''
`` 2nd. There must be a voluntary jettison, jactus, or casting away, of some portion of the संयुक्त चिंता लिये the purpose of बचने इस निकट peril, periculi imminentis evitandi causa, or, in other words, a transfer of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole. ''
`` 3rd.
This attempt to avoid the निकट आम peril must be successful ''.
Example Polish call लिये टीकाकरण against Diphtheria and Tetanus.
A vaccination schedule is a series of vaccinations, including the समय of सब doses, जिससे may be either अनुशंसित or compulsory, depending on the country of residence.
A vaccine is an antigenic तैयारी प्रयुक्त to उपज क्रियाशील प्रतिरक्षण to a बीमारी, in अनुक्रम to prevent or reduce the effects of infection by any natural or `` wild '' pathogen.
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum effectiveness, either to उपज sufficient आरंभिक प्रतिरक्षा जवाब or to बूस्ट जवाब कि fades over time.
For उदाहरण, tetanus vaccine boosters are often recommended every 10 years.
Vaccine schedules are developed by सरकारी एजेंसियों or physicians समूह to achieve maximum effectiveness using required and recommended vaccines for a locality while minimizing the number of health care system interactions.
Over the past two decades, the recommended vaccination schedule has grown rapidly and become more जटिल as अनेक नई टीके have महरूम developed.
कुछ टीके हैं अनुशंसित तभी in certain areas ( countries, subnational areas, or at-risk populations ) where a disease is common.
For instance, yellow fever vaccination is on the routine vaccine schedule of French Guiana, is recommended in certain regions of Brazil but in the United States is only given to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease.
In developing countries, टीका सुझाव also take into account the level of health care access, the cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage.
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the World Health Organization show a developed country using a schedule which extends over the first five years of a child 's life and uses vaccines which cost over $ 700 including प्रशासन लागत जबकि a विकासशील देश उपयोग a अनुसूची providing टीके in the first 9 months of life and costing only $ 25.
This difference is due to the lower cost of health care, the lower cost of many टीके provided to developing nations, and that more expensive vaccines, often for less common diseases, are not utilized.
In 1900, the smallpox टीका was the only one administered to children.
By the early 1950s, children routinely received four vaccines, for protection against ( डिप्थीरिया, pertussis, टेटनस, पोलियो, और smallpox ), and as many as five shots by two years of age.
Since the mid-1980s, अनेक vaccines have been added to the schedule.
, the US Centers for Disease Control and रोकथाम ( सीडीसी ) अभी अनुशंसा टीकाकरण विरूद्ध at least fourteen diseases.
By two years of आयु, u.S. children प्राप्त as many as 24 vaccine injections, and might receive up to five shots during one visit to the doctor.
The use of combination vaccine products means that,, the United किंगडम 's immunization कार्यक्रम consists of 10 injections by the age of two, rather than 25 if vaccination for each disease was given as a separate injection.

The Trinidad and Tobago Carnival is an annual event held on the सोमवार और मंगलवार पहले राख बुधवार, और is खूब ज्ञात for participant 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations.
Carnival in Trinidad and Tobago is the most significant event on the islands ' cultural and tourism calendar, with numerous cultural events running in the lead up to the गली परेड on कार्निवल सोमवार और मंगलवार.
it is कहा कि if the आइलैंडर्स are not celebrating it, then they are preparing for it, while reminiscing about the past year 's festival.
The heart of the musical celebration has been calypso ; recently soca has replaced कैलिप्सो as the सबसे मनाये type of music.
वेशभूषा, stickfighting and limbo competitions are also important components of the festival.
कार्निवल as it is celebrated in Trinidad and Tobago is also celebrated in cities worldwide.
These including Toronto 's Caribana, Miami 's मियामी कार्निवल, ह्यूस्टन carifest, London 's Notting Hill Carnival as well as New York City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few.
Carnival was created when वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी स्लेव mimicked their French owners who where known for their lavish costumes balls.
Forbidden to partake in these festivities and confined to their quarters, slaves combined elements from उनके अपना संस्कृतियों to उनके निपुण 's fete.
Hence the creation of characters such as Jab jab or jab molassie ( शैतानों ), Midnight Robbers, Imps, Lagahroo, Soucouyant, La Diablesse and Demons.
With the abolition of गुलामी in 1838, freed africans took उनके संस्करण of Carnival to the streets through expression of drums, riddim sections like tamboo bamboo and as each new immigrant population entered Trinidad, Carnival evolved into what we know today.
the नगर of शिकागो, इलिनोइस held a nonpartisan mayoral election on Tuesday, February 22, 2011.
Incumbent महापौर रिचर्ड M. डाले, a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी जो had been in office since 1989, did not seek a seventh term as mayor.
Candidates needed to collect 12,500 याचिका हस्ताक्षर by November 22, 2010 to qualify for a place on the ballot.
अप्रैल 5, 2011 was scheduled to be a runoff election date if no candidate received an absolute majority.
Rahm Emanuel won the रेस लिये महापौर साथ अधिक than 55 % of the vote.
He was inaugurated on May 16, 2011.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी indie pop band Foster the People.
It was released as the group 's debut single in September 2010, and the following year was included on their EP Foster the लोगों और उनके debut album Torches.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' became the group 's भेदन hit और थी एक of the most popular songs of 2011.
The song was written and अंकित by frontman चिह्नित फोस्टर जबकि he थी working as a commercial jingle writer.
Contrasting with the upbeat musical संयोजन, the गीत describe the homicidal thoughts of a troubled youth.
The track प्राप्त considerable ध्यान बाद it थी posted ऑनलाइन in 2010 as a फ़्री डाउनलोड, और it helped the समूह गार्नर a multi-album रिकार्ड सौदे साथ कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड imprint startime अंतरराष्ट्रीय.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' proved to be a sleeper hit ; in 2011, after receiving significant airplay on modern rock stations, the song crossed-over onto समकालीन hit रेडियो स्टेशन.
The song spent eight consecutive weeks at number three on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in the United States, making it the पहला Billboard Alternative Songs number-one single to crack the U.S. top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009.
The song was widely praised by critics, and it has been licensed for use in a चौड़ी दायरा of popular media since its release.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' received a Grammy Award nomination for Best पॉप duo/group Performance.
The State Fair of वेस्ट वर्जिनिया is an annual state fair for West Virginia.
It is held annually in mid-August on the State Fairgrounds in Fairlea, near lewisburg, वेस्ट वर्जिनिया in the southeastern part of the state.
The State Fairgrounds consists of a large open field for carnivals and exhibitions, a घोड़ा track, grandstands, और अनेक exhibition buildings.
Free parking is provided adjacent to the fairgrounds and, until 2006, free camping was also available in a विशाल फ़ील्ड साथ running-water toilets and showers, but no hookups.
Campers are now चार्ज a छोटी fee.

Under the United States Constitution, the President of the United राज्य is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the highest political दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य by influence और मान्यता.
The president is भी the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an चुनावी कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the Electoral College fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951, no person may be elected President more than twice, and no one who has served more than two years of a term to जिससे किसी else थी निर्वाचित may be elected more than once.
Upon the मौत, इस्तीफा, or removal from office of an incumbent President, the Vice President assumes the office.
The President must be at least 35 years of age and a `` प्राकृतिक born '' नागरिक of the United States.
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the ratification of the United States संविधान, जिससे took प्रभाव on कूच 4, 1789.
लिये अमरीकी नेताओ पहले इस अनुसमर्थन, see President of the Continental Congress.
The list does not include any एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as Grover Cleveland परोसा दो non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as president, four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison, zachary टेलर, वारेन G. हार्डिंग, और Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. Garfield, William McKinley, and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first president, was inaugurated in 1789 after a unanimous vote of the चुनावी कॉलेज.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841, and Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over बारह सालो, लकिन died shortly into उसके चौथी पद in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than two terms, and a संवैधानिक amendment, affecting राष्ट्रपतियों after Harry Truman, was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब वर्ग in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
Warren Harding was the first elected after महिलाओं gained voting rights in 1920.
History records four presidents – John Q Adams, Rutherford B. Hayes, Benjamin Harrison and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed दफ्तर.
जॉन F. कैनेडी रै महरूम the तभी अध्यक्ष of रोमन Catholic faith, and the current president, Barack Obama, is the first president of African descent.
`` लोम्बार्डी Trophy '' redirects here.
For the पुरस्कार awarded annually to the बेहतरीन कॉलेज football lineman or linebacker, see Lombardi Award.
The Vince Lombardi Trophy is the trophy awarded प्रत्येक साल to the जीतना टोली of the National Football League 's championship game, the Super Bowl.
The ट्रॉफी is नामित in honor of legendary NFL coach Vince Lombardi.
This is a list of tables of the verified oldest लोगों in the संसार in ordinal rank, such as oldest person or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an international body कि specifically सौदे in आयु शोध, ऐसे as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
the longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is that of Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 years, 164 days.
She met Vincent van Gogh when वो थी 12 or 13.
This led to news media ध्यान in 1985, बाद Calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation मिला दस्तावेज़ीकरण for Calment 's age, beyond any reasonable question, in the records of her native city, Arles, France.
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; her case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura, who फिलहाल जीवनदान in जापानी और is आयु as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States, on 17 December 2012, Kimura, born 19 अप्रैल 1897, is the oldest living person in the world whose age can be documented.
He has also been the oldest जीना man since the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013, the oldest living woman has been -year-old misao okawa, also from Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
The People 's Court is an American arbitration-based वास्तविकता अदालत show, currently presided over by retired Florida State Circuit Court Judge Marilyn Milian, in which small claims disputes are handled.
The People 's Court is the first court show to use binding मध्यस्थता, introducing the स्वरूप into the genre in 1981.
The system has been duplicated by सबसे of the show 's successors in the judicial genre.
Moreover, The People 's Court is the पहला लोकप्रिय, long-running वास्तविकता in the judicial genre.
It was preceded only by a few short-lived realities in the genre ; these short-lived पूर्ववर्तियों यहूद तभी loosely सम्बन्धित to न्यायिक कार्यवाही, मगर लिये एक : पैरोल ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings.
Prior to The People 's Court, the vast majority of TV courtroom shows used actors, and recreated or fictional cases ( as did radio before that ).
Among examples of these types of court shows include प्रसिद्ध जूरी Trials and Your Witness.
The People 's Court has had two चिहृ जीवनदान.
The दिखाएँ 's पहला जीवन थी presided over solely by former Los Angeles County Superior Court Judge Joseph Wapner.
His tenure lasted from the show 's debut on September 14, 1981, until May 21, 1993, जब the दिखाएँ थी रद्द due to low ratings.
इस बाएँ the दिखाएँ साथ a total of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes and 12 seasons.
The show was taped in Los Angeles दौरान इसके पहला जीवन.
After being रद्द, reruns aired until September 9, 1994.
On September 8, 1997, after being out of production for four years, the लोगों 's अदालत थी revived लिये a दूसरी life in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program.
Former lawyer and Mayor of New York Ed Koch was chosen as arbiter, which he maintained for 2 seasons from the 1997–98 season through the 1998–99 ऋतु ( the उपस्थित life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ).
By the 1999–00 season, husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides over न्यायधीश जुडी ) और पूर्व नई York State Supreme Court Judge Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch.
Sheindlin lasted one and a half seasons as he थी replaced towards the समाप्त of the 2000–01 season ( present life 's 4th season and overall show 's 17th ).
शुरूआत in वसन्त 2001, फ्लोरिडा judge Marilyn Milian took over The People 's Court and has presided over the show ever since.
Once milian completes the 2012–13 ऋतु, she will have served as longest arbiter over the series with 12 and a half seasons.
As of the present, however, उसके सालो on the program tie Wapner at 12 seasons.
In the 2009-10 television ऋतु, the लोगों 's Courts 2nd/present life outlasted its first when it reached 13 seasons.
While the show taped in New York City for the first 15 seasons of its second life, it अभी टेपों in stamford, कनेक्टिकट as of the 2012-13 season.
On September 3, 2012, The People 's Court 's 2nd/present life entered its 16th ऋतु ( 28th overall ऋतु ).
With 28 total seasons, The People 's Court ranks as the 2nd longest-running courtroom कार्यक्रम पीछे the ongoing Divorce Court at 33 seasons ( from its 3 combined lives ).
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho : Wo'tééneihí ' ) is a state in the पश्चिमी संयुक्त राज्य.
It became the 45th राज्य admitted to the Union on January 4, 1896.
Utah is the 13th-largest, the 34th-most populous, और the 10th-least-densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately 80 % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the Wasatch Front, centering on Salt झील नगर, leaving विशाल expanses of the राज्य nearly uninhabited and making the population the sixth most urbanized in the U.S. Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east, Wyoming on the northeast, Idaho on the north, Arizona on the south, and Nevada on the west.
It also छू a कोने of नई Mexico on the southeast.
Utah is the सबसे religiously homogeneous state in the Union.
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints or LDS ( Mormons ), which greatly प्रभाव यूटा संस्कृति and daily life.
The world headquarters of The Church of यीशु मसीह of latter-day संतो ( LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's state capital.
The state is a बीच of transportation, education, information technology and research, government services, mining, and a major tourist destination for outdoor recreation.
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population estimates, Utah is the fifth fastest-growing राज्य in the United States as of 2012.
St. George, थी the fastest–growing metropolitan area in the United States from 2000 to 2005.
A 2012 Gallup national survey found Utah overall to be the `` best state to live in '' based on 13 forward-looking माप सहित विभिन्न आर्थिक, जीवनशैली, और health-related outlook metrics.
Coldwater is a छोटी कस्बा in टेट County, Mississippi.
It is in the मेम्फिस Metropolitan Area.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 1,674 at the 2000 census.
The hard तालु is a thin horizontal bony plate of the skull, located in the roof of the mouth.
It spans the मेहराब formed by the upper teeth.
It is formed by the palatine प्रक्रम of the maxilla और आड़ा plate of palatine bone.
It forms a partition between the nasal passages and the मुँह.
भी on the अग्रवर्ती portion of the roof of the hard palate is the Rugae which are the irregular ridges in the mucous membrane that help facilitate the movement of food backwards towards the pharynx.
This partition is continued deeper into the mouth by a fleshy एक्सटेंशन called the soft palate.
Complete set of scrolls, constituting the संपूर्ण Tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; भी tenakh, tenak, Tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
The Tanakh is also known as the Masoretic टेक्स्ट or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching '', also known as the पाँच किताबे of मूसा ), nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) और ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), meaning `` that which is read '', is an वैकल्पिक यहूदी term for the Tanakh.
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral परंपरा passed on by each generation, called the Oral Torah.
गम्भीरता नाका in Germany
Driving under the influence ( DUI ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), शराबी ड्राइविंग, नशे ड्राइविंग, पेय ड्राइविंग, ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the influence, drinking and driving, or impaired driving is the crime of driving a motor vehicle with blood levels of alcohol in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '', or `` BAC '' ).
Similar regulations cover driving or operating certain types of मशीनरी while affected by drinking alcohol or taking other drugs, including, but not limited to prescription drugs.
This is a दण्ड offense in most nations.
Convictions do not necessarily involve वास्तविक driving of the vehicle.
In most jurisdictions a मापन ऐसे as a रक्त दारू सामग्री ( bac ) in excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज स्तर, ऐसे as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the offense, with no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol.
In some jurisdictions, there is an aggravated category of the ठोकर at a उच्चतर स्तर e.g. 0.12 %.
In most countries, anyone who is convicted of injuring or killing someone while under the influence of alcohol or drugs can be heavily fined, as in फ़्रांस, in जोड to होने दिए a lengthy prison sentence.
Some jobs have their own rules and bac हद, for example commercial pilot, and the Federal Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % limit for train crew.
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC ; for example, the state of California has a 0.08 % BAC limit, which is lowered to 0.04 % if the ऑपरेटर holds a वाणिज्यिक ड्राइवर 's license.
The California bac सीमा is 0.01 % लिये those younger than 21 years of age and those on probation for a previous DUI conviction.
Some large corporations have उनके अपना नियम ; संघ प्रशांत रेलरोड रै उनके अपना BAC limit of 0.02 % that, if violated during a random test or a for-cause test — for example, after a traffic accident — can result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire.
Many states in the U.S. and provinces in Canada have adopted truth in sentencing laws that enforce strict guidelines on sentencing, differing इससे पिछला अभ्यास जहाँ थाना समय थी घटाया or suspended after sentencing had been issued.
Some jurisdictions have judicial guidelines requiring a अनिवार्य न्यूनतम वाक्य.
Penalties for DUI charges range from expensive fees to forfetiruree of your license plates and in some serious circumstances, your vehicle.
A drunk driving simulator in montréal, Canada
The specific criminal offense may be called, depending on the jurisdiction, driving under the influence [ of alcohol or other drugs ] ( DUI ), driving under intense influence ( DUII ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), operating under the influence ( OUI ) operating while intoxicated ( OWI ), operating a motor vehicle while intoxicated ( omvi ), ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the संयुक्त influence of दारू and/or अन्य दवाएँ, ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a vehicle ].
अनेक ऐसे कानून लागू भी to motorcycling, बोटिंग, piloting aircraft, use of motile farm equipment such as tractors and combines, riding horses or driving a horse-drawn vehicle, or bicycling, possibly with different BAC level than driving.
In some jurisdictions there are separate charges depending on the vehicle used, such as BWI ( bicycling while intoxicated ), which may carry a lighter sentence.
In the United States, local law enforcement agencies made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for driving under the influence of alcohol in 1996, compared to 1.9 million such arrests during the peak year in 1983.
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 DWI अपराधियों यहूद in थाना or jail, down from 593,000 in 1990 and up from 270,100 in 1986.

Law प्रवर्तन in the संयुक्त राज्य is एक of तीन major components of the criminal justice system of the United States, along with courts and corrections.
Although there exists an inherent interrelatedness between the अलग समूह कि मेक up the दण्ड इंसाफ प्रणाली आधारित on उनके अपराधों deterrence purpose, each component operates independently from one another.
However, the judiciary is vested with the शक्ति to मेक विधिक determinations regarding the conduct of the other two components.
Apart from maintaining order and service functions, the purpose of policing is the investigation of suspected criminal कार्यकलाप और the referral of the परिणाम of investigations and of suspected criminals to the courts.
Law enforcement, to varying degrees at different levels of government and in different agencies, is also commonly चार्ज साथ the जिम्मेदारियों of deterring दण्ड कार्यकलाप और of preventing the successful commission of crimes in progress ; the service and enforcement of warrants, writs and other orders of the courts.
Law enforcement agencies are also involved in providing first response to emergencies and other threats to पब्लिक सुरक्षा ; the सुरक्षा of निश्चित पब्लिक सुविधाएं और अवसंरचना ; the मेंटेनेंस of public order ; the protection of public officials ; and the operation of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ).
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born June 28, 1968 ), best known under the stage name Chayanne, is a Puerto Rican Latin pop सिंगर और कर्ता.
As a सोलो कलाकार, chayanne रै released 21 solo albums and sold over 15 million albums worldwide.
`` World War हल्क '' is a कॉमिक किताब क्रॉसओवर कथानक कि ran through a self titled limited series and various other titles published by Marvel Comics in 2007, featuring the Hulk.
The series consists of five main issues titled World War Hulk, with Greg Pak as writer and John romita, jr. as penciller, और तीन अन्य सीमित श्रेणी : संसार युद्ध हल्क : सामने लकीर, संसार युद्ध हल्क : Gamma Corps, and World War Hulk : X-Men.
It also भागा through several other Marvel comics series.
The plot is the culmination of a series of events that began with the Hulk being tricked into space by the illuminati और a जीवन मॉडल decoy of उपनाम फ़्यूरी, the Hulk 's subsequent exile seen in Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati.
Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion Robert Morrison ; May 26, 1907 – June 11, 1979 ), better known by his stage name John Wayne, was an अमरीकी फिल्मी कर्ता, director and producer.
An Academy Award -winner, Wayne was among the top box office draws for three decades, और थी नामित the all-time शीर्ष money-making star.
An enduring American icon, he epitomized खुरदरा masculinity and is famous for his demeanor, including his distinctive calm voice, walk, and height.
Wayne was born in Winterset, Iowa but his family relocated to the greater Los Angeles area when he थी चार सालो बूढ़ा.
He found work at local film studios when he lost his football scholarship to USC as a result of a bodysurfing दुर्घटना.
Initially working for the Fox Film Corporation, he ज़्यादातर appeared in छोटी बिट भाग.
उसके पहला अग्रणी भूमिका आए in the वाइडस्क्रीन एपिक the बिग ट्रेल ( 1930 ), which led to leading roles in numerous films throughout the 1930s, many of them in the western genre.
His career rose to further heights in 1939, साथ जॉन घाट 's Stagecoach making him an instant superstar.
Wayne would go on to स्टार in 142 pictures, primarily typecast in Western films.
Among his best known later films are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ), which follows him as an Irish-American boxer and his love affair with a fiery spinster played by Maureen O'Hara ; The Searchers ( 1956 ), in जिससे he plays a सिविल युद्ध दिग्गज जो seeks आउट उसके abducted भांजी ; रिओ ब्रावो ( 1959 ), playing a शेरिफ साथ डीन मार्टिन ; True Grit ( 1969 ), playing a humorous U.S. Marshal who sets out to avenge a man 's death in the role that won Wayne an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ), his final screen performance in which he plays an aging gunslinger battling cancer.
Wayne moved to Orange County, California in the 1960s, and was a prominent Republican in Hollywood, supporting anti-communist स्थितियाँ.
He died of पेट कर्कट in 1979.
In June 1999, the American Film संस्थान नामित वेन 13th among the Greatest Male Screen Legends of All Time.
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February 1564 – 8 January 1642 ), was an Italian physicist, mathematician, astronomer, and philosopher who played a major role in the Scientific Revolution.
His achievements include improvements to the telescope and consequent astronomical observations and support लिये copernicanism.
गैलीलियो रै महरूम पुकारा the `` पिता of आधुनिक observational astronomy ``, the `` father of modern physics ``, the `` father of science '', and `` the Father of Modern Science ''.
His योगदान to observational खगोलशास्त्र शामिल the telescopic पुष्टि of the phases of Venus, the discovery of the four largest satellites of Jupiter ( named the Galilean moons in his honour ), and the observation and analysis of sunspots.
Galileo also worked in applied science and technology, inventing an improved military compass and other instruments.
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial भीतर उसके आजीवन, जब सबसे subscribed to either geocentrism or the Tychonic system.
He met with opposition from astronomers, who doubted heliocentrism due to the absence of an observed तारकीय parallax.
The matter was investigated by the रोमन inquisition in 1615, and they concluded that it could be supported as only a possibility, not an established fact.
Galileo later defended his views in Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief World Systems, which appeared to attack Pope Urban VIII and thus alienated him and the Jesuits, who had both supported Galileo up until this point.
He was tried by the inquisition, मिला `` ओजस्वी suspect of heresy '', forced to recant, and spent the rest of his life under house arrest.
It was while Galileo was under house arrest that he लिखा एक of उसके finest works, दो नई sciences, in जिससे he summarised the work he had done some forty years earlier, on the two sciences now called kinematics and strength of materials.
