demonstration of a flexible OLED device
An OLED ( organic light-emitting diode ) is a light-emitting diode ( LED ) in जिससे the emissive electroluminescent layer is a film of organic compound which emits light in response to an electric current.
This layer of organic सेमीकंडक्टर is situated between two electrodes.
Generally, at least one of these electrodes is पारदर्शी.
OLEDs are used to create digital displays in devices such as television screens, computer monitors, portable systems such as mobile फोन, हैंडहेल्ड खेल consoles और गुस्से.
A major area of research is the development of white OLED devices for use in solid-state lighting अनुप्रयोग.
There are two main families of OLEDs : those based on small अणुओं और those employing polymers.
Adding mobile ions to an OLED creates a light-emitting electrochemical cell or LEC, जिससे रै a थोड़ा different mode of operation.
OLED displays can use either passive-matrix ( PMOLED ) or active-matrix संबोधित योजनाएं.
Active-matrix OLEDs ( AMOLED ) require a thin-film ट्रांजिस्टर backplane to switch each individual pixel on or off, but allow for higher resolution and larger display sizes.
An OLED प्रदर्शक works बगैर a backlight.
Thus, it can display deep black स्तर और can be thinner and lighter than a liquid crystal display ( LCD ).
In low ambient light conditions such as a dark room an OLED screen can achieve a उच्चतर कंट्रास्ट अनुपात than an एलसीडी, whether the LCD uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight.
A carton and a glass of eggnog from Montreal, Canada, showing its French मुखाग्र ( अंग्रेज़ी रिवर्स ) और the French term lait de poule ( literally, `` hen 's milk '' )
Eggnog, or egg nog, is a sweetened dairy -based beverage traditionally made with milk and/or cream, शुगर, और whipped eggs ( which gives it a frothy texture ).
ब्रांडी, rum, व्हिस्की, bourbon, vodka, or a combination of liquors are often added.
the समाप्त सेवारत is often garnished with a sprinkling of ground cinnamon or nutmeg.
it थी also known as the egg milk punch.
Eggnog is a popular drink throughout the United States and Canada, और is प्रायः संबद्ध with Christmas.
Eggnog may be added as a flavoring to खाना or drinks such as coffee and tea.
Eggnog as a custard can also be used as an बर्फ मलाई आधार.
A pasty (, ), ( sometimes known in Britain as a Cornish pasty, and in the United राज्य as a pastie or अंग्रेजों pasty ) is a baked पेस्ट्री, a परंपरागत variety of which is particularly associated with Cornwall, the westernmost county in England.
It is made by placing uncooked filling typically of मांस और सब्जियां, बगैर मांस in शाकाहारी versions, on a flat pastry circle and folding it to wrap the filling, crimping the edge to form a seal.
बाद बेकिंग, the result is a raised semicircular comestible.
The traditional Cornish pasty, which has Protected Geographical Indication ( PGI ) status in Europe, is भर साथ बीफ, sliced or diced आलू, swede ( भी ज्ञात as a पीला शलजम or rutabaga – referred to in कॉर्नवॉल as शलजम ) और प्याज, seasoned साथ नमक और pepper, and is baked.
Today, the pasty is the food most associated with Cornwall, it is regarded as the national dish, and it accounts लिये 6 % of the cornish खाना अर्थव्यवस्था.
Pasties with many different fillings are made ; some shops specialise in selling सब sorts of pasties.
The origins of the pasty हैं unclear, हालांकि वहीँ हैं अनेक references to them throughout historical documents and fiction.
The pasty is now popular world-wide due to the spread of Cornish miners, and variations can be मिला in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, the United States, Mexico and elsewhere.
The ( ortho- ) sympathetic बेचैन system ( SNS ) is one of three major parts of the autonomic nervous system : the others being the enteric and parasympathetic systems.
Its general action is to mobilize the body 's nervous system fight-or-flight response.
It is, however, constantly active at a basic level to maintain समस्थापन.
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile मेमोरी कार्ड स्वरूप लिये उपयोग in पोर्टेबल डिवाइस, ऐसे as mobile phones, digital cameras, GPS navigation devices, and tablet computers.
The सुरक्षित डिजिटल standard is maintained by the SD Card Association ( SDA ).
SD technologies have महरूम implemented in अधिक than 400 brands across dozens of product categories and more than 8,000 models.
The Secure Digital format includes four card परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in तीन different form factors.
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ), and the SDIO, which combines input/output functions with data storage.
The three form factors are the original size, the `` mini '' size, and the `` micro '' आकार ( देखिए उदाहरण ).
There are अनेक combinations of form factors and device families.
Electrically passive adapters allow the use of a smaller कार्ड in a host device built to hold a larger card.
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide पिछड़ा संगतता और accept पुरानी SD cards, but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may प्रस्ताव वृहद क्षमता than the host device can handle.
A newer card may use a संचिका system the host device can not navigate.
Use of an SDIO card requires the host device be designed for the input/output कृत्यों the कार्ड provides.
The organization of the card was बदला starting साथ the SDHC family.
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 GB before the SDA had मानकीकृत a विधि of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with its specifications and assure उपयोक्ता of संगतता.

Daniel Lawrence Whitney ( born February 17, 1963 ) best known by his stage name and character Larry the Cable Guy, is an American stand-up हास्य, कर्ता, देश म्यूज़िक कलाकार, voice actor, and former radio personality.
He was one of the members of the Blue कॉलर कॉमेडी दौरे, a कॉमेडी troupe जिससे शामिल Bill Engvall, Ron White, and Jeff Foxworthy ( with whom he has starred on Blue Collar TV ).
Whitney has released seven comedy albums, of which three have been certified सुनहरा by the riaa for shipments of 500,000 copies.
In addition, he has starred in three Blue Collar Comedy Tour-related movies, as well as in the films Larry the केबल guy : स्वास्थ्य इंस्पेक्टर, डेल्टा Farce, and Witless Protection, as well as voicing Mater in the Cars franchise.
Whitney 's catchphrase : `` git-r-done ! '' is भी the शीर्षक of उसके book.
On January 26, 2010, the TV चैनल इतिहास घोषित कि it थी ordering a series starring Whitney called Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy, in which he would explore the country and immerse himself in different lifestyles, jobs, and hobbies.
The first एपीसोड of the श्रेणी aired on February 8, 2011.
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible for intestinal अवशोषण of कैल्सियम और phosphate.
In humans, the most important सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of विटामिन d हैं विटामिन D2 and vitamin D3.
cholecalciferol ( विटामिन d3 ) और ergocalciferol ( विटामिन D2 ) are unique as they constitute what we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can also synthesize vitamin D ( from cholesterol ) when sun एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence इसके उपनाम, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
Although विटामिन d is commonly पुकारा a विटामिन, it is not actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense, as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight.
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize vitamin D efficiently और जरूर प्राप्त it in their diet. )
An सशुल्क रासायनिक यौगिक ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of यौगिकों ) is तभी scientifically called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from their diet.
However, as साथ अन्य यौगिकों commonly पुकारा vitamins, vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find the dietary substance that was lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the childhood form of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like other compounds called vitamins, in the developed world vitamin D is added to staple foods, such as milk, to avoid disease due to deficiency.
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous synthesis from exposure to sunlight as well as intake from the diet, and it is believed that संश्लेषण may योगदान generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations.
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but, because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from sunlight, no सुझाव हैं जारी by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान, यूएसए, लिये the राशि of सूर्य एक्सपोज़र जरूरी to meet vitamin D requirements.
Accordingly, the Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that no synthesis occurs and that all of a person 's vitamin D is from their diet, although कि होगा rarely occur in अभ्यास.
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; और जिससे is the विशिष्ट विटामिन d metabolite कि is measured in सीरम to determine a person 's vitamin D status.
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त, regulating the concentration of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone.
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes, such as the proliferation, differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol भी affects neuromuscular फलन and inflammation.
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the evidence for other health effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
The best evidence of benefit is for bone health और a घटी in mortality in elderly women.
Standard रूप of the आवधिक table.
The colors represent different categories of elements explained below.
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements, organized on the आधार of उनके परमाणु संख्याएँ, electron configurations, and recurring chemical properties.
Elements are प्रस्तुत in order of increasing atomic number ( number of protons ).
The मानक रूप of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main body of elements, positioned above a smaller double row of elements.
The table can also be deconstructed into चार आयताकार blocks : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the middle, and the f-block below that.
The rows of the table are called periods ; the कालम of the s-, d-, और p-blocks are called groups, with some of these having names such as the halogens or the noble gases.
Since, by definition, a periodic table incorporates पुनरावर्ती रुझान, कोई ऐसे तालिका can be प्रयुक्त to derive संबंध between the properties of the elements and predict the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
As a result, a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing रासायनिक बर्ताव, and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences.
Although precursors exist, Dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the प्रकाशन, in 1869, of the first widely recognized periodic table.
He developed his table to illustrate आवधिक रुझान in the properties of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown elements that होता be अपेक्षित to भरण gaps in this table.
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the तत्व in question were subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been विस्तारित और परिष्कृत साथ the डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further नई तत्व and the development of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior.
All elements from atomic numbers 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम मिला to मौजूद naturally, although some are found only in trace amounts and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
The elements after 98 have तभी been synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued, with the सवाल of कैसा the आवधिक table may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have also been produced in laboratories.
Minimum wage by U.S. state and U.S. territory ( American Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, वर्जिन आइलैंड्स ), as of jan. 1, 2013.
in the संयुक्त राज्य, मजदूर हैं generally entitled to be paid no less than the statutory minimum wage.
The federal government mandates a nationwide minimum wage level of $ 7.25 प्रति घंटा, जबकि कुछ राज्य और municipalities have set minimum wage levels higher than the federal level, with the highest state minimum wage being $ 9.19 per hour in Washington as of 2013.
Among those paid by the hour in 2012, 1.6 लाख यहूद reported as earning exactly the prevailing federal minimum wage.
About 2.0 million were reported as earning wages below the minimum.
Together, these 3.6 million मजदूर साथ मजदूरी at or below the minimum made up 4.7 percent of all hourly-paid workers.
A selection of Bourbons and Tennessee whiskeys offered at a liquor स्टोर in decatur, Georgia
Evan विलियम्स bourbon whiskey
Bourbon whiskey is a type of अमरीकी whiskey – a barrel-aged आसुत spirit made primarily from corn.
The name of the spirit derives from its historical association with an area known as Old Bourbon, around what is अभी bourbon County, Kentucky ( which, in turn, was named after the French House of Bourbon royal family ).
It has been produced since the 18th सदी.
While it may be made anywhere in the United States, it is strongly associated with the अमरीकी दक्षिण in सामान्य, and Kentucky in particular.
The Mona Lisa ( La Gioconda or La Joconde ) is a half-length पोर्ट्रेट of a स्त्री by the इतालवी कलाकार Leonardo da Vinci, which has been acclaimed as `` the best known, the most visited, the most written about, the most sung about, the most parodied work of art in the world. ''
The painting, thought to be a पोर्ट्रेट of लिसा gherardini, the wife of Francesco del Giocondo, is in oil on a poplar panel, and is believed to have been painted between 1503 and 1506.
It was acquired by King Francis I of France and is now the property of the French Republic, on स्थाई प्रदर्शक at the musée du louvre in पेरिस चूंकि 1797.
The ambiguity of the subject 's expression, which is frequently described as enigmatic, the monumentality of the composition, the subtle modeling of forms and the atmospheric illusionism were novel qualities that have contributed to the continuing fascination and study of the work.
Robert Allen Palmer ( 19 January 1949 – 26 September 2003 ), was an अंग्रेज़ी singer-songwriter and musician.
He was known for his distinctive voice and the eclectic मिक्सर of musical शैलियाँ on उसके एल्बम, combining soul, jazz, rock, pop, reggae and blues.
He found success both in his solo career and in the musical अधिनियम the Power Station, and had Top 10 songs in both the UK and the US.
His iconic music videos by Terence Donovan for the hits `` Addicted to Love `` and `` Simply Irresistible `` featured identically dressed dancing women with pale faces, dark eye makeup and bright red lipstick, which resembled the women in the आर्ट of पैट्रिक nagel, an कलाकार लोकप्रिय in the 1980s.
sharp-suited, his involvement in the music industry commenced in the 1960s, covered five decades and included a spell with Vinegar Joe.
Palmer received a number of awards throughout his career, including two Grammy पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन पुरूष चट्टान गायन प्रदर्शन, an MTV Video Music Award, and was twice nominated for the Brit Award for Best British Male.
Computed tomography angiography ( CTA ) is a computed tomography technique used to visualize arterial और venous vessels throughout the body.
This ranges from धमनियों सेवारत the brain to those bringing blood to the lungs, kidneys, arms and legs.
The Champs-Élysées decorated with ध्वज लिये bastille Day
Horseman of the French Republican Guard during the 2007 सैन्य परेड on the Champs-Élysées.
Prise de la bastille by jean-pierre-louis-laurent Houel
Bastille Day is the name given in english-speaking देशों to the French National Day, which is celebrated on the 14th of July each year.
In France, it is formally पुकारा la fête nationale ( ; the नेशनल Celebration ) and commonly Le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ).
It commemorates the 1790 Fête de la Fédération, held on the first anniversary of the storming of the Bastille on 14 July 1789 ; the anniversary of the storming of the bastille fortress-prison थी देखी as a symbol of the uprising of the modern nation, and of the reconciliation of all the French inside the constitutional monarchy which preceded the First Republic, during the French Revolution.
festivities और आधिकारिक ceremonies are held all over France.
The oldest and largest regular military parade in Europe is held on the morning of 14 जुलाई, on the champs-élysées एवेन्यू in पेरिस in front of the President of the Republic, French officials and foreign guests.
The United States of America ( यूएसए or u.s.A. ), commonly पुकारा the संयुक्त States ( US or U.S. ) or America, is a federal republic consisting of fifty states and a federal district.
The lower forty-eight contiguous states and the federal district of Washington, D.C. are in central North अमेरिका between कनाडा और Mexico.
The state of Alaska is west of Canada and east of Russia across the Bering Strait, and the state of हवाई is in the mid-North Pacific.
The देश भी रै पाँच populated and nine unpopulated territories in the Pacific and the Caribbean.
At 3.79 million square miles ( 9.83 million km2 ) and with around 315 लाख लोगों, the संयुक्त राज्य is the third- or fourth-largest country by total area and the third-largest by both land area and population.
It is one of the world 's most ethnically diverse and multicultural nations, the product of large-scale आव्रजन इससे अनेक देशों.
The geography and climate of the U.S. is also extremely विविध, साथ रेगिस्तान, plains, forests, and mountains that are home to a wide variety of species.
paleoindians migrated इससे एशिया to कया is अभी the United States mainland around 15,000 years ago.
After 1500, बूढ़ा संसार रोगों introduced by Europeans greatly reduced their populations.
European colonization began around 1600 and came ज़्यादातर इससे England.
The United राज्य उभरा इससे तेरह अंग्रेजों colonies located along the Atlantic seaboard.
Disputes between Great ब्रिटेन और the अमरीकी colonies led to the American Revolution.
On July 4, 1776, delegates from the 13 colonies unanimously जारी the घोषणा of Independence, which established the United States of America.
The American Revolutionary War, which ended with the recognition of independence of the United States from the Kingdom of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, थी the पहला कामयाब युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता against a European colonial empire.
The current संविधान थी अपनाया on सितंबर 17, 1787 ; twenty-seven Amendments have since been added to the Constitution.
The first ten amendments, collectively named the Bill of अधिकारों, यहूद ratified in 1791 and guarantee many fundamental civil rights and freedoms.
Driven by the doctrine of manifest destiny, the United States embarked on a vigorous विस्तार आरपार उत्तर America throughout the 19th century.
This involved displacing देशी जनजातियों, acquiring नई territories, and gradually admitting new states.
The American Civil War ended legalized गुलामी in the United States.
By the end of the उन्नीसवीं सदी, the संयुक्त राज्य extended into the Pacific Ocean, and its economy was the world 's largest.
The Spanish–American युद्ध और पुष्टि the देश 's status as a global military power.
The United States emerged from as a global superpower, the first country with nuclear weapons, और a स्थाई सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Security Council.
The end of the Cold War and the dissolution of the Soviet Union left the संयुक्त राज्य as the एकमात्र महाशक्ति.
The United States is a developed country and has the world 's largest national economy, with an अनुमानित 2012 जीडीपी of $ 15.6 खरब 19 % of वैश्विक जीडीपी at purchasing-power parity, as of 2011.
The per capita GDP of the U.S. was the world 's sixth-highest as of 2010, although America 's wealth inequality was भी क्रमित उच्चतम among oecd देशों by the World Bank.
The economy is fueled by an abundance of natural resources, a well-developed अवसंरचना, और ऊँची उत्पादकता ; और जबकि इसके अर्थव्यवस्था is माना post-industrial it continues to be one of the world 's largest manufacturers.
The country accounts for 39 % of global military spending, and is a leading economic, political, and cultural force in the world, as खूब as a नेता in वैज्ञानिक research and technological innovation.
The NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championship is a single-elimination tournament played each spring in the United States, currently featuring 68 कॉलेज बास्केट टीमों, to determine the national championship of the major college basketball teams.
The tournament, organized by the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ), was created during 1939 by the National Association of Basketball Coaches, and was the विचार of Ohio State University coach Harold Olsen.
Played mostly during March, it is known informally as March Madness or the Big Dance, and has become one of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध सालाना sporting events in the United States.
The NCAA has credited Bob Walsh of the Seattle Organizing कमेटी लिये starting the कूच Madness celebration during 1984.
The tournament teams include champions from 31 प्रभाग i सम्मेलनों ( जिससे प्राप्त स्वचालित बोलियों ), और 37 teams which are awarded at-large berths.
These `` at-large '' टीमों हैं चुनी by an NCAA selection committee, as detailed below.
The 64 teams are divided into four regions and organized into a single elimination `` bracket '', which predetermines, जब a टोली विन्स a game, which team it will face next.
Each team is `` seeded '', or क्रमित, भीतर its region.
After an initial four games between eight lower-ranked teams, the टूर्नामेंट occurs दौरान the कोर्स of three weekends, at pre-selected neutral sites around the United States.
Lower-ranked teams are placed in the bracket विरूद्ध उच्चतर क्रमित टीमों.
Each weekend eliminates three-fourths of the teams, from a round of 64, to a `` Sweet Sixteen '', and for the last weekend of the Tournament a Final Four ; the Final Four is usually played during the first weekend of April.
These four teams, one from each region, then compete in one location for the नेशनल चैंपियनशिप.
The tournament has been at least partially televised चूंकि 1969.
Presently, the games are reported by सीबीएस, TBS, TNT, and truTV by the trade-name NCAA March Madness.
Since 2011, all games are available for viewing देशभर.
As television कवरेज रै grown, so too has the tournament 's popularity.
presently, लाखो of Americans `` fill out a bracket '', predicting winners of all 67 games.
With 11 national शीर्षक, ucla रै the रिकार्ड for the most NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championships ; John Wooden coached UCLA to 10 of its 11 titles.
The University of Kentucky is second, with 8 national titles, while Indiana University and the University of North Carolina are tied for तीसरा साथ 5 नेशनल शीर्षक.
Duke University ranks fifth with 4 national titles.
A sample of synthetic मोटर आयल
Synthetic oil is a lubricant consisting of chemical यौगिकों कि हैं artificially made ( synthesized ).
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using chemically परिवर्धित petroleum components rather than whole crude oil, but can also be synthesized from other raw materials.
Synthetic oil is used as a substitute for lubricant refined इससे पेट्रोलियम when operating in extremes of temperature, because, in general, it provides superior mechanical and chemical properties than those found in traditional mineral oils.
Aircraft jet engines, for example, require the use of synthetic oils, whereas वायुयान पिस्टन इंजन do not.
Jackass is an American वास्तविकता श्रेणी, originally shown on MTV from 2000 to 2002, featuring people performing various dangerous, crude self-injuring stunts and pranks.
The show served as a launchpad for the television and acting careers of Bam Margera, steve-o, और भी जॉनी Knoxville, who previously had only a few minor acting roles.
Since 2002, three Jackass films have been produced and released by MTV corporate sibling सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें, continuing the मताधिकार बाद इसके run on television.
The show sparked several spin-offs सहित चिरायु la bam, wildboyz, Homewrecker, Dr. Steve-O and Blastazoid.
The show placed # 68 on Entertainment साप्ताहिक `` New TV Classics '' list.
Roseanne Cherrie Barr ( born November 3, 1952 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, comedienne, लेखक, टेलीविज़न producer, director, and 2012 presidential nominee of the California -based Peace and Freedom Party.
Barr began her career in stand-up कॉमेडी at क्लब पहले gaining fame for her role in the sitcom Roseanne.
The show was a hit और lasted nine seasons, from 1988 to 1997.
She won both an Emmy and a Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री for her work on the show.
Barr had crafted a `` fierce working-class घरेलू देवी '' persona in the eight years preceding her sitcom and wanted to do a realistic show about a strong mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism.
The granddaughter of immigrants from Europe and Russia, Barr was the oldest of four children in a working-class Jewish Salt Lake नगर परिवार ; वो थी भी क्रियाशील in the LDS Church.
In 1974, she married Bill Pentland, with whom she had three children, before divorcing in 1990 and marrying हास्य tom अर्नाल्ड लिये चार years.
Controversy arose जब वो संग `` the star-spangled Banner `` off-key at a 1990 nationally aired baseball game, followed by grabbing her crotch and spitting.
After her sitcom ended, she launched her own talk show, The roseanne दिखाएँ, जिससे aired इससे 1998 to 2000.
In 2005, she returned to stand-up कॉमेडी साथ a world tour.
In 2011, she starred in an unscripted tv दिखाएँ, roseanne 's nuts, कि lasted from July to September of that year, about her life on a Hawaiian farm.
In जल्दी 2012, Barr announced her candidacy for the Presidential nomination of the Green Party.
Barr lost the नामांकन to Jill Stein.
She then sought the presidential nomination of the Peace and Freedom Party, जिससे वो जीती on अगस्त 4, 2012.
barr प्राप्त 61,971 मत in the general election, placing sixth overall.
Francesco Albani 's 17th century Baptism of मसीह is a ठेठ चित्रण with the sky opening and the Holy Spirit descending as a dove.
The baptism of यीशु marks the शुरूआत of his public ministry.
This event is recorded in the canonical gospels of मैथ्यू, Mark and Luke.
John 's gospel does not describe Jesus ' baptism, but John the Baptist करता गवाही of the अन्य बाते in.
In the New Testament, जॉन the बैपटिस्ट preached the बपतिस्मा of तौबा लिये the remission of पापों ( ), and declared himself a forerunner of he that would baptize `` with the Holy Ghost and with fire '' ( ).
In so doing he was preparing the way for यीशु.
Jesus came to the Jordan River where he was baptized by जॉन.
The baptismal scene includes the आकाश खोलने, a dove-like descent of the Holy Spirit, and a voice from heaven saying, `` This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased. ''
Most modern scholars view the fact that Jesus was baptized by John as an ऐतिहासिक इवेंट to जिससे a ऊँची उपाधि of certainty can be assigned.
Along with the crucifixion of Jesus सबसे विद्वानों दृश्य it as एक of the two historically certain facts about him, and often use it as the starting points for the study of the historical Jesus.
The baptism is one of the five major माइलस्टोन in the इन्जील कथा of the जीवन of यीशु, the अन्य being the Transfiguration, Crucifixion, Resurrection, and Ascension.
Most Christian denominations view the baptism of Jesus as an important event and a basis for the ईसाई रीति of बपतिस्मा ( देखिए भी ).
In Eastern Christianity, Jesus ' baptism is commemorated on 6 January, the feast of Epiphany.
In the Roman Catholic Church, the Anglican Communion, the Lutheran चर्च और कुछ अन्य पश्चिमी denominations, it is recalled on a day within the following week, the feast of the baptism of the Lord.
In Roman catholicism, the बपतिस्मा of Jesus is one of the Luminous Mysteries sometimes added to the Rosary.
It is a Trinitarian feast in the पूर्वी Orthodox Churches.
Methylcobalamin ( दिखाया ) is a form of vitamin B12.
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12, occurring as dark red crystals that freely रूप cherry-colored पारदर्शी समाधान in जल.
Vitamin B12, vitamin b12 or विटामिन b-12, भी पुकारा cobalamin, is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the brain and nervous system, and for the formation of blood.
It is एक of the eight B vitamins.
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body, विशेषकर affecting डीएनए synthesis and regulation, but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production.
neither fungi, plants, nor animals are capable of producing vitamin B12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the एंजाइमों required for its synthesis, although many foods are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally complicated vitamin and can be उत्पादित industrially तभी through बैक्टीरियल fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a क्लास of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), all of which have vitamin activity.
It contains the biochemically विरल तत्व cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by जीवाणु ( जिससे प्रायः उपज hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन conversion between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body.
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in nature, लकिन is उत्पादित इससे बैक्टीरियल hydroxocobalamin और तब प्रयुक्त in अनेक दवाएँ and supplements, and as a food additive, because of its stability and lower production cost.
In the body it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the साइनाइड, albeit in minimal विशेषज्ञता.
अधिक recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements.
The अतिरिक्त यूटिलिटी of ये is currently debated.
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia, which is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the पेट जिम्मेदार लिये secreting मूलभूत factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal अवशोषण of b12, so a कमी of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर, as देखी in pernicious anemia, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency and their biochemical effects have since been elucidated.
Full Metal Jacket is a 1987 युद्ध फिल्मी उत्पादित, निर्देशित और co-written by Stanley Kubrick.
It is an adaptation of Gustav Hasford 's 1979 novel The Short-Timers and stars Matthew Modine, विंसेंट d'onofrio, R. Lee Ermey, Arliss Howard, and Adam Baldwin.
The फिल्मी फ़ॉलो a प्लाटून of u.S. Marines through their training and the experiences of two of the platoon 's Marines in the Tet Offensive during the Vietnam War.
The film 's title refers to the full metal jacket गोली प्रयुक्त by infantry riflemen.
The film प्राप्त नाजुक acclaim.
It received an Academy Award nomination for Best Adapted Screenplay लिये kubrick, माइकल Herr and Gustav Hasford.
In 2001, the American Film Institute placed Full मेटल जैकेट at # 95 in their `` AFI 's 100 Years... 100 Thrills `` poll.
TMZ is a celebrity news website कि debuted on नवम्बर 8, 2005.
It was a collaboration between AOL and Telepictures Productions, a division of Warner भाईs., जबतक समय warner divested AOL in 2009.
However, it remained संबद्ध साथ एओएल न्यूज and has the AOL News logo affixed in the upper right corner.
The name TMZ stands for the historic `` studio zone `` or 30-mile zone radius from the चौराहे of वेस्ट बेवर्ली Boulevard and North La Cienega Boulevard in Los Angeles.
TMZ 's managing editor is Harvey Levin, a lawyer-turned-journalist जो थी previously a विधिक विशेषज्ञ लिये the Los Angeles television station KCBS-TV.
The site claims that it does not pay for stories or interviews ; however, Levin has admitted that TMZ does `` sometimes अदा स्त्रोत लिये लीड on कहानियां ''.
Levin has stated कि `` सबकुछ is researched and vetted for accuracy. ''
A companion TV श्रेणी, tmz on TV, debuted on September 10, 2007.
Scream 3 is a 2000 American slasher film created by केविन विलियमसन, directed by Wes Craven and written by Ehren Kruger, starring Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox Arquette and David Arquette.
It was released on February 4, 2000 as the third installment in the Scream film series.
The events of the स्टोरी हैं नियत तीन सालो बाद those of Scream 2 and follows Sidney Prescott ( Campbell ) who has gone into self-imposed isolation following the events of the previous two films but is drawn to Hollywood after a new Ghostface begins killing the cast of the film within a film `` Stab 3 ''.
Scream 3 combines the violence of the slasher genre with comedy and `` whodunit `` mystery while satirizing the cliché of फिल्मी trilogies.
Unlike the पिछला चीख films, वहीँ थी an increased जोर on comedic तत्व और the हिंसा और हॉरर थी reduced in response to increased public scrutiny about violence in media following the Columbine High School massacre.
The फिल्मी थी the concluding chapter of the Scream series until it was revived with a sequel, Scream 4, in 2011.
विलियमसन provided a five-page outline for two sequels to Scream when auctioning his original script, hoping to entice bidders with the potential of buying a franchise.
Williamson 's commitments to other प्रोजेक्ट meant he थी असमर्थ to develop a complete script for Scream 3 and writing duties were undertaken by Ehren Kruger who discarded much of Williamson 's notes.
Craven and Marco Beltrami returned to direct and score the film respectively as they था साथ the पिछला two series entries.
Production was troubled with script rewrites, साथ पृष्ठों sometimes only ready on the day of filming, and scheduling difficulties with the main cast.
चीख 3 performed दोनो financially और critically worse than its preceding films, earning over $ 161 million and with many critics claiming that the film had become what Scream originally `` spoofed ``.
Despite negative criticism the film किया प्राप्त तारीफ़ साथ reviewers कॉलिंग it the perfect end to the Scream trilogy.
As of 2012, the film is currently the number 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in उत्तर America, following Scream at number 1 and Scream 2 at number 2.
The film 's soundtrack was well-received, बिता चौदह सप्ताह on the Billboard 200 and reaching a high of # 32.
Shoulder impingement syndrome, also called painful arc syndrome, supraspinatus syndrome, swimmer 's shoulder, and thrower 's shoulder, is a clinical syndrome which occurs when the tendons of the rotator कफ मांसपेशियां become irritated और inflamed as they pass through the subacromial space, the passage beneath the acromion.
This can result in पीड़ा, weakness and loss of movement at the shoulder.
JLA was a monthly comic book published by DC Comics इससे जनवरी 1997 to अप्रैल 2006 featuring the Justice League.
The colonial history of the United States covers the history of यूरोपीय settlements इससे the प्रारंभ of colonization of America until their incorporation into the United States.
In the late 16th सदी, इंग्लैण्ड, फ़्रांस, स्पेन और the Netherlands launched major colonization programs in eastern North America.
Small early attempts—such as the अंग्रेज़ी खोया उपनिवेश of roanoke —often disappeared ; everywhere the death rate of the first arrivals was very high.
Nevertheless successful colonies were established.
यूरोपीय settlers came from a variety of social and religious groups.
No aristocrats settled permanently, लकिन a क्रमांक of adventurers, सैनिको, किसानो, and tradesmen arrived.
Diversity was an American characteristic as the Dutch of New Netherland, the Swedes and Finns of New Sweden, the English Quakers of पेन्सिलवेनिया, the अंग्रेज़ी puritans of नई इंग्लैण्ड, the अंग्रेज़ी settlers of jamestown, और the `` worthy ग़रीब '' of जॉर्जिया, आए to the new continent and built colonies with distinctive social, religious, political and economic styles.
Occasionally one colony took कंट्रोल of another ( दौरान wars between their European parents ).
Only in Nova Scotia ( now part of Canada ) did the conquerors expel the previous colonists.
Instead they सब जिया पक्ष by side in peace.
There were no प्रमुख सिविल युद्धों among the 13 colonies, and the two chief armed rebellions ( in Virginia in 1676 and in New York in 1689–91 ) were short-lived failures.
Wars between the French and the British—the French and Indian Wars and पिता rale 's युद्ध —were तूल, और शामिल french-support for Wabanaki Confederacy attacks on the frontiers.
By 1760 France थी पराजित और the अंग्रेजों seized its colonies.
The four distinct regions were : New England, the Middle Colonies, the chesapeake खाड़ी colonies ( अपर दक्षिण ) and the Lower South.
Some historians add a fifth region, the frontier, जिससे was never separately organized.
By the time European settlers arrived around 1600–1650, the majority of the Native Americans living in the eastern United States had been decimated by new diseases, introduced to them दशकों पहले by explorers and sailors.
See timeline of Colonial America for list of ऐतिहासिक कार्यक्रम.
Gloria Laura Vanderbilt ( born February 20, 1924 ) is an American कलाकार, लेखक, अभिनेत्री, heiress, और socialite most noted as an early developer of designer blue jeans.
She is a member of the prominent वेंडरबिल्ट परिवार of New York and the mother of CNN 's Anderson Cooper.
Greece ( Romanization of Greek| ), officially the Hellenic Republic ( ' ), is a देश in southeast Europe.
According to the 2011 census, यूनानियों 's जनसांख्यिकी is around 11 million.
Athens is the स्वदेश 's पूंजी and largest city, its urban area also including Piraeus.
Greece is strategically located at the crossroads of Europe, Asia, the Middle East, and Africa, और रै जमीन सीमायें साथ अल्बानियाई, the गणतंत्र of Macedonia and Bulgaria to the north, and Turkey to the northeast.
The Aegean Sea lies to the east of मेनलैंड यूनानियों, the आयोनियन समुद्र to the west, and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
Greece has the 11th longest coastline in the world at in length, featuring a vast number of islands ( approximately 1,400, of which 227 are inhabited ), सहित Crete, the Dodecanese, the Cyclades, and the Ionian Islands among others.
Eighty percent of Greece consists of mountains, of which Mount ओलम्पस is the highest at.
Modern Greece traces its roots to the civilization of Ancient Greece, generally माना the पालना of पश्चिमी civilization.
As such, it is the जन्मस्थान of लोकतंत्र, पश्चिमी दर्शनशास्त्र, the ओलम्पिक खेल, पश्चिमी literature and historiography, political science, major scientific and mathematical principles, and Western drama, including both tragedy and comedy.
This legacy is partly reflected in the seventeen UNESCO World Heritage Sites स्तिथ in यूनानियों, रैंकिंग it 7th in Europe and 13th in the world.
The आधुनिक यूनानी राज्य थी established in 1830, following the Greek War of Independence.
Greece is a founding member of the United Nations, has been a member of what is now the यूरोपीय संघ चूंकि 1981 ( और the eurozone चूंकि 2001 ), and has been a member of NATO since 1952.
Greece is a developed country with an advanced, high-income economy and very high मानकों of living, including the world 's 21st highest quality of life as of 2010.
Greece 's economy is also the largest in the balkans, जहाँ Greece is an important regional investor.
A prime meridian is a meridian, i.e. a line of longitude, at जिससे देशांतर is defined to be 0°.
A prime meridian and its opposite in a 360°-system, the 180th मध्याह्न ( at 180° देशांतर ), form a great circle.
This great circle divides the sphere, e.g. the धरती, into दो बांटती.
If one uses दिशानिर्देश of ईस्ट और वेस्ट इससे a पारिभाषित prime meridian, then they can be called Eastern Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere.
Gerardus Mercator in his Atlas cosmographicae ( 1595 ) उपयोग a प्रधान मध्याह्न कही close to 25°W, passing just to the west of Santa Maria Island in the Atlantic.
His 180th meridian runs along the Strait of anián ( Bering Strait )
A prime meridian is ultimately arbitrary, unlike an equator, which is संकल्पित by the अक्ष of rotation—and various conventions have been used or advocated in different regions and throughout history.
Minka Dumont Kelly ( born Minka Dumont Dufay ; June 24, 1980 ) is an American actress.
She is perhaps best ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ in चार्ली 's फ़रिश्ते, Friday Night Lights, and The Roommate.
R.O.B. ( Robotic Operating Buddy ), released in Japan as the, is an accessory for the Nintendo Entertainment System ( NES ).
It was released in July 1985 in जापानी और later that year in North America.
It had a short उत्पाद जीवनकाल, साथ support लिये तभी two games which comprised the `` Robot Series '' ; Gyromite and Stack-Up.
R.O.B. was released with the intention of portraying the निन्टेंडो entertainment प्रणाली as something novel in order to alleviate retail fears following the video game crash of 1983.
R.O.B. was available in the Deluxe Set, a configuration for the console that included, among अन्य बाते, r.o.b. और gyromite.
Stack-Up was खरीदा separately और included its own physical game pieces.
The Walking स्वतंत्रता हाफ डालर थी a चांदी 50-cent टुकड़ा or हाफ डालर coin issued by the United States Mint from 1916 to 1947 ; it was designed by Adolph A. Weinman.
In 1915, the new Mint Director, रॉबर्ट W. woolley, आए to मानना कि he was not only allowed but required by law to replace coin designs that had been in use for 25 years.
He therefore began the process of replacing the Barber coinage : dimes, quarters and half dollars, all bearing similar designs by long-time मिंट engraver चार्ल्स E. नाई, और पहला struck in 1892.
Woolley था the आयोग of Fine Arts conduct a competition, as a result of which Weinman was selected to design the dime and half dollar.
Weinman 's design of Liberty striding towards the Sun लिये the हाफ डालर proved difficult to perfect, and Treasury Secretary William G. McAdoo, whose department included the Mint, considered having Barber create his own design.
Mint officials were successful in getting Weinman 's design into production, although it never struck very well, which may have been a factor in इसके बदलना by the फ्रैंकलिन हाफ डालर शुरूआत in 1948.
Nevertheless, art historian Cornelius Vermeule considered the piece to be among the सबसे खूबसूरत US coins.
Since 1986, a परिवर्धन of weinman 's obverse डिज़ाइन has been used for the American Silver Eagle.
The Toyota 4Runner is a mid-size खेल यूटिलिटी vehicle ( SUV ) produced by the Japanese manufacturer Toyota and sold throughout the world from 1984 to present.
In Japan it was known as the Toyota Hilux लहरे.
The original 4Runner was a compact SUV and little more than a Toyota pickup truck with a fiberglass shell over the bed, but the model has since undergone significant स्वतंत्र विकास into a क्रॉस between a compact and a mid-size SUV.
All 4Runners have been built at Toyota 's Tahara संयंत्र in Tahara, Aichi, Japan, or at Hino Motors ' Hamura, Japan plant, and in Brazil.
Its mid-size crossover एसयूवी बंटवारा is the Toyota Highlander.
This article deals with medicine as practiced by प्रशिक्षित पेशेवर from ancient times to the present.
The प्राचीन उन्होंने था a प्रणाली of medicine that was very advanced for its time and influenced later medical traditions.
The Egyptians and Babylonians both introduced the concepts of diagnosis, prognosis, and medical examination.
The Greeks went even further, and उन्नत as खूब चिकित्सा ethics.
The Hippocratic Oath, still लिया by डॉक्टर आज, was written in Greece in the 5th century BCE.
In the medieval era, surgical practices inherited from the ancient masters were improved and then systematized in rogerius 's The Practice of Surgery.
Universities began systematic training of physicians around the सालो 1220 in इटली.
During the Renaissance, understanding of anatomy improved, and the सूक्ष्मदर्शी थी invented.
the रोगाणु सिद्धान्त of बीमारी in the 19th century led to cures for many infectious diseases.
Military डॉक्टर उन्नत the विधि of trauma treatment and surgery.
Public health उपायों यहूद विकसित विशेषकर in the 19th century as the rapid growth of cities required systematic sanitary measures.
Advanced research centers opened in the जल्दी 20th century, often connected with major hospitals.
The mid-20th सदी थी characterized by new biological treatments, such as antibiotics.
These advancements, along with developments in रसायन, आनुवंशिकी, and lab technology ( such as the x-ray ) led to modern medicine.
Medicine was heavily professionalized in the 20th century, and new careers opened to women as nurses ( from the 1870s ) and as physicians ( especially after 1970 ).
The 21st century is characterized by very उन्नत शोध involving numerous fields of science.
The Hippocratic Corpus, is a collection of early medical works from ancient Greece strongly associated with the ancient Greek physician हिपोक्रेटिस और उसके शिक्षाओं.
Potassium is a chemical element with symbol K ( from neo-latin kalium ) and atomic number 19.
Elemental potassium is a soft silvery-white alkali metal that oxidizes rapidly in air and is very reactive with water, generating sufficient heat to ignite the हाइड्रोजन उत्सर्जित in the प्रतिक्रिया और burning साथ a lilac ज्वाला.
Because potassium and sodium are chemically very similar, their लवण यहूद नहीं at पहला differentiated.
The existence of multiple elements in their salts was suspected from 1702, and this was proven in 1807 जब पोटैशियम और सोडियम were individually isolated from different salts by electrolysis.
Potassium in nature occurs तभी in ionic salts.
As such, it is found dissolved in seawater ( which is 0.04 % potassium by weight ), और is भाग of अनेक खनिज.
Most औद्योगिक रासायनिक applications of potassium employ the relatively high solubility in water of potassium compounds, such as potassium soaps.
Potassium metal has only a few special applications, being replaced in most रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ with sodium metal.
Potassium ions हैं जरुरी for the function of all living cells.
Potassium ion diffusion is a कुंजी यांत्रिकी in nerve transmission, and potassium depletion in animals, including humans, results in various cardiac dysfunctions.
Potassium accumulates in plant cells, and thus fresh fruits and सब्जियां हैं a शुभ dietary सोर्स of it.
Conversely, most plants except specialist halophytes are असहिष्णु of नमक, और सोडियम is उपस्थित in उन्हें only in low concentration.
This resulted in potassium first being isolated from potash, the ashes of पौधे, giving the तत्व इसके नाम.
For the same reason, heavy crop production rapidly depletes soils of potassium, and agricultural fertilizers consume 95 % of वैश्विक पोटैशियम रासायनिक production.
The Singapore dollar or dollar ( sign : $ ; कोड : sgd ) is the official currency of Singapore.
It is सामान्यतः abbreviated साथ the डालर sign $, or alternatively S $ to distinguish it from other dollar -denominated currencies.
it is विभाजित into 100 cents.
The Monetary Authority of Singapore and the Brunei Currency and Monetary Board still maintain the ऐतिहासिक exchangeability of उनके दो मुद्राएँ, the Singaporean dollar and the Brunei dollar, respectively.
The dollar is accepted as `` customary tender '' in Brunei according to the करेंसी interchangeability Agreement.
Likewise, the ब्रुनेई डालर is customarily accepted in Singapore
James Samuel Coleman ( May 12, 1926 – March 25, 1995 ) was an अमरीकी समाजशास्त्री, theorist और अनुभवजन्य researcher, based chiefly at the University of Chicago.
He was elected president of the अमरीकी समाजशास्त्रीय Association.
कोलमैन पढ़ाई the समाजशास्त्र of शिक्षा, पब्लिक policy, and was one of the earliest users of the term `` social capital ``.
His Foundations of Social Theory influenced समाजशास्त्रीय सिद्धान्त.
His The adolescent समाज ( 1961 ) और `` कोलमैन रपट '' ( Equality of Educational Opportunity, 1966 ) were two of the most heavily cited books in educational sociology.
The landmark Coleman Report helped transform educational theory, reshape national education policies, and influenced public and scholarly opinion regarding the role of schooling in determining समता और उत्पादकता in the संयुक्त States.
Superman ( from DC comics ) थी the first superhero created, art by Jim Lee.
A superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or सुपर नायिका ) is a type of stock character possessing `` extraordinary or superhuman powers '' and dedicated to protecting the public.
Since the debut of the prototypical सुपरहीरो सुपरमैन in 1938, stories of superheroes—ranging from brief episodic adventures to continuing years-long sagas—have dominated American comic books and crossed over into other media.
The word itself तिथियाँ to at least 1917.
A female superhero is sometimes called a superheroine ( also rendered super-heroine or सुपर नायिका ).
`` SUPER HEROES '' is a trademark co-owned by dc कॉमिक्स और आश्चर्य Comics.
By most definitions, characters do not strictly require actual superhuman शक्तियां to be deemed superheroes, हालांकि शर्तें ऐसे as costumed अपराधों सेनानी or नकाबपोश vigilantes are sometimes used to refer to those such as Batman and Green Arrow without such powers who share other common superhero traits.
Such characters were generally referred to as `` रहस्य मेन '' in the so-called सुनहरी Age of Comic Books to distinguish them from characters with super-powers.
Normally, superheroes use their powers to counter day-to-day crime while also combating खतरे विरूद्ध मानवता by supervillains, their criminal counterparts.
Often, one of these supervillains will be the सुपरहीरो 's archenemy.
As well, some longrunning superheroes, ऐसे as सुपरमैन, Batman, Spider-Man and Iron Man each has a rogues gallery of enemies.
As well, superheroes sometimes will combat such irregular threats as aliens, magical/ काल्पनिक entities, अमरीकी युद्ध दुश्मनों ऐसे as नात्सीवाद or communism, and godlike or demonic creatures.

The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont and starring Tim रॉबिन्स और मॉर्गन फ्रीमैन.
Adapted from the Stephen King novella रीता hayworth और shawshank मोचन, the फिल्मी tells the story of Andy Dufresne, a banker who spends nearly two decades in Shawshank State Prison for the murder of his wife and her lover despite his claims of innocence.
During his time at the prison, he befriends a fellow inmate, Ellis Boyd `` रेड '' redding, और पाता खुद सुरक्षित by the गार्ड after the warden begins using him in his money laundering operation.
Despite a lukewarm box office reception that barely recouped its budget, the film received favorable reviews from critics, multiple award nominations, और रै चूंकि enjoyed a उल्लेखनीय जीवन on केबल टेलीविज़न, VHS, DVD, and Blu-ray.
It was included in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's 100 सालो... 100 फिल्मों 10th Anniversary Edition.
IT management is the discipline whereby all of the technology resources of a firm are managed in accordance साथ its needs and priorities.
These resources may include tangible investments like computer hardware, software, data, networks and data centre facilities, as well as the staffs जो are hired to maintain them.
Managing this responsibility within a company entails many of the basic management functions, like budgeting, staffing, and organizing and controlling, along with other aspects that are अद्वितीय to प्रौद्योगिकी, जैसे बदलें प्रबन्धन, software design, network planning, tech support etc.
The Penitentiary of New Mexico Prison Riot, which took place on February 2 and 3, 1980, in the state 's maximum security prison दक्षिण of सांता fe, थी एक of the सबसे हिंसक थाना दंगे in the इतिहास of the अमरीकी correctional system : 33 inmates died and more than 200 inmates were treated for injuries.
None of the 12 officers taken hostage were killed, but seven were treated for injuries caused by beatings और rapes.
This was the third major riot at the NM राज्य penitentiary, the first occurring on 19 July 1922 and the second on 15 June 1953.
Author Roger Morris suggests the death toll may have महरूम उच्चतर, as a क्रमांक of लाशें यहूद incinerated or dismembered during the course of the mayhem.

The Northern Cardinal ( Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a उत्तर अमरीकी बर्ड in the genus Cardinalis ; it is also known colloquially as the redbird or common cardinal.
It can be found in दक्षिणी कनाडा, through the eastern United States from Maine to Texas and south through Mexico.
It is found in woodlands, gardens, shrublands, and swamps.
The उत्तरी कार्डिनल is a mid-sized songbird with a body length of 21 centimeters ( 8.3 inches ).
It has a distinctive crest on the head and a mask on the face which is black in the male and gray in the female.
The male is a vibrant red, जबकि the मादा is a dull red-brown shade.
The Northern Cardinal is मुख्यतः granivorous, but also feeds on insects and fruit.
The male behaves territorially, अंकन out his territory with song.
During courtship, the male feeds seed to the मादा beak-to-beak.
A clutch of three to four eggs is laid, and two to चार clutches are produced each year.
It was once prized as a pet, but its sale as cage birds is now banned in the United States by the migratory बर्ड सन्धि अधिनियम of 1918.
Surface runoff, also called nonpoint सोर्स प्रदूषण, इससे a फार्म फ़ील्ड in आयोवा during a rain storm.
Topsoil as well as farm fertilizers and other potential pollutants run बंद unprotected फार्म फ़ील्ड जब भारी rains occur.
Topsoil is the अपर, outermost layer of soil, usually the top to.
It रै the उच्चतम विशेषज्ञता of सशुल्क पदार्थ and microorganisms and is where most of the Earth 's biological soil activity occurs.

Note that the notes do not come in स्पेलिंग अनुक्रम लकिन हैं सब adjacent ( not separated by other notes ).
Sechs kleine Klavierstücke, Op. 19 ( or Six Little Piano Pieces ) is a set of pieces for solo piano written by the Austrian composer Arnold Schoenberg, published in 1913.
McAfee, Inc. ( ) is an American global computer सुरक्षा software company headquartered in Santa Clara, California, and the world 's largest dedicated security technology company.
as of फ़रवरी 28, 2011, McAfee is a wholly owned subsidiary of Intel.
McAfee 's competitors in the antivirus industry are Avira, bitdefender, bullguard, f-secure, frisk, Kaspersky, Symantec, and Trend Micro to name a few.
Saint Rita of Cascia ( Born Margherita Lotti 1381 - may 22, 1457 ) थी an इतालवी augustinian nun, widow and saint venerated in the Roman Catholic Church.
रीता थी शादीशुदा at an early age.
The विवाह lasted लिये 18 सालो, दौरान जिससे वो is remembered लिये her Christian values as a model wife and mother who made efforts to convert her husband from his abusive behavior.
Upon the murder of her husband by another feuding family, वो sought to dissuade her sons from revenge.
She subsequently joined an Augustinian community of religious sisters, where she was known for practicing mortification of the flesh, along with the apparent efficacy of her prayers.
St. Rita is venerated due to various miracles attributed to her intercession, and is often portrayed with a bleeding wound on her forehead, which the Roman Catholic Church claims to have been a partial stigmata.
The Roman Catholic Church, under the pontificate of Pope Leo XIII officially canonized Rita on May 24, 1900, while her feast day is मनाये प्रत्येक may 22.
In many pious Catholic countries, Rita is known to be a patroness लिये abused पत्नियां and mourning women.
North America is a महाद्वीप wholly भीतर the उत्तरी Hemisphere and almost wholly within the Western Hemisphere.
It is also considered a northern उपमहाद्वीप of the Americas.
It is bordered to the north by the Arctic Ocean, to the east by the Atlantic समंदर, to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण by the प्रशांत समंदर, और to the southeast by South America and the Caribbean Sea.
North America covers an area of about 24,709,000 वर्गाकार किलोमीटर ( 9,540,000 square miles ), about 4.8 % of the planet 's surface or about 16.5 % of its land area.
As of July 2008, its population was estimated at nearly 529 million people आरपार 23 स्वतंत्र राज्य, representing परिचय 7.5 % of the human population.
North America is the third-largest continent in area, following Asia and Africa, and the fourth in जनसांख्यिकी बाद एशिया, अफ़्रीकी, और यूरोपीय.
The first people to live in North America were Paleoindians who began to arrive दौरान the पिछला glacial period by crossing the Bering land bridge.
They differentiated into a number of diverse संस्कृतियों और communities across the continent.
The largest and most advanced Pre-Columbian सभ्यताओं in उत्तर अमेरिका यहूद the aztecs in what is now Mexico and the Mayans in Central America.
European colonists began to arrive starting in the 16th और 17th centuries, wiping out large numbers of the native populations and beginning an era of European dominance.
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born January 28, 1985 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम J. कोल, is an American hip-hop recording artist and record producer from Fayetteville, North Carolina.
In 2009, he became the first artist to sign to Jay-Z 's Roc Nation label.
His long-awaited डेब्यू एल्बम, हकदार कोल संसार : The Sideline Story, was released on September 27, 2011.
The album debuted at number one on the US बिलबोर्ड 200, शीर्ष r & B Albums and Top Rap Albums chart, selling more than 218,000 in its first week.
He received a nomination for Best नई कलाकार at the 54th Grammy Awards.

Ratchet & Clank is a series of मंच वीडियो games.
The franchise was created and विकसित by insomniac खेल और प्रकाशित by सोनी कंप्यूटर Entertainment for many different PlayStation consoles, such as PlayStation 2 and PlayStation 3 with the exclusion of Size Matters and Secret Agent Clank, which were developed by High Impact Games for the PlayStation Portable.
Every game in the series has been released for every console, as the ip is स्वामित्व by Sony Computer Entertainment.
An animated feature film adaptation produced by Rainmaker Entertainment and Blockade Entertainment is अनुसूचित लिये a नाट्य रिलीज sometime in 2015.
The games take place in a science fiction setting and follow the adventures of Ratchet ( an animalistic human-like अक्षर ज्ञात as a lombax, who is a mechanic ) and Clank ( a diminutive, sentient robot ) as they travel through the universe, saving it from evil forces on a regular basis.
The series is noted for the inclusion of many exotic and unique, over the top weapons and devices, a concept कि insomniac खेल भी विस्तारित into their other games.
A will or testament is a legal declaration by which a person, the testator, names one or more persons to मैनेज his/her एस्टेट और provides लिये the transfer of his property at death.
For the devolution of प्रॉपर्टी नहीं disposed of by होगा, see inheritance and intestacy.
In the strictest sense, a `` will '' has historically been सीमित to रियल प्रॉपर्टी जबकि `` वसीयत '' applies तभी to dispositions of निजी property ( thus giving rise to the popular title of the document as `` Last Will and Testament '' ), though this distinction is seldom observed today.
A will may also create a testamentary trust that is प्रभावी तभी बाद the मौत of the testator.
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can supply शक्ति 24 घंटों a day.
Solar energy, radiant light and heat from the sun, has been harnessed by humans since ancient times using a दायरा of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies include solar heating, solar photovoltaics, solar thermal electricity, solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis, which can make considerable योगदान to solving कुछ of the सबसे तात्कालिक उर्जा समस्याएं the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or active solar depending on the way they capture, convert and distribute सौर उर्जा.
Active solar techniques include the use of photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing गुण, और डिजाइनिंग spaces that naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी कहा कि `` the विकास of affordable, inexhaustible and clean solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous, inexhaustible and mostly import-independent resource, enhance sustainability, reduce प्रदूषण, निम्नतर the लागत of mitigating जलवायु बदलें, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
These लाभ are global.
hence the अतिरिक्त costs of the incentives for early deployment should be considered learning investments ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
Sir थामस अधिक ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 14786 जुलाई 1535 ), known to Roman Catholics as Saint Thomas More since 1935, was an English lawyer, social philosopher, author, statesman, and noted Renaissance humanist.
He was an important councillor to Henry VIII of England and was Lord चांसलर इससे अक्तूबर 1529 to 16 may 1532.
He was canonized by Pope Pius XI in 1935 as one of the early martyrs of the schism that separated the Church of इंग्लैण्ड इससे रोम in the 16th century.
In 2000, Pope John Paul II declared him patron of Catholic statesmen और राजनेता.
More was an opponent of the प्रोटोस्टेंट reformation, in particular of Martin Luther and William Tyndale.
However, चूंकि 1980, he is भी commemorated by the Church of England as a reformation martyr.
More coined the word `` utopia `` – a name he gave to the ideal and imaginary island nation, the political system of which he described in यूटोपिया, प्रकाशित in 1516.
he opposed the किंग 's विरह इससे the Roman Catholic Church and refused to accept him as Supreme Head of the Church of England, a title which had been given by parliament through the Act of Supremacy of 1534.
He was imprisoned in 1534 for his refusal to take the oath required by the First Succession Act, because the अधिनियम disparaged papal प्राधिकार और henry’s विवाह to Catherine of Aragon.
In 1535, he was tried for treason, convicted on perjured गवाही, और beheaded.
More also helped to originate the phrase `` grasp at लोभी '' to mean `` desperately trying even useless things '', in his Dialogue of Comfort Against Tribulation.
Intellectuals and कूटनीतिज्ञों आरपार यूरोपीय यहूद stunned by More 's execution.
Erasmus saluted him as one `` whose soul was more pure than any snow, whose प्रतिभाशाली थी ऐसे कि इंग्लैण्ड never had and never again will have its like ''.
There was a more controversial side to More 's life, because he advocated the persecution and निष्पादन of protestants who refused to recant their faith.
However, the judgement of history has been largely willing to forgive इस in लाइट of the टाइम्स he जिया in और उसके martyrdom in the Roman Catholic cause.
Two centuries later Jonathan Swift said More was `` the व्यक्ति of the महानतम पुण्य इस किंगडम कभी उत्पादित '', a sentiment with which Samuel Johnson agreed.
Historian Hugh Trevor-Roper said in 1977 that More थी `` the पहला ग्रेट अंग्रेज जिसको we महसूस that we know, the most saintly of humanists, the most human of saints, the universal man of our cool northern renaissance. ''
Captain Nemo, also known as Prince Dakkar, is a fictional character invented by the फ्रेंच विज्ञान fiction लेखक Jules Verne.
Nemo appears in two of Verne 's novels, Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the समुद्र ( 1870 ) और the रहस्यमय द्वीप ( 1874 ), और makes a cameo appearance in Verne 's play Journey Through the Impossible ( 1882 ).
nemo, एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध antiheroes in fiction, is a mysterious figure.
The son of an Indian Raja, he is a scientific genius who roams the depths of the समुद्र in उसके पनडुब्बी, the Nautilus, which was built on a deserted island.
Nemo tries to project a stern, controlled confidence, but he is driven by a thirst for प्रतिशोध और a द्वेष of साम्राज्यवाद ( particularly the British Empire ).
He is also wracked by remorse over the deaths of his crew members और भी by the मौतों of दुश्मन sailors.
Nemo has appeared in विभिन्न adaptations of वर्न 's novels, सहित films, जहाँ he has been portrayed by a number of different actors.
He has furthermore been adopted by other authors for inclusion in their novels, most notably in Alan Moore 's The League of असाधारण सज्जनों और फिलिप जोस किसान 's the Other Log of Phileas Fogg.

ध्वनिक coupler modem
A modem ( modulator-demodulator ) is a device that modulates an analog वाहक सिग्नल to encode डिजिटल सूचना, and also demodulates such a carrier signal to decode the transmitted information.
The goal is to produce a signal that can be transmitted easily और decoded to reproduce the original digital data.
Modems can be used over any means of transmitting एनालॉग सिग्नल, इससे लाइट emitting diodes to radio.
The most familiar example is a voice band modem that turns the digital data of a personal कंप्यूटर into modulated विद्युत सिग्नल in the आवाज़ आवृत्ति range of a telephone channel.
These signals can be transmitted over telephone lines and demodulated by another modem at the receiver पक्ष to रिकवर the डिजिटल आंकड़ा.
Modems are generally classified by the amount of data they can send in a given unit of time, usually expressed in bits प्रति दूसरी ( bit/s, or bps ), or बाइट्स प्रति second ( B/s ).
modems can alternatively be classified by their symbol rate, measured in baud.
The baud unit denotes symbols per second, or the क्रमांक of टाइम्स per second the modem sends a new signal.
For example, the ITU V.21 standard used audio आवृत्ति shift keying with two possible frequencies corresponding to two distinct symbols ( or one bit per symbol ), to carry 300 bits per second using 300 baud.
By contrast, the original ITU V.22 standard, which was able to transmit and receive चार पृथक symbols ( two bits per symbol ), handled 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 symbols per second ( 600 baud ) using phase shift keying.
The Declaration of Independence is a statement adopted by the Continental Congress on जुलाई 4, 1776, जिससे घोषित कि the तेरह अमरीकी colonies, तब at war with Great Britain, regarded themselves as independent states, and no longer a part of the British Empire.
बजाय वे अभी formed a new nation—the United States of America.
John Adams was a leader in pushing for independence, जिससे थी unanimously स्वीकृत on July 2.
A committee had already drafted the औपचारिक घोषणा, to be ready when congress voted on independence.
Adams persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to लिखें the असली ड्राफ्ट of the दस्तावेज़, which congress would edit to produce the final version.
The Declaration was ultimately a formal explanation of क्यों कॉंग्रेस था voted on जुलाई 2 to घोषित independence from Great Britain, more than a year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War.
The national birthday, the स्वतंत्रता दिन is मनाये on जुलाई 4, although Adams wanted July 2.
After ratifying the text on July 4, Congress issued the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in अनेक फ़ॉर्म.
It was initially published as the printed डनलप broadside कि was widely distributed and read to the public.
The most famous version of the Declaration, a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता, is displayed at the National Archives in Washington, D.C.
Although the wording of the घोषणा थी स्वीकृत on July 4, the date of its signing was August 2.
The original July 4 United States Declaration of Independence manuscript was lost while all other copies have been derived from इस असली दस्तावेज़.
The sources and निर्वचन of the Declaration have been the subject of much scholarly inquiry.
The Declaration justified the स्वतंत्रता of the संयुक्त राज्य by लिस्टिंग colonial grievances against King George III, and by asserting certain natural and legal rights, including a right of revolution.
Having served its original purpose in announcing स्वतंत्रता, the text of the Declaration was initially ignored after the American Revolution.
Since then, it has come to be considered a major statement on human अधिकारों, विशेषकर इसके दूसरी sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal, that they are endowed by उनके निर्माता साथ निश्चित unalienable अधिकारों, कि among ये हैं जीवन, स्वतंत्रता और the pursuit of Happiness.
This has been called `` one of the best-known sentences in the English language '', containing `` the most potent and consequential शब्द in अमरीकी history. ''
the ड्योढ़ी आए to represent a moral standard to which the United States should strive.
This view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln, who considered the Declaration to be the foundation of his political philosophy, and argued that the Declaration is a बयान of सिद्धान्त through जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution should be interpreted.
it रै प्रेरित कार्य for the rights of marginalized people throughout the world.
The Economy of Greenland can be characterized as छोटी, मिश्रित and vulnerable.
The present economy consists of a big public sector and व्यापक विदेशी व्यापार, जिससे रै resulted in an अर्थव्यवस्था साथ अवधि of दमदार विकास, considerable inflation, unemployment problems and extreme dependence on capital inflow from Denmark and use of outside, mainly Danish, skilled labor.
GDP per capita is similar to the average European economies but the economy is critically dependent upon substantial support इससे the डैनिश सरकारी, जिससे आपूर्तियाँ परिचय हाफ the revenues of the home rule government who in turn employ about 8,000 Greenlanders out of a labor force of 40,156 ( Jan. 2012 ).
बेरोजगारी nonetheless remains ऊँची, with the rest of the economy dependent upon demand for exports of shrimp and fish.
Hydrogen is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ symbol H and atomic number 1.
With an atomic weight of ( लिये hydrogen-1 ), हाइड्रोजन is the lightest element and its monatomic form ( H1 ) is the most abundant chemical substance, constituting roughly 75 % of the Universe 's baryonic mass.
Non- remnant सितारों हैं mainly composed of hydrogen in its plasma state.
At standard temperature and pressure, हाइड्रोजन is a colorless, odorless, tasteless, non-toxic, nonmetallic, highly combustible diatomic gas with the molecular formula H2.
Most of the hydrogen on Earth is in molecules such as water और सशुल्क यौगिकों क्युकी हाइड्रोजन readily फ़ॉर्म covalent compounds with most non-metallic elements.
Hydrogen plays a particularly important role in acid-base chemistry with many reactions exchanging protons between घुलनशील अणुओं.
In ionic compounds, it can take a negative charge ( an anion known as a hydride and written as H− ), or as a positively charged species H+.
The latter cation is written as though रचित of a bare प्रोटॉन, लकिन in वास्तविकता, हाइड्रोजन cations in ionic compounds always occur as more complex species.
The most common isotope of hydrogen is protium ( name rarely प्रयुक्त, प्रतीक 1H ) with a single proton and no neutrons.
As the simplest atom known, the हाइड्रोजन अणु रै been of theoretical use.
लिये उदाहरण, as the तभी न्यूट्रल atom with an analytic solution to the Schrödinger equation, the study of the energetics and bonding of the hydrogen atom played a key role in the development of quantum mechanics.
Hydrogen gas was first artificially produced in the early 16th century, via the mixing of metals with acids.
In 1766–81, Henry Cavendish was the first to recognize that hydrogen gas was a discrete पदार्थ, और कि it produces जल जब burned, a प्रॉपर्टी जिससे बाद दिया it इसके नाम : in Greek, hydrogen means `` water-former ''.
Industrial production is mainly from the steam reforming of प्राकृतिक गैस, और कम प्रायः from more energy-intensive hydrogen production methods like the electrolysis of water.
Most hydrogen is employed near its production site, with the two largest uses being fossil fuel प्रसंस्करण ( e.g., hydrocracking ) and ammonia production, mostly for the fertilizer market.
Hydrogen is a चिंता in metallurgy as it can embrittle many metals, complicating the design of pipelines and storage tanks.
Unstoppable is a 2010 American action thriller film directed by Tony Scott, लिखा by चिह्नित bomback, और अभिनीत डेंज़ल वॉशिंगटन and Chris Pine.
The film, loosely based on the real-life CSX 8888 incident, tells the story of a runaway freight train, and the two men ( Washington and Pine ) who manage to stop it.
It was स्कॉट 's फाइनल विशेषता film before his death in 2012.
The film was released in the United States and Canada on November 12, 2010, और in the संयुक्त किंगडम on नवम्बर 24, 2010.
It received mostly favorable reviews from film critics ; it garnered a `` certified भैस '' दरजा on सड़े टमाटर based upon aggregated reviews and a rating of `` Generally favorable reviews '' at Metacritic.
The film was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Sound Editing at the 83rd Academy पुरस्कार, लकिन खोया to inception.
In photography, bracketing is the general technique of taking several गोलियाँ of the वही विषय using अलग camera settings.
Bracketing is useful and often recommended in situations that make it difficult to obtain a संतोषजनक चित्र साथ a सिंगल शॉट, विशेषकर जब a small variation in exposure parameters has a comparatively large effect on the resulting image.
Autobracketing is automatic bracketing by using a setting on the camera to take several bracketed गोलियाँ ( in contrast to the photographer altering the settings by hand between each shot ).
Given the time it takes to accomplish multiple shots, it is typically, but नहीं सदा, प्रयुक्त लिये स्थिर subjects.
Insulated glazing ( IG ), more commonly known as double glazing ( or double-pane, and increasingly triple glazing/pane ) are double or triple glass window panes अलग by an एयर or अन्य gas filled space to reduce heat transfer across a part of the building envelope.
insulated कांच इकाई हैं manufactured with glass in range of thickness from 3 mm to 10 mm or more in special applications.
Laminated or tempered कांच may भी be used as part of the construction.
Most units are manufactured with the वही मोटाई of कांच प्रयुक्त on दोनो panes लकिन खास अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as acoustic attenuation or security may require wide ranges of thicknesses to be incorporated in the same unit.
A sectioned diagram of a fixed Insulated Glazed Unit ( igu ), indicating the क्रमांकन सम्मेलन प्रयुक्त in इस article.
Surface # 1 is facing बाहर, सतह # 2 is the अंदर सतह of the exterior pane, Surface # 3 is the outside surface of the interior pane, and Surface # 4 is the inside surface of interior pane.
The window frame is labelled # 5, a spacer is indicated as # 6, seals हैं दिखाया in रेड ( # 7 ), the internal reveal is on the right hand side ( # 8 ) and the exterior windowsill on the left ( # 9 )
To reduce shear effects on the sealed unit ( a major cause of premature failure ), manufacturers use a rule of thumb that permits a difference of 1 mm between the thickness of the panes of कांच प्रयुक्त in the ईकाई and still maintain the warranty for the unit.
For example, a unit may be ordered with a 4 mm pane on the exterior और a 3 mm फलक on the interior.
These variations are allowed for architectural and cost reasons.
Other combinations can be निर्दिष्ट और उत्पादित लकिन the manufacturer may reserve the right to limit the term of the warranty or refuse to warranty the unit altogether.
For ease of description the surfaces of a double paned ईकाई हैं नामित according to the following सम्मेलन : सतह # 1 ( facing outside ), Surface # 2 ( inside of outside pane ), Surface # 3 ( outside of inside pane ) and Surface # 4 ( inside surface of inside pane ).
applying the सम्बन्धित nomenclature for triple paned units results in surfaces # 1 through # 6.
