A typical installation of insulated glazing खिड़कियाँ with uPVC window frames.
Selenium is a रासायनिक तत्व with symbol Se and atomic number 34.
it is a अधातु with properties that are intermediate between those of its periodic table column-adjacent chalcogen elements sulfur and tellurium.
It rarely occurs in its elemental राज्य in प्रकृति, or as pure ore compounds.
Selenium ( Greek σελήνη selene अर्थ `` चंद्रमा '' ) थी खोजा in 1817 by Jöns Jacob Berzelius, who noted the similarity of the new element to the previously-known tellurium ( named for the Earth ).
Selenium is found impurely in metal sulfide ores, जहाँ it partially replaces the sulfur.
Commercially, selenium is produced as a byproduct in the refining of these ores, सबसे प्रायः दौरान तांबे production.
Minerals that हैं pure selenide or selenate यौगिकों are known, but are rare.
The chief commercial uses for selenium today are in glassmaking और in pigments.
सेलेनियम is a सेमीकंडक्टर और is used in photocells.
Uses in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स, once important, have been mostly supplanted by silicon semiconductor devices.
Selenium continues to be used in a few प्रकार of dc शक्ति surge protectors और one type of fluorescent quantum dot.
Selenium salts are toxic in large amounts, but ट्रेस amounts हैं जरुरी लिये सेल्यूलर function in many organisms, including all animals.
Selenium is a component of the antioxidant enzymes glutathione peroxidase and thioredoxin reductase ( जिससे indirectly reduce निश्चित oxidized अणुओं in animals and some plants ).
It is also found in three deiodinase enzymes, which बदलें एक थायराइड हार्मोन to another.
Selenium requirements in plants differ by species, with some पौधे requiring अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts, and others apparently requiring none.
The संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 2008 was the 56th quadrennial presidential election.
It थी आयोजित on मंगलवार, November 4, 2008.
Democrat Barack Obama, then the junior सीनेटर इससे Illinois, defeated Republican John McCain, the senior Senator from Arizona.
As the campaign progressed, the युद्ध in इराकी और outgoing रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश था become increasingly unpopular, and the major-party candidates ran on a platform of change and reform.
Domestic policy and the economy eventually emerged as the main themes in the last few months of the चुनाव अभियान after the onset of the worst recession since the 1930s.
Obama would go on to जीत a निर्णायक victory over McCain in both the electoral and popular vote.
Obama received the most votes for a अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी in अमरीकी इतिहास, and won the popular and electoral vote by the largest margin in 12 years, as well as the largest percentage of the popular vote for a Democrat in nearly a half-century.
This थी the पहला u.S. अध्यक्षीय election in which an African American was elected, having also been the first in which an African American won the nomination of either major party.
This election was also notable for being the first time in U.S. history that both major party candidates were sitting U.S. Senators, only the third time ( बाद 1920 और 1960 ) कि कोई बैठे u.s. सीनेटर थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष, और तभी the दूसरी time that the winning President and Vice President ( Obama and Biden ) were both sitting U.S. Senators.
इस थी भी the first election since 1952 in which neither of the major parties ' nominees was the incumbent President or Vice President.
The Sovereign Prince or Princess of Monaco is the reigning monarch और सिर of राज्य of the Principality of Monaco.
All princes or princesses have officially लिया the नाम of the हाउस of grimaldi, लकिन have belonged to various other houses ( Goyon de Matignon, Polignac ) in male line.
The reigning Prince is अल्बर्ट II.
Visualization of fragmentation और तब of defragmentation
In the maintenance of file systems, defragmentation is a प्रक्रम कि reduces the amount of fragmentation.
It does this by physically organizing the contents of the mass भंडार यंत्र प्रयुक्त to स्टोर files into the smallest number of contiguous regions ( fragments ).
It also कोशिशें to बनाएँ larger regions of free space using compaction to impede the return of fragmentation.
Some defragmentation utilities try to keep smaller files within a single directory together, as they हैं प्रायः पहुँचा in sequence.
defragmentation is advantageous and relevant to file systems on electromechanical disk drives.
The गति of the मुश्किल ड्राइव 's read/write heads over अलग क्षेत्रों of the disk when accessing fragmented files is slower, compared to accessing the entire contents of a non-fragmented file sequentially without moving the read/write heads to seek other fragments.
A service-level agreement ( SLA ) is a part of a service अनुबंध जहाँ a सेवा is formally defined.
In अभ्यास, the पद sla is sometimes प्रयुक्त to refer to the contracted delivery time ( of the service or performance ).
As an example, internet service providers will commonly include service level agreements within the terms of their contracts with customers to define the level ( s ) of सेवा होने बेची in मैदान भाषा terms.
In this case the SLA will typically have a technical definition in terms of mean time between failures ( MTBF ), mean time to मरम्मत or औसत समय to रिकवरी ( mttr ) ; विभिन्न आंकड़ा दरों ; throughput ; jitter ; or similar measurable details.
Union Station is a former shopping mall in Union नगर, जॉर्जिया, in दक्षिणपश्चिम मैट्रो अटलांटा adjacent to Interstate 85.
After new ownership and renovations in 2006, the name was बदला इससे शैनन southpark मॉल in 2007 to Union Station Mall.
a पिछला renovation was done in the late 1990s.
The mall has been closed since नवम्बर 2010.
This map shows the संलग्न संयुक्त राज्य और, in insets at the lower left, the two states that are not contiguous.
The contiguous United States are the 48 adjoining U.S. states on the महाद्वीप of North America that are south of Canada and north of Mexico, plus the District of Columbia.
the पद excludes the states of Alaska and Hawaii, and all off-shore U.S. territories and possessions, such as Puerto Rico.
Together, the 48 contiguous राज्य और d.C. occupy a संयुक्त क्षेत्रफल of, जिससे is 1.58 % of the total surface area of the Earth.
Of this, is land, composing 83.65 % of U.S. land area.
officially, is water area, composing 62.66 % of the nation 's water area.
The 2010 census population was 306,675,006, composing 99.33 % of the nation 's population, and a density of 103.639 inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2 ), compared to 87.264/sq mi ( 33.692/km2 ) for the nation as a whole.

It is the तीसरा सिंगल from their sixth studio album, Unstoppable.

It was लिखा by रोब mathes and Allen Shamblin.
Utilization management is the evaluation of the appropriateness, चिकित्सा need और दक्षता of स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं प्रक्रियाओं and facilities according to established criteria or guidelines and under the provisions of an applicable health benefits plan.
Typically it includes new activities or निर्णय आधारित upon the analysis of a case.
Utilization management describes proactive procedures, including discharge planning, concurrent planning, pre-certification और नैदानिक case appeals.
It also covers proactive processes, such as concurrent clinical reviews and peer reviews, as खूब as appeals introduced by the provider, payer or patient.
as pre-certification और संयुक्त review of cases grew, utilization management spun out of utilization review.
While not synonymous, health care professionals tend to use the शर्तें as interchangeable.
The difference is utilization management is and intends to manage health care cases efficiently and cost effectively पहले और दौरान health care administration.
Utilization review is more considering whether health care थी appropriately लागू after it was administered.
There हैं चार मौलिक techniques in utilization management:
Demand प्रबन्धन
utilization Review
Case प्रबन्धन
बीमारी प्रबन्धन
The Outsiders is a coming-of-age novel by S. E. Hinton, पहला प्रकाशित in 1967 by viking दबायें.
hinton थी 15 when she started writing the novel, but did most of the work when she was sixteen and a junior in high school.
hinton was 18 when the book was published.
The book follows two प्रतिद्वंद्वी समूह, the greasers और the socs ( pronounced by the author as, short for Socials ), who are divided by their socioeconomic status.
The book takes place in Tulsa, Oklahoma, in 1965, लकिन it is never stated in the book.
A film adaptation was produced in 1983, and a little-known short-lived television series appeared in 1990, picking up जहाँ the movie left off.
The United States House of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is frequently referred to as the House.
the अन्य house is the Senate.
The composition and powers of the House are स्थापित in आलेख एक of the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution.
The major power of the हाउस is to pass संघीय विधान कि affects the संपूर्ण देश हालांकि इसके बिल्स जरूर भी be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ).
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills, to impeach officials, and to elect the u.S. अध्यक्ष in case there is no majority in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its population but is हकदार to at तनिक one representative.
The most populous state, California, फिलहाल रै 53 प्रतिनिधि.
The total number of voting प्रतिनिधि is fixed by law at 435.
Each representative serves लिये a two-year term.
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, who presides over the chamber, is elected by the members of the House, and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन सम्मेलन, whichever party has more voting members.
The हाउस meets in the दक्षिण wing of the United States Capitol.
A supply chain is actually a complex and डायनेमिक सप्लाई and demand network.
( cf. wieland/wallenburg, 2011 )
A supply chain is a प्रणाली of संगठन, people, activities, information, and resources involved in moving a product or service from supplier to customer.
Supply chain activities transform natural resources, raw materials, and components into a finished उत्पाद कि is वितरित to the समाप्त ग्राहक.
In sophisticated supply chain systems, प्रयुक्त उत्पाद may re-enter the सप्लाई कड़ी at any point where residual value is recyclable.
सप्लाई जंजीरों link value chains.
`` Purple Haze '' is a song written and recorded by Jimi Hendrix in 1967, released as the second single by The Jimi Hendrix अनुभव in दोनो the संयुक्त किंगडम और the संयुक्त राज्य.
It later appeared on the अमरीकी संस्करण of the बैंड 's 1967 एल्बम Are You Experienced.
`` Purple Haze '' has become one of the `` archetypical साइकेडेलिक ड्रग गीतों of the sixties ''.
`` Purple Haze 's '' guitar virtuosic तकनीकों होता be emulated by many metal guitarists.
A close up चित्र of a गैंडा skin.
Skin is the soft outer covering of vertebrates.
Other animal छतरियाँ ऐसे as the सन्धिपाद बहि have अलग developmental origin, structure and chemical composition.
The adjective cutaneous means `` of the skin '' ( from Latin cutis, स्किन ).
In mammals, the skin is the largest organ of the integumentary system बना up of अनेक परतों of ectodermal ऊतक, और गार्ड the underlying muscles, bones, ligaments and internal organs.
Skin of a different nature exists in amphibians, सरीसृपों, और पक्षियों.
All mammals have some hair on their skin, even marine स्तनधारियों which appear to be hairless.
The skin अंतरफलक साथ the पर्यावरण and is the first line of defense from external factors.
For उदाहरण, the स्किन plays a key role in protecting the body against pathogens and excessive water loss.
Its other functions are insulation, तापमान विनियमन, सनसनी, and the production of vitamin D folates.
severely क्षतिग्रस्त स्किन may heal by forming scar tissue.
इस is sometimes discoloured and depigmented.
The thickness of skin also varies इससे स्थान to स्थान on an organism.
In humans for example, the skin located under the eyes and around the eyelids is the thinnest skin in the body at 0.5 mm thick, and is एक of the पहला क्षेत्रों to दिखाएँ signs of aging such as `` crows feet '' and wrinkles.
The skin on the palms and the soles of the feet is 4 mm मोटा और the thickest skin in the body.
Fur is घना बाल.
Primarily, fur augments the insulation the स्किन provides but can also serve as a secondary sexual characteristic or as camouflage.
On some animals, the skin is बहुत मुश्किल और मोटा, and can be processed to create leather.
Reptiles and fish have hard सुरक्षात्मक तराजू on their skin for protection, and birds have hard feathers, all made of tough β- keratins.
Amphibian skin is not a strong barrier to passage of chemicals and is often विषय to परासरण and diffusive forces.
For example, a frog sitting in an anesthetic solution would be sedated जल्दी, as the रासायनिक diffuses through its skin.
Thomas स्कॉट
The Rev. Thomas Scott ( 1747-1821 ) was an influential preacher and author who is principally known for his best-selling work A Commentary On The Whole Bible and The Force of Truth, and as one of the founders of the Church Missionary Society.
Daniel Radcliffe, who portrays Harry Potter, रै महरूम the प्रतीक of the फिल्मी श्रेणी चूंकि the release of the first film in 2001.
Some of the most renowned actors of the United Kingdom and Ireland have voiced or portrayed characters appearing in the हैरी कुम्हार फिल्मी series based on the book series by J. K. Rowling.
Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint and Emma Watson have played Harry कुम्हार, रॉन वीज़्ली और Hermione Granger in all the films.
When they were cast only Radcliffe था previously acted in a film.
Complementing them on screen are such actors as Helena Bonham Carter, Jim Broadbent, John Cleese, Robbie Coltrane, Warwick Davis, Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Brendan Gleeson, Richard Griffiths, Richard Harris, John Hurt, Jason Isaacs, Miriam Margolyes, Helen McCrory, Gary Oldman, Alan Rickman, Fiona Shaw, Maggie Smith, Timothy Spall, Imelda Staunton, David Thewlis, Emma Thompson, and Julie Walters, among others.
Thirteen actors have appeared as the same character in सब आठ films of the मताधिकार.
Some well-known British अभिनेताओं जो have नहीं appeared in the series, are asked in jest why they have not been cast.
When David Yates was directing the fifth film, Bill Nighy, who had previously collaborated with Yates on three of his टेलीविज़न प्रोजेक्ट, कहा कि he joked साथ येट्स कि संभवतः अभी he होता n't be the तभी कर्ता in England who had n't been in Harry Potter.
`` But nobody called '', nighy added.
But in 2009, येट्स डाल nighy as Minister of Magic Rufus Scrimgeour in Deathly Hallows.
Nighy said, `` I am no longer the तभी English actor not to be in Harry Potter and I am very pleased. ''
jude विधि रै quipped, `` Nobody 's asked me.
I was a bit too old लिये हैरी ''.
जब a रिपोर्टर compared potions प्राध्यापक होरेस slughorn 's obsession with famous names to the series ' connection to `` every notable British actor, '' Jim Broadbent, who plays Slughorn said, `` Well, not every actor gets invited.
I जान some who are still waiting. ''
With the exception of Chris Columbus, each director has had a cameo appearance in his respective film : Alfonso Cuarón appears as a wizard holding a candle during a scene at The Three Broomsticks in कैदी of azkaban ; माइक newell is सुना briefly as the रेडियो प्रस्तुतकर्ता in फ़्रैंक ब्राइस 's हाउस in प्याला of आग ; और दाउद येट्स सुविधाएँ as a wizard within a magical moving portrait in Order of the Phoenix.
Producer David Heyman also makes a cameo appearance as a wizard featured within a जादुई चलती पोर्ट्रेट in the तीसरा फिल्मी, कैदी of Azkaban.

She announced that she could never have dreamt of the प्रतिभाशाली अभिनेताओं और अभिनेत्रियों who have appeared in all the Harry Potter movies.

A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles ( accepted by members as 'spiritual principles, ' based on the approved literature ) outlining a कोर्स of कार्रवाई लिये रिकवरी इससे, compulsion, or other behavioral problems.
Originally proposed by Alcoholics Anonymous ( AA ) as a method of recovery from alcoholism, the Twelve कदम यहूद पहला प्रकाशित in the किताब alcoholics Anonymous : The Story of How More Than One Hundred Men Have Recovered from Alcoholism in 1939.
The method was then adapted और became the न्यास of other twelve-step programs.
As summarized by the American Psychological संघ, the प्रक्रम involves the following:
admitting that एक can नहीं कंट्रोल एक 's addiction or compulsion ;
recognizing a higher power that can दे शक्ति ;
examining past errors with the help of a प्रायोजक ( experienced member ) ;
बनाना amends for these errors ;
learning to live a new life साथ a नई कोड of behavior ;
helping अन्य जो suffer from the same addictions or compulsions.
Witness impeachment, in the law of evidence of the United States, is the process of calling into सवाल the credibility of an individual who is testifying in a trial.
The Federal Rules of प्रमाण contain the rules governing impeachment in federal courts.
Party leaders and whips of the संयुक्त States House of Representatives are elected by their respective parties in a closed-door caucus by secret ballot and are also known as floor leaders.
The U.S. House of Representatives does not officially use the term `` अल्पसंख्यक नेता '' हालांकि the media frequently do.
The House instead उपयोग the शर्तें `` रिपब्लिकन नेता '' or `` Democratic Leader '' depending on which party holds a minority of seats.
The current House Majority Leader is Republican Eric Cantor, while the वर्तमान हाउस अल्पसंख्यक Leader is Democrat Nancy Pelosi.
The current House Majority Whip is रिपब्लिकन केविन मैकार्थी, जबकि the वर्तमान House Minority Whip is Democrat Steny Hoyer.
Following the outbreak of World War I in 1914, the German Army opened the Western Front by first आक्रमणकारी ध्वज और बेल्जियम, तब gaining सैन्य कंट्रोल of important industrial regions in France.
The tide of the अग्रिम थी dramatically turned with the Battle of the Marne.
Following the race to the sea, both sides dug in साथ a meandering लकीर of fortified trenches, stretching from the North Sea to the Swiss frontier with France.
इस लकीर remained essentially unchanged for most of the war.
Between 1915 and 1917 there were several major offensives साथ इस सामने.
The attacks employed विशाल तोपखाने bombardments and massed infantry advances.
However, a combination of entrenchments, यंत्र गन nests, कंटीले तार, और तोपखाने repeatedly inflicted severe casualties on the attackers and counterattacking defenders.
as a परिणाम, no significant advances were made.
Among the most costly of these offensives were the Battle of Verdun with a combined [ estimated ] 700,000 dead, the Battle of the Somme with more than [ an estimated ] million हताहत, और the बैटल of passchendaele साथ roughly [ an अनुमानित ] 600,000 casualties.
In an effort to break the deadlock, this front saw the introduction of new military प्रौद्योगिकी, सहित ज़हर गैस, वायुयान और टैंक.
But it थी तभी बाद the अपनाना of improved tactics that some degree of mobility was restored.
The German Spring Offensive of 1918 was made possible by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk कि चिह्नित the समाप्त of the विरोध on the Eastern Front.
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics, the German armies उन्नत nearly to the वेस्ट, जिससे चिह्नित the deepest अग्रिम by either पक्ष since 1914 and very nearly succeeded in forcing a breakthrough.
In spite of the generally stagnant nature of this front, this थिएटर होता prove decisive.
The inexorable advance of the Allied armies during the दूसरी हाफ of 1918 persuaded the German commanders that defeat was inevitable, and the government was forced to sue for conditions of an armistice.
The terms of peace were agreed upon with the signing of the Treaty of versailles in 1919.

The current First Lady is Michelle Obama.
After her husband Barack Obama was re-elected on November 6, 2012, वो is अनुसूचित to serve until January 20, 2017.
Septic shock is a medical condition as a परिणाम of कठोर संक्रमण and sepsis, though the microbe may be systemic or localized to a particular site.
It can cause multiple organ dysfunction syndrome ( formerly known as multiple organ failure ) and death.
Its most common victims are children, immunocompromised individuals, and the elderly, as their immune systems can not deal with the infection as effectively as those of स्वस्थ adults.
Frequently, patients suffering from septic shock are cared for in intensive परवाह इकाई.
The mortality rate from septic shock is लगभग 25–50 %.
Kevin Brereton ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1972 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके stage name k-os ( ; `` chaos '' ), is a Canadian rapper, singer, songwriter and record producer.
His given name may also be cited as kheaven, a spelling he later adopted.
The alias `` k-os '', spelled with a निम्नतर मामला `` k '', थी intended to be कम aggressive than the pseudonyms of other rappers whose names were all upper case, such as KRS-One.
It is an acronym for `` Knowledge of Self, '' although in a later interview he said that it originally stood for `` Kevin 's Original Sound. '' k-os ' music incorporates a चौड़ी किस्में of म्यूज़िक जाति, सहित rap, funk, rock, and reggae.
The lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message '' while at टाइम्स expressing आलोचना of मुख्यधारा hip hop culture 's obsession with money, fame and glorification of violence.
A musician as well as a निर्माता, k-os has written and produced nearly every part of all four of his albums.
k-os usually performs with a live band, something that is uncommon in the हिप हॉप genre.
He sometimes plays guitar and कुंजीपटल दोनो दौरान सजीव प्रदर्शन and in the studio.
k-os received his first musical exposure with the single `` Musical essence '', released in 1993.
After the release of his दूसरी सिंगल `` वृद्धि Like the Sun '' in 1996, he withdrew from the industry because he was dissatisfied with his musical style.
He reappeared briefly in 1999 and released उसके डेब्यू एल्बम Exit in 2002.
The album received धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ लकिन बेची relatively few copies.
He released his second album Joyful Rebellion in 2004, which received platinum औकात in Canada.
A third एल्बम,, थी released in 2006 and also went platinum.
उसके चौथी album, Yes !
, was released in 2009.
His fifth album BLack on सुनहरे was released in 2013.

The Uniform Commercial Code ( UCC or the Code ), first published in 1952, is one of a number of uniform acts that have been promulgated in conjunction with efforts to harmonize the law of sales and अन्य वाणिज्यिक ट्रांजेक्शन in सब 50 राज्य भीतर the संयुक्त States of America.
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of climbing routes with one or अधिक stops at a belay स्टेशन.
Each section of actual चढ़ाई between stops at the belay स्टेशन is called a pitch.
The leader ascends the pitch, placing gear और stopping to लंगर themselves to the belay station.
The reason for the stops can be संकल्पित by choice, convention or necessity.
लिये example:
The rope is too short to do the entire route in one पिच ( necessity ).
The leader has run out of protective gear ( necessity ).
There is a convenient protectable ledge, or fixed bolts placed by previous climbers, at the स्थान लिये a belay station ( convention ).
The leader chooses to rest or exchange लीड पहले the अगला खण्ड of the climb ( choice ).
The general purpose of these stops is to allow the second to ascend to the point of the lead climber while collecting the सुरक्षात्मक गियर from the route in the course of the lead climber 's ascent.
At the belay स्टेशन, the सुरक्षात्मक gear is collected, possibly exchanged to a new leader, and the leader of the next pitch ascends the route.

In American football, each टोली रै ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the field at one time.
the विशिष्ट भूमिका that a player takes on the field is called their position.
Under the modern rules of American football, टीमों हैं अनुमत असीमित subsititutions, that is teams may change any number of players after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the team with the ball, who is trying to स्कोर ), the defense ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring, and to take the ball from them ), and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, various specific स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on कया the player 's main job is.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक ड्रग Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
the सीएसए is the संघीय u.S. ड्रग policy under which the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation for the Single सम्मेलन on narcotic दवाएँ.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying योग्यता लिये a substance to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a New Jersey Transit park-and-ride station in Wayne, New Jersey along the Montclair-Boonton Line that provides bus service to New York City and various other points in the area as well as Montclair-Boonton Line train service to New यॉर्क, hoboken, और इंटरमीडिएट अंक साथ the लकीर between hackettstown and Montclair State University.
It is located off of the southbound lanes of New Jersey Route 23 on West Belt Road, near the इंटरचेंज जहाँ रूट 23, अंतरराज्यीय 80, and U.S. Route 46 meet, across from the Willowbrook Mall.
The station opened in January 2008 और रै 1,000 पार्किंग स्पेसेस.
New Jersey Transit intends for this combined rail and bus station to become an `` interceptor स्टेशन, '' कि होगा help relieve the habitual congestion at the West Belt Road Interchange, where the three major highways meet.
In addition, the construction of the station थी meant to भी आसानी the जमघट at कया थी तब रूट 23 पार्क & Ride, a bus depot on Route 23 North that has since been renamed Mother 's Park & Ride, and the Willowbrook Mall Park & Ride ; the now-Mother 's site had limited parking while NJT was having trouble with overfull parking areas at Willowbrook.
The Wayne township बस गैरेज is located on the opposite side of Route 23.
वहीँ रै महरूम a प्रस्ताव to build a parking deck with another thousand spots and develop the land at the station.
In addition to montclair-boonton रेल, the Transit Center is served by the following New Jersey Transit bus lines:
75 to न्यूर्क penn Station and Butler
194 to Port प्राधिकार बस टर्मिनल and Butler/Newfoundland
198 to Port Authority Bus Terminal और विलियम paterson University

The at sign @ is also commonly called the at symbol, ampersat, apetail or commercial at in english—and कम commonly a चौड़ी दायरा of other terms.
The fact that there is no single word in English for the symbol has prompted some writers to use the फ्रेंच arobase or स्पेनी और पुर्तगाली arroba—or to सिक्का नई शब्द ऐसे as asperand, ampersat—but none of these has achieved wide currency.
Originally an accounting and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g. 7 widgets @ $ 2 = $ 14 ), it was not included on the keyboard of the earliest commercially कामयाब typewriters, लकिन थी on at तनिक एक 1889 मॉडल और the very successful Underwood models from the `` Underwood No. 5 '' in 1900 onward.
It is now universally शामिल on कंप्यूटर keyboards.
In recent years, its meaning has grown to शामिल the भाव of होने `` स्तिथ at, '' `` और, '' or `` directed at '', especially in email addresses and social media, particularly Twitter.
The चिह्नित is एनकोडेड at.
The Catcher in the Rye is a 1951 अनोखा by J. D. Salinger.
Originally published for adults, it रै चूंकि become popular with adolescent readers for its themes of teenage angst and alienation.
It has been अनूदित into लगभग सब of the world 's major languages.
around 250,000 नक़ल हैं sold each year with total sales of more than 65 million books.
The novel 's protagonist and antihero, Holden caulfield, रै become an icon for teenage rebellion.
The novel was included on Times 2005 list of the 100 best English-language novels written since 1923, and it was named by Modern Library and its readers as one of the 100 बेहतरीन english-language novels of the 20th सदी.
It has been frequently challenged in the United States and अन्य देशों लिये इसके उदार use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality.
It also deals with complex issues of identity, belonging, connection, and alienation.
skeletal muscles homo sapiens
This is a table of muscles of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान bilateral muscles, found on both sides, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
nevertheless, the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define क्युकी different sources group muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles.
उदाहरण range from 640 to 850.
The मांसपेशियां of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the head and neck, muscles of the torso or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी from the standard anatomical position.
In अन्य स्थितियाँ, other actions may be performed.
Bad Girls Club ( BGC ) is an American reality television series created by Jonathan Murray for the ऑक्सीजन टेलीविज़न स्टेशन.
The show centers on सात feisty और शरारती महिलाओं साथ different backgrounds and personalities, who have a number of psychological and behavioral problems.
They are introduced to the show बंद उनके घातक behavior and accomplish specific goals.
The cast, deemed `` bad girls '', enjoy a luxurious lifestyle in a ठीक mansion लिये तीन महीने, दौरान जिससे they must obey specified rules.
Their lives inside – and outside – of the हाउस हैं chronicled और recorded by the production team.
The Bad Girls Club is broadcast in five देशों ( संयुक्त States, Netherlands, Australia, Hungary, and Sweden ).
It has received negative reviews इससे आलोचकों, जो मानना the show promotes violence by adolescent viewers.
Furthermore, अनेक cast members made controversial remarks which outraged many viewers.
The format of the show has changed from जल्दी सीज़न.
If a `` bad लड़की '' ब्रेक a rule, she is evicted from the show and, if it is early in the season, replaced by a new `` bad girl ''.
There have been nine complete seasons of The Bad Girls Club, with the दसवाँ ऋतु फिलहाल airing.
The fourth season था the उच्चतम दरजा in the show 's history, becoming its `` breakthrough season ''.
There have महरूम तीन spin-offs of The Bad Girls Club.
One of उन्हें, प्रेम खेल : ख़राब लड़कियों Need Love Too, where past cast members seek true love, has gained high ratings.
Oxygen has also released a mobile game, comic strip and merchandise to प्रचार the दिखाएँ.
Of the 92 प्रतियोगी, Kerry Harvick ( of season one ) was a successful country singer before the show.
Tanisha Thomas ( of season two ) later hosted ऑक्सीजन 's OxygenLive !
and the subsequent सीज़न of Love Games : Bad Girls Need Love Too.
Thomas, who has been dubbed the `` godmother '' to सब प्रतियोगी, रै उसके अपना टेलीविज़न documentary entitled Tanisha Gets Married.
As of Season 8 she 's been the host of the reunion specials.
The Iowa Senate is the अपर हाउस of the Iowa General Assembly.
वहीँ हैं 50 seats in the Iowa Senate, representing 50 single-member districts across the state with populations of approximately 60,927 per constituency,.
Each Senate district is रचित of two House districts.
The Senate meets at the Iowa राज्य Capitol in Des Moines.
नापसंद the निम्नतर हाउस, the आयोवा House of Representatives, Senators serve four-year terms, with half of the Senate staggered for re-election every two years.
There are no term limits लिये the सीनेट.
mechanical repair
Maintenance, repair, and परिचालन ( mro ) or मेंटेनेंस, मरम्मत, और overhaul involves फिक्सिंग कोई sort of mechanical, plumbing or electrical device should it become out of order or broken ( known as repair, unscheduled or casualty maintenance ).
It also includes performing routine actions which keep the device in working order ( known as scheduled maintenance ) or prevent trouble from arising ( preventive maintenance ).
MRO may be defined as, `` All actions which have the उद्देश्य of retaining or restoring an item in or to a state in which it can perform its required function.
The actions include the combination of सब तकनीकी और सम्बन्धित प्रशासनिक, managerial, and supervision actions. ''
MRO operations can be categorised by whether the product remains the property of the customer, i.e. a service is being offered, or whether the उत्पाद is खरीदा by the reprocessing organisation and sold to any customer wishing to make the purchase ( Guadette, 2002 ).
In the former case it may be a backshop आपरेशन भीतर a larger organisation or smaller operation.
The former of these represents a closed loop supply chain and प्रायः रै the पैमाना of मेंटेनेंस, repair or of the product.
The latter of the categorisations is an open loop supply chain and is typified by refurbishment and remanufacture.
The main characteristic of the closed loop system is that the demand for a product is matched साथ the सप्लाई of a प्रयुक्त product.
Neglecting asset write-offs and exceptional activities the total population of the product between the customer and the service provider remains constant.
Prince William, Duke of Cambridge ( विलियम आर्थर फिलिप लुई ; born 21 जून 1982 ), is the elder बेटे of चार्ल्स, प्रिंस of वेल्स, and Diana, Princess of Wales, and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh.
He is दूसरी in the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार, पीछे उसके पिता, to the तख्तों of सोलह स्वतंत्र sovereign राज्य ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms : the संयुक्त किंगडम, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Jamaica, Barbados, The Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda, and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Prince William was educated at four schools in the संयुक्त किंगडम और प्राप्त a degree from the University of St Andrews.
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile, Belize, Tanzania, and Kenya where he रै जिया और holidayed अनेक times.
Prince William has also taken Kiswahili studies at universities in कीनिया और तंजानिया.
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household प्यादे —serving साथ उसके bhai Prince Harry —and, two years later, earned his wings by completing pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the Royal Air Force, was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and underwent helicopter flying training in order to become a full-time पायलट साथ the ढूंढें और Rescue Force.
In 2010, he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter प्रशिक्षण और गई on to raf घाटी on no. 22 स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter.
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend, Catherine Middleton, on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी.
Hours prior to his wedding, Prince William was created Duke of Cambridge, Earl of Strathearn, and Baron carrickfergus.
DeAndre Cortez Way ( born July 28, 1990 ), better known by his stage name Soulja Boy Tell 'Em, or बस soulja लड़के, is an अमरीकी rapper, रिकार्ड producer, actor, and entrepreneur.
In September 2007, his single `` Crank That ( soulja लड़के ) `` पहुँचे number one on the Billboard Hot 100.
The single was initially self-published on the internet, और it बाद became a number-one hit in the United States for seven non-consecutive weeks starting in September 2007.
On अगस्त 17 रास्ता थी सूचीबद्ध at # 18 on the फोर्ब्स list of Hip-Hop Cash Kings of 2010 earning $ 7 million for that year.
Way has currently released तीन स्टुडियो एल्बम और एक स्वतंत्र एल्बम : उसके डेब्यू studio album Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was certified platinum by the RIAA.
However, his next two albums, iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) did not match the commercial success of his debut, the latter only selling 100,000 copies, despite the success of several singles across both albums, such as `` Kiss Me Thru the Phone `` and `` Turn My Swag On `` ( isouljaboytellem ) और `` pretty लड़के swag `` ( the deandre Way ).
This was mainly due to negotiation problems with interscope रिकॉर्ड जिससे meant a सीमित amount of records were made available to the public.
As of 2011, Way has confirmed he is working on उसके चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम, हकदार USA DRE, which will be released in 2013.
The electron transport chain in the सूत्रकणिका is the साईट of oxidative phosphorylation in eukaryotes.
The NADH and succinate generated in the citric acid साईकिल हैं oxidized, providing energy to power ATP synthase.
Photosynthetic electron हस्तांतरण कड़ी of the thylakoid membrane.
An electron transport chain ( ETC ) couples electron transfer between an इलेक्ट्रॉन दाता ( ऐसे as nadh ) और an इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor ( such as O2 ) with the transfer of H+ ions ( protons ) across a membrane.
The resulting electrochemical proton gradient is used to generate रासायनिक उर्जा in the रूप of एडीनोसिन triphosphate ( ATP ).
Electron transport chains are the सेल्यूलर mechanisms प्रयुक्त लिये extracting उर्जा from sunlight in photosynthesis and also from redox reactions, such as the oxidation of sugars ( respiration ).
In chloroplasts, light drives the परिवर्तन of जल to ऑक्सीजन और nadP+ to NADPH with transfer of H+ ions across chloroplast membranes.
In mitochondria, it is the परिवर्तन of ऑक्सीजन to जल, nadh to naD+ और succinate to fumarate that are required to generate the proton gradient.
Electron हस्तांतरण जंजीरों हैं प्रमुख साइट of असामयिक electron leakage to oxygen, generating superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative stress.
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip, Ryzolt, Ultracet, Ultram in the यूएसए, ralivia, zytram xl durella { cr-100/200 mg } in Canada or Adolonta in Spain ) is a centrally acting synthetic analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain.
The drug has a wide range of applications, including treatment of आमवातीय गठिया, बेचैन टाँगे सिंड्रोम, मोटर neurone disease and fibromyalgia.
It was शुभारम्भ और marketed as tramal by the जर्मनी फार्मास्युटिकल company Grünenthal GmbH in 1977.
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist that also induces serotonin रिलीज और inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine.
Tramadol is metabolized to o-desmethyltramadol, a significantly more potent μ-opioid agonist.
Tramadol and its प्रमुख metabolite ( s ) हैं विशिष्ट from other more potent opioid agonists by relative selectivity for μ-opioid receptors.
Bernard लॉरेंस `` बर्नी '' madoff ( ; born अप्रैल 29, 1938 ) is an American former stockbroker, investment advisor, financier, and white collar criminal.
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the NASDAQ stock market, and the admitted operator of a Ponzi scheme that is considered to be the largest financial fraud in u.S. इतिहास.
Madoff founded the Wall Street कड़ बर्नार्ड L. madoff निवेश प्रतिभूति llc in 1960, and was its chairman until his arrest on December 11, 2008.
The firm थी एक of the शीर्ष मार्केट मेकर businesses on Wall Street, which bypassed `` specialist '' firms by directly executing orders over the counter from retail brokers.
He employed at the firm his brother Peter as Senior Managing Director and Chief Compliance अधिकारी ; पीटर रै चूंकि महरूम sentenced to 10 सालो in थाना.
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm 's नियम और अनुपालन अधिकारी and attorney, and his sons Andrew and Mark ( Mark committed suicide by hanging exactly two years after his father 's arrest ).
On December 10, 2008, Madoff 's sons told authorities that their father had confessed to them that the asset management unit of his firm was a massive Ponzi योजना, और कोटेड उसे as describing it as `` one big lie. ''
The following day, FBI एजेंटों गिरफ्तार madoff and charged him with one count of securities fraud.
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ) had previously conducted investigations into madoff 's कारोबार practices, but did not uncover the massive fraud.
In March 2009, Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 federal felonies and admitted to turning उसके माल प्रबन्धन कारोबार into a massive Ponzi scheme that defrauded thousands of investors of billions of dollars.
Madoff said he began the Ponzi scheme in the जल्दी 1990s.
However, federal investigators believe the धोखाधड़ी began as जल्दी as the 1970s, और those charged with recovering the missing money believe the investment operation may never have been legitimate.
The amount missing from क्लाएंट खाते, सहित fabricated gains, was almost $ 65 billion.
The court-appointed trustee estimated actual losses to investors of $ 18 अरब.
On जून 29, 2009, he थी sentenced to 150 years in prison, the maximum allowed.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular अवकाश observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the कार्य of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In उत्तर अमेरिका, it is मनाये on the Wednesday of the last full week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In फ़्रांस it is celebrated on the third Thursday in April ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is मनाये on the first Friday in May
A quasi-judicial body is an entity such as an arbitrator or tribunal board, generally of a public administrative agency, which has powers and procedures resembling those of a court of law or judge, and which is obligated to objectively determine facts और चित्रण conclusions इससे उन्हें so as to provide the आधार of an official action.
Such क्रियाएँ हैं समर्थ to उपाय a हालात or थोपने legal penalties, and may affect the legal rights, duties or privileges of specific parties.
Monument of Tycho Brahe and योहानेस कॅप्लर in प्राग
Tycho Brahe ( 14 December 154624 October 1601 ), born Tyge Ottesen ब्राहे, थी a डैनिश nobleman ज्ञात for his accurate and comprehensive astronomical and planetary observations.
He was born in Scania, then part of Denmark, अभी भाग of modern-day Sweden.
Tycho was well known in उसके आजीवन as an astronomer and alchemist.
in उसके de नोवा स्टेला ( on the new star ) of 1573, he refuted the Aristotelian belief in an unchanging celestial realm.
His precise measurements indicated that `` new stars, '' ( stellae novae, now known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572, lacked the parallax expected in sub-lunar phenomena, और यहूद इसलिए नहीं `` atmospheric '' tailless comets as previously believed, but were above the atmosphere and moon.
Using similar measurements he showed that comets were also not atmospheric phenomena, as previously thought, and must pass through the supposedly `` अपरिवर्तनीय '' celestial spheres.
As an astronomer, tycho worked to combine कया he देखी as the geometrical benefits of the Copernican system with the philosophical benefits of the Ptolemaic system into his own model of the universe, the Tychonic system.
Furthermore, he was the last of the major naked eye astronomers, working without telescopes लिये उसके observations.
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the द्वीप of hven और the funding to निर्माण the uraniborg, an early research institute, where he built large astronomical instruments and took many careful measurements, and later Stjerneborg, underground, when he discovered that his instruments in the former were not sufficiently steady.
On the island ( on which he demonstrated निरंकुश अक्षर और बर्ताव toward the residents ) he founded manufactories such as paper-making to provide material for printing his results.
After disagreements with the new Danish king Christian IV in 1597, he was आमंत्रित by the bohemian किंग और पावन रोमन सम्राट Rudolph II to Prague, where he became the official imperial astronomer.
He built the नई वेधशाला at Benátky nad Jizerou.
Here, from 1600 जबतक his death in 1601, he was assisted by Johannes Kepler who later used Tycho 's astronomical data to develop Kepler 's laws of planetary motion.
Guro District ( Guro-gu ) is a district of Seoul, South Korea, which was separated from Yeongdeungpo ज़िला on अप्रैल 1, 1980.
Located in the southwestern भाग of the नगर, जहाँ besides yangcheon ज़िला और geumcheon ज़िला guro ज़िला रै an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति as a transport link which contains railroads, land routes from the rest of Seoul to the south of the country.
The Gyeongbu and Gyeongin railway lines connect Seoul to बुसान और इंचियोन.
In addition, Seoul Metropolitan Subway lines 1, 2, and 7, and major राजमार्गों प्रतिच्छेद in Guro District.
The name Guro originates इससे the legend that nine ( ) old men ( Korean : ro ) enjoyed longevity in the district.
A digital industrial complex is located in Guro ज़िला.
The Guro Digital Industrial Complex, which played a leading industrial role mainly with textile manufacturing, dressmaking and other labour-intensive industries in 1967, has been rapidly changed into an IT industrial complex.
This complex played a pivotal role in the economic growth of the South Korea 's development era, referred to as the `` चमत्कार on the हान नदी ``, और भी contributed 10 percent of national export in the 1970s.
Twenty-one percent of the total area of Guro District is a restricted zone to be used as a greenbelt साथ the तभी arboretum in सियोल.
The zone is changing into a lively district as large labour-intensive कारखानों हैं चलती from the area and the council is developing what it terms its four zones.
An `` e-government `` system based on this hosted the अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation फ़ोरम on फ़रवरी 7–9, 2007, with the participation of more than thirty-seven countries.
The forum was launched with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André Santini ( Issy-les-Moulineaux, France ), Kevin Foy ( Chapel Hill, US ), Apirak Kosayothin ( Bangkok, Thailand ), Uvais Mohamed emthiyas ( कोलोन, श्री लंका ), और संसार विशेषज्ञ ऐसे as dr विलियम H. dutton ( निदेशक of Oxford Internet Institute at the University of Oxford, UK ) and Dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere, Finland ) participated in the forum.
The Guro Declaration, अपनाया दौरान the फ़ोरम, aims to नियत up a पोर्टल साईट for e-government development and to establish a concrete project in order to bridge the digital divide among the world 's cities.
This practice has been recognised लिये providing a नई महत्वपूर्ण step in the development of e-democracy.
The e-participation forum was a key factor for Guro to play the leading role in bridging the digital divide among cities, to provide I.T. enterprises located in Guro Digital Industrial Complex the opportunity to launch into the international market, to improve इसके चित्र और become a वैश्विक नेता to कंक्रीट e-democracy.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation forum on February 7–9, 2007
A wonton ( also spelled wantan, wanton, or wuntun in transcription from Cantonese ; Mandarin : húndùn ) is a type of पकौड़ी commonly मिला in a क्रमांक of चाइनीज cuisines.
Many people were शामिल in the आविष्कार of radio as we now know it.
Several possible methods of बेतार संचार were considered, including inductive and capacitive induction and transmission through the ground, however the method used for radio today exclusively involves the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves.
After early speculation on the subject, experimental work on the connection between electricity and चुंबकत्व began around 1820 साथ the कार्य of hans ईसाई ओर्स्टेड और जारी साथ the कार्य of André-Marie Ampère, Joseph Henry, and Michael Faraday.
These investigations culminated in the पूरा theory of electromagnetism developed by James Clerk Maxwell.
This theory described the theoretical basis of the propagation of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक लहरें.
After Maxwell 's theory was published many people experimented with wireless communication, some intentionally using मैक्सवेल 's theory some not.
It is considered likely that the first intentional transmission of a signal by means of electromagnetic waves was performed by David Edward Hughes around 1880, although this was considered to be induction at the time.
The first systematic and unequivocal हस्तांतरण of EM waves was performed by Heinrich Rudolf Hertz and described in papers published in 1887 and 1890.
Hertz famously considered these results as being of छोटी व्यावहारिक मान.
After Hertz 's work many people were involved in the development of components and theory involved with the हस्तांतरण और reception of electromagnetic waves.
Others, notably Guglielmo Marconi, were concerned with practical improvements and the commercial अनुप्रयोग of रेडियो to wireless telegraphy.
Later on Reginald A. fessenden became the first to send an audio signal by means of electromagnetic waves.
Scurvy is a disease resulting from a deficiency of vitamin C, which is जरूरी लिये the संश्लेषण of कोलेजन in humans.
The chemical name for vitamin C, ascorbic acid, is derived from the Latin name of scurvy, scorbutus, which also provides the adjective scorbutic ( `` of, characterized by or having to do साथ स्कर्वी '' ).
Scurvy often presents itself initially as symptoms of malaise and lethargy, followed by गठन of spots on the skin, spongy gums, and bleeding from the mucous membranes.
Spots are most abundant on the जांघों और legs, and a person with the ailment looks pale, feels depressed, and is partially immobilized.
As scurvy advances, there can be open, suppurating wounds, loss of teeth, पीलिया, ज्वर, न्यूरोपैथी और मौत.
Scurvy was at one time common among sailors, pirates and others aboard ships at sea longer than perishable fruits and vegetables could be stored ( subsisting instead only on cured and salted meats and सूखी दाने ) और by सैनिको similarly वंचित of ये भोजन लिये extended periods.
It was described by हिपोक्रेटिस ( c. 460 bc–c. 380 BC ), and herbal cures for scurvy have been known in many native cultures since prehistory.
Scurvy was one of the limiting कारकों of marine travel, often killing large numbers of the passengers and crew on long-distance voyages.
This became a significant issue in Europe from the beginning of the modern era in the Age of Discovery in the 15th century, continuing to खेल a significant भूमिका through संसार युद्ध i in the 20th century.
While today स्कर्वी is ज्ञात to be caused by a nutritional deficiency, until the isolation of vitamin C and direct evidence of its link to scurvy in 1932, numerous theories and treatments were proposed, often on little or no experimental data.
This inconsistency is attributed to the lack of vitamin C as a पृथक अवधारणा, an अक्षमता to reliably link different foods ( notably present in fresh citrus, watercress, and organ meat ) to scurvy.
An additional concept required to understand scurvy was the degradation of vitamin C by exposure to एयर और तांबे और अन्य परिवर्तन मेटल लवण ऐसे as those of iron, thus changing the links of foods to scurvy over time.
Treatment by fresh food, particularly citrus fruit, was periodically implemented, as it था been since antiquity.
However until the 1930s, treatment थी असंगत, साथ many ineffective treatments used into the 20th century.
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy, James Lind who first proved it could be treated with citrus fruit in experiments he वर्णित in उसके 1753 किताब, a treatise of the स्कर्वी, हालांकि उसके सलाह थी नहीं implemented by the royal Navy for several decades.
In infants, scurvy is sometimes referred to as barlow 's बीमारी, named after Sir Thomas Barlow, a British physician who described it.
However, Barlow 's disease may भी refer to mitral valve prolapse.
अन्य eponyms लिये scurvy include Moeller 's disease and Cheadle 's disease.
Scurvy does not occur in most पशु क्युकी वे can synthesize उनके own vitamin C.
However, humans and other higher primates ( the simians - monkeys and apes - and tarsiers ), guinea pigs, most or all bats, and some species of birds and fish lack an enzyme ( L-gulonolactone oxidase ) necessary for such synthesis and must obtain vitamin C through their diet.
Vitamin C is widespread in plant tissues, with particularly high concentrations occurring in citrus fruits ( oranges, lemons, limes, grapefruits ), टमाटर, आलू, पत्तागोभी, and green peppers.
Iron is a chemical element with the symbol Fe ( इससे ) और परमाणु number 26.
It is a metal in the first परिवर्तन श्रेणी.
It is the सबसे आम तत्व ( by mass ) forming the planet Earth as a whole, forming much of Earth 's outer and inner core.
It is the fourth most common element in the धरती 's क्रस्ट.
Iron 's बहुत आम उपस्थिति in रॉकी planets like Earth is due to its abundant production as a result of fusion in high-mass stars, where the production of nickel-56 ( which decays to the most common isotope of iron ) is the last nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic.
This causes radioactive nickel to become the last element to be produced before collapse of a supernova leads to the explosive कार्यक्रम कि scatter इस precursor radionuclide of iron abundantly into space.
Like other group 8 elements, iron exists in a wide range of ऑक्सीकरण राज्य, −2 to +6, हालांकि +2 and +3 are the most common.
Elemental iron occurs in meteoroids and other low oxygen environments, but is reactive to oxygen and water.
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray, but oxidize in normal एयर to दे hydrated आयरन oxides, commonly known as rust.
नापसंद अनेक अन्य धातुओं जिससे रूप passivating oxide layers, iron oxides occupy more volume than iron metal, and thus iron oxides flake off and expose fresh surfaces for corrosion.
Iron metal has been used since ancient times, though copper alloys, which have lower melting temperatures, were used first in history.
Pure iron is soft ( softer than aluminium ), लकिन is unobtainable by smelting.
The material is significantly hardened and strengthened by impurities from the smelting process, such as carbon.
A certain proportion of carbon ( between 0.002 % and 2.1 % ) produces steel, which may be up to 1000 times harder than pure iron.
Crude iron metal is उत्पादित in धमाका furnaces, where ore is reduced by coke to pig iron, which has a high carbon content.
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon content to the सही proportion to मेक स्टील.
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels ) are by दूर the सबसे आम धातुओं in औद्योगिक उपयोग, due to उनके great range of desirable properties and the abundance of iron.
Iron chemical compounds, which शामिल ferrous and ferric compounds, have many uses.
Iron oxide mixed with aluminium powder can be ignited to बनाएँ a thermite reaction, used in welding and purifying ores.
It forms binary compounds with the हैलोजन्स और the chalcogens.
among इसके कार्बधातुक compounds is ferrocene, the first sandwich compound discovered.
Iron plays an important role in biology, forming complexes with molecular oxygen in hemoglobin and myoglobin ; these दो यौगिकों हैं आम ऑक्सीजन transport proteins in vertebrates.
Iron is also the metal used at the active site of many important redox enzymes dealing with सेल्यूलर श्वसन and oxidation and reduction in plants and animals.
The Blue Cross Blue Shield Association ( bcbsa ) is a federation of 38 separate health insurance organizations and companies in the United States.
Combined, they directly or indirectly provide स्वास्थ्य बीमे to over 99 million Americans.
the इतिहास of ब्लू क्रॉस dates back to 1929, while the history of Blue Shield dates to 1939.
The Blue Cross Association dates back to 1960, while its Blue Shield बंटवारा थी निर्मित in 1948.
The two organizations merged in 1982, forming the current association.
A potato chip ( known as a chip in American, Australian, New Zealand, Canadian, Singaporean, Hong Kong, South African and Jamaican English ; as a कुरकुरे in British English and Hiberno-English, and as either a chip or wafer in Indian English ) is a thin slice of potato that is deep fried or baked until crunchy.
Potato chips are commonly served as an appetizer, side डिश, or स्नैक.
The basic chips are cooked and salted ; additional varieties are manufactured using विभिन्न flavorings और संघटक including seasonings, herbs, spices, cheeses, and artificial additives.
`` Crisps '', however, may also refer to many different types of savory snack products sold in the संयुक्त किंगडम और आयरलैंड, कुछ बना इससे आलू, लकिन may भी be बना इससे maize, tapioca or other cereals.
An example of these kinds of savory snacks is दानव चबाना.
आलू चिप्स हैं a predominant भाग of the snack food market in English-speaking countries and numerous other Western nations.
The global potato chip market generated total revenues of us $ 16.4 अरब in 2005.
This accounted for 35.5 % of the total savory snacks market in that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ).
Henry Clay, Sr. ( April 12, 1777 – June 29, 1852 ) थी a वकील, राजनेता और skilled orator जो represented Kentucky in both the Senate and in the House of Representatives.
He served three different terms as स्पीकर of the संयुक्त राज्य House of Representatives and was also Secretary of State from 1825 to 1829.
He lost his campaigns for president in 1824, 1832 and 1844.
Clay was a dominant figure in both the First and दूसरी पार्टी प्रणालियों.
As a leading war hawk in 1812, he favored युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन और निभाई a significant भूमिका in leading the nation to war in the War of 1812.
In 1824 he ran for president and lost, but threw his electoral votes to John Quincy Adams, who made उसे सचिव of राज्य as the jacksonians denounced what they considered a `` corrupt bargain. ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 and 1844 as the candidate of the Whig Party, जिससे he संस्थापित और प्रायः dominated.
Clay was the foremost proponent of the American System, fighting for an बढ़ाएँ in tariffs to फोस्टर उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य, the use of federal funding to build and maintain infrastructure, and a strong national bank.
He opposed the annexation of Texas, fearing it होता inject the slavery issue into politics.
Clay also opposed the Mexican-American War and the `` Manifest Destiny `` policy of Democrats, which cost him votes in the close 1844 चुनाव.
Dubbed the `` Great Pacificator, '' Clay brokered important compromises दौरान the nullification संकट और on the गुलामी issue.
As part of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal Trio, '' along with उसके सहयोगियों डेनियल वेबस्टर and John C. Calhoun, he was instrumental in formulating the Missouri Compromise of 1820 and the Compromise of 1850.
He was viewed as the primary representative of Western interests in this group, and was given the names `` हेनरी of the वेस्ट '' and `` The Western Star. ''
A plantation owner, Clay held slaves दौरान उसके आजीवन लकिन freed them in his Will.
Abraham Lincoln, the Whig leader in Illinois, was a great admirer of Clay, saying he थी `` my ideal of a great man. ''
lincoln wholeheartedly supported Clay 's economic programs.
In 1957, a Senate Committee selected Clay as one of the five greatest U.S. Senators, साथ साथ डेनियल Webster, John C. Calhoun, Robert La Follette, and Robert Taft.

The कम्पनी is क्रमित # 232 on सौभाग्य पत्रिका 's 2010 लिस्टिंग of America 's 500 largest public corporations.

The अक्षर थी further popularized by the classic 1939 movie, wherein his full name is not mentioned.
Kristinia जेमी debarge ( ; born कूच 8, 1990 ) is an American singer, songwriter, dancer and actress.
She first appeared on नेशनल television in 2003 as a contestant on the American Idol spin-off, American Juniors.
In 2009, DeBarge signed a contract with the Island Records department Sodapop, releasing उसके डेब्यू एल्बम Exposed in July of the same year.
The first single, `` Goodbye ``, reached the शीर्ष 20 in the us और Canada.

The टोली is coached by Norm Chow.
It was part of the Western एथलेटिक सम्मेलन जबतक जुलाई 2012, जब the टोली joined the Mountain West Conference.
The Hawaii Warriors were the third non-AQ team to play in a BCS कटोरी खेल ; खोने to जॉर्जिया 41–10 in the शुगर कटोरी on जनवरी 1, 2008 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Marvin gaye ( अप्रैल 2, 1939april 1, 1984 ), born Marvin Pentz Gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter and musician.
gaye helped to आकार the ध्वनि of motown रिकॉर्ड in the 1960s साथ a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स सहित `` कैसा Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell, later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On and let 's मिलेंगी it On and became among the first artists in Motown to break away from the reins of its production company.
Gaye 's later recordings influenced several R & B subgenres ऐसे as शांत तूफ़ान और neo-soul.
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 Grammy Award-winning hit `` Sexual healing `` और the मध्यरात्रि प्रेम album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye has been posthumously सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों, सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.

The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in Ukraine ( then officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ), जिससे थी अंतर्गत the सीधा क्षेत्राधिकार of the central authorities of the Soviet Union.
An explosion and fire released large quantities of radioactive particles into the atmosphere, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the पश्चिमी ussr और Europe.
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history, and is एक of तभी दो वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately शामिल over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles.
The official Soviet casualty गिनती of 31 मौतों रै महरूम विवादित, and long-term effects such as cancers and deformities are still being accounted for.
