Mrs. Claus is the wife of Santa Claus, the Christmas gift-bringer in उत्तर अमरीकी और European Christmas tradition.
She is known for making cookies with the elves और तैयारी खिलौने साथ her husband Santa Claus.
Her first name is a mystery, though she has been referred to as Mary, Jessica, Layla, Annette, Heidi, or Martha.
HijackThis ( also HiJackThis or HJT ) is an open source enumerating tool for Microsoft खिड़कियाँ originally निर्मित by Merijn Bellekom, and later sold to Trend Micro.
The program is notable for targeting browser-hijacking विधि, बल्कि than relying on a database of known spyware.
It scans a user 's computer quickly, and displays browser hijacking locations, प्रर्दशित कया प्रविष्टियां are there.
hijackthis is प्रयुक्त primarily लिये निदान of browser hijacking, as uninformed use of its removal facilities can cause significant software damage to a computer.
hijackthis करता नहीं हटाएँ or detect स्पाइवेयर ; it lists most common locations where browser hijacking activity can occur.
Browser hijacking can कारण मैलवेयर to be installed on a computer.
on February 16, 2012, Trend Micro released the HijackThis source code as open source and it is now available on the SourceForge site.
Saddle Creek Records is an अमरीकी रिकार्ड लेबल आधारित in ओमाहा, Nebraska.
Started as a college class project on उद्यमिता, the लेबल थी संस्थापित by माइक mogis and Justin Oberst in 1993 ( as Lumberjack Records ).
Mogis soon turned over his role in the company to robb nansel.
The label is named after Saddle Creek Road, a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha, and the beginnings of a scene whose members included Conor Oberst ( then a solo artist, currently of Bright Eyes, Conor Oberst and the Mystic Valley बैंड, desaparecidos और Monsters of Folk ), Tim Kasher ( then of Slowdown Virginia, currently of Cursive and The Good Life ), and others.
Collectively, they were ज्ञात unofficially as the `` Creekers ''.
Saddle Creek first appeared in छपाई on a दिखाएँ flyer, offering to `` खर्च an evening with Saddle Creek '' ( later to be the title of the label 's DVD. )
Saddle Creek became an incorporated entity as a result of a class project on उद्यमिता.
Distribution is handled by the वैकल्पिक वितरण गठबंधन, which is under the Warner Music Group umbrella.
Saddle Creek Records continues to be the flagship label of a style of music called `` The ओमाहा ध्वनि ``, characterized by a पतला देश twang.
This is increasingly inaccurate, though, with the rise of more electronic ध्वनि ऐसे as those favored by The Faint and Broken Spindles.
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's disparate member bands is somewhat समझाया by उनके इतिहास ; a number of the original members of the label attended grade school together.
A `` sister label '', of sorts, to काठी क्रीक is Team Love, started by Conor Oberst in 2004.
The label opened arms to their first bands not based in Omaha in 2001 with releases by Now It 's ओवरहेड and Sorry About Dresden.
Other non-nebraskan कलाकारों followed, including Los Angeles 's Rilo Kiley, Eric Bachmann ( formerly leader of Archers of Loaf and Crooked Fingers from North Carolina ), Georgie James ( Washington D.C. ), Two Gallants ( San Francisco ), and most recently Tokyo Police Club ( Toronto ).
In 2005, Spend an Evening with Saddle Creek, a documentary detailing the पहला टेन सालो of the रिकार्ड label 's history, was released.
The DVD features extensive interviews with the Saddle Creek bands, archival फुटेज, and rare live performances.
On June 8, 2007, the label opened their own music venue named Slowdown ( after the group Slowdown वर्जिनिया ), स्तिथ in शहर ओमाहा, Nebraska.
The following is a सूची of एपीसोड for the television show Full House.
In total, there were 192 episodes filmed for the show over the कोर्स of इसके eight seasons, from 1987 to 1995.
Full House is a situation कॉमेडी जिससे क्रॉनिकल्स a widowed father 's struggles of raising his three young daughters and the lives that they have touched.
The patriarch of the परिवार, डैनी ( bob saget ), invites his brother-in-law Jesse ( John Stamos ) and his best friend Joey ( Dave Coulier ), to help raise his children ( Candace Cameron, Jodie Sweetin, and Mary Kate/Ashley Olsen ), after his wife was killed during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver.
After episodes 88 and 89, Jesse marries बेकी ( लोरी loughlin ), and they move into the attic.
तब, बाद एपीसोड 104 और 105, बेकी और जेसी have twin boys named Nicky and Alex ( Daniel and Kevin Renteria/Blake and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit ).
The श्रेणी ends साथ एपीसोड 192, `` Michelle Rides Again Part 2 '', when Michelle loses her memory and the family tries to restore it.
Notice of Stamp Act of 1765 in Newspaper
American newspapers reacted to the Stamp Act with anger and पूर्वानुमान of the demise of journalism.
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties in American Colonies Act 1765 ; 5 George III, c. 12 ) imposed a direct tax by the British Parliament specifically on the colonies of British America, and it required that many मुद्रित सामग्री in the colonies be उत्पादित on stamped पेपर उत्पादित in लंदन, carrying an embossed आय stamp.
These मुद्रित सामग्री were legal documents, magazines, newspapers and many other types of paper used throughout the colonies.
Like previous taxes, the stamp tax had to be paid in valid British currency, not in औपनिवेशिक पेपर धन.
The purpose of the tax was to help pay for सैनिकों stationed in उत्तर अमेरिका बाद the British victory in the Seven Years ' War.
The British government felt that the colonies were the primary beneficiaries of इस सैन्य उपस्थिति, और चाहिए pay at least a portion of the expense.
The स्टैम्प Act met great resistance in the colonies.
The colonies sent no representatives to Parliament, and therefore had no influence over what taxes were raised, कैसा वे यहूद levied, or how they would be spent.
Many colonists considered it a violation of their rights as Englishmen to be taxed बगैर उनके सहमति —consent कि तभी the औपनिवेशिक legislatures could grant.
Colonial सभाओं भेजा याचिकाएं and protests.
The Stamp Act Congress held in New York City, reflecting the first significant joint colonial response to any British measure, भी petitioned पार्लियामेंट और the King.
Local protest groups, led by colonial merchants and landowners, established connections through correspondence that created a ढीला गठबन्धन कि विस्तारित इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड to Georgia.
Protests and demonstrations initiated by the Sons of Liberty often turned violent और destructive as the masses became involved.
Very soon all stamp tax distributors were intimidated into resigning उनके आयोग, और the tax was never effectively collected.
Opposition to the Stamp Act was not सीमित to the colonies.
British merchants and manufacturers, whose exports to the colonies were threatened by colonial economic problems exacerbated by the कर, भी pressured Parliament.
The Act was repealed on March 18, 1766 as a पदार्थ of expedience, लकिन पार्लियामेंट affirmed इसके शक्ति to legislate for the colonies “in all cases whatsoever” by also passing the Declaratory Act.
There followed a श्रेणी of नई taxes and regulations, likewise opposed by the colonists.
The episode played a major role in defining the grievances and enabling the व्यवस्थित औपनिवेशिक प्रतिरोध कि led to the American Revolution in 1775.
pt-105 underway.
PT नौकाएँ यहूद a किस्में of torpedo-armed तेज़ attack craft used by the United States Navy in World War II to attack larger surface ships.
`` PT '' is the us हल वर्गीकरण symbol for `` Patrol Torpedo ''.
The pt नाव squadrons were nicknamed `` the mosquito fleet ''.
The Japanese पुकारा them `` Devil Boats ''.
The original pre– World War I torpedo नौकाएँ यहूद designed with `` displacement '' hulls.
They displaced up to 300 टन और the top speed was.
The PT नौकाएँ प्रयुक्त in संसार युद्ध ii were built using the planing -type hull form developed for racing boats.
They were much smaller ( 30–75 टन ) और faster ( 35–40 knots ).
Both types were designed to स्ट्राइक at larger warships साथ torpedoes, using अपेक्षाकृत high speed to get close, and small size to avoid being spotted and hit by gunfire.
They यहूद much कम महंगी than large warships.
PT boats were much faster, smaller, and सस्ता than conventional ( विस्थापन हल ) vessels.
During World War II, American pt नौकाएँ सगाई दुश्मन destroyers और numerous other surface craft, ranging from small boats to large supply ships.
PT boats also operated as gunboats against enemy small craft, such as कराया barges used by the Japanese forces for inter-island transport.
Good Friday is a religious holiday observed primarily by Christians commemorating the crucifixion of यीशु मसीह और उसके मौत at कलवारी.
The holiday is observed दौरान पावन सप्ताह as भाग of the Paschal Triduum on the Friday preceding Easter Sunday, and may coincide with the Jewish observance of Passover.
It is also known as Holy Friday, Great Friday, Black Friday, or Easter Friday, though the latter properly refers to the शुक्रवार in Easter week.
Based on the details of the canonical gospels, the Crucifixion of Jesus was most likely to have been on a Friday ( the day before the Sabbath ) ( ).
The estimated year of the Crucifixion is AD 33, by two different समूह, और originally as AD 34 by Isaac Newton via the differences between the Biblical and Julian calendars and the crescent of the moon.
A third method, using a completely अलग खगोलीय approach based on a lunar Crucifixion darkness and eclipse model ( consistent with Apostle Peter 's reference to a `` moon of blood '' in Acts 2:20 ), points to Friday, 3 April AD 33.
the ग्रेट जलाशय is the largest area of endorheic watersheds in North America.
It is noted for both its arid conditions and its Basin and range topography that varies from the North American low point at badwater जलाशय to the उच्चतम पाइंट of the संलग्न United States, less than away at the summit of Mount Whitney.
The region spans several physiographic विभाजन, biomes / ecoregions, and deserts.
रास्टर may refer to:
रास्टर ग्राफिक्स, आलेखीय techniques using arrays of pixel values
Raster ग्राफिक्स एडिटर, a computer program
Raster scan, the pattern of image readout, हस्तांतरण, storage, and reconstruction in television and computer images
Rasterisation, or rasterization, परिवर्तन of a vector image to a raster image
Raster image processor, or RIP, a component of a printing system that performs rasterisation
रास्टर इन्टरनेट, a computer interrupt signal
Raster to vector, an image परिवर्तन process
Raster bar, an प्रभाव प्रयुक्त in computer demos
raster-noton, a record label
Rastrum, a device used in मध्यकालीन म्यूज़िक पांडुलिपियों to draw staff lines
Raster Document ऑब्जेक्ट, a file format
Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary Geatish hero and later turned king in the epic poem named बाद उसे, एक of the oldest surviving टुकड़े of साहित्य in the English language.
The attack on Pearl हार्बर ( पुकारा हवाई आपरेशन or आपरेशन ai by the जापानी Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning ) and the Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
इससे the standpoint of the defenders, the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with military actions the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध विदेशी territories of the संयुक्त किंगडम, the नीदरलैंड्स, and the United States.
The base was attacked by 353 जापानी सेनानी, बमवर्षक और torpedo planes in two waves, launched from six aircraft carriers.
All eight U.S. नेवी battleships यहूद damaged, with four being sunk.
Two of these were later raised, and साथ the बाकी चार repaired, छह battleships returned to service later in the war.
The Japanese also sank or damaged three cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship, and one minelayer.
188 u.S. वायुयान यहूद destroyed ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded.
Important base संस्थापना ऐसे as the शक्ति स्टेशन, डॉकयार्ड, मेंटेनेंस, और ईंधन and torpedo storage facilities, as well as the submarine piers and headquarters building ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked.
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft and पाँच midget submarines खोया, और 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One Japanese sailor was captured.
The attack आए as a profound shock to the American people and led directly to the American entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters.
The following day ( December 8 ), the United राज्य घोषित war on Japan.
Domestic support for non-interventionism, which had महरूम दमदार, disappeared.
clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( for example the Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance.
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted जर्मनी और इटली to घोषित युद्ध on the u.S. on दिसम्बर 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
There were numerous historical precedents for unannounced military action by Japan.
However, the lack of any formal warning, particularly while negotiations were still apparently ongoing, led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7, 1941, `` a date which will live in infamy ``.
U.S. रूट 85 ( us 85 ) is a north–south संयुक्त States highway that runs for in the Mountain - Northern Plains states of the United States.
The southern टर्मिनस of the रूट is at the संयुक्त states-mexico किनारा in el पासो, Texas, connecting with Mexican Federal Highway 45.
The northern terminus is at the United states-canada किनारा in fortuna, उत्तर डकोटा, जहाँ the route continues north as Saskatchewan Highway 35.
in दोनो the संयुक्त राज्य and Saskatchewan, Canada the route is known as the CanAm Highway.
Sections of US 85 are considered part of the Theodore Roosevelt Expressway.
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, आयोजित on Tuesday, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, former Vice-President Richard Nixon, won the election over the Democratic nominee, लाज़िम Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
Nixon ran on a campaign that promised to restore law and order to the nation 's cities, torn by riots and crime.
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि had dominated presidential politics for 36 years.
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide, the election saw the incumbent president forced out of the race and a Republican elected लिये the पहला समय in बारह years.
It was a wrenching national experience, conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King, Jr., and subsequent race riots across the स्वदेश, the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. कैनेडी, फैली विपक्ष to the वियतनाम युद्ध आरपार university campuses, and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election featured the strongest third party effort since 1912 by former अलबामा राज्यपाल George Wallace, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to समाप्त स्कूल पृथक्करण, he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North.
This was the last election in which New यॉर्क था the सबसे मत in the electoral college ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 census, California gained the most electoral votes and has remained the most populous state since then.
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी 's घर state.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications, processes and CPU usage, commit charge and memory information, network activity and statistics, logged-in users, and system services ( and as often is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft लिये खिड़कियाँ, 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ जिससे भरता the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly, e.g, `` प्रक्रम एक्सप्लोरर '', `` विस्तारित कार्य मैनेजर '', `` anvir कार्य मैनेजर '', `` प्रक्रम Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities, processor affinity, forcibly terminate processes, और shut bas, restart, hibernate or log बंद इससे खिड़कियाँ.
Windows Task Manager थी introduced with Windows NT 4.0.
पिछला संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the Task List application, which had far fewer features.
The task list was capable of listing currently कार्यशील प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या उन्हें, or बनाना a new process.
In Windows XP only, a Shutdown menu is also present that allows access to standby, hibernate, फेरे बंद, Restart, Log Off and Switch User.
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x, खिड़कियाँ 95, Windows 98 ) had a program known as tasks to display the programs currently running.
This file was executed by कार्यशील the taskman.exe file from the C : \Windows directory.
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that are used in the modern Japanese writing system साथ साथ hiragana ( ひらがな, ), katakana ( カタカナ, ), Hindu-Arabic numerals, and the occasional use of the Latin alphabet.
The Japanese term kanji ( ) for the चाइनीज वर्ण वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` Han characters '' and is written using the same characters as the Chinese hanzi ( ).
John R Williams ( May 4, 1782 – October 20, 1854 ) was an American soldier, merchant, and politician who is most well known for serving as the पहला महापौर of डेट्रॉयट, मिशिगन.
In total, he served as Detroit 's महापौर लिये पाँच other terms.
He also was a brigadier general in the संयुक्त राज्य फौज दौरान the Black Hawk War.

A smartphone that can be used as a compass क्युकी of the magnetometer inside.

A कम्पास is a navigational यंत्र कि shows directions in a frame of reference that is stationary relative to the surface of the earth.
The frame of सन्दर्भ defines the चार कार्डिनल दिशानिर्देश ( or points ) – north, south, east, and west.
Intermediate directions are भी पारिभाषित.
Usually, a diagram called a compass rose, which shows the दिशानिर्देश ( साथ उनके names प्रायः abbreviated to आद्याक्षर ), is marked on the compass.
When the compass is in use, the rose is aligned with the real directions in the frame of सन्दर्भ, so, लिये उदाहरण, the `` N '' mark on the rose really points to the north.
Frequently, in addition to the rose or sometimes instead of it, angle markings in डिग्री हैं shown on the compass.
North corresponds to zero degrees, and the angles increase clockwise, so ईस्ट is 90 डिग्री, south is 180, and west is 270.
These numbers allow the compass to show azimuths or bearings, which are commonly stated in इस संकेतन.
The magnetic compass was first invented as a device for divination as early as the चाइनीज हान राजवंश ( Since about 206 BC ).
The compass was used in Song Dynasty China by the military for navigational orienteering by 1040-1044, and was used for maritime navigation by 1111 to 1117.
The use of a compass is recorded in Western यूरोपीय between 1187 and 1202, and in Persia in 1232.
The dry compass was invented in Europe around 1300.
इस थी supplanted in the early 20th century by the liquid-filled magnetic compass.
The Inca Empire or Inka साम्राज्य ( quechua : tawantinsuyu ) was the largest empire in pre-Columbian America.
The administrative, political and military center of the empire was located in कुज़्को in modern-day पेरू.
The Inca सभ्यता arose इससे the highlands of Peru sometime in the early 13th century.
From 1438 to 1533, the Incas used a variety of methods, from conquest to peaceful assimilation, to incorporate a large portion of western South America, centered on the Andean mountain ranges, including, besides Peru, large parts of modern Ecuador, western and दक्षिण सेंट्रल बोलीविया, उत्तरपश्चिम अर्जेंटीना, उत्तर और सेंट्रल चिली, और दक्षिणी कोलंबिया into a राज्य comparable to the historical empires of Eurasia.
The official भाषा of the साम्राज्य थी quechua, although hundreds of local languages and dialects of Quechua were spoken.
The Inca referred to their empire as Tawantinsuyu which can be अनूदित as the चार regions or the चार संयुक्त Provinces.
There were many local forms of worship, most of them concerning local sacred `` Huacas ``, लकिन the इन्का नेतृत्व प्रोत्साहित the इबादत of inti —the सूर्य god—and imposed its sovereignty above other cults such as that of Pachamama.
The Incas considered their King, the Sapa इन्का, to be the `` child of the sun. ''
The गुर्दे हैं अंगों कि serve several essential regulatory roles in most animals, including vertebrates and some invertebrates.
They are essential in the urinary प्रणाली और भी serve homeostatic कृत्यों ऐसे as the विनियमन of electrolytes, maintenance of acid–base balance, and regulation of blood pressure ( via maintaining salt and water balance ).
They serve the body as a प्राकृतिक फिल्टर of the blood, and remove wastes which are diverted to the urinary bladder.
In producing urine, the kidneys excrete wastes such as urea and ammonium, and they are also जिम्मेदार लिये the reabsorption of water, glucose, and amino acids.
The kidneys also produce hormones including calcitriol, erythropoietin, and the enzyme renin.
Located at the rear of the abdominal cavity in the retroperitoneum, the गुर्दे प्राप्त रक्त from the paired renal arteries, and drain into the paired renal veins.
प्रत्येक गुर्दा excretes मूत्र into a ureter, itself a paired structure that empties into the urinary bladder.
Renal physiology is the study of kidney function, while nephrology is the चिकित्सा specialty concerned with kidney diseases.
Diseases of the गुर्दा हैं विविध, लकिन individuals with kidney disease frequently display characteristic clinical features.
Common clinical conditions involving the kidney include the nephritic and nephrotic syndromes, renal cysts, अधि गुर्दा injury, chronic kidney disease, urinary tract infection, nephrolithiasis, and urinary tract obstruction.
Various cancers of the kidney exist ; the सबसे आम वयस्क renal कर्कट is renal cell carcinoma.
Cancers, cysts, and some अन्य renal शर्तें can be managed with removal of the kidney, or nephrectomy.
When renal function, measured by glomerular filtration रेट, is persistently ग़रीब, dialysis and kidney transplantation may be treatment options.
Although they are not severely harmful, kidney stones can be दुखद और a nuisance.
The removal of kidney stones involves ultrasound treatment to break up the पत्थरों into छोटी टुकड़े, जिससे हैं तब passed through the urinary tract.
One common symptom of kidney stones is a sharp pain in the medial/lateral खण्ड of the निम्नतर वापस.
Lockton कंपनियाँ inc. is the संसार 's largest privately आयोजित insurance brokerage firm, providing insurance, risk management and employee benefits solutions.
In addition to its कान्सास नगर, मिसौरी मुख्यालय, Lockton operates 60 locations in 17 countries.
Lockton is currently home to more than 4,450 शरीक विश्वव्यापी.
The company was founded by Jack lockton in 1966 और रै चूंकि become the world’s 9th largest insurance brokerage firm.
Lockton serves a wide array of industries with services that include risk प्रबन्धन, casualty, surety, पेशेवर indemnity and more.
For 46 years, lockton posted असाधारण सशुल्क growth, with global revenues reaching $ 915 million in fiscal 2012.
Lockton Benefits Group : Lockton’s कर्मचारी benefit’s टोली works closely साथ बीमे carriers and administrators to create comprehensive and integrated benefits strategies for clients.
The Lockton Benefits Group provides services including अनुपालन, कार्यपालिका लाभ, स्वास्थ्य and welfare, health risk solutions, retirement and more.
Lockton Affinity : Lockton Affinity, an affiliate of Lockton Companies, meets the बीमे needs of अपनापन समूह, franchises, professional organizations, and associations of all sizes.
lockton Affinity offers a variety of insurance product options and programs.
Products include : General Liability, Professional Liability, Property, Workers Compensation, Directors & Officers Liability, Commercial Auto, specialty कवरेज, excess, स्वास्थ्य योजनाएँ और more.
lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय : lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय operates offices in the UK and Ireland, as well as offices throughout Asia and Latin America.
In Europe, Lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय is a संगी in eos risq, Europe’s leading insurance broking and risk management consultancy.
eos risq is an equity-based European partnership of major independent insurance brokers with over 3,500 employees based in more than 30 countries in Europe.
lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय provides specialized solutions for personal lines, SME’s and major multi-national clients.
White chocolate is a चॉकलेट derivative.
It commonly consists of cocoa butter, sugar, milk solids and salt, and is characterized by a पाले पीला or आइवरी रूप.
The melting पाइंट of cocoa मक्खन, इसके प्राथमिक cocoa bean component, is high enough to keep white chocolate solid at room temperature.
Donald Leon `` Don '' Blankenship ( born कूच 14, 1950 ) was Chairman and CEO of Massey Energy Co., the sixth largest coal company ( by 2008 production ) in the United States.
He served in those भूमिकाएँ इससे नवम्बर 30, 2000, until December 31, 2010.
Blankenship is an active financial backer of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी और भागीदार in लोकल and state politics, especially in his home state of West Virginia.
He has frequently spoken out सरेआम परिचय राजनीती, the environment, unions, and coal production.
U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filings दिखाएँ blankenship थी सशुल्क $ 17.8 million in 2009, the highest in the coal industry.
His 2009 pay represents a $ 6.8 लाख उठाएँ over 2008 और almost double his compensation package in 2007.
Blankenship भी प्राप्त a deferred compensation package valued at $ 27.2 million in 2009.
On December 3, 2010, Blankenship announced that he was retiring as सीईओ at the समाप्त of the साल, and would be succeeded by Massey President Baxter F. Phillips Jr.

Negligence ( Lat. negligentia, from neglegere, to neglect, literally `` not to pick up something '' ) is a failure to exercise the care that a reasonably prudent person would exercise in like circumstances.
The area of tort law known as लापरवाही involves नुक़सान caused by carelessness, not intentional harm.
According to Jay M. feinman of the rutgers University School of Law ;
`` The core idea of negligence is that people should exercise reasonable परवाह जब वे अधिनियम by लेने खाता of the संभावित नुक़सान कि वे might foreseeably cause harm to other people. ''
`` those who go personally or bring property जहाँ वे जान कि वे or it may आइये into टक्कर साथ the व्यक्तियों or प्रॉपर्टी of others have by law a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to avoid such a collision. ''
Fletcher v rylands ( [ 1866 ] LR 1 Ex 265 )
Through civil litigation, if an injured person proves that another person acted negligently to कारण their injury, they can recover damages to compensate for their harm.
Proving a case for negligence can potentially entitle the घायल अभियोक्ता to compensation for harm to their body, property, mental well-being, financial status, or intimate relationships.
However, because negligence cases are very fact-specific, this general definition does not fully explain the concept of when the law will require one व्यक्ति to compensate another लिये नुकसान caused by आकस्मिक चोट.
Further, the law of negligence at common विधि is तभी एक पहलू of the विधि of liability.
Although resulting damages must be proven in order to recover compensation in a negligence action, the प्रकृति और extent of those क्षतिपूर्ति हैं नहीं the primary focus of negligence cases.
A melanocytic nevus ( also known as `` Nevocytic nevus '' ) is a type of lesion कि contains nevus cells ( a type of melanocyte ).
Some स्त्रोत equate the term mole with `` melanocytic nevus ''.
Other sources reserve the term `` mole '' for other उद्देश्य.
The majority of moles appear during the first two decades of a person’s life, जबकि परिचय एक in प्रत्येक 100 शिशु is born with moles.
Acquired moles are a form of benign neoplasm, while जन्मजात औज़ार, or जन्मजात nevi, हैं माना a नाबालिग malformation or hamartoma and may be at a higher risk for melanoma.
A mole can be either subdermal ( under the skin ) or a pigmented growth on the skin, formed mostly of a type of cell known as a melanocyte.
The high concentration of the body’s pigmenting agent, melanin, is responsible for their dark color.
Moles are a member of the family of स्किन lesions ज्ञात as nevi.
The comprehensive metabolic फलक, or रासायनिक स्क्रीन, ( cmp ; cpt कोड 80053 ) is a फलक of 14 blood tests which serves as an initial broad medical screening tool.
the cmp provides a अशिष्ट जाँच of kidney function, liver function, and electrolyte and fluid balance, but it is far from perfect.
Abnormal values from a CBC may be a result of false positives and thus the CBC may need to be repeated लिये a रोगी ( or replaced साथ a अधिक विशिष्ट test ).
The CMP is an expanded version of the basic metabolic फलक ( bmp ), जिससे does not include liver tests.
A CMP ( or BMP ) can be ordered as part of a routine physical examination, or may be used to monitor a patient with a chronic disease, such as diabetes mellitus or hypertension.
Previous names for the panel of tests have महरूम chem 12, रसायन फलक, Chemistry screen, SMA 12, SMA 20 and SMAC ( Sequential Multiple Analysis - Computer ).
The tests are performed on मशीने आधारित on the AutoAnalyzer invented in 1957.
Natural gas extraction by देशों in घन meters per year.
प्राकृतिक गैस is a naturally occurring hydrocarbon gas mixture consisting primarily of methane, but commonly including varying amounts of other hydrocarbons, carbon dioxide, nitrogen, and hydrogen sulfide.
Natural gas is an उर्जा source often used for heating, cooking, and electricity generation.
It is also used as ईंधन लिये वाहनों और as a रासायनिक फर्टिलाइजर in the manufacture of plastics and other commercially important organic chemicals.
Natural gas is found in deep underground natural rock formations or associated with अन्य हाइड्रोकार्बन टंकी in कोयले beds and as methane clathrates.
Petroleum is भी another संसाधन found in proximity to and with natural gas.
Most प्राकृतिक gas was created over time by two mechanisms : biogenic and thermogenic.
Biogenic gas is created by methanogenic जीवों in marshes, bogs, landfills, and shallow sediments.
Deeper in the earth, at greater temperature and pressure, thermogenic गैस is निर्मित इससे दफ्न organic material.
Before प्राकृतिक गैस can be प्रयुक्त as a ईंधन, it जरूर undergo processing to remove impurities, including water, to meet the specifications of marketable natural gas.
The by-products of processing include ethane, propane, butanes, pentanes, और उच्चतर आणविक वज़न hydrocarbons, hydrogen sulfide ( which may be converted into pure sulfur ), carbon dioxide, water vapor, and sometimes helium and nitrogen.
Natural gas is often informally referred to बस as gas, especially when compared to other energy sources such as oil or coal.
This page is about the कल्पना मूवर्स band.
For information about the tv दिखाएँ अभिनीत the band, see Imagination Movers ( TV series ).
Imagination Movers is a band formed in New ऑरलियन्स, louisiana, in 2003.
The lineup शामिल समृद्ध Collins, Scott Durbin, Dave Poche, and Scott `` Smitty '' Smith.
Members of the group were longtime मित्रों और पड़ोसी.
The group started as a television/music concept which was pitched to लोकल pbs affiliates in नई Orleans.
WLAE-TV was the first to take an interest in the group and later introduced them to Beth Courtney, the President & Chief Executive अधिकारी at louisiana पब्लिक प्रसारण.
Soon बाद, lpb began airing one-minute videos produced by the Imagination Movers themselves.
The Movers built a sizable regional following by setting educational songs for kids to melodies and rhythms कि वयस्कों कद्र as well.
They sold more than 100,000 नक़ल of उनके self-produced CDs and DVDs.
Their three indie CDs : `` Good Ideas, '' `` Calling All Movers, '' and `` Eight Feet '' along with their grass roots DVD `` Stir It Up '' have, combined, won fourteen national awards, from such groups as the नेशनल संघ of परवरिश publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' Choice.
In early 2005, डिज़्नी took notice, and initiated negotiations to add the Movers to the company 's roster.
These were interrupted in August when the flood protection designed and built by the फौज corps of इंजीनियर्स to protect New Orleans failed.
The resulting floodwater claimed the बैंड 's दफ्तर, as खूब as the घरों of Collins, Durbin and Poche – but the deal was signed in the spring of 2006.
In 2008, Walt Disney Records introduced the Imagination Movers ' music to the nation with the release of the मूवर्स ' पहला nationally-released cd, `` रस Box Heroes. ''
In September 2008, a 30-minute दिखाएँ featuring the group began airing on the Disney Channel 's preschool programming block known as Playhouse Disney, and currently airs on Playhouse Disney 's replacement, Disney Junior.
The Movers write and perform all the songs on उनके दिखाएँ.
Moreover, the Imagination Movers have received critical kudos for their live concert प्रदर्शन.
In October 2009, the Imagination Movers started the `` Live from the Idea गोदाम कॉन्सर्ट दौरे 2009 ''.
Traveling from mid-October to mid-December 2009 their live प्रदर्शन शामिल लोट of उनके favorite songs and dancing, as well as video appearances of Warehouse Mouse.
Beginning in early-February 2011 और wrapping up in लेट may 2011, the कल्पना मूवर्स प्रस्तुत उनके `` in a बिग गोदाम Concert Tour, '' playing more than 100 shows in 50+ cities across North America.
From March to October 2012, the Imagination Movers toured North अमेरिका on उनके post-disney `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour.
The show maintained अनेक तत्व of the असली tv अवधारणा, ऐसे as an on-stage `` idea emergency '' and several sets from their older catalogue ; however, with the departure of Wendy Calio back to her native Hawaii, the character `` Nina '', along with her musical numbers, is not present.
The tour promotes the Imagination Movers ' new album/dvd रिलीज, `` rock-o-matic '', which features all new music from the band.
The album itself is उत्पादित independently of डिज़्नी और has a notably more mature, contemporary rock-and-roll sound, though still very appropriate for children.
Several performance dates यहूद स्थानांतरित to बाद in 2012 to लाभ from the increased exposure of the Imagination Movers TV show now playing daily on Disney Junior.
The platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern Australia, including Tasmania.
Together with the four species of echidna, it is one of the five extant species of monotremes, the तभी स्तनधारियों कि lay अंडे बजाय of giving birth.
It is the sole living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ), though a number of सम्बन्धित प्रजाति have महरूम मिला in the चट्टान रिकार्ड.
The असामान्य रूप of इस egg-laying, बतख -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed mammal baffled European naturalists when they first encountered it, with some considering it an elaborate fraud.
It is one of the few venomous mammals, the पुरूष platypus having a spur on the हिन्द foot that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable और iconic symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the animal emblem of the राज्य of नई दक्षिण वेल्स.
Until the early 20th सदी, it थी hunted लिये इसके fur, but it is now protected throughout its range.
Although captive breeding programmes have had only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of प्रदूषण, it is not under any immediate threat.
The Chupacabra or Chupacabras (, from chupar `` to suck '' and cabra `` goat '', literally `` बकरी चूषक '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit parts of the Americas.
It is associated more recently with sightings of an allegedly अनजान एनिमल in प्यूर्टो रीको ( जहाँ ये sightings यहूद पहला reported ), Mexico, and the United States, especially in the latter 's Latin American communities.
The name comes from the animal 's reported आदत of attacking और पीने the blood of livestock, especially goats.
Physical descriptions of the creature vary.
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as early as 1995 in Puerto Rico, and have since been reported as far north as maine, और as दूर दक्षिण as चिली, और भी होने spotted outside the Americas in countries like Russia and The Philippines.
It is माना a भारी प्राणी, the size of a small bear, with a row of spines reaching from the neck to the base of the tail.
Sighting reports of the Chupacabra have been disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking प्रमाण, जबकि सबसे reports in northern Mexico and the southern United States have been verified as canids afflicted by mange.
Biologists and wildlife प्रबन्धन officials view the chupacabra as a contemporary legend.
The North American फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध ( nafta ) is an agreement signed by Canada, Mexico, and the United States, creating a trilateral trade bloc in North America.
The अनुबंध आए into force on January 1, 1994.
It superseded the Canada–United States Free Trade अनुबंध between the U.S., Canada, and Mexico
NAFTA has two supplements : the North American अनुबंध on पर्यावरणीय सहयोग ( NAAEC ) and the North American Agreement on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ).
Thermal comfort is the condition of mind that expresses satisfaction with the thermal environment and is assessed by subjective evaluation ( ANSI / ASHRAE Standard 55 ).
Maintaining this standard of थर्मल सुकून लिये occupants of इमारतें or अन्य enclosures is one of the important goals of HVAC ( heating, ventilation, and air conditioning ) design engineers.
The Predicted Mean Vote ( PMV ) model stands among the most recognized थर्मल सुकून मॉडल.
It was developed using principles of heat balance and प्रायोगिक आंकड़ा एकत्रित in a नियंत्रित जलवायु chamber under steady state conditions.
Because the PMV model was derived from data collected in a controlled climate, it is not suitable for अनुप्रयोग in naturally हवादार स्पेसेस जिससे often have high levels of air movement.
This shortcoming motivated the विकास of a परिवार of अनुभवजन्य सांख्यिकीय models of thermal comfort in naturally ventilated spaces known as adaptive models.
Adaptive models of thermal comfort consider occupants as dynamically interacting साथ उनके environment, and controlling their thermal comfort by means of clothing or window-opening and closing.
This is in contrast to thermal comfort in sealed buildings, in which occupants experience the पर्यावरण passively.
थर्मल सुकून is प्रभावित by ऊष्मा conduction, convection, radiation, and evaporative heat loss.
Thermal comfort is कायम जब the ऊष्मा उत्पन्न by human metabolism is allowed to dissipate, thus maintaining thermal equilibrium with the surroundings.
It has been long recognized that the sensation of feeling hot or cold is not just dependent on air temperature alone.
Thermal comfort calculations according to ANSI/ASHRAE Standard 55 can be freely performed साथ the cbe थर्मल सुकून औजार for ASHRAE-55.
Durante degli Alighieri, simply referred to as Dante (, ; ; c. 1265–1321 ), थी a major Italian poet of the Middle Ages.
His Divine Comedy, originally पुकारा ' और बाद पुकारा ' by boccaccio, is widely माना the greatest literary work composed in the Italian language and a masterpiece of world literature.
In Italy he is known as ' ( `` the परम् कवि '' ) or just '.
He, Petrarch and Boccaccio are also known as `` the three स्रोतों '' or `` the three crowns ''.
Dante is also called the `` पिता of the इतालवी language ''.
मुख्यालय ( Kobe, Japan )
( ) is a tire and rubber कम्पनी आधारित in Japan.
It is भाग of the Sumitomo Group.
The company traces its origins to 1909, when the Sumitomo Group made an investment in Dunlop Japan, the newly formed Japanese subsidiary of the British कम्पनी dunlop रबर.
over the सालो sumitomo और Dunlop developed a close business relationship, and in 1963 the Sumitomo Group acquired control of Dunlop Japan and renamed it Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd.
in 1985, जब dunlop रबर थी taken over by BTR plc, the company acquired the automobile tire assets of Dunlop, including the right to use the Dunlop brand on automobile tires.
The acquisition did not include the US and Australian businesses, which were separately owned, but in 1986 Sumitomo also acquired the Dunlop Tire Corporation of the US इससे इसके प्रबन्धन.
In 1997, Sumitomo formed a joint venture with Goodyear Tire and Rubber Company, by which Goodyear and Sumitomo agreed to manufacture टायर लिये प्रत्येक अन्य 's बाज़ार, सहित Dunlop branded tires.
As part of the अनुबंध, goodyear acquired 75 % रूचि in dunlop Tyres, the UK company which Sumitomo had formed, and in Dunlop Tire Corporation.
Goodyear and sumitomo भी made investments in each other.
Today, the company makes a wide range of rubber based products, सहित ऑटोमोबाइल टायर, golf balls and tennis balls.
Microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware integrated development environments ( IDE ) developed by Microsoft that are lightweight versions of the Microsoft Visual स्टुडियो उत्पाद line.
Express Editions were conceived शुरूआत साथ Visual Studio 2005.
The idea of एक्स्प्रेस संस्करण is to provide streamlined, easy-to-use and easy-to-learn IDEs for users other than professional software developers, such as hobbyists and students.
The Alps are एक of the ग्रेट पहाड़ दायरा प्रणालियों of यूरोपीय stretching approximately across eight Alpine countries from Austria and Slovenia in the east, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Germany, France to the west and Italy and Monaco to the south.
The mountains were formed over hundreds of millions of years as the African and यूरेशियाई tectonic प्लेटों collided.
Extreme shortening caused by the event resulted in marine sedimentary rocks rising by thrusting and folding into ऊँची पहाड़ चोटियों ऐसे as Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn.
Mont Blanc spans the French–Italian border, and at is the उच्चतम पहाड़ in the Alps.
The Alpine region area contains many चोटियों उच्चतर than, ज्ञात as the `` four-thousanders ``.
The altitude and size of the range affects the climate in Europe ; in the mountains precipitation levels vary greatly and climatic शर्तें consist of पृथक zones.
Wildlife such as ibex live in the higher peaks to elevations of, and plants such as Edelweiss grow in rocky areas in lower elevations as well as in higher elevations.
प्रमाण of इंसान habitation in the Alps goes back to the Paleolithic era.
A mummified man, determined to be 5,000 years old, was discovered on a glacier at the austrian–italian border in 1991.
By the 6th century bc, the सेल्टिक la tène culture was well established.
Hannibal may have crossed the Alps with a herd of elephants, and the romans था settlements in the region.
In 1800 Napoleon crossed एक of the mountain passes with an army of 40,000.
The 18th and 19th centuries saw an influx of naturalists, writers, and कलाकारों, in particular the Romantics, followed by the golden age of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the peaks.
In World War II the Third Reich invaded the Alpine countries, with the exception of Switzerland and liechtenstein ; एडोल्फ हिटलर kept a base of operation in the Bavarian Alps throughout the war.
The Alpine प्रदेश रै a दमदार cultural identity.
The traditional culture of farming, cheesemaking, and woodworking still exists in Alpine गांवों, हालांकि the पर्यटक उद्योग began to grow जल्दी in the 20th century and expanded greatly after World War II to become the dominant industry by the end of the century.
The Winter Olympic Games have महरूम hosted in the Swiss, French, Italian, Austrian and German Alps.
At present the region is home to 14 million people and has 120 लाख सालाना visitors.
Lois Patrice Griffin ( née Pewterschmidt ) is a character from the animated टेलीविज़न श्रेणी Family Guy.
She is voiced by writer Alex Borstein and first appeared on television, along with the rest of the परिवार in the 15-minute छोटी on दिसम्बर 20, 1998.
Lois was created and designed by series निर्माता सेठ MacFarlane.
MacFarlane was asked to pitch a pilot to the Fox Broadcasting Company based on Larry and Steve, a short made by MacFarlane which featured a middle-aged character named Larry और an बौद्धिक श्वान, स्टीव.
After the pilot was given the green light, the Griffin परिवार appeared on the एपीसोड `` मौत Has a Shadow ``.
Lois is the माँ of the Griffin family.
With her husband Peter, she has had three children : मेग, क्रिस, और Stewie.
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother, despite उसके admitting to होने a ड्रग उपयोक्ता, a recovering मेथ addict kleptomaniac.
Lois has also had several affairs, one of which allegedly resulted in the धारणा of Meg.
She has appeared in other media relating to Family Guy—including a video game, commercials और books—and प्रेरित an संपूर्ण लकीर of merchandise.
Lois 's distinctive New York accent originated from a character in a stage show that Alex Borstein had performed in, जिससे थी largely प्रेरित by a relative who grew up on Long Island, New York.
Family transmission of Basque language ( Basque as initial भाषा )
Percentage of students registered in Basque language स्कूलों ( 2000–2005 ).

Basque ( endonym :, ) is the ancestral language of the Basque लोगों, जो inhabit the बास्क Country, a region spanning an area in northeastern Spain and southwestern France.
It is spoken by 27 % of basques in सब territories ( 714,136 out of 2,648,998 ).
Of these, 663,035 live in the Spanish part of the बास्क देश और the remaining 51,100 live in the French part.
In academic discussions of the distribution of Basque in Spain and France, it is customary to refer to three ancient प्रांतों in फ़्रांस और चार स्पेनी प्रांतों.
देशी अध्यक्षों हैं concentrated in a संलग्न area including parts of the Spanish autonomous communities of the Basque Country and Navarre and in the western half of the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques.
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic बास्क देश incorporating the परंपरागत स्पेनी प्रांतों of biscay, gipuzkoa, और álava, जिससे retain उनके existence as politico-administrative divisions.
These provinces and many areas of Navarre are heavily populated by ethnic Basques, but Basque was, at least until the 1990s, not spoken as a native भाषा in सबसे of álava, पश्चिमी भाग of biscay और सेंट्रल और दक्षिणी क्षेत्रों of Navarre, either because it had been replaced by Spanish along the centuries, in some areas, or because it had never been spoken there, in other areas.
In southwestern France, the ancient Basque-populated provinces were labourd, निम्नतर नावारा, और Soule.
They and other regions were consolidated into a single département in 1790 अंतर्गत the नाम basses-pyrénées, a name which persisted until 1970.
A standardized form of the Basque भाषा, पुकारा euskara batua, थी developed by the Basque Language Academy in the late 1960s.
Euskara Batua थी निर्मित so that Basque language could be used—and easily understood by all Basque speakers—in formal situations ( education, mass media, literature ), and this is its main use today.
The role of this standard Basque language depends on the linguistic educational मॉडल of प्रत्येक प्रदेश and each school.
In most areas of the Spanish Basque Country, the educational Model D, where all subjects are taught in बास्क, मगर `` स्पेनी भाषा और साहित्य '' ( जिससे is सिखाया in Spanish ) is now the predominant model.
In France, the Basque language school Seaska and the association for a bilingual ( Basque and French ) schooling Ikasbi meet a wide दायरा of बास्क भाषा शैक्षणिक needs up to the छठे रूप, जबकि often struggling to surmount financial and administrative constraints.
Apart from this standardized version, there are five main Basque dialects : Bizkaian, Gipuzkoan, and Upper Navarrese in Spain, and navarrese–lapurdian और zuberoan ( in फ़्रांस ).
Although they take their names from the mentioned historic provinces, the dialect boundaries are not congruent with province boundaries.
The President, Directors and Company, of the Bank of the United States, commonly known as the First Bank of the United States, थी a सेंट्रल बैंको, चार्टर्ड for a term of twenty years, by the United States Congress on February 25, 1791.
Establishment of the Bank was included in a three-part expansion of federal fiscal and monetary power ( साथ साथ a संघीय मिंट और excise कर ) championed by सिकंदर Hamilton, first Secretary of the Treasury.
Hamilton believed a central bank was necessary to stabilize और improve the स्वदेश 's credit, and to improve handling of the financial business of the United States government under the newly enacted Constitution.
Officially proposed to the first सत्र of the पहला कॉंग्रेस in 1790, Hamilton 's Bank faced widespread resistance from opponents of increased federal power.
Secretary of राज्य थामस जेफरसन और जेम्स Madison led the opposition, which claimed that the bank was unconstitutional, and that it benefited merchants and investors at the expense of the majority of the population.
The पहला बैंको भवन is अभी a National Historic Landmark located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania within Independence National Historical Park.
James Wesley Marsters ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an अमरीकी actor and musician.
Marsters first came to the ध्यान of the सामान्य पब्लिक playing the लोकप्रिय अक्षर स्पाइक, a platinum-blond yobbish English vampire in the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and its spin-off series, Angel, from 1997 to 2004.
Since then, he has gone on to play other science fiction roles, such as the alien supervillain Brainiac on the Superman -inspired series Smallville, the omnisexual time मुसाफ़िर कप्तान जॉन हार्ट in अंग्रेजों science-fiction दिखाएँ torchwood and terrorist Barnabas Greeley in Sci fi 's Caprica.
marsters appeared in a supporting role in the 2007 movie P.S.
i प्रेम तुम और as the प्रमुख विपक्षी, Piccolo, in the 2009 fantasy adventure film Dragonball Evolution.
He appeared as a recurring character in the पहला ऋतु of the revival of Hawaii 5-0.
In molecular biology, human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by the निषेचित अंडा बाद conception.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta, and later by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors produce this hormone ; therefore, elevated स्तर measured जब the रोगी is नहीं गर्भवती can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
However, it is not known whether this production is a contributing कारण or an प्रभाव of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hCG, known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ), is उत्पादित in the pituitary ग्रंथि of males और females of all ages.
, the FDA has prohibited the sale of `` होम्योपैथिक '' और over the counter hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent and illegal.
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter, known by उसके स्टेज नाम बेयोंस ( ; born सितंबर 4, 1981 ), is an American singer, songwriter, dancer, and actress.
Born and raised in Houston, Texas, she performed in गायन और नाचना प्रतियोगिताओं as a चाइल्ड पहले forming in 1990 a group with Kelly Rowland and LaTavia Roberson that was eventually named Destiny 's Child.
Once signed to Columbia Records, the लड़कियों subsequently became एक of the world 's best-selling girl groups of all time.
The group was plagued by आतंरिक conflict and legal turmoil and Knowles suffered from depression that lasted for a number of years.
During the group 's hiatus, Knowles released her debut solo album Dangerously in Love ( 2003 ), which earned her five ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और रै बेची a कुल of 4.9 लाख नक़ल in the US alone.
It spawned Billboard number one singles `` Crazy in Love, '' considered by VH1 to be the `` Greatest Song Of the 00 's, '' and `` Baby Boy. ''
Following the disbandment of नियति 's चाइल्ड in 2005, Knowles 's second solo album B'Day ( 2006 ) contained the top five singles `` Déjà Vu ``, `` Irreplaceable ``, and `` Beautiful Liar ``.
Her प्रदर्शन in dreamgirls ( 2006 ) अर्जित her two Golden Globe nominations.
Knowles ' work playing Etta James in that film inspired her subsequent एल्बम i am...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) which spawned hits `` If I Were a Boy ``, `` Single Ladies ( Put a रिंग on it ) ``, `` हेलो ``, और `` मीठी सपनो ``.
The album also helped Knowles earn six Grammys in 2010, breaking the record for most ग्रैमी पुरस्कार जीती by a मादा कलाकार in एक night.
Her fourth album 4 ( 2011 ) deviated towards परंपरागत R & B and became her fourth consecutive number one album on the Billboard 200.
In January 2012, Knowles दिया जनम to daughter Blue Ivy Carter, her first child with husband Jay-Z.
Knowles has sold over 13 million albums in the US and 118 million records worldwide ( as well as a further 50 million records with नियति 's चाइल्ड ), और is एक of the best-selling म्यूज़िक कलाकारों of all time.
The रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of America ( RIAA ) recognized Knowles as the Top Certified Artist of the 2000s.
In 2009, Billboard named her the Top Radio Songs Artist of the decade and ranked her the Top Female Artist और the चौथी कलाकार of the Decade.
Beyoncé Knowles is the most nominated woman in Grammy Award इतिहास, receiving 17 पुरस्कार ; अन्य accolades शामिल 12 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक Awards, 7 Billboard Awards including a Millennium Award, and a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame as part of Destiny 's Child.

It was बाद covered by टिम McGraw with guest vocalist Faith Hill.

The सोंग पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks ( now Hot Country Songs ) charts.
Dear John is a 2010 American रोमांटिक नाटक - युद्ध फिल्मी अभिनीत अमांडा Seyfried and Channing Tatum.
It थी released theatrically in North America on February 5, 2010.

the फिल्म थी फिल्माया in 2009 in Charleston, South Carolina.

सांता fe ( ; ( Tewa : Ogha Po'oge, ) ) is the capital of the U.S. state of New Mexico.
It is the fourth-largest city in the राज्य और is the सीट of.
Santa Fe ( meaning “holy faith” in Spanish ) had a population of 67,947 in the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
It is the principal city of a Metropolitan Statistical Area which encompasses all of Santa Fe County और is भाग of the larger albuquerque-santa Fe-Las Vegas Combined Statistical Area.
The city’s full name when founded was La Villa Real de la सांता fé de सैन फ्रांसिस्को de Asís ( “The Royal Town of the Holy Faith of St. Francis of Assisi” ).

The Sons of Liberty was a group consisting of American patriots that originated in the pre-independence उत्तर अमरीकी British colonies.
The समूह थी formed to protect the rights of the colonists and to take to the streets against the taxes by the British government.
They are best known for undertaking the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी in 1773, which led to the Intolerable Acts ( an intense crackdown by the British government ), and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots.
ओसाका किला
is a city in the Kansai region of Japan 's main island of Honshu, a designated city under the Local Autonomy Law, the capital city of Osaka Prefecture and also the largest भाग of the keihanshin metropolis, जिससे comprises तीन प्रमुख शहरों of जापानी, क्योटो, ओसाका and Kobe.
Located at the mouth of the Yodo River on Osaka Bay, Osaka is Japan 's third largest नगर by जनसांख्यिकी बाद टोकियो ( खास wards ) and Yokohama.
Keihanshin is the second largest metropolitan area in Japan by population and one of the largest महानगर क्षेत्रों अत्यधिक क्रमित in the world, with nearly 19 million people, and by GDP the second largest area in Japan and the seventh largest area in the world.
Historically the commercial center of Japan, Osaka functions as one of the कमांड centers लिये the जापानी economy.
The ratio between daytime and night time population is 141 %, the highest in जापानी, highlighting its status as an economic center.
Its nighttime population is 2.6 million, the third in the country, but in daytime the जनसांख्यिकी surges to 3.7 लाख, दूसरी तभी बाद टोकियो ( combining the special wards of Tokyo, which is not a single incorporated city, for statistical purposes ; see the Tokyo article for more information on the definition and makeup of Tokyo ).
Osaka used to be referred to as the in सामंती ईदो काल क्युकी it थी the केन्द्र of trading for rice, creating the first modern futures exchange market in the world.
The Little Mermaid is a 1989 American animated musical fantasy film produced by Walt Disney विशेषता एनिमेशन और वितरित by Walt Disney Pictures.
Based on the Danish fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen, The Little Mermaid tells the स्टोरी of a खूबसूरत mermaid who dreams of becoming human.
Written, directed, and produced by Ron Clements and John Musker, with music by एलन menken और हावर्ड ashman, the फिल्मी सुविधाएँ the आवाज़ें jodi बेंसन, क्रिस्टोफर डेनियल barnes, Pat Carroll, Samuel E. Wright, Jason Marin, Kenneth Mars, Buddy Hacket, and Rene Auberjonois.
The 28th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series, The Little मरमेड थी released to थिएटर on नवम्बर 14, 1989 to largely धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ, garnering $ 84 million at the box office during its initial release, and $ 211 million in total lifetime gross.
After the success of the 1988 Disney / Amblin film Who Framed Roger Rabbit, The Little Mermaid is given credit for breathing life back into the art of Disney animated विशेषता films बाद a स्ट्रिंग of नाजुक or वाणिज्यिक असफलताओं उत्पादित by डिज़्नी that dated back to the early 1970s.
It also marked the start of the era known as the डिज़्नी पुनर्जागरण.
A स्टेज अनुकूलन of the फिल्मी साथ a किताब by डग राइट और अतिरिक्त गीतों by एलन Menken and new lyricist Glenn Slater opened in Denver in July 2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10, 2008.
alt=Close-up photo of a मेटल चमचा filled with a viscous, clear purple fluid
Purple drank is a slang term for a recreational drug popular in the hip हॉप जातियाँ in the दक्षिणी संयुक्त राज्य, originating in Houston, Texas.
Its main ingredient is नुस्खा -strength cough syrup containing codeine and promethazine.
Cough syrup is typically mixed with ingredients such as Sprite soft drink or Mountain Dew and टुकड़े of प्रसन्न rancher कैंडी.
The purplish hue of purple drank comes from dyes in the खांसी syrup.
There are numerous slang terms for purple drank, including sizzurp, lean, syrup, drank, barre, purple jelly, Texas tea, and tsikuni.
First/given, middle, और last/family/surname diagram with J. S. Bach as example.
J. S. Bach shared his given name with six immediate family members and many विस्तारित परिवार सदस्यों.
He साझा उसके परिवार name with most family members.
A given name, in Western contexts often referred to as a पहला नाम, is a निजी नाम कि specifies और differentiates between members of a group of individuals, especially in a family, all of whose members usually share the same family name ( surname ).
A given name is purposefully given, usually by a child 's parents at or near birth, in कंट्रास्ट to an inherited एक ऐसे as a family name.
A given name is sometimes legally changed through a name change.
Given names are often used in a familiar and दोस्ताना manner in informal situations.
In more formal situations the surname is used instead, unless it is necessary to फर्क between लोगों साथ the वही उपनाम.
The idiom `` on a first-name आधार '' ( or `` on first-name terms '' ) alludes to the familiarity of addressing another by a given name.
The western style of having both a परिवार नाम ( उपनाम ) and a given name is far from universal.
In many countries it is common for ordinary people to have only one name ( a mononym ).
हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड is a clear, colourless solution of hydrogen chloride ( H Cl ) in water.
It is a अत्यधिक क्षयकारी, दमदार खनिज acid with many industrial uses.
Hydrochloric acid is found naturally in gastric acid.
Historically पुकारा muriatic एसिड, और आत्माओं of नमक, hydrochloric acid was produced from vitriol ( sulfuric acid ) and common salt.
It first appeared during the Renaissance, and then it was used by chemists such as Glauber, Priestley और डेवी in उनके वैज्ञानिक research.
With major production starting in the Industrial Revolution, hydrochloric acid is used in the chemical industry as a chemical reagent in the large-scale उत्पादन of विनाइल chloride for PVC plastic, and MDI / TDI for polyurethane.
It has numerous smaller-scale applications, including household cleaning, production of जिलेटिन और अन्य खाना एडिटिव, descaling, and leather processing.
About 20 लाख टन of hydrochloric acid are produced annually.
Wheat ( Triticum spp. ) is a cereal grain, originally from the Levant region of the निकट ईस्ट और ethiopian हाइलैंड्स, but now cultivated worldwide.
In 2010, world उत्पादन of गेहूं थी 651 million tons, making it the third most-produced cereal after maize ( 844 million tons ) and rice ( 672 million tons ).
Wheat was the second most-produced cereal in 2009 ; world production in that year was 682 million tons, after maize ( 817 लाख टन ), और साथ राइस as a बंद तीसरा ( 679 million tons ).
इस अनाज is grown on more land area than any other commercial food.
World व्यापार in wheat is greater than for all other crops combined.
Globally, wheat is the leading source of vegetable protein in human food, having a उच्चतर प्रोटीन सामग्री than soybeans or the अन्य प्रमुख cereals, maize ( corn ) or rice.
In terms of total उत्पादन tonnages प्रयुक्त for food, it is currently second to rice as the main human food crop and ahead of maize, after allowing for maize 's more extensive use in animal feeds.
Wheat was a key factor enabling the emergence of city-based societies at the start of civilization because it was one of the first फसलों कि could be easily cultivated on a विशाल स्केल, और had the additional advantage of yielding a harvest that provides long-term storage of food.
Wheat contributed to the emergence of city-states in the fertile crescent, सहित the Babylonian and Assyrian empires.
Wheat अनाज is a स्टेपल खाना प्रयुक्त to मेक आटा लिये leavened, चपटा और steamed breads, बिस्कुट, cookies, cakes, breakfast cereal, pasta, noodles, couscous and for fermentation to make beer, other alcoholic beverages, or biofuel.
Wheat is planted to a limited extent as a forage crop for livestock, and its straw can be प्रयुक्त as a निर्माण सामग्री लिये roofing फूस.
The whole grain can be milled to leave बस the भ्रूणपोष लिये श्वेत आटा.
The by-products of इस हैं bran and germ.
The whole अनाज is a concentrated सोर्स of विटामिन, minerals, and protein, while the refined grain is mostly starch.

To प्रकाशित is to make content available to the general public.
While specific use of the पद may vary among देशों, it is प्रायः लागू to टेक्स्ट, बिंब, or other audio-visual content on any traditional medium, including paper ( newspapers, magazines, catalogs, etc. ).
The word publication means the act of प्रकाशन, और भी refers to any printed copies.
Melissa & Joey is an ABC Family original television series अभिनीत मेलिसा जोन हार्ट और Joey Lawrence.
It first aired on एबीसी परिवार on August 17, 2010.
The series follows local politician Mel Burke ( Melissa Joan Hart ) and Joe Longo ( Joey Lawrence ), जिसको mel hires to dekh बाद उसके भांजी और भतीजे after a Ponzi scheme leaves him broke.
The series was renewed by ABC Family for a second season of fifteen episodes, जिससे began airing on May 30, 2012 and ended on August 29, 2012.
Melissa & Joey ranks as cable TV 's # 1 telecast at 8 o'clock across target ऑडियंस 18–34, 18–49 और 12–34 जनसांख्यिकी.
On August 17, 2012, ABC Family renewed Melissa & Joey for a third season, नियत to प्रीमियर in spring 2013.
The Dharma wheel, often used to represent the प्रतिष्ठित Eightfold Path
The Noble Eightfold Path (, ) is one of the principal teachings of the Buddha, who वर्णित it as the रास्ता अग्रणी to the cessation of suffering ( dukkha ) and the achievement of self-awakening.
It is used to develop insight into the सच्चा प्रकृति of phenomena ( or reality ) and to eradicate greed, hatred, and delusion.
The Noble Eightfold Path is the fourth of the Buddha 's Four Noble Truths ; the पहला तत्व of the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold Path is, in turn, an understanding of the Four Noble Truths.
It is also known as the Middle पाथ or मध्य Way.
All eight elements of the Path begin with the word `` right '', which translates the word samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in pāli ).
These denote completion, togetherness, and coherence, and can also suggest the senses of `` perfect '' or `` ideal ''.
'Samma ' is also translated as `` wholesome '', `` हिकमत '' और `` skillful ''.
In Buddhist symbolism, the Noble Eightfold Path is often represented by means of the dharma wheel ( dharmachakra ), whose eight spokes represent the eight elements of the path.
the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये सोंग of the साल is an सम्मान प्रस्तुत at the Grammy Awards, a ceremony that was established in 1958 and originally called the Gramophone Awards.
Awards in several categories are distributed annually by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences of the United States to `` honor artistic achievement, technical proficiency and overall excellence in the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग, बगैर लिहाज़ to एल्बम बिक्री or चार्ट position. ''
Economics is the social science that analyzes the production, वितरण, और खपत of goods and services.
The term economics आता इससे the प्राचीन यूनानी ( ', `` management of a household, administration '' ) from ( ', `` house '' ) + ( ', `` custom '' or `` law '' ), hence `` rules of the house ( hold ) ''.
Political economy was the earlier name for the subject, but economists in the late 19th century suggested `` economics '' as a shorter term for `` economic science '' that also avoided a narrow political-interest connotation और as समान in रूप to `` गणित ``, `` ethics '', and so forth.
A focus of the subject is how आर्थिक एजेंटों behave or interact and how economies work.
Consistent with this, a primary textbook distinction is between microeconomics और macroeconomics.
Microeconomics examines the behavior of basic elements in the economy, सहित व्यक्तिगत एजेंटों ( ऐसे as households and firms or as buyers and sellers ) and markets, and their interactions.
Macroeconomics analyzes the संपूर्ण अर्थव्यवस्था and issues affecting it, including unemployment, inflation, economic growth, and monetary and fiscal policy.
Other broad distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing `` कया is '' ) और normative अर्थशास्त्र ( वकालत `` कया ought to be '' ) ; between आर्थिक सिद्धान्त और लागू अर्थशास्त्र ; between तर्कसंगत और behavioral अर्थशास्त्र ; and between mainstream economics ( more `` orthodox '' and dealing with the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus '' ) and heterodox economics ( more `` radical '' and dealing with the `` institutions-history-social structure nexus '' ).
Economic analysis may be applied throughout society, as in business, finance, स्वास्थ्य परवाह, और सरकारी, लकिन भी to ऐसे विविध विषय as अपराधों, education, the family, law, politics, religion, social institutions, war, and science.
At the turn of the 21st century, the expanding डोमेन of अर्थशास्त्र in the social sciences has been described as economic imperialism.
An increasing number of अर्थशास्त्रियों have पुकारा लिये increased जोर on environmental sustainability ; this area of research is known as Ecological economics.
इस is a सूची of अनुसूची iv दवाएँ अंतर्गत the Controlled Substances Act for the United States.
Required निष्कर्षों लिये drugs to be placed in this schedule:
The drug or other substance has a low potential for abuse relative to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances in schedule III.
The drug or other substance has a फिलहाल स्वीकृत चिकित्सा use in treatment in the United States.
Abuse of the drug or other substance may सीसे to सीमित शारीरिक dependence or psychological dependence relative to the drugs or other substances in schedule III.

US काउंटी household median income 2009.
Median US household income, 2001-2011
Household income is a माप commonly used by the United States government and private institutions.
Each household is measured by the आय of प्रत्येक निवासी over the age of 15.
Income includes wages और salaries, बेरोजगारी बीमे, विकलांगता भुगतान, चाइल्ड support payments received, regular rental receipts, as well as any personal business, investment, or other kinds of income received routinely.
जबकि inflation-adjusted ( `` रियल '' ) household income had been increasing almost every year from 1945 to 1999, it has since been flat and even decreased recently.
U.S. median household आय गिरी इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme poverty in the United States, अर्थ households जीना on कम than $ 2 प्रति दिन before government benefits, doubled from 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011, including 2.8 million children.
The residents of the household do not have to be सम्बन्धित to the सिर of the household for their earnings to be considered part of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a similar economic context, the उपयोग of household आय remains among the most widely accepted measures of income.
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any analysis of fluctuations within or among the household income categories, और may रेंडर direct comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible.
The बीतने रेट is पारिभाषित as the रेट of decrease with height for an atmospheric variable.
The variable involved is तापमान जबतक निर्दिष्ट वरना.
The terminology arises from the word बीतने in the भाव of a decrease or decline.
While सबसे प्रायः लागू to धरती 's माहौल the concept can be extended to any gravitationally supported ball of gas.
Blue Mountain State is an अमरीकी कॉमेडी श्रेणी कि premiered on Spike on January 11, 2010.

Apple Inc., formerly Apple Computer, inc., is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Cupertino, California that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software and personal computers.
Its best-known हार्डवेयर products are the Mac line of computers, the iPod music player, the iPhone smartphone, and the iPad tablet computer.
Its software includes the OS X and iOS operating systems, the iTunes media browser, the Safari web browser, and the iLife और iwork रचनात्मकता और उत्पादन suites.
The company was founded on April 1, 1976, और incorporated as Apple Computer, Inc. on January 3, 1977.
The word `` Computer '' was removed from its name on January 9, 2007, reflecting इसके shifted फ़ोकस towards उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स after the introduction of the iPhone.
Apple is the world 's second-largest information technology company by revenue after Samsung Electronics, and the world 's third-largest mobile phone maker after samsung और Nokia.
Fortune magazine named ठहराना the सबसे admired कम्पनी in the United States in 2008, and in the world from 2008 to 2012.
However, the company has received criticism for its contractors ' labor practices, and for Apple 's own environmental and business practices.
, Apple maintains 394 retail stores in fourteen countries as well as the ऑनलाइन ठहराना Store and iTunes Store.
It is the second-largest publicly traded corporation in the world by market capitalization, with an estimated value of us $ 414 अरब as of जनवरी 2013.
, the company had 72,800 permanent full-time कर्मचारी और 3,300 temporary full-time employees worldwide.
Its worldwide annual revenue in 2012 totalled $ 156 billion.
Section 8 housing in the दक्षिण bronx
Section 8 of the Housing Act of 1937 ( ), often simply known as Section 8, as repeatedly amended, authorizes the payment of rental housing assistance to private landlords on निमित्त of लगभग 3.1 लाख low-income households.
It operates through several programs, the largest of जिससे, the आवास Choice Voucher program, pays a large portion of the rents and utilities of about 2.1 million households.
The US Department of Housing and Urban विकास manages the Section 8 programs.
The Housing Choice वाउचर कार्यक्रम provides `` tenant-based '' rental assistance, so a tenant can move from one unit of at least minimum housing quality to another.
It also allows individuals to apply their monthly voucher towards the खरीदें of a घर, साथ over $ 17 अरब going towards ऐसे purchases प्रत्येक साल ( इससे ncsha.org analysis ).
the अधिकतम allowed voucher is $ 2200 a month.
Section 8 also authorizes a variety of `` project-based '' rental assistance programs, under which the owner reserves some or all of the units in a भवन लिये low-income किरायेदारों, in वापसी लिये a संघीय सरकारी guarantee to make up the difference between the tenant 's contribution and the rent for 1 cent in the owner 's contract with the government.
A tenant who पत्ते a subsidized project will lose access to the project-based subsidy.
The United States Department of आवास और शहरी विकास और संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of दिग्गजों अफेयर्स have a special Section 8 program called VASH ( Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing ), or HUD-VASH, which gives out a certain number of Section 8 vouchers to eligible homeless and otherwise vulnerable US armed forces veterans.
